#3#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Ruhango-Umuryango-w-abantu-6-baherutse-kwica-washyinguwe-mu-cyubahiro
Ruhango: Umuryango w'abantu 6 baherutse kwica washyinguwe mu cyubahiro Umuryango w'abantu 6 wishwe tariki ya 31/07/2014 bikamenyekana nyuma y'iminsi ibiri, kuri icyi cyumweru tariki 03/08/2014, nibwo waherekejwe mu cyumahiro mu murenge wa Byimana akarere ka Ruhango.
Ku isaha ya saa cyenda z'amanywa, nibwo abantu 6 bo mu muryango umwe bari batangiye kururutswa mu mva, abavandimwe b'uyu muryango bari baje ari benshi, ndetse harimo na Ngayaberura Silvestre ny'iri uyu muryango, wari wambaye imyenda iranga infungwa kuko amaze imyaka 4 afunze.
Umwe mu bavandimwe b'uyu muryango Niyirera Olive, avuga ko abana bishwe bari babyara be, kuko mama we ava inda imwe na se w'abana, Ngayaberura Silvestre.
Yagize ati "ubusanzwe njye mba i Tambwe, nabyumvise kuri radiyo sinabyemera, nabyemeye mpageze batangiye gutunganya amasanduku yo kubashyinguramo.
Rwose icyambabaje cyane ni ukuntu babishe babatemaguye".
Umuryango w'abantu 6 wiciwe rimwe mu karere ka Ruhango.
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Ruhango, Mbabazi Francois Xavier, yasabye abaturage gufatanya n'izindi nzego gutahura aba bagizi ba nabi, abizeza ko nibafatwa bazerekanwa ku mugaragaro.
Kugeza ubu abantu batanu nibo bamaze gutabwa muri yombi mu rwego rw'iperereza, nk'uko byatangajwe na Chief Supert Hubert Gashagaza umuvugizi w'igipolisi cy'u Rwanda mu ntara y'Amajyepfo.
Umwana w'umuhungu warokotse uru urupfu, wari waragiye gushaka akazi i Kigali mbere y'umunsi umwe ubwo uyu muryango wicwaga, ntiyabonetse mu muhango wo gushyingura abavandimwe be, abantu bakaba bakomeje kumwibazaho byinshi niba we akiriho.
Uyu muryango washyinguwe ahantu hamwe.
Amakuru y'urupfu ry'uyu muryango yamenyekanye mu gitondo cyo ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 02/08/2014, ubwo umwana w'umuhungu yahageraga agasanga ihene zabo zimaze iminsi hanze ziziritse ndetse n'inka zirimo kwabira kubera inzara.
Abishwe ni abana 5 bari hagati y'imyaka 4 na 17 ndetse na mama wabo.
Uyu mwana w'umuhungu wabobonye bwa mbere ngo yari aragiye ingurube hafi yaho abona ihene zimaze iminsi ziziritse hanze, abona ku rugi hegetseho arahamagara arababaza ati "ese amarwa y'ejo aracyabarimo?
Yumva ntawukomye, ararunguruka abona abantu bishwe bateramaguwe ibyuma ahita atabaza.
Uyu muryango waherekejwe n'abantu benshi.
Uru rupfu kugeza ubu raracyateje amayobera menshi, gusa umuyobozi w'akarere ka Ruhango, Mbabazi Francois Xavier, avuga ko hakekwa amakimbirane ashingiye ku butaka.
Kuko ngo uyu muryango wari ufite isambu watijwe n'umuntu, ariko iyi sambu uwayibatije nawe yari yarayitijwe n'undi.
Eric Muvara

Abasobanura filime bahinduye umuvuno wo kuzigeza ku bazikunda mu ngo mu kwirinda Coronavirus Abakunda filime zisobanuye bashyizwe igorora kuko batangiye kuzigemurirwa mu ngo muri gahunda yo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyane ko Abanyarwanda basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo.
Mu ngamba zatangajwe ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatandatu, Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente, yavuze ko hashingiwe ku ntera Coronavirus imaze gufata n’uburyo ibindi bihugu bihangana nayo, abantu badafite ibikorwa byihutirwa bagomba kuguma mu ngo.
Mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara abantu 19 banduye Coronavirus, ndetse bakaba barahuye n’abandi bantu basaga 680.
Bitewe n’ubwiyongere bw’abanduye hahise hafatwa imyanzuro irimo ko ’gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa birabujijwe, keretse abajya gutanga no gushaka serivisi z’ingenzi harimo kwivuza, guhaha, serivizi za banki n’izindi.’
Mu gufasha Abanyarwanda bari mu ngo kuticwa n’irungu, Rocky Kirabiranya na Bugingo Bonny uzwi nka Junior bazwi cyane mu gusobanura filime bashyizeho gahunda yo kugeza filime ku bazishaka nk’uburyo bwo kubegereza icyo bahugiraho no kubahiriza amabwiriza ya leta abasaba kutava mu rugo.
Junior Giti yagize ati ”Kurwanya Coronavirus ngo idakwirakwira hose birasaba ko buri wese aguma mu rugo ntagire aho ajya.
Ubu biroroshye filime zirabageraho ku buryo bworoshye ziragusanga wibereye mu nzu aho uri.
Mukomeze mwirinde mugire ubuzima buzira umuze, kandi iyi ndwara twese tuyiviriyeho inda imwe yacika burundu.”
Abajijwe umubare wa filime umukiliya ahabwa, Rocky yagize ati “Turi muri gahunda yo gufasha Leta ko abantu baguma mu ngo zabo, turashaka kubaha ibyo bahugiraho rero tubaha izo twizeye neza ko zizamara igihe gihagije.”
Umuntu ushaka filime zisobanurwa n’aba basore bimusaba guhamagara 0785648331 na 0789060086 ubundi bakazimushyira ku biciro bumvikanye cyane ko bishyura bitewe n’ubwumvikane hagati y’impande zombi.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro n’inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu.

Abaturarwanda basabwe gukomeza kwitwararika, bakurikiza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima hibandwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki, kwirinda kujya ahantu hateraniye abantu benshi n’ingendo zitari ngombwa.
U Rwanda rwafashe ingamba zirimo gufunga amashuri, insengero n’ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi ndetse abakozi bashishikarizwa gukorera mu mu ngo aho bishoboka no kugabanya ingendo mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.

#71#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/inkomoko-y-insigamigani-yaje-nk-iya-gatera
Inkomoko y’insigamigani “Yaje nk’ iya Gatera” Uyu mugani bawuca iyo hagize igikorera umuntu amarorerwa kimuguye gitumo, ni bwo bagira ngo ‘Cyaje nk’iya Gatera!’
Wakomotse kuri Gatera w i Tanda na Rusizi mu Buganza, bivuye ku mukazana w’ikirongore na nyirabukwe bakorewe amarorerwa na Gatera.
Gatera k’i Tanda yari atuye mu Buganza bwa ruguru ya Muhazi, agakunda abagore byamushajije.
Umugore we bwite yari uw’i Bumbogo bwa Nkuzuzu mu Bwanacyambwe.
Bukeye sebukwe wa Gatera ararwara araremba, bamutumaho n’umugore we babibamenyesha.
Gatera ahaguruka iwe ajya kureba sebukwe, yambuka Muhazi, akomeza urugendo.
Ageze i Gicaca ashaka kunywa agatabi.
Areba ahantu hari agacucu arahicara atuma umuhungu bari kumwe ngo ajye kumutekerera.
Uwo muhungu ajya gutekera itabi mu rugo rwari hafi y’aho bari bageze.
Urwo rugo rwarimo umugeni umaze gutinyuka abantu ba hafi.
Yari amaze kujya yirirwa mu nzu yarongorewemo, atakirirwa kwa nyirabukwe na sebukwe.
Iyo nzu yarimo umuriro kuko bayicanagamo kugira ngo umuswa utazayirya.
Uwo muhungu abonye akotsi kava muri ya nzu; agenda ariho agana.
Inzu yari yase inkike ya ruguru, ifite n’igikari cyayo.
Ageze mu muryango, abona umukobwa w’inkumi wicaye mu mfuruka aboha.
Uwo mugeni yumvise umuntu winjiye, abanza kugira ngo ni mu bo basanganywe.
Umuhungu amuhereza intoke bararamukanya.
Umugenzi amusaba igishirira, undi aramubwira ati "Tambuka nguwo umuriro ku rubumbiro."
Aratambuka, atekera itabi, arahaguruka amusezeraho aragenda.
Amaze kugenda nyirabukwe w’umugeni amukurikiza amaso agira ngo amumenye ariko ntiyamumenya.
Asigara yibaza ati “Uriya muntu umviriye mu nzu y’umwana ni uwahe?”
Uwo muhungu ageze aho Gatera ari amuha itabi, amushimira n’uwo mukobwa ati" Muri ruriya rugo hari umukobwa mwiza cyane kandi ni umugeni kuko nabonye yitwikiriye mu maso."
Gatera ati “Ari mu nzu wenyine sha?”
Uwo muhungu ati “Ari mu nzu iri mu nkike ya ruguru yase urugo, arabohera mu mfuruka.”
Gatera ati " Mfasha iri tabi!"
Arahaguruka na we ajya mu rugo, aboneza uko wa muhungu yamubwiye.
Nyirabukwe w’umugeni arareba, abona Gatera yinjira mu nzu.
Umukobwa abonye ko ari umugabo ufite icyubahiro arahaguruka yigira mu kirambi.
Gatera amusanga mu kirambi vuba.
Umukobwa agira ubwoba amuhungira ku buriri.
Gatera akubita inyegamo amusangayo.
Wa mukecuru agira amakenga; aribwira ati " Uriya muntu watumye umwana, aho ntafitanye amasezerano n’umukazana wanjye?
Henga njye kureba."
Ubwo rero Gatera amaze kugera ku buriri afata wa mugeni baragundagurana, Gatera amurusha amaboko aramusambanya.
Igihe batararangiza, wa mukecuru aba ageze mu muryango arabumva.
Ntibyatinda, Gatera arangije amanuka ku buriri n’igihunga cyinshi.
Apfa kwihangana amuhereza ukuboko bararamukanya, Gatera ariyandurukira.
Uwo mukecuru atambuka agana mu kirambi, ahura n’umukazana ava ku buriri afite ipfunwe ryinshi, aramukoba, aramukwenura, ati "Yewe ga nyabu, yewe bakosha badahannye we!
Yewe wokanyagwa we, kugaragaza ingeso zawe utaranakizwa amasunzu!"
Umukobwa ati "Mukecuru urandenganya!
Uriya muntu simuzi, aje atyo nk’uko umubonye!"
Umukecuru ati "Urambeshya!
Yohereje umwana aza yitekeza itabi muravugana, asubirayo ajya kuvuga ubutumwa, amaze kubumubwira undi araza mujya ku buriri; ntiyagufatiye mu muryango, ntiyagufatiye mu mfuruka, ntiyagufatiye mu kirambi, ahubwo wamunshyiriye ku buriri bw’umwana!"
Umukecuru arashega ati "Henga inka zikuke mbivuge usendwe izo wakowe zimene ikibanga zikobwe undi!"
Ubwo rero Gatera yageze aho wa mwana bari kumwe ari, asanga igishirira cyazimye.
Arongera atuma uwo mwana ngo ajye kumushyiriraho ikindi.
Umwana ageze inyuma y’umuryango yumva uwo mukecuru akwena umukazana we.
Arahagarara akomeza kumva uko amukoba, yumva n’uko umukazana amwihohoraho amusaba imbabazi.
Undi aho kuzimuha akamutuka.
Byose amaze kubyumva, ati "Nimunyongere igishirira ikindi cyazimye."
Uwo mukecuru ati "Uwo utekerera itabi ni nde?"
Undi ati "Ni Gatera wo hakurya ya Muhazi i Tanda rya Ruzizi na Giheta."
Umukecuru ati “Murajya he?"
Undi ati "Turajya i Bumbogo bwa Nkuzuzu.”
Bamuha igishirira ashyira ku nkono ashyira Gatera.
Amutekerereza ibyo yumvise umukazana akorerwa na nyirabukwe.
Ati « Wagize nabi cyane!
Uriya mwana agiye gusendwa kubera wowe, kandi bambajije izina ryawe n’aho utuye byose ndabibabwira!
None rero uriya mukobwa nabwira bene wabo ko ibyo wamukoreye ari byo bimusendesheje bazakwitura ibihwanye n’ibyo wakoreye umwana wabo, kandi nibura ntumujyanye ngo akubere umugore cyangwa se ngo umuhe umwana wawe akubere umukazana.”
Gatera amaze kubyumva, ati “Mfasha iyi nkono!”
Umwana aramufasha.
Gatera asubirayo.
Ageze ku muryango yumva umukecuru aracyiyasira, yumva umukazana arira.
Yinjira mu nzu vuba, babona ageze mu kirambi.
Afata wa mukecuru , aramuterura amucana ( amunyurana) mu nyegamo amuta ku buriri.
Bagigiraho gato, Gatera amurusha amaboko, nawe aramusambanya.
Umukecuru akagumya kumutuka, ati “Wa gisazi we ndekura nirenganyirizaga umwana wo gatsindwa we!”
Biba iby’ubusa, Gatera aramwihorera, aritonda biratinda.
Umukazana aho yibereye mu kirambi agasekera mu bipfunsi.
Amaherezo Gatera ararangiza, amanuka ku buriri, asezera ku wa mbere (umukazana).
Undi ati “Urabeho kandi urakoze kuko unkuye mu cyaha wari unshyizemo.”
Gatera arigendera, umukecuru amanuka ku buriri n’ikimwaro kirengeje icyo umukazana yari afite mu kanya.
Nuko umukazana abaza nyirabukwe amwishongoraho, ati “Mbese aho wowe ntumuhaye ko mwatindanye?”
Undi ati “Mwana wa!
Hora mpore, ceceka nceceke, ubonye ishyano mbona irindi!
Mbese harya uriya mugabo ngo yitwa nde?”
Undi ati “Numvise wa muhungu atubwira ko yitwa Gatera.”
Uwo mukecuru ati “Bamera nyinshi, iya Gatera yo yaje ari sinsiga n’indamyi!”
Umukazana ati “Ntabwo mbireka jye sindabyara nzagomba gusaba amasubyo”.
Nyirabukwe ati “Mwana wa, uramenye uba unyambuye n’isazi ntizakugwe ku munwa!
Nayo amasubyo nzayagushakira nyaguhe.”
Nuko barigorora birashira kandi bombi bakomeza kuba inshuti za Gatera.
Nuko iyo nduru umukecuru yavugije yamagana Gatera yahuruje rubanda, bigeze aho byose biramenyekana, bamenya n’izina ry’uwo mugabo Gatera.
Kuva ubwo inkuru iba kimomo, ikije ari ingundirizi cyose, kigakoresha umuntu icyo atiteguye, atanagishaka, bati “Cyaje nk’iya Gatera.”
Yaba umuntu aguye undi gitumo atamwiteguye, bati “Yaje nk’iya Gatera!”

#104#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/IJWI-RY-UMUTURAGE/article7683.html
Gicumbi: Abayobozi bakubise abaturage, Minisitiri ategeka ko bahita birukanwa Umuyobozi ’Akagari afatanyije n’umuyobozi w’Umudugudu mu Kagari ka Rukurura , Umurenge wa Kaniga bakubise abaturage kuko banze gutanga ubwisungane mu kwivuza, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu ahita ategeka ko birukanwa ku kazi burundu.
Bernadette Mukamusoni wayoboraga Akagali ka Rukurura n’Umuyobozi w’umudugudu wa Ngabira uzwi ku izina rya Bahemuka bari mu maboko ya Polisi nyuma yo gukubita abaturage bane bakababaza ngo kuko banze gutanga ubwisungane mu kwivuza.
Byabaye kuwa Kane w’icyumweru gishize ubwo aba bayobozi bari bagiye kwaka abaturage amafaranga y’ubwisungane mu kwivuza, bamwe mu baturage banga kuyatanga aribwo ngo babakubise.
Abaturage bamaze gukubitwa, bahise batabaza ubuyobozi bwo hejuru ndetse Akarere gahita koherezayo itsinda rishinzwe gukurikirana icyo kibazo,naho abayobozi bakubise abaturage bo bahita batabwa muri yombi.
Ubwo Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu Francis Kaboneka yitabiraga gahunda y’Inteko rusange y’Akarere ka Gicumbi kuri uyu wa kabiri , yahise ategeka ko abo bayobozi birukanwa burundu mu kazi, ngo kuko bakoze ibinyuranyije n’indanagagaciro zakaranze umuyobozi.
Minisitiri Kaboneka yavuze ko kuba abaturage bataratanze ubwisungane bidaha uburenganzira umuyopbozi bwo kumukubita, ngo ahubwo igikiwiriye ni ukumwigisha akamenya impamvu akwiye gutanga ubwo bwisungane, ubutaha akajya abyibwiriza.
Minisitiri Kaboneka yavuze ko abayobozi bakeneye atari abakoresha ingufu mu kumvisha abaturage gahunda za Leta, ngo ahubwo abakenewe n’abigisha abaturage ibyiza bya gahunda za Leta.
Abo bayobozi bavugwaho gukubita abaturage bafungiye kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Mulindi mu Karere ka Gicumbi.
Muragijemariya Juventine

#119#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Abagabo-babiri-n-abana-babo-bafashwe-basarura-urumogi-muri-Nyungwe
Abagabo babiri n'abana babo bafashwe basarura urumogi muri Nyungwe Ntibigirwa w'imyaka 45 na mugenzi we Nayirwanda w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'abana babo babiri baguwe gitumo n'abacunga pariki ya Nyungwe tariki 18/03/2013 aho babasanze bari gusarura umurima w'urumogi bari bahinze mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe.
Bombi bavuga ko bari basanzwe bazi ko gukoresha cyangwa gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge bibujijwe ndetse mu rwego rwo gusaba imbabazi bemeye ko bafite indi mifuka babitse mu ngo zabo kugira ngo babarirwe.
Abacunga pariki ya Nyungwe nibo bafashe abo bagabo barikumwe n'abana babo.
Aba bagabo beyemerera icyaha batuye mu murenge wa Butare mu karere ka Rusizi bakaba bafungiye kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Kamembe.
Imbuto y'urumogi ngo bayihawe n'umugabo w'Umurundi witwa Nzeyimana Daniel wababwiye guhinga rwinshi kugira ngo nibasarura incuro imwe bazahite basezera ku bukene.
Ntibigirwa na mugenzi we Nayirwanda kandi bakurikiranyweho kwica inyamaswa zo muri parike.
Ubwo bafatwaga bari bafite inyamaswa yitwa Umuhari n'imitego bazitegesha. ngo nyama zazo nizo zibatunga mu gihe baba bari mu ishyamba.
Abagabo bafashwe basarura urumogi muri Nyungwe.
Abarinzi ba pariki ya Nyungwe batangaza ko umurima bafatiyemo aba bagabo ungana na hegitari imwe gusa banavuga ko gufata aba bangiza ibidukikije bitoroshye kuko ngo barwana nabo kakahava ndetse ngo mu minsi yashize bamugaje umwe muri bagenzi babo ku buryo bukomeye .
Ingingo ya 593-597 yo mu gitabo cy'amategeko ahana zivuga ko umuntu wese ukoresha cyangwa uhinga ibiyobyabwenge ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku mwaka umwe kugera ku myaka itatu n'ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi 50 kugeza ku bihumbi 500.
Hejuru y'urumogi hari inyamaswa bishe muri pariki ya Nyungwe.
Iyo abyinjiza mu gihugu ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku myaka itatu kugeza ku myaka itanu n'ihazabu y'amafaranga kuva ku bihumbi 500 kugeza kuri miliyoni eshanu.
Musabwa Euphrem

#120#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/article/inkomoko-y-insigamugani-yigize-nyiranzakaha
Inkomoko y’insigamugani “Yigize nyiranzakaha” Uyu mugani bakunda kuwucira ku muntu w’igitsina gore wigize (bamenya) y’iby’aha n’aha; ni we bavuga ngo (Yigize Nyiranzakaha!)
iyo ari igitsina gabo bavuga “Bamenya”.
Wakomotse ku muja wa Rugaju witwaga Mupfasoni, wo mu Bibungo bya Mukinga (Gitarama); ahasaga umwaka wa 1800.
Izina rya Nyiranzakaha si irya se, ahubwo ni irihimbano.
Ubundi yitwaga Mupfasoni, akaba umuja wa Rugaju rwa Mutimbo; wa mutoni w’akadasohoka wa Yuhi Gahindiro.
Se wa Mupfasoni yari umugaragu wa Mutimbo.
Uwo mukobwa abana na Rugaju bakiri abana; barareranwa baragirana inyana barakurana.
Bukeye Rugaju ahakwa n’ibwami ariko ahijyanye; nta wamushohoje!
Aratona aba umutware w’akadasohoka.
Nuko amaze kuba umutware birambuye yibuka wa mukobwa Mupfasoni.
Aramutumiza aramushyingira.
Umuhungu umurongoye agabana ubutware ku mpamvu ya Mupfasoni w’inshuti ya Rugaju.
Mupfasoni amaze kubyara kabiri umugabo we arapfa.
Rugaju amushyira iwe, ariko amurekera n’iby’umugabo we; urugo n’inka n’abagaragu.
Aramutonesha cyane; umuntu wese ushaka ubuhake kuri Rugaju akabanza guca kuri Mupfasoni; n’ugize ubuhake buke yegera Mupfasoni ngo amuhakirwe bikamuhira.
Arahongerwa karahava; ndetse no mu batware ba Gahindiro, uwagiraga amakuba yihutiraga kujya kwa Mupfasoni ngo amubwirire Rugaju amumuhakirweho.
Umuntu yamubaza uko Rugaju amumereye, Mupfasoni, ati “Ndabizi humura nzabikumarira’’.
Ni bwo abahungu bamuhinduye Nyiranzakaha.
Ariko bakabivuga rwihishwa kugira ngo atabimenya bikabagwa nabi.
Bukeye aho Rugaju agiriye amakuba, ariko bigihwihwiswa mu rwihisho ibwami bareshya Mupfasoni baramujyana ngo ababwire neza ibya Rugaju.
Ageze ibwami akajya abamenyesha uko ameze kugeza igihe bamutangiye.
Amaze gupfa, ibwami bahindukirana Nyiranzakaha; bati “Na we ntakwiye gusigara’’.
Baramutanga.
Rubanda rubyumvise bariyamirira, bati “Nyiranzakaha apfanye nashebuja Rugaju!’’.
Nuko bisakara igihugu cyose, biturutse kuri Mupfasoni wari warihaye kumenyera Rugaju ibihwihwiswa aha na hariya.
Kuva ubwo rero, ushatse kumenya ibintu byose by’aha na hariya, na we bakamugereranya na Mupfasoni, bati “Naka uriya cyangwa nyiranaka yigize Nyiranzakaha!’’ -Kuba nyiranzakaha ( = nyira-nzi-akaha) = Kwigira bamenya w’ibintu byose.

#135#	6	religion	https://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/igisibo-cy-ukwezi-kwa-ramadhan-kizasozwa-ku-cyumweru
Igisibo cy’Ukwezi kwa Ramadhan kizasozwa ku Cyumweru Ubuyobozi bukuru bw’Umuryango w’Abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RMC) bwatangaje ko Umunsi Mukuru usoza igisibo gitagatifu cy’ukwezi kwa Ramadhan uzaba ku Cyumweru tariki 24 Gicurasi 2020.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Mufti w’u Rwanda, Sheikh Salim Hitimana, rimenyesha Abayisilamu ko isengesho ry’uwo Munsi Mukuru wa Iddil-El Fitri bazarikurikirana kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda guhera saa Moya kugeza saa Mbili za mu gitondo.
Ibyo bikaba bisobanuye ko isengesho rizabera mu ngo kubera kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus nk’uko RMC yabishimangiye.
Itangazo rigira riti “Ubuyobozi buboneyeho umwanya wo kumenyesha Abayisilamu ko mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID -19 amasengesho bazayakorera mu ngo zabo n’imiryango yabo.”
Ubusanzwe mu bihugu byinshi Umunsi wa Eid al-Fitr wizihizwaga byihariye n’Abayisilamu aho babyukira mu masengesho mu misigiti, agakurikirwa n’ibirori bihuza Abayisilamu n’abandi baba batumiye bishimira ko barangije igisibo gitagatifu amahoro.
Ibyo byose uyu mwaka ntibizakorwa uko byari bisanzwe kubera ingamba zashyizweho hirya no hino ku Isi zo guhangana na Coronavirus.
Muri rusange Igisibo nacyo cyakozwe mu buryo budasanzwe kubera ibihe bidasanzwe.
Ibyakorerwaga mu misigiti, byakorewe mu ngo, uretse gutora Adhana byakomeje nk’ibisanzwe mu kwibutsa Abayisilamu isaha yo gusenga.
Ku Cyumweru azaba ari tariki 24 Gicurasi 2020 ku Ndangaminsi isanzwe, naho ku ya Islam izaba ari tariki ya 1 Ukwakira [bita Shawwar] umwaka wa 1441.
Ntabwo Abayisilamu bazosoreza igisibo muri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo nkuko byari bisanzwe bigenda Igisibo cy’Ukwezi kwa Ramadhan kizasozwa ku Cyumweru

#202#	3	economy	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/huye-hari-abacuruzi-bifuza-kuba-muri-momo-pay-bayibuze-kugeza-ubu
Huye: Hari abacuruzi bifuza kuba muri Momo Pay bayibuze Mu gihe abantu bashishikarizwa kwifashisha ikoranabunga mu guhererekanya amafaranga mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa rya Coronavirus, hari abacururiza mu isoko rya Huye bavuga ko hashize igihe basabye gushyirwa muri Momo Pay batarabyemererwa.
I Huye hari abacuruza imboga n’imbuto bavuga ko bifuje kujya muri Momo pay ariko batarabihabwa Uburyo bwo kwishyura hifashishijwe Momo Pay bwashyizweho na sosiyete y’itumanaho ya MTN, bufasha abacuruzi kwakira amafaranga y’abakiriya nta yo kubikuza barengejeho, na bo bakabasha kuyabikuza babifashijwemo na MTN nta kiguzi, cyangwa bakayashyira kuri konti za banki zabo na bwo nta kiguzi.
Umwe muri abo bacuruzi agira ati “Guhererekanya amafaranga turabyumva ko twahandurira, ariko noneho hano mu isoko abamaze guhabwa Momo Pay ni bakeya.
Abandi ntiturazibon, sinzi ikibazo cyabaye.
Iyo mbonye umukiriya ushaka kwishyura hifashishijwe Momo, njya kuri mugenzi wanjye uyirimo akaba ari we bishyura, we akazayansubiza yabikuje”.
Hari n’umubyeyi na we ucururiza imbuto mu isoko rya Huye uvuga ko we yari yayihawe, iza guhagarara atazi impamvu.
Ati “Hari abakiriya bancika kubera ko itagikora.
Muri MTN bambwiye gushaka manaja (manager), mureba kabiri, haza n’umuhungu wo kuyimfungurira arambwira ati bazagufungurira, ndategereza ndaheba.
N’ubu ngiye gusubira kuri MTN kuko ndayigira ntayigira”.
Abafite Momo Pay na bo bavuga ko bagifite imbogamizi y’uko badashobora gufata amafaranga bakiriye kuri Momo Pay ngo na bo bayifashishe mu kurangura n’abayirimo, kuko bitemera.
Hari n’abavuga ko abo barangura batagira telefone, ku buryo biba ngombwa ko bo babishyura amafaranga mu ntoki.
Byahurirana n’uko kugira ngo amafaranga umuntu yakiriye kuri Momo Pay ashobora kuyabikuza ku biro bya MTN gusa cyangwa kuyashyira kuri konti ye ya banki hanyuma akajya kuyabikuzayo, bigatuma hari igihe bibaviramo kubura ibyo bari bagiye kurangura.
Murekatete ati “Ujya kuri MTN ugasangayo umurongo, rimwe na rimwe bikakuviramo gusanga imari bayitwaye.
Byaba byiza Momo Pay igeze ku bakora ubucuruzi bose, hanyuma hakanabaho uburyo bwo guhererekanya amafaranga yakiriwe mu buryo bwa Momo Pay ku buntu, bitabaye ngombwa kwifashisha Mobile Money kandi bwo bagukata amafaranga”.
Hari n’abaguzi binubira kujya guhaha bagasanga abacuruzi batari muri Momo Pay, nyamara kuri bo kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga ari bumwe mu buryo bwo kwirinda Coronavirus.
Aba bavuga ko byoroshye kuba amafaranga yakiriwe i Rusizi mu gitondo, yarara i Nyagatare, na bwo yanyuze mu ntoki z’abantu benshi, harimo wenda n’abafite Coronavirus.
Uwitwa Fidèle Kamanzi ati “Ejobundi nagiye kugura porte-manger, nsanga uwo tugomba kuyigura nta na mobile money abamo, nyamara afite telefone.
Yansabye kumwishyura ndengejeho ayo kubikuza, na bwo mwishyura mbinyujije kuri mugenzi we uri muri Momo Pay.
Namubajije impamvu y’ayo mafaranga arengaho, avuga ko nta kundi byari kugenda kandi atari we nguriye”.
Kamanzi ngo hari n’aho yagiye kugura imbuto, ashatse kubishyura yifashishije terefone bamubwira ko ibyo ari iby’abakire, nta muntu w’umukene wishyurwa gutyo.
Ati “Hari hakwiye kubaho uburyo bwo gutegeka abacuruzi bose kugira uburyo bwo kwishyura hifashishijwe Momo, kuko abantu bose babagana.
Utabyubahirije agafungirwa, cyane ko ari ibintu bikorerwa ubuntu”.
Camille Birasa, umukozi wa MTN ushinzwe Amajyepfo, avuga ko abenshi mu bacuruzi b’i Huye batarashyirwa muri Momo Pay nyamara barabisabye ari abacuruza imboga n’imbuto, bakorera ku mapatante atari ayabo.
Ati “Turi kwiga ku mwanzuro wafatwa ku kibazo cyabo.
Turaza kohereza mu isoko abakurikirana iki kibazo, gikemuke”.
Ku bijyanye no kuba abari muri Momo Pay batabasha kwifashisha amafaranga bayifiteho kugira ngo na bo ubwabo babashe kurangura, Birasa avuga ko kuba byashoboka byatangijwe mu minsi yashize, ko atari azi ko bitemera.
Naho ku bijyanye no kubikuza amafaranga yakiriwe muri Momo Pay, abayirimo bahitamo hagati yo kuba bajya bayibikuriza hifashishijwe mobile money bakishyura bisanzwe, cyangwa kunyuza amafaranga yabo kuri konti zabo nta mafaranga baciwe cyangwa se na none ibiro bya MTN bikabibafashamo ku buntu ku babikuza amafaranga ari munsi y’ibihumbi 40.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hose, abacuruzi bifashisha Momo Pay ni ibihumbi 40, kandi amafaranga bagenda banyuzaho ngo agenda yiyongera uko iminsi yicuma, nk’uko bivugwa na Birasa.

#219#	1	sports	http://www.kigalitoday.com/imikino-11/football/article/masudi-yagaruye-manzi-thierry-yiteguye-kudasuzugurwa-kabiri
Masudi wagaruye Manzi Thierry, yiteguye kudasuzugurwa kabiri Umutoza Masudi Juma aratangaza ko APR iramutse imutsinze kabiri byaba ari agasuzuguro, atangaza ko Abouba Sibomana adakinnye hari izindi ngamba Mu myitozo ya Rayon Sports iri kubera i Rugende ahazwi nko ku Mafarashi, Masudi Juma utoza Rayon Sports yatangaje ko yiteguye gitsinda APR Fc, kuko abaona ko iramutse imutsize kabiri byaba ari agasuzuguro ku mugabo.
Mu myitozo i Rugende ....
Rwarutabura, n'abandi bari bitabiriye imyitozo Rwigema Yves wahoze muri APR Fc, aritegura kongera guhura nayo Masudi kandi yatangaje ko ikipe ye ihagaze neza, kandi ko yiteguye gukina n'ubwo avuga ko hirengagijwe amategeko Abouba Sibomana yateganyaga kubanza mu kibuga akimwa ibyangombwa.
Abakinnyi mu myitozo i Rugende Ibi ni bimwe mu byo Masudi yatangaje mbere yo gukina na APR "Nta rimwe kabiri mu rugo rw'umugabo, byaba ari agasuzuguro yongeye APR kudutsinda nk'uko yadutsinze muri pre-season, ubushize ni twe twabihereye ibitego ntabwo bigeze baturusha, ubu ibyo twarabikosoye" Rwarutabura, n'abandi bari bitabiriye imyitozo "Banze gukurikiza amategeko,Rayon Sports si ikipe ishngira ku mukinnyi umwe, Abouba nadakina hari abandi bazakina kandi twizeye intsinzi, tuzakoresha ubwenge bwacu bwose dufite ariko umukino tuwutsinde."
Yavuze no kuri Manzi Thierry watunguranye akagaragara ku myitozo "Manzi Thierry maze iminsi musura tunavugana, ntiyivurije hanze (muri Maroc) ariko amaze iminsi yivuza, kandi nawe yavuze ko ari tayali gukina, gusa urutonde muzarumenya ku wa Gatandatu Saa tanu."
Manzi Thierry wa Rayon Sports, yatunguye abafana agaragara mu myitozo nyuma y'igihe ari mu mvune Mu myitozo yo kuri uyu mugoroba, umutoza yabanje gukoresha imyitozo irimo kumenyera gutera amashoti ya kure, nyuma aza kugabanyamo amakipe abiri.
Irambona Eric ushobora kuzabanzamo inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibumoso, mbere hatekerezwaga Abouba Sibomana Nshuti Savio Dominique .....
Ikipe ishobora kubanza mu kibuga urebye imyitozo y'uyu munsi: Ndayishimiye Eric Bakame, Nzayisenga Jean D'Amour Mayor, Irambona Eric, Munezero Fiston, Mugisha François Master, Niyonzima Oliver Sefu, Kwizera Pierrot, Manishimwe Djabel, Nahimana Shassir, Moussa Camara, Nshuti Savio Dominique.

#220#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/article/danny-vumbi-yahishuye-byinshi-ku-rukundo-rwe-n-umugore-bamaranye-imyaka-15
Danny Vumbi yahishuye byinshi ku rukundo rwe n’umugore bamaranye imyaka 15 Semivumbi Daniel wamamaye mu muziki nka Danny Vumbi, yavuze byinshi ku muryango we na Jeannette Muhawenimana, yitsa ku ipfundo riziritseho urukundo rwabo rumaze imyaka 19.
Danny Vumbi w’imyaka 41 ni umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda, by’umwihariko ari mu bafite urugo rukomeye uhereye kubigaragarira amaso.
Danny Vumbi na Muhawenimana bafitanye abana 2 b’abahungu; Henry Jayz Ineza na David Ihirwe.
Danny Vumbi yahoze ari umwe mu bagize itsinda rya The Brothers, aza kurivamo mu 2011 atangira gukora umuziki ku giti cye ndetse ari mu bahanzi bafite ubuhanga bwihariye kandi bakora ibihangano birimo ubutumwa bufasha benshi.
Uretse kuba umuhanzi, ni n’umwanditsi ukomeye w’indirimbo kuko benshi mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda bamwitabaza kugira ngo bakore indirimbo zifite icyanga.
IGIHE yaganiriye na we ku rukundo rwe na Muhawenimana n’andi mabanga y’urugo ye atazwi na benshi.
IGIHE: Bakunze kuvuga ko ingo z’ibyamamare zikunze kutamara kabiri.
Nawe ni ko ubibona?
Danny Vumbi: Nibyo.
Ikintu kiba ku Isi yose twirirwa tureba ntabwo nagihakana n’ubwo nta bushakatsi nakoze njye nka Danny Vumbi, ariko hari abagiye babukora.
Twirirwa tubona ingo nyinshi zisenyuka, na hano iwacu mu Rwanda tubona abantu bazwi babana ariko ukajya kumva ngo nyuma y’amezi atatu, atandatu cyangwa umwaka se, batandukanye.
Ntabwo biba byoroshye kubana n’umuhanzi, keretse nawe uri we kubera ko abahanzi baba mu Isi yabo, kuko producer aguhaye gahunda ya saa munani z’ijoro urayubahiriza.
Urumva niba ufite umugore ukagenda izo saha ntabwo byoroha.
Nko mu minsi ishize byambayeho nari mfite indirimbo ngomba kurangiza kandi ngomba kuyiririmbira abantu mu gitondo nka saa yine ahantu kure, kandi yari itararangira; producer arambwira ati nubona akanya saa munani z’ijoro uze tuyirangize.
Mbwira madamu nti ‘saa munani z’ijoro nibwo ndi bugende’, aransubiza ati ‘nta kibazo.’
Nk’ibyo hari udashobora kubyakira.
Kuba muba mudahuje gahunda, ikindi kivugwa mu bahanzi urabona ibintu by’ibiyobyabwenge nk’amayoga, n’abafana bari mu bintu bituma ingo zitaramba cyane.
Urugero wenda niba uri wa musitari w’umufana ufite abakobwa birirwa bakwandikira bakubwira ko bagukunda, hari umuntu udashobora kubyumva akavuga ati ‘ibyo aribyo byose ntabwo ari umuziki gusa’.
Hazamo ikintu cyo kumvikana n’uwo mubana no kuba muziranye, ni cyo cyatuma urugo rw’umuhanzi rwaramba rugakomera.
IGIHE:Wadusangiza ku rugendo rwawe n’umugore wawe mumaranye imyaka 15?
Danny Vumbi: Ntabwo tumaranye imyaka 15 gusa kuko twakundanye imyaka ine duhuriye muri Kaminuza, urumva imyaka 15 yo niyo tumaze nk’umugabo n’umugore.
Habayeho kumenyana bihagije no kwihanganirana ku tuntu tumwe na tumwe kuko nta muntu shyashya kuko ntabwo habura agatotsi mu mubano wanyu ariko mukakaganiraho mukakumva.
Nicyo cyamfashije kuba maranye iyi myaka yose n’umugore wanjye.
Hari ubwo ushobora gufata icyemezo mugenzi wawe ntagishyigikire, ibyo rero bisaba kwigomwa ku ruhande rumwe, iyo bitayeho nibwo usanga byageze mu nshuti byakwanga mukitabaza inkiko kuko zo zitananirwa zikabatandukanya.
Kumenya mugenzi wawe, kwihanganira mugenzi no kumwumva, nibyo byatuma urugo rukomera.
IGIHE: Dusangize uko wowe n’umugore wawe mwamenyanye!
Danny Vumbi: Twamenyaniye mu ngando z’abanyeshuri, njyewe nari ngiye mu mwaka wa kabiri we agiye kujya mu wa mbere.
Turamenyana, turakundana, kuko nigaga imibare nawe ariyo yiga kuko nigaga mu mwaka uri hejuru akajya ambaza nkamusobanurira, bitavuze ko murusha imibare ahubwo ni uko nigaga mu mwaka wisumbuye uwe, ibyo atarasobanukirwa akabimbaza nkamusobanurira kugeza ndangije ndamutegereza nawe akirangiza duhita tubana.
IGIHE: Umunsi wa mbere muhura byagenze bite?
Danny Vumbi: Umunsi wa mbere duhura yari arimo atembera.
Urumva ahantu habera ingando z’abanyeshuri akenshi haba hari udushyamba, yari arimo atembera mbona adashaka kwegera abantu, ndavuga nti ese uyu mwana uri gutembera wenyine uwamwegera, ndabikora ndamubaza nti ‘ese bite ko uri wenyine ati ndabikunda, nti ku buryo utaba uri kumwe n’abandi?
Nawe arambwira ati ‘none wowe uje hano utari wenyine?’
Kandi nanjye koko natambutse ubona ari nk’aho ndi njyenyine turahura.
Ni uko twahuye muri make ibintu birakomeza gutyo.
IGIHE: Umubwira bwa mbere ko ushaka ko mukundana hari hashize igihe kingana gute mumenyanye ?
Danny Vumbi: Duhura bwa mbere, twaraganiriye bisanzwe birakomeza amezi aba abiri, atatu… ndumva naramubwiye ko mukunda hashize amezi nk’umunani.
Twabanaga bisanzwe nk’umuntu nshobora kubaza ikibazo akansubiz, nk’uwo twajyana kureba umupira mu kigo, ariko hagati aho abantu baratangiye kugenda bavuga ngo ‘aba bantu ni inshuti’, ariko ntawe urahingutsa ijambo ry’urukundo.
IGIHE : Umubwira ko umukunda wabikoze gute?
Waramutunguye?
Danny Vumbi: Ibintu byo gutungurana rero mu nkundo ntabwo abantu babikora nko gutungurana kuko ushobora kubikora gutyo we akakubwira ko atagukunda.
Ni umwanya ushaka wihariye ukegera uwo ukunda, ukamubwira uti ‘ndagukunda ndumva bishobotse wazambera umugore cyangwa se bishobotse wazambere umugabo’ bitewe n’uwo ubwira cyangwa n’ukubwira.
Njye sinibuka neza isaha cyangwa umunsi cyangwa se uburyo nabivuzemo icyo nibuka ni uko nabimubwiye tumaranye icyo gihe tuziranye.
IGIHE: Yabyakiriye ate?
Danny Vumbi: Yarishimye na we ambwira ko ankunda kandi cyane, turakomeza.
IGIHE: Icyo gihe ntabwo wari uzwi mu kigo?
Danny Vumbi: Mu kigo bari banzi kuko nari naratangiye kuririmba, hari ibikorwa bimwe byabaga akagaragaza ibimenyetso by’urukundo.
Hari ukuntu nabaga ndi kuririmba akanzanira indabo ku rubyiniro abantu bakabyishimira.
Hari indirimbo ya The Brothers yitwa ‘Ijambo Ryawe’, ndibuka ko nigeze kuyiririmba akanzanira indabo ku rubyiniro abantu bakishima cyane, abanyeshuri bakabifata nk’ikintu kidasanzwe kuko iyo ndirimbo yarayikundaga n’abandi banyeshuri benshi bayikunda mu kigo kuko ntabwo yari yagasohotse yari izwi n’abo muri KIE aho twigaga gusa.
Aho niho abantu batangiye kugenda bahwihwisa ko dukundana ariko nta kintu cyo gukundana cyari kiri hagati yanjye na we ariko urumva ko yishimiraga ibyo nkora.
IGIHE: Nta ndirimbo n’imwe kugeza ubu uramuhimbira cyangwa se ngo uyihimbe ariwe biturutseho ?
Danny Vumbi: Oya.
Nta ndirimbo yihariye ndamukorera irebana n’urukundo rwacu cyangwa ubuzima bwe.
Ntayo.
IGIHE: Kubera iki ?
Danny Vumbi: Urumva umugore wawe kuririmba ubuzima bwanyu bw’urukundo ntabwo bishobokera abahanzi bose, hari abahanzi badakunda kuririmba inkuru mpamo kandi nanjye ndimo.
IGIHE: Ugira gutya wibaruka umuhungu umwita Jay Z!
Danny Vumbi: Umuhungu wanjye ntabwo arinjye wamwise Jay Z ahubwo akivuka hari murumuna wanjye wabaga mu rugo hanyuma akimubona ahita asakuza aravuga ngo mwabyaye Jay Z, ndavuga nti Jay Z wuhe?
ati wa wundi w’umuririmbyi, ati reba mu mafoto urebe ko adasa n’uyu mwana.
Hanyuma ngiye kureba koko nsanga barasa n’ubwo wenda uko umuntu agenda akunda isura igenda ihinduka, ariko barasaga.
Uwo murumuna wanjye niwe wakomeje kugenda amwita Jay Z n’abandi bana bararimwita birangira ku ishuri bamwise gutyo, turavuga tuti ‘ibyo aribyo byose ubwo ari izina rimuzwiho reka turishyire no mu byangombwa.’
IGIHE: Hashize igihe kinini ufite abana babiri, ujya uteganya kuzabyara bangahe?
Danny Vumbi: Nteganya kubyara abana babiri gusa, nta wundi mwana nteganya.
Ntabwo nabihamya neza ariko niko mbitekereza.
Ikindi kubera ko abana babiri mfite bakuze, umutoya afite imyaka 11, mba numva kumukurikiza umwana w’ukwezi haba harimo intera ndende cyane ku buryo byaba ari ikibazo, mba numva kubyara undi mwana bitazapfa kubaho muri iyi minsi.
Danny Vumbi n'umugore we bafitanye abana babiri b'abahungu IGIHE: Ntabwo uri mu batekereza kugira hungu na kobwa cyangwa ngo umugore abe yakubwira ngo mubyare undi mushaka umukobwa?
Danny Vumbi: Hari ikintu nabwira abantu, abateganya kubyara cyangwa se ababyaye.
Umwana wese ni umwana, wagize amahirwe yo kubyara umwana wuzuye ufite amaso, amatwi, amaguru… ni umwana umeze neza, ntugahangayikishwe n’uko atavutse ari umukobwa cyangwa se umuhungu.
Ibyo ni ibibazo bikunze kuba mu miryango imwe n’imwe, hari n’ababisenyeraho ingo zabo ariko mba mbona ari ubujiji kuko umwana wese ni umwana kandi urubyaro rwose rutangwa n’Imana, hari n’abashakana ntibabyare.
Mba numva umuntu yakabaye yishimira umwana wese wavutse gusa iyo wabyaye ibitsina byombi aba ari umugisha ugize, ariko ntabwo biba bivuze ko ubyaye abakobwa gusa cyangwa abahungu uba utarabyaye, uba ufite abana.
Icyo kibazo ntacyo nigeze ngira kuko kuva na kera nasengaga nsaba Imana umwana, ntabwo nigeze nyisaba umuhungu cyangwa umukobwa.
Ubwo rero kuba mfite abana babiri ni ibyo nyishimira.
IGIHE: Mu muryango ntabwo abantu bajya bagusaba agakobwa?
Danny Vumbi: Abavuga amagambo ntabwo babura mu bijyanye n’ingo z’abantu, hari n’uza akavuga ati ariko mwagerageje mukabyara umukobwa.
Umwereka ko icyo yavuze wacyumvise ariko ntabwo ucyitaho, ntabwo ugiha agaciro cyane.
IGIHE: Mu bahungu bawe hari uwari wagaragaza impano yo kuririmba?
Danny Vumbi: Impano barazifite abana banjye.
Umuhungu wanjye ntabikunda ariko afite ijwi ryiza ryaririmba, hanyuma umukurikira azi kubyina cyane ugereranyije n’abandi bangana ndetse azi no gukina umupira w’amaguru ku buryo twamushyize no mu ishuri ryabyo hamwe abana baba bakina cyangwa se biga ibintu bijyanye n’umupira mu biruhuko.
Ubu ari mu mashuri yisumbuye n’ubundi aba akina.
Ariko iyo ndebye mba mbona batabikunda cyane ahubwo bikundira amasomo, baba bibereye mu bintu by’ubuzima busanzwe.
Nanjye nk’umubyeyi ntabwo nabahatira gukora ikintu badakunda.
IGIHE: Ntabwo ujya wicara nko mu rugo ngo wigishe abana gucuranga ?
Danny Vumbi: Gitari bavutse bayibona, bakura bayibona.
Umwana rero ubona gitari ukabona ntacyo bimubwiye, ukagerageza no kuyimwigisha akakubwira ko ntabyo ashaka, ntabwo wabimuhatira.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe kintu utakundaga umugore wawe yagukundishije?
Danny Vumbi: Ibintu madamu wanjye yankundishije harimo kuganira cyane, ntabwo nabikundaga nari umuntu ugira make ariko kuba ndi kumwe na we akanganiriza cyane, byatumye nanjye nganira cyane bituma numva kubana n’umufasha ari byiza.
Ibindi yankundishije ni ugusenga.
Numvaga ari ngombwa ariko atari ngombwa cyane, ariko buriya siyankundishije ibintu byinshi ra!?
IGIHE: Ni ibihe byo kurya yagukundishije?
Danny Vumbi: Nta biryo runaka mvuga ngo ndabikunda cyane kuruta ibindi, ibihari ndarya.
Hari ibyo ntakunda cyane nk’ibijumba na we ntabwo yabashije kubinkundisha.
‘Ijambo ryawe’ indirimbo umugore wa Danny Vumbi yakundaga cyane Danny Vumbi aherutse gushyira hanze iyo yise ‘Abana Babi’ Urugo rwa Danny Vumbi na Muhawenimana ruzira induru n'intugunda Urugo rwa Danny Vumbi ruri mu ngo nke z'ibyamamare mu Rwanda zibanye mu mutuzo

#271#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/Ubwiteganyirize/Guhera-muri-2016-za-Sacco-zizatangira-kwifashisha-ikoranabuhanga
Guhera muri 2016 za Sacco zizatangira kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga Guhera mu ntangiriro z'umwaka utaha wa 2016 za Sacco zizatangira kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga, abanyamuryango babashe guherwa serivisi muri sacco bagezeho yose.
Iryo koranabuhanga rizatuma umunyamuryango wa Sacco abasha kubikuriza aho ageze nta gusubira aho yafungurije konti, nk'uko Umugenzuzi mukuru w'amakoperative mu kigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere amakoperative (RCA) Gilbert Habyarimana.
Ati "Kwihuza kwa za Sacco bizatuma bagira urwego rumwe rubarindira umutekano rufite ibya ngombwa byose nk'iby'amabanki."
Avuga ko icyo gikorwa kandi kizajyana no gushyiraho banki imwe za Sacco z'imirenge zizaba zihuriyeho.
Yongeraho ko iryo koranabuhanga rizatuma kandi abanyamuryango ba za sacco babasha kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga nko kubasha kumenya amafaranga bafite kuri konti.
Hakiyongeraho no kongerera umutekano amafaranga abitse muri za Sacco.
Bamwe mu basanzwe batabitsa muri Sacco bavuga ko nibigenda gutyo noneho na bo bazazigana.
Josiane Umulisa ucururiza mu karere ka karere ka Huye, avuga ko umunsi za sacco zizaba zibumbiye hamwe na we azafunguzamo konti, kuko ubusanzwe ntacyo bazinenga.
Ati "Ubundi umutekano urindishwa inkoni ni kimwe mu byatumaga ntitabira kujya muri sacco.
Nizihuzwa, zikagira abarinzi bizewe bitwaje imbunda, nta kabuza nzajyamo.
Nanazikundira ko zitanga inguzanyo mu buryo butagoranye."
Biteganyijwe ko ku ikubitiro Sacco 180 ari zo zizashyirwamo ikoranabuhanga nk'ikitegerererezo, izindi nazo zikazagenda zigerwaho nyuma.
Gahunda ihari ni uko 2016 uzarangira za sacco zose uko ari 416 zifashisha ikoranabuhanga.
Marie Claire Joyeuse

#276#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/urukundo/article/hakozwe-porogaramu-ya-telefoni-ifasha-abakundana-gutera-akabariro
Hakozwe porogaramu ya telefoni ihuza abashaka gutera akabariro Isi irakataje mu iterambere, ikoranabuhanga rimaze gushinga imizi mu mibereho ya benshi bituma hahangwa uburyo bushya bwo kuganira no guhanahana amakuru.
Kuri ubu hakozwe porogaramu ya ‘Feeld’ ifite umwihariko wo gufasha itsinda ry’abantu bashaka gutera akabariro kugabanya ingendo bakoraga bakaba babivugana no mu gihe bari ku kazi.
Feeld yahoze yitwa ‘3nder’ cyangwa ‘Tinder for threesomes’ mu Cyongereza, yashyizeho serivisi nshya y’ubutumwa bugufi bwohererezanywa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga ku bantu bifuza kujya mu rukundo.
Iyi serivisi ifasha abantu bakorana ku kazi runaka koherezanya ubutumwa bababaza niba bashobora kuryamana.
Ifite umwihariko kuko uwohererezwa ubutumwa atashobora kumenya ko ari gusabwa urukundo kugeza igihe bimujemo akisanga yabyemeye.
Ubuyobozi bwa Feeld bwashyizeho ubu buryo mu rwego rwo gufasha abantu kugaragaza ibyiyumviro by’imibiri yabo no mu gihe bari mu kazi, ibintu bavuga ko bifasha abatari bake kugira ubuzima bwiza.
Ubu buryo bwahoze bwitwa ‘Threesome’ bwahinduye izina ariko ntibwahinduye imikorere kandi ababukoresha ntibagomba guteshuka ngo barenge imbibi z’amategeko abagenga aho bakorera.
Ubuyobozi bw’uru ruganda bukomeza butangaza ko “Kwidagadura no gutebya uri ku kazi ni byiza, ariko kugaragaza ibyiyumviro byawe twizera ko bitugira abo dushaka kuba bo.”
“Uko byaba bimeze kose akazi ni akazi.
Iteka jya uzirikana ko ugomba gukora ibinogeye abo mukorana.”
Haracyarebwa amabwirizwa ngenderwaho, nko kuba abakoresha ubu buryo basezeranya ko hatazabaho kugirirana nabi hagati yabo kandi ko bazakomeza kugira amatsiko yo kumenya umuntu ubashakaho ubucuti no kwirekura mu gihe bamaze kumenyana.
Igihe iyi porogaramu izajya iba yashyizwe muri telefoni, uzajya wandika izina ry’uwo ushaka gusaba urukundo kandi amakuru yose utanze azajya agirwa ibanga mu gihe mutarahuza.
Aba bombi bazajya bahuzwa mu gihe ubu buryo bwemerera ubutumwa kugera kuri nyirabwo na we agatera intambwe yo kwiyumvamo mugenzi we.
Iyi porogaramu izajya ikugaragariza ubutumwa buvuga ko runaka akwiyumvamo ushobora gutangira kumuganiriza.
Feeld yakozwe n’ikompanyi yo mu Bongereza yitwa Feeld Ltd n’Umunya-Bulgarian witwa Dimo Trifonov mu 2014.
Mu 2015 yatangiye gukoreshwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ndetse kugeza mu ntangiriro za Kanama 2016, yari imaze gukoreshwa n’abasaga miliyoni imwe n’igice.

#383#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/urusobe-rw-ubuzima/article/basanga-atari-ngombwa-gutanga-insimburamubyizi-ku-miryango-ibanye-nabi
Basanga atari ngombwa gutanga insimburamubyizi ku miryango ibanye nabi Bamwe mu bakangurambaga mu byo kurwanya ihohoterwa mu ngo bavuga ko amafaranga y’insimburamubyizi imiryango nterankunga igenera imiryango irangwamo amakimbirane mu gihe babigisha, akwiye gukurwaho, bakayahabwa mu bundi buryo.
Abahabwa amahugurwa ku makimbirane ntibakwiye guhabwa insimburamubyizi Impamvu ni uko ngo hari bamwe na bamwe bamara gufata ayo mafaranga, aho kwiyunga cyangwa gukorera hamwe na bagenzi babo bakarushaho kubahohotera, kuko ayo mafaranga aho kuyikenuza bayajyana mu tubari, basinda bakitwara nabi.
Akenshi ayo mafaranga bayatanga nk’insimburamubyizi cyangwa nk’inyoroshyarugendondo, bitewe n’uko inyigisho zibakangurira kubana neza ziba zabereye kure y’aho batuye.
Concilie Mukandutiye, umuyobozi w’inama y’igihugu y’abagore mu murenge wa Gishubi mu Karere ka Gisagara agira ati “Ubundi tuba ari udufaranga dukeya.
Nubwo hari abumva inyigisho bakazikurikiza, amakimbirane bakayareka, n’amafaranga bahawe bakayikenuza, hakaba n’abayajyana mu kabari, ugasanga basinze, ihohotera aho gushira rikarushaho kwiyongera.”
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Gishubi, Jean Damascene Renzaho, avuga ko yaje gusanga hari n’ababona abagiye guhugurwa batahana amafaranga, na bo bagatangira guhohotera abo babana, kugira ngo na bo bazatumirwe mu nyigisho bibonere amafaranga.
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko hari n’abo yagiye abona baje gusaba ko bajya ku rutonde rw’ababanye nabi.
Renzaho asanga umuti kuri iki kibazo waba ko iyi miryango yajya itangira inyigisho zikenewe hafi y’ahatuye abagenerwabikorwa, hanyuma amafaranga y’insimburamubyizi cyangwa inyoroshyangendo bakazayabona mu buryo bundi butari ukubaha amafaranga mu ntoki.
Ati “Ntekereza ko icyiza ari uko abantu twakomeza kubigisha, tukanabafasha mu buryo butari ubwo kubaha amafaranga mu ntoki, tukabihindurira mu kubafasha kwishakamo ubushobozi, bakaba bakora ibimina bibafasha kurushaho kubana neza, bakaba bahabwa amatungo, n’ibindi.”
Najyingo Robinah, ukorera umuryango Action Aid ubu uri gufasha mu kurwanya ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana bari munsi y’imyaka 18 mu mirenge itatu yo mu Karere ka Gisagara, avuga ko bo aya mafaranga bagahaye abaje mu nama bateganya kuzayabafashisha mu bundi buryo.
Ati “Tugitangira umushinga twarabahamagaye kugira ngo bahure bamenyane, tubaha n’itike, ariko noneho tuzajya tubegera iwabo mu mirenge.
Urumva ko nta tike bakeneye.
Amafaranga twakabahaye nk’itike, nibamara gukora ibimina, bagakora umushinga runaka, tuzawutera inkunga.”
Aimé Nshimiyimana, umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’abafatanyabikorwa mu karere ka Gisagara, we avuga ko muri iki gihe abari gufashwa banahabwa amafaranga ahanini ari abakene bari mu cyiciro cya mbere n’icya kabiri cy’ubudehe, baba bakeneye gufashwa ngo bikure mu bukene.
Ati “Imiryango itari iya Leta iyo ibegereye, isanga mu ngo zabo harimo n’ihohoterwa, hanyuma amafaranga babahaye agatuma rya hohoterwa rigaragara kurushaho.”
Nshimiyimana we avuga ko ubwo bushobozi bagenerwa butahagarikwa, ahubwo inzego z’ubuyobozi, ari na zo ziba zabahaye imiryango itari iya Leta ngo ibafashe, zigafatanya na yo mu gufasha aba baturage guhinduka biteza imbere aho kurushaho gukimbirana.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Marie Claire Joyeuse Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ JoyeuseC

#424#	1	sports	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIKINO/article/Amakipe-5-afite-ballons-d-or-nyinshi
Amakipe 5 afite ballons d'or nyinshi Lionel Messi ni we uyoboye abandi na Ballons d'or 5 zose.
FIFA Ballon d'Or, ni igihembo gitangwa n'Impuzamashyirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru ku isi ku mukinnyi uba warahize abandi mu mwaka wose mu bagabo no.
Iki gihembo gitangwa hagendewe ku majwi aba yatanzwe n'abatoza b'amakipe y'ibihugu, ba kapiteni ndetse n'abanyamakuru bava hirya no hino ku isi.
Tugiye kurebera hamwe kuva iki gihembo cyatangira gutangwa mu mwaka 1956, amakipe (clubs) yagiye avamo abakinnyi bacyegukanye kenshi nk'uko tubikesha urubuga rwa interneti http://www.sportskeeda.com 5.
Inter Milan, Hamburg, Dynamo Kyiv- 2 Izi kipe uko ari 3 zo ku mugabane w'i Burayi zihuriye ku kuba abakinnyi bazinyuzemo hari abatwaye igihembo cya ballon d'or inshuro ebyiri.
Ba rutahizamu babiri ba Inter Milan Lothar Herbert Matthäus (1990) na Ronaldo muri 1997 ni bo bafite iki gihembo bakiniye iyi kipe yo mu Butaliyani.
Kevin Keegan wanakinnye muri Liverpool ni we watwaye iki gihembo akinira Hamburg, yagitwaye kabiri yikurikiranya mu mwaka wa 1978 na 1979.
Oleh Blokhin, umunya Ukraine ni we watwaye iki gihembo bwa mbere muri Dynamo Kyiv mu 1975 naho Igor Ivanovich Belanov agitwara mu 1986 ari muri iyi kipe.
4.
Manchester United Ku mwanya wa kane haza ikipe yatwaye shampiyona nyinshi mu gihugu cy'Ubwongereza Manchester United.
Ifite abakinnyi 4 begukanye iki gihembo.
Dennis Law muri 1964, Sir Bobby Charlton mu 1966, George Best muri 1968 na Cristiano Ronaldo mu 2008 ahize uwo bahangana cyane Lionel Messi na Fernando Torres.
3.
Bayern Munich- 5 Ku mwanya wa gatatu hari ikipe ya Bayern Munich ifite abakinnyi batatu batwaye ballon d'or bayikinamo.
Kabuhariwe Gerd Muller ni we wafunguriye abandi imiryango yo kwinjiza iki gihembo muri iyi kipe mu mwaka w'1970.
Franz Beckenbauer yahise amukurikira agifata inshuro ebyiri mu 1972 no mu 1976 mbere gato kugira ngo Karl-Heinz Rummenigge, na we agitware kabiri yikurikiranya mu 1980 na 1981.
2 Real Madrid, Juventus, AC Milan- 8 Umwanya wa kabiri wicayeho amakipe y'ubukombe n'ubundi afite abayakiniye batwaye ibihembo umunani bayakinamo.
Real Madrid yo muri Esipanye yafunguriwe imiryango na rutahizamu Alfredo di Stefano wagitwaye kabiri yikurikiranya mu 1957 na 1959, mu gihe umufaransa bakinanaga Raymond Kopa yagitwaye muri 1958.
Iyi kipe yategereje imyaka 41kugira ngo Luis Figo yiyongere kuri aba mu mwaka wa 2000.
Haje kuza umunyaburezili Ronaldo muri 2002 mbere gato ya Fabio Cannavaro 2006.
Nyuma y'aba haje na Cristiano Ronaldo ayitwara kabiri adasimbuwe muri 2013 na 2014.
Mu 1961 umutaliyani Omar Sivori yabimburiye abandi muri Juventus haza rutahizamu Paulo Rossi muri 1982 mbere y'uko Michel Platini atwara iki gihembo myaka itatu yose atarekura 1983, 1984 na 1985.
Mu mwaka 1993 Roberto Baggio yaragitwaye mbere y'uko utoza Real Mardid kuri ubu Zinedine Zidane na Pavel Nedved bagitwara mu 1998 na 2003.
AC Milan byayisabye gutegereza 1969 kugira ngo Gianni Rivera atware iya mbere, ndetse na none bategereza indi myaka ngo Ruud Gullit ayiterure mu 1987.
Babaye nk'aho babyihariye ubwo kabuhariwe Marco Van Basten yayitwaraga gatatu mu mwaka wa 1988,1989 na 1992.
Imyaka itatu nyuma, umunyafurika rukumbi George Weah yaje kuyitwara mu 1995 Andriy Shevchenko amukurikira mu 2004.
Iheruka ikaba ifitwe na Kaka wayitwaye mu 2007.
1.
FC Barcelona- 11 Nta gitangaje kuko ari na o basa nk'aho bayoboye umupira kuri ubu.
FC Barcelona ikaba yaragize abakinnyi batandatu batwaye ballon d'or 11 mu bihe bitandukanye.
Bayobowe n'ufatwa nk'uw'ibihe byose na bagenzi Lionel Messi uyifite gatanu kose.
Umukinnyi wo hagati Luis Suarez, ni we wabaye uwa mbere muri iyi kipe watwaye iki gihembo mu 1960, mu gihe kizigenza wa FC Barcelone Johan Cruyff yayihariye imyaka ibiri ikurikirana mu 1973 na 1974.
Barcelona yategereje imyaka 20 kugira ngo Hristo Stoichkov atware iyo mu 1994 maze imyaka ine gusa nyuma Rivaldo arayibaha mu 1998.
Mugenzi we kizigenza Ronaldinho wigaragaje bitangaje yahise atwara iya 2005.
Nyuma y'aba bose ariko, uwo benshi badatinya kuvuga ko atari umuntu mu kibuga, umunyarijantine Lionel Messi yakoze ibitangaza muri iyi kipe bituma kuri ubu abaye umukinnyi wayo ufite iki gihembo cya FIFA inshuro eshanu zose.
Ubwo yagitwaraga bwa mbere, imyaka ine yose 2009, 2010, 2011 na 2012 nta musimbura yabonye.
Uyu mugabo w'umugore umwe n'abahungu babiri yeretse isi ko ari uwa mbere ubwo yashyiraga ikipe ye kuri ballons d'or 11 kuri uyu wa mbere i Zurich.
FC Barcelona iza kuri uyu mwanya nyuma y'aho n'ubundi ikomeje kwikubira ibikombe byinshi bikinirwa ku mugabane w'Uburayi.

#425#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Ruhango-Batatu-bagwiriwe-n-ikirombe-barapfa-bacukura-gasegereti
Ruhango: Babiri muri batatu bari bamaze iminsi mu kirombe basanzwe ari bazima Babiri mu bagabo batatu bari baragwiriwe n’ikirombe ku itariki 09 Ukwakira bakuwemo kuri uyu wa 11 Ukwakira 2017 mu ma saa yine ari bazima undi asangwa yarapfuye.
Ku itariki ya 9 Ukwakira, mu karere ka Ruhango mu Murenge wa Byimana akagari ka Mpanda, mu mudugudu wa Bisika abantu 3 bagwiriwe n’ikirombe ariko ntibahita baboneka hatangira imirimo yo kubashakisha munsi y’ibitaka byari byabaguyeho.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo Inspector of Police (IP) Emmanuel Kayigi, yavuze ko nyuma y’akazi katoroshye kakozwe mu kubatabara, babiri basanzwe ari bazima, ku bw’ibyago undi wari kumwe na bo asangwa yarapfuye.
Abasanzwe ari bazima ni Shyiriburyo Francois w’imyaka 50, na Hakizimana Gabriel w’imyaka 35, mu gihe Musabyimana Sixibert w’imyaka 36 we yasanzwe yarapfuye.
Aba bagabo bagwiriwe n’ikirombe ubwo barimo gucukura gasegereti mu kirombe cy’uwitwa Cyiza Mukarage Anastase ufite sosiyete icukura amabuye y’agaciro yitwa Cyusa.
Bitewe nuko aba bavuyemo ari bazima bari bafite ikibazo cyo kudahumeka neza, kuri ubu bajyanwe mu bitaro bya Gitwe kugirango bitabweho n’abaganga.
Ni nako umurambo wa Nyakwigendera na wo wajyanwe kuri ibi bitaro kugirango ube ari ho uruhukiye.
IP Kayigi yavuze ko ibikorwa byo kubakuramo bitari byoroshye, ati: "Ntibyari byoroshye, kuko ikirombe cyari kirekire cyane ku buryo gukurikirana no gushaka uburyo dukuramo abo bantu byasabye imbaraga nyinshi.
Twifashishije abahanga mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye bashaka uburyo bagera kuri abo bantu abaturage bafatanya na bo n’inzego zose zari zahagurutse."
Aba bakuwemo ari bazima batangaje ko mugenzi wabo na we yari amaze igihe kinini ari muzima ngo yashizemo umwuka ahagana saa cyenda z’urukerera rw’iki gitondo.
IP Kayigi yagiriye inama abafite ibirombe agira ati:"Abafite amasosiyete acukura amabuye y’agaciro ntibagomba kwirara ngo bafite ibyangombwa, n’uburyo bwo kwirinda impanuka zishobora gukomoka kuri uyu mwuga ni ngombwa.
Kubigira ni byiza ndetse yewe ni n’itegeko, ariko na none bagomba buri gihe gusuzuma ko bidashaje, baramuka basanze bishaje bakagura ibishya."
Yavuze ko nta muntu n’umwe wemerewe kujya mu kirombe adafite ibyangombwa bibimwemerera ndetse n’ibikoresho byabugenewe, kandi ba nyir’ isosiyete zicukura amabuye y’agaciro barasabwa gushinganisha abakozi babo muri za sosiyete z’ubwishingizi bakanubahiriza amategeko yose basabwa na Leta.
Yanabasabye kandi kujya babanza gusuzuma neza ahantu bagiye gukorera imirimo y’ubucukuzi, kugira ngo harebwe niba bitateza impanuka ku buryo binavamo impfu za bamwe.

#427#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/ngororero-ababyeyi-barasabwa-gutoza-abana-gukoresha-neza-umuhanda-wa-kaburimbo
Ngororero: Ababyeyi barasabwa gutoza abana gukoresha neza umuhanda wa kaburimbo Ababyeyi bafite abana biga mu bigo by'amashuri abanza byubatse ku nkengero z'umuhanda wa kaburimbo wa Muhanga-Ngororero, barasabwa kwigisha kubigisha kwitondera uwo muhanda ugizwe n'amakoni mu gihe bawambuka.
Umuhanda Muhanga – Ngororero ugizwe n'amakoni menshi bitewe n'imisozi minini iwukikije, ku buryo impungenge ku mutekano w'abana biga mu mashuri y'uburezi bw'ibanze bw'imyaka Icyenda na 12 zakomeje kwiyongera.
Ubuyobozi bw'uyu murenge wa Gatumba buvuga ko iki kibazo gihari koko, bugasaba abashoferi kwitondera ahari ibigo by'amashuri, ariko ababyeyi nabo bagatoza abana babo kwitwararika mu muhanda.
Atanga urugero rw'ahari aho uku kwihaniza abana kutajya mu muhanda byagize akamaro mu kugabanya impanuka, nko mu Mujyi wa Kigali, bityo akavuga ko n'ahandi bishoboka.
Ku rundi ruhande abashoferi banyura muri uyu muhanda bijujutira uburyo abanyeshuri biroha mu muhanda ari benshi, maze rimwe na rimwe bikanatera impanuka.
Hari n'abambukira ahari amakorosi batabanje kureba niba hari ibinyabiziga biri mu muhanda.
Uwimana Nepo ukora akazi ko gutwara abagenzi muri uyu muhanda, avuga ko abashoferi bagerageza kwiwararika iyo bageze ku banyehuri, ariko imyitwarire y'abana ikababera imbogamizi kuko hari n'abahagarara mu muhanda bakinisha imodoka.
Ahavugwaho gutera inkeke ni mu murenge wa Gatumba ku ishuri rya ADEPR, riri mu kagali ka Cyome, ryegereye umuhanda ku buryo no mu gihe cy'akaruhuko usanaga abana bari ku muhanda.
Aha hantu hakunze kuba impanuka ku buryo mu minsi ishize abana bagera kuri bane bagonzwe ndetse bamwe bagapfa.
Ikindi kibazo usanga kigaragara kuri ayo mashuri n'ahambukirwa n'abanyeshuri, ni uko nta byapa byabugenewe biburira abatwaye ibinyabiziga ko hari ibigo by'amashuri, nk'uko bigaragara ahandi hari imihanda ya kaburimbo.
Umukozi w'akarere ushinzwe ibikorwaremezo avuga ko icyo kibazo bazagikorera ubuvugizi, ahakenewe ibyapa bikongerwamo.
Ernest Kalinganire

#443#	6	religion	https://umubavu.com/iyobokamana/article/Papa-Francis-yahinduye-ibanga-ry-ubupapa
Papa Francis yahinduye ’ibanga ry’ubupapa’ kubera gusambanya abana Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku isi yakoze impinduka mu buryo iri dini ryitwara mu bibazo byo gusambanya abana, avanaho ku itegeko ’ry’ibanga ry’ubupapa’.
Inyandiko nshya Vatican yasohoye ivanaho ibyategeka kugira ibanga ihohoterwa cyangwa kuvuga ko barikorewe.
Abategeka Kiliziya Gatolika bari basabye ko iyi ngingo ivanwaho mu nama nkuru ya Vatican mu kwezi kwa Kabiri.
Papa yatangaje ko ubu amakuru ajyanye n’ibibazo by’ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina azajya akurikiranwa "mu mutekano, mu kuri n’ibanga".
Yategetse ko abategetsi muri Kiliziya bakurikiza amategeko y’ibihugu bagenderaho muri ibi bibazo, bagafasha inzego z’ubutabera z’ibihugu gukora iperereza ku birego nk’ibyo.
Papa Francis yahinduye kandi uko Kiliziya yifataga amashusho y’urukozasoni arimo abana, abivana ku myaka 14 kumanura ategeka ko biba kuva ku myaka 18 kumanura.
Ibanga ry’ubupapa ni itegeko ryo kugira ibanga mu kurengera amakuru akomeye agendanye n’ubutegetsi bwa Kiliziya, nk’uko za guverinoma cyangwa kompanyi zigira "inyandiko/amakuru y’ibanga".
Kuri uyu munsi yujujeho imyaka 83, Papa Francis yasubije ikifuzo cya benshi ku bijyanye n’uburyo Kiliziya yita ku bibazo bijyanye n’ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina no gusambanya bana.
Mu bihe bishize, Kiliziya Gatolika yanengwaga kugirira ibanga abantu bayo bakekwaho ibi bikorwa yishingikirije ibanga ry’ubupapa.
Kumena ibanga ry’ubupapa byahanishwaga kuvanwa muri Kiliziya, byatumaga abategetsi bayo n’abihaye Imana ntacyo babwira inzego z’ubutegetsi zisanzwe mu iperereza ku byaha nk’ibi.
Ibi ejo ku wa Kabiri Papa yarabiciye.

Theo Bosebabireba agiye gusubira mu ishuri kwiga umuziki Umuririmbyi Uwiringiyimana Théogène [Theo Bosebabireba] agiye gutangira amasomo ajyanye n'umuziki no kwihugura mu bicurangisho by'ibanze bya muzika, yihaye umwaka wa 2017 ko ugomba kurangira ageze ku rundi rwego.
Theo Bosebabireba umaze imyaka igera ku icumi aririmba, mu gihe cyose yakoze umuziki nta gikoresho na kimwe cy'umuziki yigeze yiga gukoresha gusa yihaye intego ko mu ntangiriro z'umwaka wa 2017 azagana ishuri ry'umuziki ryigisha inanga ya kizungu[piano] na gitari kugira ngo ahinduke umucuranzi wabigize umwuga.
Yagize ati "Umwaka utaha ngira ngo uyu murabona ko warangiye ndashaka gutangira kwiga ibicurangisho bikomeye bya muzika ku buryo nzaba umuhanzi w'umunyamwuga nkajya ntumirwa mu bitaramo nkaririmba nicurangira."
Uwiringiyimana Theo yavuze ko mu byamuzitiye ntabashe gufata amahugurwa mu muziki ku isonga haza ibibazo yahuye na byo mu buzima bikamubuza amahirwe yo kwiga bityo no gukora umuziki akaba yarabyinjiyemo ashakisha ubuzima.
Ati "Ntabwo natangiye umuziki ntekereza ko nzaba umuhanzi ukomeye, byari ugusenga no gufasha abantu twasenganaga kuko ni bo banteraga imbaraga […] Nakoze umuziki ntazi neza ko nzamenyekana, nagezemo mbona ubuzima nkomeza gushakisha imibereho gusa, aho bigeze ubu ndashaka kuzamura urwego ngezeho…" Ati "Ndashaka kwiga cyane gucuranga piano na gitari, ni ibicurangisho navuga ko ari iby'ibanze ku munyamuziki.
Nta masomo ndabifataho kuko icyo nkora mu myaka yose maze ndirimba ni uguhanga gusa ariko nari ntaratekereza ku byo kwiga gucuranga […] Nzashaka abantu babyigisha babifitemo ubumenyi buhagije bampugure mbimenye neza."
Theo Bosebabireba agiye kujya mu ishuri kwiga umuziki Theo Bosebabireba mu myaka amaze akora umuziki amaze kuririmba indirimbo zirenga ijana ze bwite, yanakoze album zigera ku icumi zanacurujwe bikomeye.

#451#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/google-yashyizeho-uburyo-bushya-bufasha-abayikoresha-kuvumbura-amashusho-y
Google yashyizeho uburyo bushya bufasha abayikoresha kuvumbura amashusho y’amiganano Urubuga rwa Google rukoreshwa n’abantu benshi kurusha izindi ku isi, rwashyizeho uburyo bushya bufasha abarushakiraho ibintu kumenya mu buryo bwihuse niba bageze ku kintu nyirizina bashakaga cyangwa niba icyo bagezeho ari icyiganano.
Uburyo bushya Google yashyizeho buzajya bufasha cyane abajyaga bayishakiraho amashusho bakabona menshi avuga ikintu kimwe bikagorana kumenya ay’ukuri.
Mu cyimbo cy’ifoto nto yifashishwaga mu kugaragaza ihuza ry’amashusho hazajya hakoreshwa amashusho magufi y’umusogongero ku buryo uyarebye ahita amenya niba ari aya nyayo hanyuma akabona kuyafungura.
Ikinyamakuru The Independent cyo mu Bwongereza cyatangaje ko ibibazo byari biri mu buryo bwakoreshwaga ari ukuba hari imbuga nyinshi cyangwa konti zitandukanye kuri izo mbuga zashukaga abantu bakaba bafungura amashusho atari ayo bifuzaga, ibyo byateraga umunabi abakoresha Google bayinengaga kuba itabasha kubarangira iby’umwimerere bifuza ahubwo ikabashyira mu gaco cy’abigana ibyakozwe n’abandi.
Uburyo bushya urwo rubuga rwashyizeho ruzajya rwohereza umuntu wese ushakiyeho amashusho runaka kuyageraho atayobye kandi byihuse.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa bya serivisi muri Google, Prashant Baheti, yagize ati "Tuvuge nko mu gihe ushatse kwiga imbyino nshya ya Salsa cyangwa waheze ku muhanda ushaka kwiga uko bahindura ipine ryagize ikibazo, ukaba ushaka amashusho akwigisha uko wakoresha bike ufite, uzajya umenya ayagufasha ukiyakubita imboni mu bisubizo byatanzwe n’ishakiro kuko uzajya ubona mu buryo busobanutse icyo ugiye gufungura cyose."
Yongeyeho ati "Incamake y’amashusho ni intambwe nshya mu kubafasha kumenya amakuru mu buryo bwihuse."
Ubuyobozi bwa Google buvuga ubu buryo bw’incamake y’amashusho, azajya yikina adasohora ijwi, buzahabwa gusa abakoresha porogaramu za Android cyangwa Chrome muri telefoni.
Ntabwo batangaje igihe buzagezwa ku bakoresha mudasobwa cyangwa se niba bizakorwa.
Ubu buryo bushya bufasha mu ishakiro ry’amashusho kuri Google, bwifungura ku muntu wese uri gukoresha internet ya Wi-Fi, gusa bukanemererwa abakoresha iyabo bwite mu gihe babihisemo bahindura uburyo porogaramu bifuza kubishyiramo zikora.

#454#	1	sports	https://www.igihe.com/imikino/indi-mikino/article/umulisa-joselyne-yatangije-academie-izafasha-u-rwanda-kubona-abakinnyi-ba
Umulisa Joselyne yatangije Académie izafasha u Rwanda kubona abakinnyi ba Tennis Umulisa Joselyne usanzwe ari umukinnyi akaba n’umutoza wa Tennis mu Rwanda, yatangiye kwigisha uyu mukino abakinnyi bakiri bato kugira ngo mu azamure umubare w’abakinnyi ukiri muto cyane cyane mu bakobwa.
Umulisa ufite impamyabushobozi y’ubutoza yo ku rwego rwa mbere, akunze kwiharira menshi mu marushanwa ya Tennis akinirwa mu Rwanda.
Kuri ubu ari gutoza abana bakiri bato ku bibuga bya Tennis biherereye i Remera, iruhande rwa Petit Stade.
Avuga ko yahisemo gukora uyu mushinga wo kwigisha abana Tennis kuko yasanze mu Rwanda hari umubare muto w’abakinnyi by’umwihariko mu cyiciro cy’abakobwa.
Ati “Njya gutangira gutekereza uyu mushinga wo gutoza abana bato no kubazamura mu mwuga wa Tennis byatewe n’uko nari maze igihe kinini cyane ndi Championne [ntwara Shampiyona] w’Igihugu.
Numvise nshaka abana bansimbura.”
“Nararebye mbona mu gihucu cyacu dufite umubare muto w’abakinnyi ba Tennis cyane cyane uw’abakobwa, niyemeza gushyiramo imbaraga ngo ntangize igikorwa nk’iki, nshaka abana bato bafite impano gahoro gahoro.
Natangiranye abana bake, ariko uko mwabibonye, bamaze kuba benshi.”
Abajijwe icyizere afite cyo kuba uyu mushinga wamara igihe kirekire n’aho akura ubushobozi bwo kugura ibikoresho byifashishwa muri Tennis, Umulisa yavuze ko hari ababyeyi ba bamwe mu bana- bafite ubushobozi- bitanga kugira ngo n’abatishoboye babone uko biga gukina Tennis.
Ati “Ni umushinga wanjye, ariko nkaba mfite abafatanyabikorwa aribo federasiyo ya Tennis mu Rwanda (RTF).
Ibikoresho nkoresha ni ibyo nishatsemo njyewe ubwanjye kubera ko mfite ubushake nubwo ubushobozi butaraboneka neza.
Nizera ko nibigenda neza nzabona abaterankunga kuko ibikoresho bya Tennis birahenda kandi bisaza vuba.”
“Ababyeyi uko dukorana, mbasaba kugura bimwe mu bikoresho by’abana nk’imyambaro n’inkweto.
Habamo n’abandi bishyura amafaranga kugira ngo dufashe n’abatishoboye kwiga no kwita ku bibuga.”
Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Tennis mu Rwanda; Karenzi Théoneste, yavuze ko bazakomeza gushyigikira Umulisa Joselyne muri uyu mushinga we kuko uhuye na gahunda yabo yo kuzamura impano z’abakiri bato.
Ati “Inshingano ya mbere ya Federasiyo ni uguteza imbere umukino, ikagira abafatanyabikorwa baba ari abaterankunga cyangwa abatugira inama.
Ni igikorwa dushima cyane kuba umukinnyi nk’uyu wa Tennis wabigize umwuga kandi w’Umunyarwanda ashaka gusangiza ubuhanga bwe abakiri bato.
N’abandi bakwiye gutera ikirenge mu cya Umulisa.”
“Bigamije kunganira no gufasha Federasiyo.
Tuzamuha ubujyanama, tuzakurikirana iterambere ry’abakinnyi babo, tubahe ubufasha mu bya tekiniki no mu bushobozi cyane mu bikoresho igihe byaba bibonetse.”
Ishyirahamwe rya Tennis mu Rwanda risanzwe rifite gahunda ya Junior Tennis Initiative (JTI) ifasha kuzamura impano z’abakiri.
Ubuyobozi bwaryo buvuga ko ibibuga bitandatu by’itaka biheruka kuzura Kicukiro, bizagira uruhare mu kongera umubare w’abakina Tennis.

Djabel yateye ivi asaba umukunzi we kuzamubera umugore - AMAFOTO Manishimwe Djabel yateye ivi asaba Niyitunganye Kawthar kuzamubera umugore nyuma y’imyaka 2 bamaze bakundana uruzira imbereka.
Ngo yamuhisemo kubera uburere bwiza yamubonanye ndetse no kuba ari umukobwa w’ umunyakuri.
Ni umuhango wabaye kuri uyu Gatandatu tariki 3 Ugushyingo 2018.
Witabiriwe na bamwe mu bakinnyi bakinana na Djabel muri Rayon Sports barimo Kapiteni Manzi Thierry, Mugisha Francois bakunda kwita Master, Bimenyimana Bon Fils Caleb, Ndayisenga Kassim na Tumushime Ally Tidjan akaba na murumuna wa Djabel.
Hari kandi umutoza wa Rayon Sports, Robertinho ndetse na bamwe mu bo mu muryango wa Kawthar barimo mukuru we Amatullah ari na we ngo watumye aba bombi bamenyana.
Ahagana ku isaha ya saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba nibwo abari batumiwe muri uyu muhango bari bageze kuri Galaxy Hotel iherereye mu Kiyovu.
Djabel na we yakomezaga kuvugana na Bashunga Abouba wari uri kumufasha gukora iki gikorwa gikomeye.
Hashize iminota 30, Djabel yahageranye na murumuna we ndetse n’abandi bavandimwe ba Kawthar.
Bahageze abandi bose bikinze kuruhande.
Djabel n’abo bari kumwe bicaye , baba baganira nk’abantu wabonaga ko basohotse.
Ushinzwe ubuhanga bw’ibyuma yahise ashyiraho indirimbo ’ Marry me’ ya Diamond , abandi baturuka inyuma bayiririmba ari nako bacana umutsima wari urimo impeta.
Kawathar yahise atungurwa cyane ndetse amara umwanya yubitse umutwe arira amarira y’ibyishimo, Djabel na we ahita atera ivi, amusaba ko bazarushinga.
Kawathar yahise amubwira ’YEGO’, amashyi ngo Kaci kaci.
Nyuma yo gutanga icyifuzo kikanakirwa neza, Djabel yatangarije Rwandamagazine.com ko anejejwe cyane n’iyi ntambwe bateye we n’umukunzi we.
Kubana na we ngo asanga bizamufasha byinshi ku hazaza he no mu iterambere rye muri rusange mu mwuga we wo gukina umupira w’amaguru.
Manishimwe Djabel yamenyekane ari mu ikipe y’Isonga FC, ahava ajya muri Rayon Sports amazemo imyaka isaga ine ndetse mu kwezi kwa Nzeli uyu mwaka yongereye amasezerano ye akinira iyi kipe ikomoka i Nyanza.

Kamichi aravuga ko abantu bumvise nabi ibyo yavuze Umuhanzi Kamichi umaze iminsi avugwaho kwaka ruswa umuhanzi Jason Derulo ubwo yari hano mu Rwanda mu mpera z'icyumweru gishize aratangaza ko ayo makuru atari yo.
Kamichi yagize ati: "Abantu bumvise nabi ibyo navuze, njye rwose sinigeze naka ruswa Jason Derulo ndetse sinigeze mvuga ko murusha isaha nziza cyangwa n'ibindi ahubwo ababivuze rwose sinzi aho babikuye."

Kamichi.
Muri iyo nama Jason Derulo yagiranye n'abanyamakuru mbere yo kujya mu gitaramo cyo gusoza amarushanwa ya PGGSS 2 tariki 28/07/2012 ngo Kamichi kandi yavuze ko Jason Derulo atamurusha ikote n'isaha ihenze.
Iyo nama yahuje abanyamakuru banyuranye ba hano mu Rwanda bakora ku makuru y'imyidagaduro by'umwihariko hakaba hari kandi n'abategura amarushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star aribo EAP na Bralirwa, hari Jay Polly na King James ndetse na Jason Derulo uvugwaho kuba yaratswe ruswa.
Kamichi asaba Abanyarwanda ndetse n'abakunzi be by'umwihariko ko bataha agaciro ibimaze iminsi biri kumuvugwaho kuko atari byo.
Marie Clemence CYIZA UWIMANIMPAYE

#504#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/rayon-sports-yemeye-kwishyura-indezo-ya-manishimwe-djabel
Rayon Sports yemeye kwishyura indezo ya Manishimwe Djabel Ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports bwemeye gutangaza indezo ku mukinnyi wa APR FC, Manishimwe Djabel, nyuma y’uko ubwo yageraga muri iyi kipe mu 2014, byari binyuze mu buryo budakurikije amategeko.
Mu mpera za Nzeri nibwo Ubuyobozi bw’ikigo kizamura impano z’abana mu mupira w’amaguru mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba ‘Gatsibo Academic Sport Center’, bwandikiye Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) burisaba ko ritakwemerera Manishimwe Djabel gukina uyu mwaka w’imikino mu gihe ikirego yatanze mu myaka ine ishize kitarakemurwa.
Icyo kigo cyazamuye uyu mukinnyi cyavugaga ko kimaze hafi imyaka itanu cyaratanze ikirego muri FERWAFA, kirega Rayon Sports ko yagitwariye umukinnyi mu buryo budakurikije amategeko, ariko kugeza icyo gihe iki kibazo kikaba kitarakemuka.
Nk’uko bigaragara mu myanzuro y’Akanama nkemurampaka ka FERWAFA kahuje impande zirebwa n’iki kibazo tariki ya 1 Ugushyingo, IGIHE ifitiye kopi, Rayon Sports yemeye ko uburyo yabonyemo Manishimwe Djabel bwari budakurikije amategeko.
Ubwo aka kanama kayobowe na Munyankumburwa Jean Marie kateranaga mu cyumweru gishize, Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Rayon Sports, Itangishaka King Bernard yavuze ko “Icyo kibazo bakizi nk’Ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports kandi ashingiye kubigaragara muri dosiye, bemera ko umukinnyi ari uw’iki kigo kandi biteguye gutanga indezo.”
Nyuma y’ibiganiro byo kumvikanisha impande zombi, Rayon Sports yemeye kwishyura ibihumbi 500 Frw by’indezo bitarenze uyu mwaka wa 2019.
Gatsibo Academic Sport Center na yo yemeye aya mafaranga ndetse inemera ko ihagaritse ibirego byose birebana n’iki kibazo kuko igifite uburenganzira ku ndezo yatangwa mu gihe Manishimwe Djabel yaba aguzwe n’ikipe yo hanze nk’uko amategeko ya FIFA abiteganya.
Manishimwe Djabel w’imyaka 21, ni umukinnyi wa APR FC nyuma y’uko Rayon Sports imugurishije muri Gor Mahia, n’iyi kipe y’ingabo ikavuga ko yumvikanye na K’Ogalo yo muri Kenya, muri Nyakanga uyu mwaka.

#515#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Kivuruga-Imodoka-ya-twegerane-yahirimye-ku-bwamahirwe-ntawahasize-ubuzima
Kivuruga: Imodoka ya twegerane yahirimye ku bwamahirwe ntawahasize ubuzima Imodoka itwara abagenzi izwi ku izina rya twegerane ifite nimero ya purake RAC 326 N yarivuye i Kigali yerekeje mu Karere ka Musanze yahirimiye mu Murenge wa Kivuruga mu karere ka Gakenke ku bwamahirwe ntihagira uhasiga ubuzima cyangwa ngo akomereke.
Iyi tagisi mbere yuko ihirima kuri uyu wa 09 Kamena 2014 yabanje kugonga imodoka yaturukaga mu karere ka Rubavu yerekeje i Kigali abayirimo babiri umugabo n'umuhungu we bose nabo nta kintu bigeze baba uretse imodoka yabo yangiritse uruhande rwagonzwe.
Iyi tagisi ngo yari ifite umuvuduko mwinshi inanirwa gukata ikorosi irahirima.
Umuhungu wa nyiri imodoka yagonzwe utashatse ko amazina ye amenyekana yavuze ko babonye tagisi iza yiruka ibasanga bagerageza kuyihunga gusa nyuma izagukubita uruhande maze nayo iragenda ihirima ku rundi ruhande.
Bamwe mu bantu bahageze mbere babwiye Kigali Today ko abantu bahise bavamo bose ari bazima ku buryo banakomeje kujya muri gahunda bari bagiyemo ariko kandi bakemeza ko nyirabayazana w'iyi mpanuka yabaye umuvuduko.
Ngiyo tagisi imaze kwegurwa mu muhanda.
Bati "uriya mushoferi wa tagisi yari yafatiyeho kuko yageze hano asa nk'uwikanze iriya modoka yindi nuko abura uko akata rino korosi bituma agongana n'iriya yindi".
Imodoka za twegerane zikunze gukora impanuka muri uno muhanda wa Kigali-Rubavu kandi ugasanga biterwa n'umuvuduko ukabije ukoreshwa n'abashoferi bo muri uno muhanda akenshi baba batanguranwa abagenzi baba bahagaze ku muhanda.
Nguko uko ijipe yagonzwe.
Aho iyi tagisi yaguye ni mbere gato y'ahaherukira guhirimira indi twegerane mu gitondo cyo kuwa 01 Kamena 2014 ikagenda ikurura umugore ukuboko muri kaburimbo kuburyo yoherejwe i Kigali kugirango ariho akurikiranirwa.
Abdul Tarib

#611#	1	sports	https://rwandamagazine.com/imikino/article/munezero-fiston-yahagaritswe-muri-musanze-fc
Munezero Fiston yahagaritswe muri Musanze FC Myugariro Munezero Fiston yamaze guhagarikwa n’ikipe ya Musanze FC igihe kitazwi azira imyitwarire mibi.
Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe ya Musanze FC bushinja Munezero Fiston imyitwarire mibi ishingiye ku gusuzugura umutoza wungirije Mbweki Tariki Todek wasigaranye ikipe nyuma y’uko Ruremesha Emmanuel ahagaritswe igihe cy’ukwezi.
Tuyishime Placide uyobora Musanze FC yatangarije Rwandamagazine.com ko impamvu bamuhagaritse ari uko asuzugura umutoza wasigaranye ikipe ndetse akanamuvugaho amagambo mabi.
Ati " Yakomeje kuvuga amagambo mabi ku mutoza wasigaranye ikipe, akanamusuzugurira ku rubuga bahuriraho , agaragaza ko ari umukinnyi ukomeye cyane, utavugwaho.
Umutoza we yari yamusabye ko yazagaruka mu myitozo ari uko Ruremesha yagarutse ariko twe twamuhagaritse igihe kitazwi , tunahagarika ibyo twamugeneraga."
Muri Mutarama uyu mwaka nibwo Munezero Fiston yerekeje muri Musanze FC nyuma yo kwirukanwa muri Police FC.
Yasinye muri Musanze FC amezi 6.
Tariki 9 Werurwe 2019 nibwo Musanze FC yahagaritse umutoza Ruremesha Emmanuel mu gihe kingana n’ukwezi.
Hari nyuma yo gutakaza umukino w’umunsi wa 19 wa shampiyona wabahuje na Espoir FC i Rusizi.
Icyo gihe ikipe yamushinjaga umusaruro muke.
Amakuru agera kuri Rwandamagazine.com yemeza ko kuva icyo gihe aribwo Munezero Fiston yatangiye kubura umwanya ubanza mu kibuga ku buryo buhoraho ari nabyo byatumye ashinja umutoza Mbweki Tariki Todek kutamukinisha ngo ahubwo akaba agendera ku nama aba yagiriwe n’abakinnyi.
Kuva aho ahagarikiwe muri Musanze FC, Ruremesha ntiyemerewe kugera mu bakinnyi ndetse no mu bindi bikorwa by’ikipe.
Kuza ku kibuga ho ahaza bisanzwe nk’undi mukunzi cyangwa umufana w’ikipe.
Kuva Ruremesha yahagarikwa muri Musanze FC, imaze gukina imikino 2 harimo uwo batsindiye Police FC 2-0 kuri Stade Ubworoherane n’uwo banganyije n’Amagaju 0-0 i Nyagisenyi.
Iyo mikino yombi ntabwo Munezero Fiston yigeze abanzwa mu kibuga.
Twashatse kuvugana na Munezero Fiston ku cyo avuga ku iahagarikwa rye ariko ubwo twandikaha iyi nkuru ntiyafataga telefone ye igendanwa ndetse ntiyasubizaga n’ubutumwa bugufi twamwandikiye.
Kugeza ubu, ku rutonde rw’agateganyo rwa Shampiyona, Musanze FC iri ku mwanya wa 12 n’amanota 23.
Munezero Fiston ahagaritswe muri Musanze FC amazemo amezi 3 Gusuzugura ibyemezo by’umutoza Mbweki Tariki wasigaranye ikipe nibyo byatumye ahagarikwa igihe kitazwi Mbweki Tariki wasigaranye ikipe nyuma y’uko Ruremesha ahagaritswe ukwezi Ruremesha Emmanuel atarahagarikwa, Munezero Fiston yahoranaga umwanya ubanza mu kibuga uhoraho Munezero Fiston ntiyari muri 11 babanjemo Musanze FC itsinda Police 2-0 ku munsi wa 20 wa Shampiyona.niwo mukino wa mbere iyi kipe yari ikinnye nyuma y’uko Ruremesha Emmanuel ahagarikwa Mbweki Tariki niwe uzatoza Musanze FC indi mikino 2 isigaye ngo ihagarikwa rya Ruremesha rirangire

#629#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Gicumbi-Umukobwa-yabyaye-umwana-amuta-mu-musarane
Gicumbi: Umukobwa yabyaye umwana amuta mu musarane Umukobwa witwa Nyirangayaberura Dinah uvuka mu Karere ka Gicumbi, mu Murenge wa Muko, Akagari ka Mwendo, Umudugudu wa Kabuye yabyaye umwana amuta mu musarane.
Amakuru atangwa n'umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Muko, Nzabanterura Eugène avuga ko uyu mukobwa Nyirangayaberura yaturutse mu Murenge wa Giti tariki ya 1/3/2015 ajya mu Murenge wa Muko gusura babyara be.
Abo yari agiye gusura ngo bari basanzwe bazi ko atwite inda nkuru, mu masaha ya saa saba z'ijoro rishyira ku wa 2/3/2015 ngo bumvise asohotse amara umwanya munini hanze.
Agarutse mu nzu nibwo babonye arembye cyane bamwitegereje babona nta nda agifite, nibwo bahise bahamagara abaturanyi babo batangira kumuhata ibibazo maze abemerera ko yabyaye umwana akamuta mu musarane, ndetse ko umwanya munini yamaze ari hanze yari ari kubyara.
Abaturanyi barebye mu musarane basanzemo umwana ariko yamaze gupfa, nk'uko Nzabanterura akomeza abivuga.
Bitewe n'uko uyu mukobwa Nyirangayaberura yari ameze nabi bahise bihutira kumugeza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Rutare hamwe n'umurambo w'umwana we.
Nyirangayaberura namara kwitabwaho agakira neza azashyikirizwa inzego z'ubutabera kugira ngo akurikiranwe ho icyaha cyo kwihekura.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Muko yaboneyeho gutanga ubutumwa cyane cyane ku bantu bakiri bato ko bari bakwiye kwirinda gutwara inda batateguye, ndetse bakaba bakoresha agakingirizo kuko kabarinda ibyago byose birimo kubyara umwana batateguye.
Uyu Nyirangayaberura Dinah naramuka ahamwe n'icyaha cyo kwica umwana yibyariye azahanishwa igihano cyo gufungwa burundu nk'uko biteganywa mu igitabo cy'amategeko ahana ibyaha y'u Rwanda mu ngingo ya 141, ivuga ko umuntu wese wishe umuntu akamuvutsa ubuzima ahanishwa gufungwa burundu.
Ernestine Musanabera

#639#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Ibitaro-byabanje-mu-gihugu-byatangirijwemo-uburyo-bwo-kubika-amakuru-y-abarwayi
Ibitaro byabanje mu gihugu, byatangirijwemo uburyo bwo kubika amakuru y'abarwayi Kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki 29 Nyakanga Minisiteri y'ubuzima yatangije gahunda nshya yo kubika amakuru y'abarwayi hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, igikorwa cyatangirijwe mu bitaro bya Gahini mu karere ka Kayonza.
Ni uburyo butangijwe bwa mbere mu Rwanda, kuri iyi nshuro bukazibanda mu kubika amakuru ajyanye n'agakoko gatera SIDA, uburyo ABANTU bipimishamo n'uburyo bavurwamo.
Ibitaro bya Gahini nibyo byubatswe bwa mbere mu Rwanda, mu mwaka wa 1927, byubatswe n'abangilikani.
Minisiteri y'Ubuzima ivuga ko iyi gahunda izafasha mu buvuzi no gushakisha ibikoresho bijyanye n'indwara.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisante, Dr Patrick Ndimubanzi wari uhagarariye iyo Minisiteri yavuze ko ubu buryo buzafasha mu ihererekanyamakuru ryihuse muri serivisi z'ubuvuzi.
Minisante ubu yatangiye gukoresha ubu buryo mu bitaro bigera ku 10 by'uteurere, ndetse no mu bigo nderabuzima 20, mu gihugu hose.
Ubu amakuru y'abantu bagera ku 15, 000 amaze gukusanywa, kuva gahunda yatangizwa.
Peter Malnak, uhagarariye umuryango USAID mu Rwanda yavuze ko nta ko bias gutangiza iyi gahunda bwa mbere, mu bitaro bya mbere byubatswe mu Rwanda.
Yavuzeko bazakomeza gufasha u Rwanda muri gahunda zo kwegeerza abaturage ubuvuzi.
Iyi gahunda yatangiye hakusanywa amakuru kuri virusi itera SIDA, gusa ngo byitezwe ko vuba izaba yatangiye gukusanya n'andi makuru.
