Uburusiya bwatangiye kwihimura kuri Turukiya buyishinja ubucuruzi n'umutwe w'iterabwoba Perezida wa Turukiya Recep Tayyip Erdogan aravuga ko nibimuhama azahita yegura k'ubutegetsi Minisitiri w'umutekano mu Burusiya arashinja umuryango wa Perezida wa Turukiya Recep Tayyip Erdogan na bamwe mu bategetsi bakomeye muri leta gukorana bya hafi mu bucuruzi bwa Peteroli n'umutwe w'iterabwoba wa leta ya kisilamu (IS) .
Aganira n'itangazamakuru Minisitiri w'umutekano mu burusiya Anatoly Antonov yavuze ko Turikiya ari umguzi ukomeye wa peteroli yibwa muri siriya na Iraq , Peteroli yibwayo n'umutwe w'intagondwa za leta ya kisilamu(IS).
Uyu mu Minisitiri yavuze ko Peresida wa Turukiya yesezeranyije kwegura k'ubutegetsi naramuka ahamwe n'ubwo bucuruzi bwa rwihishwa .
Minisitiri Antonov avugako hari amakuru yizewe avuga ko bamwe mu bategetsi bo murwego rwo hejuru muri Turukiya , Peresida Erdogan n'umuryango we bari muri ubu bucuruzi bunyuranyije n'amategoko.
Minisitiri avuga kandi ko hari amashusho ya satellite agaragaza amagunguru ya Turukiya arimo peteroli ava ahari inyeshyamba za IS yerekeza mu ntara ya Turukiya,Uburusiya bukomeza buvuga ko kugeza ubu bufite ibimenyetso.
Leta ya Moscow yari imaze iminsi ishinja leta ya Ankara kungukira mu bucuruzi bwa peteroli iva mu nyeshyamba za IS.
Kuwa mbere w'iki cyumweru perezida wa Turukiya nawe yari yasabye mugenzi we w'uburusiya gutanga ibimenyetso kuri ibyo birego, byagaragara ko ari ukuri akaba yakwegura k'ubutegetsi.
Recep Tayyip Erdogan akaba yaragize ati : kuva iki cyaha cyavugwa ubusugire bw'igihugu cyacu buransaba kwegura, ntabwo nzakomeza kuyobora ,ariko nkibaza Putin wowe wumva uzakomeza kuyobora nibitaba byo?
Kuva Turukiya yahanura indege y'Uburusiya tariki 24 Ukwezi gushize ibi bihugu byombi byakunze kurangwa n'ibikorwa byo kutumvikana .
Mu cyumweru gishize leta y'Uburusiya yategetse kujya baka ibyangombwa bya visa ku banyaturukiya bose baje mu gihugu, inategaka guhagarika ibikorwa by'ubucuruzi bagiranaga na leta ya Turukiya.

#648#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/mu-rwanda-abandi-babiri-bishwe-na-covid-19
Mu Rwanda abandi babiri bishwe na COVID-19 Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 17 Nzeri 2020, mu Rwanda abantu babiri byishwe na COVID-19.
Abo babiri bishwe na COVID-19 ni Abanyarwanda umwe w’imyaka 80 n’undi w’imyaka 29 y’amavuko bitabye Imana bari i Kigali.
Mbere yaho ku wa Kane undi mugabo w’imyaka 48 y’amavuko na we yitabye Imana ari i Kigali, abamaze kwicwa na COVID-19 mu Rwanda bose hamwe bakaba ari 25.
Abantu mu Rwanda bongeye kwicwa n’iki cyorezo mu gihe hari hashize iminsi irindwi nta muntu bivugwa ko yishwe na COVID-19 mu Rwanda, dore ko uwaherukaga kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo ari umubyeyi w’imyaka 62 witabye Imana i Kigali ku wa Kane tariki 10 Nzeri 2020.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima kandi yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Gatanu habonetse abantu 18 bashya banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, mu gihe abandi 28 bakize.
Mbere yaho ku wa Kane hari habonetse abarwayi bashya 19, abakize nabwo bari 28.
Abo barwayi bashya 18 babonetse mu bipimo 1,549 bakaba barimo 9 babonetse muri Kigali (bapimwe mu bibasiwe kurusha abandi), naho abandi 4 baboneka muri Nyamagabe, i Rubavu na ho habonetse 4, undi umwe aboneka i Bugesera.
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatanu mu Rwanda abamaze kwandura icyo cyorezo ni 4,671 muri bo abamaze gukira ni 2,845 naho abakivurwa ni 1,801.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima isaba Abaturarwanda bose gukomeza kwitwararika bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.

#683#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/ubumwe-ni-bwo-buzatuma-ingengabitekerezo-ya-jenoside-icika
Ubumwe ni bwo buzatuma ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside icika Ubuyobozi bw'Akarere ka Gatsibo buravuga ko gushyira hamwe, abaturage bagatahiriza umugozi umwe ari byo bizatuma ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside iranduka burundu.
Muri iki gihe cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 22 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Gatsibo, Gasana Richard, yavuze ko abantu baramutse badashyize hamwe ngo batahirize umugozi umwe mu kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ntacyo baba bakora kuko ngo kwaba ari nko kubaka ku musenyi.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Gatsibo, Gasana Richard, asaba abaturage kubakira ku bumwe bakarwanya ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside.
Agira ati "Kurwanya ingengabitekererezo ya Jenoside ni ko gutsinda nyakuri kandi ni ko kurwanya Jenoside kurambye.
Nimucyo rero dushyire hamwe dutahirize umugozi umwe muri urwo rugamba kandi tuzarutsinda."
Sakindi Joseph, umwe mu barokokeye mu cyahoze ari Komini Murambi (agace kamwe mu tugize Akarere ka Gatsibo y'ubu), mu buhamya bwe avuga ko muri aka gace, ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside yahemberewe kuva na mbere yuko Jenoside yo mu 1994 itangira.
Ati "Kuva mu mwaka wa 1990 Inkotanyi zikimara gutera, ni bwo muri Murambi hatangiye urwango ku Batutsi bari bahatuye babita ibyitso by'inyenzi.
Abayoboraga iyi komini batangiye kwigisha abaturage bababwira ko Abatutsi ari abagome kandi ari abanzi b'Abahutu.
Icyo gihe bamwe barafunzwe, abandi batangira kwicwa."
Insanganyamatsiko yo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 22 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994 iragira iti "Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, turwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside."

Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Werurwe 2021, Minisitiri Dr Ngamije yifatanyije na Mico The Best mu gikorwa cy’ubukangurambaga bwo kurwanya igituntu.

Indi ngamba ni ukongerera imbaraga urwego rw’abajyanama b’ubuzima, byose bigamije kurandura burundu igituntu bitarenze umwaka wa 2035.
Kuri uyu munsi Mico The Best yateguye igitaramo yatumiyemo Riderman kiza kuyoborwa na Anita Pendo.
Bitewe n’uko ibitaramo bihuza abantu bitemewe mu Rwanda, kiratambutswa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zirimo na shene ye ya Youtube guhera saa moya z’ijoro.
Riderman na Anita Pendo biyemeje gushyigikira Mico The Best mu gitaramo cy'ubukangurambaga bwo kwirinda igituntu Mico The Best na Minisitiri w'Ubuzima Dr Ngamije Daniel bunze ubumwe mu guhashya igituntu Aho wakurikira igitaramo cya Mico

Kugeza ubu ntiharamenyekana ahazaza h’uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20 mu Rwanda nyuma y’uko FERWAFA itangaje ko umwanzuro uzatangazwa bitarenze tariki ya 30 Gicurasi.

#758#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/kirehe-fc-yahize-gutsinda-rayon-sports
Kirehe FC yahize gutsinda Rayon Sports Umutoza wa Kirehe FC, Sogonya Hamiss ‘Kishi’ avuga ko nyuma yo gukura amanota i Nyagatare, amahirwe yo kuguma mu cyiciro cya mbere yiyongereye ndetse we n’abakinnyi be bagomba kubishimangira ku wa Gatanu batsinda Rayon Sports.
Kirehe FC yari imaze iminsi iri ku mwanya wa 15, yazamutseho umwanya umwe nyuma yo gutsindira Sunrise FC iwayo ibitego 2-1 mu mukino w’Umunsi wa 28 wa Shampiyona wabaye ku wa Gatandatu mu gihe Gicumbi FC yatsinzwe na Etincelles FC ikajya munsi y’umurongo utukura.
Iyi Kipe yo mu Burasirazuba, izakira Rayon Sports mu mukino w’Umunsi wa 29 wa Shampiyona uzabera i Nyakarambi ku wa Gatanu saa 15:30, aho izaba yifuza kongera amanota kugira ngo ishyiremo ikinyuranyo hagati yayo na Gicumbi FC banganya 27.
Umutoza wayo, Sogonya Hamiss yabwiye IGIHE ko gutsindira Sunrise FC iwayo, byahaye ikipe ye imbaraga zidasanzwe kuko wari umukino wa mbere iyi kipe itsindiye hanze kuva ayigarutsemo mu mikino yo kwishyura.
Yagize ati ’’Byaradushimishije.
Ni intsinzi yari ikenewe haba ku mutoza, abakinnyi, komite n’abafana.
Narabyishimiye kuko bwari ubwa mbere kuva ngeze hano mbasha gutsindira hanze.
Byatumye abakinnyi, abatoza na Komite tugira morale yo gutegura umukino wa Rayon Sports.”
IGIHE yamubajije uko yiteguye uyu mukino uzahuza ikipe iharanira kuguma mu cyiciro cya mbere n’ishaka igikombe cya shampiyona, byongeye kandi Kirehe FC ikaba yari imaze iminsi ivugwamo guhagarika imyitozo ku bakinnyi kubera ibibazo by’amikoro, Kishi avuga ko ubu abakinnyi bari hamwe, bafite intego yo gutsinda Rayon Sports.
Ati ”Rayon Sports ni ikipe ikomeye, ndayubaha, ariko natwe turakomeye kandi hashize igihe idakura hano intsinzi kuko umwaka ushize yarahanganyirije.
Irashaka igikombe nibyo, ariko natwe turashaka kuva aho turi, turashaka ariya manota atatu kuri Rayon Sports kugira ngo twegere imbere.”
“Amakipe yo mu Rwanda yose ni amwe.
Abafana bazaze ari benshi barebe ko hari icyahindutse ugereranyije n’imikino yabanje.
Abakinnyi bari hamwe, mu kanya tuvuye mu myitozo, ibibazo biba hose kandi abayobozi hari uburyo bari kubikemura.
Intego ni ugutsinda Rayon Sports.”
Kirehe FC ya 14 n’amanota 27, isigaje imikino ibiri izahuramo na Rayon Sports (mu rugo) na Bugesera FC (hanze) mu gihe Gicumbi FC ya 15 n’amanota 27 yo isigaje guhura na AS Muhanga (mu rugo) na Mukura Victory Sports (hanze).
Bugesera FC na yo ni indi kipe ishobora kumanukana mu Cyiciro cya Kabiri mu gihe yaba yirangayeho dore ko ifite amanota 31 ku mwanya wa 13, aho isigaje imikino ibiri izahuriramo na Musanze FC (hanze) na Kirehe FC (mu rugo).
Rayon Sports ya mbere n’amanota 66, ikeneye amanota atatu mu mikino ibiri izahuriramo na Kirehe FC (hanze) na Marines (mu rugo) kugira ngo yizere kwegukana Igikombe cya Shampiyona ku nshuro ya cyenda.
Kirehe FC irashaka gutsinda Rayon Sports kugira ngo yizere kuguma mu Cyiciro cya Mbere Sogonya Hamiss Kishi yavuze ko Rayon Sports ikunze gutakaza amanota i Kirehe Kishi yasubiye i Kirehe mu ntangiriro z'uyu mwaka

#762#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/article/umunyarwanda-yatoranyijwe-mu-bazitabira-amahugurwa-yo-kongerera-ubushobozi
Umunyarwanda yatoranyijwe mu bazitabira amahugurwa yo kongerera ubushobozi abagore mu miyoborere Umunyeshuri wiga mu mwaka wa gatatu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Grace Ineza Umuhoza, yatoranyijwe mu bazitabira gahunda yo kongerera ubushobozi abagore mu miyoborere n’iterambere rya Afurika.
Iyi gahunda izwi nka ‘Moremi Initiative Leadership and Empowerment Development (MILEAD)’ itoranya muri Afurika yose abagore batanga icyizere kurusha abandi mu bijyanye n’imiyoborere, kandi bakaba bafite umuhate n’umurava wo kuyobora abandi no guharanira impinduka z’uyu mugabane.
Uyu mwaka abagore bagera ku 2500 bo mu bihugu bya Afurika 45 no muri Diaspora bari basabye kujya muri aya mahugurwa ariko 26 barimo Umuhoza wiga amasomo ajyanye n’iby’amazi no kubungabunga ibidukikije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, baba aribo batoranywa.
Abayitabira baba bari mu kigero kiri hagati y’imyaka 19 na 25 bafite imishinga ijyanye no guhanga imirimo, ubuzima bw’abagore, ubutabera, kugira uruhare muri politiki, guhanga udushya mu bijyanye n’ibidukikije n’uburinganire nkuko The NewTimes yabitangaje.
Umuhoza umwaka ushize wanatsindiye igihembo cyo guhanga udushya tugamije ubucuruzi muri Afurika, kubera umushinga we Baby An Angel ugamije gufasha abagore n’imiryango yo mu cyaro abinyujije mu kwita ku bana bato, avuga ko aya ari amahirwe abonye yo kongera ubumenyi bwe.
Yagize ati “Nishimiye kuba natoranyijwe kwitabira iyi porogaramu ya MILEAD 2017, ndizera ko aya ari amahirwe kuri njye yo kwiyungura ubumenyi kugira ngo mbashe gukemura ibibazo byugarije umugore mu gihugu cyanjye na Afurika muri rusange bityo babeho neza.”
Moremi Initiative ni umuryango ugamije guteza imbere abagore mu miyoborere n’ubutabera muri Afurika.
Ufite icyicaro muri Ghana no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Iyi gahunda itanga ubumenyi bufasha abayitabiriye kugira imiyoborere ibereye Afurika kandi izatuma uyu mugabane uba ahantu heza ku Isi.

#767#	4	health	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/ibitaro-bya-gihundwe-bimaze-amezi-atatu-byiyubaka
Ibitaro bya Gihundwe bimaze amezi atatu byiyubaka Ibitaro bya Gihunde biherereye mu Karere ka Rusizi bimaze amezi atatu byiyubakamo umuco wo kwigarurira icyikizere ku babigana.
Ibi bitaro mu iminsi yashize byagiye bivugwamo imyitwarire itari myiza yatezaga umwuka mubi hagati y'abakozi n'abayobozi yabyo.
Bigatuma serivisi zibitangirwamo zicumbagira n'abarwayi babigana bakabihomberamo.
Abayobozi bombi bakora ihererekanyabubasha.
Hari hashize amezi atatu Dr.
Nshizirungu Palacide wayoboraga ibyo bitaro asezeye, avuga ko agiye kwiga.
Ariko muri iyo minsi byahise bihabwa by'agateganyo umuyobozi mushya CIP Dr.
Toussaint Dusabe.
Kuri uyu wa kane tariki 31 Ukuboza 2015 yongeye gukora ihererekanya bubasha n'uwahoze abiyobora.
CIP Dr Toussaint Dusabe avuga ko akigera muri ibi bitaro yabanje kwita ku ibyibanze yabonaga bikenewe, harimo guhindura imyitwarire y'abakozi, kuzamura urwego rw'imitangire ya serivisi ikaba myiza, isuku no gushaka uburyo abakozi bahembwa.
Abakozi b'ibitaro bya Gihundwe bari gukurikirana umuhango w'ihererekanyabubasha.
Akomeza avuga ko yasanze ibitaro bya Gihundwe byaritabirwaga n'abatishoboye badashobora kujya kwivuriza Mu karere ka Nyamasheke cyangwa kigari, ariko mu mezi atatu amaze byose byari bimaze guhinduka.
Agira ati" Twasanze hano abitabiraga ibitaro bya Gihunde ari abatishoboye badashobora kujya mu bitaro bya Bushenge kibogora cyangwa Kigali ariko twakoze uko dushoboye Kugira ngo tugarure isura nziza yibi bitaro kuburyo n'abakire basigaye baza kubyivurizamo atari abakene gusa."
Yasabye abakozi b'ibitaro gukomeza gufatanya n'umuyobozi wabo bari basanganywe bahesha agaciro ibitaro byabo.
Dr Nshizirungu wari umaze wavuye ku buyobozi bw'ibyo bitaro, avuga ko ashimiye mugenzi we asimbuye n'ibyo bagezeho, mu gihe gito afatanyije n'abakozi b'ibitaro bose yijeje ko azakoresha imbaraga ze zose kugirango ibyagenzweho bikomeze bigende neza.
Ati "ubwiza bw'ibintu ni urugendo umuntu atakwicarana ngo adamarare nshingiye kumusingi nsanze hano nubufatanye bwinzego zose ndizera ko bizashoboka cyane."
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Rusizi wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y'abaturage, Nsigaye Emmanuel, avuga ko icyo bishimira ari uko ibyo bashakaga byagenzweho yaba imyitarire, serivisi nziza nibindi aha akaba asobanura ko yizeye ko bitazasubira inyuma.

#833#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Amwe-mu-magambo-azimije-Perezida-Kagame-yavuze-asoza-Itorero-ry-abayobozi-b-Utugari
Amwe mu magambo azimije Perezida Kagame yavuze asoza Itorero ry'abayobozi b'Utugari Ubwo yasozaga Itorero ry'Abanyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa b'Utugari twose tw'u Rwanda, ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 12 Kamena 2015 Perezida Paul Kagame yagize impanuro aha izi ntore, aho yagiye akoresha amagambo yiganjemo ubuhanga, rimwe na rimwe buri wese adashobora guhita yisobanurira.
Aya magambo yasabaga uyabwiwe kuyatekerezaho cyane, yamara kuyumva neza agahita yumva koko icyo abwiwe ari ukuri, cyane ko basabwaga kubanza kwitekerezaho n'iterambere ryabo, bityo abaturage nabo bakibona mu ishusho bazaba batanze.
Amwe muri aya amagambo ni aya: "Hari ubwo uwejeje Toni imwe aba yakoresheje imbaraga zingana n'uwejeje Toni 10" Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yavuze ko umuntu adakwiye kwifuza kweza toni ebyiri aho abandi beza toni 10.
Yavuze ko hari n'aho bigenda gutya ariko uwejeje Toni ebyiri yakoresheje ingufu zingana n'izuwejeje Toni 10 ahubwo bigatandukanira ku buryo byakozwe.
Asanga abantu bakwiye kugira umuhate bakibaza impamvu badatera imbere kandi hari ababishoboye.
"Ubujiji n'ubuswa bishobora gutandukana" Perezida Kagame yababwiye ko injiji n'umuswa bashobora kugira itandukaniro kuko injiji ishobora kwigishwa ikajijuka ariko umuswa we arigishwa ariko akanga agakora ibinyuranye n'ibyo azi bikamubera ubusa.
Gusa akavuga ko nta na kimwe muri ibi byombi gikenewe mu Rwanda kandi hari n'uburyo bwo kubyirinda bunazwi.
"Umuganga wa mbere burya ni umurwayi" Yakomeje avuga vuga ko umurwayi ariwe ukwiye kugira umutima wo gushaka gukira indwara maze umuganga wabyigiye akabona kumuvura, bityo ngo iyo uri umurwayi udashaka gukira, nta muganga wakuvura ngo ukire.
Yavuze ko abayobozi nabo bakwiye kwivura ubuswa, ubujiji, ubukene…, kuko igihe ukibifite udashobora kubivura uwo uyobora.
"Iyo uyobora abakene weho ukagenda wiyongerera ubukire, abakene bagera aho bakabikuryoza" Perezida Kagame avuga ko iyo ushatse kwiteza imbere no gukorera mu nyungu zawe bwite kandi uhagarariye abaturage bakuzindukira mu gitondo, bakabikubaza ndetse n'igihe bagiye gutora abayobozi hari ukuntu babikwishyuza.
Avuga ko iyo babikwishyuje, n'abandi [ubutabera] bagera aho bakagukurikirana ngo ibyo watwaye bigaruke.
"Iyo ugiriwe imbabazi ejo ugasubira mu ikosa, za mbabazi nta gaciro uba uzihaye" Perezida Kagame avuga ko gutanga imbabazi no kuzisaba ari ibintu bisanzwe, gusa ngo iyo uhawe imbabazi kubera ikosa wakoze uvuga uti:" sinzasubira, ukongera ukarisubiramo, uba uzambuye agaciro".
Ngo gutanga imbabazi birasanzwe ariko gusubira mu ikosa haba hari ikindi kibazo.
"Abateye imbere bakurusha iki [?]
Imana mu kukurema ntiyigeze igucagasa" Perezida Kagame yabajije abo bayobozi impamvu bamwe batera imbere ariko abandi bakumva ko batatera imbere Imana yarabaremye kimwe.
Avuga ko iki kintu cyagakwiye gutera abantu imbaraga ndetse nabo bakiteza imbere.
"Nuwagushyira imbere ibikoresho byose usaba utabanje gukemura ibiri mu mutima wawe, umusaruro uguma uri hasi" Perezida Kagame avuga ko ibikoresho bikwiye gukoreshwa mu gihe n'ubundi umuntu afite ubushake ndetse n'umuco wo gukora, kuko n'iyo haba hari ubushake ariko hakaboneka ibikoresho bidahagije umusaruro waboneka.
Gusa aha ngo yibaza impamvu n'ibifitiwe ubushobozi byo bidakorwa neza.
"Ntukeneye abaterankunga ngo ubashe gukaraba [ …..] uturiye umugezi" Perezida Kagame avuga ko hari n'ibyo abantu badashyira mu bikorwa mu by'ukuri bitanakeneye umuterankunga, ahubwo bisaba kuba "Smart" mu mutwe aho yagiye atanga urugero ku isuku.
Yibaza niba umuntu uturiye umugezi ariko ntakarabe nawe aba akeneye abaterankunga.
Yakomeje agaragaza ingero z'abana bakigira mu mwanda, mu binogo ndetse bigatuma barwara amavunja kandi bidasaba ubushobozi buhambaye.
"Nimunyumvisha neza ko namwe mubirimo abantu bazabitekereza" Avuga ko hari bimwe agomba kubanza gusaba abayobozi kugira ngo nawe abahe ibyo abaha, aha yatanze urugero rw'umwe mu bayobozi wamubwiye ko bashaka ko iIegeko Nshinga rihinduka ngo yongere kwiyamamaza.
Avuga ko azashyiraho amananiza "Conditions" ndetse hagomba kugira icyo bumvikanaho mu rwego rwo kwiyemeza kuzuza inshingano aho gushaka kuzishyira ku bandi.
Gusa kuri Perezida Kagame, yavuze ko gukomeza kuyobora atabikeneye cyane Ati : "Tuzakomeza icyo kiganiro twumvikane ikigomba gukorwa, ariko ikizumvikanwaho cyose kigomba kuba gitanga umutekano ku Banyarwanda."
Iri jambo nubwo ryabwiwe abayobozi b'Utugari, rishobora kuba ryarumviswe cyane n'abo mu zindi nzego zo hejuru cyane ko aribo baba bakwiye gusubiza amaso inyuma bagaha umurongo abo hasi.
Perezida Kagame nawe yavuze ko n'abandi barimo babyumva ndetse byaba ngombwa ngo bakazagira igihe cyabo cyo kubibwirwa.
Iri torero ryasojwe kuwa gatanu tariki 12 Kamena 2015, mu kigo cya Gisirikare cya Gabiro, mu Karere ka Gatsibo, rikaba ryari rihuje Abanyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa b'Utugari twose tw'Igihugu bagera kuri 2.148, bakaba barahawe izina ry'Abashingwangerero.

#863#	5	politics	https://igihe.com/politiki/article/imyaka-ibiri-iruzuye-ijisho-ku-miyoborere-ya-perezida-macron-yahinduye-byinshi
Imyaka ibiri iruzuye!
Ijisho ku miyoborere ya Perezida Macron yahinduye byinshi mu mibanire n’u Rwanda Ku itariki nk’iyi mu 2017 nibwo Emmanuel Macron icyo gihe wari ufite imyaka 39, yatorewe kuyobora u Bufaransa ku majwi 66 % atsinze Marine Le Pen wagize 33,94 %, asimbura François Hollande muri manda y’imyaka itanu.
Mu mwaka we wa mbere muri Elysée, Macron yagaragaje ubushake bwo guhindura politiki y’u Bufaransa kuri Afurika, yo kubaka umubano w’abafatanyabikorwa bitandukanye n’iy’abamubanjirije bubatse uwagereranywa n’umwana imbere y’umubyeyi.
Umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa wakunze kuba mubi bishingiye ku ruhare bushinjwa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, mbere na nyuma yayo, bwo bukagaragaza ibisa no kwihunza ibyo bwakoze birimo ibirego bwashyiriyeho abayobozi bahagaritse Jenoside.
Ubutegetsi bwa Macron mu gukosora ibyagenze nabi Mu Ukuboza 2018 abacamanza b’Abafaransa bahagaritse iperereza ku ihanurwa ry’indege ya Habyarimana ryari rimaze imyaka 20, ryahoraga ku izingiro ry’umwuka mubi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ryahembereye umubano mubi hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa.
Mbere gato y’uko u Rwanda rwinjira mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994, Perezida Emmanuel Macron yakiriye itsinda ry’ abayobozi b’Umuryango uharanira inyungu z’abarokotse Jenoside, Ibuka-France.
Nyuma Perezida Macron yatangaje ishyirwaho rya komisiyo igizwe n’abahanga mu mateka n’abashakashatsi, izasesengura inyandiko icyo gihugu kibitse zigaragaza ibikorwa byacyo mu Rwanda hagati ya 1990-1994, ngo hashyirwe ahabona ukuri ku ruhare rwacyo muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi.
Perezida Macron yanatangaje ko hagiye gushyirwaho uburyo bwo gusobanura amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no gushishikariza abantu gukora ubushakashatsi kuri Jenoside.
Yagaragaragaje kandi ko adashyigikiye umuco wo kudahana, avuga ko agiye kongerera ubushobozi urukiko rukurikirana ibyaha bifitanye isano na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no kongera umubare w’abagenzacyaha “kugira ngo abakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside bakurikiranwe kandi bacirwe imanza mugihe gikwiye.”
U Bufaransa bwashyigikiye Mushikiwabo muri OIF Kimwe mu bikorwa Macron yagaragaje mu mubano mushya, ni uko yashyigikiye byeruye kandidatire ya Louise Mushikiwabo wari umukandida w’u Rwanda n’Umuryango wa Afurika yunze Ubumwe, ku mwanya w’Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa, OIF.
Mushikiwabo yaje kwemezwa n’abakuru b’ibihugu ku bwumvikane busesuye, asimbura Michaelle Jean wari usanzwe muri uwo mwanya ndetse wifuzaga manda ya kabiri.
Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru muri Gicurasi 2018, ari kumwe na Perezida Kagame, Macron yavuze ko umutima wa Francophonie uherereye muri Afurika, ko buri wese wifuza kugeza aheza uyu muryango atabigeraho atishingikirije urubyiruko rwo ku mugabane wa Afurika.
Ibyo ngo bituma ku bwa Macron "Kandidatire ku buyobozi bwa Francophonie yaba iturutse muri kimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika, niyo yaba ifite ishingiro cyane".
Afurika ifite ibihugu 30 kuri 50 bifata ibyemezo muri OIF ndetse uyu muryango wanashingiwe kuri uyu mugabane.
Perezida Macron yagiranye ibiganiro n'abayobozi ba Ibuka-France ari kumwe na Depite Hervé Berville ukomoka mu Rwanda, wamuhagarariye mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi U Bufaransa bwahagarariwe mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka Perezida Macron yatumiwe inshuro nyinshi ngo azasure u Rwanda, ndetse bamwe bari biteze ko azarusura muri uyu mwaka.
Mu kiganiro yagiriye muri Ethiopie muri Werurwe, yabajijwe n’abanyamakuru kuri ubu butumire bw’u Rwanda.
Ati "U Rwanda nibyo rwadutumiye mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka, ubutumire twarabwakiriye kandi ndemeza ko u Bufaransa buzaba buhagarariwe muri ibyo bikorwa byo Kwibuka."
Yahagarariwe na Depite Hervé Berville ufite inkomoko mu Rwanda wifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda mu mugoroba wo Kwibuka wabereye kuri Stade Amahoro.
Kutiyizira ubwe byanenzwe n’abantu batandukanye ariko bigaragaza ubushake mu kunga ubumwe nyuma y’ibyabaye byose.
Mu muhango wo Kwibuka wabereye i Paris naho Macron yohereje Minisitiri w’imari n’ubukungu, Bruno Le Maire, unitabirwa n’umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Paris, Anne Hidalgo.
Hejuru y’ibyo byose Macron yagaragaje icyifuzo cy’uko itariki ya 7 Mata, mu Bufaransa yafatwa nk’umunsi wo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Kwinjiza uyu munsi mu yubahwa mu Bufaransa ni ikimenyetso gikomeye, harebwe ku mateka y’icyo gihugu mu Rwanda, mbere ya Jenoside ndetse n’igihe yakorwaga.
U Rwanda rushima imiyoborere ya Macron Nyuma ya Jenoside, Perezida Nicolas Sarkozy ni we wa mbere uyoboye u Bufaransa wasuye u Rwanda, muri Gashyantare 2010.
Icyo gihe yanasuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, anemera ‘amakosa’ igihugu cye cyakoze.
Perezida Kagame nawe yagiye i Paris muri Nzeri 2011, ashimangiraga ubushake hagati y’ibihugu byombi mu kuzahura umubano.
Nyamara Sarkozy avuyeho mu 2012, ibyari bitangiye kujya mu murongo hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa byongeye gukonja.
Ubwo Macron yatorwaga, ubutegetsi bwe bwazanye icyizere n’itandukaniro ry’abayoboye u Bufaransa bose nyuma ya 1994.
Ni nawe Perezida u Bufaransa bwagize nyuma ya 1994, utari mu buyobozi ubwo Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yabaga.
Nyuma y’imyaka yose yari ishize, muri Gicurasi 2018 Perezida Kagame yasuye u Bufaransa aganira na Perezida Macron bemeza kunoza umubano.
Perezida Kagame aheruka kuvuga ko muri iki gihe nta gushidikanya ko hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa hari ubwumvikane ahanini bitewe n’imikorere ya Perezida Emmanuel Macron.
Yavuze ko “Perezida Macron yazanye imitekerereze mishya muri politiki y’u Bufaransa” ndetse ko ari guhindura “Politiki y’u Bufaransa n’amateka yabwo”.
Hategerejwe intambwe ikomeye mu mubano Mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV5 i Erevan muri Arménie umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yabajijwe niba nyuma y’igihe kinini u Bufaransa bushobora kongera kugira Ambasaderi mu Rwanda, asubiza ko usibye icyo hari n’ibindi bishoboka.
Ati “Ndatekereza ko icyo kigiye kuba umusaruro w’iyi mitekerereze mishya n’uburyo bwo gukorera hamwe.
Hari ibintu bigiye kuba birenze na Ambasade kuko ibi birajyana n’umubano mu buryo bwagutse aho ibintu byinshi biba harimo n’icyo.”
“Icy’ingenzi ni uko tugomba gusa n’abavugurura uyu mubano tugatuma uba mwiza ukajyana n’imitekerereze mishya.”
Aya magambo yasaga n’agiye guhindura amateka yari amaze imyaka itatu u Bufaransa butagira Ambasaderi mu Rwanda kuko uheruka ari Michel Flesch.
Mbere y’uko agenda mu 2015, u Bufaransa bwahaye u Rwanda izina rishya ry’uwo yifuza ko yayihagararira, Fred Constant, wari usanzwe ari Ambasaderi mu Birwa bya Antilles na Guyane.
Ntiyaje koherezwa mu Rwanda kuko hashize igihe kirenga umwaka rutaramwemeza, ajyanwa muri Guinée Équatoriale.
Mu gihe u Bufaransa nta Ambasaderi bugira mu Rwanda, Chargé d’Affaires, Etienne de Souza, ni we ukurikirana ibikorwa bya Ambasade.
Mu ntangiriro z’umwaka ushize yabwiye IGIHE ko hari icyizere ko hazaboneka ambasaderi mushya.
Ati “Ntabwo nakubwira igihe bizabera, ariko urabizi biterwa n’ubushake bw’ibihugu byombi, tuzareba icyo ahazaza haduhishiye.
Igikenewe ni ukureba mu buryo bw’igihe kirekire.”
Mu ruzinduko i Paris, Perezida Kagame na Macron bashyigikiye kandidatire ya Mushikiwabo Macron i Paris Izina rya Macron rirubashywe ku rwego rw’Isi ariko iwe mu gihugu amaze amezi atandatu hanganye no kwigarurira icyizere afitiwe n’abaturage, nyuma y’imyigaragambyo irangajwe imbere n’abaturage bambaye akenda k’umuhondo buri muntu aba ategetswe kugendana mumodoka ye, ari naho hakomoka izina ‘Gilets Jaunes.’
Ubwo Macron yiyamamazaga ndetse akanatorwa mu 2017, yatangaga icyizere cyo kuzaba umuyobozi ukiri muto uzanye impinduka muri politiki y’u Bufaransa akazana n’impinduka mu bukungu zizatuma imibereyo myiza izamuka n’ubushobmeri bukagabanyuka.
Ibintu byatangiye neza ariko nyuma abantu batangira kugenda bagaragaza icyuho, ku buryo hagendewe kuri politiki y’ubukungu mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ya 2018/2019, abasesenguzi bavugaga ko abakennye n’ubundi bazarushaho gukena cyangwa ntibagire icyo biyungura.
Imyigaragambyo ya Gilets Jaunes yatangiye mu Ukwakira 2018, ku ikubitiro iba iyo kwamagana imisoro yari yashyizwe ku bikomoka kuri peteroli.
Agahinda k’abaturage kazamutse kuko igiciro cya lisansi cyiyongereye kuri 23 %, mu gihe abenshi batuye kure y’imijyi bashakiramo ubuzima bityo bagakoresha imodoka cyane, ku buryo kuzamura uwo musoro byafashwe nk’ibizanye ubusumbane mu mibereho bijyanye n’amafaranga bakorera n’ibiciro by’ibindi nkenerwa byazamutse.
Impamvu z’imyigaragabyo zaje kwaguka noneho zigera ku kiguzi cy’ubuzima cyatumbagiye mu Bufaransa, bituma n’igihe leta yemereye kwisubiraho kuri wa musoro itabasha kuneza bose, maze gahunda z’ubukungu za Perezida Macron zitangira kwinubirwa.
Mu kwezi gushize Perezida Macron yijeje ‘Gilets Jaunes’ amavugurura arimo kugabanya imisoro ku mishahara y’abakozi, kongera pansiyo hitawe ku guta agaciro k’ifaranga n’amavugurura mu mirimo ya leta, hakabaho gahunda zishishikariza abantu gukora bakarenza imyaka 62 yagenewe kujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Hari kandi gukuraho ishuri rizwi nka ‘Ecole Nationale d’Administration, ENA’ rinyuramo abo mu miryango ikomeye ari nabo bavamo abayobozi bakuru muri Leta, na Macron ubwe akaba yararyizemo.
Ibi ngo byakorwa hagamijwe gutanga amahirwe ku bantu bose.
Yavuze ko yumva akababaro k’abaturage babona ko birengagijwe, ko azakora ku buryo ubutegetsi bwegerezwa abaturage, uturere tugahabwa ububasha bwisumbuye, kuko wasangaga “hari abantu benshi i Paris bafata ibyemezo batazi uko ibintu byifashe mu baturage”.
Iyi myigaragambyo ikomeje kugenda icogora nyuma yo kuba ku minsi ya gatandatu 23 yikurikiranya ndetse ikaba yarakunze kurangwa n’ubugizi bwa nabi ku buryo hari benshi bayifatiwemo ubu bafunzwe ndetse abandi bagejejwe imbere y’inkiko.
Perezida Kagame yagiriye uruzinduko rwa mbere mu Bufaransa kuva mu 2015 asubirayo mu 2018

#880#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/u-rwanda-duhagaze-neza-mu-buvuzi-bwa-coronavirus-dr-nsanzimana
U Rwanda duhagaze neza mu buvuzi bwa Coronavirus - Dr Nsanzimana Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RBC) Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, avuga ko u Rwanda ruhagaze neza mu buvuzi bwa Coronavirus no mu bushakashatsi bunyuranye bw’umuti wo kuvura iyo virus.
Dr Nsanzimana Sabin Ubwo yari mu kiganiro Ubyumva Ute cya KT Radio cyo ku itariki 27 Gicurasi 2020, uwo muyobozi yagaragaje ibipimo u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho mu kuvura Coronavirus agendeye ku bipimo by’ibihugu binyuranye ku isi.
Yavuze ko n’ubwo umuti wa Coronavirus utaraboneka, u Rwanda ruhagaze neza mu bushakashatsi mu gushaka uburyo iyo ndwara ivurwa.
Yagize ati “Kugeza ubu u Rwanda duhagaze neza.
Nta muti uraboneka wizewe, hari imiti yagiye ica mu igeragezwa n’iyagiye yizerwa cyane byagera hagati bikarangira bidakunze.
Uzwi cyane ni Chloroquine, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ukaba Umuryango mpuzamahanga ushinzwe iby’ubuzima wamaze guhagarika ubushakashatsi bwakorwaga kuri uwo muti.
Natwe twari twaratangiye kwinjira mu itsinda mpuzamahanga rikora ubushakashatsi ku miti na wo urimo, twarabihagaritse nta n’umuntu n’umwe twari twakawuhaye”.
Arongera Ati “Hari indi miti igera kuri itatu dukurikirana itanga icyizere, hari uwo turi kwitaho cyane tutaratangira gutanga aha mu Rwanda, gusa ubushakashatsi bwa mbere buragaragaza ko ushobora kugira ingaruka nziza kurusha Chloroquine yamaze no kuva muri uru rugamba”.
Yagarutse ku iterambere ry’ubuvuzi bwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda, aho kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hataraboneka umurwayi wo ku gipimo cya nyuma.
Agira ati “Kugeza uyu munsi, nta barwayi turagira bari bagera ku rwego bita ubuvuzi bwisumbuyeho kuko twari twarabyiteguye byose, ni ikintu twishimira, iyo umurwayi ageze kuri icyo gipimo cya nyuma, biragorana kumuvura, n’amahirwe yo gukira aba ari make”.
Abajijwe n’umunyamakuru ibanga u Rwanda rufite ryo kuba umubare w’abarwayi bakira Coronavirus ukomeje kwiyongera, Dr Nzanzimana yavuze ko uburyo bwa mbere bwifashishwa ari ukwita cyane ku barwayi, mu rwego rwo gufasha umubiri w’umurwayi kwirwanaho mu guhangana n’iyo virus.
Ikindi ngo ni uburyo bwo kuvura ibyuririzi, umuntu agakira n’ubwo nta miti iraboneka ku isi hose ivura COVID-19.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rufite akarusho ku bindi bihugu, aho kugeza ubu rwakataje mu gupima abantu benshi mu buryo bwihuse.
Agira ati “Mu bijyanye no gupima Coronavirus, hari itsinda ry’abashakashatsi bacu bamaze iminsi bapima mu buryo bwihuse, ndetse twanabyanditseho inkuru y’ubushakashatsi ishobora gufasha n’ibindi bihugu”.
Arongera ati “Hari uburyo dupima abantu benshi icyarimwe, nk’ibihumbi bibiri mu buryo bwihuse.
Ni abashakashatsi muri Laboratwari yacu bicaye, barareba basanga birakunda.
Ubu hari ibihugu byinshi biri kutugisha inama batubaza uburyo tubikora”.
Dr Nsanzimana kandi, yavuze ko hari n’irindi tsinda riri mu bushakashatsi bwo gupima hifashishijwe ibipimo byo mu Rwanda, aho bakurikirana abakize ngo harebwe ubudahangarwa umubiri wabo wagiye ukora, ubwoko bwabwo, n’abasirikare b’umubiri, ndetse hakaba higwa n’ubwoko bwa virus.
Ati “Ndetse na virus ubwayo turi kuyiga, kugira ngo turebe ko iyo dufite mu Rwanda itandukanye n’iyo mu bindi bihugu nko muri Aziya cyangwa muri Amerika”.
Uko u Rwanda ruhagaze mu guhashya icyorezo cya Coronavirus Dr Nsanzimana avuga ko mu mezi abiri n’igice ashize habonetse umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus mu Rwanda.
Ingamba zafashwe zatumye icyo cyorezo kidakwirakwira mu baturage, akaba ari na yo mpamvu kugeza ubu Coronavirus itasakaye mu baturage.
Yavuze ko kugeza ku itariki 27 Gicurasi 2020, hari hamaze kuboneka abarwayi 346 aho 245 ari abakize, abari bakirwaye bagikurikiranwa bakaba 101.
Avuga ko hari amasomo menshi yizwe aho urugamba rugikomeje abantu bakaba basabwa kwirinda kwirara kuko icyorezo gikomeje guhindura isura hirya no hino ku isi.
Ati “Mu rwego rw’ubuzima, tubona uyu ari umwanya wo gufungura amaso kurushaho kuko ibihugu byinshi byagiye bikumira byagera hagati bikirara imibare ikabibana myinshi ikanabisiga, mu Rwanda turacyafite agahenge tugomba gufatirana”.
Yavuze ko mu gihe raporo ya buri munsi ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaje umubare munini w’abarwayi bashya, ko bidakwiye gutera Abanyarwanda impungenge.
Ati “Nkunda kuvuga ngo iyo twabonye imibare myinshi biba ari byiza, kuko uba wabonye ikibazo aho giherereye ugafata n’ingamba uko bikwiye.
Kubona imibare mike bishobora gusobanura ibintu bibiri: ibipimo wafashe bishobora kuba bitari bihagije cyangwa byafashwe ahatari ho, cyangwa se bigasobanura ko icyorezo kiri kugabanuka.
Buriya rero nta bipimo turageraho ngo twishimire ko twageze ku mibare twifuza, iyaba byadushobokeraga ngo dupime abantu bose tumenye uko bahagaze”.
Yavuze ko mu byumweru bitatu bishize, abarwayi bashya ari abafite aho bahuriye n’abatwara amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka, abo bahuye n’abo bazanye, icyorezo kikaba kiva mu gihugu kimwe kijya mu kindi aho abo bashyiriweho ingamba zo gupimwa batarahura n’abaturage.
Ati “Mu minsi ishize akazi kacu karahindutse, aho uyu munsi akazi kacu gakorerwa ku mipaka kurusha uko mbere byadusabaga gushakisha abantu mu ngo zabo”.
Mu Rwanda uburyo bwo gupima Coronavirus bwageze mu Ntara Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko uburyo bwo gupima Coronavirus bukomeje kwiyongera, aho mu ntara hatangiye gushyirwa ibyuma byifashishwa mu gupima iyo ndwara.
Intara y’Iburasirazuba ni yo yabimburiye izindi, aho ibitaro bya Rwamagana byamaze kubona imashini igiye kwifashishwa mu gupima Coronavirus ikanifashishwa no gupima Virusi itera SIDA.
Ngo ni yo mpamvu hakomeje kugaragara ubwiyongere bw’abarwayi mu bipimo bifatwa ku munsi, aho ku nshuro ya mbere abagera ku bihumbi bibiri bapimwe ku munsi umwe.
Imashini yahawe ibitaro bya Rwamagana igiye kwifashishwa mu gupima Coronavirus Dr Nsanzimana abajijwe n’umunyamakuru impamvu abantu batemerewe gusurana baturutse mu ntara zinyuranye, ariko abaturuka hanze y’igihugu bo bakemererwa kwinjira, yasubije ko imigenderanire y’ibihugu igenda ikomorerwa mu bushishozi hashingiwe ku buryo imibare y’abarwayi igenda igabanuka, ndetse ngo ni na byo bigenderwaho mu gihugu runaka, aho serivise zimwe na zimwe zigenda zifungurwa bitewe n’uburyo icyo cyorezo cyifashe.
Ngo ubwo ku itariki ya 1 Kamena hagiye gufungurwa zerivise zimwe na zimwe, ubu hafashwe ingamba zo gupima abazakora muri izo serivise, urugero abamotari n’abandi bakora ingendo zinyuranye zifite aho zihurira n’abantu benshi, hagamijwe kwirinda ko virus yakwirakwizwa mu bantu.
Yavuze kandi ko kuba ingendo zihuza Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali zigiye gusubukurwa, bidateye impungenge kuko mu bipimo bafashe basanze mu mujyi wa Kigali nta coronavirus irimo.
Agira ati “Mbere twari dufite impungenge z’uko Umujyi wa Kigali ari wo wibasiwe, abantu bakaba bajyana Coronavirus kure aho tudashobora gutanga ubutabazi bwihuse.
Ubu ikigaragara ni uko mu Mujyi wa Kigali nta kimenyetso na kimwe kitwereka ko hari coronavirus iri kugenda tutazi.
Aho iri turahabona ku mipaka n’ahandi turayikurikirana muri abo batwara amakamyo, icyo tuzakomeza kureba ni uko hatavuka ahandi hantu hari coronavirus yakwinjira mu baturage.

Kempinski yatangiye gucunga Hôtel des Mille Collines Yanditswe kuya 18-07-2014 saa 12:55' na Elisée Mpirwa Hôtel des Mille Collines iherereye rwagati mu mujyi wa Kigali yegukanwe n'ikompanyi y'Abadage kabuhariwe mu by'amahoteli yitwa Kempinski izwiho kuba ari yo nkuru mu kugira hoteli zihenze i Burayi.

Hôtel des Mille Collines iherereye rwagati mu mujyi wa Kigali yegukanwe n'ikompanyi y'Abadage kabuhariwe mu by'amahoteli yitwa Kempinski izwiho kuba ari yo nkuru mu kugira hoteli zihenze i Burayi.
Mu itangazaho Umuyobozi mukuru wa Kempinski Milles Collines, Christoph Strahm yashyize ahagaragara, yishimiye iki gikorwa "Ni igihe nyacyo gukorera mu Rwanda.
Ni ubukwe budasanzwe kuri hoteli ya mbere yafunguwe mu Rwanda mu myaka 40 ishize ndetse n'itsinda ry'amahoteli ahenze i Burayi rikuze kurusha andi."
Hôtel des Mille Collines yari yaraguzwe mu 2005 n'istinda ryo muri Afurika y'Epfo rizwi nka Mikcor rifatanyije na Banki y'u Rwanda itsura Amajyambere (BRD) ndetse na guverinoma y'u Rwanda.
Iyi hoteli y'inyenyeri enye ifite ibyumba 122, hamwe n'igice kigenewe inama zitandukanye.
Mu mezi 18 ari imbere Hôtel des Milles Collines iraba iri kuvugururwa kugira ngo yuzuze ibisabwa ngo igere ku rwego nk'urw'i Burayi.
Itsinda rya Kempinski rifite icyicaro i Genève mu Busuwisi rikaba ribarizwa mu bihugu 43 ku Isi birimo 6 byo muri Afurika.

#925#	6	religion	http://makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article/Ni-iki-Bibiliya-ivuga-ku-butane-bw-abashakanye-bweze-muri-iki-gihe
Ni iki Bibiliya ivuga ku butane bw'abashakanye bweze muri iki gihe?
Matayo 19:3-6: Abafarizayi baza aho ari kugira ngo bamutegere mu byo avuga, baramubaza bati: "Mbese biremewe ko umugabo yirukana umugore we ku mpamvu ibonetse yose?"
Arabasubiza ati: "Mbese ntimwasomye ko mbere na mbere igihe Imana yaremaga yaremye abantu, umugabo n'umugore?
Nyuma yaravuze iti: ‘Ni cyo gituma umugabo azasiga se na nyina akabana n'umugore we akaramata, bombi bakaba umuntu umwe', ku buryo baba batakiri babiri ahubwo baba babaye umuntu umwe.
Nuko rero ntihakagire umuntu utandukanya abo Imana yafatanyije."
1Abakorinto 7:39: Umugore aba ahambiriwe ku mugabo we igihe cyose uwo mugabo akiriho.
Ariko aramutse apfuye uwo mugore aba afite uburenganzira bwo gushyingirwa uwo ashaka wese, apfa kuba umuyoboke wa Nyagasani.
Abaroma 7:2-3 :Ni cyo gituma amategeko ahambira umugore ku mugabo we akiriho, ariko iyo umugabo amaze gupfa, umugore aba ahambuwe ku mategeko y'umugabo we.
Nuko rero, ni cyo gituma iyo umugabo we akiriho, niba abaye uw'undi mugabo yitwa umusambanyikazi, ariko iyo umugabo we apfuye, ntaba agitegekwa n'ayo mategeko, ni cyo gituma ataba umusambanyikazi naho yacyurwa n'undi mugabo.
Luka 16:18 "Umuntu wese usenda umugore we akarongora undi aba asambanye, kandi n'ucyura umugore usenzwe n'umugabo we aba asambanye. .
Mu nkiko hirya no hino ku isi haravugwa umubare uri ku kigero cyo hejuru cy'abasaba ubutane harimo n'abizera Bibiliya.
Ni nako inama zidasiba guterana mu matorero no mu miryango zigerageza gukemura urusobe rw'ibibazo biri kubera mu miryango bagerageza kubunga no gukemura amakimbirane.
Ni iyihe ntandaro yayo makimbirane mu miryango?
Kubaho k'umuryango no kubana kw'abashakanye n' umugambi ukomeye w'Imana watangiriye mu ngombyi ya Edeni.
Bibiliya igaragaza ko ababiri babaye umubiri umwe bombi bakabana akaramata, Adamu yahamije uko kuba umwe agira ati "Uyu we n'igufa ryo mu magufa yajye n'akara ko mu mara yanjye".
Ikibi gisekwa nk'icyiza ariko birababaje cyane!
Si umuco wacu nk'abanyarwanda; gusenyuka kw'ingo no gutandukana kw'abashakanye.
Twabyumvaga iyo mu mahanga yakure nk'ikizira; none iyo mbuto mbi umwanzi yayizanye iwacu; no mu bizera Imana.
Abakijijwe dukwiye gufatanya gusenga no kurwanya izo mbaraga z'umwijima ziva kuri sekibi satani.
Mu muryango niho itorero ritangirira no gutoza abazadukomokaho kubaha Imana;niyo mpamvu umwanzi arwanya umuryango;Kuko aba awubonamo imbaraga zikomeye zizamumerera nabi.
Nkuko itorero rigomba kuba maso kandi rigasenga , ni nako ingo zidakwiye kudamarara kugirango umwanzi atazigabaho ibitero.
Birakabije aho abantu basigaye basaba ubutane bataranabana n'ukwezi, mu kundi ukumva umwe muri bo yakoze ubundi bukwe kandi bagasubira kurahira ibinyoma ko bazatandukanywa ;ikindi kitari urupfu cyangwa Yesu agarutse!
Gutana abantu babigize nk'umukino ariko dukwiye kubigendamo gahoro;kuko n'imwe mu ntwaro ikomeye Satani ari gukoresha benshi bakagwa mu mutego batabizi.
Urugo si urwo guhubukirwa.
Wowe wifuza kubaka ukeneye kumenya inshingano ugiye kwinjiramo neza mbere y'uko uzinjiramo;dore ko ari Nkunda ngukunde na ngandukira ngukunde; tutirengagije n'izindi nshingano zitandukanye z'urugo.
Imana ihe ubwenge abagiye kubaka kandi itwikirize amaraso y'umwana wayo Yesu Kristo ingo zose z'abashakanye;maze satani amware abure abo aconcomera.

#946#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUREZI/article/Ntabwo-wavuga-ireme-ry-uburezi-atongereye-ubushobozi-bw-abarimu-MINEDUC
Ntabwo wavuga ireme ry'uburezi utongereye ubushobozi bw'abarimu –MINEDUC Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri MINEDUC ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye yatangaje ko uburezi bufite ireme ari bwo buzafasha abanyarwanda mu iterambere ariko kandi akavuga ko igihe abarimu bazaba batitaweho iryo reme ntaho ryaturuka.
Ibi yabitangaje kuri uyu wa 21 Ukuboza 2016 ubwo yasozaga amahugurwa y'abarimu bitwa aba mentors mu ishuri ryisumbuye ryitiriwe mutagatifu Aloys ry'i Rwamagana.
(G.
S Staint Aloys) Aba barimu ubusanzwe baba bafite inshingano yo guhugura bagenzi babo mu rurimi rw'icyongereza bavuga ko bazafasha abana kugera ku ireme ry'uburezi ariko bakavuga ko hari bamwe mu bana biga nabi bitewe n'ubukene abandi bigaturuka ku babyeyi babo.
Umwe muri bo witwa Girikwayo Phocas yemeza ko ayo mahugurwa azatuma uburezi bugira ireme kuko bayakuyemo byinshi ariko akavuga ko muri iki gihe ngo ababyeyio basa n'aho bahariye abarimu uburere bw'abana babo kandi ngo ubundi haba hakenewe ubufatanye ku babyeyi n'abarimu.
Yagize " Turishimira ko baduha amahugurwa, tuzakomeza gufasha ibigo by'amashuri twaturutsemo ariko hakwiye ubufatanye n'inzego zose kugirango tuzagere ku nshingano zacu, nibyo tubonye amahugurwa ariko hari bamwe mu bana bagenda bata ishuri kubera ibibazo byo miryango bigatuma batiga neza na byo bikagira ingaruka ku ireme ry'uburezi."
Yakomeje agira ati: "Ababyeyi bamwe bakwiye guhindura imyumvire kandi abagaragara ko bakeneye gufashwa basanzwe bafashwa ariko hari uruhare rw'umubyeyi agira mu gushakira umwana iby'ibanze bituma yiga neza."
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y'uburezi ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye Isaac Munyakazi agaruka ku bibazo by'ireme ry'uburezi we yavuze ko mbere na mbere abarimu bagomba kubanza guhugurwa kugira ngo babone aho bakura rya reme ry'uburezi.
Yagize ati: "ntabwo wavuga ireme ry'uburezi udafashije abarimu mu kubongerera ubushobozi, ubu hamaze guhugurwa bagera ku 1536 kandi bose b'abanyarwanda mu gihe tugitangira twakoreshaga abanyamahanga kuko hashize igihe gito dutangiye kwigisha mu rurimi rw'icyongereza, ubu turi muri gahunda yo kuvugurura uburyo bw' imyigishirize kugirango uburezi burusheho kugira ireme" Agaruka ku ruhare rw'ababyeyi, Munyakazi yagize ati: "uruhare rwa buri munyarwanda rurakenewe kugirango uburezi bugire ireme kuko uburere ntibureba Minisiteri y'uburezi gusa, nta mwana ugomba kuvutswa amahirwe yo kwiga ngo abantu barebere kandi Leta yo ikora ibishoboka ngo buri mwana yige kandi neza , Tuzakomeza gukangurira inzego zose n'ababyeyi gufasha abana kwiga neza kuko nta mwana ugejeje igihe cyo kwiga wakagombye kuva mu ishuri."
Mu Rwanda hagitangira gukoreshwa ururimi rw'icyongereza mu burezi, hari benshi mu barimu byabereye imbogamizi kuko batumvaga neza icyongereza, ibi byatumye Leta iha akazi bamwe mu banyamahanga ariko ishyiraho gahunda yo guhugura abarimu na bo bakajya guhugura abandi muri uru rurimi mu rwego rwo gushimangira ireme ry'uburezi mu Rwanda.
Iki kiciro gisojwe kuri uyu wa gatatu cyari kirimo abarimu 340 baturutse mu turere twose tw'u Rwanda.
Justin Ngabonziza

#963#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Abanyeshuri-320-ba-ES-Byimana-basubiye-iwabo-kubera-amacumbi-yahiye
Abanyeshuri 320 ba ES Byimana basubiye iwabo kubera amacumbi yahiye Kubera inkongi y'umuriro yongeye kwibasira ishuri rya Ecole des Science Byimana, tariki 02/06/2013, abanyeshuri 320 b'abahungu biga muri icyo kigo basubijwe iwabo mu gihe hagishakishwa ahandi bazajya barara.
Iki cyemezo cyafashwe n'inzego zitandukanye mu nama yakozwe irimo na minisitiri w'uburezi Dr Vincent Biruta ku gicamunsi cya tariki 02/06/2013 nyuma y'amasaha macye inyubako abo banyeshuri biga mu cyiciro cya kabiri bararagamo ifashwe n'umuriro.
Aya macumbi yatangiye gushya saa sita z'amanywa yahiriyemo ibikoresho byose byarimo ariko ku bw'amahirwe nta muntu wahitanywe n'uyu muriro kuko abanyeshuri bari bagiye mu mikino itandukanye.
Ubuyobozi, inzego z'umutekano n'abaturage bafatanyije kuzimya iyi nkongi y'umuriro.
Ababyeyi bari baje kureba abana babo ntibishimiye ko hataha aba bana gusa, kuko bo bavugaga ko abana bose bakwiye gutaha hakabanza hakamenyekana igitera izi nkongi z'umuriro zimaze kuba ubugira gatatu muri iki kigo.
Abanyeshuri biga mu mwaka wa gatandatu, nabo bari mu batashye, baravuga ko bahangayikishijwe n'ikizamini cya Leta bagomba gukora uyu mwaka, ngo kuko amakaye yabo yose yarahiye kuburyo kuzabona aho bigira bizabagora cyane.
Iyi nkongi yongeye kwibasira aya macumbi nyuma y'aho tariki 20/05/2013 na 23/04/2013 yari yahiye agakongoka.
Nubwo abashinzwe kuzimya umuriro baturuka kure, bagerageza gushyiraho akabo mu kuzimya iyi miriro.
Ubwo uyu muriro wibasiraga iki kigo ku nshuro ya mbere tariki 23/04/2013, ugatwika icumbi ry'abana b'abahungu bigaga mu kiciro cya mbere cy'amashuri yisumbuye nabwo ikemezo nk'iki cyarafashwe hataha abanyeshuri 409.
Ku nshuro ya kabiri 20/05/2013 bwo aba banyeshuri ntibongeye gutaha kuko hakozwe ibishoboka abana bagakomeza amasomo.
Iri shuri risanzwe rizwiho kuza mu myanya ya mbere mu gutsindisha abanyeshuri benshi mu kizamini cya Leta.
Kugeza ubu ntiharamenyekana icyaba cyihishe inyuma y'izi nkongi z'umuriro.
Inyubako yahiye yegeranye n'iyari yahiye ku nshuro ya mbere.
Hari hasgize iminsi umuyobozi w'ishuri ES Byiamana, Frere Gahima Alphonse, atangaje ko bagiye gushyiraho abashinzwe umutekeno bazajya baba muri aya macumbi amasaha 24/24 mu rwego rwo gucukumbura igitera izo nkongi z'umuriro.
Eric Muvara

#977#	1	sports	https://rwandamagazine.com/imikino/article/gukinira-musanze-fc-ni-ukunywana-na-yo-tuyishimire-placide-6644
Gukinira Musanze FC ni ukunywana na yo- TUYISHIMIRE Placide Perezida wa Musanze FC Tuyishimire Placide avuga ko kuba ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe bwarakomeje kwita no guhemba abakinnyi bayo no muri ibi bihe imikino yahagaze kubera Covid-19 ari uko kuyikinira ari nk’igihango bafitanye na yo bakaba basa n’abanywanye bikaba ari kubagumisha mu mwuka wo gukomeza gutumbira intego bihaye yo kuza mu myanya ine ya mbere muri shampiyona.
Mu gihe havugwa imibereho mibi mu bakinnyi b’amwe mu makipe y’umupira w’amaguru yo mu Rwanda kubera kudahembwa bitewe n’uko ibikorwa bya siporo byahagaritswe kubera Covid-19, iyo si inkuru irangwa mu bakinira Musanze FC.
Mu nama ubuyobozi bwakoranye n’abakinnyi mu kwezi kwa mbere, bemeranije ko bazakomeza guhembwa ariko bagahabwa 30% by’amafaranga basanzwe bagenerwa nk’imishahara nk’uko amasezerano bafitanye n’iyi kipe abiteganya.
Ikipe ya Musanze FC yaraye ihembye abakinnyi bayo umushahara w’ukwezi kwa 12 k’umwaka ushize mu gihe kandi byitezwe ko bazabona vuba aha ay’umushahara w’ukwezi kwa mbere k’uyu mwaka.
Ni ibintu abakinnyi ba Musanze FC bakiranye ibyishimo kuko bahembwe badakina nk’uko babyemerewe n’ubuyobozi bw’ikipe bakinira nkuko bamwe mu bo twaganiriye babivuze.
Aganira na Rwandamagazine.com, Perezida wa Musanze FC yavuze ko kwita kubakinnyi no gukomeza kubahemba ari uko babona abakinnyi mbere ya byose nk’abantu kandi ko kubafasha mu bihe nk’ibi bifitiye inyungu iyi kipe mu gihe kirambye ndetse n’igihe bazaba batagikinira iyi kipe.
Bwana Tuyishimire avuga ko kwita ku bakinnyi ba Musanze FC ubu bisa nko kunywana no kugirana igihango kiba kizageza no ku bana b’aba bakinnyi.
Perezida wa Musanze FC yavuze kandi ko guhemba abakinnyi ari ukubagumisha mu mwuka uzatuma bitwara neza ubwo shampiyona izaba isubukuwe.
Tuyishimire Placide, Perezida wa Musanze FC Ikipe ya Musanze FC yatangiranye umwaka w’imikino wa 2020-2021 intego yo kuzaza mu myanya ine ya shampiyona ndetse no gutwara nibura ikindi gikombe kimwe mu bikinirwa mu Rwanda.
Aha, Bwana Tuyishimire yagize ati “Ku byerekeye umusaruro w’ako kanya, shampiyona nisubukurwa ntabwo [umukinnyi] uzamwaka umusaruro kandi utaramubaye hafi mu bihe bigoye nk’ibi turimo.
Kandi twe dufite intego yo kuba mu makipe ane ya mbere muri Shampiyona , byanashoboka tukegukana igikombe kindi.

#1013#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/Ubwiteganyirize/article/nyamagabe-kugana-amatsinda-yo-kwizigama-no-kugurizanya-byakenuye-abaturage
Nyamagabe: Kugana amatsinda yo kwizigama no kugurizanya byakenuye abaturage Abaturage batuye umurenge wa Gatare, kugana amatsinda yo kwizigama no kugurizanya byabakuye mu bukene aho babashije kwigurira amatungo magufi, bagura amamashini adoda, biga ububaji n'ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye byazamuye imibereho myiza yabo.
Kuri uyu wa 31 Ukwakira, mu kagari ka Ruganda, umurenge wa Gatare, Akarere ka Nyamagabe, ubwo hasozwaga icyumweru cyo kwizigama no kwizihiza umunsi wahariwe kwizigama ku rwego mpuzamahanga abaturage bamurikiye abitabiriye aho kwizigama bibagejeje.
Amatsinda yo kwizigama no kugurizanya yamurikiye abitabiriye ibyo bagezeho.
Abaturage bamwe bahereye ku mafaranga 200 y'u Rwanda ndetse na 500, bishimira aho kwizigama bahereye ku mafaranga make byabakuye ndetse n'aho bibagejeje.
Uwitwa Valeriya Nyirashengero yagize ati "Kera ntarajya mu matsinda nari umudamu w'umukene wahingiraga amafaranga 500 mfata, amafaranga make nkuye mu bwizigame, ngura umurama w'ibinyomoro, noneho akarere kaje kungurira imbuto kampa 600,000, ubu naguze ikibanza ndishyura n'ishuri ry'abana."
Mu bayobozi bitabiriye umunsi mpuzampahanga wo kwizigama bibukije abaturage ko kwizigama bizabageza kuri ejo hazaza heza.
Uwitwa Josephine Nyiragaju nawe yagize ati: "Ubu ndi ku gishoro cy'amafaranga 16,000 mfite amamera ncuruza kandi narwanyije Nyakatsi nturutse ku amafaranga 200 gusa."
Muri aka karere ka Nyamagabe, abaturage bamaze kujya mu matsinda yo kwizigama no kugurizanya baragera ku 9,000 mu matsinda 157 bakaba bafashwa n'ishyirahamwe ry'abagore b'abakirisitu nyarwanda ku nkunga y'umuryango CARE international.
Nubwo amatsinda yateje imbere bamwe, umubare wabatitabira uracyari muke, ariko ubuyobozi bw'akarere bufite ingamba zo gukangurira abaturage kubyitabira.
Philbert Mugisha umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyamagabe yagize ati: "nukwifashisha wa muturage mugenzi we abona, areberaho amubwira ngo kera urugo rwacu ntitwari tworoye, ariko noneho dore ibyo dufite, rero nibo tuzifashisha cyane cyane amatsinda yamaze gutera intambwe."
Ibi birori byateguwe n'umuryango CARE ufasha amatsinda yo kwizigama no kugurizanya, abafashe amajambo barimo abahagarirye ibigo by'imari bitandukanye, imiryango itegamiye kuri leta bongeye kwibutsa abaturage ko kwizigama aribyo bizatuma bagira ejo hazaza heza.
Caissy Christine Nakure

#1055#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/abasirikare-bakuru-bakiriye-apr-fc-mu-busabane-manzi-thierry-abizeza-gutwara
Abasirikare bakuru bakiriye APR FC mu busabane, Manzi Thierry abizeza gutwara ibikombe byose (Amafoto) Abasirikare bakuru mu ngabo z’u Rwanda (RDF) barangajwe imbere n’Umuyobozi w’icyubahiro wa APR FC akaba n’Umujyanama wa Perezida wa Repubulika mu bijyanye n’Umutekano, Gen James Kabarebe, baraye bakiriye abakinnyi n’abatoza b’iyi kipe mu busabane bwabereye mu Kigo cya Gisirikare kiri i Gako mu Karere ka Bugesera, kuri iki Cyumweru.
Hari kandi Umugaba mukuru w’Inkeragutabara Gen.
Fred Ibingira, Perezida wa APR FC akaba n’Umugenzuzi mukuru wa RDF, Lt Gen.
Jacques Musemakweli ndetse n’Umuyobozi wungirije wa APR FC akaba n’umuyobozi w’ingabo mu ntara y’Uburasirazuba n’Umujyi wa Kigali, Maj Gen.
Mubaraka Muganga.
Barumuna ba APR FC bo mu ikipe y’Intare FC n’abayobozi b’amatsinda y’abafana ba APR FC mu gihugu cyose, bitabiriye ubu busabane bwo kwishimira uko iyi kipe yitwaye mu mwaka wa 2019 nubwo yawusoje nta gikombe yegukanye.
Perezida w’icyubahiro wa APR FC, Gen.
James Kabarebe, wari umushyitsi mukuru muri uyu muhango, yashimiye abakinnyi n’abatoza uko bitwaye mu 2019, anasaba kugira imyumvire y’uko iyi kipe igomba gutsinda buri gihe.
Ati ”Turabashimira umusaruro mwagize mu mwaka ushize wa 2019, mwakoze byinshi kandi byiza turifuza kubikomeza kandi tugasoza neza, birashoboka, nta na kimwe kizatubuza.
Kuva APR FC yashingwa, ubu nibwo tugize ikipe nziza ifite ubuyobozi bwiza, abatoza beza, abakinnyi beza ndetse n’abafana beza iyo urebye neza hose usanga huzuye.’’
” Niba byose rero bimeze neza, ikintu cyo gukosora kugeza ubu ni kimwe gusa kandi mugomba kuzirikana, ni imyumvire ya APR FC.
Iyi myumvire ntabwo igoranye ni uko APR FC ijya gukina igomba gutsinda byanze bikunze, iyi myumvire rero iyo igiye mu batoza, abakinnyi ndetse n’abafana twese tukajya ku kibuga twumva ko tugomba gutsinda nta cyatubuza kubigeraho.”
Kapiteni wa APR FC, Manzi Thierry, wavuze mu izina ry’abakinnyi, yashimiye ubuyobozi buhora ikipe hafi ndetse n’abafana bababaye inyuma bakabinjiza mu mwaka w’imihigo wa 2020 bari ku mwanya wa mbere.
Uyu mukinnyi yijeje Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe y’ingabo kuzegukana ibikombe byose bizakinirwa mu Rwanda muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 uhereye ku Gikombe cy’Intwari kizatangwa tariki ya 1 Gashyantare uyu mwaka.
Ati ‘’Twasoje umwaka wa 2019 turi ku mwanya wa mbere ku rutonde rw’agateganyo rwa shampiyona, ariko ntibihagije kuko uyu mwaka twatangiye wa 2020 ari uw’imihigo kandi tugomba guhigura, tugomba kubashimisha bitewe n’icyizere mutugirira n’uburyo mudutera imbaraga zo gukora cyane.”
”Uyu mwaka dutangiye urimo akazi gakomeye, harimo imikino yo kwishyura ya shampiyona ya 2019-20 twanatangiye, igikombe cy’Intwari ndetse n’igikombe cy’Amahoro.
Kuri twe abakinnyi imbagara zirahari, intego dufite ni uguharanira gutwara ibyo bikombe byose kandi tugomba kuyigeraho.”
APR FC yatangiye umwaka wa 2020 inganya na AS Kigali ubusa ku busa, iyoboye Shampiyona n’amanota 38 nyuma y’imikino 16, irusha amanota ane Rayon Sports ya kabiri.
Ikipe y’ingabo izagaruka mu kibuga ku Cyumweru, yakira Bugesera FC mu mukino uzabera kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo.
Abatoza ba APR FC mu busabane bw'iyi kipe bwabaye kuri iki Cyumweru Abakinnyi ba APR FC bafata inyama zo kurya muri ubu busabane bwo kwishimira uko basoje umwaka ushize Umutoza w'abanyezamu Mugabo Alex na Nabyl Bekraoui wungirije umutoza mukuru, bafashe ibiti byariho inyama muri ubu busabane Manzi Thierry wavuze mu izina ry'abakinnyi, yijeje ubuyobozi bwa APR FC kuzegukana ibikombe byose Perezida wa APR FC akaba n’Umugenzuzi mukuru wa RDF Lt Gen.
Jacques Musemakweli yashimiye abakinnyi uko bakomeje kwitwara Umutoza mukuru wa APR FC, Umunya-Maroc Adil Mohamed Erradi yavuze ko ari bwo bwa mbere akoreye mu ikipe iharanira intsinzi cyane Umutoza wa APR FC, Adil Mohamed Erradi asuhuzanya na Perezida w'icyubahiro w'iyi kipe, Gen James Kabarebe Umuyobozi w'icyubahiro wa APR FC, Gen.
Kabarebe yibukije abakinnyi n'abatoza b'iyi kipe ko igomba gutsinda buri mukino uko byagenda kose Abakinnyi ba APR FC bashimiwe uko bitwaye mu mwaka ushize wa 2019 Abatoza b'ikipe y'Intare FC Abatoza bo mu ikipe y'abato y'Intare F.A Ubu busabane bwahuje abasirikare bakuru, abayobozi ba APR FC, Abakinnyi n'abatoza bwabereye i Gako Amafoto: APR FC

#1057#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/ibiterane/article/korali-hoziana-yahembuye-abitabiriye-igitaramo-cyabuzemo-new-melody-amafoto
Korali Hoziana yahembuye abitabiriye igitaramo cyabuzemo New Melody (Amafoto) Korali Hoziana yo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yakoze igitaramo cy’uburyohe cyahuruje imbaga y’abaturutse imihanda yose, benshi bataha banyuzwe no kumva indirimbo zakanyujijeho hambere; New Melody yari yatumiwe ntiyakigaragaramo.
Iki gitaramo cyabereye muri Dove Hotel kuri iki Cyumweru, ahari hateraniye ibihumbi by’abakirisitu batandukanye, abayobozi bakuru muri ADEPR n’abo mu nzego za Leta barimo Perezida w’Itorero ry’Igihugu, Bamporiki Edouard.
Hoziana imaze imyaka 40 ishinze imizi mu ivugabutumwa yongeye gushimangira umwihariko mu gushyikirana n’Imana binyuze mu kuyiramya mu ndirimbo zururutsa imitima iremerewe.
Ahagana saa cyenda n’iminota umunani nibwo abacuranzi bageze ku byuma batangira kuzamura umuziki uryoheye amatwi, bahita bakurikirwa n’abaririmbyi binjiranye igice cy’indirimbo ivuga ko “Urufatiro rw’Imana rugihagaze rwanditseho ko Uwiteka azi abe.”
Iri jambo riri mu Gitabo 2 Timoteyo 2:19 niryo ryari intego y’igitaramo.
Hoziana yasubije ubusabe bw’abakunzi bayo bwo gutaramana na bo bisanzuye, yaririmbye indirimbo zirenga 20 ziganjemo izo mu myaka yo hambere kuva kuri “Tugumane Mwami” yatangiriyeho, “Ibimenyetso by’ibihe”, “Tuza wa nyanja we”, “Yerusalemu” yatewe mu majwi y’umwimerere na Pasiteri Rushema Ephraïm na Pasiteri Munyanshongore Edison bongeye kugaragaza impano yabo mu zabukuru bibutsa abakirisitu amakuru y’umurwa w’amahoro.
Abitabiriye iki gitaramo batakanzwe n’icyocyere cyari gihari, indirimbo yasozwaga, benshi bagahanika amajwi mu ndimi zo kuzuzwa nk’ikimenyetso cyo kunyurwa kuzuye n’ubutumwa bwinjiye mu matwi yabo.
Hoziana yasoje igitaramo cyayo iririmba izasabwe n’abakirisitu zirimo izakunzwe cyane kuva hambere nka “Imva ya Yesu irarangaye”, “Gitare”, “Uko yagiye” ndetse na “Satani yaratsinzwe” yasorejeho igifitiwe inyota yo gutambutsa ubutumwa bwiza bunyuze mu ndirimbo zandikanye ubuhanga.
Pasiteri Rushema Ephraïm (ibumoso) na Pasiteri Munyanshongore Edison, mu ndirimbo "Yerusalemu" Umuramyi Pappy Clever yanyuze abitabiriye igitaramo Pappy Clever uri mu banyempano bihariye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana ni we muhanzi watumiwe muri iki gitaramo, ndetse yaririmbye binyura imitima myinshi.
Uyu musore w’imyaka 26 yaririmbye indirimbo ze zikunzwe muri iyi minsi zirimo “Uvuze Yego”, “Narakwiboneye” n’izindi.
Agana ku musozo, yaririmbye iyo mu gitabo “Amakuru y’Umurwa”, benshi barizihirwa, ndetse bamwe bagaragaza amarira y’ibishimo byo gucengerwa n’ubutumwa bari bamaze gusogongezwa.
Iyi ndirimbo niyo yitiriye album igizwe na 12, mu mushinga mugari wo gusubiramo izo mu gitabo aheruka gutangiza.
Pappy Clever azwi mu ndirimbo zirimo “Ugendane Nanjye”, ‘‘Narakwiboneye’’, ‘‘Uburyohe’’, ‘‘Ahari Kurira’’, “Utwumvire”, "Uvuze Yego" n’izindi New Melody ntiyagaragaye, hari abatashye bavugira mu matamatama Mu gitaramo hari abavugiraga mu matamatama babazanya bati “Nonese nta yindi korali yakirwa?”
Aha baganishaga kuri New Melody yatumiwe ariko itari yakiriwe mu bashyitsi.
Ubwo cyari gihumuje umwe mu bakirisitu utashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa yabwiye IGIHE ati “Naje nziko New Melody ihari.
Hoziana yaririmbye turafashwa ariko twari dukeneye no kubona New Melody nkuko byari kuri gahunda.”
Umuyobozi wa New Melody, Neema Marie Jeanne, yatangarije IGIHE ko Hoziana ariyo yasubitse ubutumire bwayo.
Yagize ati “Twamenyeshejwe ko tutazitabira igitaramo hagati mu cyumweru (gishize).
Hoziana yari yadutumiye ni yo yasubitse ubutumire bwayo ariko benshi mu bagize itsinda twari duhari.”
Abajijwe ku kuba New Melody igizwe n’abaririmbyi bava mu madini atandukanye n’imyemerere idahuye bikaba ariyo ntandaro yo gukurwa kuri gahunda yo kuririmba, yagize ati “Impamvu zishingiye ku kuba tudashingiye ku idini, nta gihamya tubifitiye kuko nta gisobanuro cyanditse twahawe.
Hoziana niyo yagira igisubizo gihamye kuri ibyo.”
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko Hoziana yicaye igasubira mu mashusho yakozwe na New Melody igasanga harimo abaririmbyi bafite imisatsi n’ibindi, ADEPR itemera bituma ifata icyemezo cyo kuyimenyesha ko itazaririmba.
Perezida wa Korali Hoziana, Ndungutse Fabien, yashimiye abitabiriye igitaramo cyabo anisegura ku batabonye New Melody, avuga ko atari icyemezo cyafashwe kuko iri tsinda rihuriza hamwe abo mu matorero atandukanye.
Yagize ati “Mwarakoze abitabye ubutumire bwa Korali Hoziana.
Ibyiza tuzategura ntabwo tuzabibahisha.
Bitewe n’imitegurire y’igiterane yagiye ihinduka ntabwo byakunze ko New Melody igaragaramo.
Ku bakunzi bayo twababwira ngo bihangane ariko ibyo bari kubona muri yo byabonetse muri Hoziana kuko ubutumwa twese dufite bwubakiye ku Mana.
Mu byo twari twateguye hari ibyo tutakoze bitewe n’imihindagurikire yagiye ibaho.”
Muri Kanama, Hoziana irategura gukora ibindi biterane byagutse ku bibuga bigari na za Stade aho izahuriza hamwe abakunzi bayo bakaramya Imana.
Korali Hoziana yatangiye umurimo w’ivugabutumwa mu 1978; kuri ubu ibarizwamo abarenga 120.
Imaze gukora album 10 z’amajwi n’eshatu z’amashusho ndetse igaragara mu bindi bikorwa bitandukanye birimo gushyigikirana hagati yabo, gufasha abatishoboye n’ibindi.
Korali Hoziana yahembuye imitima y'abitabiriye igitaramo yakoreye muri Dove Hotel ku Gisozi Yaririmbye indirimbo ziganjemo izakanyujijeho mu myaka yo hambere Iki gitaramo cyari gifite intego iri muri 2 Timoteyo 2:19 hagira hati “Nyamara urufatiro rukomeye rw’Imana ruracyahagaze, rwanditsweho iki kimenyetso ngo ‘Uwiteka azi abe’, kandi ngo ‘Umuntu wese uvuga izina ry’Uwiteka ave mu bidatunganye.’’
Abagabo bahanikaga amajwi bashimangira ugukomera kw'Imana Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev Karuranga Ephraïm (ibumoso) n'Umwungirije Rev.
Karangwa John, bitabiriye iki gitaramo Umushumba wa ADEPR mu Itorero ry’Akarere ka Gasabo, Rev.
Ruyenzi Erneste Korali Hoziana ibarizwa ku Mudugudu wa Nyarugenge ni imwe mu zo hambere muri ADEPR Hoziana mu ndirimbo yakunzwe cyane yitwa "Ibimenyetso by'ibihe" yishimiwe na benshi Umuyobozi Ushinzwe Ubutegetsi n’Imari muri ADEPR, Umuhoza Aurélie Korali Hoziana yahembuye abitabiriye igitaramo cyabuzemo New Melody Pappy Clever n'itsinda rimufasha kuramya no guhimbaza Imana Baririmba "Amakuru y'Umurwa" yashyize benshi mu mwuka N'abayobozi bakuru muri ADEPR bafashijwe baha Imana icyubahiro n'abashumba barayitambira Abaririmbyi barimo uwa Korali Agape yo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge (uzamuye ukuboko) basazwe n'ibyishimo, amarira aragwa Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev Karuranga Ephraïm, yavuze ko “Abashumba nimutabibirwa umucyo muziba nk'abandi bose."
Perezida w’Itorero ry’Igihugu, Bamporiki Edouard n'umufasha we bitabiriye iki gitaramo Bobo Bonfils usanzwe aririmba ku giti cye, abarizwa muri Korali Hoziana Ababyeyi babonye umwanya wo gutambira Imana Pasiteri Rushema Ephraïm ni umwe mu batangiranye na Korali Hoziana mu 1978 Bishop Sibomana Jean wambuwe inshingano z'ubupasiteri yari yicaye inyuma y'abayobozi bakuru ba ADEPR Banyuzagamo bagahimbaza Imana, bayitambira mu mbyino gakondo Bamwe mu bari bagize Orchestre Kimisagara Jazz binjiye muri Hoziana nyuma yo kubwirizwa ubutumwa bwiza.

#1068#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/kompanyi-visa-yashyizeho-umuyobozi-mukuru-mu-bihugu-birimo-n-u-rwanda
Kompanyi ’Visa’ yashyizeho Umuyobozi Mukuru mu bihugu birimo n’u Rwanda Kompanyi ifite uburyo bwo kwishyura hifashishijwe ikarita y’ikoranabuhanga ‘Visa’, yashyizeho Corine Mbiaketcha, ngo ayibere Visi Perezida n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wayo mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, akazatangira inshingano kuwa 5 Ugushyingo 2019.
Mbabiaketcha yari asanzwe ari umuyobozi mu kigo cya Oracle, mu ishami ryacyo rikorera muri Kenya, aho yari ashinzwe ibijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga.
Inshingano yahawe zirimo kuyobora ikipe ifite icyicaro i Nairobi, aho azafatanya nayo mu kuzamura ubucuruzi bwa Visa mu bihugu birimo Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, u Rwanda, Mauritius na Ethiopia, akaba ari naho iyi Kompanyi ya Visa ifite isoko rinini mu bihugu 13 byo mu karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ikoreramo.
Azaba kandi ashinzwe ibikorwa byose birimo kubaka umubano urambye hagati ya Visa n’abakiriya bayo, abagenzuzi ndetse n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa mu kwimakaza umuco wo kwishyura hifashijijwe ikoranabuhanga nta kujyana amafaranga mu ntoki.
Umuyobozi wa Kompanyi ya Visa muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara, Aida Diarra, yavuze ko Corine yaziye igihe cyane ko ngo azafasha Afurika y’Iburasirazuba gukoresha uburyo bwizewe bwo kwishyura hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga.
Ati “Corine yaziye igihe muri Visa kuko azafasha Afurika y’Iburasirazuba mu nzira yo kuva mu kwishyurana amafaranga mu ntoki ahubwo bagakoresha uburyo bwizewe, butekanye bwo kwishyura hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga n’ubufatanye n’ibindi bigo byimakaza ikoranabuhanga mu by’imari.”
Corine Mbiaketcha nawe yavuze ko yishimiye kujya mu ikipe y’abakozi ba Visa, yizeza imikoranire myiza n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo.
Corine Mbiaketcha wagizwe Umuyobozi wa Visa muri Afurika y'Iburasirazuba

#1076#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/reg-yatangije-huza-ikoranabuhanga-rya-miliyoni-enye-z-amadolari-rizifashishwa
REG yatangije “Huza”, ikoranabuhanga rya miliyoni enye z’amadolari rizifashishwa mu guhuza imikorere Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ingufu (REG), cyatangije ku mugaragaro ikoranabuhanga ryitwa ‘Huza’, kivuga ko kizaryifashishwa mu kugenzura no guhuriza hamwe imirimo yose.
Raporo y’Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta y’umwaka wa 2016 yagaragaje ko muri REG hari ububiko bwa miliyari 1.5 budakoreshwa, ibigega by’amazi yajyanwaga kuri Kalisimbi mu mushinga wa Geothermal bya Miliyari 2.7 Frw bimaze imyaka itatu bidakoreshwa n’ibindi bikoresho bya miliyari 1.5 bisohoka mu bubiko gake cyane.
Ibyo n’ibindi ni bimwe mu byo umuyobozi ushinzwe uwo mushinga Patrick J.
Mwesigye, yavuze ko iryo koranabuhanga rizakemura ndetse rikanafasha mu kuzamura urwo rwego.
Yagize ati “Iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha REG n’ibigo byayo mu kugenzura mu buryo bwaba ubw’amafaranga, imicungire y’abakozi, intonde z’abakozi, gutanga amasoko no gukora imishinga.
Usibye ibyo kandi gahunda zose zo kuyobora umuriro w’amashanyarazi byose bikazakorwa kuri mudasobwa hifashishijwe iryo koranabuhanga.”
Nyuma yayo kandi hateganyijwe gutangizwa irindi ryitwa Customer Management System, rizafasha abakiliya gukorana na sosiyete zitanga umuriro haba mu bujyanama, mu kuvugana, guhabwa ubujyanama, aho umuriro wacitse, ikibazo cyabaye cyose kigahita kigaragara muri mudasobwa.
Mwesigye avuga ko iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha kugabanya ibikoresho byagenderaga mu micungire mibi kuko buri kintu cyose kizajya kiba cyageze mu REG kizajya kiba kizwi ndetse inagikurikirane.
Ati “Buri kigo mu bigo byose bya REG gifite ububiko, iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha nk’umuntu uri mu Bugesera ku buryo niba ibikoresho bizajya biba byamushiranye azajya arebaho akamenya ko mu bundi bubiko buri i Remera harimo ibyo akeneye, agahita abisaba.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REG, Ron Weiss, yavuze ko iryo koranabuhanga rizafasha mu kugenzura no kwihutisha imikorere y’urwego rw’ingufu mu Rwanda.
Yagize ati “Ndasaba ko iri koranabuhanga twazarikoresha kugira ngo tugeze ku ndunduro ibyo abakiliya bacu bose bifuza.”
Urwego rw’ingufu mu Rwanda rwateye imbere mu myaka irindwi ishize bitewe n’ingamba nyinshi Guverinoma yashyizeho zirimo kongera ingomero z’amashanyarazi no korohereza abashakaga gushora imari muri urwo rwego byatumye haboneka MW 208.36 zivuye kuri MW 97 zariho mu 2010.
Uko kongera umubare wa megawate byanazamuye umubare w’Abanyarwanda bafite amashanyarazi bava ku ngo 288685 zingana na 10.8% mu 2010 zigera kuri 2893000 mu 2017 zingana na 34.6%.
Umuyobozi wa REG nawe yashimangiye ko bifashishije iryo koranabuhanga ryabatwaye miliyoni enye z’amadolari n’izindi ngamba nshya bizatuma bagera ku ntego u Rwanda rwihaye yo kugeza amashanyarazi ku banyarwanda nibura 70% mu mpera z’umwaka utaha.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REG, Ron Weiss Abagize uruhare muri iryo koranabuhanga bahawe ishimwe Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa by'iri koranabuganga, Patrick J.
Mwesigye

#1138#	5	politics	https://umubavu.com/politike/article/Mu-Rwanga-hari-abanyamakuru-banga-kwiteranya-n-Ubutegtsi
Mu Rwanga hari abanyamakuru banga kwiteranya n’Ubutegtsi Raporo nshya ya Reporters Sans Frontières (RSF) ku bwisanzure bw’itangazamakuru mu bihugu 180 ivuga ko u Burundi bwazamutse imyanya 13 u Rwanda rugasubira inyuma umwanya umwe, byombi biracyari mu bihugu biniga ubwo bwisanzure.
Iyi raporo yitwa World Press Freedom Index ivuga ko "itangazamakuru, urukingo nyarwo rw’amakuru ayobya, rinizwe neza neza cyangwa rinizwe igice muri 73% y’ibihugu 180 bishyirwa ku rutonde" na RSF.
Ku rutonde rushya rw’uyu mwaka, iyi raporo ishyira u Burundi ku mwanya wa 146, kuri raporo ya 2020 rwari ku mwanya wa 160.
Iyi raporo ya 2021 ishyira u Rwanda ku mwanya wa 156, mu 2020 rwari ku mwanya wa 155.
Reporters Without Borders ivuga ko ubutegetsi bwa perezida mushya mu Burundi "buha icyizere abanyamakuru nyuma yo kwibasirwa" kuva mu 2015 kuri ’coup d’état’ yapfubye.
RSF ivuga ko gufungura abanyamakuru ba Iwacu mu kwa 12/2020 bari bamaze umwaka urenga bafunze, no kuba perezida yarasabye abashinzwe itangazamakuru "gukemura ibibazo" leta yagiranye n’ibinyamakuru byafunzwe "nabyo byabonywe nk’ikimenyetso cyiza".
Gusa ivuga ko abategetsi mu Burundi bagifite ibyo gukemura kuko hakiri "ubwoba no kwibuza gukora inkuru zimwe na zimwe ku binyamakuru bigikorera mu Burundi… cyane ko n’ibura ry’umunyamakuru Jean Bigirimana w’ikinyamakuru Iwacu mu kwa 07/2016 ritigeze rikorwaho iperereza nyaryo".
RSF ivuga ko mu myaka ya vuba yabonye igabanuka ry’umubare w’ibikorwa bihohotera ubwisanzure bw’itangazamakuru mu Rwanda, "ariko kubuzwa no kwibuza gukora inkuru zimwe na zimwe bigihari cyane mu kwirinda kugirana ibibazo n’ubutegetsi".
Iyi raporo ivuga ku munyamakuru Dieudonné Niyonsenga uzwi nka Cyuma Hassan wa ’chaîne’ yo kuri YouTube Ishema TV, "wafashwe agafungwa mu buryo budasobanutse mu 2020 aregwa kurenga ku mategeko ya ’guma mu rugo’".
Hashize amezi 11, yabaye umwere ararekurwa.
BBC ivuga ko abashinzwe itangazamakuru mu Burundi cyangwa mu Rwanda ntacyo baratangaza kuri iyi raporo nshya ya Reporters Without Borders dukesha iyi nkuru.
Gusa mu Rwanda, raporo ya 2018 y’ikigo gishinzwe imiyoborere yitwa ’Rwanda media barometer’ ivuga ko igipimo kitwa "Ubwisanzure bw’itangazamakuru" kiri hejuru ku gipimo cya 77%.
Iyi raporo ya 2021 ivuga ko Norway (Norvège), Finland na Sweden - bikurikiranye gutyo, ari byo biza imbere y’ibindi 180 mu kubahiriza ubwisanzure bw’itangazamakuru, mu gihe Ubushinwa, Turkmenistan, Korea ya ruguru na Eritrea bikurikiranye gutyo ari ibya nyuma.
Ibindi bihugu byo mu karere n’aho bihagaze: Kenya - 102 Tanzania - 124 Uganda - 125 DR Congo - 149 Impande z’u Burundi n’u Rwanda ntacyo ziravuga kuri iyi raporo nshya.

Diamond, izina ry’abantu badakunda kuvuga icyo batekereza Diamond ni izina rifite inkomoko mu kigereki ku izina Adamas rikaba risobanura ‘udatsindwa’, ubundi risobanura ibuye ry’agaciro rya diamant.
Ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umukobwa ariko hari naho usanga n’abahungu baryitwa.
Bimwe mu biranga ba Diamond Ni abantu bagira umutima mwiza, basabana kandi bagera ku iterambere byihuse ariko badapfa kuvuga icyo batekereza ku bandi.
Ni umuntu uzi kunezeza inshuti ze, ni umuntu uzi gutanga inama kandi azi kwita ku bantu.
Iyo agize ibumuvangavanga, Diamond aracanganyukirwa ku buryo ashobora gufata imyanzuro igayitse.
Aba azi aho agarukira, ugasanga atirekura mu mivugire ariko ajya agirana ibibazo n’abantu kuko adakunda kuvuga ibyo abatekerezaho.
Ni umuntu ugira amarangamutima menshi kandi ashobora kuyagaragaza igihe icyo aricyo cyose.
Ni umunyakuri kandi ukora uko ashoboye akarwanira ukuri.
Ariyemeza akagera ku bintu bihambaye ariko ahora yifuza gushyigikirwa kugira ngo yumve ko yabikomeza.
Ni umuntu ukunda ibintu bikozwe neza kandi nawe aba ayumva yabikorera abandi.
Bakunze kuba abanyabirori, bagakunda kuba abashyushya rugamba kandi bakamenya kwiyitaho ngo bakomeze kugaragara neza.
Baba kandi abanyamategeko, abanyabugeni ndetse n’abamurika imideli.

#1210#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/Ubwiteganyirize/article/abana-bigishijwe-kwizigamira-bakiri-bato-barabikurana-bikabagirira-akamaro
Abana bigishijwe kwizigamira bakiri bato barabikurana bikabagirira akamaro bakuze Ababyeyi n'abarezi barakangurirwa gutangira kwigisha abana kwizigamira bakiri bato, kugira ngo ubwo bazaba bamaze gukura ntibizabagore kubera ko bizaba byababayemo umuco, nk'uko bitangazwa n'Ishyirahamwe ry'Ibigo byimari biciriritse (AMIR).
Iri shyirahamwe ryatangiye ubushakashatsi bugamije guhugurira abanyeshuri bakiri mu mashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye gukurana umuco wo kwizigamira.
Gusa n'ubwo bigoye ko abakiri bato bakwizigamira kubera ntaho bakura amafaranga, ariko biba byiza byibura iyo bakuranye icyo gitekerezo kugira ngo kibabemo umuco, nk'uko bitangazwa na Faustin ZIhiga uyobora inama y'ubutegetsi muri AMIR.
Ati: "Mu gihe tugezemo kugira ngo igihugu cy'u Rwanda kibashe gutera imbere ni uko tugomba gukira ishoramari rirambye.
Ishoramari rirambye ntirishobora kubaho igihugu kitizigama, Abanyarwanda batizigama.
Kugira ngo uwo muco wo kwizigama ushinge imizi ugomba guhera mu bana batoya.
Abakuru baba batangiye kugira ibintu byinshi bibasaba gukoresha amafaranga".
Zihiga yabitangarije mu mahugurwa yagenewe abarezi bo mu bigo by'amashuri bitandukanye yabaye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 18/07/2013.
Yasobanuye ko akenshi iyo umuntu atigeze yizigama akiri muto bimugora iyo abonye akazi kuko hari ibindi byinshi ahita ashyiraho umutima, birimo kubaka, gushinga urugo.
Nubwo abana nta mafaranga bagira, Zihiga yemeza ko kwizigamira kw'abana biba bitagambiriye kubika amafaranga ahubwo ari ukubibatozamo nk'umuco.
Ibi ni nabyo byagarutsweho na bamwe mu barimu nabo bemeza ko ari igitekerezo cyiza ariko bagasaba ko iyi gahunda yashakirwa umwanya wo kwinjizwa mu masomo asanzwe, nk'uko beyemejwe n'umwe mu bayobozi b'ibigo witwa Jeremie Sinamenye.
Ati: "Birumvikana ko abanyeshuri twigisha nta mafaranga bagira ariko hari impano bajya bahabwa.
Iyo umubyeyi amubwiye ati watsinze akamuhereza wenda nk'amafaranga 500.
Wa mwana aho kugira ngo yirukanke ajye kuyagura amabombo, ashobora kwizigamiraho 400 ijana wenda akaba ariryo aguramo nk'amabombo ariko noneho n'ikindi gihe ariko agenda yizigamira cyane cyane ko ibigo by'imari byinshi dukorana nabyo amakonti bayabafungurira ku buntu."
Iyi gahunda izatangira ku mushinga AMIR yatanze muri DFID, waje gutoranywa muri 26 yatoranyijwe mu 150 yari yatanzwe.
Bizera ko mu gihe cy'imyaka ibiri y'igerageza uzamara kugira ngo DFID ibone kuwutangiza hari icyo bizaba byahinduye ku myumvire y'abana.
AMIR kandi yiyemeje gukora ubuvugizi ku bigo by'imari iciriritse ihuriza hamwe kugira ngo byorohereze abanyeshuri bo muri za kaminuza batashyizwe ku rutonde rw'abagomba gukomeza kurihirwa.
