#1865#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Kigali-Polisi-yagaruje-miliyoni-20-zibwe-sosiyete-y-Abanyaturukiya
Kigali: Polisi yagaruje miliyoni 20 zibwe sosiyete y'Abanyaturukiya Umugore witwa Bakundukize Chantal w'imyaka 30 na Tuyisenge Eric ufite imyaka 24 y'amavuko, bakoreraga isosiyete y'ubwubatsi y'Abanyaturukiya yitwa "DABCO" bafungiwe kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi y'i Remera bakurikiranweho kwiba amafaranga miliyoni 20 y'u Rwanda mu kazi.
Aba bakozi uko ari babiri batawe muri yombi kuwa Kabiri tariki 2 Ukuboza, babwiye itangazamakuru ko bibye aya mafaranga bayakuye mu kabati kari mu cyumba cy'Umuyobozi wabo.
Basobanuye ko bagiye inama z'uburyo bayiba, kuko bari bamaze umwaka bahakora kandi ari bamwe mu bizerwaga cyane kugeza n'aho bageraga no mu mbere h'umukoresha.
Umugore wakoraga akazi ko guteka muri DABCO wemera icyaha nubwo yagize ati "Nibyo twarayibye tuyakuye mu biro hejuru y'ameza turayajyana turayahisha ariko ni ubwa mbere nibye njye kandi ndabisabira imabazi."
Ayo mafaranga yari yibwe arimo, amadorari y'amanyamerika, amapawundi, akoreshwa muri Turukiya ndetse n'amanyarwanda.
Tuyisenge eric wahahiraga iyi sosiyete ari nawe waguze umufuka akabikamo igice kimwe cy'amafaranga akajya kuwubitsa hafi y'aho bakorera nawe yemera icyaha.
Yagize ati " Rwose uko mugenzi wanjye yabivuze niko bimeze twarayibye kubw'amahirwe make turafatwa."
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y'igihugu, CSP Celestin Twahirwa, yavuze ko aba bantu uko ari 2 bamaze kwiba ayo mafaranga bagiye inama z'uko bagomba kuyahisha amwe bayataba mu gitaka aho bakoraga andi uriya muhungu yaguze umufuka wa kawunga ayashyiramo ajya kuwubitsa ku iduka ababwira ko azaza kuwufata bukeye bwaho.
Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma y'uko Polisi itangiye iperereza uyu mukobwa yaje kugira ubwoba bwinshi bituma bafatwa.
Yagize ati"Yashakishije umuntu amubwira ngo amushakire uzabafasha kugira ngo batazafatwa ariko uwo babibwiye yaje gucikwa abivuga mu kabari bituma umwe munyangamugayo wamwumvise ahita ibimenyesha Polisi."
Ihereye kuri izo miliyoni zibwe mu nzu, Polisi yasabye abantu kutabika amafaranga angana kuriya mu ngo zabo, kuko hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kuyabika.
Umuyobozi wa DABCO, Emre CICEK , we yashimye imikorere ya Polisi y'u Rwanda amaze gusubizwa amafaranga ye.
Yagize ati"Polisi ikwiye gushimwa bitewe n'uko ikora kuko itandukanye n'izindi zose, yaba izo hanze kuko usanga zo zirenza iminsi kandi zifite za kamera mu gihe bo bakora ntazo bafite."
Icyaha cy'ubujura gihanishwa ingingo ya 300 yo mu gitabo cy'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda iteganya ibihano bihera ku mezi abiri kugeza ku myaka itatu, n'amande akubye kabiri ingano y'ibyo bari bibye cyangwa arenze kugera ku nshuro eshanu.
RNP

#1867#	0	entertainment	https://umubavu.com/imyidagaduro/article/Umuvugizi-w-Imana-y-u-Rwanda-yavuye-I-Burayi-yakiranwa-yombi
Umuvugizi w’Imana y’u Rwanda yavuye I Burayi yakiranwa yombi Ntezimana Sebu ni umuvugizi w’Imana y’u Rwanda akanaba umwe mu bategura icyo bise ‘umunsi wera w’umucyo’, mu minsi ishize yari yerekeje I Burayi ajyanywe no kuvuga no gusobanurira ababa mu mahanga ibijyanye n’Imana y’I Rwanda.
Nyuma yo gukubuka I Burayi mu butumwa yaganiriye n’umubavu.com maze asobanura ko icyari cyamujyanye cyagezweho ashingiye ku buryo yatunguwe no kubona uburyo abo yabwiraga babyakiriye.
Ati “byarantunguye nange ndebye uburyo babyakiraga, barabyumva cyane, babihaye n’agaciro cyane ku buryo nababwiraga uburyo twebwe nk’abanyarwanda dufite imisengere yacu mu Rwanda, nabakanguriye ko no mu bindi bihugu bakwiye kuba bakoresha gakondo zabo bambaza Imana z’iwabo aho gufata ibivuye mu bindi bihugu, barabyumvise neza ndetse baranabyakira numva biranejeje cyane”.
Ku bumva ko ngo hari Imana babwiwe n’abazungu b’abanyaburayi b’abamisiyoneri uyu muvugizi w’Imana y’I Rwanda yabibukije ko bakwiye kumenya ko umuco wabo ariwo ukwiye gufata umwanya wa mbere kurusha imico y’ahandi.
Ati “bakeneye kumenya ko umuco w’iwacu ariwo ufite agaciro kurusha imico y’ahandi bafata, imisengere dufite cyane iyi ibakikije siyo y’iwacu, siyo kamere y’iwacu y’abanyarwanda, Imana y’I Rwanda yahozeho ahubwo abazungu barebye uburyo imyemerere yacu ihamye tunayihagazeho barayijyana barayihindura aba ariyo bagarura ari nayo dufite ubu”.
Iyumvire unarebe byinshi muri iyi Video: Abajijwe niba abona bizamworohera kwemeza abo abwira dore ko bamaze gushyira mu mitwe yabo imyemerere ya kizungu, yavuze ko nta kibazo kirimo kuko ashingiye ku bo yaganiriye nabo babyumvaga cyane birenze uko nawe yabitekerezaga.
Yavuye i Burayi yemeranyijwe na bamwe ko ku itariki ya 7 Nyakanga uyu mwaka bazaza ari benshi muri gahunda yo kwifatanya na bo mu kugaragaza nyirizina ibi byose bavuga bijyanye n’Imana y’I Rwanda.
Uyu muvugizi w’Imana y’I Rwanda yari yagiye mu gihugu cy’u Bufaransa aho yananyuze mu Buholandi no muri Mauritius (muri Afurika).
Ni ubutumwa uyu muvugizi yari amazemo ukwezi kose aganiran’abantu batandukanye ababwira Imana y’I Rwanda.
Bamwe mu baganiriye n’umubavu.com kandi na bo bagaragaje ko bashyigikiye Imana y’I Rwanda aho kuvuga izindi babwiwe n’abazungu.
Uyu yagize ati “jyewe ku bwange nkurikije Imana y’abazungu batuzaniye baje bafite ibibagenza ntabwo bari baje gusenga bityo jyewe nahisemo gukurikira Imana y’I Rwanda kuko ni Imana ishobora byose kuko icyo uyisabye cyose irakiguha”.
Yakomeje avuga ko ngo yasaba abanyarwanda bose gukurikiza umuco wabo bagasenga Imana yabo kuko ngo icyo bayisaba cyose yakibaha aho gusenga Imana y’Abaroma, y’Abanyamahanga,… Mubaraka Edward uhagarariye abategura umunsi wera w’umucyo aheruka gutangariza umubavu.com ko bahisemo kwimika umuvugizi w’Imana y’u Rwanda, kugira ngo ajye amenyekanisha ko n’u Rwanda rufite Imana kandi ikomeye ari nayo Imana yaremye ijuru n’Isi.
Aba bantu bategura umunsi wera w’umucyo bagizwe n’abasaga 250 abamaze gusaba ko bazahura bakaba bagera ku bihumbi 9500, ndetse bahura rimwe mu gihembwe, biteganyijwe ko uyu munsi uzajya uba ku itariki 7 Nyakanga buri mwaka, aho uzajya utangizwa n’igitambo cy’isengesho nk’ikimenyetso kigaragaza ko Imana ari yo isumba byose.
Ubwo himikwaga umuvugizi w’Imana y’i Rwanda kandi hanimitswe intuma 11 z’Imana muri 12 zari zateganyijwe zirimo n’abakobwa, zizajya zikwirakwiza iyo nkuru nziza y’uko u Rwanda rufite Imana nziza kandi iha abantu buri kimwe cyose bayisabye.

Gaëtan, izina ry'umuntu uvugisha ukuri Yanditswe kuya 30-09-2016 saa 08:00' na IGIHE Gaëtan ni izina rihabwa umwana w'umuhungu, rifite inkomoko mu Butaliyani, rikunze kwitwa abana bavukiye mu Mujyi wa Gaeta i Lazio muri iki gihugu.
Bamwe bandika Gaetano, Gaëtan, Gaétan , Kayetan , Cajetan , Gaetano , Caietanus , Kajetan ,Caetano Cayetano , Kajetan n'ayandi bitewe n'igihugu bakomokamo.
Bimwe mu biranga ba Gaëtan Ni umuntu ushobora kuba mu buzima ubwo aribwo bwose bwaba bwiza cyangwa bubi.
Agendera inzira imwe, akiyubaha ngo hato hatagira umuntu umuvogera cyangwa akamumenyera uko yiboneye.
Akunda kuganira n'abandi, gusabana, guhanahana amakuru ku buryo yishimira no kugeza ku bandi amakuru badafite.
Ni umuntu w'umunyakuri, udaca ibintu ku ruhande, iyo agiye kugukunda arabanza agafata igihe kirambuye akakwiga neza ku buryo agusuzuma niba mugomba gukomezanya.
Iyo mwamaze kumenyerana usanga ari wa muntu uvuga amagambo menshi.
Akunda kwigenga, uburenganzira bwe akabubamo neza kandi ntiyibuza gutekereza ibintu bitandukanye.
Akunda imikino, kwidagadura no kwishimisha hamwe n'inshuti ze.
Azi kwemeza abantu b'ingeri zose kandi akabivangamo no gusetsa, bituma n'icyo agusabye uhita ukimuha, uretse kuba yagusekeje azi no kukwemeza ukabura icyo wongeraho.

#1955#	7	development	http://umubavu.com/iterambere/article/Uyuwe-ngo-arakangurira-abantu-gusenga-bijyanye-na-gakondo-no-kwivuza-bya-gakondo
Uyuwe ngo arakangurira abantu gusenga bijyanye na gakondo no kwivuza bya gakondo Dusabimana Emmanuel Umuraguzi ukomoka mu igisekuru cy’iburagura Bwami aratangaza ko Abanyarwanda bagomba gukangukira ubuvuzi bwa gakondo no gusenga bijyanye na gakondo ndetse bakamenya n’indanga gaciro z’umuco w’abanyarwanda.
Impamvu ikomeye yagaragaje kubyo avuga ko abantu bagomba gukangukira kwivuza mubya Kinyarwanda, ngo ni uko hari indwara abazungu batajya bavura, hari indwara zimwe nazimwe nagiye mbabwira no mu inkuru iheruka kujya ku igitangaza amakuru cy’Umubavu.com, amarozi y’amategano ndayavura, amahumane baroze umuntu nayo ndayavura, uburozi bahuhera kugirango bufate umuntu batagaburiye, no gutega umuntu ndabivura.
Ubugumba ndabuvura bumwe baroga umuntu bityo umugore n’umugabo bashakanye bakabasha kubona abana mu igihe baba bamaze cyose batamubona ndabavura bagakira maze bakabyara.
Ibyo nta umuganga wa kizungu ndabona ubikora.
Hari nikindi abavuzi ba kizungu batajya bavura nk’ubufatire ubufatire n’indwara ifata umugabo iyo yaciye umugore we inyuma uwo umugore yagiyeho utari uwe niwe umufatira, noneho umugabo yagera m’urugo rwe ashaka gutera akabariro bikanga kubera ko uwo yagiheyo aciye umugore we inyuma yamuhaye ubwo burozi bwo kumufatira.
Abajijwe impamvu ashaka ko abanyarwanda basenga muri gahunda ya gakondo, nukugirango umuco Nyarwanda wahereye cyera udacika mu Rwanda.
Nkaba nifuza ko abanyarwanda babandwa, bagaterekera bagasubizaho, bakiyambaza abazimu kuko nabo ni abantu bacu kuruta uko twakwiyamabaza abazimu bo mu amahanga bitwa abatagatifu.
Yabajijwe impamvu avuga ko abanyarwanda bagomba kureba no ku indanga agaciro z’umuco nyarwanda zisanzwe zizwi mu itorero ry’Igihugu.
Avuga ko mbere nambere itorero ryigisha umuco na kirazira.
Ati: “Kuba byonyine itorero ry’igihugu ryigisha kirazira ntaho dutaniye kuko nanjye ndwanya abantu bose baca k’umuziro wasizwe na ba sogokuruza.
Bikaza bishimangira ko ngewe ndi umuraguzi ubibona kare muburyo bw’indagu bityo ngashaka ibyatuma Igihugu cyacu gitera imbere muri byose tugendeye k’ubudahemuka aribwo ubunyanga mugayo bwararanze ingoma zose z’u Rwanda uvanye mo guverinoma yiswe iyo abatabazi bagiye bahekuye u Rwanda.”
Akomeza avuga ko cyaziraga kwica umuntu ariko bo barabikoze.
Niyo mpamvu navuze ku itorero ry’igihugu.
Ubutumwa ntanga ni ugukangurira buri wese, yuko yabungabunga umuco nyarwanda, kugirango udacika mu Rwanda kuko igihugu cyitagira umuco kiba gicitse twese hamwe nk’abanyarwanda twite k’umuco nyarwanda. 0785213504 0725095110 0735211969 e-mail edusabimana 2@gmail.com Bye Big Man Edward Mubalaka umubavu.com

#1962#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/nyamagabe-umugore-yahisemo-kwibera-mucoma-ngo-ahe-serivisi-nziza-abakiriya-be
Nyamagabe: Umugore yahisemo kwibera "mucoma" ngo ahe serivisi nziza abakiriya be Mukeshimana Thacienne wo mu karere ka Nyamagabe mu murenge wa Tare aratangaza ko yahisemo kuba "mucoma" (umuntu wotsa inyama mu kabari) mu kabari ke kugira ngo abashe gutanga serivisi nziza ku bakiriya be.
Uyu mugore atangaza ko mbere yakoreshaga abakozi bamufasha muri aka kazi ariko imikoranire ikamugora ndetse ntibanatange serivisi nziza ku bakiriya, akaba yarahisemo gushaka umufasha mu kubaga ibindi byose akabyikorera.
Ati "mbere nahoze mfite abakozi nkabona nyine imikoranire nabo itagenda neza, yenda n'abakiriya ntibabakira neza, biba ngombwa ko mbyinjiramo kugira ngo njye ntanga serivisi nziza".
Mukeshimana Thacienne (hagati) yashyikirijwe ishimwe nk'umugore wo mu cyaro wabashije kwiteza imbere mu karere ka Nyamagabe.
Mukeshimana avuga ko uyu mwuga we wo gucoma awukora awukunze kandi awishimiye ngo kuko wagize uruhare rugaragara mu iterambere amaze kugeraho.
Mbere ngo yabanje gucuruza ihene ariko nkeya bitewe n'amikoro make nyuma aza kuyoboka iy'akabari agamije kunguka menshi kuri za hene binyuze mu kuzibaga.
Ubu bucuruzi hamwe no gukorana n'umurenge SACCO abitsa anafata inguzanyo ndetse no kwisungana n'abandi mu bimina ngo bimaze kumuteza imbere mu buryo bufatika.
"Nkitangira umwuga w'ubucuruzi bw'ihene nabaga mu nzu nkodesha.
Gukora uwo mwuga wo Gucoma byatumye njya mu bimina bigurizanya amafaranga, bituma mbasha gufunguza konti mu murenge SACCO nkabitsa, nkabikuza nkabasha no gufata inguzanyo kandi nkayishyura.
Ibi byatumye mva mu bukode bw'inzu ubu ntuye mu nzu yange y'amatafari ahiye, harimo amazi n'umuriro," Mukeshimana.
Hon Senateri Mushinzimana Appolinaire, n'umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyamagabe, Mugisha Philbert bashyikiriza Mukeshimana amashimwe ye.
Kwisungana mu bimina kandi ngo byatumye abasha kugura inka ya kijyambere ubu ikaba yarabyaye, ikaba ihaka kandi ikinakamwa ndetse n'iyayo ihaka, akaba avuga ko interanya ntaho yahera imenera mu rugo rwe.
Uyu mugore aha inama bagenzi be zo kutitinya ngo kuko akazi kose bagashoboye kandi ko umurimo wose umuntu yakora awukunze umuteza imbere.
Ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga w'umugore wo mu cyaro tariki ya 26/10/2013, Mukeshimana yashikirijwe icyemezo cy'ishimwe ndetse n'amafaranga ibihumbi 200 n'inama y'igihugu y'abagore nk'umugore wahize abandi mu bikorwa byo kwiteza imbere mu karere ka Nyamagabe.
Emmanuel Nshimiyimana

#1988#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/urubyiruko/article/Urubyiruko-ruranenga-ababyeyi-bakibacengezamo-amacakubiri
Urubyiruko ruranenga ababyeyi bakibacengezamo amacakubiri Urubyiruko rwishimira ko rwatangiye kugenda rwigobotora izo nyigisho mbi baba bigishwa n'ababyeyi babo Rumwe mu rubyiruko ruravuga ko hakiriho bamwe mu babyeyi bakibananiza mu kwimakaza umuco w'amahoro, babicishije mu mvugo zabo ziba zuzuyemo amacakubiri n'urwango, kuburyo ngo bituma hari urubyiruko rushobora kwishora mu bikorwa by'ubugizi bwa nabi kubera bo.
Bamwe mu rubyiruko twaganiriye, ruvuga ko bamwe mu babyeyi usanga bashyira umwuka mubi w'amacakubiri mu bana babo, bababwira ko kuba udahuje ubwoko n'umuntu runaka mudashobora guhuza.
Ganzo Jordan agira ati" ikijyanye n'amacakubiri usanga ahanini kikiri mu bantu bakuze bitwa ko bari bahari kiriya gihe cya Jenoside, kuko mu rubyiruko dufite amatsinda (clubs) zigenda zidufasha ahanini aho twigira ibyabaye ndetse n'uburyo tugomba kubikumira."
Uyu musore yavuze ko yajyaga yumva ibyo yabwirwaga na bamwe mu muryango we, ariko we ngo aho yagiriye mu matsinda y'urubyiruko, yagiye yumva ko abantu bose ari bamwe , nta tandukaniro rishingiye ku kintu icyo aricyo cyose.
Kayesu Monica nawe avuga ko koko aba babyeyi bigisha abana babo inzangano ndetse n'amacakubiri bakiriho, ariko asaba urubyiruko kubima matwi nubwo ari ababyeyi babo.
Agira ati" umubyeyi bwa mbere ugomba kumwubahira ko ari umubyeyi, ariko na none mubwire ko amateka yamuranze siyo agomba kundanga.
Niba yarabaye mu gihe cyo kumva ko ibyo bintu byari bihari, reka jyewe uvutse uyu munsi nanjye ampe ubwo burenganzira, nanjye mwumvishe akamaro ko kugira amahoro kugira ngo amateka ye ntazanjyeho, sinzagendere ku mateka ababyeyi banjye bagendeyemo."
Hon.
Depite Byabarumwanzi Francois, Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo y'Ubumwe bw'Abanyarwanda Uburenganzira bwa muntu no kurwanya Jenoside mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, yavuze ko ibi bibazo bikiri mu bantu batandukanye, ariko ngo bari gukora ibishoboka byose ngo babirwanye, bikuramo amateka banyuzemo.
Agira ati" icyo muvuga nicyo, biragaragara ko igisekuru (generation) yacu, ndashaka kuvuga abangana nanjye cyangwa undi munyarwanda wo mu gihe cyacu, muhora muvuga ko dufite ibitekerezo bya kera bikiturimo, ibitekerezo by'amacakubiri, ibitekerezo by'inzangano byakuruye inzangano na jenoside yo mu 1994, nibyo ntago tubihakana, ariko turagerageza kubirwanya."
Hon Byabarumwanzi Yavuze ko bagize amahirwe make yo kuba mu buyobozi bubi bwabigishaga amacakubiri, ariko ngo kubera ko abanyarwanda bari mu buyobozi bwiza bubigisha ibintu by'ingirakamaro bibafasha no kwikuramo ayo mateka mabi banyuzemo.
Yavuze ko nk'abantu bakuru cyane abayobozi bagerageza guharanira amahoro, kugira ngo urubyiruko rutazamera nkabo (abantu bakuru) rukoreka igihugu kikaba cyasubira mu bihe cyanyuzemo mu 1994.

#2021#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/urusobe-rw-ubuzima/article/abakecuru-bahangayikishijwe-n-abakobwa-babyara-bakabatana-abuzukuru
Abakecuru bahangayikishijwe n’abakobwa babyara bakabatana abuzukuru Abakecuru bo mu Karere ka Muhanga baravuga ko bagowe cyane no kurera abuzukuru babo ahanini basigirwa n’abakobwa babyarira iwabo.
Abakecuru batakibyara usanga bariyandikishijeho abuzukuru kandi nta bushobozi bwo kubarera bafite Ababyeyi bavuga ko kubera amikoro make, kurera umwana w’undi nta bufasha bituma batabasha kugira icyo bikorera kandi n’uburenganzira bw’umwana bukahahungabanira.
Babivugiye mu Nteko y’abaturage ya buri wa kabiri ku mugoroba, aho abaturage bo mu Kagari ka Kinini mu Murenge wa Shyogwe banoza urutonde rw’abageze mu za bukuru bagomba guhabwa inkunga y’ingoboka.
Ikibazo cyigaragaza kuri uru rutonde ni abenshi muri abo bakecuru usanga baragiye babarurwaho abuzukuru babo, mu gihe bagombye kuba babana n’abababyaye, ibi bigatuma bongera gukurwaho abo bana mbere yo kwemeza burundu abagize imiryango y’abo bagomba guhabwa inkunga y’ingoboka.
Scholastique Bazubagira arera umwuzukuru we w’imyaka itatu.
Avuga ko kubyara imburagihe ku bakobwa bituruka ku kuba batacyemera kugirwa inama no guhanurwa, ubukene na bwo ngo bukaba bubagusha mu bishuko bibashora mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.
Agira ati, “Umukobwa w’imyaka 19 na 20 iyo ugize ngo uramugira inama akubwira ko azicunga kuko ibyo umubwira abizi kandi abikurusha bikarangira bipfuye”.
Ati “Mbona impamvu abakobwa batwara ziriya nda ari ukubera ubukene, barangiza amashuri bakabura akazi bahura n’abasore babaha akantu bakaba babateye inda gutyo.
Nk’ubu ndarera umwuzukuru wanjye w’imyaka itatu, nyina afite undi w’umwaka n’igice”.
Uwamariya avuga ko umukecuru wiyandikishijeho umwana ufite se agomba kumukurwaho akajya kurerwa na se umubyara Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga, Uwamaliya Beatrice, avuga ko abakobwa babyariye iwabo bakwiye gufatanya n’inzego z’ubuyobozi kugira ngo ba se b’abana bamenyekane bityo bafashe ba nyina kubarera nk’inshingano zose z’umubyeyi.
Agira ati, “Amakuru bayatange mu nzego zose kuko ni bo ubwa mbere bagomba kudufasha kubafasha.
Dufite inzego zitandukanye zikurikirana ibijyanye n’ihohoterwa, nibaze baduhe amakuru”.
Yongeyeho ati “Ntabwo bikwiye ko abakobwa babyara bazanira ba yirakuru, basubirayo nta mahwa kuko ni ingeso mbi, ntabwo ari byo ko umukecuru rukukuri yirirwa akururana n’umwuzukuru na we adafite imbaraga zo kumwitaho” Abakobwa bo mu Gasantere ka Kinini mu Murenge wa Shyogwe ahagaragara abakobwa bakiri bato bahetse abana babyariye iwabo bavuga ko bishimira kuba bagiye gufashwa gushaka ba se b’abana babo.
Aba bakobwa bahetse abana nta ba se bafite babitaho kuko bamwe batazi aho bagiye abandi bakaba bafite abandi bagore Umwe muri abo bakobwa avuga ko we yatewe inda n’umugabo wubatse amubeshya ko ari umusore bazaba inshuti none akaba yaranze kujyana uwo mwana kuko ngo afite undi mugore nyamara kurera uwo mwana ntibimworoheye.
Agira ati, “Birakwiye ko n’abo bagabo twabyaranye ubuyobozi bwadufasha bagafata abana babo kuko baraturushya ntacyo dufite cyo kubaha, nta bwisungane mu kwivuza, nta n’uburenganzira bagira kuri ba se”.
Nta mibare ntakuka igaragara y’abakobwa babyariye iwabo mu Karere ka Muhanga.
Icyakora mu kigereranyo, bivugwa ko nibura mu ngo icumi haba harimo umukobwa wabyariye iwabo.
Ni ikibazo gikomeza gufata intera n’ubwo ubukangurambaga mu kurwanya inda ziterwa abangavu na bwo bukomeje.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Ephrem Murindabigwi Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ murieph

#2055#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/ibitabo/article/dr-kimonyo-yagarutse-ku-bibazo-byazonze-u-rwanda-nyuma-ya-jenoside-n-intege-nke
Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bibazo byazonze u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside n’intege nke zaranze Guverinoma y’Ubumwe Umwanditsi, inzobere muri politiki akaba n’umujyanama wa Perezida, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagaragaje ko nubwo u Rwanda hari ibihe bikomeye kandi bibi rwanyuzemo, hari icyizere ko ibyagezweho bizasigasirwa kubera ko urubyiruko rwongeye kwiyumvamo ubunyarwanda.
Ibi yabitangaje ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu mu muhuro ugamije kungurana ibitekerezo (café littéraire) by’umwihariko haganirwa ku gitabo cye ‘Rwanda demain ! : Une longue marche vers la transformation’ kivuga ku mbogamizi n’ibitekerezo byiza byaranze inzira yo kongera kwiyubaka k’u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Uyu muhuro wateguwe n’umunyarwenya Ntarindwa Diogène uzwi nka Atome mu biganiro akunze gutegura bivuga ku buvanganzo n’ubwanditsi bizwi nka ‘Atomium’.
Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bibi u Rwanda rwanyuzemo, ahera mu mwaka wa 1959 ubwo Abatutsi bameneshwaga mu gihugu bikozwe n’abari bari mu mashyaka nka Parmehutu ku bufasha bahabwaga n’Ababiligi.
Kimonyo yavuze uburyo Abatutsi babaye impunzi muri icyo gihe babayeho nabi cyane mu bihugu bahungiyemo dore ko nta n’imiryango yita ku mpunzi yari ihari, byatumye bamwe bakurizamo gupfa kubera imibereho mibi.
Ati “Impunzi zavuye mu Rwanda zabayeho nabi cyane, zicwa n’inzara n’indwara n’ibisimba haba muri Uganda,Tanzania n’i Burundi.
Muri Congo ho bazijyanye ahantu habi cyane, ntabwo bashakaga kubaha ahantu hameze neza, babashyize ahantu hatari aho guturwa”.
Dr Kimonyo yavuze ko impunzi zakomeje guhanyanyaza, mu myaka ya 1960 zirisuganya zigaba ibitero byiswe iby’Inyenzi ariko ntibyazihira.
Zakomeje kubaho mu buzima bubi mu mahanga, bigeze mu myaka ya 1980, haba ibibazo bya Politiki hirya no hino muri Afurika, impunzi z’Abanyarwanda zongera gufatwa nabi, ari nabwo abari urubyiruko muri zo icyo gihe bishyize hamwe, bagashinga FPR Inkotanyi bafite umugambi wo gusubira mu gihugu cyabo, kugeza ubwo batangije urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Gutsindwa kwa Guverinoma ya Twagiramungu no kugumuka mu banyamuryango ba FPR Muri uwo muhuro, Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bikomeye politiki y’u Rwanda yanyuzemo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, cyane cyane ubwo hari hamaze gushyirwaho Guverinoma y’Ubumwe.
Ni guverinoma yari igizwe n’amashyaka atarijanditse muri Jenoside, ku isonga arimo MDR ya Twagiramungu Faustin ari na we wagizwe Minisitiri w’Intebe.
Nta mwaka washize, aba mbere batangiye kwegura hashize amezi make igiyeho kubera kutumvikana.
Dr Kimonyo avuga ko uko kutumvikana kwatewe n’uburyo abari muri Guverinoma bari bafite ibyerekezo bitandukanye nyamara bagomba guha igihugu icyerekezo kimwe.
Ati “Guveirnoma y’ubumwe yagize gutsindwa kubiri.
Ugutsindwa kwa mbere ni ukwa politiki kubera ko abantu bamwe batumvikanaga muri Guverinoma cyane cyane FPR na MDR kubera impamvu zitandukanye, nk’ikibazo cy’umutekano uburyo cyari kiri gukemurwa.
Ayo mashyaka yombi kandi ntiyari afite imigambi imwe, ntabwo yabonaga ahazaza h’u Rwanda kimwe.”
Twagiramungu yeguye muri Kanama mu 1995, bukeye abandi ba minisitiri bavanwa muri Guverinoma.
Dr Kimonyo avuga ko mu myaka ya 1997/1998 haje kubaho ikindi kibazo cyo kugumuka kwa bamwe mu bari abayoboke ba FPR Inkotanyi, batangira kurya ruswa mu ishyaka haza umwuka mubi.
Ati “ Hari indi Guverinoma yagiyeho ariko nayo iza gutsindwa, ibangamirwa na bamwe mu banyamuryango ba FPR bari bagumutse mu 1997/1998 , bamwe bamagana ibintu bya ruswa byari bitangiye gukomera cyane.
FPR yahise ijya mu bihe bibi cyane, ishaka uko yabivamo havanwaho abantu bakekwagaho ruswa.”
Ibibazo byadindizaga Guverinoma bimaze kuvaho, nibwo hatangiye gutekerezwa ku hazaza h’igihugu, hatangizwa ibiganiro byo mu Urugwiro ari nabyo byacuriwemo icyerecyezo 2020 kiri gusozwa.
Guverinoma y’Ubumwe yarangiye mu 2003 ubwo hatorwaga Itegeko Nshinga hakaba n’amatora ya Perezida, ya mbere kuva Jenoside yarangira.
Kimonyo yemeza ko urebye aho u Rwanda rugeze, n’imyumvire urubyiruko rw’ubu rufite, nta kabuza ko ibyagezweho bizakomeza gusigasirwa no kongerwa.
Ati “Urasanga rubyiruko rutangiye kwitabira ibintu by’umuco kandi no kuva cyera, haba mu gushinga FPR, kurwanya igitugu no kubaka igihugu, umuco w’ubunyarwanda no gukunda igihugu nibyo byari umusingi w’ibyo twashoboye kugeraho.
Urasanga urubyiruko muri iyi minsi rutangiye kwitabira iby’umuco.”
Yashishikarije urubyiruko kujya rwitabira ibiganiro nk’ibyo bigaruka ku byaranze u Rwanda, kugira ngo rwige uko ibyagezweho byakozwe n’uko rwarushaho kubyongera.
Uretse igitabo ‘‘Rwanda demain !’
Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo asanganywe ikindi gitabo cyitwa ‘Rwanda : Un génocide populaire’ yasohoye mu 2008.
Benshi bari bateze amatwi Dr Kimonyo ubwo yasobanuraga urugendo rwo kwiyubaka kw'Abanyarwanda Urubyiruko ruri mu bitabiriye uyu muhuro Dr Kimonyo yavuze ko na nyuma ya Jenoside, Guverinoma y'Ubumwe yahuye n'imbogamizi zirimo kutumvikana mu bari bayigize Ntarindwa Diogène uzwi nka Atome niwe wateguye uyu muhuro uzwi nka café littéraire Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yavuze ko urubyiruko rw'u Rwanda kuri ubu rugaragaza gusigasira ibyagezweho Umwarimu mu ishuri ry'itangazamakuru rya Kaminuza y'u Rwanda, Yann Gwet ni umwe mu bayoboye ibiganiro Kimonyo yafashe umwanya wo kumva ibitekerezo by'abitabiriye Uyu muhuro watangiwemo ibitekerezo bigamije kumenya byimbitse ahahise h'u Rwanda n'ingamba ku hazaza

#2078#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/umugore-ngo-ntiyagera-ku-iterambere-adahereye-kuri-bikeya
Umugore ngo ntiyagera ku iterambere adahereye kuri bikeya Inararibonye mu gukurikirana imishinga mu bigo by'imari, n'abagore bahereye ku gishoro gitoya bavuga ko ari yo nzira y'iterambere ry'umugore.
Nyiranzeyimana Alphonsine wo mu Murenge Rugendabari wa ubarizwa muri Koperative "Abibumbye Nyundo" yatangiye muri 2007, avuga ko ubuzima bwe na bagenzi be bwarangwagwa n'bwigunge n'ubuneke, ubu basezereye kubera gutinyuka kwishyira hamwe.
Nyiransengimana Alphonsine avuga ko kwitinya kw'abadamu bitera umwanda n'ubutindi.
Agira ati "Ntakintu nagira iwanjye, ariko ubu nyuma yo gukora amasabune muri Koperative yacu, ndakaraba ngacya, n'abaturanyi bagacya, ubuzima bumeze neza kuko usibye no kwiteza imbere dufite n'ubumenyi bwateza abandi imbere mu mishinga yo guhinga ibihumyo."
Mukanyamibwa Seraphine utuye mu Murenge wa Cyeza, ati "Ntakidashoboka ku mugore usibye kwinangira mu mutwe, ubu batureberaho kandi n'abagabo bacu basigaye babona ko dufite akamaro."
N'ubwo aba bagore bavuga gutya ariko haracyari abigunze bataramenya icyo bakora kubera kutagira ibishoro ari nabyo Inararibonye mu gucunga imishinga iciriritse zivuga ko igihe cyose abagore batazashora bahereye kuri bikeya ntacyo bazageraho.
Abagore batinyutse gutangirira kuri make bavuga ko bigaragaza ugereranyije nabakomeje kwinangira.
Chantal Zihinjishi amaze imyaka 12 mu kazi ko gutanga no kugira inama abagana ibigo by'imari ziciriritse gucunga imishinga, avuga ko Leta hari uburyo yashyizeho bwo korohereza abaturage by'umwihariko abagore kwiteza imbere.
Zihinjishi avuga ko igitera kutagana amabanki ngo abantu batangire ibikorwa bibateza imbere, icyo yita nk'igihombo kyuri bo.
Ati "Iyo ugannye banki n'ibigo by'imari wongera igishoro ukagera ku bintu bibatika."
Zihinjishi kandi avuga ko batagira igishoro, babiterwa n'imyumvire ikiri mikeya, ati "Dufite ikigega BDF, ikigo gitanga ingwate, hari ibimina n'amatsinda yo kugurizanya.
Ibyo byose byafasha ushaka gutangira umushinga wo kwiteza imbere, abantu bareke kwitinya bagane ibyo bigo byose bibasobanurire kwinjira ni ubuntu gusohoka ni uguhabwa amafaranga."
Ibibazo byo kwiteza imbere byakomeje kutavugwaho rumwe mu byiciro bitandukanye, ariko Leta ikomeje gushishikariza abanyarwanda muri rusange kwishyira hamwe bagatizanya ingufu kuko bigoye ku banyarwanda besnhi gushora ku giti cyabo.

#2119#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/ntende-hotel-yabaye-igisubizo-cy-abashakiraga-amacumbi-iyo-bigwa-amafoto
Ntende Hotel yabaye igisubizo cy’abashakiraga amacumbi iyo bigwa (Amafoto) Nyuma y’aho ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi bw’umuceri bya Coproriz Ntende byagutse bikabyara ishoramari mu byo kwakira no gucumbikira abantu, ubuyobozi bwayo buvuga ko byatangiye gutanga umusaruro no kuzana impinduka zifatika mu gace iherereyemo.
Coproriz Ntende (Cooperative de Promotion des Riziculteurs de Ntende) ni koperative yashinzwe mu 2003 yibanda ku gihingwa cy’umuceri, ikaba yaragiye yaguka haba mu bwinshi bw’abanyamuryango n’umusaruro.
Mu mpera z’umwaka wa 2017 yatashye ku mugaragaro hoteli n’ibindi bikorwa byo kwakira abantu birimo amacumbi yo ku rwego rwiyubashye, aciriritse n’ahendutse; restaurant n’akabari, ibyumba by’inama, amahugurwa n’ubukwe.
Coproriz Ntende ikorera mu Murenge wa Rugarama w’Akarere ka Gatsibo hagati y’Umujyi wa Nyagatare na Kayonza ari na ho abakoreraga muri aka gace basabwaga kwerekeza igihe babaga bakeneye serivisi itanga.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa by’ishoramari, Karangwa James, yatangaje ko biga uyu mushinga bashingiye ku bibazo byari bifitwe na benshi ikaba ari yo mpamvu ugenda neza.
Yagize ati “ Twahereye ku cyumba cy’inama n’ubukwe, abatugannye bakabura aho biyakirira biduha igitekerezo cyo kubaka restaurant n’akabari gato.
Byatumye restaurant iganwa kuko umushinga wizwe hashingiwe ku byo abantu bakeneye.”
“Nyuma abantu bakoreraga ubukwe n’amahugurwa hano batugaragarije ko bajya kurara i Kayonza cyangwa i Nyagatare.
Twatekereje ko umushinga wacu wakwaguka tukagera ku gikorwa cy’amacumbi, aho abahakoreye bahakirirwa bakanaharara.
Turishimira ko umushinga wunguka; ku kwezi hinjira hagati ya miliyoni esheshatu n’umunani z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.”
Ibikorwa bya hoteli no kwakira abantu bisa n’aho ari umwihariko wa Coproriz Ntende ndetse ngo bimaze kwigarurira imitima y’abaturuka impande zose z’igihugu ndetse no hanze yacyo bajya gukorera muri Gatsibo.
Ni nako bizana impinduka muri aka gace nk’uko Perezida wa Coproriz Ntende, Rugwizangoga Elysée, yabivuze haba mu kwegereza serivisi abaturage bashakiraga kure no guhanga imirimo.
Ntende Hotel, igice kirimo amacumbi yo ku rwego rwa mbere Ntende Hotel iherereye mu bice by'icyaro ariko imaze kuhateza imbere Buri cyumba cyo mu macumbi yo ku rwego rwa mbere kiba gifite ibice bitatu birimo na 'Salon' Ahaherereye amacumbi yo ku rwego rwa kabiri muri Ntende Hotel Amacumbi yo ku rwego rwa gatatu (ahendutse kurusha ayandi ndetse afite ibyumba rusange) Inzu yagenewe inama n'amahugurwa byakira abantu baringaniye Icyumba cyagenewe inama n'amahugurwa ku bantu batari benshi Ntende Hotel ifite n’akabari gafasha abakeneye ibinyobwa by’amoko yose Restaurant iri mu bikurura abantu benshi muri aka gace Icyumba cy'inama cyakira abantu besnhi icyarimwe Icyumba gishobora kwakira inama, amahugurwa cyangwa ubukwe Ikindi gice cyagenewe kwakira ubukwe Amafoto: Niyonzima Moses

ECOBANK yashyizeho ikarita idakenera konti ngo ikoreshwe Banki ya ECOBANK yatangije uburyo bushya bwo gutanga ikarita izwi nka Visa Card idakenera kuba uyikoresha afite konti muri banki kugira ngo abone amafaranga ye.
Iyi karita yiswe CashXpress ifasha uwo ari wese yaba umukiriya wa ECOBANK cyangwa undi uwo ari we wese uyifite guhaha, kwishyura no kubitsa no kubikuza amafaranga ahantu hose hari icyuma gitanga amafaranga cya ATM machine.
Ubuyobozi bwa Ecobank butangiza ikarita ya CasXpress.
Kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki 18 Ugushyingo 2015, nibwo ubuyobozi bwa ECOBANK bwatangike ku mugaragaro iyi karita bwizera ko izafasha kongera ubuzima bw'Abanyarwanda bakoresha ihererekanyamafaranga.
Ubuyobozi bwa ECOBANK buvuga ko umuntu ari we wihitiramo uko azakoresha iyo karita, haba kugena amafaranga azajya asohora, haba kuyifatanya n'umuryango we cangwa kugena ukundi kose ashatse azajya ayikoresha.
ECOBANK ivuga ko iyi karita ije kunganira Abanyarwanda.
Iyi karita kandi ishobora gukoreshwa hagati y'abantu bari hanze n'abari mu Rwanda kuko ikora ku isi hose, bitewe n'uburyo bwa Visa ikoresha.
Harateganywa kandi ubukangurambaga buzakorwa hirya no hino mu gihugu, kugira ngo serivisi z'iyi karita zigere no ku muturage wo hasi.

#2130#	6	religion	http://www.makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article14341.html
Ese birakwiye ko amadini ashyamirana apfa abayoboke?
1 Abakorinto 3:4- 5 " Igihe umwe muri mwe avuga ati: “Jye ndi uwa Pawulo”, undi ati: “Jyewe ndi uwa Apolo ”, ntibiba byerekana ko mukimeze nk’ab’isi?
Mbese ye, Apolo ni nde?
Ese Pawulo we ni nde?
Twembi turi abagaragu b’Imana batumye mwemera Kristo.
Buri wese muri twe akora umurimo yiherewe na Nyagasani."
Zimwe mu nsengero usanga zidacana uwaka n’izinndi bibangikanye cyangwa izagiye zikomoka ku zindi;aho usanga abapasiteri bombi bayoboye insengero bashyamiranye mu buryo bukomeye; ndetse hari ubwo n’abaKristo babo iyo hagize urenga ku mabwiriza yatanzwe yo gushyiraho imipaka yo kugendereranirana hagati yabo, ahagarikirwa amasakaramentu.
Ese byagakwiriye ko amatorero abiri afite imyizerere imwe akimbirana bikomeye kugeza aho abayobozi babiba uwo mwuka mubo baba bayoboye ndetse bagashyiraho amategeko ahagarika ubusabane no kugendereranirana kuri bene so muri Kristo Yesu ?
Bamwe muba Kristo usanga batengwa bazira ko bagiye mu makwe ya bene wabo bagakora inshingano runaka; kandi mu byukuri byari bikwiye kubera amasano ya hafi bafitanye; Uwagiye muri urwo rusengero rundi akagenda mu byukuri atajyanywe n’iyobokamana ashaka gufasha no gushyigikira umuvandimwe we.Benshi usanga bava muri ibyo birori bagafatirwa ibihano bikomeye; Abandi bakabwirwa amagambo yo kubasebya no kubaharabika mu ruhame ngo basuzuguye itorero n’uriyoboye; bagashyirwa inyuma y’itorero.
Ibyo ntibikorwa n’abapagani batazi Imana; Usanga bikorwa n’insengero zose ziyitirira ko zisenga kandi zigakorera Imana; Biyobowe nabo tuzi ko ari abakozi b’Imana babisigiwe amavuta.
Akenshi usanga ipfundo rya byose haba hari ikibazo cyabaye hagati ya’abapasiteri , maze ibyo bapfa bombi bakabyinjiza mu ntama bayoboye.
" 1 Abatesaronike 1:12-15 " Dore icyo mvuga ni iki: buri wese avuga ibye umwe ati: “Ndi uwa Pawulo,” undi ati: “Jyewe ndi uwa Apolo,” naho undi ati: “Jyewe ndi uwa Petero,” n’undi ati: “Jyeweho ndi uwa Kristo.”
Ese Kristo yaciwemo ibice byinshi?
Mbese Pawulo ni we wababambiwe ku musaraba?
Mbese ni mu izina rya Pawulo mwabatijwe?
Ndashimira Imana ko nta n’umwe muri mwe nabatije uretse Krisipo na Gayo, bityo nta wavuga ko yabatijwe mu izina ryanjye."
Ikindi gitera ayo makimbirane ni ukurwanira abayoboke, bityo ugasanga habaho gukumira kugenderanirana hagati y’insengero ngo hagati aho hatazagira ushima ibyiza by’ahandi akahabenguka akagenda buheriheri, maze haba akantu gato ugasanga kabaye impamvu yo guhangana no gushyamirana gukomeye; Imiryango no kugendereranirana bigafungwa guhera ubwo;bigakurikirwa no guhanga no gusebanya buri umwe ashaka kwereka abo ayoboye ko ari umunyakuri!
Usanga ari icyaha kitababarirwa iyo umuKristo avuye mu rusengero akajya mu rundi wenda kuko ariho yumva hamubohokeye.
Iyo agarutse muri rwa rusengero afatwa nk’umwanzi ukomeye ndetse n’izari inshuti ze bisanzwe zikamugendera kure zanga ko abayobozi bo mu itorero bazabareba nabi.
Uva mu rusengero we ahamagawe n’Imana akajya gutangiza urundi; we usanga ahigwa bukware akarwanywa bikomeye; Intego nyamukuru ari ukwanga ko hari abanyetorero bamukurikira!
Ibi birababaje kandi biratangaje.
Aho kugirango umuyobozi w’urusengero anezezwe nuko Imana yaguye umurimo wayo ikaba hari uwo ihamagariye kwagura ubwami bwayo; Usanga aho kumushyigikira no kumutera ingabo mu bitugu; Uwakamushyigikiye niwe umurwanya akamusebya; Rimwe na rimwe yaba amurusha ubushobozi agashyirwa aruko asenye ibyo yubatse.
Igitangaje nuko abapasiteri bamwe bakora ibikorwa nk’ibyo byo kugawa; babyirata mu ruhame maze abayoboke babo si ikubashimagiza no kubakomera amashyi; induru n’impundu bikavuga.
Intambara turwana ntabwo ari iy’umubiri; Imana iduhishurire tumenye neza ko ibyo twahamagariwe atari kwinezeza no kubaka ubwami bwacu; Ko icyo twahamagariwe ari kubaka umubiri wa Kristo; Bityo tureke kubera imbogamizi abo Imana ihagurukije.
Igitangaje nuko abo barema inzangano bakanakumira abandi kujya gukora ibyo Imana ibahamagarira nabo baba baratangiye aho bavuye babarwanya; ariko ibibi banyuzemo ntibibigishe ibyo bagomba gukosora.
Abefeso 4:26 " Nimurakara ntimugakore icyaha, izuba ntirikarenge mukirakaye " Ese Birakwiriye ko habaho gushyamirana n’amakimbirane mu bantu b’Imana byumwihariko hagati y’ababakozi b’Imana bayoboye abandi; Uwo mwuka ugashyirwa no mu bayoborwa?
Niba mwarahamagawe koko n’Imana nta mpamvu yo kurwana urugamba rwo mu Mwuka mu mubiri; Mukwiye kureka Imana yabahamagaye ikaba ariyo ibarwanirira intambara.
Bibiliya itubwira ko tudakwiye gutamba ibitambo tutarikiranura neza nabo dufitanye ibibazo.
" Matayo 5:23-24 " Noneho nujyana ituro ryawe ku rutambiro kuritura Imana, wahagera ukibuka ko mugenzi wawe afite icyo apfa nawe, uzasige ituro ryawe aho imbere y’urutambiro , maze ubanze ugende wigorore na we, ubone kuza utange ituro ryawe."
Birababaje ko no mu nsengero zihuje izina n’imyizerere " Doctrine " habamo kutumvikana mu bayoboye; Yaba abari mu rusengero rumwe cyangwa mu yandi mashami y’urwo rusengero; Uwo mwuka abizera bakwiye kuwukumira ukarandurwa; Kuko itorero niritaba maso; Umwanzi arakomeza kuribibamo urukungu.
1 Abakorinto 1-4;6-7 " Nubwo navuga indimi z’abantu n’iz’abamarayika ariko singire urukundo, naba meze nk’ingoma inihira cyangwa inzogera irangīra.
Kandi nubwo nagira impano yo guhanura, nkamenya amabanga yose no gusobanukirwa ibintu byose, ndetse nkagira ukwizera guhagije kwatuma ntegeka imisozi ngo ive aho iri ariko singire urukundo, nta cyo naba ndi cyo.
Nubwo natanga ibyo ntunze byose ngo bihabwe abakene, ndetse nanjye ubwanjye nkitanga ngo ntwikwe ariko singire urukundo, nta cyo byamarira.
Urukundo rurihangana rukagira neza, urukundo ntirugira ishyari, ntirwirarira kandi ntirwihimbaza. ntirwishimira ibibi abandi bakora, ahubwo rwishimira ukuri.
Urukundo rwihanganira byose, muri byose rukemera Imana, rukiringira kandi rukiyumanganya."

#2134#	0	entertainment	http://www.igihe.com/imyidagaduro/article/usa-umuraperi-w-imyaka-19-yakatiwe-igifungo-cy-imyaka-55
USA: Umuraperi w’imyaka 19 yakatiwe igifungo cy’imyaka 55 Umuraperi w’imyaka 19 witwa Tay-K wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yakatiwe igifungo cy’imyaka 55 nyuma yo guhamwa n’ibyaha by’ubujura bwitwaje intwaro.
Taymor McIntyre wamamaye nka Tay-K, mu 2016 nibwo yashinjwe urupfu rw’umusore witwa Ethan Walker wari ufite imyaka 21, warasiwe mu rugo iwe mu Mujyi wa Mansfield muri Leta ya Texas.
Abatangabuhamya bavuze ko Tay-K yari mu mugambi wo kwiba ibiyobyabwenge n’amafaranga mu rugo rwa Walker.
Umukunzi wa Ethan Walker yavuze ko nyakwigendera yarashwe amaboko ye ari mu kirere nk’ikimenyetso cyo gusaba imbabazi nyuma yuko abamuteye bari babuze ibyo bashakaga.
Ethan Walker yarashwe n’igitero cy’abajura barimo na Tay-K wahanishijwe igifungo cy’imyaka 55 n’ihazabu y’ibihumbi $21 nyuma yo guhamwa n’ibyaha.
Tay-K yahamijwe ibyaha ku wa Gatanu w’icyumweru gishize, nyuma y’aho ubushinjacyaha bwemeje ko ari we wateguye igitero ndetse ashaka umuntu wishe Walker, uyu akaba yarakatiwe igifungo cya burundu.
Televiziyo ya KTVT ikorana bya hafi na CBS yatangaje ko abunganizi ba Tay-K mu by’amategeko bavuze ko umukiliya wabo atari we warashe amasasu ndetse adakwiye guhamywa icyaha.
Uruhande rw’abashinjacyaha rwavuze ko Tay-K yari azi neza umugambi wo kwiba Walker.
Mu 2017 nibwo uyu musore w’imyaka 19 yamenyekanye cyane ubwo yashyiraga hanze indirimbo ye yise “The Race” yaje no ku rutonde rw’indirimbo 100 zikunzwe kuri Billboard Hot 100.
Yayishyize hanze nyuma yo kwica akuma kagenzura abantu bafungishijwe ijisho mu ngo agatoroka.
Mu mashusho yayo yagaragaye yifotoreza iruhande rw’ifoto yerekana ko ashakishwa.
Uyu musore yafatiwe muri New Jersey nyuma y’amezi atatu yarahunze.
Reba “The Race”, indirimbo Tay-K yakoze amaze gutoroka polisi Umuraperi w’imyaka 19 witwa Tay-K yakatiwe igifungo cy’imyaka 55 ahamijwe ibyaha by’ubujura bwitwaje intwaro, byavuyemo urupfu Tay-K yamenyekanye cyane mu 2017 ubwo yashyiraga hanze indirimbo ye yise “The Race” Tay-K yakatiwe igifungo cy'imyaka 55 muri gereza

#2141#	5	politics	https://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/iyaba-ikiyaga-cya-kivu-cyashoboraga-kuvuga-kuko-cyabonye-byinshi-uwarokotse-jenoside
Iyaba ikiyaga cya Kivu cyashoboraga kuvuga kuko cyabonye byinshi - Uwarokotse Jenoside Uwitwa Mukakayumba Marie Goreth w’imyaka 49 wavukiye mu Mujyi wa Kibuye, akaba ari na ho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yamusanze, ahamya ko iyaba ikiyaga cya Kivu cyashoboraga kuvuga cyagaragaza byinshi cyabonye.
Mukakayumba wavutse ari umwana wa munani kandi wari umuhererezi mu muryango wa Madaraza na Nyirahindira, ubu atuye iruhande rw’ahahoze urugo rw’ababyeyi be mu mudugudu wa Rurembo, akagari ka Kibuye, Umurenge wa Bwishyura mu Karere ka Karongi.
Agasozi atuyeho gasa n’akinjiye mu kiyaga cya Kivu, umuntu ugahagazeho akaba ashohora kubona amazi y’icyo kiyaga hirya no hino mu ntera ya metero nka 300.
Mukakayumba wari umukobwa w’inkumi w’imyaka 22 mu 1994, yari yarahawe akazi ko gutegurira amafunguro abanyeshuri muri Collège Sainte-Marie ku Kibuye, yagize amahirwe kuko mu ijoro ryakeye iwabo bari bwicwe we yari yaraye ku ishuri.
Ntabwo yibuka umunsi neza, ariko abatangabuhamya bandi bavuga ko ku itariki 18 Mata 1994, Perefe wa Kibuye w’icyo gihe witwaga Kayishema Clément, yahamagariye Abatutsi guhungira kuri Kiliziya yitiriwe Mutagatifu Petero, hamwe no mu macumbi yari hafi aho yitwa Home Saint Jean.
Ibyo ariko Kayishema akaba ngo yarabikoze mu rwego rwo kwegeranyiriza hamwe abari bateguwe kwicwa, agamije guhita ahamagara Interahamwe.
Mukakayumba yagize ati "Ikivu iyaba cyari gishoboye kuvuga kuko cyabonye byinshi, cyaguyemo abantu bahungaga baturuka hakurya baza kuri Saint Jean, iyo wabaga uzi koga wirohaga mu mazi uhunga, abafite ubwato bakakugenda inyuma bakagukubita ingashya ukazikama, ibyawe bikarangirira aho".
Hari abarobyi n’abasare bicaga Abatutsi mu 1994 bakoresheje ingashya Mukakayumba avuga ko aherukana n’ababyeyi be ndetse n’abo bavukanaga icyo gihe, kuko Jenoside yarangiye akisanga wenyine hamwe n’abavandimwe babiri bari baragiye muri Kongo.
Avuga ko yakomeje kwihisha muri Collège Sainte Marie aza kuyivamo agenda yikinga aho abonye, kugeza ubwo ingabo zari iza APR zitangarije ko zibohoye u Rwanda.
Uwo mubyeyi ubana n’umwana arera, yaganiriye n’umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today anezerewe ndetse anyuzamo agaseka, akabiterwa n’uko ngo abona yaramutse neza kandi ashoboye kwifasha nta muntu umutera inkunga.
Avuga ko inzu atuyemo ari we wayiyubakiye, akaba afite imirima n’amatungo ndetse abanye neza n’abaturanyi.
Urugo rwa Mukakayumba Marie Goreth Inzibutso ebyiri ziri mu mujyi wahoze ari umurwa mukuru wa Perefegitura ya Kibuye, ubu ziruhukiyemo abagera ku bihumbi 27, ariko ababonye Jenoside ikorwa bakavuga ko uwo mubare urenze cyane bitewe n’uko abenshi ngo baguye mu kiyaga cya Kivu.
Collège Sainte Marie, aho Mukakayumba yarokokeye Jenoside Shakisha izindi nkuru MENYA UMWANDITSI Simon Kamuzinzi Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ SimonKamuzinzi Reba inkuru zose nanditse ( 1297 )

#2181#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/abagera-kuri-miliyoni-imwe-bahitanywe-na-sida-mu-2016
Abagera kuri miliyoni imwe bahitanywe na Sida mu 2016 Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rigamije kurwanya icyorero cya Sida, ONUSIDA ryatangaje ko mu 2016, abantu bagera kuri miliyoni imwe ku isi aribo bapfuye bazize impfu zifitanye isano n’iki cyorezo.
Raporo yakozwe na ONUSIDA igaragaza ko uyu mubare wagabanutse cyane ugereranyije no mu 2015, ahabarurwaga abagera kuri miliyoni 1.9 bishwe na Sida.
Nk’uko BBC dukesha iyi nkuru yabyanditse ibi byagezweho kubera ko hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’abayirwaye batangiye gufata imiti igabanya ubukana ku nshuro yabo ya mbere.
Ku isi yose habarurwa abagera kuri miliyoni 36.7 babana na Virusi itera Sida, 53% bakaba babasha gufata imiti igabanya ubukana ituma babasha kubaho igihe kirekire.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa ONUSIDA, Michel Sidibé,yatangaje ko bageze ku ntego bari barihaye mu 2015 yo guha imiti igabanya ubukana abagera kuri miliyoni 15, ndetse bakaba bafite gahunda yo gukuba uyu mubare inshuro ebyiri kugira ngo bagere ku byo biyemeje kugeza mu 2020.
Muri iyi raporo kandi ONUSIDA yagaragaje ko kuva mu 2010, ibihugu byo Burasirazuba n’Amajyepfo ya Afurika byari byarazahajwe n’icyorezo cya Sida byabashije kugabanya ubwandu bushya kugera kuri hafi kimwe cya gatatu.
Icyizere cyo kubaho na cyo kiyongereyeho imyaka 10.
ONUSIDA yihaye intego yise 90-90-90, aho bateganya ko muri 2020, 90% by’abafite Virusi itera Sida bazaba babizi, 90% byabo bakaba bafata imiti igabanya ubukana, ndetse 90% Virusi ikagabanuka mu mubiri ku buryo batabasha kwanduza.
Mu 2016 iyi mibare yari ku kigero cya 70% cy’abazi ko banduye, 77% muri bo bakaba bari ku miti, mu gihe 82% virusi itera Sida yari yaragabanutse mu mubiri wabo. [email protected]

#2197#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/ivugabutumwa/article/amagambo-yo-mu-isengesho-ryawe-yarumviswe-nibyo-binzanye-kukubwira-iyi-nkuru
Amagambo yo mu isengesho ryawe yarumviswe nibyo binzanye kukubwira iyi nkuru Yanditswe kuya 26-08-2016 saa 06:39' na Rejoice Africa Ministries Hanyuma yaho arambwira ati ‘'Witinya Daniyeli, kuko uhereye ku munsi watangiriyeho gushishikarira gusobanukirwa no kwicisha bugufi imbere y'Imana yawe, amagambo yawe yarumviswe kandi ni yo anzanye.
Ariko umutware w'ubwami bw'u Buperesi amara iminsi makumyabiri n'umwe ambuza , nyuma Mikayeli, umwe wo mu batware bakomeye aza kuntabara, ntinda mu bami b'u Buperesi (Daniyeli 10: 12-13) Mu bisanzwe aya magambo ashimangira ukuntu Imana iha agaciro ibyo tuyikorera byiza kandi bikayikora ku mutima, iyo umuntu yashishikariye kwita ku by'Imana.
Iyo uharaniye gukiranuka Imana ntibifata nk'ibitagize icyo biyibwiye ahubwo ibyitaho kandi si aha gusa mu isi, umwanditsi wandikiye Abaheburayo 6: 10 yaravuze ngo "Imana ntikiranirwa ngo yibagirwe imirimo myiza abantu bakora n'urukundo berekana ko bakunda abera".
Ndababwiza ukuri ko aya ari amwe mu magambo ankomeza iteka iyo mvunikiye mu murimo w'Imana kuko numva ko hari agaciro Imana ibiha kandi ko idashobora gukora ikosa ryo kubyibagirwa cyangwa kubyirengagiza nkuko abantu babigenza.
Daniyeli hano yasenze ashaka gutabarwa n'Imana asa n'udahise asubizwa, nyamara si uko yari umunyabyaha.
Intambara umukristo arwana mu isi ntirangizwa n'amasengesho buri gihe ahubwo hari n'igihe usenga ukahakura imbaraga mbere y'igisubizo, ariko hano Daniyeli yaje gusubizwa amasengesho ye arumvwa, ndetse biragaragara ko Imana yamwumvise mbere ahubwo Daniyeli arwanaga intambara nk'izindi zose abakristo babayeho mu buzima busanzwe hano ku isi bahora barwana.
Usomye neza ariya magambo, ubona Daniyeli yari yarasubijwe kera ariko ntiyakira igisubizo cye, ahubwo yacyakiriye nyuma y'iminsi makumyabiri n'umwe cyaraheze mu nzira, Daniyeli we atabizi agakomeza kwinginga Imana ituma malayika Mikayeli aza kumutabara.
Ngaho rero reka nawe nkwibutse ko umukristo arwana intambara ariko akazinesherezwa n'Imana; izi ntambara reka nzite izo mu Mwuka kuko Satani n'abadayimoni umurimo wabo ni ubujura n'ubushukanyi.
Ijambo ry'Imana riravuga ngo "umujura ntazanwa n'ikindi keretse kwiba no kurimbura" rikomeza risobanura ngo "ariko Yesu we yazanywe no kugira ngo intama ze zibona ubugingo ndetse ngo zibone bwinshi."
(Yohana 10: 10) Satani aba ashaka iteka kubuza abantu b'Imana umudendezo wo mu gakiza, agakora ibishoboka byose ngo amasengeso yawe ntasubizwe, agakora uko ashoboye ngo utabona ibyiza byo mu gakiza, wenda nibinashoboka uzinukwe kwizera Imana, ariko Imana ishimwe Yesu yaraje kugira ngo tubone ubugingo ndetse tubone bwinshi nkuko hariya Imana yari yamaze kumva Daniyeli akimara gushishikarira guca bugufi imbere y'Imana.
Intambara zihoraho mu isi ariko dukomeze twizere Imana nk'umutabazi Nubwo turwana amanywa n'ijoro n'ingabo za satani zishaka ko twihakana Imana ariko nimureke dukomere rwose kandi twihangane kuko Imana twizeye kamere yayo si nk'iy'abantu, ariko kandi dukwiye gutwara intwaro zose z'Imana kugira ngo tubashe guhagarara tudatsinzwe n'uburiganya bwa Satani (Abefeso 6:11) kandi nimuhumure tuzanesha kuko turi kumwe n'Umwami wanesheje ku mugaragaro imbaraga zose z'umwijima.
"Kuko intwaro z'intambara yacu atari nk'iz'abantu, ahubwo imbere y'Imana zigira imbaraga zo gusenya ibihome no kubikubita hasi impaka n'ikintu cyose cyishyiriye hejuru kurwanya Imana."
(2 Abakorinto 10: 4-5) Niba bitakoroheye muri iki gihe ihangane nshuti, iyo udahise usubizwa si uko Imana iba yakuretse.
Ntubireke, komeza wizere Imana kuko niba warashishikariye guca bugufi nawe malayika Mikayeli utumwe n'Imana yakuzaho akagutabara ahubwo ndagusabira Imana kurwana kigabo kuko Imana yarakumvise cyane ko ireba mu mutima kurusha ibindi byose.
Ni Imana itagenda, idakora, itanatekereza nkuko abo mu miryango yacu cyangwa abakomeye twizera bakora kuko ni abantu.
Ahubwo iyi Mana tuvuga, ikora byose nk'Imana kandi ikabikorana ubuhanga, ubwenge n'ubunyangamugayo butangaje!
Komera rwose kandi ugwize imbaraga z'umutima.

#2200#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/rwanda-online-ishyigikiye-ikigo-cyo-muri-israel-gikoresha-ikoranabuhanga-mu
Rwanda Online yateye ingabo mu bitugu ikoranabuhanga rizifashishwa mu buhinzi Yanditswe kuya 21-09-2016 saa 15:06' na Tombola Felicie Umuyobozi w'Ikigo Rwanda Online gifite mu nshingano zacyo urubuga rwa internet ‘Irembo' rutangirwaho serivisi za Leta hagamijwe kuzihutisha binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga yatangaje ko bashyigikiye gahunda zo guteza imbere abaturage cyane cyane abahinzi bakorana n'Ikigo Nfrnds cyo muri Israel mu guhanahana amakuru.
Nfrnds ni ikigo cyo muri Israel cyatangije uburyo bwo kugeza ku baturage bataragerwaho na internet uburyo bwo kongera ubumenyi mu byo bakora binyuze mu kubona amakuru kuri telefoni zabo yaba ajyanye n'ubuhinzi, ubucuruzi, ndetse n'ibindi.
Iki kigo gikoresha ikoranabuhanga ridakenera internet haba mu buhinzi,mu bucuruzi, mu burezi , kubona amakuru y'iteganyagihe, amakuru asanzwe mu nzego zose z'ubuzima bwa buri munsi, bikaba bikorwa muri gahunda cyihaye yo gufasha miliyari enye z'abatuye Isi bataragerwaho n'ikoranabunga rigezweho kubona amakuru no gutera imbere.
Mu muhango wo gutanga imyampabushobozi ku banyeshuri 12 biga muri Kaminuza zitandukanye basoje amezi atatu y'amahugurwa yo kwihangira imirimo hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga ndetse no mu guhugurira abaturage kuyoboka ubu buryo bwo kubona amakuru ajyanye n'ibyo bifuza bakoresheje telefoni zisanzwe kandi badakeneye internet, Umuyobozi wa Rwanda Online, Uwajeneza Clement, yatangaje ko bashyigikiye ubu buryo bw'ikigo Nfrnds cyo muri Israel kuko byose bigamije iterambere ryihuse.
Yagize ati "Twishimiye iyi gahunda y'ikoranabuhanga bafite kuko ni akazi natwe dukora kandi twese tugamije iterambere ndetse no korohereza umuturage kubona ibyo akeneye atavunitse kandi adatakaje igihe.Kuba umuturage afite telefoni bizajya bimuhesha kubona amakuru adakeneye internet kandi ku giciro gito."
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi n'Iterambere mu Kigo Nfrnds, Caylee Talpert, yatangaje ko bahisemo u Rwanda kuko hari aho rumaze kugera mu guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga.
Ati "Dukorera mu bihugu bitandukanye muri Afurika nka Uganda, Zimbabwe n'ibindi byinshi , umwaka ushize twaje mu Rwanda dusura KLab twaganiriye n'abantu batandukanye tubona ko u Rwanda rushyize imbere ikoranabuhanga niyo mpamvu twahisemo kuza gutanga amahugurwa mu rubyiruko ngo rwihangire imirimo kandi basobanurire abaturage ibyiza by'ubu buryo bwo kubona amakuru ajyanye n'ibyo bifuza hadakenewe internet."
Yakomeje avuga ko Nfrnds yitaye cyane ku bantu bataragerwaho n'amakuru nk'abahinzi, abacuruzi bato n'abandi bose bashobora kuba badafite telefoni zigezweho na internet ariko bakaba bakenera amakuru.
Ati "Hari imibare umuntu akanda muri telefoni ye akagenda akurikiza amabwiriza,niba ashaka kumenya uko inyanya ziboneka kuva zihinzwe kugeza zisaruwe byose arabibona.
Ku munsi ibyo washakisha byose umuntu akoresha amafaranga 21 gusa, ku cyumweru ni amafaranga 150, ku kwezi ni amafaranga 600."
Shyaka Charles wasoje amahugurwa yatangaje ko aho bagiye bagera hose bamenyekanisha iyi gahunda abaturage babyishimiye kuko berekanaga ko byatuma barushaho kunoza ubuhinzi cyangwa ubucuruzi bakora.
Ati "Abaturage twasobanuriraga nko ku munsi w'umuganda wasangaga bishimye kuko hari nk'igihe ibihingwa birwara ntibamenye uko byagenze cyangwa bakabura uwo babaza ariko ubu bakaba bazajya babaza telefoni zabo."
Nubwo iyi gahunda ngo ikiri mu igeragezwa abaturage 1400 bo mu turere dutandukanye bamaze kuyijyamo.
Abatarayisobanukirwa bakanda akanyenyeri 847 urwego (*847 #) ku bakoresha MTN bagakurikiza amabwiriza naho ku bakoresha Tigo ukanda akanyenyeri 265 (*265 # ) urwego nabwo ugakurikiza amabwiriza.
Abasoje amahugurwa bahawe ibihembo binyuranye hakurikijwe icyo umuntu yitwayemo neza, hanatanzwe ibihembo ku bagaragaje imishinga myiza y'uburyo bw'iki kigo Nfrnds bwakoreshwamo abaturage bakabona amakuru hadakenewe internet.

#2221#	10	relationships	http://makuruki.rw/URUKUNDO/article/Sekibi-yaranteye-none-nsigaye-nca-inyuma-umugabo-wange-uko-bwije-nuko-bukeye-Mungire-inama
Sekibi yaranteye none nsigaye nca inyuma umugabo wange uko bwije nuko bukeye "Mungire inama" Muraho bakunzi dusangiye uru rubuga rudufasha, mumbabarire simbabwire amazina yanjye n'icyo nkora kuko ntinya ko hari abahita bamenya.
Nifuje kubasangiza ubuhamya n'agahinda k'uburyo nahemukiye uwo twashakanye dufite abana babiri.
Ndi umudamu mfite imyaka 34, maze imyaka ibiri n'igice nshatse, umugabo wanjye dufitanye abana babiri n'undi umwe w'umugabo turera.
Twashakanye dukundana tutanafite amafaranga menshi ariko buri umwe afite akazi akora.
Nyuma y'amezi arindwi dushakanye umugabo wanjye yakundaga kujya muri misiyo mu Ntara akamara nk'iminsi ine,itanu akagaruka, najye nkasigara mu rugo nkumva nta kibazo.
Nubwo yazaga mukumbuye ariko sinatekerezaga kuba namuca inyuma kuko twari n'abarokore.
Iyo yatahaga avuye mu Ntara yarazaga tugakora imibonano mpuzabitsina ariko agakora kenshi gashoboka kugira ngo azarangize week end tumaranye ipfa, bityo bigatuma nanirwa cyane, byageraga mu cyumweru hagati nongeye kumva mbishaka cyane nkagira n'isoni z'uwo nagisha inama.
Mu kwezi kwa 10 muri 2014, byabaye ngombwa ko bamwimurira gukorera I Huye, noneho hakaba ubwo amara nk'ibyumweru bibiri adatashye, rimwe yanaza agasanga ndi mu mihango situgire icyo dukora.
Umugabo nawe ukiri muto wari inshuti y'umugabo wanjye nawe wari ufite umugore, yakundaga kunyuraho ku kazi tugatahana, tukaganira, buke buke urumva umuntu mutahana buri munsi ugenda umuvunguriraho ku buzima bwawe, ngira ngo iby'abagore murabizi.
Uko namubwiraga dutahanye mu modoka ye ni ko we yanyigaga, twagera ku irembo akansezera akampa akabizu ku itama.
Byaje kugeraho ntangira kujya mutekerezaho kenshi.
Umunsi umwe yamvanye mu materaniro ku rusengero kuko buri wa kabiri no kuwa kane tugira amateraniro y'umugoroba.
Yaje kunsaba ko twanyurana I Nyarutarama ku nzu yabo yari yavuyemo umupangayi ngo avugane gato n'umuzamu.
Twagezeyo, arareba avugana n'umuzamu kuko ari za nzu bakodesha ziba zifitemo ibikoresho byose, tuninjirana mu nzu.
Ubwo nanjye ntabeshye numvaga nsigaye mwifuza, maze ansaba ko twagira icyo dukora.
Agatima k'ubukirisitu kabanje gukubita ariko ndaganzwa nshiduka twasambaniye muri salo tutaragera no mu cyumba.
Turangije natashye mfite ubwoba numva nanicuza.
Bukeye bwaho yarampamagaye sinanamwitaba, mwandikira sms ngo ntiyirirwe anaza no kumfata ku kazi ngo dutahe.
Uwo munsi umugabo yaratashye ariko nkumva mfite ubwoba ko yaba abimbonamo ko namuhemukiye.
Ntavuze byinshi cyane, nyuma y'ibyumweru nka bitatu, uyu mugabo yaje kunsaba ko twajya dufata umwanya tukiha akabyizi kuko nawe umugore we abona atajya amuha umwiyumvamo.
Nubwo ntigeze mbimwemerera ariko ntababeshye sinjya menya uko twongeye kuryamana.
Ndabizi ko ibyo ndimo ari amakosa bamwe banantuka, ariko nimunsengere nukuri ababishoboye kuko mbona narasenye byararangiye. kandi umugabo wange ndamukunda Mungire inama murakoze.

#2255#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/u-bushinwa-umwana-yavutse-nyuma-y-imyaka-ine-ababyeyi-be-bitabye-imana
U Bushinwa: Umwana yavutse nyuma y’imyaka ine ababyeyi be bitabye Imana Mu buhanga bwihariye bugezweho muri iyi minsi, hafashwe intanga z’umugore n’umugabo zibyazwamo umwana wavutse nyuma y’imyaka ine se na nyina batakibarizwa ku Isi y’abazima.
Ababyeyi b’uyu mwana bapfuye mu 2013 bazize impanuka y’imodoka, maze intanga zabo zirafatwa zibikwa ahantu hakonje cyane, abazibitse bagumana icyizere cyo kuzabona umwana binyuze mu kuzihuza bitabereye mu nda y’umugore, ibizwi nka ‘In vitro fertilization’.
Ababyeyi ba ba nyakwigendera binjiye mu rubanza rwo gusaba kwemererwa gukoresha intanga z’abana babo, kugeza ubwo umwuzukuru yavutse mu Ukuboza, nk’uko ikinyamakuru The Beijing News cyabitangaje.
Cyasobanuye ko muri urwo rubanza, kuba nta kirego gisa n’iki cyari cyarabayeho byatumye ababyeyi ba ba nyakwigendera baburana igihe kinini, mbere y’uko guhuza intanga bikorwa.
Ubwo impanuka yabaga, intanga zabitswe mu bitaro bya Nanjing, mu bukonje bwa dogere 196 munsi ya zeru, mu kinyabutabire cya nitrogen gisukika.
Ababyeyi b’abitabye Imana baje guhabwa uburenganzira ku magi yari yamaze guhura ngo atangire gukora umwana.
Nta rubanza nk’uko rwari rwarabayeho ngo rureberweho mu guha ababyeyi uburenganzira ku ntanga z’abana babo.
Gusa ibyo ntibyari bihagije, kuko bategetswe ko bazavana mu bitaro urwo rusoro ari uko bagaragaje icyangombwa cy’uko hari ibindi bitaro bizarwitaho.
Bitewe n’uburyo hari ugushidikanya kwinshi ku igi riteganywa kuvamo umwana nyamara ritari mu mugore nk’uko bisanzwe, byari bigoye kubona ibitaro mu Bushinwa byari kwinjira muri icyo kibazo.
Ndetse ngo kuba ubwo buryo bwo kubyara butaremerwa mu mategeko yo mu Bushinwa, icyari gisigaye kwari ukubikorera hanze y’icyo gihugu, niko kwerekeza muri Laos.
Ingorane nabwo ntizarangiriye aho, kubera ko byari ihurizo ko ikigo cy’indege cyakwemera gutwara icupa rya nitrogen rikonje kuri ruriya rwego, uwo muzigo wagombaga kugenda n’imodoka.
Muri Laos, urwo rusoro rwatewe mu mugore, maze mu Ukuboza 2017 havukamo umwana w’umuhungu.
Ubwenegihugu bw’uwo mwana waje kwitwa Tiantian, nabwo bwaje kuba ikindi kibazo kuko yavukiye mu Bushinwa, abyawe n’umugore bamuteretsemo, icyo gihe akaba yaramubyaye yagiye mu Bushinwa, kandi icyo gihe yagenderaga kuri viza ya ba mukerarugendo.
Kubera ko nta wundi muntu wari uhari wo gushimangira inkomoko y’umwana, ababyeyi bibarutse abo Tiantian akomokaho uko ari bane, basabwe gutanga amaraso ngo hapimwe ADN, kugira ngo hemezwe mu buryo ntakuka ko uwo ari umwuzukuru wabo, kandi bose bakaba bafite ubwenegihugu bw’u Bushinwa.
Nyuma yo kwemezwa, amakuru agaragaza ko byabaye ibyishimo bidasanzwe kuri uwo muryango, kuko bari babonye ko umuryango wabo ugiye gukomeza kororoka.
Ababyeyi banejejwe n'uko umuryango wabo ugiye gukomeza kwaguka Igi ryamaze gusama ryakonjeshejwe imyaka itatu

#2277#	0	entertainment	http://www.ukwezi.rw/Imyidagaduro/article/Gisele-Precious-yijeje-ubudasa-mu-gitaramo-azafashwamo-na-Aline-Gahongayire-na-Gaby-Kamanzi
Gisèle Precious yijeje ubudasa mu gitaramo azafashwamo na Aline Gahongayire na Gaby Kamanzi Umuhanzikazi Nsabimana Gisèle [Gisèle Precious], ukunzwe mu baririmba izo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, yavuze ko igitaramo yateguriye abakristo n’abanyarwanda muri rusange giteguye neza ndetse abazakitabira bazaryoherwa no gutarama bashima Imana.
Ni igitaramo giteganyijwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 26 Ukuboza 2020, guhera i saa tatu z’umugoroba kugeza saa tanu, aho kizatambuka ku ISIBO TV ndetse no ku rukuta rwa YouTube rwa ‘IRERA Rehoboth TV’.
Iki gitaramo ngarukamwaka ni icyo gufasha abanyarwanda n’abakristo muri rusange kwizihiza Umunsi Mukuru wa Noheli, cyiswe ‘Xmass Festival’.
Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyo kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Gisèle Precious yasobanuye ko iki gitaramo cyahawe izina rya ‘Festival’ kubera ko kizajya gikorwa mu buryo bw’iserukiramuco kandi kiba ari ngarukamwaka.
Ni igitaramo kizaba kirimo abahanzi b’igistinagore, bivuze ko uretse Aline Gahongayire, Gaby Kamanzi na The Anointed Band n’abandi bashobora kuzagaragaramo ni ab’igitsinagore.
Ntuzacikwe n’iki gitaramo… Gisèle Precious yavuze ko icyo abantu bakwiye kwitega muri iki gitaramo “Ni uko twese cyangwa abantu benshi bafite inyota yo kubona abantu dutarama, ikindi gikomeye ni uko ni ubwa mbere mu Rwanda bizaba bibayeho ko abantu babona urubyiniro ruriho abagore gusa.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Turashaka ko abazaba bari gukurikirana iki gitaramo bazareba abagore babo cyangwa abakobwa babo bafite impano bakabona ko nabo babishobora bityo bakabashyigikira.”
Uyu muhanzikazi yavuze ko muri rusange iki gitaramo ari icyo gushima Imana muri rusange kubw’imirimo n’ibitangaza byayo iba yarakoreye abantu.
Gisèle Precious watangiye umuziki mu buryo bw’umwuga mu 2017, amaze gukora indirimbo nyinshi zirimo iyitwa ‘Imbaraga, Shimwa, Niwe, Urampagije ndetse n’iyitwa ‘Nashukuru’ yaherukaga gushyira hanze muri uyu mwaka.
Ntuzacikwe n’iki gitaramo…

#2284#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/Imibereho-y-abanyamuryango-ba-Zigama-CSS-igiye-kuba-myiza-kubera-umutungo
Imibereho y'abanyamuryango ba Zigama CSS igiye kuba myiza kubera umutungo wiyongereye Inama ya Koperative yo kuzigama no kugurizanya, Zigama CSS, yanzuye ko izajya itera inkunga abanyamuryango bakomerekera mu kazi kugera ku mafaranga miliyoni eshatu, kunganira imishinga y'abafasha b'abanyamuryango; ndetse na servisi z'imari zikazabegerezwa, aho ngo bashobora gufatira amafaranga kuri banki iyo ari yo yose ikorana nabo.
Iyi myanzuro yagezweho mu rwego rwo kwishimira ko Koperative ya Zigama CSS yageze ku mutungo wa miliyari 111.5 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda; nk'uko Umuyobozi mukuru, Dr James Ndahiro yabitangarije abanyamakuru, nyuma y'inama y'abahagarariye Zigama CSS, yateranye kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 21/3/2014.
Dr Ndahiro yagize ati: "Umunyamuryango wacu ufite ikarita ya ATM azajya abikuza amafaranga ava kuri konti ya Zigama CSS, ayakuye ku cyuma gitanga amafaranga cya BK cyangwa indi banki iyo ari yo yose; uwakomerekera ku kazi yarafashe inguzanyo, koperative izamwunganira kugera kuri miliyoni eshatu z'umwenda yafashe".
Dr James Ndahiro, umuyobozi wa Zigama CSS, Gen James Kabarebe Minisitiri wingabo, Gen Patrick Nyamvumba umugaba Mukuru w'Ingabo, na DIGP Dan Munyuza Umuyobozi Wungirije wa Polisi.
Inama ya CSS yanzuye kandi ko abafasha b'abanyamuryango bazajya basaba kongererwa inkunga yo guteza imbere imishinga ibyara inyungu, ndetse hashyizweho komite y'iyo koperative ishinzwe gufasha abanyamuryango kwiga neza imishinga yateza imbere ingo zabo.
Umuyobozi wa Zigama CSS yavuze ko babonye ibisubizo ku byakorohereza abanyamuryango kubona inguzanyo mu buryo bwihuse kandi buhendutse, uko bajya babona icumbi, kwigisha abana no guhabwa inkunga y'ingoboka mu gihe umunyamuryango agize ikibazo.
"Ubu ni uburyo bwo kwirwanaho ku muntu ubona umushara muto, bikaba byaratumye amahanga ahora aza kwigira ku Rwanda, uburyo twita ku bafasha b'abajya mu butumwa bw'amahoro hanze y'igihugu", nk'uko Umuvugizi w'ingabo z'u Rwanda, Brig Gen Joseph Nzabamwita yabitangaje.
Abahagarariye abanyamuryango ba Zigama CSS mu nama.
Brig Gen Joseph Nzabamwita yasobanuye ko umwaka ushize wa 2013 wasize CSS igeze ku mutungo wa miliyari 111.5, mu gihe uw'2012 iyo koperative yari igeze kuri miliyari 85 (RwF).
Inama y'abahagarariye Koperative Zigama CSS iterana buri mwaka igamije kwemeza ibyavuye mu mwaka ushize.
Iyi koperative igizwe n'Ingazo z'igihugu, Abapolisi n'abashinzwe kurinda za gereza.
Simon Kamuzinzi

#2324#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUREZI/article/Gahunda-yo-kwishyurira-abana-ba-mwarimu-ishobora-kuba-yarumviswe-nabi-RWAMUKWAYA
"Gahunda yo kwishyurira abana ba mwarimu, ishobora kuba yarumviswe nabi" RWAMUKWAYA.
Mu nama iherutse guhuza Minisiteri y'uburezi n'abafatanyabikorwa bayo, hagamijwe gusuzuma ibyagezweho n'ibiteganywa gukorwa, hagarutswe ku birebana no kuzamura imibereho myiza y'umwarimu.
Icyakora MINEDUC yo ivuga ko bishobora kuba byarumviswe nabi, ngo kuko ari umushinga ugutekerezwaho, utarafatirwa umwanzuro.
Muri iyi nama Minisiteri y'Uburezi yatangaje ko mu rwego rwo kuzamura imibereho ya mwarimu no kumufasha kwiteza imbere, abana babiri yabyaye bazajya bigira ubuntu kuva mu mashuri abanza kugeza mu yisumbuye nk'imwe mu ngamba zashyizweho zikiri mu mishinga.
Bamwe mu barimu twaganiriye bavuga ko bishimiye iyi gahunda kuko ngo biteye ipfunwe kwigisha abana b'abandi, abawe wabasize mu rugo.
Athanasie MUKAKAYANGE wigisha mu mwaka wa 4 w'amashuri abanza ku Kamuhoza, avuga ko wasangaga abana ba mwarimu aribo bari gusiragira mu nzira bataha kubera kubura amafaranga y'ishuri.
Akishimira ko iki cyemezo nikiramuka gishyizwe mu bikorwa kizakemura icyo kibazo ndetse n'ibindi.
Ati "Biragayitse kuza kwigisha abana ba rubanda abawe wabasize mu rugo, urumva icyo gihe ko utakigisha wishimye, kandi koko bishobora kugira ingaruka ku myigishirize n'imitsindire y'abanyeshuri.Ariko icyo nibagikemura urumva ko hari ikizaba gihindutse mu mibereho yacu" Mwarimu Mukakanyange, washimishijwe n'iyi gahunda yo kurihira abana ba mwarimu Mwarimu Felicien ariko we avuga ko atewe impungenge n'ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry'iyi gahunda.
Ati "Erega ni ukubibara umuntu abibonye, ntuzi se ko hari gahunda zimwe Leta yavugaga ko igiye gushyiriraho abarimu ariko zigahera mu nyandiko gusa, nibabyihutishe, natwe tuzabibara tubibonye" Ku ruhande rwa Minisiteri y'uburezi mu Rwanda, yo ivuga ko abantu bumvise nabi iby'iyi gahunda.
Olivier RWAMUKWAYA , Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri MINEDUC , avuga ko uyu mushinga wo kwishyurira abana babiri ba mwarimu, ari imwe muri gahunda nyinshi zigitekerezwaho kuko ngo hagikusanywa ibitekerezo ku birebana n'uburyo byazashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Ati "Abantu bashobora kuba barumvise nabi iyi gahunda.
Uyu ni umushinga ukiri mu bitekerezo, turacyakusanya ibitekerezo by'abarimu ndetse n'abandi barebwa n'iyi gahunda, nimara kwemezwa muzabona ishyizwe mu bikorwa.
Ubwo icyo gihe nibwo tuzabasobanurira uko bizakorwa n'ibindi byose birebana n'iyi gahunda" Rwamukwaya avuga ko Leta y'u Rwanda itazagarukira aho gusa, kuko hari n'izindi gahunda zikomeje gutekerezwa zo kuzamura imibereho myiza ya mwarimu, zirimo kumwongerera ubumenyi hagamijwe kugera ku ireme ry'uburezi, kubaha agahimbazamusyi nyuma y'umwaka nk'abandi bakozi ba Leta, kubafasha kubona za mudasobwa, amacumbi, guhabwa inka muri gahunda ya ‘Girinka mwarimu' no kuborohereza mu mibereho yabo n'iy'imiryango yabo.
Nta gushidikanya ko mu gihe izi gahunda zitahera mu mpapuro zagira icyo zihindura ku mibereho ya mwarimu , byakunze kuvugwa kenshi ko itameze neza bitewe n'ikibazo cy'umushahara muto cyakunze kugaragazwa n'abakora uyu murimo.
Makuruki.rw

#2341#	4	health	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/u-rwanda-rwagabanyije-abahitanwa-n-indwara-z-ubuhumekero
U Rwanda rwagabanyije abahitanwa n'indwara z'ubuhumekero U Rwanda ruri imbere mu bihugu byo munsi y'Ubutayu bwa Sahara byagaragaje igabanuka ry'indwara z'ubuhumekero zahitanye abagera ku 8,181 mu 2015.
Indwara z'ubuhumekero zahitanaga benshi muri Afurika.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na The Lancet bukubiye muri raporo yiswe the "Global Burden of Diseases, Injuries, and Risk Factors Study (GBD)", bugaragaza ko ibihugu byinshi bya Afurika y'Iburasirazuba byagize uruhare rufatika mu kugabanya impfu z'abarwayi baziraga indwara z'ubuhumekero.
Dr.
Charles Shey Wiysonge, umuhuzabikorwa wa GBD muri Afurika y'Epfo, yagize ati "Ibihugu byinshi bifite imbogamizi zo kurengera ubuzima nubwo hari iterambere ry'ubukungu, uburez no kubyara bake, mu gihe ibindi bihugu byitwa ko bikiri inyuma mu iterambere byagaragaje impinduka."
Mu bihugu byinshi bya Afurika y'Iburasirazuba, indwara z'ubuhumekero nizo zari ku isonga mu kuganisha ku mpfu, aho zahitanye abagera ku 58,231 muri Ethiopia, 8,181 mu Rwanda.
Ku rundi ruhande kandi, agakoko gatera sida niko kahitanye benshi muri Kenya, aho mu mwaka wa 2015 kahitanye 46,577.
U Rwanda kandi ni rwo rufite umubare muto w'imfu z'abana muri Afurika y'Iburasirauba, aho mu mwaka ushize hapfuye abana bari munsi y'imyaka itanu bagera ku 23,768, mu gihe ibindi bihugu nka Kenya hapfuye abagera ku 79,236 na 189,636 muri Ethiopia.
Ku rwego rw'isi, icyizere cyo kubaho cyavuye ku myaka 62 mu 1980 kigera ku myaka 72 mu 2015.
Ibihugu byinshi bya Afurika ni bimwe mu byagize ubwiyongere mu guhangana n'impfu, kubera gahunda zo guhangana n'icyorezo cya SIDA.
Mu myaka 25 ishize, kuramba byagiye byiyongera bitewe na buri karere.
Mu 2015, kuramba muri Tanzaniya byari bigeze kuri 64, imyaka 61 muri Uganda, 57 muri Zambia na 54 muri Somalia.

#2371#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/yashinjwe-n-abaturage-mu-ruhame-kunyereza-miliyoni-eshatu-muri-vup
Yashinjwe n'abaturage mu ruhame kunyereza miliyoni eshatu muri VUP Umukozi ushinzwe Imibereho Myiza y'Abaturage mu Murenge wa Busoro mu Karere ka Nyanza, Mugisha Janvier, arashinjwa kunyereza asaga miliyoni eshatu yo muri gahunda y'ubudehe.
Yatawe muri yombi ashinjwa kunyereza asaga miliyoni 3 muri VUP.
Uyu mukozi w'umurenge yatawe muri yombi nyuma y'uko abaturage bamushinje imbere y'Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyanza, Ntazinda Erasme, mu nama yakoranye na bo kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 21 Kamena 2016.
