Abahanzikazi ba ‘Gospel’ 11 bishyize hamwe bagiye gukora igitaramo gikomeye Ku nshuro ya 2 abagore n’abakobwa baririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana bagiye gukora igitaramo gikomeye kigamije gukangurira abahanzikazi bo muri ‘Gospel’ kwitinyuka ndetse n’umugore muri rusange kumva ko na we afite ubushobozi bwo kuzamura impano ye no kwiteza imbere.
Ku itariki 14 Ukuboza 2016 nibwo hari habaye igikorwa cyo gutangiza ihuriro ry’aba bahanzikazi bise ‘All In One Gospel Ladies’.
Muri iki gitaramo ninabwo hamuritswe ‘DVD’ iriho indirimbo zabo uko ari 11, ku ikubitiro ihita igurwa asaga miliyoni n’igice y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Igitekerezo cyo gushinga umuryango uhiriwemo n’aba baririmbyi b’abagore cyazanwe na Tonzi wavuze ko kigamije guca burundu akajagari mu gucuruza ibihangano by’abahanzi nta burenganzira.
Indi ntego ‘All In One Gospel Ladies’ igamije ni uguha imbaraga abahanzi mu byiciro byose kuva ku bakizamuka kugeza ku bamaze gukomera bityo ngo bose barusheho gushinga imizi kandi babone amafaranga afatika.
Ku itariki 05 Werurwe 2017 nibwo hateganyijwe igitaramo cya 2 kizahuza aba bahanzikazi aribo: Aline Gahongayire, Diana Kamugisha, Pastor Rose Ngabo, Assumpta uzwi ndirimbo ‘Satura ijuru’, Alice Tonny, Giselle Phanny, Karen, Rachel Rwibasira, Pastor Jackie Mugabo, Gabi Kamanzi ndetse na Tonzi ari na we wagize igitekerezo cyo gutangiza iri tsinda.
Iki gitaramo kizabera kuri ‘Ubumwe Grande Hotel’ iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati.
Kwinjira bizaba ari 10.000 FRW ndetse na 5.000 FRW.
Tonzi yatangarije rwandamagazine.com ko intego yabo ikomeye ari ukuzamurana kw’abahanzikazi hagati yabo.
Ati “ Nkuko dukora Edition ya mbere , twari twemereye abantu ko hazabaho niya 2, iya 3,. ubu tugiye gukora edition ya 2 kandi n’izindi zizaza kandi buri yose izajya iba ifite umwihariko.
Kizaba ari igitaramo gikomeye kuko twese hamwe twariteguye bihagije kandi abazaza tuzafatanyiriza hamwe kuramya no guhimbaza Imana mu buryo bwimbitse.
“ Yunzemo ati “ Intego ya mbere nuguhura tugahuza impano zacu turamya Imana, tuzamura icyubahiro cy’Imana, tugashyigikirana mu mpano Imana yaduhaye kuko tuziko ’Unity is power’.

Evangelical Restoration Church (ERC) Kimisagara yahanze ikoranabuhanga rizajya rifasha abakirisitu kwiyandikisha bakoresheje telefoni ngendanwa, ku buryo habayeho ibyago by’uko hari abandura COVID-19, gushakisha abageze mu rusengero byakoroha.
Umwe mu bayobozi ba ERC Pasiteri Kaberuka Célestin yavuze ko bashyizeho ikoranabuhanga rizatuma umukristo yiyandikisha akiri iwe mu rugo bijyanye n’umubare w’abakirwa mu iteraniro rimwe, agahabwa ubutumwa bumubwira niba iteraniro ashaka kujyamo rikirimo umwanya, niba umubare wagenwe wuzuye ajye mu rikurikiyeho.
Mu butumwa azabona amaze kwiyandikisha harimo n’icyicaro cye mu rusengero.
Ayo makuru y’abantu biyandikisha kandi azajya abikwa n’urusengero, ku buryo bibaye ngombwa ko akenerwa n’inzego z’ubuzima yaboneka.

Uburyo twabiteguye, mbere bakiri iwabo bazajya biyandika bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga, abantu nibamara kuzura 500 ba mbere bihagarare binjire mu iteraniro rya kabiri.
Irya kabiri nirigera mu bantu 1000 nabwo bihagarare, binjire mu rya gatatu bityo bityo."
Pasiteri Kaberuka yavuze ko bakabaye batangiye amateraniro kuri iki Cyumweru nk’abandi, ariko bifuje ko babanza kwigisha abayoboke iby’iryo koranabuhanga, ku buryo ku Cyumweru gitaha nabo bazasubukura.
Bitewe n’iri koranabuhanga, umuntu azava mu rugo igisigaye ari ugupimwa umuriro, gukaraba intoki no kwerekana ubutumwa bugufi yahawe kuri telefoni bugaragaza iteraniro ajemo n’icyicaro cye.
Umuyobozi Nshingwabikorwa w’Akarere ka Nyarugenge, Ngabonziza Emmy yasuye urwo rusengero kuri uyu wa 18 Nyakanga 2020, ashima iryo koranabuhanga.
Ati "Mu nsegero tumaze gusura twasanzemo n’urwa Restoration Church bakaba bari gutegura n’uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu kwemerera abakristo babo kuza gusenga, kandi bikorohereza inzego za leta kuba zagenzura abaje gusenga n’igihe bahasengeye, ku buryo haramutse habonetse n’ikibazo bishobora koroha kumenya aho yari yicaye n’abari bamwegereye ndetse bikorohereza n’abayoboke kuba ataza ngo asange huzuye.”
Mu Karere ka Nyarugenge kabarizwamo ERC Kimisagara, raporo yo mu Mirenge yako yerekana ko kugeza ku wa 18 Nyakanga 2020 insengero 36 mu zigera ku 111 zimaze kuzuza ibisabwa, ngo zemererwe gutangira gukora.
Izindi ziracyitegura.

Miliyoni 52 zagiye ku nyubako, amamashini yatumijwe mu Bushinwa n'ibikoresho by'ibanze bizaba bikoreshwa mu gihe cy'amezi 6; nk'uko bitangazwa na Batamuliza Liliane ukuriye iyo mpuzamakoperative igizwe n'amakoperative 5 yibanda ku bikorwa by'ubuhinzi.

#6092#	4	health	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Ubuzima/article/Abamontari-babiri-basanzwe-baranduye-Coronavirus-bateye-impungenge
Abamotari babiri basanzwe baranduye Coronavirus bateye impungenge Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin yavuze ko abamotari babiri babonetse kuri iki Cyumweru baranduye Coronavirus bahangayikishije cyane asaba abantu kwitwararika kugira ngo moto zitaba ikiraro cyo gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda yatangaje ko kuri iki Cyumweru hagaragaye abantu bashya batandatu banduye Coronavirus mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu gihe I Rusizi habonetse 18 naho ku mupaka wa Rusumo haboneka babiri.
Muri rusange abarwayi babonetse kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 21 Kamena 2020, ni 26 mu bipimo 3,252.
Mu barwayi batandatu bagaragaye mu Mujyi wa Kigali harimo babiri bakora imirimo yo gutwara abantu kuri moto naho abandi bane ni abafite aho bahuriye n’abandi barwayi bari baragaragaye ubushize.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC gitangaza ko abatwara za moto bagaragaye mu buryo bwo gupima bwari bumaze iminsi itanu hapimwa abantu benshi ngo hamenyekane niba iki cyorezo kidakomeje gukwirakwira.
Umuyobozi wa RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, yavuze ko abamotari babiri bagaragaweho Coronavirus bateye inkeke aho abaturage n’abamotari muri rusanga basabwe kwitwararika ngo bataba ikiraro gikwirakwiza Coronavirus.
Yagize ati “Nibo bahangayikishije cyane kuko ni icyiciro cyafunguriwe imirimo nyuma y’ibindi byose ku buryo rero biduhangayikishije mu buryo bwo kuvuga ngo izi moto turi kugendaho tugomba kwitwararika cyane ngo zitaba ikiraro cyo gukwirakwiza Coronavirus.”
Dr Nsanzimana yabwiye RBA ko ubu igikurikiyeho ari ugushakisha hakarebwa aho aba bamotari bakuye icyorezo ndetse no kumenya abo bashobora kuba baratwaye cyangwa barahuye nabo n’ubwo bigoye.
Yakomeje agira ati “Icyo dusaba Abanyarwanda ni uko abagenda kuri za moto n’abakora indi mirimo gukurikiza amabwiriza ni ingenzi kuko ntumenya niba ugutwaye ataba afite ubwo burwayi atanabizi kuko abenshi ntan’ibimenyetso bari kugaragaza.”
Dr Nsanzimana avuga ko n’ubwo icyorezo bigaragara ko tuzabana nacyo igihe kirekire ariko kwirinda ikwirakwira ryacyo birashoboka Amabwiriza yashyizweho n’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere (RURA) ku wa 3 Kamena 2020, ubwo serivisi zo gutwara abantu kuri moto zasubukurwaga, asaba abamotari n’abagenzi kwitwaza imiti y’isuku yabugenewe (Hand-Sanitizers) kugirango basukure intoki na casques mbere y’urugendo.
Abamotari n’abagenzi bagomba kuba bafite Agatambaro ko kwambara imbere y’ingofero (Casques).
Abamotari n’abagenzi kandi bagomba kwambara udupfukamunwa uko bikwiye nk’uko biteganywa n’amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’ubuzima ndetse abantu bose bashishikarizwa kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu kwishyura.
Dr Nsanzimana avuga ko kuba abamotari batangiye kugaragaraho iki cyorezo bishoboka cyane ko hagiye kubaho ikwirakwira ryihuse rya Coronavirus cyane ko baba batwara abantu benshi mu gihe gito cyane.
Ati “Uko urujya n’uruza rw’abantu rwiyongera hirya no hino mu Rwanda, biroroshye cyane ko abantu bavana uburwayi ahantu babujyana ahandi.
Ariko biroroshye cyane kuko dufite uburyo bwo kwirinda aribwo bwo kubahiriza neza amabwiriza yashyizweho.”
Icyizere I Rusizi?
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko kuri ubu mu mibare bigaragara ko akarere ka Rusizi ariko gakomeje kuza imbere mu bwandu bwa Coronavirus cyane ko nko mu barwayi 26 bagaragaye kuri iki Cyumweru 18 ari ab’I Rusizi.
Yakomeje avuga ko bigaragara ko hari ibiri kugerwaho kuko nk’aba 18 bagaragaye ku Cyumweru, batatu muri bo ni abanyarwanda bari baratahutse, mu gihe abandi bane ari ababana n’umwe wari wagaragaye mu minsi ishize mu gihe abandi 11 ari ababonetse ahantu hibasiwe muri aka karere ka Rusizi.
Ati “Haracyari kare kugira ngo tuvuge ko icyorezo mu Karere ka Rusizi kiri kugabanyuka, abaturage barasabwa kubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho kuko twabonaga ko hari abatazikurikiza nk’abo tubona bajya gusura ababo ndetse n’abagerageza kuva muri Rusizi bajya ahandi.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Muby’ukuri ingamba dufite n’ibipimo byinshi biri gufatwa ndetse na guma mu rugo iri I Rusizi, twizeye ko mu minsi iri imbere ibipimo biza kugabanyuka ndetse n’ababa barahuye n’ubu burwayi bagatangira gukira.”
Icyorezo tuzabana nacyo igihe kirekire Icyorezo cya COVID19 giterwa n’agakoko gashya ka Coronavirus cyageze mu Rwanda ku wa 13 Werurwe 2020, ubwo habonekaga umurwayi wa mbere.
Kuva icyo gihe abantu 111,257 nibo bamaze gupimwa aho muri bo abagera kuri 728 bamaze kwandura iki cyorezo mu gihe abandi 359 aribo bamaze gukira naho abakirwaye ni 367.
Abantu babiri nibo bamaze guhitanwa n’iki cyorezo ku butaka bw’u Rwanda.
Iminsi igera mu 100 ishize icyorezo kigeze mu Rwanda igaragaza ko abanyarwanda bazabana nacyo igihe kirekire, aho basabwa kubahiriza amabwiriza n’ingamba byashyizweho ku nyungu zabo n’izabandi.

#6105#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/kuki-afurika-ariwo-mugabane-uzahazwa-n-ibyorezo-bikomeye-kurusha-ahandi
Kuki Afurika ariwo mugabane uzahazwa n’ibyorezo bikomeye kurusha ahandi?
Uko umwaka ushira undi ukaza niko hirya no ku Isi havuka ibyorezo bihitana ubuzima bw’abatari bake, kimwe mu bikomeje kuvugwa ubu ni Ebola ikomeje kuyogoza Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Nubwo ibi byorezo bivuka ku Isi, muri iki gihe nta mugabane ugaragaramo ibi byorezo nka Afurika, nk’uko n’ikinyamakuru NBC cyabitangaje.
Kivuga ko akenshi biterwa n’imiyoborere itanoze ikunze kugaragara kuri uyu mugabane, ubuvuzi butaratera imbere no kutagira ingamba zihamye zishobora gukumira cyangwa guhashya icyorezo runaka cyavutse.
Isi muri rusange yagiye yibasirwa n’ibyorezo bikomeye, ikizwi cyane ni icyiswe Spanish Flu cyangwa Flu of 1918, iki ni icyorezo cyadutse nyuma y’intambara ya mbere y’Isi.
Ibitangazamakuru bivuga ko mu mateka y’Isi iki gishobora kuba aricyo cyorezo cyishe umubare w’abantu utari muke kuko bari hagati ya miliyoni 50-100.
Impamvu iki cyorezo ngo cyakwirakwiye vuba ni abasirikare bari bavuye mu ntambara ya mbere y’Isi bajya mu bihugu byabo bagenda bagikwirakwiza.
Nyuma yo kubona ibi byorezo bikomeza kugenda bibibasira, ibihugu cyane cyane iby’i Burayi byafashe ingamba zikomeye zirimo gukora imiti, gukora inkingo no gufata ingamba zikomeye zibihashya.
Afurika yo kugeza ubu ikomeje guhura n’ibibazo birimo Ebola, Malaria na virusi itera Sida.
Kuva mu 1976 abahanga nibwo bavumbuye Virusi ya Ebola muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ku mugezi wa Ebola, uherereye mu Majyaruguru y’iki gihugu.
Kuva icyo gihe iki cyorezo cyakomeje kuyogoza Afurika gusa cyibukwa cyane mu 2014 ubwo kibasiraga ibihugu birimo, Liberia, Guinea, Sierra Leone, Nigeria, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Mali.
Abantu barenga ibihumbi 11 nibo bapfuye gusa mu mezi 21.
Nubwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigaragara mu bihugu byagezweho na Ebola muri uwo mwaka, mu bantu 11 bari bayanduye nabwo bayikuye muri Afurika, babiri nibo bapfuye, ibi byatewe n’ubuvuzi bwateye imbere buri muri iki gihugu.
Kugeza ubu ibihugu birimo u Rwanda bikomeje gufata ingamba zikomeye nyuma yaho muri Kanama 2018 nabwo Ebola yongeye kugaragara mu Burasirazuba bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, kugeza ubu abarenga 1400 ikaba imaze kubahitana.
Afurika si wo mugabane wibasirwa gusa Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ushinzwe Ubuzima rusange, Dr.
Ndimubanzi Patrick, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari ibyorezo koko muri Afurika ariko ko hari n’ibindi usanga biri ku yindi migabane.
Yagize ati “Niba mwibuka neza hari ibyorezo no mu bindi bice by’Isi, ikibazo kiba cyane muri Afurika ni ingamba ziba zititeguye zo guhangana nabyo.
Ubu niyo mpamvu turimo gushyiramo imbaraga mu gutegura uburyo dushobora gusubiza kuri icyo cyorezo.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ebola yabaye mu bihugu by’amahanga mu Budage yarahabaye no muri Amerika ariko bisaba kuba ufite uburyo bwiza, waba ugize umurwayi umwe cyangwa babiri ukabavura bagakira.”
Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) mu Rwanda, Dr Kasonde Mwinga, we yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi byorezo bitari muri Afurika gusa ahubwo igikenewe ni ukubirwanya.
Ati “Njye ndatekereza ko ibi byorezo bitari gusa ku mugabane wa Afurika, uyu munsi ni Ebola iri ku mugabane wa Afurika ariko turabona no mu tundi duce tw’Isi ahari ibindi byorezo, icyangombwa ni ukubirwanya no gufata ingamba zihamye.”
Ibibazo by’umutekano muke, ubukene, urwego rw’ubuvuzi rutaratera imbere, politiki zidahamye zo guhangana n’ibyorezo, ni impamvu zikomeye zituma Afurika izahazwa nabyo kurusha ahandi.
Inzobere mu by’ubuzima zivuga ko guhangana n’ibi byorezo bivuka umunsi ku munsi, bisaba guhuza kw’ibihugu no gushyiraho politike ihamye ku buryo iba yiteguye guhangana n’icyorezo kivutse kitagombye kumara umubare w’abaturage bafashwe.
Ebola na virusi itera Sida ni bimwe mu byorezo bikomeje kuzahaza Afurika

Rayon Sport itsinzwe na Police, APR itwara igikombe idakinnye Ku munsi wa 25 wa shampiyona, ikipe ya Rayon Sport itsinzwe na Police 2-1 naho APR FC itwara igikombe idakinnye nyuma y'uko Gicumbi ihagaritse As Kigali banganya 0-0.
Umukino wabereye ku Kicukiro Rayon Sport Police yari yakiriye Rayon Sport amakipe zombi zari zararangije gukura amaso ku gikombe cya shambiyona kuko amakipe aziri imbere yari yarazisizeho amanota menshi.
Ibi byatumye n'umukino utagaragaza ubukana bwinshi haba mu bakinnyi ndetse no mu bafana.
Mu kibuga amakipe yatangiye akina umupira woroheje agacishamo agasatirana cyane cyane ku ruhande rwa Police ariko ishyaka ryo kurangiriza imipira mu izamu ngo ibitego biboneke rikabura.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0 , mu gice cya 2 nibwo Police yaje ihindura umukino itsinda igitego ariko ibyishimo byayo ntibyatinze kuko Rayon Sport yahise igaruka mu mukino maze Fuad Ndayisenga atsinda igitego acenze ba myugariro ba Police.
Amakipe yose yakomeje gukina asatirana ariko Rayon Sport ikagaragaza ko yigaranzuye Police.
Gusa umutoza Kasa yaje gushyiramo kapiteni we Tuyisenge Jack wari umaze igihe mu mvune ahindura umukino atsinda igitego cya kabiri.
Umutoza Kayiranga Baptiste yavuze ko nubwo atsinzwe nacyo yanenga abakinnyi be kuko bakoze ibyo bagombaga gukora ariko hakabura amahirwe.
Kayiranga yavuze ko ntacyo Police yabarushije ngo uretse ko bakoze ikosa rimwe ryatumye batsindwa igitego cya 2.
Mugenzi we Kasa Mbungo Andrew nawe yavuze ko amakipe yombi yakinnye umukino mwiza wo gusatirana ariko ikipe ikarusha Rayon Sport amahirwe yo kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yabonye.
Umutoza Kasa kandi yavuze ko abakinnyi be bahushije ibitego byinshi mu gice cya mbere bakabaye barangije umukino hakiri kare.
Undi mukino wabaye uyu munsi ni ikipe ya As Kigali yanganyije n'ikipe ya Gicumbi 0-0 binatuma APR bari bahanganiye igikombe ihita icyegukana bidasubirwaho nubwo yo izakina ejo.
Ku geza ubu As Kigali yagize amanota 46 mu gihe APR ifite amanota 51 mu gihe isigaranye imikino 2 As Kigali isigaranye 1.

#6111#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/gucunga-umutekano-neza-byabahesheje-imodoka-ya-miliyoni-32rwf
Gucunga umutekano neza byabahesheje imodoka ya miliyoni 32RWF Umurenge wa Remera wegukanye imodoka itangwa n'Umujyi wa Kigali ufatanije na Polisi y'Igihugu, nyuma yo kurusha isuku n'umutekano indi mirenge.
Umurenge wa Remera wahembwe imodoka Uyu murenge wahawe imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Mahindra ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 32 RWf.
Mu kwezi kw'Ukuboza 2016 nibwo batoranyijwe nk'abahize abandi, ariko imodoka bahawe itahwa ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa 06 Mutarama 2017.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Remera, Kalisa Jean Sauveur, avuga ko iki gihembo bagikesha abaturage bakorana n'ubuyobozi, ndetse n'irondo rikoranywe umwuga.
Yagize ati"Uyu murenge ufite abaturage bumva, ufite abafatanyabikorwa barimo abakora isuku neza; tunafite irondo ry'umwuga ryubakitse kandi habaho guhuza ibikorwa".
Akomeza agira ati "Isuku n'umutekano twabigize ubuzima bwa buri munsi.
Irondo rirahembwa kandi rifite ibikoresho; hari ibintu byinshi byibwa bikazanwa muri Remera, ariko turabifata tukabishyikiriza Polisi, nayo ikabiha ba nyirabyo".
Umuturage witwa Mukabaranga Anne-Marie, ni umwe mu bavuga ko bishimiye imodoka izajya ibatabara, igihe hari nk'ukeneye ubufasha bwo kujyanwa kwa muganga.
Ati "Iyi nanjye ndayikesha kuba mbyuka buri munsi ngakora isuku ahantu hose, nta macupa n'indi myanda wasanga mu muhanda".
Kabogoza Innocent, umukuru w'umudugudu w'Urumuri muri Rukili ya mbere, aremeza ko irondo ryabo ryiyubaha kandi rihembwa neza, ku buryo ngo nta birarane ubuyobozi bubafitiye.
Umurenge wa Remera wari usanganwe imodoka imwe ishinzwe irondo n'isuku, ariko ngo iya kabiri yabonetse izayunganira mu bikorwa bya Leta no gutabara abaturage.
Igihembo nk'iki Umujyi wa Kigali na Polisi bagitanga buri mwaka ku murenge wahize indi muri Kigali, mu bijyanye n'isuku n'umutekano.

Bugesera: Imvura ivanze n'umuyaga yasambuye amazu 45 Imvura yiganjemo amahindu n'umuyaga mwinshi yasakambuye amazu 45 ndetse inangiza ibintu byinshi birimo imyaka nk'ibigori, insina n'ibindi bitandukanye mu Kagari ka Maranyundo mu Murenge wa Nyamata mu Karere ka Bugesera.
Iyi mvura yaguye ku mugoroba wo kuwa 18/01/2015 hagati ya saa kumi n'imwe n'igice na saa kumi n'ebyiri.
Umukozi ushinzwe iterambere n'imibereho myiza mu Kagari ka Maranyundo, Rwamucyo Janvier avuga ko kuri ubu ibyangijwe bikirimo kubarurwa kuko bitaramenyekana byose.
Agira ati "gusa nko mu mudugudu wa Rusagara honyine harabarurwa urutoki rungana na hegitari 4 rwaguye insina zikaba zarambaraye zose, ibyo bikiyongeraho ibigori byari mu murima ariko naba nabyo kuko byo byari byeze kuko ba nyirabyo ntabwo bahombye".
Imwe mu mazu yasambuwe n'imvura ivanze n'umuyaga mwinshi.
Rwamucyo avuga ko muri ayo mazu yasambutse amaze kubarurwa agera kuri 14 niyo ibisenge byayo byangiritse cyane ku buryo ba nyirayo bibasaba gushaka irindi sakaro rishya.
"Turashimira abaturage batangirijwe amazu n'imvura kuko bahutiye gucumbikira bagenzi babo bakabona aho barambika umusaya.
Kuri ubu hakaba harimo gukorwa raporo kugira ngo igezwe ku murenge no ku karere kugira ngo abo baturage babashe gufashwa bihuse kuko bigaragara ko ntako bamwe bameze," Rwamucyo.
Mu gitondo cyo kuwa 19/01/2015 abaturage babyutse batoragura ndetse banasubiranya ibyo imvura yasigaje kugira ngo barebe uko basana amazu yabo.
Amazu yasenyutse mu buryo butandukanye.
Hari bamwe basabwa gushaka isakaro bundi bushya.
Sekamana Pierre, umwe mubasenyewe n'imvura aravuga ko yaguye batayiteguye kuko bagiye kubona bakabona haje umuyaga mwinshi uhita ukurikirwa n'imvura irimo inkuba zakubitaga cyane.
Akomeza agira ati "turasaba ubuyobozi ko bwadufasha kuko muri twe hari abadafite isakaro rindi kuko amabati amwe imvura yayashwanyaguje, none ubu tukaba twibaza uko twabigenza".
Iyo mvura yamaze igihe kingana n'iminota nka 40 ariko ibyo yangije bikaba ari byinshi n'ubu bikibarurwa.
Iyi mvura kandi yanasenye amazu mu Kagari ka Mayange, aho hamaze kubarurwa inzu 2 ndetse n'ibikoni 6 mu mudugudu wubakiwe abanyarwanda birukanwe mu gihugu cya Tanzaniya.

Muhanga: Abantu umunani bahitanywe n'imvura Abaturage umunani bo mu mirenge ya Nyabinoni, Rongi na Mushishiro mu Karere ka Muhanga bahitanywe n'ibiza by'imvura.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Muhanga, Uwamaliya Beatrice, avuga ko imvura yaguye mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa 08 Gicurasi 2016 yateje inkangu zisenya amazu agwira abantu barapfa, aho Umurenge wa Nyabinoni ubarurwamo batanu, Rongi abantu babiri, naho Mushishiro hagapfa imwe.
Abaturage b'i Muhanga batuye mu manegeka baramagarirwa kwimuka vuba ngo barengere ubuzima bwabo.
Abana bane bo mu Murenge wa Nyabinoni baraye bashyinguwe kuko ababo babuze uko bararana imirambo yabo aho bahungiye, mu gihe umwana umwe w'umwaka n'igice w'i Nyabinoni we yakomeje kuburirwa irengero kuko ngo yatwawe na Nyabarongo.
Abantu babiri bo mu Murenge wa Rongi bo barashyigurwa kuri uyu wa 09 Gicurasi 2016 hamwe n'uwo w'i Mushishiro, mu gihe ubutabazi bwo bukomeje hifashishwa inzego z'umutekano zirimo abasirikare na Polisi bari gufasha mu bikorwa byo kwimura abaturage bakiri mu manegeka.
Ubuyobozi bw'Akarere ka Muhanga bwatangarije Kigali Today ko amazu asaga 30 na yo yangiritse, ndetse na Ha zisaga z'imyaka 100 zirangirika, hapfa kandi amwe mu matungo magufi n'amaremare yatwawe n'imvura, imihanda igana Rongi na Kabacuzi irangirika ku buryo bitoroshye kujyayo n'imodoka.
Akarere ka Muhanga kagaragaza ko abaturage bagituye amanegeka basabwa bose kwimuka kugira ngo barengere ubuzima mu gihe hategerejwe ko mu Mpeshyi bazakomeza ibikorwa by'ubwubatsi ku bazimuka.
Ubuyobozi buvuga ko ahakenewe ubufasha buri gutegurwa, aho bizaba ngombwa hakitabazwa Minisiteri ishinzwe Ibiza, ariko ko n'abaturage bakaba bagomba gushyiraho akabo.

Nyundo: Bamurikiwe ivuriro rishya nyuma y'iryangijwe na Sebeya Ubuyobozi bwa Diyosezi gaturika ya Nyundo bwamurikiye abaturage n'ubuyobozi ikigo nderabuzima gishya nyuma y'uko icyari gisanzwe cyangijwe n'umugezi wa Sebeya.
Kuva Gicurasi 2010 nibwo ikigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo cyangijwe n'amazi biba ngombwa ko hashakwa ahandi hakwimurirwa serivisi z'ubuvuzi zahatangirwaga, aho hakodeshejwe inzu y'umuturage ariko nabwo serivisi zose ntizishobore kuhatangirwa.
Izi nyubako zamuritswe nyuma y'imyaka isaga ine icyigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo cyarasenyutse.
Nk'uko bamwe mu baturage bari basanzwe bivuza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo babitangaza, ngo n'ubwo cyari cyiza bakiganaga bafite ubwoba ko Sebeya yakibasangamo kuko iyo amazi yazaga inyubako zose zuzuraga amazi.
Inyubako zamuritswe kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 6/10/2014 zubatswe mu mezi 19 zitwaye amafaranga y'u Rwanda angana na miliyoni 440 yatanzwe n'abaterankunga batandukanye barimo umushinga wo mu gihugu cy'Ubudage witwa Mizereor, umushinga wo mu gihugu cy'Ububiligi witwa Ingobyi hamwe na Minisiteri y'ubuzima mu Rwanda.
Musenyeri Habiyambere n'abandi bayobozi bataha ku mugaragaro inyubako z'ikigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo.
Musenyeri wa Diyoseze ya Nyundo, Dr Habiyambere Aléxis avuga ko ivuriro rya Nyundo mu mwaka wa 2010 ryitaga k'ubuzima bw'abaturage ibihumbi 50, harimo ubuzima bw'abanyeshuri biga ku mashuri ya Nyundo bagera ku bihumbi 3.
Musenyeri Habiyambere asaba abaturage kwitabira gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro hakoreshejwe uburyo bwa gakondo bigafasha no kwirinda virusi itera Sida.
Inyubako z'ikigo nderabuzima cya Nyundo zari zangijwe n'umugezi wa Sebeya muri Gicurasi, 2010.
Uretse kuba Diyoseze ya Nyundo yarafashe iya mbere mu kubaka ivuriro ryangijwe n'umugezi wa Sebeya, yatanze n'ikibanza kizubakwamo urwibutso ruzimurirwamo imibiri yari mu rwibutso rwa Nyundo narwo rwangijwe n'amazi, akarere ka Rubavu kakaba gatangaza ko kamaze kubona amafaranga n'ubwo kataratangira ibikorwa byo kubaka.
Sylidio Sebuharara

#6145#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/amazina/article/uwicyeza-izina-rikomoka-mu-mihango-yo-kwera-no-kwirabura
Uwicyeza, izina rikomoka mu mihango yo kwera no kwirabura Uwicyeza ni izina rya gikobwa, rivuga ufite uburanga cyangwa se umuntu mwiza.
Ibisobanuro byimbitse Icyeza ni ijambo rifite inyito ebyiri mu kinyarwanda.
Iya mbere ni uko bivuga amabengeza, ikintu cyiza cyane.
Ibyo bisobanuye ko Uwicyeza byaba bivuga ufite uburanga buhebuje cyangwa Iribagiza.
Inyito ya kabiri ikomoka mu mihango yo kwera no kwirabura.
Iyo abantu biraburaga (kujya mu kiriyo) birabaga ivu (kwisigaga ivu).
Igihe rero cyo kwera bakiraba ingwa cyangwa se bakisiga ingwa byerekana ko batakiri mu cyunamo.
Uwayoboraga imihango yo kwera yitwaga umuhunguravu cyangwa icyeza.
Umwanzuro Duhereye kuri ibi bisobanuro byombi ko Uwicyeza bijyana n’ibisobanuro by’icyeza bivuga Iribagiza cyangwa ubwiza buhebuje.
Uwicyeza rero ni Nyaburanga, Mwiza utagira uko asa.
Bishobora no kuvuga ukunze kuyobora Imihango yo kwera cyangwa yo gusoza ikiriyo.
Ibi bisobanuro byatanzwe n’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco, RALC

Miss Akiwacu Colombe agiye gufasha abatishoboye kubakirwa inzu ya miliyoni 15 Mbere y'uko hatorwa Miss Rwanda 2015 uzasimbura Akiwacu Colombe, uyu mukobwa wabaye Nyampinga w'u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2014 yagaragaje ko agikomeje ibikorwa byateza imbere igihugu bikazamura n'imibereho myiza y'abaturage, ubu abatishoboye bakaba bagiye kubakirwa inzu ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 15 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda babikesha uyu Miss Rwanda Akiwacu Colombe.
Iki nicyo gishushanyo mbonera cy'inzu yatangiye kubakwa bigizwemo uruhare Miss Colombe Izi nshike zari zisanzwe ziba mu nzu zenda kuzabagwa hejuru ariko bagiye kuba mu nzu ijyanye n'igihe Nk'uko uyu mukobwa yabishimangiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n'umunyamakuru wa Umuryango.rw, yashatse inkunga mu bigo bitandukanye afatanyije n'umuryango w'abana barokotse Jenoside, kuri iyo nkunga babasha kubona ubushobozi bwo gutangira kubakira inshike za Jenocide inzu igezweho kandi ijyanye n'igihe izatwara miliyoni cumi n'eshanu z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda.
N'ubwo agiye kubona umusimbura ku mwanya wa Miss Rwanda, Akiwacu Colombe akomeje ibikorwa byo kwita ku bababaye Iyi nzu igezweho, n'ubwo ari imwe ariko yubatse mu buryo yifitemo inzu ebyeri, ikaba ifite ibyumba bitandatu n'ubwiherero n'ubwogero bubiri bwo mu nzu, ikaba izabamo abantu bane b'inshike.
Umuhango wo kuyitangiza ku mugaragaro wabaye tariki 3 Gashyantare 2015, bikaba biteganyijwe ko izarangira mu kwezi kwa Kanama uyu mwaka.
Miss Colombe agiye gufasha abatishoboye kubona inzu ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 15 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda Nk'uko Miss Colombe yakomeje abitangaza, babonye inkunga zitandukanye z'abantu ku giti cyabo ndetse n'ibigo n'amakompanyi atandukanye nka Ets MubiligiPaul, Ets Harijit, Comeka, Petrocom, Simba Cement ndetse banafashwa n'Intara y'Uburasirazuba kugera kuri iki gikorwa cy'inzu irimo kubakwa ahitwa i Bwiza mu murenge wa Kigabiro ho mu karere ka Rwamagana.

#6216#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/ubuhamya-umugore-wubatse-aravuga-amakosa-abagabo-banga
UBUHAMYA: Umugore wubatse aravuga amakosa abagabo banga Ubu ni uhamya bw’umugore yageneye bagenzi be abereka amakosa abagabo banga n’inama zabafasha kubaka neza urugo. – “njye sinicuza kuba narashatse mubyukuri njye nashatse umugabo unyorohereza cyane”. – “ hari n ‘ayandi makosa nagiye nkora mu rugo rwanjye iyo nza kuyamenya ntari gukora kuko kenshi turisenyera tutabizi ugasanga byose turabigereka ku bagabo”.
Umugore wubatse ufite abana babiri.
Abifuza gushaka bakwiye gushaka batagendeye ku marangamutima gusa.
Usanga abakobwa benshi bavuga ngo kanaka nubwo ambabaza ndamukunda!
Ugasanga umuntu arihambira ku wundi ngo bamaranye igihe.Ngo ubu se abantu bazabifata gute ntandukanye nawe?
Ukajya kubana n’ umuntu ubibona ko harimo ibibazo.
Nitanzeho urugero njye nari narishyizemo ngo umuhungu tuzakundana bwa mbere niwe tuzabana,rwa rukundo rwo mu bitabo.
Ariko siko byaje kugenda kuko yarampemukiye kumureka birangora.
Kuva ubwo mfata decision ko igihe cyose ntarasezerana n’ umuntu atazantera stress.
Uwo wa mbere twamaranye umwaka ,abandi twamaranaga amezi abiri ,icyumweru, gutyo gutyo, nkahita mbasezerera.
Kugeza ubwo mpuye nuwo nifuzaga ariwe mugabo wanjye.
Inshuti zanjye zakundaga kumbwira ngo nta rukundo ngira.
Igisubizo cyanjye nuko nari narahisemo ko aho kugira amarangamutima azambabaza nyuma nagira control mu rukundo hakiri kare.
Ibi bintu abagore benshi barabikora kandi bibangamira abagabo.
Communication/dialogue (kuganira) Iyo muri muri fiancaille (kurambagizanya), umugabo aca bugufi cyane kubera ko aba ashaka umugore,umukobwa agakora ibyo ashatse nibidahwitse umugabo akihangana.
Urugero abagabo ntibakunda abantu babaca mu ijambo, abagore bahora bavuga amagambo menshi niyo umugabo yaba ari nko gukora report mu rugo,bari kureba emission/umupira bakunda… Abagabo ntibakunda abagore babaca mu ijambo; ugasanga icyo umugabo avuze buri gihe uramuburanya iza ngo turwane rimwe na rimwe utabanje kumwumva.
Abagabo bakunda abagore bari social ariko not too much (abagore bazi kubana ariko bitari agakungu).
Comparaison(kugereranya) dukora tuvuga ngo mbere byagenda gutya none siko bikimeze.Abagore baba bibeshya ko uko mwari mumeze muri fiancaille ko ariko bizahora!
Never never.
Better expecting some changes. ( siko bikora ukwiye kumenya ko hari ibihinduka).
Guhora ugereranya urugo rwanyu n’abandi si byiza.
Kumva ko umugore mugenzi wawe icyo yakoze nawe ugomba kugikora ibi bisenya urugo.
Inama nagira abagore bagenzi banjye : Nibyiza kumenya gutega amatwi abagabo bacu.
Kurakazwa, n’ ubusa, guhimana no kwivumbura bagore ntibikwiye.
Umugore niwe mutima w’ urugo iyo uhorana umushiha, uvuga nabi ntacyo ushima cyangwa uri pessimiste(uhora ubona uruhande rubi rw’ibintu) umugabo araguhunga.
Iyo agukoreye ikosa rimwe ukihangana ugaca bugufi ikindi gihe ntiyongera.
Ariko iyo uhanganye kakubaho.
“Jye nahinduye byinshi none ubu ndi umwamikazi.Nta na rimwe njya mbwira umugabo wanjye ngo ahinduke.
Iyo mpinduye ikintu kibi muri jye, feedback iba nziza.”
Mbere ya byose ufata umwanya wo kubitekerezaho ,ugatecyereza n’uburyo uzabimubwira.
Kwicupiza nabyo birasenya bagore mukwiye kubyirinda Abagore benshi bumva ko kubyibuha aricyo gituma umugabo atamwitaho.
Aha baribeshya cyane.
Iyo kwumvikana ari guke mu mibanire yanyu impamvu ingana ururo; Menya ko iyo ufata neza umugabo morarement ibindi ntabibona ndetse niyo hari ikitagenda afata umwanya wo kugutega amatwi ; Kubana ni urugendo.
Kandi gushwana mu bashakanye nabyo ni byiza.
Surtout mukibana kuko iyo mwicaye mugacyemura icyatumye mushana neza bibaha umurongo ngenderaho ariko iyo mutabikemuye kare muba mufite ibibazo bikomeye.
Gufata neza umugabo bivuga iki?
Hari igihe ibyo wita kumufata neza ataribyo we akunda.Ugomba kumenya umugabo wawe personal.Abagore benshi ngo baziko guteka neza no gusasa aribyo gufata umugabo neza!
ngo no kuryoshya mu buriri I mean.
Ibyo byose biza nyuma iyo wamaze kumenya kwishimira umugabo wawe.
Kumenya umugabo wawe … Ugomba gukora analyse y’ ikimubabaza kurusha ikindi n’ikimushimisha kurusha ikindi.
Ibanga rya mbere ni ugushima no guha agaciro ibyo akora.
Uka mu supportinga, ibyo avuga ukabyumva ukabiha agaciro.
Iyo umenye ibyo akunda ntabwo ubimubuza cyangwa ngo bihore ari impamvu y’intonganya, urugero umupira,byeri,….
Kumenya icyo akunda nicyo yanga bifata umwanya kandi kubimubaza ntabwo wabona igisubizo nyacyo kuko nawe hari igihe ataba abizi.
Kubaka urugo bitandukanye no guhindura uwo mwashakanye.
Intambwe ya mbere ni uguca bugufi Kwibwira ko ibyo uwo mwashakanye adakora neza uzamubwiriza kubihindura uba wibeshye.
Nta muntu ushobora guhundura undi,umuntu ahinduka ku bushake bwe no ku cyemezo cye bwite.
Guhindura umuntu neza ni uguhinduka wowe ubwawe nawe birangira ahindutse.
Urugero abagore benshi baba bafite code,kandi nta mutagatifu ubaho.
Niba umugabo agukoreye agakosa gato si ngombwa kugakwedura.
Jye mbona intambwe ya mbere ari ukwemera ko nawe(nk’ umugore) utari shyashya ugafata icyemezo muri wowe ko hari icyo ugomba gukora.
Intambwe ya kabiri Mbona umuntu agomba kwemera ko twese turi ibiremwa bifite defaut na qualite (ukemera ko n’ umugabo washatse ari uko) nyuma yo kwemera ibi umuntu yafata urupapuro akandikaho ibintu byose byiza umugabo yaba akora,ashoboye cyangwa se yaba yaramukoreye mu gihe cyashize iyo ubitekerezaho ubiha agaciro.
Rimwe na rimwe yakora ikintu cyiza ukakimushimira, yakubwira ibitekerezo byiza ukabishima ,ukamushyigikira.
Icyitonderwa Umugabo ntajya gushaka umugore amwanga icyo aba acyeneye ni motivation na support (umugabo akeneye ko umugore we amwubaha akanamushyigikira).
Kirazira kubwira umugabo ngo reka iki cyangwa mu gihe agukoreye ikosa ugahubuka umubwira nabi bigukundiye waceceka(aho jye n ‘amasengesho aramfasha).
Plutard mwatuje ukaba wamubwira uti”sha cheri buriya ejo bundi nari nababaye”,”buriya birambabaza iyo umuntu ambwiye ……” iyo utangiye gutyo ikiganiro cyanyu gitanga umusaruro kandi amahirwe menshi nuko umugabo yawe yirinda kongera gukora icyo kintu.
Ikindi burya patience(kwihangana no kudahubuka) ni qualite ku mugore ushaka kubaka.Ibintu byose ni pole pole.
Birangira resultats zibaye nziza.
Gusa abagabo baratandukanye.Bisaba kumenya umugabo wawe ikimubabaza ukakirinda ikimushimisha ukagikomeza.
Icyo nzi ni uko nta mugabo ukunda umugore ugira amahane,umunabi, inzika, guhubuka, incyuro, kutava ku izima n’ ibindi bisa nibi.
Strategies nziza ni torelence (kwihangana no koroherana), kwemera difference( ko mutandukanye), kubaha preferences (ibyo mugenzi wawe akunda )no self- confidence(kwigirira icyizere) nk ‘umutima w ‘urugo.
Byakiriwe bisubirwamo na Barada Clementine.
Niba nawe ufite ubuhamya wasangiza abasomyi ba Rwandamagazine.com, wakohereza ubutumwa bwawe kuri info@rwandamagazin.com

#6242#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/IJWI-RY-UMUTURAGE/article/Gatsibo-Abaturage-bigabije-amazi-y-amatungo-yabo-bagira-ngo-birwaneho
Gatsibo: Abaturage bigabije amazi y'amatungo yabo bagira ngo birwaneho Abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Kabarore mu Karere ka Gatsibo bibasiwe n'ikibazo cyo kubura amazi meza bakoresha mu buzima bwa buri munsi aho kuri ubu bavoma mu bidendezi byari byaragenewe kuhirirwamo amatungo.
Aba baturage bavuga ko kuba bakoresha aya mazi atari ukuyakunda ahubwo ni uko nta yandi babona kuko ngo kubona amariba abaha amazi meza bisa nk'inzozi kuri bo cyane ko batuye mu bice birangwamo izuba cyane, kuburyo bituma ubutaka bwakabahaye amasoko y'amazi meza bwuma vuba cyane bityo amazi meza bagaca ukubiri nayo.
Umuturage witwa Gasana Steven waganiriye na Makuruki.rw yavuze ko aho bavoma rimwe na rimwe usanga ari aho buhirira amatungo ndetse ngo hari n'abo bigora kuhabona.
Yagize ati :"Urabona ino ikibazo cy'amazi kirakabije kuko nta mazi meza dutekereza, izuba riba ryinshi bigatuma ubutaka bukama vuba ntitubone amasoko yo gukora imiyoboro y'amazi meza bityo rero tugapfa gukoresha ayo tubonye.
Biriya bidendezi tuvomamo hari ibyo usanga byadufashaga kuhirira amatungo, kandi hari n'aho bitari."
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Gatsibo Richard Gasana yadutangarije ko ikibazo cy'amazi meza mu ntara y'i burasirazuba ari icya kera ariko bikaba umwihariko mu turere twa Nyagatare na Gatsibo.
Ariko avuga ku ruhande rw'akarere ka Gatsibo abereye umuyobozi, hari ibirimo gukorwa kugira ngo imirenge itandukanye yo muri Gatsibo nibura mu myaka ibiri iri imbere izabe yabonye amazi meza.
Yagize ati: Mu mihigo y'uyu mwaka wa 2016 harimo umuyoboro w'amazi urimo kubakwa uzava i Gihengeri muri Gicumbi uzageza amazi mu mirenge 6 harimo na Kabarore, ukazongera m3 hafi 800 z'amazi."
Yakomeje agira ati:" Ubu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry'uyu muyoboro bigeze kuri 50%.
Hari n'undi mushinga uri mu nyigo ugomba kurangirana n'umwaka wa 2016 turimo gufatanyamo na WASAC wo gutunganya amazi yo mukiyaga cya Muhazi, mu byukuri iyi mishinga yombi nirangira ikibazo cy'amazi mu karere ka Gatsibo kizaba kibonewe umuti."
Ubusanzwe mu myaka itanu ishize akarere ka gatsibo kari ku kigero cya 32% by'amazi meza agera ku baturage ariko ubu hakaba hari intambwe imaze guterwa aho aka karere kamaze kugera ku gipimo cya 65% nkuko Meya Gasana abivuga, akanongeraho ko bifuza ko nibura mu mwaka wa 2016 w'imihigo bazava kuri 65% bakagera kuri 70%.
Ikibazo cy'ibura ry'amazi meza ntikihariwe n'akarere ka Gatsibo gusa kuko no mu turere dutandukanye tugize igihugu iki kibazo gikunda kumvikana cyane, ariko bikarushaho kugaragara cyane mu turere tugize intara y'i Burasirazuba.

#6250#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/isano-yo-kubandwa-no-gusenga-ubupfumu-n-ubuhanuzi-guterekera-n-abatagatifu
Isano yo kubandwa no gusenga, ubupfumu n’ubuhanuzi, guterekera no kwiyambaza abatagatifu Hari imigenzo imwe n’imwe ikorwa n’amadini n’amatorero yo muri iki gihe witegereza neza ukabona ifitanye isano n’ibyakorwaga hambere, uretse gusa ko byitwa amazina atandukanye, bigakorwa no mu buryo twakwita ko buvuguruye.
Muri iyo, twavuga kubandwa no gusenga, ubupfumu no guhanura, guterekera no kwiyambaza abatagatifuza n’ibindi.
Mu kugaragaza ayo masano twifashishije igitabo cyitwa ‘Imizi y’u Rwanda’ cy’Umwanditsi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu.
Kubandwa no Gusenga Kubandwa ko mu Rwanda rwo hambere ni kimwe no gusenga k’ubu.
Kubandwa Imana bikomoka ku nshinga kubanda ariho hava amazina nka Kabanda, Kayibanda bisobanuye komatana cyangwa kuba hamwe n’Imana.
Gusetsa Imana ni ukujya mu materaniro ahantu hamwe ni kimwe no kujya mu nsengero muri iyi minsi.
Kwatuza umuntu winjiye mu idini bwa mbere twabigereranya no kubatiza kuko imandwa zarateranaga zikaba zifite amarwa adasembuye avugirwaho amagambo batongereragau uwabaga agiye kubandwa.
Iyo babandishaga umuntu (kumwinjiza mu idini ya Ryangombe) yagira umubyara mu mandwa, yabaga ari nk’umubyeyi wa batisimu uko bimeze mu madini amwe na mwe ya gikirisitu.
Uwabanzwe bamwita ‘Uruzingo’ ni nk’umukristo naho utarabanzwe yitwaga ‘inzigo’ ni nk’umupagani w’iki gihe.
Uko imandwa zahura babaga isekurume bakayotsa, bafite n’umutsima witwa umunayo hamwe n’amarwa y’isugi (adasembuye) bakarya kandi bakanywa , ibyo bikaba bisa n’ibyo abakirisitu bakora by’ifunguro ryera uretse ko bo batarya inyama kuko muri iki gihe mu ifunguro ryera hakoreshwa divayi n’imigati ikozwe mu ifarini.
Abagaragu b’imandwa, twavuga ko muri iki ari nk’abapadiri n’abapasiteri.
Guterekera no kwiyambaza abatagatifu Kubandwa byakorwaga rimwe, ukaba winjiye mu idini.
Guterekera byahoraga bikorwa nk’uko abemera Imana bahora bagira amateraniro yo gusenga.
Guterekera: Kwari ukwiyambaza abakurambere b’ibihangange babayeho ngo babavuganire ku Mana kuko bemeraga ko nta gihanganjye cyangwa imfura zipfa, ahubwo ko bagira ahantu bajya nk’ibihangange bagiriye umumaro sosiye.
Batekerezaga ko bajya mu birunga kuko hahoraga haka umurimo cyangwa ahandi hihariye.
Ibyo rero bikagereranywa n’abanyamadini bagira igihe cyo kwiyambaza abatagatifu, kuko nabo ni abantu bapfuye ariko bafite urugero ruhanitse rwo kwemera Imana no kuyikorera.
Abo banyamadini hari abemera ko abo bantu hari ahandi bajya hatari mu ruvange aho bise muri puligatori ( ahantu hajya abantu bafite ibyaha bike).
Guterekera byakorwaga kenshi nk’uko amadini asaba abayoboke bayo gusenga iteka.
Uwaterekeraga yamurikiraga (yaragiza) abakurambere ibiri mu rugo rwe byose nk’amatungo, umugore, abana n’ibindi byose atunze.
Kimwe n’abasenga biragiza Imana badasize ibyo batunze n’ibyo Imana yabahaye byose.
Kuraguza no guhanuza Abanyarwanda cyangwa abakurambere bacu bahaga agaciro ndetse abandi baracyaha agaciro ibyavuzwe n’abapfumu n’abahanuzi.
Kujya kuraguza kwari ukujya kureba umupfumu ukamugezaho gahunda zose uteganya nawe akakurebera ko bizagenda neza.
Ni ibikorwa byakorwaga n’Abanyarwanda mbere yo kugira icyo bakora cyose ngo barebe niba bazagira intsinzi.
Ntabwo byari ubujiji nk’uko bamwe babitekereza kwari ukwiyitaho ngo bamenye uko bahagaze.
Abapfumu baraguzwagaho babaga bazwi, uwabyiyitiriraga yarahanwaga bikomeye ndetse bikagera no ku gihano cy’urupfu.
No muri Bibiliya abakiririsito bemera usangamo abahanuzi b’ukuri nka Samuel, Yeremiya, Natani, Elisa n’abandi.
Nk’uko no mu Rwanda habayeho abapfumu cyangwa abahanuzi bavuzwe nka Nyirabiyoro.
Iyo yasangaga harimo ikibazo yakubwiraga icyo ukora cyangwa se akakubuza gukora icyo kintu.
Kuri ubu usanga nabwo biriho, mu nsengero nyinshi usanga abakirisitu bashidukira kwegera abo bazi ko bahanura cyangwa berekwa ngo bababwire uko babibona.
Igitabo ‘Imizi y’u Rwanda’ kigira kiti “ Abapfumu bo mu Rwanda rwo ha mbere bari abahanuzi b’icyo gihe.”
Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu ku murongo wa telefoni ati “ No kuri ubu usanga umukobwa cyangwa umusore ndetse abantu bose mu nsengero babanza kubaza abahanuzi babo berekwa , ngo none se bigende, tubanze dusengere ubukwe mbere y’uko bubaho n’ibindi n’ibindi.”
Akomeza avuga ko atemera abahanuzi bariho ubu kuko nta gishya bavuga.
Ati “Nubwo ariko biyita ariko nta bahanuzi bakibaho, abahanuzi ntabwo bavuga ibintu bisanzwe ngo mbonye Imana ikurinze impanuka, ngo ugiye kugura imodoka.
Ibyo si ubuhanuzi kuko ubuhanuzi bwabaga bwerekeza ku gihugu n’ingaruka byagira k’umuryango mugari.”
Igitabo Imizi y’u Rwanda kigaragaza ko Abanyarwanda bari abahanga ndetse bemeraga Imana nubwo hari abatekereza ko ari ibintu bishya byazanywe n’abazungu.
Ibyo bakoraga babishyiragamo urukundo n’ukwemera gukomeye cyane ku buryo aribo bantu bakwiriye kwigiraho ugeranyije n’abakoloni baje batandukanya abanyarwanda ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko uwo mudahuje idini utamushyingira umugeni n’ibindi. igitabo ‘Imizi y’u Rwanda’ cy’Umwanditsi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu [email protected]

#6259#	0	entertainment	http://www.igihe.com/imyidagaduro/hanze/article/davido-mu-rungabangabo-nyuma-yo-gushinjwa-uruhare-mu-rupfu-rw-inshuti-ze-eshatu
Davido mu rungabangabo nyuma yo gushinjwa uruhare mu rupfu rw’inshuti ze eshatu Umuhanzi Davido amaze iminsi mu gahinda n’urungabangabo yashyizwemo no gukekwaho kugira uruhare mu rupfu rw’inshuti ze eshatu, hategerejwe ibimenyetso byo kwa muganga bizemeza icyishe abo basore.
Ni nyuma y’iminsi uyu muhanzi w’icyamamare ukomoka muri Nigeria ashyizwe mu majwi na n’umukobwa ukina filime witwa Caroline Danjuma wamushinje kugira uruhare mu rupfu rw’inshuti ye yitwa Tagbo, bari baraye basangira nyuma y’iminsi hakumvikana n’izindi nshuti ze ebyiri zapfuye mu buryo bw’amayobera.
Uwitwa Tagbo yituye hasi mu gitaramo ahita yitaba Imana, mu ijoro ry’urupfu rwe yari yabanje gusabana na Davido, bakinnye umukino wo kurushanwa kunywa inzoga nyinshi, bashyiraho igihembo ku muntu uri butsinde undi aho yagombaga guhita ahabwa iPhone 8 nubwo uwo mukino utaje kurangira.
Nyuma yo kumara amasaha basangira agatama, Davido n’abandi bari kumwe basize Tagbo mu kabyiniro, umusore bamusabye ko bajyana mu modoka ariko arabatsembera.
Nyuma yaje kwitura hasi bamujyana mu modoka ariko ashiramo umwuka mbere y’uko agezwa mu bitaro.
Danjuma wari umukunzi wa Tagbo yashinje Davido uruhare mu rupfu rwe, yanditse kuri Instagram agira ati "Davido, Tagbo ari he?
Mwari kumwe n’inshuti zawe mu ijoro ryakeye, mwambaye ingofero zihisha mu maso ngo hatagira ubavumbura nyuma y’uko apfiriye mu modoka yanyu mukamuta mu bitaro mukigendera.
Amategeko agomba gukurikizwa kuri iyi nshuro.
Ntabindi mugomba kugarura Tagbo ari muzima."
Nyuma y’igihe gito Davido ashinjwa n’abantu batandukanye kugira uruhare mu rupfu rw’iyo nshuti ye ndetse bigakekwa ko yarozwe, humvikanye indi nkuru ivuga ko izindi nshuti ebyiri z’uyu muhanzi zirimo na Dj Olu wabarizwaga mu inzu y’umuziki ya HKN n’uwitwa Chimes bitabye Imana.
Abo bombi basanzwe bapfiriye mu modoka ya Dj Olu ku Cyumweru, tariki 8 Ukwakira 2017.
Nyuma y’ibyabaye kuri izi nshuti ze eshatu mu minsi yegeranye, Davido amaze iminsi mu rungabangabo ku cyo yakora ngo yikure mu byo ashinjwa byo kugira uruhare mu rupfu rwazo.
Uyu muhanzi yanditse ubutumwa bwo kwihanganisha imiryango ndetse ahagarika kuzaririmba mu gitaramo cya Felabration cyo kwibuka Fela Kuti.
Yanditse kuri Snapchat agira ati "Iruhuko ryiza Chime, buri gihe uko twahuraga habaga hari impumeko y’ibyishimo."

David Adedeji Adeleke [Davido] w’imyaka 24 y’amavuko aza mu b’imbere bazamuye umuziki wo muri Nigeria bakabasha kuwucuruza ku rwego mpuzamahanga, yaririmbye indirimbo zizwi ndetse zakunzwe zirimo iyitwa ’Skelewu’, ’Aye’, ’Gobe’, ’Dami Duro’, ’Fall’ n’izindi zirimo iyitwa ‘Pere’ iheruka yakoranye na Young Thug n’itsinda Rae Sremmurd.

Mu bikorwa abagize AERG barimo byo gutegura Kwibuka25, bazitiye ibice bitabururwamo imibiri y’abishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, bateye ubusitani ndetse banasukura urwibutso rw’i Ruhanga mu karere ka Gasabo.

Ubuvugizi bw’inganda zibyaza umusaruro ibitoki: Isezerano PL yahaye ab’Iburasirazuba Ishyaka riharanira ukwishyira ukizana kwa buri muntu, PL, ryijeje abaturage b’Intara y’Iburasirazuba, kubakorera ubuvugizi bakabona inganda zibyaza umusaruro ibitoki, nka kimwe mu bihingwa byera cyane muri iyi ntara.
PL kimwe n’indi mitwe ya politiki bakomeje ibikorwa byo kwiyamamariza imyanya y’Ubudepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, aho kuri iki Cyumweru bari mu Karere ka Rwamagana na Kayonza.

Ati “Nimuramuka mutugiriye icyizere tuzakomeza gukora ubuvugizi muri bwa bufatanye bwa leta n’abikorera, ku buryo hano hazaboneka inganda zikora ibintu binyuranye bivuye muri bya bitoki bya hano iwacu."
Intara y’Iburasirazuba ifite umwihariko wo kweza ibitoki byinshi, ku buryo habonetse inganda nyinshi zongerera umusaruro iki gihingwa nta gushidikanya ko n’imibereho y’abahinzi yatera imbere, bityo ubuhinzi bukaba umwuga.
Mukabalisa yongeyeho ko bazakora ubuvugizi bwisumbuyeho buzatuma umunyarwanda akora ubuhinzi n’ubworozi bya kinyamwuga.
Ati “Ubwo ubuhinzi bw’umwuga turifuza ko butanga umusaruro ugaragara watuma umunyarwanda ubukora atera imbere ava mu cyiciro kimwe akajya mukindi”.
PL ifite abakandida 80, yasezeranyije abaturage kuzakora ubuvugizi ku buryo haboneka banki yihariye n’ikigega cy’ubwishingizi cy’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi.
Mu bindi iri shyaka rishyize imbere birimo; kwita ku mabuye y’agaciro hakaboneka inganda ziyatunganya, kwita ku musaruro w’amafi n’ibindi.
Nsengiyumva Wellars, umuturage wo mu Murenge wa Nyamirama yabwiye IGIHE ko ubuhinzi busanzwe bugenda neza ariko ko batakwanga inyongera PL ishaka kubazanira.
Yavuze ko bakeneye cyane amasoko y’umusaruro w’ibigori kuko babyeza bakabura aho babigurisha.
Ati “Ikibazo ubundi hano dufite bagashyizemo imbaraga ni ukudushakira aho tugurisha ibigori byacu kuko hari igihe usanga twejeje byinshi ntitubone aho tubigurisha”.
PL ni ishyaka ryashinzwe tariki 14 Nyakanga 1991.
Ku rupapuro rw’itora rizaba rirangwa n’iyi mpine yaryo n’inyenyeri eshatu ziri mu ibara ry’umuhondo.

Tangawizi kandi ifasha mu gukira umutwe, kuruka, gufungana mu mazuru n’ibindi.
Si ibyo gusa kuko Tangawizi ikora nk’ifunguro rifasha mu gutakaza ibiro.
Ifasha umubiri wawe gutuma ukora cyane, bigatuma udahora ushonje cyane.
Ni nziza ku igogora, ifasha ku barwaye igifu ndetse n’ikora neza ry’umutima.
Tangawizi inakura imyuka y’umurengera mu mara no mu gifu.
Tangawizi kandi ifasha mu itembera ryiza ry’amaraso , igabanya kuribwa mu ngingo cyangwa kuribwa imitsi.
Tangawizi ifite n’akamaro gakomeye mu gutuma ibisebe bikira vuba.

Inyungu mbumbe ya Bralirwa yiyongereyeho 9.5% mu 2015 Yanditswe kuya 28-04-2016 saa 21:06' na Rabbi Malo Umucunguzi Inyungu mbumbe y'uruganda rukora rukanacuruza ibinyobwa bisembuye n'ibidasembuye, Bralirwa, mu 2015 yazamutseho 9.5%, ahanini bikaba byarashingiye ku kwiyongera kw'ibinyobwa bidasembuye byoherezwa ku isoko.
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 28 Mata 2016, uru ruganda rwashyize ahagaragara imibare rwacuruje mu mwaka ushize, aho ingano y'ibinyobwa byashyizwe ku isoko yiyongereyeho 7.6%, inzoga zikaba zarazamutse kuri 5.3% mu gihe ibinyobwa bidasembuye ari 14%.
Ibi byatumye inyungu yinjijwe mu mwaka ushize igera kuri miliyari 84 na miliyoni 88 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda.
Uyu ubaye umwaka wa kane wikurikiranya ibinyobwa bidasembuye bikorwa na Bralirwa bitazamuye ibiciro, mu gihe inzoga nazo ziheruka kongererwa ibiciro muri Nyakanga 2011.
Umuyobozi wa Bralirwa, Jonathan Hall yavuze ko Bralirwa ihagaze neza ku isoko rikomeje kuzamo uguhangana, bitari mu rwego rw'ibinyobwa gusa ahubwo no mu zindi nzego zinyuranye.
Yakomeje avuga ko mu myaka ine ishize Bralirwa yashoye imari mu rwengero rwa Gisenyi n'ahakorerwa ibinyobwa bidasembuye muri Kigali, ibintu byakozwe mu mafaranga y'uruganda ndetse n'inguzanyo.
Ati "Icyiciro cyo gushora imari kiri kugera ku musozo.
Tumaze igihe dukora ishoramari rigera kuri miliyoni 30 z'amayero mu bikorwa byacu, mu myaka ine n'igice ishize.
Ni ishoramari riri kurwego rwo hejuru.
Hakenewe ko tuzamura ubushobozi bwacu, hakenewe ko tuvugurura ibyo dukoresha…."
Bralirwa igiye gukora Fanta zo mu macupa ya ‘Plastic' Freddy Nyangezi Biniga, ushinzwe itumanaho muri Bralirwa, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari gukorwa ishoramari ku buryo mu Rwanda hatangira gukorwa Fanta ariko ziri mu macupa ya Plastic.
Yagize ati ‘‘Nubundi twazicuruzaga, ariko twazitumizaga hanze.
Ubu turashaka kujya tuzikorera hano mu Rwanda kuva muri Gicurasi, ku buryo nko mu cyumweru gitaha icupa rya mbere rizaba ryageze hanze.''
Biteganyijwe ko nyuma y'uru rwunguko rwa 2015, abanyamigabane ba Bralirwa bazasaranganywa 72.4% by'inyungu yose ya 2015 bingana n'amafaranga atanu y'u Rwanda ku mugabane, iyo ngano ikazabanza kwemezwa n'Inteko rusange.
Abayobozi banyuranye ba Bralirwa mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa Kane Jonathan Hall, Umuyobozi wa Bralirwa Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

Antoine Mukunzi yavuze ko abaducuruza bose bagomba kubahiriza amabwiriza ajyanye n’isuku.
Ati “abaducuruza hirya no hino mu mitaka, na bo bagomba kuba barasobanukiwe amabwiriza yo kuducuruza, bafite isuku kandi bagacuruza udufunze neza”.
Yasabye abaguzi kujya babanza kureba niba ako bagiye kugura gafunze neza, handitseho ingano yako ndetse n’uruganda rwagakoze, kugira ngo yizere ubuziranenge bwako.
Samuel Mporanzi, Umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe Ubuziranenge mu ikoranabuhanga mu Kigo gishinzwe Ubuziranenge (RSB), yavuze ko abanyenganda bahawe uburenganzira bwo gushaka ibikoresho bapfunyikamo, ariko ko udupfukamunwa tutagomba gufungwa mu ishashi mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ingamba zo kurinda ibidukikije.
Abaguzi baba bagomba kureba niba ako baguze gafunze ku buryo kadahura n’umwanda.
Yavuze ko abaturage bakwizera ubuziranenge bw’uturi ku isoko uyu munsi, kuko utwakozwe tutari twujuje ubuziranenge, basabye abari badukoze kudukura ku isoko, kandi ko hirya no hino hari abagenzuzi ba RSB bagenda bareba niba koko uducuruzwa twujuje ubuziranenge.

#6395#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/urukundo/article/impamvu-ituma-bamwe-mu-bagore-bagira-agahinda-nyuma-y-imibonano-mpuzabitsina
Impamvu ituma bamwe mu bagore bagira agahinda nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina Mu gihe abantu benshi bumva ko nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina by’umwihariko iyakozwe ku bwumvikane impande zombi zisigarana ibyishimo, ibi si ko bimeze kuko hari benshi mu bagore bahita biyumvamo agahinda ndetse bakagira ubwoba.
Ubushakashatsi buherutse gukorerwa ku bagore 230, bwagaragaje ko 46% byabo bagiye biyumvamo agahinda gakabije nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina ibizwi nka PCD (post-coital dysphoria).
Ibi kandi byanahuye neza n’ubundi bushakashatsi bwakozwe mu 2011, aho kimwe cya gatatu cy’abagore babajijwe bavuze ko akenshi basigaranaga agahinda kenshi kandi nyamara imibonano mpuzabitsina batayikoze bahatirijwe.
The Independent ivuga ko hari bamwe mu bagore bumva ko bafite agahinda, ubwoba, umujinya no kumva badatuje, kabone n’ubwo imibonano mpuzabitsina yaba yagenze neza.
Dr.
Robert D Schweitzer avuga ko PCD ari ikintu gisanzwe kandi gishobora kuba ku bagore n’abagabo, ariko mu buryo butandukanye bitewe n’imiterere yabo.
Buri muntu wese iyo akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina arekura imisemburo by’umwihariko dopamine ituma umubiri w’umuntu wifuza gukora ikintu runaka ndetse akagira ibyishimo ndetse na Prolactin igira uruhare mu ikorwa ry’amashereka, zombi zituma ubasha kwirekura no kugaragaza amarangamutima yawe.
Umujyanama mu birebana n’Imibonano mpuzabitsina, Denise Knowles, avuga ko iyo imibonano mpuzabitsina irangiye iyi misemburo ndetse n’indi irimo endorphin na oxytocin igenda imanuka isubira ku kigero cyayo gisanzwe ari nabyo bituma umuntu arushaho kugira agahinda n’ubwoba ku buryo na bamwe barira.
Mu bindi bivugwa kuba intandaro y’aka gahinda harimo ihungabana rishobora guturuka ku kuba umugore yarigeze gukorerwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, bituma igihe akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina kabone n’ubwo yari abyishimiye bimwibutsa ibihe yanyuzemo bitoroshye.
Kuba umugore atabashije kugera ku ndunduro y’ibyishimo bye kandi nabyo ngo bishobora kumusigira agahinda no kwicuza yibaza icyatumye akora imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Ibi bikunze kuba ku bagore batinya kubwira abakunzi cyangwa abagabo babo ikibashimisha mu gihe bari gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, ahubwo bagahitamo kugaragaza ko bishimye nyamara atari byo kubera imyumvire ndetse n’imico itandukanye bakuriyemo.
Kuba umugore atabashije kugera ku ndunduro y’ibyishimo bye kandi nabyo ngo bishobora kumusigira agahinda no kwicuza yibaza icyatumye akora imibonano mpuzabitsina

#6405#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/mukama-abaturage-bafite-icyizere-ko-vup-izabateza-imbere
Mukama: Abaturage bafite icyizere ko VUP izabateza imbere Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Murenge wa Mukama mu Karere ka Nyagatare bakora muri gahunda ya VUP bavuga ko bafite icyizere cyo kwikura mu bukene, dore ko mu gihe bamaze bakorana nayo babashije kwigurira amatungo magufi.
Gacoco Boniface ni umwe mubo Kigali today yasanze bakora umuhanda Rugarama-Gihengeri muri gahunda ya VUP.
Avuga ko aribwo agitangira gukorana na VUP ariko akemeza ko amafaranga yahembwe bwa mbere yaguzemo ibintu bitandukanye.
Abaturage bakora muri VUP bizera ko ari inzira yo kugera ku iterambere.
Raphaël Ndimubanzi, nawe wahawe akazi ko gutunganya umuhanda, avuga ko yagahawe ari umukene abana be batakiga kubera ko atabashaga kubabonera ibikoresho by'ishuri.
Ubu ngo yamaze kugura ihene kandi afite intego yo gukomeza gukora yizigama agasubiza abana be ku ishuri.
Kuba abakora muri gahunda ya VUP bavuga ko bagiye gusezerera ubutindi bishimangirwa n'umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Mukama, Gakuru James.
Aba baturage bavuga ko mu mafaranga bahembwa baguzemo amatungo magufi n'ibindi byo kwikenura.
Avuga ko imirimo ikorwa n'aba baturage mbere yahabwaga ba rwiyemezamirimo bagakoresha bacye ariko ubu amafaranga akaba agera ku baturage benshi kandi n'ibikorwa bakora ari ibyabo.
Uyu muhanda aba baturage bakora ugizwe n'abirometero 16 ugakorwamo n'abaturage basaga ibihumbi 3.
Uretse abakora mu muhanda bahembwa amafaranga 1500 ku munsi, hari n'abihuriza mu matsinda bakagurizwa amafaranga bazishyura mu gihe cy'umwaka ku nyungu y'amafaranga 2%, hakaba n'abahabwa inkunga y'ingoboka kubera ko batishoboye kandi badashoboye no gukora.
SEBASAZA Gasana Emmanuel

#6425#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUREZI/article12822.html
IBIZAMINI BYA LETA: Amazi si ya yandi ku banyeshuri birukanywe ku bigo Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe Uburezi (REB) kiravuga ko nta munyeshuri wirukanywe ku ishuri yigagaho uzemererwa gukora ibizamini bya Leta, kabone n’aho yaba yarirukanywe yaramaze kuzuza amafishi y’abemerewe gukora ibyo bizami.
Bisanzwe bimenyerewe ko umunyeshuri wamaze kuzuza ifishi yo gukora ikizami cya Leta mu mashuri abanza, icyiciro rusange n’ayisumbuye, aba atakigengwa cyane n’ishuri yigaho dore ko n’iyo yirukanwaga bitamubuzaga gukora ibizamini bya Leta nk’abandi.
Ibi byatumaga hari abanyeshuri bitwara nabi ubwo babaga barangije kuzuza ayo mafishi kuko babaga bizeye ko bazakora ibizamini bya Leta uko byagenda kose.
Mu kiganiro umuyobozi muri REB ushinzwe Ibizami Dr Emmanuel Muvunyi yagiranye na MAKURUKI yadutangarije ko muri uyu mwaka ibintu byahindutse ko umunyeshuri uzakora ikizamini cya Leta ari uwabaye mu ishuri kugera ku munsi w’ibizamini bya Leta.
Yagize ati: “ twamaze kuzenguruka amashuri yose tumenya abanyeshuri bahari kandi bazakora ibizamini bya Leta… ubwo umunyeshuri tutahasanze (wirukanywe) ntazakora, umunyeshuri agomba gukora ikizamini cya Leta ari uko afite indangamanota zose kandi yarize kugeza ku munsi wa nyuma.”
Iki cyemezo cya REB kiri mu rwego rwo gufasha ibigo by’amashuri byagorwaga n’abanyeshuri babaga bageze mu mwaka usoza icyiciro runaka bakoraga amakosa atandukanye bitwaje ko nta wababuza gukora ikizamini cya Leta.
Ibi kandi ngo bizafasha kurwanya uburiganya bwakorwaga n’abayobozi b’ibigo by’amashuri bafatakaga abakandida bigenga bakabeshya ko ari abanyeshuri basanzwe biga.
Ubusanzwe umukandida wigenga yemerewa gukora ikizamini cya Leta gisoza amashuri yisumbuye mu gihe amaze byibuze imyaka 5 akoze ikizamini cya Leta gisoza icyiciro rusange.
Ku kibazo cy’abanyeshuri bajya bangirwa gukora ibizamini bya Leta kubera ko bafitiye ibigo bigaho imyenda, Dr Emmanuel Muvunyi avuga ko hakwiye kubaho ubwumvikane hagati y’ishuri n’umubebyi ariko ngo umunyeshuri ntiyakabujijwe gukora ikizamini kubera umwenda.
Yagize ati “cyane cyane mu bigo byigenga, hakwiye kuba ubwumvikane hagati y’ababyeyi abayobozi b’ishuri, ariko ku ruhande rwacu twumva umunyeshuri atabuzwa gukora ikizamini kuko atarishyura amafaranga y’ishuri."
Mu rwego rwo gukomeza guhangana n’abakora uburiganya mu bizamini bya Leta hashyizweho uburyo budasanzwe bwo kubika ibizamini mu cyumba gicungiwe umutekano ibyo bise "Strong Room"aho icyo cyumba kizaba gifungishijwe ingufuri 2 kigafungurwa hari uhagarariye site y’ibizami, umwungirije ndetse n’umupolisi.
REB ntiyashimye kudutangariza umubare w’abanyeshuri bazakora ibizamini bya Leta muri uyu mwaka wa 2016 ariko ngo wariyongereye ugereranije n’umwaka ushize wa 2015.
Biteganijwe ko ibizamini bisoza amashuri abanza bizatangira kuwa 01 Ugushyingo bikarangira kuwa 03 Ugushyingo 2016 naho abarangiza icyiciro rusange n’abarangiza amashuri yisumbuye bazatangira kuwa 09 Ugushyingo basoze kuwa 18 Ugushyingo 2016.

#6442#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Menya-impamvu-eshanu-RUCAGU-Boniface-yambara-amafoto-ya-Paul-KAGAME-n-igihe-ayambarira
Menya impamvu eshanu RUCAGU Boniface yambara amafoto ya Paul KAGAME n'igihe ayambarira?
Benshi bakunze kwibaza ku myambarire idasanzwe y'Umusaza Rucagu Boniface, ukunze kugaragara mu birori bitandukanye yambaye imyenda iriho amfoto ya Perezida Paul Kagame ndetse rimwe na rimwe n'ibirango bya RPF- INKOTANYI, bakibyibazaho, nyamara ariko burya ngo uyu mutara w'Intore ngo burya ntajya apfa kuyambara ngo agira igihe ayambarira kandi ku mpamvu eshanu yatangarije umunyamakuru wacu mu kiganiro bagiranye tariki ya 22 Mutarama 2015.
Aha hari mu nama ya 12 y'Umushyikirano 2014 Impamvu ya mbere Rucagu atangaza ituma yambara imyambaro iriho Perezida Kagame, ari ukubera ko ari umukuru w'igihugu.
Ati " impavu ya mbere ituma nambara iriya myenda ni uko ari umukuru w'igihugu, ubu se abambara Obama ko ntacyo mubabaza ubu jye wambara umukuru w'igihugu ni jye ubazwa?"
Impamvu ya kabiri Rucagu avuga ko ikindi kibmutera kwambara imyenda iriho amafoto y'umukuru w'igihugu ari uko bakoranye kandi bagakorana ibintu byiza.
Ibi byatumye Makuruki tumubaza, uburyo ki avuga yakoranye neza na Perezida Kagame kurusha abandi, bituma agera aho amwambara ku myenda , maze nawe adutangariza ko izo mpamvu nazo ziri mu buryo bune bukurikira; Mu magambo Rucagu Boniface yagize ati: " hamwe na Paul Kagame twafatanyije kurwanya intambara y'abacengezi yamaze hafi imyaka ine turanayitsinda; Twafatanyije gusana no gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe abaturage ba Ruhengeri tubasubiza ibikorwa remezo byabo byari byarasenyutse nk'ibitaro ,amazi, amashuri n'ibindi byiza cyane.
Birangiye dufatanya guteza Ruhengeri imbere yari yarazahajwe n'intambara y'abacengezi, ariko twayiteje imbere mu kanya gato ifata umuvuduko inacaho izindi ntara zitahuye n'intambara ikomeye nk'iy'abacengezi; Ikindi rero ni uko ubu turi gufatanya gutoza abanyarwanda tubatoza imico myiza n'ubunyarwanda bakubahana bakabana mu mahoro.
Ngibyo rero ibintu bintera ishema ryo kwambara umukuru w'igihugu Paul Kagame" Ku bijyanye no kwambara imyenda iriho ibirango bya FPR INKOTANYI, kandi Rucagu yatubwiye ko abanyarwanda bitiranya ibintu kuko ngo adashobora kwambara iyi myenda yagiye mu bikorwa bisanzwe by'akazi yavuze ko yambara imyenda iriho ibirango bya FPR INKOTANYI ari uko agiye mu bikorwa by'iri shyaka.
Rucagu Boniface akunze kugaragara mu mihango mikuru y'igihugu yambaye ishati iriho amafoto arenze imwe.
Alexis MUSABIREMA

#6459#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/miliyari-zisaga-1000-frw-zimaze-guhererekanywa-kuri-tigo-cash
Miliyari zisaga 1000 Frw zimaze guhererekanywa kuri Tigo Cash Tigo Rwanda yatangaje ko kuva yatangiza serivisi zo kohereza no kwakira amafaranga hakoreshejwe telefoni igendanwa buzwi nka “Tigo Cash’, imaze kunyuzwaho amafaranga y’u Rwanda arenga miliyari 1000.
Ubu buryo bworoshye bwo guhererekanya amafaranga bwa Tigo Cash bumaze kuganwa n’abantu miliyoni 1.3.
Iyi mibare yagaragajwe n’Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi muri Tigo, Yaw Ankoma Agyapong, mu muhango wo gutangiza ku mugaragaro serivisi zo kubikuza no kubitsa amafaranga kuri konti ya banki, hakoreshejwe Tigo Cash.
Yaw Ankoma yagize ati ”Twari turi kureba imibare dusanga kuva mu 2011 twatangiza Tigo Cash hano, abakiriya bacu bahererekanyije amafaranga asaga m miliyari 1000.1 z’amanyarwanda.”
Yakomeje avuga ko iki ari ikimenyetso kigaragaza icyizere abantu bafitiye serivisi za Tigo, bikaba bituma iyi sosiyete ikomeza gufatanya n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo mu kugera ku ntego yayo yo kugeza serivisi z’imari kuri bose.
Imibare ya BNR igaragaza ko kugera mu Ukuboza 2016, abagera kuri 3,333, 349 aribo bari bafite konti zo kohererezanya no kwakira amafaranga hakoreshejwe telefoni.
Mu 2016, abantu bahererekanyije amafaranga angana na miliyari 1040 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, akaba yaragabanutse ugereranyije na miliyari 1093 Frw zari zahererekanyijwe mu 2015 mu masosiyete y’itumanaho atandukanye.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi muri Tigo, Yaw Ankoma Agyapong

#6470#	6	religion	http://makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article/Abakirisitu-barashinja-bamwe-mu-bahanuzi-guhanura-ibinyoma-no-kubibasira-mu-ruhame
Abakirisitu barashinja bamwe mu bahanuzi guhanura ibinyoma no kubibasira mu ruhame Abavugabutumwa batandukanye barakangurirwa kujya babanza kwitonda bagashishoza, mbere yuko bageza ubutumwa bwabo kubo baba babugeneye, kubera ko iyo ubutumwa butambutse butabanje gutekerezwaho mbere yuko butambuka, ngo usanga hari igihe bugira ingaruka mbi kuwo buba bugenewe.
Nkuko bitangazwa na bamwe mu bakiristu basengera mu itorero rya ADEPR mu rurembo rw'umujyi wa Kigali, badutangarije ko hari abavugabutumwa akenshi biyita abahanuzi, ngo usanga rimwe na rimwe bahanura ibinyoma cyangwa se ngo ugasanga n'ibyo bahanura babivugira mu ruhame kandi ngo hari igihe ubwo butumwa baba bashaka gutanga buba bugenewe umuntu ku giti cye.
Bamwe mu bo twaganiriye bagira bati" ugasanga umuhanuzi yabibuzemo ubwenge, ugasanga avugira mbega ibintu mu ruhame kandi yakagombye kubibwira umuntu bireba, cyangwa se igice runaka bireba."
Undi nawe twaganiriye bisa naho we byamubayeho, yavuze ko yigeze guhanurirwa n'umuvugabutumwa, ariko ngo mu kumubwira ubutumwa yari yamutumweho, ntiyarindiriye kubumubwira mu ibanga, ahubwo ngo yahise abuvugira mu ruhame mu materaniro, bityo ngo bimugiraho ingaruka yo gutangira kuvugwa n'abantu bitewe n'ibyo bari bamwumviseho mu rusengero.
Agira ati" umuhanuzi umwe araza arahanura muri rusange araza akajya avuga ngo ni mwihane, ni mwihane, ni mwihane ubusambanyi, ni mwihane ubusambayi.
Hano hari umuntu wasambanye, ngiye kubona mbona angezeho ankoraho ati ihane ubusambanyi, ihane ubusambanyi warasambanye, aramfata nyine ajya kumpfukamisha imbere ngo nihane, ariko tugeze hanze abantu batangira kuvuga ngo narasambanye, ngo uriya yarasambanye , nkajya numva n'abantu babivuga nanjye nkagira umubabaro mwinshi cyane, ubwo bakirinda no mu buhanuzi bwabo bakajya basaba Imana ikabaha ubundi bwenge."
Rev.
Pastor Rurangirwa Emmanuel, umushumba w'itorero rya ADEPR ururembo rw'umujyi wa Kigali , yavuze ko abavugabutumwa bose bakagombye kugira ubwenge mubyo bigisha, bakajya babanza gutekereza ku butumwa baba bahawe mbere yuko babutangaza ku bo bugenewe.
Agira ati" …iyo abivugiye aho burya wa muntu aranangirwa kuko aba amutangarije ku mugaragaro wenda ni umubyeyi ufitemo abana, ufitemo abakwe, ufitemo abakazana, ufitemo abuzukuru, ni uko.
Ariko ijambo ry'Imana riravuga ngo umwuka w'abahanuzi ugengwa nab a nyirawo."
Yongeye agira ati" ntabwo rero Imana hari uvuga ngo ni ntabivuga ngo Imana iranyica, ntacyo yamutwara kuko ntibiba byenda kuzima, biba biri aho.
Aragomba kubyumva noneho rero abitekerezeho neza abivuge mu mwanya wabyo."
Rev.
Pastor Rurangirwa Emmanuel umushumba w'itorero ADEPR ururembo rw'umujyi wa Kigali Rev.
Rurangirwa kandi yavuze ko abahanuzi bagomba kujya babanza kumenya abantu ubutumwa buba bugenewe, kuburyo ariho bahera banatandukanya aho ubwo butumwa bugomba gutangirwa, mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko hari umuntu bwakomeretsa kubera ko buvugiwe ahadakwiye.
Agira ati"…biterwa n'ubutumwa ubwo aribwo , niba ari ubw'Itorero n'abuvuge, ariko niba ari ubw'umuntu ku giti cye nagire ubwo bwenge atangire yimetirize(Maitriser) abumushyire wenda basohotse.
Niba ari ubw'umuryango ( Famille) agire ubwenge abushyire muri famille nyine, niba ari ubw'igihugu nabushyire abayobozi nabwo mu bwitonzi yitonze, agishije inama anyure mu nzira nziza."
Uretse kuba bamwe mu bavugabutumwa bashyira ku ka rubanda aba kiristu bitewe nuko ubutumwa bwabo babuvugiye mu ruhame kandi bwari bugenewe umuntu ku giti cye, bamwe mu ba kirisitu bashinja aba bavugabutumwa rimwe na rimwe guhanura ibinyoma, akenshi bagendereye kubabonaho indonke zitandukanye.

#6480#	4	health	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Ubuzima/article/4532
Ibyo gushyira udukingirizo mu mashuri ntibivugwaho rumwe Bamwe mu babyeyi bo mu karere ka Rwamagana ntibavuga rumwe n’abana babo ku ngingo irebana no gushyira udukingirizo mu bigo by’amashuri aho benshi mu babyeyi bavuga ko ibi ari uburyo bwo gukurura ubusambanyi no kwigisha abana imico mibi.
Gusa ku rundi ruhande hari abemeza ko ubu ari uburyo bwiza bwo kurinda indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina no gukumira inda zitateganyijwe zikunze guterwa abangavu bakiri mu mashuri.
Bamwe muri ibi byiciro baganiriye na Ukwezi bagaragaje ko gushyira udukingirizo mu bigo by’amashuri bisa no kwigisha abantu imico mibi ndetse no gukurura ubusambanyi, gusa ariko hari n’abandi biganjemo abanyeshuri bavuze ko iyi gahunda yafasha benshi mu kubarinda izo nda zitateganyijwe ndetse no kubarinda indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.
Umunyeshuri wiga ku rwunge rw’amashuri rwa Gishari waganiriye na Ukwezi, yagize ati “Ngewe mbona ari nk’uko baba bashaka kwigisha abana ibintu bijyanye n’ubusambanyi, igihe babibonye nyine nabo bajya barwana ishyaka ryo kubikoresha (Udukingirizo) kuko babibonye” Yakomeje agira ati “Udukingirizo batuzanye nko mu kigo abanyeshuri urumva bajya babikurura ubusambanyi kuko abantu benshi baterwa inda baziterwa n’abasore baba hanze rero mbona udukingirizo twaba tudafite akamaro mu mashuri” Iraguha Yvette nawe wiga mu mwaka wa Gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye kuri iki kigo yagize ati “ Birakwiye cyane kuko utwo dukingirizo batuzanye hari byinshi baba bakemuye kuko kuvuga ngo bakazanye ngo byatuma abanyeshuri barushaho ngo kugira uburara nk’ubwongubwo?
Oya!
Hari byinshi byaba bikemuye izo nda ziba zitateganyijwe zahagarikwa byacika kabisa” Yakomeje agira ati “Hari icyo byadufasha, n’abanyeshuri ubwabo erega biraba cyane, ariko nkatwe twiga dutaha izo nda baziterwa n’abantu bo hanze.”
Yvette kandi yavuze ko icyo bifuza ari uko utu dukingirizo bajya batuzana mu mashuri bakabigisha no kudukoresha mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwikingira mu buryo bwiza.
Nyinawumuntu Cecile, Umunyamabanga muri Gs Gishari, iherereye mu Murenge wa Gishari, Akarere ka Rwamagana we yavuze ko iki kintu cyo gushyira udukingirizo mu bigo by’amashuri ari byiza ariko bikaba akarusho mu bigo bicumbikira abanyeshuri.
Yagize ati “Rwose ngewe mbona byaba ari byiza, byaba byiza kubera ko yego abana ntabwo tuba tubashora mu busambanyi cyangwa kugira gute (……) Ariko nk’iyo urebye hanze aha uko hameze n’abana benshi ubona batwara inda z’indaro batarageza igihe mbona nk’icyo kintu cy’udukingirizo kudushyira mu bigo by’amashuri byaba byiza.”
Kumutariza Marie Assumpta, umubyeyi utuye mu mudugudu wa Nyakabungo akagari ka Bwisange, umurenge wa Gishari ho mu karere ka Rwamagana, Intara y’Iburasirazuba we yabwiye Ukwezi ko gushyira udukingirizo mu mashuri ari ukwigisha abana ubusambanyi Yagize ati “Agakingirizo se mama?
Yego numvishe bavuga ngo ni nka mituweri ariko kariya nako numva kaba gakuruye imico mibi, mwahura ati ntufite agakingirizo ati akira aya ngaya bakagakoresha noneho yazageraho akamenyera akanibagirwa bakaba bakorera aho akaba arasamye ya nda atateganyijwe” Mu kuboza 2017, Ubwo yari mu nama n’abayobozi bagize inzego zinyuranye mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, Musenyeri Servilien Nzakamwita, umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Byumba yavuze ko kumenyereza abana udukingirizo bituma birekura, bakishora mu busambanyi kuko baba beretswe ko mu gihe hari udukingirizo gusambana babyemerewe.
Ati “Hari n’ababyeyi babivuga ngo umwana we iyo yagiye ku ishuri abishyira (udukingirizo) mu isakoshi ye agira ngo nagira ibyago yitabare!
Ibyo rero bituma abana birekura tukazabura aho tubigarurira.”
Nyinawumuntu Cecile, Umunyamabanga muri Gs Gishari Kumutariza Marie Assumpta,, Umubyeyi ufite abana b’abakobwa avuga ko bidakwiye gushyira udukingirizo mu mashuri

#6495#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/uturere-twose-twasabwe-gushyiraho-itsinda-ryihariye-ryo-guhangana-na-malaria
Uturere twose twasabwe gushyiraho itsinda ryihariye ryo guhangana na malaria Imibare itangwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima (RBC) igaragaza ko indwara ya malaria ikomeje gukaza umurego, dore ko mu 2013 abayivuje banganaga na 1,014,500 ariko bageze kuri 4,739,896 mu 2017.
Ni muri urwo rwego rero ku wa 3 Gicurasi 2018, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yahurije hamwe abafatanyabikorwa bayo, abayobozi b’uturere twose bungirije bashinzwe ubuzima ndetse n’abayobozi b’ibitaro by’uturere mu Rwanda, higwa ku kibazo cya malaria.
Uretse kurebera hamwe gahunda yo kurwanya iyio ndwara hashyirwa mu bikorwa uburyo bwashyizweho, hanafatiwemo ingamba z’uko buri karere kagomba gushinga itsinda ryihariye ryo guhangana n’icyorezo cya malaria uhereye mu nzego z’ibanze kuzamura ku rwego rw’igihugu.
Iryo tsinda ryihariye rikazajya ritanga raporo buri kwezi, riterane rimwe mu gihembwe naho buri mezi atandatu rihure ku rwego rw’igihugu, rihuze amakuru riyasesengure, rirebere hamwe icyarushaho kuba cyiza mu rwego rwo guhashya malaria.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa RBC, Dr Jeanine U.
Condo, yagize ati “Ni ngombwa ko inzego zose zihuza imbaraga kugira ngo malaria icike, haba mu kuyirinda, kuyivuza ku gihe ndetse no kwigisha abaturage ibijyanye nayo.
Kugira ngo urugamba rwo kuyihashya rube urwa buri wese nta n’umwe usigaye kandi icyizere cyo kuyitsinda kirahari mu bufatanye busesuye bwa buri wese.”
Abari mu nama bunguranye ibitekerezo, Visi Meya ushinzwe imibereho myiza mu Karere ka Kayonza, Harerimana Jean Damascene, atanga icyifuzo ko inyigisho zijyanye na malaria zagezwa no ku bana mu mashuri y’ibiburamwaka.
Yagize ati “Byaba byiza malaria, yigishijwe abana bato, bagakura bayizi bihagije, icyinjizwa muri za kirazira nk’uko biri mu zindi ndangagaciro nyarwanda, cyane ko inyigisho ihawe umwana ayibika neza ikamugirira akamaro mu mibereho ye yose n’igihe azaba mukuru.”
Dr.
Aimable Mbituyumuremyi uyobora Ishami rishinzwe kurwanya malaria muri RBC yasobanuriye abari aho ko kurwanya no gutsinda malaria atari umugani kuko hari aho ingufu zagiye zihuzwa zigatanga umusaruro.
Yagize ati “Dufashe nk’urugero ku Karere ka Nyagatare, aho kubera ingamba zo kurwanya malaria zashyizwemo imbaraga harimo no gutera imiti mu mazu y’abaturage ndetse no kuyivurira mu bajyanama b’ubuzima, akarere kavuye ku barwayi 90,000 mu 2015 kageza ku 5000 mu 2017.”
Gusa ngo iyi gahunda yo gutera imiti yica imibu itera malaria ntishobora gutererwa uturere twose kubera ko ingengo igenda ku karere kamwe ubwayo ari miliyari imwe n’igice y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda kandi hari izindi ngamba zagahurijwe hamwe nko gusibanganya ahari ibizenga imibu yororokeramo, gutema ibihuru no gukinga amadirishya kare hamwe no kurara mu nzitiramubu ziteye umuti.
Hanatangajwe ku mugaragaro ko hari gahunda Leta yashyizeho muri Werurwe 2018, yo kwemerera abikorera ku giti cyabo bagacuruza inzitiramubu, byongeye kandi bamwe mu baturage bo mu cyiciro cya gatatu n’abari mu cya kane cy’Ubudehe bakajya bigurira inzitiramubu ku giti cyabo.
Muri ayo mabwiriza kandi, harimo ko ubwo bucuruzi bw’inzitiramubu n’uturere dusabwa kuzabishoramo imari kugira ngo Farumasi z’uturere n’ibigonderabuzima mu bihe bizaba bitanga inzitiramubu ku baturage bo mu bindi byiciro by’ubudehe nk’uko bisanzwe, abo bo mu byiciro bizazigurira bizabone aho bazihahira.
Abari mu nama ariko binubiye ko inzitiramubu zizagurishwa abo mu kiciro cya gatatu kandi hari abakijujutira ko bagishyizwemo nta mikoro bafite, Dr.
Aimable azubiza ati “Si bose bazazigurira, hazarebwa ba bandi bafite imirimo izwi, cyane cyane abafite akazi muri leta n’abandi bishoboye, si buri wese wo muri icyo cyiciro uzigurira inzitiramubu, abo rero bazishyura amafaranga kandi ntazaba akanganye.”
U Rwanda rufite intego ko ingamba zafashwe zo kurwanya malaria zishyizwe mu bikorwa byazagera mu 2020 iyi ndwara yarabaye amateka.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa RBC, Dr Jeanine U.
Condo Dr.
