#7052#	6	religion	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Iyobokamana/article/Zion-Temple-yamaganye-abakwirakwiza-amashusho-agamije-guharabika-izina-rya-Gitwaza
Zion Temple yamaganye abakwirakwiza amashusho agamije guharabika izina rya Gitwaza Mu gitondo cyo kuwa 28 Ukwakira 2018, nibwo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hatangiye gukwirakwizwaho amashusho y’Umuyobozi w’Itorero Zion Temple ku Isi, Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza, amugaragaza avuga ko “Abakirisitu basengera mu itorero rye ni bo bazajya mu ijuru, abatahasengera ishyano ribaguyeho.”
Inkuru yari igezweho kuri WhatsApp, Facebook na Twitter ni ijyanye n’akavidewo k’amasegonda 14 kakwirakwizwaga, aho abatari bake bongeye kwikoma Apôtre Dr Gitwaza, bavuga ko inyigisho ze zikomeje kuyobya abakirisitu.
Iby’aya mashusho yanenzwe n’abatari bake ndetse bakanamwuka inabi (Apôtre Gitwaza), kaje nyuma y’igihe gito nanone uyu muvugabutumwa yongeye kugarukwaho bamunenga kwigamba ko ari we muhanuzi wa mbere mu Rwanda no muri Afurika.
Icyo gihe yaribasiriwe bikomeye, aba ikiganiro ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse no mu bitangazamakuru byo mu Rwanda.
Nyuma yo kubona ibyiriwe bivugwa kuri Apôtre Dr Gitwaza kuri iki cyumweru, Itorero rye ryasohoye itangazo ry’amagana ibikomeje gukorerwa uyu muvugabutumwa, bagaragaza ko biri gukorwa n’ababifitemo inyungu bagamije kwangizaz isura y’itorero rye ndetse n’izina rye muri rusange.
Muri iri tangazo ryasinyweho na Ngabo Fabien David ushinzwe itangazamakuru muri iri torero rya Zion Temple, yavuze ko amashusho yakwirakwijwe ari akantu gato bakase bayakuye mu nyigisho, bituma gahabwa inyito y’ubutumwa atari yashatse gutanga.
Iri tangazo ryavugaga ko abakomeje abakora ibikorwa nk’ibi baba bagamije gusenya ivugabutumwa, kuzana ubushyamirane hagati y’amatorero ya gikirisitu, kwangiza isura y’itorero Apôtre Dr Gitwaza abereye umushumba no guharabika izina rye bwite nk’umuntu ugoreka ukuri kw’ijambo ry’Imana.
Abakase agace kakwirakwijwe bakavanye mu nyigisho ye yo muri Nzeri 2018 yagarukaga ku nsanganyamatsiko ivuga ku ‘Kuri kutuzuye’, uyu mukozi w’Imana yavuze ko hari ukuri ko mu bitekerezo gutuma abantu baba intagondwa bagatsimbarara ku byo bemera.
Yakomoje ku bakirisitu bavuga ko abandi batazajya mu ijuru ndetse ko bagiye kurimbuka, usanga basenga bibwira ko abo bahuje imyemerere aribo gusa bazagororerwa.
Gitwaza yagize ati “Umukirisitu akavuga ngo nitwe twenyine tuzajya mu ijuru, akabyakira gutyo.
Yabona abandi akibwira ko bagiye kurimbuka.
Muri we azi ko abandi bose badasenga ariwe usenga.
Uko ni ukuri kwe yaryamyeho kandi afite igice cy’ukuri kwako kuko asenga, ariyiriza, ntakora icyaha kandi akunda Yesu.
Yumva ko abameze nkawe aribo bazajya mu ijuru.
Ni imitekerereze abantu baba bafite muri bo.”
Yavuze ko hari abantu b’intangondwa batemera abandi kubera ukuri bagenderaho.
Ati “Tujye ku ngingo yacu.
Mpagaze aha nkavuga ngo ‘Abakirisitu ba Zion ni bo bazajya mu ijuru gusa.
Abadasengera muri Zion bose ishyano ribaguyeho.
Nkabivuga nta zindi nyungu mfite ahubwo ari ko mbyizera, bamwe bakaza kumbaza igituma mbivuga.
Nanjye nti ni uko tubigisha ijambo ry’ukuri, hanze aha badafite.”
Itangazo ryamagana ibikomeje gukorerwa Apôtre Dr Gitwaza

#7109#	6	religion	https://umubavu.com/iyobokamana/article/Byari-ibyishimo-bikomeye-kuri-Korari-Enihakore-imaze-imyaka-10-ikora-umurimo-w-Imana
Byari ibyishimo bikomeye kuri Korari Enihakore imaze imyaka 10 ikora umurimo w’Imana Ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 28 Kanama 2019 ku mudugudu wa ADEPR Nyarugenge ari nayo Paruwasi, Korari Enihakore yari mu byishimo bikomeye byo gushimira Imana mu myaka 10 imaze ikora umurimo w’Imana mu rugendo rutari rworoshye.
Korari Enihakore yashimiye Imana mu masengesho yari yateguwe ku bufatanye n’umudugudu wa ADEPR Nyarugenge mu ntego igira iti "Abazi Imana yabo bazakomera bakore iby’ubutwari, Daniel 11:32".
Ni amasengesho Korari Enihakore yari yatumiyemo Korari zitandukanye zirimo Beula Choir yo mu Gatenga n’izo ku mudugudu wa Nyarugenge mu rwego rwo kwifatanya mu gushimira Imana yabashoboje gukora umurimo w’Imana batinnyaga".
Mu ijambo rye, umuyobozi w’iyi korari Mutuyemungu Jean Pierre yashimiye Imana mu myaka isaga 10 bakora umurimo w’Imana ntawiganda, ati "Turashimira Imana yabanye natwe mu gihe kingana n’imyaka isaga 10 dukora umurimo w’Imana hano mu Cyumba ku wa Gatatu kandi tudasiba na rimwe".
Yashimiye kandi amakorari atandukanye arimo Beula Choir yo mu Gatenga n’ayi Nyarugenge yari yaje kwifatanya na bo mu masengesho yo gushimira Imana mu gihe bamaze bakora umurimo wayo.
Kanda hano urebe uko byari bimeze Korari Enihakore ifite imishinga migari irimo kugura ibyuma bya Muzika bifite agaciro ka Miliyoni 10, umuhigo ivuga ko izawesa bitarenze umwaka utaha wa 2020 kugira ngo umurimo w’Imana ukomeze ugende neza dore ko nabyo bifasha mu kwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza.
Muri iyi mishinga ifite abantu beshyi bayihaye inkunga yo kugirango ibashe kugera kuntego biyemeje zirimo gukora album video no kugura ibyuma bishya kuko ibyo ikoresha ubu bimaze gusaza, dore ko ibyuma byayo biri mu bikoreshwa cyane kuri uyu mudugudu wa Gakinjiro.
Ibigeragezo ni umushinga w’Imana wunguka ku bantu b’Imana Pasiteri Uwambaje ni umwe mu bagabuye Ijambo ry’Imana kuri uyu munsi, mu byo bigishije harimo amagambo agarura ikizere ku bantu bahura n’ibigerageza, muri iyi nyigisho yagaragaje ko ibigerageza by’Imana ari inyungu kuri yo kandi ko uwo mushinga ugirira inyungu abantu benshi.
Aha yatanze urugero rw’umuntu wabyaye akimara gushaka n’uwabyaye hashize inyaka itandatu, avuga ko bose batagira amashimwe amwe kuko bose imishinga yabo si imwe.
Muri iri jambo yigishije ryakoze benshi ku mutima maze batambutsa amashimwe y’ukuntu bahoraga bivovota ariko ko basobanukiwe.
Korari Enihakore imaze imyaka 10 ikora umurimo w’Imana I Nyarugenge by’umwihariko mu masengesho yo ku wa Gatatu kandi idasiba na rimwe.
Ni korari yavukiye mu Cyumba cy’amasengesho cyareraga abizera bashya.
Ni korari yatangijwe n’abantu barindwi mu 2001 bagiye biyongera uko iminsi ishira.
Izina ’Enihakore’ iyi korari yiswe, risobanura ’iriba ry’uwambaje’ riboneka mu gitabo cy’Abacamanza 15:19.
@Umubavu.com

#7120#	5	politics	http://makuruki.rw/politiki/leta-y-u-rwanda-irahakana-ibyavuzwe-ko-yicishije-col-karegeya/
Johnston Busingye Minisitiri w’ Ubutabera w’ u Rwanda, yagize icyo avuga ku nyandiko y’ ikinyamakuru “The Global and Mail” yemezaga ko Perezida Kagame ariwe nyirabayazana w’ iyicwa rya Col Patrick Karegeya.
Related posts “Gitifu warashwe; igisambo gikorana n’umwanzi!”
Guverineri BOSENIBAMWE August 4, 2014 Abanyamuryango b’ihuriro United for Assistance bafashije abatishoboye August 4, 2014 Minisitiri w’ ubutabera akaba n’ intumwa Nkuru ya Leta Johnston Busingye Minisitiri Johnston Busingye mu kiganiro yagiranye na RFI yagize ati” Kuva nabaho iyi nkuru ndayigaye cyane (information bidon) kuko ntibyumvikana uburyo umuntu yabika inkuru y’ umuntu ugiye kugambanirwa akicwa ntayitangaze yamara kwicwa akabona kubitangaza”.
Minisitiri Busingye akaba yashakaga kugaruka ku byo Maj.
Higiro watorotse igisirikare cy’ u Rwanda mu mwaka w’ i 2010 yise ubuhamya bw’ impamo n’ uruhare rwa Leta y’ u Rwanda mu guhiga abatavuga rumwe na yo.
Robert Higiro akaba yaragiranye ibiganiro n’ abanyamakuru babiri ba The Globe and Mail, ababwira ko iperereza ry’ u Rwanda ryamuhaye ubutumwa bwo kwica abatavuga rumwe na Leta bari mu buhungiro muri Afurika y’ Epfo barimo Gen.
Kayumba Nyamwasa na Col.
Patrick Karegeya wishwe taliki ya 31 Ukuboza umwaka ushize .
Robert Higiro yakomeje atangariza abo banyamakuru ko afite n’ amajwi y’ ibiganiro bagiranye n’ umwe mu bayobozi bakuru b’ iperereza mu gihe bamuhaga ubwo butumwa.
Minisitiri Busingye akaba yibaza impamvu amakuru nk’ ayo atangwa mu binyamakuru aho kuyatwara mu butabera, bityo akaba ahamya ko ibyo nta kuri kubirimo.
Abayobozi b’ u Rwanda ntibahwemye kugaragariza amahanga ko nta ruhare na ruto bagize mu iyicwa rya Col Patrick Karegeya ko batanakwiye kuryozwa urupfu rw’ umuntu utaraguye ku butaka bwarwo.

#7122#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUREZI/article/Nyuma-yokongezwa-umushahara-akanyamuneza-ni-kose-mu-barimu
Akanyamuneza ni kose mu barimu nyuma yo gukurwa mu rujijo Nyuma yo kubona amafaranga kuri konti zabo za banki bakabifata bitandukanye bamwe bakavuga ko bongejwe umushahara abandi bavuga ko ari agahimbazamusyi yewe bataretse no kuvuga ko ari ibirarane by'imishahara ya bo, abarimu kuri ubu bakuwe mu rujijo na Minisiteri y'abakozi ba leta n'umurimo (MIFOTRA) ibabwira ko bongejwe umushahara.
Byari byitezwe ko mu ntangiriro z'uyu mwaka nk'uko byemejwe n'inama y'abaminisitiri ko umushara wa mwarimu ugomba kuzamuka ariko ntibyubahirizwe kuri ubu noneho bidasubirwaho buri mwarimu wigisha mu mashuri abanza ndetse n'ayisumbuye mu mashuri ya leta umaze imyaka itatu yigisha yongejwe 10% by'umushahara we.
Nyuma y'uko babonye amafaranga kuri konti za bo ariko ntibasobanukirwe neza benshi bavuga ko bishoka kuba ari ibirarane cyangwa agahimbazamusyi dore ko yari yanaje baramaze guhembwa, MIFOTRA ikaba yatangarije Makuruki.rw ko ari amafaranga bongejwe ku mushahara wabo batabonye muri aya mezi 6 ashize.
Tumaze kumenya aya makuru twegereye abarimu maze badutangariza ibyiyumviro byabo nyuma yo kumenya ko bongerewe umushahara kuri ubu akanyamuneza ni kose mu barimu aho bavuga ko babanje guterwa urujijo n'aya mafaranga ariko kuri ubu bakaba bashima leta y'u Rwanda kuba yarabatekerejeho ikabongeza umushahara.
Nshimiyimana Samuel yagize ati:"kuko twumvaga ko tuzongezwa umushahara twabanje kugira ngo niwo ariko twibaza impamvu duhembwe kabiri mu kwezi, twaje gutekereza ko ari agahimbazamusyi cyangwa ibirarane ariko kuba ari inyongera ku mushahara wacu biradushimishije cyane sinabona uko mbivuga kandi dushimiye leta yacu kuko ibyo yadusezeranyije ibikoze."
Mbabazi Comfort umuyobozi muri MIFOTRA yatangarije Makuruki.rw ko ari icyemezo cyavuye mu nama y'abaminisitiri ko abarimu bongezwa umushahara guhere mu ntangiriro z'uyu mwaka wa 2016 ariko bakaba bitari byarakozwe bityo ko babahereye rimwe inyongera ku mushahara w'amezi atandatu batabonye.
"Ni cyemezo cyavuye mu nama y'abaminisitiri ko umwarimu agomba kongererwa umushahara, kuva uyu mwaka watangira ntago bigeze bongezwa, buri mwarimu umaze imyaka itatu yongereweho 10% by'umushahara we, ariya mafaranga babonye ni amafaranga agomba kwiyongera ku mushahara wabo muri aya mezi 6, guhera mu kwezi gutaha kwa 7 umushahara wabo uzajya uza uri kumwe n'ayo mafaranga bongereweho."
Yavuze ko kandi umwarimu wongejwe umuhara ari umaze imyaka itatu yigisha ni ukuvuga guhera muri 2013, nyuma agakorerwa isuzuma bagasanga yarakoze neza ikindi ni uko aya mafaranga babonye arimo n'ishimwe ryabo riri hagati ya 3% na 5% by'umushahara wabo.
Canesius Kagabo Makuruki.rw

#7125#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/abanyarwanda-babyifuza-bagiye-guhabwa-urukingo-rwa-ebola-ruri-mu-igeragezwa
Abakora muri serivisi zo kuvura Ebola bagiye guhabwa urukingo rwayo ruri mu igeragezwa Minisiteri y’ubuzima mu Rwanda, itangaza ko abakora muri serivisi z’ubuvuzi babyifuza cyane cyane abakora mu bijyanye na Ebola, bagiye guhabwa urukingo rwayo ruri mu igeragezwa mu bihugu bitandukanye bya Afurika birimo na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe byo muri Afurika y’Iburengerazuba ndetse no muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, abaturage bamaze iminsi bahabwa urukingo rwa Ebola ruri mu igeragezwa.
Mu Kiganiro ‘Sobanukirwa’ cyanyuze kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda kuri iki cyumweru, Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe ubuzima bw’ibanze muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, Dr Ndimubanzi Patrick, yavuze ko uru rukingo ruzanahabwa abanyarwanda babyifuza.
Ati “Murabizi ko mu gihugu cy’abaturanyi cya Congo hari indwara ya Ebola, hari urukingo abantu bari gukoresha rwakoze no muri Afurika y’Iburengerazuba.
Uru rukingo ntabwo ruremezwa burundu ruracyari mu igeragezwa, ariko ukuntu imibare ibigaragaza ni uko rurinda abantu kwandura ebola.”
Yarakomeje ati “Iyo urukingo rukiri mu igeragezwa gutyo turutera umuntu wabyemeye tumaze no kumusobanurira tumubwira icyo turuziho, ingaruka zagaragaye nicyo rushobora kumurinda.
Niba abyemeye akarufata.
Ibyongibyo tugiye gutangira kubyigisha hirya no hino […] twirinde ko icyorezo cya ebola cyagera mu gihugu n’urwo rukingo ababyifuza babe bashobora kuba baruhabwa.”
Abazahabwa uru rukingo ni abakora muri serivisi zituma bashobora guhura byoroshye n’umuntu urwaye ebola bityo akaba yabanduza, nk’abakora mu kigo cyagenewe kwita by’umwihariko ku bafashwe n’iyo ndwara.
Abajijwe niba hari inkingo zindi zijya zihabwa abanyarwanda ziri mu igeragezwa, Dr Ndimubanzi yavuze ko kugeza ubu inkingo zose zikoreshwa mu Rwanda by’umwihariko izihabwa abana, ari inkingo zemejwe n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima n’ibigo mpuzamahanga byita ku buzima.
Ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y’Aturage “DHS” bwakozwe mu 2015, bwagaragaje ko abana 93% bavuka mu Rwanda bahabwa inkingo 12 zose, kuva umwana akivuka kugeza ku mwaka umwe n’igice.
Hari n’rukiko rwa kanseri ifata inkondo y’umura ruhabwa abana b’abakobwa bafite hagati y’imyaka 10 -12.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe ubuzima bw’ibanze muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, Dr Ndimubanzi Patrick, yavuze ko uru rukingo ruzanahabwa abanyarwanda babyifuza [email protected]

#7127#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/ibimenyetso-7-bigaragaza-umukobwa-ugukundira-amafaranga-utunze-gusa
Ibimenyetso 7 bigaragaza umukobwa ugukundira amafaranga utunze gusa Buri musore cyangwa umugabo wese aba yifuza umukobwa wamukundira uwo ari we , atari uko amukurikiyeho ubutunzi cyangwa amafaranga atunze.
Hanze aha hari ubwoko bwinshi bw’abakobwa:Hari abagukundira uko uri, uko uteye ,imico myiza n’ibindi.
Hari abandi benshi ariko bakundira umusore kubera ubutunzi afite cyangwa amafaranga menshi ahembwa buri kwezi.
Ibi ni ibimenyetso 7 Elcrema, uruguga rwandika ku mibanire rwashyize hanze bigaragaza ko umukobwa mukundana agukundira amafaranga utunze , wowe ukaba wibwira ko ari urukundo: 1.
Ntajya agushishikariza kwizigamira Umukobwa ugukunda by’ukuri yita ku hazaza hanyu kandi mugafatanya kuhategura.
Kugushishikariza kwizigamira no kubitsa,gukoresha amafaranga neza ni bimwe mubizakwereka ko umukobwa agukunda, agukunda uko uri ,atari uko agukurikiyeho amafaranga ufite, ndetse akwifuriza ejo heza.
Umukobwa uzabona ashishikajwe gusa no kwakira amafaranga umuha, ntiyite ku hazaza hawe cyangwa ha mwembi, jya umugiraho amakenga.
2.
Gutumiza nta rutangira Umukobwa muzasohokana, ukabona ari gutumiza atitaye ku giciro cy’ibyo atumiza cyangwa ngo abanze arebe niba bitagushyira mu mazi abira,cyangwa bikakugiraho ingaruka mbi ku mufuka wawe,ntuzashakire kure agukurikiyeho amafaranga n’ubutunzi si urukundo.
Mwene uyu mukobwa ,uzamubwirwa n’uko atazatinya no kuba yatumiza telephone ihenze cyane(smart phone) kandi azi neza ko umushahara wawe uri munsi yayo igura.
3.
Agundira ibye Ikindi kizakubwira ko umukobwa mukundana agukundira amafaranga cyangwa ubutunzi , ni uko atajya ashaka kugira na we uruhare mu mubano wanyu cyane iyo bigeze mu gihe cyo kugira na we icyo agufasha cyerekeranye n’amafaranga.
Arakureka ukirwariza n’ubwo yaba afite icyo yagufasha.
Aba akeneye kwakira ibiva iwawe , ntakindi aba yifuza.
4.
Ahora ategereje kwakira Atitaye ku byakubayeho mu minsi yashize byaba byiza cyangwa bibi, aba ategereje iteka kwakira ikintu kiguturutseho kandi gifite agaciro.
5.
Ntajya ashima Biragoye ko mwene uyu mukobwa yashima ibyo umukorera.
Iyo ugize icyo umuha cyangwa umukorera , ababinona nkaho ari ibintu afitiye uburenganzira kandi biri mu nshingano zawe.
Mwene uyu mukobwa agushima gake cyane gashoboka , nabwo byagoranye.
6.
Hari n’abandi bagabo bamuha impano kandi zihenze Iyo umukobwa wita ko ari umukunzi wawe adasiba kubona impano zinyuranye ahabwa n’abandi basore cyangwa abagabo, agakenera kandi n’izindi ziguturukaho, kandi ukaba ubona ariwe wavuzwe mu ngingo zabanje, ntujijinganye, agukundira ikofi yawe , si urukundo.
7.
Ntajya yita aho ukura amafaranga Iki nacyo ni ikimenyetso mwene aba bakobwa bahuriraho.
Kuba umukobwa mukundana atita kuho ukura amarafaranga, ahubwo agashishikazwa nuko umuhereza , ni ikigeragezo wahuye nacyo , si umukunzi.

#7135#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Abacuruzi-basabwe-gukora-iyo-bwabaga-ingwate-Lt-Gen-Karenzi-yasabwe-ikaboneka
Abacuruzi basabwe gukora iyo bwabaga ingwate Lt Gen Karenzi yasabwe ikaboneka Urugaga rw'Abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) ruratangaza ko ubu rwatangiye ubukangurambaga budasanzwe mu Banyarwanda ariko cyane cyane abacuruzi, kugira ngo amafaranga Lt Gen Karenzi Karake yaciwe n'Urukiko mu Bwongereza nk'ingwate yo kuburana ari hanze aboneke.
Lt Gen KARENZI yaciwe amafaranga arenga gato Miliyari y'amanyarwanda n'Urukiko rwo mu Bwongereza, kugira ngo yemerewe gukurikiranwa ari hanze by'agateganyo.
Kuwa gatanu tariki 26 Kamena nibwo PSF yatangije ikigega "ISHEMA RYACU' kigamije gukusanya amafaranga azifashihswa mu kwishyura iyo ngwate Lt Gen yaciwe.
Mu kiganiro na Antoine Manzi Rutasiyisire, Ushinzwe ubuvugizi mu bucuruzi n'ibijyanye n'umurimo muri PSF, yadutangarije ko ubu batangiye ubukangurambaga mu banyarwanda, kandi ngo nubwo abacuruzi aribo bagaragaje ubushake bwa mbere ndetse kugeza ubu iki kigega kiba kiri gucungwa n'Urugaga rw'Abikorera, iyi gahunda ikaba ireba abanyarwanda bose.
PSF itangira icyo kigega, yavuze ko kigamije guhangana n'agasuzuguro amahanga akomeje kugirira u Rwanda, nyuma gato y'itabwa muri yombi rya Lt Gen Karenzi Karake ukuriye urwego rw'Ubutasi mu Rwanda.
Manzi yavuze ko abacuruzi by'umwihariko bahamagarirwa gutanga umusanzu wabo muri icyo kigega, dore ko n'ubusanzwe cyatangijwe ku gitekerezo cya bamwe mu bacuruzi, banahise bashyiramo amafaranga asaga Miliyoni 120 z'amanyarwanda.
Manzi yakomeje avuga ko abacuruzi bakwiye gufata iya mbere mu gushyigikira igitekerezo cya bagenzi babo, abandi banyarwanda nabo bakabunganira.
Gusa, nubwo PSF nta munsi ntarengwa igaragaza cyo kuba yamaze gukusanya amafaranga yose asaga Miliyari y'amanyarwanda, ivuga ko "ari igikorwa cyihutirwa (Urgent) abanyarwanda basabwa gushyigikira byihuse kuko hifuzwa ko kigira iherezo vuba."
MANZI avuga ko ubukangurambaga bugomba gushyirwamo imbara cyane muri iki cyumweru, nubwo yirinze kuvuga niba ari cyo igihe ntarengwa cyo gukusanya iyo ngwate yaciwe Lt Gen Karenzi.
Perezida Paul Kagame ubwo yarahizaga bamwe mu bayobozi bashya barimo na Minisitiri w'Uburezmi Mushya, Malimba Papias Musafiri, yavuze ko ibyakorewe Lt Gen Karenzi ari "agasuzuguro n'ubwirasi ku Rwanda" kandi yongeraho ko Atari ubwa mbere cyangwa ubwa nyuma bibaye.
PSF nayo ivuga ko ikigega ISHEMA RYACU kizahoraho.
Kuwa gatanu ushize Minisitiri w'Ubutabera Johnston Busingye yasabye abanyarwanda gufatanya bagashaka amafaranga urukiko rwaciye Lt Gen Karenzi, ndetse na Minisitiri ubwe yemera ko azagira icyo atanga.
Kugeza ubu PSF yatanze konti za banki ushaka gutanga inkunga ye mu kigega ayinyuzaho, arizo 00040-0677862-38 muri BK na 400.3820333-11muri BPR.

#7169#	11	people	https://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/article/kigali-yaje-ashaka-akazi-ko-mu-rugo-atungurwa-no-guhabwa-ak-uburaya

Muri Stade Amahoro naharirimbira !
Ikiganiro na Amb Habineza Joe wahoze ari Minisitiri Kuva kuwa Gatatu tariki 15 Nyakanga 2020, abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga batunguwe n’integuza y’uko Ambasaderi Habineza Joseph [Joe] agiye gushyira hanze indirimbo, bamwe babifata nk’urwenya abandi barabyishimira.
Ibitekerezo byagarukaga ku kuba Amb Habineza ari umugabo waranzwe kandi ukirangwa no gusabana n’abantu by’umwihariko urubyiruko ku buryo bitabatungura baramutse bamubonye mu ndirimbo ari kuririmba.
Amb Habineza Joe wabaye Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko, Siporo n’Umuco, kuri ubu ni Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Ubwishingizi cya Radiant Yacu Ltd.
Amb Habineza avuga ko akiri umwana yakuriye muri korali na nyuma aza gucuranga muri Salus ari naho ahera avuga ko nta mpamvu yamubuza kuririmba cyane ko n’ubundi asanzwe yarigeze kuba umunyamuziki.
Reba hano ikiganiro twagiranye na Amb Joe Mu kiganiro yagiranye na UKWEZI, yavuze ko hari abantu baje bamugezaho icyifuzo cy’uko bashobora gukorana indirimbo yumvise neza umushinga wabo asanga ari mwiza cyane nawe yemera gukorana nabo.
Uyu mugabo uvuga ko yigeze no gukina mu ikinamico Urunana, atangaza ko hari ikintu abona hano mu Rwanda cy’abantu badaha agaciro abahanzi kandi nabo ari abanyarwanda ndetse bafite uruhare rukomeye mu gushimisha abantu no kubigisha.
Yakomeje agira ati “Aha niho hari ikibazo ku banyarwanda, bakumva ko umuntu ukoze indirimbo cyangwa umuhanzi ari umuntu udafite ubuzima nk’ubw’abandi.
Icyo kintu njyewe ndakibaza, ikibi ni uko naririmba ibintu bitesha agaciro ariko niba mfite ubutumwa ngomba gutanga ni gute ntaririmba ?”
Amb Joseph avuga ko abahanzi ari abantu nk’abandi ariko usanga mu muryango Nyarwanda hari abatumva ko abahanzi bafite agaciro n’uruhare rukomeye mu kubaka abanyarwanda.
Ati “Ubu ko tujya mu rusengero kuko abantu baririmba ?
Ugasanga umuntu agiye muri korali ararimbye abantu bakamwubaha ariko yaririmba indirimbo izajya kuri radio ukabona bamuhaye akato.”
Yatanze urugero rw’igihe yari Minisitiri ubwo yigeze kujya mu Buyapana abantu bagacurangirwa n’uwari Minisitiri w’Umuco muri Brezil.
Amb Habineza avuga ko kuririmba atari ibintu azakora nk’akazi ariko igihe yumva yabonye uburyo ashobora no gukora izindi ndirimbo igihe cyose yumva bimurimo.
Abajijwe niba aramutse atumiwe mu gitaramo nk’umuntu uzaba afite indirimbo, Amb Habineza yavuze ko ari ibisanzwe kuko niba yarajyaga ku rubyiniro agiye kuvuga imbwirwaruhame yumva nta cyamubuza kujyaho agiye kuririmba.
Ati “Ko najyaga ku rubyiniro ngiye kuvuga imbwirwaruhame, ahubwo se kuririmba sibyo byoroshye ?
Nibyo nakubwiye ikibi ni ukuvuga ngo nishe akazi kanjye, mu gihe iyo ndirimbo yamfasha mu kazi kanjye no kuri Stade Amahoro naharirimbira ni uko Guma Guma itagihari.”
Habineza Joseph, yarakoreye uruganda rwa Heineken i Kinshasa, mu 1994-1998, ndetse aza no kuba Umuyobozi ushinzwe ikoranabuhanga muri Heineken muri Nigeria, mu 1998-2000.
Muri Nzeri 2004 kugeza muri Gashyantare 2011 yabaye Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko, Siporo n’Umuco, mu 2011- 2014 agirwa Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Nigeria aho yavuye ajya kwihangira imirimo aza gushinga uruganda.
Reba hano ikiganiro twagiranye na Amb Joe

Anagira umuriro no gucika intege cyane, kuribwa mu ngingo n’ibindi birimo gukorora.
Kwita ku ndembe za COVID-19 bisaba ubushobozi buhambaye kuko dufashe nk’urugero hari abarwayi bagiye bakenera litiro icumi z’umwuka ku munota kugira ngo babashe guhumeka.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yahishuye ko imwe mu mpamvu zatumye imibare y’abarembye kubera COVID-19 yiyongera ndetse n’abahitanwa na yo bakarushaho kuba benshi, ari uko hari abantu benshi bitiranyije ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 n’ibicurane bisanzwe, bigatuma babisuzugura bagatinda kujya kwivuza.
Umuvugizi wa Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, Julien Mahoro Niyingabira, yavuze ko kubera ko muri aya mezi hasanzwe n’ubundi hagaragara ibicurane bisanzwe (grippe), byatumye hari abagira ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 bakabisuzugura.
Yagize ati “Iki gihe ubusanzwe gikunze kubamo ibicurane bisanzwe, ibyo rero byatumye abenshi babisuzugura, bakamara igihe kinini batagiye kwa muganga kwisuzumisha kubera ko ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 byenda gusa neza n’iby’ibicurane bisanzwe bikunze kugaragara muri aya mezi.”
Yongeyeho ati “Kuba rero ari igihe gisanzwe kizwiho kubamo ibicurane bisanzwe bikaba byaratumye benshi bajya kwa muganga bakerewe, byatumye umubare w’abarwayi ba COVID-19 barembye cyane wiyongera, binatuma tugira umubare munini w’abitaba Imana.”
Niyingabira yavuze ko kuba harafashwe icyemezo cyo gushyira Umujyi wa Kigali muri Guma mu rugo, ari uko imibare y’abandura yari hejuru cyane kuko yari ikubye inshuro ebyiri imibare y’abandura ahasigaye hose mu gihugu.
Yongeyeho ko Umujyi wa Kigali wagombaga gushyirirwaho ingamba zihariye zigamije gukumira ko ubwandu bwarushaho gukwirakwira.
Ati “Mu Mujyi wa Kigali hashyizweho gahunda ya Guma mu rugo, abantu bakwiye kumva ko iyo dushyizeho Guma mu rugo cyangwa iyo tugabanyije ingendo z’abantu, bigira uruhare rukomeye kuko bituma abanduye badakwirakwiza ubwandu mu bandi.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RBC), Dr Sabin Nsanzimana, aherutse gutangaza ko mu bipimo bimaze iminsi bifatwa byagaragaye ko abangana na 16% y’abapimwa baba baranduye COVID-19 bakarinda bayikira batabimenye, ariko bakaba bashobora kuba baranduje benshi muri icyo gihe bari barwaye.
Umuganga ukora cyane mu bikorwa byo gupima COVID-19, Igiraneza Deborah, yatanze ubutumwa bw’uko buri muntu wese akwiye kurushaho kwirinda kuko nta wamenya uwanduye cyangwa utaranduye.
Yagize ati “COVID-19 ntabwo iboneshwa ijisho, ntushobora kubona umuntu ngo umenye niba ayirwaye cyangwa atayirwaye, ni yo mpamvu ugomba kwirinda.
Buri muntu wese ntabwo yapimwe, buri wese rero ashobora gusanga yaranduye kandi ntiwapfa kubimenya, ushobora no gusanga umwe mu bo mubana yaranduye, abantu rero bagomba kwirinda kuko ntuzi ukwegereye uko ahagaze.”
Imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ko icyiciro gikunze kugaragaramo umubare munini w’abandura, ari abari hagati y’imyaka 20 na 49, ahanini ngo kuko ari bo bantu bakunda kugenda cyane, baba bajya mu mirimo cyangwa ahandi.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iheruka gutangaza ko mu Rwanda nta mubare munini w’indembe kandi n’izihari zitabwaho zigakira zigataha.
Muri icyo gihe mu Bitaro byo mu Gatenga na Nyarugenge bijyanwamo abarwayi bafite ibibazo bikomeye hasezerewe abantu 45.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda, imibare igaragaza ko kugeza ku wa 25 Mutarama 2021, abanduye COVID-19 bose bagera ku 13311, muri bo abakirwaye bakaba 4453, mu gihe abitabye Imana ari 177.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro.
Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Mu gukomeza kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kwitwararika no kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune, kwirinda imihuro itari ngombwa no kwambara udupfukamunwa n’amazuru mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi.
Inzego z’ubuzima zitangaza ko ubwiyongere bw’indembe za COVID-19 bufitanye isano n’umubare munini w’abitiranya ibicurane bisanzwe n’ibimenyetso by’iki cyorezo.
Aba barwayi ni zimwe mu ndembe zirwariye mu Bitaro bya Nyarugenge

#7332#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/mine-ya-gifurwe-ngo-igomba-gufasha-abacukuzi-bayikoramo-kwigira-bityo
Mine ya Gifurwe ngo igomba gufasha abacukuzi bayikoramo kwigira bityo bagaharira n'abandi Guverineri w'intara y'amajyaruguru, Bosenibamwe Aimé, arasaba abaturage bo mu murenge wa Rugengabari, mu karere ka Burera, gufata neza umutungo kamere w'amabuye y'agaciro ari mu murenge wa bo kugira ngo uzabafashe kwigira kandi baharanira kuwusaranganya.
Guverineri Bosenibamwe yatangaje ibi ubwo, ku wa gatanu tariki ya 24/1/2014, yifatanyaga na Mine ya Gifurwe, iri muri uwo murenge, mu kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w'ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro, usanzwe uba tariki 04 Ukuboza buri mwaka.
Nduhije Fabien yahawe igihembo nk'umucukuzi w'intangarugero.
Iyi mine icukurwamo amabuye y'agaciro yo mu bwoko bwa Wolfram.
Ayo mabuye y'agaciro acukurwa na kampani yitwa Wolfram Mining and Processing Ltd.
Iyo kampani ikoresha abakozi bagera ku 1250 barimo abayituriye ndetse n'abaturuka ahandi, aho ibahemba bose hamwe amafaranga y'u Rwanda agera uri miliyoni 50 buri kwezi.
Umukozi uhembwa amafaranga make muri bo ahembwa amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 50.
Guverineri Bosenibamwe yabwiye abo bakozi ko bagomba gufata iyo mine "nk'aho bajishe igisabo" bityo bagafatanya kuyirindira umutekano, bakirinda gusahura amabuye y'agaciro kuko ariyo ituma biteza imbere kandi igatuma n'u Rwanda rwigira.
Abacukura amabuye y'agaciro muri Mine ya Gifurwe bibutswa ko iyo mine igomba kubafasha kubona amafaranga bagahanga indi mirimo bityo bagaharira n'abandi nabo bagacukura.
Agira ati "Twaje ahangaha kugira ngo twereke aba baturage ko bafite umutungo ukomeye cyane, bagomba kwishimira ko bafite.
Kandi bakawufata nk'umusingi ukomeye cyane wo kwigira."
Uyu muyobozi akomeza abwira abo bacukuzi b'amabuye y'agaciro guharanira ko amafaranga bakura muri ako kazi bakora yabafasha guhanga indi mirimo yabo mishya bityo ntibazahere mu kazi ko gucukurua amabuye y'agaciro gusa ahubwo bagaha amahirwe n'abandi.
Agira ati "Turabasaba ko baraharanira ko ayo mabuye y'agaciro abafasha kubona amafaranga yo gushora imari.
Umuntu ntakazabe umucukuzi w'amabuye y'agaciro ubuzira herezo."
"Ahubwo azagere igihe avuga ngo naracukuye, nabonye amafaranga, narazigamye, ahasigaye reka ndekere abandi banyarwanda batagize amahirwe yo kubona iyi Mine hanyuma njye mu bindi bikorwa binyuranye nabyo bimpa amafaranga.
Ibyo bizatuma umutungo kamere w'u Rwanda usaranganwa mu banyarwanda benshi bashoboka."
Abacukuzi bahamya ko ibateza imbere Abacukura amabuye y'agaciro muri Mine ya Gifurwe bahamya ko iyo mine imaze kubageza kuri byinshi.
Nduhije Fabien, umwe muri bo, avuga ko ubu amaze kugera ku mushahara w'amafaranga y'u Rwanda agera ku bihumbi 600 buri kwezi.
Ngo ayo mafaranga yose atuma yikenura.
Agira ati "Ubu mfite inka zigeze kuri enye.
Mfite n'abana batatu bari mu mashuri hejuru, ndabatangira.
Mfite n'inzu y'ibati."
Nduhije kandi yahawe igihembo nk'umucukuzi w'intangarugero muri Mine ya Gifurwe.
Yahawe igikombe ndetse n'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 100.
Uyu mugabo afite abakozi bagera ku 106 ahagarariye.
Niwe ubakoresha, akabareberera buri kintu cyose ndetse akaba ari nawe ubahemba.
Akora nk'aho ari rwiyemeza mirimo.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa Wolfram Mining and Processing Ltd ahemba Nduhije nawe agahemba abakozi ahagarariye.
Mu bandi bakozi bahagarariye abandi muri Mine ya Gifurwe, Nduhije niwe ubahiga akaba ari nayo mpamvu yahawe igihembo.
Icyo abarusha ngo ni uko afite abakozi benshi batanga umusaruro mwinshi kandi abo bakozi bose bakaba bafite ubwishingizi mu buvuzi (mituelle de Santé) ndetse n'ubwo muri "Caisse Sosiale".
Abakozi bose bacukura amabuye y'agaciro bafite ibyangombwa byose bigenewe abakozi bacukura amabuye y'agaciro bityo bigatuma muri iyo mine nta mpanuka bakunze guhura nazo.
Guverineri Bosenibamwe avuga ko Mine ya Gifurwe ari intangarugero mu ma Mine agera kuri atandatu akorera mu ntara y'amajyaruguru.
Ikindi ni uko mu mwaka wa 2012 iyi Mine yahawe igikombe cy'umucukuzi mwiza w'amabuye y'agaciro mu Rwanda.
Kalima Jean Malik, umuyobozi mukuru wa Mine ya Gifurwe, avuga ko ku mwaka bacukura amabuye y'agaciro agera kuri toni 120.
Gusa ariko ngo bafite intumbero yo gucukura toni 20 z'amabuye y'agaciro buri kwezi.
Iyo amabuye y'agaciro ya Wolfram amaze gutunganywa neza agurishwa kuri sosiyete yitwa Wolfram Bergbeau ikorera mu bihugu birimo Ubudage.
Norbert NIYIZURUGERO

Iki kibazo cyagaragajwe ubwo hasozwaga amarushanwa yo gusoma yitabiriwe n’abanyeshuri baturutse mu bigo 45 byo muri Kigali, ariko ugasanga ababashije kugera ku cyiciro cya nyuma abenshi ari abo mu bigo byigenga.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage, Muhongerwa Patricia, yavuze ko ibigo by’amashuri ya leta bigiye gukurikiranirwa hafi, kuko ibitabo bihabwa hagamije kwimakaza umuco wo gusoma no kwandika bidakoreshwa neza.

Muhongerwa avuga ko igisubizo cyo kwimakaza umuco wo gusoma mu bigo ari byo bigifite, kikaba ari cyo cyaherwaho mu gufashwa kuwimakaza.
Amarushanwa yo gusoma ategurwa buri mwaka n’Umujyiwa Kigali yatangiye mu 2014.
Abatsinze uyu mwaka mu gukora ibiganiro mpaka, gusoma no kwandika bazahemberwa mu nama y’uburezi yaguye yo ku rwego rw’Umujyi wa Kigali iteganyijwe mu kwezi gutaha.
Queen Mutesi wo muri Groupe Scolaire APADE yatsinze mu irushanwa ryo gusoma ku rwego rw’amashuri abanza; Laissa Uwase wo muri FAWE Girls School atsinda ku rwego rw’icyiciro rusange; Belinda Uwase uturuka muri King David Academy na Flora Niyigena wo muri FAWE Girls School batsinda mu barangiza amashuri yisumbuye; AbdulKarim Mugisha wo muri Riviera High School yatsinze mu gukora ibiganiro mpaka ku rwego rw’icyiciro rusange.

#7334#	6	religion	http://www.makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article/Umuryango-w-abayisilamu-mu-Rwanda-wahishuye-itekinika-ukora-mu-bajya-mu-mutambagiro-i-Maka
Umuryango w'abayisilamu mu Rwanda wahishuye itekinika ukora mu bajya mu mutambagiro i Maka Ngo bibasaba guhindura imibare kugira ngo batabuzwa kwinjiara i Maka Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu taliki ya 9 Ukuboza 2015 ubwo abayisilamu bavuye mu mutambagiro mutagatifu bahabwaga ibyemezo by'ishimwe,umuryango w'abayisilamu mu Rwanda wagaragaje uburyo utekinika imibare y'abajya mu mutambagiro mutagatifu (Hijja) kugira ngo igihugu cya Arabia saudite kitazababuza kuwitabira.
Muri iyi nama umuryango w'abayisiramu mu Rwanda watangaje ko kugeza ubu ikibazo uyu muryango ufite gikomeye,ndetse gishobora no kuzambura abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda uburenganzira bwo kujya mu mutambagiro mutagatifu ari uburyo bagendamo iyo bajya I Meque.
Mufuti w'u Rwanda Kayitare Ibrahim yavuze ko igihugu cya Arabiya saudite cyemereye umuryango w'abayisiramu mu Rwanda kujya ujyana abayisilamu 120 mu gihe cy'umutambagiro mutagatifu, babura uyu muryango ukaba wahagarikwa gutwara abantu mu mutambagiro mutagatifu.
Kuba uyu mubare w'abayisilamu 120 bemerewe kujyana mu mutambagiro mutagatifu batawugezaho,bituma umuryango w'abayisilamu murwanda wemera gutekinika kugira ngo utazabuzwa kwerekeza ku butaka butagatifu.
Mufti kayitare asobanura uko umuryango w'abayisilamu mu Rwanda ubigenza, yavuze ko nko mu mwaka ushize bajyanye abayisilamu bagera kuri 80 ariko uyu muryango ukaba warishyuriye ibisabwa abayisilamu 120 ikintu avuga ko gikomeza kubateza igihombo.
Sheikh Kayitare Ibrahim yagize ati:"Iyo tutagejeje ku bantu 120 kiriya gihugu cyatwemereye, abandi bose basigaye turabishyurira.
Urugero iyo abantu biyandikishije tukabona nk'abantu 80 hakabura abantu 40 icyo gihe mu kwishyura service zose zisabwa twishyurira abantu 120 urumva ko abo 40 bo tubishyurira kandi badahari."
Kuba umubare w'abayisilamu umuryango w'abayisilamu mu Rwanda ujyana mu mutambagiro mutagatifu ukiri hasi, abayisilamu bavuga ko biterwa n'uko abayisilamu bamwe bagenda n'izindi kompanyi zitari iz'umuryango w'abayisiramu mu Rwanda, bityo bakaba bagirana inama yo kujya bagendera hamwe kugira ngo u Rwanda rutazagera aho rusibwa mu bihugu byitabira umutambagiro mutagatifu.
Sheikh Abdoul Kalim Harerimana we asaba abayisilamu kujya bagendera hamwe mu gihe bagiye mu mutambagiro mutagatifu kugira ngo bongere ubumwe kuko ari byo bizatuma abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda bakomeza guhabwa agaciro.
Sheikh Abdoul kalim Harerimana yagize ati:"Umuryango w'abayisilamu mu Rwanda ufite ubushobozi bwo gutwara abantu bageze no ku gihumbi,numvaga rero icyiza ari uko twajya tugendera hamwe turi bamwe kuko nibyo byaba byiza kurushaho" Abayisilamu barasabwa kujya bagendera hamwe kugira ngi imibare y'abasabwa ibashe kuzura Sheikh Tamir Murangwa ushinzwe ibikorwa byo gutegurira abayisilamu umutambagiro mutagatifu, avuga ko mu rwego rwo kugira ngo abayisilamu bajye bagendera hamwe, uyu muryango wamanuye ibiciro kugira ngo abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda bajye bagendera hamwe.
Mu mwaka w'1968 nibwo abanyarwanda batangiye kwitabira umutambagiro mutagatifu, ariko bakajya bagenda banyuze mu gihugu cya Uganda, ariko mu mwaka wa 2007 baza kwigobotora kugendera mu kwaha kwa Uganda, batangira kugenda bazamuye ibendera ry'u Rwanda.
Gusa ngo kuri ubu bakaba bahangayikishijwe n'uko bashobora kuzamburwa ubwo burenganzira bitewe n'uko uburyo bw'imigendere butanoze bushobora kuzatuma umubare bemerewe ubura bityo bakaba bashobora guhagarikwa kujya gusengera ku butaka butagatifu i Mecque.

#7335#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/Abashakashatsi-bagomba-kugira-uruhare-mu-iterambere-ry-igihugu-Dr-Musafiri
Abashakashatsi bagomba kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'igihugu -Dr Musafiri Dr Musafiri Papias, umuyobozi w'ishami rya Kaminuza y'u Rwanda ryigisha ubucuruzi n'ubukungu (College of Business and Economics), aratangaza ko abashakashakashatsi bagomba kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'ibihugu byabo, bakanagira uruhare mu iterambere ry'akarere batuyemo muri rusange.
Ibi Dr Musafiri yabitangaje ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 05 Gicurasi 2015 ubwo hatangizwaga inama mpuzamahanga y'iminsi itatu y'abashakashatsi baturutse mu mpande zose z'isi, aho bateganya kuzaganira ku bushakashatsi bakoze ku iterambere ry'ubukungu n'ubucuruzi, mu bihugu bigize Afurika y'uburasirazuba.
Dr Musafiri atangaza ko abashakashatsi bagomba kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'ibihugu byabo.
Dr Musafiri yatangaje ko haramutse habaye imikoranire no guhuza hagati y'abashakashatsi cyane cyane mu by'ubukungu n'imibereho hamwe n'abagena politiki z'ubukungu mu bihugu bigize akarere k'Afurika y'uburasirazuba, hagaragara iterambere rifite ireme muri ibyo bihugu.
Yagize ati "Kubera icyuho cyakunze kugaragara hagati y'abashakashatsi mu by'ubukungu hamwe n'abagena politike z'ubukungu n'iterambere mu bihugu, izo politike zikunze kudashingira ku bintu byaturutse mu bushakashatsi.
Ugasanga inzego zikora ubushakashatsi ari nka za kaminuza, ibyo zikora ntaho bihuriye n'abagena izo politike mu buryo butandukanye".
Abateguye iyi nama iri kubera muri Kaminuza y'u Rwanda, ishami ry'ubucuruzi n'ubukungu.
Dr Musafiri yakomeje avuga ko icyo cyuho kivuyeho abagena izo politike bagashingira ku bimenyetso bifatika byavuye mu bushakashatsi nta kabuza iterambere ryakwihuta, kandi rikagaragarira buri wese muri ibi bihugu bigize akarere ka Afurika y'uburasirazuba.
Muri iyi nama izamara iminsi itatu, abashakashatsi bo ku isi hose bazaganira ku mbogamizi ubukungu n'ubucuruzi bifite mu bihugu byo mu karere, barebe buri gihugu icyo cyakwigira ku kindi ku bijyanye n'iterambere mu bukungu n'ubucuruzi, kugira ngo bazakuremo ingamba bageza ku bagena politike z'ubukungu n'ubucuruzi mu bihugu byabo.
Dr Musafiri yanatangaje kandi ko nyuma y'iyi nama bazanashyiraho ihuriro ry'aba bashakashatsi, kugira ngo bazakomeze gukora ubushakashatsi ku bibazo bizahaje ubukungu haba mu Rwanda ndetse no mu bihugu bigize akarere, kugira ngo bushingirweho n'abashinzwe gushyiraho politike z'ubukungu n'iterambere mu bihugu mu guhangana n'ibyo bibazo.
Roger Marc Rutindukanamurego

#7348#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Abitabiriye-inama-ku-buringanire-bw-ibitsina-byombi-bishimiye-Isange
Abitabiriye inama ku buringanire bw’ibitsina byombi bishimiye Isange Itsinda ry’abantu 25 baturutse mu bihugu bya Afurika bari mu Rwanda mu nama mpuzamahanga aho barebera hamwe uko bateza imbere uburinganire hagati y’abagabo n’abagore, ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 3 Ugushyingo basuye ikigo Isange One Stop Center gikorera mu bitaro bya Kacyiru, aho baje kwirebera uko u Rwanda rwishatsemo ibisubizo mu gukumira kurwanya no gufasha abakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina n’irikorerwa abana.
Aba bashyitsi bakigera ku Isange One Stop Center, bakiriwe n’Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda wungirije, Chief Supt of Police (CSP) Lynder Nkuranga, ababwira amavu n’amavuko yacyo, anabatembereza mu byumba bikigize, ari nako basobanurirwa serivise zitangwa n’ iki kigo zirimo, guha uwakorewe ihohoterwa ubufasha mu by’ ubuvuzi, ubutabera ndetse n’ ubujyanama.
CSP Nkuranga yababwiye ko mu gihugu hose hamaze kugezwa ibigo nk’ibi 44, aho yavuze ati:”Ubufasha bwose buhabwa ugannye ibi bigo burimo abuhabwa ku buntu, kandi ikiza ni uko Serivisi zose akenera azibonera ahantu hamwe.”
Nyuma y’aho Tadesse Engida ukomoka muri Ethiopia yavuze ko intego y’urugendo rwabo ari ukwigira ku kigo Isange kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina kuko ari ikigo kizwi ku Isi mu kurwanya ibi byaha no gufasha ababikorewe, akaba yagize ati:”U Rwanda ni igihugu cyamenyekanye ku Isi yose kubera imbaraga cyashyize mu gukumira no kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.
Twamenye ko Ikigo Isange ari bumwe mu buryo u Rwanda rwashyizeho mu guhangana n’ibyo byaha no gufasha ababikorewe.
Ni muri urwo rwego twaje kureba uko Isange ikora, bityo tuzavugane n’abayobozi b’ibihugu byacu barebe ko bashyiraho ibigo nk’ibi.”
Mugenzi we Rukiya Mohamed wo muri Sudani y’Epfo yavuze ati:”Tubonye ubushake bwo guhuriza hamwe inzego zose zishinzwe gukumira no kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina bw’abayobozi b’u Rwanda, ubunararibonye dukuye mu Rwanda, butweretse ko gukorera hamwe kw’inzego zose byagize ingaruka nziza mu kurwanya ibi byaha no gufasha ababikorewe, kandi ibindi bihugu bya Afurika bifite byinshi byakwigira ku Rwanda”.
Mbere yaho mu gitondo, CSP Nkuranga yari yakiriye intumwa zo muri Polisi yo mu gihugu cya Suède nazo zasuye iki kigo, zari ziyobowe na Inspector, Thereza Skogbund Shokarabi.
Nawe yashimye uko Isange yita k’uwakorewe ihohoterwa aho yavuze ati:”Ibyo mbonye ni ingenzi cyane, biragaragara ko u Rwanda ruri ku isonga mu guteza imbere uburinganire n’ubutabera.”
Abitabiriye iyi nama basuye Isange one stop center Iki kigo (Isange) cyashyizweho muri 2010, ku bufasha bwa Nyakubahwa Madame wa Perezida, Jeanette Kagame, n’Ihuriro ry’Amashami y’Umuryango w’Abibimbye akorera mu Rwanda (One UN).
Isange itanga serivise z’ubutabazi mu rwego rwo kurinda uwahohotewe gutwara inda, imiti irinda ubwandu bwa SIDA, ubufasha mu kwirinda indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina n’ubundi buvuzi.
Isange kandi yohereza mu bitaro bikuru iyo hakenewe ubuvuzi bwihariye, serivisi z’ubuganga bukenerwa mu maperereza, ubujyanye n’imyibarukire, ubuvuzi bw’indwara zo mu mutwe, icumbi mu rwego rw’umutekano na serivise zo gusubiza abantu mu buzima busanzwe.
Muri raporo ya Global Gender Gap 2017 yasohotse kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 3 Ugushyingo, U Rwanda rwaje ku mwanya wa kane ku Isi, n’uwa mbere muri Afurika mu kuziba icyuho mu buringanire hagati y’abagabo n’abagore.

#7351#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/nyaruguru-umugabo-yasanzwe-imbere-y-urugo-rwe-yapfuye
Nyaruguru: Umugabo yasanzwe imbere y’urugo rwe yapfuye Umugabo witwa Jean Damascene Mporamusanga wo mu Kagari ka Ruhinga, Umurenge wa Nyabimata mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, yasanzwe imbere y’urugo rwe yapfuye, nyuma y’amakimbirane yari yaraye agiranye n’umugore we Nyirabukara Odette.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyabimata, Rudasingwa Aphrodis, yemereye Kigali Today ko uyu mugabo koko yasanzwe imbere y’iwe mu rugo yapfuye, gusa avuga ko nta wakwemeza ko yishwe n’umugore we.
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko amakuru y’urupfu rwa Mporamusanga bayamenye ahagana saa sita kuri uyu wa mbere, bagahita bihutira kujyayo nk’ubuyobozi hamwe n’inzego z’umutekano.
Rudasingwa avuga ko bakihagera basanze uwo mugabo yapfuye, ariko ko nta gikomere na kimwe bamusanganye ku mubiri.
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko umugore wa nyakwigendera hamwe n’abana batari bahari, kuko abana bakuru bari bagiye kwiga, naho umuto yajyanye na nyina.
Yavuze kandi ko baganiriye n’umugore wa nyakwigendera, akababwira ko kuva mu gitondo umugabo yamubwiraga ko yumva arwaye, akamusaba kujya kwa muganga ariko undi akabyanga avuga ko azajyayo ejo.
Amakuru aturuka mu baturanyi b’uyu muryango aravuga ko uwo mugabo hari abamubonye mu gitondo arimo yota izuba aho yaguye.
Icyakora andi makuru avuga ko uyu muryango wari umaze iminsi mu makimbirane yaturutse ku mafaranga y’inka bagurishije, ariko umugabo akayanywera yose akayamara.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyabimata Aphrodis Rudasingwa, na we yemeje aya makuru, avuga ko uwo muryango wari wararagije inka umuntu, ariko akaza kubabwira ko atagishoboye kuyitaho.
Nyuma y’ibyo ngo haje gufatwa umwanzuro wo kuyigurisha bagabana amafaranga, maze umuryango wa Mporamusanga uhabwa amafaranga ibihumbi 80 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, ari na yo bivugwa ko yanywereye akayamara.
Kuva uwo mugabo yabona ayo mafaranga ngo ntiyongeye kugaruka mu rugo, kugeza ku cyumweru tariki 01 Werurwe 2020, ubwo umugore we yamusangaga mu kabari mu gasantere baturanye.
Uwo muyobozi avuga ko ku kyumweru tariki ya 01 Werurwe 2020, umugore wa Mporamusanga yamusanze mu gasantere kari hafi y’aho batuye, akamubaza aho yashyize amafaranga, ariko agasanga nta yo afite, gusa nyuma y’uko abaturage babumvikanishije umugabo yari yemeye ko yari kumuha ibihumbi 20 kuri uyu wa mbere saa kumi n’imwe.
Abaturage bavuga ko muri uko kugirana amakimbirane, umugore ngo yabwiye umugabo ko "uko anywera ayo mafaranga yanazigama ayo kugura isanduku yo kumushyuinguramo".
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, CIP Twajamahoro Sylvestre, na we yemeje amakuru y’urupfu rwa Mporamusanga.
CIP Twajamahoro yavuze ko umurambo wa nyakwigendera wasanzwe imbere y’iwe, ariko hakaba nta kimenyetso kigaragaza icyaba cyamwishe.
Yavuze ko ubu hatangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekanye icyaba cyateye uru rupfu, mu bakorwaho iperereza hakaba harimo n’umugore wa nyakwigendera.
CIP Twajamahoro kandi na we yavuze ku makimbirane yari ari hagati y’uyu muryango, avuga ko na we amakuru afite ari uko ku cyumweru bari batonganye bapfa amafaranga.
Umurambo wajyanywe ku Bitaro bya Munini mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, kugira ngo usuzumwe.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Charles Ruzindana Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ CharlesRUZINDA2

#7508#	0	entertainment	http://www.umuryango.rw/imyidagaduro/article/ifoto-y-umunyarwandakazi-kate-bashabe-yatumye-abasore-bamutomagura-biratinda
Ifoto y’umunyarwandakazi Kate Bashabe yatumye abasore bamutomagura biratinda[AMAFOTO] Mu minsi ishize ubwo yashyiraga hanze amafoto agaragaza inseko ye abafana be benshi biganjemo ab’igitsina gabo bayavuzeho ibintu byinshi bitabdukanye,bamwe bamushimangiza ko aseka neza,ari mwiza abandi bakavuga ko ariwe muntu wabo wa mbere bemera ndetse hari n’abagiye bashimangiza ko abirabura ari beza cyane bashingiye ku buranga bw’uyu mwali w’umunyarwandakazi.
Ifoto ya Kate Bashabe yatumye abasore benshi bamutera imitoma Mu minsi ishize Kate Bashabe, ukurikirwa n’imbaga y’abarenga ibihumbi 459 kuri Instagram, yashyize ifoto kuri urwo rubuga yifuriza abakunzi be icyumweru cyiza maze abafana bayisamira hejuru nk’ibisanzwe ndetse na Mani Martin aboneraho gushyira hanze imbamutima ze amutaka.
Martin wagaragayeho gukururwa n’imiterere ya Bashabe, ntiyabashije guhisha ibyiyumviro bye ubwo yabonaga iyo foto, ahubwo yahise ajya muri “comments” yandikaho amagambo ngo “Size wanu”, ashatse kugaragariza Bashabe ko yakunze imiterere ye.
Bashabe wakunze kwerekana ko atifuza kuvugwa mu rukundo n’abahanzi nyarwanda kuva bamuvugana na Meddy mu mwaka wa 2017, yahise asiba iyo foto vuba ndetse anaboroka Mani Martin kuri Instagram bisa n’aho atifuje ko abafana n’itangazamakuru bongera kumubaza ibibazo nk’ibyo bamubajije ubwo hagaragaraga amafoto ari kumwe na Meddy.
Bashabe yavuzwe mu rukundo n’umukinnyi wa Liverpool, Sadio Mane, gusa uwo munya-Sénégal yahakanye ibyo gukundana na we.
Mani Martin wakumiriwe na Kate Bashabe bakoranye indirimbo yitwa “You and I” mu mwaka wa 2019.
Kate Bashabe n’ubwo akurikirwa n’ibihumbi 459 kuri Instagram we nta muntu ku giti cye akurikira.

#7518#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/si-abaturage-gusa-n-abayobozi-baradohotse-ku-mabwiriza-yo-kwirinda-covid-19-meya-gashema
Si abaturage gusa, n’abayobozi baradohotse ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid-19 - Meya Gashema Umuyobozi w’agateganyo w’Akarere ka Nyaruguru, Gashema Janvier, avuga ko atari abaturage gusa badohotse ku kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 ahubwo n’abayobozi badohotse ari byo bituma imibre y’abarwayi yiyongera.
Akarere ka Nyaruguru kahagurukiye kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda Covid-19 Yabigarutseho mu kiganiro yagiranye na Radio Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2021, avuga ku ngamba nshya akarere gafite nyuma y’uko ingendo guhera saa moya z’ijoro zibujijwe.
Gashema avuga ko mu mirenge 14 igize akarere barimo gushishikariza abaturage kubahiriza amabwiriza ajyanye no kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19.
Ikindi ni uko ubuyobozi bwose burimo gukebura abaturage aho abashobora gutandukira ku bijyanye n’amabwiriza.
Avuga ko kuva COVID-19 yagera mu Rwanda, mu Karere ka Nyaruguru hamaze kugaragara abarwayi barenga 120, abaturage 50 bakaba bakirwariye mu ngo zabo, babiri bari kwa muganga abandi bakaba bari mu bigo binyuzwamo abantu by’igihe gito (Transit Center), naho batandatu bakaba aribo bamaze guhitanwa n’icyo cyorezo.
Avuga ko ugaragaweho uburwayi aherekezwa akagezwa mu rugo yaba abana n’abandi bagapimwa kugira ngo barebe ko nabo batanduye hanyuma bagahabwa amabwiriza y’uko bagomba kwitwara.
Gashema avuga ko ku bagaragaweho uburwayi kandi aribo bari batunze ingo zabo kandi bigaragara ko nta bundi bushobozi, akarere kabafasha kubona ibibatunga ndetse n’ibindi bikoresho by’isuku.
Agira ati “Hari abo usanga bafite amikoro makeya kandi yenda ugasanga uwo muntu ariwe wari utunze umuryango kandi ntagomba gusohoka kugira ngo atanduza abandi, nk’akarere tubageraho tukabagenera ibibatunga ku munsi n’ibindi bikoresho byangombwa byaba iby’isuku ndetse n’ibimufasha kugira ngo COVID-19 itamuzahaza kandi akire vuba”.
Yongeraho ko ibyo bikorwa byose babikora bafatanyije n’inzego z’ubuzima ndetse n’iz’ibanze kugira ngo uwo murwayi akire vuba kandi atanduje abandi.
Ikindi ngo batangiye kubahiriza amabwiriza mashya kandi yizeye ko abaturage bazayashyira mu bikorwa kuko ngo bumvira ubuyobozi.
Avuga ko atari abaturage gusa badohotse ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19, ahubwo n’ubuyobozi bwadohotse.
Ati “Nta n’ubwo byakwitwa kudohoka gusa yenda ku baturage, tuvugishije ukuri twakwemeranya ko inzego natwe twagiye tudohoka ari na byo nsaba abayobozi dufatanya kuyobora Akarere ka Nyaruguru, nk’uko nabivuze kare, nta kibazo abaturage bafite mu kubahiriza amabwiriza mu gihe twabibukije kenshi”.
Gashema avuga ko ahantu hatumye indwara ikwira ari abagendaga batambaye neza agapfukamunwa n’abakibagirwa, kudahana intera ndetse n’abari barahinduye ingo zabo utubari.
Arasaba abaturage gukomeza imirimo yabo ariko bambara neza agapfukamunwa, bagahana intera ariko bakanibuka ko isaha ya saa moya bagomba kuba bageze mu ngo zabo.
Aranashishikariza kandi abikekaho ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 kwihutira kujya kwa muganga hakiri kare kugira ngo nibasanga yanduye afashwe ataranduza abandi.
Ikindi ni uko abayobozi aribo babanziriza abaturage mu isoko kugira ngo basange hashyizwe uburyo bwose butuma binjira neza kandi amasoko ahuza abantu benshi ahuriramo ibicuruzwa bitandukanye, kuba bimwe byacuruzwa mu gitondo ibindi amasaha y’amanywa cyangwa bimwe mu bicuruzwa bikimurirwa ku w’undi munsi.

#7523#	6	religion	http://makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article/Waba-uzi-isano-Ubunane-bufitanye-n-ibyanditswe-byera
Waba uzi isano Ubunane bufitanye n'ibyanditswe byera?
Ubusanzwe ku itariki ya 1Mutarama buri mwaka hafi ku isi yose hizihizwa umunsi w'itangira ry'umwaka mushya (Ubunane), aho abantu baba bishimira ko barangije umwaka mu mahoro ndetse banatangiye undi mu mahoro.
Uyu munsi w'Ubunane wizihizwa kuri iyi tariki ya Mbere, n'abakoresha ingengabihe (calendar) ya Gregoire ndetse na Julien uhereye mu myaka myinshi ishize.
Mu muco wa kera w'abaromani, itariki ya mbere Mutarama buri mwaka kuva mu mwaka wa 153 mbere y'ivuka rya Yezu, yabaga ari itariki ya kuramya ibigirwamana byabo muri icyo gihe.
Mu mwaka wa 42 mbere y'ivuka rya Yezu, iyi tariki yabaye itariki yo kwibukiraho uwitwaga Julius Caesar wari warakoze ingengabihe ya Julien wari umaze kwicwa.
Umunsi w'Ubunani uhura neza n'ikebwa (gusiramura) rya Yezu Kirisitu Nyuma y'ivuka rya Yezu abenshi bafata nk'umucunguzi w'isi, amadini n'amatorero amwe ntiyizihiza uyu munsi nk'umunsi w'itangira ry'umwaka gusa, ahubwo ngo aba anizihiza ikebwa rye ari nabwo yahawe izina nkuko bigaragara muri bibiliya, muri Luka, 2:21.
Amatorero arimo Abangilikani n'aba Lutheri kugeza ubu yo ngo ajya mu nsengero kuri iyi tariki atari ukwishimira ko basoje umwaka ndetse banatangira undi mu mahoro gusa, ahubwo ngo baba banibukaho ikebwa ry'umwana Yezu, bitewe n'uko Yezu yavutse kuri 25 Ukuboza, kandi umuco w'Abaheburayo waravugaga ko buri mwana wese w'umuhungu yagombaga gukebwa ku munsi wa munani ukurikira ivuka rye (itari ya 1 Mutarama).
Mu idini Gatolika kuva muri iyo myaka yakurikiye ivuka rya Yezu kugeza ubwo Papa Paul II yari agiye kuyobora Kiliziya Gatolika, nabo bizihizaga umunsi w'ikebwa rya Yezu, ariko nyuma yuko Papa agiriye kuri uyu mwanya, yahinduye izina ry'uyu munsi awita umunsi w'izina ritagatifu rya Yezu.
Akimara kuwuhindurira izina, Papa yahinduye n'itariki wizihirizwaho awushyira ku itariki 3 Mutarama buri mwaka, naho itariki ya mbere yemeza ko abayoboke b'idini Gatolika bazajya bizihiza umunsi wa Bikiramariya Nyina wa Jambo.
Ku munsi w'Ubunani abaturage bo mu bihugu bitandukanye bikoresha ingengabihe ya Gregoire bizihiza uyu munsi bahana impano zitandukanye, ari nako basangira ibiribwa n'ibinyobwa hamwe n'imiryango n'inshuti zabo.
Isi yose ntitangirira rimwe umwaka Nubwo umwaka mu bihugu byinshi bizihiza itangira ry'umwaka ku itariki ya 1 Mutarama, hari bimwe mu bihugu byizihiza uyu munsi ku yindi tariki kuburyo usanga hamwe bawizihiza mu mwaka hagati.
Thailand Mu gihugu cya Thailand bo bizihiza umwaka mushya ku itariki ya 13 cyangwa iya 14 Mata buri mwka, umunsi wahawe izina rya Songkran.
Iyi tariki kandi ihurirwaho n'igihugu cya Cambodia muri aziya.
Mu bihugu by'Ubushinwa n'ibindi bihugu bikoresha ingengabihe ya Abashinwa, bo bizihiza ubunani hagati y'itariki ya 21 Mutarama n'itariki ya 20 Gashyantare buri mwaka.
Ethiopia Mu gihugu cya Ethiopia umunsi w'ubunani wahawe izina rya Enkutatash, ukaba wizihizwa ku itariki ya 11 Nzeri, aho bawizihiza buri gihe mu mpera z'igihe cy'izuba (impeshyi) ugendeye ku ngengabihe y'igihugu cya Ethiopia.

#7527#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/ibimenyetso-bigaragaza-ko-umusore-mukundana-ashobora-kuba-atakigukunda
Ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko umusore mukundana ashobora kuba atakigukunda Umaze igihe ukundana n’umusore ndetse urukundo rwanyu rwarakebaga ariko muri iyi minsi ubona ibintu bisa nibyahinduye isura ku buryo ucyibaza niba koko akigukunda.
Ibikurikira ni ibimenyetso bizakwereka ko umusore mukundana yagabanyije umurego mu rukundo ndetse ko bishoboka ko aho mugana atari heza.
1.
Ingeso nziza zawe yishimiraga, zisigaye zimubera umutwaro 2.
Asigaye arakazwa n’ubusa kandi bikagorana ko uburakari bushira kandi biturutse ku mpamvu zidafatika ( nyamara siko byahoze) 3.
Asigaye yihugiyeho kuburyo asigaye abura umwanya wo kuba muri kumwe (mbere byari ikinyuranyo, yigomwaga byinshi ngo akubonere umwanya) 4.
Telefoni ye asigaye yarayishyizemo urufunguzo rukomeye gukuramo (atanakubwiye)nyamara mbere warayinjiragamo uko ushaka.
5.
Asigaye aguhisha amabanga y’ubuzima bwe, ariko mbere yakubwiraga byose bimwerekeye.
6.
Ntakikugisha inama ariko mbere ni wowe yabanzaga kubaza icyo agiye gukora akabona gufata icyemezo.
7.
Asigaye atinda gusubiza ubutumwa bugufi uwandikira cyangwa ntakinabusubiza na busa ariko mbere umurabyo waratindaga.
8.
Ntakita ku bintu bikugoye, urabimubwira ariko ukabona ntacyo bimubwiye (mbere yahangayikishwaga n’ikikubabaje icyo aricyo cyose , cyaba gito cyangwa ikigoye cyane, mugafatanya kugeza gikemutse.)
9.
Ntacyubaha umuryango wawe n’inshuti zawe 10.
Ntagishaka gukora ibigushimisha nkuko yahoze abigira.
Ikimenyetso kimwe muri ibi cyangwa ikindi ubona cyahindutse mu rukundo rwanyu.
Gusa niba ubona byinshi muri ibi ariko bisigaye bimeze, ukwiriye kugira amakenga y’aho urukundo rwanyu rugana.
Ikitagenda hagati y’abakundana cyangwa abashakanye gikemurwa no kukiganiraho.
Musabe umwanya, mwicare ahantu hiherereye, umubaze impinduka uri kumubonana, nakubera imfura azakubwira ikibimutera, hari n’igihe wasanga ari wowe watumye ahinduka.

Yabeshye ko ari imfubyi yamaririje bucyeye avuga ko yapfushije nyina Yanditswe kuya 2-06-2016 saa 19:04' na Emma-Marie Umurerwa Umukobwa uri mu kigero cy'imyaka 28 yabwiye bagenzi ko nta babyeyi agira bagahora baterateranya amafaranga yo kumufasha bucyeye ababwira ko yapfushije nyina bagwa mu kantu.
"Yatangiye kuvuga ko ari imfubyi yiga mu mashuri yisumbuye, tukamufasha uko dushoboye, tukamuha amavuta, amasabune n'ibindi bikoresho twabaga twakuye iwacu, hari n'abajyaga bamuha imyenda yo kwambara.

Mu bihugu byateye imbere kubeshya bifatwa nk'indwara (Mythomanie) ishobora no guhagurutsa uyirwaye akajya gushaka inzobere mu bijyanye n'imitekererereze ya muntu (psycologue) cyangwa se umuhanga mu bijyanye n'indwara zo mu mutwe (psychiatre) bakamuvura.

#7535#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Gasabo-Bavuga-ko-baciwe-amafaranga-yo-kubakirwa-Parking-none-amaso-yaheze-mu-kirere
Gasabo: Bavuga ko baciwe amafaranga yo kubakirwa Parking none amaso yaheze mu kirere Ngo barifuza ko bakubakirwa Parking bijejwe cyangwa bagasubizwa amafaranga batanze Abakora umurimo wo gutwara abagenzi kuri za Moto (Abamotari) bakorera kuri gare ya Remera, baravuga ko batswe amafaranga n'abayobozi ba Koperative yabo yo kububakira Parking bazajya baparikamo, ariko ngo bategereje iyo Parking barayibuze Aba bamotari bavuga ko bahora bacibwa amande na Polisi ibashinja guparika ahantu hatemewe.
Nkuko abamotari twaganiriye babisobanuye, baravuga ko abayobozi b'amakoperative yabo babagezemo babaka amafaranga, babwirwa ko ari ayo kububakira Parking bazajya baparikamo, ariko ngo batunguwe nuko iyi Parking itigeze yubakwa.Ikindi ngo nuko batigeze banasubizwa amafaranga yabo.
Umwe twaganiriye witwa Tuyisenge agira ati: "Hari igihe bigeze kuduca amafaranga ngo bagiye kudukorera Parking.
Icyo gihe amafaranga twarayatanze hashize iminsi icyapa bahise bagikuraho hariya twaparikaga."
Yakomeje agira ati" Inyemezabwishyu (reçu) turazifite.
Hari amafaranga twagiye twishyura y'iriya parking ariko iyo parking ntiyigeze yubakwa,ahubwo bahise batwirukana.
Baducaga amafaranga 1000 kuri moto nini n'amafaranga 500 kuri velo moteur ariko iyo parking ntiyubatswe."
Undi twaganiriye utashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa nawe yavuze ko ayo afaranga bayaciwe ariko ntibubakirwe parking, bigatuma polisi iza igahita ibafata ikabatwarira moto ndetse ikanabandikira amande agera ku bihumbi 50 by'amanyarwanda.
Agira ati :" Ayo mafaranga twarayatanze n'ubu njyewe Recu nanayikwereka icyo gihe natwaraga velo moteri ..ubu iyo bagufashe uparitse hariya baguca ibihumbi 25 noneho bakongeraho na 25 bita iby'agasuzuguro."
Aba bamotari bakaba basaba abayobozi babo kuba babubakira Parking bijejwe kandi banatangiye amafaranga, cyangwa ngo bitaba ibyo bakaba basubizwa amafaranga yabo batanze.
Umuyobozi wa Koperative y'abo bamotari Kayitare Jean Claude yahakanye yivuye inyuma iby'ayo mafaranga bavuga ko baciye abamotari.
Yavuze ko ibyo ntabyo azi.
Agira ati" Ayo mafaranga ntabwo yatanzwe, ntayo rwose nzi."
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko icyo azi ari uko nta mafaranga yatanzwe ngo bubakirwe parking, gusa avuga ko niba hari umu motari waba warahuye n'icyo kibazo cyo kwakwa amafaranga, yazabagana bakareba niba koko aribyo bakabona kugira icyo bakora, kuko ngo hashobora no kugira uwabyiyitirira.
Aba bamotari kugeza ubu ntibemerewe guparika aho bari basanzwe baparika ku muryango wa gare ya Remera.
Icyakora Kayitare avuga ubu bari gushaka uko babashakira ikibanza cyo kububakiramo Parking hafi aho.Iyo Parking akemeza ko izaba yabonetse mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka.

#7545#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Emmanuel-Habumugisha-yatawe-muri-yombi-aje-gucururiza-urumojyi-mu-mujyi-avuye-mu-ntara
Emmanuel Habumugisha yatawe muri yombi aje gucururiza urumojyi mu mujyi avuye mu ntara.
Umugabo w'imyaka 31 y'amavuko witwa Emmanuel Habumugisha ukomoka mu karere ka Kirehe yatawe muri yombi na olisi ikorera mu mujyi wa kigali yikoreye ibiro 33 by'urumojyi aje kurucururiza mu mujyi.
Nyuma y'iminsi mike arekuwe mu buroko muri gereza ya kimironko nabwo azira urumojyi, habumugisha emmanuel yongeye gutabwa muri yombi atwaye urumojyi aho yiyemerera ko yari aje kurucururiza mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 9 Mutarama 2015, ni bwo Polisi y'u rwanda yerekanye uyu mugabo aho yemera ibyo aregwa akanabisabira imbabazi.
Umuvugizi wa polisi Supt Modeste Mbabazi, yongeye kwibutsa urubyiruko n'abanyarwanda muri rusange ko bakwiye kureba ibindi byabateza imbere batishoye mu biyobyabwenge kuko byangiza iterambere ry'igihugu.

#7548#	6	religion	http://igihe.com/iyobokamana/ivugabutumwa/article/ni-uwuhe-mugisha-mukuru-wakurutira-indi-yose
Ni uwuhe mugisha mukuru wakurutira indi yose?
Henoki yamaze imyaka mirongo itandatu n'itanu avutse abyara Metusela.
Amaze kubyara Metusela, Henoki agendana n'Imana imyaka magana atatu, ayibyaramo abahungu n'abakobwa.
Iminsi yose Henoki yaramye ni imyaka magana atatu na mirongo itandatu n'itanu.
Kandi Henoki yagendanaga n'Imana, ntiyaboneka, kuko Imana yamwimuye.
(Itangiriro 5: 21-24) Iyo uvuze "kugendana" biba bivuga ko hari abafatanyije urugendo basezeranye.
Turebere hamwe uko umuntu yagendana n'Imana mu rugendo rujya mu ijuru bikamufasha kururangiza neza.
Buri wese afite uko yahamagawe ava mu byaha arakizwa aza mu nzu y'Imana.
Umuntu yibuka igihe yakirijwe, akaba yanezerwa; ariko ikiri ngombwa ni kimwe : Mbese muri iyi myaka turacyagenda uko twahamagawe?
Tugume mu muhamagaro, turushaho gukora ibyo Imana ishaka dukizwe uko bwije n'uko bukeye, tubeho tunezeza Imana kuko yaduhaye imbaraga zo kuzarangiza uru rugendo neza, niyo izabiduhoboza.
Itangiriro ry'urugendo ni ryiza, ariko ikiruta ni iherezo ryarwo.
Enoki yagendanye n'Imana, arayinezeza kugeza ubwo ifashe umwanzuro wo kumwimura adapfuye.
Ikizadufasha muri uru rugendo ni ukugenda twezwa mu ngeso zacu zose uko bwije n'uko bukeye (1Petero 1:15), ibi ntabwo bikwiye kudutera ubwoba kuko twahawe intwaro yo kudufasha ari yo Ijambo ry'Imana.
Dusabwa kuba abera aho twirirwa hose nk'uko Imana ari iyera.
Kuko urugendo rukomeye, Imana ijya iduha impozamarira; urugero: waba utarashaka ugasenga ngo ikubakire urugo Imana ikakumvira ikabikora neza binejeje umutima wawe, Imana ikaguha uwo mufatanya urugendo kuko ababiri baruta umwe, mugakomezanya mukabasha kunesha n'ibindi.
Impamvu tugihari tukiriho ni kubw'umurimo w'Imana.
Mu gukizwa kwacu tuzera imbuto bizane benshi kuri Yesu Kristo binubahishe Imana.
Gukiranuka kwacu kube uguhoraho kuko nubwo tuzi itangira ry'urugendo ariko ntituzi iherezo ryarwo.
Bizatuzanira umugisha ubwacu no ku bacu.
Niyo mpamvu Nowa yarinzwe n'abe bakarindwa, mu gihe cy'abakoraga ibyaha bari bakataje nk'uko ubu bimeze mu gihe cyacu.
(Itangiriro 6: 5): Kandi Uwiteka abona yuko ingeso z'abantu zari mbi cyane mu isi, kandi ko kwibwira kwose imitima yabo itekereza ari kubi gusa iteka ryose.
Uwiteka yicuza yuko yaremye abantu mu isi, bimutera agahinda mu mutima.
Uwiteka aravuga ati "Nzarimbura abantu naremye, mbatsembe mu isi uhereye ku muntu n'inyamaswa n'amatungo n'ibikururuka n'inyoni n'ibisiga byo mu kirere, kuko nicujije yuko nabiremye."
Ariko Nowa agirira umugisha ku Uwiteka.
Uru ni rwo rubyaro rwa Nowa.
Nowa yari umukiranutsi, yatunganaga rwose mu gihe cye.
Nowa yagendanaga n'Imana.
Nubwo hari imigisha tujya duhererwa mu gakiza ku bw'ubuntu, umugisha mukuru twahawe ni uwo kuzabona Imana.
Tube abagenzi beza bajya mu gihugu cyo mu ijuru twe kuba icyapa kiyobora abandi nyamara cyo kikaguma aho gihagaze.
Uru rugendo ruzarangira yemwe abakunda Imana nimuhumure, dusabwa gusa kuzasangwa turi maso ubwo Umwami wacu Yesu azaza.
Tuzabishobozwa no kugenda twigenzura buri gihe, aho wisanze watandukiriye wegere Imana uyisabe imbabazi, irazihorana kandi iteka ihora yiteguye kwakira umuntu wese uyigana afite umutima uciye bugufi.
Hatabayeho urupfu, impanda y'Imana izavuga kandi abazaba bejejwe bari maso nibo bazayumva gusa.
Iyi si yo irashirana no kwifuza kwayo, ariko nkuko tubisoma ngo « ariko twebweho abizera ntidufite gusubira inyuma ngo turimbuke, ahubwo dufite kwizera kugira ngo tuzakize ubugingo bwacu.
» (Abaheburayo 10: 39).
Imana ibahe umugisha.

Umuhanzi Ruremire yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya zuzuza Album Yanditswe kuya 23-07-2012 saa 11:17' na Turikumwe Noël Umuhanzi Ruremire Focus umenyerewe mu ndirimbo z'umuco Nyarwanda, yashyize ahagaragara izindi ndirimbo nshyashya zigera kuri ebyiri zuzuza Album ye ‘Ntungurishirize umuco' izaboneka ku isoko mu mpera z'uku kwezi Kwa Nyakanga.

Umuhanzi Ruremire Focus umenyerewe mu ndirimbo z'umuco Nyarwanda, yashyize ahagaragara izindi ndirimbo nshyashya zigera kuri ebyiri zuzuza Album ye ‘Ntungurishirize umuco' izaboneka ku isoko mu mpera z'uku kwezi Kwa Nyakanga.
Izo ndirimbo nshya zirimo iyitwa ‘Cya Kijigija' ndetse na ‘Ntungurishirize umuco' ari nayo yitiriwe Album.
Mu bihangano bye uyu muhanzi atanga ubutumwa ku Muryango Nyarwanda yifashishije umuco wa kera benshi mu rubyiruko badakunze kumenya.
Ngo ku giti cye biramworohera cyane kuko ari inganzo yakuriyemo.
Yagize ati "Nkiri muto Data yakundaga kundirimbira indirimbo za kera, binjyamo najye ntangira kuvuga amazina y'inka nkiri akana gato cyane".
Ruremire kandi yagize ibisobanuro atanga kuri izi ndirimbo nshya.
Indirimbo ‘‘Cya Kijigija' ngo iyo umuntu ayikurikiranye yumva avuga inka ibi bisanzwe nyamara ubutunwa atangamo bugenewe ba shugamami (Sugar Mami) bashukashuka abasore bakiri bato ndetse n'uburyo inkumi zishobora kugusha abasore mu bishuko.
‘Ntungurishirize umuco' ari nayo ihatse izina rya Album, ngo ikubiyemo ubutumwa bwinshi ariko ubw'ingenzi bukaba bubiri.
Icyambere itesha abatakaza umuco wabo bakawusimbuza uw'ahandi, ikindi ni ukwigisha abakiri bato akamaro k'Umuco Nyarwanda.
Ruremire Focus ni umusore w'imyaka 34 akaba ari n'ingaragu yiyeguriye umuco.
Ngo ashaka ko ibintu akora byazaba ububiko bw'ibiranga Abanyarwanda cyane cyane abavuka ubu n'abazavuka mu bihe bizaza.

Florence, izina ry'abantu bazi kujyanisha Florence ni izina rihabwa umwana w'umukobwa, rifite inkomoko mu Kilatini ku izina Florentius rikaba risobanura indabyo zikibumbura cyangwa se zigitangira kuraba.
Bamwe bandika Florrie, Flossie, Floella , Fiorenza, Fiorenzo Florentia, Florentius Florencio, Florencia, Florencio.
Bimwe mu biranga ba Florence Ni umuntu w'amafiyeri, uzi kujyanisha, haba mu myambarire amenya ibijyanye akanabitoza abandi.
Mu nzu aba azi uburyo bwinshi butandukanye ashobora guteguramo inzu igasa neza.
Mu gikoni aba azi guteka no kumenya gutaka ibiryo ku buryo ubibonye wese, abyibazaho.

Iyo akiri umwana, Florence aba akunda inkuru, kwicara aho yumva bavuga utuntu dutandukanye kandi niyo akuze usanga hari ubwo abikurana.
Iyo abaye umugore yita ku bintu agashyira akazirana n'umuntu umuvangira mu byo yateguye.

#7611#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/ibintu-8-bifasha-mu-gutegura-akabariro-ku-bashakanye
Ibintu 8 bifasha mu gutegura akabariro ku bashakanye Ibibazo byinshi by’imibanire mibi hagati y’abashakanye bikunze guterwa n’uko gahunda yo gutera akababariro itagenda neza igihe kinini.
Kimwe mu mpamvu zikomeye zo gutagenda neza nuko abashakanye badategurana mbere yo gutera akabariro.
Nkuko nta gahunda iyariyo yose yagenda neza itateguwe ni nako gutera akabariro bidashobora kugenda neza igihe cyose bikozwe abashakanye batateguranye.
Wategura ute uwo mwashakanye nawe ukitegura : 1.
Nihabeho gahunda yo gutera akabariro Nibyiza cyane ko abashakanye baganira bagahuza noneho bakemeranya ku nshuro ndetse n’iminsi mu cyumweru cyangwa se mu gihe bashaka bagomba gutera akabariro.
Ibyo bifasha umwe wese kwirirwa yitegura ndetse no muri cya gihe mbere yuko bakora iyo gahunda.
Ntiwategura ikintu utazi igihe kizabera.
2.
Gutekereza uwo mwashakanye Mu gihe umugabo cyangwa umugore bari mu kazi igice yagerageza ko anyuzamo ibitekerezo bye biganisha k’uwo bashakanye.
Uko umutekereza cyane ni nako kumukunda bizamuka mu mutima wawe, bityo bikaza kworoha cya gihe cyo gutera akabariro ; 3.
Kwirinda gukora ibyo uzi yanga ukagira imbaraga zo kumukorera ibyo akunda Iyo wiriwe umutekereza, birakworohera kwibuka ibyo akunda nibyo adakunda, ukirinda ibyo yanga ndetse bikagutera imbaraga zo gukora ibyo akunda.
Urugero : Niba uwo mwashakanye yanga ko utaha utinze icyo gihe uzi neza ko hariho ya gahunda ugomba kwirinda gutaha utinze.
Uba umufashije kugubwa neza mu mutima noneho bikamworohera kuzuza uruhare rwe mu gutera akabariro.
Bimenyerewe ko abashakanye batera akabariro ntagahunda bakoze, icyo gihe ntuzatekereza gutaha kare kuko uwo munsi ntuzi neza ko muri bubikore.
4.
Communication Uwo munsi uzi ko muri butere akabariro, gerageza ujye umwoherereza utu messages turimo amagambo meza nka : Ndagukunda Cheri(e) ; niriwe ngutekereza cyane ; Niriwe nibuka bya bihe byiza twagiranye wa munsi ….
; Urataha ryari ko ngukumbuye ?
N’ibindi….
Nimugera mu rugo gerageza mwese mukoreshe imvugo nziza irimo kubaha, urukundo ( affection), umunezero, … kandi mugabanye cyane ikoreshwa rya whatsp, TV n’ibindi bisamaza bituma utita kuri cheri wawe muri ya masaha abanziriza akabariro mukiri mu ruganiriro.
5.
Impano zoroheje Ubishoboye ukaba uzi ko madamu wawe akunda bombo ( ni urugero) tumuzanire n’ubwo twaba 2 tw’amafranga ijana.
Ibyo bizamushimisha cyane ndetse bigushe neza umutima we.
Nawe wa mudamu we, wibuke gutegura ibyo umutware akunda kandi abe ari wowe umu sereva.
6.
Gutaha kare Umunsi wo gutera akabariro umugabo n’umugore bagomba gutaha kare kugira ngo birinde gutera akabariro amasaha agiye bigatuma babikora bananiwe cyane noneho bakabikora nabi.
Mutahe kare, ameza ategurwe kare ndetse n’abana bagomba kuryama kare , ibyo mubitegura mbere yigihe. mwirinde gutinda kuri televiziyo niba aricyo kibatinza kuryama kare.
Mufatanye gukora uturimo twa nimugoraba.
Izindi gahunda zose mugomba kuzihorera cyangwa se mukazikora kare.
Ibyo bisaba ko mwemeranya iminsi mugomga kureba aho mudafite izindi nshingano nko mu rusengero, mu mashyirahamwe, muri siporo,… 7.
Mugeze mu cyumba Mwese mukiri « en forme » kuko mugeze mu cyumba hakiri kare, nimufate akanya muganire ku tuntu n’utundi.
Ubwo niko buri wese aba ariho akora ibyo mugenzi we akunda kugira ngo amufashe kwitegura kubishaka nawe yitegura (caresses, kumusoma, kwambara utwenda sexy, utugambo twiza, gusangira akantu ko kunywa, n’ibindi).
Mwirinde kuzimya amatara kugira ngo mukomeze murebane.
Buri wese akeneye kubona umubiri wa mugenzi we.
8.
Kuganira ku buryo bwiza bwo gutera akabariro Umugabo abaze umugore we ibimunezeza iyo batera akabariro n’umugore abigenze atyo.
Nubimenya bishyire mu bikorwa kugirango mugenzi wawe anezerwe.
Icyitonderwa : Umugabo yirinde kwifuza gutera akabariro ashaka kurangiza inyungu ze ahubwo abishake kugirango afashe mugenzi we.
N’umugore ni uko nyine.
Nimukurikiza ibyo bizabarinda ibibazo ngo banyimye, sindyoherwa, bamfashe ku ngufu, nibindi.
Source:Agasaro.com

PEARL ESTATES LTD igisubizo ku banya Musanze bifuza aho gutura PEARL ESTATE LTD ikigo kigiye kuzuza imyaka itatu gifasha Abanyarwanda kubona amazu baturamo ku giciro gito, ubu cyasize ku isoko inzu zigezweho zigera kuri esheshatu mu Mujyi wa Musanze.

Rucyahana Andrew umuyobozi w'imishinga y'ubwubatsi muri PEARL ESTATE.
Yavuze ko muri aka karere bari barubatse inzu 14, ubu umunani zamaze kugurwa, esheshatu zisigaye nazo ziri ku isoko ku bakizikeneye.
Yagize ati "Muri izi nzu esheshatu ziri ku isoko, eshanu muri zo zubatse kimwe, aho zifite ibyumba bine birimo icy'ibanze gifitemo ubwiherero n'aho kogera, zikagira uruganiriro, igikoni kigezweho mu nzu n'ubundi bwiherero bubiri n'aho kogera, busangirwa n'abatuye muri iyo nzu, ndetse n'aho kubika ibikoresho bitandukanye bikoreshwa mu rugo (Stock )".
Izi nzu eshanu zubatse kimwe Rucyahana atangaza ko imwe igura Miliyoni 55 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda.
Indi nzu Rucyahana avuga ko igizwe n'ibyumba bine, buri cyumba kikaba gifite ubwiherero n'aho kogera, ikagira igikoni kigezweho mu nzu, ikagira uruganiriro ndetse ikanagira aho kubika ibikoresho bitanduka bikoreshwa mu rugo (Stock).
Iyi nzu Rucyahana yatangaje ko yo igura Miliyoni 65 z'amafaranga y' u Rwanda.
Abifuza gukodesha nabo baroroherejwe Abifuza gukodesha nabo Rucyahana atangaza ko boroherejwe, kuko bashobora guhabwa inzu irimo ibikoresho byose bikenerwa mu nzu, umuntu akaza yinjira munzu.
Ati " Uwifuza gukodesha turumvikana tukaba twamuha inzu irimo ibikenerwa byose byo munzu birimo, ibitanda, imifariso, ameza n'ibikoresho byo mu gikoni, akishyura ibihumbi 500Frw ku kwezi.
Yongeraho ko uwo bahaye inzu gusa ari bwizanire ibikoresho, yishyura ibihumbi 300Frw ku kwezi.
Abanya Kigali na Rubavu nabo bashonje bahishiwe Mu Ntangiro za 2017 Rucyahana atangaza ko Mu Karere ka Rubavu bazatangira kuhazamura izindi nzu, ndetse no mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu ntangiriro z'umwaka wa 2017 naho bazatangira kuhubaka, kuburyo ikibazo cy'aho gutura kizagabanuka muri utwo duce ku buryo bushimishije.
Uko muri izi nzu imbere hameze.
Ati "Turateganya kubaka inzu zigera ku ijana muri Rubavu no mu Mujyi wa Kigali, abifuza inzu muri utwo duce muminsi micye ibishoshanyo mbonera byazo bisohotse bashobora kutwegera bagatangira gufata aya mazu."
Uwakenera inzu muri izi ziri ku isoko n' uwakenera andi makuru yahamagara Rucyahana Andrew kuri iyi numero " 0783768500" cyangwa akandikira PEARL ESTATE LTD kuri [email protected] cyangwa B.P 48 Musanze, akazahabwa amakuru ahagije kandi agahabwa igisubizo kihuse.

#7657#	1	sports	http://www.kigalitoday.com/imikino-11/football/article/kamonyi-ikipe-ya-rukoma-mu-bakobwa-n-iya-musambira-mu-bahungu-zegukanye
Kamonyi: Ikipe ya Rukoma mu bakobwa n'iya Musambira mu bahungu zegukanye igikombe "Umurenge Kagame cup" Mu mukino wa nyuma w'igikombe cy'imiyoborere myiza cyiswe "Umurenge Kagame Cup", ikipe ya Rukoma mu bakobwa yegukanye igikombe nyuma yo gutsinda iya Nyamiyaga.
Naho ikipe y'Umurenge wa Musambira mu bahungu itsinda iy'Umurenge wa Karama.
Uyu mukino wabereye ku kibuga cy'umupira cya Remera tariki 2 Mata 2015; mu muhango wo gusoza ukwezi kwahariwe imiyoborere myiza.
Habanje umukino w'abakobwa wahuje Umurenge wa Rukoma n'uwa Nyamiyaga, umukino urangira Rukoma itsinze ibitego bitatu ku busa.
Ikipe y'Umurenge wa Musambira yishimira intsinzi.
Hakurikiyeho umukino w'abahungu wagaragaragamo ishyaka ku makipe yombi.
Ikipe y'Umurenge wa Musambira n'iy'uwa Karama barangije iminota 90 ari 0-0; hitabazwa penaliti maze Umurenge wa Musambira winjiza enye kuri eshatu, n'uko ihita yegukana igikombe.
Amakipe yatsinze yahawe igikombe giherekejwe n'imyenda yo gukinana, umupira wo gukina ndetse n'ibahasha y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 100, yegukana n'itike yo guhagararira akarere mu mikino izakomeza ku rwego rw'Intara y'Amajyepfo.
Rutsinga ashyikiriza igikombe ikipe ya Musambira.
Amakipe yabaye aya kabiri na yo yahawe imyenda yo gukinana n'umupira wo gukina, biherekejwe n'ibahasha y'amafaranga ibihumbi 50.
Gukinira igikombe cyitiriwe Umurenge Kagame Cup, byahujwe n'ukwezi kw'imiyoborere myiza, kugira ngo uwo mwanya wo kwidagadura, abayobozi babonereho umwanya wo gutambutsa ubutumwa bujyanye na gahunda za leta.
IKipe y'abakobwa y'Umurenge wa Rukoma yakira igikombe nyuma yo gutsinda uwa Nyamiyaga.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kamonyi, Rutsinga Jacques atangaza ko wabaye umwanya wo gutahura impano z'urubyiruko mu mupira w'amaguru ku buryo bizabafasha gushyiraho ikipe y'abahungu y'akarere, no kongera abakinnyi mu ikipe y'abakobwa y'akarere iri mu cyiciro cya mbere.
Marie Josée Uwiringira

Umukobwa yahumye ijisho nyuma yo kumara igihe kinini akina umukino wo muri Telefone Wu Xiaojing , umukobwa w’imyaka 21 wo mu gace ka Dongguan mu Bushinwa ari kuvurwa ijisho ry’iburyo ryahumye nyuma yo kumara igihe kirekire akina umukino wo muri telefone ugezweho cyane mu Bushinwa.
Ibyamubayeho byabaye akabarore ku bandi bakunda gukina mwene iyo mikino nta kuruhuka.
Wu yamenye ko ijisho rye ry’i buryo ritakibasha kureba ku itariki 1 Ukwakira 2017 ubwo yakinaga umukino witwa Honor of Kings.
Yafashe uwo munsi wose wari ikiruhuko mu Bushinwa akina umukino , nyuma ijisho rye riza kunanirwa kureba.
Yabanje gukeka ko ari ukunanirwa , ajya kuryama ariko bukeye bwaho nabwo yabyutse ijisho rye ritakibasha kubona ikintu icyo aricyo cyose.
Ababyeyi be bahise bamujyana mu bitaro.
Abaganga bemeje ko amaso ya Wu yari ananiwe ku buryo bukabije.
Nkuko Wu ubwe yabitangaje, ngo iyo yavaga mu kazi, yafataga amasaha hagati ya 7 n’amasaha 8 akina umukino nta kuruhuka.
Akora mu bijyanye n’ibaruramutungo.
Aho akora nabwo aba akoresha mudasobwa ari nabyo bituma amaso ye aruha kurushaho.
Mu gihe cye cy’iminsi y’ikiruhuko ho ngo byabaga ari ibindi kuko yakinaga uwo mukino nta n’amasaha make afashe yo kuryama.
Nyuma y’uko amaso ye ananiwe cyane, ijisho ry’iburyo ryo ryarananiwe burundu.
Kugeza nubu Wu aracyari mu bitaro.
Abaganga bari kugerageza kumuvura ijisho ritabona ariko ntacyo biratanga.
Ikinyamakuru Metro cyatangaje ko ababyeyi be akenshi bamuburiraga bamubwira ko azahuma nakomeza gukina uwo mukino nta kuruhuka, ariko akanga kubumvira.
Abaganga bamuvura bemeje ko basanzwe afite ikibazo Retinal Artery Occlusion (RAO) yagize kubera kumara igihe kirekire akina umukino kuri telefone.
Inkuru y’ibyabaye kuri Wu yabaye kimomo mu Bushinwa.
Abavura amaso baboneyeho kubyuririraho, bibutsa buri wese ukoresha ‘ecran’ yaba iya mudasobwa cyangwa telefone kujya banyuzamo bakaruhuka, batayirebamo.
Abarenga Miliyoni 200 mu Bushinwa nibo bakina umukino Honor of Kings bifashishije telefone zabo.
Nubwo ibyabaye kuri Wu biteye ubwoba hari abo byananiye kureka gukina uwo mukino waviriyemo Wu guhuma ijisho rimwe.
Wu Xiaojing aracyavurirwa mu bitaro Abagera kuri miliyoni 200 nibo bakina umukino wa Honor of Kings mu Bushinwa watumye Wu ahuma ijisho rimwe

Ali Kiba yishimiwe mu gitaramo yakoreye i Kigali (Amafoto na Video) Umuririmbyi Ali Kiba uri mu bakomeye muri Tanzania yanyuze abitabiriye igitaramo cya East African Party ku nshuro ya cumi mu ndirimbo ze zakunzwe n’izigezweho muri iyi minsi.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye mu ijoro ryo ku wa Mbere, tariki ya 1 Mutarama 2018, cyitabiriwe n’imbaga y’abakunzi b’umuziki mu Rwanda, bagaragaje kwishimira uyu muhanzi mu buryo budasanzwe bitewe n’imiririmbire yagaragaje mu kugorora ijwi ndetse n’uko yanyuzagamo akabereka imbyino.
Umuhanzi wa mbere muri East African Party yageze ku rubyiniro saa mbili zirengaho iminota mike.
Usibye Ali Kiba wari umuhanzi mukuru, iki gitaramo cyanasusurukijwe n’Abanyarwanda barimo Riderman, Bruce Melodie, Yvan Buravan, P Fla, Tuff Gangs ndetse na Sheebah wari waturutse muri Uganda.
Ali Kiba wari utegerejwe na benshi yageze ku rubyiniro mu masaha akuze kuko indirimbo ze hafi ya zose yaziririmbye mu wundi munsi.
Uyu muhanzi yigaragaje nk’uwiteguye mu buryo bunoze iki gitaramo, yari yazanye abacuranzi bane ndetse n’abasore babiri bamuherekeza mu majwi.
Yageze ku rubyiniro benshi bariyamira arabasuhuza agira ati "Amahoro," ubundi yanzika n’indirimbo ye yitwa "Cinderela" yaciye ibintu mu bihe bishize.
Iyi yayiririmbye ajyana n’abafana kuva ku ntangiriro kugeza ku musozo ndetse n’abari mu byicaro bamwe bahagurutse.

Umujyi mwiza.
Igihugu cyiza.”

Sheebah wanenzwe kuririmba ’Playback’, yagaragaje imibyinire idasanzwe Umuririmbyi Sheebah Karungi wo muri Uganda waririmbye mbere ya Ali Kiba yakoresheje uburyo bamwe bita ’kuririmbira kuri CD’, ibintu byanenzwe na benshi mu bitabiriye iki gitaramo nubwo bitamubujije guhagurutsa imbaga bitewe n’imbyino zidasanzwe yagaragaje.
Uyu mukobwa yari yambaye akenda kamufashe ndetse kajya gusa n’umubiri mu buryo butagaragaza ko yambaye koko ndetse n’utwagereranywa n’udushabure dutendera mu gituza no ku mayunguyungu.
Yari afite umusatsi w’ibara ritukura ndetse n’urukweto rugera ku mavi.

Imbyino zabo zari ziganjemo izo gutigisa umubyimba ndetse n’izimenyerewe ku bamansuzi byatumaga buri mwanya ubona abahagurutse ngo bitegereze neza ibyo yakoraga ndetse n’abiyamira akoze ibidasanzwe.
