#8325#	0	entertainment	http://www.ukwezi.rw/Imyidagaduro/article/Juru-Ornella-yashyize-hanze-indirimbo-ya-kabiri-yizeza-impinduka-mu-muziki-nyarwanda
Juru Ornella yashyize hanze indirimbo ya kabiri yizeza impinduka mu muziki nyarwanda Umuhanzikazi ukiri muto, Juru Ornella yashyize hanze indirimbo ye ya kabiri yizeza ko abanyarwanda bagiye kuryoherwa n’ibihangano bye ashimangira ko agiye kubibaha ari byinshi kandi biri ku rwego rwiza.
Juru Ornella w’imyaka 20 y’amavuko ku wa 2 Ukwakira 2020, nibwo yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Pango’ itunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi n’amashusho.
Mu kiganiro na UKWEZI, yavuze ko ari indirimbo avuga ko yayikoze agamije gukundisha abantu umuziki no kubyina muri rusange by’umwihariko abasore n’inkumi bakundana.
Yagize ati “Mba mbwira umuhungu ngo aze tubyinane, mbese twishimire umuziki, tukabyinana nanjye nkabyina gutyo.”
Indirimbo ‘Pango’ yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Element muri Country Record mu gihe amashusho yayo yakozwe na Bob Chris Raheem.
Reba hano amashusho y’indirimbo ’Pango’ Uyu muhanzikazi avuga ko hari izindi ndirimbo nyinshi ari gukoraho zirimo izarangiye yiteguye kugeza ku bakunzi b’umuziki n’abanyarwanda muri rusange.
Uyu mukobwa uvuka mu muryango w’abana babiri ndetse akaba ariwe wa kabiri avuga ko mu muziki we afashwa na Papa we ndetse akaba ariwe mujyanama we mu bijyanye n’ibikorwa bya muzika.
Ati “Ndashimira abamfasha by’umwihariko papa, kuko amfasha ahantu hose, ndashimira kandi abakurikira ibihangano byanjye mbabwira ko mfite imishinga myinshi izajya hanze mu minsi mike cyane.”
Yakomeje avuga ko "Intego mfite ni ugukora umuziki mwiza kandi ntabwo nzatenguha abanyarwanda kuko nshaka kuzana impinduka."
Juru Ornella kuri ubu umaze gukora indirimbo ebyiri kuva yinjiye mu muziki yarangiye amashuri yisumbuye umwaka ushize aho yigaga HEG mu Rwunge rw’Amashuri rwa Gahini mu Karere ka Kayonza.
Reba hano amashusho y’indirimbo ’Pango’

#8344#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/rwatubyaye-abdul-yageze-mu-amavubi-atuganiriza-uko-abayeho-muri-amerika
Rwatubyaye Abdul yageze mu Amavubi, atuganiriza uko abayeho muri Amerika Myugariro w’ikipe ya Sporting Kansas City yo muri shampiyona ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Rwatubyaye Abdul yageze mu Rwanda, aho aje gufatanya na bagenzi mu ikipe y’igihugu ‘Amavubi’ ikomeje kwitegura umukino usoza amatsinda yo gushaka itike ya CAN ya 2019, u Rwanda ruzakirwamo na Côte d’Ivore ku wa Gatandatu.
N’ubwo ikipe ye yari yabanje gusaba FERWAFA ko bamureka, agasiba uyu mukino kubera ko atari yamenyerana na bagenzi be bo muri Sporting Kansas City, baje kumureka, yitabira ubutumire bw’ikipe y’igihugu.
Mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Mbere, ikipe ye yari ifite umukino wa shampiyona bakiriwemo na Colorado Rapids, banganya igitego 1-1.
Nyuma y’uyu mukino, Rwatubyaye yakoze urugendo rw’amasaha 12 mu ndege, aza mu Rwanda ndetse ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri, nibwo yageze mu ikipe y’igihugu.
Rwatubyaye Abdul ni umwe muri ba myugariro ngenderwaho mu ikipe y’igihugu dore ko amaze gutangira imikino ine muri itanu Amavubi amaze gukina muri uru rugendo rwo gushaka itike ya CAN 2019 izabera mu Misiri.
Kagere Meddie wa Simba SC muri Tanzania, ni we mukinnyi ukina hanze wahamagawe utaragera mu ikipe y’igihugu, aho biteganijwe ko ahagera mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu.
Amavubi azahaguruka i Kigali ku wa Kane, yerekeza mu Mujyi wa Abidjan, ahazabera uyu mukino.
Guinea na Côte d’Ivoire nizo zabonye itike yo gukina CAN 2019 mu itsinda H mu gihe Centrafrique n’u Rwanda bo bamaze gusezererwa.
Bite bya Rwatubyaye muri Amerika?
Uyu myugariro wavuye muri Rayon Sports mu kwezi gushize yaganiriye na IGIHE, adutangariza uko abayeho nyuma yo kugera muri shampiyona ya Amerika.
IGIHE: Wakiriye gute guhamagarwa mu ikipe y’igihugu aribwo ukigera mu ikipe nshya?
Rwatubyaye: Yego ikipe yari inkeneye, mu bijyanye no kumenyereza muri byinshi bya hariya bitoroshye kubimenyera ariko wenda navuga ko wafashe umwanya wawe neza nta cyakugora.
Kuba barabanje gushidikanya ku butumire ni uko hari gahunda bari bamfitiye.
Kuri njye kongera guhamagarwa n’ikipe y’igihugu nta kibazo mbifiteho, ni agaciro.
IGIHE: Ukimara kugurwa na Sporting Kansas City, wabyakiriye gute?
Rwatubyaye: Uko nabyakiriye n’ubu biracyari kumbaho kuko ntabwo navuga ko ari ibintu biri ku rwego rwo hasi, urwego nagiyeho ruri hejuru, rurashimishije.
Shampiyona iri hejuru, imyitozo bakora, umujyi, imyitwarire n’umuco waho n’ibintu umuntu atavuga ko biciriritse, biri hejuru cyane.
Byari ibyishimo, byari iby’agaciro kuri njye kuba nari ngiye gukina muri iriya kipe, atari no kuyikinamo gusa ahubwo n’abakinnyi ngiye gukinana nabo bari ku rwego rwo hejuru, navuga ko hari ibyo nungutse mu buzima bwanjye.
IGIHE: Kumenyera muri Amerika, byarakoroheye?
Rwatubyaye: Ntabwo byanyoroheye, n’ubu ntabwo biranyorohera kubera ko mazeyo ibyumweru hafi bitatu, mbere y’uko ngaruka inaha.
Ntabwo biranyorohera, nabanje kugerayo mba muri Hotel, bajya kunshakira ahandi natura, nahabonye ejo bundi mu byumweru bibiri.
Nibwo nari nkimara kwimuka, hashize iminsi nk’itatu nimutse, ntabwo ndamenyera neza, haracyarimo ingorane nke, ariko ndakeka bitazamfata igihe kirekire.
IGIHE: Ugereranyje n’ubuzima bwo mu Rwanda, ni irihe tandukaniro rihari?
Rwatubyaye: Ikintu navuga bitandukaniyeho ni imitekerereze y’abantu, uko umukinnyi abayeho n’uko umuntu usanzwe abayeho, itandukaniro ni rinini cyane.
Muri Amerika uburyo babaho biri hejuru cyane, ni ahantu buri mukinnyi ushaka kuba uwabigize umwuga yakwifuza gukina.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe kintu cyakugoye ukigerayo, uzahora wibuka?
Rwatubyaye: Ni mu buryo bwo gukoramo ibintu, urebye bafite uburyo bakoramo ibintu, biratandukanye cyane.
Ku mazina yanjye, hano mu Rwanda tubanza Rwatubyaye, hariya ho babanza Abdul kuko niryo zina ryabo rya mbere, hagakurikiraho Rwatubyaye.
Ahantu bakorera hararenze ukuntu, kuhinjiramo nabanje kuyoba.
Kwinjiramo barahanyeretse, nisubijemo ndayoba.
Ni byo byantonze.
Ikindi cyantonze ni imirire ya hariya, byarantonze cyane kugeza n’ubu sindayisobanukirwa neza, gusa ndacyafite igihe n’iminsi yo kumenyera, ndakeka mu bihe bizaza nzaba meze neza.
Rwatubyaye ntabwo aratangira gukinira Sporting Kansas City, ariko amaze kugaragara ku ntebe y’abasimbura mu mikino itatu bamaze gukina kuva ageze muri Amerika.

Mu myaka itatu, ikibazo cy’abacitse ku icumu batagira aho baba kizaba cyakemutse burundu Ruberangeyo Theophile umuyobozi wa FARG Umuyobozi w’ikigega cyashyiriweho gufasha abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside batishoboye (FARG) avuga ko bihaye imyaka itatu yo gukemura burundu ikibazo cy’abacitse ku icumu badafite aho baba.
Imyaka 23 irashize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri mata 1994 ibaye.
Kugeza ubu haracyari abarokotse jenoside batagira aho baba kandi batishoboye.
Leta y’u Rwanda ndetse n’imiryango nterankunga bagiye bashyiraho gahunda zitandukanye zo gukemura iki kibazo arikona n’ubu ntikirarangira.
Ruberangeyo Theophile umuyobozi wa FARG mu kiganiro na Makuruki, yatangaje ko iki kibazo kigihari koko.
Ati "Turabizi barahari.
Mu mwaka wa 2010 habayeho ibarura ry’abubakiwe n’abasigaye kubakirwa, kugeza nko muri 2013 wa mubare twabaruye uba urarangiye kuko twari dusigaje amazu 500 mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Twongeye gukora irindi barura tuza kubona imiryango 1687 y’abatagira aho baba.”
Ruberangeyo avuga ko bibajije aho abo bantu bava ariko baza gusanga ari abari abana babaga mu miryango nyuma ikaza kubirukana ngo bajye gusaba amazu muri FARG.
Icyakora avuga ko ubu bihaye imyaka itatu yo kuba barangije burundu ikibazo cy’abacitse ku icumu batishoboye badafite aho baba.
Ati:”Dukurikije inkunga tubona, tuvana muri minisiteri y’imari n’amasezerano twagiranye na bo, twihaye gahunda ko mu myaka itatu tuzaba turangije icyo kibazo wenda hagasigara umuntu umwe umwe nawe waza nyuma uko ubu iyo miryango dufite tuzaba tuyirangije."
Ruberangeyo kandi avuga ko banafashe ingamba zo kubakira umuryango aho kubakira umuntu ku giti cye.
Ati "Ubu rero twanafashe ingambo zo kubakira umuryango.
Twubakira umuntu umwe umwe ntabwo twazabivamo cyane cyane ko twubaka twubakira wa muryango wasenyewe twongera gusubizaho ya nzu yabo ya mbere.”
Uretse abatagira aho baba, hari n’ikibazo cy’abafite amazu ashaje amaze igihe kandi yubatswe nabi mu myaka yo ha mbere, Ruberangeyo avuga ko aba nabo bazasanirwa ariko kandi ngo iziri kubakwa ubu zizaba ari inzu zikomeye zizamara igihe.
Ati:”Inzu turimo kububakira ni inzu ihenze imwe byibuze iri mu gaciro ka miliyoni zirindwi mu gihe nko myaka ya mbere dutangira kububakira wasangaga inzu imwe yarabaga ifite agaciro nkak’ibihumbi 600.”

#8491#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/article/kuvuguruzanya-kw-ababyeyi-bishobora-gutera-umwana-uburwayi-bwo-mu-mutwe
Kuvuguruzanya kw’ababyeyi bishobora gutera umwana uburwayi bwo mu mutwe Kuba ababyeyi bahora bavuguruzanya mu mabwiriza baha abana bishobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye mu mitekerereze bikamuviramo no gufatwa na bumwe mu burwayi bwo mu mutwe.
Kuvuguruzanya kw’ababyeyi imbere y’umwana, kutamutega amatwi ngo bumve ibisobanuro abaha ahubwo bakihutira kumwuka inabi no kumuha ibihano bikarishye ni kimwe mu bishobora kumuviramo uburwayi bwo mu mutwe.
Mu kiganiro inzobere mu bijyanye n’imyitwarire n’imitekerereze ya muntu, Dr Sezibera Vincent, yagiranye na IGIHE, yavuze ko ababyeyi bamwe ari bo nyirabayazana y’uburwayi bwo mu mutwe ku bana babo.
Yagize ati “Indwara zitari nke z’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe zigaragara ku muryango, ababyeyi babifitemo uruhare rukomeye.
Niba umwana yarakuze ateshwa agaciro, ababyeyi bavuguruzanya imbere ye umubyeyi w’umugabo amubwira ati kora iki, nyina akamubwira ati oya kora kiriya bicanga umwana ntamenye ngo ni iki cyo gukora, akaguma mu rungabangabo ku buryo imitekerereze ye igera aho igacanganyukirwa bikaba byamuviramo bumwe mu burwayi bwo mu mutwe.”
Dr Sezibera akomeza agira ati “Burya si byiza ko ababyeyi bavuguruzanya imbere y’umwana, bagomba kubyirinda cyane kuko bituma imitekerereze y’umwana izamo akavuyo ‘désordre’ bigahungabanya imitekerereze ye.”
Wamenya gute ko umwana afite ikibazo mu mitekerereze?
Iyi nzobere ivuga ko hari uburyo butandukanye bukoreshwa n’ababifitemo ubumenyi bakavumbura ko umwana afite ikibazo mu mitekerereze, ariko kandi ngo n’umubyeyi ashobora kubimenya.
Ati “Hari ibintu bidasanzwe umwana akora umubyeyi akaba yahita amenya ko afite ikibazo mu mitekerereze ye.
Umwana ashobora kugira ubutiriganya ‘amanyanga’ ku buryo bukabije nk’urugero ukabona atahanye amakaramu 10 yibye bagenzi kandi yavuye mu rugo wamuhaye ikaramu cyangwa se ukabona umwana wawe arabeshya cyane, uba ukwiye gutangira kumukurikiranira hafi ukamushyira abaganga b’inzobere mu mitekerereze ya muntu.”
Bumwe mu burwayi bwo mu mitekerereze bushobora kuvamo ubwo mu mutwe, iyo butavuwe bushobora gutuma umwana yishora mu biyobyabwenge ndetse no mu bindi bikorwa by’urugomo bitandukanye.
Akomeza avuga ko atari byiza ko umwana ufite imyitwarire idasanzwe ababyeyi bihutira kumuha ibihano bibabaza umubiri, ahubwo ngo baba bakwiye kumujyana ku baganga babyigiye kuko bafite uburyo butandukanye bwo kumuvura agakira. [email protected]

#8589#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/ngoma-yafatanwe-insinga-z-amashanyarazi-avuga-ko-ari-umukozi-wa-ewsa
Ngoma: Yafatanwe insinga z'amashanyarazi avuga ko ari umukozi wa EWSA Iraguha Remmy, ukomoka mu mugi wa Kigali akaba acumbitse mu murenge wa Kibungo yafatanwe insinga z'amashanyarazi mu rugo mu mukwabu wabaye kuri uyu wa 18/07/2013.
Uyu musore avuga ko ari umukozi w'Ikigo cya Leta gishinzwe gukwirakwiza amazi n'amashyanyarazi (EWSA ) ishami rya Ngoma ariko ubuyobozi bwa EWSA ishami rya Ngoma bwahakanye ko atigeze abakorera ndetse ko nta mukozi wabo utahana insinga.
Umuyobozi wa EWSA Ngoma, Mugeni Genevieve, yatangarije itangazamakuru ko uyu mukozi yakoreraga abantu batsindiraga amasoko yo gukora ibintu bimwe na bimwe ku ishami rya EWSA Ngoma ariko ko atari umukozi wa EWSA.
Yongeraho ko Iraguha bafite amakuru ko yirukanywe na rwiyemezamirimo yakoreraga akekwaho kumwiba insinga bityo ko agomba gushyikirizwa ubutabera agakurikiranwa kuri izo nsinga yafatanwe.
Yagize ati "Ntamukozi wacu wemererwa gutahana insinga mu rugo ngo azibikeho, kandi naho uyu musore yakoreraga bamwirukaniye icyaha cyo kwiba insinga.
Akurikiranwe nk'abandi bose bakekwaho kwiba insinga."
Remmy uvuga ko akora muri EWSA izi nizo nsinga yafatanwe mu rugo aho yari yarazibikije.
Uyu musore wavugaga ko yarari muri konje yahawe na EWSA we avuga ko izo nsinga yari yazisaguye akora noneho akazibitsa umuntu ari naho zafatiwe mu mukwabu wakozwe na police n'ingabo z'igihugu.
Uyu musore yongeraho ko insinga we afite atari izivugwa ko zibwa kuko ari izijyana umuriro muri Cash power.
Yiyemerera ko yakoze amakosa yo kwibikaho insinga bitemewe.
Mu biherutse gushyirwa ahagaraga n'ikigo cya EWSA ishami rya Ngoma, bagaragaje ko bamaze kwibwa inshinga zifite agaciro ka miliyoni icumi muri uyu mwaka wa 2013.
Uku kwiba insinga bitera abaturage batari bake ikibazo cyo kudacanirwa mu makaritsiye aho batuye kuko insinga ziba zibwe.
Abarenga batatu bari gukurikiranwa n'inkiko ku kwiba insinga z'amashanyarazi harimo n'abafatiwe mu cyuho baziba.
Uyu mukwabu wabaye tariki 18/07/2013 kandi wafatiwemo inzererezi, ibiyobyabwenge ndetse n'inzoga zinkorano zitemewe.
Jean Claude Gakwaya

Abanyarwanda bahindutse abacakara cyangwa ibicuruzwa muri Uganda - Uwafungiweyo Muhire Jean Baptiste w’imyaka 32 y’amavuko yari afite inzu yogosherwamo (Salon de coiffure) i Kisoro muri Uganda, akajyayo buri gihe ahawe agapapuro kabimwemerera kitwa ‘Jeton’ nk’umuntu wari uturiye umupaka wa Cyanika (i Burera).
Muhire Jean Baptiste avuga ko adatekereza gusubira muri Uganda vuba Yaje no gutekereza gukora umwuga w’ubukanishi bw’ibikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi, kuko ngo yabonaga muri Uganda hamushimishije no kuhakorera ahita ajya kwiga i Kampala.
Avuga ko mu gihe yari atararangiza kwiga uwo mwuga hashize nk’amezi abiri gusa, yaje guta ibyangombwa bye ahita afata bisi imuzana mu Rwanda gushaka ibindi.
Ageze i Kisoro ku mupaka w’u Rwanda na Uganda ngo yasanze haparitse imodoka nyinshi za bisi, zimwe zavaga mu Rwanda izindi zerekezayo.
Ati "Abanyarwanda twese badukuye muri izo modoka batujyana muri Polisi.
Twaramutse tujya mu rukiko ku itariki 10/5/2018, buri wese bamukatira igifungo kirengeje umwaka muri gereza".
"Twari benshi cyane turenga nka 600, ku buryo byabaye ngombwa ko batujyana mu magereza atandukanye y’i Kiburara, Kabale, Mbarara, Ibuga na Ibanda".
"Icyakora baguhitishamo gufungwa cyangwa gutanga amafaranga kuva kuri miliyoni imwe y’amashilingi kugera kuri ebyiri bakakurekura ugataha iwanyu.
Waba utayafite rero nibwo bagufunga ukajya guhinga".
"Abantu barakoreshwa!
Bahinga bakubitwa kuva mu gitondo kugeza nimugoroba nta kintu bashyira mu kanwa, amazi yonyine ni yo umuntu atangira gushyira mu nda nka saa cyenda-saa kumi".
"Abanyarwanda bahindutse abacakara cyangwa ibicuruzwa muri Uganda, n’ubwo twumvise ko abakuru b’ibihugu bashyize umukono ku masezerano y’i Luanda muri Angola, ntacyo byahinduye kuko Uganda itatekereza kurekura abo bantu".
Muhire avuga ko icyatumye we adakoreshwa imirimo ivunanye muri Uganda ari uko ngo yari afite ’Salon’ yo kogosheramo izwi, ku buryo batamushyiragaho ’agahato nk’ako bakorera abandi Banyarwanda b’abakene’.
Avuga ko agarutse ubutazasubira muri Uganda, kandi akaba akangurira abandi Banyarwanda bahatekerezaga kuzinukwa inzira yerekezayo.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Simon Kamuzinzi Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ SimonKamuzinzi

#8626#	3	economy	http://umubavu.com/ubukungu/article/Abafite-ibirarane-by-amazi-ya-WASAC-batishyuye-kagiye-kubabaho
Abafite ibirarane by’amazi ya WASAC batishyuye kagiye kubabaho Ikigo gishinzwe amazi n’isukura mu Rwanda kizwi nka WASAC kigiye kujyana mu nkiko abafatabuguzi bacyo bagera ku 15.000, kubera umwenda w’amafaranga y’u Rwanda asaga miliyari ebyeri (2.000.000.000) babereyemo iki kigo.
Ubuyobozi bwa WASAC, buvuga ko hari bamwe mu bafatabuguzi banze kwishyura amazi, bamwe barabafungira abandi bandikirwa amabaruwa abasaba ko bakwishyura ibirarane ariko bakomeza guterera agati mu ryinyo, hakaba hagiye kwitabazwa inkiko.
Umwenda wose iki kigo kiberewemo n’abaturage, ugera ku mafaranga y’u Rwanda miliyari enye (4.000.000.000) ariko abafite ibirarane bimaze amezi arenga atandatu kuzamura batishyura, nibo bishyuzwa asaga miliyari ebyiri, bakaba ari nabo bazajyanwa mu nkiko.
Gusa iki kigo kivuga ko mu gihe abatabuguzi bakwibwiriza bakishyura, ikibazo cyakemuka nta nkiko zitabajwe.
Ubuyobozi bwa WASAC buvuga ko mu mpamvu zituma bagomba gushyira imbaraga mu kwishyuza ku ngufu z’amategeko abafatabuguzi bambuye iki kigo, harimo kuha ubugenzuzi bukuru bw’Imari ya Leta nabwo bushyira igitutu kuri WASAC ngo yishyuze aka kayabo.
Mutamba Jane umuyobozi WASAC mu akarere ka KIcukiro we arasaba abafatabuguzi ko abafite ibirarane bakwegera ibiro bya Kicukiro aho byimukiye k’umuhanda ujya Kicukiro Center hafi na station Meru cyangwa bagahamagara kuri nimero 0788557863.

Laurence ubu ni inshuti ikomeye na Nkundiye wamwiciye umuryango wose muri Jenoside - VIDEO Nyuma y’imyaka 25 mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu mwaka w’1994, Abanyarwanda bateye intambwe ikomeye mu kubaka ubumwe n’ubwiyunge hagati y’abiciwe ababo ndetse n’abagize uruhare mu bwicanyi, kuburyo hari n’abatanga ubuhamya bw’uko ubu bafitanye ubucuti n’ababiciye umuryango.
Urugero ni uyu Laurence n’abandi benshi baduhaye ubuhamya bwabo Iby’intambwe idasanzwe y’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge mu Rwanda, biragaragazwa na benshi barimo n’umubyeyi Laurence Niyongira n’umuturanyi we Thacien Nkundiye bo muri Mbyo mu karere ka Bugesera, babaye inshuti zikomeye nyuma y’imyaka mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kandi Nkundiye yarishe umuryango wose wa Niyongira akaba ari we urokoka wenyine mu muryango we wose.
Laurence Niyongira wiciwe umuryango we wose na Thacien, avuga ko we yamaze kumuha imbabazi ubu akaba ari mu nshuti ze za hafi, ndetse ngo ubu bakaba babanye neza batitaye ku byabaye muri Mata 1994.

Iteka ubwo namwandikiraga ibaruwa igihe nari ndi muri gereza musaba ko yazambabarira, nta na rimwe yigeze anyita umwicanyi.
Ubu musigira abana banjye iyo ngize aho njya kandi abitaho nk’abe atitaye ku mabi namukoreye.
Yatumye ngira amahoro yo mu mutima.”
Aba bantu bombi bari mu itsinda ry’imiryango 54 igizwe n’abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bo muri Mbyo, bakaba bariyunze binyujijwe mu muryango wa gikirisitu udaharanira inyungu ugamije kwigisha abantu ubumwe n’ubwiyunge.
Ikinyamakuru Ukwezi cyaganiriye na bamwe muri aba batujwe muri iyi miryango, baduha ubuhamya budasanzwe bw’uko basigaye babanye kandi imiryango yabo yaragiye ihemukirana mu gihe cya Jenoside.

#8666#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/u-bubiligi-bwahaye-u-rwanda-miliyari-20-rwf-yo-guha-abaturage-amashanyarazi
U Bubiligi bwahaye u Rwanda miliyari 20 RWF yo guha abaturage amashanyarazi U Rwanda n'u Bubiligi byashyize umukono ku masezerano y'inkunga ya miliyoni 22 z'amayero (miliyari 20 RwF), yo kugeza amashanyarazi ku ngo ibihumbi 21 zo mu turere twa Kirehe, Gatsibo na Kayonza.
Ikindi gice cy'ayo mafaranga kigenerwa kongerera ubushobozi abashinzwe kwita ku mashanyarazi.
Ministiri Labille, Amb.
Claver Gatete na Ing.
Isumbingabo nyuma yo gushyira umukono ku masezerano y'inkunga.
Ministiri w'u Bubiligi ushinzwe inganda za Leta n'ubutwererane mu iterambere, Jean Pascal Labille na Amb.
Claver Gatete, Ministiri w'imari n'igenamigambi mu Rwanda; nibo bashyize umukono ku masezerano y'inkunga yatanzwe n'u Bubiligi ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 14/2/2014.
Miliyari 15.5 RwF muri 20 zatanzwe, niyo yagenewe gutanga amashanyarazi ku baturage batayafite mu turere twa Kirehe Gatsibo na Kayonza; hagamijwe no gufasha abikorera bo muri utwo turere guteza imbere ibikorwa bibahesha imirimo n'amafaranga, nk'uko Minitiri Amb.
Claver Gatete yabisobanuye.
Abitabiriye umuhango wo gushyira umukono ku masezerano y'inkunga yatanzwe n'u Bubiligi.
Yaguze ati "Kutagira ingufu z'amashanyarazi niyo mbogamizi ikomeye ituma abikorera badatera imbere."
Yakomeje asobanurira mugenzi we w'u Bubiligi uri mu ruzinduko rw'akazi mu karere k'ibiyaga bigari, akaba azamara iminsi ibiri mu Rwanda.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Ministeri y'ibikorwaremezo ushinzwe ingufu, Ing.
Emma Francoise Isumbingabo witabiriye isinywa ry'amasezerano, yavuze ko amafaranga asigaye muri iyo nkunga yatanzwe, azafasha guhugura no kwerekera abakozi b'ikigo gishinzwe ingufu(EWSA), uburyo bwo gukwirakwiza amashanyarazi batitabaje abanyamahanga no kuyacunga neza.
U Rwanda ngo ni umufatanyabikorwa ukomeye cyane w'u Bubiligi, ni yo mpamvu ubufatanye no gukomeza gutanga inkunga ku Rwanda bizakomeza, nk'uko Ministiri Labille yabitangaje.
Ati "Hari imishinga myinshi yo gufasha u Rwanda, ishyigikiwe na Banki y'isi n'Umuryango w'ubumwe bw'u Burayi, ikaba igamije kugeza abaturage b'u Rwanda n'abo mu biyaga bigari muri rusange ku by'ibanze bakeneye.
Turabizi neza ko amashanyarazi ari imbogamizi ikomeye cyane muri Afurika, haba ku baturage n'inganda zikora ibyo bakeneye."
Avuga ko avuye muri Kongo Kinshasa mu rugendo rwo gushaka icyateza imbere ibihugu bigize akarere k'ibiyaga bigari, aho asaba ko bigomba kwibeshaho hatagize ababangamira abandi.
Ati:" Erega Congo n'u Rwanda bizaguma ari ibihugu bibiri, akaba ari yo mpamvu bigomba kubana nk'abaturanyi beza."
Inkunga yatanzwe n'u Bubiligi yo kongera umubare w'abaturage batunze amashanyarazi, ni igice kimwe mu mafaranga agera ku mayero miliyoni 160 u Rwanda rwemerewe n'icyo gihugu mu gihe kingana n'imyaka ine, guhera mu 2011.
U Bubiligi butanga inkunga yo kunganira ibikorwa byo kwita ku buzima, kongera ingufu no koroshya kwegereza ubuyobozi n'ubushobozi abaturage(descentralisation).
Simon Kamuzinzi

#8667#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/Kutubahiriza-amabwiriza-yo-gufata-imiti-byongera-impfu
Kutubahiriza amabwiriza yo gufata imiti byongera impfu Impuguke zinyuranye n’abiga iby’ubuvuzi mu ishuri rikuru rya INES-Ruhengeri, baremeza ko kuba abaturage badasobanukiwe n’uburyo bwo gufata imiti bahabwa n’abaganga, ari kimwe mu bikomeje gutwara ubuzima bwa benshi.
Abitabiriye ibiganiro Babigaragarije mu biganiro nyunguranabitekerezo byateguwe n’ishuri rikuru rya INES-Ruhengeri, mu rwego rwo kurwanya ibibazo bya mikorobe zikomeje kwiyongera ari nako zugarije abaturage zinabatwara ubuzima.
Ni ikiganiro cyateguwe ku nsanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘The future of Antibiotics depends on all of us’.
Nk’uko Padiri Dr.
Hagenimana Fabien, Umuyobozi wa INES-Ruhengeri yabitangarije Kigali Today, ngo ikibazo gihangayikishije isi, ni imbaga y’abantu ikomeje gupfa kubera mikorobe zivuka ari nyinshi mu mubiri, zikarenga ubushobozi bw’imiti.
Inama yitabiriwe n’impuguke zinyuranye Yavuze ko icyo kibazo gikururwa no kudasobanukirwa kw’abaturage mu gufata imiti bahabwa hirya no hino mu mavuriro aho bayifata mu buryo butemewe bikabaviramo ibibazo.
Agira ati “Ni ikibazo gihangayikishije isi, bakurikije uburyo mikorobe zigenda ziyongera mu mu biri wa muntu, barasanga mu myaka 15-20 nta muti uzaba ukivura kubera ko uko mikorobe zigenda zimenyera mu buryo ubu n’ubu, ariko uyiha umuti wari usanzwe wayica bikanga.
Padiri Dr.
Hagenimana Fabien Umuyobozi wa INES-Ruhengeri Ni ikibazo tugomba kumva kimwe, ari abize, ari abatarize, ari abakora mu mavuriro natwe tuyobora ibigo nk’ibi, kugira ngo abantu bumve uburyo bwo gufata imiti bwabavura”.
Akomeza agira ati “Hari ubwo umuntu arwara agafata ‘antibiotic’ iyi n’iyi, akanywa ndetse yakumva yorohewe akarekeraho akabika, yahura na mugenzi we urwaye indwara nk’iye akamuhaho, bagakomeza kwinywera umuti nta wawupimye.
Hari n’abanywera alukoro (alcohol) kuri iyo miti, umubiri ukamenyera utyo kugeza ubwo umuti wazana wose udashobora kuvura umuntu, kubera ko mikorobe zabaye inshuti na ya miti ufata mu buryo butemewe, bikarangira umuntu apfuye”.
Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’abanyeshuri biga iby’ubuvuzi (Biomedical Laboratory sciences) muri INES-Ruhengeri, bwagaragaje ko na bo bagiye bahura n’ibyo bibazo by’abaturage bagezweho n’ingaruka zo gufata imiti nabi bikarangira bapfuye.
Doroth Nantari, usoza amasomo muri INES-Ruhengeri, avuga ko mu bushakashatsi yakoze yibanze ku buryo abaturage bafata imiti, aho yasanze batazi kuyikoresha, batazi n’ingaruka zo kuyikoresha nabi.
Ati “Nasanze antibiotic bazizi, ariko batazi kuyikoresha, batazi n’ingaruka zo gufata iyo miti nabi, umuturage baramuha imiti yakumva agaruye akabaraga ugasanga ntiyongeye kuyikoza, ibyo bituma mikorobe zikomeza kuvukira mu mubiri bikarangira nta muti ukibasha uburwayi”.
Nasanze avuga ko abaganga na bo bagenda babigiramo uruhare, aho usanga badasobanurira abarwayi uko bafata imiti bahawe, ibyo bigatuma umuturage atagira ubumenyi bw’uburyo yafata imiti yahawe, ari ho hava bya bibazo byo kutayiha agaciro ngo yumve ko akwiye kuyinywa akayimara.
Uwakoze ubushakashatsi ku buryo abaturage bafata imiti Ati “Ntabwo abaganga abasobanurira abaturage uko bafata imiti bahawe, no muri za laboratwari, usanga iyo umuganga agiye gufata ibizamini atabanza gusobanurura umurwayi impamvu yabyo.
Birakwiye ko mbere yo gufata umurwayi ibizamini ubanza kumusobanurira impamvu yabyo, ndetse na wawundi ushinzwe gutanga imiti akaganiriza umurwayi ahereye ku bizamini umuganga yamwandikiye, kugira ngo avurwe neza”.
Kabare Isaie Wiga mu mwaka wa kane muri Biomedical Laboratory Sciences, agira ati “Nk’uko babigaragaje, muri 2050 umubare w’abantu bazaba bicwa n’indwara zagombye kuba zivurwa uzaba wariyongereye cyane.
Ni yo mpamvu ibi biganiro biriho kugira ngo twirinde kuzatakaza abantu kandi hakabayeho kwirinda”.
Kabare Isaie wiga ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi muri INES-Ruhengeri Akomeza agira ati “Hari abafata imiti mu kajagari, ugasanga ayifashe itari ngombwa.
Umuturage baramuha imiti yakwiyumvamo ko atoye akabaraga agahita ajugunya iyo yari asigaje cyangwa akayiha undi.
Ibyo ni ukwiyica, cyane kuko aba ahaye icyuho za bagiteri kuko igihe wahawe imiti ugomba kuyimara”.
Ibyo biganiro byitabiriwe n’impuguke zinyuranye mu bitaro by’icyitegererezo byo hirya no hino mu gihugu, byagaragaje ko ikibazo kinini kikiri ku myumvire mike y’abaturage aho bataramenya neza ingaruka zo gufata imiti nabi nk’uko Jean Pierre Uwizeyimana, ukora muri Laboratwari yo mu bitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faycal abivuga.
Agira ati “Ntabwo nakwemeza ko ibyo bibazo by’abaturage biterwa n’abaganga badasobanurira abarwayi.
Ntekereza ko umuganga mbere yo gutanga umuti abanza kuganiriza umurwayi, akamusobanurira uko ayifata.
Ibiganiro byitabiriwe n’impuguke zinyuranye mu buvuzi Nkeka ko ari ubumenyi buke bw’abaturage, umuntu yakumva ahembutse akumva ko yakize, birasaba inyigisho zifasha abaturage gusobanukirwa neza akamaro ko gufata imiti neza, n’ingaruka zo kuyifata nabi”.
Mu myanzuro yafatiwe muri iyo nama, harimo ko ibiganiro byiga kuri icyo kibazo bizakomeza.
Ikindi hagategurwa ubukangurambaga mu bigo byose bikora ibikorwa by’ubuvuzi, hagamijwe kurushaho guhugurira abaturage gufata imiti mu buryo bwemewe, mu kubarinda ibyago byakururwa no gukoresha nabi imiti bahabwa mu mavuriro anyuranye.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Servilien Mutuyimana Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ mutuyiserv

Mashami Vincent utoza Bugesera FC nawe nubwo akorera imyitozo kuri iki kibuga buri munsi yunze mu rya mugenzi agira ati "Sinabihisha gukinira ku kibuga kibi nta kipe biha amahirwe.
Dufite abakinnyi batandukanye ariko ntabwo ushobora kubona ubuhanga bafite badashobora guhererekanya umupira."
Nyuma y'umukino ndetse n'abayobozi bamaze gutaha, abafana ba Bugesera FC basubiranyemo bararwana ngo bitewe n'amafaranga bishyujwe kuri uyu mukino batavuzeho rumwe.
Bamwe mu bazitiye ikibuga nk'uko byavugwaga n'abari ku kibuga bakubiswe kuko ngo batumye abandi bishyuzwa.
Mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade Mumena, Gicumbi FC yanyagiye Kiyovu Sports ibitego 4-1 bya Rutayisire Egide watsinze bibiri, Mudeyi Suleyman na Muhumure Omar icy'impozamarira cya Kiyovu Sports gitsindwa na Bigirimana Blaise.

Ikibuga cy’indege cya Gisenyi kigiye kubakwa kibe mpuzamahanga Minisiteri y’Ibikorwaremezo yatangaje ko Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi kigiye kwagurwa ku buryo mu mwaka wa 2021 kizaba cyatangiye kwakira indege nini z’imbere mu gihugu n’izo mu Karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe gutwara Abantu n’Ibintu muri Minisiteri y’Ibikorwaremezo, Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu, yatangaje ko imirimo yo kwagura iki kibuga izaba yatangiye muri Nyakanga 2018.

Yakomeje asobanura ko biteganyijwe ko nibura mu mwaka wa 2021 Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi kizaba cyatangiye gukoreshwa, cyakira indege nini zirimo iza boeing ziva mu bindi bihugu byo mu Karere.
Ku birebana n’igikorwa cyo kwishyura ingurane ku miryango yari ituriye imbago z’iki kibuga, mu biganiro Leta yagiranye nayo kuri uyu wa Gatanu bemeranyije ko muri Kanama 2018 bizaba byarangiye.

Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi cyajyaga cyakira mu bihe bishize indege nto za RwandAir gusa.
Umushinga wo kwagura Ikibuga cy’Indege cya Gisenyi urarimbanyije mu gihe n’Iburasirazuba naho hatangiye imirimo yo kubaka Ikibuga cy’Indege Mpuzamahanga cya Bugesera.

Abamugariye ku rugamba bazibandwaho mu muganda udasanzwe w’urubyiruko Mu rwego rwo kuzirikana ubwitange bw’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, mu gihugu hose hateganyijwe umuganda udasanzwe w’urubyiruko uzibanda ku kubafasha mu bikorwa bitandukanye.
Uyu muganda udasanzwe wa buri gihembwe uteganyijwe mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 21 Mutarama 2017 ukazabera muri buri kagari mu gihugu hose.
Uyu muganda wateguwe n’inama y’igihugu y’urubyiruko ku bufatanye na Minisiteri y’urubyiruko n’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwitegura umunsi w’intwari no kugaragaza uruhare rw’urubyiruko mu kuzirikana ubutwari bwaranze intwari z’u Rwanda.
Abamugariye ku rugamba ni bo bazibandwaho muri uyu muganda aho bazakorerwa ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo gusanirwa amazu, ubwiherero cyangwa indi mirimo irimo kwahirira amatungo, guhinga, kumesa n’ibindi bikorwa by’isuku bitewe n’ibyo abazafashwa bifuza.

#8778#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/article/zuckerberg-yahawe-impamyabumenyi-y-ikirenga-nyuma-y-imyaka-13-avuye-mu-ishuri
Zuckerberg yahawe impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga nyuma y’imyaka 13 avuye mu ishuri Mark Zuckerberg washinze ndetse akaba ayobora urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Facebook, yahawe impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga (Honorary degree) na kaminuza ya Havard, nyuma y’imyaka 13 avuye mu ishuri.
Mu 2005 nibwo Zuckerberg wigaga muri kaminuza ya Havard yavuye mu ishuri, kugira ngo umwanya we wose awushyire mu kunonosora Facebook.
Icyo gihe yatangaje ko adateze kuzarisubiramo ukundi.
Ubwo yakiraga iyi mpamyabumenyi ku itariki ya 23 Gicurasi 2017, Zuckerberg uza mu baherwe ba mbere ku isi aho afite umutungo ubarirwa muri miliyari 62.5$, yabwiye abari barangije amasomo yabo ko aribo bafite inshingano yo kuzana impinduka no kurwanya ubusumbane.
Ati “Impinduka zitangirira aho uri, n’impinduka z’isi yose zitangirira ku tuntu duto, zitangizwa n’abantu nkatwe.”
Zuckerberg w’imyaka 33 yavuze ko hari abantu benshi basigajwe inyuma, kandi ko bitoroshye kwita ku bari mu bindi bice by’isi, igihe iwanyu mu rugo naho hari ibibazo.
Nk’uko Daily Mail yabyanditse, Zuckerberg yongeye kwiyibutsa ibihe bye muri Kaminuza ya Havard kuva ku munsi wa mbere, uburyo yasobanuye ibijyanye na Facemash yaje guhinduka Facebook, uburyo yavuye muri iyi kaminuza agakorerwa ibirori byo ku musezeraho n’inshuti ze, n’ukuntu kuri uwo munsi yahuriye mu bwiherero na Priscilla Chan waje kuba umugore we.
Ati “Mu byo navuga ko ari ari amagambo y’urukundo adasanzwe naramubwiye nti ‘ ngiye kwirukanwa muri iyi kaminuza mu minsi itarenze itatu, rero dukeneye gusohokana mu buryo bwihuse’.
Umwe muri umwe ugiye kurangiza kwiga nawe ashobora gukoresha aya magambo.”
Yongeye ho ko atigeze yirukanwa ko ahubwo ariwe ubwe wafashe umwanzuro wo kuva mu ishuri, ndetse ahamya ko nubwo muri film yakinwe ku buzima bwe bagaragaje ko Facemash ariyo yatumye habaho Facebook atari ko bimeze, ahubwo ko icyo yakoze ari ugutuma ahura n’umuntu w’agaciro mu buzima bwe ariwe mugore we.
Asoza ijambo rye, Zuckerberg yashishikarije abiga muri Havard guharanira ko ubuzima bwabo bubera abandi umugisha.
Nyuma y’uyu muhango yashyize ifoto kuri Facebook ari hagati y’ababyeyi be, ashyiraho amagambo agira ati “Mama, iteka nahoraga nkubwira ko nzagaruka, ndetse nkabona impamyabumenyi yanjye.”
Zuckerberg yatangiye kubaka urubuga rwitwaga ‘TheFacebook’ muri Mutarama 2004, afatanyije na Eduardo Saverin, Andrew MacCollum, Dustin Moskovitz na Chris Hughes, nyuma y’ukwezi tariki ya 4 Gashyantare barushyize hanze rutangira gukoreshwa.
Yakomeje kurunonosora kugeza rubaye Facebook tuzi uyu munsi, ikoreshwa n’abagera kuri miliyari ebyiri bari hirya no hino ku isi.
Zuckerberg yahawe impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga nyuma y’imyaka 13 avuye mu ishuri Zuckerberg yishimanye n'umuryango we Zuckerberg ni umwe mu bavuye mu ishuri mu gihe bigaga muri Harvard ariko ubu bakaba barateye imbere.
Mu bandi bazwi harimo P Diddy Zuckerberg yavuye mu ishuri ajya kwita kuri Facebook [email protected]

#8782#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/article/inganzo-ifutse-ya-kilimobenecyo-wahanze-ibendera-ry-igihugu-ikirangantego-n
Inganzo ifutse ya Kilimobenecyo wahanze ibendera ry’igihugu, ikirangantego n’inote zirimo iya 5000 Frw (Video) Abanyabugeni ni abantu bamenywa na bake ariko ibikorwa byabo biba ibimenyabose!
Nko ku Bakirisitu Gatolika hari ibishushanyo byamamaye, uko bizwi muri Kiliziya y’i Vatikani bikaba ari nako bizwi mu y’i Kigali ariko abazi uwabicuze ni mbarwa.
Urugero ni nk’ikigaragaza batisimu ya Yezu Kirisitu.
Ni bangahe bazi ko ari icya Leonardo da Vinci?
Ni abantu batavugwa ariko baba bicaranye inganzo ihambaye, barara amajoro bahimba ibintu dukoresha mu buzima bwa buri munsi, tukabifata nk’ibiraho tutazi inkomoko.
Imyenda, telefoni, intebe, imodoka, ipasi n’indege…byose bihera ku rupapuro n’ikaramu.
Mu Rwanda naho ni uko.
Turitsa cyane ku bikoresho nkenerwa bya buri munsi birimo ibyangombwa n’amafaranga.
Ibendera u Rwanda rufite ubu ryatangiye gukoreshwa ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2001.
Rigizwe n’amabara atatu arimo icyatsi kibisi, umuhondo n’ubururu.
Ibara ry’icyatsi kibisi risobanura icyizere cy’uburumbuke; iry’umuhondo ni iterambere ry’ubukungu mu gihe iry’ubururu risobanura umunezero n’amahoro by’Abanyarwanda.
Ishusho y’izuba rifite imirasire 24 isa n’umuhondo w’igi rishushanyijemo uruziga; rigaragaza urumuri rumurikira u Rwanda n’abarutuye.
Ni ikimenyetso cy’ubumwe, gukorera mu mucyo no kurwanya ubujiji.
Iri bendera ryahanzwe n’Umunyabugeni w’Umunyarwanda, Kilimobenecyo Alphonse, nyuma yo guhigika izindi ntiti zirenga 400 zari zaturutse imihanda yose y’Isi.
Yatangiye ubugeni ari amaburakindi Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE, Kilimobenecyo yasobanuye ko ajya gutangira gukora ubugeni, ari ibintu atari asanzwe yiyumvamo ahubwo bisa n’ibyamugwiririye kuko mu yandi masomo yabonaga byanze.
Ati “Kera abantu barangizaga kwiga umwaka wa gatandatu bagakora ikizamini cyo kujya mu mashuri yisumbuye.
Icyo gihe nari umuhanga, ariko umwaka wa mbere nakoze ikizamini ndatsindwa, ndasibira nabwo ndatsindwa, ku nshuro ya gatatu nabwo ndatsindwa, nibwo navuze nti igisigaye reka njye kwiga gushushanya.”
Icyo gihe yashatse abantu bari babizobereyemo baramuhugura, amaze kubimenya akora ikizamini cyo gutangira kwiga mu Ishuri ry’Ubugeni ku Nyundo, aratsinda.
Mu gihe yari arimo gusoza, u Burusiya bwatanze amahirwe ku bashaka gukomeza amasomo yabo aba umwe muri bake berekeje muri Institut des Beaux-Arts de Kiev, aho yakurikiranye ibijyaye na ‘Arts graphiques’.
Uyu mugabo yavuye mu Burusiya mu 1988, abona akazi mu Icapiro ry’Ibitabo by’abanyeshuri aho yari ashinzwe ibijyanye no gutekereza ibishushanyo, gukosora amagambo no gukora inyigoshusho (design).
Yatangiye akoresha intoki kuko icyo gihe mudasobwa zari zitaraza, gusa yaje kugura iye bwa mbere mu 1989.
Ajya guhanga ibendera ry’igihugu, iyari Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu yatanze itangazo rivuga ko ikeneye ibirangantego bya Repubulika, maze abiyumvamo impano y’ubugeni barapiganwa.
Mu basaga 400 bitabiriye ipiganwa hatoranyijwemo icumi maze bahura n’itsinda ryashyizweho kugira ngo ryige ku birango bibereye u Rwanda, aza gusohokamo ari uwa mbere.
Ati “Nahembwe neza nk’uwa mbere mu bakoze ibendera n’ibirangantego bya Repubulika y’u Rwanda.’’
Mu gukora ibendera, aba banyabugeni bari bahawe amabara bagomba kugenderaho hanyuma ibindi bo bakabivana mu bwenge bwabo.
Ati “Hari ibyo twagombaga kugenderaho nk’icyerekezo cy’igihugu.
Niba irya kera ryarimo umutuku uvuga impinduramatwara n’amaraso yamenetse, twagombaga gukoresha irigaragaza icyizere cyo kwiyubaka.’’
Abitabiriye aya marushanwa basabwe kwitondera amakosa nk’ayakozwe mu 1959 aho ibendera ry’u Rwanda ryasanishijwe n’irya Guinée-Conakry, nyuma y’imyaka ibiri rikaza kwandikwamo inyuguti ya ‘R’ mu kubitandukanya.
Kilimobenecyo Alphonse ni umunyabugeni w'umwuga wakoze byinshi mu bihangano bikoreshwa mu buzima bwa buri munsi Gushyiramo izuba ni ibitekerezo bye bwite Uyu mugabo wishimira kuba yaratanze umusanzu mu bikorwa bikomeye by’u Rwanda, iyo muganira aba avuga ko ibyo yakoze ari iby’igihugu aho kuba byamwitirirwa.
Yibuka ko mu gihe cy’icyumweru arimo guhanga ibendera, yagerageje ibintu byinshi ariko akazajya asanga nta gisobanuro bifite.
Aha niho gushyiramo izuba byaturutse.
Ku ikubitiro iryo zuba yarihaye imirasire 12, ariko kuko yagombaga gutanga ibisobanuro byaryo abisesenguye asanga bitaba biboneye ni ko guhitamo kuriha 24 kandi rikajya iburyo.
Ati “Nabanje gutekereza utuntu twihariye tugomba kuba mu ibendera.
Izuba naravuze nti ‘ese ndariha imirasire ingahe’, ndavuga nti ‘irindwi ariko nsanga bidasa neza’.
Natangiye ngira 12, ndenzaho mike nabwo mbona ari bibi nyuma nza kuvuga nti reka ngire 24.”
Iyi mirasire 24 yayihaye igisobanuro cya politiki nziza itagomba gusinzira ahubwo igomba buri gihe guhora imurikiye igihugu.
Iryo zuba kandi yagennye ko rigomba kujya iburyo aho rirasira, aho kujya ibumoso nk’aho rirengera kuko kurenga byaba bivuze ko ya politiki nziza isinziriye.
Amajoro yamaze adasinziye yaje kubyara umusaruro maze atangazwa nk’uwatsinze.
Ntajya yifuza gushyira hanze ingano y’amafaranga yahembwe, gusa ashimangira ko ‘yari menshi muri icyo gihe kandi icy’ingenzi si umubare wayo, ni uko byamfunguriye amarembo’.
Ati “Icyanshimishije ni ukumva nakoze ikintu cy’agaciro ku gihugu n’Abanyarwanda.’’
Ihangwa ry’ikirangantego Kilimobenecyo ni na we wakoze ikirangantego cy’u Rwanda kirimo agaseke, ingabo, amasaka n’ipfundo rishimangira ubumwe.
Ati “U Rwanda rwagize akaga gakomeye; kubera Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, nahisemo agaseke kuko nyuma yayo Abanyarwanda bari bakeneye kongera gusabana, sinari nzi ko kazakundwa cyane mu mahanga kakatuzanira n’amadovize.
Ikindi natekereje ko iterambere ry’igihugu rigomba inganda ikoranabuhanga, nabyo mbishyiramo.
’’ “Ntitwibagiwe ubuhinzi n’ubworozi n’ikawa icuruzwa hanze mu kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Ingabo ebyiri nazikoresheje nk’uburinzi bw’ibikorwa by’igihugu.
Byose bikorwa Abanyarwanda batahiriza umugozi umwe, bivuga ko tugomba gukorera hamwe kandi mu mucyo.’’
Niwe washushanyije inote zirimo iy’ibihumbi bitanu Kilimobenecyo yanagize uruhare mu gushushanya inote dukoresha mu Rwanda rwa none kimwe n’izakoreshejwe mu bihe byahise nk’iya 500 Frw.
Ati “Hari inote zimwe zirimo iya 5000 Frw, 2000 Frw, 1000 Frw na 500 Frw nagiye nshushanya mbisabwe na Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu mu gihe bahinduraga amafaranga.’’
Igiceri cy’ijana cyifashishwa muri iki gihe nacyo ni we wagishushanyije ariko mu gihe gito abantu benshi badashobora gutekereza, kuko cyamutwaye iminota itanu gusa.
Kilimobenecyo ushimangira ko uwo ubugeni bwahiriye bumutunga bitewe n’uburyo abwitwaramo, yagiye akora n’ibindi birimo amashusho yigeze gukwira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga agaragaza Perezida Kagame ari umutoza w’ikipe naho abagize Guverinoma ari abakinnyi.
Ni we kandi wakoze igishushanyo kigaragara nk’ikirango cy’Igicumbi cy’Intwari, ibirango bitandukanye bya RDF, yanashushanyije impeta z’ishimwe z’igihugu, ikirango cy’Umujyi wa Kigali ndetse afatanyije n’uwitwa Hategekimana Laurent bakoze Ingabo yahawe Perezida Kagame ubwo yarahiriraga kuyobora u Rwanda muri Kanama 2017.

Kirehe: Yataye umwana yari amaze kubyara mu musarani atabarwa atarapfa Nyirahagenimana Veronika w'imyaka 28 wo mu kagari ka Ruhanga mu murenge wa Kigina mu gihe, akurikiranwe n'inzego zishinzwe umutekano arwaje umwana we mu bitaro bya Kirehe nyuma yo kumubyara akamuta mu musarani.
Umwe mu bo mu muryango wa Nyirahagenimana ubwo yajyaga m'umusarani mu rukerera rwo kuwa 15 Kamena 2015 avuga ko yumvise umwana aririra mu musarani asubirayo yiruka ajya kubibwira umuvandimwe we Nyirahagenimana ko hari icyo yumvise mu musarani.
Nyirahagenimana ngo yagiye mu musarano atazi ko abyara umwana agwamo.
Nkuko Nyirahagenimana yabidutangarije aho arwaje umwana we mu bitaro bya Kirehe ngo uwo muvandimwe we akimubwira iyo nkuru umusantsi wamuvuye kumutwe kuko yari azi ko yabikoze mu ibanga.
Nyirahagenimana utemera ko yataye uwo mwana mu musarani k'ubushake avuga ko nyuma yo kumenya ko atwite yagize ubwoba bwo kubibwira iwabo atekereza gutoroka ahunga iwabo akagira aho aba agiye.
Ngo mu gihe yashakaga amafaranga y'urugendo mu rukerera rwo kuwa mbere nibwo ngo yumvise ashaka kujya mu musarani agezeyo yumva umwana aguyemo agira ubwoba abihisha iwabo kugeza ubwo bitahuwe n'umuvandimwe we ubwo yajyaga mu musarani bukeye yumva umwana ararira.
Yamusabye kumugirira ibanga biba ibyubusa abibwira ababyeyi nibwo batabaje abaturanyi bakura uwo mwana mu musarani wari ugihumeka ariko bigaragara ko ubuzima bwe bumeze nabi kuko umwanda uvanze n'ibisimba (inyo) yari wuzuye ku bice byose by'umubiri wageze no munda.
Nyiransabimana Perpetue uyobora akagari ka Ruhanga avuga ko ibyo Nyirahagenimana avuga ko yagiye mu musarani akabyara atabizi bitabaho.
Ati"ibyo avuga ngo umwana yaguye mu musarani atabizi arabeshya nanjye narabyaye ntabwo umwana avuka atyo."
Nyiransabimana Perpetue asaba urubyiruko kwirinda inda zidateganyijwe bitonda, birinda ubusambanyi asaba n'abatwite kubyakira bakabyara bakarera neza abana aho gukora amahano bica abo baziranenge.
Kuri uwo munsi umwana yahise ashikirizwa ibitaro bya Kirehe nkuko Dr Uwiringiyimana Jean Nepomscene uyobora ibyo bitaro abivuga ngo umwana n'ubwo bamugejeje ku bitaro ameze nabi cyane yitaweho bihagije k'uburyo ngo hari icyizere cyo gukira.
Ubu Nyirahagenimana mu gihe akurikiranwe na Polisi ari mu bitaro bya Kirehe aho ari hafi y'umwana we amwonsa ibindi bibazo by'uburwayi bikurikiranwe n'abaganga.

Kuba nta tegeko rirengera ababana batarasezeranye, intandaro y'amakimbirane kubera mitungo Gloria Jean Garaland, umuyobozi w'ibiro bishinzwe imiyoborere na Demokarasi mu mushinga wa USAID mu Rwanda Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umushinga Landesa mu 2014 bukorewe mu turere twa Nyagatare na Kayonza bwagaragaje ko 89% by'abagore babajijwe bagaragaje ko amakimbirane ashigiye ku butaka ari ikibazo gikomeye.
Umuryango Haguruka wo uvuga ko wakiriye telefoni 1 797 by'abantu basabaga ubufasha mu kubakemurira ibibazo bishingiye ku makimbirane y'ubutaka.
Ibi n'ibyagaragajwe kuri uyu wa 13 Mutarama 2016 n'umushinga w'abanyamerika Landesa uterwa inkunga n'undi mushinga w'abanyamerika utsura amajyambere USAID.
Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko 95% by'abayobozi bo ku nzego z'ibanze n'abagore bangana 89% babajijwe bagaragaje ko amakimbirane mu miryango ashingiye ku butaka ari ikibazo gikomeye, mugihe 71% by' abayobozi bo ku nzego z'ibanze babajijwe, 65% muri bo bemeje ko akenshi imiryango ihura n'ibi bibazo.
Ibi biremezwa na Dismas Rurangangabo ushinzwe imibereho myiza y'abaturage mu murenge wa Katabagemu mu karere ka Nyagatare waganiriye na Makuruki, aho avuga ko mu karere ka Nyagatare by'umwihariko mu murenge ayoboye abagabo bagurisha ubutaka rwihishwa bakambuka bakajya mu gihugu cy'abaturanyi cya Uganda.
Rurangangabo yagize ati: "Ibibazo by'amakimbirane mu miryango bituruka ku bagabo usanga bagurisha ubutaka rwihishwa bakigira mu gihugu cya Uganda.
Kuba hari bamwe mu bantu bibaruzaho ubutaka butari ubwabo, ndetse hakaba n'abagura ubutaka batabanje kureba ko ubugurisha afite icyemezo cya burundu, uwabugurishije atagifite agahita acika agasiga ibibazo by'imanza mu miryango."
Nyinawumuntu Agnes, Umufashamyumvire mu murenge wa Rukara mu karere ka Kayonza we yabwiye Makuruki ko ibibazo by'amakimbirane mu miryango aturuka ku ukuba hakiri imwe mu miryango ibana itarasezeranye .
Yagize ati:" Haracyari icyuho cyo kuba hari imwe mu miryango ibana itarasezeranye, kandi abenshi ugasanga batazi amategeko abarengera cyane cyane abagore, umugabo ugasanga yagurishije imitungo, umugore agaceceka."
Mugabo Fidele, ushinzwe imicungire y'umushinga ndetse akaba n'umukozi muri Haguruka yavuze ko akenshi ibibazo by'amakibirane yo mu miryango bituruka ku mitere y'amategeko agenga ubutaka mu Rwanda.
Mugabo kandi avuga ko biterwa no kuba hari imwe mu miryango ibana mu buryo butemewe mugihe nyamara mu Rwanda nta tegeko rihari rirengera abagore babana n'abagabo mu buryo butemewe n'amategeko.
Mugabo yagize ati: "Mu ngo 32% twasuye, umugabo afite umugore umwe , twasanze 5% ari ababana mu buryo bunyuranyije n'amategeko, mugihe 7,5% twasanze ari umugabo utunze abagore barenze umwe.
Ibi bigateza ibibazo mu muryango mugihe mu Rwanda nta tegeko rihari rirengera umugore utarasezeranye mu mategeko ku bijyanye n'umutungo."
Fidele Mugabo, Umukozi muri Haguruka ushizwe umutungo mu mushinga Landesa Ibindi Mugabo yagarutseho bituma mu miryango hakomeza kugaragara amakimbirane n'uko itegeko ry'ubutaka rivuga ko ubutaka butarengeje hegitare imwe butemerewe kugurishwa cyangwa ngo bugabanywe abantu.
Ubwo uyu mushinga Landesa wakoraga ubushakashatsi uvuga ko wegereye abaturage ukabafasha gukemura ibibazo bishingiye ku makimbirane ashingiye ku mitungo , aho mu turere twa Nyagatare na Kayonza abagore bagera kuri 40% basobanukiwe uburenganzira bwabo mu gukoresha, kugurisha no guhabwa ubutaka , naho 72% by'abaturage bashoboye gukurikira ibikorwa by'umushinga bashoboye gusobanukirwa no kubaza ibijyanye n'uburenganzira ku butaka.
Uyu Mushinga Landesa waterwaga inkunga na USAID ukaba washoje imirimo yawo .

#8857#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/bimwe-mu-bizakwereka-ko-umusore-mucuditse-nta-kindi-akurikiye-kitari-ubutunzi
Bimwe mu bizakwereka ko umusore mucuditse nta kindi akurikiye kitari ubutunzi ‘Gukura ibyinyo’ ni imvugo yamamaye cyane mu Rwanda aho abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye bayikoresha bashaka kugaragaza umukobwa utagira urukundo ahubwo usanga akundana n’umugabo cyangwa umusore runaka kubera ubutunzi afite.
Nubwo ariko abakobwa aribo bakunda gushyirwa mu majwi, burya ngo hari n’umusore usanga akundana n’umukobwa runaka nta kindi agamije uretse kurya imitungo ye.
Imbuga zitandukanye zirimo na Standard zagiye zandika ku miterere y’abasore nk’aba aho zagaragaje ko akenshi nta bikorwa bifatika bafite, ahubwo barangwa no kugerageza kwereka abakunzi babo ko ntacyo batabakorera ngo bishime ariko hagira ikibazo kivuka ugasanga ntibashoboye kwihangana.
Dore bimwe mu bizakubwira ko umusore mukundana ari muri iki cyiciro: 1.
Bashishikazwa no kumenya amafaranga winjiza Kimwe mu bizakubwira ko umusore mukundana ari umukuzi w’ibyinyo ni uko uzasanga ashishikajwe no kumenya amafaranga winjiza, uburyo wizigama ndetse akenshi ugasanga ashaka kugenzura uburyo uyakoresha.
Ikindi ngo abasore nk’aba usanga bakunze kugeza ku bakunzi babo ibitekerezo bitandukanye bijyanye no gushora imari, ariko washishoza neza ugasanga atari izindi impuhwe ahubwo ari amaco yo kugira ngo babone uko bakoresha umutungo w’abakobwa mu nyungu zabo bwite bitwaje urukundo rudahari.
2.
Biyumvamo kuba abasore b’ibitangaza Abasore nk’aba kandi ngo usanga akenshi bakunze gushyira imbere uburyo bagaragara inyuma mu buryo bukabije, ndetse bakiyumva nk’abasore b’ibitangaza ku buryo gukundana n’abo babifata nk’amahirwe ku bakobwa.
Ibi ngo bituma bumva ko abakunzi babo bagomba gukora ibishoboka byose bakabitaho binyuze mu kubahonga impano zitandukanye zirimo n’amafaranga, ku iturufu y’uko nibatabikora bazatandukana na bo.
3.
Ntibashishikazwa n’umurimo Benshi mu basore barangwa n’imico yo gukunda abakobwa bafite amafaranga usanga nta gitekerezo na gito cyo gukora bafite cyangwa inzozi zo kugera ku kintu runaka, ahubwo bagashishikazwa no gushaka abakunzi bafite amafaranga menshi.
Niba uri umukobwa ufite akazi kabone n’iyo kaba kataguhemba amafaranga menshi, ukaba ukundana n’umusore utagira akazi, aho gushaka icyo akora ugasanga anejejwe no gukoresha umutungo wawe gusa uritonde utazasigara uririra mu myotsi.
4.
Bakunda kubaho ubuzima buhenze Gukuda ubuzima buhenze ubwabyo si ikibazo, ariko uzasanga abasore bari muri iki cyiciro bakunda ibihenze gusa kandi nta gikorwa na kimwe bafite kibinjiriza amafaranga.
Usanga bakunda imyambaro y’agaciro, gusohokera ahantu hahenze ariko igihe cyo kwishyura cyagera ugasanga iteka barereka abakunzi babo ko wenda bibagiriwe amafaranga mu rugo cyangwa bayashoye mu bikorwa runaka bibyara inyungu kandi mu by’ukuri nta kintu na kimwe bifitiye.

#8876#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/amazu-afite-agaciro-ka-miliyoni-28rwf-azagurishwa-miliyoni-18rwf
Amazu afite agaciro ka miliyoni 28RWf azagurishwa miliyoni 18RWf Inkeragutabara zamuritse inzu 32 ziri muri Kicukiro, zubakiwe abifuza inzu zo kugura,zigurwa ku mafaranga miliyoni 18 RWf imwe, nyamara yari afite agaciro ka miliyoni 28 RWf.
Aya mazu azajya agurwa miliyoni 18 n’ibihumbi 600 Minisitiri w’ingabo, General James Kabarebe, yashimye Inkeragutabara zibumbiye muri koperative y’Abadahigwa zakoze iki gikorwa cyo kubaka aya mazu.
Minisitiri General Kabarebe yashimye kandi uruhare rw’inzego zirimo banki ya BRD na Rwanda Housing Authority zagize uruhare muri iki gikorwa, anaboneraho ashima abanyarwanda bose bagira uruhare mu bikorwa byo kubaka igihugu.
Yagize ati “Abaturage bose b’u Rwanda ni reserve force, ni reserve system y’igihugu kuko reserve bivuze bamwe batari mu ngabo z’igihugu zihoraho z’umwuga, ariko mu gihe igihugu cyabitabaje ku mbaraga zose zikenewe bagahaguruka bakagikorera”.
Umuyobozi w’abadahigwa ku ntego Willy Rukundo yavuze ko kuba aya mazu yaruzuye adahenze cyane byaturutse ku bufatanye bwa Leta na koperative yabo byatumye aho kuzura inzu ifite agaciro ka miriyoni zisaga 28RWf, ubu yuzura ihagaze miriyoni zisaga 18RWf.
Asaba abanyarwanda bose bafite ikibazo cy’amacumbi aciritse kubagana hakiri kare.
Yagize ati “Abantu bamwe baratubwira ngo aya mazu ashobora kuba yubakishije rukarakara kandi arimo ibintu byose kandi yubakishije ibintu bigezweho, n’abandi bifuza amazu bashonje bahishiwe."
Umwe mu baguze inzu muri uyu mudugudu avuga ko yari yarabuze inzu iri ahantu hafi y’umuhanda yubatse neza kandi ihendutse akemeza ko bigoye kwiyumvisha ko ubwiza bw’izo nzu bukwiranye n’amafaranga bayitanzeho.
Yagize ati “nabanje gushaka amazu meza muri iyi Kigali ndaheba, nabonye iyi nzu irimo byose kandi nini ku mafaranga make."
Huzuye amazu 32, muri yo 13 yamaze kwishyurwa andi nayo yamaze kubona ba nyirayo gusa bakaba bacyumvikana na banki zabo kugira ngo bumvikane uko bazishyura.
Iyi nzu igizwe n’ibyumba bitatu binini na salon, inzu yo gutekeramo, iy’umukozi n’aho kogera habiri kandi hashashemo amakaro, ikishyurwa miriyoni 18 n’ibihumbi 600 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Abayobozi batandukanye bitabiriye gutaha aya mazu Biteganyijwe ko mu cyiciro cya kabiri gagiye kubakwa andi mazu 24, aho abaturage bahamagarirwa kwiyandikisha hakiri kare ngo bigurire amazu yubatse neza kandi adahenze yubakwa n’inkeragutabara zibumbiye muri koperative yitwa Abadahigwa ku Ntego.

#8888#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/ibintu-7-byagufasha-gukuraho-ibicece
Ibintu 7 byagufasha gukuraho ibicece Abakobwa benshi n’abagore babangamirwa no kubyibuha inda, yewe ugasanga ntago banejejwe no kwambara imyenda bakaberwa ariko byagera ku nda ukabona ko habura ikintu.
Nubwo rwose kuri ubu hariho imyenda wambara igahisha ubunini bw’inda ariko ntago bikuyeho ko ushobora no gukoresha ubundi buryo uwo mubyibuho w’inda ukagenda burundu.
Dore ibintu by’ingenzi ukwiye kwibandaho mu gihe ushaka gutakaza amavuta yo munda ibyo benshi bita ibicece nkuko tubikesha Agasaro Magazine 1.
Icyambere ni ukugabanya isukari Iyo uriye isukari nyinshi, umwijima uba wuzuye fructose nyinshi bityo ukayihinduramo amavuta yo mubwoko bwa fat.
Ayo mavuta rero ntahandi yibika atari kunda.
Iyo bigeze rero ku isukari iba mu binyobwa biba bibi kuko niyo iba ari nyinshi.
Niba ushaka kugabanya inda irinde kunywa ibintu bifite isukari nyinshi.
2.
Kurya proteines nyinshi Protein ni imwe mu ntungamubiri burya zifasha gutakaza ibiro.
Abahanga bavuga ko kurya ifunguro ririmo protein bifasha umubiri kudashaka ibiryo birimo za calorie nyinshi nk’amasukari bityo bikakurinda kubyibuha cyane, ndetse no kuzana amavuta ku nda.
Rero ni byiza mu gihe ushaka gutakaza amavuta yo kunda ko ugomba kurya ifunguro ryiganjemo za protein nk’amata, amagi, imboga, ubunyobwa n’ibinyampeke.
3.
Irinde ifarini Ifarini ni imwe mu bintu bishobora kukongerera amavuta yo kunda bityo ukarushaho kubyibuha inda, ubwo aha turavuga nka za keke, imigati, capati, amandazi ndetse nibindi byose bikozwe mu ifarini.
Kureka ibiryo birimo ifarini burundu bishobora kukugabanyiriza inda mu buryo utatekerezaga.
4.
Gukora Sport Ni byiza ko wakora sport zigorora munda nka za abdominaux cyangwa pompage nkeya ku munsi ibyo ni ingenzi kuko bigufasha kuhakomeza bityo ntago wongera kubyibuha munda ahubwo uhora wemye munda hagororotse.
5.
Kurya imboga n’imbuto Ibi ni bimwe mubikungahaye kuri fibre ndetse n’isukari nziza byagufasha kugabanya amavuta ashobora kwibika kunda bityo iyo ufata ifunguro ryiganjemo imbuto n’imboga bituma utabyibuha munda.
6.
Kunywa icyayi cy’icyatsi (Green Tea) Iki cyayi ni kiza cyane kuko cyuzuyemo anti oxidant zisohora imyanda mu mubiri ndetse n’amavuta mabi akenshi yibika kunda nibyiza rero gufata Green Tea mu gihe ushaka kugabanya amavuta yo kunda.
Ikindi kintu abakobwa benshi n’abamama bakunda kandi nyamara kibatera kubyibuha inda vuba ni icyayi cy’amata ndetse n’igikoma cya n’ijoro mbere yo kuryama birimo isukari.
Byaba byiza ubaze amasaha atanu mbere yo kuryama nta kintu washyize munda bityo bifasha umubiri kutabika amavuta menshi avamo umubyibuho wo kunda gusa 7.
Kunywa amazi menshi Ni byiza kuzirikana ko amazi ari ubuzima ndetse anabasha mu kugabanya amavuta menshi ari ku mubiri.
Niba koko ushaka kugira munda zero amazi yagire inshuti yawe magara.

#8892#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/ikigo-cy-abanyamerika-kigiye-gufasha-u-rwanda-guhangana-n-indwara-zo-mu-mutwe
Ikigo cy’Abanyamerika kigiye gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’indwara zo mu mutwe Ikigo mpuzamahanga cy’Abanyamerika gitanga ubufasha mu by’ubuvuzi cyitwa ‘Johnson & Johnson’ cyasinyanye amasezerano y’ubufatanye bw’igihe kirambye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, agamije kuyifasha gukora ubushakashatsi ku ndwara zo mu mutwe, guhugura abaganga bazo no gutanga imiti.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr.Diane Gashumba n’umuyobozi wa Johnson & Johnson, Paul Stoffels, nibo bashyize umukono ku masezerano kuri uyu wa kabiri.
Dr.
Gashumba yavuze ko mu by’ibanze Johnson & Johnson, izafasha u Rwanda ari gukora ubushakashatsi ku gitera indwara zo mu mutwe n’uko uzirwaye yakwitabwaho.
Ati “Ni inyigo izareba uburemere bw’ikibazo cy’indwara zo mu mutwe mu gihugu cyose, ikareba impamvu zitera ibibazo byo mu mutwe, ikareba nanone ibisubizo bigendeye no ku mpamvu, uburyo dushobora kwirinda.
Twanashizemo ikibazo cy’ibiyobyabwenge kugira ngo turebe uburemere bwacyo.”
Uretse ubwo bushakashatsi, iki kigo kizakomeza no gufasha Leta mu bikorwa isanganye byo kwita ku bafite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe, nko kugeza ubuvuzi kuri buri muturarwanda ubukeneye, bikavanwa ku bitaro by’uturere, bikagezwa ku mavuriro mato no ku midugudu.
Si ibyo gusa kuko Johnson & Johnson izanafasha mu bukangurambaga ku banyarwanda ku kwita ku muntu ufite ubwo burwayi, kubona imiti hafi kandi ihendutse, guhugura abaganga bavura indwara zo mu mutwe n’abajyanama b’ubuzima.
Dr.
Gashumba yashimiye iki kigo ku bufatanye gitangije na Leta y’u Rwanda, avuga ko bizagira uruhare mu kunoza gahunda za Guverinoma zo kwita ku bafite ubwo burwayi.
Paul Stoffels yavuze ko biyemeje gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’uburwayi bwo mu mutwe kuko ari ikibazo gihangayikishije Isi muri rusange.
Ati “Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe ni ikibazo gikomeje kwiyongera ku Isi, kandi cyangiza ubuzima bw’umuntu ku giti cye, umuryango we n’abaturanyi muri rusange, cyane cyane abo mu bihugu bikennye, ku buryo bikwiye ko tucyitondera.”
Umuganga w’inzobere mu kuvura indwara zo mu mutwe ku Ibitaro bya Ndera, Dr Bizoza Ritakayire, asanga aya maserano azagirira akamaro benshi, kuko uretse ubushakashatsi, azaba anagamije gukora ubukangurambaga ku ndwara zo mu mutwe, bamwe usanga bazirwara ntibivuze, bakazitiranya n’amarozi, bigatuma badafata imiti neza.
Uretse kuba uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bushobora guterwa n’izindi mpamvu zirimo nko gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge, ihohoterwa n’ibindi, mu Rwanda bifite umwihariko bamwe babitewe n’ibikomere batewe na Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994.
Nubwo nta bushakashatsi bugaragaza umubare w’abanyarwanda bafite indwara zo mu mutwe, ni ikibazo gihangayitse kuko ibitaro bya Ndera, byakiriye abarwayi 994 mu 2010, mu 2015 byakirwa 1,432 mu wa 2016, byakirwa 2804, naho mu mu mu 2017 byakirwa 1960.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr.Diane Gashumba n’umuyobozi wa Johnson & Johnson, Paul Stoffels, nibo bashyize umukono ku masezerano Dr.
Gashumba yavuze ko mu by’ibanze Johnson & Johnson, izafasha u Rwanda ari gukora ubushakashatsi ku gitera indwara zo mu mutwe n’uko uzirwaye yakwitabwaho.
Paul Stoffels yavuze ko biyemeje gufasha u Rwanda guhangana n’uburwayi bwo mu mutwe kuko ari ikibazo gihangayikishije Isi muri rusange [email protected]

Rwiyemezamirimo Claudine Rusakiza we yasabye ko abagore bagabanyirizwa inyungu ku nguzanyo zihariye kugira ngo babashe kwitinyuka no kwiteza imbere ari benshi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Equity Bank mu Rwanda, Hannington Namara, yatangaje ko iki kibazo kigomba gusuzumwa kikajyana no kwagura ikoranabuhanga rizatuma serivisi zose umukiliya azikorera kuri telefoni.
Yagize ati “Niba koko banki twishyuza umuntu inguzanyo nicyo yayatangiye kitaratangira nibyo kuganirwaho mu bushishozi tukanarengera inyungu z’umukiliya kuko ni we mizero yacu akomeye”.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Muhanga, Béatrice Uwamariya, yagarutse ku musanzu itanga mu iterambere rusange asaba ubuyobozi bwayo kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe ahagaragara.
Yagize ati “Ndahamya ko hari umusanzu Equity Bank itanga mu iterambere ry’Akarere ka Muhanga n’igihugu ariko ndabasaba mufatanye n’abandi mu kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe akarere gafite yo kuba hagati mu gihugu.
Ibi bizatuma buri wese unyura i Muhanga yifuza kubagana kuko twe tuzabafasha ibishoboka byose ngo munyurwe no kuba inkingi z’iterambere ry’aka karere”.
Equity Bank imaze imyaka itanu ifunguye imiryango imaze kugira abakiliya barenga ibihumbi 600 bafite ubwizigame bugera kuri miliyali 100 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Iyi banki imaze gutanga inguzanyo z’asaga miliyari 90 mu mashami yayo umunani akorera mu gihugu.
Abayobozi bakuru ba Equity Bank mu Rwanda Rwiyemezamirimo Claudine Rusakiza asaba ko abagore bagabanyirizwa inyungu ku nguzanyo Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Muhanga, Uwamariya Beatrice Abakilya ba Equity Bank bakurikiye ibiganiro Abakiliya ba Equity Bank bari mu gikorwa cy'ubusabane

#8916#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Minisitiri-w-Intebe-yahaye-ubutumwa-abanyarwanda-bakiyita-impunzi-mu-mahanga
Minisitiri w'Intebe yahaye ubutumwa abanyarwanda bakiyita impunzi mu mahanga Minisitiri w'Intebe w'u Rwanda Anastase Murekezi yahamagariye abanyarwanda bose baba hanze y'u Rwanda bitwaza ko ari impunzi ko batahuka cyangwa se bakaguma muri ibyo bihugu batitwa impunzi kuko u Rwanda rufite umutekano usesuye.
Ibi Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi yabivuye mu muhango wo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w'impunzi, umunsi wizihijwe kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 20 Kamena 2016.
Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi yagaragaje ko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994, abayikoze benshi bahungiye mu bihugu bitandukanye by'amahanga, ariko nyuma Leta y'u Rwanda yafashe umwanzuro ukomeye wo kubagarura mu gihugu ngo bafatanye n'abandi kubaka u Rwanda.
Yongeyeho ko n'ubwo hari abanyarwanda batahutse hakiri n'abandi bakiri mu mahanga bacyiyita impunzi.
Gusa Minisitiri Murekezi yabahamagariye gutaha cyangwa se bakaguma muri ibyo bihugu batitwa impunzi ndetse ko mu mwaka 2017 sitati y'ubuhunzi izakurwaho burundu.
Yagize ati " Abanyarwanda bafite uburenganzira bwo gutahuka cyangwa se bakaguma mu bihugu byabakiriye ariko batitwa impunzi, nk'uko turi kwegereza gukuraho burundu sitati y'ubuhunzi, uyu munsi ubaye umwanya wo kongera gushimangira ko nta munyarwanda ukwiye kwitwa impunzi kugeza uyu munsi."
Minisitiri w'Intebe Murekezi kandi yaremye agatima abarundi bahungiye mu Rwanda ababwira ko afite icyizere ko bazataha vuba mu gihe ibiganiro biri guhuza Leta y'u Burundi n'abatavuga rumwe na yo bigenze neza ndetse bafashishwe na Leta z'ibihugu bigize umuryango wa East Africa Community.
Yagize ati "Mu mwaka wa 2015 abantu basaga miliyoni 5 barahunze harimo abarenga ibihumbi 80 b'abarundi baje mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda na Leta y'u Rwanda bizeye ko abarundi bazasubira iwabo vuba nyuma y'ibiganiro twizeye ko bizagenda neza."
Uhagarariye UNHCR mu Rwanda yashimiye u Rwanda uburyo bwagaragaje ubushake bwo gukuraho sitati y'ubuhunzi, aho nawe yashimangiye ko mu ntangiriro z'umwaka wa 2018 nta munyarwanda ku isi uzaba akitwa impunzi.
Yagize ati "Mu mwaka wa 2014 Minisitiri muri MIDIMAR na njye twatangiye gahunda yo gukuraho burundu sitati kuko abanyarwanda bahunze mbere y'1999 nta mpamvu n'imwe bafite yo kutagaruka mu Rwanda, nyuma y'ibiganiro byabaye hagati y'ibihugu byombi twemeje ko tariki ya 01 Mutarama 2018 sitati y'ubuhunzi izaba yakuwe ku banyarwanda baba mu mahanga."
Abandi bafashe ijambo muri uyu muhango bagaragaje ko ikibazo cy'ubuhunzi gikwiye gucika ari uko hakemuwe igitera ubuhunzi.
Kuva mu 1994 abanyarwanda barenga miliyoni 3 bamaze gutahuka ariko hakaba hasigaye n'abandi bakiri mu bihugu bitandukanye ariko abenshi bakaba bari muri Kongo.
Muri uyu mwaka wa 2016 abanyarwanda 1935 ni bo bamaze gutahuka mu gihe abandi 7101 na bo basubiye mu bihugu byabo bavuye mu Rwanda aho bari bacumbikiwe.
U Rwanda kugeza ubu rucumbikiye impunzi z'abanyamahanga zigera ku bihumbi 162.254 barimo impunzi z'abanyekongo zigera ku bihumbi 182, abarundi barenga ibihumbi 78 ndetse n'abandi barenga 350 bakomoka mu bindi bihugu.
Impuguke zatanze ibitekerezo ku cyakuraho ubuhunzi Abaterankunga batandukanye bafatanyije n'u Rwanda mu munsi mpuzamahanga w'impunzi

BNR ibitse amafaranga miliyoni 500 Frw yabuze ba nyirayo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) ivuga ko ifite amafaranga hafi miliyoni 500 Frw ibitse, kubera ko amakonti aya mafaranga yabagaho atagikora.
Ubusanzwe konti yitwa ko itagikora iyo imaze igihe kinini idakoreshwa.
Buri konti iri muri banki y’ubucuruzi, iyo imaze amezi atandatu idakoreshwa yinjira mu mubare w’izidakora, yagera ku mezi 12 ikaba itagikoreshwa.
Iyo imaze imyaka itanu, amafaranga ayiriho yoherezwa muri BNR.
Mu gihe nta muntu uyaburana mu myaka itanu, ashyirwa kuri konti ya leta.
Gusa ngo ba nyirayo n’abandi babifitiye uburenganzira, bashobora kuyaburana biciye muri ya banki y’ubucuruzi bari bafitemo konti, ariko bagaragaje ibyangombwa byerekana ko bifite ukuri.
Ubuyobozi bwa BNR buvuga ko bimwe mu bikunze gutuma habaho izi konti zibitse amafaranga ariko ntizikore, biterwa n’abantu bagiye gutura hanze y’igihugu.
Hari aho ba nyiri konti bapfa kandi batarashyizeho abasimbura ndetse ngo hari n’aho usanga bamwe batazi ko bafite uburenganzira bwo gukurikirana ya mafaranga yageze mu isanduku za leta nk’uko The New Times yabyanditse.
BNR ivuga ko mu 2017 abakurikiranye aya mafaranga ari bake, kuko bari ku kigero cya 15%.
Kuba aba aribo bayasubijwe, akenshi ngo biterwa n’igenzura rikorwa ku byangombwa by’abayaregera, mu rwego rwo kureba ko nta manyanga y’abashobora kubiyitirira.
Amafaranga akurikiranwa na ba nyirayo, babanza kwandikira banki aho bafite konti bakayasaba, bitwaje ibyangombwa byuzuye.
Iyo icyifuzo cyabo cyubahirijwe, ya banki y’ubucuruzi yandikira BNR inyandiko iherekejwe na bya byangombwa.
BNR igenzura bwa busabe, yasanga bwujuje ibisabwa, amafaranga akagarurwa kuri konti ya wa muntu.
Iyo bunenzwe, BNR ibwira ya banki ko bidashoboka, umukiliya wasabye ya mafaranga akabwirwa ibikenewe byose ngo ayahabwe.
BNR ivuga ko gukemura ibi bibazo bigiye kujya bikorwa na Minisiteri y’Ubutabera mu kwemeza igaruzwa ry’amafaranga no kwishyura nk’uko byavuguruwe mu itegeko ryo mu 2015 rijyanye n’igaruzwa ry’umutungo.

Gahanga: Bizihije umunsi mukuru w'intwari bishimira ibyo bagezeho Kuri iyi tariki ya 01 Gashyantare 2017, abaturage bo mu murenge wa Gahanga, Akagari ka Kagasa mu mudugudu wa Nyagafunzo bizihije umunsi mukuru w'intwari bishimira ibikorwa bagezeho birimo gutaha ivomero ritanga amazi meza biyubakiye nokwambika abakora irondo ry'umwuga.
Umunsi w'itariki ya 01 Gashyantare buri mwaka u Rwanda rwawuhariye kwizihiza umunsi w'intwari, kuri iyi nshuro wizihirijwe ku rwego rw'umudugudu, ku nsanganyamatsiko igira iti: "Ubutwari ni uguhitamo ibitubereye" MAKURUKI yageze mu Murenge wa Gahanga mu karere ka Kicukiro, mu murenge wa Gahanga aho abaturage mu tugari dutandukanye bari babukereye aho bahawe ibiganiro bivuga ku butwari ndetse bagasabana.
Abaturage batuye mu kagari ka Kagasa mu mudugudu wa Nyagafunzo bizihije uyu munsi banishimira ibyo bagezeho birimo ivomero biyubakiye bafatanyije n'ubuyobozi bw'umurenge.
Umuyobozi w'umudugudu wa Nyagafunzo Uwayisaba Evode yavuze ko isoko y'iri vomo yabonetse mu 1980 ariko ntiryabasha gutunganywa n'aho bikorewe ngo ntibyakozwe neza ku buryo bwafashaga abaturage ari byo batumye bashishikariza abaturage babo kwishakamo ibisubizo bakiyubakira iri vomero.
Abaturage bo mu mudugudu wa Nyagafunzo bavuze ko kuba bariyubakiye iri vomero byagabanyije inkomati yajyaga iba kuri iri vomero kubera amazi make kandi akenewe n'abantu benshi.
Umwe muri bo yagize ati "inkomati yaracitse ubu ngubu abaturage baravoma neza nta kibazo n'umutekano urahari nta bantu bakiza ngo bavundavunde, dore ko mu minsi yashize kuvoma byabaga ari ikibazo hakavoma umusore ufite imbaraga, umugore utwite ntavome ariko ubu abaturage bari kuvoma neza nta kibazo."
Aba baturage kandi bahaye ibikoresho bishya abanyerondo b'umwuga birimo imyambaro, inkweto, amatoroshi n'inkoni.
Umunyabanga nshingwabikorwa w'agateganyo w'umurenge wa Gahanga Maniraguha Jean Claude yavuze ko ibi bikorwa abaturage bo mu mudugudu wa Nyagafunzo bagezeho bifite aho bihuriye n'ubutwari.
Yagize ati "iyo tuvuze ubutwari ntabwo dusiga kwicungira umutekano, ni na yo mpamvu mwabonye abaturage bishyize hamwe bakaba bambitse irondo ryabo ry'umwuga, ni na yo mpamvu bishyize hamwe bakagera ku gikorwa nk'iki cyo kugira ngo tubashe kubona amazi."
Iki gikorwa cyo kubaka iri vomero cyatwaye amafaranga ibihumbi 480 harimo ayatanzwe muri gahunda y'ubudehe ibihimbi 200 n'andi 280 yatanzwe n'abaturage.
Iri vomero rya Nyagafunzo rihurirwaho n'abaturage bo mu tugari tumwe two mu murenge wa Gahanga, ndetse na Kagarama.

#8979#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/amazina/article/paola-izina-ry-abantu-batinyuka-cyane
Paola, izina ry’abantu batinyuka cyane Paola ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umukobwa; rifite inkomoko mu Kilatini ku ijambo Paulus risobanura umuntu woroheje cyangwa umuntu muto “Humble, Small”.
Iyo ari umuhungu, aba yitwa Paul cyangwa Paulin.
Ni izina ryandikwa mu buryo butandukanye Paula, Pauline, Pauletta, Paule, Paulette, Paulinha n’andi atakndukanye.
Bimwe mu biranga ba Paola Paola ni umuntu wigirira icyizere cyane, nta muntu atakwiyegereza igihe hari icyo amushakaho.
Amenya kwiyitaho no kwiyegereza inzego zose, nubwo bamutinya nyamara abaho nk’abandi ariko akigiramo gutinyuka cyane.
Akunda gutembera no gusohokana n’abantu bagasabana kandi akunda no gufasha abandi.
Guhitamo uwo bazabana biramugora cyane kuko Paola agenzura akantu kose bitewe n’uburyo na we abaho.
Paola akunda umuryango we akawuganira ndetse ugasanga no mu byo aganira ahoza mu kanwa abo mu muryango we nk’aho nta bandi azi.
Ni umuntu ugaragaza amarangamutima ye cyane, niba yishimye , ababye cyangwa anyuzwe byose biragaragara, ni umuntu utazi kwiyoberanya niba atagukunda nyine ntagukunda.
Paola aba ari umuntu w’umuhanga ndetse bigatuma amenywa cyane mu bandi.
Nta kirazira agira, yumva uko ubuzima buje ariko abwakira akabugendamo akurikije ibihari , ibijyanye n’umuco n’imigenzo abiha akanya gato.
Mu rukundo Paola arayobora kuko n’ubusanzwe aba yigirira icyizere , ahora yumva ko ibyo watinze gukora abyikorera.
N’iyo amaze guhitamo aba ashaka ko ibitekerezo bye biba ari byo bigenderwaho mu kuyobora umuryango.

Nyanza: Umuhungu yishe se amuteye umusumari mu rubavu Ndikuryayo Samuel w'imyaka 26 y'amavuko uvuka mu mudugudu wa Sholi mu Kagali ka Gasoro mu murenge wa Kigoma mu karere ka Nyanza kuri iki cyumweru tariki 13/07/2014 saa moya n'igice z'umugoroba yishe se umubyara amuteye umusumali mu rubavu bitewe n'amakimbirane bari bamaranye iminsi ashingiye ku nzu bari batuyemo.
Mbere y'uko uyu muhungu akora ubu bwicanyi ngo yabanje gutongana na se maze biza kurangira amuteye umusumari mu rubavu ahita apfa ako kanya nk'uko Bwana Kajyambere Patrick umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'umurenge wa Kigoma mu karere ka Nyanza abitangaza ndetse bikanemezwa na mushiki we bari kumwe.
Bwana Kajyambere Patrick uyobora uyu murenge wa Kigoma ubu bwicanyi bwakorewemo yatangarije Kigali Today ko uyu musaza witwa Musangwa w'imyaka 66 y'amavuko umurambo we wahise ujyanwa mu bitaro bya Nyanza bawusuzuma bagasanga koko yishwe n'umusumari yatewe mu rubavu.
Yagize ati: "Mu bitaro bya Nyanza bamaze kwemeza ko yishwe atewe umusumari mu rubavu ukamukomeretsa umutima…. nicyo cyamuhitanye kuko n'uwo musumari bawumuvanyemo".
Amakuru akomeje guturuka mu murenge wa Kigoma aravuga ko uyu muhungu ukurikiranweho kwica se umubyara ngo yahoraga amubuza amahwemo akamwifuriza icyamukuraho ariko abaturanyi b'uyu muryango ntibashobore kwiyumvisha ko nawe ubwe yamuhitana kugira ngo asigarane iyo nzu.
Uyu Ndikuryayo Samuel akekwaho kuba ariwe wiyiciye se umubyara amuteye umusumali mu rubavu kugira imitungo irimo n'inzu babagamo ahakana ko atariwe wamwishe ariko yabazwa undi wabikoze akabiburira ibisobanuro nk'uko byatangajwe n'umuyobozi w'umurenge wa Kigoma.
Yakomeje asaba abaturage bo muri uyu murenge kwirinda amakimbirane abibutsa ko igihe cyose bagize ikibazo bashobora kwitabaza ubutabera cyangwa ubuyobozi bubegereye aho kwishora mu bwicanyi ndetse n'ubundi bugizi bwa nabi buhanwa n'amategeko y'u Rwanda.
Mu gitabo cy'amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda mu ngingo yacyo ya 141 ivuga ko ubwicamubyeyi ari ubwicanyi bukorewe umwe mu babyeyi baba ab'umubiri cyangwa se ababihabwa n'amategeko.
Ubwicamubyeyi bukaba buhanishwa igifungo cya burundu.
Jean Pierre Twizeyeyezu

#8992#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/iburengerazuba-transit-center-ya-ngororero-ngo-ni-ikitegererezo-mu-ntara-yose
Iburengerazuba : Transit Center ya Ngororero ngo ni ikitegererezo mu ntara yose Ubuyobozi bw'Intara y'Iburengerazuba bwemeje ko Ikigo ngorora muco cya Ngororero (Transit Center) kiri mu Murenge wa Kabaya ari icyitegererezo mu bindi bigo nka cyo byo mu tundi turere tugize iyi ntara bityo abayobozi b'uturere bakaba basabwa kukigiraho mu kunoza imikorere y'ibigo ngororamuco byo mu turere twabo.
Abayobozi n'abakozi b'uturere tugize Intara y'Uburengerazuba basuye Ikigo Ngororamuco cya Ngororero kuri uyu wa 26 Gashyantare 2015 na bo bashimangira ko ari intangarugero mu kwigisha abahahererwa amasomo ku birebana n'imyitwarire, isuku no kwiga imyuga.
Abari mu Kigo Ngororamuco cya Ngororero bahabwa amasomo.
Kimwe no mu bindi bigo ngororamuco, abahigishirizwa ni abafite imyitwarire mibi mu muryango nyarwanda, bakaba bahabwa amasomo yose hamwe 18 arebana n'imyitwarire, gukunda Igihugu no kwiga imyuga.
Mu kwirinda ko hari uwabeshyerwa , mu ngo abajyanwa mu Kigo Ngororamuco cya Ngororero ni abo biba byemejwe na komite y'umudugudu hamwe n'umuyobozi w'akagari ko bafite amakosa akwiye gukosorwa vuba nk'ubusinzi, urugomo, gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge n'ibindi.
Aho abagororerwa mu Kigo Ngororamuco cya Ngororero barara.
Twahirwa Abdoulatif, Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu wari muri urwo ruzinduko ashima uburyo Akarere ka Ngororero gafashe gafasha abari mu kigo ngororamuco mu kubagaburira neza, kuryama heza kuko bafite matora n'ibyo kwiyorosa, ibikoresho by'isuku ndetse no kwigishwa imyuga itandukanye, nko kubaka amashyiga ya rondereza, imbabura n'ibindi.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'Intara y'Iburengerazuba, Jabo Paul, yaboneyeho gusaba utundi turere kwigira ku Karere ka Ngororero maze na bo bakanoza imikorere y'ibigo byabo mu rwego rwo kunganira ikigo cya IWAWA.
Anasaba ko mu kigo cya Ngororero cyamaze gutera imbere bajya bahitishamo abakigishirizwamo imyuga bashaka kwiga.
Abayobozi batandukanye mu Ntara y'Iburengerauba basura Ikigo Ngororamuco cya Ngororero.
Ikigo Ngororamuco cya Ngororero cyatangiye ku wa 11 Nzeri 2012, kimaze kunyurwamo n'abagabo n'abasore 1187 harimo n'abaturuka mu tundi turere tugera kuri 15 tw'u Rwanda baba bafatiwe muri Ngororero.
Muri bo, 1147 baratashye basubira mu miryango kandi ngo bitwara neza. 40 baracyakirimo naho 97 bajyanywe Kirwa cya IWAWA, aho ngo bahabwa ibikoresho bitandukanye mbere yo kugenda.
Ernest Kalinganire

#9001#	4	health	https://igihe.com/ubuzima/article/kiliziya-gatolika-yamaganye-itegeko-ryo-gukuramo-inda-inasaba-amavuriro-yayo
Kiliziya Gatolika yamaganye itegeko ryo gukuramo inda, inasaba amavuriro yayo kutazarikurikiza Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda yatangaje ko umuntu atari igikoresho buri wese afiteho uburenganzira bwo gukoresha icyo ashatse kabone nubwo yaba umwana ukiri mu nda.
Yatangaje ko idashyigikiye itegeko riherutse gusohoka, ritanga uburenganzira ku muntu ufite impamvu zihariye kuba yasaba gukurirwamo inda.
Biri mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’inama y’abepiskopi ba Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, nyuma y’iminsi mike hasohotse igitabo gishya cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda.
Ingingo ya 123 na 124 z’igitabo gishya cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha, zivuga ko gukuramo inda cyangwa kugira uwo uyikuriramo ari icyaha gihanirwa.
Icyakora, ingingo ya 125 ivuga ko nta buryozwacyaha bubaho iyo gukuramo inda byakozwe iyo ubisaba utwite ari umwana, kuba uwakuriwemo inda yarakoreshejwe imibonano mpuzabitsina ku gahato, kuba uwakuriwemo yarayitwaye nyuma yo kubanishwa n’undi nk’umugore n’umugabo ku gahato, kuba inda ibangamiye ubuzima bw’utwite cyangwa ubw’umwana atwite n’ibindi.
Iyi ngingo ivuga ko gukurirwamo inda bikorwa na muganga wemewe na Leta.
Mu itangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’Umwepisikopi wa Diyosezi ya Butare akaba na Perezida w’Inama y’Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, Filipo Rukamba; rishima ko igitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha gifite ingingo zihana gukuramo inda, ariko rikanenga kuba hari izindi zibyemera.
Kiliziya ivuga ko gukuramo inda ku bushake ari icyaha gikomeye kandi ko biteye agahinda kuba itegeko ryemera ko bikorwa na muganga ari we wagakwiye kurengera ubuzima bw’umwana n’umubyeyi.
Rikomeza rigira riti “Mu gihe inda ibangamiye ubuzima bw’utwite cyangwa ubw’umwana atwite, ukwemera dusangiye muri Yezu Kirisitu kwibutsa abaganga ko bafite inshingano yo gukora ibishoboka byose bagamije gukiza ubuzima bw’umubyeyi n’ubw’umwana ku buryo n’iyo haba ingaruka mbi ku mwana, atari byo biba bigambiriwe.”
Kiliziya ivuga ko ubuzima bw’umuntu atari igikoresho buri wese agiraho uburenganzira kabone nubwo bwaba ari ubw’urusoro rukiri mu nda.
Aba bepisikopi bakomeza bagira bati “Umuntu si igikoresho buri wese afiteho uburenganzira.
Ubuzima bw’umuntu ntibushyirwa ku munzani nk’ibintu cyangwa ngo buhabwe agaciro bitewe n’imyaka umuntu afite ahubwo ni impano y’Imana ihabwa uburemere n’urukundo rw’Imana yamwiremeye”.
Kiliziya Gatolika ifite ibigo nderabuzima n’ibitaro bisaga 118 mu gihugu hose.
Si ubwa mbere ifata umwanzuro ukomeye nk’uyu kuko mu 2016 yahagaritse serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro zitari iza gakondo mu mavuriro yayo.
Mu itangazo ryo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Kiliziya Gatolika yasabye Leta kutazahatira abaganga gukuramo inda, isaba by’umwihariko abakora mu mavuriro yayo kutazabikora.
Iti “Turizera ko ubuyobozi butazahatira abaganga bemewe na Leta gukuramo inda iyo bumva binyuranyije n’umutimanama wabo bikaba byabahungabanya mu myemerere no mu mibereho yabo bwite.”
“Turamenyesha abakora mu mavuriro yacu ko tutemera ko hakorerwa icyaha cyo gukuramo inda.
Turifuza ko abaganga b’abakirisitu bafata iya mbere mu kurengera ubuzima no kugira iyo nama nziza ababagana bose bashikamiwe n’ibibazo binyuranye by’ubuzima.”
Igitabo gishya cy’amategeko kivuga ko uretse igihe byakozwe mu buryo bwemewe n‘amategeko, umuntu ukuyemo inda mu bundi buryo ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’umwaka umwe ariko kitarenze imyaka itatu n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi y’ibihumbi ijana ariko atarenze ibihumbi magana abiri.
Uhamwe n’icyaha cyo gukuriramo undi inda, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’umwaka umwe ariko kitarenze imyaka ibiri n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi y’ibihumbi magana atatu ariko atarenze ibihumbi magana atanu cyangwa kimwe gusa muri ibyo bihano.
Ibi bihano biriyongera iyo uwakuriwemo inda yakurijemo ubumuga cyangwa urupfu.
Kiliziya Gatolika yamaganye itegeko ryo gukuramo inda
