Nyabihu: Hashyinguwe imibiri 35 y'abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Mu rwibutso rw'akarere ka Nyabihu hashyinguwe mu cyubahiro imibiri 35 yakuwe mu murenge wa Jenda, Mukamira na Muringa, isanga imibiri 2020 yari isanzwe ishinguwe muri urwo rwibutso.
Muri uwo muhango wabaye tariki 12/04/2013, habaye amasengesho y'abanyamatorero n'amadini batandukanye no gufata umunota wo kunamira inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse hanacanwa urumuri rushushanya ikizere cyo kubaho ku bacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Benshi mu bagize icyo bavuga, bihanganishije cyane abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside, babahumuriza, bababwira ko Imana yatumye barokoka bakaba bakiriho izakomeza kubarinda.
Imibiri 35 y'abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi niyo yashyinguwe mu cyubahiro.
Bongeyeho ko na Leta y'ubumwe ndetse n'ingabo z'u Rwanda, baharanira ibyiza kandi bazarushaho kugumya kwimakaza umuco w'amahoro,ubumwe no kurwanya Jenoside n'ingengabitekerezo yayo kugira ngo bitazasubira ukundi.
Ikindi kandi ku bufatanye n'abaturage ,bakazaharanira iterambere ry'abacitse ku icumu n'Abanyanyarwanda bose muri rusange baharanira kwigira no kwiteza imbere.
Perezida wa IBUKA mu karere ka Nyabihu, Juru Anastase,yashimiye cyane Leta y'ubumwe ku byiza igenda ibagezaho.
Yavuze ko Leta y'ubumwe ibafasha mu nzego zose, haba mu burezi, mu mibereho myiza, mu iterambere n'ahandi.
Perezida wa IBUKA mu karere ka Nyabihu, Juru Anastase, yashimiye Leta y'ubumwe ibyiza idahwema kubagezaho ndetse ashimira n'akarere uburyo kabitaho.
Yavuze ko abana 500 biga bamwe bakaba baranarangije babifashijwemo na Leta y'ubumwe.
Uretse kwiga amashuri yisumbuye, Leta ibafasha no kwiga kaminuza aho mu mwaka ushize abagera kuri 20 bafashijwe kwiga muri za kaminuza ndetse no muri uyu mwaka bakaba bizeye ko hari abaziga.
Uretse mu burezi, mu mibereho myiza Leta yakoze byinshi.
Kugeza ubu abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside bafite amacumbi, aho amazu agera kuri 400 yubatswe, abatarabona aho baba bakaba bagera ku 9 kandi nabo ikibazo cyabo kikaba kigiye gukemuka vuba; nk'uko Juru yabigarutseho.
Ku kibazo cy'amazu akenewe gusanwa, yavuzeko bafite ikizere cyo kuyasanirwa babifashijwemo na FARG .
Ku birebana na gahunda ya Girinka, abacitse ku icumu bamaze guhabwa inka zisaga 150 atabariyemo izabyaye.
Bafite kandi amatungo magufi agera ku ihene 50 byose bakesha Leta y'ubumwe mu gihe Jenoside irangira nta wari utunze kuko bari barariye amatungo yabo.
Kugeza ubu abantu 87 bahabwa inkunga y'ingoboka muri aka karere.
Mu ijoro ryo kwibuka abazize Jenoside mu karere ka Nyabihu hacanwe urumuri rw'ikizere cyo kubaho.
Kugeza ubu hari ikibazo cy'amarange yomoka bitewe n'ubukonje bw'imbere mu rwibutso, ariko Perezida wa IBUKA mu karere yizeye ko kizakemuka kuko hari amwe mu mafaranga yateganijwe mu gukora icyo gikorwa.
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyabihu yasezeranije abacitse ku icumu ko nk'akarere bazakomeza gukurikirana ikibazo icyo ari cyo cyose bagira,bakabafasha muri byose no gutera intambwe ikomeye mu guharanira kwigira nk'uko insanganyamatsiko y'uyu mwaka ibivuga.
Safari Viateur

#9014#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Perezida-Kagame-yahawe-igihembo-cy-uko-yateje-imbere-ikoranabuhanga
Perezida Kagame yahawe igihembo cy'uko yateje imbere ikoranabuhanga Perezida Kagame yakira iki gihembo yagenewe na ITU Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yashyikirijwe igihembo nk'umwe mu bakuru b'ibihugu na za guverinoma bagize uruhare mu guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga mu bihugu byabo.
Ibi bihembo byiswe ICTs in sustainable development awards, byatanzwe n'umuryango mpuzamahanga w'itumanaho ITU, ni mu nama y'umuryango w'abibumbye iri kubera I New York muri leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika.
Ubwo yahabwaga iki gihembo, Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame, yavuze ko acyakiriye mu izina ry'Abanyarwanda.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iki gihembo acyakiriye mu izina ry'abanyarwanda Perezida Kagame akaba yagize ati" Ndagira ngo nshimire umuryango mpuzamahanga w'itumanaho, ndetse n'umuryango uharanira iterambere rirambye kubera iki gihembo bampaye.
Nkyakiriye mu izina ry'Abanyarwanda kuko bihatira gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ngo bahindure ubuzima bwabo, Ndetse ngo barusheho no gusabana neza.
Ikoranabuhanga kandi rinatwibutsa ko gusakaza umurongo mugari w'itumanaho rya interineti bizafasha cyane kugera ku ntego z'iterambere rirambye."
Mu bandi bakuru b'ibihugu byo ku mugabane wa Afurika bahawe iki gihembo cya ICTs in Sustainable development awards, harimo Perezida wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta, ndetse na Ali Bongo Ondimba uyobora Igihugu cya Gabon.
Mbere yuko Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame yitabira inama yashyikirijwemo iki gihembo, yabanje kwitabira inama yigaga ku kuzamura icyaro, inama yateguwe na Koreya y'epfo ndetse n'ishami ry'umuryango w'abibumbye ryita ku iterambere UNDP.
Ibi bihembo ICTs in Sustainable development awards bihabwa abakuru b'Ibihugu na za Guverinoma bagize uruhare mu guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, byatanzwe ku nshuro ya mbere, ariko bikaba biteganyijwe ko bizajya bitangwa buri mwaka.

Nyampinga Aurore yaba yatanze itike yo kuvuriza mu Buhinde Iranzi urwaye bikomeye Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore biravugwa ko yatanze itike y'indege yo kujya kuvuriza mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde umwana uzwi ku izina rya Iranzi Ndahiro Isaac ufite uburwayi bwananiranye kuvurirwa hano mu Rwanda.
Ibi bibaye nyuma y'uko ibitaro byose bya hano mu Rwanda binaniriwe kuvura uyu mwana uburwayi bivugwa ko yavukanye bumeze nk'ibibyimba cyangwa se ubushye buri kunda ku mukondo we, hanyuma Minisiteri y'Ubuzima ikemera kumwishingira mu kumuvuriza mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde ariko hakabura itike yo kumujyanayo.
Amakuru atugeraho aravuga ko Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore yabanje kwemerera nyina wa Iranzi ariwe Mbabazi Liliane ko azamuha itike yo kumujyana hamwe n'umwana mu Buhinde ariko yanga ko byatangazwa ataramushyikiriza ayo mafaranga.
Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore.
Biravugwa kandi ko amafaranga yose Nyampinga Mutesi Kayibanda Aurore yatanze ngo Iranzi na mama we Mbabazi Liliane babashe kujya mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde angana n'amadolari 1600.
Twagerageje kuvugana na Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore ngo tumenye amakuru arambuye kuri iyi nkuru ariko ntibyadukundira.
Iranzi Ndahiro Isaac afite uburwayi bumeze nk'ibibyimba cyangwa ubushye bw'ako kanya buri ku nda ye ku mukondo aho bivugwa ko yabuvukanye.
Iranzi Ndahiro Isaac urwaye indwara yananiranye hano mu Rwanda.
Afite gusa amezi icyenda akaba azavurizwa mu gihugu cy'u Buhinde mu bitaro bya "Narayana Hospital" biri mu mugi wa Bangalore ku bufatanye bwa Minisiteri y'Ubuzima izamuvuza na Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore watanze itike yo kugerayo.
Nyampinga Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore akunze kugaragara mu bikorwa binyuranye by'urukundo akaba anaherutse gutangiza umushinga wo gufasha abana bafashwe ku ngufu bakiri bato.

#9097#	5	politics	http://makuruki.rw/politiki/new-york-u-rwanda-rwongeye-kuyobora-akanama-gashinzwe-amahoro-ku-isi/
U Rwanda rwatangiye bwa kabiri, kuwa 1 Nyakanga 2014, kuyobora Akanama k’Umutekano ka Loni.
Related posts “Gitifu warashwe; igisambo gikorana n’umwanzi!”
Guverineri BOSENIBAMWE August 4, 2014 Abanyamuryango b’ihuriro United for Assistance bafashije abatishoboye August 4, 2014 U Rwanda ruzaba rusimbuye u Burusiya bwayoboye aka kanama kuva kuwa 1 Kamena 2014.
Mu kiganiro giheruka na IGIHE ubwo u Rwanda rwiteguraga uyo mwanya, Uwungirije Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Loni, Olivier Nduhungirehe, yagaragaje ko kuyobora aka kanama hari isomo bitanga ku Banyarwanda no ku mahanga.
Yagize ati “U Rwanda ruzayobora bwa kabiri Akanama k’Umutekano k’Umuryango w’Abibumbye muri Nyakanga 2014.
Icyo gihe tuzaba twizihiza imyaka 20 u Rwanda rumaze rwibohoye.
Iki ni ikimenyetso gikomeye ku Banyarwanda, kuko gituma twibuka uko amahanga, arimo Akanama k’Umutekano w’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yateraranye u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1994, maze igihugu kikabohorwa n’abana bacyo, bahagarariwe na FPR-Inkotanyi.
Bivuze ko ibi bigomba gukomeza kutubera isomo.
U Rwanda nubwo rimwe na rimwe rwakenera ubwisungane mpuzamahanga, ruzarengerwa kandi ruzazamurwa mbere na mbere n’amaboko y’abana barwo.”
Mu byo u Rwanda rushyize imbere kuri iyi nshuro ruyobora AKanama ka Loni ni ukwibanda ku kubungabunga umutekano, hakoreshejwe ubufatanye bw’Umuryango w’Abibumbye n’Imiryango y’Uturere (peacekeeping : regional partnerships and its evolution).
Hanaganirwe no ku ngingo yo kubaka amahoro mu bihugu bivuye mu ntambara (post-conflict peacebuilding).
U Rwanda rwaherukaga kuyoboye Akanama k’Umutekano k’Umuryango w’Abibumbye muri Mata 2013.

#9117#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/Abanyamadini-barasabwa-kurandura-ingengabitekerezo-ya-Jenoside
Abanyamadini barasabwa kurandura ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside Guverineri w'Intara y'Amajyepfo, Munyantwali Alphonse, arasaba abanyamadini n'amatorero gufata iya mbere mu kurandura ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside binyuze munyigisho batanga.
Muri iki gihe hibukwa ku nshuro ya 22 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Guverineri Munyantwali mu butumwa atanga, ahanini yibanda ku madini ayasaba kugendera kure ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside kandi bakabitoza abayoboke babo.
Abanyamadini n'amatorero basabwa gufata iya mbere mu kurandura ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside.
Mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, ubwo mu cyumweru gishize yifatanyaga n'abatuye Umurenge wa Cyahinda mu kwibuka, yasabye abanyamadini gufata iya mbere mu kwigisha abo bayobora kugira imico myiza n'imikorere mizima,hagamijwe gukumira ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside.
Ati "Banyamadini n'amatorero namwe muri abayobozi, mukwiye kuba abambere mu kuyobora neza, mukigisha abo muyobora imico myiza n'imigirire mizima, kandi mukaba intangarugero, kuko ntawe utanga icyo adafite".
Guverineri Munyantwari yifatanya n'abaturage ba Cyahinda mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 22 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nubwo akunze kwibanda ku banyamatorero n'amadini ariko, Guverineri Munyantwali avuga ko atari uko mu madini ari ho hagaragara ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ko ahubwo abanyamadini ari bo bafite uruhare rukomeye mu gutuma abo bayobora bagira imitekerereze n'imikorere myiza.
Agira ati "Abanyamadini n'amatorero simbibandaho kuko ari ho bafite ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ahubwo ni uko ari bamwe mu bafite uruhare runini mu gutuma abo bayobora bagira imyumvire n'imitekerereze mizima yubaka u Rwanda".
Guverineri Munyantwali kandi avuga ko abanyamadini n'amatorero hamwe n'abayobozi bazatsinda urugamba rwo kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ari uko babaye intangarugero mu bikorwa byiza byubaka.
Abaturage basabwa kwigishanya ubu bw'amacskubiri.
Aba ni ab'i Nyagisozi muri Nyaruguru.
Akomeza agira ati "Burya uko witwara bifasha abo uyobora kubyigiraho, kuko iyo uvuga ibintu bidahuye n'ibyo ukora biragorana ko abo uyobora babikurikiza.
Abayobozi rero dukwiye kuba aba mbere mu kugaragariza abo tuyobora ibyiza byo gushyira hamwe no gukunda igihugu cyacu".
Guverineri Munyantwali kandi asaba abaturage kwigisha abakiri bato ibibi by'amacakubiri n'ibyiza byo gushyira hamwe, kuko ari byo bizatuma bakurana urukundo hagati yabo ndetse bagakunda n'igihugu cyabo bakakirwanira ishyaka mu iterambere.

#9128#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/hanze-y-igihugu/article/manishimwe-n-umuryango-we-bamburiwe-muri-uganda-bavuye-gupagasa
Manishimwe n’umuryango we bamburiwe muri Uganda bavuye gupagasa Manishimwe Elias ukomoka mu Murenge wa Rwinkwavu mu Karere ka Kayonza wajyanye n’umuryango we mu gihugu cya Uganda mu mwaka wa 2017, yagarutse mu Rwanda imbokoboko nyuma yo kwamburirwa muri Uganda ibye byose ubwo yari mu nzira ataha mu Rwanda.
Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 25 yagarutse mu Rwanda ari kumwe n’umugore we witwa Iradukunda Emerence n’abana babo batatu babaga mu gace ka Bunyoro.
Bavuga ko mu myaka hafi itatu bamaze mu gihugu cya Uganda babayeho bapagasa.
Baganira na Kigali Today kuri uyu wa kane tariki 30 Mutarama 2020 aho bari bacumbikiwe ku Murenge wa Cyanika mu Karere ka Burera mu gihe bategereje kugezwa iwabo muri Kayonza, mu gahinda kenshi bagaragaje urugendo bafata nk’inzira y’umusaraba bavuyemo nyuma y’uko bari bafashe icyemezo cyo gutaha iwabo mu Rwanda.
Ngo ubwo bageraga mu gihugu cya Uganda muri Nzeri 2017, ngo hari umugabo w’umukire wari wabajyanye abizeza akazi ko mu rugo bagezeyo bamukorera mu gihe cy’amezi abiri arabasiga aragenda ntibongera ku muca iryera.
Ngo mu gushaka uburyo babaho, bigiriye inama yo gupagasa bahingira abandi, aho bageze aho babona ubushobozi batangira gukodesha ubutaka barihingira bageza ubwo bagera ku mitwaro 60 y’amashilingi ya Uganda aho bavuga ko ayingayinga amafaranga ibihumbi 150 y’u Rwanda.
Nyuma y’uko ngo bakomeje guhura n’itotezwa rikomeje gukorerwa Abanyarwanda mu gihugu cya Uganda, babonye ko bashobora kuhaburira ubuzima bigira inama yo kugaruka mu gihugu cyabo.
Ngo bakimara kuzinga utwangushye nibwo bagiye gutega bisi, uwinjizaga abagenzi muri iyo bisi abizeza ko abageza mu Ruhengeri abaca amagande imitwaro itanu gusa batungurwa n’uko ku nyemezabwishyu bahawe yanditseho imitwaro ibiri.
Nk’uko Manishimwe yakomeje abivuga, ngo barabajije impamvu bahawe fagitire yanditseho imitwaro idahuye n’iyo bishyuye.
Ati “Kuki muduhaye Fagitire yanditseho imitwaro ibiri kandi twishyuye imitwaro itanu?, bamubwira bati icyangombwa se si uko tukugeza aho twavuganye iwanyu mu Ruhengeri?”
Ngo baraje bakigera ahitwa Ntungamo shoferi ahagarika imodoka avamo n’abo yari itwaye bose hasigaramo Manishimwe n’umuryango we, batungurwa no kubwirwa ko batarenga aho.
Ngo byajemo impaka bigeza n’ubwo barara mu modoka mu rukerera bakurwa muri iyo modoka ku ngufu, barebye aho barambitse ibikapu byabo muri iyo modoka basanga byibwe hasigara igikapu kimwe cyarimo imyambaro bari babitsemo ishaje itakigira umumaro.
Manishimwe avuga ko babajije umushoferi w’iyo modoka bati “Ibintu byacu ko ari mwe mwabitubikiye tukaba tubibuze?”
Umushoferi arabasubiza ati “Mubitubitsa se hari aho mwanditse ibyo mubikije?
Musohoke vuba mugende”.
Ari amafaranga amashilingi imitwaro 60 yari muri icyo gikapu, ari imyambaro ibikoresho byose byo mu rugo n’ibindi byari muri ibyo bikapu barabyibye ba nyirabyo basigara imbokoboko uretse amashilingi imitwaro itanu Manishimwe yari yasize mu mufuka w’ipantalo yari yambaye.
Manishimwe avuga ko bateze indi modoka ibageza ahitwa Kisoro, batanga imitwaro ibiri basigarana itatu.
Ngo bakigera muri Kisoro ni ho bahuriye n’akaga gakomeye aho bahise basanganirwa n’itsinda ry’insoresore babazwa aho bagiye basubiza ko berekeje ku mupaka wa Cyanika dore ko batari bazi aho ari ho kuko mbere bajya muri Uganda banyuze ku mupaka wegereye Umutara kuko bari batuye muri Kayonza.
Ngo abo basore batangiye kubatera ubwoba bababwira ko ugeze ku mupaka wa Cyanika wese ahita yicwa, babagira inama yo kubereka inzira z’ubusamo zibafasha kwinjira mu Rwanda nta kibazo bagize.
Agira ati “Abo basore bo muri Uganda nyuma yo kutubeshya ko ku mupaka bahicira abantu, batugiriye inama yo kuduherekeza batunyuza izindi nzira”.
Batubwira bati “Mureke tubereke inzira zoroshye kunyuramo, icyangombwa si uko mugera mu Rwanda?”.
Ngo baremeye banyura mu nzira z’ishyamba, bagenda babereka ko mu Rwanda ari hafi kuhagera, ariko baza kubahinduka babaka amafaranga bababwira bati “Ubutaka bw’u Rwanda ni buriya, none ni muduhe amafaranga nimwanga tubahamagarize Polisi n’abasirikare bacu baze babice”.
Manishimwe n’umuryango we ugizwe n’umugore n’abana batatu, bahise bagwa mu kantu babura uburyo bifata kuko bakwaga imitwaro 12 mu gihe bari basigaranye imitwaro itatu gusa.
Ngo bakomeje guterwa ubwoba babwirwa ko bagiye kwicwa, bahamagara umugabo w’inshuti yabo bari basize muri Uganda, bamusaba ko aboherereza imitwaro umunani n’igice abumva vuba arayaboherereza ayongera kuyo bari basigaranye barishyura.
Bakimara kuyishyura ntabwo byarangiriye aho, kuko ngo hahise hagera umupolisi wa Uganda ahamagaza abo basore avugana na bo bagaruka bishyuza Manishimwe indi mitwaro itatu yiyongera kuri 12 yari amaze kubishyura.
Ati “Bakimara kuvugana n’uwo mupolisi bahise bagaruka batubwira ko umupolisi na we ashaka kwishyurwa byakwanga tukicwa, bansaba kongera imitwaro itatu kuri 12 nari maze kubaha, n’ubwoba bwinshi ndababwira nti ese, n’ayo mbahaye ko mubonye uko mbigenje arava he?
Bati shaka andi niwanga upfe”.
Manishimwe yigiriye inama yo guhamagara undi muntu bari baziranye amusaba imitwaro itatu, bakimara kuyohereza barayishyura.
Ngo ako kanya abo basore bahise bishakamo abasore batatu muri bo babaha imitwaro ibiri, babategeka guherekeza Manishimwe n’umuryango we bavugana kubageza mu Rwanda aho bakigera mu muhanda ugera mu Rwanda ba basore baboye Inkeragutabara zo mu Rwanda bariruka.
Ngo nyuma yo kwiruka, izo Nkeragutabara zaje zisanga Manishimwe n’umuryango we zirabaganiriza zibereka aho baruhukira, ngo mu kanya abasirikare b’u Rwanda baba barahageze batwara Manishimwe n’umuryango we ku mupaka wa Cyanika aho babapimishirije Ebola, nyuma babazana ku biro by’Umurenge wa Cyanika babashakira icyo kurya ari na ho bagicumbikiwe mu gihe bategereje guherekezwa berekeza iwabo i Kayonza.
Ibi bibaye nyuma y’iminsi mike uwitwa Uzabumwana Dieudonné wo mu Karere ka Burera yitabye Imana azira inkoni yakubiswe n’abanya-Uganda, nyuma yo kwamburwa ubwo yatahaga mu Rwanda agezwa ku mupaka wa Cyanika ari intere.
Imanishimwe avuga ko ubuzima Umunyarwanda abayeho muri Uganda ari bubi, kuko bigeze aho babambura imitungo yabo irimo n’amasambu banahinga bigasarurwa n’Abagande.
Ibyo ngo biba cyane cyane ku muntu utaramara imyaka itanu muri icyo gihugu, aho bakomeje gutotezwa banakubitwa.
Agira ati “Abanyarwanda niba bakunda ubuzima bwabo birinde kujya muri Uganda”.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Servilien Mutuyimana Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ mutuyiserv

Ni umukino wahagurukije Isi ndetse n'amatike yo kwinjira kuri Stade des Lumières, mu mujyi wa Lyon aho uyu mukino ubera akaba yamaze gushira ku isoko.

Iyo neza niyo Jabo yifuza gukwiza hose ikagera ku bafite ubumuga aho bava bakagera no ku batishoboye.
Yakomeje agira ati “Hari umunsi nifuza ko yaba ari abafite ubumuga, ari abatabufite, twese twazahurira ahantu hamwe, atari ukuvuga ngo ni umunsi w’abafite ubumuga gusa, ahubwo ari umunsi wo kwishima tugafasha n’abandi kugera ku byo twaba twagezeho.”
“Turifuza gufasha abantu bafite ubumuga, baremerewe, bafite ibibazo byo kubaho.

#9229#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/kirehe-abikorera-barishimira-gahunda-bateguriwe-y-itorero-ry-igihugu
Kirehe:Abikorera barishimira gahunda bateguriwe y'itorero ry'igihugu Abikorera bo mu karere ka Kirehe barishimira gahunda y'itorero ry'igihugu yabashyiriweho, bakizera ko bazunguka byinshi ku bijyanye n'indangagaciro z'Umunyarwanda baharanira kunoza imikorere yabo.
Ibi babitangaje ubwo batangiraga iyi gahunda y'itorero ry'igihugu ihuja abikorera mu ntara y'iburasirazuba yatagiye kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 9/1/2015.
Bishimiye gahunda y'itorero.
Ubwo abahagarariye abandi mu bikorera bari mu nama yabahuje n'umuyobozi w'akarere ka Kirehe bigiye hamwe aho ukwitegura iyo gahunda y'itorero igeze bagaragaza ko imyiteguro igeze kure kandi ko bayishimiye.
Muhawenimana Lambert, umuyobozi w'urugaga rw'abikorera mu rwego rw'akarere ka Kirehe aravuga ko iyi ngando bagiye kujyamo ikintu cya mbere ngo igiye kubamarira ngo ni ukubasubiza ku murongo bakaba abantu bahora bazirikana bakanamenya neza mateka y'igihugu batibagiwe n'indangagaciro z'umuco Nyarwanda.
Abahagarariye abikorera n'umuyobozi w'akarere basobanuriye abaraho gahunda y'itorero bagiye kwitabira.
Yagize ati "Abikorera natwe dufite inshingano zo guhora tuzirikana tukamenya amateka y'igihugu cyacu, icya kabiri tugomba kuba abikorera tukajyana na gahunda za Leta umuntu akamenya ati <Ndi umunyarwanda> n'iki?
ukamenya n'indangagaciro z'umuco Nyarwanda."
Yavuze ko nk'abikorera bazunguka byinshi mu itorero hakazaba n'impinduka mu mikorere kuko bazaba bamenye ibiranga umunyarwanda bityo ngo izo nyigisho zizagirira buri mu nyarwanda wese akamaro n'abazamukomokaho bose.
Mugiraneza Daniel umwe mu bikorera i Kirehe avuga ko biteguye kujya mu itorero kugira ngo bige gahunda za Leta, amateka y'u Rwanda na gahunda ya Ndi umunyarwanda n'indangagaciro z'umuco Nyarwanda n'imyitwarire yagakwiye kuranga umuntu mu butore bwe mu kuvugurura no guhindura ibyo bakoraga kugira ngo babashe guteza imbere igihugu.
Muzungu Gerald umuyobozi w'akarere ka Kirehe yasabye abacuruzi kuzajya mu itorero bagamije gukarishya ubwenge baharanira kumenya ibijyanye na gahunda z'igihugu kugira ngo hazabe impinduramatwara mu mirimo bakora.
Ati "abarimu bagiye mu itorero; abagoronome; ba meya, namwe rero abikorera ni byiza kujya gukarishya ubwenge, ubona ushinga iduka cyangwa resitora ukagira ngo ni inyungu zawe gusa ariko bifite inyungu ku gihugu muri rusange, uwo mutungo uwukoresheje nabi ni igihugu cyaba gihomba ndizera ko mwe mugiye guhagararira abandi muzagaragaza impinduka mu mikorere."
Yasabye abazajya mu itorero kumenya ikibajyanye baharanira kumenya kugira ngo nabo bazafashe abo bahagarariye bityo hazabe impinduramatwara ikenewe mu byiciro bitandukanye bakoreramo baharanira guteza akarere imbere n'igihugu muri rusange.
Gahunda y'itorero igenewe abikorera iteganyijwe mu ntara zose zigize igihugu,intara y'iburasirazuba ikaba iteganyirijwe kujya mu itorero kuva tariki 09/1/2015 i Nkumba aho buri karere gasabwa kohereza abahagarariye abandi bagera kuri mirongo irindwi.
Servilien Mutuyimana

#9317#	0	entertainment	http://www.igihe.com/imyidagaduro/article/muyango-yahishuye-byinshi-birimo-uko-bangirwaga-kuririmba-abandi-bagafungwa-ngo
Muyango yahishuye byinshi birimo uko bangirwaga kuririmba abandi bagafungwa ngo ni ‘Abatutsi’ Muyango Jean Marie umwe mu bahanzi bagize uruhare runini mu kumenyekanisha indirimbo zo hambere abinyujije mu mpano ye yihariye afite mu kuririmba no guhamiriza.
Muyango yavukiye mu buhungiro i Burundi.
Ni umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda ujyanisha guhamiriza no kuririmba bikaryohera abatari bake.
Yamamaye mu ndirimbo nyinshi zitandukanye mu Rwanda zirimo iyitwa ‘Sabizeze’ yabaye nk’ibendera n’ikirango cye mu muziki.
IGIHE yamuganirije ahishura byinshi mu buzima bwe n’ubuzima bwe benshi bajya bibaza.
IGIHE: Muyango ni izina rikuru mu muziki nyarwanda, umuntu yakwibaza amavu n’amavuko y’umuziki wawe ?
Muyango: Ni ibintu navuga ko nakuriyemo.
Mu muryango wacu byarahabaga tugakora ibitaramo by’intore, nabikuriyemo rero ntabwo navuga ko ari ibintu nagiye kwiga ahantu cyangwa nashatse ahandi.
IGIHE: Niba ubyibuka neza byaje ufite imyaka ingahe?
Muyango: Biragoye cyane.
Natangiye ndi umwana uko nakuraga bigenda byiyongera.
Nagize igihe nyine njya ahandi hantu ariko birakomeza.
IGIHE: Iyo ugiye kwandika indirimbo ugendera kuki?
Muyango: Nk’umuhanzi hari ibyo wibuka n’ibindi biza.
Byakuzamo ugashaka amagambo ubundi ukaba wakwandika amagambo wumva ukunze meza ukayashakira ijwi.
IGIHE: Ni iyihe ndirimbo yawe ukunda cyane?
Muyango: Indirimbo zanjye zose ndazikunda.
Kenshi hari izo ukundira ko ijwi ryayo ryabaye ryiza, hakaba iyo ukundira amagambo, hakaba n’ubwo uyikundira ko itakuvunnye.
IGIHE: Ni iyihe ndirimbo yakugoye ?
Muyango: Ni iyitwa ‘Manyinya’.
Ni indirimbo nafashe ijwi gusa ariko nashatse kujya muri studio mfite izindi ndirimbo ariko irananira pe.
Twayikoze dutangira album tunayirangirizaho, mu micurangire niho byagoranaga.
Twakoze amezi abiri hamwe na album, iyo twatangiriyeho twarayibitse, izindi zirangiye tuyisubiraho.
IGIHE: Iyakoroheye ?
Muyango: Indirimbo uhimbira umuntu uzi birakorohera.
Hari izigera kuri ebyiri cyangwa eshatu zitamvunnye nk’izo, harimo ‘Gisa’ indi ni ‘Karame na None’ yo nayihimbiye Perezida wa Republika Paul Kagame kuvuga ibigwi bye biroroshye cyane.
IGIHE: Hari abavuga ko wabaye mu Isamaza, byo nibyo ?
Muyango: Ahubwo nabaye mu ‘Imitari’, ‘Isamaza zaje nyuma.
Nabanje gukorera i Burundi, nabaye mu itorero rya Sentore Louis se wa Masamba byinshi niwe nabikuyeho n’ubwo twahuye nanjye hari ibyo nzi afite ibyo yanyongereye byinshi.
Tubana imyaka mike muri iryo torero biza kugera igihe nanjye ngira iryanjye.
Nyuma y’imyaka itatu abakobwa bo mu Bubiligi barantumira ni uko nagiye rero.
Niryo tsinda rya mbere ryabayeho ry’abanyarwanda hariya.
Byari mu 1987.
IGIHE: Hari amakuru avuga ko Leta ya Habyarimana yigeze kubangira kuririmba bavuga ko nta Mututsi wahagararira igihugu, byagenze bite ?
Muyango: Ayo makuru niyo ariko byabaye i Burundi, byagiye mu bindi bihugu nyuma, byabayeho kugeza ubwo bajyaga bafunga Abaperezida b’amatorero ubwo Habyarimana yabaga yaje mu Burundi.
IGIHE: Nawe baragufunze?
Muyango: Sentore n’uwitwa Milimba nibwo bari abatware b’amatorero icyo gihe ntibasohotse mu nzu.
IGIHE: Mufite indirimbo zimwe zafashije mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, mwabishobozwaga n’iki?
Muyango: Twebwe twumvaga ariyo nkunga yacu gutera inkunga abantu bari ku rugamba.
IGIHE: Icyo gihe Masamba mwari kumwe?
Muyango: We yari yarasigaye mu Burundi, niho bakoreraga.
IGIHE: Amasezerano ya Arusha asinywa mwari he ?
Muyango: Twebwe twari mu Bubiligi.
IGIHE: Hari indirimbo mufite yitwa ‘Sabizeze’ yavuye he ?
Muyango: Sabizeze, ni umugani ntabwo ari indirimbo.
Hari ubwo umuhanzi ashobora kwirarira kubera indirimbo yakoze igakundwa ayikomoye ku bindi.
Ni umugani mama yanciriye, nkura warangiye mu mutwe.
Ntangiye ibyo kuririmba, nibwo nagize igitekerezo ndi mu Bubiligi mbiganiriza ‘Imitari’ babanza kunseka.
Iri mu za ngoye kuko nashatse amagambo nakoresha nkayiririmba bimeze nk’indirimbo bitagaragara nk’umugani.
IGIHE: Muyisohora yakiriwe ite ?
Muyango: Nta banteye amabuye.
Abenshi barambwiye bati wakoze cyane kuko nari nabashije gufata umugani nkawuhinduramo indirimbo.
IGIHE: Indirimbo wise ‘Karame na none’ yaje ite ?
Muyango: Ni indirimbo nahimbiye umukuru w’igihugu.
Igitekerezo cyaje mvuga nti umuntu nk’uriya wamuha iki?
Ukurikije ibikorwa bye, aho yari agejeje igihugu adukuye mu buhunzi twamazemo imyaka irenga 30.
Nk’umuhanzi rero ni ugushaka akantu wavuga ukinigura, ni uko nayihimbye.
Ngira Imana nsanga ibyinshi nshaka kuvuga ari iby’ukuri kandi bizwi.
Ishobora kuba ari iyo mu 1996.
‘Musa n’iwabo’ yo ni iya mubyara wanjye naririmbiye agiye gukora ubukwe.
Yari agiye gukorera ubukwe inaha aza mu Bubiligi kudusezera, tumubwira ko tutabona uburyo tuza mu Burundi.
Tumubwira ko dushaka kumuhimbira indirimbo abanza kubyanga, amara iminsi ajya muri Niger niho yari yarize ubuganga, aragaruka mu Bubiligi akihagera aravuga ati naratekereje nsanga mugomba kumpimbira indirimbo.
Twafashe inzira tujya mu ishyamba, ni uko numva hajemo akajwi ndababwira nti muze mbabwire, mbabwira iryo jwi dushyira kuri telefoni turataha ntabwo twaryamye turara dutekereza.
Bwacyeye mu gitondo dufite ibitero bibiri, yagiye indirimbo ayitwaye.
Twayihimbye mu minsi itatu.
Ku munsi w’ubukwe ntabwo twayimuririmbiye.
IGIHE: Papa wawe ashobora kuba atakiriho, ariko iyo uri kumureba umubona mu yihe shusho?
Muyango: Ntabwo akiriho ariko iyo ifoto ye ije bintera ikiniga kuko yagiye ntari nabasha kumuganiriza ngo ambwire byinshi.
Anagenda tutari kumwe, yaguye inaha yarahungutse nk’abandi ahuye n’insanganya.
Apfa tudaherukana.
IGIHE: Hari abana bato bajya bakwegera ngo mukorane indirimbo ?
Muyango: Sinzi niba ari ukutabitinyuka.
Gusa nanjye hari igihe kitambereye cyiza narasaraye nayobewe indwara narwaye ariko icyo bakora banyoherereza indirimbo bakoze ngo nzumva mbakosore.
IGIHE: Ni abahe bahanzi b’ubu ubona ukumva urabishimiye ?
Muyango: Ni uguteranya abana keretse uvuze abakuru kuri bo, umwe we namuvuga, tuvuge nka Jules Sentore ni umwana ubona ko azusa ikivi cyacu.
Hari icyizere cy’uko tutazasiga ubusa.
IGIHE: Ni uruhe rwibutso ufite kuri Kamaliza?
Muyango: Ni umuntu nubaha cyane, yatangiye kuririmba turi i Burundi.
Atangira no gucuranga, ni ibintu yatangiye kera.
Ntabwo yari mukuru cyane nta n’ubwo yaturutaga, we yaje akora umuziki usa nk’ugezweho ariko atataye umuco wacu.
Twajyana mu bitaramo tugahamiriza akaririmba.
Ni umuntu wakoze igikorwa cyiza mu banyarwanda.

Abashoferi baravuga ko babayeho nk'abasigajwe inyuma n'amateka Abashoferi bibumbiye muri Koperative Prodco Abashoferi batwara imodoka nini zitwara abagenzi ziganjemo izijya mu ntara baravuga ko babayeho mu buzima bubi haba uko bafatwa mu kazi ndetse no mu buzima busanzwe, bakaba badatinya kugereranya imibereho yabo n'iy'abasigajwe inyuma n'amateka.
Aba bashoferi bavuga ko bafatwa nabi n'abakoresha babo, banatinyuka kuvuga akababaro kabo ngo bagakomanyirizwa muri byose.
Ubwo aba bashoferi bamurikaga ku mugaragaro koperative bahuriyemo bise PRODCO (Professional drivers cooperative) kuri iki Cyumweru, bavuze ko bihuje ngo babone uko baganira ku bibazo byabo ndetse banabishakire umuti bari hamwe.
Aba bashoferi bavuga ko mu kazi kabo bahura n'ibibazo byo kutagira amasezerano y'akazi, kudahabwa ubwishingizi ndetse no gusuzugurwa n'abakoresha babo.
Banavuga ko iyo hagize ikibazo bagize bakajya kukivuga, ngo basanga abakoresha babo babatanze mu nzego bagiye ku kivugamo, kuva ubwo uwabivuze agakomanyirizwa aho agiye hose.
Musoni Sultan, umwe muri abo bashoferi yagize ati: "Twishimiye ko nkatwe nk'abashoferi twahuye tukaganira ibibazo byacu, twari tubayeho nk'abasigajwe inyuma n'amateka.Urabona nitwe dutunze abakire, baragenda bakazana imodoka batse inguzanyo, tukazibishyurira ariko bakatwima agaciro."
Ntigurirwa Theoneste we avuga ko nk'iyo habayeho impanuka, umushoferi udafite ubushobozi ngo ashobora no gupfa iyo atishoboye.
Yagize ati: :"Boss iyo amaze kuguha akazi, wenda ugakora impanuka ushobora gupfa ntubone n'isanduku yo kugushyinguramo.
Nakoze accident ariko nirwanyeho, nta mukoresha wageze aho nari ndwariye kandi nta bwishingizi bampaga."
Perezida wa Kopertive Prodico na we yemeza ibivugwa n'abo bashoferi, icyakora akavuga ko kubabishyize hamwe bizagira icyo bikemura.
Nshimiyimana Innocent Omar, Perezida wa Prodico Nshimiyimana Innocent Omar avuga ko bagorwa cyane n'abakoresha babo.
Ati: "Uko ushaka gukora siko umukoresha wawe aba ashaka.imibereho yacu burya abashoferi ntabwo ari myiza.
Urabona dukora amasaha menshi, abenshi nta masezerano y'akazi bagira, nta bwishizi …kandi iyo ushatse kuvuga ibyo bibazo, uba igicibwa, ugakomanyirizwa, aho ugiye ugsanga bagutanzeyo" Uyu muyobozi avuga ko bagiye gukora ubuvugizi ku bibazo bahura nabyo kandi bakabona nuko bajya bafashanya igihe cyose hari mugenzi wabo wagize ikibazo.
PRODCO igizwe n'abanyamuryango bagera ku 140, abenshi akaba ari abamaze nibura imyaka itanu mu mwuga wo gutwara abantu.

Ikarita imwe igiye kujya ikoreshwa mu kwishyura urugendo mu modoka, moto no guhaha mu masoko Ikoranabuhanga rimaze kumenyerwa mu kwishyura urugendo mu modoka rusange, rigiye kwagurwa rigere kuri moto ku buryo niba ukeneye kujya ahantu runaka, mubazi yashyizwe kuri moto izajya ikwereka intera wagenze n’amafaranga wishyura ugakozaho ikarita, utiriwe uciririkanya ngo hato mubure amafaranga avunje, usange mutakaje umwanya.
Ni urugendo rukomeje rwo kubaka ubukungu bw’u Rwanda budashingiye ku guhererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki.

Ati “N’ubundi nk’uko wakozagaho kuri bus, uzajya uva muri bus wenda ube wakoza kuri moto cyangwa uve kuri moto ukoze kuri bus, ari ikarita imwe utiriwe uvuga ngo hano ndatanga ikarita n’undi atange indi ikarita.
Noneho mu minsi mike kuri ya karita ube wajya no mu maduka uyikoreshe nk’uko ukoresha visa card.”
Yavuze ko ubu ikigezweho ari uguhuza ikoranabuhanga (integration) ku buryo mubazi zizakorwa na Mara Phones zizaba zirimo ubushobozi bwo kwakira amakarita yose, yaba iy’urugendo n’isanzwe ya banki.
Yakomeje ati “N’ikarita ya banki uzaba ushobora kuyikozaho amafaranga akavaho.
Ubu banki twasinyanye amasezerano ni BPR ariko n’izindi bitabujije ko zizaza.
Nukozaho ikariya ya banki, iyo ufite application y’umugenzi, ushatse ya karita uyishyira muri application amafaranga akajya ahita yivanaho.”
“Iyo udafite application, iyo ukojejeho ikarita, imashini ihita ikoherereza ubutumwa kuri telefoni buguha aho ushyira umubare w’ibanga, ku buryo wanakwishyurira umuntu uri mu ntara wenda umubwiye uti gera i Kigali ndakwishyurira.
Ntabwo yakuraho amafaranga utarashyiramo umubare wawe w’ibanga.”
Kuri application ya Pascal Moto ushyira muri telefoni ya Android cyangwa iPhone, ushobora kuyinjiramo ukishyura cyangwa nabwo ugahabwa ubutumwa bugufi kuri telefoni buguha aho wuzuza wa mubare w’ibanga.
Biteganywa ko iyi gahunda izaba yarangiye nibura mu kwezi kumwe, ku buryo ku wa Ku wa 1 Nyakanga uzaba ushobora gukoresha ikarita imwe ku rugendo kuri moto cyangwa mu modoka.
Abamotari bagiye guhabwa mubazi ku buryo guciririkanwa n'umugenzi bizaba amateka Uzaba ushobora kwishyura serivisi z’Irembo cyangwa amande ya Polisi Ukoresheje mubazi y’umumotari, uzaba ushobora kwishyura serivisi ku Irembo, bitagusabye gukora urugendo runini.
Ndizeye ati “Mu kwezi kumwe n’Irembo byose bizaba biri hamwe ku buryo ushobora kwishyura serivisi z’Irembo ku mumotari wese wabona, unyuze muri ya mashini y’umumotari.
Nta komisiyo bazaba baka, ni serivisi bagomba gutanga na bo barabizi.”
“Polisi niba iguhagaritse, nabo bazaba bafite application ikorana n’izo mashini, ashyiremo plaque gusa ahite amenya nyir’ikinyabiziga, perimi ye, indangamuntu ye, imyirondoro yose.
Bizaba binahura n’ibigo nk’Ikigo cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro.
Ubwishingizi bw’ibinyabiziga ubu bwose bukoresha ikoranabuhanga, azajya ahita amenya niba ubufite, atiriwe agusaba igipapuro.”

Ferwafa yasobanuye ibijyanye n’ubusabe bwa FIFA bwo kurenganura Rwemalika Komisiyo y’Amatora muri Ferwafa yatangaje ko nta kurenganya Rwemalika Félicité kwabayeho mu matora aheruka kuko atabonye amajwi ahagije, bityo nta kibazo babona afite bakemura nubwo byari byasabwe n’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi, FIFA biciye ku Munyamabanga waryo Mukuru, Fatma Samoura.
Fatma yandikiye Komisiyo y’Amatora muri Ferwafa tariki 30 Mutarama 2018 asaba Umuyobozi wayo, Kalisa Adolphe n’abo bafatanya gukemura ikibazo cya Rwemalika Félicité, wajuririye icyemezo cyafashwe cyo gutangaza ko atabonye amajwi amwemerera gutsinda amatora.
Muri aya matora yabaye tariki 30 Ukuboza 2017, Rwemalika yari ahanganye na Nzamwita Vincent de Gaulle mbere y’uko uyu akuramo kandidatire ye ku munota wa nyuma.
Amatora yarakomeje Rwemalika ari umukandida rukumbi ariko mu kubara amajwi bigaragara ko ari abanyamuryango 13 bamutoye batageze kuri 50% bya 52 bagize Inteko Rusange itora kuko andi majwi yabaye impfabusa.
Yajuririye iki cyemezo mu kanama k’ubujurire muri Ferwafa, abimenyesha CAF na FIFA agaragaza ko hari amategeko yirengagijwe kuko mu gihe byagaragaye ko abanyamuryango 39 batanze impapuro zabo nta kintu cyanditseho, hagombaga guhabwa agaciro iz’abatoye.
Nubwo FIFA yasabye ko ibi bibazo byakemuka vuba bitaba ibyo ikazabyikurikiranira, Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo y’Amatora muri Ferwafa, Kalisa Adolphe aganira na IGIHE yavuze ko nta kintu bazakemura kuko babona nta kibazo cyabayeho ahubwo bakaba bari gutegura andi matora azagaragaza perezida mushya tariki 30 Werurwe 2018.
Yagize ati “Nta kibazo na kimwe cyabayeho, FIFA nayihaye impapuro zigaragaza uko amatora yose yagenze, mbasobanurira n’impamvu twemeje ko amatora agomba gusubirwamo kuko hari abakandida babiri, umwe avuga ko akuyemo kandidatire hasigara undi, amatora akorwa bisanzwe.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Muri 52 bagombaga gutora bose batanze impapuro zabo batoreyeho 13 aba aribo bamutora [Rwemalika] abandi 39 baratoye ariko banga gutora umukandida wasigaye ari umwe kubera iyo mpamvu dufata icyemezo ko atabashije kugira amajwi 50% guteranyaho rimwe.”
Kalisa yasobanuye ko nyuma y’uko Komisiyo y’Amatora yemeje ko hazaba andi matora, Rwemalika yari yemerewe kujurira ariko ngo yabikoze mu buryo butari bwo.
Ngo yagombaga kubanza kumenyesha iyi komisiyo ko atishimye n’impamvu ze zikigwaho nyuma akabona kujya mu kanama k’ubujurire ariko we ngo yahise ajya mu bujurire bamusubiza inyuma mu nzego yasimbutse bituma iminsi yo kujurira imushirana niko kwandikira CAF na FIFA.
Yashimangiye ko ubu komisiyo ihugijwe no gutegura uko amatora yandi ateganyijwe tariki 30 Werurwe 2018 azagenda; ibijyanye na yo byose bikazatangazwa ku wa kabiri w’icyumweru gitaha.
Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo y’Amatora muri Ferwafa, Kalisa Adolphe aganira na IGIHE yavuze ko nta kintu bazakemura kuko babona nta kibazo cyabayeho

Umwana wavukanye ubumuga budasanzwe arifuza kuzaba umuganga Turikumwenayo Jean De Dieu w’imyaka 14, umwana wo mu kagari ka Kabeza umurenge wa Cyuve i Musanze wavutse atagira umwanya wo kwitumiramo, arifuza kuziga akaba umuganga.
Turikumwenayo Jean De Dieu w’imyaka 14 afite ubumuga yavukanye butarabasha kuvurwa Nyuma yo kuvuka, ngo hashize amasaha make umwanda wishakira inzira, hafi yahakagombye kuba umwanya wo kwitumiramo haturika igisebe kinini kinyuramo imyanda, bimuviramo ubumuga bukabije aho icyo gisebe cyananiye abavuzi.
Si icyo gisebe gusa kuko ngo yavukanye n’ubundi bumuga aho mu mugongo yavukanye ikibyimba gikomeza gukura kugeza ubwo cyakoraga hasi ubwo yabaga yicaye nk’uko bivugwa na Ayingeneye Petronille, umubyeyi we.
Ayingeneye avuga ko izo ndwara zose zahuriye kuri uwo mwana amujyana mu bitaro binyuranye ikibyimba kibagwa umwana afite imyaka ine.
Ati “nkimara kumubyarira mu rugo, ubumuga bwe bwatubereye urujijo aho twasanze nta mwenge wo kwitumiramo, ahubwo tubona ikintu yavukanye mu ruti rw’umugongo kimeze nk’ikibyimba, kigenda gikura umunsi k’uwundi kigera ubwo abaganga bamubaga afite imyaka ine”.
Turikumwenayo wamaze imyaka icyenda adashobora kugenda, nyuma yo kubona igare yatangiye ishuri ubu ari mu wa gatanu w’amashuri abanza, aho afite indoto zo kuzaba umuganga agendeye ku baganga bamuvuye ikibyimba.
Ati “nziga cyane kandi nzaba umuganga, bamfashije byinshi niyo mpamvu nanjye niga nshizeho umwete ngo nzabe nkabo, ubu sinjya munsi y’amanota 60”.
Uwo mwana n’ubwo afite izo nzozi, arinubira abana bigana bakomeje kumuca intege.
Ati “ikibazo mfite ni icy’abana twigana bakomeje kumfata nabi banserereza, numva banca intege ngasaba Leta kubwira abo bana ko nanjye ndi umuntu nk’abandi.
Ndasaba Leta kandi kujya imfasha kwiga ikampa ibikoresho nkagera ku ntego zanjye, nk’ubu ku ishuri basabye ko mbona agapira ko gukinira muri aka kagare kugira ngo ingingo zinanuke ariko narakabuze”.
Umuryango w’ivugabutumwa Gisubizo Ministries niwo ukomeje gufasha uwo mwana N’ubwo uwo mwana yifuza kwiga akaminuza umuryango we ntiworohewe n’ikibazo cy’ubukene dore ko barya bavuye guca inshuro ngo bagaburire abana barindwi bafite.
Ni nyuma yo gukurwa mu cyiciro cya mbere, bagashyirwa mu cya kabiri, aho ubu kubona mituweri ari ikibazo nk’uko bivugwa na Ayingeneye.
Agira ati “Leta ni ukudutera inkunga ikadufasha kuko ntacyo twifashije, hari ubwo abwirirwa akarya ari uko mvuye guca inshuro, ubundi twatangirwaga mituweri tukiri mu cyiciro cya mbere, badushyira mu cya kabiri mbabajije impamvu nk’umuntu wahuye n’ikibazo cyo kurwaza umwana, barambwira ngo ntibitureba ngo turi bazima tugomba kwirihira”.
Habarurema Samuel, umukuru w’umudugudu wa Karunyura, avuga ko akiri mushya mu kazi atigeze amenya ko uwo muryango uri mu cyiciro cya kabiri.
Yemeza ko hari abaterankunga bamwemereye ubufasha ku batishoboye, ngo n’uwo muryango azawushyira muri raporo ufashwe.
Kugeza ubu abagiraneza bibumbiye m’umuryango w’ivugabutumwa witwa Gisubizo Ministries, nibo bakomeje gufasha uwo muryango, ku itariki 25 Gashyantare 2019 batanze inkunga y’ibiribwa binyuranye birimo kawunga, umuceri, amasabune, ibikoresho by’isuku n’amafaranga ibihumbi 30 yo gufasha uwo mwana.
Kenedy Cyiza uhagarariye uwo muryango mu karere ka Musanze avuga ko basanzwe basura uwo mwana mu kumufasha kugira ubuzima bwiza no kwivuza.
Ati “ni umwana dusanzwe twitaho, n’ubu twamenye ko yarwaye, hari imyanda isohokera mu gikomero imutera gushya amatako, akeneye kwivuza kandi umuryango ntiwishoboye, niyo mpamvu twamusuye tumuzanira n’ubufasha bunyuranye”.
Umuryango w’uwo mwana urashimira abo bagiraneza kandi usaba n’ubufasha muri Leta mu kurushaho kwita kuri uwo mwana ngo yige agere ku nzozi ze dore ko n’inzu babamo ishaje cyane aho bagira impungenge zuko mu gihe cy’imvura yazabagwira.

‘Abanyarwanda bava muri kiliziya bajya mu madini mashya byatewe na Jenoside’ Musenyeri Hakizimana Musenyeri wa Diyosezi gatolika ya Cyangungu na Gikongoro Hakizimana Celestin yemera ko abakiristu ba kiliziya gatolika mu Rwanda bagabanuka akavuga ko byatewe n’ uko muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi hari abiciwe muri za kiliziya bituma abanyarwanda batakariza ikizere iri dini gusa abaturage bo siko babibona.

Yagize ati “Ijanisha baragabanyuka kandi n’ abo dufite tubafite ku izina gusa, abakirisitu nyabo dufite wasanga ari bakeya ariko umugambi dufite ni ukubongera.
Nabwiye abapadiri ko tugomba kuva kuri 40% tukagera kuri 60% buri mwaka tugoma kujya twongeraho bake bake kugira ngo twongere dusubire kuri 60%”.
Musenyeri Hakizimana yabwiye Radio1 ati “(Kugabanyuka) njyewe ntekereza ko byatewe na Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi kuko abantu bapfiriye mu kiliziya, benshi batari mu Rwanda bari baziko ari kiliziya yabishe ariko rero ntitwakwishinja rwose turimo kubikosora ibyapfuye kandi bazagaruka” Akomeza agira ati “Aya madini yose turi bakuru babo, turi n’ ababyeyi babo wahungira hehe se umubyeyi wawe, turizera ko mu myaka mikeya tuzaba tumaze kwisuganya, ibyo tutabashije gutunganya tukabitunganya ahasigaye tugakomeza tukaba bakuru b’ andi madini nabo bakaba barumuna bacu”.
Bamwe mu baturage bavuye muri kiliziya gatolika bakajya mu yandi madini n’ amatorero bavuga ko babitewe n’ uko imyigishirize ya kiliziya gatolika idahinduka.
Uwayivuyemo akajya muri ADEPR yagize ati “Mu katorike nabonaga cyane cyane ririya sengesho ryabo, ntashoboye kuba umuntu wanjye waryakira, mbona ADEPR ariyo umutima wanjye ushobora kwakira isengesho ryabo.
Hari ibintu basoma mu ivanjiri ukumva ntabwo iyo vanjili uri kuyisobanukorwa ariko ADEPR baragusobanurira ukumva birakunyuze mu mutima wawe”.
Undi yavuze ko hari imvugo zadutse muri rubanda zigaragaza ko ibintu byo muri kiliziya ari ibintu bidahinduka.
Ati “Mperutse kujya ahantu turi kuganira n’ abantu turi gusabana noneho numva umwe atumije ako kunywa ati bwira wa mukobwa ushaje nk’ ibanjiri anzanire akantu ko gusoma" Yakomeje agira ati "Ibyo bituruka kukuba ivanjili yaragiyeho YESU akivuka, inyigisho yatangaga na n’ ubu nizo abenshi twigishwa.
Uko byari bimeze YESU akiriho n’ ubu uko bimeze ntabwo bihinduka ukiri mutoya ukabyiruka aribyo yumva n’ ushaje aba aribyo azi kuko nk’ umuntu w’ umusaza Padiri ashobora gutangira gusoma misa n’ umusaza ubwe yayisoma bitewe n’ uko ari ibintu yamenyereye yacengeye bihoraho”.
Kuva mu 1962 kugera muri 2012 mu Rwanda hari amadini n’ amatorero 180, nyuma y’ uko Leta y’ u Rwanda ishyizeho gahunda yo kuyandika yariyongereye cyane agera ku 1500 muri 2016.

#9464#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/rutsiro-yagonze-inkuta-z-inzu-acibwa-ibihumbi-800
Rutsiro: Yagonze inkuta z'inzu acibwa ibihumbi 800 Umugabo witwa Habamenshi Augustin uzwi ku izina rya Pasiteri wari utwaye imodoka ipakiye imbaho yo mu bwoko bwa Fuso yagonze amazu y'ubucuruzi aherereye mu Kagari ka Nyagahinika mu Murenge wa Kigeyo ho mu Karere ka Rutsiro acibwa naba nyir'amazu amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 800 ngo babashe gusana ibyangiritse.
Hari mu masaha ya sa munani z'ijoro ryo kuwa gatandatu rishyira ku cyumweru tariki ya 04/01/2015 ubwo uyu mugabo yavaga mu Karere ka Rutsiro aho akorera umushinga wo kubajisha imbaho azijyanye mu Karere ka Rubavu ari naho atuye.
Habamenshi avuga ko ari impanuka isanzwe yakoze ariko benshi bemeza ko ashobora kuba yari asinziriye bitewe n'uburyo yagonzemo ayo mazu kandi umuhanda wagutse cyane.
Imodoka yagonze inzu yari ipakiye imbaho.
Ubwo Kigali Today kuri iki cyumweru yageraga ahabereye iyo mpanuka ku gasantere ka Nyagahinika, uwagonze ayo mazu Pasiteri na ba nyir'amazu polisi yari yabategetse kumvikana ariko ubwumvikane bukaba bwaragoranye.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Akagari ka Nyagahinika, Ntibiramira Jean Damascène nawe wari mu bari kumvikanisha ba nyir'amazu n'uwagonze, yabwiye Kigali Today ko kumvikana byabanje kunanirana Pasiteri avuga ko amafaranga ari menshi ariko byarangiye yemeye kuyatanga.
Ati "Impanuka koko yabaye ariko kubumvikanisha byagoranye kuko ba nyir'amazu babanje kwifuza miliyoni 2 uko ari bane ndetse na pasiteri akavuga ko yabaha ibihumbi 400 gusa ariko abagabo bemeje ibihumbi 800".
Umwe mu bafite inzu yangiritse witwa Bitwayiki Céléstin avuga ko kuba baca Pasiteri ibihumbi 200 kuri buri muryango atari menshi ahubwo ari ukumworohera kuko ngo hakurikijwe ibizakenerwa bamuca menshi.
Abapolisi basabye ko impande zombi zumvikana.
Uyu wari utwaye iyi modoka we ntiyabashije kuvugana na Kigali Today kuko yavuze ko ahuze.
Bitegetsimana Céléstin Umwe mu bagabo bari bari kumvikanisha impande zombi yatangaje ko amafaranga ibihumbi 200 basabye ko Pasiteri atanga kuri buri muryango ari mu buryo bwo kubafasaha ntihagire n'umwe ushegesha undi.
Yagize ati "Kuba twavuze ko pasiteri atanga ibihumbi 200 kuri buri muryango ni mu rwego rwo kubafasha kumvikana no kubunga kuko na Pasiteri nawe ntiyabigambiriye".
Aya mafaranga ibihumbi 800 azatangwa na Pasiteri basinyanye ko azatangwa mu byiciro 2 aho ku itariki ya 9/1/2015 azabanza gutanga ibihumbi 400 nyuma ku itariki ya 23 akazongera agatanga andi asigaye.
Mbarushimana Aimable

#9491#	8	technology	https://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/ibyo-wamenya-ku-mikorere-y-umurongo-wa-telefone-udashobora-kumvirizwa
Ibyo wamenya ku mikorere y’umurongo wa telefone udashobora kumvirizwa Ku bajya bareba filime cyane iz’Abanyamerika, iyo hajemo ibibazo by’umutekano w’igihugu, uzakunda kumva bavuga gukoresha umurongo wa telefone utekanye udashobora kumvirizwa, ushobora kwibaza ko ari ibyo muri filime nyamara bibaho koko mu buzima busanzwe, hari uburyo bukoreshwa bugatuma umurongo wa telefone runaka udashobora kumvirizwa.
Umuyobozi w’ikigo kijya inama ku mutekano w’ikoranabuhanga cya Rhino Securiry Labs, Ben Caudill, yavuze ko ubu buryo buberaho kwirinda ko telefone yawe yakumvirizwa cyangwa yakwinjirirwa.
Yagize ati “Iki kibazo mpora nkibazwa hashingiwe ku bigaragara muri za filime, gusa muri make, ubu buryo bubereyeho kurinda ko uhamagaraga yakumvirizwa n’urundi ruhande urwo ari rwo rwose.”
Ibi bigerwaho hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rituma umurongo ujyamo code itafungurwa n’undi uwo ari we wese, ni uburyo bwitwa “encryption”, butuma umuntu atakoresha uburyo ubwo ari bwo bwose, haba kwinjirira mu migozi ijyana umurongo, cyangwa gukoresha ubundi buryo ngo yinjirire telefone yawe uri guhamagara.
Caudill yagize ati “N’ubwo nabasha kubona “signal” ya telefone yawe, cyangwa nkinjirira imigozi itwara ihuzanzira rya telefone yawe yo mu rugo, sinabasha kumviriza ibyo uvugira kuri telefone mu gihe ikingiwe (encrypted), ndetse n’abakoze iyo telefone ndetse na leta ntibabasha kuyumviriza nabo.”
Uwo uhamagaye na we hari uburyo izo code ziba zirimo zituma itabasha kumvirizwa, zihita zivanamo akabasha kukumva neza mu buryo bunoze, ariko nta rundi ruhande rwa gatatu rushobora kubumviriza, hakaba na telefone zubakanywe ubwo buryo zihamagarana gusa n’izo byubatse kimwe.
Hari uburyo bubiri ushobora kwifashisha kugira ngo ukoreshe ubu buryo butuma utakumvirizwa (en-to-end encryption), hari uburyo bikorerwa imbere (software), hakaba n’uburyo byabikorera inyuma (hardware).
Ubu buryo bwo kubikora hifashishijwe “software”, bumaze kumenyekana cyane, kuko ubu nk’urubuga rwa WhatsApp rurabufite kimwe n’izindi “application” zikoreshwa mu kohererezaya ubutumwa kuri telefone zigezweho (smartphone).
Caudill yavuze ko kugerageza gukoresha ubu buryo ari indi ntera, gusa ngo hari abagaragaza ko ubu buryo bushobora kuba butizewe nk’uko umuntu yabitekereza.
Ati “Niba telefone yawe isanzwe ifite utubazo mu mikorere, hari ubwo abajura bo kuri internet bashobora kukumviriza, rero haracyari ikibazo cyo kumenya ikigero ubu buryo bwaba bwizeweho uko kingana, gusa na none nibwo buryo bwiza kuruta gukoresha ubusanzwe.”
Ni ibyo rero tujya tubona muri filime, aho wumva perezida avuze ati mumpe umurongo wa telefone utekanye, haba hari telefone yubatswe yifitemo ubwo buryo bwo kutumvirizwa, ihamagaragana n’izindi zubatse nkayo, hakaba nta rundi ruhande rushobora kuyumviriza.
Hari telefone zakoranywe uburyo ntawe ushobora kuzumviriza kandi zigahamagarana n'izo biteye kimwe

#9507#	10	relationships	http://www.makuruki.rw/URUKUNDO/article15100.html
Akamaro k’imibonano mpuzabitsina mu buzima Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko kwifata bitabangamira ubuzima bw’umuntu, ariko gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ku bashakanye bifitiye umubiri wa muntu inyugu nyinshi cyane.
Mu nyigo z’abahanga zakozwe zerekanye ko gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n’iyo byaba ku rugero ruke mu cyumweru, hari akamaro bigirira umubiri.
Nk’uko tubitangarizwa kandi na forbes.com, imwe muri iyo mimaro ni iyi ikurikira: 1.
Kongera ubushobozi bwo guhumurirwa Nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, umubiri urekura umusemburo witwa “Prolactin”.
Uyu musemburo utuma uturemangingo two mu bwonko dutuma hiyongera ibice bihererye mu bwonko bishinzwe impumuro.
2.
Kugabanya indwara y’umutima Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe muri Kaminuza ya Queens (Queens University) y’i Belfast, ku bijyanye n’umutima, basanze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina inshuro eshatu cyangwa nyinshi mu cyumweru bigabanya ibyago byo guhura n’indwara y’umutima.
3.
Kugabanya ibiro Buriya ngo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina na byo ntaho bitaniye no gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri, kuko iyo umuntu arangije rimwe gusa; ibingana no kwiruka mu gihe cy’ iminota 15 kuri Treadmill (igikoresho cya gymnastic umuntu yirukaho atava aho ari).
4.
Kugabanya kwiheba Inyigo yakozwe mu mwaka wa 2002, ku bakobwa 233; aba bakobwa baryamanye na bagenzi babo b’abahungu bamwe bambaye udukingirizo abandi batatwambaye.
Ku bakobwa bahuye n’abahungu batambaye udukingirizo, basanze ikibazo cyo kwiheba ari gike ugereranyije na bagenzi babo bahuye n’abahungu bambaye udukingirizo.
Ibi biterwa n’ umusemburo wa “prostaglandin” uba mu masohoro, ukinjirira mu mukobwa biciye mu myanya ndangagitsina ye.
Uyu musemburo ugabanya kwiheba.
5.
Kugabanya ububabare Nyuma y’ibyishimo byinshi bibonwa nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina hari umusemburo urekurwa witwa “Ocytocin” ku rugero rukubye inshuro Eshanu ku rwari rusanzwe ruriho.
Uyu musemburo na wo utuma harekurwa “endorphins”, ariyo ikuraho ibijyanye n’ububabare; nk’umutwe ukabije.
Ku bagore ho hanarekurwa umusemburo, “estrogen” ufite ubushobozi bwo kugabanya uburibwe bubanziriza igihe cy’imihango ku bantu b’igitsina gore.
6.
Kugabanya ibyago byo kurwara ibicurane na Giripe Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Kaminuza ya Wilkes (Wilkes University) yo muri Pennsylvania buvuga ko gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina inshuro imwe kugera kuri ebyiri mu cyumweru byongera 30% urugero rwa “immunoglobin A”, ishinzwe kurinda umubiri.
7.
Gukora neza k’uruhago rw’inkari Imibonano mpuzabitsina kandi ituma Uruhago rw’inkari rugira ubushobozi bwo gukora neza.

Safi Madiba yashyize hanze indirimbo iri kuri album ateganya kumurika umwaka utaha Umuhanzi Niyibikora Safi Madiba yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Sound’ avuga ko ari imwe mu zigize album ye ya mbere ateganya kumurikia mu mpera z’umwaka utaha wa 2021.
Safi Madiba kuri ubu usigaye utuye mu gihugu cya Canada yaherukaga gushyira hanze indirimbo yise ‘My Love’ yagiye hanze mu buryo bw’amajwi n’amashusho [amashusho yayo yafatiwe ndetse anatunganyirizwa muri Canada].

Ni ukuvuga kuva yatangira gukora nk’umuhanzi ku giti cye.

Ati “Ndabakunda kandi album irenga kurangira, ikindi ndabasaba kwirinda muri ibi bihe bya COVID19 kugira ngo bazabivemo amahoro mbataramire.”

#9515#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Abadozi-b-I-Kigali-ngo-babangamiwe-n-abakobwa-babasaba-kubapima-bambaye-ubusa
Abadozi b'I Kigali ngo babangamiwe n'abakobwa babasaba kubapima bambaye ubusa.
Abakora umwuga w'ubudozi bw'imyenda mu mujyi wa Kigali baravuga ko babangamiwe n'umuco wadukanywe n'abakobwa babasaba ko babapima bambaye ubusa.
Aba badozi bemeza ko ibi bintu bibabangamira ariko bakabura uko bagira kuko batareka akazi cyangwa babwire nabi abakiriya.
Aba badozi bavuga ko uyu ari umuco utangiye gukura mu bakobwa biganjemo ab'I Kigali, kuko ubu ngo nta we ukemera gupimwa yambaye kuko ngo bavuga ko baba bashaka imyenda ibakwira, ibegereye.
Aba batayeri bemeza ko iki gikorwa kibabangamira kuko kinabera mu bwiherero, bakanavuga ko bidasanzwe ko umugore yambara ubusa imbere y'umugabo utari uwe.
Mu kiganiro twagiranye n'abadozi batandukanye mu mujyi wa Kigali , abenshi bagaragaje kubyinubira.
Umwe yagize ati:"Abantu basigaye baza bakakubwira ngo bapime ubadodere ariko akagusaba ko mujya mu bwiherero umupime yambaye ubusa ngo nibwo imyenda imukwira.
Ukibaza ubu hagize ikindi kiba ko turi abantu.
Urabikora kubera amafaranga ariko ukabikora ufite ubwoba."
Undi ati:"No mu minsi ishize rwose umukobwa yaraje yanga ko mupima yambaye.
Yambara ubusa ubwo ndamupima, jye maze kubimenyera rwose gusa ariko nuko ari akazi ariko si umuco.
Jyewe abaza bose baba ari abakobwa nimba ari ibishoboka bakwigishwa bakabireka kuko nibyo bishyizemo.
Niyo wamupima yambaye umwenda wamukwira rwose."
Hari n'abavuga ko ibyo abakobwa bakora bisa no kwiyenza, kuko bishobora no gutuma bafatwa ku ngufu.
Hari uwagize ati:"Jyewe mbona ntazi ibyateye!
Nonese umuntu araza akakubwira ngo umupime yambaye ubusa ngo nibwo imyenda izamukwira. ubwo se ibyo ni ibintu.
Biratubangamira nuko utareka akazi kandi abenshi baba ari abakobwa.
Ubwo se mugiye muri ubwo bwiherero aka kwanduranyaho ibintu bigahindura isura wabyitwaramo ute."
Bamwe mu bakobwa twaganiriye biyemerera ko bipimisha bambaye ubusa.
Bavuga ko babona aribyo byiza kumyambarire yabo kuko bituma umuntu adoderwa imyenda imukwira.
Uyu aragira ati:"Jye naragiye ndamubwira mubwira moderi nkeneye arambwira ati nagupima koko yarampimye na metero yiwe.
Tujya ahantu nyine mu bwiherero nkuramo arampima nakuyemo byose birumvikana.
Nohejuru arampima agakote birangije arandeka ndongera ndambara ariko imyenda yaje inkwira neza."
Undi nawe ati:"Nange nkibyumva bwa mbere numvise bintunguye ariko bandodeye mbonye umwenda nambaye mbona ndaberewe.
Abantu bakambwira ngo nambara neza numva ndabikunze.
Ubu rwose nange niko mbikora.
Bampimye nyine nakuyemo imyenda nabanje kwambara kora ariko ubu nayo nyikuramo kuko nayo hari icyo ihindura ugasanga umwenda ntugukwiriye uko ubyifuza."
Bamwe mu baturage twaganiriye b'igitsina gore nabo batubwiye ko ibyo babona ntacyo bitwaye kuko icyo umukiriya ashaka kiba ari nk'itegeko.
Basaba aba batayeri kwikuramo isoni kuko ntagitangaje kirimo ndetse babwira abakeka ko ibi byavamo uburaya ko bibeshya.
Ati:"Byanze bikunze iyo umuntu aje kwipimisha aba akwizeye nta mpamvu yo kugira isoni uri umudogiteri se wagira isoni.
Burya iyo kwinjiye mu kintu uba ugomba kugikora nababwira ko izo soni bazireka."
Undi nawe ati:"Oya ibyo ntaho bihuriye n'uburaya umuntu aba asanzwe ari ibitekerezo yifitiye muri we."
Iki kibazo kije cyiyongera ku myambarire abantu bavuga ko idahesha agaciro abayambara, imyambarire yiganje cyane mu rubyiruko.
Twashatse kuvugana n'inzego bireba ariko ntibyadukundira.

#9537#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/sunrise-fc-yahize-gutsinda-apr-fc-nk-uko-iheruka-kubigenza
Sunrise FC yahize gutsinda APR FC nk’uko iheruka kubigenza Intero ni imwe ku mutoza w’Umunya-Uganda, Moses Basena utoza Sunrise FC, kapiteni w’ikipe Uwambazimana Léon ‘Kawunga’ ndetse n’abafana bemeza ko APR FC ikwiye kuza yikandagira kuko uyu munsi ishobora kongera gutsindwa na Sunrise FC.
Iyi kipe yo mu Ntara y’Uburasirazuba iri ku mwanya wa gatandatu n’amanota 14, irakira APR FC ya mbere n’amanota 21 mu mukino w’umunsi wa 10 wa Shampiyona ubera kuri Stade ya Nyagatare saa 15:00.
Ubwo Sunrise FC yari imaze gutsinda Heroes FC ibitego 4-1 mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, umutoza wayo, Umugande Moses Basena yavuze ko mu Rwanda nta kipe ikomeye ihari ku buryo asanga no gutsinda APR FC bishoboka.
Ati” Nta kipe hano mu Rwanda ikomeye, hari amakipe meza ariko nta kipe ikomeye mbona hano mu Rwanda.
Ni byiza ko abakinnyi banjye bari gutsinda kandi ndizera ko bashobora no gutsinda ibitego birenze ibi.”
Aya magambo y’umutoza ntaho atandukaniye n’aya kapiteni w’iyi kipe, Uwambazimana Léon na we wavuze ko APR FC yakagombye kuza yikandagira.
Ati"Umuntu ahora abivuga buri munsi, iyo ukina n’ikipe irwanira igikombe, ni umukino uba ukomeye cyane.
APR FC icyo nayibwira ni uko yaza yikandagira ntiyizere ko izaza gutoragura amanota atatu, uwiteguye neza ni we uzawutsinda."
Abafana ba Sunrise FC bafite bafite icyizere ko ikipe yabo yongera gutsinda APR FC nk’uko yabigenje mu mwaka ushize w’imikino ubwo yayitsindiraga n’ubundi i Nyagatare ibitego 3-2 mu mikino ibanza.
Ku ruhande rwa APR FC, Niyonzima Olivier ‘Sefu’ ukina mu kibuga hagati, yavuze ko icyo bakeneye ari amanota atatu muri uyu mukino.
Ati” Sunrise ni ikipe nziza irimo no kwitwara neza muri shampiyona, ariko twebwe ku ruhande rwacu turiteguye icyo dushaka ni amanota atatu ku munsi w’ejo.’’
Mu mikino 10 imaze guhuza amakipe yombi kuva Sunrise FC izamutse mu cyiciro cya mbere mu myaka ine ishize, APR FC yatsinzemo imikino umunani, iyi kipe yo mu Burasirazuba itsinda ibiri isigaye.
Imikino yombi Sunrise FC yatsinze ni yo yakiriye ku kibuga cyayo ku bitego 3-0 (mu 2015 ubwo APR FC yari yaramaze guhabwa igikombe cya Shampiyona) na 3-2 mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka.
Sunrise FC kuri ubu ikinira ku kibuga gishya cy’ubwatsi bw’ubukorano, nta mukino iratakaza mu yo imaze kwakira muri uyu mwaka w’imikino ndetse yahatsindiye amakipe atandukanye arimo na Rayon Sports.
Umunya-Nigeria Babuwa Samson n’Umugande Wangi Pius bombi bakinira Sunrise FC, ni bo bayoboye abamaze gutsinda ibitego byinshi kugeza ubu, aho bombi bafite ibitego birindwi mu mikino icyenda.
Sunrise FC ntiratsindirwa mu rugo mu mikino yose imaze kwakira muri uyu mwaka w'imikino Moses Basena utoza Sunrise FC asanga mu Rwanda nta kipe ikomeye kurusha izindi ihari Abafana ba Sunrise FC bafitiye icyizere ikipe yabo

MUSANZE: Uwari Gitufu w'Umurenge wa Cyuve yarashwe ubwo yageragezaga gutoroka Amakuru agera kuri MakuruKi.com aravuga ko uwari Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Cyuve Alfred Nsengimana, wari ufungiye muri Gereza ya Ruhengeri yaba amaze kuraswa ubwo yageragezaga gutoroka inzego zisahinzwe umutekano, ubwo yari agiye kubereka aho avuga ko yatabye imbunda.
Alfred Nsengimana umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa yari amaze iminsi atawe muri yombi akekwaho gukorana na FDLR ndetse aza kugezwa imbere y'urukiko tariki ya 25/05/2014.
Amakuru atugeraho avuga ko yaba yarashwe ubwo yari agiye kwerekana aho yavuze mu buhamya ko yaba yarahishe imbunda ayitabye.
Ubwo yari agiye kwereka inzego z'umutekano, ngo yagerageje kwiruka acika aribwo yarashwe ahita apfa.
Twagerageje kuvugana n'Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu Ntara y'amajyaruguru, ariko telefone ye igendanwa ntiyashoboye kuyitaba.
Tuvugana n'umuvugizi wa Polisi y'igihugu ACP Damas GATARE yadutangarije ko aya makuru yari ataramugeraho ariko atubwira ko aza kuba yaduha amakuru ku munsi w'ejo.
Tubibutse ko Alfred NSENGIMANA wari Gitifu wa Cyuve we na bagenzi bakekwaho gukorana na FDLR, bari bagejejwe imbere y'urukiko tariki ya 25/03/2014, bakaba bari bakatiwe gufungwa iminsi 3 y'agateganyo muri Gereza ya Musanze.
Turacyabakurikiranira iyi nkuru.

#9625#	11	people	https://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/urukundo/article/niyomukesha-ukinira-ikipe-y-igihugu-ya-volleyball-yasezeranye-na-team-manager
Niyomukesha ukinira ikipe y’Igihugu ya Volleyball yasezeranye na Team Manager wa UTB VC (Amafoto) Niyomukesha Euphrance ukinira Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Volleyball na RRA VC, yasezeranye imbere y’amategeko n’Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubuzima bwa buri munsi bwa UTB VC, Mucyo Philbert, bamaze imyaka ine bakundana.
Mucyo Philbert na Niyomukesha basezeranye ku wa Kane mu Murenge wa Niboyi mu Karere ka Kicukiro.
Muri Kanama 2020 ni bwo Mucyo yateye ivi asaba Niyomukesha ko azamubera umugore.
Bombi bazasezerana imbere y’Imana ku wa 12 Werurwe 2021 muri EAR Remera ku Giporoso.
Mu mwaka ushize, Mucyo Philbert yabwiye IGIHE ko hashize igihe azi Niyomukesha ndetse ngo yatangiye kumukunda ubwo yakiniriraga ikipe y’Igihugu.
Ati “Namumenye kuva kera, ndamukunda ubwo yari mu ikipe y’Igihugu muri 2016.
Gusa muri 2013 najyaga njya iwabo gusura abaturanyi nibwo namumenye.”
“Mu 2017 nibwo nafashe icyemezo cyo kumumenyesha ko mukunda, mbigeraho mu 2018.
Namaze nk’imyaka itanu mwigaho, mureba.
Nyuma narabimubwiye, arambwira ngo niba nkomeje arabyemeye.”
Mucyo yakomeje avuga ko mu byatumye arushaho gukunda Niyomukesha Euphrance harimo kuba bombi bahuriye ku gukunda siporo kandi akaba ari umukobwa ufite uburere.
Ati “Ikintu cya mbere cyatumye mukunda ni uko yari umu-sportif kandi nanjye ndi we, icya kabiri kandi ni uko ari umukobwa usenga ufite uburere.
Nari naramwize neza mbibona.
Twatangiye afite isoni nyinshi atabyumva, ariko ubu nta kibazo kandi twiteguye kubana.”
Niyomukesha Euphrance yatangiye urugendo rwe rwo gukina Volleyball ubwo yajyaga kwiga muri St Aloys i Rwamagana muri 2009, akaba ari nabwo yahamagawe bwa mbere mu ikipe y’Igihugu y’abato batarengeje imyaka 18, yitatabiriye imikino yabere i Cairo mu Misiri muri 2010.
Kuva icyo gihe yakomeje kwitwara neza ari nako ahamagarwa mu ikipe y’Igihugu kugeza magingo aya.
Mu 2012, ubwo yari asoje icyiciro kibanza cy’amashuri yisumbuye, Niyomukesha yahise yerekeza muri RRA VC agikinira kugeza uyu munsi.
Mucyo Philbert arahira imbere y'amategeko kuzabana na Niyomukesha Niyomukesha ukinira ikipe y’Igihugu ya Volleyball, na we yemeye kuzabana akaramata na Mucyo Philbert Bombi basinyiye isezerano bakoze Mucyo Philbert na Niyomukesha Euphrance bamaze imyaka ine bakundana Niyomukesha na Mucyo Philbert bifotoza nyuma yo gusezerana mu murenge Amafoto: UTB

#9642#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/i-kigali-hongeye-kuboneka-abarwayi-benshi-ba-covid-19-kurusha-ahandi-mu-gihugu
I Kigali hongeye kuboneka abarwayi benshi ba #COVID-19 kurusha ahandi mu gihugu Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iratangaza ko kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 08 Nyakanga 2020 mu Rwanda habonetse abarwayi bashya makumyabiri na babiri (22) ba COVID-19.
Abo barwayi 22 babonetse mu bipimo 2,644, abamaze kuboneka mu Rwanda banduye icyo cyorezo bose hamwe baba 1,194.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yasobanuye ko abo barwayi bashya 22 barimo 17 babonetse mu kigo kinyurwamo by’igihe gito cya Kigali (Transit Centre).
Hari kandi batatu (3) babonetse i Rusizi, abandi babiri (2) babonetse muri Ngoma.
Mbere yaho ku wa Kabiri hari habonetse abarwayi bashya 59 barimo 49 babonetse mu kigo kinyurwamo by’igihe gito cya Kigali n’abari mu kato mu Karere ka Kicukiro.
Abandi batanu (5) bari babonetse i Rusizi, batatu (3) bari babonetse i Nyamasheke, i Kirehe hari habonetse umuntu umwe (1) n’undi umwe (1) wabonetse i Nyagatare.
Abantu cumi na batanu mu bari barwaye bakize kuri uyu wa Gatatu, abamaze gukira bose hamwe baba 610, naho abakirwaye ni 581.
Abamaze kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo mu Rwanda ni batatu.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima isaba abaturarwanda bose gukomeza kwitwararika bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.

#9645#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/amafoto-y-ubwiza-bwa-stade-12-zizakinirwaho-igikombe-cy-isi-mu-burusiya
Amafoto y’ubwiza bwa stade 12 zizakinirwaho Igikombe cy’Isi mu Burusiya Harabura iminsi umunani ngo Igikombe cy’Isi cy’umupira w’amaguru gitangire aho amakipe 32 y’ibihugu azaba ahanganiye mu mijyi inyuranye y’u Burusiya, mu mikino 64 izabera kuri stade 12 zifite ubwiza buryoheye ijisho ndetse zubakanywe ikoranabuhanga rigezweho.
Muri stade zose zizakinirwaho Igikombe cy’Isi uyu mwaka, into ni iya Ekaterinburg Arena yakira abafana ibihumbi 35 isanzwe ikinirwaho n’ikipe ya FC Ural Yekaterinburg naho inini ni iya Luzhniki yakira abafana ibihumbi 81 ikaba ari nayo izaberaho imikino ya ½ n’uwa nyuma muri iri rushanwa.
Igikombe cy’Isi kizabera mu Burusiya kuva ku ya 14 Kamena kugeza ku ya 15 Nyakanga 2018, kizakinirwa kuri stade 12 zifite amateka yihariye.
Aya ni amwe mu mafoto y’ubwiza bwa stade zizakira imikino ihuruza imbaga y’abakunzi ba ruhago mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi kuva ku bato kugeza ku basaza b’imvi z’uruyenzi.
1.
Kazan Arena Iyi ni stade yubatse mu Mujyi wa Kazan, ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu ibihumbi 45,379 ikaba yarafunguwe mu mwaka wa 2013.
Imwe mu mikino ikomeye izayiberaho harimo uzahuza u Bufaransa na Australia mu itsinda C tariki 16 Kamena; uwa Iran na Espagne mu itsinda B tariki 20 Kamena; Pologne na Colombia mu itsinda H tariki 24 Kamena n’uwa Koreya y’Epfo n’u Budage mu itsinda F tariki 27 Kamena; ikazanakira imwe mu mikino ya 1/8 na ¼.
2.
Ekaterinburg Arena Ni stade iherereye mu bilometero 1000 ugana mu Majyepfo y’Umujyi wa Moscow.
Yubatswe mu 1956 ivugururwa kuva mu 2014 kugera mu 2017 ikaba ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu 35,000.
Izakinirwaho imikino ine gusa yose yo mu matsinda harimo uwa Misiri na Uruguay tariki 15 Kamena; u Bufaransa na Peru tariki 21 Kamena, uw’u Buyapani na Sénégal tariki 24 Kamena 2018 kimwe n’uzahuza Mexique na Suède.
3.
Stade ya Fisht: Iyi stade yubatse mu Mujyi wa Sochi, yafunguwe mu 2013, ikaba ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu 47,659.
Ikibuga cya Fisht cya Leta y’u Burusiya cyakoreweho ibirori bifungura ndetse n’ibisoza irushanwa ngororamubiri ‘Winter Olympics’ mu 2014.
Ikaba yubatse mu buryo bumwe na Etihad, stade y’Ikipe ya Manchester City yo mu Bwongereza.
Izaberaho imikino itandukanye irimo uzahuza Portugal na Espagne tariki 15 Kamena mu itsinda B; uw’u Bubiligi na Panama tariki 18 Kamena mu itsinda G; uzahuza u Budage na Suède tariki 23 Kamena mu itsinda F n’uwa Australia na Peru tariki 26 Kamena ndetse izakira umukino wa 1/8 n’uwa ¼.
4.
Stade ya Kaliningrad Stade ya Kaliningrad iherereye ku Kirwa cya Oktyabrsky mu Mujyi wa Kaliningrad.
Igishushanyo mbonera cyayo kikaba cyagendeye kuri stade ya Bayern Munich, Allianz Arena.
Ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu 35, 212 ikaba yarafunguwe uyu mwaka.
Ubusanzwe ikinirwaho n’ikipe ya FC Baltika Kaliningrad.
Izakira imikino ine y’amatsinda mu Gikombe cy’Isi harimo uzahuza Croatia na Nigeria tariki 16 Kamena; uzahuza Serbia n’u Busuwisi tariki 22 Kamena; Espagne na Maroc tariki 25 Kamena n’uw’u Bwongereza n’u Bubiligi tariki 28 Kamena 2018.
5.
Stade ya Spartak Iyi ni stade yakira abantu 45,360 nayo yafunguwe mu 2014.
Isanzwe ikinirwaho n’ikipe ya Spartak Moscow ikaba ifite umwihariko wo kuba itatse diamant mu mabara y’umutuku n’umweru yihinduranya bitewe n’amakipe ari kuyikiniramo.
Izakira imikino yo mu matsinda irimo uwa Argentina na Iceland tariki 16 Kamena; Pologne na Sénégal tariki 19 Kamena; u Bubiligi na Tunisia tariki 23 Kamena n’uwa Serbia na Brazil tariki 27 Kamena, ikazanakinirwaho umukino umwe wa 1/8 tariki 16 Nyakanga 2018.
6.
Stade ya Luzhniki Iyi stade nini mu zizakinirwaho uyu mwaka yubatse mu Karere ka Khamovniki mu Mujyi wa Moscow, yatashywe ku mugaragaro mu 1956, yakira abantu 81,006.
Izakinirwaho imikino ine yo mu matsinda harimo uzahuza u Burusiya na Arabie Saoudite ufungura irushanwa tariki 14 Kamena; uw’u Budage na Mexique tariki 17 Kamena; uwa Portugal na Maroc tariki 20 Kamena n’uwa Denmark n’u Bufaransa tariki 26 Kamena 2018.
Iyi stade izakira n’umukino umwe wa 1/8 tariki ya 1 Nyakanga, yakire uwa ½ tariki 11 Nyakanga n’uwa nyuma tariki 15 Nyakanga 2018.
7.
Nizhny Novgorod Iyi stade yakira abantu 44, 899, yubatse hafi ya Cathedral ya Alexandre Nevsk.
Izakira imikino ine mu matsinda harimo uzahuza Suède na Koreya y’Epfo tariki 18 Kamena, uwa Argentine na Croatia tariki 21 Kamena, uw’u Bwongereza na Panama tariki 24 Kamena n’uw’u Busuwisi na Costa Rica tariki 27 Kamena 2018.
Hazabera n’umukino umwe wa 1/8 n’undi wa ¼.
8.
Rostov Arena Iyi stade isanzwe ikinirwaho n’ikipe ya Rostov, ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu ibihumbi 45.
Izakira imikino irimo uwa Brazil nu Busuwisi tariki 17 Kamena, Uruguay na Arabie Saoudite tariki 20 Kamena; Koreya y’Epfo na Mexique tariki 23 Kamena; Iceland na Croatia tariki 26 Kamena yose yo mu matsinda, ikazanakira umukino umwe wa 1/8 tariki 2 Nyakanga 2018.
9.
Saint Petersburg Iyi stade ikinirwaho n’ikipe ya Zenit Saint Petersburg ikaba yakira abantu 64,287, ni imwe mu zihenze ku Isi kuko ibarirwa agaciro ka miliyari 1, 14 z’amayero.
Izakira imikino ine mu matsinda harimo uwa Maroc na Iran tariki 15 Kamena; uw’u Burusiya na Misiri tariki 19 Kamena; Brazil na Costa Rica tariki 22 Kamena n’uwa Nigeria na Argentine tariki 26 Kamena 2018.
Izakira n’umukino umwe wa 1/8 tariki 3 Nyakanga, yakire umwe wa ½ tariki 10 Nyakanga ndetse ikaba ari nayo izaberaho uwo guhatanira umwanya wa gatatu tariki 14 Nyakanga 2018.
10.
Samara Arena Ni stade yakira abantu 44,918 ikaba yubatse mu bilometero 1057 mu Majyepfo ashyira Uburasirazuba bwa Moscow.
Izakira imikino irimo uwa Costa Rica na Serbia tariki 17; uwa Denmark na Australia tariki 19 Kamena; uwa Uruguay n’u Burusiya tariki 21 Kamena; n’uwa Sénégal na Colombia tariki 25 Kamena, yose yo mu matsinda.
Izanakira umukino umwe wa 1/8 tariki 16 Nyakanga, n’uwa ¼ tariki 7 Nyakanga 2018.
11.
Mordovia Arena Yakira abantu 44, 412 ikaba yaratangiye kubakwa mu 2014.
Izakira imikino y’amatsinda gusa harimo uzahuza Peru na Denmark tariki 16 Kamena, uwa Colombia n’u Buyapani tariki 19 Kamena; uzahuza Iran na Portugal tariki 25 Kamena n’uwa Panama na Tunisia tariki 28 Kamena 2018.
12.
Volgograd Arena Volgograd Arena yakira abantu 45 568, yafunguwe ku wa 3 Mata 2018 ikaba ikinirwaho n’ikipe ya Rotor Volgograd.
Izakira imikino ine gusa yo mu matsinda harimo uwa Tunisia n’u Bwongereza tariki 18 Kamena; uwa Nigeria na Iceland tariki 22 Kamena; uwa Arabie Saoudite na Misiri tariki 25 Kamena ndetse n’uw’u Buyapani na Pologne tariki 28 Kamena 2018.
Uko amakipe 32 agabanyije mu matsinda mu Gikombe cy’Isi cya 2018: Itsinda A: U Burusiya, Uruguay, Misiri, Arabie Saoudite Itsinda B: Portugal, Espagne, Iran, Maroc Itsinda C: U Bufaransa, Australie, Peru, Danemark Itsinda D: Argentine, Iceland, Croatie, Nigeria Itsinda E: Brazil, u Busuwisi, Costa Rica, Serbie Itsinda F: U Budage, Mexique, Suède, Koreya y’Epfo Itsinda G: U Bubiligi, Panama, Tunisie, u Bwongereza Itsinda H: Pologne, Colombie, Sénégal, u Buyapani

#9649#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Za-FARUMASI-zo-mu-Mujyi-wa-Kigali-zikwepa-amazamu-ziraburirwa
Za FARUMASI zo mu Mujyi wa Kigali zikwepa amazamu ziraburirwa Amafarumasi yasabwe kubahiriza inshingano zo gukora n'amasaha y'ijoro mu gihe yapanzwe Ministeri y'ubuzima mu Rwanda MINISANTE, irasaba abaturage bose kugerageza kuyiha amakuru ajyanye n'imikorere ya za Farumasi, cyane cyane izitubahiriza amabwiriza aba yarashyiriweho n'iyi Minisiteri, kugira ngo barusheho gutanga serivisi nziza kubabagana.
Ibi iyi Minisiteri yabidutangarije nyuma y'ikibazo cyakunze kugenda kigaragazwa n'abaturage, bavuga ko bajya gushaka aho bagura imiti mu gihe cya n'ijoro, bagasanga amafarumasi afunze, kandi hari ayo usanga aba apanzwe kurara izamu, ariko nayo ugasanga yafunze imiryango kimwe n'ayandi.
Bamwe mu baturage twaganiriye, batubwiye ko babangamiwe bikomeye n'imikorere y'amwe mu mafarumasi cyane mu masaha y'ijoro, kuko ngo Babura aho bagurira imiti, kandi baba bayikeneye cyane kugira ngo babashe kuramira amagara.
Umuturage Henriette Mukamutesi, wemeye kuganira na Makuruki.rw yagize ati"… njye nigeze no kujya hariya ku Gisimenti, nsanga harafunze mbura umuti, ubwo nyine byabaye ngombwa ko ku bucyeye ngaruka."
Yakomeje avuga ko kugera ku mafarumasi ugasanga afunze, bituma umurwayi aremba kuko aba atabonye umuti, ku buryo bishobora no kukuviramo urupfu, bitewe no kuba utaboneye imiti ku gihe.
Karasira Jean Pierre nawe yagize ati"… jyewe ubwange nigeze kuzenguruka Nyarugenge yose nijoro umurwayi yandwaranye, mbura umuti, byabaye ngombwa ko njya gusoma farumasi zaraye izamu nijoro, izo nsanzeho najyayo ngasanga zirafunze batakoze, niba baba baryamye, niba baba batakoze ari ukutubeshya, ari baringa simbizi."
Uyu muturage yasabye Minisiteri y'ubuzima, kujya ikora igenzura ikareba niba amafarumasi yari apanzwe kurara izamu, ko yariraye, kuko ngo hari igihe ushobora gusanga hari impamvu ifatika yatumye idakora, cyangwa se ko ari ubushake bw'abakozi b'izo farumasi.
Amwe mu mafarumasi twaganiye, yatubwiye ko icyo kibazo gihari, aho hari amafarumasi atubahiriza ibyo aba yarabwiwe na MINISANTE, agafunga mu gihe cy'amasaha y'ijoro, kandi biba biteganijwe ko ariyo ari burare izamu, ariko bagasaba ayabikora kwisubiraho, kuko ngo aba atubahiriza ibyo aba yariyemeje.
Umukozi ukorera farumasi Kipharma, yatubwiye ko ubusanzwe buri munsi haba hari farumasi ziba zigenewe kurara izamu, haba no mu gihe cya konji. ariko ngo iyo zitabikoze ziba zikoze amakosa, kandi ngo ziba zirenze kubyo ziba zariyemeje, bityo rero ngo bagomba kubikora nkuko baba barabyiyemeje ntawubashyizeho agahato, kandi bakabikora nta kwita ku masaha.
Yatubwiye kandi ko ntacyo abo bose batubahiriza amasaha bagakwiye kwitwaza ngo bafunge, kuko ntawe uba utazi igihe azararira izamu, kuko minisiteri y'ubuzima ipanga amafarumasi azarara izamu mu gihe cy'ukwezi, kandi ngo ikabikora mu ntangiriro z'ukwezi, kuburyo buri wese aba azi umunsi we wo kurariraho izamu.
Umukozi wa Farumasi New Hope twaganiriye kandi, yatubwiye ko ibi bibaho cyane aho usanga hari amafarumasi afunga mu masaha ya nijoro, kandi yakagombye kuba ari gukora, akavuga ko ibi ari amakosa akomeye, bityo ko bagomba gushyiramo imbaraga, bakagerageza gukora ibyo baba bariyemeje.
Yavuze kandi ko nubwo farumasi yaba yagize ikibazo gituma itari burare izamu, igomba kubivuga hakiri kare bakaba bayisimbuza indi, bityo abarwayi ntibabure aho bagura imiti.
Nathan Mugume, Umuvugizi wa Minisiteri y'ubuzima, yavuze ko ubundi bagira amafarumasi agomba gukora nijoro, no muri week end, bityo rero ngo ayapanzwe gukora, agomba kubyubahiriza, nkuko biba byarateganijwe na MINISANTE, bitaba ibyo agafatirwa ibihano.
Yakomeje kandi asaba abaturage, kujya bayigezaho amakuru y'amafarumasi yakagombye kuba yakoze, maze ngo ayatabyubahirije bayafatire ibihano bikarishye.
Yagize ati"… aba baturage aho bazajya babisanga bagasanga zitarimo gukora, bazajye batubwira. … bajye batubwira, tugakurikirana twasanga koko ko ari byo, ko izagombaga kuba ziri ku izamu, zikaba zitari ku izamu, ubwo hari ibihano zifatirwa."
MINISANTE kandi ikaba isaba abaturage kujya bayigezaho amakuru y'ahantu batakiriwe neza, cyangwa aho batabonye ibyo bifuza, bahamagara numero 114, kugira ngo babashe kuba barenganurwa igihe barenganyijwe, cyangwa aho bakiriwe nabi, kugira ngo babashe kubakurikirana, nibiba ngombwa babe babafatira ibihano.
Jean Louis UWISHYAKA/Makuruki.rw

#9688#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Biterwa-ni-iki-kugira-ngo-umuntu-avukane-ubumuga-bw-uruhu-rwera-Nyamweru
Menya byinshi ku gituma umuntu avukana ubumuga bw'uruhu (Nyamweru) Mu miryango itandukanye havugwa abantu bafite uruhu rwera kandi atari abazungu, abantu mu Kinyarwanda bavuga ko baba babana n'ubumuga bw' uruhu (nyamweru).
Ubumuga bw' uruhu rwera ni indwara y'uruhererekane nta muti ubaho wo kuyivura.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye Makuruki.rw yagiranye n' inzobere mu by' uruhererekane mu miryango, umwarimu muri kaminuza y' u Rwanda, ukora mu bitaro bya Kaminuza no bitaro bya gisirikare I Kanombe, Dr Mutesa Leon yasobanuye byinshyi binyanye n' ubumuga bw'uruhu.
Asobanura imvano y' uruhu rwera ku muntu utari umuzungu, Dr Mutesa yagize ati: "Uruhu rwacu rufite uturemangingo twitwa melanosite dukora ibyitwa melanosome.
Izo melanosome ni zo zituma umuntu asa uko asa, yaba inzobe cyangwa igikara.
Noneho hari n'ibindi nakwita ko ari nk'imisemburo (Anzyme tyrosinase) ituma za melanosite zikora melanosome.
Ku muntu rero iyo tyrosinase iba idakora cyangwa itanahari bigatuma umuntu aguma yera cyane, mbese nta bara uruhu rwe ruba rufite."
Makuruki imubajije impamvu umuntu avuka mu bandi akagira uruhu rutandukanye n' urwa bagenzi, yavuze ko kugira ngo umuntu avukane ubu bumuga ari uko ababyeyi be bombi baba bari bafite uturemangingo (gene) dufite ibibazo bakatumuhurizaho.
Yagize ati : "Mu mu biri w' umuntu habamo uturemangingo bita Chromosomes, umuntu agira chromosome 46, muri chromosome habamo utundi turemangingo bita gene two tuba ari twinshi turenga miliyoni 30.
Buri gene igira umumaro wayo, birumvikana ko harimo n' izishinzwe gutanga ibara ry' uruhu."
Yakomeje avuga ko kugira ngo gene ikore ari uko igomba kuba idafite ubusembwa, agaragaza ko hari igihe umuntu aba afite gene nzima n' izifite ikibazo, akavuga ko iyo bimeze gutya bitagaragara ku ruhu ariko uyu muntu aba afite ibyago byo kubyara nyamweru.
Yagize ati: " Mu gihe cy' irekurwa ry' itanga, umugabo n' umugore buri wese atanga chromosomes 23 n' undi agatanga 23, iyo umugore muri chromosome yatanze harimo gene ifite ubusembwa n' umugabo bikaba uko, babyara umwana ufite ubumuga bw' uruhu rwera."
Yavuze kandi ko iyo Umugore n' umugabo bafite gene nzima n' izifite ubusembwa, baba bafite amahirwe yo kubyara abana bafite ubumuga bw' uruhu n'abadafite ikibazo.
Muganga Dr Mutesa Leon inzobere mu buvuzi bw' indwara z' uruhererekane Dr Mutesa yagize ati: "Iyo umugore n' umugabo bashakanye bombi muri gene zabo harimo inzima n' izifite ubusembwa, baba bafite ibyago bingana na 25% byo kubyara nyamweru, 50% byo kubyara abana bameze nkabo.
Abafite gene nzima n' izifite ubusembwa ni amahirwe angana na 25% yo kubyara abana bazima."
Hari uburyo bushoboka igihe abashakanye bombi bafite gene nzima n' izifite ubusembwa bakabyara abana badafite ikibazo Dr Mutesa avuga ko bumwe mu buryo bwakoreshwa, abaganga bashobora gufata intanga z' umugore n' iz' umugabo bagatoranyamo intanga zifite gene zidafite inenge bakazihuriza muri laboratoire bakazitera mu mugore agatwita akazabyara umwana udafite ikibazo.
Uyu muganga yavuze ko uretse kuba izuba ryinshi rituma uruhu rwabo rukanyarara bikaba byabaviramo kurwara kanseri y' uruhu no kuba amaso yabo atitira iyo bari ahantu hari urumuri rwinshi, ngo haniiyongeraho n'umusatsi wabo ushobora gutuma barwara ibihushi, nta kibazo cy' ubwenge buke baba bafite.
Dr Mutesa yasabye abantu kwirinda guhohotera no guheza ababana n'ubumuga bw' uruhu kuko ari abantu nk' abandi.
Muri Afurika umuntu umwe mu bantu bari hagati ya 5000 na 15 000 aba abana n' ubumuga bw' uruhu (nyamweru), ku mugabane wa Afurika, Tanzaniya ni cyo gihugu gifite abantu benshi babana n' ubu bumuga aho umuntu umwe mu bantu 1 000 aba abana nabwo.
