#10627#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/amazina/article/ntirandekura-izina-ry-umuntu-warokotse-byinshi
Ntirandekura, izina ry’umuntu warokotse byinshi Ntirandekura ni izina ry’irigenurano rihabwa abana b’abahungu n’abakobwa, hagaragazwa ko urimwise cyangwa uryiswe akirinzwe n’Imana.
Ntirandekura ni umuntu wahuye n’ibyago byinshi byashoboraga kuba byahitana ubuzima bwe ariko Imana igakinga ukuboko , mbese aba yarasimbutse impfu nyinshi.
Ni izina umubyeyi yita umwana agaragaza ko Imana yamuhagazeho yaba ari we ubwe cyangwa uwo mwana.
Aba ashaka kubwira abanzi be ko atariheba, agifite amahirwe menshi yo kubaho.
Kwita umwana Ntirandekura ni ukugaragaza ko Imana ikikurinze cyangwa se ikirinze umwana wawe.
Ibi bisobanuro byatanzwe n’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco

#10642#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/amadini/article/itorero-assemblee-de-dieu-ryatangije-gahunda-ya-girinka-pasiteri
Itorero Assemblée de Dieu ryatangije gahunda ya ‘Girinka Pasiteri’ Nyuma yo kubona ko bamwe mu bapasiteri bo mu Itorero Assemblée de Dieu badafite ubushobozi bwo kwigurira inka zo korora, ubuyobozi bwaryo bugiye gutangiza gahunda ya ‘Girinka Pasiteri’.
Iyi gahunda yiyongera mu yindi ya Girinka munyarwanda leta yatangije mu 2006 igamije kurandura imirire mibi no kongera umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi.
Ubuyobozi bw’Itorero Assemblée de Dieu, buvuga ko gahunda ya Girinka Pasiteri bwayitangije nyuma yo kubona ko bamwe muri bo badafite ubushobozi bwo kwigurira inka zo korora, by’umwihariko abo mu duce tw’icyaro.
Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa Mbere, Umuvugizi w’iri torero, Pasiteri Kabandana Clever yagize ati “Naritegereje nsanga ubuzima bw’abashumba atari bwiza, ndavuga nti uwabunganira akabaha inka.
Burya iyo umuntu afite inka aba afite byinshi, iyo afite umurima aba abonye ifumbire, abona amata yo kunywa kandi akabona n’ayo kugurisha, wagira na biogaz.
” Gahunda ya ‘Girinka Pasiteri’ izatangizwa ku wa Gatatu mu Karere ka Nyagatare, aho ku ikubitiro hazatangwa inyana 22.
Uyihabwa ntaba yemerewe kuyigurisha, ahubwo izajya ibyara, yoroze mugenzi we.
Pasiteri Kabandana yakomeje ati “Twebwe ntabwo duhemba abapasiteri bacu, bahembwa n’amatorero bayoboye, ninako Bibiliya ivuga, umuntu akama izo yaragiye.
Amatorero yo mu cyaro rero kubera ko abayoboke aba ari bacye, usanga n’ubushobozi ari bucye ku buryo hari utabasha kwigurira inka yo korora.”
Umushumba w’iri torero muri Kabarore mu Karere ka Nyagatare, Pasiteri Karamage Paul, umwe mu bazahabwa inka, avuga ko ari igitangaza Imana imukoreye.
Ati “Nta nka nari nsanzwe mfite.
Nubwo twitwa ko dutuye mu Mutara siko twese dufite ubushobozi bwo kuba tworoye inka.
Igikorwa abayobozi bacu batekereje nagishimye cyane, muri make ni igitangaza Imana idukoreye.
” Yavuze ko agomba kuzayorora neza ku buryo nibyara azoroza n’abandi bakirisitu.
Pasiteri Kabandana Clever, Umushumba w'Itorero Assemblée De Dieu mu Rwanda

#10665#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/ibirori-by-ilayidi-byimuriwe-kwa-kadhafi-kubera-umukino-wa-al-hilal-na-rayon
Ibirori by’Ilayidi byimuriwe ‘kwa Kadhafi’ kubera umukino wa Al-Hilal na Rayon Sports Ubuyobozi bukuru bw’Umuryango w’Abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RMC), bwamenyesheje bayisilamu bose ko ibirori byo kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wa Eid-el-Adhha uteganyijwe ku cyumweru, bitazabera kuri Stade ya Kigali nk’uko byari bisanzwe.
Uyu munsi mukuru uteganyijwe ku wa 11 Kanama 2019, uzabera Centre Culturel Islamique Nyamirambo ahazwi nko kwa Kadhafi, kubera ko Stade ya Kigali izaba iri mu myiteguro yo kwakira umukino wa Al-Hilal na Rayon Sport mu irushanwa rya CAF Champions League.
Amabwiriza y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika, CAF, avuga ko Stade itagira ikindi kintu kiberamo mbere y’amasaha 48 ngo yakire umukino.
RMC yagize iti "Ubuyobozi bw’Umuryango wa RMC buboneyeho umwanya wo gutangariza Abayisilamu bose ko ibirori byo kwizihiza uwo munsi mukuru wa Eid-el-Adhuha ku rwego rw’igihugu bizabera kuri Centre Culturel Islamique Nyamirambo, bikazatangira guhera saa kumi n’ebyiri (6h00) za mu gitondo."
Minisiteri y’abakozi ba Leta n’Umurimo iheruka gutangaza bitewe nuko Eid Al-Adha izahuza n’impera z’icyumweru, ku wa Mbere tariki ya 12 Kanama 2019 uzaba Umunsi w’Ikiruhuko.
Uyu munsi wizihizwa mu gihe abayisilamu benshi baba barimo gusoza umutambagiro mutagatifu i Mecca.
Abayisilamu 84 baheruka kurira indege bava mu Rwanda bagana muri uwo murwa mutagatifu, mu rugendo nyobokamana.
Eid Al-Adha ni umunsi wa kabiri ari nawo ukomeye muri ibiri yemerwa nk’ikiruhuko mu Idini ya Islam, nyuma ya Eid al-Fitr.
Mu kwibuka igitambo cya Aburahamu, itungo ritangwaho igitambo bibarwa ko riba rikwiye gusangirwa hagati y’abatanga igitambo, abakene ndetse n’inshuti.
Ku munsi mukuru abayisilamu mu Rwanda bakunze guhurira mu isengesho muri Stade ya Kigali

#10670#	5	politics	https://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/perezida-kagame-avuga-ko-nta-munyarwanda-uzongera-kwemera-ko-umutekano-uhungabana
Perezida Kagame avuga ko nta Munyarwanda uzongera kwemera ko umutekano uhungabana Perezida wa Repuburika Paul Kagame atangaza ko u Rwanda rumaze kugera kuri byinshi kandi byivugira ku buryo ntawe uzongera kwemera ko ibyagenzweho byangizwa n’abahungabanya umutekano.
Avuga ko n’ubwo hakiri intege nke z’ubushobozi, Abanyarwanda bazi na none uko bahangana n’ibibazo byabo kandi, bafite imbaraga kandi batatezuka ku ntego yo kwiteza imbere kuko ibimaze kugerwaho byivugira.
Urugero umukuru w’Igihugu yatanze ni ibikorwaremezo by’ubuzima birimo ibitaro amazi n’amashanyarazi no kwakira abashyitsi neza, hakaba n’ibindi bitagaragarira amaso bihindura imibereho myiza y’Abanyarwanda biri mu mitima y’abaturage.
Ibyo ngo byatumye Abanyarwanda bakomeza gutera intambwe uko imyaka iza indi igataha kugeza ubu icyizere hagati y’abayobozi n’abaturage ikaba imeze neza, mu myumvire myiza no guhanga udushya no guharanira kwigira.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ishema ryo kubona amateka u Rwanda rwanditse ritera Abanyarwanda kwiyukaba kugeza no hanze y’imbiri z’Igihugu, kandi icyizere kuri bose kikaba ari cyo gitera imbaraga zo gukomeza gukora.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko Abanyarwanda bamaze kugera kuri byinshi kandi by’agaciro bagomba kurinda, ibyo bigasaba guhora bari maso, kwisuzuma no kuba inyangamugayo.
Yavuze kandi ko n’ubwo amajyambere yaba amaze imyaka myinshi igera no mu 100 ashobora guhanagurika mu mwanya muto kandi ko hari ingero mu bihugu byinshi byagaragayemo kandi byari byarateye imbere.
Agira ati “Abanyarwanda twiteguye kurinda ibyo twubatse nta kuzuyaza, kandi ntawe twiseguraho kimwe n’ibindi bihugu byose, u Rwanda rufite uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uburyo bwose bwemewe, mu guhangana n’ibitero byibasira abaturage bacu”.
Yongeraho ati “Igihe cyose bishoboka abashaka kuduhungabanyiriza amahoro bazajya bashyikirizwa ubutabera kandi kugendera ku mategeko ni ingingo itagibwaho impaka”.
Yavuze ko ubu hari imanza ziri mu nkiko zo mu Rwanda ziburanisha bamwe bagize udutsiko tw’iterabwoba ritandukanye, ariko ugasanga hari bamwe muri bo bavuga ko bafashwe mu buryo budakurikije amategeko.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ntawe uzongera kwemera ko Ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda buhungabanywa Perezida kagame yavuze ko Niba hari abibaza uko bamwe mu bahungabanyije umutekano w’u Rwanda bafashwe bagashyikirizwa ubutabera, ibyo byazasuzumwa ukwabyo kuko ikiruta ikindi ari ukubageza mu butabera, n’ubwo baba baraje mu bundi buryo.
Agira ati “Abanyarwanda baziko ko igihugu cyacu kidashobora kwemera ko ibikorwa nk’ibi by’iterabwoba bitazongera gukorerwa ku baturage bwacu, iyo umurongo uganisha ku bugizi bwa nabi urenze nabyo bigira umuti wabyo”.
Umukuru w’Igihugu avuga ko benshi mu bagize ayo matsinda y’ubugizi bwa nabi batekereza ko bazagira agaciro mu mahanga ari uko bahungabanyije ubukungu bw’igihugu bakanica abaturage, ibyo bikaba bibabaje n’ubwo bisa n’aho uwo mugambi wabo bawugezeho.
Agira ati “Murabizi ko bamwe muri abo bantu bari hirya no hino baba bari ahantu bumva ko bafite amasomo menshi batwigisha ku bijyanye na demokarasi n’ubwisanzure n’ibindi byinshi bijyanye na Politi n’uburenganzira bw’abaturage”.
Perezida Kagame avuga ko usanga abahungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda bakingirwa ikibaba n’abanyobozi b’ibihugu bibabarengera bibabavugira byitwa ko ari abantu bashaka guhindura u Rwanda bakarugeza kuri rwa rwego igihugu kitarageraho.
Umukuru w’Igihugu avuga ko usanga n’ibihugu bicumbikiye abo bagizi ba nabi bitemera ko ari abagizi ba nabi koko.
Agira ati “Twabwiye abacumbikiye abo bagizi ba nabi ko ni abagizi ba nabi bishe abaturage, bibye, bakoze amabi menshi ariko ababacumbikiye bakadusubiza ko abo ari abantu batavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, kandi baharanira uburenganzira bw’abaturage”.
Nyamara ngo igitangaje ni uko bidafata igihe kinini ngo ukuri kumenyekane bamenye ukuri, kuko bamwe muri abo bagizi ba nabi usanga bafungiye muri ibyo bihugu bazira ko ari abagizi ba nabi hari n’ibimenyetso by’ibyaha bakoze ariko bagakomeza kuvuga ngo ni Perezida Kagame wohereza abantu bamukorera na ba maneko be ngo bakoreshe abo bantu.
Perezida kagame avuga ko hari abafatwa kubera ubugizi bwa nabi ariko ugasanga amahanga aribaza ngo abo bantu bageze mu butabera gute bafashwe bate, ariko nyamara ngo niba hari ibintu ubazwa n’ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda ugomba kubibazwa, kabone n’ubwo abo bacuti babo batabyumva.
Agira ati “Mperutse kubyumva ubwo hari umuntu wazanywe hano agakomeza kuvuga ngo ikibazo ni uburyo yageze aha aho kubazwa uko yakoranye n’abagizi ba nabi.
Umva rero nshuti zanjye mushobora kumbeshyera ibyo mushatse byose, za toni z’ibinyoma ariko ntacyo bizampinduraho nta n’icyo bizahindura kuri iki Gihugu, ibyo wakora byose uko wabikora kose ibyo ndabikubwiye”.
Perezida Kagame avuga ko abagizi ba nabi banihisha mu binyamakuru bakandika inkuru kubera aho baturuka hirya no hino ibyo bavuze bigafatwa nk’ukuri, gusa kubera aho bavukiye n’aho bakomoka ibyo bavuze byose bigafatwa nk’ukuri kandi ntacyo bihuriyeho n’ukuri uretse kuba uwo muntu aba avukira ahantu aha n’aha.
Avuga ko atazihangana abona ibinyoma bihinduka ukuri, inzirakarengane zigahinduka abanyabyaha, ibikorwa by’iterabwoba bigahinduka uburyo bwo guhangana muri Politiki noneho ibikorwa byo kubirwanya bikanengwa.
Agira ati.
“Twebwe twakwemera kunengwa bishingiye ku kuba turimo gukora ibyo tugomba gukora kuko tubyemera mu kurwanya ibyo bikorwa navuze bigamiie kutugirira nabi, ubu se koko abo ni bo bantu navuga ko bahagarariye indangagaciro tugenderaho, ibyo sibyo rwose ntabwo bikwiye”.
Ibyo Perezida Kagame yabivugiye mu muhango wo gutangiza gahunda zo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakoerewe Abatutsi mu 1994, kuri uyu wa Gtatu tariki 7 Mata 2021.

#10757#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/amadini/article/umumisiyoneri-wo-muri-espagne-yaguye-mu-rwanda-nyuma-y-imyaka-40-ahakorera
Umumisiyoneri wo muri Espagne yaguye mu Rwanda nyuma y’imyaka 40 ahakorera Rosa Dilmé Brugada, Umumisiyoneri ukomoka muri Espagne wari umaze imyaka 43 akora ibikorwa by’urukundo i Ruli mu Karere ka Gakenke yitabye Imana azize uburwayi.
Rosa Dilmé Brugada wavutse ku wa 15 Gicurasi 1933, yitabye Imana ku wa 30 Kanama 2017.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere Impuzamiryango y’abamisiyoneri boherejwe na Papa (Pontifical Mission Societies, PMO) yatangaje ko uyu mumisiyoneri wari uzwi ku kazina ka Mama Rosa yakoraga ibikorwa byo kwita ku batagira kivugira.
Urubuga Lavanguardia rwanditse ko uwo mubyeyi yaharaniraga ko imishinga y’abatishoboye ihera ku batagira kivugira.
Kubera uko kwita ku batishoboye, umwaka ushize yabiherewe igihembo kizwi nka Banyoli de l’Any ku nshuro yacyo ya munani.
Umuryango PMO watangaje ko ubwo intumwa zawo ziheruka mu Rwanda muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, zagize amahirwe yo kuganira na Brugada.
Bagize bati “Yari umuntu udasanzwe, umunyamurava kandi ufasha abandi.Nyuma gato y’uruzinduko rwacu, twumvise ko yarwaye cyane.”
Uwo muryango washimye akazi keza Brugada yakoze mu butumwa yari amazemo igihe mu Rwanda ndetse unihanganisha umuryango we.
Rosa Dilmé Brugada, Umumisiyoneri ukomoka muri Espagne wari umaze imyaka 43 akora ibikorwa by’urukundo mu Rwanda Rosa Dilmé Brugada yitabye Imana afite imyaka 84 y'amavuko Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda yasezeye mu cyubahiro Rosa Dilmé Brugada

#10760#	0	entertainment	https://www.igihe.com/imyidagaduro/article/miss-umwiza-phionah-yakozwe-ku-mutima-n-abana-bafite-ubumuga-bwo-mu-mutwe
Miss Umwiza Phionah yakozwe ku mutima n’abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe yiyemeza kubavuganira Miss Umwiza Phionah wabaye igisonga cya mbere cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2020, kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 13 Ugushyingo 2020 yasuye ikigo cya AVEH Umurerwa (Association des Volontaires pour assistance aux enfants Handicape) gifasha abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe giherereye mu Karere ka Bugesera mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba.
Mu rugendo yahagiriye, uyu mukobwa yaganirijwe ibikorwa by’iki kigo, atemberezwa ahabera ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo kwita kuri aba bana.
Miss Umwiza wakozwe ku mutima n’aba bana, yashimiye ababyeyi bashinze iki kigo ahita yiyemeza kugikorera ubuvugizi.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Miss Umwiza yagize ati ”Ni ukuri nakozwe ku mutima n’aba bana, birababaje nitwe bo kubitaho.”
Uyu mukobwa yavuze ko agiye gufasha iki kigo uko ashoboye kose, yaba mu buryo bw’amikoro ndetse no mu kubakorera ubuvugizi.
Yasabye buri wese kugira umutima ufasha kandi bakita ku batishoboye, ati” Nanjye sinarinzi ko iki kigo kibaho, ndashimira aba babyeyi babashije kugishinga, bakwiye gushyigikirwa, buri wese yagira uruhare mu kugira ngo babeho neza.”
Urugendo rw’uyu mukobwa muri iki kigo rwashimwe bikomeye n’umuyobozi wungirije w’iki kigo Umunyana Cécile.
Uyu mubyeyi yashimye Miss Umwiza Phionah ku bw’igitekerezo yagize cyo kubasura akanabashyigikira.
Umunyana yavuze ko ari iby’agaciro kuba Igisonga cya mbere cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yasuye iki kigo, kuko ari ijwi rishobora kubagirira akamaro.
Yasabye buri wese wabasha gufasha cyangwa gukorera ubuvugizi abana barererwa muri iki kigo kubikora, kuko bakenera byinshi kandi birenze ubushobozi bw’abagishinze.
Miss Umwiza Phionah yasuye iki kigo abashyiriye ibikoresho by’isuku birimo amasabune ndetse n’impapuro zo mu bwiherero.
Ibi ni bimwe mu bikoresho nkenerwa cyane muri iki kigo kuko abana bakirererwamo, bahora biyanduza kubera ko 90% baba batazi kwijyana mu bwiherero.
Ikigo AVEH Umurerwa cyatangiye mu 2005, gitangizwa n’itsinda ry’ababyeyi bari biyemeje gufasha abana bafite ubumuga ku gitekerezo cy’umubyeyi witwa Umunyana Cécile.
Kuri ubu gifasha abana 122 barimo 20 baba mu kigo.
Cyatangijwe n’ababyeyi 17 gusa ubu hasigaye icyenda bonyine kuko harimo abaje kubireka bitewe n’impamvu zitandukanye n’abitabye Imana.
Cyita ku bana mu buryo butatu; ku buzima bwabo, imibereho myiza ndetse n’uburezi.
Ni ikigo gishingiye ku kwitanga kw’abagishinze hakiyongeraho ubufasha bahabwa n’abagiraneza batandukanye ndetse na Leta ibagenera miliyoni eshatu mu mwaka.
Umunyana yavuze ko bafite umwarimu ubigisha ndetse bakagira n’ababitaho mu buryo bw’ubuvuzi cyane ko hari abo ubumuga bwo mu mutwe butera ubundi bw’ingingo.
Muri aba bana 20 baba mu kigo, Umunyana avuga ko hari umwana w’imyaka irenga 30 batangiranye iki kigo ndetse akaba ari nawe ukimazemo igihe kurusha abandi.
Iki kigo kimaze kwakira abana 57 bagiye basubira mu miryango yabo nyuma yo kugaragaza impinduka ku buzima bwabo.
Uyu mubyeyi yasabye ababeyi muri rusange bafite abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe kugerageza kubitaho aho kubafata nabi.

#10761#	0	entertainment	https://www.igihe.com/imyidagaduro/muzika/article/impano-zitangaje-mu-muziki-ku-ndirimbo-ya-mbere-vestine-dorcas-bakoze-ku-mitima
Impano zitangaje mu muziki: Ku ndirimbo ya mbere, Vestine & Dorcas bakoze ku mitima ya benshi Ni abana mu myaka, ariko mu mirimbire barakuze!
Bafite amajwi atangaje yanyuze benshi babakundiraga gusubiramo indirimbo z’abandi, bihumira ku mirari ubwo bashyiraga hanze indirimbo yabo ya mbere.
Ishimwe Vestine na Kamikazi Dorcas ni abavandimwe babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Musanze, biyemeje kuririmbira Imana mu myaka y’ubuto bwabo kugeza imvi zibaye uruyenzi.
Bafite ubuhanga buhambaye ku buryo babasha guhuza ibyo baririmba n’amarangamutima, bakagera n’aho basuka amarira, maze ab’imitima yoroshye kwiyumanganya bikanga.
Aba bana bashyize hanze indirimbo yabo ya mbere bise ‘Nahawe Ijambo’, irimo ubutumwa buvuga ku muntu wahuye n’ibigeragezo ariko akaza gutabarwa n’Imana, akaba ayishima mu buryo bukomeye.
Mu gitero cyayo cya mbere hari aho baririmba bati “Urugamba rugeze mu mahina, warurwanye uruhereye mu mizi, iminwa y’abadukwenaga warayicecekesheje uravuga.
Nanjye nahawe ijambo kuko byemewe na Nyir’ijambo.
Umutima wanjye wawujuje amashimwe, akanwa kanjye nako ukuzuza indirimbo, aho byari bigoye waratabaye, warakoze Mwami.”
Hari n’ahandi baririmba bagaragaza ko “amenyo yari ay’abasetsi warayankijije uransetsa, imbaraga zawe zangose no mu ishyamba ry’inzitane.”
Mu mashusho yayo hagaragaramo umwana wigunze kubera gutereranwa n’umugore umurera, umukoresha imirimo isa nk’uburetwa.
Mu bitekerezo byari bimaze gutangwa kuri iyi ndirimbo kuri YouTube bisaga 400, benshi bakozwe ku mitima.
Mukundwa Rosine yagize ati “Iyi ndirimbo iraruhura ikanafasha.
Aba bana bafite impano ni ukuri.
Imana ikomeze ibaremere ubuhamya bushya.”
Akaliza Murungi Sabrina we yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo yamurijije, ati “Uzi kuryoherwa n’indirimbo utarayisubiramo, utaranayirangiza, mbega byiza we!
Mwa bana mwe muhirwe kandi inganzo yanyu ntizazime.
Narize pe!
Ariko sinzi ikiri kundiza.”
Ishimwe Vestine Taricy yavutse tariki 2 Gashyantare 2004, ubu yiga mu mwaka wa Gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye.
Kamikazi Dorcas we yavutse ku wa 28 Kamena 2006.
Yiga mu mwaka wa kabiri w’amashuri yisumbuye, bombi bavuka kuri Uzamukunda Elizabeth na Nizeyimana Mazimpaka.
Bavuka ari batandatu mu rugo iwabo, harimo abakobwa bane n’abahungu babiri.
Baririmba muri Goshen Choir yi Musanze.
Batangiye kuririmba ku giti cyabo mu 2018, ariko ubu nibwo babashije gushyira hanze indirimbo yabo ya mbere.
Ubu bari gufashwa mu muziki na Murindahabi Irénée.
Bahuriye na Niyo Bosco mu mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ye yitwa M.
Irene Entertainment.
Iyi ndirimbo yabo ya mbere bise ‘Nahawe Ijambo’ yanditswe na Niyo Bosco uzwiho ubuhanga buhambaye mu kuririmba, kwandika no gucuranga.

Gisagara: Yahawe ishimwe kuko yinjije abantu benshi mu murenge Sacco Niyogakiza Aphrodise uyobora umudugudu w'Akagarama mu kagari ka Muyira mu murenge wa Kibilizi ho mu karere ka Gisagara yahembwe igare kubera ko yabaye indashyikirwa mu bikorwa biteza imbere abaturage harimo no kuba yarinjije abanyamuryango benshi muri Sacco mu gihembwe gishize.
Umudugudu urangwa n'abaturage bitabira gahunda zose za Leta zigamije kubateza imbere nk'uko umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'uyu murenge Innocent Kimonyo abivuga.
Niyogakiza Aphrodise umukuru w'umudugudu w'Akagarama yahembwe igare kuko yagaragaje ibikorwa by'indashyikirwa.
Umudugudu w'Akagarama witabiriye ubwisungane mu kwivuza ku kigereranyo cya 98%, ibikorwa by'umuhigo bihakorerwa usanga byaragezweho ku kigereranyo kirenga 100%, washoboye kwinjiza abanyamuryago benshi muri Sacco mu gihembwe gishize mu gihe abandi usaga bitwaza impamvu zitumvikana.
Niyogakiza Aphrodise avuga ko ibanga rye ari ukumva abaturage akabakemurira ibibazo, bityo nawe bakamwumva iyo agize icyo abagezaho.
Bwana Niyogakiza ati "kuko nzi ko nyobora abantu kandi bakuze ngerageza gusubiza ibyifuzo byabo mbakemurira ibibazo ntabashyizeho amananiza, ibi bikamfasha kubumvisha gahunda za Leta no kuzibacengezamo bakazitabira hatabayeho gusunikana".
Akomeza asobanura ko aho batabashije kugera ku 100% nko mu bwisungane mu kwivuza byatewe n'abantu bake batarabona ubushobozi ariko ko nacyo kizakemuka.
Club Nkundurwanda yigisha urubyiruko umukino wa karate mu murenge wa Kibirizi nayo yahembwe igare.
Ku bijyanye na Sacco avuga ko bitari byoroshye kubyumvisha abantu, ariko ko aho yagiye abegera akabamwira neza ibyiza byayo, uburyo iguriza umuntu akaba yakwiteza imbere benshi bemera kuyiyoboka kandi ngo ubu barabishima.
Uyu mugabo akomeza ashishikariza abandi bayobozi nkawe gukora bumva ko bakorera Igihugu cyabo nabo ubwabo.
Muri uwo muhango wo gutaha inyubako y'umurenge Sacco, kandi hahembwe Club Nkundurwanda yigisha urubyiruko umukino wa karate mu murenge wa Kibirizi, nayo yahembwe igare kuko yateje imbere imikino ngororamubiri muri uyu murenge.
Clarisse Umuhire

#10816#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/polisi-yahagurukiye-abakwiza-ibihuha-bakoresheje-imbuga-nkoranyambaga
Polisi yahagurukiye abakwiza ibihuha bakoresheje imbuga nkoranyambaga Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangiye kugeza mu bugenzacyaha abakwiza ibihuha bakoresheje imbuga nkoranyambaga nyamara birengagije ukuri.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera Tariki 12 Nyakanga 2020, uwitwa Hamuli Ruben ufite imyaka 26 yatawe muri yombi na Polisi y’u Rwanda akurikiranyweho kurenga ku mabwiriza yo kurwanya COVID-19 arimo kutambara agapfukamunwa.
Ku butumwa Hamuli yashyize ku rukuta rwa twitter ye, avuga ko yafashwe arengana kuko bamufashe aguze icyo kurya Polisi igahita imufata.
Yagize ati “Bishoboka bite ko umuntu gura ikintu muri superrnarche (iduka) yajya kukirya polisi ikamufata ngo amanuye agafukamunwa, bagushyira mu modoka ugasanga n’amategeko yo kwirinda #covid-19 atanakurikijwe mu modoka babajyanyemo, Coaster yuzuye.
Ibi ni Rubavu biri kubera @Rwandapolice”.
Polisi y’u Rwanda yahise imusubiza ko bagiye kubikurikirana.
Ubutumwa bwo kuri twitter ya Polisi bugira buti “Mwaramutse Hamuli, murakoze ku makuru mutanze, reka tuyakurikirane.
Gutwara abantu bigomba kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda #Covid-19”.
Nyuma y’ubu butumwa bwa Polisi, Hamuli yongeye gutanga ubundi butumwa asaba imbabazi ku byo yakoze.
Agira ati “Ndasaba imbabazi kuri iyi twitter natangaje ku manywa, no kwisegura ku nzego z’umutekano.
Ibyabaye ku manywa byatewe n’uburyo nitwaye bitari byiza”.
Hamuli yashyikirijwe urwego rw’ubugenzacyaha (RIB) ikorera muri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Gisenyi kugira ngo hakorwe iperereza.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda CP John Bosco Kabera avuga ko hari abafatirwa mu makosa bakajya kwandika ibitari byo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, kandi babibonye inshuro nyinshi bagerageza kwigisha ariko ntibicika ku buryo abazajya babifatirwamo bazajya bahanwa.
CP Kabera avuga ko kuba Polisi ihagarika umuntu atubahirije amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19 abantu badakwiye gukwiza ibihuha kuko bihanwa n’amategeko.
Itegeko no 60/2018 ryo ku wa 22/8/2018 ryerekeye gukumira no guhana ibyaha bikoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga ingingo ya 39, ivuga ko umuntu wese, ubizi, wifashishije mudasobwa cyangwa urusobe rwa mudasobwa, atangaza amakuru y’ibihuha ashobora guteza ubwoba, imvururu cyangwa ihohotera muri rubanda cyangwa ashobora gutuma umuntu atakarizwa icyizere, aba akoze icyaha.
Iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka itatu (3) ariko kitarenze imyaka itanu (5), n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi ya miliyoni imwe (1.000.000 FRW) ariko atarenze miliyoni eshatu (3.000.000 FRW).
MENYA UMWANDITSI Sylidio Sebuharara Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ sebuharara Reba inkuru zose nanditse ( 593 )

#10820#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/Isoko-ry-imigabane/article/uruganda-rw-icyayi-rwa-shagasha-rweguriwe-abikorera
Uruganda rw'icyayi rwa Shagasha rweguriwe abikorera Kuri uyu wa kane tariki 06/12/2012, uruganda rw'icyayi rwa Shagasha rweguriwe sosiyete y'ishoramari ya RTI (Rwanda Tea Investiment).
Ihererekanya bubasha hagati ryakozwe ya NEAB yari ifite urwo ruganda mu nshingano zayo na RTI yaruguze.
Agashya RTI ifite ni uko ifatanyije na company y'abahinzi b'icyayi STT (Shagasha Tea Trading) iyobowe na Karamaga Francois, aho ngo bazigishwa uburyo bugezweho bwo guhinga icyayi no kukibyaza umusaruro.
Bimwe mubikoresho bitunganyirizwamo icyayi.
Ikindi n'uko nyuma y'imyaka irindwi RTI imigabane yayo izayegurira abo bahinzi b'icyayi bibumbiye muri STT dore ko ngo bazaba barabigishije ubumenyi bwinshi.
RTI ifite 60% by'imigabane, STT ifite 30% naho Leta yasigaranye 10%.
Iyi sosiyete yaguze uruganda rwa Shagasha n'iyo mu Bwongereza ikaba iheruka no kugura uruganda rutunganya icyayi rya Murindi muri gahunda ya Leta yo kwegurira inganda abikorera.
Aho bapimira icyayi.
Muri uwo muhango w'ihererekanyabubasha, NEAB yari ihagarariwe n'umuyobozi mukuru wayo, Kanyankore Alexis naho ku ruhande rwa RTI hari David Knopp uyikuriye RTI muri Afrika ari kumwe na Sanjay Kumar uyikuriye mu Rwanda.
Musabwa Euphrem

#10827#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article15933.html
Kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka bisaba ingamba zihamye n’ubufatanye - Minisitiri Busingye Minisitiri w’Ubutabera akaba n’Intumwa Nkuru ya Leta, Johnston Busingye yavuze ko kurwanya no gukumira ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka bisaba ingamba zihamye n’ubufatanye buhoraho hagati ya Polisi zo mu bihugu byo muri aka karere ka Afurika y’i Burasirazuba ndetse no hanze yako.
Ibi yabivugiye mu nama y’Abaminisitiri bashinzwe Polisi mu bihugu by’ibinyamurwango by’Ihuriro ry’Abakuru ba Polisi mu bihugu bya Afurika y’i Burasirazuba (EAPCCO).
Iyi nama ibaye ku nshuro ya 17 ikaba yarabereye i Kampaka, muri Uganda mu cyumweru gishize.
Isozwa ryayo ryabanjirijwe n’imyiherero ibiri irimo uw’Abayobozi Bakuru ba Polisi mu bihugu 13 bigize EAPCCO; undi ukaba ari uw’abagize Inama Rusange ya EAPCCO ubaye ku nshuro ya 19; ukaba warayobowe na Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Uganda, Ruhakana Rugunda.
Mu bitabiriye uwo mwiherero wayobowe na Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Uganda harimo Abafatanyabikorwa ba EAPCCO barimo Abahagarariye Umuryango wa Polisi Mpuzamahanga (Interpol), Abahagarariye Umuryango wa Polisi Nyafurika (Afripol), Abahagarariye Umuryango wa Afurika y’i Burasirazuba (EAC), Abahagarariye amwe mu mashami y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye (ONU), n’Abahagarariye Ikigo gishinzwe kurwanya ikwirakwizwa ry’intwaro nyota n’izangushye muri aka karere (RECSA).
Mu ijambo rye, Minisitiri Busingye, usoje manda ye ku Buyobozi bw’Inama y’Abaminisiti bafite Polisi mu nshingano zabo mu bihugu by’ibinyamurwango by’Ihuriro ry’Abakuru ba Polisi mu bihugu bya Afurika y’i Burasirazuba (EAPCCO) yagize ati," Ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka bigira ingaruka ku iterambere n’umutekano muri rusange.
Nta gihugu gishobora kubirwanya ku giti cyacyo cyonyine kidafatanyije n’ibindi bihugu.
Imikoranire myiza hagati ya Polisi zo mu bihugu byo muri aka karere ndetse no hanze yako ikwiriye kurushaho gutezwa imbere hagamijwe gufatanya kurwanya ibyaha ndengamipaka."
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, Inspector General of Police (IGP) Emmanuel K.
Gasana, unacyuye igihe ku Buyobozi bwa EAPCCO yabwiye abari mu mwiherero w’Abayobozi Bakuru ba Polisi mu bihugu bigize uyu muryango ko EAPCCO ari urubuga rwiza rufatirwamo ingamba z’uburyo aka karere ka Afurika y’i Burasirazuba karushaho kurangwamo umutekano.
Abitabiriye umwiherero w’abagize Inama Rusange ya EAPCCO wabereye i Kampala mu cyumweru gishize baganiriye ku ngingo zitandukanye zirimo kurebera hamwe ibitera umutekano muke muri aka karere no ku Mugabane wa Afurika muri rusange n’uburyo Ikoranabuhanga ryarushaho gutezwa imbere no kurikoresha mu guhanahana amakuru atuma habaho ubufatanye bukomeye kandi buhoraho mu kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka.
Mu bindi baganiriyeho harimo guteza imbere imikoranire n’abafatanyabikorwa ba EAPCCO no kubaka ubushobozi bw’Umuryango wa Polisi Nyafurika (Afripol) umaze igihe gito ushinzwe.
Mu nyanzuro 12 yafatiwe mu Nama y’Abaminisitiri bafite Polisi mu nshingano zabo mu bihugu bigize EAPCCO harimo uwemerera Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo kuba Umunyamuryango wayo; iki gihugu kikaba kiyongereye kuri Uganda, Comoros, Ethiopia, Eritrea, Djibouti, Kenya, Sudan, Burundi, South Sudan, Seychelles, Somalia, Tanzania n’u Rwanda.
EAPCCO yashinzwe mu 1998.
Indi myanzuro yafatiwe muri uwo mwiherero ishingiye ahanini ku guteza imbere imikoranire hagati ya Polisi zo bihugu byo muri aka karere ka Afurika y’i Burasirazuba no kubaka ubushobozi bwazo biciye mu mahugurwa atandukanye hagamijwe kugira ngo izi nzego z’umutekano zigire ubumenyi buhagije mu kurwanya no gukumira ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka birimo iterabwoba n’icuruzwa ry’abantu.
Abitabiriye Inama Rusange ya EAPCCO yabaye ku nshuro ya 19 bashimye u Rwanda kuba rwaremeye ko Ikigo Ntangarugero mu kurwanya ibyaha bikorwa hifashishijwe Ikoranabuhanga cyubakwa i Kigaki; aho kizubakwa hakaba ndetse harashyizwe ibuye ry’ifatizo.
Inama Rusange ya EAPCCO ya 20 izabera muri Sudan.

#10832#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/amajyepfo-amacumbi-y-ibitaro-by-intara-azatuma-haboneka-abaganga-b-inzobere
Amajyepfo: Amacumbi y’ibitaro by’Intara azatuma haboneka abaganga b’inzobere Ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Amajyepfo buratangaza ko kubakira amacumbi abakozi b’Ibitaro by’Intara bya Kinazi bizareshaya abaganga n’inzobere kandi serivisi zihabwa abagana ibitaro zikarushaho kunoga.
Ibitaro bya Kinazi byaruzuye birakora ariko nta macumbi bifite ku bakozi Ibitaro bya Kinazi byashyizwe ku rwego rw’Intara kugira ngo byakire abafite uburwayi burenze ubushobozi bw’ibitaro by’uturere mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, ariko kutagira amacumbi bigatuma bitabona abaganga b’inzobere muri serivisi zo kuri urwo rwego kuko biri mu cyaro kandi nta macumbi y’abaganga bifite.
Ibitaro bya Kinazi byakira nibura abarwayi ibihumbi 240 ku mwaka mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo baturuka mu Ture twa Ruhango, Nyanza, Kamonyi ndetse na Muhanga, bikaba biri ku rwego rw’Intara aho abarwayi bakeneye serivisi zihariye bahoherezwa, ariko bikaba byari bifite ikibazo cy’amacumbi y’abakozi bigatuma abaganga b’inzobere batitabira kujya kubikoraho.
Umuyobzozi mukuru w’Ibitaro by’Intara bya Kinazi Dr.
Namanya William, avuga ko ibyo bitaro kugeza ubu bifite abaganga bavura mu buryo rusange 10 (General Practitioners) n’abaganga batanu b’inzobere (Specialists), mu gihe aba ba nyuma hakenewe nibura 12.
Dr.
Namanya avuga ko imwe mu mbogamizi zatumaga aba baganga bataza gukora i Kinazi ari imiterere y’ibitaro biri mu cyaro kandi nta macumbi yo ku rwego rw’abaganga ahari, bigatuma serivisi batanga zitanogera neza ababigana.
Ibitaro bifite inyubako zibereye ijisho Agira ati “Usibye ibikoresho bimwe na bimwe bitaraboneka n’abaganga badahagije, ibi bitaro biri ku rwego rw’Intara kandi biteganyijwe gutanga serivisi zagutse kandi zihariye kurusha izitangirwa ku bitaro by’uturere mu rwego rwo gufasaha abaturage b’Intara y’Amajyepfo”.
Arongera ati “Izi nyubako z’amacumbi zizakemura ikibazo cy’abakozi batahaga Nyanza, Rungo na Muhanga, bigatuma badatanga serivisi nziza kubera kutegera abarwayi, amacumbi niyuzura bizakemura icyo kibazo cy’abakozi kuko azaba ari hafi yabo”.
Nta gushidikanya ko amacumbi azarushaho gutuma ibitaro by’Intara bikora neza Guverineri w’Inta y’Amajyepfo Alice Kayitesi washyize ibuye ry’ifatizo ku nyubako z’amacumbi y’Ibitaro bya Kinazi, avuga ko kuba nta macumbi yari ahari byatumaga abaganga bakenewe batitabira kuza kuhakora kuko bigoye ntaho bafite bataha.
Guverineri Kayitesi avuga ko kubaka amacumbi bizatuma ibitaro byo ku rwego rw’Intara bitanga serivisi zinoze kurushaho Agira ati “Twagiraga ibibazo by’abaganga bahora bagera hano bagahita bahava kuko nta macumbi bagahora bashikagurika, bataha hirya no hino, wasangaga kandi kuhohereza abarwayi bidakorwa neza nubwo bahaza, ariko turifuza ko ibi bitaro bitanga serivisi nziza zirimo no kubaga ku buryo abaturage baza bakurikiye serivisi ku buryo batajya ahandi”.
Guverineri Kayitesi avuga ko inzu 23 zubatse mu buryo bw’inzu ebyiri muri imwe n’inzu enye muri imwe ari zo zigiye guhita zitangira kubakwa zikazatuzwamo abakozi b’ibitaro b’ingenzi barimo n’umuyobozi w’ibitaro, bikaba biteganyijwe ko azubakwa mu myaka itatu atwaye asaga miliyoni 270frw.
Agira ati “Ibi bitaro biri mu cyaro ku buryo ibikorwa remezo byo gucumbikira abaganga bitari bihagije kuko n’abashaka amacumbi baburaga aho bacumbika kuko n’abikorera batigeze batekereza kubaka amacumbi aberanye n’abaganga bo ku rwego rw’ibi bitaro, ubwo rero amacumbi niyuzura tuzarushaho guha abaturage serivisi zinoze”.
Abaganga bagiye gutuza kandi bakore neza kubera kubakirwa amacumbi Abaganga bakora ku bitaro bya Kinazi bemeza ko gukora bataha hanze y’ibitaro byatumaga badaha abaturage serivisi nziza uko bikwiye, kuko igihe bakenerewe batabashaga kuboneka kuko babaga batashye nko muri Nyanza na Muhanga, kandi akazi k’ubuvuzi katagira amasaha karangiriraho.
Sibomana Charles uhagarariye abaganga bo ku Bitaro by’Intara bya Kinazi, avuga ko akigera ku kazi mu myaka itatu ishize byamugoye kubona icumbi kandi yanabona inzu agasanga itajyanye n’imibereho y’umuganga.
Inyubako ziracyari nshya kandi zishobora kuzongerwa uko hakenerwa serivisi zitandukanye Agira ati “Kwa muganga akazi ni amasaha 24/24 usanga bigoye kuba umuntu atuye hirya no hino ku buryo no kumushakisha aho atuye habaye nk’ikibazo nijoro biba ikibazo, waba unahazi umuganga ntube wamenya izindi gahunda yafashe, kuko aba yibereyeho mu buzima utamenya ubwo ari bwo”.
Ati “Ibyo byabaga ikibazo kuri serivisi zihutirwa kuko n’iyo byasabaga ko imodoka ijya kumutwara byasabaga igihe kinini, ibaze nk’utuye Kigali cyangwa Huye agakora ataha wasangaga ataza no gukora hano kubera ko yakora ahomba agahitamo gukora hafi hari ubuzima bworoshye”.
Ibitaro bya Kinazi byubatswe ku mpano Perezida wa Repuburika Paul Kagame yageneye abatuye ku Mayaga bagorwaga no gushaka serivizi z’ububuzima kure, kutagira amacumbi y’abaganga b’inzobere bikabangamira serivisi ababigana bakenera.
Biteganyijwe ko nibura abaganga b’inzobere bakibura ngo serivisi z’Ibitaro by’Intara y’Amajyepfo bya Kinazi bikore neza bazaba bageze ku bitaro mbere y’ukwezi k’Ukuboza 2020, inyubako zikazakomeza kuboneka uko ubushobozi bugenda buboneka, ubu hakaba hatangiye imirimo yo gusiza ahazubakwa.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Ephrem Murindabigwi Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ murieph Reba inkuru zose nanditse ( 574 )

Mozambique: Abafite uruhara bibasiwe na ba rushimusi babakekaho gutanga ubukire Polisi yo muri Mozambique itangaza ko iri gukora iperereza ku kibazo cy’abantu bafite uruhara bari gushimutwa bakicwa, bagakoreshwa mu mihango y’ubupfumu.
Abantu bafite uruhara nk’uyu, muri Mozambique bari gushimutwa bakicwa Inkuru dukesha Clubofmozambique.com ivuga ko Polisi yo muri icyo gihugu yemeza ko hamaze kumenyekana nibura abantu babiri bafite uruhara bashimuswe mu turere tw’ahitwa Milange.
Muri icyo gihugu ngo uruhara barufata nk’ikimenyetso cy’ubukire.
Abashimuta abarufite ngo baba babashakaho bimwe mu bice by’imibiri yabo kugira ngo bitume nabo bagera ku bukire.
Miguel Caetano, umuvugizi wa Polisi ya Mozambique ikorera mu Ntara ya Zambezia, yagaragayemo iryo shimutwa, yemeje iby’ayo makuru.
Agira ati “Abantu bafite uruhara barashimuswe baricwa.
Ku makuru tumaze kumenya ni uko ababashimuta baba bashaka kubakoresha mu mihango y’ubupfumu nk’uko bikorerwa abafite ubumuga bw’uruhu.”
Akomeza avuga ko bamaze guta muri yombi umwe mu bakekwaho gushimuta umuntu ufite uruhara, amushakaho bimwe mu bice by’umubiri we.
Bahise bakora iperereza kugira ngo hamenyekane uri inyuma y’ibyo byose.
Agira ati “Turacyakora iperereza.
Hari abo turi gukeka bashobora kuba bari inyuma y’iryo shimuta, bakaba bakomoka muri Tanzania no muri Malawi.”
Ku itariki ya 18 Gicurasi 2017, nibwo umuntu ufite uruhara wa mbere yashimuswe.
Iryo shimutwa ry’abantu bafite uruhara rije ryiyongera ku ishimutwa ry’abafite ubumuga bw’uruhu naryo rimaze igihe rivugwa muri Mozambique.

Kizito Mihigo yataramiye i Nyamagabe ku isabukuru ye y’amavuko Umuhanzi Kizito Mihigo yataramiye abakirisitu bo mu Karere ka Nyamagabe, aho yagiyeyo yitabiriye ihuriro ry’urubyiruko Gatorika ku rwego rw’igihugu.
Ni ibirori byahuriranye n’isabukuru ye y’amavuko, aho yujuje imyaka 38.
Kizito Mihigo yavutse ku wa 25 Nyakanga 1981, avukira i Kibeho mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, ni mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Kizito yavuze ko yishimiye kwizihiriza isabukuru ye mu isengesho.
Ati "Iyi myaka 38 maze ku isi, yambereye ubuhamya bukomeye bw’urukundo rw’Imana."
Yakomeje avuga ko Imana yamubaye hafi mu bihe byose ariyo mpamvu yayigeneye umwanya ukomeye kuri uyu munsi, mbere y’inshuti, abavandimwe n’umubyeyi we.
Ati "Mu bihe bikomeye no mu bihe by’ibyishimo, Imana yangaragarije ko iri kumwe nanjye.
Sinzigera mbyibagirwa."
Uyu ni umwaka wo kurushaho kwiyubaka kuri Mihigo, kuko nyuma y’imyaka ine n’igice afungiwe ibyaha birimo kurema umutwe w’abagizi ba nabi, icyaha cy’ubugambanyi bwo kugiririra nabi ubutegetsi buriho ndetse n’icyaha cy’ubwoshye bwo kugiririra nabi Perezida wa Repubulika, ku wa 15 Nzeri 2018 nibwo yasohotse muri Gereza ya Mageragere, ku mbabazi yahawe na Perezida Kagame.
Uyu muhanzi yizihije isabukuru y’imyaka 38 nyuma yo gusohora indirimbo yo mu rurimi rw’Igifaransa yahimbye mu kwezi gushize, ayitura Papa Francis, umushumba wa Kiriziya Gatorika ku isi.

Sony yakoze Air Conditioner igendanwa mu ishati Uruganda rwa Sony rwakoze agakoresho kitwa ‘Reon Pocket’ kifashishwa mu kongera cyangwa kugabanya igipimo cy’ubushyuhe, gashobora kugendanwa mu mufuka w’ishati.
The Sun yanditse ko aka gakoresho kagenzurwa mu kongera cyangwa kugabanya ubushyuhe bitewe n’imiterere y’aho umuntu ageze hifashishijwe porogaramu ishyirwa muri telefone zigezweho [Smartphone], bigahana amakuru hifashishijwe Bluetooth.
Kugeza ubu ntabwo ako gakoresho kararangira ku buryo katangira gukoreshwa ariko biteganyijwe ko hamwe n’ishati kambarwamo bizaba bifite agaciro k’amadolari 130.
Wifashishije porogaramu ya telefoni ushobora kongera ubushyuhe cyangwa ukabugabanya bitewe n’icyo ukeneye.
Bivugwa ko aka gakoresho gashobora gutanga ubuhehere buri hasi ku gipimo cya -13°C cyangwa uburi hejuru kuri 8°C.
Gafite batiri ishyirwamo umuriro mu gihe cy’amasaha abiri, ukamaramo iminota 90.
Aka gakoresho kitezweho gufasha abantu mu gihe bageze mu bice bishyuha cyangwa bikonje cyane kurusha ibindi.
Sonny yatangaje ko izakagurisha mu Buyapani 2020, ariko ntiyasobanura niba kazagezwa mu bindi bihugu.
Aka gakoresho gashobora gutanga ubushyuhe cyangwa ubukonje Ugashyira mu mufuka w'ishati ugakoresha telefoni mu kugena ubushyuhe cyangwa ubukonje ushaka Gakorana na porogaramu ya telefoni [email protected]

Tumaini Byinshi yaririmbye ku bantu bajya mu nsengero imitima yibereye ahandi Umuhanzi mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Tumaini Byinshi yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Nafashe Umwanzuro’ irimo ubutumwa bugaruka ku bantu bajya mu nsengero ariko imitima yabo yibereye ahandi.
Uyu muhanzi w’umunyarwanda ukorera umuziki muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yashyize hanze iyi ndirimbo ‘Nafashe Umwanzuro’ nyuma y’uko yari asanzwe yarayikoze ariko aza kuyisubiramo ndetse ahita anayikorera amashusho yasohotse ku wa 21 Kamena 2020.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na UKWEZI, yavuze ko ubutumwa bukubiye muri iyi ndirimbo bwaje ubwo yari amaze iminsi mu masengesho ariko aza kwegerwa n’umukozi w’Imana amubwira ko n’ubwo abantu benshi baba baje mu nsengero ariko hari n’aba baje byo kurangiza umuhango.
Yagize ati “Ni ihishurirwa ryaje ubwo twari tumaze iminsi mumasengesho,maze nsinziye mbona abantu benshi bajya mu rusengero, maze umushumba umwe aranyegera arambwira ngo buriya abenshi baba baje by’umugenzo gusa ariko imitima yabo yibereye hanze.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Numva agahinda ntangira gusenga ngo "Mana manura ubutabazi" nkangutse ntangira gutekereza kukudasubira inyuma ngakomeza urugendo rw’i Siyoni.”
Reba hano amashusho y’indirimbo nshya ya Tumaini Byinshi Uyu muhanzi yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo ari imwe mu zigera ku munani zizaba zigize alubumu yifuza gukora ikarangirana n’uyu mwaka cyangwa mu ntangiro za 2021.
Tumaini Byinshi ni umugabo w’imyaka 28 y’amavuko akaba ari Umunyarwanda wavukiye mu gihugu cya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, aho yaje kwerekeza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2015.
Kuririmba yabitangiriye muri korali akiri umwana, arabikurana kuko yumvaga bimuguye neza.
Kuri ubu ni umwe mu bahanzi mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bahagaze bakunzwe haba mu Rwanda ndetse no mu banyarwanda baba mu mahanga.

Gatsinzi Emery wamamaye ku izina rya Riderman Riderman yigaga muri Kaminuza yigenga ya Kigali ULK, aho yigaga mu mwaka wa kabiri, mu bijyanye n’ubukerarugendo ndetse no kumenyekanisha ibikorwa.

Ni umudugudu uzaba ugizwe n’inyubako zakira ba mukerarugendo, uberamo ubucuruzi bugaragaza iby’umuco nyarwanda, ibibuga by’imyidagaduro, ubusitani bwiza burimo ibihangano by’umuco nyarwanda, amateka n’ibindi.
Vivendi Group igiye gukora uyu mushinga ni ikigo gikomeye cyo mu Bufaransa gishamikiye kuri Bolloré Holdings.
Gikora ibijyanye n’imyidagaduro, gifite televiziyo n’inzu itunganya filime ya Canal+ Group, inzu itunganya umuziki ya Universal Music Group, inzu y’ibitabo ya Editis, ikigo cy’itumanaho cya Havas, ikigo gikora imikino inyuranye cya Gameloft n’urubuga rushyirwaho amashusho rwa Dailymotion.
Ni umushinga uzubakwa ku butaka bwa hegitari 30.1, aho biteganywa ko uzatwara agera kuri miliyoni $40.
Nyuma y’isinywa ry’aya masezerano, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko bishimiye iri shoramari rishya rizatuma u Rwanda rugira ibintu binyuranye ruha ba mukerarugendo, hagamijwe ko urwo rwego rwinjiriza igihugu miliyoni $800 bitarenze umwaka wa 2024.
Ni intambwe ikomeye kandi ku rwego rw’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kwakira inama n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bigenda bibera mu Rwanda (MICE), bikomeje kwagurwa uko bwije n’uko bukeye.
Ati “Binyuze muri KCV, ibihumbi by’abanyarwanda bazabasha kubona imirimo myiza n’urubyiruko rukora mu bijyanye n’ubugeni rubone ubumenyi bushobora kurutunga ndetse rukanabusangiza abandi mu karere.
Dushimishijwe no kuba ari ishoramari rya mbere rya Vivendi muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.”
Ni umushinga Akamanzi ahamya ko uzatuma u Rwanda ruba igicumbi cy’imyidagaduro n’ibikorwa ndangamuco.
Icyemezo cy’ishoramari rya Vivendi Group mu Rwanda cyafashwe umwaka ushize, ubwo abashoramari barimo Perezida wa Bolloré Holdings, Cyrille Bolloré, basuraga u Rwanda muri Mutarama 2018 bari kumwe na Nicolas Sarkozy wayoboye u Bufaransa.
Bagiranye inama na RDB aho beretswe amahirwe atandukanye u Rwanda rufite yashorwamo imari arimo n’ibijyanye n’ubukerarugendo.
Vivendi Group izakoresha hagati ya miliyoni 3-4 z’amadolari ya Amerika mu cyiciro cya mbere cy’umushinga.
Biteganyijwe ko kizuzura mu mezi atandatu, kikazaba kirimo inzu igezweho yo kwerekaniramo sinema ifite imyanya 300, ahantu hashobora kubera ibitaramo hanze hakwakira abantu 15,000, ahantu ho gufatira amafunguro n’ahagenewe imikino y’abana.
Aho hantu kandi hazaba herekanirwa sinema inshuro 19 mu cyumweru, ibitaramo, amaserukiramuco, imyiherero n’inama.
Icyiciro cya kabiri kizakomereza ku mirimo y’icyiciro cya mbere.
Kizubakwamo studio ya Universal, icyumba cy’imikino (Escape games) n’ahantu haba imikino ya Gameloft mu ikoranabuhanga, ibibuga by’abana, utubari, restaurant na Canal Factory.
Canal Factory ni inzu ikomeye izaba itunganya umuziki n’amashusho arimo sinema n’ibiganiro bya televiziyo, ibikorwa byitezweho kuzamura impano z’abanyarwanda cyangwa abanyeshuri bifuza gukarishya ubumenyi mu gutunganya filime.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB, Clare Akamanzi ari kumwe n’uyobora Bollore Logistics, sosiyete ishamikiye kuri Vivendi, Roger Nkubito, nyuma y’isinywa ry’amasezerano Kigali Cultural Village yeguriye Vivendi iherereye ku i Rebero mu Mujyi wa Kigali

#11071#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Bugeshi-Imidugudu-ikora-ku-mipaka-yahawe-telefoni-zo-gutanga-amakuru
Bugeshi: Imidugudu ikora ku mipaka yahawe telefoni zo gutanga amakuru Imidugudu 15 yo mu murenge wa Bugeshi mu karere ka Rubavu yashyikirijwe telefoni zigendanwa mu rwego rwo kuborohereza akazi no kubafasha gutanga amakuru ku gihe cyane ko begereye igihugu cya Congo.
Ubwo ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Rubavu bwatangaga izi telefoni tariki 04/07/2013bwagaragaje ko abaturage begereye imipaka ari imboni z'igihugu, bamwe bakaba bafasha inzego z'umutekano mu kumenya uko umutekano uhagaze ku mipaka n'igihe hari icyo babonye kidasanzwe bakaba bakwihuta mu gutanga amakuru.
Ubuyobozi bw'ingabo bushyikiriza abaturage telefoni.
Abahawe izi telefoni babwiwe ko bazihawe kugira zibafashe mu gutanga amakuru cyane ko bajyaga bavuga ko hari igihe babona amakuru ariko bakabura uburyo bayatanga.
Umurenge wa Bugeshi, ni umwe mu mirenge y'akarere ka Rubavu ihana imbibe n'igihugu cya Congo zirimo n'ikirunga cya Nyiragongo abarwanyi ba FDLR banyuramo baza guhungabanya umutekano mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w'akarere wa ka Rubavu, Bahame Hassan, ahamagarira abaturage guhamagara abafite ababo bari muri FDLR kubashishikariza gutaha, kuza kwiyubakira igihugu no kuza kubaho neza kuko aho bari muri Congo batabayeho neza.
Bamwe mu baturage b'umurenge wa Bugeshi bari bitabiriye umunsi wo kwibohora.
Abaturage bafite ababo bari mu mashyamba ya Congo bashishikarizwa guhamagara ababo kuko hari ababatera ubwoba no kubaha amakuru atariyo kugira ngo bagume mu mashyamba nabo bigumanire imitungo yabo.
Sylidio Sebuharara

#11085#	4	health	https://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/udukingirizo-dutangwa-mu-rwanda-twaragabanyutse-cyane-mu-gihe-cya-guma-mu-rugo
Udukingirizo dutangwa mu Rwanda twaragabanyutse cyane mu gihe cya Guma mu Rugo Umuryango Mpuzamahanga ufasha kurwanya no gukumira agakoko gatera SIDA (AHF), watangaje ko mu gihe abaturarwanda bari bari mu rugo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, umubare w’udukingirizo dutangwa wagabanyutse cyane hafi kimwe cya kabiri.
Tariki 4 Gicurasi 2020, nibwo ibikorwa hirya no hino mu gihugu byasubukuwe nyuma y’iminsi 43 bari bamaze mu ngo zabo, bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Umuryango AHF uvuga ko mu gihe ibikorwa bindi byari byahagaze, n’umubare w’abafata udukingirizo wagabanyutse cyane kubera ko abantu batari bemerewe kuva mu ngo.
Umuyobozi wa AHF mu Rwanda, Dr Brenda Assiimwe Kateera kuri uyu wa Kane ubwo uwo muryango watangaa ibiribwa ku babana na virusi itera SIDA batishoboye n’abafite ibibazo by’imirire mibi, yavuze ko ingaruka za coronavirus zanageze ku bikorwa by’uwo muryango, by’umwihariko kuri gahunda yo gutanga udukingirizo nk’uburyo bwo kwirinda.
AHF ifite gahunda yo gutanga udukingirizo tugera kuri miliyoni enye muri uyu mwaka.
Dr Brenda avuga ko kugeza ubu bamaze gutanga utugera kuri miliyoni 1.8.
Yavuze ko ikibazo gikomeye cyabaye mu gihe cya Guma mu rugo kuko serivisi nyinshi zari zarahagaze ntibabone uko bakomeza kudutanga mu buryo bworoshye.
Yagize ati “Habayeho kugabanyuka ariko ntabwo ari cyane.
Byagabanyutse cyane cyane mu gihe cya Guma mu rugo, abantu bitabiriye kudufata bari bake ariko bafunguye duhita tubona imibare izamuka.
Bigaragara ko abantu badukeneye kandi badukoresha.”
Umuyobozi wa porogaramu yo kwirinda SIDA muri AHF, Nteziryayo Narcisse, yavuze ko impamvu abafata udukingirizo mu gihe cya Guma mu rugo babaye bake, ari uko abenshi batabashaga gutembera nk’ibisanzwe.
Ati “Udukingirizo twinshi twe twadutangaga nijoro kuko nibwo nk’abakora uburaya bakora cyane, akenshi usanga ku manywa baryamye.
Abantu benshi rero ntabwo babashije kudufata.
Mu dukingirizo twatangaga urebye twatanzeho nka kimwe cya kabiri kubera ko hari utundi twatangaga mu bukangurambaga, ubu ntabwo twabashije kudutanga ndetse na nijoro.”
Nteziryayo yavuze ko Guma mu rugo irangiye, abantu bafata udukingirizo biyongereye nubwo atari cyane nka mbere kuko saa tatu z’ijoro abaturage basabwa kuba bageze mu ngo.
Dr Assiimwe yavuze ko udukingirizo duhagije duhari ku buryo nta kibazo cy’ibura ryatwo bazagira.
Icyakora, yagaragaje impungenge z’abashobora gutwara inda zitateganyijwe cyangwa kwandura virusi itera SIDA muri ibi bihe, bakurikije imibare ituruka mu bindi bihugu.
Ati “Dukomeje gutanga n’ubutumwa ko abantu birinda virusi itera SIDA.
Impungenge dufite nuko abakobwa mu bindi bihugu harimo imibare igaragaza ko inda zitateguwe zigiye kwiyongera ariko turakomeza kubakangurira kwirinda inda zitateguwe no gukoresha udukingirizo n’ubundi buryo bwo kwirinda.”
Uretse AHF, udukingirizo mu Rwanda dutangwa na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima binyuze mu bigo nderabuzima ku bufatanye n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa.
AHF yatangaje ko umubare w'abafata udukingirizo wagabanyutse mu gihe cya Guma mu rugo AHF yatanze inkunga y'ibiribwa ku babana na virusi itera SIDA batishoboye kugira ngo bakomeze gufata imiti nta kibazo Dr Assiimwe yavuze ko udukingirizo duhagije duhari ku buryo nta kibazo cy’ibura ryatwo bazagira

RDC: Byemejwe ko amatora ya Perezida azaba kuwa 27 Ugushyingo 2016 Komisiyo y'amatora yigenga muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, CENI, kuri uyu wa Kane yatangaje ingengabihe y'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu ndetse n'izindi nzego aho yemeje ko gutora umukuru w'igihugu bizaba kuwa 27 Ugushyingo 2016.

#11099#	6	religion	http://www.makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article/Kwizera-kudafite-imirimo-kuba-gupfuye
Kwizera kudafite imirimo kuba gupfuye Mbanje kubasuhuza mbifiriza amahoro atangwa na Nyagasani.
Uyu munsi tugire kurebera hamwe ''Kwizera'', bibiriya itubwira neza ko kwizera konyine kudahagije iyo kudafite imirimo.
Yakobo 2: 14 17; haravuga ngo: "mbese bene Data, byavura iki niba umuntu avuga ko afite kwizera ariko nta mirimo?
Bene uko kwizera kwabasha kumukiza?
Cg se hagira mwese Data w' umugabo cg w' umugore wambaye ubusa, kandi akaba abuze ibyo kurya by' iminsi yose, maze umwe akamubwira ati "genda amahoro ususuruke uhage" ariko ntimumuhe ibyo umubiri ukennye byavura iki"?
Uko niko kwizera iyo kudafiye imirimo, ahubwo kuba gupfuye.
Haguruka ukoreshe kwizera kwawe kuko kwizera kudafite imirimo kuba gupfuye.
Ibyo utazakora ukiri ku isi ntawundi uzabigukorera kuko ntawe mumeze kimwe kdi imirimo myiza ukorera muri iyi si niyo izaguherekeza.

#11125#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/ibindi-bikoresho/article/ibintu-binengwa-ku-modoka-zo-mu-bwoko-bwa-maserati-zitaboneka-i-kigali
Ibinengwa ku modoka zo mu bwoko bwa ‘Maserati’ zitaboneka i Kigali Imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa ‘Quattroporte’ yakozwe n’uruganda rwa ‘Maserati’ imaze kwigarurira imitima y’abatari bake bakunda ibigezweho bitewe n’uko igaragara inyuma ndetse n’amateka ifite kuva mu myaka yo hambere.
Amateka y’uruganda rukora izi modoka zitagaragara ku butaka bw’u Rwanda ngo abaherwe b’i Kigali bazitemberemo, agaragaza ko rwatangiye kuzikora mu 1914, mu Mujyi wa Bologne mu Butaliyani.
Maserati yakoze ubwoko bw’imodoka butandukanye burimo Ghibli na 3500 GT zamamaye mu myaka ya 1960.
Uru ruganda ruheruka gushyira hanze ubwoko bushya bw’imodoka ya Quattroporte, igizwe n’imiryango ine, yatangiye kugera ikirenge mu cya Chevrolet yakoze iyitwa Malibu Maxx n’iya Audi yitwa A5 Sportback.
Mu nkundura yo guhanganira isoko ry’imodoka, Maserati ihanganye n’izindi kompanyi zirimo BMW yo mu Budage na Porsche Panamera.
Imodoka nshya ya Maserati Quattroporte yageze ku isoko mu 2016, igura amadolari ya Amerika ari hagati ya 110,600 na 147,300, akabakaba miliyoni 93 na 120 mu mafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Iyi modoka yashyizwe hanze ku nshuro ya gatandatu kuko ubwoko bwayo bwa mbere bwakozwe hagati ya 1963 na 1969.
Quattroporte ikoresha moteri y’ibitembo (cylindre) bikoze nk’inyuguti ya ‘V’ byose hamwe ari umunani, V8 [ibi bisobanuye ko nta modoka yitwa V8 ibaho nkuko abantu benshi bajya babyitiranya].
Yagize ibigwi bihambaye ndetse uyu mwaka byitezwe ko izagurisha izigera ku bihumbi 75, gusa abayikoresha bakomoje ku nenge ifite nk’uko bigaragara ku rutonde rw’ibintu umunani uruganda rwayikoze rwasabwe guhindura.
1.
Gusana ibigega bigabura ingufu zivuye muri moteri Ibigega bigabura ingufu ziturutse muri moteri kugira ngo imodoka ibashe kugenda bigaragaza ingufu nke, ku buryo kugenda ahaterera bitacyorohera iyi modoka kuko bisaba ko uyitwaye kongera umuriro cyane.
2.
Kuyinoza mu miterere Abayikoresha bavuga ko uko ikoze bidahuye n’uko ivugwa.
Imikorere yayo n’ingufu bavuga ko ifite ngo birahabanye.
3.
Kuyiha uburyo bwo kuyishitura Iyi modoka iyo umuntu agiye kuyishitura, bisaba gushyiramo ingufu nyinshi cyane kugira ngo ihaguruke, isubire inyuma cyangwa se igende.
Umwe mu bayikoresha avuga ko bitoroshye kubisobanura kuko hari igihe ajya kuyihagarika, ikaba isubiye inyuma cyangwa yaba ashaka gusubira inyuma, igahita igenda.
Ibi bituma asabwa kugira ubwitonzi kugira ngo atagira ibyo yangiza, ikaba impamvu yifuza ko byahinduka bikajya mu buryo buboneye.
4.
Kuvugurura ibyuma bifasha mu kuyobora imodoka N’ubwo bisa n’aho ari ikintu gito, ariko gukora urugendo rw’umunsi wose umuntu abangamiwe, kenshi bigira ingaruka ku mushoferi.
Umwe mu bakoresheje Quattroporte, bakanakoresha iyakozwe na BMW, yavuze ko ifite ibyuma bifasha mu kuyobora birebire ugereranije n’izindi.
Ibi bituma rimwe na rimwe intoki zishobora gukora ahatari ho mu gihe umushoferi agiye gucana itara ry’icyerekezo cyangwa guhanagura ibitonyanga by’amazi ku kirahuri cy’imbere.
5.
Kugabanya urusaku rwa moteri Urusaku rwa moteri ntirushobora na rimwe kugira uruhare mu kugaragaza imbaraga iyo moteri ifite.
Ibyifuzo bya bamwe byerekeye urusaku rwa za moteri z’imodoka bizakomeza kugira ishingiro, kuko n’ubundi hari inganda ziri kuzana imodoka zikoresha ikoranabuhanga cyangwa ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Haracyakoreshwa imodoka zifashisha ibikomoka kuri peteroli, ariko bigaragara ko zizagera aho zigacika mu rwego rwo kurengera ibidukikije bihumanywa n’imyotsi izi modoka zisohora.
6.
Kuyongeramo ibindi bikoresho bijyanye n’igihe Abakoresha Quattroporte bifuza ko yakongerwamo ahareberwa amashusho atandukanye ndetse n’umwanya uba hagati y’intebe, kuko ibirimo bitajyanye n’igihe.
Televiziyo yerekanirwaho amashusho irimo ngo bigaragara ko ari nto ugereranije n’iy’izindi modoka.
7.
Gukuramo igice gisa n’ikibyimbye giherereye aho ibirenge bihagarara Aho ibirenge bihagarara higiye hejuru, ku buryo amaguru adashobora gukwirwa aho yagenewe mu gihe umuntu atwaye iyi modoka.
Kuyitwara amasaha menshi biba bibangamye kuko bisaba umushoferi kwihengeka kugira ngo amaguru ase n’akwirwa aho yagenewe, kandi usanga bivunanye.
Abatwara izi modoka za Quattroporte, banavuga ko bibaye byiza intebe zazo zakorwa ku buryo ubishatse yajya azizamura cyangwa akazimanura mu gihe ashatse kwicara yigiye hasi.
Abazikoresha n’abandi bantu muri rusange, bizeye ko impungenge zabo zizahabwa agaciro izi modoka zimaze kwigarurira imitima ya benshi zikagira imikorere ivugwaho rumwe.
Quattroporte ikoresha moteri y’ibitembo (cylindre) bikoze nk’inyuguti ya ‘V’ byose hamwe ari umunani, V8 Iyi Maserati ni imwe mu modoka zigezweho muri iki gihe Abantu benshi banenga imiterere y'iyi modoka imbere aho umushoferi yicara Iyi modoka yashyizwe hanze ku nshuro ya gatandatu kuko ubwoko bwayo bwa mbere bwakozwe hagati ya 1963 na 1969

#11144#	1	sports	https://www.igihe.com/imikino/article/zabyaye-amahari-hagati-ya-ajspor-n-abanyamakuru-ba-radio-10
Zabyaye amahari hagati ya AJSPOR n’abanyamakuru ba Radio 10 Ishyirahamwe ry’Abanyamakuru ba Siporo mu Rwanda (AJSPOR) ryatangaje ko ryitandukanyije n’abanyamakuru bane bakorera Radio 10 kubera ko imikorere yabo itubahiriza amahame akwiye kubaranga nk’abanyamwuga mu itangazamakuru.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 22 Gashyantare 2021 ni bwo AJSPOR yashyize hanze itangazo rigenewe abanyamakuru, inenga imikorere ya bamwe mu bakorera Radio 10.
Yagize iti “Dusanze hari amakosa mu mwuga menshi yakozwe n’abanyamakuru ba Radio 10: Karenzi Samuel (umunyamuryango wa AJSPOR), Kalisa Bruno (umunyamuryango wa AJSPOR), Kazungu Claver (utari umunyamuryango wa AJSPOR) na Biganiro Antha (utari umunyamuryango wa AJSPOR) bihabanye n’amahame y’umwuga w’itangazamakuru mu Rwanda ndetse n’intego za AJSPOR by’umwihariko;” “Ku bw’iyo mpamvu, AJSPOR yitandukanyije n’imikorere idakurikiza amahame y’umwuga iranga aba banyamakuru kuko idahesha ishema AJSPOR ndetse AJSPOR ikibutsa ko mikorere itagombye kuyitirirwa.”
Bimwe mu byo AJSPOR yatangaje, yagendeyeho ifata iki icyemezo harimo inama yabaye ku wa 12 Ugushyingo 2020, yahuje inzego zitandukanye zifite aho zihuriye n’itangazamakuru rya siporo zirimo Minisports, RGB, OGS, RURA, MHC na RMC.
Yakomeje ivuga ko “Abitabiriye iyi nama banenze imikorere y’itangazamakuru rya siporo bakagaruka ku mvugo zidakwiriye zakoreshejwe mu itangazamakuru rya Siporo.”
Iri shyirahamwe rigizwe n’abanyamakuru ba siporo basaga 100 ryavuze ko ibyatangarijwe muri iyi nama nyunguranabitekerezo byagarutse ku byavuzwe n’igitangazamakuru cya Radio 10, akaba ari byo byatumye umwe mu bakinnyi bagombaga gufasha Ikipe y’Igihugu y’umupira w’amaguru [Kévin Monnet-Paquet] ataboneka.
Ryavuze ko kandi ryashingiye ku nama Urwego rw’abanyamakuru bigenzura (RMC) rwagiranye n’abanyamakuru ba siporo ku wa 3 Ukuboza 2020, ikagaruka ku makosa y’umwuga yagiye agaragara cyane mu gitangazamakuru cya Radio arimo “kudatandukanya ibiketerezo bwite bw’umunyamakuru n’ibimenyetso bifatika, kubogama no guhengamira ku ruhande rumwe, gukwirakwiza ibihuha, gukoresha imvugo isesereza inibasira bamwe n’ibindi.”
Raporo ya RMC, IGIHE yabonye, ivuga ko uburyo abanyamakuru ba Radio 10 bitwaye mu bibazo bya Rayon Sports biheruka gukemurwa n’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Imiyoborere (RGB) budakwiye kuko habayeho guhengamira ku ruhande rumwe hagati ya Munyakazi Sadate na Muvunyi Paul.
Ishyirahamwe ry’Abanyamakuru ba Siporo ryakomeje rivuga ko ryashingiye ku myanzuro y’iyo nama yanzuye ko amakosa yakozwe agomba gukosorwa hagamijwe gukora itangazamakuru ryubaka imikino mu Rwanda, ku kuba ryarakomeje guhwitura abanyamakuru bagarutsweho no ku birego byatanzwe na Munyakazi Sadate [wahoze ayobora Rayon Sports] na Ntwalindwa Théodore [wari Visi Perezida wa Kiyovu Sports] ku wa 19 Kanama no ku wa 23 Ugushyingo 2020.
Hashingiwe kandi ku ngingo ya kane y’amategeko shingiro ya AJSPOR ivuga ko intego nyamukuru z’ishyirahamwe ari uguteza imbere siporo binyuze mu itangazamakuru, hanashingirwa ku mutwe wa mbere w’ingingo ya kabiri y’amahame ngengamyitwarire y’umwuga w’itangazamakuru mu Rwanda.
Iyi ngingo ivuga ko “Umunyamakuru yirinda ibinyoma, ko afite inshingano yo gutangaza uko ibintu byagenze, agashakisha ukuri, kandi azirikana rubanda rufite uburenganzira bwo guhabwa amakuru y’impano (…) agomba kumenya ko guharabika, gutukana, gusebanya no gushinja ibinyoma yaba abantu, amatsinda, amasosiyete y’ubucuruzi, amashyirahamwe, imiryango cyangwa ibihugu ari amakosa akomeye y’umwuga.”
Mu kiganiro 10 Sports cyiswe Urukiko, Karenzi Sam yavuze ko we na bagenzi be, bose bitandukanyije na AJSPOR ndetse bazakomeza umurongo bakoreramo kuko bagamije gukosora byinshi bigenda nabi muri Siporo.
Yagize ati “Njyewe ndi umunyamakuru wa siporo, guhera uyu munsi si ndi umunyamuryango wa AJSPOR.
Icya kabiri, ndagira ngo mbwire ASPOR, Abanyarwanda bose bumva, mu izina ry’uhagarariye ishami ry’imikino kuri Radio 10, twitandukanyije na AJSPOR ku mugaragaro n’imikorere idahwitse ya ASPOR, n’urwango n’ishyari biri muri AJSPOR.”
Impande zombi zafashe iyi myanzuro nyuma y’uko mu minsi ishize, aba banyamakuru ba Radio 10 bumvikanye bavuga ko hari abanyamuryango ba AJSPOR basabwe n’abari bayoboye delegasiyo y’u Rwanda muri CHAN 2020 yabereye muri Cameroun, kugira ngo bajye ku ruhande rwabo ubwo basobanuraga uko urwo rugendo rwavugishije benshi rwagenze.
Ishyirahamwe ry'abanyamakuru ba siporo mu Rwanda (AJSPOR) ryitandukanyije n'imikorere ya bane bakorera Radio 10 Karenzi Sam (iburyo) uyobora ishami rya siporo kuri Radio 10, yavuze ko na bo bitandukanyije na AJSPOR

Cassien Ntamuhanga n’abandi bagabo babiri batorotse Gereza Cassien Ntamuhanga wareganwe hamwe na Kizito Mihigo agakatirwa gufungwa imyaka 25, Sibomana Kirege wari warakatiwe imyaka 20 na Tambirije Théogène wari warakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 16 batorotse gereza ya Nyanza.
Aba bagabo batorotse mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa 30 Ukwakira 2017 nkuko umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Imfungwa n’Abagororwa ,RCS, CIP Sengabo Hillary yabitangaje.
CIP Sengabo yavuze ko aba bagororwa mu gutoroka bakoresheje imigozi bakurira urukuta rwa gereza bakabasha gusimbuka urukuta nta mucungagereza ubabonye.
Abacungagereza ngo babonye ibimenyetso byo gutoroka kw’aba bagororwa nyuma yo kubona imigozi inaganitse ku rukuta rw’igihome cya gereza.
Cassien Ntamuhanga ahuje dosiye na Jean Paul Dukuzumuremyi, Agnes Niyibizi na Kizito Mihigo.
Ntamuhanga wakoraga kuri radiyo Ubuntu butangaje yari yarakatiwe igifungo cy’imyaka 25 ku byaha birimo icyo kugambirira kugirira nabi umukuru w’igihugu, kurema umutwe w’abagizi ba nabi no gucura umugambi w’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba.
Sibomana Kirege watorokanye na we yari yarakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 20 azira icyaha cy’ubuhotozi naho Tambirije Théogène wari warahamijwe icyaha cyo gufata ku ngufu yari yarakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 16.
Kizito waregwaha hamwe na Ntamuhanga we yakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 10, Ntamuhanga Cassien akatirwa gufungwa imyaka 25 naho Jean Paul imyaka 30 mu gihe Agnes Niyibizi we yagizwe umwere ku byaha yashinjwaga.

#11186#	5	politics	http://igihe.com/politiki/article/kuva-mu-ishuri-winjira-mu-nteko-amateka-kuri-imaniriho-umudepite-muto-mu-rwanda
Kuva mu ishuri winjira mu Nteko: Amateka kuri Imaniriho, umudepite muto mu Rwanda Ibyishimo biracyari byose kuri Maniriho Clarisse w’imyaka 23 y’amavuko, uheruka kwemezwa nk’umwe mu badepite babiri bahagarariye urubyiruko, bategereje kurahirira kwinjira mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda.
Muri iyi manda ya kane y’Umutwe w’Abadepite nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Imaniriho wazamukiye ku itike y’ urubyiruko, ni we uzaba ari muto mu myaka kuko yavutse mu 1995.
Mu badepite 80 bose hamwe, umukuru mu myaka azaba ari Rwigamba Fidèle w’imyaka 68 uri ku rutonde rw’abadepite 40 ba FPR Inkotanyi.
Uyu asanzwe mu Nteko.
Imaniriho aracyari ingaragu, avuka mu Murenge wa Bwishyura mu Karere ka Karongi, aho umuryango we utuye.
Ni bucura mu muryango w’abana bane barerwa na nyina gusa kuko ari we mubyeyi basigaranye.
Afite impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya kabiri cya kaminuza mu by’Ubuhinzi n’Ubukungu yabonye umwaka ushize, kuko aribwo yarangije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro kigufi yagiranye na IGIHE, Imaniriho yagaragaje ko yanejejwe n’intsinzi yo kuzajya guhagararira urubyiruko mu Nteko, aho yabonye amajwi 52.9%.
Avuga ko yiteguye gufatanya na bagenzi be gutora amategeko abereye Abanyarwanda no gukurikirana uko gahunda za Guverinoma zishyirwa mu bikorwa.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ikindi ni ugutega amatwi ibibazo by’urubyiruko, ngafatanya n’inzego zibishinzwe kugira ngo bibonerwe ibisubizo mu gihe gikwiriye.”
Yirinze kwinjira mu bibazo byugarije urubyiruko, avuga ko hari byinshi yaba ibyo bazamubwira ndetse n’ibyo azibonera n’amaso, akazafatanya n’abandi kubikorera ubuvugizi.
Kwinjira mu Nteko kwa Imaniriho bizaba intangiriro y’ubuzima bushya kuko nyuma yo kurangiza kaminuza, yari umushomeri.
Umushahara we wa mbere uzaba ari 1.774.540 Frw ugenerwa umudepite.
Ati “Ubusanzwe nta kazi nari mfite.”
Ikibazo cy’ubushomeri ni kimwe mu byugarije urubyiruko agiye guhagararira mu Nteko.
Imibare y’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare igaragaza ko mu rubyiruko (hagati y’imyaka 16-30) ubushomeri buri kuri 21 %.
Imaniriho yigiriye icyizere cyo kwiyamamariza kujya mu nzego nkuru z’igihugu nta handi hakomeye yigeze ayobora.
Aho yibuka ni uko mu mashuri yisumbuye, akenshi yagiye aba umuyobozi w’abanyeshuri bigana, nka ‘Cheftaine de Classe’.
Ahandi avuga ko yayoboye, ni mu nshingano zinyuranye yagiye ashingwa mu rusengero rwa gikirisitu abarizwamo.
Umuganda n’inama z’abaturage ngo ni yo mashuri akomeye yitabiraga, binamukuzamo kumva agomba kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry’igihugu, yiyamamariza ubudepite, atsinda amatora.
Ati “Narishimye cyane gutsinda, hamwe n’Imana numva nzababera intumwa nziza.”
Mu magambo make, agira inama urubyiruko yo kugira imyitwarire itegura neza ahazaza habo n’iterambere rirambye ry’igihugu.
Ati “Bakwiye kujya bitabira gahunda za leta uko bazisabwa, kugisha inama no kwemera gukosorwa.”
Imaniriho anabwira bagenzi be b’urubyiruko ko nta cyo bakwiye gutinya gukora, yaba no kwinjira muri politiki.
Ati “Bagomba gutinyuka bakumva ko bashoboye.
Hari ijambo rivuga ngo ‘ntituri bato bo kudafata inshingano’ kuko imbaraga n’ubushake byo gukorera igihugu barabifite …hari intero ivuga ngo ‘urubyiruko ni imbaraga z’igihugu zubaka kandi vuba’.”
Avuga ko iyo umuntu yatinyutse nta kintu na kimwe cyamunanira.
Uretse Imaniriho Clarisse w’imyaka 23, urubyiruko ruzaba ruhagarariwe mu Nteko na Kamanzi Ernest w’ imyaka 28.
Indi nkuru wasoma: NEC yemeje burundu abadepite 80, inavuga ku mashyaka mashya yinjiye mu Nteko Imaniriho Clarisse w'imyaka 23 niwe uzaba ari umudepite muto muri iyi manda [email protected].

Umuhanzi nyarwanda wakoraga umuziki Gakondo yapfiriye muri Zambia bamushyingurayo[AMAFOTO] Iyakaremye Justin yari umwe mu bahanzi gakondo babarizwaga mu ihuriro ‘Ishakwe Gakondo Music Union’, ririmo abandi bahanzi bakomeye nka Nzayisenga Sophie uribereye Visi Perezida, Masamba Intore n’abandi benshi.

#11210#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/ubuzima-2020-covid-19-yishe-abantu-inazahaza-ubukungu-icyegeranyo
Ubuzima 2020: Covid-19 yishe abantu inazahaza ubukungu (Icyegeranyo) Mu mpera z’umwaka wa 2019, ku isi hadutse indwara yiswe Coronavirus cyangwa Covid-19 iterwa na virusi ya ‘Corona’, yatangiriye mu mujyi wa Wuhan mu Bushinwa, itangirana ubukana kuko yandura mu buryo bwihuse, igenda ikwirakwira buhoro buhoro, yica abantu benshi ari nabwo yiswe icyorezo, kandi n’ubu ikaba ikomeje kugaragaza ubukana ari nako yica abantu.
Abo mu bihugu iyo ndwara yari itarageramo bumvaga izaguma mu mahanga iyo, ari na ko Abanyarwanda babitekerezaga, gusa abayobozi b’igihugu ntibahwemye kugira impungenge kuri icyo cyorezo, ari bwo hatangiye gushakwa uko abantu babyifatamo kiramutse kigeze mu Rwanda, ndetse hashyirwaho n’ingamba zo kugikumira zishingiye ku kugira isuku.
Icyo gihe abantu bakomeje gusobanurirwa uko iyo ndwara yandura, ibimenyetso biranga uwo yafashe, ndetse bagirwa inama yo guhagarika ingendo zigana aho yagaragaye kuko ahanini yandurira mu gukoranaho hagati y’uwanduye n’umuzima cyangwa guhurira ku bikoresho.
Kwitegura guhangana n’icyo cyorezo byasabaga ko u Rwanda rubona ibikoresho byo gupima abantu, icyo kikaba ari cyo cyirukanishije uwari Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Diane Gashumba weguye ku ya 14 Gashyantare 2020, azira ko yabeshye Umukuru w’Igihugu, avuga ko hari ibipimo bihagije byapima abari bagiye mu mwiherero w’abayobozi bakuru b’igihugu wo ku ya 16 Gashyantare 2020, kandi ari nta byo.
Bidatinze, Covid-19 yageze mu Rwanda Ku itariki ya 14 Werurwe 2020, umuntu wa mbere yagaragaweho Covid-19, Umuhinde wari wageze mu Rwanda ku ya 8 Werurwe 2020 aturutse mu Mujyi wa Mumbai, yaje kwijyana ku kigo nderabuzima, bamupimye basanga yaranduye iyo ndwara.
Hakurikiyeho igikorwa cyo gushakisha ababa barahuye n’uwo Muhinde kugira ngo na bo bapimwe, abo basanga banduye batangire kuvurwa byihariye hagamijwe ko icyo cyorezo kidakwirakwira.
Ku itariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020, hasohotse itangazo rivuga ko amashuri yose agomba gufunga imiryango, abana bagahita bataha iwabo.
Leta yahise ishyiraho amabisi acyura abana ikitaraganya, ku buryo ababyeyi batasabwe kwishyura amatike.
Kuva icyo gihe ingamba zo kwirinda zarakajijwe, zirimo guhagarika amateraniro y’abantu benshi, kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa, gukaraba kenshi intoki n’amazi n’isabune cyangwa umuti wabugenewe (hand sanitizer), abayobozi bakanyuza amatangazo menshi mu bitangazamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga akangurira abantu kwirinda n’ibindi.
Guma Mu Rugo Ku itariki 21 Werurwe 2020, hasohotse itangazo rivuye kwa Minisitiri w’Intebe, rishyiraho gahunda ya Guma mu rugo mu gihugu cyose, yagombaga kumara iminsi 15.
Ryahagarikaga ingendo, hagakorwa iza ngombwa gusa nko kujya kwivuza, guhaha, kuri Banki, abantu bakaguma mu ngo.
Imipaka yose yahise ifungwa, abakozi ba Leta n’abikorera basabwa gukorera mu ngo, ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu zirahagarikwa hagakorwa iza ngombwa, amasoko n’amaduka birafungwa uretse ahacururizwa ibiribwa, farumasi, sitasiyo n’ahandi ha ngombwa.
Utubare twose twategetswe gufunga, moto zibuzwa gutwara abagenzi, abagira ibyo bishyura basabwa gukoresha ikoranabuhanga na ho resitora zemererwa gukora ariko abakiriya bakagura ibiryo babitwara.
Iryo tangazo ryasozaga risaba inzego z’ibanze na Polisi y’igihugu gukurikirana uko ayo mabwiriza yubahirizwa.
Kuva icyo gihe Inama y’Abaminisitiri yagiye iterana buri nyuma y’iminsi 15, hagamijwe kureba ubukana bw’icyo cyorezo ngo hagire ibyoroshywa cyangwa ibyongerwa kuri izo ngamba, cyane ko ku itariki 23 Werurwe Minisiteri y’Ubuzima (MINISANTE) yatangaje ko hamaze kwandura abantu 36, na ho ku 29 Werurwe bari bamaze kugera kuri 70, bakaba bari biganjemo abaherukaga kujya hanze y’igihugu.
Icyo gihe cyo kuguma mu rugo cyagoye abantu benshi, kuko umwe wese aho yari yagumye aho nubwo habaga ari hanze y’umuryango we kuko kugenda bitashobokaga.
Kubera ko akazi kenshi kahagaze, abaryaga ari uko bavuye gukora bahuye n’ikibazo cy’inzara, aha twavuga nk’abayede, abafundi, abahingira abandi, abamotari n’abandi, gusa Leta yahise ishyiraho gahunda yo kubagezaho ibyo kurya.
Abandi byagoye ni abari bemerewe gucuruza ariko kugenda bikabagora kuko nta modoka nta moto bashoboraga kubona, ibyo byose bikaba byaratumye abantu bagwa mu bukene ndetse n’iterambere ry’igihugu rirahazaharira.
Icyakora abafite ubushobozi cyane cyane abikorera ndetse n’imiryango nterankunga, bakomeje gutera ingabo mu bitugu Leta, bageza ibyo kurya ku bari bashonje.
Muri icyo gihe kandi hari abagendaga bahanwa bafashwe na Polisi y’igihugu bananiwe kuguma mu rugo, cyangwa bava mu Ntara bajya mu Mujyi wa Kigali bitemewe, ababeshyaga ko bafite impamvu zikomeye, abikingiranaga mu tubare bakanywa inzoga bagafatwa basinze n’ibindi.
Aha umuntu yakwibuka abafatiwe mu kabare k’i Muhanga, maze umukobwa umwe wari mu bafashwe agira ati “Numvise agahumburo ka burusheti ndi mu rugo nanirwa kwihanga ni ko kuza hano mu kabari”.
Abanduye Covid-19 bakomeje kuvurwa, kuko Leta biciye muri MINISANTE, yagiye ishyiraho ibigo abayanduye bavurirwamo, harimo icya Kanyinya muri Nyarugenge ari na cyo cyabanje, nyuma hagenda hashyirwaho ibindi hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Kuva muri Guma Mu Rugo Ku itariki ya 4 Gicurasi 2020, ni bwo abantu bemerewe kongera kugenda, imodoka zitwara abagenzi zongera gukora mu Ntara ariko zitemerewe kugera i Kigali ndetse nta n’izemerewe kuva i Kigali ngo zijye mu Ntara zindi, zigatwara abagenzi kuri 50%.
Abakozi bemerewe kujya mu mirimo yabo ariko abajya mu biro bagakora ari 50% gusa abandi bagakomeza gukorera mu ngo.
Ibyo abantu byarabashimishije nubwo ibikorwa byabo nk’iby’ubucuruzi byari byarazahaye, gusa na bwo ab’i Kigali bakagorwa no kujya mu Ntara kurangura.
Kuva ubwo ibindi bikorwa byagiye byemererwa gufungura uko Inama y’Abaminisitiri iteranye, amasoko yarafunguye ariko agakora kuri 50%, amahoteri atangira imirimo, ubukerarugendo bw’imbere mu gihugu buremerwa ariko abantu bagasabwa kubanza kwipimisha Covid-19, nyuma y’igihe moto zemererwa gutwara abagenzi, ingendo zo mu kirere, insengero zirakomorerwa n’ibindi.
Muri icyo gihe ni bwo kwambara agapfukamunwa byabaye itegeko kuri buri muntu wabaga asohotse agiye hanze y’urugo, hahise hashyirwaho inganda zo gukora udupfukamunwa twishi ahanini dukoze mu myenda, kamwe kakagura 500 ndetse izindi nganda zitangira gukora imiti isukura intoki, bishyirwa ku isoko bwangu abantu bakajya babibona bitabagoye.
Uko gufungura imirimo ariko kwatumye imibare y’abandura Covid-19 izamuka, bituma uduce tumwe tw’igihugu dusubira muri Guma mu rugo, twavuga nk’imwe mu mirenge n’utugari two muri Kigali, imirenge yo muri Rusizi, Rubavu na Nyamagabe, gusa kubapima no kubavura byarakomeje ndetse bamwe batangira gukira.
Ku mipaka ahanini ni ho hibasiwe n’icyorezo kubera abantu bambukaga mu buryo butemewe, ndetse n’abashoferi b’amakamyo bambukiranyaga imipaka bakinjira mu Rwanda ku buryo Leta yigeze gushyiraho uburyo bwo gukumira ko bakomeza kwambukana uburwayi.
Kugeza ku ya 22 Kamena 2020, mu Rwanda hari hamaze kwandura abantu 787, muri bo 370 bari barakize na ho babiri (2) barahitanywe n’icyo cyorezo.
Muri Kanama imibare y’abandura yakomeje kuzamuka kuko nko ku itariki 25 z’uko kwezi handuye abantu 231, abapfuye bose bakaba bari bamaze kuba 15.
Gusa nyuma nko mu kwezi k’Ukwakira imibare yagiye igabanuka ijya munsi y’abantu 10 ku minsi, Minisitiri w’Ubuzimama, Dr Daniel Ngamije akaba yaravuze ko nubwo ari uko bimeze abantu batagomba kwirara.
Yagize ati “Kuba imibare igenda igabanuka ni uko hashyizwe ingufu mu guhashya icyorezo, gusa abaturage ntibagomba kwirara kuko indwara igihari.
Turabasaba gukomeza kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda, bambara neza agapfukamunwa, bahana intera, bakaraba kenshi intoki”.
Nyuma hashyizweho na gahunda yo kuvurira abarwaye Covid-19 mu ngo iwabo, ikaba yarahereye mu karere ka Rusizi kandi ngo yagize akamaro.
Gufungura amashuri Uko iminsi yagendaga ni ko ibikorwa byakomeje gufungurwa kuko abayobozi bavuga ko abantu bagomba kumenya kubana n’icyorezo, bagakora kugira ngo ubukungu bw’igihugu buzahuke.
Bityo amashuri yafunguwe mu byiciro bibiri kuva mu ntangiriro z’Ugushyingo, abana bakagomba kwigana udupfukamunwa.
Imikino itandukanye yarafunguwe ndetse n’ahigirwa gutwara ibinyabiziga, mu bisigaye bigifunze harimo imipaka yo ku butaka n’utubare, usibye ko aheshi ducuruza ari yo mpamvu hari abantu Polisi idufatiramo basinze cyangwa bagafatwa barengeje amasaha yo gutaha bakarazwa muri stade bakanacibwa amande.
Muri minsi ishize abandura bari baragabanutse ariko imibare yongera kuzamuka mu nkambi z’impunzi ndetse no mu magereza, kuko nko ku itariki ya 27 Ukuboza, hagaragaye abanduye 153, 103 muri bo bakaba bari abo muri gereza ya Huye.
Ubu isi ihanze amaso inkingo zo gukingira abantu Covid-19 kugira ngo ibe yahashywa, ndetse mu bihugu bimwe nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubwongereza, U Bufaransa, u Bushinwa n’ahandi abaturage batangiye gukingirwa, u Rwanda na rwo rukaba rurimo kwitegura kwakira inkingo kuko rurimo kuvugana n’abazikora, nk’uko Perezida wa Repubulika aherutse kubivuga ubwo yagezaga ku Banyarwanda uko u Rwanda ruhagaze.
Kugeza ku ya 31 Ukuboza 2020, mu Rwanda abanduye Covid-19 ni 8,383 naho abayikize ni 6,542 mu gihe abakirwaye ari 1.749, abapfuye ni 92 hakaba hamaze gufatwa ibipimo 730,136.
Mu mpera z’Ukuboza ni bwo abicwa na Covid-19 biyongereye cyane kuko ku itariki 29 hapfuye abantu bane (4), ku ya 30 hapfa barindwi (7) naho ku ya 31 Ukuboza hapfa abantu batandatu (6), ni imibare itari imenyerewe, ibyo byatumye hari bimwe mu bikorwa byari byafunguwe byongera gufungwa byiganjemo imikino, inama ndetse n’imodoka zitwara abagenzi mu buryo bya rusange zongera kubatwara kuri 50%.
Icyakora Leta yongereye ahapimirwa iyo ndwara, ni ukuvuga mu mavuriro yigenga ndetse n’ibigo nderabuzima bikaba birimo gushyirwamo uburyo bwo gupima bwihuse buzwi nka ‘Antigen Rapid Test’ buhendutse kuko igipimo ari amafaranga 10.000 kugira ngo abantu bajye bipimisha bitabagoye kuko hari abitiranya Covid-19 n’ibicurane bisanzwe.
Kurwanya Malariya hifashishijwe ‘Drones’ Ku ya 10 Werurwe 2020, mu Rwanda hatangijwe gahunda yo kwica imibu isanzwe mu ndiri yayo hifashishijwe utudege duto tutagira abadutwara (drones) dutera imiti, igikorwa cyatangirijwe mu gishanga cya Rugende, umurenge wa Rusororo muri Gasabo, kigomba gukomeza n’ahandi.
Ubwo buryo ni ubwo kunganira ubwari busanzwe bwo gutera imiti yica imibu mu nzu, guha inzitiramibu abaturage bakanaziryamo ndetse bakanibutswa kugirira isuku aho baba.
Ikindi gikorwa cy’ubuzima ni uko u Rwanda rwahawe na Leta y’u Buligi imbangukiragutabara 40 zifite agaciro ka miliyari ebyiri z’Amafaranga y’u Rwanda, ngo zikazafasha guteza imbere ubuvuzi nk’uko byagarutsweho na Minisitiri Ngamije wazakiriye.
