Aya magambo Amama Mbabazi yahise ayafata nk'aho Museveni yakoresheje imvugo ya gishumba itari ikwiye umuyobozi nka perezida uyubora igihugu cyose.
Amama Mbabazi yagize ati: "Perezida yagakwiye kureka kuba umunyamusozi.
Ese waba uri perezida nyabaki ukoresha imvugo ya gishumba?
Ndashaka kurega perezida ku bw'amagambo mabi akoresha.
Njye mbabajwe n'imvugo ye ya gishumba.
Nta muntu n'umwe nigeze ntuka cyangwa ngo nkoreshe imvugo ya gishumba,.
Bamwe mukeka ko ndi umunyantege nke, ariko kwitonda ni zo mbaraga."
Uku guterana amagambo hagati ya Museveni na Amama Mbabazi kuraturka ku kuba mu minsi ishize insore sore zirinda Amama Mbabazi zigabije abayoboke b'ishyaka rya Museveni NRM zikabakubita.
Ni ibintu byabababje cyane Perezida Museveni bituma atageko ko ababikoze bose bahigwa bukware bakabiryozwa.
Twabibutsa ko aba bagabo bombi babanye igihe kirekire babana mu ishyaka rya NRM ryaboheye Uganda mu 1986, uyu Amama Mbabazi akaba yarabiye minisitiri w'intebe ku ngoma ya Museveni aza kumwirukana kuri uwo mwanya muri Nyakanga uyu mwaka.
Amama Mbabazi akimara kwirukanwa ku mwanya wa Minisitiri w'intebe ahita yiyemeza kwiyamamariza umwanya w'umukuri w'igihugu.kuri ubu akaba ahanganye bikomeye na Perezida Museveni aho bari mu bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza.

#12125#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/abahanga-imirimo-barasabirwa-igihe-cyo-kudasora
Abahanga imirimo barasabirwa igihe cyo kudasora Sosiyete sivile ivuga ko abahanga imirimo bakagombye guhabwa igihe cyo kudasora, kuko iyo bahise batangira gusora batarafatisha bituma badindira.
Byavugiwe mu kiganiro sosiyete sivile yagiranye na zimwe mu nzego za Leta, ubwo yashyiraga ahagaragara ubushakashatsi yakoze ku bijyanye n'ubushomeri mu Rwanda, kuri uwu wa kane taliki 5 Ugushyingo 2015.
Korohereza abihangira imirimo ngo bizagabanya umubare w'abashomeri.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwerekana ko ubushomeri mu Rwanda buri ku kigero cya 2% cy'abantu bagejeje imyaka yo gukora kandi bashakisha akazi, ari yo mpamvu ubuyobozi bukangurira Abanyarwanda kwihangira umurimo.
Munyamariza Edouard, umuvugizi wa Sosiyete sivile mu Rwanda avuga ko kwihangira imirimo ari uburyo bwiza bwo kugabanya ubushomeri, gusa ngo haracyari imbogamizi.
Yagize ati "Umusoro ni ngombwa kuwutanga ariko iyo umuntu awatswe agitaguza, ari bwo agitangira gukora ngo yikure mu bushomeri akenshi umubera umutwaro kuko aba atarashinga umuzi."
Minisitiri w'Umurimo Uwizeye Judith avuga ko Leta ishishikajwe n'uko ubushomeri bwagabanuka.
Yakomeje avuga ko mu bushishozi bwayo, Leta yakagombye kureba uko yakorohereza bariya bahanga imirimo, kugirango babanze bafate imbaraga bityo bazatangire gusora nyuma kuko umuntu atangiye gukora agahita ahomba ntacyaba gikemutse.
Izindi nzitizi ngo ni iz'ubushobozi buke bwo gukora imishinga yemerwa n'amabanki, imyumvire ikiri hasi ku bijyanye no kwiga imyuga ndetse no kubura igishoro.
Minisitiri w'Umurimo Uwizeye Judith, yavuze ko hakagombye gukorwa ubushakashatsi bwerekana ingaruka umusoro ugira ku batangiye gukora.
Ati "Igishishikaje Leta ni uko ubushomeri bwagabanuka, biramutse bigaragaye ko uriya musoro utuma imishinga myinshi ihomba mu itangira, nta cyabuza ko byaganirwaho bityo Leta ikaba yagira icyo ibikoraho."
Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'Ikigo cy'igihugu cy'ibarurishamibare (NISR: EICV 4), byagaragaye ko ubushomeri mu Rwanda buri hejuru mu bantu barangije za kaminuza, kuko buri ku kigero cya 13.5% naho ku barangije amashuri yisumbuye bukaba ari 9.0%.
N'ubwo iyi mibare iri hejuru, Leta iteganya ko aba barangije amashuri anyuranye bakongererwa ubumenyi mu by'imyuga binyujijwe muri gahunda yita ku bumenyingiro (WDA), bikaba byagabanya ubushomeri nk'uko Minisitiri Uwizeye yabivuze.
Munyantore Jean Claude

#12144#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/wari-uzi-ko-impumuro-mbi-mu-bice-bitandukanye-by-umubiri-ishobora-kwerekana
Wari uzi ko impumuro mbi mu bice bitandukanye by’umubiri ishobora kukwereka uburwayi waba ufite ?
Impumuro yawe igira uruhare runini mu kugena umubano ugirana n’abandi no gutuma usabana n’abandi.
Akenshi usanga burya no mu gukunda umuntu, nubwo waba utayitayeho cyane, ariko impumuro ye iri mu bigufasha kumumenya nubwo yaba akiri kure ndetse no gutuma urushaho kumukunda no kumwishimira akwegereye.
Ku bantu bamwe na bamwe hari igihe bagira impumuro mbi mu bice bitandukanye by’umubiri uretse kubatera ipfunwe, bikaba byanabangamira abakwegereye bose, ku buryo utinya kujya mu bandi nabo bagatinya kukwegera.
Impumuro mbi mu bice bitandukanye by’umubiri, akenshi biterwa na bagiteri ziba zabaye nyinshi muri ibyo bice.
Izi bagiteri ziba zitunzwe n’uturemangingo twapfuye n’ibindi binyabutabire bitandukanye biba ku ruhu, mu gihe zivanze n’icyuya cg andi mavuta akorwa n’uruhu, bikora impumuro mbi, ishobora kuba yoroheje cg ikomeye bitewe n’aho iri.
Ibice byihishe ndetse n’ibirimo ubwoya bwinshi nibyo byiganzamo impumuro mbi cyane.
Impumuro mbi mu bice bitandukanye by’umubiri ugomba kwitondera no kwihutira kugana kwa muganga 1.
Impumuro mbi mu kanwa Guhumura nabi mu kanwa bishobora guterwa n’impamvu zitandukanye, akenshi bishobora guterwa n’ibyo wariye; nko kurya ibitunguru cg tungurusumu cyane bishobora gutuma uhumura nabi.
Isuku nke yo mu kanwa, ishobora gutuma bagiteri ziba nyinshi zikaba zatera kunuka mu kanwa.
Bagiteri ziba mu kanwa zishobora kwiyongera zigatangira gutungwa na proteyine ziboneka mu macandwe cg ibisigazwa by’ibyo wariye, zikaba zatera kunuka nabi.
Impumuro nziza nk’iy’isukari cg ibindi bihumura nayo ishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy’indwara ya diyabete.
Nuramuka wumva mu kanwa hawe hahumura ntacyo uzi wariye kibitera ni ngombwa kugana kwa muganga, ukisuzumisha.
2.
Inkari Inkari ubusanzwe nta mpumuro zigomba kugira kandi zigomba kuba zerurutse.
Ibi bintu 2 nibyo byerekana ko umubiri udafite umwuma (dehydration) cg ikindi kibazo.
Niba inkari zawe wumva zinuka cyane, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy’uko urwaye ubwandu bw’umuyoboro w’inkari (infection urinaire/urinary tract infection), indwara y’impyiko cg umwijima.
Gusa hari imiti ushobora gufata ikaba yahindura impumuro y’inkari nabyo ugomba kubizirikana.
Niba unyara inkari zihumura bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy’indwara ya diyabete.
Igihe wumva impumuro y’inkari zawe yahindutse ni ngombwa kugana kwa muganga.
3.
Imyanya y’ibanga Imyanya y’ibanga nko mu gitsina niho ukunze gusanga higanje impumuro mbi cyane.
Ibi bikaba cyane ku gitsina gore kurusha igitsina gabo.
Nubwo imyanya ndagagitsina ku bakobwa n’abagore ifite ubushobozi bwo kwikorera isuku, impumuro mbi muri ibyo bice akenshi ishobora guterwa na mikorobe ziba zabaye nyinshi cyane.
Izikunze kuhaba cyane ni izo mu bwoko bw’imiyege zizwi nka candida albicans.
Igihe cyose wumvise impumuro idasanzwe mu myanya y’ibanga yawe, ni ngombwa kugana k’umuganga w’indwara zifata mu myanya ndagagitsina (gynecologist).
4.
Mu kwaha Mu kwaha nicyo gice cy’umubiri kibonekamo ibyuya byinshi, kandi hakunze kuba ubwoya, kubera ibi byombi, hashobora kuba impumuro mbi cyane.
Niba ufite impumuro mbi mu kwaha, hari uburyo ushobora kugabanya bagiteri ziba zabaye nyinshi muri icyo gice.
Ushobora gukubamo indimu, mu rwego rwo kugabanya bagiteri ziba zikorwa ku bwinshi.
Hari n’ibindi ushobora gukoresha mu rwego rwo kwirinda iyo mpumuro mbi nk’ibihumuza (deodorant na antiperspirant).
5.
Ibyo wituma Nubwo amabyi aduhumura, ariko mu gihe wumva anuka bikabije; nk’igihe anuka nk’ibintu byaboze cg ibindi wumva bidasanzwe, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy’uburwayi.
Impumuro mbi iherekejwe no guhindura ibara, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy’uko hari amaraso ari guca mu kibuno, cg ubundi burwayi mu gifu nk’impiswi (diarrhea/ diarrhée) cg ikindi kibazo mu nzira y’igogora.
Ugomba kwihutira kugana kwa muganga mu gihe ugize iki kibazo, ukabona hashize iminsi nta gihinduka.
6.
Ibirenge n’amano Impumuro mbi mu birenge n’amano bikunze kuba ku bantu bambara inkweto zifunze kenshi.
Ahantu hatagera umwuka kenshi, hakunze kurangwa umwuka utari mwiza.
Usibye ikibazo cyo kutagerwaho n’umwuka, koga ntiwihanagure neza hagati y’amano n’ibirenge cg se kwambara ibintu bitos biri mu bikurura uyu mwuka mubi, ndetse bikongera mikorobe zo mu bwoko bw’imiyege (champignons/fungi) muri ibyo bice.
Niba ukora isuku ihagije, ariko ukaba uhorana impumuro mbi mu birenge no hagati y’amano ni ngombwa kugana kwa muganga ukaba wavurwa, mu rwego rwo kurinda ko imiyege yakwira n’ahandi.
Source: Umutihealth.com

Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abazahazwa na coronavirus baba basanganywe izindi ndwara Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe mu mujyi wa New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, bwagaragaje ko abarwayi ba coronavirus bagera ku rwego rwo kuremba baba basanganywe ibindi bibazo by’ubuzima.
Ni ubushakashatsi bwakorewe ku bantu 5700 barwaye coronavirus, bose bashyizwe mu bitaro.
Ibyavuyemo bigaragaza ko hafi ya bose bari basanganywe izindi ndwara ari nazo zongereye ubukana coronavirus bakarushaho kuremba.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwakozwe hagati ya Werurwe na Mata uyu mwaka, bwatangajwe mu kinyamakuru gitangazwamo ubushakashatsi ku by’ubuzima gikorana n’Ihuriro ry’abavuzi muri Amerika, American Medical Association (JAMA).
Abashakashatsi bavuze ko abo bantu bakozeho ubushakashatsi impuzandengo y’imyaka yabo ari 63.
Muri bo, 94 % bari basanganywe ibindi bibazo by’ubuzima, nibura buri umwe afite indi ndwara imwe asanganywe itari coronavirus.

Ubushakashatsi bwanarebye ku bandi bantu 2 634 bavuye mu bitaro barwaye coronavirus.
Abo barimo abapfuye bishwe na coronavirus n’abasezerewe bakize.
Mu batakiri mu bitaro, abashakashatsi basanze 14 % barigeze kurwara bagashyirwa mu byumba byita ku ndembe, 12 % bigeze kurwara bongererwa umwuka naho 3 % bari barahawe impyiko.
Ubushakashatsi kandi bwerekana ko 88% by’abantu bashyizwe ku byuma bibongerera umwuka bapfuye.
Abasanzwe barwaye diabète nibo benshi bagiye bashyirwa ku byuma bibongerera umwuka.
Benshi mu barwayi ba coronavirus baremba ni ababa basanganywe ibindi bibazo by'ubuzima

WhatsApp yajyanye mu nkiko ikigo cyayifashishije mu kwiba amakuru Ubuyobozi bwa WhatsApp bwatangaje ko bwareze mu rukiko ikigo cyo muri Israel, cyihishe inyuma y’igitero cy’ikoranabuhanga giheruka kwibasira abakoresha uru rubuga, kigashyira muri iyi porogaramu virusi ituma kibasha kwibamo amakuru.
Ni igikorwa bavuga ko cyibasiye cyane impirimbanyi z’uburenganzira bwa muntu, abanyamakuru, impunzi za politiki, abadipolomate n’abayobozi muri guverinoma.
Ikigo cya Facebook ari nacyo WhatsApp ibarizwamo, cyatangaje ko cyajyanye mu nkiko NSO mu rukiko rwo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kuri uyu wa Kabiri.
Umuyobozi wa WhatsApp, Will Cathcart, yanditse muri Washington Post ati “Ibi bikwiye kuba nk’uburyo bwo guhwitura ibigo by’ikoranabuhanga, za guverinoma n’abantu bose bakoresha internet.”
Yavuze ko uburyo busanzwe bukoreshwa mu kugenzura ibintu burimo kugenda bukoreshwa nabi, ugasanga amakuru y’abantu ashobora kujya mu biganza bibi.
NSO ni Ikigo gikora Ikoranabuhanga rigenzura ibintu runaka aho bibaye ngombwa.
Kirashinjwa ko cyakoresheje ububiko bwa WhatsApp buherereye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu kohereza virusi muri smartphones zisaga 1400 n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, hagati ya Mata na Gicurasi.
Abari bagambiriwe barimo impirimbanyi z’uburenganzira bwa muntu zisaga 100, abanyamakuru n’abandi bakora mu miryango itari iya leta hirya no hino ku Isi.
Ngo babarizwaga mu bihugu bya Mexique, Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu na Bahrain.
Gusa mu itangazo NSO Group yashyize ahagaragara, yavuze ko itemeranya n’ibyo birego ndetse izaburana urwo rubanza.
Iti "Akazi ka NSO ni uguha ikoranabuhanga ibigo by’iperereza byemewe bya za guverinoma n’inzego zishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko, mu kuzifasha kurwanya iterabwoba n’ibindi byaha bikomeye.
Ikoranabuhanga ryacu ntabwo ryakorewe cyangwa ryaherewe uburenganzira gukoreshwa mu kwibasira abaharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu n’abanyamakuru.”
Igitero cyabayeho cyatumye WhatsApp ikora iperereza ifatanyije n’impuguke zo muri Kaminuza ya Toronto, ryaje gutahura abari inyuma y’ibyo bikorwa.
Ngo basanze NSO yaroherezaga muri telefoni y’umuntu virusi yiswe Pegasus, umuntu agahita ahamagarwa kuri WhatsApp ku buryo kugira ngo telefoni ye ifatwe bitasabaga ko anitaba abamuhamagaye.
Ngo hari n’ubundi buryo bwakoreshejwe mu kwanduza telefoni n’ubu butaramenyekana.
Iyo virusi yagendaga yiba muri telefoni amakuru arimo imibare y’ibanga, nimero umuntu abitse, ibyo yashyize ku ndangaminsi ya telefoni, ubutumwa bugufi n’ibindi.
WhatsApp n’Ikigo ishamikiyeho cya Facebook, byasabye urukiko guhabwa impozamarira ya $75,000 hamwe n’igihembo cya avoka, kimwe n’indi nyishyu y’ibyangijwe byakwemezwa n’urukiko.
Ibyo ngo byajyana no kubuza icyo kigo n’ibigishamikiyeho kongera gukoresha serivisi za WhatsApp cyangwa Facebook, zirimo gufunguza konti cyangwa kuzihagumana mu gihe baba bazisanganywe.
WhatsApp yitabaje inkiko ku kigo cyayifashishije mu kwiba amakuru

Gahongayire yakusanyije amafaranga arenga miliyoni n’igice mu gitaramo cyo gufasha (Amafoto) Umuramyi Aline Gahongayire yakoze igitaramo gikomeye yahuriyemo n’abandi bahanzi bakunzwe mu Mujyi wa Kigali, cyakusanyirijwemo amafaranga arenga miliyoni n’igice azakoreshwa mu bikorwa byo gufasha abatishoboye.

Gahongayire yari yatumiye abandi bahanzi b’indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bamufashije barimo Kayitana Janvier wamamaye mu ndirimbo ‘‘Jehovah’’; Iyamuremye Serge wanyuze benshi mu ndirimbo ye nshya “Biramvura”, Billy Jakes wamamaye mu yitwa “Umunyamateka” n’abandi.

Aba bose banyuze abitabiriye igitaramo cya mbere cya “Ineza Tour” cyateguwe na Aline Gahongayire.
Uyu muhanzi yagiye ku rubyiniro ahagana saa moya n’iminota irengaho.
Yabanje gusanga umubyeyi we aho yari yicaye, amwatuririho amagambo y’umugisha.
Yakoresheje imbaraga nyinshi ku rubyiniro, indirimbo ze nyinshi yaziririmbye agaragaza akanyamuneza.
Gahongayire yaririmbye mu buryo bw’umwimerere, afatanya n’abandi kuramya mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘‘Because of who you are’’, ‘‘Umukiza wanjye ariho’’, ‘‘Hari impamvu pe’’, ‘‘Niyo yabikoze’’, ‘‘Warampishe’’, ‘‘Iyabivuze’’, ‘‘Warahabaye’’, ‘‘Nakumbuka’’ n’izindi.
Mu gice kigana ku musozo w’igitaramo cya Gahongayire, benshi bitanze bashyira mu Kigega cya ‘‘Ineza Initiative’’ yashinze ifasha abatishoboye mu mishinga yo kubateza imbere, kwishyurira ishuri abana, kwishyura ubwishingizi mu kwivuza ku batishoboye n’ibindi bikorwa binyuranye.
Itsinda rifasha Gahongayire muri ibi bitaramo bizashyigikira “Ineza Initiative” ryabwiye IGIHE ko mu gitaramo cya mbere hakusanyijwe inkunga ya 1,070,000 Frw n’andi angana na 750$ azafasha imishinga ya ‘Ineza Initiative’ mu gufasha.
Ibitaramo nk’ibi, Aline Gahongayire ateganya kubikorera mu duce dutandukanye mu gihugu turimo i Nyamata, Kayonza, Karongi, Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, Byumba na Rusizi.
Aho hose azagenda ahumuriza abari mu bibazo binyuranye ari nako aremera abatishoboye.
Gahongayire ukikijwe na Camarade (iburyo) na Eddie Mico batambira Imana Serge Iyamuremye yanyuze abitabiriye iki gitaramo Billy Jakes uzwi mu ndirimbo "Umunyamateka" n'iyitwa ''God of All Nations'' yakoranye n'Umunyafurika y'Epfo, Zaza na Tonzi yaririmbye mu gitaramo "Ineza Tour" Gahongayire yari afite akanyamuneza muri iki gitaramo Gahongayire yaririmbye n'indirimbo zo kuri album ye nshya yise "New Woman" Benshi bagiye mu mwuka bamufasha kubyinira Imana Gahongayire yatangiriye i Kabuga ibitaramo bizavamo inkunga yo gufasha Ibitaramo nk'ibi, Aline Gahongayire ateganya kubikorera mu duce dutandukanye mu gihugu turimo i Nyamata, Kayonza, Karongi, Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, Byumba na Rusizi Iki gitaramo cyabereye muri Eglise Vivante ya Kabuga Abacyitabiriye bafashe umwanya uhagije wo kuramya Imana Muri iki gitaramo, abantu batandukanye batanze inkunga yo gufasha abatishoboye Abitabiriye

Abagabo barigata mu gitsina cy'abagore bafite ibyago byo kurwara kanseri yo mu kanwa Yanditswe kuya 2-04-2016 saa 14:22' na Umutoni Rosine Abagabo barigata mu gitsina cy'abagore bafite ibyago byinshi byo kurwara kanseri ifata mu muhogo, mu gihe abagore bakoresha ubu buryo bwo gushaka umunezero mu mibonano mpuzabitsina umubiri wabo ugira ubudahangarwa.
Mu bantu batatu barwaye kanseri yo mu muhogo, babiri muri bo mu bihugu by'i Burayi na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika bayitewe no kurigata mu gitsina cy'abagore muri iyi myaka ishize.
Ibi bikaba byaratangarijwe mu nama yahuje abagize ihuriro ry'abahanga muri siyansi yagutse yabereye i Washington.
Izi nzobere zavuze ko kurigata mu gitsina ari imwe mu nzira yanduriramo kanseri ifata ibice byo mu kanwa kuri ubu yibasiye igitsinagabo, cyane cyane abazungu bakiri bato ugereranyije n'abagore.
Urubuga rwa doctossimo dukesha iyi nkuru ruvuga ko isesengura ryagaragaje ko ubu buryo bwo gushaka umunezero bukorwa n'abagabo bakiri bato, bugenda bwiyongera uko bwije n'uko bucyeye.
Aba bashakashatsi bagize bati "Mu nyigo yacu twasanze abagabo bafite ibyago byinshi byo kwandura virusi ya HPV, igihe bakoze imibonano mpuzabitsina ikorewe mu kanwa."
Iyi nyigo yagaragaje ko abagore bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina yo mu kanwa n'abagabo batandukanye, bafite ibyago bike byo kwandura virusi ya ‘HPV' ugereranyije n'abagabo, ibi ngo bikaba biterwa n'ubudahangarwa bw'umubiri wabo.
Banavuze kandi ko imibonano mpuzabitsina yo mu kanwa yongera ibyago byo kurwara kanseri ifata ibice byo mu kanwa ku kigereranyo cya 22%, yiyongereye kugera kuri 225% mu myaka 20 ishize.
Uretse iyi kanseri, imibonano mpuzabitsina yo mu kanwa ishobora no kuba inzira yo kwanduriramo izindi ndwara zirimo virusi itera SIDA, Mburugu, Hepatite B n'izindi.

Ntibyatinze Esther abaza Leila ati:"nonese ko utanyereka umurwayi ngo musuhuze urabona ndagenda ntamubonye!"
ariko Leila amusubiza ko asinziriye kuko aterwa imiti imusinziriza mu gihe hagikurikiranwa uburwayibwe ngo hamenyekane niba koko abiterwa n’ibiyobyabwenge cyangwa hari indi mpamvu ibimutera!"
Ariko bakiri muri ibyo bumva umuntu akuruye urugi ruri hirya yabo maze barebye babona ni Miheal wakangutse!
Esther yananiwe kwifata maze aza yiruka ahobera Micheal,na we aramwemerera amusuhuza noneho atuje nuko Esther abaza Micheal ati:"umeze ute muvandi?"
nuko Micheal aho kumusubiza aramubaza ati:"Esther nawe uremeranya n’abavuga ko nkoresha ibiyobyabwenge bagahora bantera inshinge ngo mpagarike amarangamutima yanjye?"
nuko Esther aramubaza ati:"ayahe se?"

arongera ati:"nyine icyangaruye ku isi ni uko naje kureba aho bashyinguye ababyeyi banjye ubwo rero numvaga igihe ari iki ngo nongere mbasange!"
Esther yumvise ayo magambo kwihangana nk’uwize iby’ubuvuzi bwo mumutwe biranga amarira amutemba mu maso ndetse ashoka no kumatama.
Nuko Micheal ahita amubwira ati:"ntureba ko wibutse urupfu napfuye rukakubabaza maze ukarira!"
ahita avuga ati:"reka nigendere ntazongera kukubabaza cyangwa nkagira undi muntu mbabaza!"
kuko bari bahagaze mu nyubako ya etaje (etage) Michael ahita asimbuka ngo agwe hasi yipfire!
Nuko Esther agize ngo amwiyahureho bajyane yumva umuntu aramukuruye maze kuko Esther na we yari yafashe Michael bose bagaruka inyuma ntibamanuka baba bararokotse.
Ubwo Esther yarahindukiye abona ni Cyusa umufashe ariko aramubwira ati:"Cyusa ndekura kandi urabizi ko nakwiyamye kandi singushaka iruhande rwanjye!"

arongera ati:"kandi humura Micheal ntacyo yabaye!"
Nyuma y’uko Esther asanze umuyobozi we wa kera aho yakoreraga barumvikanye maze basubiramo amasezerano y’akazi (contract) nuko akomeza gukora kuri ibyo bitaro nk’umuhanga w’inzobere mubijyanye n’ubuvuzi bw’indwara zo mumutwe.

nuko Esther ahita ataha.

Ntimuzacikwe n’igice kizakurikira.

#12347#	3	economy	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubwiteganyirize/article/iburasirazuba-abikorera-biteguye-gufasha-abashobora-gusonza-kubera-kudakora
Iburasirazuba: Abikorera biteguye gufasha abashobora gusonza kubera kudakora Umuyobozi w’Urugaga rw’Abikorera (PSF) mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba, Ndungutse Jean Bosco, avuga ko bagiye gutekereza ku cyo bafasha bamwe mu Banyarwanda bari batunzwe no kurya ari uko bavuye guca inshuro ariko uyu munsi bakaba batabasha kubona akazi bitewe n’ingamba nshya zo kwirinda Coronavirus.
Itangazo rya Minisitiri w’Intebe ryo ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 ku ngamba nshya zo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus risaba Abaturarwanda guhagarika ingendo zitari ngombwa, amasoko n’amaduka, utubari n’ibindi bikorwa byatuma hahurira abantu benshi birahagarikwa usibye ahahahirwa ibiribwa n’ahandi nko kwa muganga.
Hari bamwe mu bakozi bari batunzwe no kurya ari uko bavuye ku mirimo bita ba nyakabyizi bahise babura akazi.
Umuyobozi w’Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba, Ndungutse Jean Bosco, avuga ko gutabarana mu bihe cy’amage Abanyarwanda babisanganywe mu muco ku buryo ntawe ukwiye kwibaza uko ejo azaramuka mu gihe atarabona uko yitabira umurimo.
Ati “Mu muco nyarwanda agace kagiraga ikibazo yaba inzara ufite ibigega akabasha gutunga abo baturanye, abana barwaye bwaki akabasha kubakamira.
PSF natwe dukwiye kubikora tugakamira abaturanyi bacu, tukabaha ku byo dufite mu ngo aho gufunga ibipangu dukingiranyemo imifuka y’imiceri n’ibindi bintu.”
Ndungutse avuga ko abikorera bishoboye bityo ko bagiye gushaka uko bagoboka Leta mu kwita ku badafite ibibatunga muri iki gihe kandi yizera ko bizagenda neza kuko ngo bitumvikana ukuntu umuzungu yatekereza gufasha Abanyafurika, Abanyarwanda bakaba batafashanya ubwabo.
Agira ati “Niba umuzungu yatanga miliyoni 100 akagurira ibihugu bya Afurika ibikoresho bya COVID-19 Umunyarwanda ntiyananirwa gutanga imodoka y’umuceri, ntiyananirwa gutanga miliyoni 5 zo kugurira abantu akawunga, turaza kubyigaho neza na bagenzi banjye dufashe Leta.”
Abatoni Grace umwe mu bagize itsinda Brothers and Sisters risanzwe rifasha bamwe mu barwayi mu bitaro bya Nyagatare badafite ababazanira ingemu, avuga ko biteguye gufasha n’abanyarwanda bashobora kutabona amafunguro muri iyi minsi ahubwo ngo ikibazo ni ukubamenya.
Ati “Twebwe turiteguye, ubundi twabitwaraga bitetse ariko abaturanyi bo si ngombwa kubatekera twabaha ibibisi.
Ahubwo ikibazo tuzababwirwa n’iki?
Birumvikana sinarya umuturanyi aburaye rwose.
Abayobozi bazatwereke abakeneye inkunga.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyagatare, Mushabe David Claudian, avuga ko abantu barya ari uko bavuye mu kazi bazwi mu midugudu ku buryo habaye ikibazo bafashwa binyuze mu baturanyi babo kimwe n’abandi Banyarwanda bafite umutima wo gufasha.
Anavuga ko ikibazo cyo kubura ifunguro ku basanzwe barya ari uko bavuye mu kazi gishobora no kutagaragara cyane uretse mu mujyi kuko ari bo barya ari uko bavuye mu kazi naho mu cyaro ho ngo barahinze kandi barejeje.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Emmanuel Gasana Sebasaza Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ SEBASAZAGEmman1

Benengango bacucuye imodoka ya Ama G The Black Yanditswe kuya 8-06-2014 saa 10:24' na Munyengabe Murungi Sabin Ubwo yari avuye kuririmba i Gicumbi umuraperi Ama G The Black yasanze aho yari yaparitse imodoka ye mu mujyi wa Kigali abajura bayigabije bavanamo ibikoresho bifuza barangije barigendera.
Ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 07 Kamena 2014 ntiryabereye ryiza uyu muraperi dore ko mu gihe bagenzi be bari bishimiye ko bavuye gutaramana n'abafana babo i Gicumbi we yasanze imodoka ye yafunguwe n'abajura bibamo ibyo bifuza.
Mu kiganiro Ama G The Black yagiranye na IGIHE nyuma gato ya saa (...)
Ubwo yari avuye kuririmba i Gicumbi umuraperi Ama G The Black yasanze aho yari yaparitse imodoka ye mu mujyi wa Kigali abajura bayigabije bavanamo ibikoresho bifuza barangije barigendera.
Ama G yibwe avuye kuririmba mu mujyi wa Gicumbi Ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 07 Kamena 2014 ntiryabereye ryiza uyu muraperi dore ko mu gihe bagenzi be bari bishimiye ko bavuye gutaramana n'abafana babo i Gicumbi we yasanze imodoka ye yafunguwe n'abajura bibamo ibyo bifuza.
Mu kiganiro Ama G The Black yagiranye na IGIHE nyuma gato ya saa mbili z'ijoro ari nabwo yari arimo gukurikirana ikibazo cy'iyi modoka ye, yadutangarije ko bamwibye radiyo yo mu modoka, igikapu cyari cyirimo, ibikoresho byo mu modoka bifunga inzugi, agatabo yifashisha mu kubikuza amafaranga kuri banki n'ibindi.
Yafataga icyo kunywa i Gicumbi atazi ko imodoka ye benengango bayigabije Ama G ati, "Sha imodoka nari nasize nyiparitse imbere ya T2000 mu mujyi, nayisigiye abashinzwe kwishyuza parking nyine.
Ngarutse mvuye i Gicumbi, nayikubise amaso nsanga irafunguye numva umutima uransimbutse."
Akomeza agira ati, " Ngezemo nasanze Radio bayiteruyemo, bavanamo ibyuma bifunga inzugi, sha bagiye bavanamo ibyo bashaka kabisa.
Hari agatabo nkoresha mbikuza amafaranga na ko bakajyanye, igikapu nari nasizemo nacyo bagitwaye, mbese ni danger" Iyi niyo modoka ya Ama G gusa muri iyi minsi yayisize irangi ry'umutuku Ama G amaze kuganira n'abo yari yasize ayirindishije ariko ntibayicunge neza kugeza ubwo abajura babaca mu rihumye bakayiba, bemeranyije ko kuwa Mbere tariki ya 09 Kamena uyu muraperi azabasanga ku cyicaro cya sosiyete yishyuza parking mu mujyi wa Kigali agahabwa indishyi z'ibyibwe mu modoka ye. #12361#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/inama-zigirwa-abantu-bicara-igihe-kinini-mu-kwirinda-uburwayi-bw-umugongo
Inama zigirwa abantu bicara igihe kinini zabafasha kwirinda uburwayi bw’ umugongo Ni kenshi uzasanga umuntu ataka umugongo akakubwira ko yashize nyamara bishobora kuba bituruka mu mibereho yawe ya buri munsi.Byagaragaye ko abantu bicara umwanya munini cyane cyane ku bakora akazi kabasaba kwicara amasaha menshi kandi buri munsi, bagira ibyago byo kurwara umugongo.
Muri iyi nkuru tugiye kubagezaho uburyo umuntu wicara cyane aba agomba kwitwaramo mu rwego rwo kwirinda guhura n’ibibazo by’umugongo.
Rwandamagazine.com yeganiriye na PT Jean Denys NDORIMANA, inzobere mu kuvura hakoreshejwe ubugororangingo (physiotherapist),agira inama abantu bamara amasaha menshi bicaye.
Ngizi inama zigirwa abo bantu bicara igihe kinini: 1.
Kwicara ku ntebe ijyanye n’ameza Mu gihe uziko ukora akazi kagusaba kwicara umwanya munini mu biro ni byiza ko ugenzura intebe wicaraho ko zijyanye n’ameza.
Intebe ijyanye n’ameza igomba kuba ituma umuntu uyicayeho inkokora ze zigomba kuba ziteganye n’ameza, igihe umuntu yicaye umugongo urambuye kandi bikaba bitari busabe ko uzamura amaboko igihe ugiye kwandikira ku mashini.
2.
Kwicara ku ntebe zifite akantu gafata umugongo wo hasi ( back support) Umugongo wo hasi ahanini niwo ugira ibibazo byo kurwara bikaba byiza rero kwicara ku ntebe zigira utuntu dufata umugongo wo hasi.
3.
Gufata akaruhuko byibura buri nyuma y’isaha Ni byiza ko uhindura uburyo wicayemo ugakora imyitozo mito mito nko guhaguruka ukirambura byibura buri nyuma y’isaha imwe,ibi wabyita kwinanura.
4.
Kwirinda guterura ibintu biremereye nabi Igihe ukeneye guterura ikintu kiri hasi wirinda guhina umugongo wonyine ahubwo ugahina amavi kuko iyo uhinye amavi birinda umugongo kuba wakangizwa nibyo bintu uteruye.
“Uzumva abantu bavuga ngo nateruye ibintu numva akagufwa ko mu mugongo karaturitse” ibyo biba ku bantu baba bateruye ibintu biremereye batabanje guhina amavi, aho guhina amavi bakunamisha umugongo wonyine.
5.
Gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri Imyitozo ngoramubiri irimo koga, gukora urugendo,nayo ifasha abantu bicara umwanya muremure kutarwara indwara zifata umugongo.
Wari uzi ko hari ubufasha ku bantu barwaye umugongo ?
Ni byiza kwirinda bimwe mubyo tumaze kuvuga haruguru kuko byangiza umugongo,ariko hari n’ababa barwaye umugongo warabazengereje,ubu rero habonetse inyungariramirire zikoze mu bimera zifasha gufasha ingingo ziba zarangiritse nk’amagufa ndetse n’ibindi bice byo mu ngingo biba bigenda bisaza.Izi nyunganiramirire zirizewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga kuko zibifitiye n’ubuziranendge butangwa n’ibigo bikomeye nka FDA (Food and Drug Admnistration).
Muri yo twavugamo nka : Compound marrow powder, Calcium Capsule, Joint Health Capsules,… Uramutse ukeneye izi nyunganiramirire wagana Horaho Life aho ikorera mu mugi wa Kigali mu nyubako yo kwa Rubangura muri Etage ya 3, mu muryango wa 302 na 301 cyangwa ugahamagara kuri 0789433795/0726355630.

#12362#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/minisante-mu-rugamba-zo-guhangana-n-igituma-abaganga-basezera-umusubizo
Minisante mu rugamba rwo guhangana n’igituma abaganga basezera umusubizo Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itangaza ko nyuma y’uko bigaragaye ko hari abaganga bata akazi bakajya ahandi, yashyizeho ingamba nshya zo gukora ku buryo abaganga batazongera guhora bimuka zirimo no kubashyiriraho banki yo kubitsa no kuguriza( SACCO).
Ku wa 2 Gicurasi 2016 humvikanye amakuru y’uko abaganga batanu b’inzobere muri 45 ibitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK) byari bifite bari bamaze gusezera mu gihe cy’amezi ane.
Impamvu zateraga kugenda kwa benshi muri abo ifitanye isano n’amafaranga babaga bahembwa kuko bivugwa ko umuganga w’inzobere muri CHUK, nibura ahembwa amafaranga ibihumbi 700 cyangwa arenzeho gato ku kwezi, mu gihe abakora mu yigenga bashobora no kurenza miliyoni y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Kuri uyu wa 11 Gicurasi 2017, ubwo iyi Minisiteri yagezaga imbanzirizamushinga y’ingengo y’imari ikeneye muri 2017/2018 kuri Komisiyo y’Ingengo y’Imari n’Umutungo bya Leta mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, Depite Mukama Abbas yasabye ko icyo kibazo cyakwitabwaho.
Yagize ati “Minisiteri y’Ubuzima nidufashe ishyireho politiki yo kugumana abaganga, ubusanzwe biga ari abanyeshuri baba batoranyijwe mu bandi b’abahanga, ibintu bakora ni ibintu bivunnye, ariko buri munsi baragenda, mukore gahunda yo kubagumana ku buryo umuganga washowemo imari akagera ku rwego ruhanitse, mu gitondo atagenda kubera imibereho.”
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima ,Dr Diane Gashumba, yavuze ko ibyo ari ibibazo babonye ariko bari gushyiraho ingamba zo guhangana na byo.
Yagize ati “Akazi k’ubuvuzi ni akazi kagoye umuntu agomba kujyamo agakunze koko, gasaba kwitanga, natwe ingamba dufata ni ugukomeza kubashishikariza gukunda umurimo wabo, kubereka uburyo umurimo wabo ari mwiza, kuborohereza dufatanyije na guverinoma yose kugira ngo umuganga akore ameze neza.”
Yongeyeho ati “Ikindi ni uko abanganga n’abakozi bo mu bitaro bagiye gushyiraho Koperative yo kubitsa no kuguriza (Sacco) yabo, kandi umushinga ugeze kure kugira ngo babashe kwigira kuko kongera umushahara w’abaganga n’abaforomo ntabwo ari ikintu igihugu rwose cyashobora mu gihe gito uko abantu babyifuza.”
Usibye abaganga basezeye muri CHUK, hari abagera kuri barindwi n’abaforomo bane bo mu Bitaro bya Nemba basezeye.
Iyi Minisiteri itangaza ko kugeza ubu hari kwiga abanyeshuri bashya muri kuminuza mu ishami ry’ubuvuzi bagera kuri 300, kandi buri mwaka ngo bashyira hanze abagera kuri 35 ku buryo abavuyemo batazabura ababasimbura.
Minisitiri w'Ubuzima, Dr Diane Gashumba

#12376#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/gakenke-havumbuwe-grenade-n-amasasu-40
Gakenke: Havumbuwe grenade n'amasasu 40 Ahagana saa yine za mugitondo, kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 23/04/2013, mu Karere ka Gakenke, Umurenge wa Gashenyi, Akagali ka Nyacyina mu mudugudu wa Mukira, umuturage yataburuye igisasu cyo mu bwoko bwa grenade n'amasasu 40.
Ubwo umuturage witwa Nyirandayahaze Chantal yahingaga mu murima we, yaguye kuri grenade n'amasasu 40 bigaragara ko bimaze igihe kinini.
Bikekwa ko ari ibisasu byo mu gihe cy'intambara y'abacengezi yayogoje Akarere ka Gakenke.
Ubuyobozi bw'umurenge bwihutiye kubimenyesha abashinzwe umutekano nabo bahita bahagera babikuraho kugira ngo bitagira ubuzima bw'Umunyarwanda bihitana; nk' uko bitangazwa na Byiringiro Simeon, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Gashenyi.
Mu kuboza 2012, abana babiri b'abavandimwe bo mu Mudugudu wa Mutara, Akagali ka Raba, Umurenge wa Minazi bitabye Imana bahitanwe n'igisasu cyo mu bwoko bwa Grenade batoraguye baragikinisha kirabaturikana.
Mu myaka ya 1997-1998, Akarere ka Gakenke kabaye indiri y'abacengezi bityo ibyo bisasu bitoragurwa bikaba bishobora kuba bifitinye isano na byo.
Nshimiyimana Leonard

#12382#	4	health	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Ubuzima/article/Abaganga-b-indwara-z-uruhu-baraburira-abiharaje-kwisiga-amavuta-ya-mukorogo
Abaganga b’indwara z’uruhu baraburira abiharaje kwisiga amavuta ya mukorogo Abaganga b’inzobere mu kuvura indwara z’uruhu ndetse n’abahanga mu byerekeye imiti ( Pharmacien ) bahuriye i Kigali mu nama yari igamije kungurana ibitekerezo ku buryo bwo gukumira no kurwanya indwara z’uruhu, bakomoza ku bubi bw’uruvangitirane rw’amavuta bamwe baharaye gukoresha yamenyekanye nka ’Mukorogo’.
Iyi nama yabaye kuwa Gatanu tariki 29 Kanama 2018, yahuriyemo n’abaganga ndetse n’abaganga mu by’imiti baturutse hirya no hino mu gihugu, yateguwe ku bufatanye na KIPHARMA –SEBAPHARMA.
Ingingo nyamukuru y’utuntu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yari iyo kwiga ku buryo bwo kwita ku ruhu no kuvura indwara zitandukanye zifata uruhu zikarwangiza.
Hanagarutswe kandi ku bantu biharaje guhindura uruhu rwabo bakoresheje uruvangitirane rw’imiti inyuranye, ibintu Abahanga mu by’imiti ndetse n’abaganga b’uruhu bavuze ko bigira ingaruka zikomeye ku bisiga ayo mavuta.
Dr Gahongayire Francoise, impuguke mu bijyanye n’indwara z’uruhu, yavuze ko abisiga za mukorogo babikora byabanje kugenzura ngo bamenye ziba zakozwe mu buhe buryo, cyane ko aba ari imiti ivangwavangwa ishobora kugira ingaruka nyinshi kandi zikomeye ku mubiri w’uwayikoresheje.
Yanavuze ko n’ubwo benshi bisiga ayo mavuta ya mukorogo bashaka guhindura uruhu rwabo, ngo ari uko baba batamenye ko bashobora kwegera abaganga bakabagira inama ndetse bakanababwira amavuta yabugenewe bashobora gukoresha bahindura uruhu kandi ntabagireho ingaruka.
Yagize ati “Si mbona impamvu ushaka guhinduka, simbona impamvu ushaka kuba umuzungu kandi uwo muzungu nta n’ubwo uzanaba we kuko kenshi uzasanga ibyo bintu azajya gukoresha, wenda ubwa mbere ibyumweru bibiri cyangwa bitanu azaba koko yishimiye kuba yarahindutse atagifite urwo rukara.
Ariko nyuma yaho ahubwo aba mubi kurushaho, nshobora kukwemeza ko hari abantu batakiva mu nzu kubera mukorogo bisize.”
Umuhanga mu by’imiti uyobora Umuryango Nyarwanda ugamije kurushaho kuzamura ubuzima rusange bw’abaturage Organization for public healthy improvement (OPHI) Uwambajineza Tito, yavuze ko aya mavuta ya mukorogo ari ibintu bikorwa n’abantu ahanini baba batabifitiye ubumenyi buhagije.
Yagize ati “Ibya mukorogo ni ibintu bikorwa n’abantu badasobanukiwe icyo umuti aricyo, kubera ko iyo uri umuhanga mu by’imiti uba uzi ngo niba ari imiti ugiye kuvanga, urayivanga ku ruhe rwego, urashyiramo niba wenda nabyita nk’ubukana."
Yunzemo ati "Ubukana bw’uyu muti nimbuvanga n’ubwuyu burakemura ikibazo umuntu afite?
Ibyo ngibyo rero bikorerwa inyingo ukanabyemererwa n’inzego zigiye zitandukanye ntabwo ari ibintu ujya ahantu hihishe ukavangavanga ugahereza abantu.”
Uwambajineza yavuze ko hari igihe abakora mu mwuga wa farumasi cyangwa abandi bahanga mu by’imiti baha abaturage imiti batabanje kumenya iyo bakeneye, by’umwihariko iyi y’uruhu avuga ko rugira ibyiciro bitandukanye birimo uruhu ruba rwumye, urw’amavuta n’uruhu rukakaye cyane.
Abahanga mu by’imiti ndetse n’inzobere z’abaganga n’indwara z’uruhu bagarutse ku ngaruka z’amavuta ya mukorogo Umuhanga mu by’imiti uyobora Umuryango Nyarwanda ugamije kurushaho kuzamura ubuzima rusange bw’abaturage (OPHI) Uwambajineza Tito

#12397#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/ahantu-umunani-ho-kwibandaho-mu-isuku-yo-mu-rugo
Ahantu umunani ho kwibandaho mu isuku yo mu rugo Abantu bagakwiye kwibanda ku buryo bwo kwirinda ko ’microbes’ zigira ingaruka mbi ku buzima zikwirakwira mu ngo zabo, aho kwibanda ku gusukura ahagaragara ko "hasa nabi".
Ibi ni ibikubiye mu bushakashatsi bushya bw’ikigo cyigenga cyita ku buzima cyo mu Bwongereza.
Ubu bushakashatsi bw’ikigo Royal Society for Public Health (RSPH) buvuga ko gukaraba intoki, kumesa ibitambaro byo guhanagura amasahani n’ibindi byombo, no koza ahategurirwa amafunguro byose bikozwe mu gihe cya nyacyo, ari ingenzi ku isuku.
Ariko ubushakashatsi bw’iki kigo buburira ko umuntu umwe muri buri bantu bane aba atekereza ko ibyo atari ingenzi.
Kwita ku isuku neza bishobora kugabanya indwara zandura ndetse no guha ubushobozi n’imiti imwe iba itagishobora indwara, nkuko ubu bushakashatsi bubivuga.
Kandi ngo nta "suku ikabije" ibaho.
Ubu bushakashatsi buvuga hari urujijo mu baturage ku itandukaniro hagati y’umwanda, ’microbes’, gucya, n’isuku.
Mu bantu 2000 bakoreweho ubu bushakashatsi, 23% muri bo batekereza ko abana bacyeneye gushyirwa muri ’microbes’ zagira ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwabo ngo hubakwe ubwirinzi bw’umubiri wabo.
Ariko impuguke zakoze ubu bushakashatsi zivuga ko iyi ari "imyumvire ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi" igatuma bishoka ko indwara zahitana ubuzima bwabo.
Izi mpuguke zisaba ko ahubwo abantu bakwiye kwibanda ku gusukura ahantu h’ingenzi mu bihe by’ingenzi, nubwo haba hagaragara nk’ahasukuye, mu kurinda ko ’microbes’ ’mbi’ zikwiragira.
Ni ibihe bice 8 byo kwibandaho mu isuku mu ngo ?
Ubu bushakashatsi buvuga ko ari ingenzi by’umwihariko gukaraba intoki nyuma yo gufata ibiribwa, uvuye mu bwiherero, umaze gukorora, kwitsamura, kwita ku murwayi no kwita ku mbwa.
Bwongeraho ko ari ingenzi gusukura igikoni n’aho gukatira ibiribwa bibisi nk’inyama n’ibikomoka ku nkoko n’ibindi byo mu muryango wazo, cyangwa mbere yo guteka ibiryo byoroheje nk’imigati.
Ubu bushakashatsi buvuga ko hasi mu nzu hashobora kugaragara ko handuye, ariko ko haba hari ’microbes’ akenshi zidashobora kugira ingaruka nini ku buzima.
Gusukura bikuraho ’bactérie’ gute ?
Koza ahantu ku buso runaka ndetse n’ibikoresho byo mu gikoni ugakoresha amazi y’akazuyaze kandi arimo isabune, bikuraho udukoko twa ’bactérie’, tukajyana n’ayo mazi mu gihe uri koza ununyuguza.
Ariko kugira ngo ’bactéries’ zipfe neza neza, bisaba kuzitwikisha amazi ashyushye ku kigero kirenga dogere 70C kandi ibyo woza ukabimaza akanya muri ayo mazi, nkuko bivugwa n’ikigo Food Standards Agency cyita ku buziranenge bw’ibiribwa mu Bwongereza.
Profeseri Sally Bloomfield, wo kuri Kaminuza ya London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, avuga ko abantu bakwiye gusobanukirwa n’itandukaniro riri hagati y’isuku no kuba ahantu cyangwa umuntu agaragara ko acyeye.
"Mu gihe gusukura bivuze gukuraho umwanda na za ’microbes’, isuku yo ni [umuco wo] ugusukura ahantu ha ngombwa no mu bihe bya ngombwa, mu kwirinda kwandura indwara nko mu gihe hategurwa amafunguro, mu gihe cyo gukoresha ubwiherero."
Profeseri Lisa Ackerley, impuguke mu isuku y’ibiribwa wo mu kigo RSPH cyakoze ubu bushakashatsi, yavuze ko "isuku mu ngo mu buzima bwa buri munsi ifasha kugabanya indwara zandura, kandi ni ingenzi cyane mu kurinda abana bacu."
BBC

#12426#	8	technology	https://rwandamagazine.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/porsche-na-boeing-bagiye-gukora-imodoka-ziguruka
Porsche na Boeing bagiye gukora ’imodoka ziguruka’ Urambiwe n’umubyigano w’imodoka utwaye iyawe!?
Ihangane igisubizo kiraje!!
Uruganda rukora imodoka Porsche n’urukora indege Boeing basinye amasezerano yo gufatanya bagakora ibikoresho kigenda mu mujyi gishobora no kuguruka.
Mu rurimi rwacu cyakwitwa ’imodoka ziguruka’.
Porsche itangaza ko yifuza kurenga ibyo gukora imodoka nziza za siporo ikagera ku rundi rwego rwo "gutwara abantu ku yindi ntera" itari ubutaka.
Detlev von Platen ushinzwe ibyo kwamamaraza muri Porsche avuga ko kompanyi zombi ziri guhuza imbaraga kugira ngo zirebe kuri iri soko rishya ryo gutwara abantu ryo mu gihe kiri imbere.
Izi kompanyi zivuga ko mu gitekerezo izi ’modoka ziguruka’ zigomba kuba zikoresha ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Zizajya kandi zihagurukira aho ziri zijya mu kirere cya bugufi aho zizagenda nk’indege kandi zamanuka hasi zikagenda nk’imodoka.
Ba enjeniyeri (’ingénieurs’) ba kompanyi zombi ni bo bazashyira mu bikorwa igerageza ry’uyu mushinga nk’uko itangazo ry’izi kompanyi ribivuga.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Porsche mu 2018 buvuga ko ’imodoka’ ziteye gutya zishobora kuzaba zirimo gukoreshwa cyane mu 2025.
Porsche ivuga ko nibigerwaho bizatanga igisubizo cyo gutwara abantu vuba, bihendutse, byoroshye kandi mu mutekano kurusha mu buryo busanzwe bw’imodoka mu mihanda bumenyerewe.

IJAMBYO RY'IMANA: Kumwizera byaduhesheje kuba ab'agaciro imbere y'isumbabyose!
Yatumenye kera itaraturema, mbere y'uko tubaho yari ituzi iduhindura abana bayo binyuza mu mfura yayo Yesu Kristo.
Umuririmbyi niwe waririmbye neza ati : "Nisanze mu rukundo rwawe wambereye uburuhukiro ubuntu bwawe bumpagije ndi kumwe nawe ndaruhutse".

Aba ni abamwemeye bose bivuga ngo abemeye kumwemera bakizera izina rye gusa, nta yandi mananiza abo bahindutse abana b'Imana.
Agakiza katanzwe ku buntu nta kiguzi, agakiza ni ak'abantu bose abaremwe baragafite abariho bose bahawe agakiza ariko nyamara abakarimo ni abakakiriye gusa, ariko hari n'abagahawe batakakiriye ariko baragafite kari imbere yabo n'uyu mwanya yashaka kukakira yakakira, n'aka kanya umuntu yashaka kugatahana yagacyura nta kiguzi.

Ni ukuvuga ngo niwanga gukingura ntabwo azasunika utabishaka, ntabwo azahatiriza ngo yinjire iwawe ku ngufu Oya!
Kristo ni umunyamahoro wuje urukundo rutagereranywa.
Imana igambirira kurema umuntu yashatse ko aba mu ishusho yayo agasa nayo.
Ni nako kuduha ishusho y'umwana wayo ikunda Yesu Kristo, bimwe mu byatumye ishaka kuduha ishusho nkiy'umwana wayo ikunda kwari ukugira ngo Yesu aronke abandi basa nawe mu bwami bw'Imana, ikindi kwari ukugirango Yesu abone bene se b'abantu babe barumuna be mu bwami bw'Imana ibi bimuheshe kuba mukuru wa bose, abe imfura ya bose, ategeke bose hanyuma abariho bose bamwigane bamwizere bamukurikire.
Kuko umwana iyo ari ikinege mu rugo ntaba ari imfura ntaba ari n'umuherezi, na none mu rundi ruhande aba ari imfura akaba n'umuherezi ariko iyo afite abo bavukana nibo batuma habaho kwemeza neza bidasubirwaho umuherezi n'imfura y'umuryango.
Imana ishimwe kuko byatumye natwe duhinduka abana b'Imana kubwa Kristo Yesu.
Iyo nizeye Kristo nkamwinjiramo nawe akambamo sinjye uba nkigaragara, aho niho Pawulo yabivuze neza ati "si njye ndiho ahubwo ni Kristo uri muri njye, ni kristo ugaragara ubu noneho naho njye singihari".
Icyo gihe uba wagiye muri we hakaboneka we gusa wowe ntuboneke, iyo wemeye ukinjira muri we, kubwo kwizera ahita akwambika gukiranuka kwe kuko gukiranuka kwawe ntiwakwishoboza kuragoye ariko hamwe n'imbaraga ze no gukiranuka kwe ibi nibyo bituma Imana iyo iturebeye muri Kristo Yesu itwemera.
Ntabwo Imana ishobora kukwemera itakubona mu mwana wayo, ariko nikubona muri we uwo munsi izakwemera ikwite ukiranuka.
Uwiteka umucamanza iyo ambonyeho amaraso ntancira urubanza rubi ahubwo anyita ukiranuka.
Akenshi iyo nigisha ijambo ry'Imana ntya nkunda gutanga ingero z'ibyo tubona mu buzima busanzwe kugira ngo zidufashe gusobanukira neza.
Ndabaha urugero ku bantu boroye inka cyangwa se bigeze gutunga inka, muzi yuko ntibishoboka ko inka ushobora kuyikama ngo yemere kukugirira impuhwe ikurekurire amata inyana yayo itarabanza konka ntibishoboka.
Inka irekura amata kubera imbabazi z'akanyana kayo, iyo ibonye kaje irabira ikanezerwa, zimwe zijya zisimbuka ku misozi zishaka inyana zazo zazibona zigatuza, iyo inyana itaronka icebe rya nyina amabere ya nyina amata ntashobora kuza ni ngombwa ko inyana ibanza gukurura amata hanyuma nawe ushaka gukama ukinjirira ku kanyana kayo uje gusa ukayisanga ku musozi aho uri ngo urayikama yagutera umugeri ukumirwa ariko iyo irikubona akanya kayo iruhande aho, inanirwa gutera amahane ngo ibe yagutera umugeri wowe uri kuyikama kugira ngo idahusha ikawutera akanyana kayo ibyo bigatuma ituza, nawe kuko winjiriye ku nyana yayo ukakagiriraho ayo mahirwe yo gukama nyina mu mutuzo ukesha akanyana kayo, ukayakama witonze kugeza uhumuje.
Ntabwo Imana yatwemera itaturebeye mu mwana wayo ikunda twagereranya na kariya kanyana, Iyo Imana ituboneye mu mwana wayo Yesu Kristo ijya irekura imigisha yose yo mu mwuka, ikarekura n'imigisha yose yo mu mubiri ikayitwoherereza kubera ko iturebeye muri Kristo uburakari bwayo bugashira ikavuga iti nubwo ari babi ariko kuko bari mu mwana wanjye Yesu ndabemera uko bari kwose.

Keila, izina ry’umukobwa ukunda kubaho mu buzima bwiza Izina Keila rikomoka mu Rurimi rw’Igiheburayo rikaba ryarakunze no gukoreshwa cyane muri Bibiliya rigereranywa n’inyubako nini.

Hakuweho uburyo abakinnyi baserukiraga u Rwanda mu mahanga batabihiganiye Ku bufatanye na Minisiteri ya Siporo n’Umuco, Komite Olempike yafashe icyemezo ko nta mukinnyi uzongera kujya yemererwa kujya guserukira u Rwanda mu marushanwa mpuzamahanga atabanje guhiganwa n’abandi mu gihugu kugira ngo hahabwe amahirwe ushoboye.
Mu mikino imwe n’imwe, hagiye hakunda kuvugwa abakinnyi bumva ko bakomeye bazahamagarwa byanze bikunze igihe cyose ikipe y’igihugu izaba igiye gusohoka mu marushanwa mpuzamahanga, bigatuma birara kuko ntabo bahanganye.
Nk’uko Perezida wa Komite, Olempike Amb.
Munyabagisha Valens, yabitangarije abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa Gatatu, ubwo habaga igikorwa cyo gutoranya abangavu n’ingimbi bazaserukira u Rwanda mu mikino Nyafurika y’abato ‘African Youth Games’ izabera Alger, basanze gufata abakinnyi bamwe buri gihe bituma nta mbaraga bashyiramo bikagira n’ingaruka ku musaruro.

Mbere amashyirahamwe y’imikino niyo yaduhaga amazina y’abameze neza ariko twabonaga ko bagenda bakirara, bakaba bamara n’igihe batitoza kuko bazi ko ari bo bazagenda.”
Igikorwa cyo gukoresha amarushanwa abitegura gusohokera igihugu cyatangiriye ku bangavu n’ingimbi zikina volleyball yo ku mucanga, aho abakobwa 10 bagize amakipe atanu kuko bakina ari babiri babiri, kimwe n’abahungu bahuriye i Remera bahanganiye itike yo kuzitabira imikino y’urubyiruko ku rwego rwa Afurika iteganyijwe ku wa 18-28 Nyakanga 2018 i Alger muri Algeria.
Mu bakobwa hari hasanzwe hari ikipe ya Munezero Valentine wiga muri IPRC Kigali na Musabyimana Penelope wiga muri Saint Joseph i Kabgayi, yitabiriye amarushanwa ya Commonwealth yabereye Bahamas umwaka ushize ikegukana umudali wa Bronze.
Kubera amabwiriza mashya ya Komite Olempike, iyi kipe yahanganye n’izindi eshatu, yitwara neza ariko haboneka indi igizwe na Ingabire Hycentha wiga muri Saint Joseph na Kayitesi Clementine wiga muri Saint Aloys, nayo ihagaze neza bituma zifatwa zombi zijya mu mwiherero, aho zizakomeza guhatana inziza ikaba ariyo izasohoka.
Mu bahungu, naho hafashwe amakipe abiri yitwaye neza muri atanu yakinnye imikino y’amajonjora, iya mbere igizwe na Kageruka Cedrick na Masabo Bernard biga muri College Christ Roi; indi igizwe na Ngabo Rwamuhizi Romeo wiga muri PSVF de Butare na Ndahayo Dieu Est la wiga muri Don Bosco Gatenga, nabo bajya mu mwiherero hakazavamo imwe izajya muri Algeria.
Muri African Youth Games, u Rwanda ruzaserukirwa mu mikino itatu harimo volleyball, karate no gusiganwa ku maguru, amajonjora y’abazajyayo akazakorwa ku Cyumweru tariki 10 Kamena.
Abana bose bahawe amahirwe yo kugaragaza impano zabo bitandukanye na mbere aho hasohokaga abasanzwe ari aba mbere nta marushanwa yandi bakoze Perezida wa Komite Olempike, Amb.
Munyabagisha Valens, aganiriza abana bitabiriye amajonjora Umutoza w'ikipe y'igihugu ya Volleyball, Paul Bitok, ari mu bafashije gutoranya abakinnyi Mu bakobwa imikino y'amajonjora yitabiriwe n'amakipe ane, buri imwe igizwe n'abakinnyi babiri Perezida wa Komite, Olempike Amb.
Munyabagisha Valens, aganira n'itangazamakuru

#12487#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/perezida-wa-repubulika-ya
Perezida wa Repubulika ya Centrafrique arashima Polisi y'u Rwanda kuba yaratabariye ku gihe Perezida wa Repubulika ya Centrafrique Catherine Samba Panza yagiranye n'abanyamakuru tariki ya 4 Nzeli mu ngoro y' umukuru w' igihugu i Bangui, yashimye uruhare rwa Leta y' u Rwanda mu kubungabunga no kugarura amahoro rwohereza abapolisi n'abasirikari muri icyo gihugu.
Catherine Panza, Perezida wa Centrafrique Uyu muyobozi yanashimye kandi ko u Rwanda rwohereje abapolisi kandi bagatabara mbere y'igihe cyari giteganyijwe muri icyo gihugu cyakomwe mu nkokora n' umutekano mucye, aho yavuze ko iki gikorwa ari: "ntagereranywa".
Perezida Samba yasobanuye ko igihugu abereye umuyobozi cyanyuze mu bihe bikomeye by' umutekano mucye byagiye biterwa n' abantu ku giti cyabo ndetse n' udutsiko tw' abantu.
Nyakubahwa Samba yavuze kandi ko guhangana n'ibi bibazo bisaba inzego z' umutekano zikora kinyamwuga kugira ngo zibashe kugarura amahoro n' ituze, ndetse izo nzego kandi zikanasangiza ubunararibonye bwazo na Polisi y' icyo gihugu.
By'umwihariko yashimye intambwe u Rwanda rugezeho, kugeza n'aho rwohereza abapolisi mbere y'uko itariki yateganyijwe n'Umuryango w'Abibumbye igera.
Yagize ati "Kuri ubu hari ubufatanye bukomeye cyane hagati ya Centrafrique n'u Rwanda, kandi ku mpande zombi turishimira iyi mikoranire.
Ndashima ko igihe twasabaga abapolisi bagarura amahoro u Rwanda rwabaye urwa mbere mu kutwereka ko bifuza kutwoherereza itsinda ryabo."
Kuri gahunda y'Umuryango w'Abibumbye, hagaragaza ko abapolisi n'abasirikare bagomba guturuka imihanda yose boherezwa muri Centrafrique bagomba kuhagera ku wa 15 Nzeri, ariko Polisi y'u Rwanda yo yahisemo kohereza mbere itsinda ribanza mu 140 bazagenda mu byiciro bine, ryahagurutse ku wa 1 Nzeri.
Ibi bikaba byarafashije iki gihugu nk'uko Perezida Samba-Panza yabivuze agira ati "Mu byumweru bicye bishize, twagiye tubona udutsiko tw' abantu bitwaje intwaro banakora ibikorwa by'ubugizi bwa nabi kuko bumvaga ko abacunga umutekano bazaza ku wa 15 Nzeri nk'itariki yatanzwe, ariko kuva aho aba Polisi b' u Rwanda bahagereye ibi byose byahise bihosha."
Yongeraho ati "Ukuza kw'abapolisi b'u Rwanda bubahiriza amahoro ni ishema kuri twe, kuko badufasha gukumira ibyo byaha."
Itsinda ry' aba Polisi b' u Rwanda 140, barimo ab' igitsinagore 14, bazakora ibikorwa byo ku bungabunga no kugarura amahoro, birimo nko kurinda abayobozi bakuru n' ibikorwa remezo, gukora amarondo n'ibindi.
Catherine Zamba ndetse wigeze no kuba umuyobozi w' umugi wa Bangui mbere yuko atorerwa kuyobora iki gihugu, yashimiye n'ingabo z' u Rwanda uruhare rukomeye rwo kubungabunga amahoro kuva zagera muri icyo gihugu mu kwezi kwa Mutarama uyu mwaka.
Yakomeje agira ati, "Kuva bakihagera ndetse bakanahabwa n' inshingano yo kundinda nk' umukuru w' igihugu, nababonyemo kuba ari abasirikare koko b' umwuga, bafite icyerekezo, bubaha ndetse bafite urukundo.
Ibi byose ni ingezi k' umusirikare uri mu butumwa bw' amahoro, ni nayo mpamvu yatumye mbahitamo kugira ngo bandindire umutekano."
U Rwanda kuri ubu rufite abasirikare 850 mu gihugu cya Centrafrique.
Muri bimwe mu bikorwa bikorwa n' ingabo z' u Rwanda hakaba harimo, kurinda no guherekeza umukuru w' igihugu ndetse na Perezida wa Sena, kurinda umutekano w' abayobozi b' amadini Gatorika, Anglikani, abayisiramu, ndetse aba basirikare bakaba banarinda gereza nkuru y' icyo gihugu n' ibindi bikorwa remezo bitandukanye.
Amakimbirane yanaje kuvamo ubwicanyi bw' indengakamere mu gihugu cya Centrafrique bwatangiye mu Ukuboza 2013, aho umutwe w' inyeshyamba Anti- Baraka ushingiye ku idini rya gikirisitu washinjaga undi mutwe w' inyeshyamba wa Sereka ugizwe n' abayisiramu kuba warakoraga ibikorwa byo kubahiga no kubica, ibi akaba aribyo byatumye Sereka nayo yirwanaho ndetse bikaza gutuma amagana n' amagana y' abantu bicwa abandi bakava mu ngo zabo bahunga iyi mirwano.
Kugeza ubu u Rwanda rufite abapolisi 528 mu butumwa bw'amahoro bw'umuryango w'abibumbye mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi.

Ibiranga ba Emilienne Ba Emilienne usanga bakunda guhindagurwa n’ibihe gusa bagira impano ikomeye yo gukemura ibibazo ibyo aribyo byose bahuye nabyo neza kandi vuba.
Ni abantu bakunda gusabana cyane kandi bakizihirwa no kubana n’inshuti zabo.

Ni abanyempuhwe nyinshi.
Ba Emilienne na bo bakunda ukuri n’ubutabera muri byose, bakunda ubwisanzure mu buzima bwabo, bakabangamirwa no kubohwa n’amategeko runaka kuko bibabuza umudendezo wabo.

Afurika yo Munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara imaze kugira abarenga 25 000 bagaragayeho COVID-19, barimo abarenga 1,200 imaze guhitana.

Mu 2018, hari abantu miliyoni 213 barwaye Malaria muri bo 360,000 bazize urupfu rufitanye isano nayo, barenga 90% ku Isi.
OMS yavuze ko ingufu zo gucogoza Coronavirus nizirenga ¾ by’izo kurwanya Malaria, impfu zizikuba kabiri zikagera ku 769 000.
Kwiyongera kw’ibyo byago bifitanye isano n’imbaraga zagabanutse mu gutanga inzitiramibu kubera imbaraga zose zashyizwe ku guhashya icyorezo cya COVID-19.
OMS yavuze ko ibihugu birimo Bénin, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Sierra Leone na Chad byashyizeho gahunda zabyo zo kurwanya Malaria muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19 ndetse bikwiye kubera ibindi icyitegererezo.
Ibihugu nibyibagirwa ingamba zo kurwanya Malaria kubera imbaraga zashyizwe mu guhashya Coronavirus, iyi ndwara ishobora kuzikuba kabiri muri uyu mwaka

Yanaboneyeho gusubiza Bebe Cool amwita impyisi ati “Ntuzagendere kubandi ngo ugaragaze icyubahiro cyawe, Imana yonyine niyo yo gukuzwa. nubwo washaka ubundi buryo bwose ariko bizaguma gutyo.
Ntago nakwigereranya n’abandi kuko izo n’impyisi ariko barikumpa impano ihagije bihamya ko ndi Intare !!!
Ndi umunyamugisha.
” Kuva mu mwaka wa 2005 nibwo hatangiye kuvugwa umwiryane hagati ya Bebe Cool na Chameleone ubwo batangiraga gukora indirimbo zishotorana ndetse zumvikanamo ihangana ry’amagambo.
Ibya Bebe Cool na Chameleone nta wamenya uko n’aho biyungira kuko rimwe bagaragaraga mu itangazamakuru bashwanye ubundi bakagaragara basangira agacupa nk’abavandimwe.

Hamaze gutorwa Umudepite usimbura Kabahizi Celestin muri EALA Karinda Francois, watorewe guhagararira u Rwanda muri EALA Karinda Francois Xavier ni we umaze gutorwa n'abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y'u Rwanda kuri uyu wa gatanu , ngo asimbure Kabahizi Celestin weguye mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y'Umuryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba (EALA).
Karinda w'imyaka 53 ni umurwanashyaka wa PSD, akaba yari amaze imyaka 19 yigisha muri Kaminuza y'u Rwanda.Ni umwe mu bagize inama nkuru y'ubushinjacyaha.
Yatsinze ku majwi 79, kuri 12 ya Uwera Pelagie bari bahanganye.
Karinda yatangarije abanyamakuru ko mu mirimo ashinzwe atazaharanira inyungu ze bwite, kandi ko azaharanira guteza imbere indangagaciro z'abanyarwanda.
Ati: "Nzakora inshingano mpawe, nkazikora ntirebyeho ntareba inyungu zanjye ahubwo ndeba ku igihugu cyose .
Nzaharanira ko indangagaciro nyarwanda zumvikana kandi mparanira ko tugira uruhare mu mikorere y'Umuryango."
Karinda afite impamyabumenyi y'ikirenga (PHD) mu by'amategeko y'ubucuruzi, mu gace k'umutungo mu by'ubwenge , yayikuye muri Canada.
Karinda Francois (ibumoso) na Uwera Pelagie bari bahanganye Amakuru y'iyegura rya Kabahizi Celestin yatangiye kumenyekana tariki 6 Kamena uyu mwaka.
Kabahizi Celestin w'imyaka 55 mbere y'uko ajya mu Nteko ya EALA yari Guverineri w'Intara y'Iburengerazuba imyaka itanu.
Akaba yari umwe mu badepite 5 bahagarariye u Rwanda muri iyi Nteko, akaba akomoka mu Ishyaka PSD.

Ntimugapfobye amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi nararokotse- Kabarari Valens Umwanditsi Kabarari Valens aheruka gusohora igitabo yise ‘‘Vivant’’ kigaruka ku mateka yabayemo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ashimangira ko atazamerera ko hari abapfobya ayo mateka.
Kabarari ni Umunyarwanda w’imyaka 34 wubatse, afite umwana umwe akaba atuye aho bita Meuse mu Bufaransa aho amaze imyaka igera kuri 14 muri icyo gihugu.
Uyu mugabo yageze mu Bufaransa ahakomereza amashuri ye mu bijyanye no gukora flime.
Mu minsi ishize IGIHE yagiranye ikiganiro cyihariye na Kabarari cyagarutse kuri bimwe mu bikubiye mu gitabo cye ‘‘Vivant’’, yahaye igisobanuro cyo mu Kinyarwanda nka ‘‘Ntacyo mukibaye.’’
Yagize ati ‘‘Nanditse kugira ngo abagerageza gupfobya amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi nararokotse batiharira uruvugiro.’’
Yanagarutse ku buryo yasanze u Rwanda yagarutsemo nyuma y’imyaka 14 aruvuyemo ngo aruhure umutima rw’ibyo yaruboneyemo mu 1994.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Tariki ya 6 Mata, 1994, indege yarimo Perezida Habyarimana yararashwe, bamwe bajya mu mihanda bati ‘Ikinani cyahanutse barabyina’, nanjye aho nari ndi numvaga nasohoka nkajya kubyina mu muhanda na bagenzi banye, ariko byihuse nabonye mu maso ya Data ko atari igihe cyo kwishimira, ko njye ntemerewe kwishima muri ibyo bihe kuko byagaragaraga ko natwe urupfu rudutegereje.’’
Kabarari Valens yavuze ko buri gihe ikintu kimugaruka mu mutwe ari ijambo se yamubwiye baryamye ku rubaraza i Jali muri Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi.
Yagize ati ‘‘Mwana wanjye bagiye kutwica, ibi yabimbwiye nyuma yaho yari arambiwe mu by’ukuri kuturema agatima nkuko yabikoraga mbere ngo dutuze.
Akimara kubimbwira nemeye ko ibintu bikomeye kuko njye kubera ubwana nabonaga kuba turi kumwe twese ari ibintu byiza abavandimwe, ba sogokuru, ba masenge n’abandi benshi twari twateranye.’’
‘‘Twari kumwe kandi na murumuna wanjye witwaga Baganizi Phocas, uwamukurikiraga witwaga Uwamahoro Jeannette abo bombi barishwe, hicwa kandi Data Kabarari Callixte na Mama Mugorewabera Geneviève; harokoka Kanamugire Didas na mushiki wacu w’imfura Kayitesi Judence.’’
Mu kuvuga inkuru yo kurokoka kwe, Kabarari avuga ko yashenguwe bikomeye n’urupfu rwa murumuna wa se witwaga Murenzi Wellars wakoraga icyo gihe mu kigo cyari gishinzwe umuriro n’Amazi cyitwa Electrogaz.
Ati ‘‘Bamwishe bamuteye icyuma ndeba, yari umuntu numvaga ko adashobora gupfa.’’
Kabarari yahisemo kwandika ku mateka ye agamije gutanga umusanzu we mu kubungabunga amateka ya Jenoside.
Ati ‘‘Kwandika rero byaramfashije cyane kuko nsa n’uwatuye umutwaro w’ibyo nabagamo mbere yo kwandika, kuko mbere najyaga mbiganiriza mushiki wanjye Kayitesi ko ntemera ko Murenzi yishwe, kandi naramwiboneye bamwica, ariko nkumva ko umunsi umwe nzongera nkamubona.
Maze kubishyira ku rupapuro ni bwo nemeye koko ndabyakira ko yishwe, ko ba sogokuru bishwe, ko ababyeyi banjye bishwe, ko abo tuva inda imwe babiri bishwe n’abandi.’’
Yashimye Inkotanyi zamurokoye aho hari i Jali, zikamufasha kongera kugarura icyizere cyo kubaho.
Kanda hano ubashe kubona igitabo ‘‘Vivant’’ cya Kabarari Valens.

Sadate yasubije abasabye ko habaho inteko rusange Umuyobozi w’ikipe ya Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate yasubije abanyamuryango b’iyi kipe bari basabye ko habaho inteko rusange idasanzwe ngo higwe uburyo hakemurwa ibibazo bivugwa muri iyi kipe ya ’rubanda’, ababwira ko bidashoboka ko iyo nteko rusange itumizwa.
Abanyamuryango ba Rayon Sports 27 nibo banditse ibaruwa kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 8 Kanama 2020, basaba Perezida wayo gutumiza inama y’Inteko Rusange kugira ngo ibibazo biri mu ikipe ngo byagarutsweho mu itangazamakuru bishakirwe umuti.
Munyakazi Sadate uyobora Rayon Sports yari yakiriye iyo baruwa yasabaga inteko rusange.
Kuri iki cyumweru tariki 9 Kanama 2020 Sadate yari yatangarije Rwandamagazine.com ko igisubizo yagombaga kugitanga vuba.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 10 Kanama 2020 nibwo ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports bwanditse ibaruwa busubiza abo banyamuryango ba Rayon Sports.
Hari nyuma gato y’uko hatangajwe ko inzego zose za Rayon Sports zibaye zihagaritswe, uretse Komite nyobozi.
Ibaruwa Munyakazi Sadate yanditse ashyizeho amazina yose y’abasinye basaba ko hatumizwa inteko rusange idasanzwe, iragira iti " Nshingiye ku ibaruwa nandikiwe n’umukuru w’urwego rw’igihugu rw’imiyoborere(RGB), nshingiye ku ibaruwa nandikiye abagize inzego za Association Rayon Sports izimenyesha ko zibaye zihagaritswe , mbabajwe ko kubamenyesha ko inama y’inteko rusange idasanzwe mwasabye idashobora kuzatumizwa kuko uretse urwego nyobozi (Komite nyobozi), izindi nzego zose zabaye zihagaritswe kugera igihe inononsora ry’amategeko shingiro ya Association Rayon Sports rizarangirira hakajyaho inzego zizaba zihuye nayo mategeko.
Tuboneyeho kubasaba guhagarika ibikorwa byose mwakoraga mu izina rya Association Rayon Sports."

Umurenge wa Kimironko wabaye uwa mbere mu bukangurambaga bw’isuku, akarere ka Kicukiro gasabwa kwisubiraho-AMAFOTO Umurenge wa Kimironko mu karere ka Gasabo wabaye uwa mbere mu bukangurambaga bw’isuku, umutekano no kubungabunga ibidukikije.
Abayobozi ba Polisi na MINALOC babitangaje kuri uyu wa 03 Kanama 2019, ubwo basozaga ubukangurambaga bw’isuku, umutekano no kubungabunga ibidukikije, bwari bumaze amezi atandatu bukorwa na Polisi y’Igihugu ifatanyije n’Umujyi wa Kigali.
Muri uyu muhango wo gusoza ubu bukangurambaga, akarere ka Gasabo niko kaje imbere, mu gihe akarere ka Kicukiro kasabwe kwikosora.
Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu, Prof.
Shyaka Anastase yavuze kko ubu bukangurambaga bugiye kugezwa mu gihugu hose.
Prof Shyaka ati, "Imbaraga zirashyirwa mu guharanira isuku y’ahahurira abantu benshi, mu ngo no ku mibiri y’abantu, kandi ntabwo hazabaho guhemba gusa ahubwo hazabaho no kubaza ndetse no guhana abatabyubahiriza".
Umuyobozi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, IGP Dan Munyuza yavuze bahagurukiye isuku ku aho umupolisi wese uhagaze cyangwa ukorera hafi y’ahamenwe ibishingwe n’amazi mabi kuri ubu abihanirwa.
Agira ati"Ahantu umupolisi akorera akazi hose, haba ku muhanda, ku nyubako ashinzwe kurinda, ku mipaka,.nihaba hari umwanda uwo mupolisi arabihanirwa".
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’umurenge wa kimironko, Nyiridandi Mapambano yavuze ko kugera kuri ibi byose babikesha guha umuturage umwanya akagira uruhari mu bimukorerwa.
Mapambano yagize ati “Nta kindi uretse guha uruhare abaturage bagakora inshingano tuba twabasabye tukabasaba ko bagira uruhare mu isuku n’umutekano twifashije inzego z’umutekano n’izibanze kuva ku murenge kugera ku masibo.”
Imirenge yo mu karere ka Kicukiro ntiyitwaye neza muri ubu bukangurambaga ariyo mpamvu aka karere kasabwe kwikosora.
Dore uko imirenge yagiye ikurikirana: 1)Kimironko 2)Muhima 3)Nyarugenge 4)Remera 5)Kacyiru 6)Gisozi 7)Rusororo 8)Kimisagara 9)Kinyinya 10)Niboye 11)Kimihurura 12)Rwezamenyo 13)Gitega 14)Nyakabanda 15)Kanombe 16)Jabana 17)Kagarama 18)Gikomero 19)Nyarugunga 20)Nyamirambo 21)Gahanga 22)Kigarama 23)Jali 24)Gikondo 25)Mageragere 26)Masaka 27)Kanyinya 28)Kicukiro 29)Nduba 30)Gatsata 31)Rutunga 32)Ndera 33)Bumbogo 34)Kigali 35)Gatenga

#12742#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/burera-minisitiri-musoni-yatanze-umuti-wo-guca-burundu-abarembetsi
Burera: Minisitiri Musoni yatanze umuti wo guca burundu "Abarembetsi" Minisitiri w'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, Musoni James, arasaba abayobozi ndetse n'abaturage bo mu karere ka Burera gushishikariza Abarembetsi kuza ku buyobozi mu mirenge bakimenyekanisha kugira ngo bakore amakoperative bityo baterwe inkunga, bakore imishinga ibyara inyungu, ibateza imbere.
Abarembetsi ni abantu bajya kurangura ikiyobyabwenge cya kanyanga muri Uganda bakakizana kugicuruza mu Rwanda.
Bazwiho guhungabanya umutekano mu karere ka Burera kuko iyo bagiye kurangura kanyanga bagenda bafite n'intwaro za gakondo zirimo ibisongo n'imipakanga kuburyo uwashaka kubatangira bamugirira nabi.
Minisitiri Musoni ubwo yasuraga akarere ka Burera, ku wa kabiri tariki ya 29/04/2014, yavuze ko abarembetsi bagomba guhagurukirwa bakareka gukomeza guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu.
Minisitiri w'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu yagiranye ibiganiro n'abagize inteko y'abaturage y'akarere ka Burera barimo abayobozi b'inzego z'ibanze, abafatanyabikorwa mu iterambere, abikorera ndetse n'abandi bavuga rikumvwa biga ku cyakorwa ngo abarembetsi bacike burundu.
Minisitiri Musoni avuga ko mu rwego rwo guca burundu abarembetsi bagiye kubumbirwa mu makoperative baterwe inkunga maze bateze imbere.
Abanze kubivamo hazakoreshwa izindi mbaraga.
Abagize inteko y'abaturage y'akarere ka Burera bagaragarije Minisitiri Musoni uburyo abarembetsi baza ku isonga mu guhungabanya umutekano muri ako karere, aho banitabaza abashinzwe umutekano kugira ngo babafashe gufata abarembetsi kuko hari igihe amarondo atabasha kubarwanya.
Umwe muri abo baturage witwa Ingabire Jean Bosco, yagize ati "…mu murenge wacu hari umudugudu nyobora bakunze kunyuramo (Abarembetsi), icyo dukora ni ikihe: kubera ko hari igihe baza ari abantu benshi, bafite n'ibisongo, tugerageza gutanga amakuru ku gihe."
Minsitiri Musoni yabwiye Abanyaburera ko umuti wo guca burundu abarembetsi ari uko babumbirwa mu makoperative bagaterwa inkunga bakiteza imbere.
Abanze kuva mu burembetsi hakitabazwa izindi ngufu.
Agira ati "Mubahamagare baze, tubafashe ku mirenge, tubashyire mu makoperative, turi tayari gufasha ayo makoperative kugira ngo biteze imbere babe abajyambere nk'abana b'u Rwanda bose.
Aho bari hose mubibabwire ibyo bintu babifashe hasi, baze kandi hari abandi babikoze batera imbere.
Uku kwezi kwa Gatanu (2014) uzaba atarajya muri iyi gahunda, akaba akiri muri ibyo bikorwa, azaba yiyemeje kurwana n'igihugu, azitegure arwane n'igihugu.
Mwese uko muri aha muhaguruke tubarwanye kuko baraduhungabanyiriza umutekano."
Kanyanga ifatirwa muri Burera iba yazanywe n'Abarembetsi bayikuye muri Uganda.
Minisitiri w'ubutegetsi bw'igihigu yemeza ko abazafatwa baranze kubivamo mbere bazashyikirizwa ubutabera naho abazafatwa bikagaragara ko bakiri bato mu myaka bakajyanwa mu bigo ngororamuco.
Agira ati "Nitumara kubafata, abo bigaragara ko bari mu bikorwa by'ubugambanyi, bahungabanya umutekano, bazana ibiyobyabwenge, bitwaza ibikoresho byo guhungabanya umutekano, abongabo bazashyikirizwa ubutabera.
Aba kabiri, abana bakirimwo bato, tuzabajyana Iwawa."
Ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Burera nabwo bwari bwarashyizeho ingamba zitandukanye zo kurwanya abarembetsi ariko ugasanga badacika burundu.
Abanyaburera bemeza ko abarembetsi bahungabanya umutekano.
Ngo usibye kuba banahohotera abaturage ngo bajya banagirira nabi abashinzwe kubungabunga umutekano ku mupaka wa Cyanika aho bigize no kwica umwe mu ba "Local Defense" wakoreraga kuri uwo mupaka.
Norbert Niyizurugero

Ikipe y’Ingabo z’Igihugu yari yiganjemo abakiri bato bazamuwe mu y’abana yakiriye KCCA FC yatwaye igikombe cya shampiyona muri Uganda mu mwaka ushize mu rwego rwo gukomeza imyitozo no kureba uko abakinnyi bayo bashya bahagaze.

APR FC yakiniraga imbere y’abafana bayo ni yo yafunguye amazamu ku munota wa 25 ku gitego cyitsinzwe na Habib Kavuma nyuma yo kotswa igitutu maze umupira wari utewe neza Twizerimana Martin Fabrice ahita awuruhukiriza mu rushundura.
Amakipe yombi yakiniraga hagati mu kibuga, yarangije igice cya mbere APR FC iyoboye n’igitego kimwe ku busa.
Iminota 45 y’igice cya kabiri cyatangiye KCCA isa n’iyikosoye ndetse iza kubona igitego cyo kwishyura cyatsinzwe na Kiizza Moustapha ku munota wa 64 kuri coup franc.
Abakinnyi biganjemo abakuwe mu ikipe y’abato ya APR FC baje kuziba icyuho cyasizwe n’abarimo Rutanga Eric, Rusheshangoga Michel, Sibomana Patrick, Usengimana Faustin, Mwiseneza Djamal, Habyarimana Innocent, Ngandu Omar, Mvuyekure Emery na Bizimana Djihad bayisohotsemo, bahawe amahirwe yo kugaragara kuri uyu mukino.
Umukino wa mbere KCCA FC yakiniye i Kigali yawusoje inganyije na APR FC yegukanye igikombe cy’Amahoro mu mwaka w’imikino ushize, itsinze Espoir FC y’i Rusizi.
Abakinnyi babanjemo ku mpande zombi: KCCA FC: Lukwago Charles, Dennis Okot, Kavuma Habib, Obenchan Philbert, Dennis Rukundo, Kirabira Isaac, Wamani Ibrahim, Kizza Mustafa, Serunjogi Patrick, Oryek Allan na Abubakar Saddiq Tijjani Abakinnyi 11 ba KCCA FC babanje mu kibuga APR FC: Ntaribi Steven, Ngabo Albert, Ishimwe Christian, Songayingabo Shaffy, Rugwiro Herve, Innocent Bakundukize, Bigirimana Issa, Twizeyimana Martin Fabrice, Twizerimana Onesme, Ishimwe Fiston na Sekamana Maxime Abakinnyi 11 ba APR FC babanje mu kibuga Amafoto:Ruhago Yacu

#12882#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/ibitaramo/eac-u-rwanda-ruzakira-iserukiramuco-rihuza-abahanzi-bo-mu-karere
EAC: U Rwanda ruzakira iserukiramuco rihuza abahanzi bo mu karere Yanditswe kuya 17-01-2013 saa 17:47' na Vénuste Kamanzi Kuva tari ya 9 kugeza ku ya 16 Gashyantare mu Rwanda hazabera iserukiramuco rizahuza abahanzi batandukanye bo mu karere ka Afurika y'Iburasirazuba (EAC) rizwi nka Jamafest (Jumuiya ya Afrika Mashariki Utamaduni Festival) ku nshuro yaryo ya mbere.
Ibi byongeye kugarukwaho na Jesca Eriyo, Umunyamabanga Mukuru mu muryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba ushinzwe inzego z'umusaruro n'imibanire mu bantu (Productive and Social Sectors) ubwo yamurikaga ku mugaragaro urubuga rwa internet bise (...)
Kuva tari ya 9 kugeza ku ya 16 Gashyantare mu Rwanda hazabera iserukiramuco rizahuza abahanzi batandukanye bo mu karere ka Afurika y'Iburasirazuba (EAC) rizwi nka Jamafest (Jumuiya ya Afrika Mashariki Utamaduni Festival) ku nshuro yaryo ya mbere.
Ibi byongeye kugarukwaho na Jesca Eriyo, Umunyamabanga Mukuru mu muryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba ushinzwe inzego z'umusaruro n'imibanire mu bantu (Productive and Social Sectors) ubwo yamurikaga ku mugaragaro urubuga rwa internet bise "www.jamafest.org" ruzajya rugaragaraho amakuru yose y'iriserukiramuco, yaba ayo mu bihe byashize n'agezweho.
Mu kumurika uru rubuga kandi Jesca Eriyo yahaye ikaze ndetse anasaba abahanzi n'abaturage bo muri Afurika y'Iburasirazuba, by'umwihariko abo mu Rwanda, kuzitabira iri serukiramuco.
Eriyo yagize ati "Ubu noneho amakuru ya Jamafest ntazagarukira mu karere ka Afurika y'Iburasirazuba gusa, ahubwo agiye gusakara n'ahandi muri Afurika no ku Isi muri rusange, binyuze kuri uru rubuga no ku nkuta zaryo za Facebook na Twitter."
Ku ikubitiro iri serukiramuco ryemejwe n'inama y'abaminisitiri bashinzwe Umuryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba mu 2011, ku nshuro yaryo ya mbere rikaba rigiye kubera mu Rwanda.
Ryahawe insanganyamatsiko igira iti "Dushyigikire Umuryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba tubinyujije mu ruganda rw'umuco."
Bimwe mu bikorwa biteganijwe muri iri serukiramuco harimo ibitaramo by'imbonankubone (live), Ikinamico, imurikabikorwa ry'ubugeni, ibiganiro no kungurana ibitekerezo n'ibindi.
Biteganijwe ko rizitabirwa n'abahanzi benshi baturutse mu bihugu bya Uganda, Kenya, Burundi, Tanzania n'u Rwanda ruzaba rwaryakiriye.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#12890#	4	health	https://igihe.com/ubuzima/article/ubushakashatsi-bwagaragaje-ingaruka-zo-kuba-telefone-yarabaye-nk-ikiyobyabwenge
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ingaruka zo kuba telefone yarabaye nk’ikiyobyabwenge ku rubyiruko Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko kimwe cya kane cy’urubyiruko cyabaswe cyane na telefone zigezweho ku buryo byahindutse nk’ikiyobyabwenge kuri bo.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakorewe muri King’s College London, buvuga ko kubera uko kubatwa, urubyiruko ruta umutwe iyo hagize igituma bamburwa uburenganzira bwo kuba bafite telefone.
Abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi bavuze ko bigeze aho urubyiruko rudashobora kumenya no kugenzura amasaha rumara ruri kuri telefone, nkuko BBC yabitangaje.
Ubushakashatsi bwaburiye abantu ko iyo myitwarire ifite ingaruka zikomeye ku buzima bwo mu mutwe mu rubyiruko.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwatangajwe mu kinyamakuru BMC Psychiatry, bwakoze inyigo 42 zirimo urubyiruko 42 000, harebwa ibijyanye n’imikoreshereze ya telefone zigezweho.
Mu bakoreweho ubushakashatsi, 23 % basanze bafite imyitwarire imeze nk’iy’abakoresha ibiyobyabwenge iyo habayeho kubima umwanya wo gukoresha telefone zabo.
Basanze ko abo bantu batabasha kwihanganira kubaho badafite telefone zabo ku buryo bigira ingaruka no ku bindi bikorwa bakabaye bakora.
Umwe mu bakoze ubushakashatsi, Nicola Kalk yavuze ko abantu bakwiriye kumenya ingaruka zo gukoresha telefone cyane.
Yavuze ko kugeza ubu bataramenya niba telefone igezweho ubwayo ariyo ntandaro yo kuba imbata z’abayikoresha cyangwa niba ari porogaramu zibamo abantu bakoresha.
Yagiriye inama ababyeyi n’urubyiruko by’umwihariko, kumenya neza uburyo abana bakoresha telefone, igihe gikwiriye bagombva kuba bari kumwe nazo n’ingaruka bishobora kubakururira.
Samantha Sohn na we wagize uruhare mu bushakashatsi, yavuze ko gukoresha telefone zigezweho cyane bishobora guteza ikibazo cyo mu mutwe, bityo ko hakwiriye ubushakashatsi bwimbitse.
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko kimwe cya kane cy’urubyiruko cyabaswe cyane na telefone zigezweho ku buryo byahindutse nk’ikiyobyabwenge kuri bo

#12892#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/ibiza-bikomeje-kwibasira-abanyarubavu-begereye-ibirunga
Ibiza bikomeje kwibasira Abanyarubavu begereye ibirunga Imvura y'amahindu ivanze n'umuyaga bidasanzwe byaguye mu murenge wa Busasamana akarere ka Rubavu mu tugari twa Gasiza na Kageshi byasenye amazu 14 naho imyaka yangiritse igera kuri hegitare 30.
Abaturage basenyewe bacumbikiwe n'abaturanyi naho imyaka yo yangijwe n'imvura y'urubura yari nyinshi yaguye mu masaha ya saa munanai na saa cyenda z'amanywa tariki 24/04/2014, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umuyobozi ushinzwe ubuhinzi mu murenge wa Busasamana, Sinabacyeka Jean de Dieu.
Bamwe mu baturage bafite ibyangijwe n'imvura bavuga ko imvura n'umuyaga byaguye bibatunguye ndetse igisenge cy'inzu cyagurutse kigahitana igiti cy'amashanyarazi bigatuma abaturage benshi babura amashanyarazi.
Umuyaga ukomeje gusenyera abaturiye ibirunga bya Kongo.
Uretse kuba amazu yasenyutse, bamwe mu baturage bavuga ko bahangayikishijwe no kongera kubaka cyane ko n'imyaka bacungiraho nayo yangiritse.
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Rubavu, Bahame Hassan, avuga ko bakigenzura imibare neza y'abangirijwe kugira ngo harebwe uko abaturage bagize ibyago bafashwa.
Uretse umurenge wa Busasamana wibasiwe n'ibiza, taliki 21/4/2014 nabwo umuyaga udasanzwe wari wibasiye umurenge wa Bugeshi akarere ka Rubavu wangiza amazu 52 ugusha n'ibiti, abaturage bakaba bavuga ko ibi biza bifite aho bihuriye n'imiterere y'ikirunga cya Nyamuragira kitegura kuruka.

Kamonyi:Umukecuru w'imyaka 74 yafatanywe urumogi Polisi y'u Rwanda ikorera mu karere ka Kamonyi , mu ijororyo kuwa kane taliki ya 16 Nyakanga, yakoze umukwabu mu murenge wa Kayumbu, akagari ka Muyange, maze ifata ibiyobyabwenge bikubiyemo ibiro 4 n'udupfunyika 317 by'urumogi n'udupaki 100 twa shifu warage.

Umuyobozi wa Polisi y'u Rwanda mu karere ka Kamonyi, Superintendent Vita Hamza, yavuze ko kunywa, gutunda no gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge n'inzoga zitemewe mu Rwanda, nka kanyanga ,urumogi , uretse kuba ari ibyaha, bituma uwabinyoye akora ibyaha birimo gukubita no gukomeretsa, ubujura, gufata ku ngufu, gusambanya abana, ubujura, ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina , kuko nta bwenge aba afite.

Ingingo ya 593 y'igitabo cy'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda ivuga ko, guhinga, gukora, guhindura, kugurisha, gutunda, kubika no kunywa ibiyobyabwenge bibujijwe keretse mu bihe no mu buryo byagenwe n'itegeko.
Iya 594 igika cya 2 ivuga ko, umuntu wese ukora, uhindura, winjiza, ugurisha mu gihugu ibiyobyabwenge n‟urusobe rw‟imiti ikoreshwa nka byo mu buryo bunyuranije n‟amategeko, ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku myaka itatu (3) kugeza ku myaka itanu (5) n‟ihazabu y‟amafaranga y‟u Rwanda kuva ku bihumbi magana atanu (500.000) kugeza kuri miliyoni eshanu (5.000.000).
