#14160#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/umubano-mwiza-hagati-y-umukoresha-n-umukozi-ni-ipfundo-ry-iterambere
Umubano mwiza hagati y'umukoresha n'umukozi ni ipfundo ry'iterambere Minisiteri y'Umurimo n'abakozi ba Leta (MIFOTRA), ivuga ko ibiganiro hagati y'abakozi n'abakoresha, aribwo buryo bwo kubona umusaruro mwiza mu kazi.
Twahirwa Alexandre, umuyobozi ushinzwe imigendekere myiza y'akazi muri MIFOTRA Byavugiwe mu biganiro byahuje urugaga rw'abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF), MIFOTRA, bamwe mu bakoresha na sendika z'abakozi,kuri uyu wa 6 Ukwakira 2016.
Byari bigamije kungurana ibitekerezo ku mibanire hagati y'abakozi n'abakoresha, ariho umusaruro mwiza ushingira nk'uko Twahirwa Alexandre, umuyobozi ushinzwe imigendekere myiza y'akazi muri MIFOTRA abivuga.
Yagize ati "Iyo haba ibiganiro bihoraho hagati y'abakozi n'abakoresha, bituma bashyikirana bityo akazi kakagenda neza.
Ibi bituma umusaruro w'igihugu muri rusange n'uw'ibigo by'umwihariko uzamuka, bityo n'imibereho y'umukozi na yo ikaba myiza kurushaho".
Yongeraho ko ibigo bigomba kubahiriza itegeko rishyiraho abakozi bahagarariye abandi, bagahugurwa kugira ngo bamenye inshingano zabo zo guhagararira bagenzi babo.
Biraboneye Africain, umunyamabanga mukuru wungirije w'urugaga rw'amasendika y'abakozi mu Rwanda (SESTRAR), avuga ko hakiri abakoresha batemera ko amasendika amenya ibyabo.
Ati "Hari bamwe mu bakoresha banga kugaragaza uko bafata abakozi babo, niba bahabwa ibyo amategeko abagenera, niba akazi bakora koko gatuma babaho.
Ibiganiro nk'ibi twumva bizafasha abantu nk'abo guhindura imyumvire, bakajya batanga amakuru y'ibigo bayobora nta mananiza".
Avuga ko akenshi aba bakoresha bashyira iterabwoba ku bakozi ntibavuge, ntibisanzure, bigatuma bakora batizeye ahazaza habo bityo umusaruro w'ibigo ukadindira.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa PSF, Ruzibiza Stephen, avuga sosiyete runaka itatera imbere hatari ubwumvikane hagati y'abakozi mu nzego zose.
Ati "Niba umuntu afite sosiyete y'ubucuruzi, yarateganyije n'ingamba zo kuyiteza imbere, ntiyabigeraho niba atumvikana n'abo akoresha kuko ari bo bashyira mu bikorwa ya mishanga ye".
Umuyobozi mukuru wa PSF, Ruzibiza Stephen, avuga ko bazakomeza gutegura ibiganiro bigamije kurengera imibereho myiza y'abakozi PSF ivuga ko izakomeza gutegura ibiganiro nk'ibi hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Bigamije kwibutsa abakoresha kwita ku burenganzira bw'abakozi babo, kuko ngo uko haza sosiyete nshya ari ko zitwara abakozi b'izisanzwe, zihereye kuri babandi badafashwe neza.

#14176#	8	technology	https://rwandamagazine.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/us-kompanyi-y-indege-irateganya-kugura-taxi-ziguruka-zikoreshwa-n-amashanyarazi
US: Kompanyi y’indege irateganya kugura taxi ziguruka zikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi Kompanyi y’indege United Airlines irateganya kugura imodoka 200 ziguruka zikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi (cyangwa umuyagankuba mu Kirundi), yizeye ko zizatwara abagenzi ku kibuga cy’indege mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu iri imbere.
Iyi kompanyi y’indege yo muri Amerika ni imwe muri za kompanyi za mbere zikomeye zitwara abantu mu ndege yiyemeje kugura izo ’taxi’ ziguruka.
United Airlines izanashora imari muri kompanyi Archer y’imodoka za ’taxi’ ziguruka, nkuko bikubiye mu masezerano afite agaciro ka miliyari 1.1 y’amadolari y’Amerika yo guteza imbere ubwo buryo bwo gutwara abantu n’ibintu.
Iyi kompanyi icyeneye guhabwa uruhushya n’urwego rugenzura ibyo gutwara abantu mu ndege, mbere yuko ikomeza na gahunda yayo yo kugura izo ’taxi’ ziguruka.
United Airlines izafatanya na kompanyi y’indege Mesa Airlines ikorera mu karere Amerika iherereyemo, muri iyo gahunda yo kugura imodoka za kompanyi Archer zikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi.
Zihaguruka buhagarike kandi zikagwa muri ubwo buryo buzwi mu mpine nka eVTOL.
Yazitumije kuri miliyari imwe y’amadolari.
Ayo masezerano abonwa nk’ikimenyetso cyo kwemera imikorere ya kompanyi Archer icyishakisha, iyi ikaba yavuze ko nyuma y’aya masezerano igiye gufungura imigabane yayo ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane ry’Amerika.
Abandi bashoramari muri iyo kompanyi barimo nka kompanyi nshya Stellantis ikora imodoka yashinzwe mu kwezi gushize nyuma yo guhuzwa kwa kompanyi Fiat Chrysler na PSA Group yo mu Bufaransa.
United Airlines na Mesa Airlines zavuze ko ziteganya gukoresha izo ’taxi’ ziguruka mu gutwara abagenzi zibanyuza hejuru y’imihanda minini irimo umubyigano w’ibinyabiziga zibajyana ku bibuga by’indege.
Kompanyi Archer ifite icyicaro muri leta ya California ivuga ko izo ’taxi’ zizashobora kuguruka ahantu h’intera ya 95km zigendera ku muvuduko wa 240km ku isaha (240km/h).
Kandi ngo zishobora no kugabanya hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’imyuka ihumanya ikirere ku bagenzi barimo kwerekeza ku kibuga cy’indege bakoresheje ibinyabiziga bisanzwe.
Mu itangazo yasohoye, Scott Kirby ukuriye United Airlines yagize ati: "Dukoresheje ikoranabuhanga rya nyaryo, dushobora kugabanya ingaruka indege ziteza ku mubumbe [w’isi], ariko tugomba gutahura kompanyi zijyanye n’igihe cy’ejo hazaza zizatuma ibi bishoboka hakiri kare ndetse no gushaka uburyo bwo kuzifasha gutera imbere".
Muri ayo masezerano, harimo n’ingingo yuko United Airlines na Mesa Airlines zishobora no kugura izindi ’taxi’ ziguruka zifite agaciro ka miliyoni 500 z’amadolari.
Muri iki gihe cy’icyorezo cya coronavirus, byabaye ngombwa ko kompanyi z’indege zigabanya amafaranga zikoresha kubera ko hari igihe cyageze gutwara abagenzi mu ndege bigahagarara.
Mu mwaka ushize, United Airlines yahombye miliyari zirenga 7 z’amadolari, ndetse yagobotswe n’imfashanyo ya leta y’Amerika kugira ngo idasezerera abakozi babarirwa mu bihumbi.
Bamwe mu bahanga mu bukungu babona iki cyorezo nk’akanya kompanyi z’indege zabonye ko gukoresha amafaranga nk’aya y’ingoboka mu gushyiraho uburyo budahumanya ikirere bwo gutwara abagenzi.
Volocopter, indi kompanyi ya za ’taxi’ ziguruka, irimo guteganya gukora ingendo zerekeza mu mijyi hagati ikoresheje ’taxi’ zayo zizwi nka VoloCity zikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi.
Ariko, mu kwezi kwa cumi na kabiri, kompanyi y’ubucuruzi bwo gutwara abantu mu modoka mu buryo buhuriweho izwi nka Uber yagurishije ishami ry’imodoka zayo ziguruka rya Elevate.
BBC

#14196#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/article/gufasha-abanyamuryango-kubona-amacumbi-na-telefoni-imihigo-ya-zigama-css-mu
Gufasha abanyamuryango kubona amacumbi na telefoni-Imihigo ya Zigama CSS mu 2020 Koperative yo kuzigama no kugurizanya Zigama CSS, yatangaje ko mu igenamigambi ryayo rya 2020, izibanda mu gufasha abanyamuryango gusezera ku bukode bw’amacumbi no kubafasha kubona telefoni kugira ngo babashe gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu gusaba serivisi z’imari.
Iyi koperative ihuriwemo n’abagize inzego z’umutekano; Ingabo z’igihugu, Abapolisi, abarinda amagereza, abagize Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) n’abakozi ba Laboratwari y’u Rwanda y’ibimenyetso bishingiye ku bumenyi n’ubuhanga.
Mu nama rusange ya 32 ya Zigama CSS, yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu, hatangajwe igenamigambi rya 2020, rizibanda ku gukoresha ikranabuhanga muri iyi banki no gufasha abanyamuryango kubona amacumbi.
Perezida w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi ya Zigama CSS, Dr Ndahiro James, yabwiye itangazamakuru ko umwaka utaha bazagerageza gushora imari mu bikorwa bifasha abanyamuryango cyane cyane gutunga inzu no kubona telefoni.
Ati “Hari serivisi twenda kubaha zijyanye no kubona amatelefoni cyangwa se ikoreshwa ry’amatelefoni rikagera ku banyamuryango bacu benshi ku buryo noneho bigabanya ingendo za buri munsi”.
Asobanura ko ari ibintu bagenda bashyiramo ingufu kugira ngo n’ikoranabuhanga bashaka kujyamo rikore, hirindwa ko ryajyaho ariko abarishyiriweho ntibarikoreshe kuko nta buryo bwo kurigeramo bafite.
Akomeza avuga ko bafatanyije n’izindi nzego za leta bazagerageza gufasha abanyamuryango ba Zigama CSS bato kugira ngo bagire amacumbi yabo kuko ibintu by’ubukode abenshi baba batabishoboye.
Ati “Tuzashyira ingufu mu gushakira abanyamuryango bacu amacumbi cyane cyane abanyamuryango bagiye kugira inzu ya mbere cyangwa se ari bwo bwa mbere bagiye kwishakira icmbi, abo nibo tuzaha umwihariko cyane”.
Dr Ndahiro avuga ko bateganyije gushyiraho ikigega no gukangurira abanyamuryango ko iyo serivisi ihari, uko bazabyitabira akaba ari byo bizagena amafaranga bazakoresha.
Abajijwe igihe izi serivisi zo gufasha abanyamuryango kubona amacumbi zizatangirira, Dr Ndahiro yagize ati “n’uyu munsi”.
Zigama CSS kandi irashaka gushora imari cyane mu bijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga, aho yifuza ko abakozi bayo bose barihugurwamo kuko urwego rw’imari muri iyi minsi rugenda ruhindura imikorere.
Dr Ndahiro ati “Tuzashyira ingufu mu mahugurwa, mu kugura ibikoresho bijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga ndetse no kurinda umutungo w’abanyamuryango”.
Intego ikaba ari uko ‘buri munyamuryango wa Zigama CSS, yabona serivisi ashaka atavuganye n’umuntu, adateze, adatelefonnye, ahubwo aho ari akabyikorera’.
Uyu mwaka izunguka miliyari 10 FRW, zivuye kuri miliyari 9FRW, yungutse umwaka ushize ndetse umwaka utaha iyi nyungu ikaziyongera ikagera kuri miliyari 12FRW.
Dr Ufitikirezi Daniel, umwe mu bagize inama y’ubutegetsi ya Zigama CSS, yavuze ko inyungu y’iyi banki yagiye ikura kuva mu 2017 kugeza ubu, aho biragaragara ko igenda yunguka ku kigero kirenze 20% ugereranyije buri mwaka.
Ati “Yiyongera ku bushobozi bwa banki bityo ikaba yabasha guha abanyamuryango inguzanyo ku buryo buhagije ndetse ni nayo mpamvu usanga iyi banki yita ku banyamuryango cyane, ni uko n’iyo nyungu yungutse igumamo ikongera ubushobozi bwo gutanga inguzanyo”.
Imari shingiro ya Zigama CSS, ni miliyari zirenga 300 FRW, amafaranga imaze kuguriza abanyamuryango ararenga miliyari 200 FRW ndetse n’ubwizigame bw’abanyamuryango burarenga miliyari 200 FRW.
Zigama CSS yishimira ko abanyamuryango bayo bamaze kuba inararibonye mu kwizigamira ndetse bari mu bantu bake bamaze kumenyera gufata inguzanyo no kuzishyurira igihe.
Ibi bigaragazwa n’uko abantu batangiye baguza ibihumbi 30 FRW bageze ku rwego rwo kuguza miliyoni 10 cyangwa miliyoni 15 FRW.
Inyungu ku nguzanyo muri Zigama CSS, ni 13% ku bafata umwenda wa miliyoni 5 kumanura naho abafata miliyoni 5 kuzamura inyungu ni 15%.
Umuyobozi w'Ingabo mu Ntara y'Iburasirazuba n'Umujyi wa Kigali, Gen Maj.
Mubarak Muganga aganira na mugenzi we ACP Linda Nkuranga yitabiriye iyi nama rusange ya Zigama CSS Komiseri wa RCS, CGP George Rwigamba (ibumoso) yitabiriye iyi nama ya Zigama CSS Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Polisi wungirije ushinzwe Abakozi n'Imiyoborere DIGP, Juvénal Marizamunda (iburyo) Inama rusange ya Zigama CSS yemeje igenamigambi rya 2020 Minisitiri w'umutekano Gen Nyamvumba Patrick (ibumoso), Perezida w'Inama y'ubutegetsi ya Zigama CSS, Dr Ndahiro James (Hagati) na Minisitiri w'ingabo Maj Gen Albert Murasira Perezida w’Inama y’ubutegetsi ya Zigama CSS, Dr Ndahiro James yavuze ko ikoranabuhanga ari ryo rishyizwe imbere Minisitiri w’ingabo Maj Gen Albert Murasira ari mu bayoboye inama Minisitiri w’umutekano Gen Nyamvumba Patrick yitabiriye inama Dr Ufitikirezi Daniel, umwe mu bagize inama y’ubutegetsi ya Zigama CSS, yavuze ko inyungu

#14211#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/rwamagana-rwarakabije-yasabye-imfungwa-n-abagororwa-kugaragaza-ukuri-kuri
Rwamagana: Rwarakabije yasabye imfungwa n'abagororwa kugaragaza ukuri kuri Jenoside Komiseri Mukuru w'Urwego rw'Igihugu rushinzwe Imfungwa n'Abagororwa, Paul Rwarakabije, arasaba imfungwa n'abagororwa kugaragaza ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kandi akihanangiriza zimwe mu mfungwa n'abagororwa zishyira igitutu kuri bagenzi bazo zibabuza kuvuga ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yabisabye ku wa 13 Mata 2015 ubwo yari muri Gereza ya Rwamagana (Nsinda), aganira n'imfungwa n'abagororwa mu muhango wo gusoza icyumweru cy'icyunamo cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 21 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1994.
Komiseri Mukuru w'urwego rw'Igihugu rushinzwe Imfungwa n'Abagororwa, Paul Rwarakabije, yasabye abafunzwe ukuri kuri Jenoside.
Komiseri Rwarakabije yavuze ko mu gihe bamwe mu bafungiye muri Gereza ya Rwamagana bavuga ko ibiganiro byatanzwe mu gihe cy'icyunamo byabafashije kubohoka ndetse bamwe bagatanga ubuhamya, ngo bibabaje kuba hari abandi badakozwa ibyo kuvuga ukuri kuri Jenoside ndetse ngo bagashyira igitutu ku zindi mfungwa bazibuza kugaragaza ukuri no gutanga ubuhamya.
By'umwihariko, bamwe mu bahoze ari ba Burugumesitiri b'amakomini, batunzwe agatoki kuri iyo myitwarire mibi ndetse biba ngombwa ko Komiseri Rwarakabije, abahagurutsa akabasaba kwemerera imbere y'imbaga y'izindi mfungwa n'abagororwa ko batazongera kurangwaho iyo myitwarire.
Ubwo bahagurukaga, abahoze ari abayobozi b'amwe mu makomini yo muri Perefegitura ya Kibungo, bafungiye muri Gereza ya Rwamagana, bagiye bavuga mu ijwi riranguruye ko batazongera guhisha ukuri ndetse bamwe muri bo bakavuga ko batangiye kukugaragaza kandi ngo bifuza umwanya kugira ngo batange ubuhamya kuri Jenoside yakorewe mu makomini bayoboraga, bityo banagaragaze uruhare rwabo.
Imfungwa n'abagororwa bafunguye bafungiye muri Gereza ya Rwamagana basabwe kugaragaza ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nubwo hari abakinangiye bakabuza n'abandi gutanga amakuru y'ukuri kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, bamwe mu bafungiye icyaha cya Jenoside bemeza ko kwatura bakavugisha ukuri byatumye baruhuka ku mutima kandi nyuma y'imyaka 21 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe, bakaba baharanira kwigisha bagenzi babo ukuri.
Habimana Emmanuel uzwi nka Cyasa yakatiwe igifungo cya burundu nyuma yo guhamwa n'ibyaha bya Jenoside.
Mu gihe cya Jenoside yari akuriye interahamwe muri Degiteri y'Umujyi wa Kibungo, akaba amaze imyaka 17 muri Gereza.
Avuga ko yahindutse cyane mu mutima we kandi akaba yaragize uruhare mu gufasha bagenzi be kwemera ibyaha no kubisabira imbabazi.
Afatanyije na bagenzi be bafunganywe muri Gereza ya Rwamagana, Habimana yashinze ihuriro (Club) ryo kurwanya Jenoside n'ingengabitekerezo yayo kandi ngo kuva ryajyaho muri Mata 2014, abantu 486 bamaze kwandikira imiryango 678 bahemukiye, bayisaba imbabazi.
Emmanuel Ntivuguruzwa

Bamwe mu bakorera uburaya i Nyamirambo ntibacyemera imibonano mpuzabistina idakingiye Mu Rwanda mu minsi ishize hari amakuru yagaragaye mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye avuga ko abakora uburaya bashyiraho ibiciro bitandukanye ku babagana hakurikijwe niba umukiriya yifuza cyangwa atifuza gukoresha agakingirizo. i Nyamirambo mu karere ka Nyarugenge mu mujyi wa Kigali ni hamwe mu haboneka abakora uburaya nubwo aka kazi katemewe n'amategeko.
Kigalitoday yegereye itsinda rya bamwe mu bakorera uburaya i Nyamirambo bayibwira ko bamenye ububi bwa SIDA bakurikije uko babona SIDA imerera nabi bamwe muri bagenzi babo.
Itsinda ry'indaya z'i Nyamirambo ryemeye kuganira na Kigalitoday rivuga ko ntawabona cyangwa ngo abe yumva ububi bwa SIDA maze ngo abure gufata ingamba zo kwirinda SIDA: "Ntitucyemera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina nta gakingirizo n'abakiriya bacu kuko twamenye ingaruka mbi z'imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye.Abagabo badakoresha agakingirizo baba bafite virusi itera SIDA.Iyo yanze ko dukoresha agakingirizo acaho na njye nkacaho."
Nubwo ariko bamwe mu bakora uburaya i Nyamirambo bavuga ko batacyemerera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina abakiriya banga gukoresha agakingirizo, ngo hari abakora uburaya bageraho bakemera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina nta gakingirizo kubera ubukene no kubura abakiriya.
Itsinda ry'indaya z'i Nyamirambo riti: Hari bagenzi bacu bageraho bakemera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina nta gakingirizo kubera ko ategereza umwanya munini umukiriya wemera agakingirizo akamubura kandi yenda abana baburaye."
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ikigo cy'igihugu cy'ubuvuzi(Rwanda Bio-Medical Center) bugashyirwa ahagaragara mu mwaka wa 2010 buragaragaza ko mu bakora uburaya ,umuntu umwe kuri babiri aba yanduye virusi itera SIDA.
Umukozi wa RBC, Dr Mwumvaneza Mutagoma wari uyoboye itsinda ry'ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje imibare y'ubwandu bwa virusi itera SIDA mu Rwanda.
Dr Mwumvaneza avuga ko imibare yavuye mu bushakashatsi bakoze igaragaza ko mu gihugu hose mu Rwanda, abakora uburaya abagera kuri 51% banduye virusi itera SIDA naho mu mujyi wa Kigali ijanisha rikaba riri hejuru ugereranije no mu gihugu muri rusange kuko ho abagera kuri 56% banduye virusi itera SIDA.
Inzobere ku ndwara ya SIDA zivuga ko indaya ari itsinda ry'abantu rifite ibyago byinshi byo kwandura virusi itera SIDA kurusha andi matsinda.
Ibi biterwa nuko indaya ari abantu bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina inshuro nyinshi kandi n'abantu batandukanye barimo abanduye VIH/SIDA. u Rwanda ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ubu rutuwe n'abaturage barenga gato kuri miliyoni 11.
Muri rusange mu gihugu hose abantu babana na Virusi itera SIDA ari 3% by'abanyarwanda bose.
Ni ukuvuga ko mu Rwanda abantu bagera ku bihumbi 33 000 babana na virusi itera SIDA.
Jean Baptiste Micomyiza

#14410#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/imburamukoro-na-dundubwonko-bimwe-mu-bihungabanya-umudendendezo-muri-huye
Imburamukoro na Dundubwonko, bimwe mu bihungabanya umudendendezo muri Huye Abatuye mu Mujyi wa Huye no mu nkengero zawo, bavuga ko urubyiruko rudafite akazi n’abanywa inzoga zisindisha bita Dundubwonko, ari bo bakunze kubahungabanyiriza umudendezo.
Abayobozi bavuga ko inzererezi n’inzoga zitujuje ubuziranenge bihungabanya umutekano Babibwiye Abasenateri bo muri komisiyo y’ububanyi n’amahanga, ubutwererane n’umutekano, babagendereye tariki 27 Ugushyingo 2020 bagamije kureba uko abaturage bagira uruhare mu kwibungabungira umutekano.
Marc Kayonga uyobora umudugudu wa Ruvuzo mu Kagari ka Matyazo mu Murenge wa Ngoma, agira ati “Dufite urubyiruko rudashaka gukora, birirwa bakoze mu mifuka, abandi bakirirwa banywa inzoga, byagera nijoro bakajya mu ngo z’abantu bagapfumura ibikoni bagatwara amatungo n’ibindi biba birimo”.
Aba kandi ahanini ngo si ba kavukire.
Ahubwo ni abantu baba baje mu mujyi gushaka imirimo inyuranye nko kuragira no gukora mu ngo, yabananira bakajya gutura mu Matyazo kuko haboneka inzu bakodesha makeya (haba n’iz’ibihumbi bibiri), hanyuma bagatungwa no kwiba.
Antoine Ngiruwonsaga ukora irondo mu Matyazo, ati “Dufite umubare munini w’abaturage harimo urubyiruko n’abataye amashuri badakora, nyamara bashaka kurya.
Ni kwa kundi wanika umwenda, ntumenye aho ugiye.
Hari n’igihe ushyira ihene hariya, umuntu akahanyura ntumenye uko ayinize, akayishyira mu mufuka akayitwara”.
Ikindi gihungabanya umudendezo mu Matyazo, ni inzoga ziza zipfundikiye nk’aho zujuje ubuziranenge, nyamara atari byo kuko abazinywa zibica, byatumye bazita ‘Dundubwonko’.
Ngiruwonsanga ati “Hari ahantu nari ndi ejobundi hari dépôt yazo, nkajya numva ibintu biturika, nkagira ngo ni ibintu barimo bahonda, naho ari amacupa arimo za nzoga.
Inzoga imena icupa, urumva igeze mu bwonko byamera gute?
Ni Dundubwonko nyine!
Kandi ni agacupa k’amafaranga 200.
Umusore arakanywa ukabona ararerembuye, yashyiramo itabi bikaba ibindi”.
Ibi bituma Ngiruwonsanga yifuza ko ziriya nzoga zakongera kujya zipimwa kuko atekereza ko kuba zisindisha bene kariya kageni hari ibindi zongerewemo, bidahuye n’ibyari bizigize ubwo abazikora bemererwaga kuzajya bazikora.
Ati “Abazinyoye ujya kubona ukabona umwe aje ugutwi kwenda kuvaho bamukomerekeje, undi ijisho, undi yagwiriye ikintu kikamukomeretsa.
Twe tubanza kubakorera ubutabazi bw’ibanze, hanyuma tukajya kureba aho icyaha cyabereye”.
Abatuye mu Murenge wa Ngoma banavuga ko bahangayikishijwe kurushaho n’abana batangira kuba inzererezi bakiri no mu ishuri, kuko baba babona bazavamo abajura mu bihe biri imbere.
Faustin Musabyimana ukuriye inkeragutabara mu Kagari ka Matyazo avuga ko abo bana babita ‘abamarine’.
Agira ati “Usanga ababyeyi babo baraje mu mujyi baje gukora mu ngo hanyuma bikabananira, nuko bagashakana.
Ntabwo bamenya kuboneza urubyaro ku buryo hari n’abo usanga bafite abana nka barindwi, bakabyuka bajya kubashakira imibereho nyamara ntibabashe kubabonera ibibahaza, hanyuma abana na bo bakajya kwirwaho”.
Anavuga ko abo bana ubasanga ku modoka zizanye ibirayi byatakara bakabitora bakajya kubihisha.
Imyenda barayanura bakayitwara.
Niba banyuze ku rugo bakabona isafuriya mu rugo ba nyir’urugo bari mu nzu, baraterura bagatwara.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Ngoma, Alphonse Mutsindashyaka, avuga ko mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ibi bibazo bibangamira umudendezo w’abaturage bakora akenshi ubukangurambaga bwo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.
Ngo banashyizeho amarondo.
Hari irondo rikorwa n’abaturage, hakaba n’iry’umwuga rya nijoro no ku manywa mu bice bituwemo n’abantu birirwa ku kazi.
Kandi ngo bamaze kwegeranya miliyoni zirindwi zo kugira ngo bazigurire imodoka ya miriyoni 21 yo kuzajya ibafasha mu bikorwa by’umutekano.
Asigaye na yo ngo bari kuyashakisha kugira ngo igurwe.
Ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe hanze n’Urwego rw’Imiyoborere (RGB) muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, bwagaragaje ko muri rusange abaturage bo mu Rwanda bishimira umutekano ku rugero rwa 91.6%.
Senateri Clothilde Mukakarangwa na Senateri Ephrem Kanyarukiga, i Huye baganiriye n’abahagarariye abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Huye n’uwa Ngoma Bwagaragaje kandi ko imbogamizi ya mbere ku mutekano w’abantu n’ibintu ari ubujura ku gipimo cya 38.5%.
Hakurikiraho ubutekamutwe bukoresheje ikoranabuhanga kuri 20.3%, ikoreshwa ry’ibiyobyabwenge kuri 20.2%, gukubita no gukomeretsa kuri 18.9% impanuka zo mu muhanda kuri 11.6%, n’icuruzwa ry’abantu kuri 2.8%.
Ubushakashatsi ku gipimo cy’imiyoborere mu Rwanda muri 2019 bwagaragaje ko u Rwanda rufite umupolisi 1 ku baturage 780, mu gihe Umuryango w’Abibumbye uvuga ko ubundi hakagombye kubaho umupolisi 1 ku baturage 334.
Abasenateri biyemeje kujya kureba igikorwa kugira ngo umutekano w’abaturage ucungwe neza hifashishijwe kwicungira umutekano (community policing) n’urubyiruko rw’abakorerabushake, kuko ibibangamira umudendezo w’abaturage binabangamira iterambere.
Senateri Clothilde Mukakarangwa, Visi Perezidante wa Komisiyo y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri, ubutwererane n’umutekano Sena, waje kuganira n’Abanyehuye ku ko bicungira umutekano, avuga ko muri rusange komisiyo barimo izagenderera uturere 16, kandi bagasura imirenge ibiri muri buri karere.
Ibizava mu biganiro n’abaturage ndetse n’abayobozi ngo bazabigeza ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, izatanga inama ku cyakorwa kugira ngo umudendezo w’abaturage ugerweho uko byifuzwa.

#14413#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/covid-19-bwa-mbere-urukingo-rwayo-rugiye-kugeragezwa-muri-africa
Covid-19: Bwa mbere urukingo rwayo rugiye kugeragezwa muri Africa Kaminuza ya Wits y’i Johannesburg muri Afurika y’Epfo uyu munsi yatangaje ko igerageza rya mbere ry’urukingo rwa coronavirus muri iki gihugu, ari naryo rya mbere muri Afurika, ritangira.
Abantu ba mbere baraterwa urwo rukiko muri iki cyumweru.
Uru rukingo ruri mu igerageza, abahanga barwise ChAdOx1 nCoV-19, barukoze muri virusi yitwa ChAdOx1, bari kureba niba rushobora gukingira umubiri w’umuntu Covid-19.
Muri Afurika y’Epfo abantu 80,000 bamaze kwandura iki cyorezo, muri bo 1,674 yarabishe.
Profeseri Shabir Madhi, umuhanga mu by’inkingo wo muri Kaminuza ya Wits ni we uyoboye igerageza ry’uru rukikogo muri Afurika y’Epfo, ubushakashatsi bafatanyijemo na Kaminuza ya Oxford yo mu Bwongereza hamwe n’ikigo Oxford Jenner Institute cyarukoze.
Bwana Madhi avuga ko batangiye gusuzuma abo bazakoreraho igerageza mu cyumweru gushize.
Ati: "Aba mbere baraterwa uru rukingo muri iki cyumweru".
Ishami rya ONU rishinzwe ubuzima ku isi OMS rivuga ko nta muti cyangwa urukingo by’iki cyorezo biraboneka kugeza ubu.
Mbere y’uko iri gerageza ritangira, abagiye kurikora bavuga ko uru rukingo rwabanje kugenzurwa no kwemezwa n’ikigo cya leta ya Afurika y’Epfo gishinzwe kwemeza ibikoreshwa mu gihugu.
Uru rukingo rwamaze guterwa abantu 4,000 mu igeragezwa mu Bwongereza, ruri kugeragezwa kandi no muri Brazil.
Bavuga ko bateganya gukora igerageza ryarwo ryagutse ku bantu 30,000 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Abashakashatsi bakoze uru rukingo bavuga ko bimwe mu birugize (antibodies) byagaragaje - mu isuzumwa ryo muri ’laboratoire’ - ko bishobora kwica iyi virusi.
Bavuga ko bizeye ko nirugera mu mubiri w’umuntu ruzabasha kuwuha ubudahangarwa imbere ya virusi ya SARS-CoV-2 igera mu mubiri w’umuntu igatera indwara ya Covid-19.
Abari gukora iri gerageza bavuga ko izi nkingo zigaragaza ko nta ngaruka zigira, nubwo zishobora gutera guhinda umuriro, kuribwa umutwe no kubabara akaboko by’igihe gito.
Mu kwezi gushize, aba bashakashatsi basabye leta ya Kenya ko uru rukingo rugeragezwa ku bantu 400, inzego zibishinzwe muri Kenya ntiziremeza ko igeragezwa ritangira.
Ahatandukanye ku isi hari gukorwa inkingo zirenga 100 za Covid-19.
BBC

#14427#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/imibereho-ya-ronaldinho-muri-gereza-iratangaje-ku-isabukuru-ye-y-amavuko
Imibereho ya Ronaldinho muri gereza iratangaje!
Ku isabukuru ye y’amavuko yokerejwe inyama n’imfungwa Umunyabigwi w’Umunya-Brésil, Ronaldo de Assis Moreira wamenyekanye nka Ronaldinho Gaúcho, yizihirije isabukuru ye y’amavuko y’imyaka 40 muri gereza yo muri Paraguay, aho yokesherezwa inyama n’imfungwa.
Ronaldinho amaze iminsi afungiye muri Paraguay, akurikiranyweho gukoresha impapuro (pasiporo) mpimbano ndetse yabwiwe ko we na mukuru we, bazamara amezi atandatu bafunzwe.
Ubwo yizihizaga isabukuru y’imyaka 40 ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, Ronaldinho yokerejwe inyama n’imfungwa bari kumwe muri gereza yo muri Paraguay.
Abakinnyi benshi bakinannye barimo abo batwaranye Igikombe cy’Isi cya 2002, bamwoherereje ubutumwa bumwifuriza isabukuru nziza babinyujije kuri Instagram.
Abo barimo Ronaldo w’imyaka 43, washyizeho ifoto bari kumwe, Roberto Carlos w’imyaka 46 na Samuel Eto’o bakinannye muri FC Barcelone.
Ubusanzwe Ronaldinho yajyaga yishimira isabukuru ye y’amavuko mu birori.
Ubwo yuzuzaga imyaka 26, yaraye mu kabyiniro ko mu Mujyi wa Barcelone kugeza saa Kumi n’ebyiri za mu gitondo mu gihe ubwo yagiraga imyaka 32, yizihije iyi sabukuru iminsi itanu, bimutwara ibihumbi 10 by’ama-eurp muri hoteli ihenze y’i Rio de Janeiro muri Brésil.
ESPN yatangaje ko Ronaldinho "akunzwe" na bagenzi be bafunganywe nubwo amara igihe kinini muri kasho ya gereza, ibikorwa bye bya buri munsi bikaba gukina umupira n’imfungwa n’abakozi ndetse no kwitabira amasomo y’ububaji.
ESPN itangaza ko kandi uwo yaganiriye na we, yavuze ko “Ronaldinho ameze neza muri gereza” nubwo yabuze imwe mu nkingi z’ubuzima bwe: umuziki.
Igihe cye kinini nyuma yo gusezerera umupira w’amaguru akaba yarakimaze acuranga ingoma za bongo.
Yagize ati "Ntashobora gucuranga imbere muri gereza ariko nzi neza ko mu mutwe we azakomeza kugira injyana z’indirimbo igihe azaba ari hanze."
"Akina umupira w’amaguru buri munsi kandi yigisha abasore akina nabo amayeri make.
Kuva akinjira muri gereza, yashakaga kumenyana n’izindi mfungwa kandi yahise abikora.
Ni nk’ikigirwamana kuri benshi muri bo, bamusabye gusinya ku ngofero, imipira bambara n’indi myambaro.”
Mu minsi ishize, hashyizwe hanze amafoto n’amashusho agaragaza uyu mugabo wabaye umukinnyi w’umwaka wa FIFA ku Isi inshuro ebyiri, yambaye ikabutura n’umupira, akina umupira muri gereza.
Yitabiriye kandi umukino wa Futsal mu cyumweru gishize, afasha ikipe ye gutsinda bagenzi babo b’imfungwa ibitego 11-2, aho bivugwa ko yatsinzemo ibitego bitanu akanatanga imipira itandatu yavuyemo ibindi bitego.
Mu minsi mike ishize kandi, Umuyobozi wa gereza, Blas Vera, yatangaje ko Ronaldinho na mukuru we, hari icyubahiro bahabwa.
Basangira ubwiherero n’izindi mfungwa ariko buri umwe afite kasho ye hamwe na televiziyo n’ibyuma bituma bagira umuyaga mu cyumba ndetse akaba ahabwa umwanya wo kuganira n’inshuti ze kuri WhatsApp, aho umwanya munini awuharira umuryango we.
Undi waganiriye na ESPN yavuze ko umwanya munini Ronaldinho amara kuri telefoni, awumara avugana na nyina.
Ati "Avugana na nyina buri munsi nimugoroba.
Ni umwe mu bangayikisha cyane Ronaldinho."
Nk’uko Ibiro ntaramakuru EFE bibitangaza, ngo kuva abapolisi ba Paraguay batangiye gukora iperereza ku buryo Ronaldinho na mukuru we bagiye muri icyo gihugu, bamaze guta muri yombi abantu 14.
Mu bafashwe harimo abayobozi benshi bo mu ishami rishinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka mu gihugu bafashije koroshya ikorwa ry’izo mpapuro [pasiporo] mpimbano.
Iyi mibare kandi irimo abagabo babiri bakoresheje ibihumbi 18$ yo kubona pasiporo mpimbano, bishyikirije polisi mu cyumweru gishize.
Wilmondes Sousa Lira, Umunya-Brésil wahaye pasiporo aba bavandimwe, na we yatawe muri yombi.
Abakora iperereza bavuga ko ubu barimo gusuzuma dosiye n’ubutumwa kuri telefone za Ronaldinho, mukuru we, n’abandi bantu bafatiwe muri iki kirego.
Ronaldinho ngo amaze iminsi abaririza amakuru y’indege zikora ingendo hagati ya Asunción na Rio de Janeiro kugira ngo narekurwa azahite yerekeza ku kibuga cy’indege.
Iburanishwa rye ryabaye ryigijwe inyuma kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus nk’uko byemejwe n’umwunganizi we, Sergio Queiroz.
Ronaldinho yokerejwe inyama n'imfungwa bafunganywe muri Paraguay Umunya-Brésil wabaye umukinnyi ukomeye, yizihirije isabukuru y'imyaka 40 muri gereza Ronaldinho Gaúcho yari afite ubuhanga bwihariye mu kibuga, akaba umukinnyi wakundwaga n'abafana b'amakipe menshi

#14439#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/bishop-gahima-yatorewe-gusimbura-birindabagabo-umaze-imyaka-21-ayobora-diyosezi
Bishop Gahima yatorewe gusimbura Birindabagabo umaze imyaka 21 ayobora Diyosezi ya Gahini Inama y’Abepisikopi ba Provensi y’Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda, kuri uyu wa Gatatu yatoreye Musenyeri Gahima Manasseh kuba Umwepisikopi w’Umusimbura wa Diyosezi y’Itorero Angilikani ya Gahini, aho agomba gusimbura Musenyeri Birindabagabo Alexis wari umaze imyaka 21 ayiyobora.
Nyuma yo kwemezwa n’iyi nama yabereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, Musenyeri Gahima yabwiye IGIHE ko byamushimishije kuba yagiriwe icyizere n’itorero.
Yagize ati "Ni iby’agaciro kubona Itorero ringirira icyizere bakampa kuba Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Diyoseze ya Gahini, nzakomeza gufatanya n’abandi mu kogeza ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo."
Musenyeri Birindabagabo biteganyijwe ko azajya mu kiruhuko, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari byinshi yishimira yakoze, ku buryo uzamusimbura afite intangiriro nziza nubwo igihe cyo gusimburwa kitaragera.
Yagize ati "Ndacyakomeza urugendo ntaho nari najya, ni uwo mukorana bikamara iminsi hanyuma akazabona gufata inshingano.
Gusa twubatse Cathédrale nziza, icyo cyaranejeje cyane, hari n’ibindi byinshi nko gufasha abaturage, twagiye dutera inkunga abaturage bakizamura bakagira aho bagera muri za gahunda nyinshi zitandukanye, zirimo kubigisha guhinga no korora, ari gahunda ya Girinka, amazi meza, ibyo kuzamura abaturage…" Ku bijyanye n’igihe Musenyeri mushya azatangirira inshingano, Birindabagabo yagize ati "Ntabwo turabyemeza, intambwe ya mbere ni iyi yatewe uyu munsi, ibyo gutangira inshingano tuzabibamenyesha.
Gusa ntitugomba kurenza imyaka ibiri, ariko sinibwira ko tuzanayigezaho nta mpamvu yabyo, ibindi tuzabibamenyesha."
Gahima w’imyaka 48 ni umugabo wubatse akaba afite abana 8.
Afite impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga (PhD) mu bijyanye n’iyobokamana (Théologie) akaba yari umwepisikopi wungirije muri Diyoseze ya Gahini guhera ku wa 28 Gicurasi 2017.
Musenyeri Gahima hamwe na Musenyeri Birindabagabo yatorewe gusimbura Ubwo Musenyeri Gahima yagirwaga Umwepisikopi Wungirije wa Diyoseze ya Gahini ku wa 28 Gicurasi 2017 Musenyeri Gahima yasengewe na Musenyeri Onesphore Rwaje wari Umwepisikopi Mukuru w'Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda Musenyeri Alexis Birindabagabo yishimira ko hari ibikorwa byinshi yakoze mu myaka yose amaze muri Diyosezi ya Gahini

#14453#	9	culture	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Umuco/article/Rubavu-Uwanze-guhekera-umuturanyi-warwaje-umuntu-ahanishwa-gucibwa-inzoga
Rubavu: Uwanze guhekera umuturanyi warwaje umuntu ahanishwa gucibwa inzoga Umuco wo gutabarana ufite umuzi kera kuva ku ngoma z’abami.
Uwabaga atunguwe yatabarwaga n’abaturanyi bakamuha ubufasha bwo kumuhekera.
Mu myaka yo hambere, ingobyi yafatwaga nk’intwaro y’ubutabazi ku barwayi barembeye mu rugo bakeneye kugezwa kwa muganga.
Uyu muco hari aho wasigaye na nubu aho usanga mu bice by’icyaro abarwayi bagihekwa mu ngobyi kuko batagerwaho n’imbangukiragutabara.
Urugero rwa hafi ni mu Murenge wa Busasamana mu Karere ka Rubavu aho uyu muco ukomeje kwimakazwa.
Abaturage bo muri aka gace mu kubumbatira umuco wo gutabarana barakeburana mu gihe hari bagenzi babo banze guhekera ukeneye kugeza umurwayi kwa muganga.
Aba batsimbaraye ku ndangagaciro zisigasira umuco nko gufashanya, gusabana no gutabarana.
Abo mu Murenge wa Busasamana babwiye Ukwezi.com ko gufashanya babigize intego n’uwarwaje umuntu atari hafi y’imbangukiragutabara bitabaza abaturanyi bakamuhekera bakoresheje ingobyi gakondo.
Nta byera ngo de!
Hari bamwe mu bagabo bigize ba ntibindeba bitabazwa ngo bahekere abaturanyi bakabatera utwatsi.
Sindikubwabo Augustin utuye mu Kagari ka Makoro mu Murenge wa Busasamana yavuze ko mu gufashanya hari abagenda biguru ntege mu gihe bitabajwe.
Yagize ati “ Ubu nk’iwacu dufite ingobyi gakondo y’abarwayi, iyo umuntu arwaye nijoro imbangukiragutabara itari hafi, duhita tumuheka kuko ari nk’ishyirahamwe mu mudugudu.
Uwitabajwe akanga guheka kandi afite ubushobozi n’imbaraga zo kubikora, turamuhana tukamuca ijerekani y’ikigage cyangwa abiri kugira ngo n’abandi barebereho.”
Uwitwa Nzayisenga François wo mu Mudugudu wa Kidadi mu Kagari ka Makoro na we yavuze ko abigira ba ntibindeba ntibafatanye n’abandi bahanirwa muri rusange.
Ati “ Umuco wo gutabarana twe turacyawukomeyeho.
Iyo hari utabajwe akananirwa gutabara, bashyiraho umwanya wo kumuhanira mu ruhame, bakamuca amafaranga ibihumbi bitanu cyangwa amajerekani abiri y’inzoga cyangwa ikigage abantu bakakinywa.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akagari ka Kageshi, Gacamena Jean Nepo, ashimangira ko umuco wo gufashanya no gutabarana ukomeye cyane muri Busasamana, n’ubwo hakiri abigira ibigande ntibatabare bagenzi babo aho rukomeye.
Yagize ati “Umuco wo gufashanya no gutabarana uhagaze neza mu murenge wacu.
Buri kagari gafite ingobyi gakondo ebyiri zo guhekamo abagize ikibazo.
Mu mudugudu kandi dufitemo kavuzampanda utabariza uwagize ikibazo abantu bakabimenya bakamutabara bwangu, bakamuheka bakamugeza kwa muganga.
Utabajwe ntahagere ngo afashe abandi guheka, acibwa ijerekani rimwe cyangwa abiri y’ikigage cyangwa urwagwa.”
Gacamena avuga ko gusigasira umuco nyarwanda bimaze kubageza kuri byinshi mu murenge wabo, ngo kuko bibafasha mu bikorwa biteza imbere umuryango nyarwanda n’igihugu muri rusange.
Kuva mu myaka yo hambere wasangaga Abanyarwanda barangwa n’umuco wo gufashanya, gutabarana, gusabana, kubana n’ibindi bigaragaza ubumwe butajegajega, byabafashije kubaka imibanire hagati yabo.

Itorero Umuriro wa Pentecote ryiyomoye kuri ADEPR ryimitse Abapasiteri bashya Yanditswe na Munyengabe Murungi Sabin Kuya 26 Ukuboza 2016 saa 09:20 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 3 0 Itorero Umuriro wa Pentecote ryashinzwe n'abahoze basengera muri ADEPR mu mwaka wa 2000 ryakoze ibirori byo gusengera abakuru baryo n'abadiyakoni bakora indi mirimo mu rusengero.
Uyu muhango wabaye ku wa Gatandatu tariki 24 Ukuboza 2016 ku cyicaro gikuru cy'iri torero giherereye i Kibagabaga imbere ya Saint Ignace mu Murenge wa Kimironko mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Ni nyuma y'imyaka igera kuri 16 iri torero rivutse kuko abenshi mu bakirisitu barigize basohotse muri ADEPR mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2000 ubwo abayobozi b'iri dini bahozemo bari bahinduye imwe mu myizerere y'itorero.
Itorero Umuriro wa Pentecote ryaherukaga gusengera abashumba baryo mu myaka itandatu ishize.
Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri bakoze iki gikorwa kuko baherukaga tariki ya 26 Ukuboza 2010 ari nabwo bwa mbere.
Icyo gihe basengeye abashumba bayoboye iri torero aribo Pator Rukundo Fidele na Pastor Ntawuyirushintege Coloneriyo.
Mu muhango wo gusengera abashumba b'iri torero wari ubaye ku nshuro ya kabiri, hasengewe Rebero Pascal, Rangira Benoit, Nahimana Gervais, Bazambanza Claver na Ntabanganyimana Elie.
Muri uyu muhango wari wateguwe n'Itorero Umuriro wa Pentecote rimaze kugira insengero mu turere twose tw'u Rwanda hanabayeho ubusabane hagati y'abayoboke baryo bari baturutse imihanda yose mu Rwanda.

#14503#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/rubavu-nta-modoka-yemerewe-gupakira-ibirayi-nyuma-ya-18h00
Rubavu: Nta modoka yemerewe gupakira ibirayi nyuma ya 18h00 Mu rwego rwo kwirinda guha icyuho abamamyi b'ibirayi, nta modoka yemerewe gupakira ibirayi nyuma ya saa kumi n'ebyiri z'umugoroba kuko hari aho byagaragaye ko abamamyi bananiza amakoperative yemerewe kugura umusaruro w'abaturage.
Abamamyi bakora akazi ko guhuza umuhinzi n'imodoka zibagurira umusaruro wabo bavugwaho guhendesha abahinzi b'ibirayi kuko bumvikana igiciro gito kandi imodoka zaguze ibirayi zo baba baziciye menshi bigatuma inyungu yari kubonwa n'umuhinzi aribo bayijyanira.
Taliki 05/12/2014 amahuriro y'abahinzi b'ibirayi mu Rwanda abifashijwemo na Minisitere y'ubuhinzi n'ubworozi hamwe na Minisitere y'ubucuruzi n'uturere 5 tweza ibirayi mu Rwanda bashyizeho amasezerano ko hagomba kubaho koperative zizwi akaba arizo zigura ibirayi n'abahinzi.
Mu rwego rwo guteza imbere umuhinzi w'ibirayi, ayo masezerano ateganya ko igiciro cy'ibirayi ku kilo kitagomba kujya munsi y'amafaranga 110.
Umuhinzi w'ibirayi iyo ahawe amafaranga ari munsi y'ijana (100frw) ku kilo aba ahenzwe hashingiye ku mbaraga n'ibyo akoresha kugira ngo ibirayi bishobore kwera.
Nubwo hashyizweho izo ngamba ariko taliki 11/12/2014 abazwi nk'abamamyi b'ibirayi basanzwe bakora akazi ko guhuza umuhinzi n'imodoka zibagurira umusaruro wabo basabye abaturage gukura ibirayi byinshi, amakoperative yemerewe kugura umusaruro ananirwa kubigura kuburyo toni 90 zabuze abaguzi zikamara iminsi ine ku muhanda.
Harerimana Blaise umukozi w'akarere ushinze ubuhinzi mu karere ka Rubavu, avuga ko kugira ngo bakize abahinzi igihombo basabye amakoperative yemerewe kugura ibirayi kugura uwo musaruro uri ku muhanda, basaba abaguzi b'ibirayi ko nta modoka zemerewe gupakira ibirayi nyuma ya saa kumi n'ebyiri kugira ngo hatazivangamo abamamyi.
Iki cyemezo giha bamwe uburenganzira bwo kugura mu gihe byari bisanzwe ko umuntu wese yumvikana n'umuhinzi bakagura.
Ubu ushaka gukura ibirayi mu turere twa Rubavu, Nyabihu, Musanze na Burera agomba kugura n'amakoperative yahawe uburenganzira bwo kugura n'abahinzi, bamwe bakaba babifata nk'itonesha kuri bamwe ryigeze kubaho mu mwaka wa 2007 rishyizweho n'amakopetaive n'abacuruzi ndetse bagashyiraho n'umusoro ku myaka.
Sylidio Sebuharara

#14513#	7	development	https://rwandamagazine.com/umurimo/article/kicukiro-urubyiruko-rukora-peanut-butter-zifite-umwihariko-kurusha-izitumizwa
Kicukiro: Urubyiruko rukora ‘Peanut Butter’ zifite umwihariko ’kurusha izitumizwa muri Amerika’ Mu rwego rwo kwihangira umurimo, urubyiruko rwo mu Karere ka Kicukiro, Umurenge wa Nyarugunga bishyize hamwe bakora ‘Peanut butter’ zisigwa ku migati zihariye kandi zihendutse ugereranyije n’izitumizwa hanze y’u Rwanda.
Mu kwezi kwa Werurwe 2016 nibwo abasore 4 batangije ishyirahamwe bise LFSFC (Looking into Future Saving Fud Cooperative) ry’abanyeshuri barangije kaminuza, begeranya ubumenyi butandukanye bakuye ku ntebe y’ishuri.
Munyentwali Jean Damascene wazanye igitekerezo yatangarije Rwandamagazine.com ko batangije umushinga wabo bashaka kwihangira umurimo ariko bakibanda ku hari icyuho mu bitumizwa mu mahanga bashingiye ku bumenyi bigiye mu ishuri.
Ati " Igitekerezo cyavuye mu guhanga umurimo ariko cyane hashingiwe cyane ku bibazo bihari n’aho wabona isoko kandi mu bicuruzwa bifite n’intungamubiri …Nagiye muri Minicom nkurayo imibare igaragza ko ibitumizwa hanze bisigwa mu migati bitumizwa hanze y’u Rwanda bitwara nibura miliyoni 40 z’amadorali ku mwaka… Ni menshi cyane, niho twashatse guhera."
Munyentwali avuga ko we nubwo yize ibijyanye n’ubukungu ariko ngo hari bagenzi be bize ibijyanye na ‘Food science’ mu cyahoze ari KIST bityo ubumenyi bwabo aba aribwo batangiriraho bakora ‘Peanut butter’ zikozwe mu bunyobwa zisigwa mu migati.
Munywentwali avuga ko ‘Peanut Butter’ bakora yihariye kuko ntakindi bongeramo kuko ikozwe mu bunyobwa gusa kandi ikaba itongerwamo isukuri.
Mu bunyobwa kandi bakoramo Chocolat ndetse n’isosi.
Ati " Peanut butter dukora irihariye kuko n’abantu badakoresha isukari bayikoresha.
Ikindi ni isosi dukora.
Ukeneye kuyikoresha, ashyushya amazi akabira, ubundi akayishyiramo, ikaba irahiye.
Ishobora kandi no gukaranga ibiryo."
Peanut Butter bakora ya garama 250 igura 1500 FRW naho iya garama 500 ikagura 2500 FRW.
Munyentwali avuga ko Peanut Butter yabo ihendutse ugereranyije n’izitumizwa nko muri Amerika ziba zigura 4000 FRW ku zifite garama 500.
Mu bunyobwa bakuramo Peanut Butter, Chocolat n’isosi Ku munsi bafite ubushobozi bwo gutunganya Peanut Butter 54 ziganjemo iza garama 250 kuko ngo arizo zorohera cyane abaguzi.
Peanut Butter zabo ziboneka muri za Alimentations na Supermarkets zinyuranye zo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, mu isoko rya Nyarugenge.
Mu gihe kizaza ngo barateganya no kuzigeza mu gihugu hose bitewe n’uko ubushobozi bwabo buzagenda bwiyongera.
Kugeza ubu ngo bishimira ko babashije kugera ku ntego yabo kandi ‘Product’ ikaba imaze kumenywa n’abantu kandi amabanki akaba atangiye kwemera umushinga wabo.
Munyentwali Jean Damascene ngo yishimira ko bihangiye umurimo ariko bakanagerageza kugabanya ibitumizwa hanze bisigwa ku migati Munyentwali ati " Kugira ngo ubashe gukora ugere kuri product bisaba gukora cyane.
Twifashishije ibigo nka NIRDA …umushinga wacu muri Youth Connect mu Mujyi wa Kigali wegukanye umwanya wa 2.
Ubu twishimira ko abantu batangiye kumenya ibicuruzwa byacu kandi amabanki nka BRD atangiye kwemera umushinga wacu.
Ibyo byose biduha icyere ko ejo ari heza cyane."
Avuga ku nzitizi bahura nazo, Munyentwali yemeza ko kuba abanyarwanda bataraha agaciro cyane ibikorerwa iwabo bikiri imbogamizi.
Ati " Inzitizi ni uko ubushobozi bukiri buke kandi tukanagorwa no kubona ibikoresho bijyanye n’igihe.
Ikindi ni imyumvire ikiri hasi ya bamwe yo kumva ko ibintu bikorerwa mu Rwanda batabigirira icyizere… Usanga umuntu agura Peanut Butter 4000 FRW kandi asize iya 2500 kandi itavangiyemo ibintu byamugiraho ingaruka…"

#14571#	8	technology	https://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/hatangijwe-ubukangurambaga-busobanurira-abanyarwanda-ibijyanye-n-umutekano-w
Hatangijwe ubukangurambaga busobanurira abanyarwanda ibijyanye n’umutekano w’ikoranabuhanga Umuryango udaharanira inyungu Get Safe Online ufite icyicaro Mu Bwongereza, ugiye gutangiza ubukangurambaga mu Rwanda bugamije gusobanurira abaturage uburyo bwo gucunga umutekano mu gihe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Ubu bukangurambaga buje nyuma y’ibihe bidasanzwe by’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho abantu benshi bahanze amaso ikoranabuhanga nk’ubuyro bubafasha gukomeza akazi kabo batari hamwe.
Umuryango Get Safe Online wahawe inshingano n’ibiro bya Leta y’u Bwongereza bishinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga, zo gushishikariza no kumenyesha abanyamuryango ba “Commonwealth” mu buryo bunoze, akamaro ko kugira umutekano mu gihe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Iyi gahunda ikazaba no mu Rwanda nka kimwe mu bihugu biri muri uwo muryango, yatangiye tariki ya 20 Nyakanga 2020.
Iyi gahunda ije mu rwego rwo gusobanurira abantu akamaro ko kugira umutekano mu gihe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, uyu muryango uzakorana na Minisiteri y’Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho na Inovasiyo, ndetse n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho n’Isakazabumenyi(RISA).
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho na Inovasiyo bwana Yves Iradukunda yavuze ko kumenyekanisha ibijyanye n’umutekano w’ikoranabuhanga kuri ubu bikenewe cyane kurusha ikindi gihe cyose.
Ati“Gahunda ya Get Safe Online ije yiyongera ku zindi zari zisanzweho zo guteza imbere umutekano w’abakoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Hashingiwe ku bushake Guverinoma yashyize mu gufasha abantu kubona serivisi hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, kumenyesha abantu ibijyanye n’umutekano wabo birakenewe cyane ku bakozi ba leta ndetse n’abikorera.”
Peter Davies uhagarariye Get Safe Online ku rwego mpuzamahanga, yasobanuye ko nubwo ikoranabuhanga rifite akamaro gakomeye, iyo ridakoreshejwe neza rishobora kuba ikibazo ariyo mpamvu umutekano waryo ari ingenzi.
Yagize ati “Mu byago bishobora guturuka kuri iri koranabuhanga, hari mo kwibwa amakuru y’ingenzi akwerekeyeho, kwibwa umwirondoro ugakoreshwa mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko, kwamburwa uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri mudasobwa yawe hagamijwe kuguca amafaranga y’amaherere n’ibindi.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ku bufatanye n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu bo mu Rwanda, twizeye kumenyesha abantu akamaro k’umutekano wabo mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga.”
Innocent Bagamba Muhizi, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RISA yagize yavuze ko ubu bukangurambaga bugamije guhugura abanyarwanda ku byago bishobora guterwa n’ikoreshwa nabi ry’ikoranabuhanga.
Ati “Ni ukuzamura ubumenyi bw’Abanyarwanda n’abandi Baturarwanda ku byerekeye ibyago byibasira abakoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Ku mpera z’iyi gahunda, turizera ko buri muturarwanda azaba asobanukiwe uburyo bwo kwirinda kugerwaho n’ibyo byago byibasira abakoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Tuzashyira umwihariko mu gukora ibishoboka byose abana bacu bagire umutekano cyane cyane muri iki gihe bari kwiga bifashishije ikoranabuhanga.”
Get Safe Online yagaragaje ko mu buryo buzifashishwa hatangwa ubu bukangurambaga hazifashishwa uburyo butandukanye burimo urubuga www.getsafeonline.org.rw, Gahunda zitandukanye z’imenyekanisha zizabera mu Rwanda, zigamije kumenyekanisha ibyago byibasira umutekano w’abakoresha ikoranabuhanga, kongera ubushobozi bw’abantu hagamijwe kubamenyesha ibijyanye n’umutekano ku ikoranabuhanga, binyuze muri gahunda y’imenyekanisha ifasha abantu mu miryango n’ibigo babarizwamo binyuze mu mahugurwa, ubujyanama, inama zitangwa n’impuguke za Get Safe Online ndetse n’abafatanyabikorwa bo mu Rwanda Get Safe Online ni umuryango udaharanira inyungu ubarizwa mu Bwongereza washinzwe muri 2005, utanga ubumenyi na serivizi z’imenyekanisha z’ubuntu kandi zo ku rwego rwo hejuru, zerekeye uburyo bwo kwirinda ibyago byibasira abakoresha ikoranabuhanga.
Abanyarwanda bagiye gusobanurira akamaro ko kugira umutekano mu gihe bakoresha ikoranabuhanga

#14578#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/inkomoko-y-insigamigani-ingwize-yishe-ntango
Inkomoko y’insigamigani “ Ingwize yishe Ntango” Uyu mugani bawuca iyo babonye umuntu ukunda kugira umururumba aririmira utw’abandi, ntanyurwe n’ibye bwite bona n’iyo byaba byamusagiranye.
Wakomotse kuri uwo mugabo Ntango,wari umugaragu wa Rukangirashyamba rwa Kanyamuhungu w’umutsobe, amutwarira i Ndorwa ya Nyabishabi,ahasaga umwaka wa 1700.
Rukangirashyamba amaze gupfa yazunguwe n’umuhungu we Gashamura.
Naho Ntango akomeza kumutwarira icyo gihuhu cya Nyabishambi.
Mu igabana ry’u Rwanda na Gikore azungurwa n’umugabo w’Umutsobe witwa Rutayashwaga.
Uwo Ntango yari intwari cyane, agakunda kurasana n’abanyagikore akabanyaga inka.
Amaze kugwiza inka ziturutse ku muheto,yongera gutera i Gikore ahanyaga amashyo menshi y’inka, aziroha mu gifunzo cya Nyabishabi barazambutsa , hasigaramo akamasa gato k’uruvuzo.
Abanyagikore baza bakurikiye inkora zanyuzemo kugira ngo bazambure abanyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda bamaze gukuka cya gifunzo, abanyagikore bakirohamo.
Abanyarwanda bakebutse babona ka kamasa kasigaye gashimbagira gasubira i Gikore.
Ntango ati "Nsubiyeyo ngarure kariya kamasa, abanyagikore batagasubiranayo."
Abagaragu be na rubanda rundi baramubuza bati "Dore abanyagikore baracyuzuyemo nujyayo barakwica !"
Ngo umuntu ananira umuhana ntananira umushuka.
Ntango arabananira ati" Akamasa kanjye ntikahera.
»Yiroha mu gifunzo ahubirana n’Abanyagikore bamutera amacumu bamutsindamo.
Bamaze kumugarika bakukana Abanyarwanda, barabanesha babambura za nka bari banyaze.
Intumbi ya Ntango bayisubirana iwabo.
Abanyarwanda bataha amara masa, umugaba wabo ahera i Gikore.
Ubwo Ntango yari afite abagore babiri, Kangondo na Nyirantwari,wari inkundwakazwa.
Ingabo zitabarutse ziza kubabikira.
Kangondo utari inkundwakazi aba ari we ubabara cyane ararira, naho Nyirantwari we arishima.
Ingabo zimaze kubika zirataha, abagore basigarana n’abana iwabo.
Nuko Kangondo yiroha mi kirago, araryama by’umubabaro.
Naho Nyirantwari ariyicarira, niko guterura akabyino ko gushinyagurira mukeba we ati "Yewe Kangondo ka Ngaboyisonga, byuka uterekere Ntango ariho araza !"
Kangondo amusubiza muri ako kabyino ati "Yewe Nyirantwari wivuga amahomvu,Ntango yarapfuye" Nyirantwari yongera gusubiza Kangondo ati « Yewe Kangondo ka Ngaboyisonga, Ntango ntiyapfuye Ntango ariho azaza, ari mu gafunzo ka Nyabishabi, aranyaga impenda n’inyana zazo."
Nuko abagore bahererekanya amagambo batyo.
Umugani w’Ingwize yishe Ntango wamamara utyo mu Rwanda, bitewe nuko yari afite amashyo y’inka akazira akamasa kamwe k’amanjwe yakurikiranye mu rufuzo rwa Nyabishambi, Abanyagikore bakarinda kumutsindamo.
Bawuca iyo babonye umuntu ugira umururumba ,ntanyurwe n’ibye ,kabone nubwo byaba byaramusagiranye.
Gushaka ingwize =Kutanyurwa n’ibyawe, kuririmira utw’abandi.

Abavugwa bose harimo abo twarangizanyije hari n’abo tukiri kuvugana kandi bakomeye.”
“Dutegereje ko FERWAFA ifungura isoko ry’igura n’igurisha ry’abakinnyi ku itariki ya 21 Kamena, tugahita dutangira kubatangaza ku mugaragaro abo twasinyishije.”

#14586#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/mudasobwa/article/microsoft-yemerewe-kuzamura
Microsoft yemerewe kuzamura ikoranabuhanga ry'uburezi mu Rwanda Yanditswe kuya 6-03-2014 saa 19:52' na Jean Claude Ntawitonda Minisiteri y'uburezi mu Rwanda, yemereye Ikigo mpuzamahanga kabuhariwe mu ikoranabuhanga ku Isi "Microsoft Corp" kongera ubushobozi bw'ikoranabuhanga mu burezi bw'amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye, bibonwa nk'ibisubizo ku burezi bwo mu Rwanda.
Microsoft yiyemeje guhindura byinshi mu burezi bw'u Rwanda, harimo kuzana porogaramu zafasha mu myigire inoze, aho igiye kujya ikorana na Minisiteri y'uburezi mu kugeza porogaramu, mudasobwa, n'ibindi bifasha uburezi gutera imbere mu ikoranabuhanga ku banyeshuri (...)
Minisiteri y'uburezi mu Rwanda, yemereye Ikigo mpuzamahanga kabuhariwe mu ikoranabuhanga ku Isi "Microsoft Corp" kongera ubushobozi bw'ikoranabuhanga mu burezi bw'amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye, bibonwa nk'ibisubizo ku burezi bwo mu Rwanda.
Minisitiri Biruta asinyana amasezerano na Odipo y'ubufatanye mu burezi Microsoft yiyemeje guhindura byinshi mu burezi bw'u Rwanda, harimo kuzana porogaramu zafasha mu myigire inoze, aho igiye kujya ikorana na Minisiteri y'uburezi mu kugeza porogaramu, mudasobwa, n'ibindi bifasha uburezi gutera imbere mu ikoranabuhanga ku banyeshuri n'abarezi.
Mu muhango wo gusinya amasezerano y'ubufatanye wabaye kuri uyu wa 6 Werurwe 2014, Minisitiri w'Uburezi Dr Biruta Vincent, yemeje ko kwemerera ikigo gikomeye mu ikoranabuhanga nka Microsoft bigiye kuyobora u Rwanda, kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu kuzamura ireme ry'uburezi.
Dr Vincent Biruta, yagize ati: "Duhereza ikaze ibishoboka byose ku barimu no ku banyeshuri bifite intego yo kuzamura ireme ry'uburezi mu Rwanda, kandi gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ni umusingi w'ibyo dukeneye byose."
Nk'uko byemejwe na Eric Odipo, uhagarariye Microsoft muri Afurika y'i Burasirazuba n'iy'Amajyepfo, Microsoft igiye gufasha guverinoma y'u Rwanda kugeza ku banyeshuri porogaramu za mudasobwa nka "Office 365", izitwa "imagine Cup", "DreamSpark", "kodu", "Digigilz" ku bakobwa, zibafasha gukura mu bijyanye n'ubumenyi n'ikoranabuhanga.
Ibi bizajyana no kongerera ubushobozi abarimu n'abanyeshuri, ndetse n'amahugurwa ku ikoreshwa ry'iri koranabuhanga.
Yagize ati: "Intego yacu ni ugufasha abanyeshuri n'abarimu kumenya imbaraga bifitemo, nyuma yo kuzenguruka isi binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga."
MINEDUC yongeraho ko amasezerano yasinywe agaragaza ko ubu bufatanye butazarangirira ku gutanga porogaramu n'ubumenyi gusa, kuko Microsoft igiye ibaye isoko rya Mudasobwa zigiye kujya zitangwa mu burezi.
Mu byemejwe, harimo ko nihajya hagurwa mudasobwa zirenze ibihumbi bitatu, u Rwanda ruzabona inyungu yo kugabanyirizwa ibiciro bya porogaramu zoze ziri muri mudasobwa bikajya gusa no kuzihabwa ku buntu.
Ama masezerano yasinywe nyuma y'aho mu kwezi gushize umunyarwandakazi Akaliza Keza Gara, yahawe icyizere cyo kwinjizwa mu kanama ngishwanama ka Microsoft muri Afurika (4Afrika Advisory Council).
Minisitiri w'uburezi w'u Rwanda ahererekanya amasezerano n'uwari uhagarariye Microsoft [email protected] Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#14611#	9	culture	http://igihe.com/umuco/ibitabo/article/madamu-jeannette-kagame-yitabiriye-imurikwa-ry-igitabo-cya-uwineza-celine
Madamu Jeannette Kagame yitabiriye imurikwa ry’igitabo cya Uwineza Celine, ‘Untamed, Beyond Freedom’ Madamu Jeannette Kagame yitabiriye umuhango wo kumurika igitabo ‘Untamed, Beyond Freedom’ cyanditswe na Uwineza Celine, umunyarwandakazi wanditse ku buzima yabayemo we n’umuryango we muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Iki gitabo cyamuritswe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu muri Kigali Marriott Hotel, aho umuryango, inshuti n’abavandimwe baje kwifatanya na Celine Uwineza mu gihe cyo kumurika igitabo ‘Untamed, Beyond Freedom’.
Iki gitabo cy’amapaji 149 cyanditse mu buryo bwo kubara inkuru, mbese nkuko abantu baganira umwe abwira undi ibyamubayeho.
Uwineza atangirana ibaruwa yandikiye mama we wishwe tariki 10 Mata 1994 hamwe na bakuru be babiri na musaza we, abamenyesha agahinda afite nyuma yo kubabura n’uburyo akumbuye kuzongera kubabona.
Iyo baruwa Uwineza yanditse mu Ukwakira 2015 ntiyari iyo kwishimisha cyangwa urukumbuzi rusanzwe ahubwo ni umuti yari yandikiwe na muganga nyuma y’igihe yari amaze afite ihungabana, ahora arota ibintu bibi, bigaruka ku rugendo yanyuzemo muri Jenoside.
Mu gitabo cye, Uwineza ajyana umusomyi mu minsi ya mbere ya Jenoside ubwo we, ababyeyi be n’abavandimwe be babagaho bishimye kugeza umunsi atangira inzira y’umubabaro tariki 7 ubwo yakangukaga agasanga umusirikare amuhagaze hejuru n’imbunda, akamukurura amujyana aho mama we n’abandimwe bari barindiwe bategereje kwicwa.
Uwineza wari ufite imyaka icumi mu gihe cya Jenoside, abara inkuru y’uburyo mama we yarashwe ukuguru mu maso ye, uko baraye mu bihuru bihishe kugeza tariki ya 10 umunsi umuryango we uvanwa mu kigo cy’ababikira (Les Petites Soeurs de Jesus) ku Kicukiro kuva ubwo ntiyongere kuwubona, n’uburyo yongeye guhura na papa we wari hanze ubwo Jenoside yakorwaga ndetse na musaza we Johnny warokotse.
Nyuma yo kurokorwa n’ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi, Uwineza yagerageje kwiyibagiza ayo mateka ariko aranga aramukurikirana.
Ubwo yamurikaga igitabo cye yagize ati “Nabayeho mfite abantu babiri muri njyewe, umwana w’imyaka icumi ugifashe igitenge cya mama we ufite ibibazo byinshi mu mutwe, nanjye mukuru.
Nabayeho ubuzima hanze bigaragara ko nta kibazo ariko imbere mfite agahinda kadashira.
Nakoraga ibintu binyibigiza wa mwana w’imyaka icumu ariko inyuma ntibigaragare.”
Mu 2015 yagize ihungabana rikomeye ajyanwa mu bitaro, muganga amutegeka kugenda yandika ibyo yibuka byamubayeho muri Jenoside ngo yiyibutse.
Ibyo yanditse ari umuti nibyo byaje kuvamo igitabo.
Ati “Natangiye nandika ku rupapuro, nandika uko niyumva.
Nyuma y’imyaka ibiri inkovu zari zigihari ariko cya cyizere tuvuga naracyumvise koko muri njye.
Nsubira mu ijwi mama yambwiye (bwa nyuma) ngo genda ubeho.
Nasanze narabayeho ntariho mu myaka 22 yose.”
Uwineza yashishikarije abanyarwanda bose kwandika amateka yabo by’umwihariko abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kugira ngo bahangane n’abahakana ko itabayeho.
Ati “Nitutandika amateka azibagirana, njye nzandika kugira ngo na wa wundi uhakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, atazaza ngo ambwire ko itabayeho.
Sinzarwana na we nzandika kuko ukuri guca mu ziko ariko ntigushya.”
Murengezi Wilberforce, Papa wa Uwineza yashimye ubutwari umukobwa we yagaragaje yandika igitabo gikubiyemo amateka n’ubuhamya bw’umuryango we.
Yagaragaje ko Imana ariyo yafashije umuryango we kongera kwiyubakamo icyizere nyuma y’ibyo wanyuzemo byose.
Ati “Ikintu cya mbere gikuru kuri twese ni ukumenya Imana kuko niyo ituvanamo ibihu byose tuba dufite mu mutwe.
Ushobora kuyisenga ntibivemo, ni ukwicara rero ukayisaba cyane.”
Umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe ubushakashatsi n’ishyinguranyandiko muri Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside, Jean Damascène Gasanabo, yavuze ko igitabo cya Uwineza ari umusanzu ku gihugu, ashishikariza cyane urubyiruko kwandika no gukoresha ubundi buryo bwose kugira ngo amateka ya Jenoside atazibagirana.
Uretse umubyeyi n’abavandimwe be, hari abandi bantu basaga 30 bo mu muryango wa Uwineza bishwe muri Jenoside.
Igitabo Untamed, Beyond Freedom kigurishwa 15 000 Frw.
Ubu kiboneka mu iguriro ry’ibitabo rya Ikirezi ndetse no ku iguriro ry’ibitabo ryo kuri internet rya Amazon.
Igitabo 'Untamed, Beyond Freedom' kivuga ubuzima Uwineza yabayeho mbere ya Jenoside, ubwo yakorwaga na nyuma yayo Abitabiriye imurikwa ry'igitabo cya Uwineza babanje gutembera imurika ry'ibihangano by'ubugeni Abantu b'ingeri zitandukanye bitabiriye imurikwa ry'igitabo 'Untamed, Beyond Freedom' Uwineza yashishikarije abarokotse kwandika amateka yabo mu guhashya abahakana n'abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Alice Higiro Kamikazi mu mukino ugaruka ku buhamya bw'umubyeyi wapfushije abe muri Jenoside Alice Higiro Kamikazi na Alain Pierre Sabineza bakina umukino ugaruka ku mateka ya Jenoside Biganza Isibo (ibumoso) avuga umuvugo afatanyije na Tria Mucyo

#Missrwanda2021:Kayirebwa Marie Paul yavuze uburyo kujya mu mashusho y’IKINYAFU byamugabanyirije icyizere mbere yuko yiyandikisha Ni mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE aho uyu mukobwa yavuze byinshi ku rugendo rwe mbere yo kujya mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2021 aho yanavuze ko yitabiriye Miss Rwanda 2018 gusa ntaze guhirwa no kwegukana ikamba,akaba yaragarutse muri Miss Rwanda 2021 kongera kugerageza amahirwe kuko avuga ko ubu yabaye mukuru.

Kayirebwa yakomeje avuga umuntu afata nk’ikitegererezo mu buzima bwe aho yavuze ko ari mukuru we kuko ariwe wabashije kumuba hafi mu buzima bwe, akora ibintu byose ku murongo, ni umujyanama mwiza kandi aharanira gukora kugirango abeho.
Uyu mukobwa wahishuye ko atigeze acibwa intege no kutegukana ikamba ubwo yitabiraga irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda mu 2018, yavuze ko muri uyu mwaka yafashe icyemezo cyo gusubirayo akongera kugerageza amahirwe.
Kayirebwa witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2018 ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali ntiyabashije kurenga ijonjora ry’ibanze [Pre-Selection] ngo ajye mu mwiherero.
Kudakabya inzozi ngo yegukane ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, byatumye uyu mukobwa atabasha kugera ku ntego yari yihaye zo gufasha abana bafite ubumuga nkuko byari mu mushinga we.
Icyakora ngo nubwo intego ze atazigezeho, aherutse kuvuga ko yiteguye kuzazikomezanya muri Miss Rwanda 2021.
Yagize ati "Kuri ubu kuko maze kwisobanukirwa, njya mbitekereza nkavuga nti uwasubiramo.
Njya numva uyu mwaka nasubiramo.”
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko impamvu atasubiye kurushanwa nyuma ya 2018, byatewe nuko yabanje kugorwa no kwakira gusezererwa kwe.
Muri uyu mwaka avuga ko azagenda yitwaje intwaro eshatu yizeye ko zizamugeza kure ndetse zikaba zanamuhesha ikamba; zirimo Kutagira ubwoba, kumenya icyo ashaka no guhagarara ku byo avuga.
Kayirebwa yatangaje ko yiteguye guhatana mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda nyuma y’iminsi mike agaragaye mu mashusho y’indirimbo zitandukanye.
Uyu mukobwa yifashishijwe mu ndirimbo zigezweho nka ‘We Don’t Care’ ya Rj The Dj na Meddy & Rayvanny na ’Ikinyafu’ ya Bruce Melodie na Kenny Sol n’izindi.

#14633#	1	sports	https://www.kigalitoday.com/imikino-11/football/article/nta-mafaranga-twahawe-yo-gufasha-amakipe-bategereze-icyo-fifa-izagena-ferwafa
Nta mafaranga twahawe yo gufasha amakipe, bategereze icyo FIFA izagena-Ferwafa Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, riravuga ko nta mafaranga ryigeze rihabwa na FIFA yo gufasha amakipe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus Muri iyi minsi isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho ndetse inzego nyinshi zitandukanye zikomeje guhura n’ikibazo cy’ubukungu, ndetse by’umwihariko n’urwego rwa siporo ruri mu byagezweho.
Mu minsi ishize, Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru ku isi riheruka gutangaza ko mu bintubyihutirwa rigomba gukora muri iyi minsi, ari uguhangana n’ikibazo cy’ubukungu cyugarije umupira w’amaguru, aho babona ko kugeza ubu FIFA ihagaze neza nk’uko byatangajwe na Perezida wayo Gianni Infantino, mu butumwa bw’amashusho yageneye amashyirahamwe abarizwa muri FIFA Yagize ati “Akazi twakoze mu myaka ine ishize katumye kuri ubu muri FIFA duhagaze neza mu bijyanye n’ubukung, gusa amafaranga dufite si aya FIFA ni ay’umupira w’amaguru bityo niba uyakeneye ni ngombwa ko dutekereza icyo gukora ni inshingano zacu bikaba n’akazi kacu ka buri munsi.”
Ku ruhande rw’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda FERWAFA, batangaza ko aya mafaranga atari ayo guha amakipe mu guhangana n’iki cyorezo, nk’uko twabitangarijwe n’Umunyamabanga wa Ferwafa Uwayezu Francois Regis.
“Amafaranga FIFA igomba gutanga ni amafaranga n’ubundi asanzwe agenerwa amashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru, icyabayeho kidasanzwe ni uko ubu azaza mbere mu gihe ubusanzwe yajyaga atangwa mu mpera z’umwaka” Umunyamabanga mukuru wa Ferwafa Uwayezu Francois Regis Umunyabanga wa Ferwafa kandi yakomeje avuga ko ibijyanye no gufasha amakipe bidahari kuko ayo mafaranga ubusanzwe adahari, ko ahubwo bategereza inkunga FIFA yazagenera yo guhangana n’iki cyorezo, ibi bikaba biherukwa no gukomozwaho na Perezida wa FIFA, avugwa ko hari gusuzumwa uburyo amashyirahamwe yazafashwa kubera iki cyorezo cyazahaje ubukungu.
National Football League 2019/2020

#14718#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Habonetse-urukingo-rwa-Ebola-ruzatangira-gukora-2015
Habonetse urukingo rwa Ebola ruzatangira gukora 2015.
Nkuko bitangazwa n'umushakashatsi ukomoka mu gihugu cya Danemark, ngo amaze gushyira ahagaragara urukingo rw'icyorezo cya Ebola ubu rukirimo gukorerwa isuzuma rukaba ngo ruzatangira gukoreshwa mu mwaka wa 2015.
Uyu mushakashatsi Johnson & Johnson (J&J), avuga ko urukingo rwe rugenewe abantu rukaba ruje ari urwa 2 ku rundi rwari rumaze igihe rubonetse muri Canada ariko rwo rukaba rwaribandaga cyane ku nyamaswa nk'inkende n'ibindi.
Gahunda yo gutunganya byihuse uru rukingo ngo izashyirwamo imbaraga cyane bifashishije Ebola Zaire ari na yo yagaragaye cyane muri Afurika y'uburasirazuba.
Mu rwego rwo kunoza iby'uru rukingo, uyu mushakashatsi J&J ngo afatanije n'ikigo cyo muri Amerika gishinzwe kurwanya indwara zandura ndetse n'igishinzwe ubuzima.
Uru rukingo ngo ruzakoreshwa cyane ku mugabane w'Afurika aho iki cyorezo kimaze koreka abasaga 1900.

#14729#	8	technology	http://www.makuruki.rw/IKORANABUHANGA/article2432.html
Isi yose ngo ntizihanganira Leta zibangamira imikorere y’imbuga za internet Kugeza ubu ngo hari ukutisanzura ku mbuga zimwe na zimwe za internet aho ziri kugenzurwa bikomye na Guverinoma z’ibihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi kuburyo ngo binaziviramo guhagarikwa n’izo leta, ibi ngo bikaba ari ibintu bishobora guhagurutsa isi ngo birwanywe kuko bari kubona byiyongera umunsi ku wundi.
Bamwe mu bakoresha imbuga za internet/ net Nkuko bigenda bigaragazwa na raporo y’ikigo kitegamiye kuri leta kigamije kureba ubwisanzure bw’imikoreshereze ya internet mu bigo bitandukanye, irerekana ko igenzura ryakozwe mu bihugu bigera kuri 65 byo ku migabane itandukanye yo ku isi, basanze 36 muri byo hari ukutisanzura gukomeye n’igenzura rikorwa na za guverinoma z’ibihugu bitandukanye rigakorerwa imbuga za internet rimwe na rimwe bakanazihagarika nta mpamvu.
Iki kigo kandi cyemeza ko biri kugenda byiyongera ku buryo bukabije aho leta zitandukanye ziri kugenda zishyiraho amategeko ashyiraho igenzurwa ry’imbuga za internet kandi ziha ibihano bikarishye zimwe mu zitavuga rumwe na leta harimo no kuzifunga burundu.
Iki kigo kandi gikomeza kivuga ko, hagati y’umwaka wa 2013 na 2014 abantu benshi bo mu bihugu bitandukanye batawe muri yombi bazira ibikorwa bitandukanye bitishimiwe na leta zabo bagiye bakorera ku mbuga za internet ugereranyije n’imyaka yabanje.
Sibyo gusa ngo n’imbuga za internet ubwazo nazo zashyizweho igitutu n’igenzurwa rikomeye na leta byarimba bakanabihagarika ndetse n’ibigo byigenga bigiye gutangiza ibikorwa byabo nabyo bisabwa cyane kugendera ku mabwiriza bihabwa na leta.
Nkuko byemezwa n’iyi raporo, ngo mu bihugu byakorewemo ubu bushakashatsi, ibihugu bigerageza gutanga ubwisanzure ku mbuga zitandukanye za internet ni Iran, China, Cuba, Ethiopia na Uzbekistan.
Naho mu bihugu nka Russia na Turkey nibyo bigaragaramo kutisanzura kw’imbuga za internet kuko ngo leta zo muri ibi bihugu byagiye bishyiraho amtegeko akumira amwe mu makuru aca kuri izo mbuga, ndetse bakanaurikirana mu nkiko umuntu wese unenga leta aciye kuri izo mbuga za internet cyane imbuba nkoranyambaga(social media).
Muri ibyo bihugu byose bakoreyemo ubushakashatsi, basanze ibihugu bigera kuri 19 basanze aribyo biha ubwisanzure imbuga zabo za internet, naho ibigera kuri 31 byo ntago ubwisanzure bw’izo mbuga za internet buhagije, ibindi 19 byo basanze nta bwisanzure na mba imbuga za internet zifite muri ibyo bihugu.
Uhereye mri Gicurasi mu mwaka wa 2013, habayeho ubwiyongere bukabije bw’itabwa muri yombi kwagiye gukorerwa abantu kubw’amagambo bavugiye kuri izi mbuga afitanye isano n’ibikorwa bya politiki, ibkorwa byagaragaye cyane mu bihugu byo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati(middle East) ndetse no mu bihugu byo mu majyaruguru y’umugabane wa Africa(ibihugu by’abarabu).
Ed Royce umunya politiki wo muri leta zunze ubumwe za America, yashimiye iki kigo cyasohoye iyi raporo, avugako isi ihangayikishijwe n’ukwiyongera kw’igenzura rikabije riri gukorerwa imbuga zitandukanye za internet ariko avuga ko bagiye guhaguruka bakarwanya bivuye inyuma za guverinoma zibera umutwaro imbuga za internet kuko ngo ubu aricyo gihe izi mbuga zigomba kwigenga.
Nkuko bigaragara, usanga iki kibazo cyane usanga kibasiye cyane ibihugu cyane by’abarabu kuko akenshi usanga ariho hakunze kugenda hagaragara bimwe mubyabangamira izi mbuga, kuko ikibyemeza ni abanyamakuru bagiye bagirirwa nabi mu gihe bataraga amakuru ku ntambara ibera muri Syria ndetse no kutishimira ubutegetsi buriho kwabayeho mu bihugu bya turkey, Egypt,na Ukraine.
Jean Louis UWISHYAKA

#14739#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/iburasirazuba-imashini-za-ebm-zirabapfana-bakabura-aho-bazikoresha
Iburasirazuba: Imashini za EBM zirabapfana bakabura aho bazikoresha Abikorera bo mu Ntara y’Uburasirazuba bavuga ko hari igihe biba ngombwa ko badaha umukiriya wabo inyemezabwishyu kubera ko imashini zizitanga zizwi nka EBM ziba zapfuye.
Abikorera b’Uburasirazuba bahamya ko izi mashini za EBM zikunze kubapfana ntizifate interineti Babitangaje ubwo Ikigo cy’igihugu cy’imisoro n’amahoro (RRA) kifatanyaga n’abikorera bo mu Ntara y’Uburasirazuba kwizihiza umunsi w’abasora, hanahembwa abikorera batanze imisoro neza mu mwaka wa 2016-2017.
Muri ibyo birori byabereye mu Karere ka Rwamagana ku wa gatatu tariki ya 27 Nzeli 2017, abikorera bagaragaje ko imashini za EBM zikunze kubapfana bakabura aho bazikoresha muri iyo ntara bakarinda gutega, bakajya kuzikoresha mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Kamanzi Innocent, umucuruzi wo mu Karere ka Kirehe avuga ko imashini za IBM zikunze kugira ikibazo cya interineti bigatuma abacuruzi batabona uko batanga inyemezabwishyu.
Akomeza avuga ko ibyo ngo bidindiza ubucuruzi bwabo bikanabagusha mu makosa yo kudatanga inyemezabwishyu.
Uwikorera witwa Amora Saleh yemeza ko bamaze gusobanukirwa akamaro ko gusora.
Basaba ko RRA cyabegereza abatekinisiye bakora imashini za EBM.
Komiseri mukuru wa RRA, Richard Tusabe avuga ko abo bacuruzi bagiye kubegereza ababakorera izo mashini Komiseri mukuru wa RRA, Richard Tusabe yavuze ko EBM ubusanzwe zidakorwa n’abakozi b’icyo kigo.
Akomeza avuga ko ariko bagiye gukorana n’urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) kugira ngo hashakwe uburyo abacuruzi bakwegerezwa abakora izo mashini batagombye kujya kuzikoresha i Kigali.
Agira ati “Iki kibazo tuzagikemura vuba.
Tuzavugana n’abikorera turebe uburyo hashyirwaho abakozi bahoraho hafi y’abo bacuruzi bakazajya babafasha.”
Abasora bo Ntara y’Uburasirazuba bashimiwe uburyo basigaye bibwiriza gutanga umusoro n’ubwo hakiri bake batawutanga uko bikwiye.
Intara y’Uburasirazuba yinjije imisiro ingana na miliyari 22RWf ku ntego ya miliyari 16.5RWf iyo ntara yari yihaye.

#14745#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Bimwe-mu-bimera-byagufasha-kwirinda-indwara-zitandukanye
Bimwe mu bimera byagufasha kwirinda indwara zitandukanye Igusura Tugendeye ku bushakashatsi butandukanye buboneka ku bimera n'indwara zigenda zivurwa no kurya cyangwa se kunywa bimwe muri ibyo bimera, byagaragaye ko impyiko nayo iza muri zimwe mu ndwara zigaragara ko zakwirindwa hashingiwe ku kwirinda ukoresheje ibi bimera.
Mu bucukumbuzi bwakozwe n'urubuga ubuzimabwacu.com (Rwanda health prevention) bugaragaza ko umuntu ashobora kwivura akoresheje ibimera aho wabyifashisha nko mu gihe urwaye zimwe muri izi ndwara : impyiko, Rubagimpande, umutima, umwijima, umutwe, kuva imyuna n'izindi.
Ikimera cyitwa Indimu umutobe wayo ushobora kubuza kuremwa kw'imisenyi mu ngingo, gifasha rero kuyisohora.
Mu ndimu harimo Vitamine A ibuza gufatana kw'amaraso, nicyo gituma ibarirwa mu byo kurya bivura impyiko.
Ukamura indimu imwe mu mazi wavanzemo n'ibiyiko 2 by'ubuki ukayanywa mu gitondo ukabikora mu minsi 9.
Igisura na cyo kiri mu miti y'indwara nk'iyo, Kukivuguta cyangwa kugisekura ukavanga n'amazi make ukanywa ikirahuri kimwe mu gitondo n'icyindi ku manywa bigira akamaro cyane.
Ushobora no gufata litiro imwe y'amazi ugashyiramo ifu y'igisura yuzuye ibiyiko 3 ukabibiza iminota 15,Ukanywa udukombe 3 duto cyangwa igice cy'ikirahuri mu munsi ukabikora igihe kirekire.
Igisura gihanagura ibisigazwa by'indurwe byagiye bitakara aho bitagenewe.
Igisura kivura indwara nyinshi iyo gisekuwe kikavangwa n'amazi meza bibize, ukanywa ikirahuri 1 mu gitondo, n'ikindi ku manywa.
Igisura gifite ubuhanga bwo koza amaraso kandi kirakenewe cyane ku bafite amaraso akennye.Gifite ingufu mu kuvura urwagashya, diyabete, igifu n'agasabo k'indurwe.
Cyongera amashereka kandi kivura indwara z'uruhu nyinshi .
Mu miti y'indwara z'impyiko harimo n'igitunguru gishobora gusohora iyo myanda yipfundikanije, ishobora gukoreshwa hamwe n'indimu icagaguye, ishobora no kuvangwa n'amavuta ya Soya, amavuta ya Elayo cyangwa ay'ibihwagwagari.
Ni byiza kubikoresha iminsi icumi.
Umutobe wabyo unyobwa bafata igice cy'ikirahuri kabiri cyangwa3.
Hari ikindi kibazo cy'imisenyi ishobora kwinjira mu nzira zo kwihagarika nk'imwe mu ndwara zifata impyiko "lithiase irinaire".
Iyo ndwara iterwa no kwibumbabumba kw'intungamubiri zimwe na zimwe zagombaga gukwirakwizwa aho zikenewe.
Iyo zigeze ahantu hari amazi ziribumbabumba zigahinduka akabuye.
Ako kabuye gashobora kumvikana umuntu akoresheje intoki.
Gashobora kungana n'umusenyi cyangwa kakuzura ikiziba k'inda.
Hari imiti ishobora kurinda umubiri kurwara iyo ndwara ndetse kandi ishobora gusohora utwo tubuyenge.
Ni henshi mu mubiri hakunda kuboneka iyo ndwara mu mubiri ijyanye no kwipfundikanya kw'amaraso akamera nk'utubyimba.
Iyo ndwara ishobora kuboneka mu mwijima, mu gasabo k'indurwe, mu ruhago, mu ngingo , mu mara, mu muhogo, mu kanwa no mu iherezo ry'urura"appendice cyangwa appendicite" no mu ihuriro ry'aho intanga zihurira n'umuyoboro uvuye mu ruhago.
Aho hantu h'ihuriro ry'intanga hitwa "prostate".
Imiti kuri iyi ndwara harimo karoti kuko ikungahaye kuri vitamin A ituma ururenda rwo mu mpyiko rukomera bikabuza kwipfundikanya kw'amaraso.
Karoti ishobora kuribwa ari mbisi cyangwa ukanywa umutobe wayo.
Mu mutobe wa karoti umuntu ashobora kuvangamo umutobe w'indimu"citron"cyangwa umutobe wa pome ukanywa bigufasha kugira ubuzima bwiza kandi buramba.
Uwihirwe Marie Jeanne

Producer Knoxbeat yasezeranye na Akamikazi Bernice,Rocky Kirabiranya wari ugaragagiye umugeni yatunguye abatashye ubukwe[AMAFOTO] Knoxbeat yasezeraniye mu Murenge wa Nyakabanda ho mu mujyi wa Kigali kuri uyu wa Kane, tariki 25 Werurwe 2021.
Uyu musore usanzwe amenyerewe mu gutunganya indirimbo yari agaragiwe na Rocky Kimomo nka Parrain (uhagarariye umubyeyi wa Knoxbeat).
Mu buryo butunguranye, Rocky uzwi cyane mu gusobanura filime yagaragaye inyuma y’umugeni yambaye ingofero.
Knoxbeat yasezeranye mu mategeko nyuma yo kwemererwa n’umukunzi we ko bazabana akaramata muri Mutarama 2021 ubwo yamwambikaga impeta.
Knoxbeat akaba asezeranye na Akamikazi Bernice nyuma y’uko hari umukobwa bari bamaranye imyaka itari mike bakundana,ndetse bakaba baranabyaranye umwana.
Knoxbeat wasezeranye imbere y’amategeko n’umukunzi we, ni umwe mu ba Producer bafite izina mu muziki w’u Rwanda.
Yakoze nyinshi mu ndirimbo zamenyekanye by’umwihariko izisohoka muri Monster Record ya Dj Zizou.
