#14787#	6	religion	http://www.makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article/Icyo-bibiya-ivuga-ku-cyaha-cyo-kubeshya
Icyo Bibiliya ivuga ku cyaha cyo kubeshya Muri iki gihe usanga hari abantu bafata kubeshya nk' akantu gato kadafite icyo gatwaye, ibi bigaragarira aho umuntu abeshya undi bigaragara ubona yabifashe nk' ibintu bisanzwe.
Ububeshyi nk' ubu ahanini bukorerwa kuri telephone umuntu akabeshya undi ati ndaha n' aha kandi atari byo.
Nubwo bimeze gutya bibiliya hari byinshi ivuga ku cyaha cyo kubeshya.
Hari n' aho igaragaza ko umuntu ukunda kubeshya yabigambiriye atazajya mu ijuru.
"Hanze hazaba imbwa n'abarozi n'abasambanyi, n'abicanyi n'abasenga ibishushanyo, n'umuntu wese ukunda kubeshya akabikora" Ibyahishuwe 22: 15 Iyi n' imvugo ishushanya.
Iyo bibiliya ivuga ibyerekeranye no kujya mu ijuru hari aho ikoresha kuragwa ubwami bw' ijuru ahandi igakoresha kwinjira mu bwami bw' ijuru, iyo ivuze ko umuntu ukunda kubeshya akanabikora azaba hanze bivuze ko atazinjira mu bwami bwo mu ijuru.
Itegeko rya mu munani mu mategeko 10 y' Imana riravuga ngo "Ntuzabeshye cyangwa ngo ubeshyere abandi".
Bibiriya kandi igaragaraza ko nta tegeko na rimwe umuntu akwiye gusuzugura aho ivuga ko uwubahiriza amategeko yose agasitara kuri rimwe aba yishe yose kuko uwavuze ngo ntuzibe ari we wavuze ngo ntuzasambane.
Umugabo witwaga Ananiya n'umugore we Safira bavugwa muri bibiliya bagurishije isambu babeshya umutambyi Petero ikiguzi bagurishirijeho iyo sambu bagamije kugavura bituma bombi bapfa bazize kubeshya.
1.
Hariho umugabo witwaga Ananiya hamwe n'umugore we Safira, agura isambu 2.agabanya ku biguzi byayo umugore na we abizi, maze azana igice agishyira intumwa.
3.
Petero aramubaza ati "Ananiya, ni iki gitumye Satani yuzuza umutima wawe kubeshya Umwuka Wera, ukisigariza igice cy'ibiguzi by'isambu?
4.
Ukiyifite ntiyari iyawe?
Kandi umaze kuyigura, ibiguzi byayo ntibyari ibyawe ubyigengaho?
Ni iki gitumye wigira inama yo gukora utyo?
Si abantu ubeshye, ahubwo Imana ni yo ubeshye."
5.
Ananiya abyumvise atyo aragwa umwuka urahera, ababyumvise bose bagira ubwoba bwinshi......
Ibyakozwe n' intumwa 5, 1-10.
Byaba byiza umuntu adasuzuguye itegeko rimubuza kubeshya cyangwa ngo aryirengangize nkana yumva ko nabeshya atari bube akoze icyaha gikomeye cyane, kuko bibiliya igaragaraza ko nta cyaha kinini kurusha ikindi kuko icyaha cyose umuntu atakihannye cyamubuza ubungingo buhoraho.

#14790#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/inkundura-hagati-y-abanyamakuru-b-imikino-ku-maradiyo
Inkundura hagati y’abanyamakuru b’imikino ku maradiyo Imyaka ya ba Jean Lambert Gatare, Marcel Rutagarama na Yves Bucyana mu kogeza umupira isa n’iyamaze kurangira kuko uko iminsi iza niko abandi basore bakiri bato babyirukana amashagaga n’udushya bashaka kwigarurira iki kibuga gisigaye cyarararuye abato n’abakuru.
Urebye muri iki gihe, Isi y’Umupira w’Amaguru ni ubucuruzi bukiza abafite impano bitari ukuwukina gusa ahubwo no mu kuba bashobora kuvuga abantu bakabumva.
Uhereye ku bashakira abakinnyi amakipe nka ba Jorge Mendez urebererera inyungu Cristiano Ronaldo, James Rodríguez, David de Gea n’abandi bakomeye byatumye uyu mugabo bamwita ‘Super-agent’.
Si we gusa kuko hari abandi bamaze kwigarurira imitima y’abantu iyo bigeze mu gushakira abakinnyi amakipe kandi bikaba bizwi ko bahita bibikaho akayabo.
Uheruka ni Mino Raiola uherutse guca agahigo ko kugurisha umukinnyi amafaranga menshi, uwo ni Umunyafurika ariko wabaye Umufaransa, Paul Pogba, waguzwe na Manchester United asaga miliyali 100 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda (miliyoni 105 z’amayero).
Mu banyamakuru naho agafaranga si ikibuze Mu minsi ishize Thierry Henry wamamaye muri Arsenal no mu ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Bufaransa nibwo yasezeye ku mupira w’amaguru.
Byari byitezwe ko agiye guhita yerekeza mu ikipe yagiriyemo ibihe byiza akiyungura ubumenyi bwo kuba umutoza wabigize umwuga ariko siko byagenze; yahitiye kuri Sky Sports atangaza ko agiye kuba umusesenguzi.
Uyu mugabo yasinye amasezerano yo guhembwa asaga miliyari enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda (miliyoni enye z’amapawundi), yiyongera ku bandi bagiye mu itangazamakuru barimo Jamie Carragher, Michael Owen bombi bamamaye muri Liverpool n’abandi.
Muri Afurika naho ni uko kuko Samuel Kuffour, Marcel Desailly, John Barnes, Benni McCarthy n’abandi bari gusarura agatubutse kuri Super Sports ahanini bitwikiriye umutaka w’ubudahangarwa bwabaranze mu gihe cyabo mu kibuga.
No muri Amerika, uzasanga usibye kuba ari Umupolisi, Shaquille O’Neal, wamamaye muri NBA iyo atari mu kandi kazi aba ari gukorera amafaranga asesengura ibya Basketball kuri TNT.
Mu Rwanda ho ikibuga kirihariye Ikibuga cya Siporo ku maradiyo no mu bitangazamakuru byaba ibyandika mu Rwanda, gitandukanye n’ahandi ku isi kuko ntabwo wabona murwa Gasabo umwanditsi wanakinnye umupira nkuko Jamie Redknapp cyangwa Martin Keown wakiniye Arsenal babigenza kuri Daily Mail.
Abo mu Rwanda ho barihariye…Abari mu makuru y’imikino yaba ku maradiyo no kuri televiziyo yewe no mu binyamakuru byandika, bagiyemo kubera impamvu nto cyane zitari na nyinshi ukoze igenzura.
Uzasanga ari uko bakunda imikino ariko batarahiriwe no gukina, abandi bakaba bafite amakipe bihebeye bigahurirana no gukunda itangazamakuru, hari n’abisanga bakora umwuga w’itangazamakuru ariko muri byose bakayoboka imikino.
Ntushobora kubona abubatse amazina mu mikino hano mu Rwanda bari mu itangazamakuru nkuko i Burayi n’ahandi bigenda kuko nyuma yo gukina ntawumenya irengero ryabo.
Iki kibuga rero cyihariwe n’abakiri bato basezereye burundu abakuru nka ba Marcel Rutagarama n’abandi bari bamenyerewe muri uyu mwuga mu myaka ishize.
Rutamu, Rugimbana, Rugangura, … bahinduye ikibuga Kuva ku mwaduko w’amaradiyo yigenga mu Rwanda nibwo ibijyanye no kogeza imipira cyane iyo hanze byafashe indi sura.
Muri za 2007, Kazungu Claver benshi bamwibukira ku kuvanga Igiswahili n’Ikinyarwanda yogeza mu ijwi rituje (dore ko asanzwe ari na Pasiteri) imikino ikomeye irimo iya UEFA Champions League nk’iyahuzaga AC Milan na Liverpool.
Uyu mupasiteri ikibuga yakigumyemo mu gihe kirekire yarigaruriye imitima ya benshi gusa umwaka wa 2012 watangiranye n’amatwara mashya mu byo kogeza.
Bitewe n’ukuntu radiyo nyinshi muri 35 zikorera mu gihugu usanga zishyira ingufu nyinshi mu mikino, by’umwihariko kuko ikurikirwa n’abaturage benshi kurenza amakuru n’ibindi biganiro.
Bimaze kumenyerwa ko iyo bigeze ku mupira w’amaguru, yaba imikino yo hanze cyangwa iyo muri shampiyona y’u Rwanda, usanga radiyo yose ushyizeho urushinge iba iriho abanyamakuru bayogeza, ndetse abaturage babakurikira ari benshi cyane hirya no hino.
Ibi byatumye abanyamakuru bakora urubuga rw’imikino n’abogeza imipira bahinduka ibirangirire mu baturage hanze aha.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko byanakuruye ihangana hagati yabo rikomeye, ahanini bitewe n’uko buri umwe muri bo aba yifuza ko abantu batamucikaho bakajya bumvira umupira kuri radiyo z’abakeba.
Mu gukora ibyo niho n’ak’ubugeni kaziramo, bagahanga udushya dutuma bagira umwihariko mu mikorere no mu mivugire yabo.
Rutamu Elie Joe na Rugimbana Théogène bombi batangiye itangazamakuru kuri RC Nyagatare bakomereza kuri Radio Salus, batangira kwigaragaza cyane mu 2012.
Rutamu yanyuze kuri Radio Flash, Isango Star aho yavuye ajya kuri Radio Rwanda mbere yo kwerekeza kuri Radio 1.
Rugimbana na we yakoreye igihe gito Radio Salus ahava ajya kuri Flash FM hanyuma mu 2015 arambagizwa na Radio 10.
Iturufu ikuramo indi, yari amaze umwaka umwe kuri Radio 10 ndetse amaze kuyigeza mu bushorishori mu byo kogeza imipira, budacyeye kabiri abasezeraho ajya gushakira ahandi.
Ubu nawe ari kuri Radio One.
Bashakira abafana hasi kubura hejuru Mu gushaka kwigarurira imitima y’abafana, Rugimbana, Rugangura na Rutamu nibo batangiye kuzana umwihariko mu mikorere y’uyu mwuga maze badukana amagambo ameze nk’irangamuntu kuri bo.
Umwana muto yigana Axel Rugangura Ni bo bazanye imikoreshereze mishya y’amagambo asigaye akoreshwa cyane n’abakibyiruka nka “inyatsi”, “Karundura”, “shuwa diru”, “gucabiranya”, “gukwakwanya”, “indangare”, “inzazame”, “akabwata”, “nteba”, “kuvuyanga” , “umutoto” n’andi menshi.
Ibintu nk’ibi ubusanzwe byari bimenyerewe ku gasobanuye ubwo ba Yanga bahinduraga Film urwenya mu rwego rwo gukurura abafana no gushaka kubaruhura kubera amagambo bakoresha ateye ukwayo.
Abenshi bibuka cyane ‘imikasiro’ ashaka kuvuga ‘ibibazo’.
Mu gihe cyashize kandi Fuadi Uwihanganye na Hagenimana Benjami uzwi nka ’Gicumbi’ bogeza umupira kuri Radio 10 bumvikanye basetsa abantu ubwo bifashishaga indirimbo ya Minani Rwema bagaragaza agahinda ikipe ya Paris St Germain yari imaze gutera abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru by’umwihariko abafana bayo isezererwa na FC Barcelone.
Abanyamakuru ba Radio10 baririmbira Paris Saint Germain yo mu Bufaransa Umwihariko iyo bigeze ku gitego… Magingo aya usanga abogeza imipira kuri za radio bagira uturingushyo twinshi mu mivugire, barangwa n’imvugo nyinshi zidasanzwe, byagera ku gitego cyinjiye ho bikaba akarusho ndetse bigasana no kurushanwa.
Usanga abavuga imipira baba bameze nk’abari mu irushanwa ryo kuvuga "Goooooo", hari bamwe bamara umunota wose basakuza batyo nyuma uko kogeza igitego bigakurikirwa n’andi magambo menshi rimwe na rimwe usanga adasanzwe.
Benshi babikora bigana abanyamakuru bo mu bihugu birimo Espagne bigeza igitego bihuta cyane ariko basubiramo amagambo amwe n’amwe, uburyo bwatangijwe na Rugangura Axel; uyu yanyuze kuri Contact FM, Flash FM aho yavuye ajya kuri Radio Rwanda.
Uretse aba hari n’abandi bamaze kwigarurira imitima y’abafana babakurikira barimo Mahoro Nasri, William Kadu na Mucyo Anta ba Flash FM; Bruno Taifa na Muramira Régis na Niyonizeye Jules bakorera City Radio n’abandi.
Mu banyamakuru bogeza umupira higanjemo ab’igitsina gabo mu gihe bashiki babo bagerageza kwinjira muri uru ruhando usanga ahanini bibanda ku kuvuga amakuru cyane; abagerageza kogeza imipira babikora inshuro nke cyane; aba barimo Ariane Uwamahoro ukorera RBA; Rigoga Ruth ukorera Radio&TV 10.
Uhereye ibumoso: Mahoro Nasri, Jado Max, Claude Hit na Rugangura bose bakoranye kuri Radio Flash Muri Studio za City Radio ni uko hameze Uhereye ibumoso: Niyonizeye Jules, Bruno Taiffa, Regis Muramira na Kanyamahanga Jean Claude bita Kanyizo ba City Radio Rugimbana Théogène ni umwe mu badukanye amagambo menshi asigaye yifashishwa mu kogeza imipira Habarugira Patrick (wa RBA) ari kumwe na Rutamu wadukanye ikoreshwa ry' ijambo Shuwa Diru (Sure Deal) mu mikino Rutamu ari mu cyumba cyogerezwamo imipira kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo Ariane Uwamahoro amaze kwamamara kuri Radio na Televiziyo Rwanda nk'umwe mu bakobwa bakora amakuru y'imikino Rugangura asigaye akora kuri Radio Rwanda nyuma yo kunyura kuri Radio Flash na Contact FM Papa w'abatoto, izina Fuadi Uwihanganye yiyise Rigoga
Ruth yahoze akora kuri K FM mbere y'uko ifunga imiryango, nyuma ahita ajya kuri Radio 10

#14804#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/nyanza-umufungwa-yarashwe-agerageza-gutoroka-gereza
Nyanza: Umufungwa yarashwe agerageza gutoroka gereza Nsengiyumva Jotham wari ufungiye muri Gereza ya Nyanza mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, yarashwe ahita apfa, ubwo yageragezaga gutoroka Gereza.
Nsengiyumva Jotham yagerageje gutoroka Gereza ya Nyanza akaraswa Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 25 y’amavuko ngo yarashwe ahagana saa 19h30 zo mu ijoro ryo ku Cyumweru tariki 28 Mutarama 2018, nk’uko byatangajwe n’Umuvugizi w’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe imfungwa n’abagororwa (RCS), SIP Hillary Sengabo.
Nsengiyumva yari mwene Ntahontuye na Nyirabagarura.
Yavukiye mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru mu Karere ka Musanze.
Uyu mugabo yari mu itsinda ry’abantu 14 bashinjwaga gukorana n’umutwe wa FDLR.
Yakatiwe gufungwa burundu tariki 19 Werurwe 2014, amaze guhamwa n’icyaha cyo kugambanira igihugu, kurema umutwe w’abagizi ba nabi, gutunga intwaro no kuzikwirakwiza.

#14819#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/ngororero-rib-irashakisha-nikombabona-ukekwaho-gusambanya-umwana
Ngororero: RIB irashakisha Nikombabona ukekwaho gusambanya umwana Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) rurashakisha uwitwa Ikuzwe Nikombabona Innocent, ukekwaho icyaha cyo gusambanya umwana agahita acika.
Mu butumwa bwanyujijwe kuri twitter, RIB yatangaje ko uwo Nikombabona ari mwene Bahindebya na Niyonzima Daphrose, wavutse tariki 10 Gicurasi 1984.
RIB ivuga ko uyu mugabo icyaha akekwaho yagikoreye mu Mudugudu wa Mitabo, Akagari ka Gaseke, mu Murenge wa Kabaya, ho mu Karere Ngororero, ku itariki ya 13 Mata 2020.
Uru rwego rwasabye abaturage ko uwamubona yatanga amakuru y’aho aherereye kuri Sitasiyo ya RIB cyangwa iya Polisi imwegereye, cyangwa se agahamagara ku murongo wa RIB utishyurwa 166, cyangwa Polisi 112.

#14853#	6	religion	http://igihe.com/iyobokamana/ubuhamya/article/papa-benoit-xvi-yeruye-icyatumye
Papa Benoît XVI yeruye icyatumye yegura Yanditswe kuya 22-08-2013 saa 15:28' na Deus Ntakirutimana Papa Benoît XVI ucyuye igihe, yemeje ko iyegura rye ku mwanya w'ubupapa yari yabibwirijwe n'Imana ndetse akaba abibonera ku bikorwa byiza bya papa mushya wamusimbuye Faransisiko, abona ayoboye neza Kiliziya Gatolika.
Kuva yeguye kuri uyu mwanya tariki ya 11 Gashyantare 2013 kugeza aho aganiriye n'umushyitsi ukomeye wamusuye, itangazamakuru ryakunze gushaka impamvu zitandukanye zatumye yegura ndetse bimwe muri ibi bitangazamakuru bagira izo bitangaza.
Nyamara we yakomeje kuvuga ko yeguye ku (...)
Papa Benoît XVI ucyuye igihe, yemeje ko iyegura rye ku mwanya w'ubupapa yari yabibwirijwe n'Imana ndetse akaba abibonera ku bikorwa byiza bya papa mushya wamusimbuye Faransisiko, abona ayoboye neza Kiliziya Gatolika.
Kuva yeguye kuri uyu mwanya tariki ya 11 Gashyantare 2013 kugeza aho aganiriye n'umushyitsi ukomeye wamusuye, itangazamakuru ryakunze gushaka impamvu zitandukanye zatumye yegura ndetse bimwe muri ibi bitangazamakuru bagira izo bitangaza.
Nyamara we yakomeje kuvuga ko yeguye ku mpamvu ze bwite.
Urubuga 7sur7 rwashyize ahagaragara icyo Joseph Ratzinger yatangaje ko cyatumye yegura, rwanditse ko mu kiganiro yagiranaga n'umwe mu bashyitsi bari bamusuye aho atuye muri monasitere yitiriwe umubyeyi wa Kiliziya (monastere Mater Ecclesiae) iri i Vatikani, ari nawe wabitangarije urubuga rwa Zenit, ngo Papa yamubwiye ko yeguye abihumekewemo n'Imana.
Muri iki kiganiro yakomeje amubwira ko atari ibonekerwa cyangwa ikindi kintu kidasanzwe kitazwi cyatumye yegura, ahubwo ko ari ibyo yabonye by'amayobera byabiteye.
Yagize ati "Ni Imana yabimbwiye."
Iki kiganiro cyavanyeho ibihuha byashoboraga kuvuka mu gihe yari kuvuga ko yeguye ku bw'igitangaza.
Yakomeje avuga ko ari Imana yatangije muri we icyifuzo kihariye cyo kugumana nayo ubwayo mu isengesho.
Ibyamubayeho mu mayobera kandi byakomeje kwiyongera ndetse no mu yandi mezi yakurikiyeho nyuma y'iyegura rye, nk'uko yakomeje abiganiriza uwo mushyitsi w'imena utaragaragajwe amazina.
Yongeyeho ko iyo arebye ukuntu umusimbura we afite ishingiro ry'amahame y'umuhamagaro, asanga koko byari ku bushake bw'Imana.
Papa Faransisko wabyitegereje neza, ubwo yavaga i Rio yemeje ko Papa Benoît amubereye nka sekuru aho aba.
Papa ucyuye igihe afite imyaka 86; ku cyumweru gishize yatembereye by'akanya gato mu nzu ya Castel Gandolfo iherereye mu Majyepfo ya Roma, aho yagaragaraga yishimiye ikiruhuko cyo gusenga nk'uko na Vatikani yabitangaje.
Papa ucyuye igihe, Benoit XVI, amazina ye yiswe n'ababyeyi ni Joseph Ratzinger, yeguye kuri uyu mwanya tariki ya 11 Gashyantare 2013, iyegura ryemejwe tariki ya 28 uko kwezi.

#14855#	6	religion	https://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/abayobozi-bagera-kuri-700-bitabiriye-amasengesho-yo-gusengera-igihugu
Abayobozi bagera kuri 700 bitabiriye amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu (Amafoto) Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile n’inshuti z’u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Aya masengesho yitabiriwe n’abagera kuri 700, abaye mu gihe u Rwanda rusoje icyerekezo 2020 cy’iterambere, no gutangiza icyerekezo 2050.
Ategurwa n’Umuryango, Rwanda Leaders Fellowship, akaba afite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Imiyoborere Izana Impinduka:Kwishimira aho tugeze-Dutegura ejo hahaza.”
Aya masengesho yatangijwe mu 1995 agamije gushyira hamwe abayobozi bakuru mu kwiyegereza Imana, bagasangira, hakabaho gusengera igihugu n’abayobozi bacyo ndetse bagasangira ijambo ry’Imana.
Ku nshuro ya mbere yabereye muri Hotel Hotel des Mille Collines tariki 1 Nzeri 1995, kuva icyo gihe iki gikorwa kitabirwa n’abayobozi batandukanye n’abandi.
Ay’uyu mwaka azaba ari ayo gushimira ibyo Imana yakoreye Igihugu ariko no gusengera abayobozi bacyo bagashyirwa mu maboko y’Imana.
Aya masengesho abaye ahurirana kandi n’igihe u Rwanda rurimo kwishimira ibyo rwagezeho mu cyerekezo 2020 rwari rwarihaye no gutangira icyerekezo 2020.
Hagendewe kuri iyi nsanganyamatsiko, aya masengesho afite intego yo kureba ibyakozwe no gushimira urugendo rwagenzwe, ariko no kureba aho baganisha igihugu.
Agamije kandi kugira umuco wo gushimira bitari gusa Imana ahubwo n’abo yakoresheje ngo babe bagejeje aho igihugu kiri uyu munsi, kwiga ibyakozwe n’indangagaciro z’Imana yashyize mu bantu, ibi bigafasha kubaha inzira nziza yo gukomeza imbere.
Mu masengesho y’umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bidakwiye ko umuyobozi abaho neza mu gihe abo areberera bafite ibibazo, ashimangira ko biteye isoni kumubona ashyiriye Imana abaturage yamuhaye kuyobora barwaye bwaki.
Yagize ati “Njye rwose mpora mfite impungenge ku kuzashorera abantu barwaye bwaki, bashonje, bameze nabi nkavuga nti ‘Mana ng’aba abantu bawe wanshinze’.
Ntabwo umutima wanjye ujyanye na byo.
Numva bidakwiye.
Kugira ngo utazashorera abantu bameze batyo, ikintu cya mbere ni uko buri muyobozi bikwiye kumutera isoni.
Mugomba kugira isoni.
Iyo wemera indangagaciro ukazibura bikwiriye kugutera isoni.”
Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere rirambye rikwiye gushingira ku ndangagaciro y’imikorere hagati y’abayobozi n’abayoborwa.
Umuyobozi w'Umujyi wa Kigali, Pudence Rubingisa (ibumoso) ni umwe mu bitabiriye Umujyanama wa Perezida mu by'umutekano, Gen James Kabarebe (ibumoso) mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Mufti w'u Rwanda, Salim Hitimana (ibumoso) yitabiriye National Prayer Breakfast Rev.
Karuranga Ephraim, Umuvugizi wa ADEPR na we yitabiriye amasengesho yo gusabira igihugu Abasaga 700 bitabiriye amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu Minisitiri w'Intebe, Dr Edouard Ngirente (ibumoso) aganira mbere y'umuhango wo gusengera igihugu Perezida wa Sena, Dr Iyamuremye Augustin ni umwe mu bitabiriye National Prayer Breakfast Minisitiri w'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu, Prof Shyaka Anastase (iburyo) , ni umwe mu bitabiriye Habanje indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana Bashimye Imana mu mbyino za Kinyarwanda Amafoto: Niyonzima Moses

#14868#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/umunyarwanda-watangije-uburyo-bwa-tap-go-mu-rwanda-yabugejeje-no-muri-cameroun
Patrick Buchana w'imyaka 25 watangije ‘Tap&Go' mu Rwanda yagejeje iri koranabuhanga muri Cameroon Yanditswe na Uwishyaka Jean Louis Kuya 27 Gashyantare 2017 saa 11:13 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 1 0 Ikompanyi Nyarwanda ifite ikoranabuhanga ryifashishwa mu kwishyura amafaranga y'urugendo ukoreshehje ikarita izwi nka TAP&GO, yamaze kwagura ibikorwa byayo yakoreraga mu Rwanda ibitangiza no mu mijyi ibiri yo muri Cameroun.
Uburyo bwo kwifashisha amakarita mu kwishyura amafaranga y'urugendo, bwatangijwe mu modoka zinyuranye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, mu 2015 mu rwego rwo kurwanya ubwumvikane buke bugaragara hagati y'abishyura n'abishyuza mu modoka zitwara abagenzi ndetse no kubungabunga ibidukikije n'isuku.
AC Group Ltd yatangije ubu buryo muri Cameroun mu cyumweru gishize, mu Mijyi ya Yaoundé na Douala, imwe mu ikomeye muri iki gihugu nk'uko The East African dukesha iyi nkuru ibitangaza.
Patrick Buchana, Umuyobozi Mukuru w'iyo kompanyi yatangaje ko yahisemo gutangiza ubu buryo muri Cameroun nyuma y'aho abayobozi muri iki gihugu bafite mu nshingano ibyo gutwara abantu n'ibintu biboneye akamaro kabwo mu Rwanda n'uko bwitabirwa na benshi.
Ati ''Baje mu Rwanda baganira na sosiyete zitwara abagenzi bababwira inyungu zo gukoresha ubu buryo.''
Nyuma yo kwibonera akamaro k'iri koranabuhanga, abo bayobozi ngo bahise bamusaba kubafasha kugira ngo ritangizwe no muri imwe mu mijyi yo mu gihugu cyabo.
Ati '‘Baguze bisi nini zitwara abagenzi ubwo tubasaba kugira bimwe bahindura mbere y'uko dutangira.
Icy'ibanze turi kugerageza gukora nk'ibyo twakoze i Kigali kugira ngo bikorwe no muri Cameroun.''
Patrick Buchana, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AC Group Ltd Mu byo abo bayobozi basabwe kwitaho bwa mbere, harimo gushyira mu modoka camera no gushyiraho aho imodoka zihagarara haboneye n'ibindi binyuranye.
Mu cyiciro cya mbere cy'uyu mushinga cyatangiye mu cyumweru gishize, cyatangirijwe kuri bisi nini 400 zikorera mu Murwa mukuru Yaoundé ndetse nyuma kikazakomeza gukwirakwizwa no mu Mujyi wa Douala, umenyerewemo ibikorwa byinshi by'ubucuruzi.
Mu mujyi wa Kigali, abantu basaga ibihumbi 500 bamaze kwitabira ubu buryo bakoresha amakarita atangwa n'iyi kompanyi, bifashisha buri gihe cyose bakoze urugendo n'imodoka.
Ubu buryo ngo bushobora gutanga cyane umusaruro muri Cameroun bitewe n'ubunini bw'iyi mijyi ugereranyije na Kigali byiyongera ku mubare munini w'abaturage bayituye, dore ko mu Mujyi wa Yaoundé gusa hatuwe na miliyoni zisaga ebyiri ndetse buri munsi usanga imodoka zitwara abagenzi muri uyu mujyi zuzuye.
Buchana avuga ko ubu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga muri Kigali buzakomeza gukwirakwizwa no mu bindi bice butaragezwamo nk'aho mu minsi mike buri butangizwe ku bajya mu bice bya Gisozi mu gihe ahandi hazaba hasigaye buzaba bwagejejwemo mu kwezi gutaha.

#14892#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/amazina/article/belinda-izina-ry-umukobwa-wiyiziho-ubwiza
Belinda, izina ry’umukobwa wiyiziho ubwiza Belinda ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umukobwa, usanga rigezweho cyane muri iyi minsi ku bana bavuka.
Mu gitaliyani rikomoka ku izina Bella risobanura umukobwa mwiza naho mu Kidage rikomoka ku gicumbi ‘lind’ bisobanura ’inzoka’.
Bimwe mu biraga ba Belinda Ni umuntu umenya kwiyitaho no kwiyumva ko ari mwiza bitewe n’ukuntu yumva ko izina rye aricyo rivuga.
Azi gukunda no gutuma urukundo ruryoha mu kwitetesha no gukora utuntu twose dushimisha uwo barikumwe.
Ni umuntu w’amaragamutima menshi, ariko nubwo agerageza kuyahisha biramutamaza ibyishimo bye cyangwa akababaro bikagaragara Akora uko ashoboye kose agakumira amakimbirane kandi akayirinda kuko aba yirinda ikintu cyose cyamukomeretsa.
Ni umuntu utabogama wumva buri wese kandi akamusubiriza ikibazo.
Iyo hari icyo umukeneyeho ugomba kuba utarya iminwa uzi neza ibyo urimo kuko,uburyo akurebamo no kuguhata ibibazo bishobora kugutera ubwoba.
Ni umuntu utega amatwi kandi akabonera umwanya umuntu akunda cyane cyane abo mu muryango we.
Iyo akiri umwana ababyeyi be baba bagomba kumufasha kwitinyuka no kwegera abandi kuko aba atigirira icyizere.

#14938#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Perezida-Talon-uzwi-nk-umwami-w-impamba-muri-Africa-ari-mu-Rwanda-Ni-muntu-ki
Perezida Talon, uzwi nk'umwami w'ipamba muri Afurika uri mu Rwanda ni muntu ki?
Perezida wa Benin Patrice Talon yavutse kuwa 1 Gicurasi 1958, avukira mu gace ka Déguè-Gare mu mujyi wa Porto-Novo akaba yaratangiye kuyobora iki gihugu guhera kuwa 6 Mata 2016.
Perezida Patrice Talon yize amashuri ye i Dakar muri Senegal ndetse na Toulouse mu Bufaransa, yiga ibijyanye n''Imibare n'ubugenge ariko aza kumenyekana mu bucuruzi bw'ibikomoka ku buhinzi ndetse anamenyekana mu bikorwa by'amahoteli.
Kuva mu myaka ya 1980 Patrice yakoraga ubucuruzi bw'ipamba.
Uyu mugabo ufite imyaka 58 , ni umutunzi ukomeye wakuye amafaranga menshi mu kugurisha hanze ipampa, igicuruzwa gikomeye mu gihugu cye ndetse akaba afatwa nk'umwami w'ipamba kubera uruhare yagize mu nganda ziritunganya.
Ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye afite .
Ubucuruzi bw'Inyongeramusaruro abinyujije muri Sosiyeti ya SDI muri Benin na Côte d'Ivoire .
Ubucuruzi bw'Ipamba abinyujije muri Sosiyete zitandukanye nka: Industries Cotonnières Associées (ICA) na Société pour le Développement du Coton (SODECO) muri Bénin. .
Amahoteli: Afite Hoteli Novoteli na IBIS zimwe mu zikomeye muri Benin .
Serivisi: Sosiyeti ya Agence de Transit et de Logistique (Atral), Terminal d'Allada (port sec) Mu bushabitsi bwe kandi abifatanya na Politiki aho yagendaga agira inama abakandida, amashyaka ndetse akabatera inkunga.Abavugwa cyane ni Nicéphore Soglo mu matora ya Perezida wa Benin muri 1991, mu matora y'abadepite mu 1995 na bwo yafashije amwe mu mashyaka ya Politiki .
Muri 2006 Talon ni umwe mu bateye inkunga Perezida wacyuye igihe Boni Boni, wari urangije manda ebyiri yemererwa n'amategeko.
Ipamba muri Benin ryihariye 40% by'amafaranga yinjira mu gihugu avuye mu byoherezwa hanze na 12% by'umutungo mbumbe w'igihugu ndetse 60% by'inganda mu gihugu ziritunganya.
Patrice Talon na Perezida Kagame bameranyijwe umubano utajegajega ushingiye ku buhahirane Ubwo uyu mugabo yatorerwaga kuyobora iki gihugu, yavuze ko afite umugambi wo kugabanya imyaka umukuru w'igihugu amara ku butegetsi akayigira manda imwe gusa y'imyaka itanu.
Nkuko ikinyamakuru Jeunafrique cyamusobanuye, ngo ubusanzwe ni umugabo utajya acika intege, wicisha bugufi, ugira uburyo bwinshi bwo gukora ibintu, ni umunyabwenge, akunda gukora ibintu yitonze kandi ijambo avuze arishyira mu bikorwa.
Ntakunda kugaragara mu itangazamakuru.
Prezida Patrice Talon umaze iminsi itatu mu Rwanda yanagiranye ibiganiro n'inzego zitandukanye mu rwego rwo kumenya uko igihugu cy'u Rwanda cyongeye kwiyubaka, ndetse anagaragarizwa byinshi bikubiye mu cyerekezo cy'u Rwanda mu myaka iri imbere.
Uyu mugabo mu ruzinduko rwe yasuye ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, ndetse anagera mu gace kahariwe inganda kazwi nka 'Special Economic Zone' ndetse agirana ibiganiro byihariye na mugenzi we Perezida Kagame.
Abakuru b'ibihugu byombi kandi bemeranyijwe ku bufatanye mu iterambere, ndetse Prezida Paul Kagame, atangaza ko vuba aha indege ya sosiyete Rwandair, izatangira ingendo i Cotonou muri Benin mu rwego rwo koroshya ingendo n'ubuhahirane hagati y'u Rwanda na Benin.

#14951#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/Huye-Abubatse-ibyumba-by-amashuri-i-Cyarwa-barinubira-ko-bamaze-umwaka
Huye: Abubatse ibyumba by'amashuri i Cyarwa barinubira ko bamaze umwaka batarishyurwa Abazamuye inkuta z'ibyumba by'amashuri y'uburezi bw'ibanze bw'imyaka 12 (12YBE) ndetse n'icumbi rya mwarimu byo muri Groupe Scolaire Cyarwa, mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2012, binubira ko bamaze umwaka wose bategereje ko bishyurwa amafaranga yose bakoreye, nyamara ubuyobozi bw'umurenge wa Tumba aya mashuri aherereyemo bukaba buhora bubarerega.
Ibi byabateye kwitoramo ababahagararira maze bajya kugeza ikibazo ku buyobozi bw'Akarere ka Huye, kuwa 22/10/2013, ariko bavuyeyo batishimye kuko ngo umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Huye na we yari amaze kubabwira ngo bategereze amafaranga naboneka bazababwira, mbese nk'uko ubuyobozi bw'Umurenge wa Tumba bwababwiye.
N'akababaro ndetse n'uburakari, uwitwa Niyonzima Eric tuganira yagize ati: "Dufite ikibazo cy'uko bo bashaka kwesa imihigo, bakerekana ko amashuri yarangiye, ariko abaturage twe dufite akababaro, k'uko mu ngo zacu hari inzara iteye ubwoba kubera guta umwanya, … icyo gihe ayo mezi yose…".
Ikindi gituma batishimira igisubizo cyo kubwirwa ngo bategereze, ni uko ngo abasakaye aya mashuri ndetse n'abayashyizeho inzugi n'amadirishya bo bishyuwe amafaranga yabo yose, mu gihe bo bishyuwe make cyane.
Na none kandi, ngo abari kubaka andi mashuri na yo yo muri uyu Murenge bo ngo bahembwa buri cyumweru.
Amashuri bubatse agiye kumara umwaka yigirwamo nyamara bo ntibarahembwa.
Ibi byatumye umusaza witwa Ngabonziza Evariste agira ati "biratangaje kubona dukora, abakoze nyuma bakaba barahembwe… kandi ikindi cya kabiri n'ubu bari kuzamura izindi nyubako… bakaba babahemba… twebwe twakoze mbere abana bakaba barimo biga, tukaba tutarahembwa … ni ikibazo…".
Kuba batarahembwe ngo binabakururira umwiryane mu ngo zabo kuko ngo abagore babo bakeka ko bababeshya ko batarahembwa.
N'ubwo aba bafundi ari bo twabashije kuvugana, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Tumba, Pascal Sahundwa, avuga ko abo umurenge wa Tumba urimo amafaranga yo kubaka ibyumba by'amashuri yubatswe mu mwaka wa 2012 atari abafundi gusa.
Ngo hari n'ababahaye ibikoresho bifashishije bakaba batarabashije kubishyura mu mafaranga y'imisanzu yatanzwe n'abaturage.
Yose hamwe ngo agera kuri miliyoni enye, ay'abubatse akaba ari nka miliyoni 1 n'igice, kandi ubuyobozi bw'Akarere bwabemereye kuzayishyura.
Aba bafundi twavuganye, umwe avuga ko umurenge wa Tumba wamwishyuye amafaranga ibihumbi 45 mu byiciro bibiri bakaba bamurimo ibihumbi 120, undi akavuga ko bamurimo ibihumbi 42, undi 33, undi 46, n'undi 58.
Marie Claire Joyeuse

#14952#	5	politics	http://www.igihe.com/politiki/amakuru/article/u-rwanda-na-congo-byatangiye-kwerekana-ko-kwigira-kw-abanyafurika-bishoboka
U Rwanda na Congo byatangiye kwerekana ko kwigira kw'Abanyafurika bishoboka Yanditswe kuya 30-07-2016 saa 09:21' na Cyprien Niyomwungeri Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga w'u Rwanda, Louise Mushikiwabo, yavuze ko mu myaka itatu ishize habaye ibikorwa byinshi bigaragaza ko u Rwanda na Repubulika ya Congo Brazzaville bigenda birushaho gukorana, ngo bishakire amikoro n'imibereho myiza abaturage babyo kandi ko bigaragaza neza ko ibisubizo by'ibibazo bya Afurika bizava mu bufatanye bw'Abanyafurika ubwabo.
Ibi yabitangaje kuwa Gatanu tariki 29 Nyakanga ubwo we na mugenzi we wa Repubulika ya Congo, Jean Claude Gakosso basozaga inama ya Kane yahuzaga komite zihoraho z'ibihugu byombi, zisuzuma iyubahirizwa ry'amasezeran0 y'ubufatanye bw'ibihugu byombi.
Mu nama ya gatatu iyi Komite yari yafashe imyanzuro ijyanye n'imikoranire mu bwikorezi bw'indege, ubucuruzi, ubukerarugendo, imiturire, imicungire y'impunzi, ingufu, umutekano, ubutabera, kurengera ibidukikije, uburobyi, ikoranabuhanga, itumanaho n'ibindi.
Minisitiri Mushikiwabo yavuze ko ibimaze kugerwaho ari byinshi kandi bitanga icyizere ko bizakomeza, mu rwego rwo guteza imbere abaturage b'ibihugu byombi.
Yagize ati "Mu gihe cy'imyaka itatu, ine ishize ibihugu byacu byafunguye Ambasade.U Rwanda rwafunguye ambasade muri Repubulika ya Congo mu kwezi kwa gatatu k'umwaka wa 2015, Repubulika ya Congo nayo imaze gufungura ambasade hano i Kigali hashize amezi atatu, ibyo byose biragaragaza ubushake bwa politiki ariko cyane cyane ubushake bwo kugirango dufatanye nk'ibihugu byombi cyane cyane mu gushakira amikoro n'imibereho myiza abaturage bacu."
Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere ry'Abanyafurika nta handi rizahera atari kuri bo ubwabo.
Yagize ati "Nk'uko byagarutsweho mu nama y'Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe iherutse, iterambere rya Afurika riri mu biganza by'abanyafurika.Iterambere ry'Afurika rizaturuka mu guhuza imbaraga zacu, no kubaka umubano uhamye."
Minisitiri Gakosso yizeza ko hari ubushake bwo gufatanya hagati y'ibihugu byombi buhari kandi amasezerano azashyirwa mu bikorwa bityo akabiteza imbere.
Abaminisitiri bombi basoje inama nyuma yo gusura umupaka muto n'umunini ihuza u Rwanda na Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo berekwa imikorere yayo n'uburyo ifasha mu buhahirane bw'ibihugu byombi mu guteza imbere abaturage.
Muri iyi nama hashyizeho komite ikuriye ibikorwa hagati y'ibihugu byombi ku buryo izajya ihura kabiri mu mwaka kugirango isuzume uko ibyo ibihugu byiyemeje mu ngeri zinyuranye bigenda bishyirwa mu bikorwa.
Iyi Komite igiye gutangira akazi kayo izongere guhurira mu Rwanda muri Mutarama 2017 harebwa ibyagezweho mu byo ibihugu byombi byiyemeje.
Muri iyi nama yari ihuje impuguke zo mu Rwanda na Repubulika ya Congo, binyuze muri Minisiteri z'ububanyi n'amahanga z'ibihugu byombi, hanasinywe amasezerano y'imikoranire mishya arimo kuganira bihoraho mu bijyanye na politiki hagati y'ibihugu byombi ndetse n'ubufatanye mu buhinzi n'ubworozi.
Minisitiri Mushikiwabo (iburyo) na mugenzi we wa Congo Jean Calude Gakosso (Photo:Kigali Today) Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#14971#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/article/ibyo-ababyeyi-bateye-imbere-bakunze-kuba-bahuriyeho-mu-gutoza-abana-babo
Ibyo ababyeyi bateye imbere bakunze kuba bahuriyeho mu gutoza abana babo Umubyeyi wese yishimira kubona umwana yibarutse yitwara neza mu rungano, bikaba akarusho iyo abantu bose bamufata nk’icyitegererezo mu byo akora, mu masomo ahabwa no mu buzima busanzwe.
Mu gihe ababyeyi baba bashaka ko abana babo bitwara nk’abantu bakuru, ubushakashatsi mu by’imitekerereze y’umuntu bwagaragaje ko nubwo nta mahame yashyizweho agenderwaho mu gutanga uburere bwiza hari ingingo zigaragaza uko ushobora kugera ku ntsinzi.
The Independent itangaza ko akenshi uzanga ibi bishingiye ku burere butangwa n’umubyeyi.
Dore urutonde rw’ibintu 17 ababyeyi bafite abana bitwara neza bashobora kuba bahuriyeho: 1.
Ababyeyi baha abana babo imirimo Julie Lythcott-Haims, wahoze ayobora abanyeshuri muri Kaminuza ya Stanford, yagize ati “Iyo abana badakoze imirimo yo mu rugo nko koza ibikoresho byo mu gikoni, baba bazi ko hari undi muntu uri kubibakorera.
Ntibiyumvisha ko ako ari akazi cyangwa se gakeneye no gukorwa.
Buri wese muri twe yakagize uruhare mu kubibumvisha.”
Julie yananditse igitabo yise “How to Raise an Adult”, bishatse kuvuga uburyo bwo kurera umwana uzavamo intangarugero.
Lythcott-Haims yizera ko abana babyirutse bakora iyo mirimo yo mu rugo bavamo abakozi nyabo bashobora kubana neza n’abo bakorana.
Bene abo bamenya guhangana n’ibibazo kandi biha inshingano bakanazuzuza.
2.
Ababyeyi bigisha abana babo iby’ubuzima busanzwe Mu myaka 20 ishize, abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Pennsylvania n’iya Duke bakoze ubushakashatsi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ku bana 700 bari hagati y’imyaka ine na 25 basanga imyitwarire yabo ari bakuru irasa neza n’iyo mu bwana.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abana babaye indashyikirwa mu mibanire bashoboye kubana neza na bagenzi babo, barabafasha kandi bakemura ibibazo byabo bwite, ndetse babashije gutsinda neza mu ishuri kandi ku myaka 25 bashoboraga gukora akazi ugereranije n’abatarahawe ubumenyi mu by’imibanire n’ubuzima busanzwe.
Abatarahawe ubumenyi mu by’ubuzima busanzwe, wasangaga bafite amahirwe menshi yo gufungwa, kubatwa n’ubusinzi ndetse bagakora n’akazi ko mu rugo.
Kuva umuntu akiri umwana, ubu bumenyi bushobora kwerekana ko umwana azajya mu ishuri cyangwa akananirana akaba yafungwa, azabona akazi cyangwa azabatwa n’inzoga n’ibiyobyabwenge.
3.
Ababyeyi baba biteze ibintu bikomeye ku bana babo Prof.
Neal Halfon na bagenzi be bo muri Kaminuza ya California muri Los Angeles, bifashishije ibyavuye mu nyigo yakorewe ku bana ibihumbi 6,600 bavutse mu 2001, bavumbuye ko ibyo ababyeyi baba biteze ku bana rimwe na rimwe bibabaho.
Ibyavuye muri iyi nyigo byagaragaje ko 57% by’abana batagiye mu mashuri yisumbuye, abagera kuri 96% bo bajyayo nkuko byari byitezwe n’ababyeyi.
4.
Ababyeyi babanye neza Inyigo yakozwe na Kaminuza ya Illinois yagaragaje ko abana bavuka mu miryango ikunda kugirana amakimbirane, urugero nk’iyatandukanye, bakunda guhura n’ingaruka ugereranije n’ab’ababyeyi babanye neza.
Umuyobozi w’Ishami rishinzwe Imibanire myiza mu miryango muri Kaminuza ya Illinois, Prof.
Robert Hughes Jr., yatangaje ko abana barerwa n’umubyeyi umwe ufite imico myiza babaho neza kurusha abarererwa mu muryango w’ababyeyi babiri ariko bafite amakimbirane.
Indi nyigo yagaragaje ko nyuma yo gutandukana kw’abashakanye, iyo umugabo akomeje kujya ahura na bo ariko adatongana n’uwari umugore we, abana bamererwa neza.
Ariko iyo bongeye guhura bagatongana, bigira ingaruka ku bana.
Iyi nyigo kandi yagaragaje ko abana 20 bagizweho ingaruka n’itandukana ry’ababyeyi babo kuko bamaze imyaka icumi yose batarabyakira.
Benshi muri bo batangaza ko baba bumva barahombye ndetse bakaba bicuza.
5.
Iyo ababyeyi batonganye, abana bagira uruhare mu kwiyunga Iyo abana bivugiye ko bo ubwabo bagize uruhare mu guhosha amakimbirane hagati y’ababyeyi babo, bibubakamo imbaraga n’ubushobozi byo gukemura ibibazo kandi bishobora kugira uruhare mu kuzamura umubano w’ababyeyi n’abana, ndetse bigafasha abana gutsinda mu ishuri nkuko byatangajwe na E.
Mark Cummings, impuguke mu by’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe wo muri Kaminuza ya Notre Dame.
Umunaniro ukabije ku babyeyi, hari igihe utera abana umujinya, gutakaza icyizere, uburakari, guhangana nabo, guhindura imyitwarire, kurwara, umunaniro ndetse no guhura n’ingorane mu ishuri.
6.
Ababyeyi bafite amashuri ahanitse Inyigo yakozwe mu 2014 na Sandra Tang, impuguke mu buzima bwo mu mutwe muri Kaminuza ya Michigan, yagaragaje ko ababyeyi b’abagore bageze muri za Koleji barera abana babo nkuko barezwe.
Inyigo yakorewe ku bana ibihumbi 14,000 bize mu mashuri y’incuke kuva mu 1998 kugeza 2007, yagaragaje ko abana babyawe n’abagore batari bagejeje ku myaka 18, batashoboye gusoza amashuri yisumbuye nka bagenzi babo.
7.
Ababyeyi bigisha imibare abana babo hakiri kare Isesengura ryakorewe ku bana ibihumbi 35,000 bari bagiye gutangira ishuri muri 2007, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Canada n’u Bwongereza, ryagaragaje ko ubumenyi mu mibare umwana yabonye hakiri kare bugira akamaro iyo akuze.
Umushakashatsi Greg Duncan wo muri Northwestern University, yavuze ko umwana wigishijwe imibare akiri muto bitamufasha gusa kuyimenya, ahubwo bimufasha no kumenya gusoma.
8.
Ababyeyi bazamura umubano wabo n’abana Inyigo yakozwe mu 2014, ikorewe ku bantu 243 bavukiye mu bukene, yagaragaje ko abana bitaweho neza mu myaka itatu yabo ya mbere, uretse no gutsinda mu ishuri, bagira imibanire myiza iyo bageze mu myaka 30.
Impuguke mu buzima bwo mu mutwe yo muri Kaminuza ya Minnesota, Lee Raby, yavuze ko kwita ku mwana bimuha intangiriro nziza y’ubuzima kandi bikamufasha kumenya ibibera ku isi.
Barack Obama n'umugore we Michelle Obama b'abana babo Malia na Sasha bari gutembera 9.
Ababyeyi ntibagira umunaniro ukabije Nkuko bitangazwa na Brigid Schulte, mu kinyamakuru The Washington Post, yavuze ko umubare w’amasaha ababyeyi b’abagore bamarana n’abana bari hagati y’imyaka itatu na 11 agira uruhare mu myitwarire y’umwana mu gihe kizaza.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko iyo inshuti yawe yishimye nawe wishima, yaba yarakaye ukaba nawe warakara.
Bityo rero, umubyeyi ashobora kwanduza umwana we iyo mimerere.
10.
Ababyeyi bagaragaza ingufu bakirinda gutsindwa Impuguke mu buzima bwo mu mutwe muri Kaminuza ya Stanford, Carol Dweck, mu myaka icumi yagaragaje ko abana n’abantu bakuru batekereza ku ntsinzi mu buryo bubiri: • "Imitekerereze idahinduka” yiyumvisha ko imimerere yacu, ubwenge cyangwa se ubushobozi bwo guhanga udushya bitahinduka mu buryo butandukanye, ko intsinzi ari iy’abanyabwenge gusa, kandi ko kuyiharanira bisaba umuntu kuba akorana umurava.
• “ Imitekerereze ihinduka” ihangana n’ingaruka kandi ntibona gutsindwa nk’iby’abantu badafite ubwenge, ahubwo nk’ikimenyetso cy’uko umuntu agomba kongera imbaraga mu byo akora.
11.
Ababyeyi b’abagore badakorera hafi y’ingo zabo Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Harvard Business School bugaragaza ko hari inyungu nyinshi ku bana barerwa n’ababyeyi badakorera hafi y’imuhira.
Iyi nyigo igaragaza ko abakobwa bavutse ku babyeyi b’abagore bakoreraga kure yo mu rugo, bakora akazi k’ubugenzuzi kandi bakabona amafaranga akubye inshuro 23% ugereranije n’abarezwe n’ababyeyi bakorera imuhira.
Muri iyi nyigo, abahungu bo byagaragaye ko bamara nibura amasaha arindwi n’igice bita ku bana ndetse n’iminota 25 mu kazi ko mu rugo birenga ku gihe abarerwa n’ababyeyi baba mu rugo bamara.
12.
Ababyeyi bafite ubumenyi mu mibanire no gucunga umutungo Mu buryo butangaje cyane, kimwe cya gatanu cy’abana bo muri Amerika bakuriye mu bukene, byagize ingaruka ku hazaza habo.
Nkuko bitangazwa na Sean Reardon, Umushakashatsi wo muri Stanford University, icyuho mu byinjijwe n’imiryango ikennye n’ikize cyari hagati ya 30% na 40% ku kigero cyo hejuru ugereranyije n’abavutse mu myaka 25 mbere ya 2001.
13.
Ababyeyi bafata inshingano, badakoresha igitugu Impuguke mu buzima bwo mu mutwe muri Kaminuza ya California, Diana Baumride, yagaragaje ko ababyeyi barimo ibyiciro bitatu:  Umubyeyi udahana umwana  Umubyeyi ugerageza gushungura agahana umwana we ashingiye ku buryo yitwara  Umubyeyi uyobora umwana mu buryo buboneye 14.
Ababyeyi bigisha abana babo gutinyuka Angela Duckworth, wo muri Kaminuza ya Pennsylvania, mu mwaka wa 2013 yavuze ko ibyo gutinyuka bishingira ku kwigisha umwana uburyo bwo gutekereza no kwiyemeza agamije gutegura ejo heza.
15.
Ababyeyi bita abana babo amazina abereye Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko izina ry’umuntu rishobora kujyana n’imibereho cyangwa uburyo yitwara.
Abahanga bavuga ko abantu bitwa amazina azwi kandi yoroshye kuyasoma, bakunze kugera ku ntsinzi.
16.
Ababyeyi bagenzura imyitwarire y’abana aho kugenzura imitekerereze Kutemerera abana kwifatira imyanzuro, byangiza ubuzima bwite bwabo, bigatuma batigenga ndetse no kubabuza gukora ibyo bashaka byose ni ingero zo kugenzura imitekerereze yabo.
Ingero zo kugenzura imyitwarire zo zishingira ku gutoza umwana gukora imirimo yo mu rugo, kumuha amabwiriza yo kugenderaho no kumusaba gusoza imikoro yakuye ku ishuri.
17.
Ababyeyi bazi akamaro k’indyo iboneye n’uburyo bwo kuyifata Umuhanga mu by’imitekerereze n’ubuvuzi bwo mu mutwe ku bana, Dr.
Catherine Steiner-Adair, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Business Insider, ko ababyeyi bafite ubushobozi bwo kumenya no kuboneza imirire, bafasha abana babo gukura biyitaho kandi basigasira amagara yabo.

#15000#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/article/mineacom-yeruriye-abadepite-ko-hari-ibibazo-by-amakusanyirizo-y-amata-byatewe-n
MINEACOM yeruriye Abadepite ko hari ibibazo by’amakusanyirizo y’amata byatewe n’uburangare bw’abayobozi Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi, Inganda n’Ibikorwa by’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, François Kanimba, kuri uyu wa Kabiri yabwiye Abadepite ko Guverinoma iri gukora ibishoboka byose ngo ikemure ibibazo byugarije amakaragiro n’amakusanyirizo y’amata.
Minisitiri Kanimba yari imbere y’Inteko Rusange y’Umutwe w’Abadepite, ngo ayigezeho ibisubizo mu magambo ku bibazo byagaragajwe muri raporo ku ngendo Komisiyo y’Ubuhinzi, Ubworozi n’Ibidukikije yakoreye mu turere twose hagati ya Mata na Ugushyingo 2016, harebwa aho gahunda ya Girinka n’iy’ibigo by’ubushakashatsi zigeze zifasha abaturage kwikura mu bukene.
Icyo gihe byagaragaye ko mu gihugu hari amakusanyirizo 106 y’amata, arimo 48 akora neza, 42 adatanga umusaruro uko bikwiye na 16 adakora.
Kanimba yashimangiye ko imikorere nk’iyo ishingiye ahanini ku micungire mibi y’amakoperative acunga amakusanyirizo y’amata, bamwe ugasanga nta n’ubushobozi bafite mu birebana n’amafaranga.
Yagize ati “Ntitwanabahisha ko ahenshi aya makoperative mu kubaka amakusanyirizo, hari porogaramu za leta zabigizemo uruhare, zabafashije mu kubona aho bakorera ndetse no kubona ibikoresho by’ibanze byo kwakiriramo amata ngo ashobore gufatwa neza ageze mu ikusanyirizo.
Ariko mu by’ukuri bahawe ibyo bikoresho ahenshi badafite ubushobozi bugaragara bwo kubifata neza cyangwa se ngo bagire ubushobozi bwo kuba banabisimbura igihe bigize ikibazo.”
Kanimba yavuze ko ahari ibyo bibazo by’amikoro hari umuturage uzana amata ntibabone amafaranga bamwishyura, ugasanga hari abacuruzi baca ku ruhande bakamuha amafaranga bumvikanyeho nyamara bo akenshi batagira ibikoresho bipima ubuziranenge bw’amata baguze mu baturage.
Amakusanyirizo ari mu bibazo Kanimba yakomoje kuri Ikaragiro rya Mukamira ryagize amateka maremare ku buryo rimaze imyaka irenga itandatu ritararangira, ariko ngo hari icyizere ko kuwa 1 Nyakanga 2017 rizatangira gukora.
Yagize ati “Leta yaryeguriye Inyange niyo igiye kurifata ikaricunga.
Kuva aho baryeguriwe hari imirimo myinshi bakozeho kugira ngo bashobore kurishyira ku murongo, ritangire gukora rimeze neza.”
Leta yagurishije imigabane yari ifitemo ariko amakoperative yari afitemo imigabane yo aracyarimo.
Hari n’Ikaragiro rya Burera ryari umushinga wa leta ugamije gushyiraho ikaragiro riciriritse ry’icyitegerezo, ryashoboraga kubakwa mu turere twose rifite n’ubushobozi bwo gutunganya ibintu bidasaba imashini nini, ariko umushinga wararangiye uhura n’imicungire mibi, wegurirwa rwiyemezamirimo kandi ntukora 100%.
Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi, Inganda n’Ibikorwa by’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, François Kanimba Yageze mo ku ruganda rwa Giheke muri Rusizi rwubatswe ku bufatanye bw’ikigo cyigenga Botar cyo muri Ireland gifatanyije na kopetarive icunga ikusanyirizo ry’amata i Giheke, ariko urwo ruganda rwuzuye ibigo bishinzwe ubuziranenge NIRDA na RSB basanga harimo ibibazo bikomeye.
Yakomeje agira ati “Baje gusanga urwo ruganda rudashobora kuzakora kubera amamashini basanzemo ntabwo yari mashya, amwe yari ashaje, kuyakoresha ubona bizatera ikibazo, hafatwa icyemezo ko dushakisha amafaranga ku ngengo y’imari ya leta kugira ngo ikibazo cy’amamashini yo mu ikaragiro rya Giheke gikemuke."
Ikaragiro rya Savana ryo muri Nyagatare na ryo ngo ryubatswe na leta rikajya rikorana n’Inyange Industries, ariko nabwo habamo ibibazo byatumaga Inyange isanga amata menshi atujuje ubuziranenge, Guverinoma irigurisha mu 2013.
Hari aho Kanimba abona uburangare Abadepite babajije Minisitiri Kanimba impamvu yatumye ikigo cyo muri Ireland cyagombaga kubaka uruganda rw’amata rwa Giheke kikazana imashini zishaje.
Yasubije ati “Banyakubahwa badepite, rwose sinashidikanya ko hari aho dushobora kuba twaragize uburangare kugira ngo ibibazo bigaragara byaturutse ku bufatanye na kiriya kigo kitegamiye kuri leta cyo muri Ireland. twakigiriye icyizere dutekereza ko bari kudukorera ibintu byiza.”
“Ziriya mashini nibo bazizanye, baziguze ku mafaranga yabo birumvikana ariko agenewe gufasha abaturage bo mu karere ka Rusizi, ariko birangiye inzego za leta zibishinzwe ngo zirebe ko niba ibintu bimeze neza, zisangamo ibibazo.”
Yavuze ko mu myaka yashize igenamigambi ryo kubaka inganda leta yagizemo uruhare atakwemeza 100% ko ryagenze neza, ariko ngo bakuramo amasomo, ku buryo ahandi leta yifuza gushora imari igenzura ko byizwe neza.
Hari ingamba zafashwe Minisitiri Kanimba yavuze ko mu mwaka ushize hagiyeho amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’ubuhinzi agenga ibijyanye no gutwara amata, kwegeranya amata no kuyahuriza mu makusanyirizo no kuyacuruza, ubu ari kugenda ashyirwa mu bikorwa ku buryo ubwo azaba akurikizwa 100% azafasha byinshi.
Ni amabwiriza agena ko nta muntu wemerewe kugura amata atanyuze mu makusanyirizo.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ikindi ni ukugira ngo amakoperative dushobore kuyahuza n’ibigo by’imari, kuyafasha muri rusange kugira ngo bagire imicungire y’imari ishobora guha icyizere ibigo by’imari kugira ngo bashobore kubona amafaranga yo gukoresha, bagure amata y’abaturage."
Mu bindi harimo kureba uko habaho amasezerano y’ubuguzi hagati y’amakoperative acunga amakusanyirizo, n’inganda zitunganya umusaruro uturuka kumata, zaba inini, into n’iziciriritse.
Minisitiri Kanimba yanahishuye ko hari kurebwa niba mu Rwanda hakenewe ko hashyirwaho igiciro kimwe kuri litiro y’amata, ariko ngo ntabwo baragera ku ku mwanzuro.
Aho amakusanyirizo y'amata akora neza nta bituma aborozi biteza imbere

#15024#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Perezida-Kagame-yatanze-ikaze-n-ihumure-kuri-Sudani-y-Epfo
Perezida Kagame yahamagariye ibihugu bigize EAC kwitangira gukora ibyiza Perezida wa Repubulika y'u Rwanda Paul Kagame yasabye abayobozi b'ibihugu bigize umuryango wa Afurika y'iburasirazuba gushishikarira gukora ibyiza no gushikama ku cyerekezo ibi bihugu bihuriyeho kugirango bikomeze gushimangira ubumwe n'iterambere ry'uyu muryango.
Ibi, Perezida Kagame yabitangarije mu nama ya 17 idasanzwe y'umuryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba (EAC) yateraniye i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzaniya kuva kuri uyu wa 08 Nzeri 2016.
Perezida Kagame yashimangiye akamaro ko kwihuriza hamwe nk'ibihugu avuga ko ari amahirwe yo gukora ibishoboka byose bakagera kuri byinshi byiza biruseho.
Yagize ati: "Ndashimira abavandimwe bo mu gihugu cya Sudani y'Epfo kuba barinjiye bidasubirwaho mu muryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba, dukeneye gukomeza gushishikarira icyerekezo duhuriyeho nka Afurika y'iburasirazuba tugakomeza kwitangira gukora ibyiza biruseho, uyu muryango utuma dufatanya tugakomera kuruta uko buri wese yaba ameze abaye akora ari umwe, icy'ingenzi ni uko imyanzuro dufata itagomba kugira uwo ibangamira" Muri iyi, nama Hon.
Christophe Bazivamo yarahiriye kuba Umunyamabanga mukuru wungurije wa EAC akaba ari we wungirije Ambasaderi Liberat Mfumukeko ukomoka mu gihugu cy'u Burundi.
Perezida Kagame yashimiye Hon.
Christophe Bazivamo nk'umunyarwanda witwaye neza akagirirwa icyizere cyo gutorerwa kuba umunyamabanga mukuru wungirije w'uyu muryango amusaba kuzakora nk'umunyafurika y'iburasirazuba.
Ati: "Ndashimira umunyamabanga wungirije mushya, mwifurije kandi we na bagenzi be kuzagira manda irangwa no kugera ku nshingano no kugera ku mirimo itanga umusaruro, agiye kuzakora nk'umunyafurika y'iburasirazuba cyane kurusha uko ari umunyarwanda" Bazivamo yarahiriye inshingano nshya yahawe muri EAC Muri iyi nama kandi hizwe ku cyemezo cyo gusinya amasezerano y'ubucuruzi ahuza EAC n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu by'iburayi (EU) maze abitabiriye iyi nama biha andi mezi atatu yo kwiga kuri aya masezerano.
Aya masezerano yiswe [ Economic Partnership Agreement,( EPA)] ibihugu by'u Rwanda na Kenya byamaze kuyashyiraho umukono, Uganda na yo yamaze kugaragaza ko yishimiye aya masezerano ariko ibihugu bya Tanzaniya n'U Burundi byo byakomeje kugaragaza imbogamizi mu gusinya aya masezerano.
Muri iyi nama, Perezida John Pombe Magufuli uyoboye EAC, yavuze ko hagikenewe ikindi gihe cyo kwiga kuri aya masezerano kugirango ibihugu byose bigize uyu muryango bibanze biyasesengurane ubushishozi kugirango harebwe niba koko bikwiye kuyasinya.
Magufuli yavuze ko abayobozi b'ibihugu bigize EAC bazongera guhura mu mwaka utaha bakongera kuyaganiraho mu rwego rwo kuyanonosora.
Ati: "Twihaye amezi atatu yo kuganira byimbitse ku gusinya amasezerano ya EPA, tuzahura muri Mutarama 2017 tunonosore iki kibazo."
Iyi nama yitabiriwe n'aba Perezida batandukanye barimo Perezida Dr John Pombe Magufuli wa Tanzania, Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda, Paul Kagame w'u Rwanda na Visi Perezida wa Kenya William Ruto.
Ibihugu by'U Burundi na Sudani y'Epfo byo bikaba byari byohereje intumwa zibihagararira muri iyi nama.

#15039#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/yakize-umubyibuho-ukabije-kubera-siporo-no-guhindura-imirire
Yakize umubyibuho ukabije kubera siporo no guhindura imirire Florence Uwamwezi, umwe mu bagore n’abakobwa 150 bishyize hamwe ngo barwanye ikibazo cy’umubyibuho ukabije, akaba ari n’umuyobozi w’ihuriro ryabo bise ‘Slim n’Fit’, bakora siporo no kunoza indyo kandi biragenda bikemura ikibazo cyabo batiyambaje abaganga.
Uwamwezi mbere y’uko atangira gahunda zo kugabanya ibiro na nyuma yaho.yavuye ku biro 105 agera kuri 85 Abo bagore bagira amasaha ahoraho yo gukora siporo aho babifashwamo n’inzobere, bakaba bari basanzwe bakorera mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Murenge wa Kimironko mu Mujyi wa Kigali, usibye muri iki gihe buri wese ayikorera iwe.
Ngo bagira n’igihe cyo kwigishanya uburyo bwo gutegura amafunguro abafasha mu kibazo cyabo, ndetse hakaba n’ubwo bazana impuguke mu mirire.
Bavuga ko bahisemo icyo bise ‘Life Style’, cyangwa uburyo bw’imibereho.
Uwamwezi umaze imyaka ibiri ari muri iyo gahunda, aganira na www.kigalitoday.com yavuze ko yabitangiye ari uko umubyibuho ukabije wari watangiye kumuteza ibibazo bikomeye kuko ngo yatangiye afite ibiro 105 ariko ubu akaba afite 85, kandi ngo ntibijya byongera kuzamuka kuko azi uko abikurikirana.
Bakora siporo ihoraho Kuri we ngo amafunguro bategura ahoraho ni yo amufasha cyane, bitandukanye n’abiyicisha inzara bashaka kunanuka (Régime) kuko bibateza ibibazo aho kuba ibisubizo.
Agira ati “Mbere yo gutangira iyi gahunda nshya nari kuri régime, kurya imboga gusa amezi nk’abiri cyangwa atatu, siporo nyinshi, kunywa imiti runaka no kwanga kurya rimwe na rimwe ibiryo mu gihe runaka ku munsi.
Ibyo narabikoze birakunda, ibiro biragabanuka ariko ngahita mbihagarika noneho nyuma y’andi mezi abiri byaragarutse birenga n’ibyo nari mfite mbere”.
Avuga ko ibyo byatumye akora ubushakashatsi kuri Internet ndetse yifashisha n’impuguke mu mirire ari bwo yamenye Life style, asanga kwiyicisha inzara umuntu yanga kurya atari byo.
Ati “Kwiyicisha inzara si wo muti, ahubwo ni ukumenya indyo iboneye ndetse na siporo wakora kandi mu gihe gihoraho noneho ibiro bikagenda bigabanuka gake gake kandi ntibigaruke.
Twebwe mu ihuriro ryacu umuntu afata amafunguro atatu ku munsi nk’uko bisanzwe, ariko tukamenya ayo dufata adufasha”.
Ati “Mu gitondo turya imbuto, amagi ariko atari buri munsi, igikoma ariko ntitwemerewe isukari n’ubuki.
Saa sita turya imboga nyinshi, ibijumba, amateke, imyumbati n’ibindi mbese ibyongera imbaraga.
Nijoro dufata potage y’imboga zinyuranye n’igikombe cy’amata bikunze, tubikora kugira ngo umubiri ugumane imbaraga, hatabaho gutakaza ibiro umuntu akanegekara”.
Ibyo ngo iyo umuntu abivanze na siporo ku buryo buhoraho bifasha umuntu gutakaza ibiro buke buke kandi akagumana imbaraga zo gukora imirimo ye isanzwe.
Ikindi ngo iyo bibaye ngombwa gutekesha amavuta, ni ugukoresha aturuka ku bihingwa.
Bafitemo abantu bafite ibiro birenga 200 ariko ngo bizeye ko bizagabanuka Ikindi ngo yari yarihaye intego yo gukora siporo imara isaha buri munsi, gusa ngo kubera ko muri bagenzi be harimo abafite ibiro byinshi cyane, bakora iminsi itatu mu cyumweru babifashijwemo n’impuguke (Coach) zimenya buri wese icyo akeneye.
Ibyo byose ngo ni byo byatumye Uwamwezi na bagenzi be bagenda bagera ku ntego yabo kuko ngo hari abaje muri Slim n’Fit bafite ibiro 100, 175, 250 ariko ubu ngo hakaba hari abagabanyijeho 15, 18, 20 no hejuru kandi bakomeje gahunda, icyiza kandi ngo ni uko umuntu ibiro abihagarikira aho yumva ashaka.
Buri nyuma y’ukwezi abo bagore barahura bakabapima bakareba uko ubuzima bwabo buhagaze, uko ibinure bigenda bigabanuka hanyuma buri nyuma y’amezi atatu bakareba abatakaje ibiro byinshi kurusha abandi, uwa mbere agahembwa.
Guhindura imirire biza ku isonga mu gufasha umuntu kugabanya ibiro Impuguke mu bya siporo no gufasha abantu kugira umubiri umeze neza, Gael Girumugisha, yemeza ko umuntu yava ku biro byinshi akabihagarikira ku bikenewe, ariko ngo imirire ni yo ibifitemo uruhare runini.
Ati “Birashoboka ko umuntu yava nko ku biro 120 akabihagarikira kuri 80, ibyo ahanini biterwa no guhindura imirire no gukora siporo.
Imirire ibigiramo uruhare rwa 70% naho siporo ikagira 30%, bivuze ko ibiryo birimo amavuta n’isukari ubigabanya cyane, waba wakundaga umushyusyo wa mu gitondo ukawureka, ukibanda ku biryo birimo imboga nyinshi ndetse na siporo”.
Ati “Umuntu agomba kumenya kandi siporo akora bitewe n’uko angana, ntiwaba ufite ibiro 100 ngo utangirire ku gusimbuka umugozi kuko uba wangiza amaguru, nyuma y’ukwezi ntuzaba ukibasha guhaguruka uhite ubireka.
Tangira ukora ingendo n’amaguru, wirukanke, umaze kumenyera nibwo watangira gusimbuka umugozi”.
Girumugisha agira inama abantu y’uko siporo bayigira ubuzima bwa buri munsi kuko inarinda indwara nyinshi, ngo iyo ubonye ugabanyijeho nk’ibiro 30 hanyuma ugahagarika siporo bihita bisubiraho ndetse bikanarenga ari na ko umuntu ashyira mu kaga ubuzima bwe.

#15042#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/urukundo/article/impamvu-simusiga-zagufasha-gutahura-umukunzi-utakwitaho
Impamvu simusiga zagufasha gutahura umukunzi utakwitaho Urukundo ruza imbere mu bitera umunezero w’ubuzima ndetse biba akarusho iyo ufite uwo mujya inama mugahuriza hamwe ku ntego ishimangira inzira murimo.
Abahuye n’abishushanya mu rukundo bagira ibikomere bitapfa komorwa n’ubonetse wese kubera uburemere bwabyo.
Abahanga mu by’imibanire bagaragaza ko hari ibimenyetso bishobora kwereka umukobwa ko umuhungu nta gahunda y’igihe kirekire amufiteho ndetse ibyo kuba yamushyira mu rugo ngo amubere nyina w’abana biri kure nk’ukwezi.
Metro yatangaje ko hari imyitwarire ishushanya ko umuhungu agucenga yishakira ubucuti bwo kuryoshya by’igihe gito yatuma umwirinda cyangwa ukamenya uko umwitwaraho.  
Gukunda guhora mu kabari Iyo umuhungu mukundana yibera mu kabari uzagire amakenga.
Hari abagira imyitwarire idahwitse ku buryo hari ubwo azashaka ko mukorera imibonano mpuzabitsina mu kabari atitaye ku bantu babahanze amaso.  
Gukunda gukoranaho cyane Igikorwa cyo gukoranaho ku bantu bakundana ni byiza cyane, gusa umuhungu mukundana nashaka kugukoraho cyane mwagiye nko mu birori runaka kugeza ubwo anashaka gukora ku myanya y’ibanga ni byiza ko umugendera kure.  
Ntiyita kumenya aho ukora Mu gihe umuhungu muri mu rukundo nta biganiro byinshi mugirana, icyo aba ashaka gusa ni uko muhurira mu mashuka.
Rimwe na rimwe unamusaba ubucuti kuri Facebook, ntabukwemerere kandi ahora kuri internet.  
Akubaza niba utari mu mihango mbere y’uko umusura Iyo mufitanye gahunda yo guhura cyane cyane uri bumusure, araguhamagara akakubaza niba uri imugongo, wamwemerera akakubwira ko atari kuboneka.
Iki kibazo ahanini kibazwa n’umuntu ufite gahunda yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ndetse wamaze kubitegura.  
Iyo urwaye akuvugisha kuri telefone wumva atakwitayeho Urukundo rukomezwa no kwemera kubana mu byago no mu munezero.
Umuhungu utagufiteho gahunda aguhamagara mu gicuku ku buryo kubona yakuvugishije ku manywa biba ari igitangaza.
Uyu ntanakwandikira ubutumwa bugufi uretse ubwo kukubaza uko mwahura ngo mwishimishe.  
Ntakwerekana mu nshuti ze n’umuryango Umuntu umeze gutya uzasanga yirinda ko inshuti ze zasanga muri kumwe, ndetse ntihagire n’umuntu wo mu muryango we akwereka.
Ni we uba uzi gusa.
Iyo aramutse aguhaye impano, witega ko uzayishyura mu buryo bw’imibonano mpuzabitsina nta rundi rukundo aba agufitiye.  
Ntiyifuza ko muhuza amaso iyo muri mu gitanda Kubera guhora agukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina, bigeraho akumva atifuza kukureba mu maso igihe muri kuyikora, ndetse ntanababazwe n’uko wayikoranye n’abandi bantu.
Hari n’igihe azana zimwe mu nshuti ze bose bashaka kugusambanya, wabyanga bikamubabaza akagufata nk’uwanze kuzishimisha.
Abameze gutya hari n’ubwo bajya gutereta abandi bakobwa bumva ko ntacyo bibabwiye kuba abo bakundana babimenya.
Iyi mico si kamara mu kugaragaza umuntu utagufiteho gahunda y’igihe kirekire gusa ni bimwe mu bimenyetso bishimangira ko nta cyizere cyo kurwubaka ngo rukomere. [email protected]

Leta yemeye gushakira indi mirimo abakozi ba Minisiteri zavuguruwe Minisiteri y’Abakozi ba Leta n’Umurimo yatangaje ko abakozi ba za Minisiteri bazagirwaho ingaruka n’impinduka zakozwe, bazashakirwa ahandi mu nzego za Leta bijyanye n’ubushobozi bafite, utazahabonerwa akazahabwa imperekeza.
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 18 Ukwakira 2018, nibwo Perezida Kagame Paul yavuguruye Guverinoma.
Mu mpinduka zakozwe, uretse bamwe mu bayobozi bakuweho, nka Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Amashyamba (Minilaf) yakuweho ndese Minisiteri Ishinzwe impunzi n’Imicungire y‘Ibiza (Midimar) ihindurwa Minisiteri Ishinzwe Ibikorwa by’Ubutabazi.
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Abakozi ba Leta n’Umurimo, Musonera Gaspard, yabwiye IGIHE ko abakoraga muri minisiteri zakozwemo impinduka barakomeza gufatwa nk’abakozi ba leta, cyane ko akenshi iyo urwego rwa leta ruvuyeho, inshingano rusanganwe ziba zifite aho zimuriwe.
Abakozi bamwe ngo barimukana n’inshingano zabo, ariko hari n’abo inshingano zavuyeho cyangwa se ibyo bakoraga bitajyanye n’inshingano z’urwego rushya.
Musonera ati “Abo bashakirwa ahandi iyo hahari mu nzego za leta zitandukanye, kandi ngira ngo hari ingero nyinshi zagiye zibaho nk’igihe MINEAC yahuzwaga na MINICOM bikaba MINEACOM, abakozi bose bagiye babonerwa aho bajya mu nzego za leta.
Aho bujuje ibisabwa barahashyirwa, nibo baba bafite ubwihutirwe kurenza undi wese wava ahandi.”
“Ariko biramutse bibayeho ko hari utabona aho ajya, afite ibyo agenerwa n’igihe abihabwa kuko bimara amezi atandatu, muri ayo mezi atandatu ahabwa bibiri bya gatatu b’umushahara yahabwaga.
Ayo mezi atandatu akenshi arangira hashobora kuba habonetse indi nzira.”
Igihe ngo ya mezi arangiye hatabonetse igisubizo cy’aho umukozi yakomereza akazi, ahabwa imperekeza.
Musonera ati “Ntabwo aba bafatwa nk’ababuriwe umurimo, kubivuga ubu byaba ari impuha.
Icy’ibanze dukora mu izina rya leta ni ugushaka imyanya hirya no hino itarimo abantu bujuje ibisabwa, bakayishyirwamo akazi kagakomeza.”
Imbonerahamwe y’abakozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Amashyamba igaragaza ko yari ifite abasaga 30.
Mu yindi myanya y’ubuyobozi yavuyeho harimo n’uw’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Uburezi ushinzwe Amashuri y’Imyuga n’Ubumenyingiro warimo Olivier Rwamukwaya n’uw’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi ushinzwe Ubuhinzi wari usanzwemo Nsengiyumva Fulgence.

Ibi birori byabereye i Nyamirambo ahazwi nka Fazenda, byitabiriwe n’abarimo inshuti za hafi z’uyu mukinnyi n’umukunzi we uzwi nka Djazila, gusa nta wari wambaye agapfukamunwa ndetse nta guhana intera kwarimo nka zimwe mu ngamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ni mu gihe Guverinoma ikomeje gusaba abanyarwanda kutirara na gato, ahubwo bakongera imbaraga mu kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19, aho basabwa "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa harimo no kugabanya gusurana mu miryango igihe bidakenewe."

Ubwo Sarpong yirukanwaga muri Rayon Sports muri Mata, bivugwa ko Rugwiro na Habimana ari bo bakinnyi bonyine bamuhamagaye kuri telefoni bamwihanganisha.
Mugisha Gilbert wa Rayon Sports, byitezwe ko azerekeza muri APR FC, na we yagaragaye muri ibi birori Michael Sarpong yahayemo umukunzi we impano y’igishushanyo yamukoreshereje, kigaragaza isura y’uyu mukobwa.
Agaruka ku bategura ibirori bihuza abantu benshi muri iyi minsi, Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera, yavuze ko bitazashoboka ko Polisi imenya ababiteguye bose, ariko abantu bagomba kumva ko bafite inshingano zo kwirinda.
Ati "Ikintu gikomeye cyane tubona ni uko rwose hari abantu batubahiriza aya mabwiriza kandi nta kintu kigoye cyatuma batayubahiriza.
Bizagorana cyane ko Polisi yamenya ngo uyu arateganya gukora Bridal Shower tariki ya 26 ngo dushyireho polisi.
Muri gahunda ufite ugomba gushyiramo kwirinda, uve mu rugo wambaye agapfukamunwa, wirinde kwegerana no gusuhuzanya kandi wibuke gukaraba."
Mu minsi ishize, Michael Sarpong yavuze ko ari mu rukundo n’Umunyarwandakazi ku buryo bashobora kuzashyingiranwa.
Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 24 ukomoka muri Ghana, nta kipe afite nyuma yo kwirukanwa na Rayon Sports kubera imyitwarire mibi.
Nyuma yo kubwirwa na Simba SC yo itazamugura, Yanga SC yo muri Tanzania, AS Kigali na Kiyovu Sports ni andi makipe akomeje kumugaragariza ko amukeneye.

Rulindo: Imvura imaze iminsi igwa yangije ibitari bike Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Rulindo buravuga ko inzu zirenga 40, imyaka yari ihinze mu mirima, n’ibindi bikorwa, ari byo bimaze kwangizwa n’imvura imaze iminsi igwa.
Izi nzu zasenyutse uretse kuba hari izari mu bice by’amanegeka, mu zibasiwe harimo n’izisanzwe ziri mu midugudu, ahantu hatari mu manegeka.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rulindo Kayiranga Emmanuel, asobanura ko abaturage bari bazituyemo bahise bacumbikirwa na bagenzi babo, abandi bashyirwa mu mazu adafite abayatuyemo.
Yagize ati: “Iyi mvura bigaragara ko igikomeje kugwa, nta buryo bwo guhita dusana inzu zangiritse, abari bazituyemo babaye bacumbikiwe mu baturanyi mu gihe tugitegereje ko iyi mvura ishira tukabona kugira icyo dukora mu kuzisana, cyangwa kubaka bundi bushya, abaturage bakazabona kongera gutura”.
Inzu zirenga 40 zangijwe n’imvura imaze iminsi igwa mu Karere ka Rulindo Iyi mvura yangije imyaka iri ku buso bwa Hegitari esheshatu mu Murenge wa Tumba.
Imboga zari zihinze ni zo zibasiwe cyane, mu gihe ibindi bihingwa birimo ibigori abantu bashobora kugerageza kubyegura.
Nanone umuhanda uva ahitwa Gaseke ugana Bubangu mu Murenge wa Murambi wari waguyemo ibitengu n’amabuye manini byamanuwe n’iyi mvura, ariko abaturage bahise bashakisha uko batangira kubikuramo binyuze mu muganda, kugira ngo umuhanda wongere ube nyabagendwa.
Ubu nta bindi binyabiziga bipfa kuwunyuramo uretse moto zigerageza.
Iyi nka yakubiswe n’inkuba Uyu muyobozi yagize ati: “Turasaba abaturage bacu kwigengesera bakaba maso, bakihutira kuzirika ibisenge by’inzu no gushyiraho imirindankuba, kuko mu gihe imvura irimo umuyaga n’inkuba ije bigasanga byarakozwe, ibyago byo kuba hari uwo byahitana cyangwa byangiriza biba ari bike.
Ikindi ni ukwitabira kuva ahashyira ubuzima mu kaga nko mu bice by’amanegeka, hato iyi mvura ikomeje kugwa ari nyinshi gutya itaza igasanga abantu biraye”.
Umuhanda uva ahitwa Gaseke ugana Bubangu mu Murenge wa Murambi wari waguyemo ibitengu n’amabuye manini byamanuwe n’iyi mvura Iyi mvura yangije imyaka iri ku buso bwa Hegitari esheshatu mu Murenge wa Tumba Abaturage bahise batangira umuganda mu buryo bwo gushaka igisubizo cy’umuhanda nyabagendwa wangiritse MENYA UMWANDITSI

Muhanga: Abikorera barifuza gukorerwa ubuvugizi kurusha kwakwa umusanzu Mu gihe hitegurwa amatora y'abahagarariye urugaga rw'abikorera mu gihugu, hirya no hino mu turere hari gukorwa ibiganiro bigamije gusobanura inshingano z'urugaga rw'abikorera PSF ari nako basaba abikorera kugira ibyo batekereza byakomeza kubateza imbere.
Ubwo iyi nama yabaga mu karere ka Muhanga, tariki 05/11/2014, bamwe mu bikorera garagaraje ko batazi neza inshingano z'uru rugaga kuko ngo usanga abarugize baboneka gake imbere y'abo bahagariye, bakaba banasaba ko kuri manda itaha abayobozi bashya bazashyira imbaraga mu kwegera abikorera b'abacuruzi cyane cyane abashya mu mwuga.
Nk'uko bitangazwa n'umwe mu bacuruzi bo mu karere ka Muhanga, ngo usanga abayobozi b'urugaga begera umucuruzi mu gihe bamwishyuza imisanzu no kubagezaho ibyifuzo kurusha kubaba hafi mu kazi nk'ababa babahagarariye.
Mu nama yabahuje n'ubuyobozi bw'akarere ndetse n'abacyuye igihe mu rugaga byagaragaye ko abikorera bafite inyota yo kumenya ibidasanzwe ku bayobozi b'ubutaha ugereranyije n'abamazeho igihe, aho umwe muri aba bacururiza mu mujyi wa Muhanga avuga ko byaba byiza bagiye ababa hafi y'abagana mu kwikorera bakiri bashyashya mu rwego rwo kubafasha no kubavuganira.
Abikorera bo mu karere ka Muhanga barasaba ko manda y'urugaga y'ubutaha yazavuganira abacuruzi kurusha kubishyuza imisanzu.
Pasiteri Uwamurera Vénantie, ni umwe mu bacuruzi bakorera mu mujyi wa Muhanga, akaba avuga ko hari abacuruzi benshi batazi neza inshingano, ububasha ndetse n'imikorere y'urugaga.
Agira ati «usanga umucuruzi agize ikibazo cy'igihombo akabura uwo atakambira kugirango bamufashe cyangwa se babe bamugira inama ngo avugurure imikorere, ahubwo akabona bamwe muri aba bagize komite baje kumubwira ngo akinge umuryango w'iduka, cyangwa se akababona ari uko baje kwaka amafaranga y'umusanzu abacuruzi batanga buri kwezi ».
Uyu mucuruzi asaba ko abazatorwa bazita ku kongerera abashoramali ibijyanye no kongera ubumenyi kuko aribyo byatuma abacuruzi n'abikorera barushaho kwiyumva mu babayobora.
Cyakora ku ruhande rw'urugaga rw'abikorera siko babibona kuko ngo buri wese afite uburenganzira bwo kwigenzura mu mikorere ye kandi akubahiriza uruhererekane rw'inzego ziyobora abikorera kuko rufite uruhare mu kuvuganira abikorera bato nk'uko byasobanuwe n'Umukozi w'urugaga ku rwego rw'igihugu Abatoni Bethy.
Yagize ati « mu bucuruzi hari abinjira abandi bagasohoka, aba akaba ari nabo barimo kugaragaza ko badasobanukiwe n'imikorere y'urugaga, turasaba abikorera kuzahitamo abagomba kubagirira akamaro kuko hari ubwo usanga hari abatorwa hashingiwe ku marangamutima, aho kwita ku bunyangamugayo n'ubushobozi umuntu afite».
Amatora y'abagomba gusimbura komite icyuye igihe ateganyijwe taliki ya 07 Ugushyingo 2014 mu ntara z'Amajyepfo n'Uburengerazuba.
Ephrem Murindabigwi
