Minicom yinjiye mu kibazo cy’inganda z’ubuhinzi zishingwa zikabura ibyo zitunganya Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda, Munyeshyaka Vincent, yatangaje ko batangiye gushyiraho ingamba zizatuma inganda z’ubuhinzi zitazongera kubura umusaruro zitunganya.
Mu bihe bishize hagiye havugwa inganda zishingwa ariko zikabura umusaruro wo gutunganya nyamara n’abahinzi bagataka ko babuze aho bagurishiriza umusaruro wabo.
Umwaka ushize ubwo uwari Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’inganda François Kanimba yaganiraga n’abadepite ku kugurisha umusaruro w’ubuhinzi n’ibijyanye n’amata, yavuze ko inganda nyinshi zagiye zijyaho zizeye ko abahinzi bazazizanira umusaruro ariko zamara kuzura ntibigende gutyo, zimwe zigahomba.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Kane, Minisitiri Munyeshyaka yavuze ko bafashe ingamba zizatuma inganda zibona umusaruro kandi n’abahinzi bakabyungukiramo.
Yagize ati “Abashoramari bazana inganda ariko ntibashyireho uburyo bwo kumenya aho umusaruro uzaturuka, turashaka ko bajya bagirana amasezerano n’abahinzi bacu n’amakoperative ku buryo uruganda biyemeza bati ‘tuzakenera umusaruro runaka, toni runaka z’ibigori, toni runaka z’ibishyimbo’ ku buryo ikintu cyo kuba abahinzi bahinga bazi aho bazajyana ibihingwa byabo tucyongeramo ingufu.”
Uretse kubura umusaruro hari n’ubwo uboneka inganda zikawanga kubera ko wahunitswe nabi ukangirika.
Munyeshyaka yavuze ko uburyo abahinzi bahunikamo butizewe ari nabyo bituma inganda zanga uwo musaruro.
Kuri ubu hariho gahunda yo kubaka amahunikiro ariko mu gihe ataragezwa hose n bari kuvugana n’inganda ku buryo zizajya zijya gufata umusaruro w’ubuhinzi ugisarurwa mu murima.
Ati “Uragenda ugasanga abaturage bacu ibyo bejeje uko babisaruye niko babibitse.
Ikibazo gihari ni uko abahinzi bacu batabasha kugira umusaruro udafite inenge.Nka buriya dufite uruganda rukora ibiryo by’abana n’a babyeyi batitwe ariko ku musaruro tubona imbere mu gihugu usanga bafataho 20 % kuko 80 % iba itujuje ubuziranenge.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Turi gufasha abahinzi kubabonera aho bahunika imyaka yabo, aho bayumishiriza hujuje ubuziranenge ariko mu gihe ubwo buryo butaragera ku baturage no ku makoperative yose, turi kuvugana n’inganda kugira ngo turebe ukuntu inganda zo zajya zijyana utumashini mu mirima y’amakoperative n’iy’abaturage, bagasarura bakumvikana igiciro, bagaha inganda ku buryo zijya kwiyumishiriza.”
Munyeshyaka yavuze ko biramutse bikozwe gutyo, byakorohera inganda kuko zo ziba zizi uko zihunika neza umusaruro ntiwangirike.
Kuva mu mwaka wa 2010 kugeza 2017, Leta yari yiyemeje kuba yubatse ibigega bibasha guhunika toni 200 z’umusaruro w’ubuhinzi.
Mu minsi ishize ubwo yari muri Komisiyo y’Iterambere ry’Ubukungu n’Imari muri Sena, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi, ushinzwe ubuhinzi, Nsengiyumva Fulgence, yavuze ko babashije kubaka ibigega byabasha guhunika toni ibihumbi 195 ariko nabwo ngo ababihunitsemo ni mbarwa.
Nsengiyumva yavuze ko byetewe n’ibibazo byinshi byatumye umusaruro utaboneka uko bikwiye, ahanini bishingiye ku bahinzi bawugurishirizaga mu murima ibyo bita ‘kotsa’ n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere yagiye ituma barumbya.
Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda, Munyeshyaka Vincent

#15223#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Dore-uko-bategura-Inyama-zo-muri-soya-bakoresheje-ubuki
Dore uko bategura "Inyama zo muri soya" bakoresheje ubuki.
Mu buzima bwa buri munsi, dukenera ibyo kurya birimo intungamubiri z'ubwoko butandukanye zirimo ibyubaka umubiri, ibitera imbaraga, ibirinda indwara n'ibindi.
Ibi byose rero bikunze kuboneka mu bimera ndetse n'ibikomoka ku nyamaswa hakiyongeraho n'izindi ntunga mubiri ziva nko mu mirasire y'izuba n'ahandi.
Abahanga mu bijyanye n'ubuzima berekanye uburyo abantu batarya inyama zituruka ku nyamaswa bashobora gutegura indyo iteye nk'inyama ndetse yuzuye intungamubiri nyinshi hifashishijwe soya n'ubuki.
Iyi nyama ya soya ikozwe hifashishijwe ibi ngo iba yoroshye ku buryo bayigereranya n'iy'ifi cyangwa iy'ingurube bitewe n'uko iba imeze.
Dore ibisabwa ngo ukore iki kiribwa: Amata ya soya Ifu y'amafi cyangwa ibindi bintu bigurwa mu masoko bivangwamo bita teriyaki cyangwa ging (Ibi bishobora no gukoreshwa nk'umusemburo.)
Ibiyiko bibiri by'ubuki amavuta n'ibindi birungo.
Aya mata ya soya ategurwa hakoreshejwe soya isanzwe batumbika hanyuma bakayisekura ibishishwa bikavaho, nyuma bakongera bakayisekura ikanoga bakayikamura amazi yayo aba ari makeya akaba ari yo akoreshwa.
Uko bitegurwa: Fata itasi y'amata ya soya + itasi ya ging cyangwa teriyaki + ibiyiko 2 by'ubuki bw'inzuki, vanga cyane bibe ikintu kimwe hanyuma ubishyire mu cyuma gikonjesha mu gihe kingana n'isaha imwe cyangwa amasaha 2.
Nyuma yaho, ya mvange iba yabaye ikintu gikomeye hanyuma ugakatakatamo uduce duto duto kuko iyo ukasemo binini ntibishyamo imbere.
Camutsa amavuta ushyiremo n'ibindi birungo hanyuma ushyiremo twa duce wakatakase ujye uhindura nyuma y'iminota 5.
Iyi ndyo itegurwa iminota 5 igatekwa iminota 10.
NSENGIMANA Jean

#15234#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/GICUMBI-Bamwe-bakora-urugendo-rw-ibirometero-8-ku-munsi-bagana-ku-ishuri-Meya-ati-ni-yo-miterere-y-Akarere
GICUMBI: Bagenda ibirometero 8 bagana ku ishuri, Ushinzwe uburezi ati: ’ni yo miterere y’Akarere’ Bamwe mu banyeshuri biga muri G.S.Kageyo baturuka mu Centre ya Rwasama bagorwa cyane n’urugendo rwa buri munsi bakora bajya ku ishuri kuko bo bavuga ko bakoresha amasaha abiri ku munsi bajya ku ishuri n’andi abiri basubirayo.
Intera iri hagati ya Rwasama n’ishuri bigaho ugereranyije iri hagati y’ibilometero 4 na 5 abiga mu wa gatandatu w’amashuri abanza bakaba bahangenda inshuro inshuro enye ku munsi.
Ubwo ni ibilometero birenga 16 bagenda.
Aba banyeshuri biga bataha abagaragaje imbogamizi ku myigire yabo ni abanyeshuri biga mu mwaka wa 6 w’amashuri abanza kuko biga guhera saa moya za mu gitondo kugeza saa kumi n’imwe z’ikigoroba.
Nk’uko babyivugira ntabwo bagorwa n’amasaha bamara mu ishuri ahubwo ngo ikibabangamira cyane ni igihe cya saa sita kuko bajya kurya mu ngo zabo bakagaruka saa sita na 45 ( 12h:45) Mukanshimiyimana Sophie ni umwe mu banyeshuri biga kuri iki kigo akaba ataha muri Rwasama, mu mbogamizi ahura nazo yatangarije Makuruki.rw harimo amasaha menshi amara mu nzira.
Yagize ati: “Kuva mu rugo kugera ku ishuri nkoresha isaha n’igice, hari igihe imvura igwa tukiri mu rugo tugasiba cyangwa ikadusanga mu nzira tukanyagirwa, amakayi agashwanyuka.”
Iki kibazo abanyeshuri bataha muri Rwasama bagihuriyeho bose kuko imiterere yaho n’uwagira amikoro yo gutega imodoka cyangwa moto ntiyayibona kuko ni mu musozi uhanamye kandi nta n’umuhanda ugera ku ishuri.
Ababyeyi babo nabo bahangayikishijwe n’imyigire y’abana babo kuko ngo muri ibi bihe by’imvura abenshi Babura uko bagenda bakirirwa mu rugo.
Mutuyeyezu Drocelle ni umubyeyi utuye muri Rwasama; ni umwe mu barerera muri G.S.Kageyo mu ngorane abana babo bahura na zo ngo urugendo rwa buri munsi rubatera umunaniro udashira.
Ati: “Buri munsi babyuka saa kumi n’imwe bakagaruka bwije, ntibaryama bahorana umunaniro, nta n’ujya ashobora gusubiramo amasomo.
Ni nayo mpamvu badatsinda neza.”
Kimwe n’abandi babyeyi bafite abana biga muri iri shuri, bose bahuriza ku kuba urugendo abana babo bakora rutuma badatanga umusaruro bakabaye batanga ariko bakanavuga ko muri ibi bihe by’imvura abana benshi basiba cyangwa bagakererwa.
Ushinzwe uburezi mu karere ka Gicumbi, Nsengimana jean Damascene avuga ko imiterere y’Akarere ari yo ntandaro y’abana bakora ibirometero byinshi bajya ku mashuri.
Ubwo Makuruki.rw yamubazaga niba kwiga kure kw’abanyeshuri kutaba gufitanye isano n’amashuri make yaba ari mu karere yavuze ko akarere gafite nk’amashuri ahagije kandi ko buri Murenge ufite nibura amashuri 2.
Yagize ati: “Muri rusange mu Karere ka Gicumbi hari amashuri 124, ni amashuri ahagije ariko akarere ka Gicumbi kagizwe n’imisozi myinshi kandi miremire niyo mpamvu hababera kure.”
Akarere ka Gicumbi gafite ayabanza 43, uburezi bw’ibanze bw’imyaka 9 (9Years basic education) ni amashuri 24 naho imyaka 12 (12years basic education) ni amashuri 25 hakabamo amashuri y’igenga abanza 4 n’amashuri yisumbuye yigrnga 3.

#15318#	8	technology	http://www.makuruki.rw/IKORANABUHANGA/article6858.html
Abanyarwanda benshi ntibazi niba Leta igenzura ibyo bakorera kuri telefoni no kuri interineti Abanyarwanda beshi ntibaramenya niba Leta igenzura ibyo bavugira kuri telefoni cyangwa ubutumwa bohererezanya haba kuri telefoni no kuri interineti.
Ibi ni ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo kigenzura imikorere y’ikoranabuhanga muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ndetse na Afurika y’amajyepfo (CIPESA), ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara kuri uyu wa kabiri.
Iki kigo mu bushakashatsi bwacyo, kivuga ko mu banyarwanda babajijwe, nibura 23% ari bo bavuze ko Leta yaba igenzura ibyo bavugira cyangwa bakorera kuri telefoni na interineti, bitandukanye n’ibindi bihugu byo mu karere, kuko nka Kenya 91 % by’ababajijwe, bagaragaje ko Leta ibagenzura, mu Burundi 60 % barabyemeje, Tanzania 80 % barabyemeza, naho muri Uganda byemezwa na 76 %.
Icyakora nubwo abemeje ko Leta y’u Rwanda yaba igenzura ibivugirwa kuri Telefoni n’ibikorerwa kuri Interineti ari bake, CIPESA yo ivuga ko igenzura ririho.
Aha batanze urugero rw’umuhanzi Kizito Mihigo, n’umunyamakuru Cassien Ntamuhanga, bakatiwe n’inkiko muri Werurwe uyu mwaka, bazira kubiba urwango n’ubugambanyi.
Byinshi mu bimenyetso byashingiweho, ni ibiganiro aba bombi bagiye bagirira kuri Watsapp cyangwa Skype, baganira n’abanzi b’igihugu baba hanze.
Ikindi kandi iki kigo gishingiraho kivuga ko Leta igenzura ibivugirwa ku matelefoni, ni Ishami rishinzwe kurwanya ibyaha byifashishije ikoranabuhanga ryashyizweho muri Polisi y’u Rwanda, rigamije guha ubumenyi abapolisi ku buryo bwo gutahura ibyaha bikorerwa kuri interineti.
Iki kigo kandi cyavuze ko henshi mu bihugu bya Afurika y’iburasirazuba, bigenzura ibivugirwa kuri telefoni na interineti, ngo mu rwego rwo kurwanya iterabwoba no kurinda umutekano w’igihugu.
Hatanzwe urugero rwa Uganda,aho muri Nyakanga 2015 bagiye kugura software muri Israel no mu Butaliyani, ifite ubushobozi buhagije bwo kumviriza ibikorerwa ku matelefoni no kuri interineti.
Icyakora iki kigo kivuga ko impamvu zituma Leta z’ibihugu zigenzura ibikorerwa kuri interineti no kuri telefoni, ngo hari ibyaha byinshi bisigaye bikorerwa kuri interineti birimo ubujura n’ iterabwoba.
Kubera ko Leta zigenzura ibivugirwa ku matelefoni,CIPESA ivuga ko hari abaturage barekeye aho kongera kuganirira kuri interineti no ku matelefoni.
Aha bigaragara cyane mu Burundi cyane cyane nyuma y’imvururu zakurikiye kongera kwiyamamaza kwa Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza.
Ubushakashatsi kandi bwerekanye ko u Rwanda ruza mu bihugu biri kwihuta mu kugeza interineti ku bantu benshi, aho biri ku kigero cya 31 % by’abaturage bose, bingana n’abaturage miliyoni 3.5.
Ku mwanya wa mbere hari Kenya, aho 61 % by’abaturage bagera kuri interineti, hakaza Uganda ifite 20%, ndetse na Tanzania ifite 22%.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abaturage 74 % bafite telefoni ngendanwa, mu gihe igihugu gifite umubare muto w’abaturage bafite telefoni muri EAC ari u Burundi, ifite 31% by’abaturage.

#15339#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Dr-Habumuremyi-ntiyanyuzwe-n-inyubako-agiye-gukoreramo-avuga-ko-kwinjiramo-ari-ugusesera
Dr Habumuremyi ntiyanyuzwe n'inyubako agiye gukoreramo, avuga ko kwinjiramo ari ugusesera Uwahoze ari Minisitiri w'Intebe Dr Pierre Damien Habumuremyi ubu ugiye kuyobora Urwego rw'Igihugu rushinzwe impeta n'imidali no gutoranya Intwari z'igihugu (CHENO) yagaragaje bimwe mu bibazo by'ingutu yinjiye asanga muri iki kigo agiye kuyobora, aho ku isonga haza ikibazo cy'inyubako ndetse n'ingengo y'Imari idahagije ugereranyije n'inshingano urwego rwahawe Mu muhango w'ihererekanyabusha n'uwo asimbuye kuri uyu mwanya Dr Iyamuremye Augustin, Uwahoze ari Minisitiri w'Intebe avuga ko akimara kubona uyu mwanya yasuzumye ibikorwa by'abamubanjirije ndetse avuga ko yasanze barakoze akazi keza.
Dr.
Habumuremyi yavuze ko hari utubazo dukomereye uru urwego ati "Urwego nkuru, rufite inshingano ikomeye kutagira aho gukorera ntabwo byumvikana, uko nahabonye n'uko nahabwiwe nta nubwo umuntu ashobora kubona uko ahinjira, ntabwo bishoboka kereka nko gusesera ngo umuntu abe yahagera[…]ibi ntabwo bikwiriye urwego nkuru nta nubwo bikwiriye urwego rwa Leta" Ikindi kibazo Dr Habumuremyi yagaragaje ni ingengo y'Imari aho avuga ko uru rwego amafaranga rufite ari ayo guhemba abakozi gusa kandi hari ibindi bikorwa bikeneye amafaranga ngo abakozi babashe kurangiza inshingano.
Ati"Ntabwo twirengagije ko amikora y'igihugu ari makeya ariko amikoro y'igihugu arasaranganywa" Yavuze ko mubyo bifuza gushyiramo imbaraga ari ugutoza umuco w'ubutwari urubyiruko, gukunda igihugu no kukirengera ndetse no gukomeza kubaka ubushobozi bw'urwego, ubw'abakozi kugira ngo uburemere buhure n'inshingano urwego rwabawe.
Dr Iyamuremye Augustin wayoboraga uru rwego avuga ko uru rwego rwatangiriye muri Stade Amahoro mu cyumba kimwe cyakoreragamo abakozi babiri nyuma rukimukira mu nzu iherereye Rwandex.
Dr.
Iyamuremyi kuri we usanga hari intambwe ahubwo yatewe agira ati ".. muri stade haari ahantu hava, imiryango idakinguka ubu ababishinzwe batuboneye ahandi ni hatoya no kuhinjira biragoye ariko rero ntibibuza abantu gukora[..]
Uko urwego rugenda rukura niko ruba rukeneye ahantu heza hatari imfungane ariko ntabwo byatubujije gukora.
Minisitiri wa Siporo n'Umuco Uwacu Julienne avuga ko ibijyanye n'ingengo y'Imari ndetse n'aho urwego rukorera bizakorerwa ubuvugizi ariko abakozi barwo badakwiye gucika intege.
Minisitiri Uwacu yagize ati "Ibijyanye n'ingengo y'Imari,i bijyanye n'abakozi ndetse n'aho urwego rukorera …mu kinyarwanda baravuga ngo nta mwana uvuka ngo yuzure ingobyi[..]nkaba koko nanjye uko nahabonye nibyo abantu bagerageza bakareba uko akazi kadahagarara bakareba uko byazakosoka twifashishije ubushobozi buhari" Nubwo ariko Dr Pierre Damien Habumuremyi avuga ko kwinjira mu nyubako bidashoboka ari ugusesera avuga ko ibyiza byakozwe n'uru rwego bazabigenderaho ndetse bakagera ku ntego z'urwego ziteganywa n'itegeko.
Inyubako ikoreramo n'Urwego rwa CHENO Urwego rw'Igihugu rushinzwe impeta n'imidali no gutoranya Intwari (CHENO) rukorera mu nyubako iri ku Gisimenti mu nyubako imwe n'Ishami rya Banki ya Kigali - Remera 1 na Access Bank Dr Iyamuremye Augustin ucyuye igihe ku buyobozi bwa CHENO Dr.
Habumuremyi PD n'uwo asimbuye Dr.
Iyamuremye Augustin, ubwo bari basohotse mu ihererekanya bubasha Ifoto y'Urwibutso BIRORI Eric MAKURUKI.COM

#15359#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/abanyarwandakazi-batatu-muri-batanu-ba-nyuma-bahatanira-miss-geek-africa-2018
Abanyarwandakazi batatu muri batanu bahatanira Miss Geek Africa 2018 Abanyarwanda batuta baje mu bakobwa batanu muri Afurika bafite imishinga y’ikoranabuhanga itanga icyizere cyo kugirira akamaro abantu benshi, mu irushanwa ngarukamwaka rya Ms Geek Africa.
Aba bakobwa uko ari batanu, kuri uyu wa Gatatu banyuze imbere y’abakemurampaka bagaragaza imishinga yabo, bayisobanura byimbitse harebwa ushobora kwegukana ibihembo.
Buri mukobwa yahabwaga iminota itanu yo gusobanura umushinga we, nyuma akagenda abazwa ibibazo bitandukanye bisobanura neza umushinga we, imbogamizi ushobora guhura nazo n’uburyo azazirenga, uburyo uzabona inyungu cyangwa ushobora kwagurirwa mu bindi bihugu.
Sylvie Mahoro- Rwanda Mahoro Sylvie Mahoro yahereye ku rugero rw’abakobwa babiri Victoria wo muri Afurika y’Epfo ukora ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro na Bibiane w’Umunyarwandakazi utunganya ibintu bitandukanye, bahuriye mu nama yiga ku guhanga udushya bombi ari ba rwiyemezamirimo.
Mu gihe mu nama hakoreshwaga ubusemuzi rusange, mu gihe cyo kumenyana ubwo Bibiane wivugira Igiswahili n’Ikinyarwanda yari akeneye kuganira na Victoria wivugira indimi z’iwabo n’Icyongereza, kumvikana byarananiranye.
Mahoro ati “Igitekerezo gikomeye cyo gukora ubucuruzi cyahise cyangirika kubera kutamenya ururimi.
Mu ndimi 2138 zivugwa muri Afurika hari ba Victoria na Bibiane benshi batashobora kuganira n’abandi mu nama amagana ziba muri Afurika buri mwaka,” Yakomeje agira ati “Niba ushaka kwihutisha isoko rusange rya Afurika rijyanye n’ibihe by’itumanaho, dukeneye kubasha kuvugana.
Turifuza gushyira uburyo guhuza abantu bavuga indimi zitandukanye binyuze muri application ya android itanga uburyo bw’ubusemuzi bw’indimi z’igihugu n’indimi mpuzamahanga.”
Iyo application ngo izajya iherekezwa n’akuma washyira mu matwi gakoresha bluetooth, ku buryo abantu bajya bagerwaho n’ubusemuzi bw’ururimi bifuza.
Salissou Hassane Yari Latifa –Niger Salissou Hassane Yari Latifa Uyu mukobwa avuga ko Niger yihariye 37% by’impanuka zo mu muhanda mu karere ka CEDEAO, ndetse abatabazi ngo hari ubwo batabasha kumenya neza aho impanuka yabereye cyangwa ugasanga bifashe umwanya kugira ngo bagere ku wagize impanuka.
Aho ngo hiyongeraho ikibaza cy’abantu ba mbere bageze ku muntu wakoze impanuka ariko ugasanga n’uko bamufasha.
Latifa yakomeje agira ati “Niyo mpamvu nakoze application nise SARO ishobora kujya muri telefoni na mudasobwa, ishobora gufata ishusho cyangwa video ukohereza ku batabazi, bagahita babona aho impanuka yabereye, bakaba banagira ubutabazi bw’ibanze batanga bifashishije abari aho yabereye na mbere y’uko bahagera.”
Alida Nyayiha Umurungi – Rwanda Alida Nyayiha Umurungi Uyu mukobwa yagaragaje uburyo bwakemura imbogamizi zigaragara mu bucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka, aho usanga umuntu ukeneye kurangura ibicuruzwa mu gihugu kimwe ngo agurishe mu kindi, usanga atazi aho yakura ibicuruzwa ku giciro gito.
Yagize ati “Abenshi muri aba bacuruzi nta n’ubwo bafite uburyo bwo kwikorera ibicuruzwa byabo ngo babyikorere babivane mu gihugu cyabo babigeze mu kindi gihugu cya Afurika.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Niho twifuje gukora uburyo buzajya bufasha Abanyafurika mu ikoranabuhanga guhura n’abaranguza.
Ni ikoranabuhanga ryajya rifasha abo baranguza kugurisha ibintu byabo, tukanagirana amasezerano n’ibigo bikora ubwikorezi muri Afurika kugira ngo batware bya bicuruzwa ku muntu uranguza bikagera mu gihugu icyo aricyo cyose.”
Ndèye Fatou Mboup – Senegal Ndèye Fatou Mboup Uyu mukobwa yavuze ko Isi itunganya toni nyinshi z’imbuto, imboga n’ibinyabijumba ariko ugasanga Afurika yo yihariye igice kinini cy’ibyo biribwa inihariye ikibazo cyo kwihaza mu biribwa n’imirire mibi.
Ibyo ngo bigaterwa n’uko igice kinini cy’uwo musaruro cyangirika bitewe n’uko nta buryo bwo kuwubika neza buhari.
Mu gushaka igisubizo, yatekereje Ikigega cyo guhunikamo gikoresha ikoranabuhanga, The Smart Granary.
Yakomeje agira ati “Harimo igipimo gituma ubuhehere bw’ikigega budahinduka, harimo uburyo ubushyuhe bwagenwe iyo buzamutse hazamuka ubuhehere kugira ngo niba ari imbuto zitangirika, zikomeze gutoha.”
Yanashyizeho uburyo bumufasha gukurikirana umusaruro uri muri cya kigega, ku buryo hagize ikibazo kibamo imbere cyangwa habayeho gushya, ikoranabuhanga rihita rirekura amazi akazimya wa muriro.
Ubu buryo kandi bukoresha imbaraga z’imirasire y’izuba kugira ngo byorohereze abantu badafite amashanyarazi.
Christelle Mazimpaka – Rwanda Christelle Mazimpaka asobanura umushinga we Uyu mukobwa yagaragaje uburyo yifuza kwifashisha mu guhuza abashoramari n’imishinga mito, usanga itabasha kurenga umutaru kubera ahanini kubura igishoro.

Uburyo butandukanye bwo gusomana, akamaro kabyo n’ ibisobanuro byabwo Abantu bamwe bafata gusomana nk’ uburyo bwo kwishimisha gusa sicyo gusa bisobanuye.
Mu muco nyarwanda gusomana ni umuco utari umenyerewe ariko uri kugenda ufata indi ntera cyane mu basirimu.
Abenshi barabikunda cyane cyane urubyiruko, ariko bamwe babikora kubera ko bagomba kubikora akenshi batazi icyo bisobanuye.

Gusomana ku munwa: Igikorwa cyo gusomana iyo gikozwe neza gishobora gutwika karoli (Calories) nyinshi zashoboraga kuba zatwikwa n’igikorwa (.)
Gusomana abantu benshi barabikunda cyane cyane urubyiruko, ariko bamwe babikora kubera ko bagomba kubikora akenshi batazi icyo bisobanuye.
Abamaze gusobanukirwa ntibapfa kwemera gusomwa uko bishakiye.
Amakuru atangazwa n’urubuga rwa Buzzle.com, avuga ko gusomana byagiye bigira ubusobanuro uko ibihe byagiye bisimburana, bitewe n’umuco w’igihugu runaka.
Gusomana ku munwa: Igikorwa cyo gusomana iyo gikozwe neza gishobora gutwika karoli (Calories) nyinshi zashoboraga kuba zatwikwa n’igikorwa cy’imyitozo ngororamubiri ihagije.
Ubushakashatasi bwakozwe bwerekana ko iyo abantu bari mu gikorwa cyo gusomana, buri munota batakaza nibura kalori zigera kuri 2 na 3, zikaba zingana n’izo umuntu ashobora gutakaza yirutse metero 500.
Iyo abantu basomana ngo hari imisemburo (Hormones) za “Ocytocynes » yinjira mu wo murimo gukorana icyo gikorwa, bikongera ubwizerane no kwiyumvanamo.
Ibi ngo ku gihe cya cyera byari byemerewe gukorwa n’abashakanye gusa.
Ku itama: Ni indamukanyo igaragaza ubwuzu, ubucuti ndetse no kwisanzura ku wo usomye.
Uru rubuga ruvuga ko gusomana ku itama mu bihugu by’i Burayi binagaragaza icyubahiro umuntu afitiye undi, hamwe no kwereka umuntu mumaze kumenyana ko umwishimiye.
Ku ijosi: Gusoma umuntu ni ikimenyetso cy’uko umwifuza.
Ku kiganza: Bigaragaza icyubahiro uhaye uwo muntu, ashobora kuba ari umuntu ukuruta cyangwa umukunzi wawe ushaka kumugaragariza ko umwubashye.
Ariko uko iminsi igenda isimburana ngo bikaba bigenda bikendera, kuko byakorwaga cyane ku ngoma z’Abami bo mu bihugu by’uburengerazuba bw’Isi.
Gusomana ku rurimi: Ibi ngo ni ikimenyetso gikomeye cy’ubwizerane hagati y’abantu babiri.
Kubera ingaruka zishobora guterwa n’uku gusomana zirimo no kwandura indwara zitandukanye, ubu buryo ngo na bwo bugenda bucika.
Si abantu bose bapfa kwemera ko umuntu abasoma, rimwe na rimwe kubera imyizerere cyangwa se kubera ko bazi icyo bisobanura, kandi bakaba batiyumvamo umuntu ushaka kubibakorera.

Mu mwiherero w’abitegura shampiyona ya Afurika intego ni ukwegukana imidali Iminsi irabarirwa ku ntoki kugira ngo Abanyarwanda bongere kubona ibihangange mu kunyonga igare muri Afurika biteraniye i Kigali nyuma y’imyaka umunani, abazaserukira igihugu bakomeje imyiteguro ikomeye amaso bayahanze kwegukana imidali myinshi ariko bakanenga uburyo bategurwa.
Ni inshuro ya kabiri u Rwanda rugiye kwakira rimwe mu masiganwa akomeye cyane rya shampiyona y’Afurika nyuma ya 2010 ubwo imidali myinshi yatahaga muri Eritrea na Afurika y’Epfo, u Rwanda rugatahira gutegura neza.
Si inzozi ko nyuma y’imyaka umunani ibi bitazongera kwisubiramo kuko kuri ubu abasore bo mu rwa Gasabo bahagaze neza ndetse bagiye bakubita ahababaza Eritrea isanzwe ari umwami w’igare kuri uyu mugabane aho bahuriye hose mu mezi ashize kandi ntibarashirwa.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu, IGIHE yabasuye aho bari mu mwiherero i Nyamata batangaza byinshi biteze muri iri rushanwa, ibyo basezeranya Abanyarwanda ndetse n’amakipe amwe biteze ko azabaha akazi gakomeye.
Areruya Joseph nk’izina ryigaruriye imitima ya benshi akora amateka agahesha u Rwanda isiganwa rya mbere muri Afurika rya La Tropical Amissa Bongo 2018, akegukana Tour de l’Espoir byatanze itike ku gihugu yo kuzakina Tour de France U 23, byiyongera kuri Tour du Rwanda 2017 nayo yatwaye, afite intego zo kuguma kuzamura ibendera ariko ntibyoroshye.

Sinirebaho nka Areruya ahubwo tuzakorera hamwe ku nyungu zo gushakira igihugu ishema.”

Gusa tugerageza kubaganiriza, kuko bagomba kumenya uko babyitwaramo, bashobora gutsinda cyangwa bagatsindwa.”

Niyonshuti na we yemeza ko byamushimishije kugaruka gukinira igihugu kandi yizeye ko imidali myinshi izasigara mu rugo ariko akagira n’ibyo anenga mu buryo abakinnyi bategurwa igihe gito nyamara abo baba bazahangana bo bahora hamwe.

Mama Catheline washinze umuryango w’Ababikira wita ku mfubyi n’abafite ubumuga yitabye Imana Mama Catheline Nduwamariya, Umubikira w’Umusomusiyo washinze umuryango ushingiye ku idini Gatolika witwa “ Inshuti z’abakene” , uzwi mu Rwanda ku bikorwa byo kwita ku mfubyi n’abafite ubumuga ahantu hatandukanye, yitabye Imana mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 2017.
Umuyobozi w’uyu muryango "Inshuti z’abakene", Nikuze Dative, yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mubikira washinze umuryango babamo mu 1986 yitabye Imana mu ma saa mbili n’igice.
Umuryango “Inshuti z’Abakene (I.A)” ufite ibikorwa birimo ikigo cy’abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe n’ubw’ingingo (Centre Inshuti Zacu, Gahanga-Kicukiro); Ikigo cy’abana babana n’ubwandu bw’agakoko gatera SIDA (Centre Iramiro, Busanza-Kicukiro); Ikigo cy’abana bafite ibibazo binyuranye (Centre Humura, Rutongo - Rulindo); Ivuriro (Dispensaire, Janjagiro - Rwamagana).
Umuyobozi w’ "Inshuti z’abakene" avuga ko muri ibyo bigo byose harimo kwitabwaho abantu byibuze 150.
Nk’uko izina ry’uyu muryango ribivuga, Nikuze avuga ko bazahora bibukira kuri Catheline ubwitange bwo gufasha abatishoboye no kubegera.
Yagize ati “Yari intwari, yaduhaye urugero rwiza kandi twifuza kurukurikiza.
Yakundaga abakene cyane, agakunda gusenga.”
Mama Catheline Nduwamariya mwene Gashakamba Mathias na Nyiranteko Adela, yavutse mu 1944, mu Murenge wa Mwendo, Akarere ka Ruhango; mu nzego z’idini Gatolika ni muri Santarali ya Mwendo, Paruwasi ya Muyunzwe, Diyosezi ya Kabgayi.
Nyuma n’abandi babyeyi bafite abana bavukanye ubumuga bwo mu mutwe bagiye bayoboka iki kigo kuri ubu bakaba bafite abana bagera kuri 30 bafite ubumuga butandukanye.
Mama Catheline Nduwamariya yitabye Imana afite imyaka 73 y'amavuko Ababikira b'Inshuti z’abakene

#15442#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Kigali-Abapolisi-basabwe-kurushaho-kunoza-imikorere-bagendera-ku-ndangagaciro-zayo
Kigali: Abapolisi basabwe kurushaho kunoza imikorere bagendera ku ndangagaciro zayo Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Polisi y'u Rwanda, Emmanuel K.
Gasana, yabwiye abapolisi bagize ishami rya Polisi y'u Rwanda rishinzwe kubungabunga umutekano wo mu muhanda (Traffic and Road Safety Department) gukomeza gukora akazi kinyamwuga kugira ngo bakomeze gusigasira umutekano wo mu muhanda.
Ubu butumwa IGP Gasana yabutanze ku itariki 5 Nyakanga 2015 mu nama yagiranye n'abapolisi bagize iri shami bakorera mu mugi wa Kigali.
Iyi nama yabereye ku cyicaro gikuru cya Polisi y'u Rwanda ku Kacyiru iri muri gahunda ye ngari ikomeje yo gusura abapolisi bakorera mu mashami n'imitwe bya Polisi y'u Rwanda haba mu mugi wa Kigali ndetse n'ahandi mu gihugu.
Iyi nama yitabiriwe n'Umuyobozi w'iri shami, Commissioner of Police (CP) George Rumanzi n'abandi ba ofisiye bakuru ba Polisi y'u Rwanda barimo abayiyoboye mu ntara (Regional Police Commanders-RPCs).
IGP Gasana yabanje gushimira abapolisi bagize iri shami ku bwitange n'umurava bibaranga mu kazi ndetse n'uko bafatanya na bagenzi babo bakorera mu yandi mashami mu kubungabunga no gusigasira umutekano w'abaturarwanda n'ibyabo.
Yagize ati:"Mukwiye gukora cyane ariko kandi mugakora kinyamwuga mutanga serivisi nziza aho muba muri mu kazi hose ".
Yababwiye kuba intangarugero, inyangamugayo , no kurangwa n'imico n'imyitwarire byiza, bazirikana kandi bajyanisha ibyo bakora n'indangagaciro, intego, n'ingamba bya Polisi.
IGP Gasana yabwiye kandi abapolisi bagize iri shami ati:"Mukwiye kumenya inshingano zanyu, mukwiye kumenya ibyo mukwiye gukora n'uko mwabikora neza, mugomba kumenya kandi ibyo mubujijwe gukora".
Yabagiriye inama yo kwiga no kwihugura buri gihe, aha akaba yaragize ati:" Imikorere myiza igomba kujyana naho iterambere rigeze.
Ni ngombwa rero kwihugura buri gihe kugira ngo udasigara inyuma, ibyo bituma ukora umurimo unoze , bityo ugaha serivisi nziza abaza kuyigusaba".
Yongeyeho agira ati:"Mukomeze murangwe n'imokorere ya kinyamwuga,ibyo bizatuma mukomeza guhesha ishema Polisi y'u Rwanda ndetse n'igihugu muri rusange".
IGP Gasana yasobanuriye abapolisi bagize iri shami ko "Umutekano ari ishingiro ry'iterambere rirambye" bityo ababwira gukomeza kurangwa n'imyitwarire myiza n'ubunyamwuga ku kazi kugira ngo bakomeze kuwubumbatira no kuwusigasira.
Yabibukije ko imikorere yabo idashimwa gusa n'inzego zibakuriye mu Rwanda ahubwo ko inashimwa n'ibindi bihugu, aha akaba yaratanze urugero rw'aho muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, itsinda ry'abapolisi bo mu gihugu cya Uganda ryaje mu Rwanda kwigira ku mikorere y'ishami rya Polisi y'u Rwanda rishinzwe kubungabunga umutekano wo mu muhanda cyane cyane uburyo rifatanya n'izindi nzego mu gutunganya imikorere y'abakora umwuga wo gutwara abagenzi kuri moto,abo bakunze kwita "Abamotari ".
Yabwiye abayobozi ba Polisi y'u Rwanda mu ntara bari bitabiriye iyi nama kuzageza ubu butumwa n'impanuro ku bapolisi babarizwa muri iri shami bakorera mu ntara bayobora.

Iyi nkunga izanyuzwa muri Banki y'Abadage y'iterambere (KfW) izafasha u Rwanda gutanga umusanzu warwo mu kubaka uyu mushinga.
Ubusanzwe umushinga wa Rusizi II uzashyirwa mu bikorwa hakoreshejwe amadolari y'Amerika miliyoni 650 zizatangwa n'ibyo bihugu uko ari bitatu.
Uyu mushinga wa Rusizi III uzaterwa inkunga n'abandi bafatanyabikorwa nka Banki Nyafurika y'Iterambere, Banki y'Isi n'Umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'u Burayi.
Minisitiri w'Imari n'Igenamigambi, Amb.

Muri Werurwe u Rwanda rwasinye inguzanyo ya miliyoni 25 z'amadorali ya Amerika na Banki Nyafurika itsura amajyambere (BAD) azakoreshwa muri uyu mushinga.
Ambasaderi w'u Budage mu Rwanda, Peter Fahrenholtz yavuze ko bishimiye gutanga umusanzu wabo mu kongera ingufu mu Rwanda, kuko bizatuma abaturage batera imbere bakagira ubuzima bwiza.
Yagize ati "Aya masezerano arahamya ubufatanye bushingiye ku bucuti no kwizerana hagati y'ibihugu byombi.
U Budage bushishikajwe n'uko amashanyarazi ahendutse kandi ahagije agera kuri buri Munyarwanda ndetse no mu baturanyi babo mu Burundi na RDC."
U Budage bufasha u Rwanda mu mishinga y'uburezi cyane cyane iy' ubumenyingiro n'imyuga(TVET), kwegereza ubuyobozi abaturage, iterambere ry'abikorera, igatanga n'inkunga mu kigega cy'imicungire y'imari ya leta n'ibindi, byose itangamo miliyoni z'amayero 69.5.
Umushinga wa Rusizi III uzatanga MW 147, niwo wa mbere w'ingufu mu Karere k'ibiyaga bigari uzaba ushyizweho ku bufatanye bwa Leta n'abikorera.
Biteganyijwe ko uzatwara imyaka itanu, ishobora kugabanuka bitewe n'ibiganiro hagati y'ababishinzwe n'uko amafaranga azaboneka vuba.

Asaga miliyoni 360Frw yashowe mu gushyira amazi meza ku nsengero Umushinga Peace Plan wateye inkunga insengero uzishyiraho ibigega binini bifata amazi akanayungururwa hagamijwe gufasha abahagenda n’abahaturiye kubona ayo kunywa no kugira isuku.
Umushinga watashywe ku mugaragaro Uwo mushinga watwaye asaga miliyoni 360Frw, ukaba waragejejwe ku nsengero 360 zo hirya no hino mu gihugu, aho buri rusengero rwashyizweho ikigega cya litiro 5000, bizafasha n’abazituriye kuvoma hafi kandi amazi meza kuko ayunguruye bya gihanga.
Pasiteri Naomi Mukambabazi uyobora EPR Ruhango avuga ko agace baherereyemo gakunze kugira ikibazo cy’amazi bityo ko icyo kigega cyaje ari igisubizo.
Ati “Iwacu haba ikibazo cy’amazi ku buryo gukora isuku byatugoraga kuko byasabaga kuvoma mu kabande, ugahurirayo n’abantu benshi hakaba n’ubwo bamwe bazamukaga batavomye.
Ubu ikigega twahawe cyarabikemuye, ushatse amazi arayabona ndetse n’abaturage baraza bakavoma”.
“Ubu abantu banywa amazi meza, bikazagabanya indwara zituruka ku mwanda no kunywa amazi adasukuye.
Turashima cyane abatugejejeho uyu mushinga kuko wari ukenewe”.
Begerejwe amazi meza azabarinda kongera kuvoma ibishanga Sebutimbiri Théogène, umuturage wo mu Karere ka Nyaruguru na we avuga ko kubona ayo mazi ari umugisha bagize cyane ko ntayo bagiraga atunganye.
Ati “Ni umugisha twagize nk’abantu begereye urusengero, ubu ntabwo tukijya kuvoma mu bishanga kure bigatuma umuntu adatakaza mwanya wo gukora indi mirimo.
Ni igikorwa cyiza badukoreye, ubu no guteka amazi ntitukibikora kuko ayo baduhaye aba asukuye bityo ntidutakaze inkwi”.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Peace Plan, Mary Kamanzi, avuga ko icyifuzo ari uko buri Munyarwanda yagerwaho n’amazi meza.
Ati “Aya mazi ni ay’abaturage bose babashije kuyageraho, ntabwo ari ay’abakristu gusa afasha bose.
Turakangurira n’abandi Banyarwanda gufatanya tugamije kugeza amazi meza ku baturage tudategereje abaterankunga kuko natwe dushoboye”.
Avuga kandi ko bafite gahunda yo gukomeza kwagura icyo gikorwa ku buryo bazageza amazi meza ku baturage benshi hagamijwe ko bagira ubuzima bwiza.
Uhagarariye umuryango wateye inkunga icyo gikorwa, Lorry McBride ukomoka muri Amerika, avuga ko yageze mu Rwanda muri 2007 akabona ikibazo cy’amazi gihangayikishije ahitamo kugira icyo agikoraho.
Ati “Icyo gihe wabonaga abana benshi n’abagore bajya kuvoma kure bikabavuna bigatuma batabasha kugira ibindi bakora ndetse no kwiga bikagorana.
Ni yo mpamvu twahisemo gushaka uburyo twafatanya n’Abanyarwanda mu kongera amazi meza”.
Imibare iheruka gutangazwa na Minisiteri y’Ibikorwa Remezo yerekanye ko Abanyarwanda 84.8% ari bo bagerwaho n’amazi meza.

Abaturanyi b'aha uyu wishwe yarariraga bavuga ko batigeze bumva urusaku rw'umuntu utaka avuza induru.

Uyu munyamabanga akomeza avuga ko batashoboye kumenya abishe uyu mugabo kuko ubwo bamwicaga atigeze ataka ngo abe yatabarwa.
Musabyimana w'imyaka 44 y'amavuko yishwe akiri umusore kuko nta mugore n'umwana yari yarigeze agira.
Muri aka karere hakomeje kugenda hagaragara ubwicanyi bwa hato na hato ariko mu minsi ishize hafashwe abantu bagera kuri bane bari bamaze gutema abantu ariko ntibapfa.

#15631#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Abapolisi-mu-mahugurwa-yo-gukoresha-ibyuma-bipima-umuvuduko-w-ibinyabiziga
Abapolisi mu mahugurwa yo gukoresha ibyuma bipima umuvuduko w'ibinyabiziga.
Abapolisi 10 bo mu ishami rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda muri Polisi y'u Rwanda, bari mu mahugurwa y'iminsi 5 yo gukoresha ibyuma bigezweho bipima umuvuduko w'iinyabiziga (Advanced Speed Laiser) mu rwego rwo gukumira impanuka ziterwa n'umuvuduko mwinsi mu muhanda.
Aya mahugurwa ahabwa abapolisi bazahugura abandi bakorera muri iryo shami, akaba ari imwe mu ngamba ishami rya Polisi rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda ryafashe mu kugabanya no kurwanya impanuka zo mu muhanda, dore ko inyinshi muri zo ziterwa n'umuvuduko ukabije w'abashoferi nk'uko byagiye bikunda kugaragara.
Ibi byuma (Advanced Speed Laiser) bifite ubusobozi bwo gupima umuvuduko w'ibinyabiziga, bigafata amashusho y'umuvuduko w' imodoka, ndetse bikanafata nimero iranga ikinyabiziga.
Ibi bitandukanye cyane n'ibyari bisanzwe bikoreshwa kuko byo byerekanaga umuvuduko gusa.
Ibi byuma bikaba bizafasha mu gukemura amakimbirane no kutumvikana byabaga hagati y'umupolisi n'uwakoze amakosa, kandi ibyo ibi byuma bizajya bigaragaza bikaba bishobora gukoreshwa mu nkiko nk'ibimenyetso.
Umwe mu bapolisi bari muri aya mahugurwa Assistant Inspector of Police (AIP) Stanislas Nkurundungi, yavuze ko izi mashini zizabafasha gupima umuvuduko w'ibinyabiziga cyane cyane mu mihanda miremire, bikazarushaho kubahiriza umutekano wo mu muhanda, akaba yagize ati:"Ibyuma twakoreshaga mbere byapimaga umuvuduko gusa, bikaba byaratumaga umupolisi asobanura byinshi, cyane cyane iyo uwabaga afatiwe mu cyaha yahakanaga ko atagikoze."

#15656#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/cepgl-irakuraho-imbogamizi-ku-bucuruzi-bwambukiranya-imipaka-mu-rwanda-u
CEPGL irakuraho imbogamizi ku bucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka mu Rwanda, u Burundi na Kongo Umuryango w'ubukungu bw'ibihugu bigize ibiyaga bigari CEPGL watangiye gukuraho imbogamizi ku bagore bakora ubucuruzi bambukiranya imipaka, ibi bikaba biri gukorwa aba bagore bashyirwa mu mahuriro atuma bakorera hamwe.
Umuryango w'ubukungu mu bihugu bigize ibiyaga bigari CEPGL washyizeho ahagomba kubakwa isoko rihuriwe n'abacuruzi b'u Burundi na Congo ahegereye imipaka y'ibyo bihugu.
CEPGL isanzwe ari umuryango w'ibihugu bya Repubulika iharanira Demukarasi ya Kongo, u Burundi n'u Rwanda.
Ku itariki ya 06/11/2013 nibwo abagore basanzwe mu mashyirahamwe 14 mu gihugu cy'u Burundi n'abo mu mashyirahamwe icyenda yo mu gihugu cya Kongo mu mujyi wa Uvila bashyizeho amahuriro abiri azafasha abagore bambukiranya umupaka wa Gatumba na Kavimvira gukora ubucuruzi wabo.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wungirije ushinzwe ibikorwa muri CEPGL, Joseph Lititiyo Afata aganira n'abagore bakora ubucuruzi buciriritse bwambukiranya imipaka Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wungirije ushinzwe ibikorwa muri CEPGL, Joseph Lititiyo Afata, akaba avuga ko bari gushyira imbaraga mu guteza imbere abakora ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka mu kongera ubuhahirane bw'ibihugu.
Bamwe mu bagore bari muri aya mahuriro bavuga ko abagore aribo bakunze gukora ubucuruzi buciriritse bwambukiranya imipaka n'ubwo hari abatabuha agaciro kandi bwinjiza mafaranga menshi bukanabeshaho imiryango myinshi mu bihugu bituranye.
Ibi ngo bituma haba ubwo ababukora bahohoterwa cyangwa ntibabone inyungu y'ibyo bakora.
Cyakora ngo kuba babonye uzajya abavugira bashobora gutera imbere kandi n'ubucuruzi bwabo bugakora nkuko Nteziryayo Antoinette wo mu gihugu cy'u Burundi abitangaza, ahereye kuba urwandiko rw'inzira rwa CEPGL baguraga amadolari 75 rwaragabanyirijwe igiciro kugera ku madolari 15.
Nteziryayo avuga ko uretse kugabanya ikiguzi cy'urwandiko rw'inzira ngo barifuza ko ibihugu bigabanya n'imisoro yakwa kuri ubwo bucuruzi buciriritse.
Abagore bagize uruhare rwa 70% mu kwitabira ubucuruzi buciriritse bwambukiranya imipaka mu muryango wa CEPGL.
Abayobozi mu nzego zose basabwe kuzafasha abakora ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka Nzohabanayo Jeanne d'Arc watorewe kuyobora ihuriro ry'abagore bakorera Gatumba avuga ko ubucuruzi bwabo buciriritse ariko ngo bashobora gushyira hamwe ibicuruzwa abandi bakajya babisanga ku isoko bazubakirwa na CEPGL bikoherezwa mu mahanga.
Nzohabanayo avuga ko uretse inyungu abagore bazakuramo n'igihugu cyakongera amafaranga kinjiza mu gihugu ndetse bikaba byatanga akazi kubandi benshi, gusa avuga ko leta ikwiye kubaba hafi mu kubongerera ubumenyi hamwe no kuvugurura amategeko.
Nyuma yo kubaka isoko rihuza abacuruzi b'u Burundi na congo, hazakurikiraho andi masoko ahuza abacuruzi baciriritse hagati y'u Rwanda na Congo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, CEPGL ikaba itegerejweho kongerera ubumenyi abakora ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka hamwe no gukora ubuvuzi bwo kuyoroshya amategeko.
Sylidio Sebuharara

#15663#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/80-by-abagana-isange-one-stop-center-baba-basamye
80% by’abagana Isange One Stop Center baba basamye Urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha (RIB) butangaza ko abagana Isange One Stop Center basambanyijwe akenshi bahagera basamye kubera gutinda, bityo kubaha ubufasha bwihuse bw’ingoboka ntibikunde.
Jeanne D’Arc Mukandahiro ukuriye Isange One Stop Center RIB ivuga ko uwasambanyijwe ku ngufu yakagombye kwihutira kugera kuri Isange kugira ngo ahabwe ubufasha bwihuse bwamurinda gutwara inda cyangwa kwandura indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, bigakorwa mu gihe gito gishoboka bityo ibindi bijyanye n’amategeko bigakomeza nyuma.
Jeanne D’Arc Mukandahiro ukuriye Isange One Stop Center, avuga ko abasambanyijwe akenshi batinda kugera aho bahererwa ubufasha bigatuma ntacyo bubamarira.
Agira ati “Isange One Stop Center iba yiteguye kubafasha, ikibabaje ni uko abasambanyijwe batinda kuhagera wabapima ugasanga batwise.
Icyo gihe ya miti itangwa mu masaha 48 ibarinda gusama nta mumaro iba igifite, itangwa mu masaha 72 ibarinda kwandura virusi itera SIDA na yo ntacyo iba ikimaze”.
Ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ribangamiye uburenganzira bwa muntu Urubyiruko rwari rukurikiye ibiganiro ku ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ari na ho icyo kibazo cyavugiwe, rwagaragaje imbogamizi y’ubuke bwa Isange butuma hari abagorwa no kugera aho iri, aha ariko Jeanne d’Arc akaba ayabamaze impungenge ko zigiye kongerwa.
Ati “Koko hari abagorwa no kugera ahatangirwa ubufasha bwihuse ku basambanyijwe, ariko icyo kibazo kigiye gukemuka.
Umwaka utaha ibigo nderabuzima byose byo mu gihugu bizaba bifite icyumba cya Isange One Stop Center, uhageze nibura iby’ibanze nko kumurinda SIDA no gusama bikorwe, ibikeneye ubundi buhanga abone ajye ku bitaro”.
Yakomeje avuga ko harimo kwigwa uko n’imbangukiragutabara zashyirwa muri serivisi yo gufasha abahuye n’icyo kibazo, utabaje bakayimwoherereza agahabwa ubufasha ku gihe.
Sylvie Dufitimana wo muri Musanze wari witabiriye ibiganiro ku ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, yemeza ko kuzana Isange ku bigo nderabuzima bifite akamaro kanini.
Urubyiruko rwahawe umwanya wo gutanga ibitekerezo Ati “Hari abana bajyaga bahohoterwa ugasanga nta makuru bafite, ibitaro biri kure nta n’amafaranga yo gutega ngo bajyeyo bigatuma babireka.
Isange nishyirwa ku bigo nderabuzima bizaba byoroshye, umwana wahuye n’icyo kibazo azajya yinyabya abe arahageze afashwe”.
Ibyo biganiro byabaye kuri uyu wa 13 Ukuboza 2018, ubwo mu Rwanda hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga w’uburenganzira bwa muntu, byibanze ku kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, cyane cyane abangavu baterwa inda, bikaba byarateguwe n’ihuriro ry’urubyiruko ruharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu (AJPRODHO-Jijukirwa).
Minisiteri y’uburinganire n’iterambere (MIGEPROF), itangaza ko abana basaga ibihumbi 17 bari hagati y’imyaka 16 na 19 batewe inda muri 2016.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’Impuzamiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu (CLADHO) mu turere 10 muri 2016, bwerekanye ko abana baterwa inda bahura n’ingaruka nyinshi, aho bwasanze 54% bareka ishuri, 19% bibasirwa n’ubukene, 11% bafite agahinda gakabije, 9% bakorerwa ibikorwa bibabaje, 5% bahabwa akato na ho 2% bafite ihungabana.

#15664#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/internet/article/hagaragajwe-uburyo-bwo-kurinda-mudasobwa-zo-mu-rwanda-igitero-cy-ikoranabuhanga
Hagaragajwe uburyo bwo kurinda mudasobwa zo mu Rwanda igitero cy’ikoranabuhanga cyibasiye ibihugu Nyuma y’aho mu cyumweru gishize igitero cy’ikoranabuhanga cyibasiye ibihugu bigera ku 150, Ikigo cy’igihugu cy’Ikoranabuhanga (RISA) cyasohoye imirongo ngendarwaho ikwiye gukurikizwa na buri wese utunze mudasobwa mu Rwanda mu rwego rwo kwirinda.
Kuwa Gatanu w’icyumweru gishize nibwo byatangajwe ko mudasobwa zigera ku bihumbi 200, zibasiwe na virus yitwa WannaCry ifunga ibintu byose biri muri mudasobwa, kugira ngo ubifungure ugasabwa kwishyura amadolari 300.
Kugeza ubu ibihumbi 50 $ nibyo bimaze kwishyurwa.
Mu itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara kuri uyu wa Mbere, ubuyobozi bwa RISA bwavuze ko abantu bakwiye kwitondera iki gitero kigaragaza mu mazina atandukanye nka WannaCrypt, WannaCry, WannaCryptor cyangwa Wcrya.
Mudasobwa zikomeje kwibasirwa ni zikoresha porogaramu ya OS (Operating System) itangwa n’Uruganda rwa Microsoft.
Nubwo iki gitero cyibasiye ibihugu bikomeye ku Isi nk’u Bwongereza n’u Burusiya kitaragera mu Rwanda, RISA yasabye abatunze mudasobwa by’umwihariko izikoresha OS ya Microsoft kurushaho kwirinda, ibereka ibyo bakwiye gukurikiza: 1.
Buri wese arasabwa kubika ku buryo bwihariye (backups) kandi buri munsi, ibintu byose biri muri mudasobwa ye nka porogaramu, ibirebana na emails, amakuru (database), n’ibindi.
Ndetse akagerageza kubigarura kugira ngo arebe niba byongera gukora neza (restoration).
2.
Mudasobwa zose zikwiye gushyirwamo uburyo bwo kwirinda bujyanye n’igihe (security updates), by’umwihariko MS17-010 ituma mudasobwa yawe idapfa kwinjirwamo n’iriya virus.
3.
Shyira urukuta (Firewall) kuri mudasobwa zose ziri ku muyobora utari mugari (Local Area Network, LAN), ndetse wongereho akantu kabuza abashaka gukoresha SMB ku nzira ya 445.
5.
Mudasobwa zose zigomba gushyirwamo Windows 10, kugira ngo zibashe kubona ubwirinzi bwose butangwa na Microsoft.
Uburyo bw’ubwirinzi burimo Antivirus, Windows Defender, bifite ubushobozi bwo kubona kiriya gitero nabwo bukwiye gushyirwa muri mudasobwa.
6.
Reba neza ko Antivirus uri gukoresha yongewemo uburyo bw’ubwirinzi bwa vuba, kuko abazitanga bakomeje gukora ibishoboka ngo bazongerere ubushobozi bwo guhangana n’iki gitero.
7.
Buri wese ufite mudasobwa kandi arasabwa kwirinda gufungura ubutumwa atazi, by’umwihariko ubuherekejwe n’indi nyandiko cyanga ibindi (attachment).
Ikindi ni ukwirinda gukura kuri internet ikintu cyose utizeye uwagishyizeho.
Uramutse uhuye n’ikibazo cyangwa mudasobwa yawe yibasiwe n’iki gitero, urasabwa kuyikura ku murongo wa internet, ukihutira kubimenyesha RISA uhamagara umurongo utishyurwa 4045, cyangwa ukohereza ubutumwa kuri [email protected] [email protected]

Umukozi wa Apple yirukanwe azira kumena amabanga ya iPhone X Ikompanyi yamamaye mu gukora ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga ya Apple yirukanye umukozi wayo bitewe n’uko umukobwa we yashyize hanze amashusho agaragaza imikorere ya telefone ya iPhone X nyamara itarashyirwa hanze. iPhone X ni telefone igezweho iri mu ruhererekane rw’izikorwa na Apple igiye gukurikira iPhone 8 na iPhone 8 Plus zamuritswe ku ya 12 Nzeri 2017 ari nabwo hatangajwe umushinga wayo.
Mu gihe haburaga iminsi mike ngo ishyirwe hanze, umukobwa witwa Brooke Amelia Peterson wa Ken Bauer wakoraga muri Apple yashyize kuri YouTube ye amashusho ayigaragaza, igikorwa cyitishimiwe na Apple yahise ifata icyemezo cyo kwirukana se.

Imyambarire y’inkumi z’i Kigali muri 6 bitavuzweho rumwe ku gitaramo cya Davido-Amafoto Mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatandatu rishyira ku Cyumweru tariki 04 Werurwe 2018, Umuhanzi Davido wo mu gihugu cya Nigeria yataramiye abanyarwanda, mu gitaramo kimwe mu bigize uruhererekane rw’ibyo ari kugenda azenguruka Afurika akora byitwa ‘30Billion Africa Tour’.
Iki gitaramo cyabereye I Kigali muri parikingi ya Sitade Amahoro I Remera mu karere ka Gasabo.
Ni igitaramo cyagaragayemo byinshi bitavuzweho rumwe, birimo imitegurire itaranyuze bamwe ahanini ishobora kuba yaratewe n’imvura, ikindi cyagaragaye muri iki gitaramo ni uburyo uyu muhanzi Davido yashimangiye ko ari mpuzamahanga ndetse ko hari n’isomo rikomeye rijyanye no kubaha akazi abahanzi Nyarwanda bakwiye kumwigiraho, ikindi cyagaragaye muri iki gitaramo turagarukaho ni imyambarire idasanzwe y’abakobwa bari bakitabiriye.
Imvura yakomye mu nkokora imitegurire y’igitaramo Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Ukwezi, ku wa Gatanu tariki 2 Werurwe 2018, Judo Kanobana uyobora Positive Production ari nayoyateguye iki gitaramo yari yavuze ko imyiteguro yatangiye kare ndetse byanagombaga kugera ku wa Gatandatu yarangiye aho byavugwaga ko amarembo agomba kuba afunguye saa kumi n’imwe, ibi no kubyapa byamamaza igitaramo niko byari biri.
Si iko byagenzi dore ko kuwa Gatandatu, I Kigali guhera mu masaha ya saa Cyenda z’igicamunsi imvura yatangiye kurwa ndetse igera aho iza kuba nyinshi aha byari bitangiye kuba mu masaha ya saa kumi n’imwe hafi n’ebyiri.
Iyi mvura yatangiye kugabanyuka ahagana saa moya z’umugoroba ari naho muri sitade ahagombaga kubera igitaramo batangiye gucuranga imiziki bayivangavanga mu rwego rwo kwirukana imbeho no kumvisha abantu ko igitaramo kigiye gutangira, iyi mvura kandi yari yakanze abantu benshi bifuzaga kuza kureba iki gitaramo n’ubwo yageze nyuma igahita ikirere kikeruruka, ndetse n’ibirori bigakomeza.
Ahagana saa mbiri n’igice hafi saa tatu nibwo iki gitaramo cyatangiye hajyaho abahanzi batandukanye hano mu Rwanda; barimo Sintex, Fiona Mbabazi n’abandi bagiye baza gususurutsa abantu bagendaga baza umwe kuri umwe kugeza ubwo Davido yagiye kujya ku rubyiniro abantu basa n’abamaze kuhagera ari benshi n’ubwo batari buzuye aha muri parikingi ya sitade nk’uko byari byitezwe cyangwa bisanzwe bigenda iyo haje umuhanzi ukomeye nk’uyu.
Bamwe mu banyamakuru bikomye abateguye igitaramo Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru cyabaye kuwa Gatanu, umunsi umwe mbere y’igitaramo, abateguye iki gitaramo bari bijeje abanyamakuru ko kugera kuri sitade ahabereye ibi birori bazahita babona ubafasha akabahereza ibyangombwa bibinjiza mu gitaramo mu rwego rwo kugirango babashe gukora akazi kabo neza.
Si ko byagenze dore ko benshi mu banyamakuru bavuga ko bageze aha kuri sitade bagasanga amakarita yo kwinjiriraho nayo atari ahagije yashize bamwe bakabanza kunyagirirwa, ku marembo y’aho abandi binjiririga, ibintu byatumye bamwe mu banyamakuru bijujuta ku buryo bukabije ndetse bamwe muri bo bagatahira aho badakoze akazi kabo.
Bamwe mu banyamakuru babashije kuganira na Ukwezi, bakadusaba kudatangaza imyirondoro yabo mu nkuru kubw’umutekano wabo bikomye cyane Positive Production bavuga ko atari ubwa mbere igerageza guha agaciro gake itangazamakuru Umwe yagize ati “Ngewe naje mpagarara hariya ku marembo amasaha abiri, bari batubwiye ko tuhagera saa kumi n’imwe z’umugoroba, ariko naje nyagirwa n’imvura yose mpagaze hariya banze ko ninjira kandi mfite ikarita y’akazi” Undi yagize ati “Ibi si ubwambere bibaye mu bitaramo byateguwe na Poisitive Production kuko no kubwa Tekno niko byagenze batwiriza ku kibuga cy’indege tugiye muri Press Conference nabwo kandi baradutinza cyane rwose aba bantu ba Positive Production bakwiye kwikosora bakaba Profession” Abashyushyarugamba bahawe ‘Boooo’ Iki gitaramo cyayobowe n’umukobwa ukora kuri imwe muri televiziyo za hano I Kigali, witwa
Mc Byaka wari ufatanyije na mugenzi we w’Umunyarwenya witwa Michael.

Nabereka umuhanzi nkunda?- Davido Davido yageze ku rubyiniro ahagana saa sita z’ijoro, abantu bamwe bari batangiye kunanirwa gusa ntabwo byabuzaga ababyina n’abasoma ku muvinyo kubikora dore ko benshi bari bakeneye no kwirukana imbeho yari itari nke muri iri joro.

Ku myaka ye 25 y’amavuko, uyu musore ufatwa nk’inkingi za mwamba mu muziki wa Afurika, ikindi kandi ari ku rutonde rw’abahanzi 10 bakize kandi binjiza agatubutse muri Afurika, amazina ye nyakuri ni ‘David Adedeji Adeleke, azwi muri muzika ya Nigeria ndetse no ku isi yose nka Davido, Ni umuhanzi ukiri muto dore yavutse tariki 21 Ugushyingo 1992, akavukira muri leta ya Atlanta, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Avuka kuri Se w’Umunyemari uri mu bakomeye muri Nigeria witwa Dr Adeleji Adeleke (Chief Deji) na Nyina witwaga Veronica Adeleke (Imana imwakire), wahoze ari umwarimu muri kaminuza.
Davido yatangiriye amashuri ye kuri British Internationla School, rimwe mu mashuri akomeye muri leta ya Atlanta, yavuye kuri iri shuri aza gukomereza kaminuza muri Oakwood University aho yize ibijyanye n’ishoramari mbere y’uko azana n’iwabo gutura mu gihugu cy’inkomoko cya Nigeria ari naho yaje gukomereza amashuri n’ibijyanye n’umuziki.
Yatangiye umuziki akiri muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yabaga mu itsinda ry’abanyamuzika BK International ari naho yatangiye kugaragariza impano ye mu bijyanye na muzika, gusa iri tsinda yaje kurivamo ubwo yari agarutse kuba mu gihugu cye cya Nigeria.
Muri Gicurasi 2011, Davido yashyize hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere ari wenyine ayita ‘Back When’, iyi ndirimbo yahise ikundwa mu buryo budasanzwe bituma uyu muhanzi atangira kwibazwaho cyane ari nabwo mu kwezi kwa Nzeri muri uwo mwaka yahise akora iyitwa ‘Dami Duro’, iyi yo yamufunguriye amarembo ku mugabane wa Afurika yose batangira kwibaza kuri uyu muhanzi ufite ubuhanga n’impano idasanzwe.
Mu myaka yakurikiyeho uyu muhanzi yakoze indirimbo nazo zagiye mu mitima ya benshi zirimo ‘Skelewu, Overseas, Aye na Gobe’ Davido kandi yakomeje kwagura ibikorwa bye bya muzika akorana n’abahanzi batandukanye ku mugabane wa Afurika ahereye iwabo muri Nigeria, aho mubo yakoranye nabo twavuga ; Umuhanzi wo muri Amerika Meek Mill bakoranye iyitwa Itsinda Mafikizolo ryo muri Afurika y’Epfo bakoranye iyitwa Tchelete, Diamond Platnumz wo muri Tanzania basubiranyemo iyitwa Number One, n’abandi barimo ab’iwabo muri Nigeria , Tiwa Savage, Lola Rae, Sarkodie, Mi Casa, Kiss Daniel, Yemi Alade n’abandi benshi.
Amaze gukora alubumu nyinshi zirimo iyitwa Omo Baba Olowo yakoze muri 2012, Best of Davido yakoze muri 2015, The Badest yakoze muri 2015, Son of Mercy EP yakoze muri 2016 Davido nk’icyamamare yagiye avugwa muri byinshi bitandukanye harimo n’ifoto yagiye hanze muri 2012, imugaragaza ari mu buriri n’umukobwa biza guteza impaka ku bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga n’abafana be muri rusange, uyu muhanzi ariko yasabye imbabazi avuga ko bitazongera ariko nyuma haza gushyirwa hanze indi foto aryamanye n’undi mukobwa mu buriri, uyu muhanzi kandi yakunze kugaragara mu mpaka zagiye zinakurura imirwano mu tubari, mu bitaramo n’ahandi hakunze guhurira ibyamamare.
Uyu muhanzi yakoranye n’amakompanyi atandukanye muri Afurika arimo MTN, Guinness, aho yigeze gusinya kuba amasaderi wa MTN, Miliyoni 30 z’amafaranga akoreshwa muri Nigeria, Ku myaka 20, Davido kandi yaguze inyubako mu Mujyi wa Lagos, ihagaze akayabo ka miliyoni 140 z’akoreshwa muri Nigeria.
Ibihembo yatwaye byose hamwe ni 26 naho ibyo yagiye ahamagarwamo ntabashe kubitwa ni 48, muri byo harimo n’ibikomeye nka MTV, BET, n’ibihembo bitangirwa muri Afurika ndetse n’iwabo muri Nigeria.
Afite kandi kuri ubu inzu ye itunganye umuzika yitwa DMW, nyuma yo kuva muri HKN Music yamazemo igihe kinini.
Davido ntabwo ari umuhanzi ukomeye gusa ahubwo nin’umubyeyi dore ko muri Gicurasi yabyaranye na Sofie Momodu, aho babyaye umwana w’umukobwa w’impfura bivugwa ko yanamuhaye inzu muri leta ya Atlanta.
Davido kandi yakunze kuvugwa mu rukundo n’abakobwa benshi cyane muri Nigeria, aho kuri ubu bivugwa ko ari mu rukundo n’umunyamideri wo muri Guinea witwa Sira Kante w’imyaka 19.

#15711#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/article/u-rwanda-rugiye-gushyira-ku-isoko-impapuro-mpeshwamwenda-zifite-agaciro-ka
U Rwanda rugiye gushyira ku isoko impapuro mpeshwamwenda zifite agaciro ka miliyari 15 Frw Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ibinyujije muri Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR), igiye gushyira ku isoko impapuro mpeshwamwenda (Treasury Bonds), zifite agaciro ka Miliyari 15 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Itangazo rya BNR risobanura ko ayo mafaranga azifashishwa na leta mu guteza imbere isoko ry’imari n’imigabane no kubaka ibikorwaremezo.
Rigaragaza kandi ko isoko ry’izo mpapuro rizafungurwa ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2018, rigafunga ku wa 23 Gashyantare 2018.
Abazazigura bazishyurwa mu myaka itanu guhera ku wa 24 Kanama 2018 kugeza ku wa 17 Gashyantare 2023.
Mu guhatanira kuzigura, amafaranga yo hejuru ni miliyoni 50 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda mu gihe amake azaba ari ibihumbi 100 Frw.
Impapuro mpeshwamwenda ni impapuro abashoramari batandukanye (abantu ku giti cyabo, ibigo by’imari, amashyirahamwe, ibigo byigenga…) bashobora gushoramo amafaranga baguriza Leta, mu gihe izo mpapuro zishyizwe ku isoko, bakajya bahabwa inyungu zibarwa ku mwaka, bakazasubizwa amafaranga batanze bagura izo mpapuro igihe zagenewe kirangiye.
Izo mpapuro uwaziguze ashobora kuzitangaho ingwate muri Banki agahabwa umwenda.
Uwaziguze ashobora kuzigurisha ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane ry’u Rwanda akabona amafaranga ye.
Icyicaro cya Banki Nkuru y'Igihugu

#15727#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/gushyingura-abazize-jenoside-mu-rwibutso-rusange-ni-ukugira-ngo-amateka
"Gushyingura abazize Jenoside mu Rwibutso rusange ni ukugira ngo amateka adasibangana"- IBUKA Egide Nkuranga, Visi Pereziza wa IBUKA, asobanura ko gushyingura abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 hamwe bigira akamaro ko kurinda amateka y'urupfu rudasanzwe bapfuye, bikanafasha igihugu n'ababo kubarindira umutekano w'imva bashyinguyemo no gusurwa mu cyubahiro.
Ibi yabitangarije mu gikorwa cyo gushyingura imibiri igera kuri 84, mu Rwibutso rwa Kibuza, ruherereye mu Karere ka Kamonyi, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 27/05/2012.
Mu ijambo rye, Nkuranga yavuze ko gushyingura inzirakarengane mu mva rusange birinda ko habaho igihe aho ziba zishyinguwe hatandukanye, haba mu matongo cyangwa mu marimbi, igihe kigera hagakorerwa ibindi bikorwa ugasanga amateka aribagiranye.
Ikindi yagarutseho ni uko abazize jenoside batazize urupfu rusanzwe nk'abandi.
Kubashyingura mu Rwibutso, ngo bizajya bituma bene wabo baza kubibuka no kubasura.
Ati: "Abazize Jenoside ntibapfuye urupfu rusanzwe.
Ku bw'iyo mpamvu, ntibagomba kwibagirana.
Iyo bashyinguye mu Rwibutso rusange igihugu kibarindira umutekano kandi n'ababo bakaza kubasura ahantu hiyubashye".
Egide Nkuranga, Visi Perezida wa mbere wa IBUKA, asobanurira abanya kamonyi akamaro ko gushyingura imibiri y'abazize Jenoside mu Rwibutso rusange.
Yahamagariye abafite ababo bagishyinguye mu matongo, kubazana bakaruhukira hamwe n'abandi bapfuye urupfu rumwe, kugira ngo imibiri yabo ikomeze kwitabwaho kandi irindirwe umutekano.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kamonyi, Rutsinga Jacques, yibukije abari aho ko kwibuka Jenoside bitagarukira ku babuze ababo gusa, ko ahubwo bireba Abanyarwanda bose.
Ariyo mpamvu ntawe ukwiye kwiyumvisha ko uwabuze uwe wese yamushyingura mu nsi y'urugo cyangwa mu itongo.
Yakomeje avuga ko mu rwego rwo guhesha agaciro abazize Jenoside, Leta yashyizeho gahunda y'Urwibutso rumwe cyangwa ibyiri muri buri karere.
Mu karere ka Kamonyi hari Inzibutso ebyiri urwa Kibuza ari narwo uyu muhango wabereyeho n'urwa Mugina, ahateganyijwe gushyingura imibiri ishyinguye mu mva zitandukanye ziri hirya no hino mu karere.
Niyonsenga Thomas wari warabanje gushyingura abe mu itongo ryabo nyuma ya Jenoside, yatangaje ko yashimye icyo gitekerezo cyo gushyingura abazize Jenoside mu Rwibutso rumwe, kuko hari igihe cyari kuzagera abo bashyinguye ku matongo hakabura ujyayo kubibuka.
Ati: "Nk'ubu se ko ku itongo najyagayo kwibuka umuvandimwe wanjye, mbaye ntakiriho ni nde wajyayo".
Akomeza avuga abatumva neza iyo gahunda yo gushyingura ababo mu Rwibutso rusange ari ubujiji no kutagira umutima wihangana, batinya kongera kubona imibiri y'ababo.
Marie Josee Uwiringira

Birangiye Radiyo Amazing Grace ihagaritswe gukora kubera ikiganiro cy’umuvugabutumwa Nicolas Niyibikora Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 12 Gashyantare 2018, Urwego rw’Abanyamakuru bigenzura (RMC) rwasabye Urwego Ngenzuramikorere (RURA) guhagarika by’agateganyo Amazing Grace Christian Radio amezi atatu izira kuba yarahaye urubuga umuvugabutumwa witwa Niyibikora Nicolas akigisha yibasira abari n’abategarugori ataretse na Kiliziya Gatolika.
Iki cyemezo cyafashwe nyuma y’ikirego Impuzamiryango iharanira uburenganzira bw’abagore, Pro-Femme Twese Hamwe yagejeje kuri RMC.
Akumba gato k’inama kari kakubise kuzuye ubwo Urwego rw’Abanyamakuru bigenzura rwumvaga ikirego cyatanzwe n’Ihuriro ry’Abagore barega Radiyo Amazing Grace (Radiyo Ubuntu butangaje) nkuko BBC ibivuga.

Ibi byahise bizamura igisa n’uburakari bw’abaje bahagarariye abagore.

Icyakora uretse gusaba uyu muvugabutumwa Nicolas Niyibikora gusaba imbabazi abo yasebeje, ngo imbabazi ntizivanaho ibishobora kugaragara nk’ibyaha bizatahurwa mu iperereza ryatangijwe n’igipolisi bitegetswe n’umushinjacyaha mukuru.
Ku wa 29 Mutarama 2018 nibwo kuri Radio Amazing Grace hanyuze iki kiganiro cyaje ari inshamugongo ndetse gitesha agaciro abagore nkuko byagarutsweho mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ndetse n’abantu batandukanye.

#15760#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/ncpd-irahamagarira-ibitaro-n-amavuriro-kubakira-inzira-abafite-ubumuga
NCPD irahamagarira ibitaro n’amavuriro kubakira inzira abafite ubumuga Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Inama y’Igihugu y’Abantu bafite Ubumuga (NCPD) Emmanuel Ndayisaba, yahamagariye ibitaro n’amavuriro kubakira inzira abafite ubumuga kugira ngo bashobore koroherwa kubona serivisi z’ubuzima.
Hubatswe inzira ifasha abafite ubumuga kubasha kubona serivisi z’ubuvuzi Ndayisaba yabitangaje nyuma y’uko ku Kigo Nderabuzima cya Byahi mu Karere ka Rubavu hubatswe inzira yorohereza abafite ubumuga kubona serivisi bahabwa muri icyo Kigo Nderabuzima.
Ni inzira yorohereza abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona hamwe n’abifashisha insimburangingo.
Ikigo Nderabuzima cya Byahi ni kimwe mu byakira abarwayi benshi mu Mujyi wa Gisenyi harimo n’abafite ubumuga, bakaba bari basanzwe bagorwa n’inzira ikoreshwa n’abafite ubumuga.
Abaganga bavuga ko bari bafite imbogamizi zo kuvugana n’abarwayi bafite ubumuga bwo kutavuga kandi batarahuguwe gukoresha ururimi rw’amarenga. umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa NCPD Emmanuel Ndayisaba, avugana na Kigali Today, yatangaje ko ibikorwa byo kubakira inzira abafite ubumuga ku bigo nderabuzima no ku bitaro ari gahunda NCPD yahagurukiye, kugira ngo abafite ubumuga boroherwe no kubona serivisi z’ubuzima.
Agira ati “Ibi ni umuhigo dufite mu korohereza abafite ubumuga kuko uretse kugorwa n’inzira banyuramo, basanzwe bafite ikibazo cyo kuvugana n’abaganga kuko ibigo by’ubuzima byinshi mu Rwanda bidafite abakozi bazi kuvugana n’abafite ubumuga, ubu turafasha ahubakwa inzira y’abafite ubumuga hagatangwa n’ubumenyi bufasha abaganga kuvugana n’umurwayi hakoreshejwe amarenga”.
Ndayisaba avuga ko iyi nzira idafasha abafite ubumuga gusa kuko ari inzira ifasha abafite intege nkeya.
Inzira z’abafite ubumuga zifasha n’abandi bantu bafite intege nke Ati “Ababyeyi batwite badashobora kurira ingazi, abafite intege nkeya n’abana boroherezwa n’inzira z’abafite ubumuga kuko ziba zoroshye”.
Ubu mu Rwanda ibigo by’amavuriro 18 ni byo bifite inzira yorohereza abafite ubumuga, NCDP ikaba itangaza ko ifite umuhigo ko muri 2024 mu bigo nderabuzima 504, n’ibitaro 42 mu gihugu bigomba kuba bifite inzira zorohereza abafite ubumuga.
Mu Karere ka Rubavu, mu bigo nderabuzima 15, ibigo nderabuzima bibiri ni byo bifite inzira zorohereza abafite ubumuga, kandi ubuyobozi bw’akarere bukwiye gushyira izi nzira no ku bindi bigo nderabuzima no guhugura abaganga kuvugana n’abafite ubumuga.
Uretse kuba abafite ubumuga barimo gukorerwa ubuvugizi butuma babona inzira ziborohereza, Ndayisaba avuga ko hari izindi mbogamizi zibangamiye abafite ubumuga, zirimo kutoroherezwa mu kwivuza, kwiga no kubona imirimo.
Agira ati “Turacyafite imbogamizi muri serivisi z’ubuzima, nubwo dutekereza ko inzira zorohereza abafite ubumuga zizubakwa, abafite ubumuga baracyagowe no kubona serivisi z’ubuzima kuko indwara zabo zitishyurwa n’ubwisungane mu kwivuza kandi benshi bafite ubushobozi budahagije”.
Ndayisaba akomeza agira ati “Urebye nko kubona insimburangingo ntibyishyurwa n’ubwisungane mu kwivuza, kandi ntabundi bwisungane bafite, ibi bikongerwaho kuba izi serivisi zitangirwa ku bigo bike mu Rwanda”.
Ndayisaba avuga ko inyubako z’amashuri mu Rwanda harimo izitorohereza abafite ubumuga, indi mbogamizi ikomeye ikaba ababyeyi bakibangamira abana bafite ubumuga ntibajye ku ishuri, kimwe n’abarezi badafite ubumenyi mu kwigisha abafite ubumuga no kubafasha.
Ati “Abafite ubumuga bagorwa no kubona akazi, abakoresha benshi ntibizera ko abafite ubumuga bafite ubushobozi mu kazi, ahandi ababonye akazi ntiboroherezwa kubona ibikoresho biborohereza mu kazi.
Turifuza ko abafite ubumuga bahabwa serivisi nk’abandi, bakoroherezwa kubona ubumenyi no gukora inshingano zabo igihe babonye akazi”.
Mu Rwanda abafite ubumuga baracyafite imbogamizi mu kubona amakuru aho radiyo na televisiyo nyinshi zidafite abasemurira abafite ubumuga, bigatuma bakomeza kugira ihezwa mu kubona amakuru.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Sylidio Sebuharara Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ sebuharara Reba inkuru zose nanditse ( 627 )

#15846#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/burera-abubaka-ikigo-nderabuzima-cya-gatebe-baratabaza-kuko-bamaze-amezi-abiri
Burera: Abubaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gatebe baratabaza kuko bamaze amezi abiri badahembwa Abaturage bubaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gatebe mu karere ka Burera, baratabaza ubuyobozi kuko ngo bamaze amezi abiri badahembwa kandi icyo gihe cyose cyarashize bakora.
Aba baturage bavuga ko baheruka guhembwa mu kwezi kwa 11 mu mwaka wa 2013.
Kuva icyo gihe kugeza mu kwezi kwa kabiri mu mwaka wa 2014 ngo barakoraga gusa nta guhembwa nyuma baza guhitamo guhagarika akazi.
Aba baturage bavuga ko icyo gihe cyose gishize badahembwa cyatumye bagira ubukene bukabije ngo kuburyo n'imishinga bateguraga gukora yahagaze.
Basaba ubuyobozi kubatabara bagahembwa amafaranga yabo bakoreye.
Hakizimana Evariste, umwe muri abo baturage, avuga ko kuba bataramuhembye byatumye umwana we w'umunyeshuri wiga mu mashuri yisumbuye ajya ku ishuri afite amafaranga y'ishuri atuzuye.
Ngo ayo bari kumuhemba ni yo yari gutuma umwana we ajya ku ishuri nta kibazo afite.
Abubaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gatebe bavuga ko baheruka guhembwa mu kwezi kwa 11 mu mwaka wa 2013.
Agira ati "Nk'ubu mfite n'umunyeshuri, yagiye kwiga muri iyi minsi, nshaka amafaranga ndayabura, n'ubu ndimo n'ideni ntabwo nishyuye ngo ndangize amafaranga y'ishuri…abana bacu babirukane mu ishuri kandi twarakoze, twarakoreye umushinga nk'uyunguyu, ba rwiyemezamirimo baratwambuye rero."
Bamwe mu bakozi bubaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gatebe harimo n'abaturutse mu tundi turere two mu Rwanda.
Nshimiyimana Ildefonse aturuka mu karere ka Muhanga, mu ntara y'amajyepfo.
Avuga ko atabona uko asubira iwabo ngo kuko atarahembwa.
Ngo kuri ubu atunzwe no gutera ibiraka hirya no hino.
Ngo baramutse bamuhembye byamufasha kujya kureba umuryango we.
Agira ati "(amafaranga) twarayabuze burundu rwose…ubwo ninywubona (umushahara) nibwo nzataha!
Jye bandimo amafaranga ibihumbi 87…".
Ikigo nderabuzima cya Gatebe kiri kubakwa na rwiyemezamirimo ufite isosiyete y'ubwubatsi yitwa "Unity Company".
Twagiramungu Gerald umukozi w'iyo sosiyete, ukuriye ibikorwa byo kubaka icyo kigo nderabuzima, avuga ko kuba batarahemba abakozi ari uko akarere ka Burera nako katari kabaha amafaranga kabagomba.
Akomeza avuga ko ibyo byahise bituma bahagarika imirimo.
Ngo akarere nikatabaha ayo mafaranga ntibazi niba bazakomeza gukora.
Ariko ngo bizeye ko hazabaho ubwumvikane bagakomeza gukora.
Agira ati "Ubu ntabwo bari bayaduha (amafaranga), batubwira ko bari kuyashaka ariko ubwo ni ukuvuga ngo ntabwo barahembwa (abakozi)…nyuma yaho kubera kubura amafaranga twahise duhagarika ibikorwa ubu nta nubwo dukora."
Imirimo yo kubaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gatebe yarahagaze kubera kubura amafaranga.
Akomeza avuga ko amafaranga babereyemo abakozi bukaka ikigo nderabuzima cya Gatebe agera kuri miliyoni enye gusa ngo hari hasigaye hakora abakozi bake dore ko hasigaye imirimo mike kugira ngo icyo kigo nderabuzima cyuzure.
Ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Burera buvuga ko ikibazo cy'abo bakozi badahembwa bakizi.
Ngo kuba bataraha amafaranga "Unity Campany" kugira ngo ibe yahemba abo bakozi ni uko amafaranga y'ingengo y'imari yari agenewe kubaka icyo kigo nderabuzima yashize.
Zaraduhaye Joseph, umuyobozi wungirije w'akarere ka Burera, ushinzwe ubukungu n'iterambere, avuga ko amafaranga yandi ategerejwe mu ngengo y'imari y'umwaka wa 2014-2015, igomba gutangira mu kwezi kwa karindwi 2014.
Agira ati "Ni ikibazo tuzi, ni ukuvuga ngo twabasabye kwihangana kuko ntabwo twakwica amategeko y'ibaruramari."
Akomeza avuga ko uwo rwiyemezamirimo yagombye gukomeza gukora, agashaka amafaranga agahemba abakozi bityo imirimo akazayisoza akarere nako karabonye ayo mafaranga.
Ikigo nderabizima cya Gatebe cyatangiye kubakwa mu mwaka wa 2012, biteganyijwe ko umwaka w'imihigo 2013-2014 cyizaba cyuzuye neza.
Kuri ubu ariko imirimo yo kucyubaka yarahagaze.
Abaturage bo mu murenge wa Gatebe bavuga ko icyo kigo nderabuzima nigitangira gukora bizabafasha kwivuriza hafi ngo kuko ubusanzwe bakoraga ibilometero byinshi n'amaguru bagiye kwivuza.
Norbert Niyizurugero

#15869#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/ni-ryari-bavuga-ko-umuntu-ananutse-cyane-6857
Ni ryari bavuga ko umuntu ananutse cyane ?
Muri iki gihe abantu benshi bahangayikishijwe n’umubyibuho ukabije.
Ni mu gihe, kuko kugira ibiro birenze urugero bikurura ibyago byinshi byo kurwara diyabete, umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso ndetse n’izindi ndwara zinyuranye.
Ariko nubwo bimeze bityo, hari n’abandi bahangayikijwe no kunanuka bikabije ku buryo usanga bafite ipfunwe mu bandi kandi nabyo bigira ingaruka nyinshi ku buzima.
Ni ryari bavuga ko umuntu ananutse cyane ?
Abanyarwanda bamenyereye ko umuntu unanutse ari we uba ufite ubuzima butari bwiza na ho kubyibuha ni ikimenyetso cy’imibereho myiza nk’uko bizwi na benshi.
Nyamara impuguke mu buvuzi zivuga ko hari ibipimo byagenwe, iyo umuntu abiri hejuru aba afite ikibazo, kimwe n’uko iyo umuntu abiri munsi aba atifashe neza, ni ukuvuga ko aba bantu bombi baba bafite ibyago byo guhura n’indwara zitandura nk’iz’umutima, diyabete n’izindi.
Umuntu unanutse ni wawundi ufite igipimo cya BMI kuri munsi ya 18.5.
BMI (Body Mass Index mu cyongereza) ni uburyo umuntu amenya niba ibiro bye bijyanye n’uburebure bwe.
Ufata ibiro byawe ukabigabanya n’uburebure afite bwikubye kabiri (Kg/m2).
Ubusanzwe umuntu ufite ibiro bijyanye n’uburebure bwe, agomba kuba afite ibipimo bya BMI biri hagati ya 18,5 kugeza kuri 24,9.
Dore ibyo wakora ngo ibiro byawe byiyongere: 1.
Koresha cyane ibikungahaye kuri poroteyine nyinshi Iki ni ingenzi kandi gikwiye kwitabwaho cyane.Ubusanzwe,imikaya ikozwe na za poroteyine kandi zitabonetse byatuma za calories (ingufu z’umubiri) winjije zihinduka ibinure.
Nyamara iyo ufungura ibirimo poroteyine bituma za calories zikoreshwa zigahindukamo ibigize imikaya.Gusa wibukeko poroteyine zitera guhaga cyane niyo mpamvu usabwa kurya ibirimo poroteyine nyuma y’ayandi mafunguro kugirango bitaza kukubuza kurya.Ibyokurya bikungahaye kuri poroteyine harimo inyama, amafi, amagi, amata n’ibiyakomokaho, imboga, ubunyobwa n’utundi tubuto duhekenywa.
2.
Kurya byibuze gatatu ku munsi kandi wihatire ibinyamavuta n’amasukari Nubwo tuvuga ibi ariko ugomba kwitondera amavuta urya n’amasukari ukoresha kuko ibikomoka mu nganda nubwo byagutera kubyibuha ariko byanazana ingaruka nyinshi mbi.
Ahubwo fungura ibirimo amavuta y’umwimerere, ubunyobwa, ibihwagari, avoka n’amasukari y’umwimerere nk’imbto, ubuki, ibisheke, beterave n’ibindi.
3.
Ihatire amasupu kandi arimo ibirungo binyuranye Aha naho turavuga ibirungo bitari bya bindi bitunganywa bakongeramo ibindi bintu.
Ushobora gukoresha poivron, seleri, ibitunguru, mudarasini, icyinzari, n’ibindi birungo by’umwimerere, mbese hahandi ibiryo nawe biguhumurira amazi akuzura akanwa.
4.
Dore amwe mu mafunguro yuzuyemo ibitera ingufu wakwibandaho ukoresha: o Utubuto: Amande, ubunyobwa mu moko yose, macadamia, … o Utubuto twumye: imizabibu, prunes, dates, … o Ibiva ku mata birimo ibinure: amata ubwayo, yawurute, fromage, ikimuri, … o Amavuta n’ibinure: Amavuta ya elayo n’amavuta ya avoka (cyangwa avoka ubwayo) o Impeke: ingano n’ibizikomokaho, umuceri), ibikoma by’amafu anyuranye o Inyama: inkoko, inka, ingurube (gusa yo ukamenya niba koko yari itarwaye kuko zikunze kurwara kurenza andi matungo), kandi ukibanda ku zifite ibinure. o Ibinyabijumba: Ibijumba, ibirayi, ibikoro o Chocolat yirabura, avoka, amavuta y’ubunyobwa, amata ya cocoa, granola, … 5.
Nyuma y’ibi byose, ihatire gukora siporo kuko ikomeza umubiri, gusa nyuma ya siporo ufate amafunguro ahagije cyane cyane imbuto n’imitobe.
Wari uzi ko hari inyunganiramirire z’umwimerere zagufasha kongera ibiro?
Niba ushaka kongera ibiro, kuko kunanuka cyane bishobora kukuzanira ibibazo bitandukanye,ndetse bikaba byanagutera ipfunwe mu bandi.Ni byiza kubahiriza ziriya nama twavuze haruguru.Ubu rero,habonetse inyunganiramirire z’umwimerere zifasha kongera ibiro ndetse no kubaka umubiri.
Izi zikaba zizewe ku ruhando mpuzamahanga kuko zemewe n’ibigo bikomeye ku isi nka FDA (Food and Drug Admnistration).
Muri zo twavugamo nka Protein powder( izi ni proteyini zose),Multivitamin capsules(Habamo vitamin zose umubiri ukenera),Compound Marrow powder, Zinc Tablets,…….
Ukeneye izi nyunganiramirire, wagana aho Horaho Life ikorera mu nyubako yo kwa Rubangura muri etage ya 3, mu nyubako ya 302 cyangwa ukabahamagara kuri 0785031649 / 0788698813.
KURIKIRA IBIGANIRO BYA Horaho Life Rwanda KURI YOUTUBE

Kamonyi: Umupasiteri akurikiranyweho kwambura amafaranga abaturage abizeza ubufasha Umushumba w'Itorero "Umusozi w'ibyiringiro" rifite urusengero mu murenge wa Runda mu karere ka Kamonyi, acumbikiwe kuri Sitatiyo ya Polisi ya Runda, akurikiranyweho kwaka amafranga abakristo b'itorero ayoboye kugira ngo abashakire abaterankunga mu mushinga Compassion Internationale.
Bamwe mu bakristo basengera muri iryo torero bavuga ko iby'ubufasha babibwiwe mu ntangiro z'umwaka ushize wa 2013.
Ngo icyo gihe basabwe 200frw kuri buri mwana ukeneye gufashwa.
Nyuma y'igihe gito barongeye babwirwa ko ugomba gufashwa agomba kuba afite ikarita y'umubatizo igura 500frw.
Mu mpera z'uwo mwaka, Pasiteri yabazaniye abazungu kubasura.
Bamaze kugenda ababwira ko inkunga bayibemereye ariko ko babasabye kubanza kubaka inzu yo gukoreramo gahunda z'umushinga; maze arongera abasaba gutanga 1000frw yo kubaka icyumba cyo gukoreramo.
Amafaranga yo kubaka ngo yakusanyijwe n'umubitsi w'itorero, ngo agera ku bihumbi magana atatu, akaba yarubatswemo akazu kometse ku rusengero.
Aba bakristo batangaza ko mu gihe bari bategereje ubufasha, batangiye kumva muri bagenzi ba bo ko nta bufasha bazabona kuko ibyo pasiteri yababwiye yababeshyaga, ahubwo yashakaga kubambura amafaranga gusa.
Pasiteri amenye ko hari abamureze mu bugenzacyaha yatangiye kuvuga ko ibyo yakoze bitari mu nyungu z'itorero kuko ajya gushaka abaterankunga mu gihugu cya Kenya yajyanye n'umuvugizi w'Itorero Bishop Liliane, uyu akaba ari n'umugore we.
Icyo gihe Pasiteri yakekaga ko umugore we ari we wamureze kuko batabanye neza kandi ko ari ibibazo by'itorero byabazwa umugore kuko ari we urihagarariye mu mategeko.
Kuva yashyikirizwa Polisi, twagerageje kuvugana n'umugore w'uwo mupasiteri, bwa mbere atubwira ko ari mu muhanda urimo imodoka nyinshi, ubundi yanga kwitaba telefoni.
Marie Josee Uwiringira

#15947#	2	security	http://makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Gasabo-Abakozi-ba-WASAC-bafatiwe-mu-cyuho-baka-ruswa
Gasabo:Abakozi ba WASAC bafatiwe mu cyuho baka ruswa Polisi y'u Rwanda yafatiye mu cyuho abakozi babiri b'Ikigo gishinzwe gusukura no gukwirakwiza amazi (WASAC) bagerageza kwaka ruswa y'ibihumbi 40 by'amafaranga y'u Rwanda umwe mu bafatabuguzi b'amazi atangwa n'iki kigo.
Bafatiwe aho bakoreye iki cyaha mu kagari ka Nyarutarama, mu murenge wa Kimironko, Akarere ka Gasabo ku itariki 20 Ukwakira 2015.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y'u Rwanda mu mujyi wa Kigali Superintendent of Police (SP) Modeste Mbabazi yavuze ko mu cyumweru gishize, abo bakozi ba WASAC bagiye gufungira amazi uwo mufatabuguzi kubera umwenda w'amazi ungana n'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 400 yari afitiye iki kigo.
Yasobanuye ko bageze aho uwo mufatabuguzi atuye bamusabye ariya mafaranga bamubwira ko nayabaha batamufungira amazi.
SP Mbabazi yagize ati:"Uwo mufatabuguzi yaremeye arayabaha kugira ngo bafatirwe mu cyuho bakora icyo cyaha kandi ahita abimenyesha Polisi y'u Rwanda aribwo yaje igahita ibata muri yombi."
Yavuze ko abo bombi bafungiwe kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi y'u Rwanda ya Remera mu gihe iperereza rikomeje.
Yagize ati:"Ingaruka za ruswa zigera ku muryango mugari w'abantu akaba ari yo mpamvu buri wese akwiye kuyirinda kandi akagira uruhare mu kuyirwanya aha Polisi y'u Rwanda n'izindi nzego zibishinzwe amakuru yatuma iki cyaha gikumirwa kandi yatuma hafatwa abagikoze ndetse n'abategura kugikora."
Yashimye uwo mufatabuguzi wa WASAC kuba yarahise atanga amakuru ya ruswa yari yatswe kandi asaba abandi baturage kumufatiraho urugero.
Polisi y'u Rwanda yashyizeho ishami rishinzwe by'umwihariko kurwanya no gukumira ibyaha bya ruswa (Anti-Corruption Unit) nk'imwe mu ngamba zo kurwanya iki cyaha.
Ingingo ya 644 y'igitabo cy'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda ivuga ko umuntu wese, ku buryo bweruye cyangwa buteruye usaba, usezeranywa, wakira, ku buryo buziguye cyangwa butaziguye, impano cyangwa indi ndonke, ahamya ko ashobora gukoresha igitinyiro cye cyangwa ikimenyane, kugira ngo undi muntu abe yafata icyemezo, iyo mpano cyangwa indi ndonke yaba imugenewe cyangwa yaba igenewe undi, icyo gitinyiro cyangwa icyo kimenyane cyaragize icyo kigeraho cyangwa ntacyo cyagezeho mu byari bigambiriwe, ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku mwaka umwe (1) kugeza ku myaka itatu (3) n'ihazabu y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda yikubye inshuro kuva kuri ebyiri (2) kugeza ku icumi (10) z'agaciro k'indonke yasabwe, yasezeranyijwe cyangwa yakiriwe.
RNP

#15963#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/amazina/article/celestin-izina-ry-umuntu-uhangayikira-abandi-cyane
Celestin, izina ry'umuntu uhangayikira abandi cyane Yanditswe na IGIHE Kuya 16 Gashyantare 2017 saa 07:29 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 1 0 Celestin ni izina rifite inkomoko mu kilatini ku izina Caelestinus risobanura‘ukomoka mu ijuru'.
Bamwe bandika Celestine, Celestino , Caelestinus Celestyn , Celestino , Celestino Bimwe mu biranga ba Celestin Akunda kuba mu myanya y'imbere bityo akumva ko afite inshingano ku bandi ayoboye.
Akunda kugaragara neza, yanga ikintu cyakwangiza isura ye bigatuma akora cyane kugira ngo atazagawa.
Celestin ni umuntu ubasha gukemura ibibazo, utagira intonganya muriwe kandi ukunda kuganira.
Ni umuntu ushimishije kumureba , afite uburyo bwo gusabana akabasha kwigarurira abandi vuba.
Akunda umuryango we cyane ndetse akawitaho.
Kwita ku bandi yumva ko ari inshingano, ahora ateganyiriza ahazaza yumva ko nta muntu wigira ubwe wenda nawe ashobora gukenera abandi niyo yaba ataribo yagiriye neza.
Arigenga mu buzima bwe, yumva ko yakora ibintu yishimiye adashyizweho itegeko na rimwe.
Biragoye kugira ngo Celestin ube wamushinja ubunebwe kuko buri munsi aba ahatana kugira ngo abashe kuba umuntu wigize.
Ibyo kwishimisha no gukunda bifata umwanya munini muri we kandi usanga aba ari umuntu abakobwa benshi bifuza gukundana nawe.

#15973#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Abapolisi-b-u-Rwanda-bari-muri-Sudan-y-Epfo-mu-butumwa-bw-amahoro-bahawe-imidali-y-ishimwe
Abapolisi b’u Rwanda bari muri Sudan y’Epfo mu butumwa bw’amahoro bahawe imidali y’ishimwe Abapolisi 183 b’Abanyarwanda barimo abagore 30, bambitswe imidali y’Ishimwe n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye mu kubashimira umurava n’ubwitange bakorana mu bikorwa byo kugarura amahoro mu gihugu cya Sudan y’Epfo.
Mu Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, (UN) rigaragaza ko abapolisi b’u Rwanda bafite ibirindiro mu murwa mmukuru wa Juba, ko bafite inshingano zikomeye zo gucunga umutekano muri uyu mujyi no kurinda ahacumbikirwa abasivili badafite aho kuba.
Mukuru wa UN muri Sudani y’Epfo, Moustapha Soumaré, yavuze ko bahaye abapolisi b’Abanyarwanda imidali kubera akazi k’indashyikirwa bakoze ndetse no kuba baragize uruhare mu kugarura icyizere cy’abaturage ba Sudan y’Epfo.
Umwe mu bapolisi b’u Rwanda bahawe umudali yavuze ko kujya gucunga umutekano muri Sudan y’Epfo bifite aho bihuriye n’amateka yabaye mu Rwanda mu 1994, kuko badashobora kwemera ko ibyabaye mu Rwanda hari ahandi byaba.
Abapolisi bahawe imidali barimo 160 bageze muri Sudani y’Epfo mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro muri Mata 2017, abandi bagera kuri 23 bagiye gufasha bagenzi babo Nyakanga umwaka ushize.
U Rwanda rufite abasirikare n’abapolisi bari mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro muri Sudani y’Epfo bagera ku 2600

INILAK yongeye kwemererwa kwitwa Kaminuza Hashingiwe ku itegeko No 04/2012 rigenga imiryango n'imikorere y'imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta; Hashingiwe kandi ku busabe bwa INILAK bwo guhindura izina ndetse no ku cyemezo cya Ministeri y'Uburezi cyemeza ko INILAK yujuje ibisabwa ngo yitwe Kaminuza; INILAK yashyikirijwe icyemezo n'Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe imiyoborere (RGB) kiyemerera ko ihinduriwe izina bityo ikaba ibaye UNILAK imbere y'amategeko.
Iki cyemezo gitanzwe nyuma y'imyaka ibiri yari ishize INILAK itangiye gusaba ko yahindurirwa izina igasubira ku izina ryayo rya UNILAK dore ko ariko yahoze yitwa mbere y'umwaka w'2008.
Dore urupapuro rwemerera INILAK kwitwa kaminuza Umuyobozi wa UNILAK , Dr.
Ngamije Jean.
" Kuba twongeye kwitwa kaminuza ni ishema kuri twe, bizarushaho kudutera ishyaka ryo kugera ku ntego twihaye nka kaminuza kandi nta shiti ko bizarushaho gukuza isura nziza dufite muri sosiyete."
Ku ruhande rw'abanyeshuri biga muri UNILAK, ngo kuba ishuri bigamo rihawe izina rya kaminuza bizabafasha gukuraho urujijo ku babashidikanyagaho ko ahari bo batiga muri kaminuza kandi bizabongera ishyaka mu masomo yabo.
Kaminuza ya UNILAK yashinzwe mu mwaka w' 1997 n'ababyeyi b'Abalayiki b'Abadiventiste, kuri ubu ikaba ifite amashami atatu arimo icyicaro gikuru I Kigali, Ishami rya Nyanza n'irya Rwamagana.
