#15978#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/Buri-muganga-arasabwa-kugarurira-abarokotse-Jenoside-icyizere
Buri muganga arasabwa kugarurira abarokotse Jenoside icyizere Kuba Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yarageze no mu bitaro, abahahungiye bakicwa, bamwe mu baganga bagatatira igihango cyo kubungabunga ubuzima bakishora mu bwicanyi ngo ni amahano akabije abakora mu bitaro bya Kigeme basabwe guhanagura bafasha abarokotse Jenoside bakanabagarurira icyizere ko ibitaro bitakiri ahantu ho kwicirwa, ahubwo ari ahantu ho gukiza ubuzima.
Ubu butumwa bwatanzwe mu ijoro ryo kuwa gatanu tariki ya 13/06/2014 ubwo hibukwaga abakozi bakoraga mu bitaro bya Kigeme bazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu mwaka w'1994, ndetse n'abarwayi n'abarwaza babiguyemo.
Abakora i Kigeme bashyize indabo z'urwibutso ku mva bunamira abazize Jenoside bose.
Dr Muhayimpundu Ribakare wari uhagarariye minisiteri y'ubuzima muri uyu muhango yavuze ko ubundi umuntu ugannye ibitaro aba ashaka ubuzima, ariko ngo bikaba atari ko byagenze mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuko icyo gihe mu bitaro hiciwe abarwayi n'abarwaza, bamwe mu baganga bavuraga baricwa n'ubwo hari n'abaganga bicanye.
Ati "Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ubwayo ni amahano ariko iyo bigeze kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu bitaro ngira ngo ni amahano ubugira kabiri.
Ubundi kwa muganga ni ahantu umuntu ajya ngo ahakirire, ariko twe mu Rwanda hari abahamburiwe ubuzima kandi bigambiriwe."
Dr Muhayimpundu avuga ko uko bibuka Jenoside mu bitaro bya Kigeme bakwiye kureba icyo bakora ngo bafashe abarokotse Jenoside, kandi bakumva ko bagomba kubagarurira icyizere kuko n'ubwo hari intambwe yatewe ariko hakiri n'urugendo runini.
Kubwa Dr Muhayimpundu ati "Uko twibuka tujye tuvuga tuti muri ibi bitaro habayeho amahano, twibaze icyo twakora kugira ngo dufashe abahuye nayo ndetse natwe dufashanye.
Turacyafite abantu bakeneye ubufasha bwacu, cyane kwa muganga baradukeneye buri gihe.
Kugira ngo uwarokotse yibagirwe ibyago yagiriye mu bitaro ahabone ko ari ahantu hatanga ubuzima nitwe nk'abakozi tuzagarurira icyizere abo bose batereranywe n'ikiremwamuntu."
Abakora ku bitaro bya Kigeme bakoze urugendo rwo kwibuka bagana ku rwibutso rwa Gasaka.
Umuyobozi w'ibitaro bya Kigeme, Dr Munezero Eric avuga ko kuba bafata umwanya wo kwibuka abakozi, abarwayi n'abarwaza bazize Jenoside ngo ari n'umwanya wo gufata ingamba kugira ngo Jenoside itazasubira ukundi, ndetse no gufata mu mugongo no kwihanganisha abayirokotse.
Gahunda yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ibaye ku nshuro ya gatatu mu bitaro bya Kigeme.
Kuri iyi nshuro hasanwe inzu y'umukecuru warokotse Jenoside utishoboye, igikorwa cyatanzweho amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 700 yavuye mu misanzu abakozi bakusanyirije hamwe.
Abo mu miryango y'abazize Jenoside bakoraga mu bitaro bya Kigeme bari muri icyo gikorwa.
Ibitaro bya Kigeme kandi bigiye kubaka urwibutso rwa Jenoside imbere mu bitaro, hagamije kurushaho kwibuka no guha agaciro ababiguyemo, hakaba harakozwe urutonde rw'abari abakozi, abarwayi n'abarwaza babiguyemo ari nako hagishakishwa abandi baba bataramenyekana biciwe muri ibyo bitaro.
Emmanuel Nshimiyimana

#15987#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/Inteko-ishinga-amategeko-mu-ruzinduko-rw-iminsi-10-mu-turere
Inteko ishinga amategeko mu ruzinduko rw'iminsi 10 mu turere Mu ruzinduko rw'iminsi 10 abagize inteko ishinga amategeko imitwe yombi batangiye mu turere twose tw'u Rwanda, mu karere ka kirehe hazibandwa ku bijyanye n'iterambere ry'abaturage bareba uko imishinga imwe n'imwe ikorera muri ako karere yafasha abaturage bakagira imibereho myiza.
Urwo ruzinduko rwabimburiwe n'inama nyunguranabitekerezo yahuje itsinda rigizwe n'abadepite batatu batangiye urwo ruzinduko mu karere ka Kirehe mu nama y'abahuje na nyobozi y'akarere, njyanama y'akarere, abanyamabanga nshingwabikorwa b'imirenge n'abafashamyumvire mu karere kuri uyu wa 24/1/2015.
Njyanama n'abafashamyumvire mu karere bitabiriye iyo nama.
Muri iyo nama abadepite bagize umwanya wo kumva bimwe mu bibazo bibangamira abaturage mu iterambere mu kugezwaho gahunda zibagenewe.
Havuzwe ibikorwa by'imishinga imwe nimwe usanga bitagera ku baturage nyirizina hatangwa urugero ku mushinga wa KWAMP ufasha ubuhinzi n'ubworozi muri kirehe ku bikorwa byinshi ukora mu iterambere ariko ngo ntibigere ku bagenerwabikorwa nk'uko bikwiye.
Depite Mujawamariya Berthe umwe mu bagize ikipe y'abadepite igiye gukorera mu karere ka Kirehe muri iyo minshi icumi yavuze ko imishinga minini ikora ariko ntibisobanurirwe abaturage ngo bamenye icyo ije kubagezaho ndetse ngo bayigire iyabo.
Abadepite batangiye bumva ibibazo by'abaturage.
Ati "Iyo mishinga ikora byinshi ariko amafaranga abigendaho usanga aba menshi yagafashije n'abaturage bityo ibikorwa bigenewe umuturage bigasigara inyuma n'uwo umuturage ntabe yagerwaho n'ibyo bikorwa uko bikwiye kandi aribo bigenewe."
Yavuze ko n'ubwo haba harakozwe ho inyigo y'imishinga ikorera mu karere hagomba no kubamo ikindi kintu cyongerwamo kigenewe abaturage mu kubafasha kwiteza imbere.
Ati "Natanga urugero k'umushinga wa KWAMP nkubu hubatswe ibigo bihugura abaturage, hari ibyubatswe Mpanga, nyarubuye n'ahandi ariko iyo urebye uburyo by'ubatse n'ibikoresho birimo za computer n'ibindi usanga bigera ku baturage bake cyane ugereranyije n'uko byakabaye byaregerejwe abaturage benshi."
Yavuze ko hari byinshi bagiye kugiraho ubuvugizi mu baturage ubwo bagiye kubasura iwabo mu midugudu basobanurirwa gahunda za Leta n'uruhare rwabo mu iterambere kugira ngo ibikorwa remezo bye kwitwa iby'imushinga, abaturage bayigire iyabo bityo niba isoje igihe abaturage bekugira ikibazo mu mikoreshereze y'ibyo bikorwa isize.
Yavuzeko ikigamijwe ari uko umuturage agira icyiciro avamo cy'ubukene akazamuka ajya mu cyiciro runaka cy'ubukire bityo igihugu kikagira iterambere rirambye.
Mu bibazo byabajijwe hibanzwe ku mishinga imwe n'imwe ikorera mu karere aho usanga ibikorwa remezo bigarukira ku mishinga yabyo gusa.
Hatanzwe ingero ku mihanda yubakwa aho usanga igarukira ku bikorwa by'iyo mishinga gusa ntigere ku baturage kandi baba bayikeneye mu bikorwa binyuranye.
Muzungu Gerald umuyobozi w'akarere ka Kirehe yavuze ko iyo mishinga minini cyane cyane KWAMP yagize akamaro kanini mu iterambere ry'akarere n'iry'umuturage muri rusange, avuga ko hagomba ubundi buryo bw'inyigo yayo bunoze kugirango ibitagenda neza bikosorwe.
Ati" kubera ko umushinga washizwe mu bikorwa nkuko wateguwe hari ibigomba kurushaho kunozwa nko kukibazo cy'imihanda byari kuba byiza imihanda ikorwa utagarukuye kugikorwa remezo by'uwo mushinga gusa, byari kunozwa imihanda igafata igice kinini cy'akarere naho ubundi muri rusange umushinga wagize akamaro kanini mu iterambere."
Ingendo z'abagize inama nshingamategeko zizasozwa n'inama ku karere izaba igaragaza ibyo abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko babonye mu biganiro bagirana n'abaturage n'ibibazo babasanganye mu ngo aho batuye mu rwego rwo kubifatira ingamba hamwe n'Abagize Njyanama na Nyobozi y'akarere.
Muri iki gikorwa cyo kwegera abaturage itsinda ry'abadepite ryaje m'uruzinduko mu karere ka Kirehe rigizwe na Hon Munyangeyo Théogène, Hon Rusiha Gaston na Hon Mujawamariya Berthe.
Servilien Mutuyimana

MINALOC iravuga ko nta terambere ryashoboka abafite ubumuga batitaweho Dr Alvera Mukabaramba, Umunyamabanga umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu Ubwo kuri uyu wa 3 Ukuboza 2015 mu Rwanda rwifaranyaga n'isi yose mu kwizihizihizwaga umunsi w'abafite ubumuga, Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'igihugu yasabye abanyarwanda bose kwita no gufasha abafite ubumuga, ngo kuko nta terambere ryashoboka batitaweho.
Niyomugabo Romaris Umuyobozi w'Inama y'ubutegetsi y'abafite ubumuga, yashimiye leta kuri byinshi byagiye bikorwa mu gihugu kugirango abafite ubumuga boroherezwe mu nzego zitandukanye ndetse no kunganira Inama y'igihugu y'abafite ubumuga mu kurangiza inshingano zayo.
Raporo igaragaza ko abana bagera kuri 72 % aribo bajya ku ishuri,gusa ariko ngo nta byera ngo de uyu umuyobozi w'Inama y'ubutegetsi y'abantu bafite ubumuga mu Rwanda, yasabye ko RSSB yaha uburenganzira ibigo bikora insimburangingo ndetse n'inyunganirangingo kuba byakorana n'ubwishingizi mu kwivuza (Mituelle de santé) .
Umushyitsi mukuru yari umunyamabanga wa leta muri Minisiteri y'ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu Dr Alvera Mukabaramba, mu butumwa bwe yavuze ko mu rwego rw'amategeko na politike zidaheza, Leta y'u Rwanda yashyizeho amategeko n'amabwiriza ku myubakire idaheza, ku bantu bafite ubumuga.
Niyomugabo Romalis umuyobozi w'inama y'ubutegetsi y'abamugaye ashima intambwe imaze guterwa mu burezi bw'abafite ubumuga Dr Alvera Mukabaramba akomeza avuga ko ubu Leta iri mu gikorwa cyo kuvugurura politiki y'uburezi budaheza n'uburezi bwihariye,Ibi ngo bizorohereza abafite ubumuga mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi mu gutegura ejo heza hazaza.
Ariko Mukabaramba kavuga ko kugira ngo ibyo bigerweho hagamba kubaho uruhare rwa buri wese.
Yagize ati: ‘'Kugirango ibi bigerweho turasabwa twese ntawusigaye inyuma kugirango abafite ubumuga bibonemo, nabo bagire uruhare rugaraga mu iterambere ry'igihugu cyacu, yaba abikorera, ibigo bya leta, n'abandi bafatanyabikorwa bakwiriye kumva ko nta terambere rirambye ryagerwaho hatabayeho kwinjiza gahunda zidaheza abafite ubumuga mu bikorwa byabo bya buri munsi.
Ku rwego rw'igihugu uyu munsi mpuzamahanga wizihirijwe mu Karere ka Musanze, Uyu munsi waranzwe n'ibirori bitandukanye byasusurukijwe na bamwe mu bamugaye barimo abatavuga, ntibumve bifashishije ururimi rw'amarenga bakabyina batabusanya,abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona ariko bagacuranga bakanaririmba.
Mu rwego rw'imyidagaduro muri uyu muhango hanahembwe amakipe y'abantu bafite ubumuga yahesheje ishema u Rwanda, nyuma yo kwegukana itsinzi mu gihugu ndetse no mu mahanga bagahabwa imidari.

#16043#	9	culture	https://igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/imvano-y-igitutu-cy-u-burayi-na-amerika-ku-rwanda-ubwo-habyarimana-yacudikaga
Imvano y’igitutu cy’u Burayi na Amerika ku Rwanda ubwo Habyarimana yacudikaga na Koreya ya Ruguru Intambara n’ibitutsi, ibisasu kirimbuzi no kwigerezaho niyo makuru benshi bazi aturuka muri Koreya ya Ruguru y’umugabo w’igisunzu, Kim Jong Un.
Iyo Koreya isa n’iyitajwe n’ibihugu kuri ubu, yabaye inshuti ikomeye y’u Rwanda ku butegetsi bwa Perezida Habyarimana Juvénal mu gihe cy’intambara y’ubutita kugeza ubwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Burayi zari zimurabye ivu, bikamusaba amayeri ngo atabizira.
Habyarimana yashatse gukina amayeri Amerika n’u Burayi, bamuha gasopo Ikibazo cyo kutavuga rumwe kwa Koreya ya Ruguru n’iy’Epfo cyo mu 1948 ubwo zacikagamo kabiri, cyakomeje gukururuka kigeza mu 1973 ubwo Habyarimana yafataga ubutegetsi mu Rwanda.
Nk’umuntu wari ugiye ku butegetsi vuba, yagombaga gushaka ibihugu by’inshuti ariko agahera ku bitari bisanzwe bifitanye ubushuti bwa hafi n’u Rwanda, kugira ngo inkunga iva hanze yiyongere.
Koreya ya Ruguru yari ishyigikiwe n’ibihugu by’u Bushinwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyeti, iy’Epfo ishyigikiwe n’u Burayi Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ibihugu byinshi muri Afurika byari byarahisemo guca umubano n’ibindi bikoresha Communisme ari nacyo gice Koreya ya Ruguru yabarizwagamo kugira ngo ba shebuja b’i Burayi na Amerika babirebe neza, hato badakoma rutenderi ingoma zabo zigahirima.
Leta ya Habyarimana yashakaga ubufasha no kwimenyekanisha mu mahanga, yatangiye kugenda rwihishwa ikorana n’ibihugu bikoresha Communisme, dore ko muri ibyo bihe byatangaga inkunga itubutse kandi itariho amananiza menshi nk’ayo Amerika n’u Burayi bashyiragaho.
U Rwanda rwatangiye kwiyegereza Koreya ya Ruguru, nayo irarukundira umubano uratangira.
Tariki 15 Mata 1974 mu Rwanda haje itsinda ryo muri Koreya ya Ruguru riyobowe n’uwari Minisitiri wungirije w’ububanyi n’amahanga, Chun Nyung Soo, ryakirwa na Perezida Habyarimana.
Icyo gihe Radio Rwanda yatangaje ko Koreya ya Ruguru yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu bijyanye n’amahugurwa y’urubyiruko, kubaka inzu mberabyombi y’urubyiruko n’ibindi.
Radio Rwanda kandi yavuze ko iryo tsinda ryashyikirije Habyarimana ubutumwa buvuye kuri Perezida, Kim il Song wa Koreya ya Ruguru.
Inyandiko z’ibanga za Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda zo muri ibyo bihe zashyizwe hanze n’urubuga Wikileaks, zigaragaza ko Koreya ya Ruguru nyuma yaje no kwemera guha imyitozo urubyiruko rw’ishyaka MRND ryari ku butegetsi, gutoza abasirikare ibijyanye n’akarasisi n’ibindi.
Uruzinduko rw’intumwa za Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda rwaje mu gihe Koreya zombi zari mu biganiro byo kwiyunga ariko bigatambamirwa n’ibindi bihugu bikomeye.
Abasesenguzi icyo gihe bavugaga ko Koreya ya Ruguru nta gihambaye yashakaga ku Rwanda kitari ijwi ryarwo mu Muryango w’Abibumbye.
Habyarimana icyo gihe yabwiye itsinda rya Koreya ya Ruguru ko u Rwanda rufata ikibazo kiri hagati ya Koreya zombi nk’icy’imbere mu gihugu gikwiriye gukemurwa hatajemo ukuboka kw’amahanga.
Umubano w’ibihugu byombi warakuze, ndetse Koreya ya Ruguru ifungura Ambasade yayo i Kigali.
Mu Ukwakira 1976, inyandiko z’ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika zigaragaza ko Habyarimana afatanyije na Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru, bashyizeho Komite yiga ku kongera kwiyunga kwa Koreya zombi.
Inama yabereye mu nyubako z’uwari uhagarariye Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda.
Iyo komite yari igizwe n’abajyanama muri MRND, Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri Perezidansi, abo muri Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga n’abandi.
Iyo nama yabaye buri buke ngo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND wafatwaga nk’umuntu wa kabiri ukomeye mu butegetsi, ajye mu ruzinduko i Pyongyang.
Iyo komite yashimwe cyane na Djeun Yeung Oun wari ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru i Kigali, aho yavuze ko gushyiraho iyo komite bizongera ubushuti n’umubano mu by’ubukungu w’ibihugu byombi.
Nubwo u Rwanda rwakoraga ibishoboka byose ngo rushimishe Koreya ya Ruguru, byakorwaga mu ibanga rikomeye ngo ibihugu bya Amerika n’u Burayi bitabimenya.
Ibanga ryaje kumenyekana!
Mu 1976 intambara y’ubutita yari irimbanyije.
Gufatwa n’abanyaburayi cyangwa abanyamerika ucuditse n’ibihugu by’Uburusiya, u Bushinwa n’abakorana nabyo, byari icyaha kitababarirwa.
Ibihugu bya Amerika n’u Burayi biciye muri Ambasade zabyo i Kigali, byaje kuvumbura ko u Rwanda ruri mu bushuti bwihariye na Koreya ya Ruguru.
Ubwo hari hashize iminsi Komite ishyizweho ndetse n’Umunyamabanga wa MRND avuye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, Ambasaderi w’u Bubiligi yahamgaje Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, amusaba ibisobanuro ku mubano wihariye uhari na Koreya ya Ruguru.
Ambasaderi yamubwiye ko ababajwe no kuba u Rwanda ruri kugendera ku icengezamatwara rya Koreya ya Ruguru no guhengamira ku ruhande rumwe, avuga ko u Rwanda rukwiye kumenya neza inshuti z’u Burayi n’umwanzi wabwo.
Wikileaks igaragaza ko Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda yatunguwe, aryoshyaryoshya u Bubiligi, avuga ko umubano uri hagati y’u Rwanda na Koreya udakanganye.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rushyigikiye kongera kwihuza kwa Koreya zombi, gusa yemera ko kuba barashinze komite yiga kuri icyo kibazo ntibazanemo Koreya y’Epfo kandi nayo biyireba, ari amakosa asabira imbabazi.
Yijeje u Bubiligi ko umubano w’u Rwanda n’icyo gihugu ndetse n’ibindi bihugu by’i Burayi na Amerika utazangizwa n’iryo shyirwaho rya Komite kuko icyerecyezo cy’ububanyi n’amahanga bw’u Rwanda bakizi neza.
Ambasaderi w’u Bubiligi yavuze ko yifuza kubona inyandiko z’ibyo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND yavugiye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, kugira ngo bemeze koko niba nta kindi cyihishe inyuma y’uwo mubano udasanzwe.
Habyarimana yasuye Koreya ya Ruguru ahasiga amacumu, ahabwa umudari Ibihugu by’u Burayi na Amerika bimaze kwihanangiriza u Rwanda, rwagabanyije amarere ariko rukomeza kubana na Koreya ya Ruguru kuko yarufashaga muri byinshi.
Tariki 7 Kamena 1978, Habyarimana yahagurutse i Kigali agiye mu ruzinduko rw’iminsi icumi muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa.
Yahagurutse ku kibuga cy’indege i Kanombe aherekejwe n’abantu 70, bagenda mu ndege yatanzwe n’u Bushinwa ya Boeing 107.
Uretse kuba uruzinduko rw’iminsi icumi rudasanzwe ku mukuru w’igihugu, bwari n’ubwa mbere Habyarimana agiye hanze aherekejwe n’abantu bangana gutyo, nkuko inyandiko za Ambasade ya Amerika zibigaragaza.
Habyarimana yakiriwe neza muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa.
I Pyongyang yakiriwe n’indirimbo za MRND zaririmbwe mu Kinyarwanda n’abana bo muri Koreya ya Ruguru.
Bivugwa ko Habyarimana yasigiye Perezida Kim Il-Sung amacumu nk’ikimenyetso cy’umubano mwiza, na we agororerwa umudari uzwi nka Order of the National Flag.
Amacumu Habyarimana yatanze ari mu nzu ndangamurage yiswe International Friendship Exhibition, irimo impano Kim Il-Sung na Kim Jong-il bagiye bahabwa n’abanyamahanga.
Nyuma y’iminsi icumi, tariki 17 Kamena 1978, Habyarimana n’abo bari bajyanye bagarutse mu Rwanda.
Ageze ku kibuga cy’indege, yavuze ukuntu yashimishijwe n’umuhate w’Abashinwa n’Abanya-Koreya n’uburyo bamwijeje inkunga itubutse bazaha u Rwanda.
Icyo gihe Koreya ya Ruguru yavuze ko igiye kwihutisha umushinga wo kubaka ingoro y’urubyiruko no guhinga umuceri kuri hegitari 200 mu Rwanda.
Banatanze inkunga ijyanye n’imodoka zirekura amajwi n’amashusho zigenewe urubyiruko ndetse n’iz’Ikigo cy’amatangazo ya Leta, Orinfor.
Mu 1979, Koreya ya Ruguru yahaye u Rwanda ibijyanye n’intwaro za gisirikare imbunda zo mu bwoko bwa Howitzers, n’imbunda nini zishobora guhangana n’ibitero byo mu kirere.
Uwo mwaka kandi Koreya yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu mishinga irimo uwo kubaka ikigo cy’amashuri cyakira abanyeshuri 400, kubaka ibitaro n’uruganda rw’ibireti.
Umubano w’u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru warakomeje kugeza mu 1994 muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nyuma yo guhagarika Jenoside, umubano w’u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru wabaye nk’ukonje uretse ko n’ijambo rya Koreya ya Ruguru mu ruhando mpuzamahanga ryasaga nk’aho ntaryo, kandi intambara y’ubutita yatumaga ibihugu byiremamo udutsiko nayo yari yarahosheje.
Tariki 18 Kanama 2010, Kim Jong Il wayoboraga Koreya yoherereje ubutumwa bw’ishimwe Perezida Paul Kagame amushimira kuba yongeye gutorerwa manda ya kabiri ku majwi 93 %.
Ibiro Ntaramakuru bya Koreya, Korea News Services (KNS) byatangaje ko Kim yifurije ishya n’ihirwe Perezida Kagame ndetse ko yizeye iterambere ry’umubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Guhera mu 1994, nta mubano ushingiye kuri za ambasade ibihugu byombi bifite.
Leta ya Habyarimana imaze kwihanangirizwa, yagenje make mu mubano wayo na Koreya ya Ruguru

#16118#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/u-rwanda-rwakubye-kabiri-ishoramari-rishya-mu-myaka-icumi-rigera-kuri-miliyari
U Rwanda rwakubye kabiri ishoramari rishya mu myaka icumi, rigera kuri miliyari $1.6 mu 2017 Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) cyatangaje ko ishoramari rishya u Rwanda rwanditse mu myaka icumi ishize ryiyongereye hejuru ya 100%, bigaragaza ko ari igihugu gikomeje gukurura abashoramari mu nzego zitandukanye.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yabigarutseho ubwo kuri uyu wa Kane uruganda rw’imodoka rwa Volkswagen rwatangazaga ko bitarenze Gicurasi 2018 ruzaba rwatangiye guteranyiriza imodoka zarwo mu Rwanda, rukazatangirana ishoramari rya miliyoni20 $.
Yagize ati “Mu 2007 ishoramari ryacu ryari miliyoni 800$ ariko ubwo twasozaga 2017 twari tumaze kwandika irya miliyari 1.675 $ ku buryo twakubye kabiri ishoramari mu myaka icumi ishize.”
Iri shoramari ryabaruwe umwaka ushize ryiyongereyeho miliyoni 515 $ ugereranyije n’ishoramari ryabaruwe mu 2016 kuko bwo handitswe ishoramari rya miliyari 1.160 $.
Imibare ya RDB igaragaza ko inzego zakuruye abashoramari benshi mu mwaka ushize ari ari ubwubatsi bwanditswemo ishoramari rya 637,659,692 $; ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro bwandikwamo irya 267,344,495 $ naho ibikorwaremezo byandikwamo ishoramari rya 202,660,135 $.
Bugesera Airport Company Ltd ifite ishoramari rinini kuruta irindi ryanditswe umwaka ushize, ringana na miliyoni 398.68 $; Ignite Power Rwanda Ltd ifite umushinga wo kugeza ingufu z’imirasire y’izuba ku ngo 250,000 bitarenze uyu mwaka ifite ishoramari rya miliyoni 113.84 $ naho Gasabo Investment Company ifite ishoramari rya miliyoni 89.02 $ mu mishinga itandukanye mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Harimo kandi African Panther Resources Ltd ifite ishoramari rya miliyoni 54.02 $ mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro na Kigali View Hotel and Apartment Ltd ifite ishoramari rya miliyoni 53.2 $.
Iyo mishinga itanu yonyine yiharira ishoramari rya miliyoni708.76 $.
Mu ishoramari ryanditswe mu mwaka ushize, iry’abanyamahanga riza ku isonga n’agaciro ka miliyari 1.041 $ zihwanye na 62.26% by’ishoramari ryose; iry’abenegihugu rikagira agaciro ka miliyoni 470.98 $ zihwanye na 28.15% by’ishoramari ryose.
Ishoramari rihuriweho n’Abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga rifite agaciro ka miliyoni 160.47 $, rihwanye na 9.59% by’ishoramari ryose ryanditswe.
Iri shoramari kandi rizanagira uruhare mu kongera imirimo ihangwa, muri gahunda leta yihaye yo guhanga imirimo 200,000 buri mwaka, idashingiye ku buhinzi.
Mu itangazo RDB yashyize ahagaragara, Akamanzi yavuze ko mu mwaka ushize habazwe imirimo 38,261 igomba guhangwa mu mishinga RDB yanditse mu nzego zirimo ibikorwaremezo, serivisi, gukora ibintu mu nganda, ubukerarugendo, ubwubatsi, ubuhinzi, ikoranabuhanga n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ni inyongera ya 184% ugereranyije n’iyanditswe mu 2016 kuko yari 13,477 igomba guhangwa, yabaruwe muri izo nzego umunani.”
Izamuka ry’iri shormari ni umusaruro w’imbaraga Guverinoma y’u Rwanda idahwema gushyira mu koroshya ishoramari.
Raporo ya ‘Doing Business 2018’ yashyize u Rwanda ku mwanya wa mbere mu gukora amavugurura menshi agamije korohereza abacuruzi mu myaka 15 ishize.
Muri iyo myaka rwakoze amavugurura 52; rukurikirwa na Kenya yakoze amavugurura 32 na Île Maurice yakoze 31.
U Rwanda ni nacyo gihugu cya mbere muri Afurika cyakoze amavugurura akomeye mu kugenzura no gushyira ku murongo ibigo by’ubucuruzi mu myaka icyenda ishize.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi yavuze ko ishoramari u Rwanda rwanditse mu 2017 ryageeze kuri miliyari 1.6 z'amadolari Bugesera Airport Company Ltd ni yo yazanye mu Rwanda ishoramari ry'amadolari menshi mu Rwanda mu 2017; ringana na miliyoni 398.68 $ Perezida Kagame ashyira ibuye ry'ifatizo ahazubakwa ikibuga cy'indege cya Bugesera Imirimp yo kubaka ikibuga cy'ingege i Bugesera yaratangiye

#16148#	1	sports	https://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/espoir-fc-na-yo-yahagaritse-amasezerano-y-abakinnyi-kubera-coronavirus
Espoir FC na yo yahagaritse amasezerano y’abakinnyi kubera Coronavirus Espoir FC yo mu Karere ka Rusizi, yabaye ikipe ya kabiri yo mu Rwanda, yamenyesheje abakinnyi bayo ko ihagaritse amasezerano bari bafitanye kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Mu cyumweru gishize, Musanze FC yabimburiye andi makipe mu gufata iki cyemezo.
Kuwa Gatatu tariki ya 15 Mata, Ubuyobozi bwa Espoir FC nabwo bwandikiye abakinnyi n’abatoza bayo ko bubaye buhagaritse amasezerano bari bafitanye kuko kuri ubu nta kazi bari gukorera ikipe.
Bwagize buti “Nshingiye ku cyorezo cya Covid-19 cyatumye ibikorwa byose by’imikino n’imyidagaduro bihagarara mu gihugu harimo na Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru 2019/20, hakaba hashize ukwezi n’igice kandi n’igihe kizarangirira kikaba kitazwi, Nshingiye ko umushahara ari ingurane y’akazi kakozwe kandi ibi bihe turimo akaba ari nta kazi gahari kajyanye no gukorera ikipe ya Espoir FC nk’uko bikubiye mu masezerano y’akazi wasinye".
Bakomeje bagira bati "Nkwandikiye nkumenyesha ko guhera uyu munsi ku wa 15 Mata 2020, amasezerano wagiranye na Espoir FC abaye ahagaritswe by’agateganyo kugeza igihe ibikorwa bijyanye n’imikino bizongera gusubukurwa.”
Itegeko ry’umurimo mu Rwanda riteganya ko mu bihe bidasanzwe, ikigo gishobora guhagarika abakozi bacyo mu gihe kitarenze amezi atatu, bagasubizwa mu mirimo igihe ibyo bihe bidasanzwe birangiye.
Espoir FC yahagaritse abakinnyi mu gihe havugwaga ko ubwo ingamba zo kuguma mu rugo zafashwe mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, zizaba zirangiye, izahita izabahembwa ukwezi kwa Werurwe.
Ubwo Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda, yahagararaga tariki ya 15 Werurwe, Espoir FC yagombaga gukina na APR FC, yari ku mwanya wa 14 n’amanota 17.
Inkuru bijyanye:Amategeko ateganyiriza iki umuntu wahagarikwa mu kazi mu bihe nk’ibi bya COVID-19?
Espoir FC yabaye ikipe ya kabiri yahagaritse imishahara y'abakinnyi mu Rwanda kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus

#16164#	6	religion	http://igihe.com/iyobokamana/amadini/article/abanyamadini-bavuze-kuri-gitwaza-wiyise-umuhanuzi-uruta-abandi
Abanyamadini bavuze kuri Gitwaza wiyise ‘umuhanuzi uruta abandi’ Guhera mu ntangiriro z’iki Cyumweru ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga mu Rwanda hari gucicikana amashusho agaragaza Umuyobozi w’Itorero Zion Temple, Apôtre Dr Gitwaza Paul, aho avuga ko nta wundi muhanuzi umuruta mu Rwanda no muri Afurika.
Ni amashusho yafashwe ku mugoroba wa tariki 30 Kanama 2018 ku rusengero rwa Zion Temple Gatenga, aho yatangaga icyigisho gifite umutwe ugira uti “ibimenyetso by’ibitangaza’.
Uwo munsi Gitwaza yagize ati “Sinzi niba muri iki gihugu hari umuhanuzi unduta.
Ibi mbabwira si ukwirata kandi Imana ibimbababarire niba hari akantu ko kwirata kandimo.
Sinzi ko muri iki gihugu, muri Afurika mufite umuhanuzi umeze nkanjye.
Birashoboka ko azaza ariko muri iki gihe ndiho ntimuzamubona.
Muzamushakishe mumumbwire.”
Gitwaza yagarukaga ku byo yari amaze kuvuga, by’uko yagiye ahura n’ibigeragezo byinshi, akitwa igisambo, umusambanyi, umupfumu n’ibindi ariko agakomeza gukora umurimo w’Imana kandi akabitsinda.
Yavuze ko nubwo batakwemera ko ari we muhanuzi ukomeye ubu, ngo bazabyemera atakiriho.
Ati “Ndababwiza ukuri muzabimenya naragiye.
Hari ahandi bazanyemera.
Kubakwa kw’iki gihugu mbifitemo uruhare runini cyane.
Nahanuye nka Ezekiyeli kugira no amagufwa yongere abeho kandi intambara naciyemo nta wundi mukozi w’Imana uzazicamo cyangwa waziciyemo.”
Nyuma yo gusakara kw’ayo mashusho, ntiyavuzweho rumwe haba mu binyamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Ubusanzwe amadini yose ntiyemera abahanuzi batari abagaragara muri Bibiliya.
Ku babemera, umuhanuzi ni umuntu ushobora kubona ibizaba akoreshejwe n’umwuka w’Imana akabivuga, igihe cyagera bikazagaragara uko yabivuze.
IGIHE yaganiriye n’abandi banyamadini batandukanye mu Rwanda, bagaragaza uko bafashe ayo magambo ya Gitwaza.
Umuvugizi wa Kiliziya Gatolika akaba n’umwepiskopi wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Philippe Rukamba, yabwiye IGIHE ko batemera iby’ubuhanuzi.
Yagize ati “Hari ibintu wenda nk’amabonekerwa ashobora kubaho, nayo tuyemera buhoro cyane.
Buriya nka Kibeho kugira ngo yemerwe hari hashize imyaka 25 nibura.
[Ibyo dukora] ni ibisanzwe aho ufata Bibiliya ukayisoma, ukagerageza kuyishyira mu buzima bwawe ariko ibyo kuvuga ngo Isi izashira ejo bundi cyangwa hagiye kuba ibi, ntabwo tubyemera.”
Rukamba avuga ko na we ahubwo hari ubuhanuzi asigaye yumva bukamutera ubwoba.
Ati “Hari ubuhanuzi buntera n’ubwoba busigaye buriho.
Barakubwira bati ‘turahanura wowe Imana iragukiza ntuzongere no kunywa imiti, ntuzongere kureba muganga, emera gusa usenge.’
Ibyo ntabwo ari byo, twe ntitubyemera, ni amafuti.
Niba Imana igukijije yerekana ko wakize.
Kuvuga gusa ngo emera nta kintu kibigaragaza, ushobora no kubimbwira utarakize.”
Bishop Marguerite Rwandamura, Umushumba w’Itorero United Christian Church, Ishami rya Gikondo, yavuze ko mu Itorero rye bemera ubuhanuzi gusa ngo nta bwo yamenya ikigenderwaho ngo umuntu avuge ko ari we wa mbere.
Yagize ati “Njye simuhakanya ko ari umuhanuzi ariko kumenya urwego ariho ntabwo ndi Imana cyangwa umwuka wera.
Ntabwo nzi abarusha abandi, ntabwo nzi abaza ku mwanya wa mbere […] icyo nemera ni uko abahanuzi bariho kandi ubuhanuzi bw’ukuri n’ubw’ibinyoma bubaho.”
Rwandamura avuga ko abakirisito basabwa guhagarara ku ijambo ry’Imana kugira ngo babashe gutahura abahanura ukuri n’ibinyoma.
Ati “Iyo umuntu ahamye ku ijambo ry’Imana akaryiga akarisobanukirwa, akaryemera, abahanuzi iyo baje ntibashobora kumutesha umurongo.”
Bishop Murekezi Simon Masasu uyobora Restoration Church i Rubavu, yabwiye IGIHE, ko bemera ubuhanuzi ariko uvuga ko ngo sibyo kuvuga ko hari uruta abandi.
Avuga ko mu ivugabutumwa hagomba kubaho abantu batanu bafite imihamagaro itandukanye barimo intumwa, umuhanuzi, umuvugabutumwa, umupasitori n’umwarimu kandi bose buzuzanya.
Yagize ati “Uwo aribeshya kuko Bibiliya ivuga ko mu mihamagaro uko ari itanu biruzuzanya kugira ngo Imana ikore.
Uwo rero afite ya kamere gusa imukoresha.
Umuntu w’Imana ni umuntu uca bugufi akumva, akagirwa inama kandi akamenya ko iyo Imana imuhaye ubutumwa kugira ngo abusoze neza umwuka w’Imana niwo umukoresha.”
Masasu we yavuze ko bitanashoboka ko umuntu aba umuhanuzi ngo abe n’intumwa icyarimwe.
Ati “Kuki yiyita intumwa kandi akiyita n’umuhanuzi?
Urumva ko agiye kuvanga ibintu bibiri icyarimwe.
Haba harimo akantu k’ubuyobe.
Abahanuzi babayeho na kera, baracyariho kandi si we wenyine.”
Umuyobozi w’Itorero Zeraphath Holy Church, Bishop Harerimana Jean Bosco, yavuze ko nta muhanuzi umenya ko ari we, ngo abo akorera ibitangaza nibo bamumenya.
Ati “Eliya yigeze kubwira Imana ko ari we muhanuzi usigaye, Imana iramubwira iti uribeshye hari ibindi bihumbi by’abahanuzi biri inyuma.
Imana yahise imusaba kurangiza umurimo we, imusaba kwimika uzamusimbura Elisa akarangiza urugendo rwe.”
Yavuze ko igihe umuntu atangiye kwivuga ibigwi mu murimo w’Imana ngo aba atangiye kunanirwa.
Ati “Ibyo ukora nibyo bikwamamaza, iyo utangiya kwiyamamaza uba watangiye kunanirwa.”
Apôtre Paul Gitwaza yakunze kumvikana mu buhanuzi bwo mu bihe bitandukanye butavuzweho rumwe.
Mu 2015 yahanuye iby’imperuka y’Isi, bica igikuba muri rubanda ariko birangira itabaye.
Ibi nyuma yarabihakanye.
Ati "Sinavuze ko Isi izarangira ku itariki 28 Nzeri.
Impamvu ntabivuga ni uko Bibiliya itatubwira umunsi, icya kabiri nanjye nzi umunsi Isi izarangirira nta ngendo najyamo, sinakwigisha abantu gukora no gutekereza no kureba imbere.’’
Si Gitwaza wenyine wakunze guhanura ibintu ntibivugweho rumwe, kuko umwaka ushize Bishop Innocent Rugagi uyobora Redeemed Gospel Church, yahanuriye umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda ko azaritwara, ntibyakunda.
Muri uwo mwaka kandi hari amashusho ataravuzweho rumwe yamugaragaje yaturira imigisha ku bakiristo be bifuza amafaranga, imodoka, inzu n’ibindi bitewe n’icyo umuntu yifuza, ko bagiye kubibona mu gihe gito.
Umva Gitwaza avuga ko nta muhanuzi umuruta muri Afurika Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza yavuze ko nta wundi muhanuza umuruta muri Afurika

#16180#	9	culture	https://rwandamagazine.com/umuco/article/ibisobanuro-by-amezi-ya-kinyarwanda
Ibisobanuro by’amezi ya Kinyarwanda Amezi ya Kinyarwanda agira ibisobanuro bijyanye n’ibihe byarangaga ikirere ndetse n’ibyarangaga umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi nka bimwe byari bitunze Abanyarwanda hafi ya bose kugeza n’ubu.
Aya mazina yagiye yitwa amezi hagendewe ku bihe akenshi abakurambere babayemo bimwe bikaba bigihura nibyubu ariko hakaba n’inyito bahaye aya mezi zisa zizidahura n’ubuzima abanyarwanda babamo muri iki gihe.
Amezi ya Kinyarwanda uko ari 12 asobanura iki?
Mutarama: Ni ukwezi abantu batindaga kuryama bari mu gitaramo kuko nta mirimo babaga bafite ituma bazinduka.
Gashyantare: Ni igihe cy’izuba rikaze cyane ku buryo nta bantu babaga bakicara ku ntare (amabuye) kubera ubushyuhe bwinshi bukomoka kuri iryo zuba.
Werurwe: Ni ukwezi kw’imvura nyinshi, mu magambo arambuye bakwita “Werure ugwe”.
Mata: Ni ukwezi urwuri ruba rutoshye cyane, inka zikarisha zigahaga zigatubura umukamo.
Gicurasi: Ni ukwezi kw’ibicu byinshi bibyuka bibuditse hasi.
Kamena: Ukwezi kw’amasaka aba yeze cyane yabaye menshi.
Kwitwa Kamena kamena amasekuru.
Nyakanga: Ukwezi kw’izuba ryinshi, inka ziba zishonje kubera kubura urwuri, bakakwita Nyakanga kanga amabuguma (inka zishaje).
Kanama: Ibintu byose biba byanamye kubera izuba ryo muri Nyakanga, bakunze kukwita Kanama kanamiye Nzeri.
Nzeri: Ni ukwezi ibihe biba bitangiye kumera neza, ibyo bahinze biba bitangiye kwera.
Ukwakira: Ni ukwezi ko kwakira imyaka ibyo bahinze biba byeze.
Ugushyingo: Nyuma yo kweza cyane no gusarura byo mu Kwakira, hahita haza ukwezi ko guhunika imyaka, kukitwa Ugushyingo gushyingura ukuboza.
Ukuboza: Imyaka iba igenda isaza kubera kubura izuba aho ihunitse, indi ikiri mu mirima kuko iba yareze ntisarurwe bikayiviramo kubora.
Bakakwita rero Ukuboza kuboza imyaka.

#16185#	1	sports	http://www.kigalitoday.com/imikino-11/football/article/kiyovu-sports-itsinze-apr-nyuma-y-imyaka-12-byarayinaniye
Kiyovu Sports itsinze APR nyuma y’imyaka 12 byarayinaniye Ku munsi wa Kane wa Shampiyona ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports ibashije gutsinda APR 1-0, ibintu byaherukaga mu 2005.
Kiyovu ibashije gutsinda APR nyuma y’imyaka 12 itabasha gutsinda Uyu mukino wabereye kuri Stade Mumena i Nyamirambo, wagiye kuba benshi bibaza niba Kiyovu ikuraho amateka y’imyaka 12 imaze idatsinda APR.
Kiyovu yaje kwegukana intsinzi y’igitego kimwe ku busa aho amakipe yombi yari yatangiye igice cya mbere nta bintu bikomeye yagaragazaga.
Ku munota wa 32 Kiyovu yaje kwiba umugono APR itsinda igitego cya mbere ku burangare bw’umuzamu Kimenyi Yves.
Iki gitego cyatsinzwe na Moustapha Francis igice kirangira Kiyovu iyoboye nigitego 1-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri APR yaje mu isura nshya, igerageza gusatira izamu rya \kiyovu, ariko ntibyayihira, iminota 90 irangira ntagihindunze.

Rubavu : Umugore yafatanywe ibiro 30 by’urumugi Mu ijoro rya tariki ya 9 Nzeri 2019, Uwineza Christine utuye mu mudugudu wa Murambi, akagari ka Buhaza mu murenge wa Rubavu, akarere ka Rubavu yatawe muri yombi, yinjiza mu Rwanda udupfunyika ibihumbi 24 tw’urumogi, tungana n’ibiro 30.
Yafatanywe ibiro 30 by’urumogi Umuvugizi wa Police mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Emmanuel Kayigi, yavuze ko ubufatanye bw’abaturage butuma abinjiza urumogi mu Rwanda kimwe n’abarucuruza bagenda bafatwa, ndetse Uwineza nabo bari kumwe amakuru yabo akaba yaratanzwe na Polisi.
Ati "Bafashwe ku bufatanye n’abaturage babwiye inzego z’umutekano ko Uwineza n’abo bakorana binjiza mu Rwanda urumugi kandi bagiye kwinjiza urundi, ubwo Uwineza yinjiraga mu Rwanda avuye muri Congo ni bwo yahise afatwa abari kumwe na we bisubirira muri Congo".
Mu Rwanda ntihahingwa urumogi kuko rutemewe guhingwa no gukoreshwa, cyakora urucuruzwa ngo ruva muri Tanzania na Congo Kinshasa, kandi rukagira ingaruka ku barukoresha.
CIP Emmanuel Kayigi avuga ko itegeko rihana abinjiza biyobyabwenge mu Rwanda ryazamuye ibihano, kuburyo ubu igihano cyagejejwe ku gifungo cya burundu nyamara abarwinjiza ntibacika intege.
Uwineza Christine wafatanywe urumogi, ahakana ko urumogi ari urwe akavuga ko rwari urw’uwitwa Muganda utuye muri Bisiza, akavuga ko yamuhamagaye kuri telefoni igendanwa bakamufata batarahura.
Yagize ati "Urumogi ntabwo rwari urwanjye, yambwiye ko umutwaro we ufashwe n’abashumba ngo njye kureba ababifashe ni bwo nafashwe, ariko njye sinkora ubucuruzi bw’urumogi".
CIP Emmanuel Kayigi avuga ko Uwineza agiye gushyikirizwa urwego rw’ubugenzacyaha RIB, rukazaba ari rwo rumushyikiriza ubushinjacyaha, urukiko rwamuhamya icyaha agafungwa burundu.
Kayigi avuga ko abaturage bakorana neza n’inzego z’umutekano mu guhashya abacuruza ibiyobyabwenge kuko mu karere ka Rubavu bafata abantu benshi bacuruza urumogi.
Agira ati "Kumenya imibare y’urumogi rwafashwe bisaba kugenzura kuko turufata kenshi kuko hano ni inzira yarwo, icyo dushima ni uburyo abaturage baduha amakuru, kandi turabasaba gukomeza gukorana n’inzego z’umutekano kuko nk’uyu yarajyanye udupfunyika ibihumbi 24 mu Rwanda byari kwangiza abaturage, iyo tumuhagaritse ni insinzi".
CIP Kayigi avuga ko gucuruza urumogi nta nyungu bigira, akabishingira ko iyo ufashwe amafaranga washoyemo yose ahomba ndetse wafungwa ibyo wakoraga bikangirika, hiyongereyeho gutakaza igihe.

IONIQ, ubwoko bw’imodoka zidasanzwe za Hyundai zikoresha amashanyarazi Sosiyete y’Abanya-Koreya y’Epfo ikora imodoka, Hyundai, iherutse kumurika ubwoko butatu bushya bw’imodoka zidasanzwe ziswe IONIQ,5,6 na 7, zifashisha ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Ni imodoka zitezweho gufasha iyo sosiyete kwigarurira isoko ry’imodoka zigezweho mu myaka iri imbere, cyane ko Isi yose iri muri gahunda yo kugabanya imyuka ihumanya ikirere, harimo n’iterwa n’imodoka zikoresha ingufu z’ibikomoka kuri Peteroli.
Hyundai yari isanzwe ifite imodoka ya IONIQ yakoze mu 2017, ishobora gukoresha Lisansi, ikoresha Lisansi n’amashanyarazi, ndetse ikaba yanasharizwa.
Iyo modoka yarakunzwe cyane kubera imikorere yayo, ariko ahanini gukoresha amashanyarazi aba ari cyo ikundirwa cyane, bityo Hyundai irayivugurura mu cyiswe “Ukuvuka bwa kabiri kwa IONIQ”, aho yamuritswe nk’imodoka igenewe gukoresha ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Iyo modoka yakozwe mu buryo (model) butatu busa n’uburutana butandukanyijwe na za nimero z’imibare, imwe ihabwa 5, indi 6 n’indi 7.
Hyundai IONIQ 5 Iyi ni yo iri ku rwego rwo hasi muri eshatu zakozwe, biteganyijwe ko izashyirwa ku isoko mu ntangiriro za 2021.
Izaba ikoresha uburyo bwiswe EV ‘45’ bwifashisha ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Ni uburyo Hyundai yari yagaragarije bwa mbere i Frankfurt mu Budage mu 2019, mu Birori Mpuzamahanga byo kwerekana Ibinyabiziga(IAA).
Iyo modoka izajya ishyirwamo batiri zasharijwe ku mashanyarazi zitandukanye, harimo iyo ishobora kugenderaho ku muvuduko wa kilometero 58 ku isaha, n’indi ishobora kugenderaho ku muvuduko wa kilometero 78 ku isaha.
Biteganyijwe ko IONIQ 5 izashyirwa ku isoko muri Gashyantare 2021, ikaba ishobora kuzaba ifite agaciro ka 54,956.60$ (miliyoni 54 Frw).
Hyundai IONIQ 6 Nyuma ya IONIQ 5 izatangira kugurishwa mu 2021, Hyundai ifite gahunda y’uko mu 2022 izashyira ku iskoko indi modoka yisumbuyeho mu bushobozi, ndetse izaba ikoresha uburyo bwihariye bwiswe EV “Prophecy” nabwo bw’ingufu z’amashanyarazi.
Izaba ikoze ku buryo hari agatiyo kazaba gashinzwe kohereza akayaga aho batiri ziri kugira ngo zidashyuha.
Ntabwo haratangazwa neza umuvuduko izaba igenderaho, gusa bivugwa ko izaba ishobora kugenda kilometero 482.8 umuriro uri muri batiri utarashiramo.
Kubera ko imiterere yayo izaba ijya gusa n’iya IONIQ 5, igiciro cyayo bikekwa ko kizaba ari nka 68,730$(miliyoni 68 Frw) nubwo Hyundai itarabyemeza neza.
Hyundai IONIQ 7 Nyuma y’izo modoka ebyiri zitangaje, Hyundai izamurika ubwoko bwa nyuma bwa IONIQ 7 mu 2024.
Nta byinshi biratangazwa kuri iyi modoka, ariko iyo sosiyete yavuze ko izaba ifite “SUV” ihambaye ku buryo yabasha kugenda mu muhanda no mu butayu.
Icyo izaba irusha izayibanjirije, ni uko izaba ishobora gukoresha uburyo bwa EV ‘45’ bukoreshwa na IONIQ 5, ndetse n’ubwa EV “Prophecy” buzakoreshwa na IONIQ 6.
Izaba ishobora kugenda kilometero 482.8 ikoresha batiri imwe.
Bikekwa ko izaba igura arenga 68,730$.
Amakuru yimbitse kuri izi modoka biteganyijwe ko Hyundai izayashyira ahagaragara muri Gashyantare 2021, ubwo IONIQ 5 izaba ishyirwa ku isoko byeruye.
Hyundai IONIQ 5 ni uku igaragara inyuma Hyundai IONIQ 6 izashyirwa ku isoko mu 2022 IONIQ 5 izajya isharizwa ku mashanyarazi IONIQ 5 izashyirwa ku isoko muri Gashyantare 2021 IONIQ 6 ni uku igaragara urebeye inyuma IONIQ 7 ni uku izajya icana mu mwijima amatara y'inyuma Imbere muri IONIQ 6 ni uku hasa

#16243#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/ibimenyetso-bikwereka-ko-urukundo-rwanyu-rugiye-guhagarara
Ibimenyetso bikwereka ko urukundo rwanyu rugiye guhagarara Niba uri murukundo cyangwa se ufite umukunzi ariko ukabona bitagenda neza, bitewe n’uburyo mwari mubanye mukimenyana.
Hari ibintu bimwe na bimwe byagufasha kumenya ko umukunzi wawe atacyikwiyumvamo cyangwa se ubushuti bwanyu bugana ku musozo(break).
Niba yarasanzwe aguhamagara kuri telefone inshuro eshatu(urugero) ku munsi, ukabona atangiye kugabanya akaguhamagara rimwe cyangwa se bukira atanaguhamagaye ngo anakubaze uko umunsi wagenze,icyo gihe haba harimo akantu.
Tutirengagije ko wenda hari impamvu z’akazi gashobora kumubana kenshi , ariko ntiyabura n’iminota 5 y’ubutumwa bugufi kandi niyo byaba kubura umwanya ntiwawubura iminsi yose.
Niba mwari musanzwe musohokana nko mu mpera z’icyumweru, mugasangira, mukanaganira ku by’urukundo rwanyu, ukabona atangiye kuguha impamvu wenda ngo mfite gahunda n’izindi nshuti ze cyangwa ngo ndananiwe ndumva nshaka kuruhuka,ihangane tuzajyayo ubutaha,ugasanga ntamwanya akiguha, icyo gihe ntabakikwiyumvamo.
Niba mu gihe mwabaga muri kumwe warashoboraga gufata telefone ye nta rwikekwe agufiteho,ariko ugasanga muri icyo gihe niba munahuye adashobora kushyira telefone ye hasi, yirinda ko wayifata, icyo gihe hari icyo abagukinga.
Niba yarakugishaga inama y’ikintu runaka agiye gukora,ubu ukabona cyangwa ukumva abikubwiye byararangiye,menya ko bitameze neza.
Iterambere ryaje.
Niba yarasanzwe ashyira ifoto yawe kuri whatsapp ye(profile),ugasanga ashyizeho ifoto y’undi mukobwa utazi atigeze anakubwira, badafitanye n’isano(relatives),menya ko atacyikwiyumvamo.
Hari n’igihe wowe umuhamagara ku masaha wenda mwarimusanzwe muvuganiraho bitewe n’igihe mwese muhugukira,ugasanga ari kuyivugiraho umwanya munini,cyangwa se wamuhamagara ntayifate na nyuma yaza ntaguhamagare kandi yabonye ko wamubuze(missed call yawe),nyuma wakongera kumuhamagara wenda akwitabye nabwo ntakubwire impamvu , akagenda aca ku ruhande ashaka kukwikiza gusa.
Ibyo ni bimwe mu bimenyetso bishobora kukwereka ko uwo mukundana (umukunzi wawe)ashaka ko urukundo rwanyu rurangira, atakigukeneye. ashobora kubiterwa no kuba amaze kuguhararukwa cyangwa se yabonye undi akabura aho ahera akubwira ngo mubivemo kuko wenda aba abona ntacyo mupfuye kigaragara, impamvu atari wowe iturutseho.

Twitter yatangiye kugerageza ‘Fleets’, uburyo bwo gusangiza inkuru zisiba nyuma y’amasaha 24 Urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa ‘Twitter’ rwatangije igerageza ryo kurunyuzaho inkuru cyangwa ubutumwa bw’amashusho n’inyandiko, bizajya byisiba nyuma y’amasaha 24, ku buryo nta muntu wundi uzajya abasha kubusangiza abandi cyangwa ngo agaragaze ko yabwishimiye.

Ubu buryo bushya buzajya bugaragara gusa mu gihe umuntu akanze ahabugenewe (avatar), abandi bantu babe bagira icyo babuvugaho banyuze ku butumwa bwihariye bujya kuri nyirabwo gusa.

#16349#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/icyombo-cyashyizwe-mu-kiyaga-cya-mugesera-kitezweho-byinshi-mu-buhahirane
Icyombo cyashyizwe mu kiyaga cya Mugesera kitezweho byinshi mu buhahirane hagati y'uturere Abahinzi n'abacuruzi bo mu karere ka Ngoma baturiye ikiyaga cya Mugesera barishimira icyombo cya moteri cyashyizwe muri icyo kiyaga kizajya kibafasha mu buhahirane n'ubwikorezi na bagenzi babo ba Rwamagana n'ahandi hakora iki kiyaga.
Iki cyombo cyatashywe ku mugaragaro na governeur w'intara y'Iburasirazuba, Uwamariya Odette, kuri uyu wa 23/07/2014 ubwo yatahaga ibikorwa by'indashyikirwa byagezweho mu ngengo y'imari y'umwaka ushize wa 2013-2014.
Iki cyombo gifite ubushobozi bwo kwikorera toni 35 gitwara imizigo n'abantu ndetse gifite akarusho ko gishobora gutwara n'imodoka maze bikaba byafasha abacuruzi kugera i Kigali byoroshye n'imodoka zabo zipakihe imyaka n'ibindi.
Nubwo iki cyombo cyatashywe ntago gihita gitangira gukoreshwa kuko hagitegerejwe ko ikigo RURA kiza kukigenzura ndetse ngo hategerejwe ko iki cyombo kigira ubwishingizi nkuko bigenda ku modoka igihe igiye mu muhanda.
Ubu bwato ngo bufite ubushobozi bwo gutwara toni 35.
Icyombo cyatashywe cyari kimaze imyaka hafi icyenda cyarapfuye kitagikora, hanyuma akarere ka Ngoma gafata icyemezo cyo kugisana kugirango bahamye ubuhahirane n'ubwikorezi n'utundi turere dukikije iki kiyaga.
Abaturage baturiye ikiyaga cya Mugesera batuye mu murenge wa Mugesera baganiriye n'itangazamakuru, bavuze ko ubundi umusaruro wabo byabagoraga cyane kugirango ugere ku masoko ya Rwamagana na Kigali kubera ikibazo cy'urugendo rurerure bakoraga igihe batanyuze iyo mu mazi.
Nizeyimana Alexandre utuye mu murenge wa Mugesera avuga ko umusaruro wabo w'ubuhinzi nk'ibitoki, inanasi bizajya biborohera kuwujyana i Kigali na Rwamagana ahari isoko ryiza.
Yagize ati "Ubundi umusaruro wacu w'ibitoki, inanasi n'ibindi byatugoraga cyane kuwugeza i Kigali kuko nta bwato bunini nkubu bwari buhari ariko buba iki cyombo gitwara imizigo ndetse n'imodoka bizadufasha guhahirana na bagenzi bacu b'i Rwamagana na Kigali kandi ku giciro cyiza ku muhinzi."
Ubundi kuva mu murenge wa Mugesera ugera i Kigali bisaba kuzenguruka i Kibungo cyangwa ugaca mu Bugesera uciye mu muhanda, ariko ukoresheje inzira y'amazi ngo birihuta cyane.
Aba baturage bavuga ko bifashishaga ubwato buto bwa gakondo budafite moteri bwatwara utuzigo duke bigatuma bitaborohera.
Ubwato buto bwa gakondo bakoreshaga ngo bwabaga bwateza impanuka.
Umuyobozi w'intara y'Iburasirazuba, Uwamariya Odette , ubwo yatahaga ku mugaragaro icyi cyombo yavuze ko gifite akamaro kanini mu buhahirane hagati y'imirenge ituriye iki kiyaga mu turere twa Ngoma na Rwamagana ndetse nahandi.
Yavuze ko nk'umurenge wa Mugesera ufite umwihariko w'ibihingwa bihera birimo inanasi nziza ziherutse gusurwa n'abashoramari bo mu birwa bya Seychelles ndetse n'umusaruro w'ibitoki byose byabaga bikeneye amasoko.
Iki cyombo ngo kije kuba igisubizo mu kuba uyu musaruro bajya bawugurisha byoroshye mu karere ka Rwamagana ndetse no mu mugi wa Kigali.
Icyi cyombo cyasanwe ku bufatanye n'akarere ka Ngoma mu ngengo y'imari y'umwaka ushize ya 2013-2014 imirimo yo kugisana yatwaye miliyoni 32 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda imirimo yo kugisana itwara amezi atandatu.
Cyasanywe na kompanyi yitwa View Lake Travel Ltd.
Biteganijwe ko ikiguzi cy'urugendo muri icyi cyombo kitazarenza amafaranga 200 yari asanzwe atangwa mu bwato buto bwa gakondo bwakoreshwaga.
Ibindi bikorwa by'indashyikirwa byasuwe n'umuyobozi w'intara harimo gutaha umudugudu w'icyitegererezo i Rukumberi, gutaha poste de santé yubatswe n'abaturage bo mu murenge wa Kazo ndetse no gusura laboratoire y'ibitaro bikuru bya Kibungo.
Jean Claude Gakwaya

Iyi poste de sante igiye kubakwa na Minisiteri y'ubuzima ku bufatanya bw'ingabo z'igihugu mu bikorwa byitiriwe icyumwe cy'ingabo z'igihugu (Army Week) bikaba birimo gukorwa mu rwego rwo kwitegura isabukuru y'imyaka 20 ishize ingabo zahoze ari iza FPR Inkotanyi zihagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umudugudu wa Bubare uhana imbibe n'igihugu cya Uganda ahitwa Kizinga.
Ibi byatumaga abaturage bamwe bawutuye bahitamo kujya kwivurizayo kuko ikigo nderabuzima cya Rwempasha kiri kure yabo mu birometero bisaga 7.
Minisitiri w'ubuzima, Dr Agnes Binagwaho hamwe n'umugaba w'ingabo zirwanira ku butaka, Maj.
Gen.
Frank Mushyo Kamanzi bashyira ibuye ry'ifatizo ahubakwa Poste de santé.

Rimwe yampaye uwa maralia, iy'umugongo, uw'inzoka, imvune, rubagimpande byose kandi nta ndwara n'imwe yigeze ansuzuma."
Umugaba w'ingabo zirwanira ku butaka, Major General Frank Mushyo Kamanzi, avuga ko MU GIHE hitegurwa isabukuru y'imyaka 20 u Rwanda rubohojwe ingabo zatekereje ku buzima kuko ari inkingi ikomeye y'umutekano akaba ari yo mpamvu hatekerejwe kwegereza abaturage iyi poste de santé.
Ngo umutekano ukubiyemo byinshi ariko ubuzima nibwo buza ku isonga kuko ntiwarinda abaturage barwaye kandi nabo ntibafatanya n'ingabo badafite ubuzima bwiza bityo n'iterambere rikaba ritagerwaho.
Abasirikare n'abapolisi bari kumwe n'abaturage batangiye kubaka poste de sante ya Bubare.
Ibikorwa byo kubaka iyi poste de santé bizakorwa ku bufatanye bw'ingabo z'igihugu n'abaturage.
Minisitiri w'ubuzima Doctor Agnes Binagwaho yasabye abaturage buri wese gutanga uruhare rwe kugira ngo iyubakwa ry'iyi nyubako ryihute kandi rirangire vuba.
Ubundi iyi nyubako ifite agaciro k'amafaranga y'u Rwanda miliyoni 25.
Kubera ko imirimo imwe izakorwa ku bufatanye bw'abaturage n'ingabo z'igihugu iyi Poste de Sante ya Bubare izuzura itwaye miliyoni 11 n'igice.
Ibikoresho n'abakozi bazatangwa na minisiteri y'ubuzima.
By'umwihariko iyi poste de santé ya Bubare izafasha abaturage b'akagali ka Rugarama irimo n'aka Kazaza twose duhana imbibe n'igihugu cya Uganda kandi turi kure y'ikigo nderabuzima cya Rwempasha.
Minisiteri y'ingabo ikaba itangaza ko mu kwizihiza isabukuru y'imyaka 20 igihugu kibohowe hazaba hamaze kubakwa poste de santé 40 mu gihugu cyose ariko umwaka uzarangire hubatswe izigera kuri 500.
Sebasaza Gasana Emmanuel

#16375#	4	health	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Ubuzima/Menya-uko-wahangana-n-indwara-y-ubwandu-bw-amaraso-Blood-infection-ihitana-benshi
Menya uko wahangana n’indwara y’ubwandu bw’amaraso (Blood infection) ihitana benshi Ni kenshi muri iki gihe, umuntu arwara yajya kwa muganga bamusuzuma akumva baramubwiye ngo ufite "infection" mu maraso.
Iyi rero niyo yitwa ubwandu bw’amaraso (blood infection), ikaba ari indwara imaze kugenda yiyongera kandi ihitana benshi iyo itavuwe hakiri kare.
Ese ubwandu bw’amaraso ni iki?
Buterwa n’iki?
Ubusanzwe tugira indwara nyinshi twandura zitewe na mikorobi, habaho iziterwa na bagiteri, imiyege (champignon) cyangwa virusi.
Uko rero umubiri ugenda uhangana n’izi mikorobi, habaho igihe zimwe muri zo zinjira mu maraso atembera mu mubiri.
Ibyo bishobora gutuma ibice by’inyama zo mu nda bibyimba cyangwa bikangirika bitewe n’izo mikorobi zinjiye mu maraso.
Nibyo twita ubwandu bw’amaraso.
Ese ni bande iyi ndwara yibasira cyane?
Iyi ndwara n’ubwo ntawe itafata, ariko hari abo yibasira cyane: Ese ni ibihe bimenyetso biranga iyi ndwara?
Ese iyi ndwara yakirindwa?
Ku bana bato bisaba kubitaho no gukurikirana buri karwara kose barwaye ugahita umuvuza.
Byaba ibicurane, inkorora, gusa ukibona agize umuriro ujyana no kuruka no guhitwa kandi hari indi ndwara yari afite cyangwa akirutse, mwihutane kwa muganga.
Isuku ni isoko y’ubuzima.
By’umwihariko ku bantu bari mu bitaro, gukaraba intoki no kwita ku isuku y’aho uri byagufasha.
Ese wari uzi ko hari imiti myimerere kuri ubu burwayi?
Ushobora kuba ukunda kurwara infection mu maraso kenshi, bitewe n’uko umubiri wawe udafite ubudahangarwa buhagije.
Ubu habonetse imiti y’umwimerere ikoze mu bimera, ikaba ikoreshwa ku ruhando mpuzamahanga, ifasha kuzamura ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri ndetse igahangana cyane na za mikorobi zanduza amaraso.
Muri yo twavugamo nka: Propolis plus capsule, Ginseng Rh capsule, A-power capsule.
Iyi miti nta ngaruka igira ku muntu wayikoresheje kuko ikoze mu bimera kandi irizewe Abantu baba bifuza kubona iyi miti, bashobora kugana ivuriro Horaho Life rikorera i Kigali mu nyubako yo kwa Rubangura muri etaji ya 3 ku muryango wa 301 na 302.
Ku bindi bisobanuro wabahamagara kuri 0788698813 /0728698813.
Ushobora no gusura website yabo www.horahoclinic.rw

#16393#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/kubaho/urukundo/article/ibintu-abakundana-bagomba-kwimenyereza-mbere-yo-kubana
Ibintu abakundana bagomba kwimenyereza mbere yo kubana Kugira ngo umubano w’abakundana ube uw’ibihe byose ni ngombwa ko abashaka gushinga umuryango hari ibyo bimenyereza mbere yo gutera iyo ntambwe.
Abitegura kuzabana akaramata bagira ibyo baha agaciro mbere yo kwemeranywa kubana by’iteka nta kwishishyanya kandi baziranye.
Inkuru ya Huffington Post igaragaza ko abantu bitegura kubana baba bakwiye kumarana igihe, bakagirana gahunda zitandukanye zibahuza kenshi kuko bituma buri wese arushaho kumenya mugenzi we ndetse akanamwiyumvamo.
Ibi ni bimwe mu byakusanyijwe bikwiye kwitabwaho mu bari mu rugendo rw’urukundo rurambye.  
Gutemberana Gufata urugendo rurerure, ugatemberana n’umukunzi wawe ni byiza kuko bigufasha kumenyana byimbitse ndetse no kumenya uko yitwara igihe ahuye n’ikintu runaka kimugoye.
Inzobere mu by’imitekerereze, Spencer Scott, avuga ko uko utemberana n’umuntu munaganira aribwo umenya ibyo akunda, ibyo yanga niba ari umuntu utekereza ibyiza mu buzima bwe cyangwa se niba ari ahora abona ko nta cyiza kiri mu buzima bugira.  
Gufata imyanzuro hatabaye intonganya Kuba abakundana batakumvikana ku ngingo runaka nta kibazo kibirimo ariko uburyo babiganiraho batuje nta rusaku no guterana amagambo bituma bagera ku mwanzuro uboneye.
Inzobere mu kugira inama imiryango John Amodeo yagize ati “Ni gute utekereza ko uzihanganira kutumvikana uzagirana n’umuntu mwamaze gushakana igihe utabasha kwihangana ngo umutege amatwi muganire mutuje mukiri abasore ngo kandi muze kugera ku mwanzuro, mwembi mwumvikanyeho.”
Avuga ko uko muganira ari nako ubasha kureba niba umuntu wawe aca bugufi mukumvikana cyangwa se niba atera hejuru ibintu bikaba intambara.  
Kuganira byimbitse ku byaranze ubwana bwanyu Gusobanukirwa umukunzi wawe, ibyo yizera, ibyo yemera, kumenya ibyerekeye umuryango we n’ibyo ukunda, ibyagiye bimushimisha n’ibyamubabaje kuva mu bwana bwe ni ingezi cyane.
Ibi bituma umenya niba azakurutisha umuryango we, ukamenya uko uzagufata kandi ni ibintu bituma murushaho kumenyana umubano wanyu ukazaramba.  
Kuganira ku mafaranga mukoresha Uretse kuba hari ibyo mwemeranyaho bijyanye n’imico n’imyitwarire, ugomba no kumenya imikoreshereze y’amafaranga y’umukunzi wawe.
Bijya bibaho ko umwe yumva ko mugenzi we afite amafaranga wenda ashingiye ku gihe amaze mu kazi, ariko kuko batabiganiriyeho ugasanga bibateje ibibazo nyuma.
Kuganira ku mafaranga mwumva mutarenza mu bikorwa muba mwatwateganyije byo kwinezeza kwanyu ni byiza, bikwereka niba n’ibindi bikorwa bizakenerwa iwanyu mwarashinze umuryango muzajya mubitegurana.  
Kwifatanya mu bihe bigoye Biroroha kuba abantu bakwifatanya mu bihe byiza, iyo rero ibihe bibi bije nibwo umenya koko niba umukunzi wawe mwifatanyije cyangwa niba agucikaho.
Igihe ubona umuntu mwifatanyije mu bibazo no mu gahinda aho niho ubucuti bwanyu burushaho kugaragara kuko burya nta muntu wakwitesha uwamubaye hafi mu bibazo.  
Kuganira n’inzobere mu mibanire y’imiryango Ni byiza gufata igihe mukaganira n’inararibonye mu bijyanye n’imiryango kuko hari byinshi muba mukeneye kumenya mutaratangira umuryango wanyu.
Ibyo bibafasha kwisobanukirwa, atari uburyo ubwanyu mwebwe mwiyumva ahubwo bigizwemo n’undi muntu utabifitemo inyungu.  
Ibiganiro byerekeye gutera akabariro Kuganira ku kijyanye no gutera akabariro ni ingenzi hagati y’abakundana kuko uko byagenda kose baba bafite aho bazahurira nabyo kandi iyo bititaweho bishobora guteza ibibazo.
Gutera akabariro ni igikorwa nyamukuru cy’abashakanye; kugira ngo umubano utazazamo agatotsi biturutse kuri iyo ngingo biba byiza iyo umwe azi igihe mugenzi we yishimira icyo gikorwa n’igihe aba atacyishimira kugira bitazabatanya.
Mu rugendo rwo gushing urugo no kwemeranya kubana akaramata hari byinshi abantu bakwimenyereza mbere yo gufata icyo cyemezo.
Mu bintu abakundana bagomba kwimenyereza mbere yo kubana harimo no kuganira ibyerekeye imibonano mpuzabitsina

#16401#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Burundi-Nyuma-y-amezi-5-Abarundi-bongeye-guhurira-ku-meza-y-ibiganiro
Burundi:Nyuma y'amezi 5, Abarundi bongeye guhurira ku meza y'ibiganiro Nyuma y'igihe kigera ku mezi 5 ibiganiro hagati y'abarundi byarahagaze, kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 28 Ukuboza2015 umuhuza w'abarundi Perezida Yoweri Museveni yongeye kubyutsa ibiganiro hagati ya leta n'abatavuga rumwe nayo.
Ibi biganiro byitezweho gutanga umuti ku mvururu zimaze iminsi ziyogoza u Burundi.
Nyuma y'amezi agera muri 5 Leta y'u Burundi n'abatavuga rumwe nayo bongeye guhurira ku meza y'ibiganiro kugira ngo bashakire hamwe umuti w'ibibazo bimaze iminsi mu gihugu cyabo.
Ni ibiganiro bitangira kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 28 Ukuboza 2015, bikaza kubera mu biro bya perezida wa Uganda Yoweri Museveni ari nawe muhuza w'abarundi.
Biteganyijwe ko nta mihango ikomeye iza kubanziriza ibyo biganiro kuko nyuma y'ijambo rya Perezida Museveni haza guhita hakurikiraho ibiganiro mu muhezo hagati y'abahagarariye imitwe ya politiki.
Amakuru aturuka muri Uganda aravuga ko ibibazo bikomeye bizatangira kuganirwaho mu cyumweru gitaha , ariko nanone biteganyijwe ko ibiganiro byazasubira I Arusha mur Tanzaniya ari naho habereye amasezerano y'amahoro yo mu 2000 ari nayo yashoje intambara y'abasiviri yari yarayogoje u Burundi mu myaka yashize.
Nuko inama y'igihugu ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry'amasezerano y' I Arusha no kubahiriza amategeko mu Burundi yanze kwicarana n'abandi muri ibi biganiro .
Ibi bituma abasesenguzi basanga nta cyizere gihari cyo kuba ibi biganiro byatangijwe byazagira icyo bigeraho vuba mu kugarura amahoro.
Ibi biganiro bikaba byari bitegerejwemo intumwa zitandukanye harimo n'abahagarariye Canared., aho umuvuzi waryo Pancrace Cimpaye avuga ko ibi biganiro ari ikimenyetso k'icyizere no kwishakira ibisubizo igihe isi yose yacecetse.
Sylivestre Ntibantunganya wahoze ari Perezida w'u Buurndi we ibi biganiro nk'umuti k'ubuzima bw'ibihugu byo mu karere.
Yagize ati: Kuva u Burundi Bwabura umutekano ,byanze bikunze byagize ingaruka zihuse ku baturanyi, turabano impunzi nyinshi zihungira muri ibyo bihugu , ibi biganiro rero bigomba kwihutishwa bigatanga umuti w'ibibazo biri mu Burundi."
Ibiganiro hagati y'abarundi n'umuhuza wabo Perezida wa Uganda byaherukaga tariki 14 Nyakanga 2015 , nyuma byaje guhagarara.
Inzira y'ibiganiro hagati ya leta n'abatavuga rwumwe nayo niyo yari yarifujwe n'ibihugu by'amahanga mu rwego rwo kugarura umutekano mu Burundi, hakaba hategerejwe umusaruro uzava muri ibi biganiro bishya mu kugarura amahoro yabaye ingume mu Burundi.

Kenya: Inyama z'inkoko zikomeje guteza impaka mu gihugu Mu gihe abantu benshi bafata inyama y'inkoko nka kimwe mu biribwa biryoha kandi bihenze ndetse byifashishwa ahantu hose mu buriro, mu gihugu cya Kenya ho bamaze gutangaza ko inyama y'inkoko igiye mu mafunguro agomba kubanza kwitonderwa kuko hari gucuruzwa cyane iz'inkoko zatewe imiti ituma zikura vuba, bikagira ingaruka ku buzima bw'abazirya.
Ubu hatangajwe koo ubushakashatsi bwakozwe bwerekanye ko mu minsi iri imbere, hashobora kuzavuka ingorange nyinshi ziterwa no gukoresha inyama z'inkoko ahanini ziba zahawe imiti kugira ngo zikure vuba.
Ngo inyama z'inkoko zifashishwa cyane mu mahoteli, no mu zindi nzu z'uburiro, aho usanga abantu benshi baza babaza inyama y'inkoko, ibi rero byatumye umubare munini w'abakora imishinga y'ubworozi, batangira gukoresha uburyo bushya bwo gushakisha uko inkoko zajya zikura vuba vuba mu gihe gito, hifashishijwe imiti kabuhariwe.
Wachira Kariuki, ni umuvugizi w'umuryango Nyafurika wita ku nyamaswa, Pan African Animal Welfare Association, yasabye ko hakorwa ubukangurambaga bwo kubuza abantu gukomeza gukoresha inyama z'inkoko mu gihugu cya Kenya, nk'igihugu gikoresha cyane imiti kabuhariwe mu gukuza inkoko ku mugabane w'Afurika, aho ngo usanga mu kwezi kumwe gusa inkoko iba yamaze kugeza igihe cyo kuribwa.
Abayobozi batandukanye bakora mu mishinga yo kwita ku nyamaswa, batangaje ko bitoroshye kugira ngo abantu babshe kumva ko inyama nk'izo zikomoka ku matungo aba yahawe imiti kugira ngo akure vuba, ari mbi ku buzima bw'umuntu.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe, bwerekana ko izi nyama zikomoka ku matungo yahawe imiti ituma akura vuba, ziha umubiri w'umuntu amahirwe menshi yo kurwara indwara zirimo kanseri, umutima, umuvuduko w'amaraso, n'izindi ndwara zitandukanye zishobora kwataka ubuzima bw'umuntu.
Gusa batanga inama ko inyama z'inkoko zorowe neza hadakoreshejwe imiti ituma zikura vuba, zo nta kibazo zitera ndetse ko ari nazo zonyine zemewe mu gihugu cya Kenya.

#16511#	4	health	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/amavuriro-begerejwe-yababereye-igisubizo
Amavuriro begerejwe yababereye igisubizo Abaturage b'Akarere ka Ruhango baravuga ko kuva batangira kwegerezwa amavuriro, basigaye bafite ubuzima bwiza kuko babasha kwivuriza hafi.
Aba baturage bashimira gahunda ya Leta yo kubegereza ayo mavuriro mu tugari, kuko byatumye batakirwara bahere mu nzu, binabgabanyiriza imvune zingendo bakoraga bajya kwivuza.
Abaturage bashima gahunda y'Ivuriro mu mudugudu.
Ivuriro mu kagali ni gahunda ya Leta yo kwegereza abaturage ubuvuzi bwihuse, mu mihigo ya buri mwaka, mu karere ka Ruhango bahiga ko bagomba kubaka ivuriro mu tugali twose.
Ingabire Jose uturiye ivuriro rya Nyagisozi mu Murenge wa Ntongwe, avuga ko mbere umwana yarwaraga, kujya ku muvuza bikaba ikibazo, kuko bagombagara gukora ingendo ndende.
Agira ati "Urabona hano iyo urwaye, bigusaba gukora urugendo rujya mu Ruhango niho hari ibitaro, ugasanga hari abanga kujyayo ugasanga baheze mu nzu."
Undi witwa Bikorimana Egide nawe ati "Rwose turashimira Leta, kuko ihora idutekerereza ibyiza gusa, reba nk'ubu ukuntu iiba yaratwegereje ubuvuzi bw'ibanze, n'ukuri nta muntu ukirembera mu rugo."
Elisabeth Nyiramivumbi, umuforomo ku ivuriro rya Nyagisozi mu murenge wa Ntongwe, avuga ko yitabirwa cyane, kandi batanga ubuvuzi bw'ibanze.
Avuga ko mu gihe cy'indwara ikomeye badafitiye ubushobozi, bahita bahamagara imbangukiragutabara ikamujyana ku bitaro bikuru.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Ruhango Mbabazi Francois Xavier, avuga ko nyuma yo kubona akamaro aya mavuriro afitiye abaturage, bifuza kuyongerera ubushobozi, kugirango abaturage bajye bavurwa neza bakomeze imirimo yabo ibateza imbere.
Gusa zimwe mu mbogamizi abaturage bagaragaza, ni uko kubera ubwinshi bw'abitabira, butuma hari igihe imiti iba mike bagategereza ko babanza kujya kuyizana mu bigo nderabuzima cyangwa ku bitaro bibarizwa hafi aho.
Eric Muvara

#16553#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Itariki-yose-bashyiriraho-Referandumu-nta-bwoba-dufite-Komisiyo-y-amatora
"Itariki yose bashyiriraho Referandumu, nta bwoba dufite" Komisiyo y'amatora Ku cyicaro gikuru cya Komisiyo y'igihugu y'Amatora ku Kimihurura Komisiyo y'igihugu y'amatora (NEC) iravuga ko yiteguye bihagije amatora ya Kamarampaka ku ivugururwa ry'Itegeko Nshinga ashobora kuba mu gihe cya vuba mu gihe itariki yayo izaba imaze kwemezwa.
Mu nama yaguye ya Biro politiki y'umuryango FPR Inkotanyi yateranye ku cyumweru gishize tarilki ya 6 Ukuboza 2015, Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame akaba na Chairman w'uyu muryango, yemeye itariki yari yasabwe n'abanyamuryango b'iri shyaka, bifuzaga yuko amatora ya Referandumu ku Itegeko Nshinga yazaba ku itariki ya 18 Ukuboza 2015.
Nubwo Perezida Kagame yemeye itariki yahawe n'abanyamuryango b'umuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi, yanavuze ko iyi tariki izabanza kwemezwa mu nama y'abaminisitiri iteganyijwe muri iki cyumweru, nyuma bikazasohoka nk'iteka rya Perezida mu igazeti ya Leta.
Iyo urebye aho iminsi igeze n'itariki yifujwe n'abanyamuryango ba FPR Inkotanyi ndetse ikaza guhabwa umugisha n'umukuru w'igihugu, wibaza niba iyi tariki iramutse yemejwe n'inama y'abaminisitiri byakorohera Komisiyo y'amatora gutegura amatora ya Kamarampaka mu gihe gito nk'iki.
Komisiyo y'igihugu y'amatora yatangarije Makuruki.rw ko nta kibazo ifite ku buryo amatora ya Kamarampaka atagenda neza.
Charles Munyaneza, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y'Igihugu y'amatora, yagize ati:" Twebwe twakurikiranye inzira (process) zose kuva mu baturage babisaba, kuva mu Nteko, ubwo twebwe twahereye icyo gihe tugerageza kwitegura ibyo twagombaga kwitegura kuko twabonaga ko ariho biganisha.
Twibutse ko twari dusanzwe dufite amatora asanzwe ahari y'inzego z'ibanze kuburyo n'ubundi hari ibyo twiteguye bishobora kugendera no muri ayo naramuka ashyizwe kuri iyo tariki.
Birumvikana igihe ntabwo ari kinini cyane ariko Komisiyo y'amatora iriteguye kuzabikora nibiramuka byemejwe."
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko nta myiteguro ihanitse aya matora ibasaba bitewe nuko ibikoresho by'ibanze bikenerwa mu matora nk'amasanduku y'amatora bisanzwe bihari, ndetse n'amakarita y'itora akaba yaramaze gutangwa, bityo rero ngo itariki yose izemezwa n'inama y'Abaminisitiri ngo izabereho amatora ya Kamarampaka, ngo nta bwoba ibateye kuko biteguye bihagije.
Iyi tariki iramutse yemejwe ntiyakuraho ubukangurambaga mu baturage kuri aya matora Bitewe n'igihe gito cyaba gisigaye ngo aya matora abe mu gihe iyi tariki yaba yemejwe, ntibyorohera bamwe kwiyumvisha ukuntu hazakorwa ubukangurambaga (Campaign) bwo kwigisha abaturage ibijyanye n'aya matora n'uko azakorwa.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y'amatora yavuze ko itariki yose izemezwa igomba kuzagera bamaze gukora ubwo bukangurambaga mu baturage, dore ko ngo nta byinshi bateganya gusobanurira abaturage bitewe nuko ubusabe ku ivugururwa ry'Itegeko Nshinga bwatanzwe nabo.
Yagize ati:"Bizakorwa.
Ntabwo twabikora iteka ritarabyemeza, haba twebwe turabyiteguye, haba Inteko Ishinga amategeko irabyiteguye, ubwo nibimara kwemezwa twebwe dufite gahunda yo kubigeza ku banyarwanda ku buryo bworoshye kandi vuba bishoboka."
Yakomeje agira ati:"…Ibi bintu byasabwe n'abanyarwanda bagera kuri Miliyoni enye, abo rero n'ubundi nibo babisabye, nibo babizi igisigaye ni ukubabwira uko bazatora gusa.
Miliyoni ebyiri zirenga zitari muri Miliyoni enye zitora tuzareba uko tuzabagira.
Ariko urebye n'ubundi nta bintu bishya tuzaba tugiye kubabwira."
Itegeko Nshinga ryo Kuwa 4 Kamena 2003 ryavuguwe ndetse ryemezwa n'Inteko Ishinga amategeko imitwe yombi na guverinoma, igisigaye bikaba ari ukwemeza itariki izaberaho amatora ya Kamarampaka yo kwemeza cyangwa guhakana inshingiro ry'umushinga w'ivugururwa ry'Itegeko Nshinga, wakozwe n'inteko Inshinga amategeko.
Ibi bibaye kandi nyuma y'ubusabe bw'abanyarwanda barenga Miliyoni 3 bandikiye Inteko Ishinga amategeko bayisaba ko Itegeko Nshinga ryavugururwa cyane mu ngingo y'101 iteganya manda za Perezida wa Repubulika, aho bifuzaga ko havanwaho inzitizi kuri Perezida Kagame kugira ngo abashe kwiyamamaza mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu ateganijwe kuba mu mwaka wa 2017.

#16569#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/ibidasanzwe-mu-butayu-aho-abarokore-bahererwa-amasezerano-y-ibizababaho
Ibidasanzwe mu “Butayu” aho abarokore bahererwa amasezerano y’ibizababaho Iterambere ririhuta hirya no hino ku Isi kandi bikaba mu nguni zose z’ubuzima.
Ntiryasize amadini kuko ryadukiriye uburyo abantu basengaga, aho basengeraga, uburyo basengagamo n’ibindi bigenda bijyanishwa n’ibihe tugezemo.
Gusenga si ibyo guteranira hamwe ku cyumweru cyangwa kubikora ugiye kurya no kuryama ahubwo ni igikorwa kiba buri uko ugikeneye agishatse kandi akagikorera aho ashatse.
Nubwo Bibiliya ivuga ko n’imitima ari insengero, kuri ubu abanyamasengesho bavumvuye ahandi, ntibasiba mu mashyamba y’inzitane, mu buvumo, mu masumo n’ibihanamanga [ahazwi nko mu Butayu] aho bizera ko amasengesho yabo azasubizwa bwangu.
Ubutayu bwabaye ubuhungiro n’uburuhukiro bw’abakirisitu bizera ko iyo nzira ibaganisha ku gusubizwa ibibazo bigoye ubuzima bwabo.
Mu Rwanda hari amadini n’amatorero agera ku 2000 amaze kwandikwa no kwemererwa gukorera mu gihugu.
Uko arushaho kwiyongera ni ko n’uburyo bwadutse bw’imisengere n’aho kwiyambariza Imana hatari mu nsengero hiyongera.
Mu myaka 20 ishize nibwo abakirisitu badukanye uburyo bwo gusengera hanze y’insengero bizwi nko mu Butayu.
Ni ahantu rimwe na rimwe hashobora gushyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga nubwo bidaca intege ababikora.
Inyamaswa z’inkazi mu ndiba z’ubuvumo bwo mu butayu Umukirisitu ubara ijoro yaraye yabwiye IGIHE ko mu myaka 10 ishize yagiye gusengera mu buvumo buri mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, ahazwi nka “Mont Kigali” hahoze hacukurwa amabuye y’agaciro.
Ubwo buvumo bufite metero ziri hagati ya 300 na 500, ubugiyemo yinjira yunamye kugeza igihe azabuviramo.
Mu buhamya bwe yavuze ko ‘Ubwo buvumo bufite ibyumba bitandukanye ku buryo uyoboye abandi aba azi icyo bagomba kwinjiramo n’ikitinjirwamo kubera inyamaswa z’inkazi zirimo inzoka n’ingwe nabonye n’amaso yanjye ihacaracara.’’
Yakomeje ati “Mu butayu, hari abahamara iminsi iri hagati y’itatu n’irindwi batarya, batanywa batunzwe n’amasengesho, indirimbo ziherekezwa n’ibinyuguri, ingoma netse n’amashyi, ubundi bagacinya akadiho bigatinda batitaye ku nzara n’umwuma ufata benshi.’’
Inzira igana mu buvumo bwa Mont Kigali aho abarokore biyambariza Uwiteka Ubutayu, indiri y’ibirura byihisha mu bana b’intama Amasengesho yo mu Butayu yakunze kwikomwa na benshi kubera ibibuberamo cyane bishingiye ku buhanuzi bw’ubukorano, abajura bitwikira Bibiliya n’abayikoresha basambanya abagore n’abakobwa.
Mu mashyamba ari ku misozi yo mu Karere ka Ruhango, ahazwi nka Kanyarira, Nyabyugi, Kayenzi, Gisanga, Bangukuntabare ni hamwe mu hari ubutayu abantu bakunze gusengeramo.
Nubwo baba bajyanywe no gusenga, ntihatana no kubera ibikorwa bitandukanye bigaragaza ugutandukira ku gikorwa cy’ibanze cyo gusenga ari nacyo kiba cyabajyanye ahubwo bakumvikana mu busambanyi, ubujura, n’ibindi.
Urugero rwa hafi ni aho mu Butayu buri mu Murenge wa Bweramana, abakobwa bagiye batakira ubuyobozi ko bahafatiwe ku ngufu, abandi bakibwa.
Ibi byatumye tariki ya 7 Ukuboza 2018, ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Ruhango busohora itangazo ribuza abantu gusengera mu butayu.
Kubaza Imana ahazaza, kimwe mu bituma abantu bajya gusengera mu “Butayu” Umuhanuzi Yeremiya mu gitabo cye 29:11 yaranditse ngo ‘Erega nzi ibyo nibwira nzabagirira!
Ni amahoro si bibi, kugira ngo mbareme umutima w’ibyo muzabona hanyuma.’
Iri jambo ry’ihumure riri mu akoreshwa n’abakirisitu ndetse benshi bakomeza gushyira imbaraga mu gushaka abahanuzi ba none ngo bamenye icyo Uwiteka avuga ku buzima bwabo bw’ahazaza.
IGIHE yegereye abantu batandukanye ishaka kumenya impamvu ituma bagana ubutayu mu masengesho, aho benshi bahurira ku kubaza ibizababaho.
Umukirisitu wo mu Itorero rya ADEPR Gasave, Mutesa Fabien, yagize ati “Si buri mukirisitu ufata inzira ngo ajye gusengera mu butayu.
Hajyayo umuntu ufite ibibazo cyangwa ibigeragezo bimuremereye.
Nkanjye njyayo ngiye kubaza Imana ejo hazaza, ngiye kuyisenga no kuyisaba ngo incire inzira.”
Nikuze Devota usengera muri Eglise Vivante we yagize ati “Ubutayu njyamo ni ubwa Kanyarira hariya i Muhanga.
Iyo ngiyeyo mba mfite ibyifuzo bitandukanye ngiye gusengera ariko kandi mpakundira ko haba hariyo abahanuzi batandukanye bampanurira nkamenya uko ejo hazaza hanjye hifashe.”
Amasezerano atangirwa mu butayu yibazwaho Abakurikira ubuhanuzi bwo mu minsi ya none, si ubwa mbere bumvise ngo ‘Imana irakuzamuye, irakubakiye, iguhaye amafaranga, ubonye visa yo kujya muri Amerika.’
Aya ni amwe mu masezerano atangwa n’abahanuzi b’ubu barimo n’abo mu Butayu.
Ibihabera ntibisanzwe!
Usanga abantu bavuga mu ndimi zitandukanye, ababyeyi bahetse abagabo, bitaba ibyo abagabo bakikorera abagore.
Abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga babonye amashusho yatangajwe, agaragaza umugore uri mu kigero cy’imyaka 35, abangatana umugabo w’ibiro nka 80, akamuhanurira ko agiye kuba umutunzi.
Yumvikana avuga mu ijwi rirenga ati “Kuko ndi Uwiteka ndakubwiye ngo mwana wanjye akira amafaranga kandi ndakubwiye ngo uzagaburira n’imfubyi, uzagaburira abashonje kuko ndi Uwiteka.
Ndi Imana iri kumwe nawe ndagusinyiye […] ndi Imana iguhaye ubwenge, bamwe bakwita igicucu kubera ko utakigendana na bo, mbagucishijemo kandi ucyeye […] mparuye umuhanda nta mahwa awurimo ndi Imana igutambukije.”
Ubutayu bwahitanye bamwe Mu kubungabunga umutekano w’abagana mu butayu nyuma y’amakuru y’abahaguye, abahibiwe n’abahasambanyirijwe, Leta yashyizeho ingamba zo gukumira abahasengera.
Ku wa 19 Werurwe 2016, Mukamuyango Dancille w’imyaka 48 wari utuye ku Kimironko mu Karere ka Gasabo, yaguye ku musozi w’amasengesho wa Kanyarira aho yari yagiye gusengera.
Yakurikiye umupolisikazi na we wahasize ubuzima yagiye kuhasengera muri Nyakanga 2015.
Muri Nzeri ya 2016 kandi Inama y’umutekano y’Umurenge wa Gisenyi yahuriyemo abayobozi b’Umurenge, abahagarariye abigenga n’abagize inzego z’umutekano, yanzuye ihagarikwa ry’amasengesho ya nijoro yaberaga ku musozi wa Rubavu hikangwa ko ashobora kuba icyanzu cy’abahungabanya umutekano mu Mujyi cyane ko umugizi wa nabi ashobora kwivanga mu banyamasengesho agasohoza umugambi we.
ADEPR yahaye abayoboke bayo umurongo Abakirisitu bo mu Itorero ADEPR ni bamwe mu bitabira gusengera mu butayu ku bwinshi.
Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev.
Pasiteri Karuranga Ephrem, yabwiye IGIHE ko itorero ryasabye abayoboke kwirinda gusengera ahantu hashyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga.
Ati “Gusengera mu butayu ni ikibazo kimaze iminsi kigoranye kandi twebwe twabitanzeho umurongo.
Igihugu cyacu ntikibuza abantu gusenga, twasabye abakirisitu bacu ko aho bagiye gusengera bagomba kubimenyesha ubuyobozi bw’inzego z’ibanze na Polisi.
Hari ubutayu abantu basengeramo buzwi, ariko nanone ntawe ugomba kujyayo atabimenyesheje ubuyobozi.”
Yakomeje avuga ko abazajya gusengera ahantu hatazwi bagahurirayo n’ibibazo bazabyirengera kuko ahantu hagenewe gusengerwa kandi hadashyira ubuzima bw’abantu mu kaga hazwi.
Amatorero amwe n’amwe afite ubutayu buzwi kandi butunganyije arimo Evangelical Restoration Church iyoborwa na Apôtre Ndagijimana Joshua Masasu.
Ubutayu bwaryo buherereye i Masoro hafi y’ahitwa kuri 15, bisaba ikiguzi cya 500 Frw ku muntu ushaka kubwinjiramo.

‘Kuki mwishimiye intsinzi y'umuntu umwe, kandi muzi ko uwo muntu ari umunyamahanga?'
Joseph Habineza Aya ni amagambo Minisitiri w'Umuco na Siporo Amb Joseph Habineza yasubije umunyamakuru wari umubajije niba Minisiteri ayoboye nayo izasaba abanyarwanda imbabazi, nyuma y'uko FERWAFA yari imaze gusaba abanyarwanda bose imbabazi kubera umukinnyi Daddy Birori watumye u Rwanda rusezererwa mu marushanwa y'igikombe cy'Afurika azaba mu mwaka 2015.
Minisitiri Amb Habineza Joseph na Nzamwita de Gaule Abanyamakuru babajije Habineza niba bidakwiye ko na Minisiteri ayoboye isaba abanyarwanda imbabazi, dore ko ikibazo cy'abanyamahanga bakina mu ikipe y'igihugu bari bakizi nyamara ntibagire icyo bakora.
Amb Habineza yavuze ko atumva impamvu ikibazo kiba bakagiharira Minisiteri na FERWAFA kandi abanyarwanda bose bari bazi ko abo bantu ari abanyamahanga, bikanarenga abo banyamahanga batsinda ibitego, abanyarwanda bakishima, ntibibuke ko ababitsinze ari abanyamahanga.
Yagize ati: " Kuki bishimiye insinzi ya bitatu ku busa y'umuntu umwe kandi bazi ko uwo muntu ari umunyamahanga.Umuntu anyagiranwa n'abandi akavuga ngo yatose.Reka tunyagirwe twese dutohere rimwe.
…..
Byararangiye reka tuvuge ngo ntibizongere, turebe ibiri imbere."
Minisitiri Habineza yakomeje avuga ko gusaba imbabazi Atari byo bakomeza kwitaho , ahubwo ngo hari gushakishwa ubundi buryo bwo gushakira umupira w'amaguru abaterankunga kuburyo butandukanye, kugirango hubakwe abana b'abanyarwanda kandi ikibazo cy'abanyamahanga ntikizongere kuvugwa mu ikipe y'igihugu.
Perezida wa FERWAFA Nzamwita Vincent de Gaule na we yavuze ko icyo kibazo kitazongera kubaho, ndetse anasaba abanyarwanda bose imbabazi ku makosa yakozwe n'urwego ayoboye, bagakinisha Daddy Birori babizi ko ari umunyamahanga , bikaza kuviramo u Rwanda gusezererwa mu marushanwa .
Yagize ati : " Mboneyeho akanya ko kubwira abanyarwanda bose bakunda umupira w'amaguru ko muri Football tubasabye imbabazi ku byabaye byose mu buryo bw'ubuyobozi(administration) bwo guha abantu ubwenegihugu bitanyuze mu nzira nziza."
Ubwo u Rwanda rwamaraga gusezererwa kubera Dady Birori, rwasimbujwe Congo Brazzaville rwari rwasezereye.
Nyuma Ishyirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afurika (CAF) ryahaye ibihano Dady Birori, byo guhagarikwa imyaka ibiri adakina.

#16615#	4	health	https://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/abandura-virus-itera-sida-ku-mwaka-bagabanutseho-50-mu-rwanda
Abandura Virus itera Sida ku mwaka bagabanutseho 50% mu Rwanda Ubushakashatsi bushya bwerekanye ko umubare w’abantu bashya bandura Virusi itera Sida mu Rwanda, ugenda ugabanuka uko imyaka ishira, by’umwihariko ukaba waravuye kuri 3/1000 (barenga ibihumbi 10) mu 2014 ukagera kuri 1/1000 (barenga 5400) mu 2019.
Ibi bivuze ko habayeho igabanuka risatira 50% mu myaka itanu ishize.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwamuritswe ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa 22 Ukwakira 2019, bwagaragaje ko u Rwanda rwateye intambwe idasanzwe mu gukumira icyorezo cya Sida, by’umwihariko rukomeje kuza imbere mu gufasha abayirwaye kubona imiti no kubarinda ingaruka zayo.
Bwakozwe ku bufatanye bwa Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, Gahunda ya Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (USA) yo kurwanya SIDA (PEPFAR), Ikigo gishinzwe kugenzura no gukumira indwara cyo muri USA (CDC) n’Umushinga wa Kaminuza ya Columbia ushinzwe kurwanya virusi itera Sida (ICAP).
Bwakorewe ku baturage barenga ibihumbi 30 bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 16-65 n’abarenga ibihumbi icyenda bari hagati y’imyaka 10-14 bo mu ngo zirenga ibihumbi 11 basanzwe mu ngo hagati ya Werurwe 2018 na Kanama 2019.
Bimwe mu byavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi bigaragaza ko umubare abantu bakuru bari hagati y’imyaka 15 na 64 bafite Virusi itera Sida utagabanutse kuko ukiri ku gipimo cya 3% (basaga ibihumbi 210) wahozeho mu myaka 17 ishize.
Abari hagati y’imyaka 15-49 bari ku gipimo cya 2.6%.
Muri rusange abantu bakuru bari hagati y’imyaka 15-64 bandura Virus itera Sida ku mwaka bwerekanye ko bari ku gipimo cya 0.8%, bangana na 4500.
Muri iyo myaka, abagore bandura Virusi itera Sida ku mwaka mu Rwanda bari ku gipimo cya 3.7%, abagabo ni 2.2%, abari hagati y’imyaka 10-14 bari ku gipimo cya 0.4% mu gihe abari muri iyo myaka bafite virusi itera Sida ari 5900.
Mu bakuze bafite virusi itera Sida, 76% bigaragara ko igenda igabanuka mu maraso aho abagore bari ku kigero cya 79.1% naho abagabo kuri 70.5%.
Ibi biterwa n’uko igipimo cy’abafata imiti igabanya ubukana igenda yiyongera.
Impungenge ku bangavu Ubu bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ubwandu bushya ku bagore bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 55-59 buri ku gipimo cya 6.5% mu gihe abagabo bafite imyaka 50-59 buri kuri 7.4%.
Gusa iyo urebye mu rubyiruko usanga biteye impungenge cyane cyane ku bangavu bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 20.
Bugaragaza ko abangavu bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 20-24 bandura virus itera Sida (ari 1.8%) bikubye inshuro zirenga eshatu bagenzi babo b’abahungu (bari kuri 0.6%).
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima (RBC), Dr Nsanzimana Sabin yagize ati “Abahungu n’abakobwa bafite imyaka 15, igipimo cya Virus itera Sida kijya kungana hafi 1% ariko byagera mu myaka 20, abakobwa bagahita babikuba inshuro hafi enye!
Ukibaza bayikuye he mu myaka ine?”
Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko bishoboka ko muri iyo myaka bishora mu bikorwa by’ubusambanyi cyangwa ikaba ikigero bashukwamo n’abagabo bakayibanduza.
Ati “Muri macye birasaba ngo abareberera abo bana n’abafite imishinga ibitaho, ibarinda uburwayi bafate ingamba kuko izisanzwe ntacyo zahinduye kuri iki kibazo.”
Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ku rwego rw’Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali, Ubwandu bushya bwayo bwiganje mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku gipimo cya 4.3%, Intara y’Uburengerazuba kuri 3%, Uburasirazuba n’Amajyepfo kuri 2.9% naho Amajyaruguru kuri 2.2%. muri rusange mu mijyi buri ku gipimo cya 4.8% naho mu byaro kuri 2.5%.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Diane Gashumba yavuze ko nubwo hari intambwe ishimishije yatewe, imbogamizi zigihari mu gukumira Virusi itera Sida ku buryo inzego bireba zikeneye kongera imbaraga mu byo zikora n’ubufatanye hagati yazo.
Intambwe idatsikira ku kwesa intego ya Loni Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yamaze kurenza zimwe mu ntego Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe kurwanya SIDA (UNAIDs) ryihaye yo kugeza ubuvuzi ku bafite virusi itera Sida mu 2020.
Ni intego (90-90-90) isobanura ko mu 2020 abafite virusi itera Sida bazaba bazi uko bahagaze ari 90%, abafata imiti 90% naho kugabanuka kwa virusi itera Sida bikaba 90%.
Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ikigero cyo kumenya uko abantu bahagaze ari 84%, abafata imiti ari 98% naho ikigero cyo kugabanuka kwayo mu mubiri kiri kuri 90%.
Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente wari witabiriye uyu muhango yagize ati “Imibare iragaragaza ko u Rwanda rurimo gutera intambwe ishimishije mu gukumira Virusi itera Sida.
Ibyo birugira igihugu cya mbere kigeze kuri iyi ntambwe kandi twizeye ko nidukoza muri ubu buryo tuzagera ku musaruro mwiza.”
Dr Ngirente yavuze ko hakwiriye gukomeza gushyirwamo imbaraga kugira ngo ibyo bigerweho, ashimira abagize uruhare muri ubwo bushakashatsi barimo abajyanama b’ubuzima basanzwe banafasha mu gukumira icyorezo cya Sida.
UNAIDS igaragaza ko ku Isi mu bantu barenga miliyoni 39 bafite virusi itera Sida, 79% aribo bazi uko bahagaze, batatu muri batanu bayirwaye bafata imiti igabanya ubukana gusa naho 53% by’abafite virusi itera Sida ntabwo bipimisha ngo bamenye uko bahagaze.
Minisitiri w'Intebe Dr Ngirente yavuze ko intambwe u Rwanda rwateye mu kwita ku bafite virusi itera Sida nta kindi gihugu kirayitera kugeza uyu munsi Uyu muhango wo kumurika ubu bushakashatsi witabiriwe n'abayobozi batandukanye
