Uwahoze ari Minisitiri mu Bufaransa yabyarije umugore mu ndege Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 25 Ugushyingo 2015,umugore yafashwe n'ibise ari mu ndege ya kompani Air France yavaga i N'Djamena yerekeza i Paris mu Bufaransa.
Uyu mubyeyi yabyajwe n'undi mugenzi wahoze ari Minisitiri mu gihugu cy'ubufaransa witwa Philippe Douste-Blazy nawe wari muri iyo ndege.
Nkuko bitangazawa na France 24 uyu wahoze ari Minisitiri mu Bufaransa,ngo nyuma yo kubona ko nta muganga uhari wo gufasha uwo mugore ,yiyemeje kubyaza uyu mubyeyi maze abyara umwana w'umukobwa.

#16634#	1	sports	http://www.ukwezi.rw/Imikino/article/Amagare-Hafungurwa-Shampiyona-ya-Africa-amakipe-3-y-u-Rwanda-yegukanye-imidari
Amagare : Hafungurwa Shampiyona ya Africa amakipe 3 y’u Rwanda yegukanye imidari Ku munsi wa mbere wa Shampiyona ya Africa yo gusiganwa ku magare, amakipe atatu y’u Rwanda yakinnye yose yegukanye umwanya wa kabiri, yegukana imidari ya Feza.
Uyu munsi wa mbere wa Shampiyona ya Africa iri kubera mu Misisi, habazwe igihe amakipe yakoresheje.
Mu cyiciro cy’ingimbi (abagabo batarengeje imyaka 18) bakoze intera ya Kilometero 28, u Rwanda rwari ruhagarariwe na Iradukunda Valens, Niyonkuru Samuel, Mugabo Hussein na Tuyizere Etienne, rwasoje ku mwanya wa kabiri inyuma ya Algeria.
Mu cyiciro cy’abagore, u Rwanda rugizwe na Ingabire Diane, Mukashema Josiane, Nzayisenga Valentine na Tuyishimire Jacqueline, rwaje ku mwanya wa kabiri rukirikiye Afurika y’Epfo yegukanye umudari wa zahabu.
Mu bagabo, u Rwanda ruhagarariwe na Areruya Joseph, Habimana Jean Eric (wasimbuye Mugisha Samuel kubera uburwayi), Mugisha Moïse na Nsengimana Jean Bosco, naho baje kwegukana umwanya wa kabiri.

Senderi yashyize hanze indirimbo ‘ica intege’ abiyita abakeba be Senderi International Hit usigaye warihaye andi mazina nka 3D, Harvard, Tuff Hit, Intare y’Umujyi, Chris Brown w’i Kigali, Mayweather n’ayandi arahamya ko indirimbo ye nshya yise ‘Iyo twicaranye’ ije guca intege abakeba be bose no gushimangira ibirindiro bye mu muziki.
Uyu muhanzi uherutse kwiyita Mayweather mu kiganiro na IGIHE, yasobanuye ko kuva umwaka wa 2015 watangira ari we muhanzi ukora injyana ya Afrobeat wigaragaje neza ndetse agakora ibitaramo n’indirimbo bikwiye kongera kumuhesha iki gikombe.
Ngo ni we muhanzi rukumbi mu bakora Afrobeat utarigeze acika intege cyangwa ngo asubire inyuma mu bikorwa.
Aho bigeze, ngo ntagishaka kumva umuntu umugereranya n’abakeba be muri Afrobeat, ahubwo ngo arashishikariza Abanyarwanda bose gusakaza indirimbo ye nshya yise ‘Iyo twicaranye’.
Senderi ati “Iyi ndirimbo ni ikomeza gushimangira ibirindiro byanjye mu muziki, umuturage cyangwa umuyobozi wese uzayumva azagira ikintu kimuryohera kuko narayitondeye.
Abiyita abakeba banjye nibazane indirimbo zabo noneho abafana bahitemo umuhanga unakunzwe” Iyi ndirimbo ngo izaryohera abafana Yongeraho ati “Ndasaba abantu bose, abatwara abantu n’ibintu, abaturage bose n’undi muntu wese uri buyibone gukora uko ashoboye akayisangiza mugenzi we.
Uguhiga ubutwari muratabarana, niba hari uwo duhanganye ufite ibikorwa nk’ibyanjye azane hano tugereranye.”
Senderi wasohoye indirimbo nshya yise ‘Iyo twicaranye’ ngo yayishyize hanze kugira ngo ace intege ‘uwiyita umukeba we wese ndetse anabone ko hari intera ndende iri hagati ye n’abandi bahanzi.
Ati “Mu izina rya Yesu, iyi ndirimbo ije guca intege abakeba banjye bose.
Ndi njyenyine mu kibuga, narakoze ndaruha bari mu bintu ntazi, uyu ni Hit wagarutse rero”

#16657#	6	religion	http://umubavu.com/iyobokamana/article/Abagukangisha-gupfa-na-bo-urupfu-ntirubatinya-Theo-Bosebabireba
Abagukangisha gupfa na bo urupfu ntirubatinya-Theo Bosebabireba Mu ndirimbo ye nshya yise ‘Icyo Imana yamvuzeho yasohotse ejo ku wa 08 Nyakanga 2019, Uwiringiyimana Theogene wamamaye nka ‘Theo Bosebabireba’ wari umuhanzi ukorera mu Itorero rya Pentekote ADEPR akza guhagarikwamo burundu, yibukije abantu ko ababakangisha urupfu na bo rutabatinya.
Bosebabireba ukunze kumvikana mu ndirimbo zimwe na zimwe zumvikana nk’iziha ubutumwa abantu runaka bitewe n’ikibazo bafitanye nubwo we abihakana, muri iyi ndirimbo ye nshya avugamo amagambo akomeye aho avuga ko uko byamera kose icyo Imana yamuvuzeho kitazahera.
Ati “Naho ingabo zabambira amahema kuntera, icyo Imana yamvuzeho ntikizahera, naho amashyo yashira mu biraro, imizabibu ntiyere imbuto, icyo Imana yamvuzeho ntikizahera, ingabo zo kuntabara na zo ziryamiye majanja, amanywa n’ijoro zirahari ziryamiye amajanja”.
“Wigira ubwoba bw’ubusa n’abagukangisha urupfu na bo ntabwo rubatinya, naho ingabo zabambira amahema kuntera, icyo Imana yamvuzeho ntikizahera, naho amashyo yashira mu biraro, imizabibu ntiyere imbuto, icyo Imana yamvuzeho ntikizahera”.
Akomeza agira ati “Iyi Mana dusenga, iyi Mana dukunda, iyi Mana dukorera, Izadutabara itarindiriye ibimenyetso, abaguteye baciye mu nzira imwe, bazaguhunga baciye muri zirindwi, batatane, batandukane ubutazongera guhura, naho ingabo zabambira amahema kuntera, icyo Imana yamvuzeho ntikizahera, naho amashyo yashira mu biraro, imizabibu ntiyere imbuto, icyo Imana yamvuzeho ntikizahera”.
Twabibutsa ko Uwiringiyimana Theogene/Theo Bosebabireba yatenzwe mu Itorero rya Pentekote ryo mu Rwanda, ADEPR mu ntangiriro z’umwaka wa 2018 nyuma y’amakuru yo gutera inda abakobwa nubwo we yagiye akabihakana yivuye inyuma.
Bosebabireba amaze imyaka irenga icumi amenyekanye mu ndirimbo zakanyujijeho zirimo ‘Ikiza urubwa’, ‘Ingoma’, ‘Icyifuzo’, ‘Bugacya’, ‘Bosebabireba’ n’izindi.
Indirimbo ze ziba ziganjemo ubutumwa bwomora imitima y’abemeramana nubwo hari n’izo akora zumvikana nk’izigira abo zinegura.
Ni umugabo w’imyaka 37 y’amavuko, afite umugore n’abana barindwi yemera.
Umva amagambo akakaye ari mu ndirimbo ye nshya hano: @Umubavu.com

Salah ngo ashaka kwigumira muri Liverpool igihe kirekire Rutahizamu Mohamed Salah avuga ko ashaka kuguma muri Liverpool "igihe kirekire" ndetse atekereza ko iyi kipe ishobora kugera ku" bindi bintu bikomeye".
Salah w’imyaka 28 ni we watsindiye Liverpool ibitego byinshi muri uyu mwaka w’imikino, anayifasha kwegukana igikombe cya shampiyona yaherukaga mu myaka 30 ishize.
Uyu Munyamisiri yageze muri Liverpool mu mwaka wa 2017.
We n’ikipe ye ya Liverpool banatwaye igikombe cya Champions League i Burayi n’igikombe cy’isi gihuza amakipe (clubs).
Yabwiye igitangazamakuru BeIN Sports ati "Sinabona uko nsobanura ukuntu niyumvise muri jye nyuma yaho dutsindiye shampiyona nyuma y’imyaka 30 yari ishize".
"Ndishimye cyane.
Nezezwa n’umwuka uri hano.
Nkunda aha hantu kandi nizeye kuzahaguma igihe kirekire".
"Umwuka uri hano utandukanye n’uw’ahandi hantu aho ari ho hose".
Salah amaze gutsinda ibitego 92 mu mikino 145 amaze gukina kuva yagera muri Liverpool, harimo ibitego 21 yatsinze mu mikino 41 muri uyu mwaka w’imikino.
Mu kwezi kwa Karindwi mu mwaka wa 2018, yashyize umukono kuri kontaro nshya y’imyaka itanu, ariko rimwe na rimwe byagiye bivugwa ko ashobora kuva muri Liverpool akaba yajya mu yindi kipe imuhemba menshi kurushaho.
Liverpool, yamaze kwegukana igikombe mu cyumweru gishize, irusha Manchester City iyikurikiye amanota 23, mu gihe isigaje gukina imikino irindwi.
Biranashoboka ko ishobora guca umuhigo w’amanota menshi muri shampiyona ya Premier League, usanzwe ufitwe na Manchester City bazakina ejo ku wa Kkane.
Salah yongeyeho ati "Twamenyeranye neza nk’ikipe kandi turumvikana neza".
"Niba ibi bikomeje, dushobora kugera ku bindi bintu bikomeye.
Biragoye kuguma ku rwego rwacu rw’ubu rw’imikinire, ariko ibyo ntibivuze ko bidashoboka".
Mu myaka ibiri ishize, Salah (iburyo) yatsindiye urukweto rwa zahabu rw’umukinnyi watsinze ibitego byinshi kurusha abandi muri Premier League.

Uyu muhanzi yashyize hanze album ye ya mbere yise ‘Umugisha' kuwa 24 Ukuboza 2010.

King James ubundi yitwa James Ruhumuriza, ni umuririmbyi w'injyana ya RnB n'izindi zishamikiyeho nka Zouk na Pop.
Yavutse kuwa 1 Mata 1990.
Ni mwene na Consolatie Kakizi na Isaac Murihano.
Yatangiye ubuhanzi mu mwaka wa 2006, ubwo yari mu mashuri yisumbuye.
Indirimbo ye ya mbere yayise 'Intinyi' ayisohora mu mwaka wa 2009.
Amashuri ye yisumbuye yayize mu kigo cya APE Rugunga aho yarangije mu mwaka wa 2010.
Uyu muhanzi yashyize hanze album ye ya mbere yise ‘Umugisha' kuwa 24 Ukuboza 2010.
Iyi album iriho indirimbo zakunzwe nka Umugisha, Kuko Turi Kumwe, Naratomboye, Mwarakoze, Harabura Iki (yaririmbanye na Princesse Priscilla) n'izindi.
Ku itariki ya 10 Ukuboza 2011 Album ye ya 2 yise ‘Umuvandimwe'.
Iyo album kandi yayimurikiye no mu Ntara y'Amajyepfo muri Kaminuza NKuru y'u Rwanda ku itariki ya 13 Mutarama 2012.
Iyo Album ye iriho indirimbo nka Narashize, Ndakwizera, Buhoro Buhoro, Nta Mahitamo, Birandenga, Ese warikiniraga, Kuki unsize, Mbabarira, Nzajya Ngushima, Ubaye Uwanjye.
Kuwa 31 Mata 2012, King James yabaye umuhanzi w'umwaka mu marushanwa ya Salax Awards, nyuma yo guhabwa ibihembo bine byose (ibihembo byinshi kurusha abandi bahanzi bose) ari byo: Best RnB, Best Male, Best Album na Artist of the Year.
King James mu mwaka wa 2012 yasohoye indirimbo nyinshi zirimo indirimbo "Pala Pala" zatumye arushaho gukundwa cyane.
Ibi byamuhesheje amahirwe menshi yo gutorwa n'abantu benshi mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star II.
Bityo King James atorwa mu bahanz i20 bakunzwe kurusha abandi mu Rwanda, arakomeza atorwa muri Top 10, Top 7, Top 4 na Top 2 aho yari asigaye ahangana n'umuraperi Jay Polly uri mu bakunzwe cyane mu Rwanda.
Byari bikomeye kuri King James kuko yari yongeye guhurira Final na Jay Polly, umwe mu bahanzi bakunzwe kubw'ubutumwa bwe n'injyana aririmba ya Hip-Hop, injyana ikunzwe cyane n'urubyiruko rwinshi mu Rwanda.
Tariki ya 28 Nyakanga 2012, mu gitaramo cyari cyitabiriwe n'umuhanzi w'umunyamerika Jason Derulo hatangajwe ko King James ari we wegukanye umwanya wa mbere mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star II.
Iki gitaramo cyabereye i Remera hanze ya Stade Amahoro.
King James ubu agiye kurushaho gukora cyane kuko yahawe igihembo cya Miliyoni 24 harimo miliyoni 12 zo gukora ubuhanzi bwe harimo kumurika Album no gukora amashusho y'indirimbo ebyiri.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

Minisitiri Mushikiwabo Min.
Mushikiwabo yabitangarije Abadepite bagize Komisiyo y'Ububanyi n'Amahanga uko politiki y'u Rwanda ku rwego mpuzamahanga ihagaze, kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 12 Mutarama 2015 ari naho yagarutse kubyavugiwe mu nama y'Africa yunze ubumwe.

Mugabe yaje gukomeza kuvugwa kandi ubwo yagwaga ku kibuga cy'Indege atashye maze amafoto akwira isi ya rurema bavuga kuri uyu mukambwe ibyavugiwe mu nama biribagirana.
Mugabe yavugishije benshi kandi ubwo yagwaga Muri iki kiganiro n'abadepite Louise Mushikiwabo yavuze ko kugirango aka karere kabashe kugira amahoro arambye umutwe w'iterabwoba wa FDLR umaze imyaka 20 ukwiye kuvanwaho burundu nubwo amahanga agenda biguruntege mu kuyihashya.
Mushikiwabo kandi yagarutse ku bushake bwa Politiki mu kwihuza n'ibindi bihugu (Norther Corridor) bikomeje gufatanya ibikorwa by'iterambere ndetse ashimangira ko hari ubushake bwa Politiki.

Ibyo ugomba kwitwararika mu gutekesha Gaz bikakurinda impanuka Mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu hakomeje kumvikana inkuru z’abantu bishwe cyangwa bakomerekejwe bikomeye na Gaz batekesha, bigatuma hari abasaba ko hashyirwaho amabwiriza y’uburyo ikoreshwa akagaragazwa ahantu hose.
Tariki ya 18 Mutarama 2019, nibwo twabagejejeho inkuru y’umugore wo mu Murenge wa Gisozi mu Karere ka Gasabo, mu Mujyi wa Kigali, wahitanywe na Gaz yamuturikanye ubwo yari ayitetseho, ikanakomeretsa umwana we ndetse n’inzu bari batuyemo igashya igakongoka.
Nyuma y’iyi nkuru, ibitekerezo byatanzwe n’abantu batandukanye byagaragazaga ko hari Gaz zicuruzwa zitujuje ubuziranenge kandi ko abazicuruza badasobanurira abantu amabwiriza agenga imikoresherezo yazo, bagasaba Urwego ngenzuramikorere (RURA) gusobanurira abantu imikoreshereze ya Gaz.
Mu batanze ibitekerezo ku nkuru twabagejejeho hari uwagize ati “RURA nishake ikintu yakora kuri ibi bintu kuko abatanga gaz ntabwo bazigenzura nta nubwo bigisha abo bazihaye uko zikoreshwa.
Biratangaje kubona umuntu ajya kugura Gaz ntibabanze no kureba ko icupa ridafite ikibazo ukabibona ugeze mu rugo, kenshi usanga zisigirwa abakozi n’iyo abibonye ntamenya icyo gukora.”
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 21 Mutarama 2019, RURA yanyujije kuri Twitter ubutumwa bugaragaza ibyo abakoresha Gaz bakwiye kwitwararika.
Bagize bati “Mu gihe habayeho guhita kwa gaz cyangwa kuva, uzabibwirwa n’impumuro ya gaz yihariye.
Muri cyo gihe kora ibi bikurikira: Mu gihe utetse, funga gaz, Mu gihe utekeye mu nzu sohora icupa ryawe hanze y’inzu, ahantu hari umwuka uhagije kandi ufungure n’inzugi n’amadirishya, Irinde ikintu cyose cyatuma gaz yaka nko kunywa itabi, kwatsa ikibiriti n’ibindi, Irinde kuzimya cyangwa kwatsa amashanyarazi ukoresheje interebuteri (Interrupteur).
Irinde kuzimya cyangwa kwatsa ibikoresho bikoresha amashanyarazi kuko byazana udushashi dutuma gaz yaka.”
Bakomeza bavuga ko icupa rya gaz ribikwa buri gihe rihagaze kandi ahantu hari umwuka uhagije, hategereye ikintu cyatera ubushyuhe cyangwa cyatera inkongi y’umuriro.
Bibaye byiza kurushaho ngo waribika hanze y’inzu, ahantu hizewe aho ridashobora guhanuka cyangwa kwangirika.
Umugozi uva ku icupa ugana ku ishyiga ugomba kuba utarangiritse kandi ukanyura ahantu hatari ubushyuye mu gihe utetse.
Minisiteri y’Ibidukikije, ivuga ko abanyarwanda 98% bakoresha ibikomoka ku biti birimo inkwi n’amakara mu bikorwa bitandukanye bya buri munsi.
Igasaba abantu by’umwihariko abatuye mu mijyi guhindura imyumvire by’umwihariko abakoresha ibicanwa bikomoka ku biti ngo bakwiye gukoresha Gaz kugirango amashyamba arusheho kubungwabungwa.

Nubwo nabo basabiriza, abamugaye baranenga ababikora bataramugaye Mu gihe Umujyi wa Kigali ari hamwe mu hantu hagaragara abasabiriza cyane, ababikora bamugaye barikoma bagenzi babo basabiriza bataramugaye kuko ngo batuma badahabwa nk'uko bikwiye.
Nubwo bavuga ibi ariko polisi yo ivuga ko itegeko rihana abasabiriza ntawe rirobanura.
Kigali ni umwe mu mijyi mu Rwanda igaragaramo abasabirizi benshi, biganjemo abafite ubumuga ndetse n'abadafite ikibazo cy'ubumuga.
Uko iminsi yicuma, niko iyi ngeso ikomeza kwiyongera muri uyu mujyi ndetse n'indi mijyi ikomeye mu gihugu, abaturage nabo bakomeza kwerekana ko iyi ngeso inyuranyije n'indangagaciro z'umuco w'u Rwanda.
Mu gihe Leta nayo yakunze kugaragaza ingamba zo gukura aba bantu mu muhanda, abasabiriza bo bagaragaza ko babikoreshwa no kubura ubundi buryo bakwifashisha ngo babashe kubona amaramuko.
Twaganiriye na bamwe mu bamugaye basabiriza nka bamwe mu batungwa agatoki, batubwira ko kubikora ari amaburakindi ariko banatunga agatoki abantu basabiriza bataramugaye babashinja gutuma badahabwa nk'uko bikwiye.
Bavuga kandi ko hari abaza gusaba kubera ingeso nta kibazo bafite, bigatuma abamugaye badahabwa.
Bavuga ndetse ko mwene aba basabiriza nta kibazo bafite aribo batuma leta ishyira ingufu mu kwamagana abasabiriza ngo ugasanga bifatwa nk'aho ari ingeso.
Umwe muribo twaganiriye watugaragarije bikomeye kutishimira aba bagenzi be yagize ati: " impamvu abantu bamaze kubona ko gusaba ari ingeso, ni uko hari abaza kubikora bataramugaye bashoboye gukora, aba rero nibo batuma tudahabwa.
Naho se twe, ubu se mbiretse natungwa n'iki ko ari byo bintunze igihe kirekire…."
Nubwo ariko abamugaye bikoma abasaba bataramugaye, polisi y'igihugu ibibutsa ko ntawemerewe gusabiriza.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu Mujyi wa Kigali CSP Mbabazi Modeste mu kiganiro twagiranye kuri telefone igendanwa, yatubwiye ko itegeko rihana abasabiriza ryatangiye gushyirwa mu bikorwa kandi ko hari n'abatangiye kubihanirwa, yongeraho ko ababikora bakwiye kumenya ko ntawemerewe gusabiriza, bose iryo tegeko rikaba ribareba.
Ingingo ya 690 y'Itegeko Ngenga rishyiraho igitabo cy'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda, iteganya igihano ku cyaha cyo gusabiriza ivuga ko "Umuntu wese ukora icyaha cy'ubusabirizi ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku minsi umunani (8) ariko kitageze ku mezi atandatu (6).

#16728#	10	relationships	http://www.makuruki.rw/URUKUNDO/article/Ni-iki-wakora-ngo-ubashe-gutera-akabariro-igihe-kirekire
Ni iki wakora ngo ubashe gutera akabariro igihe kirekire?
Akenshi bamwe mu bagabo bamara igihe gito ugereranije n’igiteganyijwe mu gihe batera akabariro.
Mu gihe ibi biba inshuro nke ntibyakagombye guhangayikisha umuntu cyangwa kumutera ipfunwe.
Abahanga mu bijyanye n’ ubuzima bw’ imyororeke bemeza ko ibi biterwa n’impamvu z’imiterere y’umuntu (raisons biologiques) ndetse n’impamvu zo mu mutwe (raisons pscychologiques).
Kugira ngo iki kibazo gikemuke ibi bitaro bitangaza ko ari ngombwa kugana muganga, ubujyanama, ndetse no kunoza uburyo iyi mibonano ikorwamo.
Urubuga rwa Internet Penishealth.com rutanga bimwe mubyo gukora kugira ngo wirinde kurangiza vuba ndetse no kongera ibyishimo mu gihe cy’imibonano.
Mbere y’imibonano: 1.
Ikinishe (masturbation) nibura isaha imwe cyangwa abiri mbere yo gukora imibonano.
Ibi ngo bizagabanya ubushyuhe bukurimo bityo uruhuke ku buryo umara igihe kinini mu gihe ukora imibonano.
2.
Mbere yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, banza ukinishe igitsina kugira ngo wongere igihe igitsina kimara gifite umurego.
Ikigo cy’ubuvuzi cya Mayo kivuga ko ibi bizatuma imibonano ikorwa neza.
Mu gihe cy’imibonano: 1.
Kinisha igitsina cyawe ukoresheje intoki cyangwa mu gihe cy’imibonano.
Komeza ubikore kugeza ubwo wumva ugeze hafi y’ibyishimo bya nyuma(orgasme).
2.
Fata ku mutwe w’igitsina cyawe.
Komeza uhafate kugeza ubwo wumva ubushake bwo kurangiza bugabanutse.
3.
Nyuma yo kurekura igitsina tuza nibura amasegonda 30.
Iki kigo kivuga ko igitsina gishobora kugabanuka mu murego ariko ubushake bwo gukora imibonano bwo buzakomeza.
4.
Kurikiza ibi byiciro bivuzwe haruguru mu gihe cyose wumva ugiye kugera ku musozo w’imibonano.
Abo bahanga bakomeza bavuga kandi ko ari byiza gukoresha agakingirizo.
Ikindi ngo ni byiza gushaka ikintu cyaguhuza mu mutwe mu gihe cy’imibonano kugira ngo nabyo bigufashe kumara igihe kirekire.

#16741#	11	people	https://www.igihe.com/abantu/article/galileo-watsembeye-kiliziya-akemeza-ko-isi-izenguruka-izuba-kugeza-abizize-yari
Galileo watsembeye Kiliziya akemeza ko Isi izenguruka Izuba kugeza abizize yari muntu ki?
Galileo Galilei, ni umuhanga wamenyekanye cyane mu mpaka za muhanganishije na Kiliziya yavugaga ko Izuba rizenguruka Isi nyamara we akiyemeza kubihinyuza kugeza yitabye Imana.
Galileo Galilei ni Umutaliyani wamenyekanye cyane kubera ubuvumbuzi yagiye ageraho mu bijyanye n’Ubugenge ndetse n’ubumenyi bw’ikirere.
Galileo yabonye izuba ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1564, Se Vicenzo yari umunyamuziki ukomeye ariko utarifuzaga ko umuhungu we agera ikirenge muke ahubwo agashaka ko aba inzobere mu buvuzi.
Ubwo yari afite imyaka 17 yoherejwe kwiga ibijyanye n’ubuganga muri Kaminuza ya Pisa, mu gihe yari akiri umunyeshuri muri iyi kaminuza nibwo yaje kuvumbura ko afite impano mu bijyanye n’imibare maze asaba se ko amasomo y’ubuganga yayahagarikira aho akajya kuba umwarimu w’imibare.
Vicenzo yaje kumva iki cyifuzo cy’umuhungu we maze birangira yibereye umwarimu w’imibare.
Mu 1609, Galileo yumvise inkuru z’ivumburwa ry’igikoresho cyitwa ‘ spyglass’ cyakoreshwaga mu gukurura ibintu biri kure bikagaragara nk’ibiri hafi.
Galileo yakoresheje ubumenyi yari afite mu mibare maze avugurura iyi ‘spyglass’ akora igikoresho gikoreshwa mu kwitegereza ibiri mu isanzure kizwi nka ‘Telescope’.
Mu mpera z’uwo mwaka, Galileo akoresheje ‘telescope’ yabaye umuntu wa mbere urebye ku kwezi maze abasha kuvumbura ko ukwezi kudafite ubuso bunogereje ko ahubwo kimwe n’isi ubuso bwako bugizwe n’imisozi n’ibibaya.
Iyi ‘telescope’ kandi yayikoresheje mu kuvumbura umubumbe wa Saturne no kuvumbura ibyiciro bya Venus ndetse no kwiga byinshi ku izuba.
Uku kuvumbura no kurushaho kwitegereza isanzure yifashishije ‘telescope’ byatumye Galileo arushaho kwemera iby’ihame rya Copenicus rivuga ko Isi n’indi mibumbe bizenguruka izuba.
Iyi myemerere yari mishya cyane ko mu gihe cya Galileo abantu bemeraga ko Isi ariyo iri hagati mu isanzure izuba n’indi mibumbe bikaba biyizenguruka, inyigisho yari yarakwirakwijwe na Kiliziya cyane.
Kiliziya yananiwe kwakira ubuvumbuzi bwa Galileo Nyuma y’uko Galileo atangiye gusohora inyandiko zirimo ubu buvumbuzi bwe ko Isi izenguruka izuba, Kiliziya Gatolika yamuhamagaje i Roma.
Iki gihe yahamagajwe kugira ngo yisobanure kuko ubu buvumbuzi bwe bwafatwaga nk’ubunyuranya n’inyigisho za Kiliziya kandi ubuhakanyi cyari icyaha gishobora guhanishwa igihano cy’urupfu.
Mu 1616 Galileo yakuriweho ibi byaha by’ubuhakanyi ariko ategekwa kutazongera gusohora inyandiko zirimo iyi myemerere ye ko Isi izenguruka izuba.
Nyuma yo gukomeza gukora ubushakashatsi bwimbitse Galileo yakomeje kubona ibimenyetso bimuhamiriza ko koko ibyo yavugaga ari byo, maze mu 1632 ashyira ku mugaragaro igitabo yise ‘Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems’ aho yongeye guhamya ko ibyo avuga ari ukuri.
Ibi byatumye Kiliziya Gatolika yongera guhamagaza Galileo maze ahamywa ubuhakanyi akatirwa gufungwa ubuzima bwe bwose.
Mu 1633 kubera imyaka ye n’ibibazo by’ubuzima yemerewe gukorera igifungo cye mu rugo maze aza kwitaba Imana mu 1642.
Byafashe imyaka irenga 300 kugira ngo kiliziya yivuguruze ndetse yemeze ko Galileo yari mu kuri, ndetse izina rye riza gukurwaho icyasha cy’ubuhakanyi.
Galileo Galilei yakomeje kwemeza ko Isi izenguruka Izuba kugeza apfuye

#16752#	8	technology	http://www.makuruki.rw/IKORANABUHANGA/article/U-Rwanda-na-Afurika-biri-mu-nzibacyuho-y-ikoranabuhanga-Perezida-Kagame
"U Rwanda na Afurika biri mu nzibacyuho y'ikoranabuhanga" Perezida Kagame Perezida w'u Rwanda Paul Kagame yavuze ko u Rwanda n'umugabane wa Afurika bazakomeza gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ryakozwe n'abandi gusa.
Yavuze ko ubu u Rwanda n'Afurika bisa n'ibiri mu nzibacyuho bikoresha ikoranabuhanga ryakozwe n'abandi, ariko biga n'uburyo bakwikorera iryabo bwite.
Ubwo yatangaga ikiganiro mu nama mpuzamahanga ngarukamwaka yiga ku bukungu (World Economic Forum) iri kubera i Davos mu Busuwisi, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko Afurika igeze igihe cyo kwihangira ikoranabuhanga ryayo.
Nkuko tubikesha urubuga rwa Twitter rwa Perezidansi y'u Rwanda, Kagame watangaga ikiganiro ku "impinduka z'ejo hazaza " yavuze ko atari byiza gukomeza gukoresha iby'abandi.
Yagize ati: "Mu Rwanda no muri Afurika ubu turi mu nzibacyuho yo kwikorera ikoranabuhanga ryacu , atari ugukoresha iry'abandi gusa."
Perezida Kagame yafatanyije ikiganiro na Sheryl Sandberg ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Facebook, Satya Nadella Umuyobozi mu ruganda rwa Microsoft, Umuyobozi wa sosiyete ya Mahindra ku isi na Zachary Bookman, Umuyobozi mukuru w'ikigo OpenGov gifasha za leta gusesengura amakuru ajyanye n'ubukungu.
Kagame kandi yagarutse ku kamaro k'ikoranabuhanga mu iterambere ry'igihugu, aho yerekanye ko rikwiye kwifashishwa mu guhindura ubuzima bw'abaturage, no kurwanya ivangura.
Aha yatanze rw'aho u Rwanda rukomeje gukataza mu ikoranabuhanga hitabwa no ku gitsinagore.
Yagize ati: "Mu Rwanda gushyira no gukoresha abagore mu ikoranabuhanga mu gufasha umuryango nyarwanda, ni zimwe mu ngamba turi kwegeranya".
Perezida Kagame yashimangiye ko Afurika iri mu mpinduramatwara ya gatatu n'iya kane yo kwiteza imbere.
Yagize ati: "Afurika iri mu mpinduramatwara ya gatatu n'iya kane zo guhindura imibereho y'abaturage kandi turazishoboye zose.
Ubusanzwe impinduramatwara zituma haba abatsinda n'abatsindwa.
Twe akazi kacu ni ukugira abatinda benshi n'abatsindwa bake."
Raporo iherutse ya banki y'isi ishyira u Rwanda ku mwanya wa kabiri muri Afurika mu bihugu byiza byo gukoreramo ubucuruzi.
Perezida Kagame yatangaje ko ibyo bitapfuye kwizana gusa, ko ahubwo biterwa n'ubuyobozi buhamye, umutekano w'abashoramari n'iyubahirizwa ry'amategeko.
Muri iyi nama u Rwanda rwitezemo guhura n'abashoramari batandukanye mu bukungu ku isi ndetse n'inama zijyanye n'ubukungu nkuko byatangajwe na Amb Gatete Claver, Minisitiri w'Imari n'igenamigambi, umwe mu bagize itinda ryeherekeje Perezida Kagame.
Inama mpuzamahnga mu bukungu yatangiye kuri uyu wa gatatutariki 20 Mutarama, izarangira tariki 23 Mutarama 2016.

#16782#	5	politics	http://igihe.com/politiki/article/mushikiwabo-yabajijwe-uko-kandidatire-ye-yakiriwe-dipolomasi-y-u-rwanda-n
Mushikiwabo yabajijwe uko kandidatire ye yakiriwe, dipolomasi y’u Rwanda n’ahazaza ha OIF Hasigaye iminsi 17 ngo uzicara ku Ntebe y’Ubunyamabanga bw’Umuryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ibihugu bikoresha Ururimi rw’Igifaransa (OIF) mu myaka ine iri imbere amenyekane.
Uyu mwanya uhataniwe na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Ubutwererane n’Ibikorwa by’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, Mushikiwabo Louise n’Umunya-Canada, Michaëlle Jean uwumazeho imyaka ine.
Amatora azabera mu nama ya OIF izateranira i Erevan muri Arménie ku wa 11-12 Ukwakira 2018.
Kandidatire ya Mushikiwabo yashyigikiwe na Perezida Emmanuel Macron w’u Bufaransa, ibihugu byo muri Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU) n’ahandi mu mfuruka zose yakoreyemo ingendo yiyamamaza.
Mushikiwabo umaze imyaka icyenda ayobora Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda, aheruka gutangaza ko yifitiye icyizere cyo kwegukana intsinzi.
Mushikiwabo ni umunyapolitiki wavukiye i Jabana mu Karere ka Gasabo, ku wa 22 Gicurasi 1963.
Ahanze amaso Inama y’Inteko Rusange ya Loni iri kubera i New York izamufasha gukomeza gushaka amajwi.
Minisitiri Mushikiwabo yaganiriye na Jeune Afrique asubiza ibibazo ku cyerekezo cye muri OIF n’imibanire y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa, ibihugu byakunze kurebana ay’ingwe.
Jeune Afrique: Kandidatire yawe muri OIF yaratunguranye.
Uvuga iki ku kuba warasunikiwe kwiyamamaza n’u Bufaransa ndetse ubusabe bukaba bwaranyujijwe kuri Maroc?
Mushikiwabo: Kandidatire yaganiriweho n’ibihugu by’inshuti nifuje kudatangaza, byiyongeraho u Bufaransa.
Nabiganiriye na Perezida Kagame n’abagize Guverinoma dusanga atari igitekerezo kibi.
Igihe kirageze ngo tugire uruhare rufatika mu miryango tubarizwamo.
Jeune Afrique: Abayobozi b’u Rwanda bakiriye bate kumva ko ushyigikiwe na Perezida Macron?
Mushikiwabo: Baratunguwe, baranishima.
Mu bihe byashize Francophonie yagereranywaga n’u Bufaransa kandi ntabwo twari dufitanye umubano mwiza.
Jeune Afrique: Iyi kandidatire yaba ari inzira yo gusoza amakimbirane cyangwa iy’ubwiyunge hagati yanyu?
Mushikiwabo: Igaragaza ubushake bwo kugira uruhare mu muryango u Rwanda rubarizwamo kuva mu myaka ishize ariko rutashamadukiye kwinjiramo kubera imibanire mibi n’u Bufaransa.
Mu myaka ishize, igihugu cyanjye cyakomeje kwiyubaka no gusigasira ibyagezweho.
Ni umwanya wo kugira uruhare rukomeye mu miryango turimo.
Ni yo mpamvu twasubiye mu Muryango w’Ubukungu mu Karere ka Afurika yo Hagati (CEEAC).
Ni ibimenyetso by’ubushake bwa politiki na dipolamasi.
Jeune Afrique: Mu myaka icyenda umaze muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ni iki dipolomasi y’u Rwanda yagezeho?
Mushikiwabo: Twarazamutse mu bijyanye na politiki n’ubukungu.
Twafunguye za ambasade muri Aziya no mu Burasirazuba bwo Hagati.
Ubu duharariwe muri Singapore, Séoul, Abu-Dhabi n’ahandi.
Twanashyize imbaraga mu bikorwa byacu mu bice byose bya Afurika.
Dipolomasi yacu yaragutse n’ibikorwa byayo biriyongera mu buryo bufatika.
Turateganya gufungura Ambasade nshya muri Mozambique, Zimbabwe na Maroc.
Jeune Afrique: Mu 2014, Afurika ntiyahiriwe n’umwanya muri OIF kuko yari ihagarariwe n’abakandida bane.
Kuri iyi nshuro kandidatire yanyu ishobora gushyigikirwa bisesuye na AU?
Mushikiwabo: Icyiyongera ku ruhare rw’u Rwanda ku mugabane ndetse no muri AU, kuba ibihugu bya Afurika binshigikiye bigaragaza inzira igana ku bumwe.
Ni ibihe by’amavugurura no kwihuza.
Afurika yamenye ko mu gihe yunze ubumwe, ishobora gutsinda nkuko yafashije Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus wo muri Ethiopie kuyobora OMS.
Uko iminsi yicuma ni ko ku ruhando mpuzamahanga Afurika izagira ijwi rimwe.
Jeune Afrique: Utekereza iki ku mikorere ya Michaëlle Jean?
Ni ibiki wanoza mu byo yakoze uramutse utowe?
Mushikiwabo: Nirinze kwibanda ku bitekerezo byo kwiyamamaza biharabika Umunyamabanga Mukuru uriho.
Icyo navuga ni uko numva mfite igitutu cy’ibihugu by’ibinyamuryango bikeneye kubona OIF ifite imbaraga kandi ibegera.
Mfite ubushake, umurava n’ubunararibonye.
Abayobozi benshi ba Afurika n’abandi bashaka kunshyigikira ngo twongerere imbaraga umuryango wacu.
Nyuma yo gukorera igihugu kimwe, kwita kuri 84 biri mu byo nifuza.
Jeune Afrique: Igihe u Rwanda rwemezaga Icyongereza nk’ururimi rwo gukoresha mu burezi, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ‘‘Duha agaciro ururimi rufasha abana bacu guhangana kandi ruzadufasha mu cyerekezo cy’iterambere ry’igihugu.’’
Ibi mubihuza mute n’umwanya muri kwiyamamariza?
Mushikiwabo: Mu Rwanda nta guhangana kw’Igifaransa n’Icyongereza guhari.
Ibyacu ntibyihariye kuko nizera ko turi ibihugu umunani muri OIF birimo na Canada bikoresha Igifaransa n’Icyongereza.
Icyongereza ni ururimi rw’ikoranabuhanga, ishoramari, imbuga nkoranyambaga kandi niko Isi imeze.
Ntidukwiye kwibagirwa ko igihugu kiri muri Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, akarere gakoresha Icyongereza.
Jeune Afrique: Ni iki kigaragaza ukwiganza kw’Igifaransa mu Rwanda?
Mushikiwabo: Igifaransa gifite umwanya mu Rwanda nk’umurage.
Ubuzima bushingiye ku muco hari aho buhurira n’Igifaransa.
Twemera ko indimi ebyiri zakoreshwa nta kibazo.
Ndagira ngo mbabwire ko umwanya w’Igifaransa utahawe akato mu Rwanda aho inyandiko zemewe n’ubutegetsi zandikwa mu Kinyarwanda, Icyongereza n’Igifaransa.
Jeune Afrique: U Rwanda rwaba rwaratanze umusanzu warwo muri OIF?
Mushikiwabo: Twarabikoze.
Murabizi ko imisanzu itangwa mu miryango mpuzamahanga atari ibintu bishya.
Akenshi usunikirwa gutanga umusanzu bitewe n’inyungu witeze kuvana mu muryango.
Nzakora ibishoboka byose ku buryo buri gihugu muri OIF kizabigiramo uruhare.
Igifaransa cyemewe n’amategeko mu bihugu 29 ku Isi, aho muri byo 22 ari ibyo muri Afurika.
Ibindi bitari ibya Afurika bikoresha uru rurimi ni nk’u Bubiligi, Canada, u Bufaransa, Haiti, Luxembourg, u Busuwisi na Vanuatu.
Gikoreshwa kandi no mu birwa nka Saint Lucia, Dominica na Monaco.
Mu butegetsi bw’u Rwanda hakoreshwa indimi zirimo Icyongereza, Ikinyarwanda, Igiswahili n’Igifaransa ari nacyo gikoreshwa na benshi mu gihugu.
Umuryango wa Francophonie washinzwe mu 1970, urakomeye cyane kuko uhuza ibihugu bivuga Igifaransa, aho igenzura riheruka mu 2014 ryerekanye ko kivugwa na miliyoni 274 mu migabane itanu y’Isi.
Mushikiwabo Louise ni we mukandida wa Afurika ku buyobozi bwa OIF

#16798#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/huye-hafunguwe-santere-yo-kuvuriramo-abanduye-coronavirus
Huye: Hafunguwe santere yo kuvuriramo abanduye Coronavirus Nyuma y’uko byagaragaye ko umubare w’abanduye indwara ya Coronavirus ugenda wiyongera muri rusange, i Huye hashyizwe santere yo kubavuriramo.
Mu Kigo Nderabuzima cya Mukura ni ho hashyizwe site ivurirwamo abanduye Coronavirus Iyo santere yashyizwe mu Kigo Nderabuzima cya Mukura giherereye mu Murenge wa Mukura, guhera ku itariki ya 6 Nzeri 2020.
Kugeza ubu imaze kugezwamo abarwayi bane ariko batarembye, kandi ubu babiri muri bo bamaze gukira baranataha nk’uko bivugwa n’umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Huye, Ange Sebutege.
Nubwo hari Abanyehuye iyi ndwara yamaze kugaragaraho bagera kuri 14, umwe muri bo ubu akaba arwariye mu rugo iwe, aba bane bakiriwe muri santere ya Mukura si Abanyehuye.
Ni abagiye kwivuriza ku bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Butare (CHUB), babasangamo Coronavirus ntibabohereze iwabo, ahubwo bakavurirwa bugufi y’aho bari bari.
Abajyaga bivuriza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Mukura ubu ngo bashakiwe ahandi bazajya bivuriza nk’uko bivugwa na Meya Sebutege.
Agira ati “Abaturage bashyiriweho ahantu baherwa serivisi z’ibanze hafi y’ikigo nderabuzima bari basanzwe bivurizamo.
Hanateganyijwe ko abagize ibibazo bituma biba ngombwa ko bakurikiranwa bazajya boherezwa ku kigo nderabuzima cya Rango, cyangwa ku bitaro bya Kabutare hifashishijwe imbangukiragutabara”.
Uyu muyobozi anaboneraho gusaba Abanyehuye kurushaho kwirinda Coronavirus, buri wese akumva ko amabwiriza yo kwirinda amureba kandi akayakurikiza, kuko uretse kuba abayandura bagenda biyongera, inamunga ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Ibi binashimangirwa n’umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Huye wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu, Andre Kamana, ukunze kubwira imbaga ati “umurwayi umwe gusa kumupima, bitwara amafaranga hagati y’ibihumbi 50 na 100.
Abafite za whatsap mujye mureba ku mbonerahamwe igaragaza iby’imirwarire ya Coronavirus, murebe imibare y’abamaze gupimwa hanyuma mukube mwumve amafaranga iyi ndwara imaze gutwara”.
Aha kandi ngo ntihaba habazwe ibigenda ku barwaye iyi ndwara barembye, biba ngombwa ko bongererwa umwuka hifashishijwe imashini (Ventilators).
Visi Meya Kamana anasaba abantu gutekereza ku gihe abantu batirinze, hanyuma bakarwarira rimwe uko byagenda.
Ati “Abarwaye Coronavirus ntibarwarira aho abandi barwayi barwariye.
Ese dufite ibitaro bihagije muri buri kagari na buri murenge na buri karere ?
Tuvuge niba abaturage ba Ngoma bose barwaye, ese twabona ahantu dukwirwa?
Buri wese se yabona icupa rya bomboni rimujyaho?
Ese abo baganga babitaho bava hehe”?
Iyi santere yashyiriweho kuzajya ivurirwamo abarembye kuko abatarembye bazajya bakurikiranwa bari mu ngo.
Yashyizweho muri uku kwezi kwa Nzeri, nyuma y’uko guhera kuitariki ya 13 Nyakanga, ibitaro bya Kaminuza (CHUB) na byo ubu bisigaye bipima Coronavirus ku batuye mu Ntara y’amajyepfo.

#16819#	4	health	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Ubuzima/Abana-b-ahungu-ku-isonga-mu-gukorerwa-ihohoterwa-ryo-ku-mubiri
Abana b’abahungu ku isonga mu gukorerwa ihohoterwa ryo ku mubiri Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda bwerekanye ko abana b’abahungu ari bo bari ku isonga mu gukorerwa ihohoterwa ryo ku mubiri gukubitwa no gukomeretsa aho bwagaragaje ko 59.5% barikorewe.
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 17 Gicurasi 2018 nibwo iyi Minisiteri yashyize ahagaragara ubu bushakashatsi ikaba yagaragaje ko bugamije kwerekana uko ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana rihagaze mu Rwanda bafatiye ku mwaka ushize.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abana b’abakobwa bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 18 na 24, bakorerwa iri hohoterwa ryo ku mubiri ( gukubitwa no gukomeretsa) bari ku gipimo cya 37,2% mu gihe abasore bari muri iki kigero ari 59.5%.
Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bwanagaragaje ko abana b’abakobwa bari mu kigero cy’imyaka 18 na 24, aribo bakorerwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ku gipimo cyo hejuru cyane ugereranyije n’abana b’abahungu kuko imibare yabuvuyemo igaragaza ko abakobwa bahohoterwa ari 23.9%. mu gihe abahungu bakorewe iri hohoterwa ari 9.6% Dr Yvonne Kayiteshonga, umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe ubuzima bwo mu mutwe muri Minisante, akanaba umwe mu bayoboye ubu bushakashatsi, yavuze ko abana bakorerwa ihohoterwa bibagiraho ingaruka nyinshi kandi zikomeye.
Yagize ati “Abana bakorerwa ihohoterwa bahura n’ingaruka zzitandukanye.Hari gukomereka ku mubiri, hari kandi ibikomere byo ku mutima bimara igihe kirekire birimo agahinda gakabije, gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge cyangwa gufatwa n’indwara zo mu mutwe.”
Yanavuze ko hari abakorerwa ihohoterwa maze bagafata imyanzuro yo kwiyahura kubera ibikomere byo mu mitima baba barasigiwe n’abaribakoreye.
Dr Kayiteshonga yanashimangiye ko ababyeyi, abarezi ndetse n’abandi bantu bakuze bakagomye kubabungabunga aribo baza ku isonga mu kugira uruhare mu ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana.
Yagize ati “Byagaragaye ko abahohotera abana ari ababyeyi, abo mu muryango, abaturanyi ndetse n’abarimu.”
Ku bijyanye n’ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina Dr Kayiteshonga yasobanuye ko rikorwa mu buryo bwinshi ngo kuko atari ukubafata ku ngufu gusa, ko ahubwo harimo no kubambika ubusa, kubakorakora ku ku bitsina , kubisoma no kubakorera ibindi bikorwa biganisha ku mibonano mpuzabitsina.

Karongi: Abantu 9 batawe muri yombi benga Makokeri Abantu icyenda bo mu murenge wa Bwishyura, mu karere ka Karongi, batawe muri yombi na polisi ikorera muri ako karere bazira gukora no gucuruza inzoga y'inkorano kandi zitujuje ubuziranenge yitwa Makokeri.
Mu mukwabo wo gufata abenga n'abanywa inzoga y'inkorano ya Makokeri wabereye muri uwo murenge, polisi yafashe litiro 1060 z'iyo nzoga ndetse abayenga bagera ku icyenda nabo batabwa muri yombi.
Muri icyo gikorwa, polisi yakanguriye abaturage bo muri uwo murenge kureka kunywa ibiyobyabwenge byiganjemo inzoga y'inkorano yitwa marokeri ihakorerwa , kuko ituma badindira mu iterambere ndetse n'ubuzima bwabo bukahazaharira.
Umuyobozi wa sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Bwishyura Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Bernard Gahima yasobanuriye abo baturage ububi bwo kunywa inzoga nk'iyi y'inkorano n'ibindi biyobyabwenge muri rusange agira ati:" Abanywi b'ibiyobyabwenge ndetse n'iyi nzoga y'inkorano birirwa bicaye bazinywa badakora.
Igikurikiraho rero ni uko zibatesha umutwe maze bakishora mu byaha bitandukanye nk'ubujura, urugomo, gufata abagore n'abakobwa ku ngufu n'ibindi bikorwa bibi".
CIP Gahima yakomeje avuga ko uku kwirirwa banywa iyi nzoga y'inkorano ari nabyo ntandaro y'ubukene kubera kutitabira umurimo bityo iterambere ryabo rikahazaharira.
Yakomeje kandi asaba uwaba agicuruza izi nzoga z'inkorano kubireka kimwe n'abanywi bayo ahubwo bakitabira gahunda zashyizweho na leta zo guteza imbere imibereho myiza y'abaturage.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'umurenge wa Bwishyura, Mutuyimana Emmanuel, yabwiye abaturage bari bitabiriye icyo gikorwa kutenga, kudacuruza, no kutanywa bene izo nzoga, kandi bagatanga amakuru ku gihe y'ababikora.
Itegeko ngenga rihana ibyaha mu Rwanda No 001-2012/OL ryo ku wa 2 Gicurasi 2012 rihana umuntu wese unywa ibiyobyabwenge, ubikoresha ndetse n'ukingira ikibaba ababikoresha, harimo n'ibihano birimo igifungo cyo kuva ku mezi atatu kugeza ku myaka itanu, n' ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi magana abiri na mirongo itanu y'u Rwanda (250.
000RwF).

#16836#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/Nyaruguru-Gare-ya-Kibeho-igiye-gutangira-kubakwa
Nyaruguru: Gare ya Kibeho igiye gutangira kubakwa Bamwe mu batwara imodoka zijya cyangwa ava mu karere ka Nyaruguru barishimira ko muri aka karere hagiye kubakwa gare, kuko kuba nta yari ihari byajyaga bituma bakorera mu kajagari.
Bamwe mu batwara imodoka zitwara abagenzi bavuga ko ubusanzwe ngo mu gutega imodoka hajyaga habamo akajagari, ugasanga ngo abagezi batazi aho bagomba guhagarara bategereje imodoka.
Inyubako zarimo zamaze gusenywa.
Bavuga kandi ko gare nimara kubakwa, ngo uretse no kuba abagenzi bazabasha kugira aho bafatira imodoka hazwi, ngo bazabasha no kubona aho bafatira amafunguro, ubwiherero n'ibindi byangombwa bakeneraga bikabagora kubibona.
Ngiruwonsanga Venuste, utwara imodoka itwara abagenzi muri kompanyi ya Rwinyana Ltd, avuga ko muri uyu muhanda habamo akajagari kuberako ntaho guhagarara hazwi habaho bigatuma n'aho bahagaritse imodoka batizera umutekano wazo.
Ikindi kandi avuga ngo ni uko iyi gare niyuzura izakura abagenzi mu gihirahiro bakaba bazi aho bategera, kandi ukeneye kugira icyo agura akabona aho akigurira.
Ubusanzwe abagenzi bategera imodoka ku muhanda.
Ati:"Ubundi gutegera hano ku muhanda haba harimo akajagari kenshi, noneho byaba ari ku minsi mikuru ijya iba hano i Kibeho bwo akajagari kaba ari kenshi cyane, hari n'ubwo tbura aho dusiga imodoka, n'aho tuzisize ntituba twizeye umutekano wazo.
Ikindi n'uko duhora dushyamirana na polisi baduhana ngo duhagaze nabi, ariko icyo gihe gare niba ihari ntawe bazongera guhana bamuziza guhagarara nabi, kandi n'abagenzi bazabasha kumenya aho bategera, ndetse n'ukeneye amazi cyangwa se icyayi abone aho akinywa".
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Nyaruguru Habitegeko Francois avuga ahazubakwa gare ubu hari gutegurwa kugirango imirimo yo kubaka itangire.
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko iyi gare igiye kuza ari igisubizo ku bwinshi bw'imodoka ziza I Kibeho mu ngendo nyobokamana zajyaga ziteza akajagari muri aka gace.
Ati:"Nibyo koko hano I Kibeho hagiye kubakwa gare, ubu abaturage bamaze kubariwa kandi barishyuwe, ku buryo ubu imirimo yo kubaka igiye gutangira.Iyi gare rero ikazaza ikemura ikibazo cy'ubwinshi bw'imodoka twakira hano cyane cyane mu bihe by'ingendo nyobokamana".
Uyu muyobozi kandi avuga ko muri iyi gare hazaba harimo n'inyubako z'ubucuruzi, zizafasha abagenzi bazajya bahategerereza imodoka kubasha kugira icyo bagura bakeneye.
Ubuyobozi bw'akarere bukaba butangaza ko imirimo yo kubaka iyi gare izamara imyaka itatu, gusa ngo ikaba iri mu byiciro, kuko ngo habanje kubarira no kwimura abari batuye ahazubakwa, hkazakurikiraho kubaka gare, nyuma hakazubakwa inyubako z'ubucuruzi.
Charles RUZINDANA

#16935#	6	religion	https://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/muzika/article/umuramyi-rwibutso-emma-yasohoye-indirimbo-nshya-igihe-uzazira-isubizamo-abantu
Umuramyi Rwibutso Emma yasohoye indirimbo nshya “Igihe Uzazira” isubizamo abantu kwizera Umuhanzi uririmba indirimbo ziramya zikanahimbaza Imana, Karangwa Rwibutso Emmanuel uzwi nka Rwibutso Emma, yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Igihe Uzazira”, ikubiyemo ubutumwa buhumuriza abantu bukabasubizamo kwizera Imana.
Rwibutso yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo yayanditse ubwo ibihe bya Guma Murugo byari bitangiye.
Igitekerezo cyo kuyandika yagikuye ku buhamya bw’inshuti ye, yamubwiye ukuntu yari iri mu rungabangabo biyigoye, maze isaba Imana ko ibyo yari ari kunyuramo bitatuma ayishidikanya.
Ibyo ngo byatumye yumva yakwandika indirimbo, agasangiza n’abandi batandukanye ubwo butumwa bw’inkomezi, ababa bari mu bihe bigoye na bo ntibashidikanye ku Mana.
Yagize ati “Iyi ndirimbo nayihimbye numva nshaka guhumuriza abantu mbabwira ko amajwi twumva adukanga cyangwa adutera ubwoba tudakwiye kuyitaho ahubwo uko dusanzwe tuzi Imana bitume tutayiyoberwa.”
Indirimbo “Igihe Uzazira” yiganjemo ubutumwa bw’inkomezi ku bagenzi bajya mu ijuru ndetse ituma abantu bagarurira Imana icyizere n’ubwo baba baca mu bikomeye.
Hari nk’aho igira iti “Nsanzwe nzi yuko uri Imana yanjye, nsanzwe nzi yuko unkunda cyane, nsanzwe nzi yuko utabara abantu bawe, nsanzwe nzi yuko utazandeka, n’ubwo nakena nkaburara, nkambara ubusa, ibibi bigasimburana mu buzima bwanjye, namenye neza ko igihe uzazira, uzakora ibirenze ibyo nibwira.”
Igihe Uzazira ni indirimbo ya kabiri, Rwibutso asohoye ari wenyine, ikaba yasohokanye n’amashusho, byombi byatunganyijwe na producer Hyacinthe, umwe mu batunganya indirimbo zihimbaza Imana uri kuzamuka neza.
Rwibutso yavuze ko uretse iyi ndirimbo “Igihe Uzazira”, agiye gushyira imbaraga mu gukomeza gukora n’izindi nyinshi kugira ngo ubutumwa Imana yamushyize ku mutima abusangize n’abandi abinyujije mu ndirimbo.
Reba hano, indirimbo “Igihe Uzazira” Umuramyi Rwibutso Emma yasohoye indirimbo nshya “Igihe Uzazira” isubizamo abantu kwizera Uyu muhanzikazi ari mu banyempano bazamukanye ingoga mu muziki uhimbaza Imana

#16940#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Mu-Rwanda-buri-mwaka-havuka-abantu-buzuye-akarere-imibare-itajyanye-n-ubuso-bw-Igihugu
U Rwanda ruhangayikishijwe n'abana ruvukisha buri mwaka bakuzura akarere Umubare w'abana bavuka buri mwaka uhangayikishije igihugu/ Photo: Internet Nubwo Leta y'u Rwanda ikunze gushishikariza abanyarwanda kuringaniza urubyaro, kuri ubu imibare itangangwa n'ikigo cy'igihugu cyita k'ubuzima RBC, iragaragaza ko mu Rwanda buri mwaka havuka abana bagera ku bihumbi 300 umubare ungana nibura n'abaturage batuye akarere kamwe ku Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro Dr Nzabonimpa Anicet, impuguke mu buzima bw'imyororokere muri RBC yagiranye na Makuruki.rw, yagaragaje ko kuri ubu u Rwanda rufite ikibazo cyo kuba abanyarwanda bagikomeza kwiyongera mu gihe nyamara ubuso bw'u Rwanda bwo butiyongera.
Ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko kuva mu mwaka w'1992, uburumbuke bukiri hejuru aho mu mwaka w'1992 bwari ku kigero cya 6,2%, mu 2014-2015 bigera kuri 4,2% imibare yemeza ko iri hejuru ugereranyije n'ibihugu byateye imbere aho byo biba biri kuri 2%.
Gusa ariko ni ubwo iyo mibare igaragaza ko ubwiyongere bwagabanyutse, ntibikuraho ko abanyarwanda mu byiciro byose ari urubyiruko rutarashaka ndetse n'abantu bakuru bashatse bakomeza kubyara umunsi ku wundi.
Dr Nzabonimpa agaragaza ko mu Rwanda buri mwaka havuka abana ibihumbi 300, abana bashobora kuzura akarere kamwe k'u Rwanda.
Yagize ati: Nibyo hari gahunda ziriho zo gukangurira abanyarwanda kuringaniza imbyaro, ariko ubushakashatsi twakoze bugaragaza ko buri mwaka mu Rwanda havuka abana ibihumbi 300, abana bashobora kuzura akarere mu gihe u Rwanda rufite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare ibihumbi 26 338.
Dr Nzabonimpa akomeza agaragaza impungenge z'iki kibazo aho imibare igaragaza ko urubyiruko ari rwo rurimo kubyara cyane kurusha abantu bakuru bubatse ingo mu buryo buzwi, aho urubyiruko ruri hagati y'imyaka 15 na 19 mu mwaka wa 2014-2015, babyaye cyangwa batwite banganaga na 7% mu gihe mu miryango byari kuri 4,2%.
Ibi ntibikuraho ko hakiri imwe mu miryango ifata icyemezo cyo kuboneza urubyaro bakabyara umwana bakamwita bucura ( Cadet, Cadette , Benjamin..) nyamara nyuma bakisanga bongeye kubyara undi mwana batarabiteganyije.
Aha niho Dr Nzabonimpa asanga gahunda yo kuringaniza urubyaro itakagombye guharirwa abubatse ingo bonyine ko ahubwo bireba abantu b'ingeri zose.
Dr Nzabonimpa Anicet impuguke mu buzima bw'imyororokere muri RBC Yagize ati: Hari igihe usanga mu muryango umugabo n'umugore bafata icyemezo cyo kugabanya urubyaro bakita umwana izina bagaragaza ko nta wundi bazongera kubyara nka ba Benjamin, Cadet, Cadette, ariko nyuma ugasanga umugore yongeye gusama inda bikaba byateza ikibazo mu muryango, urubyiruko rutarashaka na rwo rurimo kubyara cyane.
Dr Nzabonimpa akomeza avuga ko gahunda yo kuringaniza urubyaro igomba kureba abantu b'ingeri zose ,umugabo-Umugore, Umuto n'umukuru.
Kugeza ubu ibipimo mu kuboneza urubyaro bigaragaza ko muri rusange bigeze kuri 53%, 48% ni ugukoresha uburyo bwa kizungu, 6% ni uburyo bwa gakondo, abakoresha agakingirizo baracyari kuri 6%.
Kwifungisha burundu ku bagore biri kuri 1,2%, mu gihe ku bagabo biri kuri 0,8%.
Intara y'Amajayaruguru ni yo iri ku gipimo cyo hejuru mu kuboneza urubyaro aho abaturage baho baboneje urubyaro bari kuri 55%, Umujyi wa Kigali ukaba uri kuri 50%, Amajyepfo 48% , Uburasirazuba 47% , Intara y'Uburengerazuba ikaza ku mwanya wa nyuma aho iri ku gipimo cya 41%.
Ubushakatsi bwakozwe mu mwaka w'2002 bwagaragaje ko abanyarwanda bari miliyoni 8.1, mu 2006 bageraga kuri miliyoni 9.3, naho ibarura rusange ryo mu 2012 ryo ryagaragaje ko abanyarwanda bari hejuru ya miliyoni 11.
Abahanga bavuga ko bimwe mu bituma igihugu gitera imbere ari uko abaturage bayoboka gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro.
Dr Nzabonimpa avuga ko Minisiteri y'ubuzima izakomeza gahunda yo gushishikariza abanyarwanda kuringaniza urubyaro nibura buri mwaka hakajya havuka abantu bakuzura umurenge gusa.

Akimenya ko atwite yabibwiye umuhungu wayimuteye ariko amwuka inabi amubwira ko azamwica nabivuga ahubwo amugira inama yo kuyigereka ku mushumba bari baturanye.
Yagize ati “Yarambwiye ngo ntuzamvuge kuko numvuga nzakugirira nabi.
Nakomeje kugira ubwoba iwacu bambaza nkavuga ngo ni uwo mushumba ariko mu by’ukuri atari we.”
Uwo mushumba wabeshyewe ngo yaje gutoroka kuko yari azi ko azafungwa kubera uwayimugerekagaho yari akiri muto.
Mukamunyawera avuga ko umwana agize amezi atandatu yarwaye akaremba noneho akabibwira wa musore wamuteye inda ngo amufashe kumuvuza ariko amutera utwatsi bituma ava ku izima abibwira ababyeyi be.
Ati “Naragiye noneho mvugisha ukuri kuko n’iwacu bari bamuzi ko ari umuturanyi.”
Kuva ubwo yatangiye kujya mu buyobozi ngo ahabwe indezo y’umwana bituma umugore w’uwo mugabo wamuteye inda amugambanira ngo bamwice kuko abantu bose bemezaga ko umwana asa na se.
Ati “Abamubonye (umwana) bose bakomaga amashyi bati ni fotokopi rwose, se yageze aho arabyemera turamwandikisha ariko bamutegeka no kujya ampa indezo.”
Uko yatemaguwe kubera kwaka indezo Mukamunyawera wagombaga guhabwa indezo bitakorwa akabimenyesha ubuyobozi yatemaguwe n’umugore w’umugabo wamuteye inda afashijwe na musaza we bashaka kumwica.
Ati “Baranteze ari ku mugoroba ngiye kumva numva bari kuntema mu mutwe n’ahantu hose ariko Imana yakinze ukuboko hahita haza umugabo bakwira imishwaro, mba ndarusimbutse.”
Icyo gihe yahise ajya kubarega ndetse abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze babyitambikamo kugeza ubwo inzego zibishinzwe zinjiye mu kibazo cye, bakorerwa dosiye ariko bamaze kumenya ko bakatiwe igifungo cy’umwaka bahita bacika bajya muri Uganda Inama agira abakobwa n’ababyaye batabiteguye Mukamunyawera yagiriye inama abakobwa yo kwitwararika kuko nubwo uwamuteye inda yari yabiteguye kuri we ngo baryamanye atabiteguye.
Avuga kandi ko kuba umuntu yahura n’ibyago agatwara inda bitavuga ko yakwishora mu buraya cyangwa ngo yumve ko ubuzima burangiye.
Ati “Nziko hari abari mu bibazo nk’ibyo nahuye nabyo, ndabahumuriza kandi mbasaba kujya mu Mana kuko nta kibazo idakemura.
Nahuye n’ubuzima buruhije kandi nahoraga mvuga ngo Mana nunkura muri ibi bibazo nzagushimira.
Ndibuka ukuntu njya kubyara abaganga bambwiye ngo barabona umwana yirukanka mu nda.
Abandi babyeyi bampaye umuti bati bashobora kuba bagutegeye ku nda maze kuwunywa mbyara neza.
Ni byinshi Imana yankoreye niyo mpamvu nyishimira kuko ubu yampaye akazi n’umwana wanjye ameze neza.”
Mukamunyawera yemeza ko yababariye abamuhemukiye, agasaba imbabazi uwo mushumba yabeshyeye mu ruhame kuko yasanze aribyo byamuteraga umutwe udakira yamaze igihe yivuriza mu Bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali,CHUK.
Minisiteri y’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango yerekanye ko mu 2016 abana b’abakobwa bari hagati y’imyaka 16-19 bagera ku 17500 batewe inda zitateguwe ndetse binabagiraho ingaruka zitandukanye zirimo no kuva mu ishuri.
Yatewe inda afite imyaka 15, aranatemagurwa azizwa kwaka indezo.

#16974#	5	politics	https://www.igihe.com/politiki/article/ukuboko-k-u-bubiligi-mu-mitegekere-y-u-rwanda-rwa-nyuma-y-ubwigenge-ubukoloni
Ukuboko k’u Bubiligi mu mitegekere y’u Rwanda rwa nyuma y’ubwigenge; Ubukoloni mu isura nshya Tariki 1 Nyakanga 1962, ibyishimo byari byose ku barwanashyaka ba MDR Parmehutu na Aprosoma, amashyaka yahanganye cyane n’ubwami guhera mu 1957 kugeza burundutse mu 1962, u Rwanda rugahinduka Repubulika.
U Rwanda rwari mu mujyo w’ibindi bihugu byinshi by’Afurika, byahuheragamo umuyaga w’impinduka n’ubwigenge nyuma y’imyaka myinshi y’ubukoloni, itotezwa n’isuzugurwa ry’abenegihugu.
Icyakora mu Rwanda ubwigenge busa nk’ubwatandukanye, cyane n’ubwavugwaga mu bindi bihugu bya Afurika, kuko mu gihe ahandi ubwigenge bwabaga bureba abaturage bose, mu Rwanda ho bwaje bureba igice kimwe cy’abaturage, Abahutu, bishimira ko bamaze kwirukana mu gihugu bagenzi babo bo mu bwoko bw’Abatutsi.
Amateka agaragaza ko kandi mu gihe abandi babaga bishimira ko birukanye ubukoloni n’ibyabwo byose, mu Rwanda ho bashimaga uburyo abakoloni bafashije Abahutu kwikiza Abatutsi ndetse uwo murongo w’ubutegetsi bw’Abakoloni, ni nawo wakomeje nyuma y’ubwigenge.
Abakoloni bashyigikiye abazakomeza gukorera mu kwaha kwabo nyuma y’ubwigenge Mu bibazo by’imvururu zatangiye mu Ugushyingo 1959 ubwo Abatutsi batwikirwaga, abari babiri inyuma ni abambari ba Parmehutu na Aprosoma ariko bashyigikiwe bikomeye n’abakoloni.
Abakoloni bakomeje kuba hafi y’igice cy’Abahutu, cyane cyane icya Kayibanda Grégoire ndetse banamuha ubufasha bwose muri gahunda ze zo guhirika ubwami kugeza ubwo ibikoresho byakoreshejwe i Gitarama tariki 28 Mutarama 1961 ubwo Parmehutu yahirikaga ubwami, byatanzwe n’abategetsi b’Ababiligi mu Rwanda.
Umunyamateka Innocent Nizeyimana yabwiye IGIHE ko no mu gihe cyo gutwikira Abatutsi, lisansi yifashishwaga yatangwaga n’abakoloni.
Yagize ati “Kwirukana Abatutsi mu 1959 byakozwe n’Ababiligi.
Yego bifashishije Abahutu ariko bakubwira ko lisansi zo kujya gutwikira Abatutsi zatangirwaga kuri Teritwari, hari n’aho Guy Logiest wari Résident Spécial yivugira ubwe ko yabaga ari kugenda hejuru mu ndege akurikirana uko ibikorwa byo kwirukana Abatutsi bigenda, ngo akababazwa nuko batari biteguye bihagije ngo babe bafite lisansi ihagije yo kubatwikira ku buryo iyo baba barabyiteguye, nta Mututsi wari gusigara mu Rwanda.”
Ababiligi baricaga bagakiza mbere na nyuma y’ubwigenge Icyerekana ko u Bubiligi bwari bugishaka kuguma mu Rwanda, nuko Guverinoma yagiyeho mu Ukwakira 1960 iyobowe na Kayibanda yari igizwe n’abaminisitiri 9 n’abanyamahanga ba Leta 12.
Igitangaje muri abo banyamabanga ba Leta, umunani bari Ababiligi.
Bigaragaza urwego rw’ubwigenge u Bubiligi bwateguriraga u Rwanda kuko bwakomeje kugira ijambo rigaragara mu butegetsi bw’u Rwanda na nyuma y’ubwigenge.
Muri Gicurasi 1962, ingabo z’abakoloni zari zishinzwe kurinda u Rwanda zahinduwemo iz’u Rwanda ariko umubare munini ari uw’ababiligi ari nabo bazitegekaga.
Hashinzwe ishuri rikuru rya gisirikare rya Kigali ritozwa n’Ababiligi.
Nyuma y’ibitero by’Inyenzi mu mpera ya 1963, Abatutsi b’imbere mu gihugu baribasiwe, cyane cyane abataravugaga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi.
Ingabo z’Ababiligi zakomeje kuba mu Rwanda na nyuma y’ubwigenge ndetse ni nazo mu 1963 zifashishijwe mu kwica Abanyapolitiki batavugaga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi bo mu mashyaka ya UNAR na RADER.
Tariki 24 Ukuboza 1963, hishwe abarimo Michel Rwagasana wari umunyamabanga mukuru wa UNAR, Afrika Etienne na Ncogoza Xavier bahoze muri Guverinoma ihuriweho, Perezida wa RADER Bwanakweri Prosper, Ndazaro Lazare wayoboraga ikinyamakuru UNITé cya UNAR n’abandi.
Bishwe nta rubanza rubayeho, bicwa n’abasirikare b’Ababiligi nyuma y’uko ab’abanyarwanda banze kubikora.
Jeune Afrique yo ku wa 17 Gashyantare 1964, igaragaza ko abo banyapolitiki barashwe n’ababiligi barimo TURPIN wari Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe umutekano, PIRATE wari umuyobozi wa Polisi n’uwitwa DURIEUX.
Innocent Nizeyimana yavuze ko nyuma y’ubwigenge u Bubiligi bwakomeje kuyobora u Rwanda, dore ko n’ingabo zabwo arizo zoherezwaga cyane ku rugamba kurwanya ibitero by’Inyenzi.
Ati “None se Repubulika imaze kujyaho, Politiki yo guheza Abatutsi siyo yakomeje?
Mu 1963 muri biriya bitero byabaye, kujya kurwana mu Bugesera ni Major Dubois w’Umubiligi wari uyoboye ibitero.”
No mu myaka ya za 1970 u Bubiligi bwari bukisirisimba muri politiki y’u Rwanda Kugeza mu 1970, u Bubiligi bwari kimwe mu bihugu biha u Rwanda inkunga nyinshi haba iy’amafaranga n’ubufasha mu bya tekiniki.
Muri uwo mwaka u Bubiligi bwari bufite inzobere mu Rwanda mu nzego zitandukanye zisaga 240 n’abarimu basaga ijana.
Kayibanda (iburyo), Habyarimana Juvenal n'umwe mu basirikare b'u Bubiligi Mu ruzinduko umwami w’ u Bubiligi Baudouin n’umwamikazi Fabiola bagiriye mu Rwanda muri Nyakanga 1970, biyemeje gukuba kabiri inkunga icyo gihugu cyageneraga u Rwanda ndetse ibihugu byombi bisinyana amasezerano atandukanye y’ubufatanye.
Kuba umwami Baudouin yarasuye u Rwanda avuye muri Congo, agakomereza mu Burundi, ibihugu bahoze bakoloniza kandi hose akahamara igihe, nabyo bigaragaza uburyo u Bubiligi bwashakaga gukomeza kwiyegereza ibihugu bahoze bakoloniza.
Ibindi bihamya by’uko u Bubiligi butari bushyigikiye ubwigenge buzatuma abaturage bigobotora ubukoloni, ni uburyo muri Congo bishe Patrice Lumumba washakaga ko batanga ubwigenge bakahava, bakamusimbuza Désire Mobutu wemeye kugendera mu murongo bashaka.
Mu Rwanda Perezida Kayibanda yakomeje gukorera inyungu z’Ababiligi kugeza ubwo babonaga ko ntacyo bakimutezeho mu 1973, bashyigikira ihikwa rye ryakozwe na Général Major Habyarimana Juvénal muri coup d’etat yabaye ku munsi w’iya 5 Nyakanga 1973.
Nizeyimana asanga gukura ku butegetsi Kayibanda byari mu mugambi w’Ababiligi kuko nta nyungu bari bakimubonamo, ndetse hakaza n’imbaraga z’u Bufaransa bwashakaga ijambo mu karere.
Nubwo Habyarimana yagiye ku butegetsi avuga ko aje kugarura ituze n’amahoro, byabaye iby’akanya gato kuko yakomereje mu murongo wa Kayibanda.
U Bubiligi n’u Bufaransa byabaye inshuti ze z’akadasohoka ndetse inkunga bageneraga u Rwanda zirushaho kwiyongera.
Umwami Baudouin yakoze ibishoboka byose mu guha inkunga Habyarimana yo kurwanya FPR Inkotanyi Umwami Baudouin w’u Bubiligi yabaye inshuti ikomeye ya Habyarimana kugeza ubwo FPR Inkotanyi yatangizaga urugamba rwo Kwibohora mu Ukwakira 1990, agahatira Guverinoma ye gufasha Habyarimana.
Mu gitabo "A Throne in Brussels: Britain, the Saxe-Coburgs and the Belgianisation of Europe cyanditswe na Paul Beliën", avuga ko ubwo Mobutu yatangiraga gutakarizwa icyizere mu myaka ya 1990, amaso Baudouin yayahanze Habyarimana wari inshuti ye magara kandi amubonamo gukomeza isura y’u Bubiligi mu Karere.
Icyo gitabo kivuga ko ubwo Umwami Baudouin yingingaga umwe mu baminisitiri ngo batange ubufasha kuri Habyarimana ahangane na FPR Inkotanyi, hari aho yageze ararira.
Byaje kurangira Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi yemeye gutanga abasirikare basaga 500 bo gufasha ingabo za Habyarimana ku rugamba.
Mu muhango wo gushyingura umwami Baudouin muri Kanama 1993, Perezida Habyarimana yashimagije cyane nyakwigendera.
Yagize ati “Umwami Baudouin kuri twese Abanyarwanda yari ikimenyetso, akaba inkingi y’ubwigenge bwacu n’ikiraro gihuza Abanyarwanda n’Ababiligi.
Ntabwo yigeze arekera aho kuduhangayikira, ntabwo tuzibagirwa uburyo yahoraga atitwayeho.”
Kuba umurongo w’u Bubiligi kandi warakomeje kubahirizwa mu Rwanda rwa nyuma y’ubwigenge, biva ku buryo biyegerezaga cyane umutegetsi wese ugiyeho.
Nyuma y’ihirikwa rya Kayibanda, mu bajyanama ba Perezida Habyarimana hari harimo Dubois na Guy Logiest bagejeje Kayibanda ku butegetsi.
Kayibanda yabaye inshuti y'u Bubiligi mbere y'Ubwigenge na nyuma yabwo, agakora ibiri mu nyungu zabwo Perezida Habyarimana n'Umwami Baudouin mu 1987 ubwo uwo mwami yasuraga u Rwanda Kayibanda (uwa kabiri wambaye utwumvisho) yakunze kwifashishwa n'u Bubiligi nyuma yo kumufasha kujya ku butegetsi Mu 1965, Kayibanda ari kumwe n'abanyaburayi mu nama yari yabereye i Kigali Colonel Guy Logiest yahaye Kayibanda n'ishyaka rya ubufasha bwose bushoboka, aba n'umujyanama wa Perezida Habyarimana

U Rwanda ku mwanya wa mbere k’urutonde rw’ibihugu 10 muri Afurika bifite abakobwa beza[AMAFOTO] Ku mugabane wa Afurika hari ibihugu bizwiho kuba bifite abakobwa beza kurusha abandi, gusa ikiza ku mwanya wa mbere mu bihugu 10 biyoboye ibindi kiraza kugutungura kuko utakekaga ko cyaza kuri uwo mwanya.

10.
Tanzaniya Tanzaniya ni igihugu cyizwiho kugira abakobwa beza muri Afurika kandi bazi kwiyitaho ku buryo umubiri wabo uhora usa neza kandi bakamenya gukurura ababareba 9.

8.
Ghana Ghana ni igihugu cyo mu burengerazuba bwa Afrika kizwiho kugira abakobwa n’abagore beza bazwiho kuba bagira igikara kinoze ku buryo ubwiza bwabo ububona iyo ubitekegeje cyane, si bwa bwiza uhita ubona umuntu akunyuzeho ngo uhite ukubitwa nabwo.
7.

6.

5.
Angola Angola nayo iri mu biguhu bifite abakobwa beza bazwiho kuba bafite uruhu rujya gusa nka shokola, uruhu rukunda kwifuzwa na benshi kuko rugaragara neza.
4.

Abakobwa n’abagore baho nabo bazwiho kugira uruhu rwiza rwa shokora.
3.
Ethiopia Ethiopia nayo izwiho kugira bakobwa beza kandi bafite igihagararo bakanatera neza.
2.
Somalia Igihugu cya Somalia nacyo kigira abakobwa beza bateye neza kandi bafite uruhu rwiza rutemba itoto.

Imashini zipima Virusi ya SIDA zigiye kwifashishwa mu gupima COVID-19 Abashakashatsi banyuranye ku ndwara ya Covid-19, bavuga ko imwe mu ngamba yafasha gukumira ikwirakwizwa ry’icyo cyorezo harimo ko abaturage benshi bapimwa, bakamenya uko bahagaze, bagakomeza n’izindi ngamba zo kwirinda.
Mu Rwanda hamaze iminsi hapimwa abantu barenze 1000 ku munsi, ariko ngo hari gahunda yo kongera umubare w’abapimwa ku munsi.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyita ku Buzima, Dr.
Sabin Nsanzimana, avuga ko bagiye kwifashisha izindi mashini zari zisanzwe zipima ubwandu bwa SIDA mu gupima Covid-19.
Yagize ati “Turashaka kwifashisha izi mashini ziri mu ntara zitandukanye, kandi turabikora vuba.
Imashini twatangiranye dupima Covid-19 na zo zimaze kwikuba kabiri ariko abakeneye gupimwa na bo bariyongera umunsi ku wundi”.
Dr.
Nsanzimana avuga ko ubushobozi nk’ubu butaza mu munsi umwe, ariko ko buri munsi hari icyiyongeraho mu bushobozi bwo gupima.
Avuga ko hari gahunda yo kwegera abapimwa, ibizamini bigakorerwa hirya no hino mu gihugu bitabaye ngombwa ko byose bizanwa muri Laboratwari nkuru i Kigali.
Harategurwa kandi kongera ibigo byakira abarwayi ba Covid-19, byunganira ikigo cya Kanyinya n’icya Nyamata, mu gihe imibare y’abandura yakwiyongera.
Dr.

Ati “Imibare iramutse yiyongereye tudafite aho tubashyira byaba ari imbogamizi.
Ni yo mpamvu tuba dufite itsinda rikurikirana rireba iyo mibare, rigategura n’aho gushyira abarwaye, ku buryo hari umubare biha wagera hagafungurwa ahandi ho kubashyira.
Birashoboka ko umubare wagabanuka hakagira aho tuba dufunze”.
Akomeza avuga ko kugeza ubu ahavurirwa abantu ari habiri, kandi ko hagifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abandi, ariko hategurwa n’ahandi bajyanwa babaye benshi.
Kugeza ubu abanduye Covid-19, baravurwa bagakira kandi kugeza ubu nta murwayi uricwa na Covid-19 mu Rwanda.
