#17756#	9	culture	https://www.igihe.com/umuco/article/inkomoko-y-umugayo-w-ibigwari-igihembo-cyahabwaga-abatinye-urugamba-mu-rwanda
Inkomoko y’Umugayo w’Ibigwari, igihembo cyahabwaga abatinye urugamba mu Rwanda rwo hambere Mu mateka y’umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda cyane cyane mu rugamba rwo kurwagura no guhashya abagomeramurage wa Gihanga w’igihugu gisangiwe, habayemo intwari zitagira ingano zakirasaniye, zinagihanganira n’abatagikunda, habayemo n’ibigwari byatereranye abandi ku kazi katoroshye ko kugundagurana n’abanzi badakunda u Rwanda.
Abami b’u Rwanda babigize intego ntagamburuzwa ko bazajya babaha impeta z’ishimwe n’ingororano ku bw’ubutwari bagaragaje mu guhanganira u Rwanda, no kugaya abahabaye ibigwari mu rwego rwo kubahwitura bakisubiraho.
IGIHE yifashishije igitabo “Intwari z’Imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro” cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, Inzobere mu Muco, Amateka n’Ubuvanganzo, yatatuye amateka y’impitabihe ku mitangirwe y’umugayo ku bagaragaje ubugwari ku rugamba rwo kurasanira u Rwanda mu mugambi wo guhashya umwanzi no kumutsinda burundu nk’uko byakorwaga ha mbere.
Mu mateka y’u Rwanda, Umwami Ruganzu Ndoli, ni we waciye iteka rishyiraho umugayo w’ibigwari byatengushye igihugu bigaharira abandi umurimo wo kuruhanganira bonyine.
Iyi nkuru iragaruka by’umwihariko ku by’umugayo w’ibigwari n’impamvu yawo.
Umwami Ruganzu Ndoli wakunze kwitwa Cyambarantama mu mateka y’u Rwanda, yatwaye u Rwanda mu bihe bikomeye aho rwari rumaze imyaka isaga 11 ruraranze, nyuma y’amahano yadutse mu bikomangoma byo kwa Gahima bikarwanira ingoma.
Juru na murumuna we Bamara bakica mukuru wabo Ndahiro Cyamatara agatanga adatanze.
Bitewe nuko Ruganzu Ndoli yari afite akazi katoroshye ko gushimangira igitinyiro cy’u Rwanda mu mahanga aruzengurutse no kwihimura ku bapfakaje u Rwanda bakica se Ndahiro Cyamatare na Nyina Nyabacuzi.
Ndoli yashakishije ikintu cyatuma abaturage ayoboye n’Ingabo bari kumwe mu igababitero byo koromya amahanga bayagusha ruhabo, bagira ubushake bwo kwitabira no kwitangira igihugu mu mugambi ukomeye barimo w’umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda, wari ugeze kure mu bitero byo kwagura igihugu no gukomeza guhashya abagomeramurage wa Gihanga w’igihugu gisangiwe.
Muri icyo kibariro, ni bwo yciye iteka riha umugayo abatereranye abandi muri buri gikorwa cyerekeranye na gahunda yari yimirije imbere.
Ruganzu Ndoli, niwe wagennye inzego z’Intwari bwa mbere mu mateka y’u Rwanda, anaca iteka rigena umugayo w’ibigwari.
Uwo mugayo wahabwaga ingabo zahunze urugamba watumye Abanyarwanda barushaho guhugukira iby’urugamba, gushira amanga no kurwana ishyaka ryo kwikura mu bucakara bw’amahanga no kwigarurira ibihugu.
Umugayo w’ibigwari, wabaga ugenewe abahunze urugamba n’abanze kurwitabira ngo bajyane n’abandi, aho bagayirwaga mu ruhame ariko mu kinyabupfura.
Nyuma yo kugena impeta z’ubutwari, n’Ingororano zahabwaga Intwari uhereye ku ngoma ye, yanagennye n’umugayo w’ibigwari wabaga uteye utya: Inka y’Imirindi: Burya mu rugamba rwose habamo intwari hakabamo n’ibigwari, habamo abarwitabira hakaba n’abaruhunga.
Inka y’Imirindi yagabirwaga ibigwari byose byahunze urugamba, mu buryo bwo kugira ubwoba bagatoroka, cyangwa se mu buryo bwo kutarwitabira, ntibanitabire uwo muhamagaro, abandi bafashe iya mbere mu kururwanirira, cyangwa se kwigira ntibindeba no kwikunda.
Yagabirwaga ibigwari byahunze inshingano zo kuba ibitsimbanyi byagombaba kujya gufasha Ingabo ziri ku rugamba mu rwego rwo gushaka ibizitunga no gushorera iminyago, kuko ntizagombaga kururasanira ngo zijye no gushaka ibizitunga.
N’ubwo ibyo bigwari byahabwaga inka imeze kimwe n’iy’Intwari, ariko bwari uburyo bwo kunenga mu kinyabupfura kw’Abanyarwanda.
Icyatandukanyaga izo nka ni izina gusa, kuba warahawe iy’ubutwari, undi agahabwa iy’ubugwari, ntabwo mwakwishima kimwe, guhorana iryo pfunwe ryonyine byatumaga bikosora nabo bagahamya ubutwari.
Ikindi Inka y’Imirindi yasobanuraga, nuko wahunze urugamba cyangwa se ntarwitabire, ibyo ari byose hari uwamuzirikanye nk’umuziho ubutwari akamurarikira gutabara igihugu n’ubwo yabaga yamutengushye ntamwitabe ku rubanza yamuhamagariye.
Abanyarwanda batinyaga izina ribi kuruta ibindi byose byiza wabaha.
Kugabira Inka ikigwari, ni umuco w’ikinyabupfura ntagereranywa kigaragaza uburyo Abanyarwanda bahaga agaciro ikiremwamuntu by’umwihariko abaruvukamo.
Aho niho bagiraga bati “UWISHE ABABI YAMAZE ABEZA” byo kuvuga ko nta Malayika uba mu Isi, uwo ariwe wese yakora nabi, ariko ejo akisubiraho agakora neza, uramutse wishe abo wita babi, wamaraho abantu ku buryo abeza ntabo wazabona.
Mu mitekerereze ya muntu habamo kugoma no gukora neza, icyo umuntu agaburiye nicyo gikura.
Ikindi bagenderagaho ni umugani uvuga ngo“ IBYAYE IKIBOZE IRAKIRIGATA” Igihe cyose umuntu akunaniye kuri iki, ariko hari ikindi ashoboye ushobora kumukoresha, bityo bigatuma abayoboye u Rwanda barushaho kugaya ibigwari ariko batabihutaza, ahubwo bakagena izindi nshingano zo kubaka igihugu dore ko zabaga zihari.
Akeso k’isoni: Mu Rwanda rwo hambere, bagiraga ibikoresho mugerwa bifashishaga mu gupima ibisukika, ndetse bakabyifashisha mu gusangiriraho ibinyobwa.
Muri ibyo bikoresho habagamo Intango, Ikibindi, Urweso n’ Akeso, uko byatandukanaga mu mazina, ni nako byabaga bitangana no mu bunini.
Mu rwego rwo gushimira ingabo zasoje urugamba, zasangiriraga ku ntango y’Abahizi zakundaga guterekwa ingabo n’abagaba bazo mu gitaramo mvarugamba, inzoga yabaga irimo yo yagenwaga n’ibwami.
Ikigwari ntabwo cyasangiriraga hamwe n’abandi ku Ntango, nticyasangiriraga na rubanda ruciriritse ku kibindi, yemwe no ku rweso rw’abatindi, nticyabashaga kurusomaho.
Ahubwo mu rwego rwo kugaya ubugwari bwa bamwe, mu gihe intwari zabaga zisangirira ku “NTANGO Y’ABAHIZI” babashakiraga Akeso (Akabindi gato cyaneeeee!!!
Kajyamo amacupa nk’atanu cyangwa se munsi yayo) akaba ariko basangiriraho, kuko babaga babuze ubutwari, bakabura no kuba rubanda rwa giseseka kuko bananiwe kumaranira igihugu cyabo.
Akeso ibigwari byasangiriragaho niko bitaga “AKESO K’ISONI” bagangiriragaho mu rwego rwo kubereka ko babaye ibigwari badakwiriye gusangirira n’abandi ku Ntango, nabo bakagasomaho n’isoni nyinshi zivanze n’ikimwaro cy’uko ntacyo bamariye igihugu.
Mu muco w’Abanyarwanda cyaraziraga ko himakazwa umuco w’ubusambo no kugira ubuntu buke.
Kwimana byari ikizira, wahaga umuntu n’iyo mwaba mufite icyo mupfa, ukazamugaya nyuma, hanyuma mukiyunga mukabana mu gihugu amahoro kuko nta wari ufite uburenganzira bwo kukikwirukanamo.
Kubera izo ngororano zose, zaba izahawe Impotore, uwahawe Umudende, Uwacanye uruti, uwahawe Inka y’Umuheto n’uwahawe Inka y’Imirindi, uwasomeye ku ntango y’abahizi n’akeso k’isoni, byose byatumaga Uwagize ubutwari abiratira abandi mu kivugo cyabimburiga kandi kikanasoza ikintu cyose avuze n’uwagize ubugwari akikosora ubutaha akajyana n’abandi kurasanira igihugu.
Ibyo byatumaga Umunyarwanda wese aharanira kuba Intwari bityo agashira ubwoba ku rugamba.
Usibye no kubaha impeta z’ubutwari, Ingabo zose zatsinze urugamba, zagabanaga iminyago, ugasanga urugo rufite Ingabo y’igihugu, arirwo rukomeye.
Uwo mujyo wo kugabira Intwari iminyago no kubaha impeta z’Ubutwari, watumye u Rwanda rubona abana benshi bagana mu Itorero kugira ngo bigiremo ibyo kuba Intwari n’imyitozo njyarugamba.
Nuko abitabira kuba Ingabo z’igihugu baba benshi u Rwanda rugira imitwe y’Ingabo myinshi, ku buryo byakangaranyije amahanga aruzengurutse, agatangira kwibaza uko azifata imbere y’u Rwanda.
U Rwanda rwarinze rwinjira mu gihe cy’ubukoloni mu ndunduro y’Ingoma ya Rwabugili rumaze kugwiza imitwe y’ingabo igera kuri 170.
Mu gihe rwahanganywe n’imitwe y’ingabo irindwi mu bihe by’ingoma ya Gihanga ahasaga mu wa 1091, kugeza ku ngoma ya Ruganzu Bwimba ahasaga mu wa 1345.
Kubera ishyaka ry’u Rwanda ryagaragaye ku rugamba ruruhanganira, byageze mu bihe by’ubukoloni abaturage bagifite umutima n’ubushake bwo kwitabira kurasanira igihugu, kubera ibanga ryo gushima no kugabira Intwari ryimakajwe.

(AMAFOTO) Ubukwe bwa Jimmy wo muri Ambassadors bwaranzwe n' udushya harimo no kudasezerana mu rusengero!
Kuri icyi cyumweru Taliki ya 07 Ukuboza 2014, Nibwo umwe mu baririmbyi bakomeye ba Chorale ambassadors of Christ witwa Bizimungu Jimmy Yakoze ubukwe n'uwo bifuza kubana akaramata Batamuliza Lilian, Gusa icyatunguranye muri ubu bukwe ni uko batigeze binjira mu rusengero ngo bambikane impeta ku mugaragaro, kandi ari Jimmy cyangwa se umugore we Lilian bisanzwe bizwi ko ari abakirisito bo mu itorero ry' Abadiventiste b' Umunsi wa Karindwi ndetse na chorale asanzwe aririmbamo ariyo ya Ambassadors ikaba itarigeze imuririmbira kuri uyu munsi we udasanzwe mu gihe Chorale Rehoboth yo mu rindi torero yaje kwifatanya nawe gushima Imana Jimmy aha bigaragara ko nta mpeta yari yambaye nyamara umugore we Lilian yari ayambaye.
Kanda hano urebe indirimbo Impeta igaragaramo Jimmy Bizimungu Ubu bukwe bwatangiye ahagana mu ma Saa yine z' igitondo ubwo ababyeyi n' inshuti za Bizimungu Jimmy bajyaga gusaba umugeni bakaza kumwemererwa.
Nyuma ibirori byakomereje ku Murenge wa Kimironk o aho Biyemeje kubana nk' umugabo n' umugore nk' uko amategeko ya Repubulika y' u Rwanda abiteganya.
Nkuko tubimenyereye ko Abakristo, mbere y' uko babana babanza guca mu nzu y' Imana (Urusengero), bakabanza gusabirwa imigisha n' abakozi b' Imana ndetse bakanambikana impeta y' urudashira, kuri Jimmy na Lilian siko byagenze kuko aba bavuye gusezerana imbere y' amategeko ya Repubulika y' u Rwanda bagahita berekeza aho bateguye kwakira abatumiwe.
Twababwira ko kandi hagaragaye abandi bantu bazwi cyane hano mu Rwanda barimo anita Pendo wari wanambariye Lilian ndetse na Papa wa Arthur ( Rutura).
Kurikira Mu mafoto imihango y' ubukwe bwabo Imbere y' Imiryango inshuti n' abavandimwe Jimmy yambitse impeta y' urukundo Lilian Batamuriza Anita Pendo, Umunyamakuru akaba n' Umu DJ, ni umwe mu bakobwa bari bambariye Lilian Lilian ati "maze kumva icyo amatego asaba abashakanye ntagahato nemeye ko Jimmy Bizimungu ambera Umugabo" Basezeraniye imbere y' umwanditsi w' irangamimerere w' Umurenge wa Kimironko Mbere yo kujya kwakira abatumiwe, babanje gufata amafoto y' urwibutso Byari ibyishimo bikomeye cyane kuri uyu muryango mushya!
Nyuma y' amafoto y' urwibutso bagiye kwakira imiryango, inshuti n' abavandimwe Nubwo batamuririmbiye, Abagize Ambassodors ntibyababujije ku muha impano ishimishije ndetse bakanamufasha mu kwakira no kwita ku bantu Abagize Chorale Rehoboth yo muri Wels Salvation Church baje kwifatanya na Jimmy baramuririmbira banashima Imana kubyo yakoze.
Anita Pendo (inshuti ikomeye ya Lilian Batamuliza), ubwo Chorale Rehoboth yaririmbaga yaranezerewe cyane arahaguruka arabyina ati Mana ibyo wankoreye ndaguhimbaza.
Umunaniro ntiwari woroheye bamwe Uyu yagiye munzu aba yihengetseho gato kuko ijoro ryari rikuze!

#17789#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/MINISANTE-yaciye-mu-Rwanda-amwe-mu-mavuta-yo-kwisiga-atukuza-uruhu
MINISANTE yaciye mu Rwanda amwe mu mavuta yo kwisiga atukuza uruhu Kuri uyu wa Gatatu Minisiteri y'Ubuzima (Minisante) ifatanyije n'izindi nzego zitandukanye zifite aho zihuriye no guhangana n'ibicuruzwa bitujuje ubuziranenge mu Rwanda yagiranye ibiganiro n'abanyamakuru maze igaragaza amavuta atemewe agiye gukurwa ku isoko mu maguru mashya, kuko ibiyagize bigira ingaruka mbi ku mubiri w'umuntu.
Ayo mavuta agira uruhare mu kuba yakwangiza uruhu ndetse akaba yatera na Kanseri.
Ku ikubitiro MINISANTE yagaragaje ayitwa Peau Claire, Lait de beaute na Fair&white.
MINISANTE ivuga ko ikigiye gukorwa ari ukubanza gukangurira abaturage kwirinda aya mavuta kuko basanze bimwe mu bigize aya mavuta byangiza uruhu harimo no gutera Kanseri.
Nzayire Philippe, Umuyobozi w'ishami rishinzwe igenzura ry'amabwiriza y'ubuziranenge mu kigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubuziranenge (RSB) , aganira n'abanyamakuru yasabye abagura amavuta ndetse n'abayarangura bagamije kuyacuruza ko bajya babanza bagasoma bakamenya ibiyagize mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko yabangiza.
Uyu muyobozi kandi yavuze ko kuri ubu mu Rwanda hari ikibazo gihangayikishije cy'abantu basigaye bafata amavuta bakayavangavanga aho usanga batanga amavuta ashobora guhindura umuntu uko ashaka,kandi ayo mavuta akagira ingaruka mbi kubayakoresha, bityo asaba ubufatanye bwa buri wese ko uwamenya aho bakorera yatungira agatoki iki kigo .
Nzayire yasabye abacuruzi bafite aya mavuta kubimenyesha inzego zibishinzwe kugirango amenwe,bityo abibutsa ko nibategereza umukwabu baziyishyurira ibijyanye n'imenwa ryayo.
Abajijwe uko ibi bicuruzwa bigera mu Rwanda kandi hari ikigo gishinzwe gupima ubuziranenge ,Nzayire yagize ati: "Dufite imipaka udashobora kubara.
Hari ibyinjira ku magare,hari n'ibyinjira byikorewe ku mutwe aho abakozi bo ku mupaka batari.
Ntabwo wabona umukozi uhagarara ku mbibi z'igihugu.
Icy'igenzi ni uko tubirwanya n'iyo byaba byageze mu gihugu."
Minisitiri w'ubuzima Agnes Binagwaho yavuzeko impamvu z'aya mabwiriza ari ukurinda ubuzima bw'abanyarwanda.
Mu itegeko rishya rigena ibikwiye gukorwamo amavuta ryagaragaje ibintu bigera ku 1345 biri mu mavuta agomba kwirindwa,ariko hakaba hari ubundi bwoko bw'amavuta 95 abantu bashobora kwisiga ariko babanje guhabwa urugero ntarengwa.
Minisante ivuga ko ba nyir'izi nganda zikora amavuta yaciwe, bashobora gukosora bagakuramo ibyo bigira ingaruka ku buzima bw'umuntu, amavuta akagaruka ku isoko.

U Rwanda rugiye kwakira inama yiga ku ishoramari ryo mu nganda Yanditswe na Jean Pierre Tuyisenge Kuya 24 Gashyantare 2017 saa 04:03 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 0 0 U Rwanda rugiye kwakira inama ikomeye y'Umuryango wa Afurika y'Uburasirazuba,EAC, yo ku rwego rwa kabiri yiga ku ishoramari ryo mu nganda ndetse n'imurikabikorwa ryateguwe n'uwo Muryango, ikazabera i Kigali kuva ku wa 23 kugeza ku wa 25 Gicurasi 2017.
Nk'uko bitangazwa n'Ibiro Bikuru bya EAC, iyo nama izayoborwa na Perezida wa Repubulika y'u Rwanda, Paul Kagame, izahuriza hamwe abayobozi mu ishoramari ryo mu nganda n'ubucuruzi bw'ibikomoka ku buhinzi, abafata ibyemezo, n'ibigo by'imari bikomeye bizaturuka muri Afurika no hanze yayo bazagaragarizwa amahirwe ari mu Karere.
Iyi nama ya ‘East African Manufacturing Business Summit and Exhibition(EAMBS)' izamara iminsi itatu yahawe insanganyamatsiko igira iti "Guhuza imbaraga ziri mu ishoramari ryo mu nganda mu kwihutisha iterambere ry'Ubukungu."
Newvision dukesha iyi nkuru itangaza ko iyo nama izakorerwamo imurikabikorwa, aho abashoramari, ibigo by'ubucuruzi, abashakashatsi n'abahanga mu by'amasomo bazerekana ibishya mu ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu bijyanye n'inganda, cyane cyane ibigo bito n'ibiciriritse.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorerwa muri EAC, Jean Baptiste Havugimana, yavuze ko iyo nama yateguwe n'Ubunyamabanga bw'uyu Muryango, n'Ihuriro rya Afurika y'Uburasirazuba ry'Ubucuruzi (EABC), na Guverinoma y'u Rwanda; izaganira ku mbogamizi zibangamiye urwego rw'inganda mu Karere.
Havugimana yavuze ko iyo nama yashibutse mu bunararibonye bwo kubona ko iterambere ridashobora kugerwaho muri EAC mu gihe haba hatabayeho gushinga inganda zikora mu buryo buhamye.
Yagize ati "Iyi nama ni ahantu h'ingenzi hazigirwa ahazaza h'inganda muri Afurika y'Uburasirazuba."
Iyi nama igiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri nyuma y'iyabereye muri Speke Resort Hotel, iherereye mu gace ka Munyonyo, i Kampala muri Uganda mu 2015.

#17857#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/burera-sekaziga-yatewe-icyuma-munsi-y-ugutwi-ahita-apfa
Burera: Sekaziga yatewe icyuma munsi y'ugutwi ahita apfa Umusore witwa Sekaziga Innocent utuye mu kagari ka Kidakama, umurenge wa Gahunga, akarere ka Burera, yitabye Imana nyuma yo guterwa icyuma munsi y'ugutwi n'umugabo witwa Ndayambaje Jean de Dieu.
Sekaziga, wari ufite imyaka 26 y'amavuko, yatewe mu ma saa mbiri z'ijoro rya tariki 30/04/2013, ubwo yavaga muri santere ya Gahunga atashye, ari kumwe n'umukobwa w'inshuti ye witwa Uwineza Julienne, nawe wakomerekejwe ku kuboko.
Uwineza, ufite imyaka 24 y'amavuko, niwe watanze amakuru ku bayobozi ko abagizi ba nabi babategeye mu nzira.
Avuga ko ubwo batahaga, bari mu nzira, bumvise abantu babakurikiye ariko batazi abo aribo.
Yahise abona umwe muri abo bantu, ariwe Ndayambaje, ateye icyuma Sekaziga munsi y'ugutwi ahita agwa hasi.
Uwineza akomeza avuga ko Ndayambaje yaje amusatira ashaka nawe kumutera icyuma mu gatuza ariko ahita akinga ukuboko icyuma agitera ku kuboko.
Sekaziga yatewe icyuma nijoro atashye avuye muri iyi santere ya Gahunga.
Kuri ubu Uwineza ari kuvurirwa mu bitaro bikuru bya Ruhengeri naho Sekaziga we yashyinguwe tariki ya 01/05/2013.
Ndayambaje n'undi mugabo witwa Ndagijimana bari kumwe ubwo bakoraga iryo bara bombi bemera icyaha.
Ndayambaje yiregura avuga ko yateye icyuma Sekaziga n'umukunzi we kubera ko ngo uwo Sekaziga yari amurimo umwenda w'amafaranga ibihumbi 11.
Kuri ubu Ndayambaje na Ndagijimana bafungiye kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Gahunga, iri mu murenge wa Gahunga, mu gihe bagikorerwa dosiye ngo bashyikirizwe inkiko.
Norbert Niyizurugero

#17858#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/guverineri-kabahizi-yaganiriye-n-abayobozi-b-akarere-ku-mpamvu-rutsiro-ikomeza
Guverineri Kabahizi yaganiriye n'abayobozi b'akarere ku mpamvu Rutsiro ikomeza gusigara inyuma Guverineri w'intara y'uburengerazuba, Kabahizi Celestin, yagiranye inama n'abakozi ndetse n'abayobozi batandukanye bo mu karere ka Rutsiro tariki 06/04/2013 bagamije kwibukiranya ku cyo Leta ibifuzaho, barebera hamwe aho intege nke ziri, bafata n'ingamba zo kwikosora kugira ngo bihute mu iterambere.
Zimwe mu ngero Guverineri yaganiriyeho n'abayobozi zigaragaza ko akarere katari kwihuta mu iterambere ni uko mu mwaka w'imihigo ushize wa 2011/2012 kaje ku mwanya wa nyuma mu kwesa imihigo.
Muri uyu mwaka naho Rutsiro iri inyuma mu buhinzi ndetse no mu kurwanya isuri ndetse mu minsi ishize ngo kari mu turere turangwamo imibare minini y'abafite imirire mibi uretse ko ubuyobozi bw'akarere buvuga ko iyo mibare yagabanyijwe.
Abayobozi baturutse ku rwego rw'intara bavuze ko bitumvikana ukuntu akarere karwaza bwaki kandi gaturiye ikiyaga cya Kivu kibonekamo amafi n'isambaza, mu gihe kandi bigaragara ko hari n'umubare munini w'inka zimaze gutangwa muri ako karere muri gahunda ya girinka.
Guverineri Kabahizi yasabye abayobozi kugaragaza uruhare rwabo mu iterambere ry'akarere ka Rutsiro.
Ubuyobozi bw'akarere bwasabwe kwihutisha ubuhinzi bw'icyayi kuko byagaragaye ko butari kwihuta kandi akarere ka Rutsiro ari kamwe mu turere twatoranyijwe dushobora kweramo icyayi.
Mu bindi Guverineri Kabahizi yavuze ko bidindiza iterambere ry'akarere harimo abayobozi bakora, ariko bageza kuwa gatanu bagakorera mu mirenge iri mu nzira zisohoka mu karere kugira ngo bahite bitahira hanze y'akarere, bityo ntibabashe gukurikirana ibibera mu karere umunsi ku munsi.
Abayobozi b'akarere kandi banenzwe kuba baragize intege nke mu gukumira ubucukuzi butemewe bw'amabuye y'agaciro, bukunze gutwara ubuzima bwa bamwe, bukangiza n'ibidukikije cyane cyane amashyamba, ugasanga abacukura ayo mabuye nta nyungu bakuramo kuko nta terambere rigaragara aho batuye.
Kugira ngo icyo kibazo gihagarare ngo hashobora kwitabazwa inzego zishinzwe umutekano hagamijwe gukumira abacukura ayo mabuye mu gihe hategerejwe ko amasosiyete afite ibyangombwa byuzuye ahabwa uburenganzira bwo gucukura amabuye y'agaciro.
Abayobozi mu nzego zitandukanye basabwe gukorera hamwe, bakirinda guhangana kuko hari ingero zagiye zigaragara z'ubwumvikane bucye bugenda burangwa hagati y'abayobozi.
Guverineri Kabahizi yavuze ko kugira ngo iterambere ry'akarere ribashe kugerwaho hagomba kugaragara ubufatanye n'uruhare rwa buri wese, ni ukuvuga abayobozi, abaturage n'abafatanyabikorwa.
Ati: "Reka rero tubanze turebe uruhare rwacu nk'abayobozi kugira ngo iyo myanya y'inyuma akarere gafite tubashe kuba twayivaho".
Iyo nama yari yatumiwemo abayobozi guhera mu kagari kugeza ku karere.
Guverineri Kabahizi muri iyi minsi ari kugenderera uturere tugize intara y'Iburengerazuba mu rwego rwo kuganira n'abayobozi ku bitagenda no gufata ingamba zihamye, ibyo yise "Open Criticism".
Muri izo nama Guverineri ari gukorera muri buri karere ko mu ntara ayobora, ahura n'abayobozi bose barimo abakozi ku rwego rw'akagari, abakozi b'umurenge, abagize njyanama z'utugari, njyanama z'imirenge, abakozi bo ku karere, abarimu, abaganga n'abandi bose bafasha akarere mu iterambere no gukora ubukangurambaga mu baturage.
Muri iyo nama baraganira, bakarebera hamwe ahagaragara intege nke, ariko cyane cyane bikaba byarahuriranye n'uko hari abari bavuye mu mwiherero w'abayobozi bakuru b'igihugu, abitabiriye uwo mwiherero bakaba bafite inshingano zo kugeza ku nzego zose ibyavugiwemo hamwe n'ibyemezo byafashwe.
Malachie Hakizimana

#17863#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/abarwayi-umuganga-umwe-yitaho-bagiye-kugabanywaho-abarenga-3000
Abarwayi umuganga umwe yitaho bagiye kugabanywaho abarenga 3000 Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yiyemeje ko mu myaka irindwi iri imbere igiye kongera ibikorwa remezo, umubare n’ubushobozi bw’abakozi b’urwego rw’ubuzima, ku buryo umubare w’abarwayi ku muganga umwe uzagabanukaho abagera ku 3055.
Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr.
Edouard Ngirente, yagejeje ku bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko gahunda ya Guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi (2017-2024), agaragaza byinshi bizakorwa mu gukomeza guharanira ko Abanyarwanda bagira ubuzima bwiza kandi serivisi z’ubuvuzi zikagera kuri bose.
Yavuze ko abaganga, abaganga b’inzobere, abaforomo n’ababyaza n’abandi bakozi b’ibitaro bazongerwa bakanahabwa ubundi bushobozi buzatuma n’igipimo cy’abarwayi ku muganga umwe kigabanuka, aho kizava ku barwayi 10 055 kikagera ku 7000.
Yagize ati “Igipimo cy’umubare w’abarwayi ku muforomo umwe na cyo kizagabanuka kive ku 1 142 kigere kuri 800.
Igipimo cy’umubare w’abagore ku mubyaza kizagera ku 2 500 kivuye ku bagore 4 037.”
Minisitiri w’Intebe, yanavuze ko Guverinoma iteganya kubaka, kwagura no gushyira ibyangombwa bikwiye mu bitaro umunani birimo ibya Ruhengeri, Munini, Byumba, Nyabikenke, Masaka, Gatunda, Gatonde na Muhororo.
Hazubakwa kandi ibigo nderabuzima 17 mu mirenge itabigiraga na Poste de Santé nshya 150 mu gihugu hose.
Mu ngengo y’imari ya 2017/2017, urwego rw’ubuzima rwagenewe miliyari 193.6, akazakoreshwa mu bikorwa birimo kubaka no gusana ibitaro n’ibigo nderabuzima hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Ubushakashatsi buheruka ku bwiyongere bw’abaturage n’ubuzima bwabo, DHS, bwagaragaje ko igipimo cy’umubare w’abagore bapfa babyara ari 210/ 100 000, Guverinoma yiyemeje ko mu myaka irindwi kizagabanuka kikagera ku 126/ 100 000.
Igipimo cy’umubare w’abana bapfa batarageza ku myaka itanu na cyo kizagabanuka kigere kuri 25/1.000 kivuye kuri 50/1.000.
Intego z’iterambere rirambye (SDGs), ziteganya ko mu 2030 igipimo cy’abagore bapfa babyara kizagabanuka bakagera munsi ya 70/100 000.
Minisitiri w’Intebe, yanatangaje ko ku bufatanye n’abikorera hazashyirwaho ibigo by’ubuzima bw’icyitegererezo bizajya bivura zimwe mu ndwara zitandura zajyaga zituma Abanyarwanda batari bake bajya kuzivuriza hanze kandi bibahenze.
Ibi bikazagendana no guteza imbere inganda zikora imiti n’ibikoresho byo kwa muganga.

Mu gitaramo cya Peace One Day urubyiruko rwakanguriwe kuba umusemburo w'amahoro Minisitiri w'Urubyiruko n'Ikoranabuhanga Jean Philbert Nsengimana arahamagarira urubyiruko rw'u Rwanda guhagurukira kuba umusemburo w'amahoro kugirango biyubakire igihugu cyabo.
Tariki ya 21 Nzeri ni umunsi mpuzamahanga w'amahoro ku isi, aho ibihugu yose bizirikana ku mahoro ndetse bakanashishikariza abandi kugira uruhare mu kugarura amahoro aharangwa umutekano muke.
Uyu munsi wizihirijwe no mu Rwanda, urubyiruko rwasabwe kugenda rubiba amahoro aho bagenda hose, kandi bakoresheje imbaraga n'ubwenge bwabo bwose.
Minisitiri w'Urubyiruko n'Ikoranabuhanga Jean Philbert Nsengimana yahamagariye urubyiruko rw'u Rwanda guharanira amahoro by'umwihariko nk'abakomoka mu gihugu cyaciye mu bihe bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Yagize : "Amahoro ntago ari imbyino umuntu abyina, amahoro ntago ari indirimbo umuntu ngo arayiririmba.
Ni uburyo bw'imyumvire umuntu agomba guharanira cyane cyane mwebwe urubyiruko twitezeho ejo hazaza heza."
Urubyiruko rwitabiriye umunsi w'Amahoro.
Umuyobozi w'Umuryango Peace One Day wateguye iki gikorwa Jeremy Glley, yashimiye Leta y'u Rwanda ndetse n'umuryango w'abibumbye ko babateye inkunga iki gikorwa, ndetse avuga ko agendeye ku bushake yabonanye abanyarwanda mu kubaka amahoro kuyageraho bishoboka.
Yagize ati "Ndashimira abaduteye inkunga bose hari mo Leta y'u Rwanda n'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ku nkunga baduteye.
Uruhare rwabo mu gutegura uyu munsi byanyeretse ko nidukomeza gutya amahoro tuzayageraho nta kabuza."
Uwashinze Peace One Day Jeremy Glley Ibi birori kandi byitabiriwe n'abahanzi bakomeye muri Afurika nka Ali Kiba,Ice Prince, n'abandi aho barirmbye indirimbo yaririmbiwe uyu munsi w'amahoro.
Aba bahanzi kandi bifatanije n'abandi bo mu Rwanda nka Urban Boys,na Knowless.
Abahanzi Ice Prince na Alikiba bari baje kwizihiza uyu munsi Butera Knowless yakanguriye Urubyiruko kuba umusemburo w'amahoro Inos B wo muri Congo nawe yari ahari Urban Boys nabo ntibatanzwe Miss Doriane na we yari ahari.

Umwe muri uru rubyiruko, Rehema Queen, avuga ko abaturutse mu mahanga babonye ubutumwa bwiza bazajyana.

Berekwa banasobanurirwa amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Sheh Nitanga Jamidu ukuriye itsinda ryateguye iri rushanwa, avuga ko kuba mu basuye urwibutso harimo n'abana bifite akamaro.
Ati " Ni ngombwa ko abana bato bamenya amateka bityo batangire hakiri kare kwirinda ibikorwa by'urugomo ndetse n'ababa bafite ibitekerezo bidahwitse birimo n'iby'ubuhezanguni bigishwe babireke bagire imyitwarire myiza".
Ahamad Swidikiy, Umunyamisiri akaba n'umukemurampaka muri iri rushanwa, yababajwe n'ibyabaye mu Rwanda akumva bitazagira ahandi biba.
Ati "Ni ubwa mbere nsuye iki gihugu, ariko ibyishimo nari mfite ngisura bihindutse agahinda nyuma yo kubona ibyakibayeho.
Ibi ni ibikorwa by'ubunyamaswa byatwaye ubuzima bw'abantu n'ibintu ndetse n'ibyishimo by'Abanyarwada, natanga ubutumwa bw'uko bitazongera kuba ukundi ku isi".
Aya marushanwa abaye ku nshuro ya gatanu arimo kubera mu Karere ka Gicumbi, yitabiriwe ahanini n'abana bato baturutse mu bihugu icyenda byo ku mugabane w'Afurika.

#17951#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Gicumbi-Minisante-irasaba-abaturage-kwizera-inzitiramibu-bahabwa-na-leta
MINISANTE irahumuriza abaturage bumvaga ko baterwa Malariya n'inzitiramibu bahawe Abaturage batuye mu karere ka Gicumbi baremeza ko indwara ya Maraliya ariyo bari kurwara muri iyi minsi kandi ko iterwa n'inzitirabibu bahawe zitameze neza kuburyo zidashobora kurwanya iyo maraliya.
Minisiteri y'ubuzima yo irabasaba kwizera inzitiramibu bahabwa n'ubwo koko iza mbere zitari zujuje ubuziranenge.
Muri aka Karere ka Gicumbi, mu Murenge wa Kageyo, abaturage baho bemeza ko muri iyi minsi Maraliya ariyo ndwara yiganje mu miryango .
Aba baturage bavuga ko guhera mu mpera z'umwaka ushize ari bwo Maraliya yatangiye kwiyongera ku kigero cyo hejuru.
Aba baturage kandi bavuga ko bigishwa kuyirwanya bakangurirwa kurwanya imibu ndetse no kurara mu nzitiramibu, ariko kandi bakavuga ko inzitiramibu Leta yabahaye ari zo bumva ko zabateye iyo Maraliya.
Abaganiriye na Makuruki.rw bemeza ko iyi ndwara n'ubwo iri kugabanuka ariko n'ubu abaturage bakiyirwara.
Uyu yagize ati:"Indwara ziba hano urebye Maraliya niyo yari itumereye nabi mu minsi ishize ariko iragenda igabanuka naho ubundi mu minsi ishize wari kugira ngo ni icyorezo cyaduteye ino aha."
Uyu nawe yagize ati:"Urebye rero ino Maraliya niyo yari iturembeje hambere aha… inzitiramibu se turazifite ariko ahubwo ngo nizo zayiduteye niko n'umva."
Uyu ati:"Yewe maraliya niyo tumaze iminsi turwara nk'uko babikubwiye n'ubu kandi ugeze hariya kwa muganga ubona ko itarashira … inzitiramibu baraziduhaye turazikoresha ariko twumva ko ngo arizo zabiteye kuko ngo zitari zitunganye."
Iki kibazo cy'inzitiramibu aba baturage bavuga na Minisiteri y'ubuzima (MINISANTE), iherutse kwemera ko yatumije mu mahanga izirenga miliyoni 3 ariko zikaza zidafite umuti uhagije ndetse nayo ikemera ko zagize uruhare mu kongera Maraliya yari imaze iminsi yaribasiye Abaturarwanda.
Ibi ariko Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri iyi Minisiteri Ndimubanzi Patrick, avuga ko n'ubwo byabaye ariko abaturage bakwiye kwizera inzitirabimu bari guhabwa ubu.
Ati:"Inzitiramibu turi gutanga muri iki gihe abaturage bagomba kwizera ko nta kibazo zifite kuko twabanje kuzipima n'ubwo iza mbere koko zari zifite ikibazo.Twazitanze duhereye mu duce twiganjemo Maraliya ndetse no ku bagore batwite."
Kuri uyu wa 26 Mata 2016 ni bwo Ministeri y'ubuzima yatangije icyumweru cyo kwita ku buzima bw'umwana n'ubw'umubyeyi, ikaba yasabye abaturage kwita ku isuku ndetse n'ibindi byose byarinda abana bari munsi y'imyaka 5 ndetse n'abagore batwite kurwaragurika indwara zirimo na Malariya.
Insanganyamatsiko y'iki cyumweru igira iti « Twite ku buzima bw'umubyeyi n'umwana tunafatanya kurandura malariya ».

Umubyeyi wa Joseph Habineza wanayoboye Inama y’Abaprotestanti mu Rwanda yitabye Imana Utumabahutu Jean, umubyeyi wa Habineza Joseph wabaye Minisitiri w’umuco na Siporo akaba na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Nigeria, yitabye Imana azize uburwayi, uyu akaba afite izina rikomeye muri ‘Eglise Presbytérienne au Rwanda’, EPR, yakoreye ubuzima bwe bwose n’Inama y’Abaprotestanti mu Rwanda yabereye Umunamabanga Mukuru imyaka 25.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 15 Kanama 2018 nibwo inkuru y’urupfu rwa Utumabahutu yamenyekanye, waguye muri Kenya aho yari yagiye kwivuriza mu bitaro biri mu Mujyi wa Nairobi.
Habineza Joseph yabwiye IGIHE ko umubyeyi we yitabye Imana azize uburwayi, akaba yaramaze igihe kinini cy’ubuzima bwe akora umurimo w’itorero, harimo imyaka 25 yamaze akorera Inama y’Abaporotestanti mu Rwanda, Conseil Protestant du Rwanda, CPR.
Yakomeje agira ati “Yazize kanseri ya prostate, twabimenye hakiri kare tumujyana kwa muganga i Nairobi, bagerageza kumuvura bamuha n’imiti azajya afata.
Mu minsi ishize twari twabonye afite intege nke turavuga tuti reka turebe uko twamusubiza kwa muganga.”
“Ubwo rero yagiye ejo saa kumi n’imwe n’indege ya RwandAir.
Uyu munsi mu gitondo yitabye Imana yari amaze kwambara agiye kujya kureba muganga ariko ahita asinzirira mu ntebe arigendera.”
Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Abaprotestanti mu Rwanda, Bishop Kayinamura Samuel, yabwiye IGIHE ko Utumabahutu yari umuntu w’inyangamugayo.
Yagize ati “Yabaye Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama y’Abaprotestanti mu Rwanda, kandi yayikoreye igihe kinini ayikorera neza, afite ubuhamya bwiza ni umukirisitu mwiza no mu zabukuru ze yari agisenga kandi agikunze umurimo w’Imana kuko yari umuririmbyi muri korari.
Igihugu, Itorero ndetse n’Inama y’abapotestani mu Rwanda tubuze umuntu w’ingirakamaro.”
Utumabahutu yavutse ku wa 15 Kamena 1940 yitaba Imana ku wa 15 Kanama 2018, akaba yatabarutse afite imyaka 78.
Uretse kuba yari umuntu wagize akamaro gakomeye mu buzima bw’itorero EPR, Utumabahutu yize kaminuza kubera abaprotestanti bamwishyuriye mu gihugu cy’u Busuwisi.
CPR ihuza amatorero y’abaprotestanti arimo Aba-Presbytérienne, Ababatisita, aba-Méthodiste, Abangilikani, Abadiventisiti b’Umunsi wa Karindwi, ADEPR n’andi matorero menshi yose hamwe agera kuri 25.
Utumabahutu yitabye Imana afite imyaka 78 [email protected]

CSP Dr Nkubito avuga ko nko ku bitaro bya Muhima bafite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abagera ku 100 ku munsi ariko usanga abagera kuri 18 aribo bisuzumisha indwara zitandura, kandi ko indwara z’umuvudo w’amaraso na diabète arizo ziganje cyane.
Ati “Urebye abaje kwisuzumisha bari hejuru y’imyaka 55,usanga bafashe nka 80% mu gihe abandi bari mu myaka 40-55, usanga ari 15% abandi basigaye ari nk’urubyiruko.
Abandi baba baje bagiye muri za misiyo ndetse no gushaka ibyangombwa bibajyana mu kazi.”
CSP Dr Nkubito yasabye abantu kujya bisuzumisha hakiri kare kandi bakirinda ibintu byose bibakururira izi ndwara birimo kunywa inzoga n’itabi.
RBC ivuga ko buri mwaka mu bantu bapfa mu Rwanda ijanisha rya 44% bicwa n’indwara zitandura.
Ni ukuvuga ngo hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’abantu bapfa mu Rwanda bicwa n’indwara zitandura.
Ni mu gihe Raporo y’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima yo mu 2018, igaragaza ko muri uwo mwaka indwara zitandura zishe abantu bangana na miliyoni 41 bingana na 71% by’abantu bose bapfuye muri uwo mwaka.
Abenshi muri aba bari bafite imyaka iri hejuru ya 65.

Umunyamideli Nadia Sif Lindal Gunnarsdottir yabwiye MailOnline ko yari amaze iminsi aganira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga na rutahizamu wa Manchester United Greenwood w’imyaka 18,hanyuma baza gupanga guhurira muri Hoteli nyuma y’umukino wa UEFA Nations League Ubwongereza bwatsinzemo Iceland igitego 1-0.

#18111#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/inyungu-ziri-mu-kugira-website-iherekeza-ibikorwa-byawe-by-ubucuruzi-104161
Inyungu ziri mu kugira ‘Website’ iherekeza ibikorwa byawe by’ubucuruzi Muri iki gihe ikoranabuhanga rimaze gutera imbere ndetse n’umubare w’abakoresha internet ukaba urushaho kwiyongera, ibigo by’ubucuruzi n’abantu ku giti cyabo bafite ibikorwa runaka bashakisha uburyo bakoresha aya mahirwe mu kurushaho kwagura no guteza imbere ibyo bakora.
Ikoranabuhanga, by’umwihariko internet ni kimwe mu bikoresho bishobora gufasha uwari we wese gutuma ibyo akora biva ku rwego rumwe bikajya ku rundi, igihe ayikoresheje neza kandi uko bikwiye.
Mu bisubizo byagufasha guteza imbere ibyo ukora harimo urubuga rwa internet (Website), kuko ari uburyo bworoshye bwo gusakaza amakuru, ndetse n’abifuza kumenya ibyo ikora bakabigeraho bitabasabye gukora urugendo ngo babe bagusanga aho ukorera.
Umuntu ufite igikorwa cy’ubucuruzi ariko atagira Website ahomba amahirwe n’inyungu nyinshi cyane zirimo:   Kumenyesha abantu ibyo ukora igihe cyose n’aho bari hose Imwe mu nyungu yo kugira urubuga rwa internet igihe ufite ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi, ni uko umuntu aho yaba ari hose ku Isi abasha kumenya ibyo ukora kandi atavuye aho ari.
Ikindi kandi mu gihe ibiro bisanzwe usanga hari igihe kigera bagafunga, abakozi bakajya kuryama cyangwa kuruhuka, website yo ihora ifunguye ku buryo abantu bayisura isaha iyo ariyo yose bashakiye, ndetse bakabasha kubonaho ibisubizo by’ibibazo byose bibazaga, ariko batagera aho ukorera ngo babone ubibasubiza.  
Icyizere Website ni bumwe mu buryo bufasha ubucuruzi bwawe kubwira abakiliya n’abandi bashobora gukenera ibyo ucuruza, impamvu bakwiye gushingiraho bakwizera ndetse bakakugana.
Ibi bigirwamo uruhare n’amakuru atandukanye yerekeye ibyo ukora uba washyizeho, ndetse n’ubuhamya bw’abaguze ibicuruzwa ufite, cyangwa bakoresheje serivisi zawe bukaza bubishimangira.
Burya abantu benshi mbere yo kugura ikintu, cyangwa gukoresha serivisi runaka, akenshi babanza kugenzura niba ari ibyo kwizerwa koko.
Mu buryo bifashisha harimo kubaza abayikoresheje, cyangwa se bagashaka amakuru banyuze kuri internet, ari naho website yawe igirira akamaro.  
Kumenyekanisha ibyo ukora N’ubwo hari ubundi buryo bwinshi ushobora kumenyekanishamo ibikorwa byawe (marketing), website yagakwiye kuba amahitamo yawe ya mbere kuko ifite umwihariko wo kuba yoroshye, ndetse uretse amakuru ushyiraho, nayo ubwayo ni igikoresho gituma umenyekana.
Niyo mpamvu ari ingenzi cyane kwita ku makuru ushyira ku rubuga rwawe rwa internet, kuko arirwo rwereka abatabasha kugera aho ukorera, ishusho nyayo y’ibyo ukora.  
Kongera ingano y’abagura ibyo ucuruza Niba uri umucuruzi ufite iduka runaka, website ishobora kugira uruhare mu kongera umubare w’abaza kugura ibicuruzwa byawe.
Uko umubare w’abasura urubuga rwawe rwa internet wiyongera, niko abakugana barushaho kuba benshi bitewe n’amakuru basanzeho.
Ushobora kandi no kurwifashisha mu gucuruza, aho kugira ngo abantu bakore urugendo baza aho ucururiza, bakaba babigura banyuze kuri website yawe, ubundi mukumvikana uko ubibagezaho.  
Kungurana ibitekerezo Indi nyungu iri mu kugira website ni uko byoroshye cyane kumenya icyo abakiliya bawe bagutekerezaho ndetse n’icyo bifuza ko washyiramo imbaraga.
Ushobora kuganira nabo binyuze kuri e-mail, chat cyangwa se ukabaha umwanya bashyiramo ibitekerezo byabo (comments), nawe ukazafata uwo kubisoma ndetse byaba ngombwa ukabasubiza.
Ibi bigira uruhare runini mu kubaka umubano ukomeye, kuko uko murushaho kumenyana ariko barushaho kukwizera, nawe ukamenya uburyo urushaho kunoza ibyo ukora ngo uhaze ukwifuza kwabo.
Ikindi ni uko bishobora no kukungura ibitekerezo by’uburyo warushaho kwaguka.
Izi nyungu n’izindi tutavuze ariko si urubuga rwose rwa internet rufite ubushobozi bwo kuzikugezaho, kuko bitewe n’uburyo rwubatse rushobora kurutwa n’urudahari ari nayo mpamvu ari ngombwa ko ufata umwanya uhagije, ndetse ukanitabaza ababifitemo ubumenyi bwisumbuye bakaguha inama n’ibitekerezo.
Gutangiza website biroroshye, birahendutse kandi binatwara umwanya muto, dore ko ari n’imwe muri serivisi zitangwa na IGIHE Ltd, aho uretse kuyikubakira, bagufasha kubona indangarubuga, no kuyishyira kuri internet abantu bagatangira kukumenya.

Ababyeyi barashinjwa uruhare rw'inda zitateganyijwe ziri mu rubyiruko rwiga mu mashuri yisumbuye na za kaminuza Minisitiri muri Minisiteri y'uburinganire n'iterambere ry'umuryango Oda Gasinzigwa Ubwo kuri uyu wa 30 Ukuboza 2015 Ihuriro ry'intumwa za rubanda riharanira imibereho myiza y'abaturage n'iterambere mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y'u Rwanda bahuraga n'abafatanyabikorwa babo barimo Minisiteri y'uburezi na Minisiteri y'umuryango bagaragajeko ikibazo k'inda zitateguwe mu rubyiruko rwo mu mashuri yisumbuye na za kaminuza giteye inkeke.
Mu kiganiro cyatanzwe na Minisitiri w'Uburinganire n'Umuryango Hon.
Oda Gasinzigwa yatunze urutoki imwe mu miryango ikigendera ku muco wa kera wo guceceka ntibaganirize abana b'abakobwa ku myororokere bagakura ntacyo babiziho.
Minisitiri Gasingwa yagize ati:twese nk'abanyarwanda duhuriye ku muco wo kutaganiriza abana ku byerekeye ubuzima bw'imyororokere yabo kandi byaraturebaga, ugasanga rero isoni tugize zitubyariye ingaruka mwese muzi.
Umuco wacu utuma ibyo tutabikorera ku gihe bityo ba bana bagakura batabizi bityo bakagerwaho n'ingaruka zo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina imburagihe kubera kutamenya.
Minisitiri w'Uburezi Dr Papias Musafiri Malimba yavuze ko iki kibazo gikomeye cyane kuko uru rubyiruko arirwo kiba gitezeho ejo heza.
Yagaragaje n'uruhare rwa Mineduc mu kurwanya iki kibazo.
Yagize ati: uruhare rwa Minisiteri yacu ni uko ubu twateguye integanyanyigisho nshya izatangirana n'umwaka utaha w'amashuri wa 2016 irimo amasomo agendanye n'ubuzima bw'imyororokere dufatanyije n'abafatanyabikorwa bacu bose ku buryo buri cyiciro cy'umwana kizabona amasomo yacyo kandi ahagije.
Gusa Minisitiri Dr Musafiri Malimba avuga ko bitazagarukira aho kuko hazanakomeza ibiganiro mu babyeyi kuburyo nabo bumva ko uruhare rwabo mu kurandura iki kibazo rukenewe .
Umunyeshuri wavuze mu izina rya bagenzi be bari batumiwe mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko yagaragaje ingaruka zo gutwita no kubyara ukiri umunyeshuri yagize ati: "Iyo wari umwe witekerezagaho wenyine.
Iyo umaze kubyara utangira gusubira inyuma mu masomo kuko utangira kwiga ugutekereza ku mwana wawe, cyangwa wajya kumwitaho ukibuka ishuri, rero urumva ko bituma utsindwa.
Ikindi n'imibereho itangira kuba mibi iyo utakibonye icumbi rya kaminuza kuko utaribamo ufite umwana."
Abari mu nama batanze ibitekerezo, bagarutse ku bana b'abahungu nabo ko bagombye guhabwa amasomo ku buzima bw'imyororokere kuko bagira uruhare muri izi nda zitateganyijwe , ndetse bongera kwibutsa Leta ko ikwiye gushishikariza ababyeyi kuganiriza abana babo bihagije.
Nta mibare ifatika igaragaza ubukana bw'iki kibazo, ariko iri huriro ry'intumwa za rubanda riharanira imbereho myiza y'abaturage n'iterambere mu nteko ishinga amategeko bashimangira iko ikibazo k'inda zitateganyijwe ziri mu mashuri yisumbye na za kaminuza giteye inkeke

#18189#	9	culture	https://igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/uko-umuganura-wizihizwaga-mu-mateka-y-u-rwanda
Uko Umuganura wizihizwaga mu mateka y’u Rwanda Umuganura ufite umwihariko mu mateka y’u Rwanda rwo hambere!
Wari umuhango ukomeye kuko wari mu nzira z’ubwiru, ukagira intego yo kwibutsa Abanyarwanda ko bakwiye kuzirikana ko basangiye igihugu kimwe, umuco umwe n’indangagaciro zimwe.
Kuva mu muco wa kera no mu mateka y’igihugu, Umuganura ni umunsi mukuru ukomeye kandi wubahwa, wahabwaga agaciro gakomeye i bwami no mu muryango Nyarwanda muri rusange.
Umuganura wari umusaruro wa mbere w’imbuto zahinzwe, wakorerwaga ku mbuto za Gihanga ari zo amasaka, uburo n’inzuzi.
Kuganura kwari ugusubira ku isooko nk’Abanyarwanda, abaturage bakiyibutsa ko bahuje gakondo n’ibyiza byayo Imana yabahaye, bakayishimira.
Ni yo mpamvu bayituraga igitambo mu byo yabahaye bahereye ku mbuto nkuru bejeje.
Ku rwego rw’igihugu Umuganura wayoborwaga n’Umwami afatanyije n’abanyamihango babugenewe mu gihe ku rwego rw’umuryango, umukuru wawo yawizihizanyaga n’abawugize bashimira Imana ibyiza yabahaye.
Imihango y’i bwami yari iyo guhuza Imana n’Igihugu, bagahuza ibikorwa by’idini n’imigenzo gakondo hamwe n’imirimo y’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi.
Umuganura wizihizwaga ku mwero w’amasaka.
Umunsi mukuru wawo watangiraga muri Kamena, ugasoza muri Nzeri, ugahera i bwami mbere yo gusesekara muri rubanda.
Baganuzaga Umwami amata, amasaka n’izindi mbuto nkuru ari zo uburo, inzuzi n’isogi ariko bakongeraho n’ibindi byose byabaga byeze muri icyo gihe.
Umwami yafataga umwuko agatangiza umuhango wo kuvugira umutsima rubanda baje kuganuza, akawuvuga apfukamye yerekana icyubahiro aha abo ayobora ndetse n’Igihugu.
Nyuma y’umuhango wo kuganura hakurikiragaho ibirori by’Umuganura byasozwaga n’igitaramo cy’imihigo.
Muri ibyo birori, Umwami yamurikirwaga umusaruro unyuranye w’Abanyarwanda bavuye impande zose z’Igihugu, hakaba amarushanwa y’ indashyikirwa.
Kuri uwo munsi kandi, imiryango nayo yarateranaga maze umutware w’umuryango akayobora imihango n’ibirori byayikurikiraga.
Umuganura wavomwe mu Rwanda rwo hambere… Umuganura watangiye kwizihizwa mu kinyejana cya cyenda, uza kongera guhabwa imbaraga n’Umwami Ruganzu II Ndoli (1510-1543) ubwo yabohoraga u Rwanda nyuma y’imyaka irenga 10 ruri mu maboko y’abanyamahanga (Abanyabungo).
Waje kugirwa ihame ridakuka mu kinyejana cya 16 ubwo Umwami Ruganzu II Ndoli yabohoraga u Rwanda rwari rwarigaruriwe nyuma y’amacakubiri yatumye Umwami Ndahiro Cyamatare yicwa n’ababisha n’ingoma yarwo, Rwoga, ikanyagwa n’abanyamahanga.
Umuganura wabanzirizwaga n’icyunamo cya Gicurasi aho Abanyarwanda bibukaga urupfu rwa Cyamatare, hagakurikiraho ibirori bya Kamena bishimira ko habonetse Umutabazi, noneho bigasozwa no kwizihiza Umuganura bashimira Imana ko basubiranye igihugu n’ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda.
Cyari ikintu gikomeye bagombaga guhora bazirikana ngo batazongera guteshuka kuri iryo hame-remezo ry’uko bahuje byose: Inkomoko imwe, igihugu kimwe, amahame-remezo gishingiyeho n’indangagaciro zigize umuco.
Umuganura wmbuwe agaciro aho abakoloni bageze mu Rwanda.
Kubera ko intwaro yabo yari amacakubiri, bihutiye guca umuco Nyarwanda wahuzaga Abanyarwanda, bityo baca Umuganura wabibutsaga umuco bahuriyeho ndetse n’Umwiru mukuru ushinzwe Umuganura Gashamura bamucira i Burundi mu 1925.
Umuganura waje kongera kwizihizwa buri mwaka muri za mirongo inani, ariko nabwo hagamijwe guha agaciro umusaruro w’ubuhinzi kuruta uw’ibindi byose kuko abayobozi b’icyo gihe bumvaga ko ngo “umurimo ari uguhinga, ibindi ari amahirwe.”
Ubwo Umuganura wizihizwaga hamurikwa umusaruro wabonetse mu buhinzi, kurusha kwizihiza ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda bushingiye ku muco umwe n’indangagaciro ziwugize.
Agahugu kadasigasira umuco karacika!
Umusozi wa Huro uherereye mu Murenge wa Muhondo mu Karere ka Gakenke uzwi mu mitegurire y’Umuganura.
Niho hategurirwaga umuganura ndetse Gihanga Ngomijana awutangiza yabikomoye ku bahatuye.
Mu kinyejana cya 16 ubwo Ruganzu II Ndori yari aturutse i Karagwe nyuma y’aho igihugu cyari cyarigaruriwe n’Abanyoro n’Abanyabungo, yifashishije ab’i Huro mu guha imbaraga Umuganura.
Mu mateka y’u Rwanda, ku munsi w’Umuganura ni bwo Umwami yagombaga gusangira na rubanda bishimira umusaruro babaga bagezeho.
Uko byagendaga mu muco ku munsi w’Umuganura, abasaza bahuriraga hamwe bakaganura bagafata ku marwa bakanywa, abakecuru bagateka umutsima n’ibishyimbo, bakagaburira abana bakabaha n’amata bakanywa.
Umuganura uhuza abaturage n’abayobozi bagasabana bishimira umusaruro wagezweho.
Nubwo ukomoka mu bihe by’Abami ariko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ntiwari mu minsi yizihizwa cyane mu gihugu.
Umuganura wagiraga n’undi mumaro wo kuzirikana umwami nka Nyir’uburumbuke bakamutura urutete rw’imyaka yeze.
Uyu muhango wakomeje gukorwa no mu yindi myaka yakurikiye ubutegetsi bwa cyami.
Aha ntibasubiragamo imihango yose yakorwaga mu gihe cy’umwami kuko wabaye nk’uhindurirwa inyito n’ibyakorwaga muri wo.
Wasigaye ukorwa mu rwego rwo kwishimira umusaruro, Abanyarwanda bagahurira mu ngo z’abakungu bagasangira ibyo kurya bakanywa n’amayoga.
Mu mateka ariko umuhango w’Umuganura wigeze guhagarikwa na Rezida w’u Rwanda mu 1925.
Umuganura mu isura nshya!
Umuganura ni Umuhango ukomeye mu mateka y’u Rwanda rwo hambere ari nacyo cyatumye Leta y’u Rwanda iwugarura ndetse ikawushyiriraho itegeko riwuha imbaraga zituma wizihizwa mu gihugu hose.
Kuganura ubu bifite igisobanuro cyo gusangira ku byavuye ku musaruro wejejwe mu gihugu hose.
Umuganura wizihizwa ku rwego rw’igihugu uhereye ku midugudu kugeza muri za Ambasade z’u Rwanda n’Imiryango y’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga.
Ni umwanya wo kongera kwibuka ibyo Abanyarwanda bahuriyeho nk’igihugu, umuco karande, inkomoko n’ibindi.
Kwizihiza Umuganura byarenze imbibi zo kwita ku musaruro w’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi gusa ahubwo byanageze mu nzego zireba ubuzima n’iterambere by’Abanyarwanda mu kugaragaza urugendo rw’Abanyarwanda rwo kwigira no kwibohora nyako.
Umuganura wizihizwa hishimirwa umusaruro wagezweho mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo ubuzima, uburezi, ikoranabuhanga, imikino n’imyidagaduro, ubucuruzi, ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, ibikorwaremezo, inganda ndangamuco, ubukerarugendo n’ibindi.
Uyu munsi wizihizwa hamurikwa bimwe mu bikorwa by’ubuhinzi, ubworozi n’ubukorikori.
Akenshi usozwa n’ibitaramo bibumbiyemo imbyino, imivugo n’indirimbo bishimangira umuco gakondo.
Muri iki gihe kandi abatishoboye batekerezwaho bakaremerwa binyuze mu guhabwa ibiribwa no gufashwa kwishyura mituweli.
Umuganura ufatwa nk’umunsi ukomeye ku Banyarwanda wo kwishimira ibyagezweho, kwisuzuma no kureba ibitaragenze neza, guhigira imyaka itaha n’ubusabane bw’abayobozi n’abayoborwa.
Ubusanzwe Umuganura wizihizwa buri mwaka ku wa Gatanu wa mbere muri Kanama.
Muri uyu mwaka, uyu munsi uzizihizwa ku wa 7 Kanama 2020.
Wahawe insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Umuganura, isoko y’ubumwe n’ishingiro ryo kwigira.”
Muri iyi minsi, Umuganura wizihizwa hatekwa amafunguro yifashishwaga hambere mu gufasha n'abakibyiruka kumenya amateka Uwa Gatanu wa mbere wa Kanama mu Rwanda ufatwa nk’umunsi w’Umuganura aho ubusanzwe mu mateka ari umuhango wahoze mu nzira z’ubwiru Madamu Jeannette Kagame aha umwe mu bana amata ubwo hizihizwaga ibirori by'Umuganura byabereye muri Petit Stade mu 2014 Umusaruro w'ubworozi wahabwaga agaciro gakomeye mu gihe cy'Umuganura Kuva mu 2015 Umuganura washyizwe mu minsi mikuru wizihizwa byihariye mu gihugu Umuganura wari umunsi usobetse imihango n’imigenzo ikubiyemo byinshi bifite icyo bivuze gikomeye mu buzima bw’igihugu Nyirasafari Espérance wari Minisitiri w’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango, aha abana amata mu muhango w'Umuganura wizihirijwe i Nyanza ku wa 27 Kanama 2017 Umuganura iyo ugeze buri wese arya ku musaruro we wa mbere
yejeje Umuganura ni igikorwa gikomoka mu bihe by'abami!
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ntiwihizwaga mu buryo buhoraho mu Rwanda Ku munsi w'Umuganura, icyo kunywa kiba giteguye mu buryo bubereye ijisho Umutsima w'amasaka uri mu mafunguro yakoreshwaga mu gihe cy'Umuganura wo hambere Umuganura ni kimwe mu bikorwa bihuza Abanyarwanda bagasabana bishimira ibyagezweho, mu gihe cyo hambere wizihizwaga mu kwishimira umusaruro w’ibiribwa bitandukanye mu gihugu Urusyo baseraho amasaka ruri mu bikoresho byifashishwaga mu kwitegura Umuganura

Uyu mugore ntiyababajwe n’umuryango we gusa kuko yanihanganishije indi miryango yaburiye abayo mu mpanuka ya kajugujugu yo ku cyumweru mu gitondo i Los Angeles.
Yanditse ati: "Dusangiye akababaro.
Nta magambo nyayo yasobanura umubabaro turimo ubu".
Kobe Bryant n’umukobwa we Gianna bapfanye n’abandi bantu barindwi barimo indi imiryango ibiri; umugabo, umugore n’umukobwa wabo, hamwe n’undi mugore wari kumwe n’umukobwa we.
Madamu Vanessa yavuze ko Kobe na Gianna bari urumuri rw’abandi bakobwa batatu ba Kobe.
Ati: "Ntabwo nzi ubuzima bwacu bw’ejo hazaza, ntibishoboka gutekereza ubuzima badahari.
Ariko buri munsi turabyuka tukagerageza kwiriza uwo munsi kuko Kobe na Gigi batumurikira".
Ejo ku wa gatatu, Vanessa yahinduye ifoto imuranga kuri Instagram ashyiraho igaragaza Kobe na Gianna mu byishimo by’umubyeyi n’umwana.
Iyi ni ifoto yafashwe mu kwezi kwa kabiri mu 2016 mbere y’umukino wa nyuma wa All-Star Kobe Bryant yakinnye.
Nyuma y’iyi mpanuka, Vanessa Bryant yari yagize urubuga rwe rwa Instagram ’private’ ariko ejo ku wa gatatu yongeye kurufungurira buri wese,ahita abona abandi bantu miliyoni ebyiri bamukurikira.
Abantu barenga miliyoni 7 bakanze like kuri ubu butumwa bwa Vanessa mu gihe abarenga ibihumbi 400 bamwandikiye bamukomeza.
Kobe Bryant n’umukobwa we nawe wakundaga Basketball cyane bahitanwe n’indege

#18228#	5	politics	https://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/icyuzi-cya-ruramira-kimaze-kubonekamo-imibiri-y-abantu-218-bishwe-muri-jenoside
Icyuzi cya Ruramira kimaze kubonekamo imibiri y’abantu 218 bishwe muri Jenoside Kuva igikorwa cyo gushakisha imibiri y’Abatutsi bazize Jenoside yajugunywe mu cyuzi cya Ruramira cyatangira muri Nyakanga 2019, hamaze kubonekamo imibiri 218.
Icyuzi cya Ruramira cyamaze kumutswa hatangira igikorwa cyo gushakisha imibiri y’Abatutsi bajugunywemo mu gihe cya Jenoside Umuyobozi wa Ibuka mu Karere ka Kayonza Ndindabahizi Didace avuga ko gushakisha imibiri muri iki cyuzi byagoranye kuko cyabanje gukamurwamo amazi hifashishijwe imashini zatanzwe na RAB.
Kugeza mu mpera za Mata imirimo yo gushakisha imibiri mu cyuzi cya Ruramira yarahagaze kubera icyondo cyinshi bisaba ko imashini zabafasha.
Ndindabahizi Didace avuga ko bafite icyizere ko iminsi 100 yo kwibuka izarangira na bo basoje igikorwa cyo gushakisha iyo mibiri.
Avuga ko guhera tariki 7 Mata 1994, icyuzi cya Ruramira cyatangiye kujugunywamo abatutsi kugeza tariki 20 Mata 1994.
Ndindabahizi avuga ko abageragezaga kuva muri icyo cyuzi ngo baterwaga ibisongo ku buryo n’imibiri imwe iboneka bikiyirimo.
Kayitaramirwa Sylvia umwe mu barokokeye mu cyuzi cya Ruramira avuga ko Jenoside igitangira iwabo i Gikaya muri Nyamirama kuwa 13 Mata 1994 ngo yagiye kwa Konseye Gakwavu gusaba imbabazi avuga ko yamubabarira ko na we ari Umuhutu.
Gakwavu ngo yasabye umusore wari uhari kubirukana bagana inzira igana i Ruramira.
Ngo bahabaye igihe bihishe mu gihuru we n’umubyeyi we ndetse n’abavandimwe be 4.
Nyuma ngo baje kuhava bashaka gusubira iwabo i Gikaya kuko bari bamaze kuzahazwa n’inzara.
Kayitaramirwa avuga ko bazamutse bageze ku kiraro cyo ku cyuzi bahasanga bariyeri basubira inyuma biruka basubira mu gihuru ariko atandukana n’umubyeyi we n’abavandimwe be.
Ngo yongeye guhurira na bo ku cyuzi bukeye abamwicira mu maso.
Ati “Hari ikintu cyambabaje mu buzima kunyicira mama imbere, muramu wanjye Kayinamura umugabo wa mukuru wanjye, yazanye murumuna wanjye na musaza wanjye aje kubica, nyamara yari yaraye atanze amafaranga 750 ngo batica umugore we.”
Kayitaramirwa Sylvia avuga ko bakimara kwica umubyeyi we n’abavandimwe be ngo na we baramukubise bamujugunya mu cyuzi.
Ngo yakomeje kugerageza kuzamuka baramufata baramuboha bakoresheje imigwegwe bamuhambiraho amabuye barongera bamuta mu cyuzi.
Ngo yaje gukurwamo n’umuntu wamwitiranyije n’umuzungukazi ajya kumuhisha iwe kugeza Inkotanyi zimugezeho.
Agira ati “Banjugunyemo mpambiriye amaboko n’amaguru bampambiraho amabuye rimwe mu gituza irindi mu mugongo, nacubiye rimwe nsubira hejuru Interahamwe yari ihageze iravuga iti kuki mwishe umuzungu, aroga ankuramo arampambura ankandagira ku nda nduka amazi nari nasomye antwara iwe ndahaba kugeza Inkotanyi zihageze.”
Kayitaramirwa avuga ko byamugoye kuba mu rugo rw’uwo mugabo witwaga Iyakaremye kuko yari Interahamwe ikomeye ndetse iwe akaba ari ho Interahamwe zazaga kurira zigamba ibyo zimaze gukora.
Avuga ko ngo uwo Iyakaremye yavugaga ko namara gukura bazamushaka akabyara abana b’Abahutu.
Abantu bagize uruhare rukomeye mu bwicanyi bw’i Ruramira na Nyamirama ngo ni abahoze ari Burugumesitiri wa Komini Kayonza Senkware Celestin ndetse na Ngenzi na Barahira bo muri komini Kabarondo.
Mu cyahoze ari Gasogi, Nyamirama y’ubu hari Gakwavu wari konseye, Sebuhunyuhunyu wari umuserire, Gahwamire wari umucuruzi, Munyaneza mwene Habimana, Ruvumba mwene Semuzima, Mutabazi wa Simpara na Nsekanabo wa Mufatantama.
Muri Ruramira hari Ndayambaje wari assistant burugumesitiri Kabarondo, Semana wayobora segiteri Nkamba, Senzayire Emmanuel, Ndayambaje Gaspard na Hakizimana Pascal bari ba Responsable, Gatera wari Perezida w’amakoperative, Komanda wa Gendermerie i Rwamagana, Bizimana wari umujandarume na Bizimana Jean wari umwarimu.

Abangavu babyariye iwabo barasobanura uko batwaye inda Mu Murenge wa Rusororo mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Mujyi wa Kigali hari abangavu babyariye iwabo mbere y’uko bashinga ingo zabo.
Umwe muri bo avuga ko impamvu zituma abangavu babyarira iwabo batarashaka abagabo ngo biterwa n’uko abakobwa baba bageze mu gihe imiterere y’imibiri yabo ibajyana mu gutekereza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, noneho umuhungu yashuka umukobwa, bombi kwifata bikabagora.

Mugenzi we uhetse umwana w’umukobwa umaze ukwezi n’igice abyaye avuga ko umugabo babyaranye bari bumvikanye kubana, umukobwa afasha umusore barubaka kuko bombi bari imfubyi.

Avuga ko yagiye gusura umusore wari waramwizeje kumwishyurira amafaranga y’ishuri.

#18281#	0	entertainment	https://www.igihe.com/imyidagaduro/article/iwacu-muzika-festival-igiye-kugaruka-mu-isura-nshya-igiye-kujya-itambuka-kuri
Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kugaruka mu isura nshya Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryateguwe mu buryo bwihariye kuko rizabera kuri internet bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika ryateguwe mu gufasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda kwegerana n’abakunzi babo.
Ryatangijwe mu mwaka ushize aho ryanyuze mu ntara zitandukanye z’igihugu risorezwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ku nshuro ya kabiri Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kongera kuba, ariko izaba mu buryo butandukanye n’ubwa mbere.
Kuri ubu izajya ica kuri Televiziyo Rwanda no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’iri serukiramuco mu rwego rwo gususurutsa abantu batakibona uko bitabira ibitaramo by’abahanzi kubera COVID-19.
Mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko Abanyarwanda bakwicwa n’irungu muri ibi bihe ibitaramo bitemewe ndetse no gufasha abahanzi gukora ibitaramo biteguye neza bagasabana n’abakunzi babo, ubuyobozi bwa East African Promoters (EAP) bwongeye gutegura Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri.
Amakuru ava imbere muri EAP ahamya ko iyi kompanyi isanzwe itegura iri serukiramuco yanze kuryama kuko ibitaramo byahagaritswe ihitamo gushaka inzira zo gukora ibitaramo byiza kandi bigezweho bizajya bica kuri internet no kuri televiziyo abantu bakabikurikirana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
IGIHE ifite amakuru yizewe yuko ibi bitaramo bigiye gutangira kuba mu minsi ya vuba ndetse bikazajya biba biteguwe neza mu rwego rwo gukomeza gutuma umuziki w’u Rwanda uguma ku rwego rushimishije.
Nubwo nta muntu uwo ariwe wese wo muri EAP wifuje kuduha amakuru kuri ibi bitaramo, ahari ni uko ari ibitaramo bizajya bica kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda (RTV) ndetse no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za Iwacu muzika Festival mu rwego rwo gufasha abantu bazaba batari hafi ya televiziyo.
Ni ibitaramo byatumiwemo abahanzi batandukanye kandi bagezweho nubwo amazina yabo ataratangazwa.
Ibi bitaramo bizamara amezi arenga atatu biba buri wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru.
Buri muhanzi azajya ahabwa umunsi we ataramire abakunzi be n’ab’umuziki Nyarwanda muri rusange.
Iwacu Muzika Festival ni ubwa kabiri igiye kuba, cyane ko mu mwaka wa 2019 yazengurutse mu ntara zose z’igihugu abahanzi batandukanye bashimisha abakunzi babo.
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika Festival ryatangirijwe i Musanze ku wa 22 Kamena 2019 kuri Stade Ubworoherane risorezwa i Kigali mu gitaramo cy’imbaturamugabo cyatumiwemo umuhanzi ufite izina ryamamaye mu muziki wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Naseeb Abdul Juma [Diamond Platnumz] wataramiye ibihumbi by’abari muri Parking ya Stade Amahoro i Remera.
Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kugaruka mu isura nshya

#18282#	3	economy	https://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/article/afreximbank-igiye-gutanga-miliyari-3-yo-guhangana-n-ingaruka-za-coronavirus
Afreximbank igiye gutanga miliyari 3$ yo guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus muri Afurika Banki Nyafurika iteza imbere ubucuruzi (Afreximbank), yatangaje ko izatanga inkunga ya miliyari eshatu z’amadolari ya Amerika, yo gufasha ibihugu binyamuryango kuri uyu mugabane ngo bishobore guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iyi nkunga yemejwe n’ubuyobozi bw’inama y’ubutegetsi y’iyi banki, yateranye tariki 20 Werurwe 2020.
Umugabane wa Afurika ukomeje kwibasirwa na Coronavirus yibasiye Isi muri rusange, imibare igaragaza ko mu bihugu 54 bigize uyu mugabane, iki cyorezo cyamaze kugera mu bihugu 43, abantu barenga 1700 bamaze kwandura naho 56 bamaze gupfa.
Ibi byatumye ibihugu byinshi kuri uyu mugabane bifata ingamba zikomeye kugira ngo iki cyorezo kidakomeza gukwirakwira mu buryo bworoshye, harimo guhagarika ingendo z’indege n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubucuruzi.
Tariki 13 uku kwezi, Ikigo Nyafurika cy’ibarurishamibare (ECA), cyatangaje ko uyu mugabane uzahomba akayabo ka miliyari 65 z’amadolari ya Amerika kubera ihungabana ry’ibikomoka kuri peteroli na miliyari 101 z’amadolari kubera ibyo woherezaga mu mahanga muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Iyi banki ivuga ko iyi nkunga izakoreshwa mu gufasha ibihugu bigize Afreximbank mu bijyanye n’ingaruka iki cyorezo kirimo guteza, byaba mu by’ubuzima ndetse n’ubukungu.
Itangazo ryayo rivuga ko izafasha kandi banki nkuru z’ibihugu n’ibindi bigo by’imari, kubera ingaruka iki cyorezo cyabigizeho.
Izafasha kandi mu gushyira mu gushyira ku murongo ibijyanye n’amadevize, ikibazo cy’ibyinjizwa mu bihugu n’ibindi.
Ivuga ko izafasha ibihugu aho wasangaga ubukungu bwabyo bushingiye ku byo byohereza mu mahanga harimo nk’amabuye y’agaciro, ubu bikaba byarahuye n’isubira inyuma ry’amafaranga byavanagamo.
Ubu bufasha buzaza buciye mu nkunga zihabwa ibyo bihugu, mu nguzanyo, ingwate n’ubundi buryo.
Perezida wa Afreximbank, Prof.
Benedict Oramah, yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyazanye akaga gakomeye n’ihungabana ry’ubukungu.
Yagize ati “Uretse ingaruka zikomeye kirimo kugira ku kiremwamuntu, iki cyorezo cyagize ingaruka ku bukungu bw’Isi, kizatuma kandi ubukungu buhungabana ku kigero cya 0.4%.”
Yavuze kandi ko ubukungu bw’Isi buzava kuri 2.9% bwariho mu 2019, bugere kuri 2.5% mu 2020.
Ati “Uburyo bwihuse bwo gufasha burakenewe mu guhangana n’iki kibazo kuri uyu mugabane, Afurika irimo kugira ihungabana rikomeye mu byo yakuraga mu bukerarugendo, isubira inyuma ry’amafaranga, ihindagurika ry’ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ihungabana ry’ibyo bakoraga.”
Yavuze ko Afreximbank izakorana n’amabanki y’iterambere mu bihugu bisanzwe, kugira ngo ibi bihugu bishobore guhangana n’ingaruka zirimo guterwa n’iki cyorezo.
Afreximbank isanzwe ifite amateka mu gufasha ibihugu bya Afurika mu gihe havutse ikibazo cy’ihungabana ry’ubukungu.
Mu 2015 ubwo habaga ikibazo cy’ihungabana ry’ubukungu, iyi banki yatanze inkunga ya miliyari 10 z’amadolari ya Amerika ku bihugu binyamuryango.
Banki Nyafurika iteza imbere ubucuruzi yashinzwe mu 1993, ishingwa na za leta kuri uyu mugabane n’abikorera.
Kuva mu 1994 imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyari 67 ku bikorwa by’ubucuruzi, naho umutungo fatizo wayo ugera kuri miliyari 13 z’amadolari ya Amerika.
Afreximbank yiyemeje kugoboka umugabane wa Afurika mu guhangana n'ingaruka za Coronavirus

Ombolenga Fitina wananiwe i Burayi yageze muri APR FC Ombolenga Fitina wari waragiye gushaka ikipe ku mugabane w’u Burayi akayibura, yagarutse mu Rwanda yerekeza muri APR FC nubwo hari andi makipe arimo AS Kigali yari yamwifuje ku buryo bukomeye.
