#18898#	5	politics	http://igihe.com/politiki/article/uko-umuhango-w-irahira-ry-abadepite-bashya-wagenze-amafoto
Uko umuhango w’irahira ry’Abadepite bashya wagenze (Amafoto) Perezida Kagame yakiriye indahiro z’abadepite bashya 80 mu muhango wabereye mu cyumba cy’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ku Kimihurura.
Witabiriwe n’abayobozi b’ingeri zitandukanye yaba abagize Guverinoma, abayobora ibigo bya leta bitandukanye, abahagarariye ibihugu byabo mu Rwanda n’abandi.
Usibye kurahira, muri uyu muhango hatowe Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko umutwe w’Abadepite wongeye kuba Mukabalisa Donatille.
Hatowe kandi Visi Perezida w’Imari n’Abakozi wabaye Musa Fazil Harerimana na Visi Perezida ushinzwe amategeko no kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma wabaye Mukabagwiza Edda.
Perezida Kagame yahaye abadepite umukoro urimo kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma ku buryo abaturage bagezwaho ibyo bemerewe.
Yabasabye kandi kujya begera abaturage nk’uko babikoze mu bihe byo kwiyamamaza.
Mu bundi butumwa, Perezida Kagame yakomoje ku banyereza imitungo ya leta ndetse anaburira Ingabire Victoire uherutse kurekurwa ku mbabazi ariko we akavuga ko ntazo yasabye.
Manda ya kane y’Umutwe w’Abadepite izatangira ku wa 5 Ukwakira 2018 isozwe mu 2023.
Abadepite uko ari 80 bose batoye binyuze mu nyandiko Mukabalisa Donatille arahirira kuba Perezida w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko umutwe w'Abadepite Mukabagwiza Edda ubwo yarahiriraga kuba Visi Perezida w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko Ushinzwe amategeko no kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma Visi Perezida w'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ushinzwe Imari n’Abakozi, Musa Fazil Harerimana, arahira Perezida Kagame mu ifoto y'urwibutso hamwe n'abadepite bashya 80 Byari ibyishimo ku miryango y'abinjiye mu nteko.
Musa Fazil Harelimana asuhuzanya n'abari bamuherekeje nyuma y'irahira UKO UYU MUHANGO WAGENZE Perezida Kagame yaburiye Ingabire Victoire Ejo bundi mu buryo busanzwe murabizi ko atari bwo bwa mbere mu buryo bwo gukemura ibibazo byacu, tugiramo n’impuhwe ariko zitari impuhwe zo gushaka gutanga impuhwe, impuhwe zo gukemura ibibazo; none se iyo bitaza kuba gutyo, ubu tuba dufite abantu bangahe bishingiye ku kuri bicaye muri gereza?
Tuba tugifite amagana n’ibihumbi bicayemo kubera ko niho bakwiriye kuba bari.
Ariko twe kubera inyungu zo kubaka igihugu cyacu tukavuga ngo ariko ntabwo ariko iteka twabigenza.
Turashakisha n’uwabaye umunyabyaha n’uwagize ute, dushaka uko tumwubaka.
Ejo bundi, turekuye aba bantu b’ejo bundi twarekuye; barimo bya byamamare bya politiki ishingiye hanze ariko idashingiye mu gihugu; twe ni muri iyo nzira tubikora ntabwo aribwo bwa mbere.
Ukajya kubona abantu ngo njye ntabwo nasabye imbabazi, njye ntabwo nasaba imbabazi.
Buriya baturekuye kubera igitutu, igitutu hano?
Ukomeje kubigenderaho, urajya kwisanga wasubiyemo.
Niba ari ubuhamya bushakwa kugira ngo tukwereke ko igitutu atari cyo gikora, hakora gutekereza neza, urisanga wasubiyemo cyangwa se urisanga wasubiye hanze kujya kuzerera kuko nta kindi uzakorayo.
Uru Rwanda mureba, aho rwavuye, twavanyemo amasomo atuma abantu batadukanga ngo dukangike.
Rero, uwashaka yacisha make.
Agakora neza, agakorana n’abandi neza.
N’amasomo ku Isi hose uko bimaze kugaragara, biratwereka ko gukorana, kuzuzanya, gushakisha inyungu za buri wese aribyo byonyine bisigaye naho ibindi nkurusha ibi, ngomba kugutamika ibyo nshaka ukabimira, ntabwo ibyo bigikora.
Cyane cyane twe twamize byinshi.
Abanyereza ibya rubanda bahagurukiwe “Nzabikurikirana ndebe ko ibyo nsaba mubyuzuza, ibi byo kujyana ibikorwa hasi mu giturage […] ababishinzwe bakabigira ibyabo ku giti cyabo […] Ubu ndabivuga mfite imbere yanjye urutonde rw’ibintu byinshi biba bifitiwe ubushobozi, ndetse ubushobozi bwatanzwe ariko ibikorwa byagombaga gukorerwa abaturage ntibikorwe.
Hari umugenzuzi w’imari uhora hano, usa n’aho mwatesheje umutwe cyangwa mwarondogoije, ahora aza akabereka uko ibintu bisa, ibyatanzwe n’ibyavuyemo ntibihure, ndetse ukabona inzego izo arizo, akavuga n’abantu abo aribo, akavuga n’umubare w’ibyo batakaje uko ungana.
Niba uri umuyobozi ku rwego runaka ibyo wari ushinzwe byose ubyumva cyangwa n’abandi babyumva, ukaba warahawe izo nshingano, amikoro n’ikindi cyose cyo kubyuzuza, warangiza umugenzuzi w’imari akaza akatubwira ko ibyageze aho byagombaga kujya ari nka 25% ibindi ntawe ushobora kumenya aho byanyuze.
Ni ukuvuga ngo bwa mbere tuzabanza twumvikane nawe ko ariko bimeze koko […] ibyageze aho byajyaga ni 25%.
Tukongera tukakubaza ngo 75% byarengeye he?
Ibyo kuvuga ngo ntabwo mbizi ntabwo birimo […] tuzabishakisha dukurikirane tumenye n’ibyo utunze mu mazina yawe cyangwa ibyo washyize mu y’abandi ubigarure.
Ariko muri uko kubigarura tuzagira aho tukubika.
Bene abo hari n’ubwo bahitamo guhunga igihugu bamaze kucyambura gutya, dufite n’ababakira hanze.
Ibihugu mubona dukorana nabyo, bafite politiki iteye ukuntu […] umuntu umaze kwiba, umaze gutera ibibazo abanyarwanda, imitungo yabo uyishyizeho, akavuga ko ari ibibazo bya politiki.”
Kwegera abaturage no gukurikirana ibikorwa bya Guverinoma bikwiye kuba inshingano “Igihe mwese mwamaze mwiyamamaza hirya no hino mu gihugu, mwabonanye n’abanyarwanda , uko mwabagezeho mubashakaho amajwi kandi mukaba mwaragiye hose ariko bizakomeza kubageraho, mubasanga.
Mufatanya gukemura ibibazo bafite mugomba kubakemuririra.
Muri icyo gihe rero hari n’ibindi mushinzwe, simwe gusa mugomba kuba mugeraho, ahubwo no mu nshingano mufite zindi, zo gukurikirana ibikorwa bya Guverinoma, muzabagerereho munakurikirana niba na Guverinoma muri ibyo bikorwa ishinzwe, ibikora kuko murabishinzwe.
Mukwiye kubahiriza iyo nshingano akenshi hari aho itubahirizwa.”
Umukoro n’umwihariko ku nteko “Iyi nteko ya kane ifite umwihariko benshi muri mwe muri bashya.
Imbaraga, ibitekerezo n’imikorere bizazamure iyi nteko ku rwego rushya bijyanye n’inzira turimo yo kubaka igihugu cyacu.
Mwumvishe kandi n’aho mutangiriye muri iyi inzira y’ibikorwa mugiye gukora.
Murubakira ku byo abandi bamaze gukora muri iyi myaka ishize ndetse namwe mwari muri ibyo bikorwa gusa ku zindi nzego zitari izi mugiyemo.
Manda yose iba ikwiye kwerekana aho tugeze nk’igihugu.
Ngira ngo uko twabibonye mu ndahiro [.] abantu bashya, bishobora kuba abashya ba FPR, ba PSD ugakomeza… ariko ayo mazina nari mvuze n’andi ntavuze, harimo n’andi mashyaka twabonye mu nteko.
Ibyo byose ni bishya bivuga urwego igihugu kimaze kugeraho […] ari Green Part, ari Imberakuri abo ni bashya.
Ntabwo ari bashya nka ba bandi ba ya mashyaka asanzwe.
Ibyo bakoreraga hanze bazakomeza kubikora […] iyo ni intambwe dukwiye gukomeza kubakiraho.”
13:30: Perezida Kagame yatangiye ijambo rye ashimira abadepite bashya ndetse na Biro Nyobozi y’Inteko.
Yagize ati “Badepite rero mugiye gutangira imiromo yanyu.
Guhura gutya ntabwo ari umuhango gusa, cyangwa kurangiza imigenzo ahubwo ni icyemezo cy’uko tugiye gutangira umurimo nyawo.
Abanyarwanda bizeye ko muzabakorera, mukabatumikira, mukabafasha kugeza igihugu cyacu ku rwego twese abanyarwanda twifuza.
Dufite uruhare runini tugomba kuzuza ariko tuzaba dufatanyije twese.”
13:15: Mukabalisa watorewe kuba Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko umutwe w’Abadepite, yashimye abamutoye.
Yavuze ko icyizere yagiriwe we na bagenzi be ari igihango gikomeye yagiranye n’abanyarwanda.
12:55: Ku mwanya wa Visi Perezida w’Imari n’Abakozi hamamajwe Musa Fazil Harerimana w’imyaka 56; Dr Frank Habineza na Mukamana Elizabeth.
Mukamana yaje gukuramo kandidatire ye avuga ko ashyigikiye Musa Fazil Harerimana.
Nyuma y’itora, Musa Fazil Harerimana yagize amajwi 76 naho Habineza agira ane.
Mukabagwiza Edda wigeze kuba Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Canada na Minisitiri w’Ubutabera, ni we watorewe uyu mwanya n’amajwi 75 mu gihe uwo bari bahatanye yagize atanu Mukabagwiza Edda yatorewe kuba Visi Perezida Ushinzwe amategeko no kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma 12:40: Ku mwanya wa Visi Perezida ushinzwe amategeko no kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma, hamamajwe Hindura Jean Pierre wavutse mu 1972; Edda Mukabagwiza w’imyaka 50 na Dr Frank Habineza w’imyaka 41.
Usibye Habineza abandi bose bemeye kandidatire zari zimaze gutangwa.
Mukabalisa Donatille wari usanzwe ayobora Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, yongeye gutorerwa kuyiyobora muri manda nshya y’imyaka itanu.
Yatowe n’abadepite 80 bose 12:15: Ruku John Rwabyoma uturuka muri FPR, yasabye ijambo avuga ko yumva ko yakwiyamamaza.
Yavuze ko aramutse agize amahirwe yo gutorwa, yazana impinduka, ndetse ngo ntiyaba nyamwigendaho.
Kandidatire ya Rwabyoma ntiyigeze yemerwa kuko aturuka mu Muryango wa FPR Inkotanyi mu gihe ari nawo uyoboye Itegeko Nshinga.
12:12: Depite Izabiriza Marie Mediatrice, yamamaje Mukabalisa Donatille uturuka muri PL.
Yavuze ko Mukabalisa ari umugore ufite imyaka 58, wubatse ndetse n’abana batatu.
Ati “Yuje ubuhanga n’ubushishozi, afite ubunararibonye mu mikorere y’inteko kuko kuva mu 2000 kugera mu 2018, uretse imyaka itatu ni yo atabaye mu Nteko”.
Imyaka itatu yonyine ni yo atari umudepite kuko yari umusenateri.
Mukabalisa yabajijwe niba yemeye kuba yamamajwe, asubiza avuga ko abyemeye.
12:10: Abadepite 80 bose bamaze kurahira.
Hakurikiyeho umuhango gutora Perezida w’Umutwe w’Abadepite.

#18921#	4	health	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/ndera-muri-2016-hakiriwe-abarwayi-2800-babaye-imbata-y-ibiyobyabwenge
Ndera: Muri 2016 hakiriwe abarwayi 2800 babaye imbata z’ibiyobyabwenge Minisiteri y’ubuzima (MINISANTE) igaragaza ko umubare w’abafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe bakirwa mu bitaro byabagenewe bya Ndera, ukomeje kwiyongera.
Hamenwe ibiro 200 by’urumogi Byatangajwe ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge wabereye mu Karere ka Kirehe, tariki ya 22 Kamena 2017.
MINISANTE ivuga ko mu mwaka wa 2015 ibitaro bya Ndera byakiriye abarwayi 440 babaye imbata z’ibiyobyabwenge.
Mu mwaka wa 2016 abo barwayi bariyongereye kuko ngo ibyo bitaro byakiriye ababarirwa mu 2800; nk’uko byavuzwe na Dr Turate Innocent umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe kurwanya no gukumira icyorezo cya SIDA n’izindi ndwara zirimo n’izo mu mutwe, mu kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima, abisobanura.
Akomeza avuga ko urubyiruko ari rwo rugize umubare munini w’abarwayi bakirwa.
Niho ahera asaba abaturage guhagurukira rimwe bagakumira ibiyobyabwenge bikomeje guhungabanya ubuzima n’iterambere by’abaturage.
Mu rwego rwo gukomeza kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge, kuri uwo munsi bamennye ibiyobyabwenge birimo toni imwe n’ibiro 200 by’urumogi na litiro 17,5 za kanyanga bifite agaciro ka Miliyoni 9RWf n’ibihumbi 705RWf.
Kuri uwo munsi wahariwe kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge kandi hatanzwe ubuhamya bwa bamwe bari barabaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge bakavurwa bagakira.
Umwe muri bo witwa Maniragaba Etienne avuga ko yatangiye abinywa gake yigana bagenzi be,bigera ubwo bimubata.
Nyuma yo kubireka yicuza igihe yataye.
Agira ati “Narwanye urugamba rukomeye kugira ngo mbivemo kuko udutsiko tw’abanywa urumogi turi hanze aha iyo babonye ubivuyemo bakomeza kukugendaho bagushuka ngo ubisubiremo.
Urubyiruko mukwiye kwitonda ntimugwe mu mutego wabo kuko urumogi rwica ubuzima, ndabizi byambayeho nahoraga meze nk’umupfu.”
Mugenzi we witwa Nsengimana Damien avuga ko yamaze imyaka itanu acuruza urumogi ageza ubwo atangira kugurisha amasambu n’imitungo y’urugo kubera guta umutwe.
Avuga ko yafunzwe umwaka umwe, akava muri gereza yaragororotse none ubu akaba amaze gutera imbere.
Agira ati“Kuva muri 2000 kugeza 2005 niberaga mu rumogi nducuruza ndukuye Tanzania.
Nafatanywe ibiro 20, mfungwa umwaka.
Abo tungana nasanze baraguze amamodoka, baba mu nzu nziza mu gihe abana banjye umusatsi wari utangiye gutukura.”
Polisi y’igihugu ivuga ko itazihanganira abantu basubiza inyuma iterambere ry’igihugu bishora mu biyobyabwenge.
Muzungu Gerald, Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Kirehe ahamagarira abaturage guhozaho baharanira kurandura burundu ibiyobyabwenge.

#18942#	3	economy	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/abasigajwe-inyuma-n-amateka-bagiye-gusezerera-umuco-wo-guhora-bafashwa
Abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka bagiye gusezerera umuco wo guhora bafashwa Mu karere ka Rubavu, umuryango w’urubyiruko mu iterambere (YADE) wahagurukiye gufasha abana bata ishuri, hibandwa ku bana b’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka, ari nako barandura umuco wo gutegereza ubufasha bihoraho, wakunze kuranga abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka. abaturage bahejejwe inyuma n’amateka ngo bagiye gusezerera umuco wo gutegereza ubufasha iteka Youth in action for development “YADE” umuryango w’urubyiruko ukorera mu mirenge itatu mu karere ka Rubavu wibanda ku bikorwa byo guteza abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka, gusubiza mu ishuri abana barivuyemo hamwe.
Kuva 2014 YADE imaze gusubiza mu ishuri abana 85, harimo 15 bashoboye gukomeza mu mashuri yisumbuye.
Hakuzweyezu Elisée uyobora YADE avuga ko bashyize imbaraga mu gufasha abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka kuko harimo abafite imyumvire yo gufashwa ndetse bakabitoza n’abana aho kubatoza kwiga, gukora no kwigira.
“U Rwanda turimo nurwo kugira agaciro no kwigira, ariko twasanze abasiganjwe inyuma n’amategka bo badahinduka, abana bata ishuri bakajya gusabiriza, imibereho idahinduka twifuza kubegera ngo turebe icyo twabafasha.”
Akomeza avuga ko nyuma yo gusubiza abana mu ishuri ndetse bagatangiza n’ishuri ryitwa Malaika St Michel bashyiramo abana b’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka, bakomeje ibiganiro byo kumenya uko bafasha abantu bakuru mu guhinduka. ikibazo cy’amazi cyaragabanutse “Twasanze bigoye guhindura imyumvire y’abantu bakuru kuko bakuze batungwa; guhiga no gusabiza ariko urubyiruko rwo turarufasha kwiga no gukora birashoboka guhinduka.
Ikindi twakoze ni uko twabagize inshuti zacu, batubwira icyo bakeneye natwe icyo tubasaba bakacyumva.
Ubu abana ntibagita ishuri kuko bakora ibyo tubasaba ibibananiye bakabitubwira.”
Imiryango 50 igizwe n’abantu 200 ubu ifashwa mu buryo butandukanye harimo kwegerezwa ibigega by’amazi meza ku bufatanye n’umuterankunga Jannine frond uba mu Budage naho ku bufatanye n’itsinda Iriba - Brunnen bagiye kubaka ishuri rya miliyoni 180 rizafasha abana b’abatishoboye kwiga no gusubiza mu ishuri abarivuyemo.
Mu mirenge ya Cyanzarwe, Gisenyi na Rubavu aho YADE ikorera ibikorwa batangaza ko yabafashije kugira imibereho myiza.
Mukeshimana utuye mu kagari ka Busigari avuga ko bashimira uyu muryango wabegereye ndetse ugashobora kumenya icyo bakeneye.
Agira ati “Bababaye inshuti zacu, batwisangamo kandi inama baduha ziradufasha. nkanjye icyo bakoze namaze kumva ni akamaro k’isuku no kohereza abana ku ishuri, dufatanya kurera badufasha kubona ibikoresho by’abana natwe tukamenya abana kandi tukabashishikariza kujya kwiga, mu gihe mbere barivagamo tukumva ntacyo bitubwiye.” mu ishuri bashinze bashyiramo abana babatishoboye n’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka Zaninka ufite imyaka 42 avuga ko umuryango wa YADE wababereye umubyeyi.
“Twari twarabuze amazi, isuku aho dutuye, haba ku mibiri n’ibyo twambara ntayo, abasanzwe batubona bakatunena ngo turi abatwa, ariko ubu turacyeye n’abana bajya ku ishuri bakeye n’abandi bana ntibabaseka.
Ntitwabona uko dushima uyu muryango.”
Uwimana we avuga ko gukura ubwisungane mu kwivuza akiri ikibazo gikomeye barwara bagahera mu nzu.
“Aba bantu baradufashije kuko ntabushobozi twari dufite bwo kwigurira mutuweli, bararwaraga bakaryama mu muhanda, ariko ubu umuntu arafatwa akajya kwa muganga.
Uyu muryango wabaye inshuti zacu, uratwegera, twabuze amaze igihe kinini isuku irabura batuzanira ibigega, none turakaraba tugacya, turamesa tukagira isuku, abana babonye ibikoresho by’ishuri basubira mu mashuri.
Twabonye byinshi twifuzaga kandi kwifuza ku muntu ntigushira, turasaba ibindi bigega, abantu 400 batuye umudugudu.”
Ishuri rya YADE ubu rifite abana 125 harimo 35 bavutse ku bakobwa batewe inda batabiteganya, hakaba n’abana b’imiryango 20 y’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka batishoboye bagomba guhabwa amahirwe yo kwiga neza.
Bavuga ko bashaka gukomeza guherekeza urubyiruko bafasha, abatazabasha kujya muri KaminuzA bakigishwa imyuga irimo gutunganya imisatsi n’ubudozi.

Mukura VS yakoze imyitozo ya nyuma mbere yo gucakirana na Free State Stars Ikipe ya Mukura VS yakoze imyitozo ya nyuma ku kibuga izakiniraho na Free State Stars yo muri Afurika y’Epfo kuri uyu wa Gatatu mu ijonjora ry’ibanze mu irushanwa rihuza amakipe yatwaye ibikombe iwayo, Total CAF Confederation Cup 2018/2019.
Bayikoreye aho bazakinira kuri Bidvest Stadium, Stade y’ikipe ya Bidvest Wits iherereye mu Mujyi wa Johannesburg.
Ni ikibuga gifite ubwatsi bwiza bihagije nkuko tubikesha umunyamakuru Bigirimana Augustin waherekeje iyi kipe.
Mukura VS yakoze imyitozo mike iri ’tactique’ mu gihe cy’isaha n’igice.
Nyuma y’imyitozo abakinnyi n’abayobozi bakoze inama y’iminota mike.
Perezida w’iyi kipe yabasabye gukora ibishoboka byose bagakomeza mu kindi cyiciro.
Bigirimana yadutangarije ko hari aba banyarwanda bake baba i Johannesburg baje kubasuhuza nyuma y’imyitozo.
Umukino uteganyijwe kuri uyu wa Gatatu saa cyenda zuzuye ku isaha ya Kigali na Johannesburg.
Bigirimana yavuze ko kugeza ubu ahantu Abanyarwanda bashobora kuwukurikirana ari kuri Twitter ya Mukura VS kuko nta televiziyo izawerekana.
Nyuma y’imyitozo, Haringingo Francis yagize ati " Abakinnyi bafite morale kandi n’ikibuga kimeze neza.
Ni ikibuga gifite ibyatsi byiza.
Tugize amahirwe ejo imvura ntigwe, kikamera nkuko cyari kimeze bizaba ari byiza.
Muri rusange abakinnyi bameze neza, nta mukinnyi ufite ikibazo.Perezida yafashe umwanya n’abandi bakinnyi baravuga.
Abakinnyi bari tayali.
Twabasabye ko bakoresha imbaraga kugira ngo tugire icyo dukura inaha kugira ngo tuzabashe gukomeza mu mukino wo kwishyura."
Yakomeje avuga ko Free State basanze ari ikipe ikina imipira ica mu mpande cyane kandi ngo barabyitoje.
Ngo abakinnyi be bariteguye neza kuko irushanwa barimo ari ahantu hashobora kwerekana impano zabo.
Ikipe izarokoka hagati ya Mukura VS na Free State Stars izahura na Al Hilal Obeid yo muri Sudan kuko yo iri mu makipe atazakina iri jonjora ry’ibanze.
Mukura VS ihagarariye u Rwanda muri Total CAF Confederation Cup kuko yegukanye igikombe cy’Amahoro 2018 itsinze Rayon Sports Penaliti 3-1.
Umukino ubanza uzahuza Mukura VS na Free State Stars uzabera muri Afurika y’Epfo ku wa Gatatu tariki 28 Ugushyingo 2018, uwo kwishyura ukazabera mu Rwanda tariki 5 Ukuboza 2018.
Imiterere ya Stade bazakiniraho Abakinnyi ba Mukura VS bose bameze neza Imodoka bari kugendamo bahawe na Free State Stars

#19034#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/abarokotse-jenoside-ngo-bafite-igihango-bagiranye-n-ingabo-zahagaritse-iyo
Abarokotse Jenoside ngo bafite igihango bagiranye n'ingabo zahagaritse iyo Jenoside Nyiratsinda Flora warokokeye i Karubamba ho mu murenge wa Rukara mu karere ka Kayonza avuga ko abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 bafite igihango badakwiye gutatira bagiranye n'ingabo zabatabaye ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside yorekaga imbaga mu bice bitandukanye by'u Rwanda.
Jenoside yakorewe abari bahungiye i Karubamba ngo yakoranywe ubugome bukabije, aho abari bahungiye ku kiriziya ya ho ngo bishwe baraswa, abandi bagaterwa amacumu, ndetse batwika za matora zari mu nzu bari bahungiyemo noneho bamwe bakajya babajugunya muri uwo muriro.
N'ubwo yari umwana muto afite imyaka 13 gusa muri Jenoside, Nyiratsinda ngo yibuka ibyo yaboneye aho ku kiriziya ya Karubamba by'umwihariko mu nzu ya ho yerekanirwagamo filimi ubwo abantu baterwaga amacumu abandi bakaraswa, hakaba n'abo bajugunyaga mu muriro bamaze gutwika za matora zari muri iyo nzu.
Agira ati "Barabanje bararasa bageze ku cyumba twarimo bateragura amacumu baratwika umuriro mwinshi za matora zari aho barazitwika abari aho bakabanagamo.
Umuriro waratwishe hazaga ibyokere bishyushye bikatugwa hejuru".
Nyiratsinda avuga ko abarokotse Jenoside bafite igihango kidakwiye gutatirwa bagiranye n'ingabo zahagaritse Jenoside.
Ibi bibazo byose kimwe n'indi nzira y'umusaraba Nyiratsinda yanyuzemo ni byo bituma avuga ko abarokotse Jenoside badakwiye gutatira igihango bagiranye n'ingabo zabatabaye ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside, akavuga ko gutatira icyo gihango byaba ari ubugwari bukomeye.
Ati "Ntitukibagirwe aho twavuye, nujya guhemukira bariya bantu batugiriye neza, jya wibuka iriya sura bajemo.
Ubugwari ni bubiri, guhemukira uwaguhaye no gusaba uwo wimye.
Twibima amatwi twaba tubaye ibyo bigwari bya mbere twima amatwi abatugiriye neza".

Abanyarwanda bajya muri Indoneziya bakuriweho kwishyura VISA Abanyarwanda bagiye kujya bazigama ikiguzi bishyuraga VISA yo kwinjira muri Indoneziya Guverinoma ya Indoniziya yakuyeho ikiguzi cy'uruhushya rwo kwinjira muri iki gihugu (VISA) ku banyarwanda batembera muri iki gihugu mu gihe kitarenze iminsi 30.
Abanyarwanda bafite passport bemerewe gutembera cyangwa se gukorera ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye mu gihugu cya Indoneziya batishyuzwa Visa ariko bakamara igihe kitarenze iminsi 30.
Ibi bivuze ko uzajya arenza iminsi 30 azajya yishyura Visa nkuko bisanzwe.
Ibi bireba abanyarwanda bose bakoresha pasiporo zisanzwe, iz'akazi ndetse n'iz'abanyacyubahiro.
N'ubwo abanyarwanda bajya muri Indonesiya bakomorewe kwishyura Visa umuvugizi w'Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe abinjira n'abasohoka Yves Butera yatangarije itangazamakuru ko basabwa kunyura ku mipaka yemewe n'amategeko.
Yagize ati: "Kugira ngo umuntu ntiyishyuzwe Visa hari urutonde rw'imipaka muri Indoneziya agomba gucaho, hari urutinde rw'ibibuga 29, ibyambu byo ku mazi 88 n'imipaka yo ku butaka, urumva ni ahantu henshi (…)" Gukuraho ikiguzi cya Visa ku banyarwanda bashaka kujya muri Indoneziya ni imwe mu mpamvu ikomeye ishobora gutuma abanyarwanda benshi bitabira kujya muri iki gihugu haba mu buryo bwo gutembera, gukora ubucuruzi, ndetse n'ibikorwa bitandukanye bahakenera.
U Rwanda ruri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu 169 Indoneziya yakuriyeho amafaranga ya Visa.
Politiki ya Visa ya Indoniziya igaragaza ko abava muri ibi bihugu bose bagomba kuba bafite pasiporo isigaje nibura amezi atandatu ngo irangize igihe cyayo.
Iki gihugu kandi kinabasaba kugaragaza inyandiko za ngombwa zigaragaza ko bashobora kwitunga nta mbogamizi.
Ubu kwinjira muri Indoneziya nta kiguzi cya VISA bisaba ku banyarwanda

Iki gitabo cyitezweho gukomeza gufasha abantu gusobanukirwa n’amateka y’u Rwanda ya mbere ndetse no mu gihe cya gikoroni.

Ku bijyanye n’ihanurwa ry’indege ya Habyarimana, Nizeyimana yavuze ko yagiye agaragaza ibintu byinshi bivugwa kuri iyi ngingo, n’ibyibazwa n’abantu batandukanye ariko ko adatanga umwanzuro ugaragaza uwahanuye indege ahubwo afasha uzagisoma kwifatira umwanzuro uko abyumva akurikije amakuru yose akubiye muri iki gitabo.
Mu gitabo cye, umwanditsi akomoza no ku ruhare rw’Ikinyamakuru Kangura mu kubiba amacakubiri mu banyarwanda, uko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yateguwe mu buryo budasubirwaho.
Nizeyimana avuga ko kugira ngo iki gitabo kijye ahagaragara yabifashishijwemo n’Umuryango Aegis Trust ndetse na Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Ubumwe n’Ubwiyunge.

Nyuma y’amezi 7 kigenda,icyogajuru cya InSight cyabashije kugera ku mubumbe wa Mars ndetse cyahise gifotora ifoto itangaje kiyoherereza abashakashatsi bo muri NASA nabo bayishyira hanze.

Icyogajuru cya The InSight cyageze kuri Mars ku wa Mbere w’iki cyumweru,nyuma y’amezi 7 kigenda bituma ikipe ya NASA igishinzwe biterera hejuru kubera ibyishimo nkuko amashusho yagiye hanze yabyerekanye.
Iki cyogajuru cyagendaga ibirometero 21,200 ku isaha ndetse byitezwe ko kiri buze kumara amatsiko abibaza niba uyu mubumbe waturwaho.
Iyi n’inshuro ya munani ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi mu by’ikirere cya Amerika NASA cyohereza icyogajuru kuri Mars ndetse byitezwe ko iki cya InSight kizacukura umwobo kugira ngo harebwe niba ubutaka bwaho bwahingwaho.

Basuye umwalimu ukora ibikorwa bitandukanye mu bituruka ku bimera.
Aba Banya-Togo, bavuga ko bari mu Rwanda ku busabwe bwa perezida w'igihugu cyabo, wabonye ko u Rwanda rufite inzira nziza mu guteza imbere imibereho ya mwalimu, hadashingiwe gusa ku mushahara bityo abasaba gukorera urugendo shuri rw'iminsi ine mu Rwanda.
Mu rugendoshuri ruzamara iminsi itanu batangiye kuri iki cyumweru, bafite muri gahunda gusura ibikorwa by'Umwalimu SACCO mu karere ka Rulindo na Musanze, kugirana ibiganiro na minisiteri y'uburezi, banki nkuru y'igihugu n'ibindi.

Mbere y’uko uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20 utangira, Banki ya Kigali yongereye amafaranga yatangaga ku mwaka, ava kuri miliyoni 100 Frw, agera kuri miliyoni 135 Frw.
Ese ubu bufatanye bw’impande zombie hari icyo bufasha abakinnyi?
Ku ruhande rw’ubuyobozi bw’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umukino wa Basketball mu Rwanda (FERWABA) ntawashidikanya ko bishimiye kubona Banki ya Kigali nk’umuterankunga mu gihe n’amakipe hari icyo yungutse, kuko uretse kuba aza mu myanya ya mbere, agira icyo abona, buri kipe yitabiriye Shampiyona ihabwa miliyoni 2 Frw ziyifasha mu ngendo ikora.
Binyuze mu bufatanye bw’izi mpande zombi, umuntu yakwishimira ko hari impano zitangiye kugaragara muri Basketball bitewe n’irushanwa rya Basketball y’abakina ari batatu ryatangijwe mu mwaka ushize, rigahuza abana batarengeje imyaka 17.
Iri rushanwa ryasorejwe i Rubavu mu Ugushyingo 2019, uyu mwaka byitezwe ko rizagera mu gihugu cyose, aho mu duce tune ryari ryakinwemo ubushize, kuri ubu hazongerwaho utundi tubiri (Rusizi na Nyamasheke & Gicumbi na Nyagatare).
Mu cyiciro cy’abakinnyi bakuru, bakina Shampiyona, hari abahembwe ubwo hasozwaga Shampiyona ishize mu byiciro birimo gutsinda amanota menshi muri Shampiyona, gutsinda amanota atatu, dunk, abakinnyi batanga icyizere n’ibindi.
Hari kandi abakinnyi 10 bitwaye neza (5 mu bagore na 5 mu bagabo), aho buri mukinnyi yahawe miliyoni imwe y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ndetse bazasinya amasezerano yo kuba abambasaderi ba BK mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe.
Ndayisaba Ndizeye Dieudonné ‘Gaston’ wa Patriots BBC, wabaye umukinnyi w’umwaka (MVP) mu bagabo, ni umwe mu ba Ambasaderi ba Banki ya Kigali.
Aganira na IGIHE , yavuze ko kuza kwa Banki ya Kigali muri Baskteball y’u Rwanda byahinduye byinshi mu kibuga ndetse no ku bakinnyi.
Ati “Mbona kuba BK yaraje ikagira ubufatanye na FERWABA byaradufashije nka Basketball muri rusange.
Mbere na mbere ni mu buryo bw’amikoro, bifasha amakipe kandi kuba BK yarashyizeho ibihembo ku bakinnyi byatumye hazamo guhangana, buri wese akeneye ko yahabwa ibihembo bya BK kandi mu gihe umukino wajemo guhangana nibwo Basketball iryohera n’abakunzi bayo.’’
Mwizerwa Faustine ni umukinnyi wa The Hoops muri Shampiyona y’abagore.
Na we avuga ko kuba abakinnyi bakina bafite icyo baharanira bibatera ishyaka ndetse bituma bazamura urwego bikaba byanafasha kubaka ikipe y’igihugu ikomeye.
Ati “Ni ubufatanye twungukiyemo byinshi, nk’abakinnyi mbere ntabwo twagiraga ikidutera imbaraga, ariko kuba umukinnyi witwaye neza ahabwa miliyoni y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda bituma buri wese aharanira gukora cyane kugira ngo n’utarayibonye azayibone ubutaha.
Ikindi ni uko buri mukinnyi aharanira kwigaragaza neza kugira ngo azabone n’umwanya mu ikipe y’igihugu.”
Nshobozwabyosenumukiza Jean Jacques Wilson, yavuze ko kuba ambasaderi wa Banki ya Kigali ari ibintu bishimishije kuko bizajya bifasha abakinnyi kumenyana n’abantu benshi ndetse bagahura n’abafana babo.
Ati “Byatumye abakinnyi benshi dukina twumva ko dushyigikiwe, hari abakunda ibyo dukora.
Kuba hari amafaranga ahabwa amakipe byarayafashije kandi hari n’icyo abakinnyi babona.
Ibihembo bitangwa nyuma y’umwaka w’imikino bituma abakinnyi bigaragaza kugira ngo bazabe aba mbasaderi ba Banki ya Kigali.”
“Kuba Ambasaderi wa Banki ya Kigali navuga ko ari ibintu bishimishije nubwo tutaratangira kubikora cyane, ariko bizadufasha kumenyena n’abantu benshi kandi biduhuza n’abakunda umukino dukina.”
Kapiteni wa APR BBC y’abagore, Umugwaneza Charlotte, avuga ko ubufatanye bwa FERWABA na Banki ya Kigali bwazanye impinduka nziza ugereranyije n’uburyo byari bimeze kuko abakinnyi ubu bakinana umuhate.
Ati “Urebye ubona ko ubufatanye bw’Ishyirahamwe rya Basketball na BK bwazanye impinduka nziza, abakinnyi bazamuye urwego, bagize umuhate mu byo bakora kandi babona abafana babashyigikira.
BK yahinduye Shampiyona, yayigize nziza ugereranyije n’uko byari bimeze.”
Abakinnyi 10 ba mbere bagizwe aba Ambasaderi ba Banki ya Kigali ni: Imanizabayo Marie Laurence (The Hoops), Kantore Sandra (APR WBBC), Umugwaneza Charlotte (APR WBBC), Uwizeyimana Assouma (APR WBBC), Mwizerwa Faustine wa The Hoops, Ndayisaba Ndizeye Dieudonné Gaston (Patriots BBC), Nshobozwabyosenumukiza Wilson (REG BBC), Niyonkuru Pascal (APR BBC), Niyonsaba Bienvenu (APR BBC ) na Sangwe Armel (APR).

#19230#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/mobayilo/article/umunyarwanda-wahimbye-chargeur-ya
Umunyarwanda wahimbye "chargeur" ya telefone ikoresha imirasire y'izuba, agiye guhembwa Yanditswe kuya 16-10-2013 saa 09:14' na Jean Claude Ntawitonda Imihangayiko yo gushaka aho gushariza telefoni buri gihe aho yari ari mu cyaro cy'i Burundi, byatumye Umunyarwanda Henri Nyakarundi akora sharijeri (chargeur/charger) ikurura imirasire y'izuba maze igacomekwaho telefoni mu mwanya w'amashanyarazi.
Nyakarundi avuga ko yagize iki gitekerezo cyo gukora iyi sharijeri yitwa Mobile Solar Cellphone Charger (MSCC) mu mwaka wa 2009 ubwo yabaga mu cyaro kimwe cy'i Burundi aho buri gihe yagorwaga no kubona aho yashariza telefoni ye.
Yaje kubona amahirwe (...)
Imihangayiko yo gushaka aho gushariza telefoni buri gihe aho yari ari mu cyaro cy'i Burundi, byatumye Umunyarwanda Henri Nyakarundi akora sharijeri (chargeur/charger) ikurura imirasire y'izuba maze igacomekwaho telefoni mu mwanya w'amashanyarazi.
Nyakarundi avuga ko yagize iki gitekerezo cyo gukora iyi sharijeri yitwa Mobile Solar Cellphone Charger (MSCC) mu mwaka wa 2009 ubwo yabaga mu cyaro kimwe cy'i Burundi aho buri gihe yagorwaga no kubona aho yashariza telefoni ye.
Yaje kubona amahirwe ubwo yageraga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika gukorana n'ikigo nyafurika gishinzwe gukwirakwiza ingufu zihoraho (African Renewable Energy Distributor) ahitwa Atlanta.
Yahise atekereza uburyo yakora akagabanyiriza umutwaro Abarundi n'abandi Banyafurika badafite amashanyarazi.
Nyakarundi agira ati: "Ubwo nari i Burundi nahoraga ndwana no kubona aho nashariza, bigatuma mporana agasharijeri kanjye ka telefoni ku mufuka nshakisha aho nagacomeka nko mu maresitora cyangwa mu biro by'abantu runaka.
Nabonye ko uwakora akantu abasharija bajya bahuriraho, byaba igisubizo ku baturage baba bashaka gushariza byihuse.
Nerekeje muri Amerika ntangira gushakisha icyaba igisubizo."
MSCC ni nka sitasiyo yo gushariza yoroshye kuyimukana kuko ifite amapine nk'ay'utugare.
Ifite ubushobozi bwo kubika umuriro w'amashanyarazi uturutse ku rumuri rw'izuba ungana na kilowatt 20 bitewe na paneaux solaires ebyiri zikurura imirasire zikabika umuriro muri batiri nini (lithium battery).
Nyakarundi yatsindiye ibihembo mpuzamahanga by'abahanze udushya Ubukorikori bwa Nyakarundi bwabaye indashyikirwa bituma yisanga ku rutonde rw'abagomba kubona ibihembo mpuzamahanga by'abahanze udushya mu ikoranabuhanga ku Isi ryagirira akamaro ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere; ibihembo byitwa "The Empowering People Award."
Iki gihembo azagihabwa hamwe n'abandi batoranyijwe bagize icyo bakora mu ikoranabuhanga birimo kwikorera Biogaz, utuyunguruzo tw'amazi dukoresheje ingufu z'izuba, kororera amafi mu mato n'ibindi.
Igihembo bazagihererwa i Nairobi muri Kenya, ku itariki ya 30 Ukwakira 2013, aho uwa mbere azahabwa amayero ibihumbi 50, uwa kabiri agahabwa ibihumbi 30, uwa gatatu ibihumbi 20, abasigaye inyuma 20 bose bagahabwa ibihumbi bitanu by'amayero.
Nyakarundi avuga ko igihembo azahabwa kizamufasha kongera umubare wa MSCC zikozwe neza maze zigakwirakwizwa mu byaro by'u Rwanda n'u Burundi bifite ibibazo by'amashanyarazi ahanini.

#19253#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUREZI/article/Mubyateje-ubukene-UR-ngo-harimo-no-kurihira-amashuri-abakozi-bayo-basaga-200
Mubyateje ubukene UR ngo harimo no kurihira amashuri abakozi bayo basaga 200 Abadepite babajije Minisitiri w’uburezi impamvu Kaminuza y’u Rwanda imaze iminsi mu bibazo by’ubukene kandi idakodesha ibikoresho cyangwa inyubako ndetse ikaba inaterwa inkunga na Leta we asubiza ko amafaranga ya UR ajya muri byinshi birimo no kurihira amashuri abakozi bayo basaga 200.
Ibi Minisitiri w’uburezi Dr Musafiri Papias Malimba yabitangarije komisiyo y’uburezi, Ikoranabuhanga, umuco n’urubyiruko mu nteko ishinga amategeko kuri uyu wa 19 Ukwakira 2017.
Yabanje gusobanura impamvu zo guhinduranya ibyicaro by’ama koleji ya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda avuga ko bigamije kunoza uburyo bwo gusaranganya ibikenerwa no gufasha abanyeshuri kwigira ahari ibikoresho bihagije.
Yavuze ko kwimura abanyeshuri mu makoreji amwe bajya mu yandi nta tegeko byishe kuko abanyeshuri bari batatanye ku buryo bigaga nabi bityo ngo abona hari hakenewe icyemezo cyo kubihindura.
Ati: “Izi Mpinduka ni nziza, urugero nk’iyo urebye ukuntu ibintu byifashe i Rukara aho twajyanye koleji z’uburezi zose, uhita ubona uburyo hariya hantu hatakoreshwaga uko bikwiye.”
Yagarutse no ku guhuza koleji z’ubuforomo agira ati: “…Twari dufite koleji y’ubuforomo i Ngoma, i Gicumbi, i Nyagatare, i Rwamagana n’ahandi kandi muri zose nta n’imwe yari irengeje abanyeshuri 300, byarumvikanaga cyane kuba twazimurira i Huye zose uretse iya Rwamagana yari ifite ibyangombwa bihagije.”
Depite Philbert Uwiringiyimana yabajije Minisitiri Musafiri imvano y’ubukene bugaragara muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda agira ati: “Kaminuza zigenga zirakora neza kandi zishyuza make ugereranyije na UR, ni gute iriya kaminuza yaba idakodesha inyubako, ikanahabwa amafaranga na Leta ariko ikagira ibibazo by’ubukene bukabije?"
Minisitiri Musafiri yasubije avuga ko amafaranga ya Kaminuza agendera mu bintu byinshi ati: “ Hari ahantu henshi amafaranga akoreshwa, nk’urugero hari abakozi ba UR basaga 200 bishyurirwa amashuri kugirango bongere ubumenyi, kandi bazagaruka bakorere UR.”
Uyu muyobozi yanavuze ko bashyizeho ingamba ko buri Koleji izajya yishakira ingengo y’imari yayo bikagenzurwa na UR nk’ikigo.
Ibi ngo bizagabanya inzira ndende byasabaga amakoleji kugera ku mafaranga ziba zikeneye gukoresha.
Asubiza ku mpamvu bamwe mu banyeshuri barangiza muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda bahura n’ubushomeri bukabije, Minisitiri Musafiri yavuze ko ibyo byaba bishingiye ku bumenyi budahagije abo banyeshuri bakura muri Kaminuza.
Ati: “Ikibazo cy’ubushomeri ni ingaruka zo kutagira abanyeshuri bafite ubumenyi buhagije, ariko uburyo turimo gukoresha bugamije kongera ireme ry’uburezi no kongera uburyo bwo guhanga imirimo.”
Iyi komisiyo yari yatumije Minisitiri w’uburezi nyuma y’ingendo yakoze muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu rwego rwo kureba iterambere ryayo.
The newtimes dukesha iyi nkuru yatangaje ko mu munsi mike iyi komisiyo izanahura n’abayobozi ba Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ndetse n’aba Minisiteri y’abakozi ba Leta n’Umurimo bakaganira ku bibazo byugarije uburezi.

#19268#	1	sports	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIKINO/article/Ikipe-ya-Espagne-Cameroun-na-Australia-zamaze-gusezererwa-mu-gihe-Ubuhorandi-na-Chili-zakomeje-mu-gikombe-cy-Isi
Ikipe ya Espagne, Cameroun na Australia zamaze gusezererwa mu gihe Ubuhorandi na Chili zakomeje mu gikombe cy'Isi.
Nyuma y'imikino ibiri ibanza mu matsinda y'igikombe cy'isi bimwe bitangiye gusobanuka ku makipe amwe yamaze gukatisha itike ya 1/8 andi arasezererwa, Cameroun, Esipanye ifite igikombe cy'isi cya 2010 mu Itsinda rya 2 yamaze gusezererwa, naho Ubuhorandi na Chili.
Mu mikino y'umunsi wa kabiri muri tsinda ikipe y'Ubuhorandi yatsinze Australia ibitego 3-2 naho igihugu cya Chili itsinda Espanye ibitego 2- 0.
Ikipe ya Cameroun ifite ubusa n'umwenda w'ibitego 5 itaranabasha gutsinda igitego na kimwe muri iki gikombe, ibyo gusezererwa bisa nk'ibidatunguranye ugereranyije n'umukino yerekanye muri iki gikombe ndetse no kuba mbere y'uko yerekeza muri Brezil yabanje gusa nkaho abakinnyi bashyize imbere inyungu z'amafranga bazakura muri iki gikombe kuruta uko bashyize imbere ishema ry'igihugu cyabo n'umugabane w'Afrika bahagarariye.
Esipanye ntiyumva ibyayibayeho muri iki gikombe Esipanye ikipe yari yitezweho ko yakwisubiza iki gikombe yari ifite, isa nkaho yatunguye benshi mu gusezererwa kwayo, dore kugeza uyu munsi ari imwe mu makipe amaze kwinjizwa ibitego byinshi muri iri rushanwa, dore ko kugeza uyu munsi mu mikino ibiri imaze gutsindwa ibitego 7, ikaba yarinjije kimwe.
Australia ikaba ari iya nyumamu itsinda ryayo nta nota na rimwe ikaba ifite umwenda w'ibitego 6.
Indi kipe yamaze kwerekeza ku muryango usohoka muri iri rushanwa ni ikipe ya Australia nayo kugeza uyu munsi ifite ubusa muri iri tsinda ihuriyemo na Espanye.
Aya makipe asezerewe mu matsinda tubibutse ko ahabwa ataviramo aho atahana akayabo k'amafaranga angana na Miliyoni eshanu z'a euros ni ukuvuga hafi Miliyari 4, 2 z'amanyarwanda.
Abakinnyi ba Chili bishimira intsinzi ya 2- 0 kuri Esipanye Amakipe y'Ubuhondi na Chili n'ubwo agifite umukino umwe, yamaze kwizera gukomeza dore ataratakaza inota na rimwe, mu gihe ayakuriye Australia na Espanye biri kumwe mu itsinda afite ubusa, bivuze ko ni yo yatsinda bitayashyikira.
Ikipe ya Australia ibyishimo byayo ntibyarambye

#19269#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Rwamagana-Umuturage-yatije-Akarere-inzu-zo-gushyiramo-ivuriro
Rwamagana:Umuturage yatije Akarere inzu zo gushyiramo ivuriro Abaturage baje kwivuza ku ivuriro Umuturage wo mu murenge wa Gahengeli, Zacharie Gasana umwaka ushize wa 2016 yemeye gutiza inzu ze Akarere ka Rwamagana kugirango zishyirwemo ivuriro rito (poste de santé) maze abaturage babone aho bivuriza.
Izi nzu ze ziherereye mu kagali ka Mutamwa mu murenge wa Gahengeri, Gasana avuga ko yazitije akarere nyuma yo kubona urugendo rurerure abaturage bakoraga bajya kwivuza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Gahengeri.
Aganira na Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, Zacharie Gasana yagize ati “Twatije akarere aya mazu kubera ibibazo abaturage bari bafite.Bararwaraga bagahera mu ngo bakabura uko bagera kwa muganga, ndareba mbona bidakwiye kandi nari mfite uburyo bw’ayo mazu nari maze gutunganya, hanyuma mbwira umurenge ko wafasha abaturage, bagatangira bagafasha abaturage kwivuza.”
Abaturage bahawe ivuriro, bashimiye Gasana wemeye gutanga inzu ze ngo zishyirwemo ivuriro.
Jeanne Uwimana umwe mu baturage yagize ati “Byari imvune abenshi twaheraga mu rugo , bigatuma tujya kunywa ibyatsi kandi dufite mitiweli, ugasanga no kubona itike ni ikibazo, rukatugora, dushima Imana yatuzaniye uyu mubyeyi, n’ahandi hose iyaba bagiraga umutima nk’uwe.”
Venuste Ntahobari avuga ko hari igihe bajyaga bakora urugendo rw’amasaha atatu bajya kwivuza ku kigo nderabuzima, ariko ubu no iyo ibaye myinshi ba iminota 30.
Yagize ati “Nk’ufite abana kugirango ubagezeyo byaratugoraga.
Iyo ufite urugendo rw’iminota 20 cyangwa 30 biradufasha cyane, turashimira uyu mubyeyi wadutekerejeho.”
Gasana watije Akarere inzu zo gushyiramo ivuriro Icyakora aba baturage bavuga ko bafite ikibazo cy’uko iyo poste de santé idakora mu mpera z’icyumweru.
Mbonyumuvunyi Radjab, Meya w’Akarere ka Rwamagana yavuze ko bagiye kwegurira abikorera iyo poste de santé kugirango ibashe gucungwa neza.
Yagize ati “Poste de santé kuba idakora muri weekend ni ikibazo natwe tuzi, kandi bitewe n’imiterere ya poste de santé iba ifite abakozi bake.Abo bakozi nabo si aba poste de santé, baba ari aba centre de santé baza kuhakorera.Muri weekend rero centre de santé igira abakozi bake, baba bake bikaba ngombwa ko zibasubirana.Mu rwego rwo kunoza imikorere, twifuje ko nkuko biri no mu mabwiriza ya Minisante, izi postes de santé zazava mu maboko ya Leta zikajya mu maboko y’abikorera.”
Mbonyumuvunyi avuga ko bagiye gushaka undi muforomo uzaba akora kuri poste de santé mu gihe bagitegereje ko haba ipiganwa ngo iyo poste de Sante yegurirwe abikorera.
Akagali ka Mutamwa gatuwe n’abaturage basaga 4600 bose bifashisha iyi poste de santé, hakiyongeraho n’abandi bo mu tugali bahana imbibi.

Beach Volleyball: U Rwanda rwatangiye neza mu mikino ya All-Africa Games Ikipe y’u Rwanda ya Beach Volleyball y’abagabo igizwe na Ntagengwa Olivier na Akumuntu Kavalo Patrick yatangiye neza mu mikino nyafurika ya All-Africa Gmes iri kubera muri Maroc itsinda iya Algérie amaseti 2-0 mu mukino wa mbere wabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu.

#19282#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/umutekano-muke-watumye-al-hilal-izahura-na-rayon-sports-idakina-umukino-wa
Imyigaragambyo yatumye Al Hilal izahura na Rayon Sports idakina umukino wa gicuti Umukino wa gicuti wari guhuza Al Hilal Omdurman na Gor Mahia ukabera mu Mujyi wa Khartoum kuri uyu wa Gatanu, wakuweho kubera ibibazo by’umutekano muke biri muri Sudani.
Gor Mahia yari kwerekeza mu Majyaruguru y’Iburasirazuba bwa Afurika ku wa Kane, ariko yamaze gutangaza ko itakitabiriye uyu mukino wa gicuti kubera umutekano.
Mu itangazo iyi kipe yo muri Kenya yashyize ahagarara, yavuze ko imyigaragambyo iri kubera muri Khartoum iri ku isonga mu byatumye itajya muri Sudani.
Rigira riti ”Turabamenyesha ko umukino wa gicuti wari guhuza Gor Mahia na Al Hilal yo muri Sudani utazaba kuko amakuru atugeraho avuga ko hari imyigaragambyo ikomeye mu Murwa Mukuru wa Sudani, iri gukorwa n’abadashyigikiye ubutegetsi buriho.”
“Ntabwo umutekano wizewe akaba ari yo mpamvu twahisemo kwimura umukino.
Tuzabamenyesha indi tariki n’aho umukino uzabera.”
Gor Mahia yari kwifashisha uyu mukino wa gicuti mu kwitegura Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya mbere muri Kenya izatangira tariki ya 31 Kanama 2019.
Al Hilal yo ikomeje kwitegura Rayon Sports bazahurira mu ijonjora ribanza rya CAF Champions League mu cyumweru gitaha.

Meya wa Kicukiro ubwo yari amaze kuregwa n'umuturage imbere ya Perezida KAGAME, yahise ajya kwereka abanyamakuru ukuri(Yavuguruwe) Ubwo Meya wa Kicukiro Paul Jules Ndamage yamaraga kuregwa n'umuturage imbere ya Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 11 Ugushyingo 2014 amushinja we n'ubuyobozi bw'akarere kumwirukana mu nzu, nyuma y'uruzinduko rwa Perezida , Meya Ndamage yahise ajya kwerereka abanyamakuru ukuri kw'icyo kibazo.
Perezida Kagame ubwo yaganiraga, anasubiza ibibazo by'abaturage Ni mu ruzinduko Perezida Paul Kagame yagiriye mu murenge wa Jabana mu karere ka Gasabo, aho igihe hari hatanzwe umwanya wo kwakira ibibazo by'abaturage, umuturage witwa Mukasinzi Clarisse yahagurutse akavuga ko yarenganyijwe na Meya wa Kicukiro ndetse n'ubuyobozi bw'akarere ngo bwamwirukanye mu nzu ndetse bukamuteza basaza be ngo bajye bamukubita.
Mukasinzi yavugaga ko bapfa isambu we na basaza be basigiwe n'ababyeyi, Leta ikaza gutuzamo abandi bantu.
Yisobanura Ndamage yavuze ko ubusanzwe Mukasinzi yari afite isambu we na basaza be basigiwe n'ababyeyi babo mu Murenge wa Kagarama.
Mu mwaka wa 2003 iyo sambu yatujwemo abandi bantu kubera gahunda Leta yari ifite yo gutuza neza abaturage.
Paul Jules Ndamage ubwo yasobanuraga ikibazo cya Mukasinzi Ndamage yakomeje avuga ko nta ngurane yatanzwe icyo gihe kubera ko nta tegeko ryo gutanga ingurane ryari ryakagiyeho.
Mu mwaka wa 2009, ngo nibwo Mukasinzi na basaza be bubakiwe inzu yo kubamo nk'abatishoboye.
Bamaze kubakirwa inzu, Mukasinzi ngo yashatse umugabo, aramuzana ngo bajye babana na basaza babo.
Byahise bizamura amakimbirane ndetse rimwe na rimwe bakajya barwana bapfa uwo mugabo wa Mukasinzi.
Ikibazo cyacyemuwe hirukanwa Mukasinzi n'uwo mugabo , icyakora Mukasinzi yaje kuhagaruka nta mugabo ari kumwe n'abana.
Ndamage akaba yahakanye ko nta masano afitanye na Mukasinzi ubwo yari abibajijwe na Perezida Kagame niba hari icyo bapfana, gusa ngo bahuriye ko bose ari abanyarwanda.
Perezida Kagame yagaragaje ko atishimiye uburyo icyo kibazo cyacyemuwe, ngo kuko bitumvikana uburyo hirukanwa umuntu ufite abana, hagasigara abasore.
Yasabye ko icyo kibazo cyiganwa ubushishozi kandi kigacyemurwa vuba nta we ubirenganiyemo.
Nyuma y'urwo ruzinduko rwa Perezida Kagame, Meya Ndamage yahamagaye abanyamakuru ngo bajye kureba ukuri kw'ibyo Mukasinzi yaregeye Perezida, bagezeyo basanga Mukasinzi aba mu nzu imwe na basaza be, bitandukanye n'ibyo yabwiye Perezida kuko we yavugaga ko bamwirukanyemo burundu.
Musaza we witwa Uwizeye Jean Pierre yadutangarije ko ubusanzwe mushiki wabo ari we wananiranye, ngo kuko nyuma y'uko Leta ituje abandi bantu mu isambu yabo, ngo hari ikibanza n'inzu yo kogosheramo Leta yabageneye, nyamara Mukasinzi ngo ahita abyigurishiriza, amafaranga ajya kuyasangira n'abagabo, adahayeho basaza be.
Abaturage baturanye nabo bemezaga ko Mukasinzi ari we utera ikibazo, ahanini kubera kuzana abagabo batandukanye muri iyo nzu.
Meya Ndamage akaba yahise avuga ko bagiye gushakira basaza be babiri aho kuba(kuko musaza we mukuru yagiye kwishakira iye mibereho) kandi ngo bakanabitaho ku buryo bwo kubona ibibatunga kugirango ikibazo gikemuke.
Ferdinand Maniraguha

#19296#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/urusobe-rw-ubuzima/article/ntibikwiye-ko-umwana-akwita-umubyeyi-ngo-nurangiza-umuhohotere
Ntibikwiye ko umwana akwita umubyeyi ngo nurangiza umuhohotere Abahagarariye imiryango itari iya Leta mu Karere ka Huye basanga bidakwiye ko umwana w’umukobwa yita umuntu mama, papa cyangwa tonto, aho kumureberera akamuhohotera.
Batekereza ko bidakwiye ko umwana akwita mama, papa, tonto aho kumureberera ukamuhohotera Babiganiriyeho mu nama nyunguranabitekerezo ku gikwiye gukorwa kugira ngo ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana ricike, batumiwemo n’Urugaga rw’amadini n’amatorero mu kubungabunga ubuzima (RICH), tariki 5 Ugushyingo 2019.
Ni nyuma yo kugaragarizwa ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na RICH, ku bufatanye bw’umuryango Oxfam hamwe n’ibitaro bya Kacyiru, bwakorewe ku bangavu 1,951 bagannye ibigo ‘Isange One Stop Center’ byo mu bitaro by’uturere twa Huye, Kamonyi, Muhanga, Ruhango, Nyabihu, Rubavu na Kacyiru; kuva muri Mutarama kugera mu Kuboza 2018.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko nubwo abangavu benshi bahohoterwa ari abari hagati y’imyaka 10 na 18, n’abari munsi yayo bahohoterwa kuko 13% kuri bariya 1,951 bari bataruzuza imyaka 5, naho 19,4% bari hagati y’imyaka itanu n’icyenda.
Bwanagaragaje ko nubwo mu ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana habamo kubakorakora, kubereka filime z’urukozasoni n’ibindi, abenshi muri bo basambanywa kuko 78% by’aba bakoreweho ubushakashatsi basambanyijwe.
Abenshi muri aba bana kandi basambanyirijwe mu ngo, haba iwabo, cyangwa iwabo w’ababahohoteye.
Abakeya ni abasambanyirijwe mu gasozi.
Ubushakashatsi kandi bugaragaza ko bagiye bahohoterwa n’abantu bazi, bafitiye icyizere, kuko abaturanyi n’inshuti bonyine ari 58.3%, ababahohoteye batabazi bakaba ari 13.3% naho 6.6% bakaba abo bagira icyo bapfana barimo ba se na ba se wabo, basaza babo, babyara babo, ba nyirarume, n’abagabo ba ba nyina.
Hari n’umwe wasambanyijwe na sekuru.
Joseph Kagabo, umujyanama wa komite nyobozi y’akarere ka Huye, ahereye ku byavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi, agaya abagabo bafatirana abana b’abakobwa babizera, hanyuma bakabasambanya.
Agira ati “Iyo umwana muhuye utamuzi akagufata nk’umubyeyi akavuga ati papa cyangwa mama, wumva hari akantu ku mutima kaje, ukabona ko uwo mwana afite uburere.
Iyo uhindukiye rero ukamuhemukira, rwose ntuba uri umuntu, kuko ubumuntu ni indangagaciro ikomeye kandi ntayo uba ufite”.
Pasitoro Paul Ntayomba wo mu itorero ‘Life Transformation Church’, akaba na visi perezeda wa RICH mu Karere ka Huye, na we avuga ko abakomeje guhohotera abana bari bakwiye kubireka kuko ibyo bakora ari ibikorwa by’ubunyamanswa byangiza igihugu.
Ati “Nanjye ndi umubyeyi.
Ndatekereza iyo nkuru y’uko umwana wanjye byamubayeho.
Icya mbere hari uguhungabana.
Uwabikorewe we aba yaramaze guhungabana.
Byangiza umuryango, itorero n’igihugu”.
Serge Uwase, umukozi w’umuryango urwanya ihohoterwa mu ngo abagabo babigizemo uruhare ari wo RWAMREC, na we avuga ko niba bene wabo b’abana b’abakobwa harimo na ba se bakomeje kubahohotera, bazatuma bagera aho batabagirira icyizere, kandi ko bizagira n’ingaruka ku muryango muri rusange.
Ati “Niba umwana w’umukobwa atacyizera se, urumva azizera umugabo we?
Abagabo nitudahaguruka ngo kubirwanya tubigire ibyacu, sosiyete nta hantu yaba iri kugana”.
Aba bose kandi batekereza ko abantu bakwiye kujya bagira umutima ubacira urubanza mbere yo guhohotera abana.
Kagabo ati “Aba bantu bafatwa batafatwa, buri wese wiyiziho iyi ngeso yibaze, yifate mbere yo gufatwa n’inzego zibishinzwe.
Umwana ni we nyir’iki gihugu igihe tuzaba tudahari, ni we ngabo y’igihugu, ni we muyobozi.
Kirazira guhemukira umutwe w’igihugu”.
Batekereza kandi ko iki kibazo cy’ihohoterwa ry’abana gikwiye guhagurukirwa na buri wese, akumva ko bimureba, akagaragaza ushuka umwana ataramuhohotera aho kuzagaragaza ko uwo mwana yabyaye na we yari agikeneye kurerwa.
Ababyeyi na bo ngo bakwiye kwiyegereza abana babo kugira ngo bababwire byose, bashukwa bakabagarura mu nzira kuko ubundi ujya gushuka umwana atabikora umunsi umwe.
MENYA UMWANDITSI Marie Claire Joyeuse Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ JoyeuseC

#19327#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/polisi-iraburira-abantu-kwirinda-guteza-urusaku-rwabangamira-abandi
Polisi iraburira abantu kwirinda guteza urusaku rwabangamira abandi Polisi y’u Rwanda irasaba abaturarwanda muri rusange kwishimira iminsi mikuru ariko birinda kubangamira abaturanyi babo bakoresheje amajwi asakuza.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera, avuga ko Polisi itazihanganira umuntu wese uhungabanya umutekano wa mugenzi we Urusaku ni ikintu cyose kivuze cyane mu buryo burenze cyangwa kikavuzwa mu buryo bushobora kubangamira ituze n’umutekano by’abumva ayo majwi arenze urugero bitewe n’umwanya amaze n’ibyakoreshejwe muri ayo majwi byatumye biteza urusaku bikaba byabangamira abantu.
Polisi irasaba abayobozi b’insengero, utubyiniro, utubari n’ahandi hose hakorerwa imyidagaduro kwirinda kuvuza ibyuma ndangururamajwi mu buryo bushobora kubangamira abaturanyi babo.
Mu Rwanda, itegeko rivuga ko urusaku ruba rwinshi igihe rurengeje igipimo fatizo cya 80 db(decibel), icyo gihe ruba rubangamira abarwumva nk’uko bitangazwa n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ibidukikije(REMA).
Ni yo mpamvu kwishima no kwidagadura byakorwa mu buryo butabangamira abandi.
Urusaku rushobora kubuza bamwe kwishimira iyi minsi mikuru uko bikwiye, birasaba rero ko twishima mu ituze n’amahoro ku buryo ntawe ubangamira undi.
Akenshi urusaku usanga rugira ingaruka zitandukanye ku bantu, aho usanga umuntu adakora neza ibyo yari arimo gukora kuko ubwonko buba burangajwe n’ayo majwi atandukanye, kutumva neza ibyo arimo, kudasinzira igihe aryamye n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, Commissioner of Police (CP) John Bosco Kabera avuga ko mu Mujyi wa Kigali kimwe n’ahandi hose mu gihugu nk’ibisanzwe, mu mpera z’umwaka no mu ntangiriro, haba hari ibitaramo binyuranye, byaba ibyo kwidagadura ndetse n’ibihimbaza Imana bityo ugasanga hari abacuranga bakarenza urugero bagateza urusaku.
Yagize ati: “Birakwiye ko abantu bishima bakidagadura bishimira ko basoje umwaka amahoro, ariko nanone tugasaba abantu kubikora(ibitaramo) mu ituze badahungabanyije umudendezo w’abandi.”
CP Kabera yavuze ko nubwo urusaku nta rupfu ruteza, ariko rushobora kubangamira abantu haba mu buryo bw’imikorere y’umubiri n’ubwonko, agasanga abantu batagomba kubuza abandi uburenganzira bwabo bababuza gusinzira cyangwa gukora ibindi bikorwa byabo batuje.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi asoza avuga ko Polisi yifuriza abaturarwanda bose kuzizihiza iminsi mikuru mu ituze no mu mutekano buri wese yirinda icyahungabanya umutekano wa mugenzi we.
Itegeko rigenga ibidukikije N°48/2018 ryo ku wa 13/08/2018, mu ngingo yaryo ya 53 ivuga ku rusaku rurengeje ibipimo.
Bitabangamiye ibiteganywa n’itegeko riteganya ibyaha n’ibihano muri rusange, umuntu uteza urusaku rurengeje ibipimo byagenwe ahanishwa ihazabu yo mu rwego rw’ubutegetsi y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda angana n’ibihumbi magana atanu (500.000FRW).

#19360#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Nyuma-yo-gutemwa-bikomeye-muri-Jenocide-yiyemeje-kwakira-uwabikoze-nk-umwana-we
Nyuma yo gutemwa bikomeye muri Jenocide , yiyemeje kwakira uwabikoze nk'umwana we Adela Kangabe wagize ubutwari bwo kubabarira uwamutemye muri Jenoside akamusiga ari intere Umukecuru Adela Kangabe wo mu murenge wa Kigabiro mu Karere ka Rwamagana , avuga ko mu gihe cya Jenoside yatemwe bikomeye n'abari interahamwe.
Gusa kuri ubu Adela avuga ko nyuma ya Jenoside uwamutemye, Kagabo Louis, yamusanze muri gereza akamubabarira ndetse yamara gufungurwa akamwakira iwe mu rugo amurera nk'umwana we.
Nk'uko uyu mukecuru yabitangarije Makuruki.rw, avuga ko mu gihe cya Jenoside umuryango we watewe n'izari interahamwe zikabatema zikamwicira umugabo na bamwe mu bana be.
Gusa uyu mukecuru avuga ko we bamutemye mu mutwe bikomeye bakamusiga bazi ko yapfuye ariko nyuma aza kurokoka.
Avuga ko uwamutemye yari yamubonye aramumenya kugeza ubwo nyuma ya Jenoside amaze kugarura imbaraga n'ubwenge, yagiye muri gereza kuvuga yo ijambo ry'Imana akabona uwitwa Kagabo Louis wari waramutemye.
Adela yagize ati" Mugihe cya Jenocide baradutemye njye n'umuryango wanjye abandi barapfuye ariko njye basiga nakomeretse kugeza ho ku rwego rwo kuba bari baziko napfuye, ariko siko byagenze ahubwo naguye muri koma , nyuma y'aho ngaruriye ubwenge nagiye muri gereza kureba abari baratugiriye nabi, ndabasengera ndataha, ariko mbona bameze nabi, nyuma naje kongera kugaruka muri gereza mbona uwantemye mu gihe, dukubitanye amaso agira ubwoba ariruka arampunga ariko njye nari namubonye."
Yakomeje agira ati" bwarakeye ndagaruka nsaba ubuyobozi bwa gereza ko nazamuzanira icyo kumutunga kuko nabonaga ameze nabi, noneho aranezerwa, aramwenyura ambwira ko ashaka kunsaba imbabazi,imbabazi naje kuzimuha akiri muri gereza, ambwira ko ashaka kubatizwa ,mbimufashamo muzanira imyenda yo kwambara agiye mu mazi n'iyo yambara avuyemo, mukorera umunsi mukuru uri ku rwego rw'abagororwa.
Adela akomeza kandi agira ati Namuhishe ko ariwe wishe umwana wanjye w'umuhererezi, ariko mubwira ko ariwe ugiye kuzambera umuherererezi,kugeza ubwo amaze gufungurwa namuzanye mu rugo iwanjye tubana amezi icyenda nyuma nza kumufasha gushinga urwe rugo, ubu mufasha aba iwe.
Mu gihe cya Jenocide Adela yakomerekejwe mu mutwe bikomeye kuburyo ngo basize bazi ko yapfuye Wumvise ububabare Adela yagize mu gihe cya Jenoside,akabuterwa n'uwo Kagabo Louis, wakibaza aho yakuye umutima wo kubabarira.
Adela akaba yaradusubije mu magambo make ati"Mbese, si njye, navuga nti ni Imana, ni yesu wabimbwiye, kuko ntibishoboka ko wamuzana, ariko byanjemo naramukundaga kandi ndacyamukunda."
Kagabo Louis avuga ko we akiri muri gereza yari azi ko mukecuru Adela yapfuye bitewe n'ahantu yari yaramusize, ariko ngo yaje gutungurwa no kumubona muri gereza ndetse akajya amusura akamufasha.
Kagabo yagize ati"Mbere yo kumusaba imbabazi nari ntaramumenya, ariko maze kumumenya namusabye imbabazi,aho namariye gusaba imbabazi, yamfashije nk'umubyeyi ntacyo namuburanye, yaramfashije muri gereza ntacyo nigeze muburana ,no kumubatizo wanjye yanzaniye ibyangombwa byari bikenewe nk'imyenda n'inkweto …., Ariko n'aho mfunguriwe twarabanye hano mu rugo rwe nk'umwana we ntacyo nigeze muburana yakomeje kumfasha kugeza nshinze urwanjye .
Kagabo avuga ko yatunguwe no kubona umukecuru Adela Kangabe yari azi ko yamwishe, nyuma ariko akamubabarira akamwakira iwe mu rugo akamurera nk'umwana we Iki gikorwa cya Adela Kangabe ni kimwe mu bikorwa bikomeye byagezweho muri gahunda y'ubumwe n'ubwiyunge binyuze muri gahunda yiswe umurinzi w'igihango.

#19362#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/byinshi-kuri-ruzagayura-inzara-yashegeshe-u-rwanda-igahitana-abasaga-ibihumbi
Byinshi kuri Ruzagayura, inzara yashegeshe u Rwanda igahitana abasaga ibihumbi 300 Ruzagayura ni inzara yanditse amateka mu Rwanda, iba ikimenyabose ku buryo hari n’ibibondo biyimenya bitarajya mu ishuri.
Ni inzara yamaze imyaka ibiri mu Rwanda, ariko yangiza ibitagira ingano.
Iyo inzara yatangiye ahagana mu Ukwakira 1942, itewe n’amapfa yamaze imyaka ibiri.
Ayo mapfa yatangiye muri Nzeri 1941, yongera kubaho nyuma gato y’itumba ryo mu 1942.
Igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda” cy’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko iyo nzara yenyegejwe yatewe n’igabanyuka ry’ibiribwa ryaturutse ku ndwara y’ibirayi bita “mildiou/mildew”, ndetse no ku ndwara y’ibishyimbo bita “chortophila”.
N’ibijumba muri ibyo bihe byari byibasiwe n’indwara bita “rhizoctonia/rhizoctonie”.
Inzara ya Ruzagayura yongerewe ubukana kandi n’intambara ya kabiri y’isi yose, ndetse n’uko icyo gihe Abanyarwanda bagombaga guha umusanzu abakoroni b’Ababiligi bari bahanganye n’ingabo za Adolf Hitler mu ntambara ya kabiri y’isi yose.
Uwo musanzu wari ugizwe n’ibiribwa n’amatungo.
Icyo gihe imbuto gakondo z’Abanyarwanda, ari nazo zari zishoboye guhangana n’ibihe n’uburwayi bw’ibihingwa, zari zimaze gucika, bazisimbuje ibirayi, imyumbati, soya n’ibindi.
Abanyarwanda batangaga inka, ibishyimbo, amasaka, amashaza byo kugaburira abasirikare b’abanyekongo ndetse n’abakozi bo mu birombe byo muri Congo.
Usibye ibiribwa n’amatungo, umusanzu w’Abanyarwanda muri iyo ntambara wari ugizwe n’imirimo y’agahato irimo guharura imihanda, kubumba amatafari, gutwara imizigo y’abakoloni, gukora mu birombe bya zahabu, Gasegereti na Wolufuramu, guhinga ibireti byakoreshwaga mu gutunganya umuti wica udukoko.
Inzara ya Ruzagayura yiswe amazina menshi bitewe n’ubukana yagiye igaragaza mu turere dutandukanye tw’u Rwanda.
Mu majyepfo yiswe “Ruzagayura”.
Mu duce dutandukanye tw’Iburasirazuba yiswe Rujukundi, Rwanyirarushenyi, Rwakinyebuye cyangwa se Rwakabetezi.
Mu Majyaruguru mu bice bya za Rubavu, Nyabihu , Burera na Musanze yiswe amazina nka Rudakangwimishanana, Rugaragazabadakekwa na Nyirahuku.
Hagati mu gihugu ndetse n’Amajyaruguru y’Iburasirazuba yari izwi nka Matemane naho mu Burengerazuba yitwa Gahoro.
Iyo nzara yagize ubukana bwinshi mu Majyaruguru, mu Burasirazuba no mu Majyepfo y’igihugu.
Mu bice bya Rusizi na Nyamasheke, niho honyine hatigeze hahura n’iyo nzara ku mpamvu z’ikirere cyaho.
Ikindi, iyo ntara yari yegeranye na Congo Mbiligi ku buryo itari kugira ikibazo cyo kubura ibiribwa.
Ahubwo yakiraga abantu bavuye mu zindi ntara nka Astrida (Butare) na Gisenyi.
Mu gihe cya Ruzagayura, uduce tw’imisozi ihanamye, uduce tw’ubutaka busharira, uduce turangwamo isuri nitwo twababaye cyane kurusha utundi.
Muri utwo duce kimwe n’ahandi, abaturage barazahaye ku buryo benshi bamaraga iminsi ibir cyangwa se itatu badakoze ku munwa.
Benshi inzara yarabicaga.
Abaryaga, wasangaga barya inguri (imizi y’insina), imizi y’ibiti, amareberebe, umutsima uvuye mu ifu ya barakatsi (acacia) cyangwa se y’intembe y’insina.
Iyo ndyo idasanzwe nta gushidikanya ko nayo yishe abantu benshi muri ibyo bihe.
Abafite agatege barasuhukaga bakajya gushaka aho bakura ibiribwa cyangwa se aho bagurana ibikoresho byabo n’ibiribwa.
Benshi wasangaga barananutse nk’uko bigaragara ku mafoto y’icyo gihe.
Babitaga ingarisi kubera uko babaga barashizemo.
Ni nako bitaga imirambo y’abo yahitanye.
Iyo mirambo yasangwaga hafi y’imihanda, mu mirima, mu mashyamba, ku nkengero z’inzuzi n’ahandi henshi.
Nyuma y’uko hafashwe ingamba zinyuranye zo kurwanya inzara ya Ruzagayura, abaturage babishishikarijwemo n’abategetsi b’abakoloni ndetse n’abatware bahinganye ubwira.
Guhera mu ntangiriro zo mu wa 1944, Abanyarwanda bahinze ibishyimbo, amashaza, ibirayi, imyumbati n’ibijumba.
Kubera uburumbuke bw’imvura yaguye mu buryo buhagije, umusaruro wariyongereye, ibigega byongera guhunikwamo, abari barasuhutse bagaruka mu ngo zabo.
Ubwo abamisiyoneri bahagaritse gutanga amafunguro.
Inkambi z’ingarisi zirafungwa.
Ahagana muri Nyakanga 1944, abategetsi b’abakoloni bahagaritse kohereza amakamyo y’ibiribwa mu Rwanda yavaga muri Kongo.
Mu mpera z’umwaka wa 1944, aba aribwo hatangazwa ko inzara yarangiye mu gihugu.
Nubwo inzara ya Ruzagayura yamaze igihe gito, yahitanye abantu benshi cyane.
Abamisiyoneri b’abagatolika batangaje muri raporo ngarumwaka yo hagati yo mu wa 1939-1945, ko u Rwanda rwatakaje abantu bagera ku 300. 000, harimo n’abasuhukiye mu bindi bihugu nka Tanganyika, Uganda na Congo Mbiligi.
Muri iyo raporo bavugaga ko abasuhutse bageraga ku 75, 000.
Ababaruraga hari ubwo bibagirwaga rimwe na rimwe kubara abana, abagore, abarwayi n’abasheshe akanguhe bapfuye cyangwa se bahunze iyo nzara ku buryo abo yahitanye bashobora kurenga.
Inzara ya Ruzagayura yangije kandi byinshi, itera n’ubujura bukabije mu gihugu.
Ubwo bujura bwakwiye mu turere twose tw’u Rwanda, cyane cyane utwari twarayogojwe n’inzara.
Bwakorwaga n’ingeri zose z’Abanyarwanda.
Mu turere tumwe na tumwe tw’u Rwanda, nko muri teritwari ya Gisenyi, ubwo bujura bwafashe indi ntera kugera aho abaturage batatinyaga gutega ku nzira bagenzi babo bavuye kuri za misiyoni bakabagusha mu gico cyabo ,maze bakabambura ibiribwa bahawe.
Izo ngaruka za Ruzagayura, zateje umutekano muke mu gihugu, bizana urwikekwe n’umujinya mwinshi mu Banyarwanda.
Ahanini, uwo mujinya waturukaga ku bukarihe bw’inzara no ku buremere bw’umusanzu watangwaga n’Abanyarwanda.
Abaturage bagiye bagobokwa n'imfashanyo z'ibiribwa mu gihe cya Ruzagayura

Abakinnyi ba PSG bifatanyije n’u Rwanda mu Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Abakinnyi batandukanye bakinira Paris Saint- Germain yo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere mu Bufaransa barimo Kylian Mbappé, bifatanyije n’u Rwanda mu Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 7 Mata 2021, Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bari mu minsi 100 yo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yahitanye inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni mu mezi atatu gusa.
Ikipe ya Paris Saint-Germain ihagarariwe n’abakinnyi barindwi barimo Kylian Mbappé, yatanze ubutumwa bwo kwifatanya n’u Rwanda muri ibi bihe.
Ni ubutumwa bw’amashusho y’amasegonda 28, aho aba bakinnyi bose uko ari barindwi bagenda bakuranwa mu kuvuga amagambo yo kwifatanya n’u Rwanda mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Aba bakinnyi bagira bati “Twifatanyije n’abavandimwe na bashiki bacu b’Abanyarwanda mu kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Turunamira abatutsi barenga miliyoni imwe bishwe kandi turazirakana imbaraga n’umurava by’abarokotse.”
Bakomeza bagira bati “Nyuma y’imyaka 27, u Rwanda ni igihamya cy’uko ikiremwamuntu gifite imbaraga zo kwihangana no guhinduka kandi gishobora kuvuka bundi bushya nyuma y’ibyago bikomeye.”
Aba bakinnyi bavugira kandi hamwe ijambo “Kwibuka” mbere y’uko Kylian Mbappé asoza agira ati “Twibuke twiyubaka.”
Nous nous unissons à nos frères et sœurs rwandais pour commémorer le génocide de 1994 contre les Tutsi.
Remember.
Unite.
Renew.
#Kwibuka27 @visitrwanda_now pic.twitter.com/ii42NHBv8x — Paris Saint-Germain (@PSG_inside) April 7, 2021 Guhera mu Ukuboza 2019, u Rwanda rwagiranye ubufatanye na Paris Saint-Germain, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere y’imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona y’u Bufaransa, Ligue 1.

#19428#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Mu-Rwanda-hagiye-guhurizwa-impuguke-za-mbere-ku-Isi-mu-kuboneza-urubyaro
MINISANTE irateganyiriza abangavu uburyo bwihariye bwo guhabwa serivise zo kuboneza urubyaro Minisiteri y’ubuzima iteganya guha abangavu serivise zo kuboneza mu buryo bwihari aho batazahura n’ababyeyi bakuze kugirango baborohereze kugabanya kubyara abana batateguye.
Ibi byatangajwe na Dr Nyemazi Jean Pierre, umunyamabanga uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’ubuzima aho avuga ko akenshi abangavu bagira isono zo guhurira n’ababyeyi bakuze ahatangirwa serivise zo kuboneza urubyaro bigatuma batitabira kuzisaba ari na byo byongera umubare w’abangavu batwita inda batateganyije.
Kugeza ubu imyumvire y’ababyeyi mu Rwanda kuri gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro igenda izamuka.
Gusa ariko ikigiteye inkeke ni abangavu bo badasiba gutwara inda zitateganyijwe bigatuma imibare y’abana bavuka igera ku kigero kiri hejuru.
Bamwe muri aba bangavu hari abatinyuka gufata imiti iringaniza urubyaro ariko kandi hari n’ababitinya.
Kubwa Nyemazi ngo bakwiye gushakirwa uburyo bwo guhabwa izi serivise ukwabo.
Ati :”Inzego zo kwa mugaga, inzego zo ku midigudu nazo zakanguriwe kugira umwanya bashobora guhuriramo n’urubyiruko, twasabye ibigo nderabuzi ko bishakisha umunsi wabo nimugoroba nko kuwa gatandatu bakagira uburyo bashobora gukurura n’urubyiruko kuko nibahahurira n’umubyeyi cyangwa umuntu mukuru bagiye gusaba serivisi (yo kuboneza urubyaro) ashobora kugira ikibazo akaba yatinya kujyayo, ibigo nderabuzima dushaka ko bishyiraho umwanya wihariye w’urubyiruko.”
Dr Nyemazi aravuga ibi kandi mu gihe mu kwezi k’Ugushyingo guhera tariki ya 12-15 mu mwaka utaha wa 2018.
Iyi ni inama yigirwamo gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro, impuguke ziyihuriramo ziga ku ngamba zafatwa kugirango abatuye Isi bakomeza kwitabira gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro.
Yavuze ko Minisiteri y’ubuzima n’u Rwanda muri rusange bishimiye ko iyi nama igiye kubera mu Rwanda bagashimira kandi n’abagize uruhare kugirango iyi nama izabere mu Rwanda.
Ati: "Tuyitegerejeho ibintu byinshi nk’Abanyarwanda, uretse kuzakira abashitsi bazaba baje kwigira ku byo twakoze, dutekereza ko tuzigiramo byinshi kuko ni inama mpuzamahanga kandi ya mbere ku Isi izana abahanga muri izi gahunda zijyanye no kuboneza urubyaro."
Dr Nyemazi Jean Pierre, umunyamabanga uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’ubuzima Kuri uyu wa kane tariki ya 24/8/2017 nibwo hatangijwe kumugaragaro komite izategura iyi nama, ni komite igizwe n’inzego zitandukanye zikuriwe na Minisiteri y’ubuzima.
Ariko kandi hakabamo n’andi matsinda mato mato arimo n’imiryango mpuzamahanga.
Nyemazi yavuze ko iyi nama izahuza abantu 3,500 bose bazahurira mu Rwanda, u Rwanda ngo rwiteguye kuyakira neza kandi rwijeje Isi ko izagenda neza.
Inama nk’iyi iherutse kubera Nusa Dua mu gihugu cya Indonesia mu mwaka ushize wa 2016 naho muri 2013 yabereye Addis Ababa muri Ethiopie mu gihe 2011 yakiriwe na Senegal I Dakar.

OMS yemeje urukingo rwa mbere rwa Ebola Umuryango mpuzamahanga wita ku buzima (OMS) wemeje bwa mbere urukingo rw’icyorezo cya Ebola kimaze iminsi gica ibintu mu Burasirazuba bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Uru rukingo rwiswe Ervebo rwakozwe n’uruganda rw’imiti MERCK.
Rwari rumaze igihe rukoreshwa mu igeregeza muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Kuri ubu, OMS yatangaje ko hari ibimenyetso bihagije byerekana ko urwo rukingo rukora, nkuko BBC yabitangaje.
Ibyo bivuze ko nibura kuri ubu ku isi hari urukingo rwa mbere rwakwifashishwa hirindwa Ebola.
Ibimenyetso byafashwe mu gihe rumaze rukoreshwa, byemejwe ko ari umuti mwiza kandi ufite ubushobozi bwo guhashya Ebola.
Uru rukingo, biteganyijwe ko ruzatangira kujya ku isoko mu mezi yo hagati umwaka utaha.
Guhera muri Kanama umwaka ushize, Ebola imaze guhitana abasaga 2000 muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.

#19458#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/perezida-kagame-yavuze-ku-kuba-ikipe-ya-afurika-yatwara-igikombe-cy-isi-n
Perezida Kagame yavuze ku kuba ikipe ya Afurika yatwara Igikombe cy’Isi, n’Umunyarwanda akegukana Tour de France Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame asanga bigoye kuba ikipe ya Afurika yakwegukana Igikombe cy’Isi mu mupira w’amaguru bitewe n’uko akenshi amakipe yiyumva nk’adashoboye imbere y’ibihugu by’ibihangange ndetse rimwe bikajyana n’iterambere ry’ibihugu bigize uyu mugabane.
Nyuma yo kwitwara neza mu Gikombe cy’Isi kwa Tunisia mu 1978, Maroc mu 1986 na Cameroun mu Gikombe cy’Isi cyo mu 1990, Umunyabigwi w’Umunya-Brésil, Pelé, yavuze ko bitarenze mu 2000, ikipe ya Afurika izaba yaregukanye iri rushanwa riruta andi mu mupira w’amaguru.
Kuri ubu hashize imyaka 19 nyuma y’igihe cyari cyateganyijwe na Pelé, nta kipe ya Afurika irarenga ¼ mu Gikombe cy’Isi ndetse ayageze kure ni Sénégal, Cameroun na Ghana, yose yagarukiye muri iki cyiciro mu 2002, 1990 na 2010 nk’uko akurikiranye.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na The East African nk’umwe mu bayobozi bakunda kandi baharanira iterambere ry’imikino kuri uyu mugabane, Perezida Kagame yabajijwe niba abona hari ikipe ya Afurika ishobora kwegukana Igikombe cy’Isi.
Perezida Kagame yasubije ko amaze kureba ibikombe by’Isi byakinwe mu myaka 30 ishize, ariko asanga abagize amakipe ya Afurika hari ibyo yirengagiza byakabaye bishobora kuyafasha kwitwara neza muri iri rushanwa rihuza ibihugu biturutse ku migabane yose.
Ati’’ Ntabwo nabyemeza neza ibijyanye n’Igikombe cy’Isi kuko akenshi usanga hari aho bihurira n’iterambere ryacu.
Kuki dukize cyane kandi na none tukaba dukennye?
Yaba ari uko se tutazi icyo gukora?
Abenshi muri twe turabizi, ariko ntitubikora.
Narebye hafi Ibikombe by’Isi byakinwe mu myaka 30 ishize.’’
Perezida Kagame yakomeje avuga ko urebye imikinire y’amakipe ya Afurika, adakina nabi ugereranyije n’andi, ahubwo itandukaniro riba ko yo yumva ko hari amakipe adashobora gutsinda ndetse byongeye ugasanga abakinnyi basa n’abishimiye ko batsinzwe.
Ati’’ Ntabwo ari uko amakipe yacu akina nabi cyane.
Mu ntangiriro batsinda amakipe meza, ariko bakomeza, bakagera aho bemera ko batsindwa, rimwe bakishimira ko batsinzwe.
Bamwe muri bo bishimira ko batsinzwe n’ikipe y’u Bufaransa kuko ari uko byari byitezwe, umukino warangira, bakajya gusaba umukinnyi wabo umwambaro we.’’
"Gusa kugeza ubu, Abanyafurika ni abakinnyi beza b’umupira w’amaguru, ariko kugira ngo bitware neza bisaba ko barebera no ku bandi, bakareka kwirebaho ubwabo.’’
Mu gikombe cy’Isi giheruka kubera mu Burusiya, Afurika yari ihagarariwe na Misiri, Maroc, Nigeria, Sénégal, Tunisia na Misiri.
Kuva iri rushanwa rikomeye ritangiye gukinwa mu 1930, Afurika imaze guhagararirwa n’ibihugu 13 gusa muri 55 bigize Impuzamashyirahamwe yayo y’Umupira w’Amaguru (CAF).
Birashoboka ko Umunyarwanda yazegukana Tour du France mu gihe cya vuba U Rwanda na Erythrée ni ibihugu biri gutera imbere byihuse mu mukino w’amagare, aho kuri ubu bihanganye na Afurika y’Epfo imaze igihe kirekire iyoboye kuri uyu mugabane.
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe igihe abona Umunyarwanda cyangwa Umunya-Erythrée ashobora kuzegukanira isiganwa rikomeye mu magare rya Tour de France.
Perezida Kagame yasubije ko hari impano z’Abanyarwanda zigaragaza ndetse asanga mu gihe kitari kirekire, bishoboka ko hari umukinnyi wo muri ibi bihugu byombi ushobora kuzegukana iri siganwa.
Ati’’ Hari Abakinnyi benshi b’amagare bazamuka byihuse mu Rwanda kandi ni ko bimeze no muri Erythrée.
Icyo umuntu yashingiraho ni uko bazamuka bigirira icyizere.
Ku bw’ibyo, ndatekereza ari mu gihe cya vuba.’’

Mu Buholandi bibutse ku nshuro ya 20 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Abanyarwanda baba mu Buholandi bifatanyije n'Abaholandi kwibuka ku nshuro ya 20 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda muri Mata 1994.
Uwo muhango wabaye tariki 15/02/2014 waranzwe n'imurika n'ibiganiro ku mateka ya Jenoside.
Kuwa gatanu tariki 14 Gashyantare, mu murwa mukuru w'Ubuholandi La Haye, ni bwo bizihije igitambo cya Misa mu kiliziya yitwa Church of Our Saviour, yari iyobowe na padiri Sjaak de Boer yitabirwa n'Abanyarwanda benshi baba mu Buholandi, abayobozi batandukanye bo muri icyo gihugu, abahagarariye ibihugu byabo ndetse n'izindi nshuti z'u Rwanda.
Abitabiriye umuhango bakoze urugendo bajya gucana buji havugwa n'amajambo y'abantu batandukanye barimo ambasaderi Karabaranga Jean Pierre uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Buholandi, umuyobozi wa IBUKA Dr.
Dusingizemungu Jean Pierre, Mundele Christian uhagarariye IBUKA mu Buholandi na Jan Pronk wigeze kuba ministre w'Ubuholandi ushinzwe iterambere n'ubufatanye kuva mu 1989 kugeza mu 1998.
Mu ijambo rye, Ambasaderi Karabaranga yavuze ko kwibuka ku nshuro ya 20 ku Banyarwanda ari iby'agaciro kanini, kuko ari igihe cyo gusubiza amaso inyuma bakareba ibitaragenze neza mu mateka yabo byatumye habaho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ibi bizatuma Abanyarwanda babasha guhangana n'ingaruka za Jenoside kugira ngo babashe kubaka umuryango utajegajega ubereye Abanyarwanda bose, baba ab'iki gihe ndetse n'abazabakomokaho.
Gasana Marcellin

Yakubise umutwe kuri paraburise arakomereka cyane".

#19691#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/article/rwemalika-yanze-kuyobora-amatora-ya-komite-olempike-y-u-rwanda-ashyirwa-mbere-y
Rwemalika yanze kuyobora, amatora ya Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda ashyirwa mbere y’Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo Inama y’Inteko Rusange idasanzwe ya Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 17 Mata 2021, yemeje ubwegure bwa Amb.
Munyabagisha Valens wari umaze imyaka ine ayiyobora, yemeza kandi ko amatora ya Komite Nyobozi nshya azaba mbere y’Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020, tariki ya 8 Gicurasi.
Mu nama y’Inteko Rusange isanzwe yari yabaye ku wa 3 Mata, abanyamuryango ba Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda bari batoye k’ubwiganze ko amatora azaba nyuma y’Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 izaba mu mpeshyi, tariki ya 9 Ukwakira.
Nyuma y’uko Amb.
Munyabagisha Valens wari umaze imyaka ine ayiyobora yeguye ku wa 6 Mata 2021, Visi Perezida wa Mbere akaba n’Umunyamuryango wa Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga, Rwemalika Félicité, yatumije inama y’Inteko Rusange idasanzwe, yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu mu cyumba cy’inama cya Lemigo Hotel.
Ku murongo w’ibyigwa hari ukwiga ku bwegure bwa Amb.
Munyabagisha ndetse no kurebera hamwe icyakorwa kugira ngo hakomeze kuba imyiteguro y’Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo izaba hagati ya tariki ya 23 Nyakanga n’iya 5 Kanama 2021.
Minisiteri ya Siporo yavuzweho kudacana uwaka n’abayoboraga Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda, yari guhagararirwa n’Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri ya Siporo, Shema Maboko Didier, ariko ntiyigeze yitabira.
Abanyamuryango ba Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda bemeje ubwegure bwa Amb.
Munyabagisha Valens ndetse kuba byari bigenze gutyo, byari bisobanuye ko Visi Perezida wa mbere, Rwemarika Félicité, ari we muyobozi wayo by’agateganyo.
Rwemarika yahise afata umwanya asaba abanyamuryango ko bamugira inama kuko bitewe n’umwuka uri mu banyamuryango kuko basa n’abacitsemo ibice bitewe n’uko bamwe bifuzaga amatora mbere y’Imikino Olempike, abandi bayashaka nyuma yayo, abona byamugora kubayobora muri icyo gihe cyose ndetse yumva adatekanye.
Ibi byatumye abanyamuryango basubira mu cyemezo bari bafashe mu nama y’inteko rusange ishize ko amatora yazaba nyuma y’Imikino Olempike, bashingiye ku kuba Rwemarika atiteguye kuyobora bitewe n’umwuka urimo, bakareba niba bamufasha maze amatora agategurwa vuba bishoboka.
Batoreye ko icyemezo cy’uko amatora azaba nyuma y’imikino mpuzamahanga Olempike giteshejwe agaciro ahubwo azaba mbere ndetse mu kwezi gutaha kwa Gicurasi.
Kandidatire zizatangira gutangwa tariki ya 24 Mata kugeza ku wa 30 Mata 2021 ari nabwo hazahita hazasuzumwa kandidatire zatanzwe.
Kuva tariki ya 1 -7 Gicurasi, abo kandidatire zabo zizaba zemewe bazatangira kwiyamamaza ni mu gihe amatora azaba tariki ya 8 Gicurasi 2021.
Nyuma y’iyi nama, Rwemalika Félicité yabwiye abanyamakuru ko atari gufata ubuyobozi bwa Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda kuko abanyamuryango bamaze gucikamo ibice.
Ati “Ikindi navuga ko twageze ku ntego twifuzaga ni uko ubushize nabwo habaye Inteko Rusange [Isanzwe] ariko hari umwuka mubi cyane, abantu baratongana, abantu barebana nabi, abandi barigendera.
Wabonaga hari ishyamirana.
Narebye ndibaza nti ‘nzakorana na bo nte kandi bariciyemo ibice?
Ndavuga nti oya!’.”
Komite Nyobozi ya Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda mu myaka ine ishize, yari igizwe na Amb.
Munyabagisha Valens [weguye], Rwemalika Félicité [Visi Perezida wa Mbere akaba n’Umunyamuryango wa Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga], Bizimana Festus [Visi Perezida wa Kabiri], Sharangabo Alexis [Umunyamabanga] watowe asimbuye Bizimana Dominique weguye manda itararangira, Ingabire Alice [Umubitsi], E’gairma Hermine [Umujyanama], Nzabanturura Eugène [Umujyanama] na Ntagengwa Olivier uyobora Komisiyo y’abakinnyi.
Inama y'Inteko Rusange idasanzwe ya Komite Olempike y'u Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, yemeje ubwegure bwa Amb, Munyabagisha Valens wari umaze imyaka ine ayiyobora Umuyobozi wa RAF, Mubiligi Fidèle, ni umwe mu bayobozi b'amashyirahamwe y'imikino bitabiriye iyi Nteko Rusange idasanzwe Bagabo Placide uyobora Ishyirahamwe Nyarwanda ry'umukino wa Taekwondo, atanga igitekerezo cye ku bijyanye n'amatora Abanyamuryango batoye ko icyemezo cyari cyafashwe ku matora tariki ya 3 Mata 2021, giteshejwe agaciro Visi Perezida wa Mbere akaba n’Umunyamuryango wa Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga, Rwemalika Félicité, yavuze ko atayobora kugeza mu Ukwakira, asaba ko hakorwa amatora vuba bishoboka Abanyamuryango ba Komite Olempike y'u Rwanda bemeje ko amatora azaba muri Gicurasi 2021, mbere y'imikino Olempike izabera i Tokyo mu Buyapani Amafoto: Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda

Uru ni urufunguzo, twarubonye, twarufunguje, iyo utsinze hanze biba byaje, nibaza ko imikino iri imbere ku bushobozi bw’Imana tuzayitsinda."
