#19716#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Ibibi-byaranze-Afurika-Yunze-Ubumwe-mu-myaka-50-ishize-bigomba-gusimburwa-n-ibyiza-CLADHO
"Ibibi byaranze Afurika Yunze Ubumwe mu myaka 50 ishize, bigomba gusimburwa n'ibyiza"-CLADHO Mu gihe umuryango w'Afurika Yunze Ubumwe umaze imyaka igera kuri 50 ushinzwe, haragaragazwa ko muri iyi myaka yaranzwe n'ibintu bitari byiza byiganjemo intambara, ihirikwa ry'ubutegetsi mu bihugu bitandukanye, imiyoborere mibi ndetse na Jenoside yabaye mu Rwanda, bityo abayigize bakaba aribo ubwabo bagomba kwishakamo igisubizo mu rwego kurushaho kuyigira nziza.
Ni muri urwo rwego hafashwe ingamba ahihawe intego y'indi myaka 50 iri imbere (Agenda 2063), abantu bakubaka noneho Afurika Yunze Ubumwe izira intambara, imiyoborere mibi, ihirikwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ibindi bibi byose.
Impuzamiryango y'amashyirahamwe yita ku burenganzira bwa muntu mu Rwanda, CLADHO ugaragaza ko uburyo bwa mbere bwo kugira uruhare mu kugira Afurika nziza, ari ukubanza kuyiyumvamo, aho nyuma yo kuyiyumvamo bituma ubasha gupanga kutongera gutekereza kuzagira Afurika y'intambara, y'Imiyoborere mibi, y'ihirikwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ibindi.
Iyi akaba ariyo mpamvu CLADHO yatangije ubukangurambaga bwiswe "My African Union campain" hagamijwe gusobanurira Abanyarwanda akamaro k'uwo muryango, inshingano zabo muri wo ndetse n'amasezerano mpuzamahanga atandukanye u Rwanda rwagiye rushyiraho umukono.
Alexis Nkurunziza Umukozi wa CLADHO akaba n'Umuhuzabikorwa wa "My African Union Campaign", avuga ko u Rwanda rugenda rusinya amasezerano atandukanye, mu nzego zitandukanye, cyane cyane ku rwego rwa Afurika ariko ugasanga ntacyo abaturage bayaziho kandi ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryayo aribo rigiraho ingaruka zaba nziza cyangwa mbi.
Avuga ko nubwo u Rwanda ruhagaze neza mu gusinya aya masezerano mpuzamahanga, ndetse ngo ugereranyije n'ibindi bihugu, ndetse ugasanga ruza mu myanya ya mbere mu kwitabira gusinya aya masezerano,inzego zibishinzwe zisabwa gushyira imbaraga mu kumenyekanisha aya mesezerano mu banyarwanda.
Ubukangurambaga bwa CLADHO kuri "My African Union campain" bwatangijwe ku mugaragaro ku cyumweru tariki ya 08 Werurwe bukazamara ibyumweru 12 (Amezi 3) ahazakorwa ibikorwa bitandukanye bigamije gusobanurira abaturage ibijyanye n'uyu muryango w'Afurika Yunze Ubumwe.

#19717#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/amadini/article/nyarugenge-abayisilamukazi-biyemeje-kwishyurira-abagore-batishoboye-mituweli
Nyarugenge: Abayisilamukazi biyemeje kwishyurira abagore batishoboye mituweli Abayisilamukazi bibumbiye mu makoperative agera kuri 60 mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, batangiye ubukangurambaga bwo gukusanya inkunga y’amafaranga yo kwishyurira bagenzi babo batishoboye ubwisungane mu kwivuza.
Aba bayisilamukazi batangarije IGIHE ko batangije iki gikorwa ku wa 3 Kamena 2018, bagamije kuzamura umubare w’abafite mituweli kuko basanze hari bagenzi babo benshi batishoboye batabasha kwiyishyurira.
Umuyobozi w’abayisilamukazi muri Nyarugenge, Uwimbabazi Rehema, yagize ati “Mbere wasangaga twakira abantu batandukanye kandi benshi baheze ku Bitaro bya Muhima n’abaheze muri CHUK tukabateranyiriza amafaranga ku buryo wasangaga duhora mu cyuho cyo gutanga amafaranga menshi, bitewe n’imyumvire iba iri hasi.”
Yakomeje avuga ko bahisemo noneho gushakira abatishoboye imisanzu ya mituweli ku buryo batabura ubushobozi bwo kwivuza.
Yasobanuye ko ubukangurambaga ari ukwishyurira mituweli abagore bose, by’umwihariko b’abayisilamukazi bo muri Nyarugenge.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyarugenge, Nzaramba Kayisime, yemeza ko ubu bukangurambaga buzazamura umubare w’abaturage bafite ubushobozi bwo kwivuza mbere ya Nyakanga.
Ati “Icyo dukeneye ni ukugira ngo umuturage w’Akarere ka Nyarugenge yumve ko kwishyura mituweli mbere bimufasha kugira ngo atangire ukwezi kwa karindwi afite ubwisungane mu kwivuza kuko bisaba ukwezi kugira ngo byibuze ya karita ye ibashe kugira agaciro.”
Yongeyeho ko aba bayisilamukazi batangije ubu bukangurambaga mu gihe cyiza kuko bizatuma n’abandi banyarwanda bose baboneraho, bityo bifashe uturere twose kuzamurire rimwe umubare w’abishyuye.
Muri ububukangurambaga abayisilamukazi bakusanyije asaga 1,600,000 Frw ariko igikorwa kirakomeje ngo bayongere.
Abayisilamukazi mu gutangiza ubukangurambaga bwo kwishyurira bagenzi babo batishoboye mituweli Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyarugenge, Nzaramba Kayisime Umuyobozi w’abayisilamukazi muri Nyarugenge, Uwimbabazi Rehema

#19722#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/izi-ntebe-zikorerwa-mu-rwanda-kandi-zishobora-kumara-imyaka-150
Izi ntebe zikorerwa mu Rwanda kandi zishobora kumara ’imyaka 150’ Abanyeshuri batatu biga muri Musanze Polytechnic bakora intebe zo munzu no mu busitani bakoresheje isima n’ibyuma, zishobora kugeza ku myaka 150 zitarasaza.
Izi ntebe uzirebye ntiwapfa kwemera ko zikozwe muri Sima Aba banyehuri babikora bagamije kurengera ibidukikije cyane cyane ibiti bikoreshwa mu bubaji, bavuga ko bishobora gukendera.
Ndahimana Tharicisse, Nshimiyimana Eric na Simba Aime Jules n’abanyeshuri bahuriye muri Musanze Polytechnique biga mu ishami ry’ubwubatsi.
Bishyize hamwe bakora umushinga wo gukora intebe zicarwaho mu ngo bakoresheje isima ndetse n’ibyuma.
Simba yagize ati “Igitekerezo twakigize nyuma yo kubona ko ibiti bikoreshwa mububaji birimo gukendera, intego akaba ari ukugabanya ikoreshwa ry’ibiti ku kigero cya 0,7% buri mwaka.”
Abo ni bo banyeshuri batatu bagize igitekerezo cyo gukora izi ntebe Mu kwezi kwa Nyakanga umwaka ushize aba basore batsindiye igihembo cyitwa African Entrepreurship Academy.
Cyabahesheje uburenganzira byo kujya kwerekana ibikorwa byabo mu mijyi y’i Burayi no muri Aziya.
Izi ntebe zifite ubushobozi bwo kumara imyaka 150 cyangwa inarenga zitarasaza, aho intebe zo mubusitani zigura amafaranga ibihumbi 600 naho izo munzu zikagura ibihumbi 800, nk’uko Twahirwa abisobanura.
Ati “Twaragabanyije kuko twatangiye tuzigurisha miliyoni, kandi Abanyarwanda barimo kugenda bitabira ibikorwa byacu.
Ikindi kandi nubwo zikoze mu isima n’ibyuma ntabwo ziremereye.”
Twahirwa avuga ko mu bushakashatsi bakoze ngo basanze ibikoresho bimeze nk’ibyabo byarubatswe mu mwaka w’i 1902 muri Leta z’unze ubumwe z’Amerika muri leta ya Ohio, ariko kugeza n’ubu bikaba bikiriho.
Ati “Ubu biradutunze n’imiryango yacu, sitwe gusa kuko dukoresha abakozi 14, ariko intego akaba ari uko mu mwaka itanu bazaba bikubye gatanu.”
Ibi bikorwa aba banyeshuri bakora babifashwamo n’abarimu babigisha, umwe mubabafashije akaba yitwa Bunani Hermas.
Avuga ko bigisha umwana nawe agatinyuka agakora ubushakashatsi ntiyumve ko ibyo mwarimu yamuhaye bihagije, akaba ariyo mpamvu bavumbura ibikorwa nk’ibi.
Ati “Kuba abanyeshuri bakora imishinga nk’iyi n’ikimenyetso cy’ihame ryerekana ko ireme ry’uburezi mu Rwanda rigenda rigerwaho, kandi ibi bigatanga ikizere cy’ejo hazaza h’igihugu.”
Bemeza ko zishobora kumara imyaka 150 zitarasaza Umuyobozi wa Musanze Polytechnic, Abayisenga Emile avuga ko abanyeshuri bafite imishinga nk’iyi batabatererana ahubwo babafasha kubona ibyangombwa by’ubuziranenge no kumenyekana.
Ati “Dufite abanyeshuri benshi bafite imishinga ariko niyo barangije amashuri dukomeza kubakurikirana ndetse bagakomeza gukorera muri iki kigo tutabishyuza nubwo baba bakorera amafaranga, ibi biha ingufu n’abagenzi babo bakiri ku ntebe y’ishuri bigatuma bakora cyane kuko baba babona aho ababanjirije bamaze kugera.”
Uretse abo banyeshuri bakora intebe, muri Musanze Polytechnique harimo abanyeshuri bafite imishinga isubiza bimwe mu bibazo igihugu gifite, inatanga imirimo ku rubyiruko bagenzi babo.

Urubyiruko rwo mu itorero New Life Bible Church rwateguye iserukiramuco ry'ivugabutumwa Yanditswe kuya 18-07-2014 saa 10:01' na Kanyamibwa Patrick Hagiye kuba iserukiramuco ngarukamwaka rihuza urubyiruko ruvuye mihanda yose rukazaba ruhugurwa ku buryo rwagendana n'Imana runaba intangarugero hashingiwe ku gushaka uburyo imyitwarire iruranga yarushaho kuba myiza.
Iri serukiramuco risa n'igiterane rikaba ritegurwa n'urubyiruko rwo mu itorero New Life Bible Church ribarizwa Kicukiro mu Kagarama.
Nk'uko twabitangarijwe na Rogers Rukundo Pasiteri ushinzwe urubyiruko muri New Life Bible Church ngo batekereje kuri iki giterane mu rwego rwo (...)
Hagiye kuba iserukiramuco ngarukamwaka rihuza urubyiruko ruvuye mihanda yose rukazaba ruhugurwa ku buryo rwagendana n'Imana runaba intangarugero hashingiwe ku gushaka uburyo imyitwarire iruranga yarushaho kuba myiza.
Iri serukiramuco risa n'igiterane rikaba ritegurwa n'urubyiruko rwo mu itorero New Life Bible Church ribarizwa Kicukiro mu Kagarama.
Nk'uko twabitangarijwe na Rogers Rukundo Pasiteri ushinzwe urubyiruko muri New Life Bible Church ngo batekereje kuri iki giterane mu rwego rwo kubaka ibyo urubyiruko rwasenye ubwo rwakoreshwaga mu bibi.
Yagize ati, "Urubyiruko rwagize imbaraga mu gusenya igihugu kandi nirwo rushukika vuba, muri make ni rwo rukoreshwa ibintu byihuse byaba ibyiza cyangwa se ibibi.
Itorero rikwiriye kwita ku rubyiruko kugira ngo rwubake" Muri iki giterane ngarukamwaka cyiswe "Now is The Time" bishatse kuvuga ko iki ari cyo gihe, (Yoweli 2:28-29) ngo hazabaho kandi guhuza ubuzima bwa buri munsi n'ubuzima bw'umwuka kugirango bagire inzozi zishingiye ku kuyoborwa n'Imana.
Iki giterane kizitabirwa n'abakozi b'Imana bazanatanga inyigisho zitandukanye zigendanye n'uko urubyiruko rwakwifata muri iki gihe harimo Rev Past.
Charles Mugisha, Apostle Paul Gitwaza ndetse n'abahanzi nka Lub Buntu, Serge Iyamuremye, Pastor G, Rene Patrick, itsinda Shining Stars ndetse na New Life Bible Church Worshipteam.
Iki giterane kizamara iminsi ibiri kizajya kibera kuri Kigali Dream Center Kicukiro kikazaba kuwa 01 no kuwa 02 Kanama 2014 guhera saa munani kugeza saa moya z'ijoro.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#19786#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/abandi-babaruramari-29-bahawe-impamyabumenyi-zo-ku-rwego-mpuzamahanga
Abandi babaruramari 29 bahawe impamyabumenyi zo ku rwego mpuzamahanga Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere umwuga w'ababaruramari mu Rwanda (ICPAR), cyahaye impamyabumenyi (ACCA, CPA & ATC) ababaruramari 29 bakora mu bigo bya Leta n'ibyigenga babihuguriwe, mu rwego rwo guharanira ko mu Rwanda haboneka ababaruramari bari ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Itangazo ryavuye mu kigo ICPAR rivuga ko bitewe n'amasomo ajyanye n'ibaruramari yatanzwe ku bakozi b'ibigo bitandukanye, hari ibigo bimaze kugaragaza imicungire inoze y'imari.
Abahawe impamyabumenyi.
Ibigo bitandatu bimaze gushimirwa ko byabashije gutanga raporo y'icungamari (financial reports), mu irushanwa rya Fire Award ryabereye i Nairobi mu kwezi kwa 10 k'umwaka ushize wa 2012.
Ibyo bigo ni Minisiteri y'ubucuruzi n'inganda, Miniseti y'ububanyi n'amahanga, banki ya Kigali, Access bank, Unguka bank na Fina bank.
Umuhango wo gutanga izo mpamyabumenyi ndetse n'ibihembo wahuriranye no kumurika ku mugaragaro ibirango by'ikigo ICPAR tariki 21/12/2012.
Umugenzuzi mukuru w'imari ya Leta (iburyo) amurikirwa ibirango by'ikigo ICPAR.
ICPAR ni ikigo cyashyizweho na Leta, kigamije kunoza umwuga w'ibaruramari no gufasha abanyamuryango bacyo bakora mu nzego za Leta n'iz'abikorera, kugira ubumenyi bwabafasha kugenzura imikoreshereze y'imari mu Rwanda.
Ikigo iCPAR kimaze kwemerwa n'urugaga rw'ababaruramari ku isi yose, nyuma y'igenzura ry'imikorere n'imigenzereze y'icyo kigo, ryakozwe n'urwo rugaga rwitwa IFAC (International Federation of Accountants).
Simon Kamuzinzi

#19791#	4	health	https://igihe.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/rulindo-umuryango-the-fred-hollows-foundation-wavuye-indwara-y-ishaza-abarwayi
Rulindo: Umuryango ‘The Fred Hollows Foundation’ wavuye indwara y’ishaza abarwayi 37 Umuryango Mpuzamahanga udaharanira inyungu, The Fred Hollows Foundation, watanze ubuvuzi bw’indwara y’ishaza ku bantu 37 baturuka mu bice byegereye ibitaro bya Kinihira mu Karere ka Rulindo.
Umuryango The Fred Hollows Foundation, ufite inkomoko muri Australia ukorera mu bihugu 25 ku Isi birimo n’u Rwanda.
Washyize imbaraga mu bikorwa bijyanye n’ubuvuzi bw’amaso no gutanga ubufasha bujyanye no gukumira ubuhumyi n’izindi ndwara bifitanye isano.
Mu mpera z’Icyumweru gishize, uyu muryango wavuye abantu 37 bari barwaye indwara y’ishaza, imwe mu zifata amaso.
Iyabuze Telesphore, ni umusaza w’imyaka 61 wo mu Kagari ka Cyohoha, Umurenge wa Base mu karere ka Rulindo, wishimiye cyane ubuvuzi yahawe.
Ubwo twamusangaga ku bitaro bya Kinihira amaze guhabwa umuti, yatangaje ko yari amaze umwaka afite ubumuga bwo kutabona ku buryo no kujya mu bwiherero bamujyanaga bamufashe amaboko.
Ati “Twaraje barambaga ijisho rimwe barampfuka bampfukuye neza mpita ndeba, mbona ndebye n’i Kigali”.
“Nza naje bankuruye kujya ku musarane bakanjyana.
None rero ndashima leta y’ubumwe yazanye aba baganga b’inzobere, nari naraheze mu rugo, nari ngiye gupfa ntarebye none n’ubwo rwanyica ariko rwose ndebye i musozi.”
Ubuhamya bw’uyu musaza ntibutandukanye n’ubwa bagenzi be bahawe ubuvuzi n’’Umuryango The Fred Hollows Foundation.
Umuganga w’amaso ku bitaro bya Kinihira, Nizeyimana Fabrice, yabwiye IGIHE ko ishaza ari indwara ikunda guhumisha abantu ariko ishobora kuvurwa igakira.
Yagize ati “Ubundi indwara y’ishaza iravurwa igakira nka hano ubu twarabasuzumye abo twasanze bayifite tubaha gahunda yo kuza hano baje tuboza mu jisho hanyuma dukuramo akarahure karwaye tugashyiramo akandi karahure gakorwa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuganga kandi kabafasha kongera kureba neza.”
Umukozi wa The Fred Hollows Foundation ushinzwe gukirikirana ibikorwa mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, Kanture Damien, yavuze ko muri ibi bitaro hari hiyandikishije abarwayi b’indwara y’ishaza 50 ariko abageze ku bitaro bahawe ubuvuzi ari 37.
Akomeza avuga ko muri aba bavuwe harimo abari bafite ijisho rimwe rirwaye n’abafite amaso abiri yose yafashwe n’iyi ndwara.
Imibare y’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS), igaragaza ko mu barenga miliyoni 253 bafite ibibazo byo kutabona neza ku Isi, miliyoni 36, bafite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Mu bafite ubumuga bwo kutabona ku Isi, 81% bari hejuru y’imyaka 50 kandi benshi muri bo babuterwa n’indwara karande zifata amaso mu gihe 80% byabwo bishobora kwirindwa no kuvurwa.
OMS ivuga ko hatagize igikorwa muri 2050, abafite ikibazo cy’ubuhumyi bashobora kuzaba bikubye inshuro eshatu.
Umuyobozi wa The Fred Hollows Foundation mu Rwanda no mu Burundi, Nzeyimana Pierre yabwiye IGIHE ko intego bafite ari uko abanyarwanda bagira ikibazo cy’ubuhumyi bagabanuka.
Aha bari kumwambika amadarubindi yabugenewe nyuma baraza kureba aho ashobora kureba Bamwambika ibyuma byabugenewe bigafunga ijisho rimwe rizima hanyuma bakareba niba iryavuwe rishobora kureba neza Iyabuze Telesphore yaje bamurandase none ari kureba n'i Kigali Umuturage amara kuvurwa hakarebwa niba ijisho ryavuwe ririmo kureba Uwavuwe bamwereka izi nyuguti bahereye ku nini bakagenda bamanuka kugeza aho avuga ko atari kuzibona hanyuma bakemeza ikigero ariho Umuganga w’amaso ku bitaro bya Kinihira, Nizeyimana Fabrice, avuga ko abaturage bavurwa amaso bagakira neza Umukozi wa The Fred Hollows Foundation ushinzwe gukirikirana ibikorwa mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, Kanture Damien

#19807#	6	religion	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Iyobokamana/article/Ibintu-7-bitangaje-Apotre-Paul-Gitwaza-yavuze-bigatera-impaka-ndende
Ibintu 7 bitangaje Apotre Paul Gitwaza yavuze bigatera impaka ndende Abavugabutumwa, ni bamwe mu bantu bakunda kugeza ku bo babwiriza amwe mu magambo atangaje, asetsa bamwe ariko ntanavugweho rumwe n’imbaga nyamwinshi.
Mu bavugabutumwa bo mu Rwanda, Apotre Paul Gitwaza ni umwe mu bagiye bavuga ibintu byinshi bigateza impaka, ibyo tukaba ari nabyo tugarukaho muri iyi nkuru.
Hari byinshi Gitwaza yagiye agarukwaho, ariko kuko tutabikubira byose mu nkuru imwe, birindwi muri byo nibyo tugarukaho by’umwihariko muri iyi nkuru.
1.
Apotre Gitwaza yavuze ko yasengeye umuntu wari wapfuye akazuka Ubwo yari mu kiganiro Amabanga y’Isi muri Nyakanga 2016, Umuvugabutumwa Apotre Gitwaza yahakanye yivuye inyuma ibyo kuba akorana na shitani byari bimaze igihe bimuvugwaho, ndetse avuga ko yatangiye kubivugwaho agitangira insengero za Zion Temple mu Rwanda, nyamara akaba akorera Imana kuburyo hari n’umuntu yasengeye yapfuye akazuka.
Gitwaza ati: "Njye mu 1991, nasengeye umuntu wapfuye arazuka, n’ubu ari muri Canada.
Musengera icyo gihe hari muri Congo, i Kisangani.
Ubu ni muzima aba muri Canada.
Nari umuvugabutumwa, nakoreye Imana cyane ariko nta munsi n’umwe numvise muri Congo bavuga ngo nkorana n’imbaraga za shitani, nasanze ibya shitani hano."
2.
Apotre Gitwaza yahanuye ko umwana we azaba Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Intumwa y’Imana Dr Paul Gitwaza Muhirwa uyobora itorero Zion Temple ku isi, akaba anafite impano y’ubuhanzi n’ubuhanuzi, ahamya ko Imana yamuhishuriye byinshi bizaba ku bana be batatu barimo uwitwa Dawidi (David) ari nawe muto muri bo, uyu ngo akaba azaba Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ibi Dr Apotre Paul Gitwaza, avuga ko amaze imyaka myinshi abibwiwe n’Imana, kandi akaba atarapfuye kubyara gusa ahubwo ngo Imana yabanje kuvugana na we.
Uretse uyu uzaba Perezida, abandi bana be babiri yeretswe n’Imana ko umwe azaba umuhanuzi undi akaba umuganga.
3.
Gitwaza yasobanuye uko umugore wamusabye ko basambana yari agiye kumwanduza SIDA Imbere y’imbaga y’abantu benshi biganjemo urubyiruko bari bateraniye mu rusengero rwa Zion Temple mu Gatenga mu mujyi wa Kigali, Intumwa y’Imana Paul Gitwaza yatangaje ko ikigeragezo gikomeye yahuye nacyo mu buzima, ari umugore washatse ko basambana ariko akaza kubasha kubikira, nyuma akaza kumenya ko uwo mugore yashoboraga no kumwanduza SIDA kuko yamenye amakuru ko uwo mugore yari yarapfakajwe n’icyo cyorezo.
Ibi Gitwaza yabitangaje tariki 2 Gicurasi 2015 ubwo habaga igitaramo cyari cyiswe "Pambazuka" , akaba yaravuze ko mu gihe cy’ubusore bwe yari yagiye mu masengesho hanyuma umugore umwe akaza kumushuka akamujyana mu cyumba cye, Gitwaza nawe akinjiramo yumva nta kibazo ariko yahagera agasanga umugore yikuyemo imyenda yose yambaye ubusa ndetse akamubwira ko yifuza kuryamana na we, icyo gihe Paul Gitwaza akaba atari kubona uko amucika kuko umugore yari yakinze ahantu hose.
Gitwaza yakomeje avuga ko yabwiye uwo mugore ko babanza bagasenga bakabona kubikora undi aranga, amusaba ko yabanza akaba akenyeye igitenge kuko yari yambaye ubusa buri buri, ni uko uyu muvugabutumwa ahita asenga ndetse anavuga indimi maze wa mugore aza kugwa hasi kubera ayo masengesho, aza kuzanzamuka abaza Gitwaza icyabaye n’ibyo barimo, nyuma arambara barasenga barasohoka.
Nyuma y’igihe Gitwaza arokotse icyo kigeragezo, ngo yaje kongera guhura na wa mugore maze umugore ahita amusaba imbabazi ari nabwo Gitwaza yamenye ko uwo mugore yari yarapfakajwe na SIDA yari yarishe umugabo we, ndetse n’umwana yari yarabyaranye n’uwo mugabo akaba yari yarishwe na SIDA.
4.
Ari muri Israel, Gitwaza yavuze ko yikoreye ku mutwe ibibazo by’u Rwanda akabyereka Imana Intumwa Paul Gitwaza, mu rugendo yagiyemo mu gihugu cya Israel hamwe n’itsinda ry’abantu basaga 140 muri Nzeri 2015, yagaragaje ko yikoreye ku mutwe we ibyifuzo by’abari kumwe nawe ndetse azirikana n’igihugu cye cy’u Rwanda yikorera ibyifuzo byacyo abyereka Imana.
Nk’uko Apotre Paul Gitwaza icyo gihe yabitangaje abinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, yavuze ko yikoreye u Rwanda (yikoreye ibendera ry’igihugu) n’ibyifuzo byo gusengerwa (Prayer requests) abijyana Iburengerazuba ahari urukuta rw’ihema rya Salomo abyereka Imana kuko handitswe ko izajya yumva amasengesho y’abanyamahanga bazayitakira bari kuri urwo rukuta nk’uko byanditswe mu 2 Ngoma 6: 32-33.
Aha muri uyu murongo wa Bibiliya haravuga ngo: "Kandi iby’umunyamahanga utari uwo mu bwoko bwawe bwa Isirayeli, naza aturutse mu gihugu cya kure azanywe n’izina ryawe rikuru, n’amaboko yawe akomeye n’ukuboko kwawe kwagirije, nibaza basenga berekeye iyi nzu, ujye wumva uri mu ijuru ariryo buturo bwawe, umarire uwo munyamahanga ibyo agutakambira byose, bitume amoko yose yo mu isi amenya izina ryawe, akubahe nk’uko ubwoko bwa Isirayeli bukubaha, kandi bamenye yuko iyi nzu nubatse yitwa iy’izina ryawe."
5.
Apotre Gitwaza yahamije ko mu gihe cya vuba u Burundi buzaba bumeze nka Dubai Mu ntangiro z’uyu mwaka, ubwo Gitwaza yari arimo kubwiriza, yatangaje ibyo yise ubuhanuzi ku gihugu cy’u Burundi bushimangira ko iki gihugu cyo mu majyepfo y’u Rwanda mu minsi ya vuba kizaba kimeze nka Dubai yo muri Afurika, ibintu bitavuzweho rumwe.
Gitwaza ati: "Ndabona u Burundi bugiye kuba Dubai yo muri Afurika, uko Dubai imeze niko u Burundi buzamera mu myaka iri imbere.
Niba ufite itongo mu Burundi rikomeze nturirekure.
Ibyo mbabwiye ni ukuri."
6.
Apotre Gitwaza yahamije ko ari we muhanuzi wa mbere mu Rwanda no muri Afurika Ibyo Gitwaza akunda kuvuga bidasanzwe, akenshi avuga ko ari ubuhanuzi ndetse n’iyerekwa aba yagize.
Mu ntangiriro z’ukwezi kwa Nzeri 2018, uyu muvugabutumwa yagarutsweho cyane ubwo yatangazaga ko ari we muhanuzi wa mbere mu Rwanda no muri Afurika yose, ndetse ko utabyemera uko afite ikibazo.
Gitwaza ati: “Sinzi ko muri iki gihugu hari umuhanuzi unduta.
Ibi mbabwira si ukwirata kandi Imana ibimbabarire niba hari akantu ko kwirata kambamo.
Sinzi niba muri iki gihugu, muri Afurika mufite umuhanuzi umeze nkanjye.
Birashoboka ko azaza, ariko muri iki gihe ndiho, ntimuzamubona.
Muzamushakishe mumumbwire.”
Yavuze ko hari bamwe mu bateranira mu rusengero rwe bayobye bakaba bemera abandi bahanuzi, ababwira ko bazamenya ugukomera kwe ari uko batakimubona.
Ati “[…] Mwemera ibya bande?
Mwemera ibyabo?
Ntabwo ari mwese, gusa abafite abandi bemera mufite ikibazo!
Ndababwiza ukuri muzabimenya naragiye.”
7.
Kubakwa k’u Rwanda ngo uruhare runini ni urwa Gitwaza Ubwo yabwirizaga mu ntangiriro za Nzeri 2018, Intumwa y’Imana Dr Paul Gitwaza yavuze ko ubuhanuzi bwe bwagize uruhare runini mu kubaka u Rwanda, ndetse ashimangira ko uruhare runini mu kwiyubaka kw’iki gihugu ari urwe.
Gitwaza ati: "Kubakwa kw’iki gihugu mbifitemo uruhare.
Murabyumva?
Kubakwa kw’iki gihugu mbifitemo uruhare, kandi runini cyane.
Nahanuye nka Ezekiyeri kugirango amagufwa yongere abeho.
Kandi intambara naciyemo ntawundi mukozi w’Imana uzazicamo nta n’undi waziciyemo, nta n’umwe uzabaho muri iki gihugu."
Mu gushimangira ibi, Gitwaza yavuze ko abo mu itorero rye batamuhemba cyane ndetse ko aho akunze kuba muri Amerika yigisha isaha imwe bakamuha amafaranga angana n’umushahara w’amezi abiri bamuha mu itorero.
Gusa ngo aritanga kuko afite ubuhanuzi bukomeye ku Rwanda.
Gitwaza ati: "Ntabwo mumpemba cyane, ariko aho mba [muri Amerika], nigisha isaha imwe bakampa amafaranga mpembwa nk’amezi abiri hano, kandi mfite ibyangombwa byaho si ibyo nsaba, ariko mfite misiyo kuri iki gihugu Imana yampamagariye.
Tujye twiga guha agaciro abantu Imana yaduhaye"

#19811#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/nyarubuye-batashye-umuyoboro-w-amazi-wuzuye-utwaye-miliyoni-481
Nyarubuye: Batashye umuyoboro w'amazi wuzuye utwaye miliyoni 481 Mu kagari ka Nyarutunga, Umurenge wa Nyarubuye mu karere ka Kirehe hatashywe umuyoboro w'amazi uri ku birometero icumi ukaba waruzuye utwaye amafaranga miliyoni 481 kandi abaturage bishimira ko babonye amazi meza nyuma y'igihe kinini ntayo bafite.
Ubwo uwo muyoboro watahagwa ku mugaragro tariki 11/02/2013, umuturage witwa Gakara Pascal yavuze ko kuba amazi yaraje hafi bibafitiye akamaro kuko bajyaga kuvoma kure bikababuza gukora akazi.
Abaturage batuye mu kagari ka Nyarutunga bavomaga mu kabande, ushaka ko bayamuzanira agatanga amafaranga 100 ku ijerekani; ariko nyuma yo kwegerezwa amazi ubu ijerekani bari kuyigura amafaranga 40.
Kankwanzi Clémence asanga amafaranga 40 ku ijerekani y'amazi ari menshi akaba yizeye ko icyo giciro kizamanuka.
Abaturage bishimiye ko babonye amazi hafi.
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Kirehe, Murayire Protais, avuga ko kuba abaturage bagurisha amazi ku mafaranga 40 biterwa na mazutu moteur ikoresha kugira ngo amazi abagereho hamwe no huhemba abacunga aya mazi n'ibikoresho bishobora kwangirika.
Akomeza avuga ko kuba abaturage aribo bicungira amazi bazanareba niba bahendwa bakaba bamanura igiciro cy'amazi akaba avuga ko kuba barabonye amazi aribyo byari bikenewe ubundi bakareba n'uburyo batajya bayavoma abahenze.
Amafaranga miliyoni 481 yagiye kuri uwo muyoboro yavuye mu kigega cya Leta gishinzwe gutera inkunga uturere, aho bateganya guha amazi umurenge wose wa Nyarubuye.
Abayobozi bareba ko amazi yakozwe neza.
Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe gahunda yo kurengera abatishoboye muri icyo kigega, Gatsinzi Justin, avuga ko bateza imbere ibikorwa abaturage bihitiyemo kandi ngo asanga umuyoboro watashywe warakozwe neza.
Uyu muyoboro w'amazi wa kilometero icumi watanshwe mu gihe mu karere ka Kirehe kimwe no mu Rwanda hose bari mu kwezi kwahariwe imiyoborere myiza aho biri gukorwa bakangurira abaturage kurwanya indwara ya malariya barara mu nzitiramibu.
Grégoire Kagenzi

#19836#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/amazina/article/mucyezamfura-izina-ry-umuntu-uhatswe-neza
Mucyezamfura, izina ry'umuntu uhatswe neza Mucyezamfura ni izina ry'abagabo rihabwa ukorera umuntu w'inyangamugayo.
Rikomoka ku nshinga ‘gucyeza' ndetse n'izina ‘imfura'.
Ibisobanuro byimbitse Gucyeza ni ugushaka ubuhake ku muntu ufite icyo akurushije cyaba icyubahiro cyangwa ubutunzi.
Imfura ni umuntu w'indakemwa mu migirire cyangwa mu myifatire ukunda gusabana n'abandi no kuborohera akabagirira neza.
Umwanzuro Mucyezamfura bisobanuye utegekwa cyangwa ukoreshwa n'umuntu w'inyangamugayo.

#19846#	5	politics	https://umubavu.com/politike/article/Abaturage-nibo-bazagira-uruhare-mu-gushyiraho-amategeko-Dr-Frank-HABINEZA
Abaturage nibo bazagira uruhare mu gushyiraho amategeko "Dr Frank HABINEZA" Umuyobozi w’ishyaka Green Party of Rwanda Dr Franka Habineza yemeza ko mu gihe ishyakarye ryabona amajwi aryemerera kwicara mu inteko ishinga amategeko yifuza ko abaturage aribo bazajya bagira uruhare runini mu ishyirwaho ry’amategeko kuko yasanze hari amategeko yagiyeho ariko atarishimiwe n’abaturage.
Mu kiganiro kigufi Dr Furank yagiranye na Umubavu.com yavuze ko hari ingingo ebyiri bibandaho biyamamaza , ingingo yambere nuko bifuza ko mu gihe baba bicaye mu inteko bazamura ijwi ryabo basaba ko mbere yuko itegeko ritorwa n’umutwe w’abadepite bazajya baha uruhare umuturage mu gushyiraho iryo tegeko, yagize ati" mbere yuko hatorwa itegeko runka abadepite nk’intumwa yarubanda bagomba ku manuka mu baturage bakababwira ku itegeko bateganya gutora noneho bakabiganiraho bakumva ibyifuzo byabo kugirango itegeko rizatorwe ritabangamiye umuturage, aha Dr Frank yatanze urugero rwuko nkitegeko ryatowe ryo guhuza ubutaka abaturage batigeze baryishimira kuko ritigeze riganirwaho ngo bumve ibitekerezo by’abaturage".
Yakomeje avuga ko iyo uri intumwa ugomba gutwara ubutumwa ku wagutumye noneho ukumvanawe icyo abivugaho kuko kujya mu inteko ntabwo ari ukwicara gusa ngo udamarare ahubwo nukumenya ko ufite inshingano zo gusohoza ubutumwa ku wa gutumye.
Indi ngingo Dr Frank yagarutseho nuko bazashyiraho urubuga ruhurirwaho n’abantu benshi bakazajya barutangiraho ibitekerezo n’ibyifuzo ku bijyanye n’amategeko aha yagize ati" Twifuza ko hazajyaho urubuga rufasha abantu gutanga ibitekerezo byabo noneho tukareba ibyo bitekerezo byatanzwe bikadufasha gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo abaturage bazaba bahisemo".
Dr Frank yakomeje agira ati “Turashaka guteza imbere ubuhinzi, aho buri wese azajya ahinga akeza, buri muryango ukagira umutekano w’ibiryo.
Turashaka ko umusoro w’ubutaka wazavaho, ku buryo n’abari i Kigali bazabugiraho uburenganzira, buri wese akagira uruhare kuri gakondo ye.”
Ku munsi wejo ubwo yatangiraga ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza Dr Frank yijeje abaturage bo muri Nyamabuye mu karere ka Muhanga ko mu gihe baramutse batoye Green Party ibibazo byo kubura amazi meza bizaba amateka muri uyu murenge.
Uyumunsi ishyaka Green Part of Rwanda ryagiye kwiyamamariza mu karere ka Kirehe mu murenge wa Kigina muri Santre ya Nyakarambi, tubibutse ko Ishyaka Riharanira Demukarasi no kurengera Ibidukikije mu Rwanda rifite abakandida 32 ririmo kwamamaza, abagabo 18 n’abagore 14.

Karangwa John; Umunyamabanga Mukuru, Pasiteri Gatemberezi Muzungu Paul; Ushinzwe Ubutegetsi n’Imari, Umuhoza Aurélie n'Umujyanama mu by’Imari n’Ubukungu, Pasiteri Ntaganda Jean Paul Amaraso mashya muri ADEPR Kuva ku wa 8 Ukwakira 2020, ADEPR iri mu nzibacyuho y’amezi 12 iyobowe na Pasiteri Ndayizeye Isaïe; yungirijwe na Pasiteri Rutagarama Eugène; Umuyobozi Nshingwabikorwa, Pasiteri Budigiri Herman; Umuyobozi ushinzwe Umutungo, Imari n’Imishinga, Umuhoza Aurélie n’Umuyobozi ushinzwe Abakozi n’Ubutegetsi, Gatesi Vestine.

Uhereye iburyo: Pasiteri Ndayizeye Isaïe wagizwe Umuyobozi wa Komite y’Inzibacyuho; Pasiteri Rutagarama Eugène umwungirije; Umuyobozi Nshingwabikorwa, Pasiteri Budigiri Herman;Umuyobozi ushinzwe Umutungo, Imari n’Imishinga, Umuhoza Aurélie n'Ushinzwe Abakozi n’Ubutegetsi, Gatesi Vestine Ingeso Komite y’Inzibacyuho ikwiye gufata nk’umuriro wo kotera kure Ibintu byo kwitwararika kuri Komite y’Inzibacyuho bikubiye mu ngingo zirimo kwirinda kunyereza umutungo, icyenewabo, ruswa, guhembera amakimbirane, irondaturere, guhagarika abavugabutumwa, imiyoborere idahwitse, kutareberera ishuri ryigisha Bibiliya rya FATEK no kutimika abashumba babiguze.

Uwahaye IGIHE amakuru yakomeje ati “Hari abanze kuyatanga na nubu bataraba abapasiteri kandi bari bujuje ibisabwa.
Hakwiye gusubiraho bwa buryo pasiteri yashyirwagaho na bagenzi be kuri paruwasi bamaze kumwigaho.’’
Ni ingingo ikwiye kujyana no kuzirikana ko ishuri rya FATEK riri mu akomeye muri ADEPR, rikeneye kwemererwa gukorera ku butaka bw’u Rwanda na diplome zaryo zikemerwa.
Ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR bukwiye kwigenga no kubaka ubushobozi bw’inzego zose kuva hasi, aho gukomeza kugendera ku mategeko yashyizweho n’abamisiyoneri bo muri Suède.
Ubwo RGB yari mu kibazo cya ADEPR yamaze umwaka ikurikirana, aba bamisiyoneri barayandikiye bayisaba ko baganira ku gushaka umuti w’ikibazo.
Ubuyobozi bushya bufite izo nshingano zo kwereka abo muri Suède ko itorero ryacutse ndetse rishobora gushyiraho amategeko arigenga bigendanye n’igihugu ririmo.
Komite y’Inzibacyuho kandi ikwiye kugendera kure amacakubiri ashingiye ku moko no kwiremereza yerekana ko yashyizweho n’urwego rwa Leta idakwiye kuvugirwamo, nk’uko bamwe babirishaga bavuga ko bakorana n’inzego z’iperereza, bagashyiraho n’amabwiriza bakayitirira Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu.
Mu bitekerezo bitangwa n’abayoboke ba ADEPR, Komite y’Inzibacyuho igirwa inama yo kugabanya imyanya idakenewe ahubwo inzego zo hasi ku midugudu na paruwasi zikongererwa ubushobozi.
Komite y’Inzibacyuho ifite umukoro wo guharanira kusa ikivi amahoro, kuko uhereye kuri Usabwimana yavuye ku buyobozi ahita ahunga, Sibomana wamusimbuye aruhukira muri gereza mu gihe Karuranga we yakuweho na RGB.
Mu byo isabwa kwitaho harimo kuvugurura amategeko shingiro arimo ibyuho no kuvugurura amabwiriza atandukanye, kuvugurura imiterere n’imikorere y’uburyo Inama y’Ubutegetsi ishyirwaho mu gufasha urwo rwego kwigenga no korohereza abashyiraho amategeko kuzuza inshingano, kwita ku bibazo itorero rifitanye n’abafatanyabikorwa baryo, ndetse imyanzuro yafashwe nayo ikwiye kwitabwaho.
Mu bindi by’ibanze hari kuvugurura amabwiriza ajyanye no gutanga amasoko, amatora, imicungire y’ibikorwa bibyara inyungu nka Dove Hotel n’ibindi, amabwiriza agenga ibinyabiziga byayo, gushyiraho politiki yihariye igenga uburezi mu bigo bya ADEPR, gukora isuzumabushobozi ku buryo kuzamuka no kumanura umukozi mu ntera bigakorwa mu buryo bwizewe, gukurikirana uko imyenda itorero rifitiye ibigo bitandukanye yishyurwa, n’amavugurura mu bijyanye n’imishahara mu kongera umusaruro muri ADEPR.
Pasiteri Ndayizeye Isaïe uyoboye Komite y’Inzibacyuho yavuze ko bizeye gusubiza ADEPR ku murongo kuko Imana yayihaye umugisha wo kugira abantu bafite ubumenyi butandukanye.
Ati “Dufite abantu bize, baratanga umusanzu mu kubaka igihugu.
Dufite Umwuka Wera wo kudufasha no kuyobora.
Hari impamvu yatumye abantu miliyoni ebyiri bari mu itorero.
Umwuka akwiye kudufasha kwishimira kuba mu itorero.
Twese dufite inyota yo kumva ubuhamya bwerekana impinduka mu itorero.
Ndasaba ubufatanye muri uru rugendo dutangiye ariko twese tugira intumbero yo kubaka itorero aho kubaka umuntu ku giti cye.’’

#19891#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/ONU-yirukanye-umunyamategeko-ushinjwa-kubeshyera-ingabo-z-u-Rwanda
ONU yirukanye umunyamategeko ushinjwa kubeshyera ingabo z’u Rwanda ziri muri RCA Ubuyobozi bw’ingabo z’umuryango w’abibumbye zigarura amahoro muri Centra Afrique (Minusca) bwirukanye umwe mu banyamategeko babo witwa Juan Branco azira kubeshyera ingabo z’u Rwanda zagiye kugarura amahoro muri Repubulika ya Cantre Afrique.
BBC ivuga ko uyu munyamategeko yazize ko yabeshyeye ingabo z’u Rwanda ko zishe abaturage b’iki gihugu 30 mu kwezi gushize mu murwa mukuru Bangui.
Juan Branco yari yahawe akazi na Minusca nk’umujyanama ku bijyanye n’urukiko rushyashya mpanabyaha rudasanzwe rushinzwe gukora iperereza ku byaha by’intambara zabaye muri iki gihugu byanatumye hoherezwa ingabo zo kugarura amahoro zirimo ni z’u Rwanda.
Minusca ivuga ko uyu munyamategeko yarenze ku masezerano bagiranye, ubuyobozo bw’izi ngabo za ONU bwababajwe n’ibyo uyu munyategeko yabeshyeye ingabo z’u Rwanda kandi zisanzwe zifatwa nk’intangarugero muri ibi bikorwa byo kugarura amahoro ndetse ziza mu za mbere zishimirwa ubunyamwuga zikorana mu bikorwa byo kugarura amahoro byanatumye zihabwa kurinda Perezida w’iki gihugu cya Centra Afrique.
Iki kinyamakuru kivuga ko Juan Branco we avuga ko iyirukanwa ryiwe rigaragaraza ko ONU ifite icyo yishinja.

#19912#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/urusobe-rw-ubuzima/article/ubuzima-2018-mu-rwanda-bikanze-ebola-rdf-yongera-kuvura-abaturage-benshi
Ubuzima 2018: Mu Rwanda bikanze Ebola, RDF yongera kuvura abaturage benshi Mu mwaka wa 2018 hari ibikorwa by’ingenzi byaranze urwego rw’ubuzima kuva ku bushakashatsi bushya kuri Sida mu Rwanda kugeza ku kwikanga Ebola mu mezi make ashize.
Hatangijwe gahunda y’imyaka itanu yo guca Hepatite C Muri uyu mwaka u Rwanda rwakiriye inama zitandukanye zaba izireba igihugu gusa ndetse na mpuzamahanga.
Inyinshi zigaga ahanini ku kuvura cyangwa kurinda indwara zinyuranye abaturage hagamijwe ko bagira ubuzima bwiza.
Muri Werurwe 2018, mu Rwanda hateraniye inama mpuzamahanga yigaga uko urwego rw’ubuzima rwatera imbere, ibihugu bikaba byarasabwe no kongera ingengo y’imari ishyirwa muri urwo rwego.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Diane Gashumba, yagaragaje ko mu karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo hakiri ikibazo cya malariya kandi ko kuyirinda bigoye ibihugu bidafatanyije.
Yagize ati “Malariya iracyari ikibazo, mu Rwanda tugerageza kuyirinda abaturage dutera imiti, tubaha inzitiramibu baryamamo ariko tudafatanyije n’ibihugu duturanye ntacyo twageraho.
Imibu nta mupaka igira ari yo mpamvu ubufatanye bukenewe”.
Muri uyu mwaka kandi hatangijwe gahunda nshya yo kurwanya malariya, haterwa imiti mu bihuru n’ibishanga, yica imibu n’amagi yayo ngo bikazagabanya iyo ndwara mu buryo bugaragara.
Ubushakashatsi kuri SIDA Dr Sabin Nsanzimana asobanura iby’ubushakashatsi burimo gukorwa kuri SIDA Mu Rwanda hatangiye gukorwa ubushakashatsi bwiswe ‘RHPIA’ bugamije kureba uko icyo cyorezo gihagaze nyuma y’imyaka 10 ubundi bukozwe, aho bwerekanye ko SIDA iri kuri 3%.
Ubwo bushakashatsi burimo gukorerwa ku baturage ibihumbi 30 bo hirya no hino mu gihugu, bari hagati y’imyaka 10 na 64, ngo bukaba bwitezweho kugaragaza abafite virusi itera SIDA bose, bityo abatari ku miti bayishyirweho, ngo bikazagabanya ubwandu bushya.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bukorwa na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ku bufatanye n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo barimo CDC na ICAP, biteganyijwe ko buzamurika raporo yabwo ya mbere m’Ukwakira 2019.
Tukivuga kuri SIDA, Madame Jeannette Kagame yagizwe Amabasaderi w’ubuzima bw’ingimbi n’abangavu ku isi, inshingano yahawe n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, ishami ryawo ryo kurwanya SIDA (UNAIDS), kubera uruhare agira mu gukora ubuvugizi ngo abana bagire ubuzima bwiza.
Yavuze ko ishimwe yahawe arikesha ubufatanye n’indi miryango nyarwanda itandukanye, ndetse akaba yariyemeje kongeramo imbaraga kugira ngo intego y’isi yo kurandura SIDA burundu muri 2030 izagerweho.
Guca burundu Hepatite C Inama mpuzamahanga ku guca Hepatite C yitabiriwe n’abaturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye Mu Rwanda hatangijwe gahunda y’imyaka itanu yo guhashya burundu indwara y’umwijima wo mu bwoko bwa C (Hepatite C), ngo bikazatwara angana na miliyari zisaga 100Frw.
Kuri ubu iyo ndwara iri kuri 5%, ariko ngo iravurwa igakira kuko ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko 91% by’abafashe neza imiti bayikize, bityo abantu bagakangurirwa kuyipimisha.
Mbere imiti iyivura ngo yatwaraga akabakaba miliyoni y’Amanyarwanda ku muntu ariko ngo barashaka ko iyo miti izajya igura ibihumbi hafi 80Frw gusa.
Ikikango cya Ebola Mu Rwanda hamaze igihe hakorwa ubukangurambaga ku kwirinda indwara ya Ebola, bugenewe abaturage ahanini b’uturere duhana imbibi na Repuburika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo kuko Ebola imaze iminsi yibasiye icyo gihugu.
Ibimenyetso biranga uyirwaye ni uguhinda umuriro, gucika intege, kubabara mu ngingo, umutwe no mu muhogo, ngo iyo ndwara ikaba yica 90% by’abo yafashe, Abanyarwanda bakaba basabwa kuyirinda bakurikiza inama z’ababishinzwe zirimo ahanini kugira isuku.
Ibikorwa by’ingabo mu iterambere ry’abaturage Ingabo zafashije abaturage gutera imiti yica imibu mu bishanga Muri ibyo bikorwa ingabo z’u Rwanda zavuye abaturage 10.852 indwara zitandukanye zirimo iz’amatwi, amazuru n’umuhogo (ENT), iz’amenyo, iz’amaso, indwara z’abagore ndetse hari n’ab’igitsina gabo bakebwe.
Muri abo, 417 barabazwe ngo bavurwe uburyayi bw’amagufa na ho 559 babagwa amaso kubera indwara zitandukanye.
Ingabo zavuye abaturage indwara zitandukanye Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Diane Gashumba atangiza igikorwa cyo gutera imiti yica imibu n’amagi yayo mu bishanga no mu bihuru Kuboneza urubyaro Madame Jeannette Kagame yagizwe Ambasaderi w’ubuzima bw’ingimbi n’abangavu kubera ubuvugizi abakorera Kuva taliki 12 kugera 15 Ugushyingo, mu Rwanda habereye inama mpuzamahanga ku kuboneza urubyaro, yahuje abantu basaga 3500 bagamije kureba uko iyo gahunda ihagaze n’icyakorwa ngo itezwe imbere.
Icyagarutsweho ahanini ni uko urubyiruko rudafite amakuru ku kuboneza urubyaro ndetse rukaba rutanemererwa kubikora kuko bavuga ko ari ukurugabiza ubusambanyi.
Félix Hagenimana, umukozi wa Imbuto Foundation ushinzwe ikurikiranabikorwa n’ubushakashatsi, yavuze ko ari ngombwa kwigisha n’abana ibyo kuboneza urubyaro.
Ati “Ni ngombwa kwigisha umwana muto cyane cyane abakobwa ibyo kuboneza urubyaro kuko nutabimwigisha ari bwo bazamushuka bakamutera inda, akaba yanahandurira SIDA.
Agomba rero kumenya icyamufasha kwikingira n’aho yagikura, ntabwo ari ukubagabiza ubusambanyi”.
Abahagarariye ibihugu bitandukanye bitabiriye iyo nama bashimye imikorere y’abajyanama b’ubuzima b’u Rwanda kuko ari bo ahanini bashyira mu bikorwa iyo gahunda, ngo bakaba barabakuyeho amasomo bajyana iwabo.
Mu Rwanda kuboneza urubyaro biri kuri 48%, intego ikaba ko bizaba bigeze kuri 70% muri 2020.

Usigaye uhura n’umurokore ukagirango uhuye n’indaya yo mu Migina - Ev.
Mama Charlene Umuvugabutumwa wo mu itorero rya ADEPR umaze kwamamara nka Charlene, avuga ko kuzarangiza urugendo rwo ku isi amahoro aricyo gihembo cyiza cy’uwasenze kandi wabanyen’ Imana.
Anenga kandi imyitwarire y’abarokore bamwe na bamwe bo muri iki gihe haba ku myitwarire no ku myambarire, aho ngo ushobora guhura n’umurokore ukamwitiranya n’indaya yo mu Migina.
Mama Charlene kandi mu butumwa bwe, avuga hari abibeshya ko kuba wabona imodoka nziza cyangwa umugore mwiza ari igihembo Imana iba iguhaye ariko ko ari ukwibeshya.
Yagize ati: "Imana yaguha umugore ukavuga ko iguhembye kandi imuguha ejobundi akaguca inyuma?

Ntabwo kubona inzu ijyanye n’icyerekezo ari igihembo n’abadasenga barazubaka, ntabwo kubona imodoka nziza ari igihembo n’ abatubaha Imana barazigura, Ntago kurongorwa no kurongora ari igihembo n’ indaya zikora ubukwe. nutarangiza urugendo amahoro uzaba wararuhiye ubusa" Izi nyigisho yazitangiye muri Paroisse ya Bugarama, umudugudu wa Kibangira mu Karere ka Rusizi, iyi nyigisho yayitanzeabwira abantu ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa bwo kubwira ubwoko bwayo kuva mu byaha, ngo kuko muri iyi minsi hari ubusambanyi bw’ indengakamere, gucana inyuma kw’ abashakanye n’ibindi.
Yibukije abantu kutarangazwa n’ ibyo babona we yise inyongezo y’ Imana ahubwo bakagaruka kuri gakondo, "Ati mbabarira umbwire wowe indangamuntu yawe ko wayitaye?. bakumenyeraga ku jipo ndende none uhura n’ umurokore mu isoko ukagirango ni indaya yo mu Migina.
Uhura n’ umupentekote hariya kwa Rubangura ukagirango ni umubingwakazi wo mu isi wibereye aho, ikintangaza ni uko hari abo tuhahurira najya kubona nkabona batondagiye ku ruhimbi ngo ni za baririmbyi".

Rubaya: Hatoraguwe umurambo w'umugore bikekwa ko yishwe na kanyanga Mu murenge wa Rubaya mu mudugudu wa Kagogo akagari ka Gashari mu karere ka Gicumbi hafi y'akayira kajya mu gihgu cya Uganda hatoraguwe umurambwo w'umugore witwa Zaninka Beatrice yapfuye.
Amakuru atangwa n'umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'umurenge wa Cyumba Nzabanterura Eugene avuga ko mu masaha y'umugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 20/7/2014 babonye umurambo w'uwo mugore mukayira gaturuka Uganda.

Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'umurenge wa Cyumba avuga ko uwo mugore n'ubwo yaguye mu murenge wa Rubaya ubundi ari uwo mu murenge wa Cyumba ngo amakuru ubu bafite ni uko uyu mugore yari yajyanye n'umugabo we kunywa Kanyanga muri Uganda.
Ati "kubera ko ino hano tumaze guca ikiyobyabwenge cya kanyanga basigaye bajya kuyinywera Uganda, tukaba dukeka ko yanyweye nyinshi ikaza kumuhitana."
Avuga ko ayo makuru bayabwiwe n'umugabo w'uyu mugore ariko atari ayo kwizerwa kuko ashobora kuba wenda yamwica bivuye ku ntonganya bagiranye bari mu nzira kuko uwo mugabo byagaragaraga ko yasinze atabashaga no kuvuga neza.
Gusa bahise bashyikiriza uwo Ayirwanda Teresphore urwego rwa polisi ikorera ku mupaka wa Gatuna ngo hakorwe iperereza ku rupfu rwa Zaninka Beatrice.
Umurambo nawo wajyanywe ku bitaro bikuru bya Byumba gukorerwa isuzuma ngo harebwe icyamwishe.

#20014#	5	politics	http://www.igihe.com/politiki/article/loni-yashimye-amasezerano-yasinywe-n-u-rwanda-na-uganda
Loni yashimye amasezerano yasinywe n’u Rwanda na Uganda Umuryango w’Abibumbye (Loni) washimye intambwe yatewe n’abakuru b’ibihugu by’u Rwanda na Uganda yo gusinya amasezerano y’ubufatanye agamije kubyutsa umubano.
Loni yatangaje ko yiteguye gutanga ubufasha bwose bushoboka kugira ngo mu karere haboneke amahoro n’iterambere rirambye.
Ku wa Gatatu tariki 21 Kanama nibwo Perezida Paul Kagame na mugenzi we wa Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni bashyize umukono ku masezerano y’ubufatanye n’umutekano ashobora no gushyira iherezo ku bibazo bimaze igihe hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Aya masezerano yashyiriweho umukono muri Angola yari ahagarariwe na Perezida wa Angola Perezida, João Lourenço; Félix Tshisekedi wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na Denis Sassou Nguesso wa Congo Brazzaville.
Ni amasezerano yitezweho kubyutsa umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda wari umaze imyaka igera kuri itatu utifashe neza kubera ibirego u Rwanda rwagiye rushinja Uganda birimo gutoteza abaturage barwo, gufasha imitwe ishaka guhungabanya umutekano n’ibindi.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu mu izina ry’Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni, Stephane Dujarric, Umuvugizi w’Umunyamabanga Mukuru yasohoye itangazo rigaragaza ko Loni yashimye intambwe yatewe n’u Rwanda na Uganda.
Itangazo rigira riti “Umunyamabanga Mukuru yahaye ikaze isinywa ryabaye ku wa 21 Kanama i Luanda muri Angola, ry’amasezerano hagati ya Perezida Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda na Paul Kagame w’u Rwanda hagamijwe kubyutsa umubano hagati y’ibyo bihugu bibiri.”’
Rikomeza rigira riti “Arasaba impande zombi gushyira mu bikorwa ayo masezerano bivuye ku mutima, ku ntego yo kubyutsa umubano n’ubufatanye hagati y’ibyo bihugu by’ibituranyi hagamijwe amahoro, umutekano n’iterambere rirambye mu Karere.”
Loni yashimye kandi abakuru b’ibihugu barimo Perezida João Lourenço wa Angola Felix Tshisekedi Congo ku ruhare bagize mu gutuma habaho isinywa ry’ayo masezerano.
Umuryango w’Abibumbye wagaragaje ko witeguye gutanga ubufasha bwose bushoboka kugira ngo amahoro no gukorera hamwe bisugire mu Karere.
Itangazo rigira riti “Umunyamabanga Mukuru yiteguye gutanga ubufasha mu nzira yatangijwe no mu zindi gahunda zigamije guteza imbere amahoro, ubufatanye no kwishyira hamwe kw’akarere.”
Amasezerano yasinywe hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda asaba kurinda no kubaha uburenganzira n’ubwisanzure bw’abaturage b’urundi ruhande batuye cyangwa banyura ku butaka bw’icyo gihugu, mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko yacyo.
Asaba guhagarika ibikorwa bigamije guhungabanya urundi ruhande n’ibihugu by’ibituranyi ndetse n’ibyo gutera inkunga, guha imyitozo no kwinjiza abarwanyi mu mitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano.
Harimo kandi gusubukura bwangu ibikorwa byambukiranya imipaka hagati y’ibihugu byombi birimo urujya n’uruza rw’abantu n’ibintu, hagamijwe iterambere n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage babyo n’ibindi.
Abakuru b'ibihugu bafatana urunana nyuma y'isinywa ry'amasezerano hagati ya Uganda n'u Rwanda

#20018#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/ibindi-bikoresho/article/u-rwanda-rurakataje-mu-gutanga
U Rwanda rurakataje mu gutanga serivisi hifashishijwe E-Government –Minisitiri Nsengimana Yanditswe kuya 12-09-2013 saa 13:11' na Deus Ntakirutimana Gahunda ya E-Government, igamije guha abaturage serivisi za Leta, biciye mu ikoranabuhanga, ikomeje gushyirwamo imbaraga na Minisiteri y'urubyiruko n'ikoranabuhanga (MYICT - Ministry of Youth & ICT).
E-Government ni gahunda yaganiriweho i Kigali ku wa kabiri tariki ya 10 Nzeri 2013, hagati ya Minisiteri y'urubyiruko n'ikoranabuhanga mu isakazabumenyi hamwe n'abafatanyabikorwa bakomoka muri Korea y'Epfo, igihugu cya mbere ku Isi mu gukoresha E-Government, by'umwihariko bakora mu kigo kigamije (...)
Gahunda ya E-Government, igamije guha abaturage serivisi za Leta, biciye mu ikoranabuhanga, ikomeje gushyirwamo imbaraga na Minisiteri y'urubyiruko n'ikoranabuhanga (MYICT - Ministry of Youth & ICT).
E-Government ni gahunda yaganiriweho i Kigali ku wa kabiri tariki ya 10 Nzeri 2013, hagati ya Minisiteri y'urubyiruko n'ikoranabuhanga mu isakazabumenyi hamwe n'abafatanyabikorwa bakomoka muri Korea y'Epfo, igihugu cya mbere ku Isi mu gukoresha E-Government, by'umwihariko bakora mu kigo kigamije iterambere mu ikoranabuhanga cya National IT Promotion Agency-NIPA.
Ambasaderi wa Koreya y'Epfo mu Rwanda, Hwang Soon Taik, yavuze ko u Rwanda rufite ubushake mu kwihuta ku ikoranabuhanga n'iterambere, asanga bizagerwaho kuko n'iki gihugu mu myaka 60 ishize cyari mu bukene cyane.
Yagize ati "U Rwanda rugaragaza ubushake bukomeye no kwihuta…muzabigeraho.
E-Government izabafasha kwihuta mu iterambere.
Ni inzira ikomeye twaciyemo kandi tuzi ko yatugejeje kuri byinshi."
Ku ruhande rw'u Rwanda, Nsengimana Jean Philbert, Minisitiri w'urubyirukon'ikoranabuhanga mu isakazabumenyi, yavuze ko kugeza ubu u Rwanda rufite umwanya mwiza mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga muri Afurika.
Yagize ati "Hifashishijwe telefone na mudasobwa, turifuza ko Umunyarwanda azajya abona serivisi biciye mu ikoranabuhanga, akazishakira aho, atiriwe agira aho ajya."
Abaturage baganiriye na IGIHE, bemeza ko koko u Rwanda rukataje mu bijyanye n'itangwa rya serivisi binyuze mu inozwa rya e-Government mu gihugu.
Mutarambirwa Richard, utuye mu mudugudu w'Isangano, mu kagari ka Nyagatovu, mu murenge wa Kimironko, mu karere ka Gasabo, yemeza ko yahinduye aho gutorera abikoresheje ikoranabuhanga; ibi ngo byamurinze ingendo ndetse no gusiragira. yagize ati "Nyuma yo kumva iyi gahunda ikataje, nibutse uburyo mu minsi ishinze nihinduje kuri lisiti y'itora binyuze ku murongo wa internet, kuko nari nanditswe kuri lisiti yo mu ntara y'Amajyepfo, ariko nihinduje ntarinze mva aho ndi, ubu nzatorera mu mujyi wa Kigali."
Ubu buryo bwatangiye bwiswe igishushanyo mbonera mu ikoranabuhanga rigamije serivisi (e-government master plan project), buzashyirwa mu bikorwa biciye mu nzira zitandukanye zikurikira : G2G (Government To Government); aho iri koranabuhanga rihuza Leta n'ibigo byayo mu guhana amakuru na serivisi.
G2C (Government To Citizens), Leta ku baturage na G2B (Government To Business) aho Leta izakoresha iri koranabuhanga mu guteza imbere ubucuruzi.
E-government, yatangiye mu 2011, bumwe mu buryo igaragariramo, harimo koherezanya amafaranga kuri telefoni, kwiyandikisha muri Kaminuza biciye mu murongo wa internet, kwiyandiksha gukorera impushya zitandukanye hifashishijwe internet na telefoni, no kwihinduza kuri lisiti y'itora; byose bigamije kugeza amakuru ku bayakeneye biciye mu ikoranabuhanga. Ruhango: Umwe yaguye mu mpanuka y'igare n'imodoka abandi batatu barakomereka bikabije Bimenyimana Emmanuel w'imyaka 34 yitabye Imana tariki 04/01/2013 ubwo we n'abagenzi be Nshumbusho Michel na Mutabaruka Assiel bari bahekanye ku igare bagongwaga n'ivatiri mu kagari ka Rwoga mu murenge wa Ruhango.
Umwe mu bari ku igare yahise apfa abandi babiri n'umushoferi Ndahiro Kanimba Athanase wari utwaye iyi modoka ifite purake RAA 608 I barakomereka bikomeye bahita bajyanwa mu bitaro bya Kinazi mu karere ka Ruhango.
Iyi manuka yatejwe n'umuvuduko mwinshi; nk'uko bitangazwa n'ababonye iyi mpanuka iba.
Umuvugizi wa polisi mu ntara y'Amajyepfo, Supt.
Hubert Gashagaza, amaze iminsi agira inama abakoresha umuhanda wo muri iyi ntara kwirinda umuvuduko mwinshi kuko akenshi ariwo ukunze guteza impanuka.
Eric Muvara

Tigo yahembye miliyoni 24 imishinga itatu izahindura ubuzima bwa benshi Tigo yahembye Imishinga itatu y’urubyiruko yagaragayeho kugirira akamaro benshi binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga, buri mushinga wahembwe 8, 200,000 Frw.
Imishinga itatu yahembwe yatoranyijwe mu marushanwa ngarukamwaka azwi nka « Tigo Digital Changemakers », Sosiyete ya Tigo yafatanyije na Reach for Change.
Aya marushanwa aba agamije gushaka urubyiruko rufite udushya tuzana impinduka mu mibereho y’abantu hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Imishinga itatu yatoranyijwe ni iyahize iyindi mu mishinga 130 yahatanaga muri aya marushanwa abaye ku nshuro ya gatandatu.
Abatsinze ni Alain Patrick Hirwa ufite umushinga witwa “Tubiganire TV”, ukangurira ababyeyi kuganiriza abana babo ibijyanye n’imyororokere; Rugambwa Bobson ufite uwitwa “Mvend” ufasha amatsinda y’abaturage kumenya amakuru ajyanye n’amafaranga babikije, ukanabafasha kuba basaba inguzanyo cyangwa bakohereza amafaranga yabo ahandi bifashishije telefone; na Igiraneza Origene ufite application yakoze yitwa « O’genius Panda” ifasha umunyeshuri gusobanukirwa neza ibyo yize ikabihuza n’ubuzima busanzwe.
Igiraneza yagaragaje ibyishimo ku guhembwa, ati “Ibi ni ibidutera akanyabugabo ko gukomeza gukora.
Twakoze ubushakashatsi igihe kirekire dukora kuri uyu mushinga none turabishimiwe.
Iyi nkunga tubonye igiye kudufasha guteza imbere umushinga wacu tuwutware ku rwego rwo hejuru ku buryo mu gihe gito cyane tuzaba dutangiye kugurisha.”
Igiraneza warangije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, avuga ko iyo application we na bagenzi be bakoze ishobora kuyikoresha ufite internet cyangwa utayifite.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Tigo Rwanda, Phillip Amoateng, yavuze ko gufasha umuryango nyarwanda gutera imbere bibashimisha kuko nabo ari bamwe mu bawugize.
Yagize ati “Binyuze muri aya marushanwa, Tigo ifasha gushaka ibisubizo bihindura ubuzima bw’abaturage.
Turi guhanga imirimo tunahanahana ubumenyi.
Ibi ni ingirakamaro kuri Tigo kuko turi bamwe mu bagize umuryango nyarwanda kandi birigaragaza ko gutera inkunga gahunda zo guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga bizateza imbere ubuzima bw’abaturage.”
Ushinzwe itumanaho muri Reach for Change ishami rya Afurika, Tadzie Madzima-Bosha, yavuze ko bashimishijwe n’imishinga yatsinze kuri iyi nshuro kandi ko bazakomeza kuyikurikirana kugira ngo igirire akamaro abandi.
Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ishami ryo guhanga udushya n’ubucuruzi muri Minisiteri y’Ikoranabuhanga, Irere Claudette. yavuze ko aya marushanwa ari ingirakamaro ku gihugu kubera ko ateza imbere gahunda yo kwihangira imirimo.
Yagize ati “Dushimishwa no kubona abikorera nka Tigo bafashe igikorwa nk’iki bakagishyiramo amafaranga, bakagishyiramo imbaraga badufasha guteza imbere abashaka kwikorera.
Icyo dushaka ni ukugira abanyarwanda bikorera benshi, tukareka guhora dukomanga ku miryango y’abantu ahubwo tugashobora kubyikorera twe ubwacu, tukabasha no guha abatwegereye akazi.”
Tigo ifatanyije na Reach for Change bimaze gutera inkunga imishinga 12, imaze guhindura ubuzima bw’abanyarwanda basaga ibihumbi 66,000.
Abatinze bose bafashe ifoto y'urwibutso n'abayobozi Rugambwa Bobson ufite umushinga witwa “Mvend” ashyikirizwa igihembo Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Tigo Rwanda, Phillip Amoateng Ushinzwe itumanaho muri Reach for Change ishami rya Afurika, Tadzie Madzima-Bosha

#20060#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUREZI/article/Munyakazi-asanga-nta-reme-ry-uburezi-ryava-mu-kwimura-abana-badashoboye-no-kubareka-bagatunga-telefone
Munyakazi asanga nta reme ry'uburezi ryava mu kwimura abana badashoboye no kureka bagatunga telefone Isaac Munyakazi, Umunyamabanga wa Leta mushya muri Minisiteri y'Uburezi ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye Umunyamabanga wa Leta mushya muri Minisiteri y'Uburezi ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye Isaac Munyakazi yatangaje ko nta mpamvu yo kureka abanyeshuri badashoboye ngo bimurwe mu myaka ikurikiraho, ngo kuko bidindiza ireme ry'uburezi bikanakurura ubunebwe mu banyeshuri.
Hashize igihe bamwe mu babyeyi n'abakurikiranira hafi uburezi binubira imyanzuro ikunze gukurikizwa mu bigo by'amashuri, aho abanyeshuri bose bimurwa mu myaka ikurikiyeho hagasibizwa mbarwa.
Hari abarimu bakunze kumvikana bavuga ko bibabangamira kandi bikabangamira n'ireme ry'uburezi, kuko hazamuka abana badashoboye.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na The New Times, Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinze amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye Isaac Munyakazi nawe yagaragaje ko adashyigikiye uwo muco wo kwimura abanyeshuri n'abadashoboye.
Yavuze ko ibyo ari ugukurura ubunebwe ndetse no gusubiza inyuma ireme ry'uburezi.
Yagize ati "Kuvuga ko bigira ingaruka ku ireme ry'uburezi nibyo.Uruhande rwanjye kuri ibi nk'umunyamwuga kandi n'umurezi, ndasaba ko umwana wimuka aba ari ubikwiye.
Nibyo abarimu bakwiye kugira uruhare mu gutuma abana benshi bimurwa mu myaka ikurikiyeho ariko bagomba kubikora mu buryo bwa nyabwo."
Yakomeje avuga ko umwarimu afite ububasha bwo gusibiza umwana igihe cyose abona nta bushobozi afite bwo kwimukira mu wundi mwaka.Munyakazi avuga ko ahubwo abantu bashobora kuba barabisobanuye nabi.
Ati "Uburezi bugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'igihugu ni ubukwirakwiza mu banyeshuri ubumenyi n'ubushobozi hatarebewe ku gihe bizamara.Abanyehsuri bakwiye kurangiza bafite ubushobozi bwo kugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'igihugu."
Telefone mu mashuri ntizikwiriye Isaac Munyakazi kandi yabwiye The Newtimes ko kwemerera abanyeshuri gutunga telefone ku mashuri bidakwiriye.
Yavuze ko telefoni igira ibirangaza byinshi, kubw'ibyo ahubwo uyifatanywe akwiye guhanwa hagendewe ku mategeko y'ikigo yigamo, gusa ibigo bikaborohereza kubona uko bahamagara nk'igihe bakeneye ababyeyi babo.
Ati "Telefone ni ibirangaza ku bana bato.Bashobora kujya birirwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, kwirirwa mu bigare bitari byiza, gukina imikino n'ibindi byinshi.Ku myaka yabo, ubushobozi bwo kwigenzurira ibyo bintu aba ari buke."
Munyakazi yavuze ko ku mashuri hariho uburyo bwa ‘smart classrooms' aho abana biga bafite mudasobwa na interineti, kubw'ibyo ngo telefone ntabwo zikenewe.
Ibyo kureka abana bagatunga telefone byavuzwe cyane umwaka ushize bishyigikiwe n'uwahoze ari Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye Olivier Rwamukwaya, aho yavugaga ko abayobozi b'ibigo bajya babafasha kuzikoresha mu buryo butabangamiye amategeko aho kubirukana.
Icyo gietekerezo cyamaganywe n'ababyeyi ndetse n'abarezi hamwe n'imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta yita ku burezi.
Mu kwezi gushize nibwo Munyakazi yagizwe umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe amashuri abanza n'ayisumbuye, asimbuye Olivier Rwamukwaya wagizwe Umunyabanga wa Leta ushinzwe amashuri y'imyuga n'ubumenyi ngiro.

Kirehe: Imbwa imaze kuruma abantu barenga icumi Abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Kigina n'uwa Nyamugali mu Karere ka Kirehe bahangayikishijwe n'imbwa batazi aho iturutse yinjiye muri iyo mirenge ku mugoroba wo kuwa 27/12/2014 ari nako igenda iruma uwo isanze, abagera kuri 11 bakaba bamaze kugera mu bitaro bya Kirehe.
Iyo mbwa yahereye mu Murenge wa Kigina igenda irya abantu ari nako bayivugiriza induru igahunga.
Ku cyumweru tariki ya 28/12/2014 yinjiye mu Murenge wa Nyamugali ari nako igenda iruma abantu.
Mubo Kigali today yasanze mu bitaro bya Kirehe wabonaga bamwe yabateye inguma ku bice binyuranye by'umubiri mu buryo bukabije.
Iyi mbwa yibasiye cyane abana bato.
Niyonsaba Liberatha utuye mu Murenge wa Nyamugali avuga ko yagiye kubona akabona imbwa imusanze mu rugo iza ibasatira isa n'iyasaze, ngo igiye gufata umwana yiruka ajya kumukiza arwana nayo ari nako imuruma.
Yagize ati "ubwo twari mu rugo bafotora abana imbwa yazamutse yahumuye igiye gufata umwana ndayifata ngenda nyizunguza nkubita hasi uko nakarwanye nayo ni nako yandumaguraga yiyongeza inanshinga inzara ku bw'amahirwe igenda nta mwana iriye, n'uwari hafi aho yagize ubwoba arahunga abandi bari bagiye gusenga mbura untabara".
Uyu mugore yamurumye arwana n'imbwa akiza abana.
Zamuda Saidi nawe warumwe n'iyo mbwa mu rubavu yagize ati "nari mpagaze imbere y'umuryango mu gitondo imbwa iraza ngira ngo ni ibisanzwe ni imbwa zigenda igeze hepfo irasimbuka ishaka gufata umwana ahungira mu gikoni, iza insanga nirukira mu nzu nibuka ko nsize abana hanze ndasohoka nsanga imaze kuruma umwana iza imfata ndwana nayo iranduma".
N'ubwo bigaragara ko ubufasha bwihuse kuri abo barwayi bukiri hasi kuko hari abamaze amasaha arenga atatu ku bitaro batarakirwa kandi bataka, Nsabimana Jackson Umuganga wita kuri abo barwayi yavuze ko bari kubakorera ubufasha bwihuse mu gihe bategereje urukingo kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 29/12/2014.
Muganga aratanga icyizere ko abo barwayi bazakira mu gihe urukingo rubonekeye igihe.
Uyu yamurumye ku kaguru.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'Umurenge wa Nyamugali, Uwamwiza Marie Chantal avuga ko imbwa zimaze kuba nyinshi mu tugari twegereye Umurenge wa Mahama zikaba zibuza abaturage umutekano, ariko ubuyobozi bw'umurenge bufatanyije n'ingabo z'igihugu bakaba bari kwiga umugambi wo kuzirwanya.
"Rwose imbwa zimaze kuba nyinshi ari nako zibuza abaturage umutekano.
Ubu twe n'abasirikari twafashe umwanzuro wo kuzirwanya tureba aho indiri yazo iri kugira ngo tuzitege tuzikize abantu".
Mu gihe umubare w'abariwe n'iyo mbwa ugenda wiyongera umunota ku wundi abamaze kugera ku bitaro ni cumi n'umwe kandi iyo mbwa kugera na n'ubu iracyari mu baturage ari nako ibabuza umutekano.
Ubufasha bwihuse burakemangwa kuko hari abamaze amasaha atatu baratakirwa.
Servilien Mutuyimana

#20209#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ubwiteganyirize/article/ubwishingizi-ngobokamuryango
Ubwishingizi ngobokamuryango buje guhangana n'ibihe by'amage bitunguranye Yanditswe kuya 12-03-2014 saa 22:08' na IGIHE Bimaze kugaragara ko kugira ngo abantu bizere kugira ejo heza, bagomba guteganyiriza ibihe bizaza, ibyo kandi bigatanga icyizere kuri bo ubwabo ndetse no ku bazabakomokaho.
Nyamara iyo urebye usanga mu bihugu byinshi bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere, harimo n'u Rwanda, abantu batitabira guteganyiriza ku bushake bwabo ibihe biri imbere.
Aha rero ni ho SORAS Vie Ltd ihera ishishikariza abaturarwanda, kuyigana kugira ngo bahangane n'ibihe by'amage biza bitunguranye, bigahungabanya umudendezo (...)
Bimaze kugaragara ko kugira ngo abantu bizere kugira ejo heza, bagomba guteganyiriza ibihe bizaza, ibyo kandi bigatanga icyizere kuri bo ubwabo ndetse no ku bazabakomokaho.
Nyamara iyo urebye usanga mu bihugu byinshi bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere, harimo n'u Rwanda, abantu batitabira guteganyiriza ku bushake bwabo ibihe biri imbere.
Aha rero ni ho SORAS Vie Ltd ihera ishishikariza abaturarwanda, kuyigana kugira ngo bahangane n'ibihe by'amage biza bitunguranye, bigahungabanya umudendezo w'umuryango n'abo bakunda bafata "Ubwishingizi Ngobokamuryango" butangwa na SORAS VIE ltd.
Ubwo bwishingizi «ubwishingizi ngobokamuryango» nk'uko umuyobozi w'ubucuruzi muri SORAS Vie Ltd, Bwana MHORANYI David yabitangaje, ngo bubereye abantu b'ingeri zose z'ubuzima bifuza kwiteganyiriza no kurinda imiryango yabo ibihe bibi bibangamira umudendezo w'umuryango, biturutse ku rupfu cyangwa ubumuga bwa burundu bw'uwafashe ubwo bwishingizi, cyangwa umwe mu bagize umuryango wishingiwe.
Igihe habayeho kwitaba Imana cyangwa se ubumuga bwa burundu kuri umwe mu bagize umuryango wishingiwe, abateganyijwe mu masezerano bahabwa na SORAS VIE Ltd, amafaranga aba yaragenwe mbere mu masezerano n'uwafashe ubwishingizi.
Ibyo bituma umuryango ubasha guhangana n'ibibazo bitewe no kubura umwe mu bawugize.
Hodari Jean Chrysostome, umuyobozi mukuru wa SORAS Vie Ltd, mu kiganiro yahaye abanyamakuru taliki ya 8 Werurwe 2014, yavuze ko ubu bwishingizi budahenze na gato.
Avuga ko uwo ariwe wese muri sosiyete nyarwanda abasha gufata ubwo bwishingizi kandi ko igihe cyose SORAS Vie Ltd ihora yiteguye kuzuza amasezerano iba yaragiranye n'umukiriya wayo.
SORAS Vie Ltd, ni imwe mu masosiyete agize SORAS Group, ikaba usibye ubu bwishingizi ngobokamuryango yamuritse ku mugaragaro, hari n'ubundi bwishingizi isanzwe itanga burimo ubwishingizi bw'amashuri, ubwishingizi bw'ubuzima bugenewe abakozi, ubwishingizi bw'izabukuru ndetse n'ubwishingizi bw'inguzanyo.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

N'ubwo yishimira aho ageze mu muziki, Jody abona agifite akazi kenshi Yanditswe kuya 26-06-2012 saa 18:21' na Richard IRAKOZE Umuhanzi uririmba mu njyana ya R'n'B, Phibie Muyoboke, w'imyaka 21, uzwi ku izina rya Jody avuga ko hari akazi kenshi abona agomba gukora kugira ngo agere ku ntego ye mu buhanzi. uyu Munyarwanda kazi ngo hari abantu benshi bamubwira ko bakunze ibihangano bye, ariko ko yumva acyifuza ko bimenyekana hose mu Rwanda kugeza no mu biturage.

Umuhanzi uririmba mu njyana ya R'n'B, Phibie Muyoboke, w'imyaka 21, uzwi ku izina rya Jody avuga ko hari akazi kenshi abona agomba gukora kugira ngo agere ku ntego ye mu buhanzi. uyu Munyarwanda kazi ngo hari abantu benshi bamubwira ko bakunze ibihangano bye, ariko ko yumva acyifuza ko bimenyekana hose mu Rwanda kugeza no mu biturage.
Jody kimwe mu byo yumva yifuza kugeraho ni uko abantu b'ingeri zose mu Rwanda bamumenya.
Avuga ko yumva hari ahantu henshi ataragera ariko ngo yifitiye icyizere, kandi akeneye ko ibihangano bye bimenyekana cyane.
Yagize ati:" Ku rwego rwo mu Rwanda ni byiza kubanza kumenyekana hose mu gihugu n'umwana n'umukecuru, nifuzaga ko babanza bakamenya ngo Jody ni muntu ki.
Umuziki wanjye nifuza ko wagera ku bantu bose no muri East Africa na Afurika yose no kugeza ku rwego rw'Isi."
Jody uri kumvikana cyane mu bahanzi bashya b'abakobwa mu Rwanda, avuga ko n'ubwo yumva yifitiye icyizere cyo kuzamamara mu ihe kiri imbere, bimusaba imbaraga nyinshi kuko yumva ataramenyekana hose nk'uko abyifuza.
Yagize ati:"Ubu ndacyafite gukora cyane (...).
Bishobora gutwara igihe ariko bizagerwaho.
Icyo nkeneye ni promotion gukora cyane, icyizere ndafite."
Jody amaze igihe kingana n'amezi atandatu akora cyane mu muziki.
Amaze kugira indirimbo eshatu ari zo ‘Ni Njye Nawe', ‘Twishime' na ‘Ndi fièrre'.
Amashusho y'indirimbo Twishime ya Jody yakozwe na Producer Cedru: Jody akorera muri Label yitwa BMCG (Baric Music Creation Generation-ikorana na Jody, True D, The Brothers, DMS, Jack-B, Usher Juno, n'abandi) imufasha mu bijyanye n'ubuhanzi bwe.
Arateganya gusohora indirimbo ye nshya yise "Ni iki nakora" yakozwe na Producer Naason muri Bridge Records.
Arateganya kandi gushyira hanze amashusho y'indirimbo yakoranye na The Brothers yitwa "Intera".
Azagaragara mu gitaramo cya Live cya Kigali Up kuwa 7 Kamena 2012.
Yatumiwe mu gitaramo kizabera muri Kenya, kizaba mu mpera z'iki Cyumweru.

#20248#	7	development	https://umubavu.com/iterambere/article/Abanyamakuru-bavuze-n-akari-imurori-ubwo-bineguraga-bareba-aho-bageze-intego-za-Vision-2020
Abanyamakuru bavuze n’akari imurori ubwo bineguraga bareba aho bageze intego za ’Vision 2020’ Mu gihe icyerekezo 2020 (Vision 2020) u Rwanda rwari rwarihaye gisigaje amezi atatu gusa ngo buri wese agikandagizemo ibirenge, mu nzego zitandukanye bikomeje kwibaza aho bageze imihigo yari yariyemejwe dore ko hari abumvaga bazaba barabaye abaherwe ariko uko iminsi ishira ubu bakaba babona nta cyizere.
Tutavuze ku nzego nyinshi, ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Nzeli 2019 itangazamakuru ryicaye hamwe mu kiganiro nyunguranabitekerezo cyavugiwemo n’akari imurori cyari kigamije kureba aho rigeze ryesa imihigo ryahawe mu ntego z’icyerekezo 2020 gusa icyagarutsweho ni uko ritigeze ritekerezwaho byimbitse mu gutegura intego za ’Vision 2020’ kuko ryavuzweho mu bika bitarenze bibiri.
Kuba itangazamakuru ritarahawe umwanya uhagije cyangwa ngo rihabwe intego zaryo zihari mu ntego za 2020, ni kimwe mu byo impuguke n’abanyamakuru bagarutseho ko biri mu byatumye batavuga ko hari intego/imihigo besheje kuko bakoraga bisanzwe bisa nk’aho nta ntumbero bose barangamiye uretse gusa gukora buri wese mu ruhande rwe ashaka kugira aho ava n’aho agera.
Ku ikubitiro impuguke muri Politiki, umushakashatsi akaba n’umwalimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu ishuri ry’itangazamakuru, Dr.
Kayumba Christophe ahawe umwanya yatangiye yibaza niba mbere yo kuvuga aho itangazamakuru rigeze ryesa imihigo y’icyerekezo 2020, hari ahagaragara intego zaryo.
Ati "Itangazamakuru ntaho naribonye.kubera ko icyerekezo 2020 kitari gifite vision y’itangazamakuru, ni yo mpamvu itangazamakuru dufite uyu munsi ricumbagira".
Yakomeje avuga ko nubwo mu bigaragara hari aho rigeze ugereranyije n’ibitangazamakuru byakoraga nko mu 2000 dore ko ubu hari amaradiyo 36, ibinyamakuru byandika online birenga 80, amateleviziyo arenga 15 ariko nta terambere rihambaye rirageraho byose bishingiye cyane cyane ku bukene.
Mu mwanya wabo w’ijambo yaba Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Urwego rw’Abanyamakuru Bigenzura mu Rwanda (Rwanda Media Commission, RMC) Mugisha Emmanuel, yaba na Mugana Gonzaga, umunyamabanga w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Abanyamakuru mu Rwanda (Association Rwandaise des Journalistes, ARJ) na bo ntibabona itangazamakuru ry’u Rwanda nk’iryubatse mu buryo bukomeye nubwo hari aho rigeze ugereranyije n’irya mbere y’umwaka wa 2000.
Mu banyamakuru batanze ibitekerezo n’ibibazo, abenshi bahurije ku kuba ari ikibazo ku kuba itangazamakuru ritarahawe umwanya ugaragara ubwo hategurwaga intego z’icyerekezo 2020, akaba ari yo mpamvu batabona uburyo bamenya ijanisha bagezeho besa intego z’iki cyerekezo, gusa bakavuga ko mu gihe u Rwanda rukomeje kwiha ibindi byerekezo, ari igihe cyiza kugira ngo ibitarakozwe bikosorwe itangazamakuru naryo rihabwe umwanya n’intego bifatika dore ko ari ubutegetsi bwa Kane kandi bufasha rubanda n’igihugu mu iterambere ryacyo muri byinshi.
Umva muri Video ikiganiro abanyamakuru binegura: @Umubavu.com

#20257#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/ibi-nibyo-byiciro-4-by-abantu-batemerewe-kunywa-no-gukoresha-tangawizi
Ibi nibyo byiciro 4 by’abantu batemerewe kunywa no gukoresha Tangawizi Tangawizi isangwa henshi mu ngo zacu ndetse tuyifashisha cyane mu kwivura indwara zimwe na zimwe ariko nubwo igira akamaro kanini hari abantu batemerewe kuyikoresha kuko yagira ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwabo aho kubakiza.
Tangawizi, umuti ukomeye cyane kandi w’umwimerere Tangawizi yifashishwa mu kuvura inkorora, ibicurane na bumwe mu burwayi bwo mu muhogo.Tangawizi yongerwa mu cyayi no mu biryo kugira ngo bigire impumuro nziza n’uburyohe bwisumbuyeho.
Tangawizi kandi ifasha mu gukira umutwe, kuruka, gufungana mu mazuru n’ibindi.
Si ibyo gusa kuko Tangawizi ikora nk’ifunguro rifasha mu gutakaza ibiro.
Ifasha umubiri wawe gutuma ukora cyane, bigatuma udahora ushonje cyane.
Ni nziza ku igogora, ifasha ku barwaye igifu ndetse n’ikora neza ry’umutima.
Tangawizi inakura imyuka y’umurengera mu mara no mu gifu.
Tangawizi kandi ifasha mu itembera ryiza ry’amaraso , igabanya kuribwa mu ngingo cyangwa kuribwa imitsi.
Tangawizi ifite n’akamaro gakomeye mu gutuma ibisebe bikira vuba.
Nubwo tubonye akamaro ntagereranywa ka Tangawizi , ntabwo ikoreshwa na buri wese nkuko urubuga Bold Sky rwandika ku buzima rubitangaza ari nayo mpamvu tugiye kurebera hamwe abantu batemerewe kuyikoresha urebe niba uri muri icyo cyiciro.
Abantu bamwe batekereza ko Tangawizi nta ngaruka mbi yagira ku muntu kuko ari icyatsi, nyamara ishobora guteza ibibazo ku bantu bamwe na bamwe.
Muri iyi nkuru tugiye kugaruka ku ngaruka mbi za Tangawizi ku bantu bagomba kwirinda kuyikoresha.
Abagore batwite Tangawizi ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi igihe umugore ayikoresheje atwite.
Icyo twakwita ibitera imbaraga karemano biba muri Tangawizi bishobora gutera umugore kugira ibise mbere y’igihe.Ibi nibyo bishobora gutuma umwana avuka igihe kitageze ari nayo mpamvu abagore batwite bagirwa inama yo kudakoresha Tangawizi mu buryo ubwo aribwo bwose.
Abantu bashaka kubyibuha n’abafite ibiro bikeya Tangawizi ni umwe mu miti myiza ifasha gutakaza ibiro.
Izamura uburyo umubiri ukoramo ubundi ikagabanya ubushake bwo kurya.
Iyi niyo mpamvu abantu bashaka kubyibuha ndetse n’abafite ibiro bikeya cyane badakwiriye gukoresha Tangawizi.
Abantu barwaye zimwe mu rwara z’amaraso Tangawizi ifasha mu gutembera neza kw’amaraso agana mu bindi bice by’umubiri.
Aka ni kamwe mu kamaro k’ingenzi ka Tangawizi ku mubiri w’umuntu.
Ariko ku bantu bafite uburwayi bw’amaraso nk’abanywa imiti ituma amaraso yabo avura cyangwa se abarwaye ‘haemophilia’(uburwayi butuma iyo umuntu akomeretse, amaraso atinda kuvura ngo bihagarare), Tangawizi ntibaba bagomba kuyikoresha mu buryo ubwo aribwo bwose.
Abantu banywa imiti Muri rusange abantu baba bari kunywa imiti y’uburwayi ubwo aribwo bwose bagomba kwirinda gukoresha Tangawizi.
Tangawizi izamura cyangwa ikagabanya ubukare bw’imiti.
Ituma ubukare bwa ‘aspirin’ n’indi miti ituma amaraso atavura.
Mu rundi ruhande ahubwo igabanya ubushobozi bw’imiti ituma amaraso avura.
Indi miti itagomba kunywebwa umuntu akanakoresha Tangawizi harimo irinda umuvuduko w’amaraso n’imiti irinda diyabete

#20261#	10	relationships	http://www.makuruki.rw/URUKUNDO/article/AMAHIRWE-ABONEKA-RIMWE-Igice-cya-Karindwi
AMAHIRWE ABONEKA RIMWE (Igice cya Karindwi) Mu gice giheruka twasize Simeo amaze gushwana na Sabine ndetse asiga barakaranyije arigendera ariko Sabine amwirukaho, kurikirana uko byaje kugenda.
Ubwo nahise ninjira muri getho yanjye ndikingirana kugirango atavaho anansangamo,doreko numvaga namwanze, Sabine yabonye ntashobora kumukingurira yisubirira inyuma, ubwo nanjye mpita mfata telephone mpamagara Ephrem (mukuru wanjye) ndamubwira nti:"muvandi, sinari nzi ko nakundanye n’umwicanyi!"
ariko Ephrem yisekera ahita ansubiza ati:"ariko sha watabaye uvuga ko umugore wawe agutabaje ngo muhurire i Kigali burya yari yasaze none nawe yakwanduje ibisazi?"
Ariko ndamubwira nti:"Ephrem gabanya urwenya!"
nkomeza mubwira nti :"kandi burya wowe urakina mubikomeye!"
ahita amabaza ati:"byagenze bite se?"
nuko ndamusubiza nti:"wari uzi ko Rugira wafatanyije na Dr.Ngabo guca akaguru papa ari musaza wa Sabine!"
ubwo Ephrem yahise ambaza uwabimbwiye nuko ndamusubiza nti:"nyine cyagihe yampamagaye aribyo ashaka kunyigambaho ngo uwo Rutindi Rugira banamufunze!"
ubwo Ephrem yahise ambaza ati:"ubwose urakora iki?"
nahise musubiza nti:"ntakindi nyine nabanje kubwira ako gakobwa ko ntagikeneye urukundo cyangwa umubano wanjye na ko,kandi ubu ngiye guhambira mu gitondo ndashaka aho nimukira sinakomeza guturana n’uyu mugizi wa nabi atazavaho anyirenza ntiwamenya!"
Nkiri muri ibyo nagiye kumva numva umuntu arakomanze maze mumutima ntangira kwibaza nti:"yaba ari Sabine unkurikiye cyangwa?"
ariko ndavuga nti:"natavuga ngo numve ijwi rye ntabwo nkingura!"
ubwo yakomeje gukomanga ariko ndamwihorera ariko aho bigeze nkingura buhoro ariko sinakuraho urugi,nuko ngiye kubona mbona rurakingutse ndebye mbona ni Nkusi.ubwo namuhaye kalibu dukomeza kuganira mubaza uburyo akazi k’itangazamakuru kameze ansubiza ko kameze neza,ariko aho bigeze arambaza ati:"Sabine ameze ate se?"
nuko ndicecekera nanga kugira icyo musubiza,yongera kumbwira ati:"ariko ndabona utameze neza!"
nuko ndamusubiza nti:"Nkusi niba umushaka umusange aho ari kandi ndakwiyamye ntiwongere kumbaza iby’uwo mukobwa!"
Umunsi wakurikiyeho nazindutse mpambira nitegura kwimuka kuko numvaga ntashaka kuguma hafi ya Sabine kuko numvaga kumubona bituma ntekereza uruhare rwa musazawe mukuba papa yaragize ubumuga,kandi nkumva nongeye kugira impuhwe kubw’urukundo namukundaga mbere yaho!
Nkumva ngomba kujya aho ntakimubona Ubwo Nkusi yakanguwe n’igikapu nafungaga nuko arambaza ati:"ariko Simeon ubwo koko ubyutse irijoro ujya hehe?"
nuko ndamusubiza nti:"urabiziko ibyo nakubwiye ntakinaga kuko ubu nabonye abandi bajama tugomba kubana muri getho kuko Sabine yanteye igikomere ntazigera nibagirwa mubuzima bwanjye!"
ariko Nkusi agerageza kungira inama ambwira ati:"nukuri wafashe icyemezo kigayitse cyo gushwana n’umukunzi wawe kuko ibyabaye byose ntaruhare yabigizemo" Nuko ndamubaza nti:"nonese njyewe ibyabaye cyera hari uruhare nabigizemo?
nonese gucika ukuguru kwa papa ugiye kumbwirako ntangaruka byangizeho kandi bizakomeza kungiraho?"
ariko aransubiza ati:"ndahamya ntashidikanya ko usibye ingaruka nemeza ko byagukomerekeje,ariko uburyo bwiza bwo gukira igikomere ni ukubabarira!"
sinatinze naramusubije nti:"nanjye naramubabariye niyo mpamvu ngomba kuva muri iki gipangu nkajya aho ntakimubona wenda ahari byatuma nibagirwa ibijyanye n’urukundo aho biva bikagera!"
Ubwo Nkusi yabaye nk’uguye mukantu abonye umujinya navuganaga,ariko yari amenyereyeho gutebya nuko ahita ambwira ati:"ariko urambwirango niba mushaka aho uwamushaka ntiwamukuramo iyo kotsa?"
ariko ndamusubiza nti:"Erega singikunda ukundi mugani wa wa musizi!"
nuko Nkusi arambaza ati:"nonese byagenze gute?"
ndamusubiza nti:" nakubwiye nti:"aho aba urahazi ubwo rero niba ukeneye kumenya byinshi ugende umubaze kandi ikindi ni uko ntazakomeza kuba muri iki gipangu!"
Ubwo Nkusi yabonye namaramaje kandi narakaye maze arambaza ati:"nonese ibyo nari ngiye kukubwira urabyakira ute kandi mbona wamaze kugera muyindi mood?"
ndamusubiza nti:"Nkusi niba wumva wazanywe no gukomeza kumbwira ibya Sabine umbwire nisohokere uyisigaremo wenyine!"
ariko Nkusi arambwira ati:"Simeon ngufitiye inkuru nziza!"
Ubwo Nkusi yahise ambwira ati:"nyamara wagakwiye kwibaza kubyo nkubwira maze ugafata icyemezo gikwiye" akomeza ambaza ati:"nonese ko utambajije amakuru meza nashakaga kukubwira?"
ubwo nahise mubwira nti:"ngaho nyibwirira iby’ayo makuru meza!"
yahise ambaza ati:"Harya ntiwibuka hahandi twasabye akazi ?"
ndamusubiza nti:"nonese ko twagiye tugasaba henshi namenya ari hehe koko?"
Nuko aransubiza ati:"nakubwiye hahandi twasabye akazi ko gukora security (gucunga umutekano) dukoresheje kamera zicunga umutekano (CCTV cameras)" naramusubije nti:"aho ndahibuka cyane !"
maze arambwira ati:"bahuje amanota twagize mukizamini cyanditse bayahuje n’ayo twagize mucy’imirimo y’amaboko (platique) basanga waraturushije ndetse urebye wanabisanga kuri webusayite (website) y’iriya kampani (company) kandi ngo nta enteriviyu (enterview) ahubwo ngo ugomba kujya ukora utaha mu macumbi yaho!"
Ubwo numvise ibyishimo bindenze niko kuvuga nti:"ni ukuri Imana igira neza cyane gusa mbabajwe no kubona akazi mubihe mfite umubabaro nk’ibi!"
ariko Nkusi arambwira ati:"ariko amazi ntararenga inkombe wagakwiye kwegera Sabine ukamusaba imbabazi kuko wamukomerekeje cyane!"
ariko ibyo Nkusi yambwiraga sinari nkibyitayeho nahise mubwira nti:"ahubwo ubu nyine mpise ntaha nzava murugo ejobundi mpitira kukazi!"
Ubwo naratashye ngeze mu rugo ntangira kubabwira uko byangendekeye n’uburyo Rugira yahaye uburozi mushikiwe kugirango aturoge ariko we akabwanga,nuko papa yumvise ayomagambo ahita ambaza ati:"ubwose wakoze iki?"
ndamusubiza nti:"nyine numvise ngomba gutandukana na we!"
ariko muzehe arambaza ati:"arikose ubwo koko wumva ufite ubwenge?"
ndamusubiza nti:"ubwose nabwirwa n’iki ko ibyo atabikoze ashaka ko mbanza kumwiyumvamo akazabona uko aturangiza yitonze?"
Nuko mama ahita ambaza ati:"ariko uwo Sabine si wamwana w’umukobwa nasanze yahangayikiye kwa muganga igihe mwari mwasuye papa wanyu?"
nuko Ephrem aramusubiza ati:"wabimenye!"
nuko mama aramubaza ati:"nonese ni iki gituma wirengagiza ineza yakugiriye ukubakira kubibazo atagizemo uruhare?"
Ubwo twahise twumva umuntu ukomanga kurugi nuko Papa aravuga ati:"uwose ni inde udusuye kandi mbona bwije?"
nuko nkinguye mbona ni umuyobozi w’itorero twasengeragamo,nuko muha kalibu,arinjira nkuko bisanzwe ageze munzu turasenga hanyuma abwira muzehe ati :"ubu rero sintinda mumagambo kuko ndihuta!"
nuko muzehe aramubaza ati:"nonese ni makuruki wari unzaniye?"
nuko uwo muyobozi aramusubiza ati:"ubu tumaze igihe munama urabizi, ubwo rero twigaga uburyo bw’ivugabutumwa mumagereza none twemejeko nawe uzafatanya n’abandi mumurimo!"
nuko papa aramusubiza ati:"ntacyambuza kujyana n’abandi ahubwo mupange neza uko gahunda zizagenda maze murebe ngo turavuga ubutumwa n’aho naba nshumbagira Imana izambashisha!"
Murugo ubwo bari bicaye maze Papa abwira Ephrem ati:"ariko nkawe uri igiki?"
akomeza agira ati:"koko murumuna wawe agende ikubagahu mugitondo none nanubu nturamuhamagara ngo umubaze uko urugendo rumeze?"
nuko Ephrem ababwira uko byangendekeye ntanakimwe aciye iruhande,nuko bakiri muri ibyo ya numero yajyaga ihamagara muzehe yongera kumuhamagara, ayitabye yumva baramubwiyengo:" ni Dr.Anasthase muvugana nagiraga ngo nkumenyesheko abakoze icyaha cyo kugucisha ukuguru ubu bari mumaboko y’ubutabera kandi ntugire ikibazo kuko ibimenyetso birahari!"
Iminsi yaragiye irahita indi irataha ntangira kuryoherwa n’akazi gusa nkibuka gusura umuryango wanjye nkareba uko bameze,nkishimira kuganira nabo,maze nkumva muzehe yishimira ukuntu umurimo w’ivugabutumwa umeze n’uburyo abantu bari kwihana abandi bakatura ibyaha byabo ndetse bakabireka maze nanjye nkumva binkoze ahantu,maze yambaza aho ibyanjye na Sabine bigeze nkicecekera ndetse ngashaka ukuntu nahindura ikiganiro kuko kwakira ko avukana na Rugira maze ngakomeza gukundana na we numvaga bingoye!
Umunsi umwe nazindukiye mukazi nkibisanzwe nuko ntashye nambara neza kuko wikendi (weekend) yari yageze maze ninjira mumodoka yanjye ntangira gutwara,nagendaga ndirimba kuko narebaga izuba rirenga nkumva ndanyuzwe ariko nakwibukako Sabine wari ibyishimo byanjye tutakirikumwe nkumva ndashenguwe!
Gusa uko nakomeje kuririmba nshuranga n’akaziki mumodoka naje gutwarwa nikanga nataye umuhanda ngonga umuntu w’umukobwa nabonaga avirirana cyane ndetse ntiyavugaga bishobokeko yari ari muri koma.
Ubwo nahise mpagarara nk’uko amategeko abiteganya kugirango mushyire mumodoka maze ngeze hanze mbona ni Sabine.
