#21355#	0	entertainment	http://www.umuryango.rw/imyidagaduro/imikino/article/rayon-sports-yamaze-gusinyisha-manace-matatu-wakiniraga-ikipe-ya-gasogi-united
Rayon Sports yamaze gusinyisha Manace Matatu wakiniraga ikipe ya Gasogi United Rayon Sports iri kugerageza kwiyubaka nyuma yo gutakaza bamwe mu bakinnyi bayo,yasinyishije umukinnyi wa Gasogi United ukina asatira witwa Manace Matatu.
Manace yagereye rimwe n’umutoza Guy Bukasa mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports ndetse bikekwa ko uyu mutoza ariwe wamuzanye.
Mu butumwa yanyujije kuriTwitter,Munyakazi yagize ati "Akazi karangiye kare.Manasse Matatu n’umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports mu myaka iri imbere."
Nyuma y’ubu butumwa,Sadate yahise ashyiraho ifoto ari kumwe na KNC bari guhuza ibirahuri bishimira iki gikorwa cy’ubucuruzi bakoze.
Mu minsi ishize umuyobozi wa Gasogi United,Kakoza Nkuriza Charles,yatangaje ko muri Gasogi United nta muntu utagurishwa uretse umugore we n’abana ariyo mpamvu yagurishije n’uyu mukinnyi ukina asatira.
Kuwa 02 Nyakanga 2020,nibwo uwari umutoza wa Gasogi United witwa Guy Bukasa,yasinyiye ikipe ya Rayon Sports amasezerano y’umwaka umwe w’imikino 2020/2021.
Bukasa wari umaze umwaka muri Gasogi United,yahisemo gutandukana nayo yerekeza mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports.
Amakuru avuga ko Bukasa Guy wahembwaga $1500 muri Gasogi United azajya ahembwa $4000 mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports.
Bukasa ngo yahisemo kujya mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports, nyuma y’uko byinshi yasabye babimwemereye birimo kumwishyura ibihumbi 8 by’amadolari y’amadolari y’amezi 2 ye ya mbere ku kazi.
Ntagitunguranye nawe azakugura niturebanabi.

#21403#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/ibimenyetso-8-bigaragaza-ko-umukobwa-mukundana-azavamo-umugore-mubi
Ibimenyetso 8 bigaragaza ko umukobwa mukundana azavamo umugore mubi Niba uteganya gusaba umukobwa mukundana ko azakubera umugore, mukabana, kumenya niba witeguye koko gushaka ni icya kabiri cyo gutsinda urugamba.
Ugomba ariko kumenya niba umukobwa mukundana muzabana rugakomera, urugo rwanyu ukarugiriramo ibyishimo n’umunezero.
Urukundo rwonyine ntiruhagije kugira ngo wiyemeze gushaka umugore cyangwa umugabo.
Hari n’indi mico y’umukunzi wawe uba ugomba kwitegereza no kwitondera kugira ngo ufate icyemezo.
Hari imico imwe n’imwe umukobwa mukundana ashobora kuba afite ,ikaba ari ibimenyetso bikuburira ko atazavamo umugore muzima,ushobotse muzabana akaramata nkuko Elcrema, uruba rwandika ku mibanire rubitangaza.
Tugiye kurebera hamwe ibimenyetso byakugaragariza ko umukobwa mukundana azavamo umugore mubi.
1.
Aguca ku nshuti n’abavandimwe Umukobwa uba udashaka ko ugirana ibihe byiza n’inshuti zawe,mugasabana, wa mukobwa uba utifuza ko ugenderera umuryango wawe ,akababazwa n’uko hari icyiza wabakorera cyane cyane kubafasha ku byerekeranye n’umutungo, ntuzatekereze ko nimubana aribwo azahinduka.
2.
Iyo bigukomeranye uramubura Umukobwa mukundana,iyo ibihe bikubanye bibi ntimuba muri kumwe.
Mu buzima ntabwo ibintu bihora bigenda uko ubyifuza.
Hari igihe ibibazo bikubana byinshi,ukabura epfo na ruguru.
Iyo ubukungu bwifashe nabi,umukobwa mwiza mukundana ntimuba mukivuga rumwe.
Iyo umaze kubyigobotoramo ,ukagira intambwe utera runaka, aho muba bamwe.
Urukundo akaruguhundagazaho.
Ese ko ibihe biha ibindi, nimugera mu rugo rwanyu ,ibintu bigahinduka ,muzabasha kumvikana?
Ni ukuvuga ko afite icyo agukurikiyeho kitari urukundo.
3.
Nta ntego agira mu buzima Ubusanzwe umusore wese aba yifuza gushaka umugore ufite intego runaka kandi nibura uzamufasha kugera ku ntambwe ifatika mu gihe kizaza.
Ikizakubwira ko umukobwa mukundana azavamo umugore mubi ni uko mu mutwe we nta kintu apangira ahazaza.
Kuri we iyo bwakeye biba ari ibyo kandi ahanini mwene aba bakobwa baba bategereje kuzarambiriza ku mugabo.
Inshingano zose akaziguharira.
4.
Aragutegeka Nubwo mutarabana ariko aba ashaka ko ukora ibyo ashaka,ujya aho yumva yifuza,kukuyobora mu biganiro mugirana.ko ukora ibyo we yumva bimunyuze.Ko bitangiye kare, ubwo nimugera mu rwanyu bizagenda bite?
Ko abashakanye babanira kuzuzanya no kujya inama,mugakora ibibafitiye inyungu,nta kwikunda kubayeho,bizacura iki nimugera mu rugo?
Ntazakwitegekera ukabura ayo ucira nayo umira?
5.
Aguca inyuma Umukobwa se uguca inyuma mukiri n’ingaragu nimugera mu rwanyu nibwo iyo ngeso azayicikaho?
Yego uba ubona utamuhara cyane urebeye ku bwiza bwe ndetse ukibwira ko uzamuhindura ariko iki ni ikimenyetso cyuko ushobora kuzabaho ubabaye mu rugo rwawe kubera umugore w’umushurashuzi.
Ubwiza sibwo bwubaka urugo.
Hari benshi babugendeyeho birengagiza ingeso kuri ubu bakaba bicuza.
6.
Mu buriri ntimuhuza Ubusanzwe umusore n’inkumi bemerwa gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina nyuma y’uko bamaze kubihererwa uburenganzira n’amategeko ndetse n’idini.
Nubwo bimeze gutyo ariko ,muri iyiminsi biragoye kubona abantu babana batararyamana.
Niba rero mwararyamanye (n’ubwo ari icyaha kandi mukaba mutari mubyemerewe),mukaba mudahuza kuri iyo ngingo ,mu rugo rwanyu witegure guhangana n’ibibazo.
Uguhuza cyangwa ukudahuza mu gihe cyo gutera akabariro bigira ingaruka nziza cyangwa mbi ku mibanire yanyu.
7.
Arafuha ku buryo bukabije Nubwo gufuha mu buryo buringaniye biba ari ngombwa mu rukundo,gufuha kuburyo bukabije bikurura umwuka mubi hagati y’abakundana.
Niba umukobwa mukundana atifuza ko uvugana n’abandi bakobwa,ko utagirana umubano wose n’igitsinagore aho kiva kikagera,ni ukuvuga ko atakwizera.
Kwambikana impeta sibyo bizazana icyizere cyangwa ngo bikemure uko gufuha kwe gukabije.
8.
Ntajya yemera amakosa Mu buzima nta muntu udakosa.
Kwemera ikosa igihe hari aho wakosheje ndete ukabisabira imbabazi ntibigabanya icyubahiro wari ufite,ntibikuraho ubwiza n’uburanga wari usanganywe,.
Niba rero iyo agukoshereje atajya yemera amakosa ye ,ahubwo akakurusha uburakari,ntutegereze ko bizahinduka nimubana Iyi ni imwe mu mico ishobora kukugaragariza ko umukobwa mukundana ndetse wenda muteganya kubana ashobora kutazavamo umugore mwiza nkuko ubyifuza.
Niba nawe hari indi mico uzi cyangwa ubona yatuma umukobwa runaka azavamo umugore udashobotse,shyira igitekerezo cyawe ahabugenewe.

#21404#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/minisiteri-y-ubuzima-yanyomoje-ibivugwa-ko-ebola-ikomeje-gusatira-u-rwanda
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yanyomoje ibivugwa ko Ebola ikomeje gusatira u Rwanda Minisiteri y’Ubuzima irahumuriza Abanyarwanda n’Abaturarwanda ibamenyesha ko nta tangazo ryatanzwe n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OMS), rivuga ko Ebola irushijeho gusatira u Rwanda.
Ni nyuma y’inkuru yacicikanye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga no ku rubuga rwa BBC tariki ya 28 Mutarama 2019, ivuga ko OMS yatangaje ko Ebola irushijeho gusatira u Rwanda.
Iri tangazo ryasohotse tariki ya 28 Mutarama 2019 riragira riti “Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iramenyesha Abanyarwanda n’Abaturarwanda ko nta tangazo yahawe n’Ishami ry’ Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe ubuzima, OMS, ryaba rivuga ko Ebola irushijeho gusatira u Rwanda nk’uko byavuzwe mu itangazamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga”.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ikaba iboneyeho guhumuriza abanyarwanda n’abandi bose bagenderera u Rwanda ko kugeza ubu nta muntu uragaragaraho icyorezo cya Ebola kandi ko hafashwe ingamba zitandukanye zo gukumira no kwirinda icyo cyorezo.
U Rwanda rumaze igihe mu myiteguro yo gukumira no kwirinda icyorezo cya Ebola cyibasiye igihugu cy’abaturanyi, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) kandi aho igeze harashimishije.
Ku bufatanye n’izindi nzego zitandukanye za leta n’imiryango mpuzamahanga harimo Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe ubuzima, OMS, hateguwe amahugurwa y’abaganga, abaforomo n’abandi bakora mu mavuriro mu turere twose tw’igihugu.
Hahuguwe kandi abashinzwe guhugura abandi kuva ku karere kugera ku mudugudu harimo abajyanama b’ubuzima, mu bijyanye no kwirinda no gukumira icyorezo cya Ebola.
Abandi bahuguwe harimo abapolisi, abanyamakuru n’abakorera bushake ba Croix Rouge y’u Rwanda.
Ubukangurambaga bugikomeza burakorwa ku bijyanye no kumenya ibimenyetso bya Ebola, uburyo bwo kwirinda kuyandura n’icyakorwa iyo habonetse uwaba yayanduye.
Ibi birakorwa ku nzego zitandukanye kugera mu mudugudu aho batanga ubutumwa bwo gukumira no kwirinda icyorezo cya Ebola mu muganda, mu mashuri, ku ma radiyo na za televiziyo n’ahandi hose hahurira abantu benshi.
Ibyaba n’andi mashusho byaramanitswe hafi ya za gasutamo, ku ma hoteri, amashuri, ibitaro n’ibigo nderabuzima n’ahandi hahurira abantu benshi mu turere twegereye imipaka.
Ubutumwa butangwa bwakozwe hagendewe ku byavuye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe mu kureba ubumenyi abanyarwanda bafite mu bijyanye no kwirinda icyorezo cya Ebola.
Hubatswe ikigo cyihariye mu kuvura Ebola iramutse igaragaye mu murenge wa Rugerero mu karere ka Rubavu.
Haguzwe ibikoresho n’imiti byakwifashishwa haramutse hagaragaye Ebola mu Rwanda.
Hakozwe imyitozo itandukanye yo gusuzuma uko u Rwanda rwiteguye kuba rwahangana na Ebola iramutse ihagaragaye.
Iyo myitozo yabereye mu bitaro bya Gisirikare i Kanombe mu mujyi wa Kigali, Mu Karere ka Rusizi ku bitaro bya Gihundwe, ku kibuga cy’indege cya Kamembe no ku kigo gifite ubushobozi buhagije bwo kuvura Ebola i Rugerero mu Karere ka Rubavu.
Minisiteri y’ubuzima igira iti “Ibyo byose biragagaza ko u Rwanda rwiteguye bihagije guhangana na Ebola.
Nubwo duhagaze neza mu kwitegura Ebola, imyitozo irakomeje ku nzego zitandukanye mu gihugu.”
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima kandi iributsa abantu bose ko Ebola ari indwara yandura iyo amaraso cyangwa amatembabuzi y’umuntu uyirwaye akoze ku muntu muzima.
Ibimenyetso by’iyo ndwara ni ukugira umuriro, kurwara umutwe, kuribwa mu ngingo, kubabara mu muhogo, gucika intege, guhitwa, kuruka cyane kandi kenshi, kuribwa mu nda no kuva amaraso ahantu hose hari umwenge ku mubiri w’umuntu.
Ebola ntiyandurira mu mwuka.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iributsa ko iyi ndwara yoroshye cyane kwirinda iyo abantu bitaye ku isuku.
Yasabye ko abantu bagira umuco wo gukaraba intoki bakoresheje amazi meza n’isabune.
Umuntu wese ufite ibimenyetso bya Ebola byavuzwe haruguru agomba kwihutira kujya ku ivuriro rimwegereye, gukomeza umuco mwiza wo kwivuza hakiri kare igihe cyose wumva urwaye no kwirinda gukora ingendo zitari ngombwa ahagaragaye Ebola.
U Rwanda rwiteguye guhangana n'icyorezo cya Ebola [email protected]

#21426#	8	technology	https://rwandamagazine.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/uburusiya-indege-yaguye-igitaraganya-ifatwa-n-inkongi-41-barapfa
Uburusiya :Indege yaguye igitaraganya ifatwa n’inkongi, 41 barapfa Abantu 41 baraye bapfiriye mu ndege yafashwe n’inkongi y’umuriro ubwo yari imaze kugwa igitaraganya ku kibuga cy’indege cya Sheremetyevo i Moscow ku murwa mukuru w’Uburusiya.
Amashusho yagaragajwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yarimo abagenzi basohoka vuba vuba mu ndege ya kompanyi ya Aeroflot irimo ishya.
Mu bapfiriye muri iyi ndege, harimo abana n’abakozi bo mu ndege nkuko bivugwa n’ibiro ntaramakuru Interfax bya leta y’Uburusiya.
Yelena Markovskaya, uri mu itsinda riri gukora iperereza ku cyabiteye, yavuze ko indege yarimo abantui 73, muri bo abagenzi 33 barokotse abakozi b’indege bane nabo bararokoka.
Abantu batanu bari mu bitaro.
Abarokotse bavuga ko iyo ndege yakubiswe n’inkuba, ariko Aeroflot, kompanyi y’igihugu, yatangaje ko iyi ndege hashize akanya ihagurutse byabaye ngombwa ko igaruka ku kibuga kubera ibibazo bya tekiniki yagize, bitatangajwe.
Iyi mpanuka yatumye indege zari zigiye kugwa kuri iki kibuga zoherezwa ku bindi bibuga by’indege.
Byagenze bite?
Iyi ndege yo mu bwoko bwa Sukhoi Superjet-100, yari yerekeje mu wundi mujyi wo mu Burusiya, abayitwaye bagaragaje ko igize ikibazo hashize umwanya muto ihagurutse.
Nyuma y’iminota 30 ihagurutse yahise igaruka ku kibuga by’igitaraganya, imaze kugera hasi moteri zayo zifatwa n’inkongi nkuko itangazo rya Aeroflot ribivuga.
Abakozi b’iyi ndege bagerageje gusohora abagenzi vuba vuba mu gihe cy’amasegonda 55.
Bose ntibashoboye gusohoka, iyi kompanyi yasohoye urutonde rw’abantu barokotse iyi nkongi ivuga ko ikomeza gutanga amakuru mashya aboneka.
Ibiro ntaramakuru Interfax bisubiramo amagambo y’uwabihaye amakuru ariko bitatangaje izina, avuga ko iyi ndege yafashwe n’inkongi nyuma yo kugwa nabi yihonze hasi.
Ko inkongi itahereye mu kirere nkuko byari byavuzwe mbere.
Ibinyamakuru bindi mu Burusiya nabyo bivuga ko iyi ndege itabashije kugwa neza.
Umuyobozi w’agace ka Murmansk aho iyi ndege yaguye, yatangaje ko imiryango y’ababuze ababo n’abarwaje ababo kubera ibi byabaye iza guhabwa ubufasha bw’amafaranga.
Bamwe mu bari muri iyi ndege batanze ubuhamya ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’uburyo barokotse.
Mikhail Savchenko, umwe muri bo, yatangaje ko yabashije "gusimbuka akava muri iyi ndege" igifatwa n’inkongi iri mu muhanda wayo.
Patrick Horlacher wari ku kibuga cy’indege agiye gufata indi ndege, yabwiye BBC ko "biteye ubwoba" kubona ibyabaye.Ubu hatangijwe iperereza ku cyateye ibyabaye kuri iyi ndege.Naho mu karere ka Murmansk yabereyemo batangije icyunamo cy’iminsi itatu.

#21463#	5	politics	http://www.igihe.com/politiki/amakuru/article/perezida-kagame-yahuye-n-itsinda-ryamufashije-kunoza-amavugurura-akenewe-muri
Perezida Kagame yahuye n'itsinda ryamufashije kunoza amavugurura akenewe muri AU Yanditswe na Rabbi Malo Umucunguzi Kuya 26 Gashyantare 2017 saa 05:17 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 6 0 Perezida Paul Kagame yahuye n'itsinda ry'abahanga bamufashije kunoza raporo ku mavugurura akenewe mu mikorere y'Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU), mu gihe gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro yemejwe mu nama y'abakuru b'ibihugu iheruka byo byatangiye.
Mu Nteko rusange ya 28 y'Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yateraniye Addis Ababa muri Mutarama, nibwo Perezida Kagame yagejeje raporo ku bakuru b'ibihugu 54 bigize AU, ku mavugurura akenewe mu mikorere y'uyu muryango.
Ni inshingano yari yaraherewe mu nama ya 27 ya AU yabereye i Kigali muri Nyakanga 2016, ndetse atoranya inararibonye icyenda zamufashije muri ako kazi.
Hari byinshi byasabiwe kuvugururwa Mu nzego zari zikeneye amavugurura, harimo imikorere ya Komisiyo ya AU, uburyo bwo gupima uko inzego zigera ku byo ziyemeje, kwishakamo ubushobozi nk'ibihugu bihuriye mu muryango, uko abayobozi bahagararirwa mu nama za AU n'ibindi.
Mu nama yabereye mu muhezo muri Ethiopia kuwa 29 Mutarama 2017, Perezida Kagame yagaragarije abakuru b'ibihugu bigize AU ko hari ikibazo cyo kuba imiryango ishamikiye kuri AU itagaragara neza uko igabana inshingano n'abanyafurika bakaba batabona akamaro k'uyu muryango.
Byiyongeraho kuba kenshi abakuru b'ibihugu bakorana inama, bagafata imyanzuro bakayumvikanaho ariko ntishyirwe mu bikorwa, ashimangira ko kugira ngo aya mavugurura ashoboke bisaba indi mikorere bityo icyo kibazo kigakemuka mbere y'ibindi.
Yavuze ko kugira ngo imyanzuro ifatirwa mu nama za AU ijye irushaho gushyirwa mu bikorwa, hakwiye kubaho uburyo abayobozi ba AU basimburana ku rwego rw'abakuru b'ibihugu, utahiwe akazajya atorwa mbere y'umwaka umwe.
Yakomeje agira ati"Abakuru b'ibihugu bakwiye kujya bahagararirwa mu nama n'abayobozi batari munsi y'urwego rwa Visi Perezida cyangwa Minisitiri w'Intebe.
Kuri iyi ngingo by'umwihariko, hari ubwo Perezida aba adahari, yaba Minisitiri w'Intebe, abaminisitiri, ba ambasaderi, ugasanga byageze ku banyamabanga ba za ambasade n'abandi.
Ndatekereza ko ibi bidakwiye."
Gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro byaratangiye Umwe mu myanzuro iri gushyirwa mu bikorwa n'ibihugu, harimo ko ibikorwa bya AU, bigomba gushingira ku bushobozi bw'abanyafurika, aho buri gihugu cyajya gitanga 0.2% by'amahoro y'ibyinjira mu gihugu, ukajya muri AU, amafaranga akomoka kuri ayo mahoro yose hamwe akazagera kuri miliyari $1.2 buri mwaka.
Muri Ethiopia, Perezida Kagame yagize ati "Gahunda zacu ziraterwa inkunga n'abanyamahanga ku kigero cya 97%, kandi kugera mu Ukuboza 2016, munsi ya kimwe cya kabiri cy'ibihugu bari barishyuye imisanzu yabo yose."
"Umwanzuro ku kwishakamo ubushobozi wo muri Nyakanga umwaka ushize wagize uruhare muri aya mavugurura.
Iyo ari wowe uri kwishyura, uhita uhangayikishwa no kubona ibihwanye n'amafaranga watanze."
Uyu mwanzuro u Rwanda rumaze gutera intambwe ifatika mu kuwushyira mu bikorwa, aho kuwa 21 Gashyantare Abadepite bemeje ishingiro ry'umushinga w'itegeko rishyiraho amahoro (soma amahooro) ku bicuruzwa byatumijwe mu mahanga, agenewe ibikorwa by'Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (AU).
Ni itegeko rizatuma guverinoma y'u Rwanda ibasha gukusanya agera kuri miliyari 1.5 Frw buri mwaka agenewe gushyikigira ibikorwa bya AU.
Kuva kuwa 1 Mutarama 2017 biteganywa ko AU izakoresha ingengo y'imari ya $1167 046, arimo $ 886 246 agize ingengo y'imari y'imirimo isanzwe na $280 800 agenewe ikigega cyo kubungabunga amahoro.
Inkuru bifitanye isano: U Rwanda rwatangiye gahunda igamije gukusanya umusanzu uzafasha ukwigira kwa AU Iby'ingenzi bikubiye muri raporo Perezida Kagame yagejeje kuri AU Perezida Kagame mu biganiro n'Itsinda ryamufashije kunoza amavugurura mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe Kwamamaza Kwamamaza Izindi nkuru wasoma Politiki Ibuka yamaganye umusenateri w'Umufaransa ushinjwa gupfobya Jenoside 2 0 0 Politiki Minisitiri Mushikiwabo yasabye Afurika guhagurukira ikibazo cy'abana bashorwa mu ntambara 0 0 Politiki Urwishe ya nka ruracyayirimo: ​Bombori bombori hagati ya ​FDU Inkingi ​na Padiri Nahimana 3 0 0 Politiki U Rwanda rwababajwe n'urupfu rwa Ambasaderi w'u Burusiya muri Loni 0 0 Inkuru ziheruka - Amakuru Imwe mu mpamvu z'igitutu u Burayi bushyira ku Rwanda ku kibazo cya Ingabire Victoire 02/03/17 - 11:19 Umujyanama wa Fillon
ushaka kuyobora u Bufaransa yatangaje ibyo yaganiriye na Habyarimana mbere ya Jenoside 01/03/17 - 10:51 Perezida Kagame yakomoje ku ntambwe u Rwanda rwateye mu kurengera abana n'abagore 18/02/17 - 06:52 Nyamurinda Pascal yatorewe kuyobora Umujyi wa Kigali: Uko amatora yagenze 17/02/17 - 12:15 Ibyagenerwaga Abanyapolitiki bakuru b'Igihugu bacyuye igihe byagabanyijwe 07/02/17 - 04:01 PSD mu myiteguro y'amatora ya Perezida, inashyigikira ‘Ndi Umunyarwanda' 24/01/17 - 12:51 Kwamamaza TANGA IGITEKEREZO AMATEGEKO AGENGA IYANDIKA RY'IGITEKEREZO CYAWE × AMATEGEKO AGENGA IYANDIKA RY'IGITEKEREZO CYAWE Witandukira kubijyanye n'iyi nkuru; wikwandika ibisebanya, ibyamamaza cyangwa bivangura; wikwandika ibiteye isoni, Wifuza kubona byihuse ibivugwa/ibisubizo ku gitekerezo cyawe, andika email yawe ahabugenewe.

#21483#	1	sports	https://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/munyakazi-sadate-yemeje-ko-rayon-sports-imaze-gusinyisha-abakinnyi-batanu
Munyakazi Sadate yemeje ko Rayon Sports imaze gusinyisha abakinnyi batanu, isigaje abandi babiri gusa Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, yemeje ko imaze kugura abakinnyi batanu bashya mu gihe ikomeje ibiganiro n’abandi babiri kugira ngo izabe ari ikipe ikomeye mu mwaka utaha w’imikino.
Rayon Sports ni imwe mu makipe atari kuvugwa cyane ku isoko ry’abakinnyi mu gihe hari abakomeje kuyisohokamo berekeza mu yandi makipe.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Radio Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatanu, Munyakazi yavuze ko Rayon Sports imaze gusinyisha abakinnyi batanu mu gihe ikomeje ibiganiro n’abandi babiri.
Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports yirinze gutangaza aba bakinnyi, avuga ko bizakorwa guhera tariki ya 21 Kamena ubwo isoko ry’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinnyi rizaba rifunguye.
Ati “Namara impungenge abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports ko tumaze gusinyisha abakinnyi batari munsi ya batanu ndetse tukaba tunitegura ko dushobora gusinyisha n’abandi babiri ari nabo bazaba ari aba nyuma mu bakinnyi duteganya kugura muri uyu mwaka.
Ku bo tumaze gusinyisha, umubare wa 30 tuzakoresha warageze, abo tuzasinyisha bandi bivuga ko hari abo tuzatiza.”
Umaze kumenyekana wamaze kwerekeza muri iyi kipe ni Uwiringiyimana Christophe ukina inyuma ku myanya itandukanye irimo ibumoso, uyu akaba yarakiniraga Gicumbi FC.
Abandi bavugwa ko baganiriye n’ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports barimo Michael Sarpong wasabye imbabazi, Mugheni Fabrice wasezeye ikipe ariko nyuma akisabira ko bakongera kuganira akongera amasezerano ndetse na Hakizimana Muhadjiri wifuza miliyoni 15 Frw ngo asinye umwaka umwe, ibiganiro bigatinzwa n’uko Rayon Sports imubwira ko yayamwishyura mu byiciro bibiri.
Hakizimana Muhadjiri wamaze gutandukana na Emirates FC yakiniraga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, ategerejwe i Kigali mu minsi iri imbere.
Munyakazi Sadate avuga ko nubwo batakaje abakinnyi benshi, bizeye ko mu mwaka utaha bazaba bafite ikipe ihanganira igikombe, ariko hari n’abandi bakinnyi batandatu bakiri bato bazazamurwa, bamwe bagatizwa andi makipe.
Ati “Gahunda dufite ni iyo guhatanira ibikombe nk’ibisanzwe.
Abakinnyi twasinyishije ni abamenyereye shampiyona barimo n’abanyamahanga tubona ko bashobora kutugeza ku bikombe.
Abana bagera kuri batandatu tuzazamura uyu mwaka tuzabohereza mu makipe dufitanye umubano kugira ngo bazamure urwego, babe bamenyera shampiyona, igihe nikigera tuzabagarure.”
Munyakazi Sadate yemeje ko Rayon Sports imaze gusinyisha abakinnyi batanu, isigaje abandi babiri gusa

#21556#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/article/axon-tunga-yegereje-serivisi-z-imari-ziganjemo-ikoranabuhanga-abasura
AXON Tunga yegereje serivisi z’imari ziganjemo ikoranabuhanga abasura imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa mu Rwanda Ikigo cy’imari cya ‘AXON Tunga’ kimaze kwamamara kuri serivisi z’imari mu Rwanda, cyegereje abasura imurikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa mu Rwanda serivisi zacyo ziganjemo iz’ikoranabahanga rifasha abakiliya guhuza konti bafitemo n’iya MTN Mobile Money, ku buryo babitsa cyangwa bakabikuza ku mukozi wayo bitabasabye gutonda umurongo ku mashami yayo.
Iri murikagurisha rizwi nka Made in Rwanda Expo riri kubera i Gikondo muri Expo Ground, ryatangiye ku wa 22 Ugushyingo 2019 rikazasozwa ku wa 4 Ukuboza 2019.
Ryitabiriwe n’abamurika bo mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo ikoranabuhanga, inganda, ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, ubugeni, iz’imari zirimo izo AXON Tunga itanga.
AXON Tunga itanga serivisi nziza kandi zihuse zirimo izo kubitsa, kubikuza, kuguriza, iri gukorera mu kibanza kimurikirwamo serivisi ziganjemo iz’ikoranabuhanga, cyanditseho ICT Chamber.
Ukigera aho AXON Tunga imurikira, nk’ibisanzwe wakiranwa urugwiro n’abakozi bayo bafite ubunararibonye mu gucunga neza umutungo no kuwubyaza inyungu, bakagusobanurira ubwoko bwa konti n’inguzanyo icyo kigo cy’imari gitanga nawe ukihitiramo wamaze kumva ibyiza bya buri imwe.
Muri konti abakozi b’iki kigo cy’imari kimaze kwigarurira imitima y’abatari bacye kubera serivisi inoze kirimo gusobanurira abasura imurikagurisha harimo iyo kubitsa no kubikuza uko wabyifuza, iyo kwizigamira yunguka 3% n’iyo kwizigamira by’igihe kirekire yunguka 9%, zose zikagufasha guhabwa inguzanyo.
AXON Tunga kandi ifite serivisi y’umwihariko, aho ushobora kubahamagara kuri 5010 cyangwa 0783523748 aho waba uri hose, bitewe n’ingano y’amafaranga ushaka kubitsa cyangwa kubikuza, bakagusanga aho ukorera ubucuruzi bwawe mu rwego rwo kuyongerera umutekano.
Iki kigo kinafite n’inguzanyo buri wese yisangamo zirimo ihabwa abantu ku giti cyabo, ihabwa amatsinda y’abantu bari hagati ya 6-10 nyuma yo gufungura konti, bakanayizigamiraho ariko bagasabwa gutanga ingwate y’umutungo utimukanwa.
Hari ihabwa amatsinda y’abari hagati ya 11-30 nyuma yo gufungura konti bakanayizigamiraho.
Ifitiye abishyize hamwe akamaro kihariye nk’uko ubuyobozi bwa AXON Tunga bubisobanura.
Iyi ihabwa abishyize hamwe nta ngwate batswe.
Ubuyobozi bw’iki kigo cy’imari kandi bwabwiye IGIHE ko hari n’inguzanyo ihabwa umuntu ku giti cye, wikorera ufitemo konti yizigamiraho igihe yifuza kwagura ibikorwa bye.
Ayihabwa nyuma yo kuganirizwa, akagirwa inama y’ingano y’inguzanyo yafata bitewe n’ubushobozi afite ndetse n’uko umushinga afite uzunguka.
Hari n’inguzanyo y’ingoboka, ihabwa abakiliya bamaze igihe bakorana na AXON Tunga igihe bahuye n’ikibazo kibasaba amafaranga mu buryo bwihutirwa n’inguzanyo ku mushahara.
Iyo ku mushahara yagenewe abakozi bahemberwa muri AXON Tunga, igihe bifuza kugura ikintu gifite agaciro karuta umushahara.
Iyi bashobora kuyaka nk’igihe bifuza kugura imodoka, ikibanza, inzu cyangwa n’ibindi bibafasha kwiteza imbere.
Ubuyobozi bwa AXON Tunga buvuga ko ‘Inguzanyo z’amatsinda, inyungu ari 2% naho izindi zose ni 1,5% ku kwezi’ ingano yazo ikagendana n’ubushobozi bw’umukiriya ndetse hanagendewe ku buryo umukiliya akoresha konti.
AXON Tunga yatangiye gukorera mu Rwanda mu 2017, ifite umwihariko wo kwimakaza ikoranabuhanga rijyanye na gahunda ya Guverinoma yo kugabanya ingano y’amafaranga ahererekanywa mu ntoki.
Abakozi ba Axon Tunga begera abakiliya bakabereka uko konti bafite zabafasha kugera ku ndoto zabo Abakozi ba Axon Tunga bakirana urugwiro abayigana Axon Tunga yegereje serivisi z'imari ziganjemo iz'ikoranabuhanga abasura imurikagurisha ry'ibikorerwa mu Rwanda Ikibanza Axon Tunga irimo gukoreramo muri Made in Rwanda Expo Itanga serivisi ziganjemo izikorerwa kuri telefone Muri Axon Tunga umukiliya ni nk'umwami Zimwe muri serivisi itanga harimo kubitsa kubikuza n'inguzanyo

"Hejuru ya byose", indirimbo nshya ya Tonzi (VIDEO) Uwitonze Clementine uzwi ku izina rya Tonzi yamaze gushyira hanze amashusho y’indirimbo ’Hejuru ya byose’ irimo ubutumwa bwibutsa abantu ko ibyo bacamo byose bakwiriye kwibuka ko hari Imana iri hejuru ya byose.
Tonzi yatangarije Rwandamagazine.com ko iyi ndirimbo yayikoze agamije kwibutsa abantu ko mu bibazo byose umuntu anyuramo ku isi, ibizazane bitandukanye, ko akwiriye kuzirikana ko hejuru hari Imana isumba byose kandi iruta ibyo byose bigora muntu.
Tonzi ati " Isi ni iruvangitirane rw’ibibi n’ibyiza ariko igihe icyo aricyo cyose tujye twibuka ko dufite Imana.
Ku bafite ibyiringiro, Imana ni ubuzima.
Ku batabifite nabakangurira kwizera Imana no kuyishingikirizaho kuko ijambo ryayo ritubwira ngo hahirwa uwubatse ku rutare, iyo imiyaga ije, Imana ibasha kuyimurindiramo."
Yunzemo ati ".
Kandi no mu gihe tugeze mu byishimo, tujye twibuka ko atari ku mbaraga zacu ahubwo ko isoko ya byose ari Imana."
Iyi ndirimbo mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe inatunganywa na Camarade mu gihe amashusho yayo yo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Eliel Sando.
Tonzi yaherukaga gushyira hanze album ya 7 yise ’Akira’ iriho indirimbo 12.
Kuri ubu iyi album iri hanze kuri CD ndetse na Flash Disks.
’Akira’ iriho indirimbo zindi nka ’Sikubwanjye’,’ Aho’, Umwizerwa’, ’ Niwe niwe’ n’izindi zinyuranye.

#21643#	7	development	http://umubavu.com/iterambere/article/Kuva-mu-mwaka-wa-2022-hazakoreshwa-imodoka-zitagira-abashoferi
Kuva mu mwaka wa 2022 hazakoreshwa imodoka zitagira abashoferi Uko bukeye nuko bwije ikoranabuhanga niko rigenda ryunguka ibintu bishya kugeza aho kuri ubu kuva mu mwaka wa 2022, igihugu cya Singapour giteganya gutangira gukoresha imodoka zitwara abantu zitagira abashoferi nyuma y’ikoreshwa ry’indege zitagira abapilote.
Leta ya Singapour ivuga ko izo modoka zizajya zica mu turere dutatu turimo imihanda idakunze kugaragaramo urujya n’uruza rw’abantu.
Iyi mihanda ngo niyo yagenewe kugendeshwamwo aya mabisi atagira abashoferi gusa.
Izi modoka zitwara abagenzi zizafasha mu duce tutarangwamo abantu benshi, hafi y’imihanda ikunze kunyuramo amagariyamoshi ndetse n’ahanyuraga amabisi manini.
Igihugu cya Singapour gifite abaturage benshi bituma kizera ko ubwo buhanga bwo kudakoresha abashoferi buzafasha mu bibazo by’ubutaka n’amikoro make y’abantu.
Khaw Wan, Minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu yagize ati "Izi modoka zizafasha abantu cyane mu buryo bwo gukora ingendo zabo za buri munsi bitagoranye cyane cyane ku bageze muza bukuru.
Imiryango ifite abana bakiri bato ndetse n’ifite abafite ubumuga".
Izi modoka zitagira abashoferi zizaba zije gusimbura izari zihasanzwe, kandi zizakora ahanini mu masaha akuze atagaragaramo urujya n’uruza rw’abantu.
Ubusanzwe nta murongo w’imodoka ukunze kurangwa muri Singapour ugereranije no mu bindi bihugu byo mu majyepfo y’umugabane wa Asia, kubera ukwiyongera kw’imihanda na politike yo guteza imbere uburyo bwo gutwara abantu.
Ku ikubitiro mu mwaka wa 2022, iki gihugu cyizeye kuzahita gifata iya mbere mu ikoreshwa ry’ubuhanga bwo gutwara abantu mu modoka zitagira abashoferi.
Daniel MUKESHIMANA/Umubavu.com

#21655#	0	entertainment	http://www.kigalitoday.com/imyidagaduro/muzika/article/ruswa-mu-itangazamakuru-ry-imyidagaduro-niyo-isubiza-inyuma-hip-hop-riderman
Ruswa mu itangazamakuru ry’imyidagaduro niyo isubiza inyuma Hip Hop – Riderman Umuraperi Riderman ahamya ko kuba injyana ya Hip Hop iri kugenda isubira inyuma biterwa ahanini na bamwe mu banyamakuru b’imyidagaduro avuga ko barya ruswa.
Riderman ahamya ko ruswa yakwa abahanzi ba Hip Hop ariyo isubiza inyuma iyo njyana Riderman ubwo yari ari mu kiganiro cyatambutse kuri Radio y’igihugu, mu cyumweru cyarangiye ku cyumweru tariki ya 17 Nzeli 2017.
Icyo kiganiro cyahuje abahanzi n’abanyamakuru bibaza igituma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma.
Hatanzwe ibitekerezo byinshi birimo kuba abahanzi barahinduye ubutumwa banyuzaga muri Hip Hop no kuba abahanzi bamwe bararetse Hip Hip bakajya mu njyana zibyinitse.
Kuri ibyo kandi ngo hiyongera imyitwarire mibi yagiye iranga abahanzi bakora iyi njyana irimo ibiyobyabwenge, kutamenya uburyo bwo kwamamaza ibyo bakora n’ibindi.
Izo ngingo zose ntabwo Riderman yigeze azemera.
Avuga ko ahubwo igisubiza inyuma Hip Hop ari abanyamakuru b’imyidagaduro baba abandika, abakora kuri Tereviziyo n’abakora kuri Radio zitandukanye avuga ko “bamunzwe na uswa”.
Riderman yavuze ko abahanzi bakora Hip Hop biyemeje kutazatanga ruswa ngo ibihangano byabo bicishwe ku ma Radio cyangwa kuri za Tereviziyo.
Bikaba ngo ariyo ntandaro yo kuba bakora imiziki myinshi nyamara abanyamakuru ntibayimenyekanishe.
Agira ati“Twebwe aba Raperi turi dushaka impinduramatwara.
Ntabwo tujya dutanga amafaranga ngo ducurarangwe, kandi abanyamakuru bamwe utabahaye amafaranga ntabwo bashobora kugucuranga.
Iyo niyo mpamvu yonyine ituma injyana yacu irushaho gusubira inyuma, navuga ko abanyamakuru aribo bayisubiza inyuma.”
Mu kiganiro cyamaze hafi isaha, Riderman yahagaze kuri icyo gitekerezo, ndetse yanga guha agaciro ibindi bitekerezo byatangwaga.
Riderman ntiyemeranya n’abavuga ko abaraperi ubwabo ari bo batuma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma Riderman, umuraperi watwaye irushwanwa rya Primus Guma Guma Superstar ubwo ryabaga ku nshuro ya gatatu, kuri ubu afite indirimbo nshya yitwa "Kadage".
Iyo ndirimbo ni imwe ndirimbo zikinwa cyane ku ma radio.
Yabajijwe niba yaratanze ruswa kugira ngo iyo ndirimbo ye ikinwe.
Yasubije ko igituma iyo ndirimbo ikinwa cyane nta kindi uretse kuba yaravuzemo ibya ruswa agasa n’uwerekana icyo kibazo abicishe mu ndirimbo.
Mu ndirimbo “Kadage” Riderman hari aho aririmba agira ati “Giti mujye muyaka imishwi jyewe ndi rusake.”
Umuraperi Jay C nawe wari uri muri icyo kiganiro ntiyemeranya na Riderman.
Uyu muraperi afite indirimbo yitwa “I am Back” yakoranye na Bruce Melodie.
Iyo ndirimbo ye iri mu njyana ya Hip Hop iri mu za mbere zikinwa cyane ku ma radio na tereviziyo.
Yabajijwe niba yaba yaratanze ruswa kugira ngo iyo ndirimbo ye ikinwe maze arabihaka avuga ko nta n’uwo yahaye igiceri cya 100RWf.
Akomeza avuga ko igisubiza inyuma injyana ya Hip Hop ari ikinyabupfura gike cy’abahanzi bakora iyo njyana.
Jay C avuga ko muri iyo myitwarire mibi harimo gutera inda abafana babo, kumvikana mu manza no mu mvururu za gato na hato ndetse no kuba hari bamwe mu baraperi bumvikanye ku maradio batuka abanyamakuru.
Umuraperi Jay C ntiyemeranya na Riderman Umunyamakuru Eppaphrodite Ndungutse wari uyoboye icyo kiganiro, yeretse Riderman ko igituma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma hatarimo ruswa nkuko abivuga.
Yamweretse ko ahubwo gusubira nyuma kw’iyo njyana bigirwamo uruhare n’abaraperi ubwabo aho usanga bamwe bashyira hanze ibihangano bidafite ireme.
Ndungutse yakomeje yereka Riderman ko ikindi gituma injyana ya Hip Hop isubira inyuma ari uko usanga bamwe mu ba raperi badakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga ngo basakaze ibihangano byabo kuba ntu benshi.
Aha yatanze urugero avuga ko usanga ari abaraperi bake bibuka gushyira indirimbo zabo kuri YouTube.
Eppaphrodite yagize ati “Aba raperi ntabwo mukunda gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga n’indi mirongo ya interineti mu kwamamaza ibyo mukora.
Kandi mushinjwa kudakora amashusho meza akurura abareba indirimbo zanyu.”
Ibyo byose Riderman yarabigaramye avuga ko ntacyo badakora, ahubwo ko ruswa ariyo imunga injyana ya Hip Hop.

#21696#	6	religion	https://rwandamagazine.com/iyobokamana/article/dudu-yaje-gushyikira-dinah-kumurika-album-ya-mbere
Dudu yaje gushyigikira Dinah kumurika album ya mbere Umuhanzi uririmba indirimbo zahimbiwe Imana , Niyukuri T.
Dudu ukomoka mu Burundi yageze mu Rwanda aje gushyigikira Dinah Uwera mu kumurika album ya mbere yise ’Nshuti’.
Dudu yageze ku kibuga mpuzamahanga cya Kigali i Kanombe mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 3 Kanama 2018 ahagana ku isaha ya saa kumi n’ebyiri n’igice za mugitondo.
Ku kibuga cy’indege, yakiriwe na Dinah ndetse na bamwe mu bagize Urugero Media Group iri gufasha Dinah mu gutegura igitaramo azamurikiramo album ya mbere.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru, Dudu yavuze ko ashimishijwe n’intambwe Dinah amaze gutera ndetse ngo atewe ishema no kuza kumushyigikira.
Dudu yagize ati " Ni ishimwe ko Dinah ageze kuri iyi ntambwe.Nje kumushyigikira kumurika album ye ya mbere.
Kuko njye natangiye kera, ni inshingano yanjye gusunika abandi uko nshoboye.
Ntabwo dufite ubushobozi bwinshi ariko aho tugeza , dushyikira abandi kugira ngo bazamuke , twumve izindi ndirimbo nyinshi , twumve izindi mpano nyinshi.
Uko abantu batandukanye, niko bagira ibintu bitandukanye kandi biryoshye."
Niyukuri T.
Dudu ni umuhanzi ukomeye cyane mu gihugu cy’u Burundi mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana.
Akunda kuza gutaramira mu Rwanda aho afite abantu benshi bakunda indirimbo yaririmbiye Imana.
Amaze imyaka 2 aba muri Kenya ariko anyuzamo akaza gukorera mu Rwanda ibitaramo binyuranye.
Dudu yamenyekanye mu ndirimbo zitandukanye zirimo Ndagushima , Sinicuza , Ndiho , Ndagushimiye umugambi n’izindi zinyuranye.
Ku itariki 5 Kanama 2018 nibwo Dinah Uwera azakora igitaramo gikomeye cyo kumurika album ye ya mbere ’Nshuti’.
Ni album izaba iriho indirimbo 9 zirimo izo abantu bazi ndetse n’izindi zitarasohoka.
Azagifashwamo n’abahanzi banyuranye barimo Dudu , True Promises, Band J 360 n’abandi banyuranye.
Kizabera muri Serena Hotel Kigali.
Imiryango izafungurwa saa cyenda z’amanywa.
Kwinjira muri iki gitaramo bizaba ari 3000 FRW na 5000 FRW.
Dinah Uwera yatangiye muzika ku giti cye mu mwaka wa 2005.
Abenshi bamumenye kubera indirimbo ze nka ‘Inshuti gusa’, ‘Says the Lord’, ’Icyo umbwira’ n’izindi zinyuranye.
Dudu ngo yashimishijwe n’Intambwe Dinah Uwera amaze kugeraho bityo ngo atewe ishema no kuza kumushyigikira

#21697#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Ndifuza-kwibutsa-abanyarwanda-bose-ko-abafite-ubumuga-ari-abantu-nk-abandi-Minisitiri-w-intebe-Murekezi
Ndibutsa abanyarwanda bose ko abafite ubumuga ari abantu nk'abandi-Minisitiri w'intebe Murekezi Minisitiri w'intebe Murekezi Anasthase yibukije abanyarwanda ko abafite ubumuga ari abantu nk'abandi kandi ko bafite uruhare runini mu kubaka igihugu.
Mu butumwa bwe, Minisitiri w'Intebe Anastase Murekezi yasabye abanyarwanda guha abamugaye icyubahiro bakwiye.
Yashishikarije kandi abanyarwanda kwita ku burenganzira bw'abafite ubumuga.
Ati:" Ndifuza kwibutsa abanyarwanda bose ko abafite ubumuga ari abantu nk'abandi, bafite uburenganzira bwose busesuye kandi bagira uruhare rukomeye mu kubaka igihugu cyacu.
Ndabasaba rero mwese kubaha icyubahiro bakwiye, ndabasaba kubaha ubufasha bakeneye."
Minisitiri Murekezi kandi yijeje abafite ubumuga ko Leta y'u Rwanda izakomeza kubaha ubufasha ndetse anasaba abanyarwanda kuzagira uruhare mu munsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe abafite ubumuga.
Ati:"Leta y'u Rwanda na yo yongeye kwizeza abafite ubumuga ko izakomeza kubaha ubufasha bwose bushoboka.
Mboneyeho no gusaba abanyarwanda bose kuzitabira ibikorwa byateguriwe kuzitabira umunsi mpuzamahanga w'abafite ubumuga."
Umunsi mpuzamahaganga w'abafite ubumuga uteganyijwe tariki ya 3 Ukuboza 2016.
Insanganyamatsiko yawo iragira iti: "kugera ku ntego z'itera mbere rirambye duteza imbere umurimo kuri bose kugirango n'abafite ubumuga bose bagire umurimo bakora ubateza imbere ugateza n'igihugu imbere".

#21717#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/ni-iyihe-nkomoko-y-imvugo-yakubitiwe-ahareba-i-nzega-yamamaye-kuva-hambere
Ni iyihe nkomoko y’imvugo ‘Yakubitiwe ahareba i Nzega’ yamamaye kuva hambere?
Abanyarwanda baba abakuru n’abato bumva imvugo ngo ‘Yakubitiwe ahareba i Nzega’ ndetse hari na bamwe bakunze kuyikoresha ariko wababaza icyo bisobanura cyangwa imvo n’imvano yayo bakakubwira ko ifitanye isano n’abagabo bibwaga n’indaya.
Umusozi wa Nzega uherereye mu Karere ka Nyamagabe ubu ni mu Murenge wa Gasaka, aho Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE yerekeje ngo aganire n’abahatuye kuva mbere, ku nkomoko y’iyo mvugo.
Abantu b’ingeri zinyuranye yasanze mu gasantere ka Gasaka munsi y’uwo musozi bavuze ko batazi neza inkomoko y’iyo mvugo ariko baracishiriza bakavuga aho bumvise yaturutse.
Mukarwemera Penina, umukecuru wavukiye mu Murenge wa Kigeme uhana imbibi n’uwa Gasaka yashakiyemo mu mwaka wa 1953, avuga ko na we yumvanaga ababyeyi be iyo mvugo bakaba ari na bo bamusobanuriye inkomoko yayo.
Yagize ati “Hano hahoze hitwaga i Nzega kuva kera kubera umusozi uhari wahitiriwe; navutse mbisanga kandi narahagendaga nzanye amata mu Barabu bari bahatuye nkaza no mu isoko rikomeye ryari rihari, kuri ubu rero hari Umudugudu wa Nzega n’Akagari ka Nzega”.
Akomeza avuga ko imvugo “ Yakubitiwe ahareba i Nzega” ifitanye isano n’uburaya bwakorwaga n’abakobwa muri ako gasantere bakurikiye amafaranga yakomokaga ku bucuruzi bw’ikawa, amata ndetse n’amaduka y’Abarabu akomeye yari hepfo yaho gato.
Ati “Abantu bazanaga ikawa kuzigurisha mu Barabu bakabaha amafaranga; hari n’indaya wa mugabo umaze kugurisha ikawa akararana na zo zikayamukuramo kuko abenshi bajyaga mu ndaya bamaze gusinda, bugacya bavuga ngo ya mafaranga indaya zayajyanye, ‘nakubitiwe ahareba i Nzega’; ni aho imvugo yaturutse bikwira bityo.”
Mukarwemera avuga ko mu gihe yari akiri inkumi iyo mvugo yakomeje gukoreshwa, abagabo bakabivuga nk’ikintu baziranyeho bagaraza ibyababayeho (ko bagiye kugura indaya zikabiba amafaranga), hakaba n’abarikoresha basa n’abaninura umugabo babonye atishimye.
Ati “No mu mwaka wa 1963 bari bakibivuga cyane, njyewe nakoreraga abazungu ku Kigeme ariko na hano narahazaga kurema isoko no kugura imyenda mu maduka y’Abarabu.
Hari ubwo rero abagabo na bo babivugaga bari kuninura mugenzi wabo babona yarakaye bakamuvugiraho ngo mumureke yakubitiwe ahareba i Nzega bashaka kumuvugiraho ko yagiye mu ndaya ziramwiba”.
Amaduka y’Abarabu i Nzega yabaye amotongo Mukarwemera avuga ko mbere y’umwaka wa 1963 agasantere ka Gasaka kari gashyushye kubera isoko ryari rihari n’amaduka y’Abarabu ariko kuri ubu hasa n’ahakonje kuko nta bikorwa bikomeye bicyihakorerwa.
Avuga ko nubwo amazu yari ahari yari yubakishije ibyatsi hari hashyushye kubera ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi byahabonekaga.
Ati “Ubu hasigaye hakonje kuko isoko baryimuriye mu Mujyi wa Nyamagabe, amazu y’Abarabu yo yabaye amatongo kuko kuva bahunga mu bwicanyi bwabaye mu 1963 ntabwo bongeye kugaruka.
Kuva ubwo hatangiye kuba amatongo kugeza na n’ubu ni inzu zihagaze ziri gusenyuka; ni amatongo, yewe n’izo ndaya ntazikiba ino kuko habaye mu cyaro”.
Uyu mukecuru avuga ko isoko rya Gasaka ryabagamo ibintu byose byiganjemo ibyo kurya n’ ibyo kunywa na ho amaduka y’Abarabu akabamo imyambaro, umunyu, ikawa, amata n’ibyo kurya bituruka mu nganda.
Mukarwemera Penina yemeza ko agasantere ka Gasaka gasigaye gakonje ugereranyije na mbere hakiba Abarabu Mukarwemera Penina avuga ko iyi nzu yahahoze kuva kera kandi yari imwe muzikomeye zabarizwaga muri ako gasantere Inzu z'Abarabu ziri munsi y'umusozi wa Nzega zarasenyutse kubera ko zitagikoreshwa Aya mazu y'Abarabu yubatse aho bita mu mutima wa Nzega Amazu y'Abarabu ari munsi y'umusozi wa Nzega yabaye amatongo kuko nta muntu ukiyakoreramo Agasantere ka Gasaka ahabaga indaya mu myaka yo hambere hateganye n'umusozi wa Nzega Mukarwemera Penina ahagaze hafi y'aho atuye yerekana umusozi wa Nzega Mukarwemera Penina asobanura inkomoko y'imvugo 'yakubitiwe ahareba i Nzega' Umusozi wa Nzega n'amazu Abarabu bubatse munsi yawo mu myaka yo hambere ahagana mu 1940 Umusozi wa Nzega uwurebeye hakurya mu gasantere ka

Perezida KAGAME yasoje uruzinduko yagiriraga mu Buholandi Kuri uyu wa kabiri Perezida w'u Rwanda Paul Kagame yasoje uruzinduko rw'akazi rw'iminsi ibiri yagiriraga mu Buholandi.
Nyuma yo kuganira n'abanyarwanda barenga ibuhimbi bine bari bitabiriye Rwanda Day ku wa gatandatu I Amsterdam , Perezida Kagame yahise atangira uruzinduko rw'akazi muri icyo gihugu, aho yaganiriye n'Umwami Willem-Alexande ndetse n'umwamikazi Queen Máxima ku bijyanye n'imari.
Perezida Kagame kandi yagiranye ibiganiro na Perezida wa Sena y'Ubuholandi Ankie Broekers-Knol ndetse n'uw'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko Anouchka van Miltenburg, na Minisitiri w'Ububanyi n'amahanga Mr Bert Koenders.
Aganira na Perezida wa Sena ndetse n'uw'Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, Perezida Kagame yashimangiye umubano hagati y'ibihugu byombi.
Yagize ati: " Igihugu kiyubatse bivuye kure.
Ndashimira ukwihangana kw'abanyarwanda n'abafatanyabikorwa nk'Ubuholandi.
U Rwanda rwakomeje gutera imbere mu myaka 20 ishize, nubwo rwagiye ruhura n'ibibazo byinshi."
Perezida Kagame kandi yashishikarije abashoramari bo mu Buholandi kuza gushora imari zabo mu Rwanda.
Yagize ati: "Gushora imari mu Rwanda, ntibigarukira gusa uwashoye imari, ahubwo bigira n'uruhare mu guhindura ubuzima."
Ubuholandi ni kimwe mu bihugu byafashije u Rwanda nyuma gato ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994 kugeza n'ubu.
Nubwo icyo gihugu ari kimwe mu bicumbikiye abantu benshi bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside , kiri no mu bya mbere bifasha u Rwanda mu bijyanye n'Ubutabera.
Gifasha kandi mu mu bijyanye n'ibiribwa no kubungabunga amazi.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hari imishinga 10 y'abaholandi, ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 52, 7 z'amadolari.
Imwe muri yo twavuga nk'ibikorwa by'uruganda rwa Heineken , sosiyete itwara indege ya KLM, hari imishinga kandi mu bijyanye n'ingufu, ubuhinzi n'ubworozui n'ibindi.

Abagera kuri 65% bakirwa na Isange one stop center ni abana b'abakobwa bahohoterwa Isange ikenera ibikoresho bikomeye n'abahanga bo kubikoresha/Photo/Birori Ikigo cya Polisi y'Igihugu gifasha abahuye n'ihohoterwa kuva cyajyaho kimaze kwakira abasaga ibihumbi icumi(10) muri bo abagera kuri 65% ku ijana ari abana b'abakobwa bahohoterwa.
ACP,Dr Wilson Rubanzana umuyobozi wa Isange One Stop Center akaba n'umuhuzabikorwa wa za Isange One Stop center zose avuga ko iki kigo yatangijwe muri 2009 mu rwego rwo gushaka ingamba zo kwita kubantu bakorerwa ihohoterwa.
Yagize ati "Kuva iki kigo cyageraho tumaze kwakira abahohotewe basaga ibihumbi icumi 65% bakaba ari abana b'abakobwa" Kuri ubu ngo hari Isange One Stop Center 12 umwaka utaha ukazatangira zabaye 23 kugeza ubwo izaba kuri buri bitabo.
Avuga ko iki kigo gikora ubufasha butandukanye bw'abaganga,isanamutima,gupima ibimenyetso ndetse bikunganira iperereza ku bugenzacyaha.
Iki kigo cyashimwe ku rwego mpuzamahanga muri 2012 ngo kimaze kurenga imipaka y'u Rwanda kuko hari benshi bagenda bakigiraho.
Umulisa Henriette umunyamabanga uhoraho muri MIGEPROF avuga ko bishoboka nta munyarwanda numwe ukwiye guhura n'ihohoterwa.
Mu nama yo kureba aho One stop Center igeze iramira abantu kuwa 3 Mata 2015 Gusa avuga ko kuba umubare w'abigaragaza ko bahohotewe ugenda wiyongera ataribyo bivuga ko ihohoterwa ryiyongera ahubwo ni ubukangurambaga buba butangiye gutanga umusaruro.
Umuyobozi wa Polisi y'u Rwanda IGP Emmanuel Gasana avuga ko nta munyarwanda ukwiye kugaragara mu bintu by'ihohoterwa,gufata abana ku ngufu ndetse n'ibindi byaha bigaragaza u Rwanda nabi.
Avuga ko ababishinzwe bakwiye gufatira hamwe ingamba zikomeye kuburyo ihohoterwa iryo ariryo ryose rikwiye gucika.
Zimwe mu mbogamizi iki kigo kigifite harimo kuba kigikeneye amafaranga atari make kubera abaganga b'abahanga,kuvurira ubuntu ndetse no kwagura ibikorwa mu gihugu hose.
Indi mbogamizi harimo kuba abahohotewe bakunda kubyihererana cyane bityo hakaba hagikeneye ubukangurambaga.

Kirazira kikaziririzwa gukora ibi bintu mbere yo gutera akabariro Ni kenshi ushobora kumva ushaka kwihagarika mu gihe ugiye gutera akabariro ukumva ko wabikora mbere mu rwego rwo kugirango igikorwa ugiyemo kigende neza uko ubyifuza, nyamara ibi ngo ntabwo ari byiza na gato kuko bishobora kugukururira ibyago byo kuba wafatwa n'indwara zandurira mu miyoboro yinkari ku buryo bwihuse.

#21792#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUREZI/article/Gicumbi-Amwe-mu-mazu-yubakiwe-abarimu-amaze-igihe-yarabuze-abayabamo
Gicumbi: Amwe mu mazu yubakiwe abarimu amaze igihe yarabuze abayabamo Amwe muri aya mazu arafunze kuko nta barimu bayabamo Kuri bimwe mu bigo by'amashuri byo muri buri murenge mu karere ka Gicumbi, uhasanga amazu yagenewe gucumbikira abarimu.
Gusa muri aya mazu hari ayakoreshwa n'andi adakoreshwa bitewe n'uko yubatswe ariko akabura abayabamo bitewe n'uko abarimu bakayabayemo bose baturiye ibigo.
Hirya no hino ku bigo bimwe na bimwe byo mu karere ka Gicumbi hari amazu yubakiwe gucumbikira abarimu, ayo mazu acumbitswemo n'abarimu mu gihe hari n'andi atarigeze yinjiramo abarimu ngo bayacumbikemo.
Bamwe mu barimu bo ku rwunge rw'amashuri rwa APAKE Byumba Inyange, batashatse ko amazina yabo atangazwa, babwiye Makuruki.rw ko impamvu batitabiriye kuyajyamo ari uko batuye hafi, kandi ko gucumbika no kudacumbika muri aya macumbi ari uburenganzira bw'umuntu.
Umwe muri bo yagize ati:"Kujya gucumbika muri iriya nzu nta bwo bindimo, impamvu ntajyamo njyewe sinkodesha kuko ntaha mu rugo,cyakora mbaye ntaha kure najyamo.
" Undi nawe ati:"Inzu yaruzuye ni umuhigo w'akarere, ninjye musiribateri wakayibayemo none mfite iwanjye, abarimu biteje imbere kuburyo kuba ku kigo ntacyo byabamarira, keretse turamutse dufite animatrice na internat igenga abanyeshuri, abigisha ku Nyange hano dutuye hafi y'ikigo".
Makuruki.rw iganira n'umuyobozi w'ishami ry'uburezi mu karere ka Gicumbi, Bizimana Jean Claude, yatangaje ko koko hari amacumbi yubakiwe abarimu ariko bakaba kuri ubu batayabamo bitewe n'uko abarimu bose bigisha ku bigo batuye hafi y'ibigo bigishaho bakaba badashobora kuyabamo kandi iwabo ari hafi.
Yavuze ko bajya kubaka aya mashuri bateganyaga ko kuri ibyo bigo hashobora kuzajya higishwaho n'abarimu baturuka kure, ariko ngo hari aho batunguwe babonye abarimu baho bose batuye hafi y'ishuri bikaba ngombwa ko iyo nzu ifungwa ntikoreshwe.
Bizimana avuga ko aya mazu azakomeza gufungwa kugeza igihe azabona abarimu bazajya bayabamo.
Gusa ibi bifatwa na bamwe nk'igihombo kuri Leta bitewe n'uko aya mazu yatwaye amafaranga menshi yubakwa, ariko akaba ari aho apfa ubusa nta cyo akoreshwa.
Bizimana ariko avuga ko n'ubwo ngo hari aho abarimu bataba muri aya mazu bitewe n'uko baba hafi y'akazi, ngo akarere nanone gafite imbogamizi y'amikoro atuma hari ibikibura ngo ayo mazu yuzure neza kuburyo yabasha gukoreshwa n'abarimu.
Kugeza ubu imirenge 18 kuri 21 igize akarere ka Gicumbi ni yo ifite amacumbi abarimu bacumbikamo, mu gihe imirenge itatu yo ifite amacumbi ataracumbikwamo n'abarezi.
Kubaka amacumbi y'abarimu muri aka karere byatangiye hagati y'umwaka wa 2012 na 2013, hubakwa inzu imwe ku kigo kimwe cyatoranijwe muri buri murenge.
Amacumbi yagenewe abarimu atari yacumbikwamo aboneka mu mirenge ya Byumba, Kageyo na Mutete.

Chelsea vs Arsenal: Amakuru avugwa mu makipe yombi mbere y’umukino wa nyuma wa Europa League Amakipe abiri yo mu Mujyi wa Londres mu Bwongereza, Chelsea na Arsenal, arahurira ku mukino wa nyuma wa Europa League kuri uyu wa Gatatu kuri Olympic Stadium yo mu Mujyi wa Baku muri Azerbaijan guhera saa 21:00.
Uyu mukino uraza kubera mu bilometero bisaga ibihumbi bine uvuye mu Bwongereza, ufite byinshi uvuze ku makipe yombi cyane kuri Arsenal yananiwe gusoreza mu makipe ane ya mbere muri Premier League, ikabura itike yo gukina UEFA Champions League mu mwaka utaha w’imikino.
Chelsea yo yabigezeho ariko na none, ikeneye igikombe nk’iki mu mwaka wa mbere w’umutoza Maurizio Sarri ushobora kwirukanwa naramuka atsinzwe ndetse uyu ushobora kuba umukino wa nyuma kuri rutahizamu wayo Eden Hazard bivugwa ko azerekeza muri Real Madrid.
Ubwo yaganiraga n’abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Sarri yahakanye amakuru amwerekeza muri Juventus yo mu Butaliyani, anavuga uburyo yagowe n’uyu mwaka wa mbere muri Chelsea n’ubwo kuri ubu ngo afite ikipe nziza.
Ati "Mfitanye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri na Chelsea, mureke rero aribyo tuvugaho muri aka kanya.
Ku bwanjye, intangiriro z’umwaka w’imikino zari zikomeye cyane mu guhuza n’abakinnyi ariko guhera muri Gashyantare byatangiye guhinduka, sinzi niba ari njye wahindutse kuko ubu mfite abasore 20, 22 beza, abakinnyi bakomeye kandi ndabishimiye.”
Ku myaka 60, Sarri nta gikombe gikomeye aratwara mu gihe umutoza wa Arsenal bagiye guhangana, Unai Emery, yatwaye iyi Europa League inshuro eshatu hagati ya 2014 na 2016 ari kumwe na Seville, gusa ikipe atoza uyu munsi na yo nta musaruro ifite kuri uru rwego.
Mu gihe Chelsea ifite Europa League ya 2013 yatwaye ubwo yari imaze umwaka umwe yegukanye UEFA Champions League, Arsenal nta gikombe cy’i Burayi iratwara kuva yegukanye icy’irushanwa ryitwaga European Cup Winners mu 1994.
Unai Emery yavuze ko intego ye ari ugushyira akadomo kuri iyi myaka 25 Arsenal imaze idatwara igikombe kugira ngo inabone itike yo kuzakina UEFA Champions League mu mwaka utaha nyuma y’imyaka ibiri itagaragara mu irushanwa rihuza amakipe yabaye aya mbere iwayo i Burayi.
Ati "Dufite intego ebyiri hano ariko iy’ingenzi ni ukwegukana igikombe.
Iya kabiri ni iyo kudufasha kugera muri Champions League.
Buri gikombe ni ingenzi kuri twe kandi no kuri Chelsea ni uko.
Uko tugishaka ni nako na Chelsea igishaka.”
Chelsea iraza gusuzuma niba ikinisha N’Golo Kanté wagize imvune mu ivi ku wa Gatandatu, aho umutoza we yavuze ko bidakomeye cyane ariko amahirwe yo gukina kugeza ubu ari 50-50.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek na Callum Hudson-Odoi ntabwo bakina uyu mukino, aho bivuze ko mu gihe Kanté atakina, Chelsea yasigarana Jorginho, Mateo Kovačić ma Ross Barkley nk’amahitamo ashoboka mu kibuga hagati.
Antonio Rüdiger na we yaravunitse, bivuze ko Andreas Christensen afite amahirwe menshi yo gutangira mu mutima wa ba myugariro akinana na David Luiz.
Arsenal yo iraza kuba idafite umunya-Armenia, Henrikh Mkhitaryan, wafashe icyemezo cyo kudakina uyu mukino bitewe n’ibibazo bya politiki biri hagati y’igihugu cye na Azerbaijan.
Abafana ba Arsenal bari bambaye imyenda ya Mkhitaryan i Baku bagiye bahagarikwa na Polisi kuri uyu wa Kabiri.
Aaron Ramsey uzajya muri Juventus mu mwaka utaha w’imikino, yaravunitse ndetse yamaze gusezera mu gihe Unai Emery agomba guhitamo niba akinisha Petr Cech uzasubira muri Chelsea kuyibera umuyobozi wa Siporo nyuma yo gusoza umupira we uyu munsi.
Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri amakipe yo mu Bwongereza ahuriye ku mukino wa nyuma muri UEFA Cup/Europa League nyuma y’uko Tottenham ihuye na Woles muri UEFA Cup mu 1972.
Ni ku nshuro ya 198 amakipe yombi agiye guhura mu marushanwa yose, ariko ikaba inshuro ya gatatu ahuriye mu marushanwa y’i Burayi.
Yahuriye muri Champions League ya 2003/04, Chelsea ikomeza ku bitego 3-2 mu mikino yombi.
Unai Emery na Maurizio Sarri barisobanura kuri uyu wa Gatatu N’Golo Kanté arashidikanywaho Arsenal na Chelsea zigiye guhura ku nshuro ya gatatu mu marushanwa y'i Burayi Petr Cech arasezera umupira w'amaguru uyu munsi, azajye kuba umuyobozi wa Siporo muri Chelsea yakiniye igihe kitari gito Abafana ba Arsenal bari bambaye imyenda ya Mkhitaryan i Baku bagiye bahagarikwa na Polisi

#21861#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/urubyiruko-rurasabwa-kwihangira-imirimo-ruhanga-udushya
Urubyiruko rurasabwa kwihangira imirimo ruhanga udushya Rumwe mu rubyiruko rwabashije kwihangira imirimo rurakangurura bagenzi barwo gushirika ubute bagakora ubushakashatsi ku byo abandi bakora, kugira ngo babashe kwihangira imirimo igamije udushya.
Ni ibitangazwa n'umwe muri uru rubyiruko witwa Maria Kamikazi, watangije ikigo cyitwa Angaza Ltd gitunganya ibikoresho binyuranye byo gutwaramo ibintu nk'ibikapu n'amakofi bikozwe mu bikoresho byo kwamamazaho (Banners, Pull-ups) bitagikoreshwa.
Uhereye ibumoso ni Furaha Amos wari uyoboye ikiganiro, hagati ni Maria Mayanja washinze Angaza Ltd na Robert Mwesigwa umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'inama nkuru y'igihugu y'urubyiruko.
Icyo kigo yatangije afite igishoro cy'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi bitanu gusa, cyashoboye gukura ku buryo kuri iki gihe ateganya ko mu minsi iza kizaba kigeze ku rwego rwiza, nk'uko yabitangarije mu kiganiro "YouthConnekt Hangout" kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki 23 Kanama 2015.
Yagize ati"Ubushakashatsi ni ngombwa kugira ngo umenye ibyo abandi bakora bityo nawe ubashe kwihangira umurimo.
Urubyiruko rugomba guhera ku bumenyi rufite rukabushyira mu bikorwa ubundi rukihangira imirimo."
Muri iki kiganiro cyari gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti"Kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe agukikije mu kwihangira umurimo", yakomeje asaba urubyiruko gutinyuka kwihangira imirimo aho guhita rutekereza kugihombo rushobora kugira.
Robert Mwesigwa umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'inama y'igihugu y'urubyiruko (NYC), yavuze ko urubyiruko rushobora gutangira kwikorera ruhereye ku ruhereye ku bushobozi buke rufite kuko hari abatangiye gutyoubu bageze ku bigo binini.
Mwesigwa yakomeje akangurira urubyiruko kugira umuco wo kuzigama kandi rugahuriza hamwe imbaraga, kugira ngo rubashe kwihangira imirimo bityo rutere imbere.
YouthConnekt Hangout itegurwa ku bufatanye hagati ya Minisiteri y'Urubyiruko n'ikoranabuhanga (MYICT), UNDP, ADMA, Tigo naHeHe Labs.

#21876#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/amakosa-10-akorwa-n-abagabo-bubatse-ingo
Amakosa 10 akorwa n’abagabo bubatse ingo Nyuma yo kubagezaho amakosa 10 akorwa n’abagore mu mibanire yabo n’abagabo bashakanye, muri iyi nkuru, turabagezaho amakosa 10 abagabo bakora mu ngo akaba ashobora kuzisenya cyangwa ntizimare kabiri: 1.
Gutekereza ibyishimo byo mu buriri wenyine utitaye ku wo mwashakanye Abagabo benshi ni ba nyamwigendaho ku ngingo yo gutera akabariro ndetse ntibatekereza ku byishimo by’abagore babo.
Kutita ku byishimo by’umugore wawe igihe muri mu gikorwa cy’abashakanye bishobora kugusenyera urugo vuba cyane.
Kugira ngo mwembi mubashe kwishimira iki gikorwa bisaba ko muganira byo ku rwego rwo hejuru mukaganira mutuje kandi mukumvana.
2.
Kwaya umutungo w’urugo Kugira ibyo ugira bihenze utabanje kubiganiraho n’umugore wawe cyangwa kwaya umutungo w’urugo ni irindi kosa abagabo bakora rikaba ryabasenyera.
Kuba ufite konti muri banki ukayihisha uwo mwashakanye ni ‘sakirirego’ mu rugo.
Iyo utumye umugore wawe atamenya ibyerekeye umutungo wawe, bituma yumva adakunzwe bihagije ndetse akaba yakwibona nk’umunyamahanga mu rugo rwanyu.
Ni ngombwa ko wizera umugore wawe n’umutima wawe wose ndetse n’ubutunzi bwawe.
3.
Kwigira ntibindeba mu kurera abana Abagabo benshi baharira abagore uburere bw’abana babo bakibwira ko icyo basabwa gukora gusa ari ugutanga ibitunga umuryango, kandi ibi bihabanye n’ukuri.
Si byo na gato rwose kwirengagiza uruhare rwawe rwo kurera abana ufatanyije n’uwo mwashakanye.
Ukwiye gufata umwanya ukawumarana n’abana bawe ndetse ukugira uruhare runini mu buzima bw’abana bawe.
4.
Kutita ku mubiri wawe Abagabo benshi baba bifuza ko abagore babo bita ku mibiri yabo nyamara bo batabikora.
Uko umugabo agaragara ni ikintu abagore bitaho kandi kibatera ishema.
Abagabo benshi iyo bamaze gushaka, ntibongera kugira icyo bakore ngo bite ku mibiri yabo kandi ntibishimisha abagore.
Nkuko wifuza ko umugore yiyitaho nawe ni ko uba ugomba kubigenza.
5.
Kudateganyiriza ejo hazaza Nk’umutware w’urugo, ukwiye gutekereza no kumenya guteganyiriza umugore n’abana bawe.
Ugomba gupangira urugo rwawe ahazaza, ubutunzi bwawe, abana n’ibindi.
Ntukabe umugabo ubaho nk’ubara ubukeye, akarya nk’aho ari bwo bwa nyuma.
Ugomba guteganya ikizababeshaho mu busaza, utagishoboye gukora, ugateganyiriza igihe uzaba wapfuye cyangwa abana bawe nibashyingirwa n’ibindi.
6.
Kutumva umugore wawe Abagabo benshi ntibabasha kubona abagore babo nk’umufasha cyangwa umufatanyabikorwa bituma batabatega amatwi ngo bumve uko babona ibintu.
Ntukumve ko uzi ibyo umugore agiye kuvuga ngo umuce mu ijambo mbere y’uko avuga uti ‘Ni ay’abagore’.
7.
Kutizera umugore wawe Kutizera umugore ngo ube wamubitsa amabanga akomeye ni irindi kosa abagabo benshi bubatse bakora mu ngo.
Umugore wawe aba agomba kuba umuntu ubwira udukuru twose ndetse ukamubitsa utubanga twose; ni urubavu rwawe.
Umugore wawe ashaka kumenya ikikwerekeye cyose kandi erega nta cyo atazi, wigira ibyo umukinga rero.
8.
Kwemerera umuryango n’inshuti zawe gusuzugura umugore wawe Nk’umugabo, uzaba utsinzwe niwemerera abagize umuryango wawe ndetse n’inshuti zawe kutubaha umugore wawe.
Umuntu wese utubashye umugore wawe nawe aba agusuzuguye; ni ibyo rwose.
Ujye wirinda kuvuga nabi no gutaranga umugore wawe mu ruhame bitazatuma ata icyubahiro cye.
Umuryango ndetse n’inshuti zawe bagomba kumenya gusa ibyiza by’umugore wawe, ibibi ni wowe ugomba kubimenya gusa.
Wowe n’umugore wawe ni mwe mwenyine mugomba kwicarana mugakemura ibibazo mufite mutihaye rubanda.
9.
Kudasaba imbabazi wahemutse Kutemera gusaba imbabazi wafuditse ni rimwe mu makosa abagabo bakora mu mibanire y’abo mu ngo.
Abagabo benshi bibwira ko ari ukwisuzuguza no kwitesha agaciro gusaba imbabazi umugore kandi mu by’ukuri si byo.
Kuba uri umugabo si impamvu yo kuba utasaba imbabazi umugore wawe igihe wamukoshereje.
10.
Kugereranya uwo mwashakanye n’abandi bagore Kugereranya umugore wawe n’abandi ni bibi cyane ndetse bishobora kugusenyera; ntukagereranye uwo mwashakanye n’abandi bagore.
Iteka ryose iruhande rwawe, aho ukorera n’aho uba ntuhazabura abagore bafite ibyo barusha umugore wawe, ariko se uzi ibibi cyangwa intege nke abo bagore bagira?
Jya wita, uteteshe, ukunde kandi wubahire umugore wawe uko ari bitari ibyo akora cyangwa adakora.
Inkuru bijyanye : Amakosa 10 akorwa n’abagore mu mibanire yo mu ngo

#21905#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/bimwe-mu-bitera-umuvuduko-ukabije-w-amaraso
Bimwe mu bitera umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso Uburwayi bw’umutima ni bumwe mu burwayi buhitana abantu benshi ku isi, benshi mu bantu bakuze baba bafite ibyago byo kurwara zimwe mu ndwara zifata umutima, cyane cyane abarengeje imyaka 40 kuzamuka.
Ibi nti bivuze ko n’abato munsi y’imyaka 40 batazirwara ; dore ko byinshi mu bitera ubu burwayi butandukanye bw’umutima bitangirira mu myaka y’ubugimbi n’ubwangavu ; umuntu akiri muto bikagenda byiyongera ariko nta burwayi buragaragara, uburwayi bukigaragaza mu myaka y’ubukure n’ubusaza.
Bamwe barwara indwara z’umutima n’imitsi y’amaraso bakiri bato munsi y’imyaka mirongo ine.
Indwara nyinshi z’umutima zifitanye isano n’uburwayi bwitwa atherosclerosis ; ikaba ari indwara mbi, irangwa n’ubwiyongere bw’ibinure bibi(Low density Lipoprotein) ku mitsi itwara amaraso.
NI IKI GITERA INDWARA YA ATHEROSCLEROSE ?
Indwara nyinshi z’umutima zifitanye isano n’uburwayi buterwa n’ubwiyongere bw’ibinure byinshi ku mitsi y’ amaraso ari byo bitera indwara ya artherosclerosis(the formation of deposits).
Ubwiyongere bw’ibinure bibi mu maraso bitera imitsi y’amaraso kugagara no kuziba ; bikagabanya ubunini bw’imitsi, aribyo bitera amaraso kudatembera neza, bikazamura umuvuduko w’amaraso(high blood pressure).
Umuvuduko w’amaraso ugenda uhitana utubumbe, n’ibinure byibumbye bigenda bitwarwa n’amaraso utubumbe turi mu maraso(clots) ; bitera ibyago byo kuziba imitsi, amaraso ntabashe gutambuka(ambolism), ibyo bitera gupfa kw’igice uwo mutsi wagaburiraga, bigatera kwangirika no gupfwa kwa bimwe mu bice bigize umutima.
UBURWAYI BWO KUGAGARA K’UMUTIMA (MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION CYANGWA HEART ATTACK) Ni uburwayi bubaho iyo umutsi w’amaraso agaburira umutima wafunzwe n’ikibumbe cy’amaraso n’ibinure ukaziba ; bigatera gupfa kw’ igice cy’umutima uwo mutsi wagaburiraga ; bitewe no kubura amaraso n’umwuka mwiza wa oxygene.
Iyo bibaye ku bwonko bitera kugwa muri coma bitewe no gutakaza imikorere y’ubwonko stroke (gupfa kw’igice cy’ubwonko uwo mutsi ugaburira).
Iyo kuziba kw’umutsi bibaye mu gice cy’ukuguru bitera ububabare bw’ukuguru, hakabaho kwipfundika kw’amaraso mu mutsi (thrombus).
Zimwe mu mpamvu zitera kugagara kw’imitsi.
Kubura Vit C : kubura vit C ihagije mu mubiri ni imwe mu mpamvu zitera uburwayi bw’imitsi ; iyi vitamin C ni ingenzi mu gukora ibyitwa Collagen zifasha kurambuka(elasticity) k’uruhu n’imitsi. uburwayi bw’umuvuduko uri hejuru (hypertension), thrombosis, angina, heart attack na Stroke ; ni bumwe mu burwayi bukomoka kuri Arterioclerosis na atherosclerosis. umuvuduko uri hejuru w’amaraso ni imwe mu ndwara zihangayikishije isi ; bayita Rwicaruhoze. umuvuduko uri hejuru ugaragazwa ni igipimo cy’umuvuduko ungana na 140/90 mmhg gusubiza hejuru, Ibi bitera ibyago by’indwara z’umutima zitandukanye.
Bimwe mu bitera umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso 1.
Indwara z’urugimbu rwinshi mu mitsi(Atherosclerosis, thrombosis arteriosclerosis) 2.
Ibinure byinshi mu maraso(LDL cholesterol) 3.
Kunywa inzoga nyinshi 4.
Kunywa itabi Inama ku kwirinda indwara z’umutima • Kurya neza bifasha umutima ; amafunguro arinda indwara z’umutima agomba kuba adafite ibyongera urugimbu rubi mu mubiri (LDL).
• Amafunguro agomba kuba agabanya mu mubiri ibinure bibi bya cholesterol. • kwirinda bimwe mu bikomoka ku matungo nk’amata, inyama zitukura, fromage, amavuta y’amamesa, ubuto.
• Irinde kurya no gukoresha ibikize ku masukari n’ibyatunganyirijwe mu nganda.
• Irinde kunywa ikawa nyinshi • Irinde umunyu mwinshi • Irinde kunwa itabi ; itabi rifite ibinyabutabire birenga 4800.
Nicotine yangiza umutima, igabanya ubunini bw’imitsi y’amaraso, itera umutima guteraguzwa, bikazamura umuvuko w’amaraso.
• Amafunguro akize ku mbuto, imboga, ibinyampeke ni meza mu kurinda indwara z’umutima n’umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso.
• Gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri kuri gahunda ihoraho bishobora kurinda indwara z’umutima n’imitsi y’amaraso na Diabetes, ni byiza kandi mu kurinda stress n’umuhangayiko ukabije.
Ibyo wakora ngo uhangane n’uburwayi bw’umutima Ubu habonetse inyunganiramirire z’ingenzi mu kurinda no gufasha abafite indwara z’umutima n’imitsi.
Ni imiti myiza ikoze mu bimera mwimerere irimo : Gingko biloba, Compound Co-Q10, Vit E, Vit C, Multivitamins, Cardiopower, Lipid care tea, Deepseafish oil softgel, na Garlic oil softgel. zifite ubuziranenge butangwa n’ibigo mpuzamahanga aha twavuga mo nk’ikigo cy’Abanyamerika gishinzwe ubuziranenge bw’imiti n’ibiribwa FDA(food and Drug Admnistration , USA).
Izo nyunganiramirire ziboneka muri Horaho life company ikorera mu mujyi wa Kigali kwa Rubangura, etage 3, umuryango 302.

#21906#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/sosiyete-y-abanya-koreya-igiye-gushora-miliyoni-5-2-z-amadorali-mu-bworozi-bw
Sosiyete y'abanya-Koreya igiye gushora miliyoni 5.2 z'amadorali mu bworozi bw'amagweja Yanditswe kuya 10-08-2016 saa 13:09' na Mukaneza M.Ange Mu rwego rwo guteza imbere inganda zikora ubudodo, sosiyete y'abanya-Koreya HEWORKS Rwanda Silk Ltd igiye gushora miliyoni 5.2 z'amadorali mu buhinzi bw'ibobere n'ubworozi bw'amagweja.
Ni nyuma y'uko ku itariki 9 Kanama 2016, iyi sosiyete igiranye amasezerano n'ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe kohereza mu mahanga ibikomoka ku buhinzi n'ubworozi, NAEB.
Nk'uko bikubiye muri aya masezerano, ku ikubitiro HEWORKS Rwanda Silk Ltd izashora mu buhinzi bw'amagweja miliyoni 5.2 z'amadorali aho izagura udupfunyika twose tw'ubudodo turi mu Rwanda ndetse ikazanashyiraho Ikigo kizajya gitangirwamo amahugurwa ku borozi ndetse kikanakoreshwa nk'ituragiro.
NAEB n'iyi sosiyete bizafatanya mu gukora ubudodo buvuye mu musaruro w'amagweja witezweho kwiyongera ukagera kuri toni 500 uvuye kuri toni 7.5 ku mwaka.
Uruganda ruzajya rutunganyirizwamo ubudodo ruzubakwa na leta mu gace kagenewe inganda mu gihe HEWORKS Rwanda Silk Ltd ari yo izashyiramo imashini zizakoreshwa mu gutunganya umusaruro w'amagweja.
Umuyobozi w'Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubworozi bw'amagweja(National Sericulture Center), Eric Mbonigaba yavuze ko HEWORKS yamaze kugura hegitari eshatu mu karere ka Rwamagana ndetse ikodesha n'izindi 20 yahise itangira guhingaho ibobere.
Minisitiri w'Ubuhinzi n'Ubworozi, Dr Gerardine Mukeshimana yashimye umusanzu w'iyi sosiyete yo muri Koreya mu guteza imbere uruganda rw'ubudodo ndetse anavuga ko leta izatanga ubufasha aho buzaba bukenewe.
Ati" Iki ni cyo gihe gikwiye cyo gushora mu bijyanye no gutunganya ubudodo.
Nizera neza ko kugira umufatanyabikorwa ufite ubunararibonye bizadufasha kugera kubyo dushaka kugeraho.
Ni iby'agaciro kandi tubasezeranyije gukora ibyo dushoboye byose."
Umuyobozi wa HEWORKS Ltd, Hee Choon YANG we yashimangiye ko icyo bifuza ari ukugera ku cyo biyemeje no gukora ubucuruzi buzahindura imibereho y'abahinzi n'aborozi.
Ubuhinzi bw'ibobere n'ubworozi bw'Amagweja bwatangiye gukorerwa mu Rwanda mu 2006.
Kugira ngo amagweja atange ubudodo abanza kugaburira ibibabi by'ibobere, nyuma akaza gutera amagi ari na yo avamo ubudodo.
Igweja rimwe riba rifite ubushobozi bwo gutera amagi ari hagati ya 300 na 400 ariko nyuma rigahita ripfa.
Ubudodo bukomoka ku magweja buba ari burebure cyane ku buryo rumwe rugira hagati ya metero 300 na 900.
Hee Choon Yang,Umuyobozi wa Heworks Ltd,(Ibumoso), Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minagri, Innocent Musabyimana, George William Bill Kayonga, umuyobozi wa NAEB [email protected] Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

Ifoto igaragaza igitego cya Messi cyanzwe n’umusifuzi yaciye ibintu hirya no hino-Yirebe Kuri iki cyumweru taliki ya 26 Ugushyingo 2017 nibwo hari hategerejwe umukino ukomeye wahuje amakipe 2 akurikiranye ku rutonde rwa shampiyona ya La Liga Valencia yari ku kibuga cyayo Mestalla yakiriye FC Barcelona aho banganyije igitego 1-1,ariko umusifuzi akora ikosa ryo kwanga igitego cya Messi cyarenze umurongo Inkuru nyamukuru yagaragaye muri uyu mukino,n’igitego cya Messi cyanzwe n’umusifuzi Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva nyamara n’ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona yacyemeza kubera ukuntu cyagaragariraga buri wese.

#21916#	1	sports	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIKINO/article/Wayne-Rooney-yatangaje-ikipe-yifuza-gusorezamo-umupira-w-amaguru
Wayne Rooney yatangaje ikipe yifuza gusorezamo umupira w'amaguru Wayne Ronney wifuza gusoreza umupira w'amaguru muri Manchester United Rutahizamu w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Bwongereza ndetse n'ikipe ya Manchester United Wayne Rooney yatangaje ko yifuza gusoreza umupira w'amaguru mu ikipe ya Manchester United.
Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 30 y'amavuko asigaje imyaka 3 ku masezerano ye mu ikipe ya Manchester United avuga ko atiteguye kuba yahindura ikipe ahubwo yifuza gusoreza umupira we muri Manchester United kandi ngo igihe gisigaye akazakimarana na Mourinho amukinira mu kibuga hagati.
Nk'uko ikinyamakuru The Sun kibivga, Wayne Rooney yifuza kuba yakongera amasezerano muri Manchester United azageza igihe azaba asoje umupira w'amaguru kuko ngo nta yindi kipe yifuza kuba yakinira.
Rooney yagize ati"ndacyafite amasezerano mu ikipe yanjye, nifuza kuba ari ho nsoreza umupira w'amaguru ariko ibyo birareba ubuyobozi bw'ikipe buzakora igikwiye."
Uyu musore kandi yatangaje ko yiteguye gukorana neza na Jose Mourinho umutoza mushya w'ikipe ya Manchester United amukinira mu kibuga hagati.
Yagize ati"ntekereza ko buri gihe nishimira gutanga imipira ivamo ibitego(assists) cyangwa nanjye nkabitsinda ariko ubu byarahindutse ngomba gukomeza kwishimira kugira uruhare rwimbitse mu itegurwa ryabyo."
Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 30, afite agahigo ko kuba ari we mukinnyi umaze gutsindira ikipe y'igihugu y'Ubwongereza ibitego byinshi ndetse akanaza ku mwanya wa 2 mu batsinze ibitego byinshi muri Manchester United nyuma ya Bobby Charlton.

#21981#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/UBUZIMA/article/Wari-uzi-ko-abantu-bapfa-biyahuye-hari-icyo-baba-bahuriyeho-mu-maraso-Wari-uzi-ko-se-umubare-w-abapfa-biyahuye-ushobora-kugabanuka
Wari uzi ko abantu bapfa biyahuye hari icyo baba bahuriyeho mu maraso?
Wari uzi ko se umubare w'abapfa biyahuye ushobora kugabanuka?
Mu bushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara muri iki cyumweru bwerekanye ko abantu bapfa biyahuye bo mu bihugu bitandukanye hari akantu gato baba bahuriyeho mu maraso yabo (gene) bityo ubwo bushakashatsi bukaba bunemeza ko hari icyakorwa umubare w'abantu bapfa biyahuye ku isi ukagabanuka.
Muri Amerika, abashakashatsi bo mu kigo cya kaminuza cya Johns Hopkins, berekanye ko umubare w'abantu bapfa biyahuye ku isi ushobora kugabanuka nyuma yo gusanga aba bantu biyahura hari icyo baba bahuriyeho mu maraso yabo.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe nyuma yuko babonye umubare w'abantu bapfa biyahuye ku isi urimo kwiyongera umunsi ku wundi.
Zachary Kaminsky, ni umushakashatsi akaba umwanditsi w'ibitabo n'umuganga ku ivuriro ry'icyo kigo cya Kaminuza ya Johns Hopkins.
Aragira ati mu maraso y'aba bantu habamo akagingo gatoya cyane (gene) kitwa SKA2 uwo muntu aba yaravukanye gahora kibutsa ubwonko kwiyahura uko ahuye n'ibihe bibi (stress) mu bihe bitandukanye kakaba kaboneka no mu maraso y'abantu batandukanye katitaye ku isano bafitanye.
Iyi nyigo yakozwe hifashishijwe abantu batandukanye biyahuye aho bapimye ubwonko bwabo bagapima n'amaraso yabo bagasanga bahuriye kuri ako kagingo ka SKA2. ubu bshakashatsi kandi bwerekanye k obyibura 80% by'abantu bavukana aka kagingo bahorana ingengabitekerezo yo kwiyahura kuko ngo ntago bibatungura mu munota umwe.
Nubwo aka kagingo gahora gatuma ubwonko butekereza mu buryo budasanzwe cyangwa kerekana uruhande rubi, aba bashakashatsi berekanye ko hari n'imiti ishobora kukagabanyiriza imbaraga bityo byibura 80% bakaba bahindura intekerezo NSENGIMANA J Mermoz

#22048#	6	religion	http://umubavu.com/iyobokamana/article/Ibihanda-3-byugarije-Afurika-bizakurwaho-n-amasengesho-y-abaramyi-b-ukuri-Apotre-Gitwaza
Ibihanda 3 byugarije Afurika bizakurwaho n’amasengesho y’abaramyi b’ukuri-Apôtre Gitwaza Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza uyobora Itorero Zion Temple ku Isi yagarutse ku bibazo/ibihanda bitandukanye byigaruriye Afurika avuga ko hakenewe abaramyi b’ukuri bagomba kujya ku misozi itandukanye bagasengera ibi bihanda byigaruriye uyu mugabane bityo bikavanwaho.
Ibi yabigarutseho ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 11 Kanama 2019, mu muhango wo gusoza igiterane cyiswe ‘Africa Haguruka’ cyari kimaze iminsi umunani kibera kuri Stade ya IPRC Kicukiro (ETO Kicukiro).
Iyumvire unareba uko byari byifashe mu gusoza igiterane ’Africa Haguruka’: Intumwa y’Imana Gitwaza yagarutse ku byo yise ibihanda 3 byugarije umugabane wa Afurika, avuga ko bizakurwaho n’abaramyi b’ukuri bazahaguruka bakajya ku musozi w’amasengesho.
Ibyo bihanda bitatu byibasiye Afurika, Apotre Dr Gitwaza yagaragaje ni intambara, inzara ndetse n’ibyorezo.
Yagize ati “Iyo tureba tubona Afurika yibasiwe n’ibihanda bitatu bikomeye.
Igihanda cy’intambara, igihanda cy’inzara n’igihanda cy’ibyorezo.Dufite ikibazo cy’inzara, dufite ikibazo cy’indwara dufite n’ikibazo cy’intambara.”
Apotre Gitwaza yavuze ko ibihugu byinshi byamaze gushaka ibisubizo by’ibi bihanda, abaturage babyo bakaba babayeho mu buzima bwiza.
Yagize ati “Ibihugu byinshi byakemuye ikibazo cy’inzara, ibihugu byinshi byakemuye ikibazo cy’ibyorezo, ibihugu byinshi byakemuye ikibazo cy’intambara.Ibyo bihanda bitatu tubisigaranye aha muri Afurika.
Nta wundi mugabane basangamo indwara z’ibyorezo nka Ebola, Malaria, Sida uretse Afurika.
Kuki dufite intambara, indwara n’inzara?
Hari ikibazo.”
Gitwaza washimangiye ko ibi bibazo Afurika izabikurwamo no gusenga yavuze ko hagomba kuzaboneka abaramyi b’ukuri bazahaguruka bagasengera umugabane.
Ati “Dukeneye Abaramyi beza bajya kuri ya misozi irindwi.
Ntidukeneye abajya ku kazi dukeneye abajya kuramya Imana kuri iyo misozi.
Dukeneye abaramyi b’Imana.”
Yunzemo ati “Abaramyi b’ukuri nibo bagomba kujya ku misozi itandukanye bagasenga ibi bihanda byigaruriye Afurika bikavanwaho.
Abo bantu turabakeneye."
Kuri iyi nshuro, igiterane ‘Africa Haguruka’ cyasojwe mu bihe bidasanzwe byo gusaba kubana n’Imana muri gahunda zose, Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza asabira imbaga y’abayitabiriye kubona impinduka mu buzima bwabo, ubw’igihugu n’umugabane wa Afurika.
Africa Haguruka yabaga ku nshuro ya 20 kuva mu 2000, ubwo Gitwaza yagiraga iyerekwa ryo guhembura umugabane binyuze mu kuwushyira mu maboko y’Imana.
Kuri iyi nshuro yitabiriwe n’abantu batandukanye barimo abavugabutumwa n’abakozi b’Imana baturutse mu bihugu byo mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, iy’Iburengerazuba no mu Majyepfo n’ibindi byo hanze ya Afurika nka Amerika, u Butaliyani, Israel, u Busuwisi, u Bubiligi, u Bufaransa, Canada n’ibindi.

#22050#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/amadini/article/umuyobozi-w-abangilikani-ku-isi-yasuye-u-rwanda-atangiza-ubukerarugendo
Umuyobozi w'Abangilikani ku Isi yasuye u Rwanda atangiza ubukerarugendo nyobokamana i Gahini (Amafoto) Yanditswe na Rabbi Malo Umucunguzi Kuya 19 Gashyantare 2017 saa 05:22 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 8 0 Umuyobozi w'Itorero ry'Abangilikani ku Isi, akaba na Archbishop wa Diyosezi ya Canterbury mu Bwongereza, Justin Portal Welby, yasuye u Rwanda anatangiza ku mugaragaro ibikorwa by'ingendo nyobokamana i Gahini, mu Karere ka Kayonza, ahari amateka akomeye mu bijyanye n'ububyutse.
Ugeze i Gahini bakubwira amateka anyuranye ajyanye n'imyemerere arimo ‘Urukuta rw'Ibitangaza', Inzu y'ubumwe, ‘Aho gutera igikumwe ushimangira ko utazava kuri Yesu' n'amateka y'ububyutse bwakwiriye muri Afurika y'u Burasirazuba yose.
Archbishop Welby yashimye uburyo Gahini iri gutezwa imbere mu nzego zose haba Cathedral iri kuhubakwa, ikigo ngororamuco, ibitaro, amashuri, n'iteramabere ry'ikiremwamuntu muri rusange.
Ati "Ikiruta ibindi ni uko ububyutse bwo muri Afurika y'u Burasirazuba bwatangiriye hano, bujyanye n'iterambere ry'itorero, muri make twashimye Imana."
Yavuze ko Gahini ari ahantu Itorero ry'Abangilikani rifite amateka akomeye, ari naho mu myaka ya 1930-40 ryakomoye imbaraga zo kubona abamisiyoneri, abaganga, n'ububyutse mu kwemera.
Ati "Icyo nasabira hano ni uko abantu benshi bajya bahagirira ingendo nyobokamana, bakagenda nk'Intumwa za Yesu Kirisito.
Ni ibintu nzajya mvugaho ningera mu Bwongereza, nzabyandikaho, ndetse njye mbigarukaho mu gihe ntanga inyigisho."
Gahini ifite mateka yihariye Urukuta rw'ibitangaza rwagaragaye mu 2004, ubwo urukuta rw'inyubako ya Diyosezi rwiyasaga nta kirusagariye, byahuriranye n'uko mu Itorero rya Gahini harimo ibibazo by'amacakubiri byanagejejwe no kuri Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ni ibibazo byaturukaga ku gatsiko kamwe mu idini kakwanyaga Musenyeri Birindabagabo aho bivugwa ko hari n'abandi bantu bakomeye bari babiri inyuma.
Musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Gahini, Alex Birindabagabo yagize ati "Mu gitondo saa mbiri abakozi barangije gusenga, umwe yabwiye abandi ati igikuta cyasenyutse, iriya nzu igiye gusenyuka nimutabare.
Abantu bahacaga bose barahagarara bakavuga bati iyi nzu izize iki?
» Ukwiyasa k'uru rukuta kwareshyaga na sentimetero eshanu ubirebye uri hanze, bajya kuburira abantu barimo imbere, ariko basanga imbere nta kibazo kirimo, babanza gutekereza ko ari ukubera ko aribwo bigitangira.
Bugenimana Jean Pierre wari ushinzwe kubakisha inzu za Diyosezi ngo yatangiye kwiga uburyo aza guhuza urwo rukuta inzu yose idashyizwe hasi, maze nka saa tanu haza umuntu amubwira ko inzu yateranye kandi yari yasadutse kuva hejuru kugeza ku musingi wayo n'amatafari yacitsemo kabiri.
Baje gutekereza ko ari Imana yohereje ubutumwa bwabahumurizaga ko ibibazo byari bibugarije mu itorero ryabo bidateze kubatandukanya burundu.
Musenyeri Birindabagabo ati «Naje gusobanukirwa mu kwezi kwa 11, icyo Imana yatubwiraga cyaramaze kuba.
Imana yaratubwiraga ngo mugiye kugaragara nk'itorero risadutse urebera hanze, ariko nimuhumure imbere muri bazima.»
« Ikindi ni uko Imana yavugaga ngo ‘mu gihe abantu bazaba bibaza uko ibya Gahini bigiye kugenda, nibwo ibyanyu nzabirangiza nk'Imana.'»
Ububyutse bwa Gahini kandi busubira no mu 1936, ubwo imbaraga z'Imana zamanutse ahantu hose zigakangaranya abanyabaha, abenshi bakemera kwihana, izo mbaraga zinakwira Afurika y'u Burasirazuba.
Gahini yahise ihinduka ahantu ho gusengerwa hakomeye ndetse habera n'ibindi bitangaza, hakurura n'abanyamahanga, ari naho Se wa Minisitiri w'Ububanyi n'Amahanga wa Uganda, Sam Kutesa yaguye mu 1952 ubwo yari yagiyeyo gusenga.
Inkuru y'ububyutse bw'i Gahini ni nayo yahinduye Justin Portal Welby ubwo yari afite imyaka 18 yigisha muri Kenya mbere y'uko atangira kwiga Kaminuza, nk'uko yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
Icyo gihe ngo ntiyari azi Yesu, maze ubwo yaganiraga n'umuyobozi w'Ishuri Ryisumbuye rya Kiburu amubwira ibijyanye n'ububyuke bwo muri Afurika y'u Burasirazuba, ku wa 12 Ukwakira 1975 maze yakira Yesu nk'Umwami n'umukiza.
Yatangiye urugendo rw'ubukirisito ubwo ku wa 4 Gashyantare 2013 yagirwaga umuyobozi wa Diyosezi ya Canterbury n'umuyobozi w'Abangilikani ku Isi.
Bishop Birindabagabo, yavuze ko Gahini iri guhindura isura, ndetse hari gahunda yo kubaka inzu nyinshi ngo abahasura bajye babona aho baryama.
Ati "Hari n'indi mishinga dufite, hari ikigo tugomba kubaka ngo abantu nacyo bajye baza bagisure, ni ukuvuga ngo aho ibiro by'Ikigo cy'Ububyuke kizaba kiri.
Ubu rero turimo turatumira abashoramari kugira ngo baze bubake kuko nk'uko mubibona, ubwo Archbishop wa Canterbury yaje, umuryango w'Abangilikani ku Isi yose ndetse si bo bonyine n'abandi bakunda Imana bagiye kuza ari benshi cyane."
Akanyamuneza kari kose kuri Welby bitewe n'urugwiro yeretswe n'imbaga yari iteraniye i Gahini Abantu b'ingeri zose zinyuranye bari bakereye kwakira Archbishop Justin Welby Abanyeshuri nabo ntibari batanzwe mu kwakira uwo munyacyubahiro Archbishop Welby ahabwa ikaze i Gahini, hamwe mu hafite amateka akomeye mu by'iyobokamana Aha kuva kera abakirisito bahashyiraga igikumwe bashimangira ko batazava kuri Yesu Abagore b'abasenyeri bashimangiye ko batazava muri Yesu Archbishop Welby avuga ko ibyabereye i Gahini azajya abigarukaho mu gihe ari kwigisha Musenyeri Birindabagabo yasabye abantu batandukanye kujya gushaka ubumenyi ku bubyutse i Gahini Musenyeri Onesphole Rwaje uyobora Abangilikani mu Rwanda Guverineri w'Intara y'u Burasirazuba, Kazayire Judith nawe yari yitabiriye uwo muhango Uyu muyobozi yashyize ikimenyetso ku kigo cy'ububyutse (East African Revival Heritage Center) Welby yasengeye aha
