#22065#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/gisubizo-ministries-yakiriye-groove-awards-kenya-2017-yegukanye-ihize-korali-zo
Gisubizo Ministries yakiriye Groove Awards Kenya 2017 yegukanye ihize Korali zo mu Karere Itsinda ry’abaririmbyi bahuriye muri Gisubizo Ministries ryakiriye igihembo cya Groove Awards Kenya 2017 ryegukanye mu ruhando rw’andi makorali yo muri Afurika yo hagati n’iy’Iburasirazuba bari bahanganye.
Byari ibirori bivanze n’akanyamuneza ku baririmbyi ba Gisubizo Ministries, ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Mbere ubwo bakiraga ku Kibuga cy’Indege cya Kigali i Kanombe umuyobozi wabo wari ubahagarariye muri Kenya, ahabereye umuhango wo gutanga ibihembo.
Gisubizo Ministries yitabiriye aya marushanwa nyuma yo kwegukana igihembo cy’umuhanzi w’umwaka muri Groove Awards Rwanda 2016, byatumye itoranywa mu bahatanira icyo muri Afurika yo hagati n’iy’Iburasirazuba (Eastern and Central Africa Artist of the year) muri iki cyiciro.
Perezida ucyuye igihe wa Gisubizo Ministries, Eddie Runyambo, yatangarije itangazamakuru ko bishimiye uko ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo rikomeje kubohora imitima ya benshi mu gihugu no hanze yacyo.
Yagize ati “Twabyishimiye cyane murabona ko abagize Gisubizo baje kutwakira ari benshi bizihiwe n’iyi ntsinzi twabonye.
Dukomeje gukora umurimo w’Imana, iki ni ikimenyetso cy’uko iri kumwe natwe kandi ikomeje kudushyigikira.
Natwe turifuza gukomeza gukora ivugabutumwa neza ngo turusheho kwagura ubwami bw’Imana.”
Gisubizo Ministries yegukanye iki gihembo mu cyiciro yari ihuriyemo na Ahavah Gospel Singers yo muri Ethiopia, Angel Benard na Goodluck Gozbert zo muri Tanzania, Levixone yo muri Uganda na Mireille Basirwa yo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Ku ya 1 Kamena 2017 nibwo inkuru y’ihirwe yumvikanye mu rwa Gasabo ikanyura amatwi y’abaririmbyi n’abakunzi ba Gisubizo Ministries ko yegukanye igihembo mu birori byabereye muri Kenyatta International Convention Centre i Nairobi muri Kenya.
Ibi birori byaberaga muri Kenya ku nshuro ya 12 byitabiriwe n’abahanzi bakomeye mu Karere barimo itsinda rya Sauti Sol, Nameless n’abandi.
Gisubizo Ministries yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Amfitiye byinshi’, ‘Mana uriho’, ‘Ndaguhetse ku mugongo’, ‘Narababariwe’ n’izindi.
Muri Groove Awards Rwanda 2016, iri tsinda ryo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ryegukanye ibihembo bitatu birimo icya Korali y’umwaka, Indirimbo nziza y’umwaka n’iyo kuramya y’umwaka.
Abegukanye ibihembo muri Groove Awards Kenya 2017  Male artist of the year: Eko Dydda  Female artist of the year: Mercy Masika  Group of the year: Adawnage  Song of the year: Thitimaa by Kymo & Stigah  Collabo of the year: Bazokizo  Video producer: Sammy Dee  Radio show of the year: Gospel Sunday Milele  Audio Producer of the year: Majic Mike  Talent to watch: MC Nebb  Radio presenter of the year: Eva Mwalili  Worship song of the year: Patakatifu Pako Eric Smith  Songwriter of the year: Pitson  Video of the year: I Live for You by Adawnage  Skiza tune most downloaded- Shule yako by Mercy Masika  TV show of the year: Angaza, KBC  Reggae/ragga song of the year: Generali by Hope Kid

#22068#	2	security	http://makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/U-Burundi-Nyuma-y-amatora-abantu-bakomeje-kuburirwa-irengero-ari-benshi
U Burundi: Nyuma y'amatora, abantu bakomeje kuburirwa irengero ari benshi Amakuru aturuka mu gihugu cy'u Burundi, aravuga ko abantu bakomeje gutabwa muri yombi bakaburirwa irengero cyane cyane nyuma y'igikorwa cy'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu giherutse kuba.
Aya makuru akomeza avuga ko abatabwa muri yombi bari gushinjwa kuba mu bagamije kurwanya Leta iriho muri iki gihugu.
Haratangwa urugero rw'abasore bagera mu icui batawe muri yombi mu rukerera rw'ejo kuwa Gatandatu ku misozi ya Gikoto na Kamango muri zone ya Ruyaga.
Umwe mu batangabuhamya kandi avuga ko abasore 7 nabo bakuwe mu nzu zabo ku musozi wa Kamango bagatwarwa n'abasirikare babashinja kuba batunze inwaro ndetse no gukorana n'imitwe irwanya ubutegetsi.
Béatrice Nizigiyimana ati: " Umugabo wanjye nawe yagiye muri ubwo buryo" Christophe Kwizera, umunyeshuri akaba n'umurwanashyaka wa FNL ya Agathon Rwasa ku musozi wa Gatoke, nawe ni umwe mu baburiwe irengero muri ubwo buryo, umutanagabuhamya akaba na mwene nyina avuga ko abasirikare bamutwaranye n'abandi basore 6 nyuma y'igikorwa cy'amatora.
Ibi bije bikurikira ibikorwa by'umutekano muke byabanjirije ndetse bikanaherekeza amatora biturutse ku kuba uruhande rutavuga rumwe na Leta rutemera ko Nkurunziza yakongera kuyobora iki gihugu kuko umubare wa manda agenerwa n'Itegeko Nshinga warangiye.
Bamwe mu bakurikiranira politiki y'aka karere hafi, bavuga ko ubu bushobora kuba bumwe mu buryo bwo kotsa igitutu abatamushyigikiye kwa Nkurunziza kugira ngo babashe kwemra ibyavuye mu matora, ndetse bave no ku izima ryo gutsimbarara ku gitekeerzo cyabo cy'uko manda ze zarangiye mu gihe nyamara we yamaze kwiyongeza indi.

#22088#	1	sports	https://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/rutanga-eric-yerekeje-muri-yanga-sc-nyuma-y-ibyumweru-bitatu-asinyiye-police-fc
Rutanga Eric yerekeje muri Yanga SC nyuma y’ibyumweru bitatu asinyiye Police FC Myugariro w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibumoso, Rutanga Eric, waherukaga gusinyira Police FC, yamaze kwerekeza muri Yanga SC yo muri Tanzania ku masezerano y’imyaka ibiri.
Mu mpera z’ukwezi gushize nibwo Rutanga Eric yasinye imyaka ibiri muri Police FC ahawe miliyoni 15 Frw, ariko uyu mukinnyi yari yasabye Ikipe y’Abashinzwe Umutekano ko naramuka abonye ikipe hanze mbere y’uko umwaka w’imikino utangira, azayisubiza ibyo yamuhaye akayerekezamo.
Yanga SC yari imaze igihe yifuza uyu mukinnyi niyo yumvikanye na we ku masezerano y’imyaka ibiri ndetse Rutanga yamenyesheje Police FC ko yamureka akayerekezamo.
Bivugwa ko Rutanga yahawe miliyoni 60 z’amashilingi ya Tanzania (miliyoni 24.5 Frw) kugira ngo yerekeza muri iyi kipe iri mu zikunzwe muri iki gihugu giherereye mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda.
Rutanga yinjiye muri Rayon Sports mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2017-2018 nyuma yo kuva muri APR FC yamureze ikanamukuza.
Tariki ya 28 Gicurasi 2020, nyuma y’imyaka ibiri akinira Rayon Sports, yayivuyemo ajya muri Police FC.
Ikipe y’Abashinzwe Umutekano yari yamuguze kugira ngo afatanye na Muvandimwe Jean Marie Vianney mu gihe Ndayishimiye Célestin atongerewe amasezerano akajya muri Sunrise FC.
Rutanga Eric yerekeje muri Yanga SC yari imaze igihe kitari gito imwifuza Rutanga yari amaze ibyumweru bitatu asinyiye Police FC

#22109#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Nyanza-Inkubi-y-umuyaga-yasambuye-ikigo-cy-amashuli-cya-Gasoro-abanyeshuli
Nyanza: Inkubi y'umuyaga yasambuye ikigo cy'amashuli cya Gasoro abanyeshuli barindwi barakomereka Ikigo cy'amashuli abanza cya Gasoro kiri mu murenge wa Kigoma mu karere ka Nyanza cyibasiwe n'imvura ivanzemo umuyaga wasenye ibyumba by'amashuli bitanu ndetse n'abanyeshuli barindwi barahakomerekera ku gicamunsi cyo ku itariki 19/02/2013.
Jeannette ni umwe mu barimu b'icyo kigo warimo kwigisha isomo ry'Ikinyarwanda ubwo umuyaga wibasiraga ishuli yarimo akaba avuga ko byari ibintu bidasanzwe.
Amabati y'iri shuli yagurutse abanyeshuli baryimurwamo.
(Photo: Jean Pierre Twizeyeyezu) Asobanura ko imvura yakubye akabifata nk'ibisanzwe bityo akikomereza isomo rye ariko hagati muri ryo yatunguwe no kubona igisenge kibaguye hejuru bagakwira imishwaro.
Agira ati: "Ubwo buri wese yatangiraga gukiza amagara ye nibwo banyeshuli bamwe bahise bahakomerekera".
Ibi byabaye no mu yandi mashuli yo muri icyo kigo amategura n'amabati byitura ku banyeshuli barimo biga.
Ubuyobozi bw'ikigo cy'amashuli abanza ya Gasoro butangaza ko bwihutiye kubimenyesha ubuyobozi bw'uumurenge wa Kigoma na Polisi kugira ngo babafashe kugeza abanyeshuli bari bakomeretse mu bitaro by'akarere ka Nyanza.
Ishuli ry'inshuke umuyaga waryigirijeho nkana.
(Photo: Jean Pierre Twizeyeyezu) Nyuma yo kwitabwaho n'abaganga batandatu bohererejwe imiryango yabo naho umwe aguma mu bitaro kuko yari yazahaye kurusha bagenzi be bari kumwe; nk'uko Maniraguha Eliel umuyobozi w'ikigo cy'amashuli abanza ya Gasoro abivuga.
Avugana na Kigali Today uyu muyobozi w'ikigo yasobanuye ko inkubi y'umuyaga yibasiye ikigo cy'amashuli abanza ya Gasoro yabateje akaga gakomeye kuko abanyeshuli bahise bakusanyirizwa mu mashuli atangiritse bakaba barimo kuyabyiganiramo mu gihe bagitegereje ubufasha.
Maniraguha Eliel umuyobozi w'amashuli abanza ya Gasoro umuyaga wibasiye.
(Photo: Jean Pierre Twizeyeyezu) Mu byifuzo bifitwe n'ubuyobozi bw'iryo shuli harimo ko ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Nyanza bwabafasha kubashakira isakaro risimbura iryangiritse nibura ngo bigakorwa mu cyumweru kimwe hagamijwe kugira ngo abanyeshuli bakomeze amasomo yabo neza nk'uko byari bisanzwe.
Jean Pierre Twizeyeyezu

#22112#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/mobayilo/article/mu-rwanda-abasaga-miliyoni-icyenda-bakoresha-telefoni-ngendanwa
Mu Rwanda abasaga miliyoni icyenda bakoresha telefoni ngendanwa Yanditswe kuya 3-09-2016 saa 10:48' na Cyprien Niyomwungeri Kuva mu 1998 ikoranabuhanga mu itumanaho rya telefoni ngendanwa ribonye izuba mu Rwanda, rimaze kugera ku rwego rushimishije aho buri Munyarwanda yarigize ubuzima bwe bwa buri munsi utarifite agafatwa nk'uwibera mu mwijima cyangwa mu Isi yindi.
Gutunga telefone mu Rwanda byahinduye ubuzima kuko uretse guhamagara, kwitaba no kohereza ubutumwa bugufi zisigaye zinakoreshwa nka Banki mu bikorwa byo kubitsa, kubikuza, kohererezanya amafaranga, utibagiwe n'izindi serivisi zirimo kugura amashanyarazi n'ibindi.
Kubera aka kamaro, ibi byatumye abafatabuguzi bagera kuri miliyoni 9,025,516 mu mpera za Nyakanga uyu mwaka bavuye kuri miliyoni 8,932,108.
Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe imirimo imwe n'imwe ifitiye igihugu akamaro (RURA), cyatangaje ko umubare w'abantu bakoresha telefoni mu Rwanda wiyongereye ku kigero cya 1.5% hagati y'impera za Kamena n'iza Nyakanga 2016.
Iyi mibare itangazwa habaruwe abakiriya bamaze nibura iminsi 90 bari ku murongo.
Sosiyete ya Tigo Rwanda niyo yungutse abantu bashya benshi b bagera ku 52,896 bigatuma muri rusange igira abafatabuguzi miliyoni 3,163,436.
MTN Rwanda yungutse 44,426, igira abafatabuguzi miliyoni 4,033,355 bavuye kuri miliyoni 3,988,929 muri Kamena.
Abakiriya ba Airtel Rwanda bo bagabanutseho 4,199 bava kuri miliyoni 1,832,924 bari bafite mu mpera za Kamena bagera kuri miliyoni 1,828,725.
Umukozi ushinzwe ibikorwa by'itangazamakuru muri Tigo, Dadi Niwenjye, yabwiye IGIHE ko ukwiyongera kw'abafatabuguzi muri Nyakanga kwatewe n'abashyitsi bagiye baza mu gihugu baba abitabiriye inama n'abaje mu biruhuko, ariko byose bigashingira ku mitangire ya serivisi.
Yagize ati "Kubitaho bidasanzwe tukabasanga ku kibuga cy'indege, kugabanya ibiciro byo guhamagara i Burayi, guhamagaza igiciro kimwe waba uhamagaza Tigo ku yindi mirongo, internet nyinshi kandi yihuse ya 4G kuri telefoni byatumye biyongera."
Muri rusange abagura amafaranga yo gukoresha muri telefoni zabo mbere [pre-paid] bavuye kuri miliyoni 8,827,923 bagera kuri 8,917,287.
Abishyura nyuma [post-paid] nabo bavuye 104,185 bagera 108,229.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#22148#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Ruhango-Umuturage-yafatanywe-litiro-65-za-Kanyanga
Ruhango: Umuturage yafatanywe litiro 65 za Kanyanga Nyumvira Emmanuel afungiye kuri sitasiyo Polisi ya Ruhango, akurikiranyweho icyaha cyo kwenga ikiyobyabwenge kitemewe n'amategeko cya kanyanga.
Kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 24 Kanama 2015 nibwo Polisi yataye muri yombi uyu mugabo w'imyaka 30 y'amavuko imufatiye mu kagari ka Tambwe umurenge wa Ruhango, kandi nawe yemera icyaha akanagisabira imbabazi. afungiye kuri polisi ya Nyamagana mu karere ka Ruhango.
Avuga ko yari amaze umwaka n'igice akora ibi bikorwa bitemewe n'amategeko nubwo yari azi ububi bwabyo ariko ntabihe agaciro.
Avuga ko ubwo afashwe yemera gusaba imbabazi kandi akiyemeza kutazongera kubisubira ukundi.
Uyu mugabo agira inama abandi bagikora ibintu bitemewe n'amategeko, ko babireka kuko nta keza kabyo.
Akavuga ko igihe ufashwe, bigusubiza inyuma bikanatanga isuru mbi mu baturage n'umuryango.
Umuyobozi wa Polisi ishami rya Ruhango Supert Richard Rubagumya, yavuze ko batazihanganira abakora ibitemewe n'amategeko byica ubuzima bw'abaturage, agira inama ababikora ndetse na babinywa kubereka.
Yashimiye abaturage bakomeje gufasha inzego z'umutekano, ahokorerwa ibitemewe n'amategeko, asaba n'abandi kugira uyu muco, kugirango ibibi bihagarikwe.
Ikiyobyabwenge cya kanyanga kiri mu biza ku isonga mu bihungabanya umutekano w'abaturage muri aka karere.
Eric Muvara

#22155#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Umukobwa-bikekwa-ko-yigaga-ULK-yiyahuye-ahanutse-muri-Etage-ya-Kane
Umukobwa bikekwa ko yigaga ULK yiyahuye amanutse muri Etage ya Kane Umukobwa utaramenyekana imyirondoro ye bikekwa ko yigaga muri ULK, yitabye Imana amanutse muri Etage ya kane, bikaba bikekwa ko yakoze ibi mu rwego rwo kwiyahura.
Nkuko twabitangarijwe n'umuvugizi wa Polisi mu mujyi wa Kigali, SP Emmanuel Hitayezu, yatubwiye ibi bybaye mu masaha ya nimugoroba kuri iki cyumweru tariki 24 Nyakanga 2016, aho ngo uyu mukobwa yacunze abandi banyeshuri akajya ahantu batari bari maze akijugunya hasi aturutse mu nyubako (etage) ya kane y'inyubako y'iki kigo maze akitaba Imana.
Yagize ati: "Ayo makuru niyo, twabimenye ejo hagati ya saa kumi n'imwe n'igice na saa moya, umunyeshuri nyine yamanutse muri etaje ya 4 muri ULK yikubita hasi, ariko ikigaragara ni uko ni ibintu yari yapanze kuko twarebye nta byangobwa yari afite, urebye n'aho yuririye, aho yamanukiye, yagiye ahantu hasa n'ahihishe, ibyo yakoze yabikoze yabigambiriye."
SP Hitayezu yavuze ko bitewe n'uko uyu mukobwa nta byangombwa yari afite, ngo byagoranye kumenya umwirondoro we, gusa ngo bakaba bakomeje gukora iperereza bafatanyije n'ubuyobozi bw'iki kigo kugira ngo bamenye umwirondoro w'uyu mukobwa ndetse kandi niba yari n'umunyeshuri wo kuri iki kigo.
Uyu mukobwa ngo mu kwitura hasi ngo ntiyahise yitaba Imana, ahubwo ngo yaguye ku bitaro bya CHUK aho yari yajyanwe kuvurirwa.
Bamwe mu banyeshuri n'abayobozi muri iki kigo babwiye Makuruki.rw ko nabo ngo batabashije kumenya uyu mukobwa, yewe ngo aba banyeshuri babonye n'ifoto ye babona batari basanzwe bamuzi, gusa bavuga ko byashoboka ko yahigaga ariko wenda ngo kutamumenya bikaba byaterwa n'uko batigaga mu ishami rimwe.

#22161#	1	sports	https://rwandamagazine.com/imikino/article/myugariro-wa-apr-fc-n-ikipe-y-igihugu-amavubi
Njye sindeba uko mukeba yiyubatse ahubwo ndeba uko mpagaze - Mutsinzi Ange Myugariro wa APR FC n’ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi Mutsinzi Ange atangaza ko afitiye icyizere APR FC yiyubatse ndetse ko adatewe ubwoba n’uko amakipe bazahanganira igikombe cya shampiyona akomeje kugura abakinnyi umunsi ku wundi.
Ibi yabitangaje mu kiganiro yagiranye n’urubuga rwa APR FC.
Ngo afite icyizere ko intego y’ikipe y’ingabo z’igihugu izagerwaho umwaka utaha ashingiye ku kuntu yongeyemo amaraso mashya impande zose.
Yagize ati " Akenshi rero njyewe sinkunda kureba uko mukeba yiyubatse ahubwo ndeba uko mpagaze, yego nibyo amakipe duhanganye ari kugura abakinnyi beza gusa njye mbanza kureba uko ikipe yacu ihagaze, ese iri ku rwego rwahangana n’uwo ari we wese mu gihugu ?"
Yunzemo ati " Icyo navuga ku ikipe yacu ni ikipe nziza mwarabibonye umwaka ushize twitwaye neza, abayobozi bafatanyije n’abatoza bongeyemo abakinnyi beza bazadufasha cyane haba mu marushanwa yo mu gihugu, mu karere ndetse no ku ruhando nyafurika nka Tuyisenge Jacques hari byinshi azaduha na bagenzi be hari byinshi bazongera mu ikipe."
Yavuze ko umutoza ubongerera ingufu ari umutoza uri ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Ati " Umutoza wongera imbaraga batuzaniye ni umutoza mwiza uri ku rwego mpuzamahanga ukomeje kudufasha cyane aduha imyitozo myiza, icyo navuga ni uko ikipe yacu ikomeye cyane, abatoza ndetse n’abayobozi beza bayireberera umunsi ku wundi nabyo biduha icyizere ko intego yacu nta kabuza umwaka utaha tuzayigeraho.”
Ubutumwa yahaye abafana Yagize ati " Icyo nakwizeza abafana ni uko ikipe imeze neza kandi ndabizeza ko umwaka utaha tuzatanga ibirenze ibyo twatanze umwaka ushize twitwara neza kugira ngo tubahe ibyishimo, ni urugendo ruzaba rutoroshye turabizi ariko natwe turiyizeye, bazadutize umurindi gusa ntibazacike intege nk’uko babikoze umwaka ushize ubundi ibyishimo bazabibona."
Mutsinzi Ange yerekanywe ku mugaragaro nk’umukinnyi wa APR FC tariki 2 Kanama 2019 akaba yarayifashije kwegukana ibikombe bitatu mu mwaka we wa mbere.

#22174#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/abanya-turkiya-bari-kureba-aho-bashora-imari-mu-rwanda
Abanya-Turkiya bari kureba aho bashora imari mu Rwanda Itsinda ry'abashoramari bo muri Turikiya kuva ku gicamunsi cya tariki 03/11/2015 bari gusura Akarere ka Kayonza berekwa aho bashora imari.
Abo bashoramari basuye Akarere ka Kayonza baje mu gihe gafite imishinga myinshi kifuza ko abashoramari bashoramo imari, bikaba byafasha Akarere mu kwihutisha iterambere ryako no kurushaho kuzamura imibereho y'abaturage.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza hagati asobanurira abashoramari baturutse muri Turkiya aho bashora imari Mu mishinga abashoramari beretswe higanjemo ijyanye n'ubucuruzi, ubukerarugendo n'ubuhinzi.
Mu bukerarugendo ako karere gafite umushinga wo kubaka inzu [guest house] ifite amacumbi ku musozi wa Gisunzu uri hafi ya Parike y'Akagera.
Batekereje uwo mushinga nyuma yo kubona ko bamwe mu basura iyo Parike bitaborohera kurara mu zindi Hoteli zihabarizwa bitewe n'impamvu zitandukanye.
Bamwe mu bikorera bo mu karere ka Kayonza baganira n'abashoramari Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza Mugabo John, avuga ko kuba hari ba mukerarugendo batarara ari igihombo ku karere kuko baraye mu karere bashobora kugasigamo amadovize menshi, ari nayo mpamvu batekereje kubaka ayo macumbi ahendutse.
Akarere kanafite umushinga w'ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco, ku buryo abaraye muri iyo ‘Guest house' bazajya basura ibikorwa by'ubwo bukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco.
Abo bashoramari bavuze ko bishimiye iyo mishinga Akarere kaberetse, ariko ngo uw'ubukerarugendo n'uw'ubuhinzi bwa Kawa ni yo yabashishikaje cyane nk'uko Aden Sanliturk wari uyoboye itsinda ry'abo bashoramari yabivuze.
Abashoramari bo muri Turkiya bari hamwe n'abayobozi b'Akarere ka Kayonza nyuma yo kuganira Yavuze ko bashaka ubutaka buhinzeho kawa bungana na Hegitari bakazayikurikirana ku buryo itanga umusaruro mwiza.
Iyo ngo niyo bazifashisha bereka abaturage ubwoko bwa Kawa bifuza kuzajya bajyana ku isoko mpuzamahanga.
Cyakora nta kintu kinini bashatse kuvuga kijyanye n'igihe bateganya gutangira gushora imari yabo muri ako karere.
Bavuze ko bazabanza kuvugana n'abikorera bo muri ako karere kugira ngo bagirane ubufatanye muri iryo shoramari bateganya gukora.
Cyprien M.
Ngendahimana

Michael Sarpong agiye gutangiza umuryango ufasha abatishoboye, ibikorwa byawo mu Rwanda ni vuba Michael Sarpong, rutahizamu w’Umunya- GHANA wahoze muri Rayon Sports yatangaje ko agiye gutangiza umuryango ufasha abatishoboye kugira ngo afashe abana babyiruka ubu kudakurira mu buzima “bw’ubukene” nk’ubwo we n’abana b’aho yabyirukiye bakuriyemo.
Ibi Michael Sarpong ubu ukinira Yanga yo muri Tanzania yabitangaje nyuma y’aho ku cyumweru gishize yafashije abana b’imfubyi barererwa mu kigo cy’imfubyi cy’iwabo muri Ghana cyitwa Royal Seed Home, akabagenera ubufasha bw’ibiribwa, ibinyobwa, ibikoresho by’isuku n’ibindi.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye Sarpong yagiranye na RWANDA MAGAZINE, yavuze ko uyu muryango witwa The Michael Sarpong Foundation utazaba ukorera gusa iwabo muri Ghana ahubwo ko uzasakaza ibikorwa byawo “ku isi hose kugira ngo tubashe gufasha no kugoboka abantu b’amikoro make kurusha abandi mu muryango mugari.”
Sarpong yavuze kandi ko “amarembo akinguye ku wo ari we wese wifuza gufasha agatanga umusanzu we mu gufasha abandi bakeneye ubufasha n’abandi batishoboye.”

Sarpong avuga ko impamvu yamuteye kugira igitekerezo cyo gutangiza umuryango ufasha abatishoboye ari ubuzima bubi we n’abana b’abaturanyi be bakuriyemo.
Yagize ati “Nakuriye ahantu twari dukennye, kugira ngo ngere aho ngeze ubu, rwari urugamba rw’injyanamuntu.
Sinifuza kubona abana babyiruka ubu guca muri ibi bintu [yakuriyemo].”
Nyuma yo gufasha abana b’imfubyi b’iwabo muri Ghana, Sarpong yavuze ko vuba aha “tuzakomereza i Kigali dukore ibikorwa by’urukundo.”
Kugeza ubu nta baterankunga cyangwa abandi abo ari bo bose batanze ubufasha kuri The Michael Sarpong Foundation.
Gufasha imfubyi muri Ghana, Sarpong yabikoze mu mujyo wa The Michael Sarpong Foundation agiye gushinga

#22221#	9	culture	https://www.igihe.com/umuco/ibitabo/article/no-muri-paradizo-hashobora-kumeramo-imifatangwe-ev-uwagaba-avuga-ku-rushako-rwe
No muri Paradizo hashobora kumeramo imifatangwe-Ev Uwagaba avuga ku rushako rwe rutarambye Uwagaba Joseph Caleb afite inkuru ushobora kumva, amarira agashoka.
Uyu muvugabutumwa muri Bethesda Holy Church yabuze umugore we Mucyo Sabine nyuma y’igihe gito bashyingiwe.
Nubwo aba bombi bari bamaze amezi atandatu bahamije isezerano ryo kubana nk’umugabo n’umugore [basezeranye ku wa 3 Werurwe 2018], iminsi mike ni yo bamaranye kuko igihe kirekire Mucyo yakimaze mu bitaro.
Mucyo Sabine yitabye Imana ku wa 4 Ukwakira 2018 azize indwara yitwa Systemic Lupus Erythematosusituma; inkuru yabaye incamugongo kuri Uwagaba, inshuti n’umuryango we.
Uwagaba uvuka i Rwamagana yateye intambwe ya mbere yandika igitabo cy’amapaji 170 yise ‘A Hundred days in marriage’ kivuga ku bigwi n’amateka y’umugore we.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 31 y’amavuko kuri ubu abarizwa muri Pologne aho yagiye kwiga amasomo y’Icyiciro cya Gatatu muri Kaminuza ya Varsovie mu bijyanye n’Ubwikorezi n’Ubucuruzi Mpuzamahanga.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE, Uwagaba yavuze ko igitabo cye ‘‘A hundred days in Marriage’’ bishatse kuvuga ‘‘Iminsi 100 ya mbere y’urushako’’, yacyanditse ashaka gusohoza ibyo yemeranyije n’umugore we.
Yagize ati ‘‘Nashakaga kubahiriza isezerano nagiranye n’umugore wanjye Mucyo Sabine mbere y’uko yitaba Imana.
Mu gihe yari arwaye hari ibyo namusezeranyije nzakora, impamvu ya kabiri ni uko namufashe nk’umuntu w’icyitegererezo numva ko ubuzima bwe n’amateka bye bitapfa kurangira gutya gusa kubera ko yitabye Imana.
Oya Sabine ntazibagirana kuko namushyize mu gitabo.
Nifuza ko umuntu wese uzabishaka azamenye amateka ye.’’
Yakomeje avuga ko ikindi cyamuteye kwandika ari uko abahanga mu bijyanye n’isanamitima bavuga ko ari umuti wavura agahinda cyangwa ihungabana runaka kuko ‘bifasha kuvuga ibyo utabashaga kwatura ngo uvuge kubera amaranga mutima yawe’.
Ati ‘‘Nanditse rero ngo ibindimo mbikure ku mutima bisohoke bimvemo mbisangire n’abandi.’’
Yasobanuye ko ibikubiye mu gitabo bitanga n’igisubizo ku bibaza ku rupfu rw’umugore we.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Dukora ubukwe byari nk’ibisanzwe nk’uko abandi bose bakundanye babigenza twari tumaze igihe kinini tumenyanye, aha nashakaga no kwerekana ukuntu abantu bajya bivuga ko urugo ahanini ari Paradizo nibyo koko ariko ntibihira bose kuko muri iyo Paradizo hari igihe hashobora kumeramo amahwa y’ibitovu cyangwa imifatangwe ku buryo utungurwa.’’
Uwagaba yavuze ko igitabo cye gifite amasomo by’umwihariko mu kubaka ingo.
Ati ‘‘Urugo si ugutura muri paradizo ni nayo mpamvu, nibanze ku minsi mike twabanyemo na Mucyo kuko benshi bakeka ko ari iminsi ya buki yo kwishimisha mu buzima ariko byabaye ibindi kandi tuguma ku isezerano twagiranye.’’
‘‘Nyuma y’ubukwe twagiye mu kwezi kwa buki nk’abandi bose, tujya mu gihugu duturanye, tujya ku Gisenyi turatembera, turataha tugeze mu rugo umugore atangira kugaragaza ibimenyetso by’uburwayi.
Twagiye kwa muganga batubwira ko ari ibintu bitagoye baduha imiti isanzwe, bavuga ko ari umunaniro.’’
Nyuma y’icyumweru, Mucyo yasubiye mu kazi ariko hashize igihe gito atangira kubyimba ibirenge, ibyo bamwe bitiranyije no gusama, ariko ‘uko iminsi ishira akarushaho kuremba.’
Uwagaba yahungabanyijwe n’urupfu rw’umugore we Ku wa 28 Nzeri 2018, Mucyo yajyanywe mu Bitaro bya CHUK ndetse abaganga baza kumenya indwara arwaye.
Uwagaba avuga ko icyo gihe yatangiye gushaka uko yajya kumuvuriza mu bihugu bifite ibikoresho bihambaye kuko mu Rwanda byari byananiranye ariko [Mucyo] ajya muri koma yamazemo ibyumweru bitatu, ahita yitaba Imana.
Ati ‘‘Uburwayi bwe bwari bugoye ku buryo byampungabanyije cyane.
Sabine yari umukobwa ukora siporo, ubona ko afite ameze neza ariko nyine ubuzima burahinduka.’’
Mu gitabo cye, Uwagaba akomeza gushimangira isezerano yagiranye n’umugore we.
Ati ‘‘Urukundo nyarwo, kurinda isezerano, kwitanga, ni byo nahaye umutwe wa kabiri w’izina ry’igitabo.
Kugira urugo rwiza cyangwa urushako rwiza bisaba kwitanga, kwitonda, kugira ibyo wigomwa kugira ngo uwo mugiye kubana abe we wuzuye.’’
Mu gihe umugore we yari arwaye, Uwagaba yagombaga kumwitaho ariko agakomeza gushaka imibereho ngo abone ikibatunga.
Ati ‘‘Umugore wanjye arwaye twarakubititse cyane kuko nagombaga no gukora ngo tubeho, na we nkamugeraho kenshi bishoboka.
Haje kugera igihe yumva yorohewe yakize, twaraganiriye arambwira ati ‘ariko uzi ko ubuzima twaciyemo bugoye kandi bubabaje?’
Icyo gihe yacurangaga gitari, arambwira ngo ‘uwazahimba indirimbo cyangwa nkakora umuvugo ariko nkagira ikintu nkora nk’inkuru ivuga iminsi twabanyemo muri aya mezi.’’
Icyo kiganiro ni cyo cyanogerejwemo igitekerezo cyo kwandika igitabo ‘‘A hundred days in Marriage’’ kigaruka ku minsi ya mbere yabo mu rushako.
Uwagaba ati ‘‘Abari aho bamubwiye bati ‘byaba birebire kereka mubishyize mu gitabo.
Sabine ati ‘nimumbwire rero tuzakita dute?’
Avuga ko ubwo tumaze amezi atatu mu bibazo reka tuzacyite ‘Mu minsi 100 twubatse urugo’.
Ni we wihitiyemo, nibyo nise isezerano.
Ubwo twaje gusezererwa turataha nyuma aza kwitaba Imana.’’
Urupfu rw’umugore we rwaramuhungabanyije kugeza aho yagiye gushaka umuganga w’indwara zo mu mutwe amugira inama yo kuruhuka bitewe n’ihungabana yari afite.
Ati ‘‘Uwo muganga yangiriye inama yo kwandika kuko njye rwose sinigeze ntekereza ko nzandika igitabo.’’
Akimara kumurika ‘A Hundred days in marriage’, Kaminuza yigamo i Varsovie muri Pologne yamugeneye igihembo cy’umunyeshuri wakoze ikintu gikomeye.
Igitabo cya Uwagaba kiri mu Cyongereza, anateganya kugishyira mu Gifaransa no mu Kinyarwanda.
Kiboneka ku maguriro ya murandasi azwi ku Isi yose nka Amazon, Xlibris, Barnes, Noble, Google, iBooks, Scribd, Booktopia n’ayandi.
Reba ikiganiro na Uwagaba Joseph asobanura Igitabo cye ‘A Hundred days in marriage’ Umuvugabutumwa Uwagaba Joseph Caleb yanditse igitabo ku nkuru y’urupfu rw’umugore we Mucyo Sabine bari bamaze igihe gito bashyingiwe Uwagaba Caleb na Mucyo Sabine bahamije isezerano ryo kubana akaramata ku wa 3 Werurwe 2018 Bamaranye igihe gito bari mu byishimo by'abagishyingirwa, umugore ahita arwara Uwagaba yavuze ko yanditse igitabo ashaka gusohoza isezerano yagiranye n'umugore we ataritaba Imana Umuyobozi Mukuru wa University of Economics and Human Sciences in Warsaw, Dr.
Konrad Janowski, yashimiye Uwagaba Caleb wakoze igikorwa cy'ubutwari mu mwaka ushize mu biga muri iyi kaminuza ‘A Hundred days in marriage’ ni igitabo cy'amapaji 170 cyanditswe mu rurimi rw'Icyongereza [email protected]

Aba nibo bakinnyi 5 barushije abandi guconga ruhango kuva Isi yabaho Ikinyamakuru UKWEZI kifashishije inkuru yatambutse kuri Quora.com cyaguteguriye urutonde rw’ abakinnyi batanu barushije abandi mu mupira w’ amaguru mu mateka yawo.
Uru rutonde ruriho abakinnye umupira w’ amaguru batakiwukina kuko bagiye mu kiruhuko cy’ izaburu, abasigaye ari abatoza, n’ abakiri abakinnyi uyu munsi.
1.
Pele Amateka y’ umupira w’ amaguru agaragaza ko umunya-brazil Edson Arantes do Nascimento, abenshi bamenye ku izina rya Pele ariwe mukinnyi mwiza wabayeho mu mateka y’ umupira w’ amaguru.
Magingo aya ari mu kiruhuko ku myaka 79.
Mu 1999 nibwo ishami rishinzwe ibarurishamibare n’ amateka muri FIFA ryatoye Pele nk’ umukinnyi w’ ikinyejana.
2.
Zinedine Zidane Ni umukinyi wabayeho mu mateka w’umupira w’amaguru kandi ukomeje kubaka izina mu bijyanye no gutoza.
Zidane yavutse (23 Kamena 1972, izina mu cyarabu, ni umukinnyi w’Umufaransa wagacishijeho mu mu mupira w’amaguru, wambaraga no 10 mu kibuga mu ikipe y’igihugu y’Ubufaransa akaba yaraciye mu makipe nka Cannes, Bordeaux, Juventus na Real Madrid ubu abereye umutoza.
Yatowe nk’umukinnyi mwiza ku mugabane w’I Burayi na UEFA Golden Jubilee Poll mu myaka mirongo itanu ishize.
Yakinnye umukino wa mbere mu ikipe y’igihugu taliki ya 17 Kanama 1994, mu mukino wa gicuti wahuzaga France na Czech Republic aho yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura agafasha ikipe ye kunganya ibitego 2-2 nyumo yo gutsinda ibitego bibiri wenyine.
3- Ronaldo Ronaldo Luís Nazário de Lima w’ imyaka 43 ni Umunya-Brazil uzwiho ubuhanga budasanzwe mu mupira w’ amaguru, no kurusha abandi guha umupira icyerekezo ashaka.
4-Leonel Messi Lionel Andrés Messi Cuccittini niwe mupaseri mwiza mu mateka ya shampiyona ya Espange, uyu munya-Argentine amaze gutsinda ibitego birenga 100 muri Champion League.
Messi uyu mwaka yanditse amateka yo kuba umukinnyi wa mbere mu mateka y’ Isi utwaye ballon d’ or ya 6 mu myaka 10 , mu gihe mugenzi we Cristiano Ronaldo afite ballon d’ or 5 mu myaka 10.
5-Cristiano Ronaldo Uyu munya-Portugal amaze imyaka 10 akina umupira w’ amaguru ariko uko yakinaga yinjira mu kibuga bwa mbere n’ uyu munsi niko akimeze ntagihinduka nubwo imyaka ye yiyongera.
CR7 na Messi bateza mu bantu impaka kuko hagati yabo bigoye kwemeza urusha undi.
Cristiano amaze gutwara ballon d’or 5 mu myaka 10.
Ushobora kuba kutemeranya n’ uru rutonde.
Ni uburenganzira bwawe kujya ahandikirwa ibitekerezo ugasangiza abandi abo ubona ko aribo bakinnyi ba mbere barushije abandi mu mupira w’ amaguru.

#22224#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/abakozi-ba-ambasade-ya-amerika-n-abadipolomate-babarizwa-mu-rwanda-batanze
Abakozi ba Ambasade ya Amerika n’abadipolomate babarizwa mu Rwanda batanze amaraso Abakozi ba Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda na bamwe mu badipolomate bakorera imiryango mpuzamahanga mu gihugu batanze amaraso azifashishwa mu butabazi ku ndembe ziyakeneye mu bitaro bitandukanye mu Rwanda.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe na Ambasade ya Amerika mu rwa Gasabo ifatanyije n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe gutanga Amaraso (NCBT).
Abakozi 108 ba Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda na bagenzi babo bo mu yindi miryango mpuzamahanga ni bo bagaragaye muri iki gikorwa cyabereye ku cyicaro cy’iyo ambasade ku Kacyiru mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ku wa 20 Werurwe 2019.
Ku nshuro ya 10 y’iki gikorwa, Ambasade ya Amerika yatumiye abandi badipolomate bakorera i Kigali barimo ab’u Bufaransa, u Bwongereza n’u Budage bahuza imbaraga mu gikorwa cyo gutanga amaraso.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa (Chargé d’affaires) muri Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda, Richard Michaels, ni we watangije iki gikorwa cyiswe “Share Life, Give Blood”, bishatse kuvuga “Sangira n’abandi ubuzima, tanga amaraso.’’
Yagize ati “Nishimiye ko abakozi ba ambasade batanze amaraso n’umutima ukunze, ni uburyo bworoshye bwo gutanga ubutabazi.
Ndizera ko igikorwa cyacu cyo gutanga amaraso gishishikariza buri wese mu Rwanda gutangira kuyatanga.’’
Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda yatangiye gutanga amaraso mu 2012, aho yagize uruhare mu gushyikiriza udupaki 736 muri NCBT.
Intego yo gutanga amaraso inajyanye no gushyigikira ubukangurambaga bw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe gutanga Amaraso mu kuyageza aho ashobora kugoboka aho akenewe no gushishikariza abatuye u Rwanda gukangukira kuyatanga ku bushake kandi mu buryo buhoraho.
Amaraso yatanzwe azakoreshwa mu gutabara inkomere, abarwayi babazwe, n’abafite indwara zo kubura amaraso ahagije mu mubiri mu Rwanda.
Biteganyijwe ko kandi hari azoherezwa mu bitaro hifashishijwe Drones za Zipline zitwara amaraso ku bitaro byo mu gihugu.
Mu mpera za 2018, izi ndege zitagira abapilote zatangiye mu 2016 nk’igisubizo mu koroshya ubutabazi ku barwayi bakeneye amaraso byihutirwa batuye mu misozi, zari zimaze kujyana udupaki 15 700 tw’amaraso ku bitaro bitandukanye ziyakuye ku kibuga cyazo kiri mu Karere ka Muhanga.
Iki gikorwa Ambasade ya Amerika yagiteguye ifatanyije n’Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe gutanga Amaraso (NCBT) Ni ku nshuro ya 10, abakozi ba Ambasade ya Amerika batanze amaraso yo kugoboka indembe ziyakeneye Abakozi ba Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda bishimiye gutanga amaraso

#22231#	5	politics	http://www.igihe.com/politiki/amakuru/article/sena-y-u-rwanda-yatoye-itegeko-rishyiraho-komisiyo-izafasha-kuvugurura-itegeko
Sena y'u Rwanda yatoye Itegeko rishyiraho Komisiyo izafasha kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga Yanditswe kuya 27-08-2015 saa 20:16' na Birori Eric Abasenateri 23 kuri 23 batoye Itegeko rishyiraho Komisiyo ishinzwe kunganira Inteko Ishinga Amategeko imitwe yombi mu ivugururwa ry'Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y'u Rwanda ryo ku wa 04 Kamena 2003, nk'uko ryavuguruwe kugeza ubu, rikanagena inshingano, imiterere n'imikorere byayo.
Ni igikorwa cyabaye kuri uyu wa 27 Kanama 2014, mu nteko rusange yari igizwe n'abasenateri 23 bari bitabiriye igihembwe kidasanzwe.
Uyu mushingwa wari uhagarariwe na Depite Musabyimana Samuel uyoboye akanama k'Abadepite kateguye uwo mushinga ndetse na Depite Uwayisenga Yvone umwungirije.
Depite Musabyimana amaze kugeza ku Basenateri ishingiro ry'uyu mushinga w'iryo tegeko, yabasabye guhita baritorera bibaye ngombwa, hagamijwe gusubiza ubusabe bw'abagera kuri Miliyoni eshatu n'ibihumbi 700 bandikiye Inteko Ishinga Amategeko basaba ko Itegeko Nshinga ryavugururwa.
Umushinga watowe n'Abasenateri bose bari bahari Inteko rusange yari iyobowe na Perezida wa Sena, Bernard Makuza nyuma yo gusuzuma uyu mushinga yahise iwutorera maze Abasenateri 23 kuri 23 bose barawutora.
Bernard Makuza, Perezida wa Sena ni we wari uyoboye Inteko Rusange Nyuma yo kuritora Senateri Makuza yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi ari ibintu bisanzwe by'uruhererekane rw'amategeko mu gusubiza icyifuzo cy'abaturage, bakaba batanze ibitekerezo mu buryo ingingo ya 101 yavugururwa.
Makuza yagize ati "Kubera uburemere by'Itegeko Nshinga imitwe yombi yasabye ko hajyaho Komisiyo yunganira Inteko Ishinga Amategeko mu kwandika imbanzirizamushinga y'ivugurura ry'Itegeko nshinga."
Depite Uwayisenga Yvone avuga ko iyi Komisiyo izafasha Inteko Ishinga Amategeko imitwe yombi mu kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga nirangiza itange raporo ku mutwe w'abadepite na Sena.
Umutwe w'abadepite uziga iri tegeko ushyikirize umutwe wa Sena kugirango bayifashishe mu mushinga wo kuvugurura itegeko nshinga.
Nyuma y'uko Sena yemeje iri tegeko rizatangazwa maze Guverinoma igene Abakomiseri barindwi bazajya muri iyi Komisiyo.
Izi mpuguke zizohererezwa Sena yemeze imishinga y'amateka abashyiraho.
Iyi Komisiyo izamara amezi ane azongerwa n'iteka rya Perezida wa Repubulika bibaye ngombwa.
Kuba iyo komisiyo ishyizweho haramaze kwemezwa ingengo y'imari y'uyu mwaka, ngo nta mpungenge bikwiye gutera, kuko izakoresha ingengo y'Imari y'umutwe w'abadepite, bigakorwa nk'uko igihugu kijya gishyira mu bikorwa ibindi byemezo byihutirwa kandi bitunguranye.
Kuwa 14 Nyakanga 2015, Inteko rusange ya buri mutwe w'inteko Ishinga Amategeko yasuzumye ubusabe bw'abanyarwanda maze hemezwa ishingiro ryabwo.
Kuwa 20 Nyakanga kugeza tariki 3 Nyakanga abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko imitwe yombi bagiranye ibiganiro n'abanyarwanda mu mirenge 416.
Kuwa 10 Kanama 2015, inteko rusange ya buri mutwe yarateranye imaze gusuzuma raporo y'izi ngendo ifata imyanzuro y'uko itegeko nshinga ryavugururwa ndetse n'umwanzuro wo gushyiraho iyi Komisiyo igashyirwaho n'itegeko ndetse igahabwa igihe kizwi izaba yarangije imirimo yayo. #22243#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/kwemerera-abaganga-basanzwe-bahembwa-na-leta-gukorera-ahantu-harenze-hamwe-bigamije-kunoza-serivisi-minisante
Kwemerera abaganga basanzwe bahembwa na Leta gukorera ahantu harenze hamwe bigamije kunoza serivisi - MINISANTE Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko mu rwego kurushaho kunoza serivisi zihabwa abagana amavuriro ya Leta no guha ayo mavuriro ubushobozi bwo gukomeza gukoresha abaganga n’abaganga b’emenyo bafite ubumenyi bukenewe ku isoko, yashyizeho amabwiriza yemerera abaganga n’abaganga b’amenyo gukorera mu mavuriro arenze rimwe, no gukora mu buryo burenze bumwe aho basanzwe bakorera (Dual clinical practice).
MINISANTe ivuga ko aya amabwiriza yemerera abaganga gukorera amavuriro basanzwe bakoreramo nyuma y’amasaha asanzwe y’akazi, ariko serivisi batanze muri icyo gihe zikishyuzwa ku giciro kingana n’icyo mu mavuriro yigenga biri ku rwego rumwe.
Itangazo rya MINISANTE rigenewe abanyamakuru riravuga ko aya mabwiriza kandi yemerera abaganga n’abaganga b’emenyo gukorera mu rindi vuriro ritari irya Leta mu gihe cyabo cy’ikiruhuko cyangwa mu minsi ya week-end.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr.
Daniel Ngamije, yagize ati “Kwemerera abagangagukora muri ubu buryo bifitiye akamaro urwego rw’ubuzima mu Rwanda, kuko bizafasha amavuriro ya Leta gukomeza gukoresha abaganga bafite ubumenyi kandi bakorana umurava, bityo n’abayagana bakarushaho guhabwa serivisi nziza”.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko hashyizweho imirongo ngenderwaho muri iyi mikorere, izatuma imirimo abaganga bakora itaba myinshi ngo irenge urugero, bityo n’ireme rya serivisi basabwa gutanga rigatakara.
MINISANTE ivuga ko ku bw’izo mpamvu, abaganga bazajya bakorera muri ubu buryo mu mavuriro basanzwe bakoreramo, hahindutse gusa ibiciro bya serivisi batanga, igihe amasaha asanzwe y’akazi azajya aba arangiye.
Icyakora bazajya bemererwa kuba bajya gutanga serivisi mu ivuriro ryigenga, rimwe mu minsi ya week-end cyangwa mu minsi yabo y’ikiruhuko.
Mu gihe bibaye ngombwa ko umuganga atanga serivisi mu mavuriro ya Leta arenze rimwe, ubwo burenganzira azajya abuhabwa na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima.
MINISANTE ivuga ko kugira ngo serivisi zitangwa zirusheho kuba nziza ku bagana amavuriro, abaganga bazajya bemererwa kwakira nyuma y’amasaha y’akazi, abarwayi batarenga 50% by’abo bakiriye mu masaha asanzwe y’akazi.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ni yo izajya iha amavuriro ya Leta uburenganzira bwo gutangiza iyo mikorere, ndetse ikanemerera abaganga babisabye.
Amavuriro yifuza gutangiza ubu buryo azasabwa gushyiraho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwo kugenzura imibare y’abarwayi abaganga bakira, ibibakorerwa ndetse n’inyungu zabonetse.
MINISANTE ivuga ko nihashira amezi atandatu iyi mikorere mishya itangiye, izakora igenzura kugira ngo hagire ibinozwa hashingiwe ku byavuye muri iryo genzura.
Iyi mikorere ikazatangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa nyuma y’amezi abiri, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima ashyize umukono ku mabwiriza agenga iyo mikorere.

#22312#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/amadini/article/rgb-yagaritse-fahico-kongera-kujyana-abayisilamu-bo-mu-rwanda-i-maka
RGB yahagaritse FAHICO kongera kujyana abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda i Maka Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Imiyoborere (RGB) rufatanyije n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere(RDB) byabujije isosiyete y’abayisilamu yitwa FAHICO kongera kujyana abayisilamu mu mutambagiro mutagatifu i Maka muri Arabie saoudite.
FAHICO, sosiyete yigenga ikora ibikorwa birimo ibyo kujyana abayisilamu mu mutambagiro no kubashakira viza n’amacumbi i Maka, yabujijwe kongera kubajyana ibyo bikorwa by’idini bigomba gukorwa n’Umuryango w’Abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RMC).
Nubwo RGB yandikiye FAHICO iyibuza kongera kujyana abayisilamu i Maka, ubuyobozi bwa FAHICO bubona ko RMC ariyo yagize uruhare rukomeye mu gutuma iyi sosiyete ibuzwa kongera gutwara abayisilamu mu mutambagiro kubera inyungu zihariye.
Aganira na IGIHE, Umuvugizi wa FAHICO, Sheikh Namahoro Hassan, unashinzwe gutegura ibijyanye n’umutambagiro mutagatifu ubera muri Arabie Saoudite, yagize ati “Ayo makuru niyo koko RGB yaratwandikiye itumenyesha ko tudakwiye kongera kujyana abantu i Maka ngo kuko ari igikorwa by’umwihariko cy’Umuryango w’abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RMC) ndetse nta n’undi wemerewe kugikora, gusa RMC babikoze kugira ngo biharire iryo soko ryo kujyana abantu i Maka kubera ko twari dusigaye tubarusha gutwarayo abantu benshi.”
Iki cyemezo cyafashwe nyuma y’uko hari hashize imyaka igera kuri itatu RMC igerageza gukoresha uko ushoboye kugira ngo FAHICO itazongera gutwara abayisilamu i Maka.
RMC yandikiye RGB kuwa 1 Werurwe 2017 iyisaba gutesha agaciro icyemezo cy’ubucuruzi RDB yahaye FAHICO kiyemerera gukora ibikorwa byakabaye bikorwa n’abanyamadini.
Ubu busabe RDB yabuhaye agaciro, ihita yandikira iyi sosiyete kuwa 21 Mata 2017 iyimenyesha; kuwa 25 Gicurasi 2017 na RGB iyihagarika gukomeza kwivanga muri ibyo bikorwa.
Sheikh Namahoro Hassan yabwiye IGIHE ko atumva impamvu FAHICO yakomwa mu nkokora gukomeza imirimo yakoraga mu gihe RMC nta nshingano ifite mu itegurwa ry’umutambagiro i Maka.
Yagize ati “Birumvikana ntabwo byadushimishije kubera ko n’ubusanzwe twe ntabwo dukora igikorwa cyo kuyobora umutambagiro mutagatifu yewe na RMC ntibyemerewe kuko bikorwa na Leta ya Arabie saoudite gusa.
Kuba baratubujije kandi twe dukora akazi ko kugezayo abantu gusa no kubashakira amacumbi na viza ni nko kuturenganya.”
Imamu w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Sheikh Sindayigaya Musa, yemeza ko FAHICO yabujijwe kongera kujyana abayisilamu mu mutambagiro mutagatifu kubera ko biri mu nshingano za RMC.
Yagize ati “Yarabibujijwe kubera ko biri muri wa murongo wo kuba hari amategeko y’Umuryango w’abayisilamu (RMC) awuha inshingano zo gushyira mu bikorwa no guhuza ibikorwa by’idini ya Islam mu Rwanda, yaba mu kwamamaza cyangwa kuvuganira ibikora by’idini kandi kujya i Maka mu mutambagiro mutagatifu ni inkingi ya Gatanu ya Islam.”
Yasoje avuga ko uretse FAHICO nta n’undi muryango cyangwa isosiyete yemerewe gutwara abayisilamu mu mutambagiro mutagatifu nta masezerano y’imikoranire na RMC.
Ubwo Abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda bajyaga i Maka mu 2015

Ni igikorwa kiri kubera ku rubuga rwa MNI aho ushaka guha amahirwe umukobwa nibura yishyura 50 Frw kuri buri jwi atanze.
Nsengiyumva Alphonse ukuriye Suprafamily Rwanda Ltd itegura Miss Supranational Rwanda, yavuze ko irushanwa ry’uyu mwaka batekereje gukoresha ubu buryo bashaka kureba umukobwa waba akunzwe n’abantu.
Ati “Urumva twashatse gushyiraho igiciro gito kuri buri jwi, tuzi ko koko mu gihe umukobwa azaba afite abamushyigikiye bizamworohera guhita akatisha itike yo kujya muri batanu ba mbere.
Ikindi twashakaga gutangira kumenyereza abanyarwanda kwikura amafaranga n’iyo yaba make, bagafasha abahatana muri iri rushanwa no mu yandi.”
Aba bakobwa 11 bamaze iminsi bari guhatana muri iri rushanwa mu byiciro bitandukanye birimo icyo kwivugaho, kuvuga ku bwiza bw’u Rwanda, kuvuga ku mushinga no kwamamaza Oppo nk’umufatanyabikorwa w’iri rushanwa.
Muri batanu bazagera mu cyiciro cya nyuma muri iri rushanwa, hazabanza gutoranywamo babiri bazaba barimo uwigaragaje neza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga [Social influencer] ndetse n’uzaba ari hejuru mu majwi yo kuri internet.
Abandi batatu bazatoranywa hazateranywa urugendo rwose banyuzemo muri uru rushanwa, batange amanota hakurikijwe uko bitwaye.
Iri rushanwa riri gukorwa hifashishijwe TV1 ndetse n’imbuga nkoranyambaga.
Abo bakobwa bakorera mu matsinda, bigatambutswa kuri televiziyo.
Akanama nkemurampaka gakurikirana irushanwa inshuro nyinshi kifashishije ikoranabuhanga, ariko rimwe na rimwe bahura n’abakobwa barimo guhatana.
Bikini ikunze kuvugisha benshi mu marushanwa y’ubwiza yakuwe mu irushanwa kubera Coronavirus.
Aba bakobwa bagiye guhatanira ikamba rifitwe na Umunyana Shanitah wabaye Miss Supranational Rwanda mu 2019.
Yahembwe miliyoni 1 Frw anaserukira u Rwanda mu irushanwa rya Miss Supranational ryabereye muri Pologne kuva ku wa 6 Ukuboza 2019.
Igisonga cya Mbere cyegukanye 500 000 Frw mu gihe Igisonga cya kabiri yahembwe 300 000 Frw.
Irushanwa rya Miss Supranational International bahatanira kwitabira, ribera muri Pologne, aho abakobwa batandukanye bahurira muri iki gihugu bakamarayo ibyumweru bitatu bahatanira iri kamba.
Urugendo rwo gushaka umukobwa uzahagararira u Rwanda muri Miss Supranational International mu 2021, rwatangiye nyuma yaho gutora uwari kwitabira iri rushanwa rya 2020 mu Ugushyingo, byasubitswe.
Umunya-Thailand ufite ikamba rya Miss Supranational, Anntonia Porsild n’Umunyamerika Nate Crnkovich ufite irya Mister Supranational, bazagumana amakamba kugeza igihe hazatorwa ababasimbura.
Gutora uzahagararira u Rwanda muri iri rushanwa bizakorwa mu mpera za Ukuboza uyu mwaka.
Guha amahirwe umukobwa unyura hano Gutoranya umukobwa uzahita akatisha itike muri iri rushanwa biri gukorwa, hakishyurwa 50 Frw kuri buri jwi

Abamotari barasabwa gukaza umurego mu kwirinda impanuka n'umwanda Ubuyobozi bw'umujyi wa Kigali bufatanyije na Police bwaburiye abatwara abagenzi kuri moto, ko ibihano bigiye gukazwa ku batubahiriza amategeko y'umuhanda n'abadaharanira isuku kuri bo ubwabo no kubagenzi batwara.
Inama yabereye i Nyamirambo kuri Stade yahuje amashyirahamwe y'abamotari ihuje abahagarariye Polisi ishinzwe umutekano mu muhanda n'umuyobozi w'umujyi wa Kigali.
Abamotari bategetswe gutanga akanozasuku ku bagenzi, bikagaragara ko ari bo banze kukambara ariko bagafite.
Ubundi ibihano byajyaga bitangwa ku bamotari batubahirije umutekano wo muhanda ni ukwamburwa moto, bakamara ukwezi badakora hakiyongeraho no kwamburwa uruhushya rwo gutwara ikinyabiziga.
Chief Supt.
Celestin Twahirwa, Umuyobozi wa Police ishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda.
Yagize ati: "Moto ziri hagati ya 400 na 500 nizo ziri mu maboko ya Police mu mujyi wa Kigali bitewe n'amakosa yanyu, ese mugira ngo twe turabyishimira?"
Fidel Ndayisaba, umuyobozi w'umujyi wa Kigali we avuga ko kuba ibihano nk'ibi byatinze gufatwa ugereranyije n'uko bimeze mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi.
Ati: "Uzamburwa uruhushya rwo gutwara ikinyabiziga, kandi nta nubwo wemerewe kongere gukorera".
Gusa abamotari bakomeje kwijujuta bavuga ko akanozasuku gahenze, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umwe muri abo bamotari, utwara abagenzi mu nkengero z'ikibuga cy'indege witwa Justin Rwagasana.
Abamotari bongeraho kwinubira ko barenganwa mu gihe moto zabo zifatirwa kandi batabona amakosa akwiye gutuma bahagarika imirimo.
Basaba kwishyura amafaranga y'ibihano bagahita basubizwa ibinyabiziga byabo, bakanagaya uburyo byangirikira mu gikorwa cyo kubifatira.
Ndayisaba yakiriye neza icyifuzo cyo gukoresha umuti wo gupuriza, ariko yongeraho ko kizabanza kwigwaho n'inzego zibishinzwe.
Naho Umuyobozi wa Police ishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda yabijeje ko nta rwiyenzo ruzabaho ndetse n'ibinyabiziga bifatiriwe ngo bikazajya bifatwa neza.
Yabasabye ko uzarenganwa agomba kuzajya amuhamagara kuri telefone ye.
Andi mabwiriza abamotari basabwa kubahiriza ni ugukorera mu makoperative bose, bakagira umwambaro wabo wanditseho amazina hamwe no kugira ibyangombwa byose bibaranga.
Inama ubuyobozi bw'umujyi wa Kigali bwagiranye n'abamotari ngo igamije kubahiriza intego bihaye igira iti:"Isuku, umutekano, umurimo unoze kandi wihuse."
Simon Kamuzinzi

#22346#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/rusizi-barasaba-polisi-ko-yajya-ihana-by-intagarugero-abakora-urugomo
Rusizi: Barasaba Polisi ko yajya ihana by'intagarugero abakora urugomo Abatuye akarere ka Rusizi by'umwihariko abo mu mujyi wa Kamembe barifuza ko Polisi ikorera muri aka karere yajya ihana by'intagarugero abahungabanya umutekano muri uyu mujyi kuko hari bamwe mu bahungabanya umutekano bafatwa na polisi nyuma y'igihe gito bakarekurwa.
Ubuyobozi bwa Polisi ariko bwo bukavuga ko iyo bahise barekurwa biba byatewe nuko nta babashinja baba babonetse cyangwa habuze ibimenyetso byatuma bajyanwa mu bushinja cyaha.
Mu mujyi wa Kamembe hari uduce twinshi tuzwi nk'indiri z'amabandi turimo ahitwa mu Rushakamba mu kagali ka Kamashangi no mu Gahinga mu murenge wa Mururu ndetse ngo nta kwezi gushira hadafatiwe abakora urugomo rurimo gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge, ubujura no gukubita abatuye uyu mujyi.
Bavuga ko kuba bidacika biterwa no kuba aya mabandi akora urugomo iyo Polisi iyafashe iyafunga igihe gito igahita iyafungura kandi bavuga ko ingufu baba bakoresheje bafata ayo mabandi ziba ari nyishi.
Tariki 13/07/2014, umuyobozi wa Polisi mu karere ka Rusizi, CSP Sesonga Johnson, yavuze ko iyi mirenge ya Mururu na Kamembe ari imwe mu mirenge igaragaramo abahungabanya umutekano koko ndetse agaragaza ko abenshi mu bafungiye urugomo ariho bavuka ndetse anemeza ko ibyo bakora ahanini babiterwa n'ibiyobyabwenge baba banyoye.
Umuyobozi wa police mu karere ka Rusizi yavuze ko kuba hari amabandi afatwa akongera akarekurwa biterwa no kuba nta we uba ubashinja cyangwa ngo akurikirane ama dossier yabo kuko police iba yagejeje ibirego byabo mu bushinjacyaha igihe cyo kubikurikirana ababazanye bakabura.
Umuyobozi wa police mu karere ka Rusizi yongeye gusaba abaturage gukomeza kwitwararika bicungira umutekano ndetse bakanirinda inkongi ziterwa n'umuriro muri iki gihe ziri kujya zibasira inyubako hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Musabwa Euphrem

Inama y'Abaminisitiri yemeje Politiki y'Igihugu yo guteza imbere Ingufu n'Ingamba zivuguruye zo guteza imbere urwo rwego.

Inama y'Abaminisitiri yemeje Raporo ya mbere ku byo u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho mu gushyira mu bikorwa Amasezerano y'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ajyanye n'Uburenganzira bw'Abantu bafite ubumuga.
7.
Inama y'Abaminisitiri yemeje Imishinga y'Amategeko ikurikira:  Umushinga w'Itegeko rishyiraho rikanagena imitunganyirize y'ibigenerwa umugore uri mu kiruhuko cyo kubyara;  Umushinga w'Itegeko ryemerera kwemeza burundu Amasezerano y'impano yashyiriweho umukono i Kigali mu Rwanda ku wa 06 Werurwe 2015, hagati ya Repubulika y'u Rwanda na Banki Mpuzamahanga y'Iterambere (IBRD) n'Ikigega Mpuzamahanga Gitsura Amajyambere (IDA), bihuriye ku buyobozi bw'Ikigega gihuriweho n'Abaterankunga ba Gahunda Nyarwanda y'Ubuhinzi bushingiye ku musaruro, yerekeranye n'impano ingana na miliyoni mirongo itanu n'ibihumbi magana atandatu z'amadorari ya Amerika (50.600.000 USD) agenewe Gahunda yo kuvugurura Urwego rw'ubuhinzi, icyiciro cya III; -Umushinga w'Itegeko ryemerera kwemeza burundu amasezerano yashyiriweho umukono i Londres mu Bwongereza ku wa 22 Ukuboza 2014, hagati ya Repubulika y'u Rwanda na Barbados, yo kuvanaho gusoresha kabiri no gukumira forode y'imisoro
ku byerekeye imisoro ku musaruro;  Umushinga w'Itegeko ryemerera kwemeza burundu amasezerano yashyiriweho umukono i Singapore muri Repubulika ya Singapore ku wa 26 Kanama 2014, hagati ya Repubulika y'u Rwanda na Repubulika ya Singapore, yo kuvanaho gusoresha kabiri no gukumira forode y'imisoro ku byerekeye imisoro ku musaruro;  Umushinga w'Itegeko rihindura kandi ryuzuza Itegeko n° 12/2009 ryo kuwa 26/05/2009 ryerekeye izahura ry'ubucuruzi n'irangiza ry'ibibazo biturutse ku gihombo, nk'uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe kugeza ubu;  Umushinga w'Itegeko rihindura kandi ryuzuza Itegeko n° 07/2009 ryo ku wa 27/04/2009 ryerekeye amasosiyete y'ubucuruzi nk'uko ryavuguruwe kandi ryujujwe kugeza ubu;  Umushinga w'Itegeko rigenga Umuhango wo Kwibuka n'Inzibutso z'Abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda;  Umushinga w'Itegeko rigena Ibungabungwa ry'Umurage Ndangamuco n'Ubumenyi Gakondo;  Umushinga w'Itegeko ryemerera kwemeza burundu Amasezerano ashyiraho
"The Global Green Growth Institute (GGGI)";  Umushinga w'Itegeko rihindura kandi ryuzuza Itegeko n° 55/2011 ryo kuwa 14/12/2011 rigenga imihanda mu Rwanda;  Umushinga w'Itegeko ryerekeye ubushakashatsi n'ubucuruzi bwa Peteroli;  Umushinga w'Itegeko rigena ibikorwa byo kubungabunga ubwiza bw'umwuka no gukumira ihumana ry'ikirere mu Rwanda;  Umushinga w'Itegeko rihindura kandi ryuzuza Itegeko n° 71/2013 ryo kuwa 10/09/2013 rishyiraho Kaminuza y'u Rwanda (UR) rikanagena inshingano, ububasha, imiterere n'imikorere byayo, imaze kuwukorera ubugororangingo; 8.

Mu bindi: a.
Minisitiri w'Ubuzima yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko u Rwanda ruzakira Inama ya IV y'Ihuriro ry'Inzego z'Ubuvuzi muri Afurika y'Iburasirazuba kuva tariki ya 17 kugeza ku ya 19 Gicurasi 2015 i Kigali.
Insanganyamatsiko y'iyo nama ni "Uruhare rw'Abikorera mu Kunganira Ibigo by'Ubuvuzi mu Buryo bw'Imitangire ya Serivisi ku buryo burambye". b.
Minisitiri w'Umutungo Kamere yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w'Amazi ku Isi wijihijwe tariki ya 20 Werurwe.
Insanganyamatsiko ni: Amazi n'Iterambere rirambye.
Mu Rwanda, kwizihiza uyu munsi byabanjirijwe n'icyumweru cyahariwe Amazi mu Gihugu hose cyatangiye ku wa 16 kigeza ku ya 20 Werurwe 2015.
Muri icyo cyumweru, abaturage bakanguriwe gufata neza amazi, kubungabunga amasoko yayo, gutangiza no gutaha imwe mu mishinga y'amazi meza. c.
Minisitiri w'Ubuhinzi n'Ubworozi yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko: Hatangijwe ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry'Umushinga wa Gako wo Kongera Umusaruro w'Inyama z'Inka n'Ibizikomokaho hatunganywa ibikorwa remezo kuri Ha 4500 z'ubutaka mu rwego rwo guhaza isoko ry'imbere mu Gihugu ndetse no gusagurira amasoko yo mu mahanga.
Muri iki gihe, MINAGRI n'izindi Minisiteri bireba, bari gukora inyigo y'ibishobora gukorwa kugira ngo hashyirweho ibikorwa remezo nk'ibyerekeye kuhira, kuhageza amazi n'amashanyararazi, kubaka ibagiro n'ibindi, mu rwego rwo kureshya abashoramari.
Hari intambwe imaze guterwa mu guteza imbere uburyo buboneye bwo guha abahinzi-borozi inka no kubaguranira inka zisigaye 391 nyuma y'uko izo Abahinzi-borozi bari baratumije mu Buholandi n'Ubudage zisubijwe MINAGRI mu rwego rwa Gahunda ya Girinka. d.
Minisitiri w'Ubucuruzi n'Inganda yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko u Rwanda ruzitabira ku nshuro ya IV kuva mu mwaka wa 2000 Imurikagurisha ku rwego rw'Isi riteganyijwe kuzabera i Milano mu Butaliyani kuva tariki ya mbere Gicurasi kuzageza tariki ya 31 Ukwakira 2015.
Insanganyamatsiko y'iri Murikagurisha ku rwego rw'isi ni: Kugaburira Abatuye Isi, Ingufu mu buzima bw'Abayituye.
Mu Rwanda, insanganyamatsiko y'iri murikagurisha ni : "Ngwino urebe ikawa y'u Rwanda rw'Imisozi Igihumbi". e.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu ushinzwe Amajyambere Rusange n'Imibereho Myiza y'Abaturage yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri aho gahunda yo gushyira abaturage mu byiciro by'ubudehe igeze.
Nyuma y'ivugururwa ry'ibyiciro by'ubudehe muri Kanama 2014, ibyiciro bishya bigaragazwa n'imibare aho kugaragazwa n'amazina yihariye.
Abanyarwanda bose bashyizwe mu byiciro by'ubudehe bigaragazwa n'imibare 1, 2, 3 na 4.
Ku ikubitiro, igikorwa cyo gushyira Abanyarwanda mu byiciro by'ubudehe cyakozwe muri Kanama 2014 kibera mu Turere dutanu twatoranyijwe aritwo: Nyagatare, Rulindo, Rutsiro, Gisagara na Nyarugenge hanyuma gisozwa muri Mutarama 2015.
Ubu amakuru yavuye mu gikorwa cyo gushyira abaturage mu byiciro by'ubudehe ari gushyirwa muri mudasobwa ku buryo biteganyijwe ko iki gikorwa kizaba cyarangiye muri Kamena 2015. f.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri MINEDUC ushinzwe Amashuri Amashuri Abanza n'Ayisumbuye yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko Ivugururwa ry'integanyanyigisho nshya ishingiye ku bumenyi ngiro ryarangiye.
Biteganyijwe ko izatangizwa ku rwego rw'Igihugu ku itariki ya 23 Mata 2015.
Iyi nteganyanyigisho nshya izatangira gukurikizwa muri Mutarama 2016.
Kuyigisha no kuyiga bizatangirira mu Mashuri y'Incuke, Umwaka wa mbere n'uwa Kane mu mashuri abanza, Umwaka wa mbere n'uwa Kane mu Mashuri Yisumbuye.
Ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry'iyi nteganyanyigisho rizamara imyaka itatu (2016, 2017 naho muri 2018 ishingirweho mu kizamini cya Leta). g.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri MINEDUC ushinzwe Amashuri y'Imyuga n'Ubumenyingiro (TVET) yamenyesheje Inama y'Abaminisitiri ko Imirimo yo kubaka Ishuri Rikuru ry'Imyuga n'ubumenyi-ngiro rya Musanze (Musanze TVET) ndetse no kurishyiramo ibikoresho byarangiye.
Iyo mirimo yakozwe ku bufatanye na Leta y'Ubushinwa kandi biteganyijwe ko umuhango wo gufungura iryo shuri uzaba muri uku kwezi kwa Werurwe 2015.
Iri tangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Stella Ford MUGABO Minisitiri Ushinzwe Imirimo y'Inama y'Abaminisitiri

#22398#	1	sports	https://rwandamagazine.com/imikino/article/michael-sarpong-yafashije-imfubyi-z-iwabo-amafoto
Michael Sarpong yafashije imfubyi z’iwabo (AMAFOTO) Michael Sarpong, rutahizamu wahoze akinira Rayon Sports ubu akaba akinira Young Africans (Yanga) yo muri Tanzania yatanze ubufasha burimo ibiribwa n’ibindi bikoresho ku bana b’imfubyi bo mu gihugu cya Ghana aho avuka.
Ibi bikoresho byiganjemo ibiribwa, amavuta yo guteka, ibinyobwa, ibikoresho by’isuku, imyunyu n’isukari…Sarpong yabigeneye abana b’imfubyi barererwa mu kigo cy’imfubyi cyitwa Royal Seed Home/ Orphanage.
Royal Seed Home ni ikigo cy’impfubyi cyashinzwe mu mwaka wa 2002, kikaba gifasha abana ndetse n’abandi bantu batishoboye kubona ibyo kurya, icumbi ndetse n’uburezi.
Ubu gifasha abana b’imfubyi bagera kuri 53 bakirerwamo mu gihe cyita kandi kigafasha abandi bana n’abakuze batishoboye bagera kuri 83.
Ibinyujije ku rubuga rwayo rwa Twitter, ikipe ya Yanga isanzwe yiyita ‘Timu ya Wananchi’ [Ikipe ya Rubanda] yavuze ko gukora iki gikorwa, Sarpong yabitewe n’umuco usanzweho w’iyi kipe “wo kugira icyo basubiza umuryango mugari w’abantu no kubasha gukora icyiza ngo batange ibyishimo ku bantu batandukanye.”
Abafana ba Yanga bishimiye iki gikorwa cyakozwe na rutahizamu wabo wageze muri iyo kipe avuye muri Rayon Sports icyakora bamwe bagaragaza ko batangajwe no kumenya ko ari muri Ghana mu gihe bari bazi ko “ari mu Bushinwa.”
Michael Sarpong yavuye muri Rayon Sports umwaka ushize nyuma yo kwirukanwa kubera amagambo “atesha agaciro” Munyakazi Sadate wahoze ayobora iyo kipe.
Ibikoresho n’ibyo kurya Sarpong yageneye imfubyi z’iwabo Yatanze n’aka gapapuro gashobora kuba ari aga ’cheque’ Sarpong ateruye umwe mu bana barererwa muri Royal Seed Home Yegereye imfubyi.
Ngo biri mu muco w’ikipe akinira ubu

#22399#	1	sports	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIKINO/article/Ikarita-y-umutuku-yahawe-Bishira-sinyemera-natwe-tuzi-amategeko-Eric-Nshimiyimana
"Ikarita y'umutuku yahawe Bishira sinyemera, natwe tuzi amategeko" Eric Nshimiyimana Ku munsi wa 2 wa shampiyona y'u Rwanda Ikipe ya APR yatahanye amanota atatu nyuma yo gutsinda As Kigali ibitego 2-1 , ariko umutoza wa As Kigali Eric NSHIMIYIMANA ntiyishimiye ikarita y'umutuku yahawe umukinnyi we Bishira Ratif .
Eric Nshimiyimana ntiyishimiye imisifurire Muri uyu mukino ikipe zombi zatangiye zisatirana ndetse ari nako zirinda amazamu yazo ndetse mu minota ya mbere bisa n'ibizikundira, ariko igice cya mbere cyenda kurangira umukinnyi ikipe MWISENEZA Djamal yaje gutsindira APR igitego.
Nyuma igice cya 2 cyimaze iminota mike gitangiye rutahizamu Bertrand wari witwaye neza yatsinze igitego cya 2.
Umukinnyi wa As Kigali BISHIRA Ratif yaje guhabwa ikarita y'umutuku benshi bibwira ko APR igiye kunyagira As Kigali ariko siko byagenze ahubwo As Kigali yaje kwishyura igitego kimwe cyatsinzwe na SUGIRA Ernest kuri penaliti.
Umutoza Eric Nshimiyimana yavuze ko nta gikuba gicitse ko batsinzwe, yemeza ko bazakomeza kwitegura kuko shampiyona ari ndende.
Gusa yanavuze ko ikarita yahawe umukinnyi we BISHIRA atari yo kuko ngo bahuye bombi ntawe ugamije kuvuna mugenzi we, ati : " natwe tuzi amategeko iriya karita ntiyari gutangwa , ariko ntakundi yayitanze."
Umutoza Petrovic utoza APR yavuze ko yishimiye uko ikipe ye yitwaye kandi ko bazakomeza gutsinda imikino ikurikiraho.
Yavuze ko azakomeza gutegura abakinnyi be bagakina umukino mwiza ngo nk'uwa Barcelona.
MUSABIRAMA Alexis/ MAKURUKI.COM

#22404#	6	religion	http://www.makuruki.rw/IYOBOKAMANA/article13882.html
Ibyo mutumvikanaho mujye mubikemura nk’abakirisitu-Anastase Murekezi afungura Hotel ya ADEPR Minisitiri Murekezi ubwo yafunguraga ku mugaragaro Dove Hotel Minisitiri w’Intebe Anastase Murekezi yasabye abakirisitu mu Itorero rya ADEPR kuba umwe, no kujya bicara bagakemura ibibazo bafitanye kugirango ibyo bakora bibashe kubagirira akamaro.
Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ubwo yafunguraga ku mugaragaro Dove Hotel y’Itorero ADEPR, iherereye ku Gisozi mu mujyi wa Kigali, ikaba ari hotel itarakunze kuvugwaho rumwe mu bakirisitu ba ADEPR.
Murekezi yavuze ko ari iby’agaciro ku Rwanda kuba huzuye Hotel nk’iyo ya ADEPR, ngo kuko izafasha muri serivisi z’ubukerarugendo Leta yiyemeje guteza imbere, kandi igaha akazi abantu benshi.
Yagize ati "Iyi Hotel Dove iradufasha muri gahunda y’u Rwanda yo kongera ubukerarugendo, ndetse na serivisi nziza.
Iyi Dove Hotel izaha Abanyarwanda benshi akazi kazabafasha guteza imbere imibereho yabo n’ababo."
Minisitiri w’Intebe Murekezi icyakora yavuze ko ntacyo byabamarira igihe baba batari umwe mu Itorero, asaba ko n’iyo hajya haba ikibazo bajya bicara hamwe bakagikemura.
Ati "Kugira ngo iyi Dove Hotel izarusheho kubagirira akamaro ndetse n’Itorero ryanyu, muzahore muharanira kuba umwe.Nimugira ibyo mutumvikanaho, mujye mwicarana, mubiganireho maze mubikemure nk’Abakirisitu."
Iyi hotel yuzuye itwaye asaga miliyari eshanu z’amanyarwanda, yatangiye kubakwa mu mwaka wa 2007.
Amwe muri aya mafaranga yitanzwe n’abakirisitu andi ni inguzanyo.Hari abakirisitu bagiye bumvikana bavuga ko bayatanga ku gahato, nubwo ubuyobozi bw’Itorero bwagiye bubyamaganira kure.
Iyi Hotel izaba ifite umwihariko wo kutabarizwamo inzoga cyangwa se indaya.

Ibyo wamenya ku mudugudu ndangamuco wubatse mu nkengero z'ishyamba ry'Ibirunga Yanditswe na IGIHE Kuya 4 Mutarama 2017 saa 08:24 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 2 118 68 Umudugudu ndangamuco uzwi nka ‘Iby'iwacu Cultural Village' wubatse mu nkengero z'Ishyamba ry'Ibirunga mu Murenge wa Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze ugizwe n'inyubako gakondo zigaragaza umuco Nyarwanda, zibumbatiye ibisigisigi bitandukanye by'amateka byashyiriweho kugaragariza ba mukerarugendo ishusho y'u Rwanda rwo hambere.
Izi nyubako zubatswe ahanini mu byatsi n'imigano.
Zigizwe n'ibyiciro bitandukanye hashingiwe kubyo zibumbatiye byibutsa amateka y'igihugu.
Zimwe zirimo ibikoresho gakondo byifashishwaga mu bucuzi, hakaba uruhimbi, urusyo n'ingasire, mu gihe izindi nyubako zagenewe kugaragaza uko bateguraga inzoga hambere, n'imiti gakondo yakoreshwaga mu buvuzi.
Uyu mudugudu urimo inzu y'ibwami, amacumbi gakondo ndetse abahakora bagafata n'umwanya wo gutarama nk'uko byagendaga mu muco Nyarwanda.
Ucyinjira uhasanga umusaza wivuga yakira abashyitsi.
Muri uyu mudugudu uhasanga abasaza bahorana amacumu n'ingabo bigaragaza uko ubwirinzi bwakorwaga hambere.
Inyubako ziwugize zirimo ibihangano by'ubugeni n'ubukorikori bijyanye n'umuco Nyarwanda bigurwa n'abaje kuhasura.
Ukomeje mu nyubako uhasanga kandi ibikorwa bigaragaza uko hambere bakoraga urwagwa n'ibikoresho gakondo nk'umuvure ndetse n'ibikoresho bifashishaga mu gukora no kunywa urwagwa harimo ibicuma, imiheha n'ibindi.
Wigiye hirya gato uhasanga umukambwe ushinzwe ubuvuzi gakondo, ufite imiti itandukanye nk'iyo hambere bakoreshaga mu kuvura indwara zitandukanye.
Iruhande rwe hari ubusitani buhinzemo ubwoko butandukanye bw'imiti yifashisha mu kuvura byose bigenda byerekwa abaje kuhasura bibutswa ishusho y'uko ubuvuzi bwari bumeze mu Rwanda rwo hambere.
Hari kandi n'ingoro y'umwami yubatse ku muheto w'uyu mudugudu aho abakerarugendo binjizwa bakerekwa uko inzu y'umwami yari imeze n'ibice biyigize.
Ucyinjira mu muryango uhasanga umugabo ucuranga buri munsi nk'uko kera byagendaga mu gutaramira umwami.
Uretse ibi haba n'igitaramo kigaragaramo abaririmbyi mu mbyino gakondo ndetse bakora n'imihango yo hambere yakorwaga bataramiye umwami kimwe n'indi mihango yakorwaga mu muco Nyarwanda harimo ubukwe aho umukobwa yatwarwaga mu ngobyi.
Umudugudu ‘Iby'iwacu Cultural Village' wubatswe mu mwaka wa 2006 hagamijwe gufasha abahoze ari ba rushimushi kwiteza imbere binyuze mu kugaragaza umuco gakondo w'u Rwanda.
Havugimana Jean Bosco, umukozi ukuriye abayobora ba mukerarugendo kuri uyu mudugudu avuga ko abahoze bashimuta inyamaswa zo mu ishyamba ndetse n'imiryango yabo bahawe akazi kabafasha kwiteza imbere mu mibereho ya buri munsi, aho umuririmbyi ahembwa ibihumbi Frw 40,000 naho abakora indi mirimo nk'abakaraza n'abivuga bagahembwa Frw 30,000 ku kwezi.
Uyu mudugudu watangijwe na Sabuhoro Edwin wari usanzwe akora mu by'ubukerarugendo.
Abahakora bishimira ubuzima babayemo Mukandayisenga Drocelle ni umwe mu bahakora ukomoka mu Kagari ka Nyabigoma mu Murenge wa Kinigi.
Nk'umwana w'umwe mu bahoze ari ba rushimusi avuga ko uyu Mudugudu wahinduye ubuzima bwabo kuko barihira abana umusanzu ndetse bakishyura na mituweli nta nkomyi.
Ntibanyendera Martin nawe ni umusaza uturuka mu Mudugudu wa Rukingo, mu Kagari ka Murago, mu Murenge wa Gataraga ho mu Karere ka Musanze.
Avuga ko mu mafaranga ahakura yarihiye umunyeshuri mu mashuri yisumbuye kandi bikaba bitunze n'umuryango we.
Hategekimana Eric ni umusore wahoze ari umushumba kuva uyu mudugudu watangizwa yemeza ko yabonyemo akazi ko kwivuga ubu akaba yarubatse inzu ifite agaciro k'ibihumbi Frw 900,000.
Hari n'ikigega kigaragaza umuco wo kuzigama imyaka hambere Arakoresha urusyo n'ingasire yifashishwaga mu gusya amasaka Ba mukerugendo baba bigishwa uburyo bwo gukoresha urusyo Umudugudu ndangamuco uzwi nka ‘Iby'iwacu Cultural Village' ufite ibohero ribarizwamo abari nk'uko byari bimeze mu Rwanda rwo hambere Muri uyu Mudugudu intore ziba zivuna sambwe zisusurutsa ba mukerarugendo Umwe mu ntore zigize itorero Bagaragaza umuco wo hambere uko umugeni yajyaga gushyingirwa ahetswe mu ngobyi Ahari bikorwa bigaragaza uko inzoga bayitunganyaga mu Rwanda rwo hambere Ntawuhamwarumwe Daniel, umwe mu bavuzi gakondo babarizwa muri uyu mudugudu Asoroma imiti akoresha avura abantu Ibikoresho byifashishwaga mu kunywa urwagwa Umuyobozi ukuriye abatembereza ba mukerarugendo Kwamamaza Kwamamaza Izindi nkuru wasoma Umuco Inkomoko y'insigamigani 'Yafatiwe mu maguru mashya' 0 0 Umuco Amatariki y'ingenzi yaranze

#22410#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/papa-francis-aragirira-uruzinduko-rw-amateka-muri-leta-zunze-ubumwe-z-abarabu
Papa Francis aragirira uruzinduko rw’amateka muri Leta zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu Papa Francis aragera muri Leta zunze Ubumwe z’Abarbu kuri iki cyumweru, abe abaye Papa wa mbere usuye iki gihugu.
Papa Francis agiye ku butumire bw’igikomangoma Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed al-Nahyan, wimye ingoma muri iki gihugu, ngo yitabire inama mpuzamadini.
Uru rugendo rw’amateka ruzanarangwa n’igitambo cya Misa izaba ku wa kabiri, byitezwe ko izitabirwa n’abantu ibihumbi 120.
BBC yanditse ko uru ruzinduko rwa Papa Francis ruraza gukurikiranirwa hafi, harebwa niba hari icyo avuga ku ntambara yo mu gihugu cya Yemen.
Papa Francis yamaganye aya makimbirane Leta zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu zifitemo uruhare kuko ziri mu rugaga ruyobowe n’Arabie Saoudite.
Mu mwaka ushize wa 2018, Papa Francis yasabye amahanga kwirinda ko ibintu bizamba mu mahano n’ubundi amaze gutikiriramo abantu yo muri Yemen.
Leta zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu zituwe n’abakristu Gatolika bagera hafi kuri miliyoni imwe mu baturage bagera hafi kuri miliyoni 10 batuye iki gihugu, benshi muri bo bagiye baturuka mu gihugu cya Philippines cyangwa mu Buhinde.
Mu butumwa bwa videwo yatangaje ku wa kane, Papa Francis agira ati "Nishimiye aka kanya Nyagasani yampaye ngo nandike, ku butaka bwanyu mukunda, ipaji nshya mu mateka y’imibanire y’amadini".
"Kwizera Imana biraduhuza, ntabwo bidutanya, bituma turushaho kwegerana nubwo dufite ibidutandukanya, bituma twitarura ubushyamirane no kudakundana".
Yashimye Leta zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu nk’ubutaka buri kugerageza kuba intangarugero yo kubana, y’ubuvandimwe mu bantu, n’ahantu hahurirwa n’abantu b’imico itandukanye’.
Mu gihe azaba ari mu murwa mukuru Abu Dhabi, Papa Francis azahura kandi na Sheikh Ahmed al-Tayeb, Imam mukuru w’umusigiti wa al-Azhar w’i Cairo mu Misiri, ukaba ari cyo cyicaro gikuru cyane aho abayisilamu b’abasuni bigira.
Umunyamakuru wa BBC Murad Batal Shishani wo mu ishami ritangaza ibiganiro mu rurimi rw’Icyarabu uri i Abu Dhabi, avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Vatican bufite icyizere ko uru ruzinduko rwa Papa Francis rushobora koroshya inzitizi ku kubaka za kiliziya muri aka karere.
By’umwihariko mu gihugu gituranyi cya Arabie Saoudite aho ahantu ho gusengera hatari ah’abayisilamu hatemewe.
Abategetsi ba Vatican bavuga ko bacyeneye ko kiliziya gatolika ishinga imizi kurushaho muri Leta zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, ikogeza ubutumwa ku bakristu gatolika bo muri iki gihugu.
Papa Francis agiye kuba uwa mbere usuye Leta zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu

#22425#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/rwanda-peace-academy-irimo-kwiga-uburyo-abanyarwanda-bakomeza-kubana-mu-mahoro
Rwanda Peace Academy irimo kwiga uburyo Abanyarwanda bakomeza kubana mu mahoro Ishuri ryigisha amahoro (Rwanda Peace Academy) rifatanyije n’inzego zitandukanye, rirasuzuma aho u Rwanda rugeze rwiyubaka rinashakisha ibyarufasha gukomeza kubaka amahoro arambye.
Rwanda Peace Academy yahuje inzego zayifasha kubona amasomo yo kubaka amahoro arambye Inama izamara iminsi ibiri ibera i Kigali kuva tariki 19/9/2019, yitabiriwe n’inzego za Leta hamwe n’izigenga zishinzwe umutekano, imiyoborere, ubutabera, ubumwe n’ubwiyunge, ubukungu, uburinganire, urubyiruko ndetse n’ububanyi n’amahanga.
Rwanda Peace Academy yanatumiye abayobozi b’ibigo byigisha amahoro bya bimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika, birimo Cameroon, Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya, Mali, Nigeria, Zimbabwe na Sudan y’Epfo.
Umuyobozi wa Rwanda Peace Academy, Col Jill Rutaremara avuga ko barimo gusuzuma u Rwanda guhera nyuma y’umwaka wa 1994 , ibyakozwe ndetse n’ibigomba gukorwa kugira ngo Abanyarwanda bakomeze kubana mu mahoro.
Agira ati "Turasuzuma aho tuvuye n’aho tugeze mu rwego rwa Politiki, mu bukungu, mu mibereho, mu rubyiruko ariko tunarebe imbogamizi zihari n’uburyo zakemuka".
"Ntabwo twakwirara ngo tuvuge ko aho u Rwanda rumaze kugera bihagije.
Mu butumwa bwinshi bw’amahoro usanga abantu bibanda ku kureba ikibazo cyavutse ariko ntibite ku gukumira amakimbirane".
Mu byo ’Rwanda Peace Academy’ isabwa gushyira mu nyigisho zayo za buri munsi, nk’uko byifujwe n’Umuyobozi w’Umuryango Transparency International mu Rwanda, Ingabire Marie Immaculée, ngo ntihagomba kuburamo isomo ryo gukora umurimo unoze.
Ati "Mu nzego zitandukanye haracyari ikibazo, umuturage wakoreye VUP ariko amaze umwaka wose adahembwa, nta muntu waburaye uvuga ko afite umutekano".
"Niba ushaka icyangombwa cy’ubutaka ukajyayo inshuro eshanu, uradindiza imirimo yawe, nta terambere".
"Urajya kuzana ibicuruzwa byawe muri MAGERWA bakakubwira ngo uzagaruke, kandi ari nako bakomeza kukwandikaho amafaranga y’uko wagumishijeyo ibicuruzwa, hari abo biba ngombwa ko batanga ikintu(ruswa) kugira ngo bemererwe gusohora ibintu".
Madame Ingabire akomeza agira ati "Hari inzego nyinshi zigifite ikibazo mu mikorere, zikaba zikwiye kwigishwa gukorera ku gihe kandi zigakora umurimo unoze."
Rwanda Peace Academy yatumiye abayohozi b’inzego zitandukanye kugira ngo bagaragaze icyakorwa mu kubaka amahoro arambye Minisitiri w’Ingabo, Maj Gen Albert Murasira watangije inama ya ’Rwanda Peace Academy’ n’izindi nzego, avuga ko aho u Rwanda rugeze rwiyubaka rwabifashijwemo no kugarura indangagaciro z’Abanyarwanda za mbere y’ubukoroni.
Minisitiri w’Ingabo akomeza asaba inzego z’u Rwanda kureba niba habaho no gutira imikorere myiza y’ibigo byo mu bindi bihugu byitabiriye iyi nama.
Rwanda Peace Academy irashaka amasomo mashya yo kwigisha ifatanyije na Ambasade y’u Buyapani mu Rwanda hamwe n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe Amajyambere(UNDP).
MENYA UMWANDITSI Simon Kamuzinzi Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ SimonKamuzinzi

#22428#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/mobayilo/article/uburyo-wakwifashisha-ushyira-umuriro-muri-telefone-udakoresheje-uw
Uburyo wakwifashisha ushyira umuriro muri telefone udakoresheje uw’amashanyarazi Telefone yabaye umuhuza w’abantu, kuva ku mukozi wo mu rugo na shebuja kugera mu bushorishori ahaganirirwa imishinga ibyara inyungu n’amafaranga menshi, bituma abayikoresha barushaho kuyiha agaciro umunsi ku wundi bishingiye ku ruhare rwayo mu kunoza ihanahana ry’amakuru.
Agaciro ihabwa gatuma benshi bayifata nk’amata y’abashyitsi bakamenya ko ifite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose birimo amafaranga yo guhamagara n’umuriro uhagije udatuma itetereza nyirayo mu gihe cya ngombwa.
Abatuye isi babayeho mu buzima aho usanga umuriro w’amashanyarazi ufite agaciro ntayegayezwa mu mpande zose kuko ukenerwa kuva mu rugo ku bikoresho by’ibanze birimo radio, televiziyo, frigo, telefone n’ibindi kugeza mu nganda ahatunganyirizwa ibya rutura.
Amashanyarazi asigaye abura, benshi bakitabaza telefone ngendanwa bamurika gusa umuriro wazo ushobora kutaramba ku buryo benshi bawuhanga amaso.
Mu gushaka umuti w’iki kibazo, abahanga bashatse amayeri ashobora gukoreshwa nk’iturufu ryafasha abantu kwinjiza umuriro muri telefone batayishyize ku muriro nk’ibisanzwe.
Hari uburyo bwinshi bushobora kugoboka umuntu washiriwe n’umuriro burimo kwitwaza ibikoresho bibika umuriro ‘Power bank’ , abandi bakoresha batiri zifite volt icyenda cyangwa gucomeka smartphone mu mbuto (uburyo butamenyerewe gukoreshwa).
Abahanga batanga inama zo kwirinda gukoresha bumwe muri ubu buryo kuko bushobora kwangiza ubuzima bwabo ndetse na telefone muri rusange.
Ikinyamakuru The Sun dukesha iyi nkuru cyerekana uburyo bwo gushyira umuriro muri telefone, igihe waba wabuze aho ucomeka kandi wagushiranye.
Kubyaza umuriro mu mbuto Gukoresha imbuto ni uburyo bushobora gufasha gushyira umuriro muri telefone gusa hari ingaruka bioshobora kugira.
Ibi bikorwa n’ufite ibisate by’imbuto, yaba indimu cyangwa amacunga aho ufata udusinga tubiri ukadushyira muri buri rubuto ku buryo tudakoranaho.
Iyo umaze kuzitobora ufata urundi rusinga, ukarucomeka ku buryo uhuza imbuto zombi bigatanga igisa n’umuriro.
Iyo urangije iki cyiciro uhita ushishura USB yawe ukayihuza n’insinga ziri mu mbuto z’amacunga cyangwa indimu.
Ibi birashoboka cyane ko byatanga umuriro wakwifashisha ucomeka telefone yawe, bigomba kwitonderwa kuko bishobora no kuyangiza.
Gukoresha agakoresho kabika umuriro (Power bank) Hari utubika-muriro dutandukanye wakwifashisha ushyira umuriro muri telefone yawe igihe umuriro usanzwe wagiye.
Ku isoko rigurishirizwaho ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga hagaragara ‘Power bank’ nyinshi birimo nk’iyitwa Anker PowerCore 20100; iyo yuzuye, ibasha gucomekwaho telefone yo mu bwoko bwa iPhone 7 inshuro zirindwi ku munsi, Galaxy S6 inshuro eshanu na iPad nini inshuro enye.
Abakoresha ‘Power bank’ bagomba kuzihozamo umuriro kugira ngo zibagoboke mu gihe bikenewe.
Kwifashisha umuriro wabyawe n’imbaraga z’umuyaga Umuntu washiriwe n’umuriro ashobora kugufasha kubona amashanyarazi ni ugukoresha imbaraga zitangwa n’umuyaga.
Abahanga bavuga ko ushobora gukora uburyo bwihariye wifashishije ‘Portable Wind Turbine’, agakoresho kagendanwa kerekana icyerekezo cy’umuyaga gashobora kugufasha by’umwihariko mu bice bitabamo abantu.
Aka gakoresho gafasha guhindura umuyaga ugatanga umuriro ushobora guhuzwa na moteri gusa gakoreshwa mu gihe umuyaga ukiri guhutera utarahagarara.
Portable Wind Turbine’ igura ama-pound 303, ishobora kubika umuriro ushobora gushyirwa muri telefone inshuro esheshatu.
Aka gakoresho gafasha mu guhindura umuyaga ugatanga umuriro Gukoresha imbaraga z’umuriro wo mu ziko Ibikoresho byinshi bikoreshwa mu guteka bigira n’ubushobozi bwo gusharija telefone kuko ubushyuhe bitanga bushobora kuvamo imbaraga zibyara amashanyarazi.
Ishyiga rigezweho rikoreshwa muri iyi minsi mu bihugu byateye imbere rya BioLite CampStove, rigura ama-pound 134.
Urikoresha ashyiramo inkwi, ku ruhande rwaryo rifite ahantu ho gushyiriramo umuriro muri bateri.
Nyuma yo guteka ushobora gucomeka iPhone yawe ukaba wanasangiza inshuti zawe amafunguro wateguye kuri Instagram.
Ubu buryo bwose bushobora gufasha mu kwirinda ibibazo byaterwa no kubura umuriro muri telefone yawe, harimo nko kwica gahunda wari ufitanye n’undi muntu, akazi, kutamenya amakuru yo hirya no hino n’ibindi.

#22433#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/nta-gisubizo-kiraboneka-ku-hazimurirwa-ibiri-yangirikira-mu-rwibutso-rwa-muhoza
Nta gisubizo kiraboneka ku hazimurirwa imibiri yangirikira mu rwibutso rwa Muhoza Mu Karere ka Musanze ntibarafata umwanzuro ku kibazo cy’imibiri isaga 800 y’abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ikomeje kwangizwa n’amazi mu rwibutso rwa Muhoza.
Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Muhoza rwarashaje ku buryo imibiri irimo inyagirwa Bamwe mu bafite ababo bashyinguye muri uru rwibutso, bavuga ko rwashaje ku buryo imibiri yatangiye kwangirika kubera kuva.
Iki kibazo kigarutsweho mu gihe hasigaye iminsi itarenze 30 ngo mu Rwanda rwinjire mu gihe cyo kwibuka Abatutsi bazize Jenoside yo mu 1994.
Ubuyobozi bw’akarere bwashatse kuba buyimuriye mu rwibutso rwa Busogo ariko bamwe mu bafite ababo bahashyinguye muri uru rwibutso babitera utwati.
Kayitesi Chantal avuga ko kwimura ababo ari ugusibanganya amateka y’ibyabereye muri Muhoza.
Agira ati “(abacu) biciwe aha ngaha, kubajyana i Busogo ni ukuzimangatanya amateka ya hano.”
Yabitangaje mu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yahuje ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Musanze n’abafite ababo bashyinguye muri uru rwibutso, kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 6 Werurwe 2018.
Abitabiriye inama babaza ibibazo by’uko batishimiye aho abavandimwe babo bazize Jenoside bashyinguye Uwitwa Nyiramahoro Vestine utuye mu murenge wa Cyuve, we avuga ko kubajyana mu rwibutso rwa Busogo biruta kubagumisha ahanyagirwa, ariko bigakorwa mu gihe hagishakwa uko urwibutso rwabo rwubakwa.
Ati “Kuba bari hariya ntabwo bidushimishije, bahavanwe bashyirwe mu rwibutso rwiza aho batanyagirwa, aho imivu idatemba ngo isange bene wacu hariya."
Gashabizi wea asa n’ugaya Akarere ka Musanze kubera nyuma y’imyaka 24 hakigaragara urwibutso rushaje gutyo, mu gihe utundi turere twamaze kubaka inzibutso z’ikitegererezo.
Ati “Ntabwo bikwiye ko mu myaka 24 haba hakiri imibiri inyagirwa.
Biraduhungabanya iyo tubona imibiri y’abavandimwe bacu inyagirwa turashaka urwibutso hano.”
Guverineri Gatabazi yungurana ibitekerezo n’abitabiriye inama Urwibutso rwa Busogo ni rwo rwakomeje kuza ku isonga mu hateganywa kuzaba himuriwe imibiri.
Ariko nta mwanzuro wafashe ahubwo hatorwa komite yashinzwe kuzasuzuma niba urwa Busogo rukwiye cyangwa harebwa ubundi buryo.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi JMV, nawe wari witabirye iyi nama, yavuze ko abacitse ku icumu bafite uruhare runini mu kuzahitamo aho ababo bashyingurwa mu cyubahiro.
Ati “Abacitse ku icumu bazahabwa umwanya wo kwemeza ahazashyingurwa iyi mibiri.
Niba hahagije cyangwa hujuje ibisabwa byose bikazakorwa muri iyi minsi ijana tugiye kujyamo yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994.”
Imibiri y’abazize Jenoside iri mu rwibutso rwa Muhoza igizwe n’umubare minini w’abiciwe ahahoze urukiko.
Indi mibiri ni iy’abiciwe hirya no hino mu mirenge inyuranye igize akarere ka Musanze.
