Karongi : Babiri bakatiwe amezi umunani y'igifungo kubera gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge Urukiko rw'Ibanze rwa Bwsihyura mu karere ka Karongi rwahamije Munyemanzi Albert na Nzakamayimana Charles icyaha cyo gucuruza ibiyabwenge byo mu bwoko bw'urumogi, bahita bakatirwa amezi umunani y'igifungo, kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 14/11/2014.
Urukiko rwanabaciye n'ihazabu y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi magana 300 kuri buri muntu, nk'uko biteganywa n'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda mu ngingo ya 593 n'iya 594 n'Itegeko Ngenga rishyira amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda.
Ubushinjacyaha bwahamyaga ko iki cyaha Munyemanzi Albert wo Mu Murenge wa Rubengera yahamijwe cyamenyekanye ubwo yavaga kurangura urumogi maze bubimenye bugahita bubimenyesha Polisi ari na bwo bahise bamusangana udupfunyika ibihumbi 17 tungana n'ibiro 22.
Munyemanzi yamereye urukiko ko yakoze iki cyaha akagisabira imbabazi ari na byo byatumwe ahanishwa gufungwa amezi umunani n'ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi 300 mu gihe ubundi ubushinjacyaha bwamusabiraga gufungwa imyaka itatu n'ihazabu y'amafaranga ibihumbi 500.
Naho Icyaha Nzakamayimana we wo mu Murenge wa Gitesi mu Karere ka Karongi icyaha ashinjwa kandi yaniyemereye mu rukiko akanagisabira imbabazi ngo cyakozwe tariki 9/10/ 2014.
Uyu we ngo yafatanywe udupfunyika 62 tw'urumogi nawe ahanishwa igifungo cy'amezi umunani n'ihazabu y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda ibihumbi 300.
Abahamijwe ibyaha bombi basabaga ko igifungo bahanishwa igihe urukiko rubahamije icyaha cyasubikwa.
Mu bushoshozi bw'urukiko ariko rukaba rwanzuye kuri bombi ko igifungo kitagomba gusubikwa.
Ingingo ya 593 yo mu gitabo cy'Itegeko Ngenga rishyiraho amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda iteganya ko guhinga, gukora, kubika, kugurisha, kugura, gutunga no kunywa ibiyobyabwenge bibujijwe keretse igihe bikozwe ku buryo bwagenwe n'itegeko.
Naho ingingo ya 594 yo iteganya ko umuntu unywa, wisiga cyangwa witera ibiyobwenge mu buryo bunyuranyije n'amategeko ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku mwaka umwe kugeza ku myaka 3 n'ihazabu y'amafaranga 500.
Niyonzima Oswald

RIB yemeje ko Ingabire Victoire yahamagajwe kubera ibitero by’i Musanze Urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe ubugenzacyaha (RIB) rwahamagaje Ingabire Umuhoza Victoire, umuyobozi w’ishyaka FDU-Inkingi ritaremererwa gukorera mu Rwanda, kugira ngo abazwe ku kuba hari aho yaba ahuriye n’igitero cyagabwe mu karere ka Musanze mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, kigahitana abantu 14, abandi 18 bagakomereka.
Umuvugizi wa RIB, Mbabazi Modeste yemereye Kigali Today ko Ingabire yahamagajwe n’uru rwego ngo abazwe kuri icyo gitero, ariko ntiyigeze (Mbabazi) atangaza byinshi kuri aya makuru.
Yagize ati “Ni byo yahamagajwe ngo abazwe ku bitero byabereye i Musanze, ariko ibyinshi kuri icyo kirego bifitwe n’umugenzacyaha ukurikirana iyo dosiye.
Nta makuru arambuye ahari ubungubu”.
Amakuru aravuga ko bamwe mu bakorana na Ingabire baba bafite aho bahuriye n’igitero cyo mu ijoro rishyira tariki ya 05 Ukwakira 2019, cyagabwe ku baturage b’abasivile.
Polisi y’igihugu yavuze ko abagabye igitero bari bitwaje intwaro zirimo n’iza gakondo.
Polisi y’igihugu kandi, nyuma yatangaje ko 19 mu bagabye igitero baje kwicwa, naho abandi batanu barafatwa.
Nyuma y’iki gitero, Ingabire yaracyamaganye, asaba abakigabye “gusubiza inkota mu rwubati”, yungamo ati “ntimushobora gukunda igihugu igihe mwica abaturage bacyo”.
Mu kwandika iyi nkuru, byari bitarasobanuka neza niba Ingabire yahamagajwe ngo abazwe gusa hanyuma aze kurekurwa.
Bamwe mu bagabye igitero mu karere ka Musanze bafashwe, batangaje ko ari abarwanyi ba FDLR/RUD Urunana, ndetse na RNC.
Bavuga ko bari bagabye igitero ari 45.
Mu bafashwe harimo uwitwa Theoneste Habumukiza, wari wararangije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda.
Abagabye igitero bateye mu mirenge ya Musanze, Kinigi na Nyange, ku bufatanye bwa polisi y’igihugu n’ingabo z’igihugu utu duce tukaba twaragarutsemo umutekano.
Abahitanwe n’icyo gitero bashyinguwe ku cyumweru tariki 06 Ukwakira 2019, abaturage b’akarere ka Musanze n’ab’intara y’Amajyaruguru bizezwa umutekano.
Abaturage babibonye bavuze ko abagabye igitero baje bambaye imyenda ya gisirikare, banitwaje intwaro zirimo iza gakondo nk’imihoro n’amasuka, batangira gutegeka abaturage gusohoka mu nzu zabo, babambura ibikoresho bifite agaciro nk’ama telefoni ndetse batangira no gusahura amaduka.
Mu muhango wo gushyingura abahitanwe n’icyo gitero, abaturage batanze ubuhamya bw’uburyo abagabye igitero bakoresheje amasuka bakubita buri wese wageragezaga kudakurikiza amabwiriza batangaga, cyangwa uwageragezaga gucika.
MENYA UMWANDITSI KT Editorial Abanyamakuru ba Kigali Today @ kigalitoday

#22601#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/hasinywe-amasezerano-yemerera
Hasinywe amasezerano yemerera abanyamwuga gukorera muri EAC nta nkomyi Yanditswe kuya 14-09-2014 saa 12:33' na IGIHE Ibihugu bitanu byo mu Muryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba (EAC) byemeranyije guha urubuga abanyamwuga bo mu karere barimo abubatsi, abacungamurungo, n'abandi uburenganzira bwo gukora ku buryo bungana muri buri gihugu cy'akarere.
Nk'uko tubikesha NTV Uganda, korohereza abanyamwuga mu bihugu bigize akarere byitezweho gukomeza ubumwe, ndetse ikaba ari intambwe ishimangira ikoreshwa ry'ifaranga rimwe muri aka karere.
Bivugwa ko aya masezerano yasinywe n'ibigo by'abanyamwuga muri EAC bakaba (...)
Ibihugu bitanu byo mu Muryango wa Afurika y'Iburasirazuba (EAC) byemeranyije guha urubuga abanyamwuga bo mu karere barimo abubatsi, abacungamurungo, n'abandi uburenganzira bwo gukora ku buryo bungana muri buri gihugu cy'akarere.
Nk'uko tubikesha NTV Uganda, korohereza abanyamwuga mu bihugu bigize akarere byitezweho gukomeza ubumwe, ndetse ikaba ari intambwe ishimangira ikoreshwa ry'ifaranga rimwe muri aka karere.
Bivugwa ko aya masezerano yasinywe n'ibigo by'abanyamwuga muri EAC bakaba bemeranyijwe ko aba banyamwuga bose bazaba bemerew gushakisha akazi no gukorera mu bihugu by'akarere uko ari bitanu.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa EAC, Richard Sezibera, yashimangiye ko kureka abamyamwuga bagashaka akazi mu karere kose bizakomanga ku bihugu bitarashyira mu bikorwa ikoreshwa ry'ifaranga rimwe.
Yakomeje avuga ko intambwe y'ikoreshwa ry'ifaranga rimwe yatangiriye ku baturage ba Kenya, u Rwanda, Uganda na Tanzania aho baba bashobora kwishyura ibicuruzwa na serivisi mu karere bakishyura amafaranga y'ibihugu byabo.
Umuyobozi w'Inama y'Ubucuruzi bwa EAC, Andrew Luzze Kagwa, yagize ati "Urugero, niba ndi Umunyarwanda nshobora kwishyura ibicuruzwa bya Mukwano (uruganda) mu mafaranga y'u Rwanda.
Nyuma yo kwishyura, Banki Nkuru z'Ibihugu zikiringaniriza ibiciro byishyuwe nta byo kubangamira ubucuruzi muri EAC."
Bivugwa ko u Burundi ari cyo gihugu kitaratera intambwe yo gukoresha ubu buryo bw'ifaranga rimwe.
Dr.
Sezibera yashimangiye ko muri uyu mwaka ibihugu byose bizaba byarashyize hamwe muri uru rugendo, hakurwaho ubuhenzi ubwo ari bwo bwose n'ibiciro byo guhamagara hanze y'imipaka mu karere.
Intambwe yo kwemerera abanyamwuga ikurikiye ikurwaho ry'imisoro yakwa abakozi b'abanyamahanga bavuka mu bihugu by'akarere hagati y'u Burundi na Tanzania.
Uganda bivugwa ko yiteye iyi ntmbwe yo gukuraho imisoro ku bakozi b'abanyamahanga yayikuyeho ku bihugu byemeye kuyikuraho.
Ibi bisobanuye ko Abanyatazaniya n'Abarundi bacyakwa iyi misoro muri Uganda igihe bataremerera Abagade gukora ntacyo batanga.
Iyi ni intambwe ya gatatu (Monetary protocol) mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda zikubiye mu masezerano agenga EAC, nyuma y'Isoko rusange (Common market) no guhuza za Gasutamo (Customs Union) byatangiye gushyirwa mu bikorwa, ariko kuri iyi ngingo ya nyuma bikaba, biteganyijwe gushyirwaho umukono n'abakuru b'ibihugu mu mwaka utaha.
Nyuma y'izi ngingo uko ari eshatu hasigaye ijyanye gahunda yo gushyiraho Leta imwe (Political Federation).
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#22604#	8	technology	http://www.igihe.com/ikoranabuhanga/article/icyogajuru-cya-boeing-kigiye-kugaruka-ku-butaka-kitarangije-ubutumwa
Icyogajuru cya Boeing kigiye kugaruka ku butaka kitarangije ubutumwa cyoherejwemo Icyogajuru gishya cya Sosiyete ya Boeing cyitwa Starliner kigiye kugaruka ku butaka nyuma y’iminsi itandatu cyoherejwe mu isanzure, ntikibashe kugera kuri sitasiyo yo mu isanzure igeragerezwaho iby’ingendo zo mu kirere.
Aya makuru yo kugaruka kw’icyo cyogajuru yemejwe n’ikigo cy’Abanyamerika gishinzwe iby’ubumenyi bw’isanzure(NASA) na Boing, bivuga ko kigera ku butaka bwo mu mujyi wa New Mexico kuri iki cyumweru saa kumi n’imwe na 47, ni ukuvuga saa sita n’iminota 57 ku isaha mpuzahanga.
Iki cyogejuru kuri ubu kiri mu birometero 250.
Abenjeniyeri ba Boeing bari gukora ibishoboka byose ngo cyoherezwe mu isanzure kinyuze hejuru y’inyanja ya Pacifique.
Iki cyogajuru kigiye kugaruka ku butaka ubutumwa cyoherejwemo budakozwe.
Ni amakuru mabi kuri Boeing nyuma y’impanuka ebyiri indege z’indege za Boeing zo mu bwoko bwa 737 MAX zahitanye ubuzima bw’abantu 346.
Iki cyogajuru cyoherejwe mu isanzure ku wa Gatanu w’icyumweru gishize muri Leta ya Florida ariko nyuma yo gutandukana n’igikoresho kicyohereza nticyabasha gukora nk’uko byateganyijwe, bituma kitagera mu nzira yacyo ituma kibasha guhana amakuru na sitasiyo zishinzwe ingendo zo mu kirere.
Nyuma y’urwo rugendo byagaragaye ko cyamaze umwanya gikoresha ibigiha imbaraga zikigurutsa mu buryo butandukanye n’uko cyagombaga kubikoresha.
Visi Perezida wa Boeing, unashinzwe ishami rijyanye n’ibyo kohereza mu kirere, Jim Chilton, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko habayeho amakosa bagikora, ‘Bashyira isaha ku gihe kitari cyo’.
Umuyobozi wa NASA, Jim Bridenstine, yavuze ko kuba kitarabashije gukora ubutumwa cyohererejwemo mu isanzure bidasobanuye ko bwananiranye ahubwo ko ‘Itsinda ry’abakozi ba NASA na Boeing bazakomeza gukorana bya hafi kugira ngo icyo gikorwa kirangire’.
Iki cyogajuru cyoherejwe mu isanzure gifite umuvuduko wikubye inshuro 25 umuvuduko w’ijwi.
Biteganyijwe ko NASA izafata umwanzuro wo kongera kucyoherezayo cyangwa ikizera niba hari ibindi bishobora kwifashishwa mu kujyana mu isanzure abahanga mu by’ubumenyi bw’ikirere.
Icyogajuru cyagombaga kuzajya mu isanzure kijyanye n’abantu byari biteganyijwe ko kizoherezwayo mu 2020 ariko nta gihe nyamukuru kiratangazwa.
Ikindi cyogajuru kitwa Crew Dragon kirimo gukorwa na SpaceX ifatanyije na NASA nacyo biteganyijwe ko kizoherezwa mu isanzure mu gihe cya vuba.
NASA yemereye miliyari 8$ Boeing na SpaceX igihe bizaba bigejeje abakora ingendo mu kirere nibura batandatu uhereye ubu kugera mu 2024.

#22629#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/abadepite-bemeje-umushinga-w-itegeko-rishyiraho-sosiyete-izajya-igura-imiti-ikenewe-mu-gihugu
Abadepite bemeje umushinga w’itegeko rishyiraho sosiyete izajya igura imiti ikenewe mu gihugu Inteko Ishinga Amategeko umutwe w’Abadepite, yamaze kwemeza umushinga w’itegeko rigena imikorere y’ikigo cyo gutanga amasoko n’ishami ry’umusaruro, Medical Procurement and Production Division (MPPD), nyuma inteko yemeza ko iyo MPPD isimburwa na sosiyete nshya yitwa Rwanda Medical Supply (RMS) yigenga, ariko ikazajya ikorana n’ikigo cy’u Rwanda cy’Ubuzima (RBC), kugira ngo ishobore kurushaho kugeza imiti ku Banyarwanda.
Itegeko rifite ingingo iteganya ishyirwaho ry’iyo sosiyete nshya ya Rwanda Medical Supply (RMS) , iyo ngingo ikavuga ko iyo sosiyete izaba yigenga mu mikorere yayo muri gahunda yo kugura no kuzana imiti ikenewe mu gihugu.
Icyakora Abadepite bagaragaje impungenge bafite ku ngingo zimwe na zimwe z’iryo tegeko, urugero ingingo ya gatanu, ku bijyanye n’uruhare rwa RBC mu guha iyo sosiyete nshya yashyizweho inshingano zo kuzana imiti mu Rwanda, hashyirwaho gahunda n’imirongo ngenderwaho.
Depite Nyabyenda Damien yavuze ko ubundi RBC yari isanzwe igira uruhare mu itumizwa ry’imiti binyuze mu kigo MPPD, ariko nyuma yo kubona ko izo nzego zombi zakundaga guhura n’ibibazo bijyanye n’itangwa ry’amasoko, bahisemo ko habaho ivugurura.
Yagize ati, “Ariko n’ubundi muri iyi ngingo ya gatanu agace ka cyenda, ndabona hagarukamo uruhare rwa RBC ko igomba kuzajya ikorana n’iyi sosiyete nshya kugura imiti.
Simbona ukuntu bizakora keretse niba RMS izajya ikora inshingano yo gutwara imiti, kandi ubundi ifite inshingano zo kugura imiti”.
Depite Muhongayire Christine, perezida wa komisiyo y’imibereho myiza y’abaturage ari na we watangaje ibijyanye n’uwo mushinga w’itegeko, yavuze ko komisiyo yahisemo gusimbuza “MPPD” hakabaho “RMS” kugira ngo ikibazo kijyanye n’igurwa ry’imiti gikemuke.
Depite Muhongayire yagize,“Twemeje ko RMS ari yo izajya igura imiti, RBC yo icyo izajya ikora ni igenamigambi, ikareba imiti ikenewe mu gihugu, nyuma igasinyana amasezerano n’iyo sosiyete ya RMS, ifite inshingano yo kugurira leta imiti”.
Depite Muhongayire yasobanuye ko hari impinduka zakozwe ku ngingo zimwe zigize uwo mushinga w’itegeko, habanza kwerekanwa uko ibijyanye n’abakozi n’umutungo w’icyo kigo cyavuyeho bizagenda,ni yo mpamvu byafashe amezi cumi n’abiri aho kuba atandatu nk’uko byari byavuzwe mbere ko bizafata amezi atatu cyangwa atandatu.
Depite Muhongayire yagize ati, “Komisiyo yashyizeho iteka rya Minisitiri w’intebe, rizagena uko iyo sosiyete yasimbuye MPPD izaba iteye.Kuko abakoreraga icyo kigo cya MPPD ari abakozi ba leta, nibaramuka batagumye mu kazi nyuma y’ivugurura bazahabwa ibyo bemerewe hakurikijwe itegeko rigenga umurimo”.
Ivugura ry’icyo kigo,ryitezweho gukemura ibibazo byinshi by’Abanyarwanda bakunda kuvuga ko babura imiti ndetse n’ibitaro ko bibura imiti.
Mbere yo kugeza uwo mushinga ku nteko, mu Kwezi kwa Werurwe uyu mwaka, Umunyamabanga wa leta muri Minisiteri y’ubuzima, yari yavuze ko icyo kigo nigikurwa muri RBC bizihutisha gahunda z’itangwa ry’amasoko ndetse bikagabanya umwanya byafataga mu gutanga amasoko yo gutumiza imiti.
Iyo sosiyete nshya ya RMS, izaba ihurije hamwe ikigo cy’u Rwanda gikora imiti (Rwanda Pharmaceutical Laboratory “LABOPHAR”) , na za Farumasi z’uturere zose mu gihugu.
Itegeko rigenga sosiyete ya RMS n’uko izakora ryatowe n’Abadepite 51.

Habakuki 2:2-3 Related posts Ni akahe kamaro ko kwiyiriza ubusa ku mukirisitu usenga?
May 17, 2015 IJAMBO RY’IMANA: Kwizera ni kwo kudutsindishiriza!
March 8, 2015 Bibilia ivuga uburyo bukwiriye umukiranutsi bwo kubaho, bumubereye, akwiye kubanamo n’Imana, kumva ijambo ryayo no kuryakira.
Mu buzima bw’umukirisitu uburyo avuganamo n’Imana benshi bazi ni ugusenga, ariko kenshi usanga mu gusenga kwacu bisa nkaho ari ukubwira Imana ibitubababaje cyangwa ibyo tuyisaba twihuta, ariko ntidutegereze cyangwa ngo twumve yo ku ruhande rwayo icyo itubwira cyangwa idushakaho.
Ariko Bibilia iyo ivuga ku mukiranutsi cyangwa umwizera ubeshwaho no kumvira ijwi ry’Imana, ivuga ko bene uwo abeshwaho n’ukwizera kwe gusa.
Bivuze iki?
Ukwizera kwe no kumva ijwi ry’Imana ni ko kumuha icyerekerezo ubuzima bwe bukwiye kugenderamo.
Ibi bisaba guhora ukoze nk’icyo wakwita mu gifaransa attention cyangwa ubwitonzi.
Umuhanuzi Habukuki mu gice cya 2 cy’igitabo cye yaranditse ngo “Nzahagarara ku munara aho ndindira, ndangaguza numve icyo ambwira…”.
Ibi icyo bivuze ku munyamasengesho wizera ni uko aho ukwiye gutegerereza ijwi ry’Imana ni bugufi bwayo si ahandi, si ukwiruka mu byumba byinshi, si ukumvira ubuhanuzi bwose butanizewe, ni ugutegerereza bugufi bw’Imana usenga ubwira ukararanguza amaso mu Ijuru, kuko aho ni ho ushobora kumva ijwi nyaryo.
Ku munara aho Habakuki yarindiriraga ni aho yasengeraga.
Kuri ubu usanga kenshi kuko abantu badafite umwanya uhagije wo gutegereza Imana, bizashikira inzira za bugufi banyura.
Ntibigutangaze ko abakirisitu benshi bayobotse inzira z’abapfumu, abandi bakunze ubuhanuzi bahabwa n’abandi akenshi ugasanga banabwishyura, abandi, ugasanga, barasenga ariko bagashaka no gufasha Imana.
Ibi si byo na gato, aho usengeye ni nayo ukura igisubizo n’Ijwi ry’Imana, niba wemera ko gusenga ari ukuganira n’Imana!?
Ese ni gute Iyerekwa ryacu dukwiye kuritandukanya n’ibyifuzo byacu cyangwa amarangamutima yacu asanzwe cyangwa inzozi z’umuruho?
Kenshi Iyerekwa twumva ntirifite uburyo warisobanura umuntu ngo uritandukanye n’andi marangamutima akururwa n’Ibyifuzo.
Icya mbere ukwiriye kumenya Iyerekwa ribaho ku muntu ufitanye ubusabane budasanzwe n’Imana.
Ishobora kukwiyereka mu nzozi cyangwa mu bundi buryo n’ibimenyetso.
Icyo gihe icyo bibilia igusaba n’iki?
Imana ibwira Habakuki ku byerekeranye n’Iyerekwa yamusabye ibintu bibiri cyangwa bitatu.
Icya mbere yaramubwiye “Andika ibyerekanywe cyangwa ibyo weretswe ku mbaho” Hab 2”2…, niba wiyumvamo ko ko hari ibyo Imana yakweretse mu nzozi cyangwa mu bundi buryo,shaka aho ubyandika nk’ikimenyetso yaba ikaye cyangwa urupapuro kugira mpamvu zo kugira nawe jye ubyibuka, ikindi kugira ngo n’undi wese ubusomye cyangwz ubyumva ajye abyibazaho kandi abyitondere.
Imana yabwiye Habakuki mu icyo gice ko ibyo umuntu yerekwa bidahera ko ngo bihite biba, bifite igihe byanewe kandi byategekewe si ako kanya, bishobora no kumara n’imyaka 100, ariko iyo byanditse ntibyakwibagirana cyangwa ngo bifatwe nk’ibije gutyo.
Icya kabiri Imana yavuze ku iyerekwa “Ubitegereze, ntibizatinda, ntibizabeshya ngo kandi naho byatinda ubitegereze” Iki ni cyo kintu kigoye mu isezerano cyangwa kwemera icyo Imana yagusezeranyije.
Gutegereza usanga bitunanira ku mpamvu z’uko iyo twumvise ngo Imana yambwiye twumva ko biba mu gitondo cyangwa ejo.
Ugasanga dutangiye kwitwara nk’abageze mu isezerano, ntitube tugikoze uko twari dusanzwe dukora.
Oya iyo ufite iyerekwa cyangwa isezerano urarikorera ukarisengera kuruta mbere y’uko uribona.
Imana yongeraho ko bitazabeshya.., naho Imana yavuga ikintu kikamara imyaka 1000 kitaraba si bivuze ko ibeshya , oya, naho utabona imbuto zayo abandi bazazibona, uzasige ugaragaje gusa ko Imana ari wowe yagize umuyoboro wo kubimenya, kuko naho byatinda ntibizahera.
Kandi uko kwizera uba ufite ni ko kukubeshaho naho utabikozaho imitwe y’intoki.
ISOMO: Iyerekwa cyangwa isezerano Imana iguhaye rigenzure witonze, risengere, uryandike, kandi ukore uganisha mu nzira no mu cyerekezo wumva Imana igiye kunyuzamo isezerano, wemere kuyoborwa naho.
Numara gukora ibyo byose fata umwanya wo gutegereza, ubyibuke ku manywa na n’ijoro kandi ugende nk’ufite isezerano, uko kwizera kuzagusunika kugeza Imana isohoje ibyo yagusezeranyije cyangwa se ku isozwa ry’urugendo rwawe mu isi.
Tuzirikane amagambo yo mu gitabo cy’Imana,avuga ngo… si ko bizaba ku bamutegereza (ntawuzakorwa n’isoni), usibye abava mu isezerani nta mpamvu!
ISENGESHO: Kuri uyu munsi w’Icyumweru, Mana turasenze kugira ngo abakwiringiye n’abagutegereje mu masezerano ubongeremo imbaraga n’ukwizera, kandi abo wayaye amayerekwa atandukanye bakayagendamo uko babyumva, bibutse kandi bandike iby’ukuri wababwiye, kugira ngo babigenderemo cyangwa babitegereze.
Mu izina ry’Umwami Yesu (Yezu) dusenze twizeye.

Miss Josiane Mwiseneza yaguze imodoka nziza, yanavuze ku musore wamukunze Miss Popularity Mwiseneza Josiane uri gutegura igitaramo yatumiyemo Tiwa Savage wo muri Nigeria yatangaje ko yaguze imodoka ye isigaye imutwara mu buzima bwe bwa buri munsi anakomoza ku musore uvuga ko yamukunze.

#22705#	3	economy	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/ubu-nta-karere-na-kamwe-katageramo-kaburimbo
Ubu nta karere na kamwe katageramo kaburimbo Akarere ka Gisagara mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, ubu ntikakiri ko karere konyine katageramo umuhanda wa kaburimbo mu Rwanda nk’uko byahoze mbere.
Aha ni ho umuhanda ujya muri Gisagara ushamikiye Imirimo yo kubaka umuhanda wa kaburimbo Huye-Ndora, w’ibirometero 13.8, ubu iri ku musozo.
Ni umuhanda wakozwe uhereye mu Mujyi wa Huye, ukanyura ahitwa ku Kabutare, ugakomeza werekeza i Ndora, ahubatse ibiro by’Akarere ka Gisagara, ukaba uzatwara miliyari 6.5 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Ni ubwa mbere muri Gisagara hageze kaburimbo mu mateka Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Gisagara Jerôme Rutaburingoga, yabwiye Kigali Today ko uyu muhanda uri hafi kurangira, kuko ngo hasigaye imirimo mikeya cyane.
Ati “Umuhanda warangiye ubu bari mu masuku no gushyirwaho amatara yo ku muhanda (public light)”.
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko imirimo isigaye itarengeje ukwezi kumwe ngo uyu muhanda ube urangiye.
Uyu muhanda wa Gisagara wuzuye nyuma y’imyaka itatu Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame awemereye abaturage, ubwo yari mu bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza muri 2017.
Uyu muhanda wakozwe na Kompanyi y’Abashinwa ‘China Roads and Bridge Corporation (CRBC)’, ukaba waragombaga kurangira mu mezi 12 uhereye mu Ukwakira 2018.
Kaburimbo muri Gisagara Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe ubwikorezi (RTDA), Imena Munyampenda, yabwiye KT Press ati “Turateganya ko uyu muhanda uzatahwa ku mugaragaro muri Gashyantare”.
Mu gihe ubu uturere dutegereje kubona indi mihanda ya kaburimbo iduhuza n’utundi, Munyampenda avuga ko hashobora gukurikiraho umuhanda wa kaburimbo uturuka mu Mujyi wa Nyamagabe werekeza i Kaduha muri ako karere.
Mu bihe biri imbere kandi, hari indi mihanda iteganyijwe kandi yihutirwa, harimo uwa Byimana-Buhanda-Kaduha, Ngororero-Satinsyi-Nyakinama-Musanze na Nyanza-Karongi.

Shampiona y’u Rwanda ya Basket igiye kujya yerekanwa kuri Startimes Ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Basketball mu Rwanda na Startimes basinye amasezerano y’ubufatanye, aho iyi Shampiona izajya itambuka kuri Startimes Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24/01/2018, ni bwo Ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Baketball mu Rwanda ryasinye amasezerano y’ubufatanye n’ikigo cya Startimes gisanzwe gicuruza ibijyanye n’amashusho, amasezerano azamara imyaka itatu.
Jess Yuchang, Umuyobozi mukuru wa Startimes atangaza ko bashaka guteza uumikino wa Basket imbere Muri aya masezerano, buri mwaka Startimes izajya iha FERWABA amafaranga agera kuri Milioni 25 Frws ku mwaka, zingana na Milioni 75 mu gihe cy’imyaka itatu aya masezerano agomba kuzarangirira.
Nyuma yo gusinya amasezerano y’imyaka itatu, bafashe ifoto y’urwibutso Startimes izajya itanga Milioni 25Frws, agabanyije mu bice bitandukanye aho hari Milioni 14 Frws zingana na 56% zizajya zihabwa amakipe 14 (buri yose Milioni imwe), Milioni eshanu zizajya zihemba amakipe yegukanye igikombe, Milioni 3,500Frws zigenewe ibikorwa biri tekinike birimo nko guhemba abasifuzi, na Milioni 2,500 zigenewe imiyoborere ya Shampiona.
Munyanziza Gervais wari uhagarariye MINISPOC muri iki gikorwa Muri aya masezerano kandi harimo ko Startimes izerekana imikino 30 buri mwaka izaba yatoranijwe, zikazajya zitambuka kuri imwe mu ma televiziyo ya hano mu Rwanda, gusa hakaba hatarangazwa izajya yerekana iyi mikino.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu guhera Saa moya z’ijoro ubwo REG izaba ikina na IPRC Kigali, hazakorwa igeragezwa ry’uko iyi mikino izajya yerekanwa, maze izatangire kwerekanwa neza mu ntangiriro z’ukwezi kwa kabiri

#22871#	4	health	https://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/coronavirus/article/hari-gutegurwa-uko-abajyanama-b-ubuzima-bakwinjizwa-mu-rugamba-rwo-guhashya
Hari gutegurwa uko abajyanama b’ubuzima bakwinjizwa mu rugamba rwo guhashya COVID-19 Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC, cyatangaje ko hari gutegurwa uburyo abajyanama b’ubuzima bakwinjizwa mu rugamba rwo kurwanya COVID -19 nyuma yo kubona ko icyorezo kizamara igihe kirekire kandi abajyanama b’ubuzima bakaba baragaragaje uruhare rukomeye mu gufasha urwego rw’ubuzima harimo guhangana na Malariya.
Umuyobozi wa RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, yabigarutseho ubwo yakiraga inkunga y’udupfukamunwa n’amazuru 71 477 twatanzwe n’Ikigega cy’Umuryango w’Abibumbye cyita ku Baturage (UNFPA).
Yavuze ko nyuma yo kubona ko icyorezo cya COVID-19 kizamara igihe kirekire hari gahunda irambye yo kureba uburyo cyavurirwa ku nzego zitandukanye harimo n’urw’abajyanama b’ubuzima.
Muri iyi gahunda yavuze ko basanze abajyanama b’ubuzima bashobora kuzajya bita ku bantu batarwaye bikabije cyangwa badafite ikimenyetso na kimwe, kandi ko bafite icyizere ko bizatanga umusaruro nk’uko babikora ku zindi ndwara n’izindi serivisi z’ubuzima.
Ati “Abantu dutekereza cyane yuko ibi bikoresho bizabafasha harimo kugera no ku rwego rw’abajyanama b’ubuzima.
Kuko icyorezo tubona ko kizatinda tugomba kubana nacyo igihe kirekire.
Turategura uburyo cyajya kivurirwa no ku zindi nzego bitari ngombwa ko abantu bose bavurirwa ahantu hamwe, ndetse n’abatarwaye cyane badafite n’ikimenyetso na kimwe bakaba babasha kuvurirwa no ku rwego rw’umudugudu.’’
“Abajyanama b’ubuzima basanzwe babikora ku ndwara zisumbuyeho.
Turi kubitegura bimwe rero muri ibi bikoresho nicyo bizakora.
Abantu barwaye koko akaba aribyo bazajya bashyirwa ahantu havurirwa ariko abatarembye n’ubundi ubona icyo tumukeneyeho ari uko yaguma aho ari nta bandi bantu akwirakwije ubwo burwayi iyo niyo nzira turi kwerekezamo mu buryo bwihuse mu minsi iri imbere.”
Dr Nzansimana yabwiye IGIHE ko abajyanama b’ubuzima bazagira uruhare mu kwita ku bamaze gusuzumwa na RBC ndetse nabo bakagira uruhare mu gusuzuma ariko ko byose bikiri gutegurwa neza uburyo bizakorwa, bamaze guhabwa ibikoresho n’amahugurwa ahagije.
Ati “Abajyanama b’ubuzima uyu munsi tuvugana barapima indwara nka Malariya, bagapima umuriro bagatanga ibinini ndetse hari n’aho batera urushinge rero COVID-19 yo abanahura nayo nta nubwo bakeneye ibyo byose.
Aba ari ukugira gusa ngo yumve ko ari bugume mu rugo nagira ikimenyetso akeneye kujya kuvurwa abe yajyanwa, ibyo nibyo turi gutegura bazakora ariko igihe cyo kubitangira tuzabamenyesha tumaze kubahugura twabahaye n’ibikoresho bibarinda n’amahugurwa.”
Kugeza ubu hari abajyanama b’ubuzima basaga ibihumbi 60 mu gihugu hose bavura abarwayi ba Malariya ku kigero cya 70% kuko abajya kuyivuza kwa muganga bari hagati ya 30 na 40%.
Mu Rwanda, abamaze kwandura Coronavirus ni abantu 1710, abagera kuri 889 barayikize naho batanu yarabahitanye kuva ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020 icyo cyorezo kigaragaye mu Rwanda.
Kugeza ubu nta muti nta n’urukingo.
Kwirinda ni ugukaraba intoki kenshi hakoreshejwe amazi meza n’isabune ndetse umuntu akambara agapfukamunwa n’amazuru igihe agiye ahahurira abantu benshi.
Abajyanama b'ubuzima mu minsi iri imbere bashobora gutangira gutanga umusanzu wabo mu guhangana na Coronavirus Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, yatangaje ko hari gutegurwa uburyo abajyanama b’ubuzima bakwinjizwa mu rugamba rwo kurwanya COVID -19

#22886#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/umuntu-wa-mbere-yishwe-na-coronavirus-i-burayi
Umuntu wa mbere yishwe na coronavirus i Burayi Mukerarugendo w’Umushinwa yapfiriye mu Bufaransa nyuma yo kwandura ubwoko bushya bwa coronavirus - uyu akaba ari we wa mbere yishe hanze y’umugabane w’Aziya.
Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 80 yakomokaga mu ntara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa, nkuko byavuzwe na Agnès Buzyn, Minisitiri w’ubuzima w’Ubufaransa.
Yapfuye azize kwangirika kw’ibihaha kwaturutse kuri coronavirus.
Yageze mu Bufaransa ku itariki ya 16 y’ukwezi kwa mbere, ku itariki ya 25 y’uko kwezi ashyirwa mu kato mu bitaro bya Bichat biri mu majyaruguru y’umurwa mukuru Paris, nkuko Buzyn yabivuze.
Impfu eshatu gusa ni zo zari zaratangajwe mbere zo hanze y’Ubushinwa - muri Hong Kong, Philippines no mu Buyapani.
Ariko abantu barenga 1,500 bamaze kwicwa na coronavirus mu Bushinwa, benshi muri bo i Hubei aho yagaragaye bwa mbere.
Abandi bantu 2,641 bemejwe ko bayanduye, ubu umubare w’abamaze kuyandura mu Bushinwa bose hamwe bakaba ari 66,492.
Mu mpera y’ukwezi kwa mbere, Ubufaransa bwabaye igihugu cya mbere i Burayi cyemeje ko hari abantu cyasanganye coronavirus.
Bufite abantu 11 byemejwe ko barwaye ubu bwoko bushya bwa coronavirus - buzwi ku izina rya Covid-19, kandi batandatu baracyari mu bitaro.
Madamu Buzyn yavuze ko mushiki w’uwo mugabo wapfuye ari umwe muri abo bayanduye, ariko byemezwa ko arimo koroherwa.
Hanze y’Ubushinwa, hamaze kugaragara abantu barenga 500 bo mu bihugu 24 banduye coronavirus.

Mulisa yavuze ku isoko ry’igura n’igurishwa mu Rwanda n’icyo kwitega kuri APR FC muri Champions League Jimmy Mulisa wabaye rutahizamu w’Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi’ yavuze ko APR FC ishobora kungukira ku mwaka mwiza w’imikino iheruka kugira, ikazitwara neza muri CAF Champions League ya 2020/21.
APR FC izahagararira u Rwanda mu mikino Nyafurika ihuza amakipe yabaye aya mbere iwayo nyuma y’uko itwaye Shampiyona ya 2019/20 idatsinzwe.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Jimmy Mulisa, yavuze ko amakipe amwe n’amwe yagerageje kwiyubaka mu kwitegura umwaka utaha wa Shampiyona 2020/21 cyane cyane Kiyovu Sports na APR FC.
Ati ”Amakipe menshi yagizweho ingaruka na COVID-19 ariko akomeje kugenda agerageza kwiyubaka.
Turumva APR FC igenda izana abakinnyi beza nk’ibisanzwe na Kiyovu Sports nishimira ko iri gukora impinduka, ndizera ko bizagenda neza nubwo bizaba bigoye.
Nishimiye no kubona Gasogi iri mu yakomeje kwitegura neza isubukurwa ry’imikino.”
Abajijwe uko abona APR FC yahozemo nk’umukinnyi ndetse n’umutoza, izahagararira u Rwanda mu mikino ya CAF Champions League y’umwaka utaha w’imikino, Mulisa yavuze ko nta rwitwazo abakinnyi bayo bakwiye kuzagira.
Ati ”Niba ubibona yarangije umwaka w’imikino ihagaze neza itaratsindwa, nibakomezanya umusaruro bafite ntekereza ko byose ari mu mutwe.
Navugako APR nk’ikipe, abakinnyi nta rwitwazo bakwiye kuzazana kuko ikipe ibitaho.”
“Bakwiye kwitwara neza kuko niyo ifite abakinnyi benshi mu Ikipe y’Igihugu nka 80%.
Nagiye nkurikirana ibiganiro by’umutoza, bitewe n’icyizere arema mu bakinnyi ndizera ko bazagera kure muri Champions League.”
Umutoza wa APR FC, Adil Mohamed Erradi, aherutse gutangaza ko intego bihaye mu mwaka utaha w’imikino ari ukugera mu matsinda ya CAF Champions League.
Jimmy Mulisa asanga APR FC izitwara neza muri CAF Champions League nikomereza ku musaruro yagize mu mwaka ushize w'imikino

Nyagatare: Bicaga Abatutsi bakabeshya ko bishe Inkotanyi Padiri Rutinduka Laurent umwanditsi ku mateka ya Jenoside yifuza ko amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi i Nyagatare yakwandikwa akamenyekana kuko hari abayahakana.
Padiri Rutinduka, umwanditsi ku mateka ya Jenoside Padiri Rutinduka yavukiye ahitwa i Kiziguro mu Karere ka Gatsibo, ahahoze ari muri Komini Murambi yayoborwaga na Gatete Jean Baptiste.
Yanditse igitabo ku mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu cyahoze ari Komini Murambi by’umwihariko iwabo i Kiziguro.
Avuga ko urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rugitangira, Abatutsi bishwe cyane i Nyagatare, babeshyerwa kuba ari Inkotanyi.
Ati “Boherezaga abasirikare kurwana n’Inkotanyi bagatinya, ahubwo bakica Abatutsi barangiza bagatangaza ko Inkotanyi bazimaze kandi atari byo.
Hari batayo yakuwe i Kibungo birazwi ko aho kujya ku rugamba n’Inkotanyi biyiciye Abatutsi barigamba bati “Twazimaze Inkotanyi.”
Padiri Rutinduka avuga ko hari abantu bajya bavuga ko i Nyagatare nta Jenoside yahabaye bitwaje ko Inkotanyi zahageze kera nyamara byari ibirindiro bya Nsabimana (Castar).
Avuga ko ubuyobozi bukwiye gukora ibishoboka byose, amateka ya Jenoside ya Nyagatare akandikwa akamenyekana akanyomoza abavuga ko nta Jenoside yahabaye.
Agira ati “Itariki ya 08 Ukwakira 1990, hano Umututsi wa mbere yarishwe, abandi bagiye gufungirwa i Ngarama bamwe babatwara i Byumba bicirwayo, hakurya y’icyambu banazwe mu Muvumba, mu maranshi baratwikiwe baricwa.”
Ibi Padiri Rutinduka yabitangaje ku wa 10 Mata, ubwo AERG Ingenzi muri kaminuza ya East Africa Rwanda yibukaga ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Mushabe uyobora Nyagatare avuga ko biteguye gufatanya n’uwabafasha kwandika amateka ya Jenoside i Nyagatare Mushabe David Claudian, umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyagatare avuga ko bagiye kwifashisha kaminuza ebyiri ziri mu karere, abanditsi n’abarokotse haboneke igisubizo ku bibaza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Nyagatare.
Ati “Imbaraga zirahari, dufite kaminuza ya East Africa na Kaminuza y’u Rwanda (UR), bafite abashakashatsi, abandi nka Rutinduka barahari kandi azi byinshi, ni ukwegera n’abarokotse tukabona amakuru agakusanywa akandikwa, tuzafatanya bikorwe.”
Komini Muvumba yayoborwaga na Rwabukombe Onesphore.
Mu mwaka wa 2015, Rwabukombe yakatiwe igifungo cya burundu n’urukiko rwo mu Budage, rumaze kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside.

Padiri Ubald Rugirangoga umaze igihe arwaye Covid-19 yifurije abantu Noheli nziza Padiri Ubald Rugirangoga uzwi mu bikorwa byo gusengera abarwayi,yifurije abantu Noheli Nziza nyuma y’amezi abiri arwaye Coronavirus mu bitaro byo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Mu mpera z’Ukwakira nibwo hatangajwe ko Padiri Ubald Rugirangonga yanduye Coronavirus ndetse ari kwitabwaho n’abaganga.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu ku nshuro ya mbere nibwo yagaragaye ku mashusho yifuriza abantu Noheli nziza, bitanga icyizere ko arimo koroherwa.
Amashusho yagaragaye ya Padiri Ubald Rugirangoga yari aryamye ku gitanda cy’abarwayi, hagaragara umutwe n’igice gito k’igihimba, yambaye ingofero ikozwe mu budodo y’amabara y’umutuku n’icyatsi, gusa ubona ko arwaye, ari kwifuriza abantu Noheli nziza ndetse anabashimira ku masengesho yabo.
Mu magambo make yavuze, yagize ati “ Ubald uri mu bitaro arabifuriza Noheli nziza, mwarakoze kunsengera ndi koroherwa, mwarakoze cyane ndabashimira ku bw’amasengesho yanyu.”
Padiri Rugirangonga kandi akeneye, inkunga y’amafaranga angana n’ibihumbi 150$ ni ukuvuga miliyoni 148.5 Frw, kugira ngo ahabwe ubuvuzi buzamufaha kongera gukira neza kuko abaganga bavuze ko agowe no guhumeka mu gihe atari ku byuma bimwongerera umwuka.
Kugeza ubu Ubald arwariye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu bitaro bya Kaminuza ya Utah Hospital mu mujyi wa Salt Lake.
Bikekwa ko Padiri Ubald yarwaye Covid-19 ayikuye mu mujyi wa Green Bay muri Leta ya Wisconsin aho yari yagiye gukora ibikorwa by’isanamitima mu ntangiriro z’Ukwakira.
Katsey Long, Inshuti ye yanamusuye ubwo yari arwariye mu bitaro bya St.
John’s Health muri Jackson, avuga ko nubwo Padiri Rugirangonga ibipimo bigaragaza ko atakirwaye Coronavirus, ariko iyi ndwara yamusigiye ubundi burwayi bwamuzahaje.
Long avuga ko mu burwayi afite harimo kuvura kw’amaraso, ndetse mu bihaha bye harimo amazi ndetse n’udukoko, byose byatewe na Covid-19.
Padiri Rugirangoga Ubald yamenyekanye cyane kubera ibikorwa by’isanamitima n’ibindi byiganjemo ibyo gusengera abarwayi bagakira.
Amaze imyaka irenga 32 yarihaye Imana.

#23035#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/bimwe-mu-bimenyetso-bya-kanseri-y-ibere-ugomba-kumenya
Bimwe mu bimenyetso bya kanseri y’ibere ugomba kumenya Kanseri y’ibere ni imwe muri kanseri ihitana umubare munini w’abatuye isi ahanini bitewe no gutinda kuyivuza dore ko itinda no kugaragaza ibimenyetso byayo ndetse n’ibigaragaye nyirabyo ntabyiteho cyane kuko bidakunze kubangama.Iyi ndwara ikunze kwibasira abantu b’igitsina gore ariko kandi n’abagabo na bo bakaba bashobora kugira ibyago byo kuyirwara.
Kanseri iterwa n’iki?
Kanseri y’ibere iterwa n’ukwiyongera kudasanzwe k’uturemangingo tw’ibere, turakura birenze urugero umubiri ntubashe kuba wabicunga neza.Yibasira abagore n’abagabo ariko ikunze kuboneka cyane mu bagore.
Ku bantu b’igitsina gore ni byiza kumenya impinduka ku mabere yabo,niba hari impinduka zabayeho bakabimenya hakiri kare kuko bibafasha kwirinda kanseri hakiri kare.Gusa ni bake bamenya bimwe mu bimenyetso byakuburira.
Bimwe mu bimenyetso byakuburira Nuramuka ubonye ibimenyetso bikurikira bihinduka ku ibere ryawe, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cya kanseri y’ibere: o Kubona ibere cg agace ko ku ibere karetsemo amazi o Kubabara imoko cg ubona itangiye kwinjira mu ibere o Kuribwa ndetse no kubyimba kw’amabere. o Kumva ikintu gikomeye ahagana munsi y’ukuboko hegereye amabere. o Gusohora mu ibere ibindi bitari amashereka. o Gutukura, gukomera cg gukweduka kw’imoko cg uruhu rwo ku ibere o Gufuruta uruhu rwo ku ibere Ikimenyetso benshi bahuriraho ni ukumva ikintu gikomeye mu ibere ushobora gukoraho nawe ukumva ubwawe.
Akenshi ntikiba kibabaza, ariko kiba gikomeye.
Gishobora kandi kuza cyoroshye, igihe cyose wumvise mu ibere ryawe harimo ikintu kidasanzwe ni ngombwa kugana kwa muganga ukisuzumisha.
Wayirinda gute?
Mu gihe ucyeka cg se hari uwo mu muryango wawe warwaye kanseri y’ibere, ni ngombwa gufata ingamba zo guhangana nayo, cyane cyane ku bakobwa bakiri bato. o Ugomba kwirinda umubyibuho ukabije. o Ni ngombwa kurya neza; ukibanda cyane ku mboga rwatsi n’imbuto byibuze mubyo kurya byawe bya buri munsi. o Kurya amafunguro akize kuri omega-3 fatty acids ni ngombwa cyane (amafi) o Kugabanya amafunguro akize kubinure o Kwirinda inyama zahinduwe, izokeje cg izindi zitandukanye zicishwa mu nganda kuko zibamo ibinure bishobora kongera ibyago byo kurwara kanseri y’ibere. o Irinde kunywa inzoga cyane no kunywa itabi Wari uzi ko hari imiti myimerere ihangana na kanseri y’ibere?
Birashoboka ko waba ufite ubu burwayi,nyamara wenda ukaba warivuje byaranze,ubu rero habonetse imiti myimerere ikoze mu bimera,kandi ikaba yizewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga,ivura kandi ikarinda kanseri y’ibere,ikindi kandi ni uko izamura ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri.Muri iyo miti twavugamo nka: A-power capsule,Ginseng Rh Capsule,Propolis plus capsule,Kudding plus tea,Ganoderma plus capsule,Deep sea fish oil capsule, ….
Twabibutsa ko iyi miti nta ngaruka igira kuko ikoze mu bimera.
Ukeneye izi nyunganiramirire, wahamagara muri Horaho Life kuri 0788698813/0728698813 cyangwa ukabagana aho bakorera mu nyubako yo kwa Rubangura mu muryango wa 301.

Sobanukirwa imiterere y’uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bwa Kanye West Byatangiye Kanye West avuga ko agiye kwiyamamariza kuyobora Leta Zunze Ubumwe bamwe bati ni ukubeshya uyu asanganywe uburwayi bwo mu mutwe ari kwishakira ko izina rye rivugwa kurushaho none bigeze n’aho umuryango we uhamya ko afite ibibazo koko.
Umugore we Kim Kardashian yatangaje ko umugabo we yakunze kurwara mu mutwe indwara izwi nka Bipolar disorder.

N’ubwo yabyivugiye ntabwo abo mu muryango we bigeze bashaka kubyinjiramo ngo babivugire ku karubanda.

Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe, nta burerekana ko indwara zo mu mutwe umuntu ashobora kuzirwara bitewe n’uko hari uwo akomokaho cyangwa uwo bafitanye isano wazirwaye.

#23087#	5	politics	http://igihe.com/politiki/amakuru/article/uko-imitwe-ya-politiki-yakiriye-imyanya-yabonye-mu-matora-y-abadepite
Uko imitwe ya politiki yakiriye imyanya yabonye mu matora y’abadepite Amatora y’abadepite bashya yasojwe abagore baje ku isonga bangana na 61.25%, ku mashyaka amwe imyanya iragabanuka mu gihe hari ayashoboye guhagararirwa mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko bwa mbere mu mateka yayo.
Nyuma y’amajwi y’agateganyo yatangajwe kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 4 Nzeri, amatora y’uyu mwaka yandikiwemo amateka kuko ari bwo bwa mbere amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi abonye imyanya mu Nteko, mu myaka 24 nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nibwo bwa mbere kandi amashyaka 11 yemewe mu Rwanda yose agiye guhagararirwa mu Nteko.
Komisiyo y’amatora yatangaje ko Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi n’amashyaka yifatanyije nawo wakomeje kuza ku isonga n’amajwi y’agateganyo 74%, bivuze ko wegukanye intebe 40 muri 53 zihatanirwa n’imitwe ya politiki n’abakandida bigenga.
Green Party na PS Imberakuri nk’amashyaka atavuga rumwe na leta, buri rimwe ryabonye amajwi 5% arihesha intebe ebyiri mu Nteko, PL ibona imyanya 4, PSD ibona imyanya 5.
Nubwo FPR Inkotanyi yabonye imyanya myinshi mu Nteko, yagabanutseho umwe ugereranyije na manda y’Umutwe w’Abadepite icyuye igihe; PSD yatakaje ibiri naho PL itakaza umwe.
Komiseri mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi akaba n’umuvugizi wayo, Gasamagera Wellars yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye umubare w’abadepite babonye kandi ko icyo bifuzaga bakigezeho.
Yagize ati “Twabyakiriye neza kandi ni umuco dusanganywe ujyanye na demokarasi, abaturage bagaragaje amahitamo yabo.Twashakaga ubwiganze busesuye mu Nteko kandi twabubonye, turashimira abanyarwanda bongeye kudushyigikira.”
Gasamagera yavuze ko kuba batakaje umwanya umwe mu Nteko bitazahungabanya uruhare rwabo mu gutanga ibitekerezo, avuga ko impamvu byabayeho ari uko hari abandi bashya binjiyemo kandi bishimangira demokarasi.
Ati “Bivuze ko demokarasi y’u Rwanda ibaye ubukombe kuko iha urubuga abantu batandukanye bagatanga ibitekerezo byabo.
Bigaragaza ko ntawe uzapfana ingingimira avuga ko yabuze aho acisha ibitekerezo bye.”
Perezida w’ishyaka PSD, Dr Vincent Biruta yavuze ko ibyavuye mu matora babyakiriye neza.
Nubwo iri shyaka ryatakaje imyanya ibiri ugereranyije no muri manda ishize, Dr Biruta avuga ko nta kibazo biteye kuko mu matora byose bishoboka.
Yagize ati “Nta mpungenge byaduteye kuko mu gihe cy’amatora imyanya ishobora kuzamuka cyangwa ikamanuka, ubwo tuzicara dusuzume impamvu, kandi si natwe twenyine imyanya yagabanyutse hari n’abandi, kubera ko hari abashya binjiye mu nteko.”
Biruta avuga ko kuba hari amashyaka mashya yinjiye mu Nteko bigaragaza ko urubuga rwa politiki mu Rwanda rufunguye.
Ku muyobozi w’Ishyaka Riharanira Demokarasi no Kurengera Ibidukikije, Dr Frank Habineza, byari ibyishimo bikomeye kuko ishyaka rye ryinjiye mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko bwa mbere mu mateka yaryo.
Iri shyaka ryashinzwe mu 2009 ariko ntiryabasha guhatana mu matora y’abadepite yabaye mu 2013.
Mu mwaka ushize Dr Habineza yahataniye kuyobora igihugu ariko aratsindwa.
Yavuze ko ubu icyo bagiye gushyira imbere ari ugukora ubuvugizi ku byo bijeje abaturage ubwo biyamamazaga.
Ati “Ni intambwe nziza u Rwanda rwateye.
Byari bimenyerewe ko FPR n’amashyaka bafatanyije, PL na PSD aribo bajya mu nteko ariko byahindutse, biratanga icyizere rero.
Nta cyabuza ibyo twiyemeje kugerwaho, si akazi koroshye ariko tuzajya tubiganiraho n’indi mitwe ya politiki tuzasangayo.”
Habineza yavuze ko icyo bazaheraho bakorera ubuvugizi ari ukuvugurura itegeko ry’ubutaka, imisoro igakurwaho cyangwa ikagabanywa ndetse no guharanira ko ubutaka buba ubw’abaturage aho kubukodeshwa na leta.
Perezida wa PS Imberakuri, Mukabunani Christine, na we ishyaka rye rigiye guhagararirwa mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko ku nshuro ya mbere, yashimiye cyane Abanyarwanda babatoye n’abandi bose bagiye bafatanya n’abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze mu kubakira.
Yakomeje avuga ko ‘icyizere bagiriye ishyaka rye, bazakizirikana bagashyira mu bikorwa ibyo bagiye babasezeranya mu kwiyamamaza’.
Mu badepite 80 batowe, hazaba harimo abagore 49 bangana na 61.2 %.
Uretse imyanya 24 yihariye ku bagore, mu badepite 40 ba FPR Inkotanyi harimo abagore 19, muri PSD harimo abagore babiri mu myanya itanu, PL ifite abagore babiri mu myanya ine naho PS Imberakuri ikagira umugore umwe mu myanya ibiri.
Abo biyongeraho na Maniriho Clarisse, umwe muri babiri batorewe guhagararira urubyiruko.
Green Party yo yabonye imyanya ibiri, irimo abagabo gusa.
Komiseri Gasamagera yavuze ko icyo bashakaga ari ubwiganze busesuye mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko kandi bwabonetse Dr Biruta uyobora PSD yavuze ko bagiye kwicara bagasuzuma impamvu batakaje imyanya mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko Dr Frank Habineza yavuze ko kuba binjiye mu Nteko ari intambwe nziza u Rwanda rwateye Mukabunani Christine yavuze ko icyizere abanyarwanda bagiriye ishyaka rye rizakizirikana, rigashyira mu bikorwa ibyo ryabasezeranyije Ishyaka PL riyoborwa na Donatille Mukabarisa ryongeye kubona imyanya mu Nteko

#23121#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Masaka-abagore-batakiye-Mayor-w-umujyi-kubera-abagabo-n-abana-babo-bajyanwe-kwa-Kabuga
Masaka: Abagore batakiye Meya w’umujyi kubw’abagabo n’abana babo bajyanywe Kwa Kabuga Mu murenge wa Masaka mu Karere ka Kicukiro, bamwe mu bagore batakambiye Meya w’umujyi bamusaba kurenganura abagabo ndetse n’abana babo bajyanywe mu kigo kinyuzwamo abafite imyitwarire idahwitse kizwi nko Kwa Kabuga.
Ubwo yasuraga uyu murenge wa Masaka kuri uyu wa Kabiri mu gikorwa cyo kungurana ibitekerezo n’abaturage muri gahunda y’icyumweru cyahariwe ubujyanama, Meya w’umujyi wa Kigali Nyamurinda Pascal yagejejweho ibibazo birimo n’icy’aba bagore batwariwe abagabo babo n’abana.
Abagore bagaragaje iki kibazo bose bahuriza ku kuba abagabo babo ndetse n’abana barasanzwe mu isoko ry’i Kabuga bagafatwa bakajyanwa Kwa Kabuga.
Nyirandikubwimana Valentine umwe muri aba bagore avuga ko yajyanye n’umwana ku isoko abona yambitswe amapingu baramujyana.
Ati :” Nagiye ku isoko ndi kumwe n’umwana hariya i Kabuga, tugezeyo ngiye kubona mbona abantu baraje babambitse amapingu barabajyanye kandi uwo mwana twari twajyanye mu isoko” Avuga ko yitabaje inzego zose zirimo n’Umurenge ariko ngo na n’ubu ntarabona igisubizo.
Nyirandikubwimana Valentine bamutwaye umwana bari bajyajye ku isoko Hari undi mugore wavuze ko yabuze umugabo we nyuma akamusanga kwa Kabuga.
Yagize ati :”Umutware wanjye yagiye mu isoko I Kabuga ndamubura ku itariki 7/3/2017, aho ntangiriye kumushakishiriza bukeye bwaho batubwira ko bashobora kuba babajyanye Kwa Kabuga.”
Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko bagiye kwa Kabuga bakamubwira ko ataribo babazana ahubwo bamubwira ko agomba kujya muri CID. avuga ko atazi aho CID ikorera ndetse ngo ntazi n’aho iba.
Avuga ko umugabo we yavuye mu rugo ari saa tanu z’amanywa agiye ku kazi asanzwe akora k’ubunyonzi ngo yahise afatwa hamwe n’igare yakoreshaga ari mu isoko.
Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko umugabo we yamusigiye abana batatu kubitaho wenyine bimugoye.
Ati "Yansigiye abana batatu kubarera njyenyine birangoye, ndababaye ikibazo cyanjye nta hantu ntakigejeje no ku Kagali nakigejejeyo bampaye urupapuro rw’imyitwarire ndujyanyeyo barambwira ngo ningende ntegereze na n’ubu amaso yaheze mu kirere.”
Yavuze ko umugabo we wajyanwe kwa Kabuga yari umunyonzi Hari undi muturage wasabye Meya gukurikirana icyo kibazo ngo kuko na we abana babo iyo bavuye mu rugo bagiye guhaha bahita bafatwa bakumva ngo bajyanwe Kwa Kabuga.
Ati "Ikibazo dufite abana bacu barimo baragenda bakabura, tukumva ngo bageze kwa Kabuga.
Muradusaba gukora ngo twiteze imbera ariko bwacya tukumva ngo abana bacu bageze kwa Kabuga rwose nimudukurikiranire icyo kibazo.”
Uyu mubyeyi nawe avuga ko bafite ikibazo cy’abana babo bajyanwa Kwa Kabuga Meya w’umujyi wa Kigali Pascal Nyamurinda yabwiye aba bagore bafite iki kibazo cy’abagabo n’abana ko bagiye kukibakurikiranira, basanga nta kibazo cyo guhungabanya umutekano bafite bakabarekura.
Ati "Abavuga ko hari abagabo babo cyangwa se abana babo bafashwe bari Kwa Kabuga, nimwegere Polisi kugirango mutange amazina.
Tuzareba ubwo nidusanga nta kibazo bafite ubwo bararenganurwa basubire mu miryango yabo.
Keretse nidusanga hari ikibazo cy’umwihariko bafite kijyanye n’umutekano.”
Umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Kigali Nyamurinda yavuze ko bagiye gukurikirana icyo kibazo Kwa Kabuga ni ikigo giherereye I Gikondo mu Karere ka Kicukiro cyakira abafatiwe mu ngeso ziririmo uburaya, gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge, gusabiriza, ubujura, gukina urusimbi, ubucuruzi bw’akajagari ndetse n’abandi bashobora guhinduka ikibazo kuri bo ubwabo no ku gihugu muri rusange.

#23139#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/miliyoni-zisaga-500-zigiye-gushorwa-mu-kwigisha-abaganga-bakora-plastic-surgery
Miliyoni zisaga 500 zigiye gushorwa mu kwigisha abaganga bakora “Plastic Surgery” Ibitaro bya gisirikare bya Kanombe bigiye kwigisha abaganga babaga bakanasubiza umubiri aho wavuye (Plastic surgeons) hagamijwe kuziba icyuho cy’ubuke bwabo kuko mu Rwanda hari babiri gusa.
Abaganga babaga ufite ikibazo ku kuguru Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa 10 Mutarama 2018, ubwo icyo gikorwa cyatangizwaga muri ibyo bitaro byemerewe kuzajya bitanga ayo mahugurwa ku bufatanye n’Ishuri ryigisha ibyo kubaga muri Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, iyo hagati n’iy’Amajyepfo (COSECSA).
Biteganyijwe ko uwo mushinga uzatwara miliyoni zisaga 500Frw, ukazamara imyaka itatu higishijwe abaganga batatu b’Abanyarwanda, ukaba waratewe inkunga n’umuryango ‘Operation Smile’.
Col Dr Charles Furaha, umwe muri abo baganga babiri bari mu Rwanda uzanatanga ayo masomo, avuga ko ibyo bizatuma urutonde rurerure rw’abakeneye ubwo buvuzi rugabanuka.
Col Dr Charles Furaha Yagize ati “Abarwayi bose bo mu gihugu bakeneye ubu buvuzi baza mu bitaro bya Kanombe cyangwa muri CHUK gusa.
Ibyo bituma iyo dukoze urutonde rw’uko bagiye baza usanga hari abamaze imyaka itatu cyangwa ine bategereje bataragerwaho”.
“Akenshi biterwa n’uko nk’umuntu uje wenda yarigeze gushya ku buryo inkovu imubuza kurambura akaboko cyangwa intoki, ibyo bitihutirwa kuko bitamwica.
Ntabwo uwo ari we waherwaho mu gihe hari undi ufite kanseri ukeneye kubagwa, bigatuma rero bategereza igihe kirekire”.
Yongeraho ko abo bazaba barimo kwiga bazajya banavura kuko n’ubusanzwe ari abaganga babaga, bityo bikazatuma urwo rutonde rugabanuka, kuko nk’ubu ngo ruriho abasaga 400.
Dr Furaha kandi asobanura bimwe mu bikorwa muri ubwo buryo bwo kubaga butitabwagaho kera, ari na cyo gituma ababukora ari bake.
Icyumba gikorerwamo ubwo buvuzi Ati “Ni ukubaga hagamijwe gusana ibyangiritse ku mubiri aho ari ho hose.
Urugero nk’umuntu warwaye kanseri ku zuru, mu kumuvura dukata igice kirwaye cyangwa izuru ryose, bimutera ipfunwe rero, ari ho tumukorera ikimeze nk’izuru twifashishije umubiri we tukarimuteraho”.
Yavuze kandi ko bakora n’ibyo bita ‘Cosmetic surgery’, ngo ni mu gihe umuntu yifuza ko hari icyahinduka ku miterere ye ku gice cy’umubiri runaka, ngo kibe cyaba cyiza kurushaho, gusa ngo mu Rwanda ntibiritabirwa cyane.
Kwigisha abaganga bashya kandi ubwo buvuzi ngo ni ingenzi kuko bizaninjiriza u Rwanda amafaranga kubera ko hari abazajya baza gushaka iyo serivisi.
Ati “Abantu bakeneye izi serivisi barahari cyane kuko hari benshi bajyaga bajya kuzishakira hanze ndetse n’abo mu bihugu duturanye bazaza tubahe izo serivisi bityo u Rwanda rwinjize amadovise.
Bivuze ko nitumara kuba benshi bizongera n’abatugana”.
Uretse abo baganga bazigishwa mu rwego rwa COSECSA, ngo n’abo muri za kaminuza bazajya bigishwa ubwo buvuzi, ku buryo bazajya bafata nibura babiri buri mwaka.

Abapolisi b'u Rwanda bari kwigishwa guhangana n'imyigaragambyo n'iterabwoba Kuri wa kabiri itariki ya 9 Gashyantare, Polisi y'u Rwanda yatangije imyitozo yo kurwanya iterabwoba no guhosha imyigaragambyo ihuriwemo n'abapolisi bose hamwe 336.
Umwitozo wo kurwanya iterabwoba uri kubera mu kigo cyigisha ibijyanye no kurwanya iterabwoba cya Mayange mu karere ka Bugesera naho uwo gukumira no guhosha imyigaragambyo wo urabera mu ishuri rya Polisi y'u Rwanda rya Gishali mu karere ka Rwamagana.
Iyi myitozo igamije gutuma abapolisi bahora biteguye, bafite ubumenyi buri gihe ndetse banafite ingufu igihe cyose zituma bakora neza akazi kabo.
Abapolisi 266 nibo bari mu mwitozo wo guhosha imyigaragambyo mu gihe abandi 60 bo bakora ujyanye no kurwanya iterabwoba .
Ubwo yatangizaga umutozo wo kurwanya iterabwoba mu kigo cya Mayange, Minisitiri w'ubutabera Johnston Busingye yavuze ko gukomeza kongera ubumenyi ku bapolisi no kugira ibikoresho bigezweho ari ngombwa cyane kuko ari igisubizo cy'ibintu bibangamiye umutekano.
Minisitiri Busingye yagize ati:" iyi myitozo ijyanye no kubungabunga umutekano kuko isaba ko umupolisi ahora ari maso kandi yiteguye gushaka umuti w'ikintu cyose cyahungabanya umutekano, byaba ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka cyangwa se ibindi byaha bikorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kubirwanya no kubikumira bikaba aribyo bituma abaturarwanda bahora batekanye mu byo bakora byose kubera umutekano usesuye bafite".
Yakomeje yizeza ko Leta y'u Rwanda izakomeza gufasha Polisi y'u Rwanda muri ibi bikorwa byose bituma ikomeza gukora kinyamwuga hagamijwe kuburizamo, kurwanya no gukumira ibyaha.
DIGP Munyuza, Ubwo yagezaga ijambo rye ku bitabiriye umwitozo mu Ishuri rya Polisi y'u Rwanda rya Gishari, yavuze ko guhosha imyigaragambyo biri mu nshingano za Polisi y'u Rwanda ariko yongeraho ko bigomba gukorwa hakurikijwe amategeko Yagize ati:" bigomba gukorwa neza, nta guhutaza abaturage mbese bigakorwa hakurikijwe amategeko ahana ibyaha cyangwa ibindi bibangamiye umutekano".
Umwitozo ku guhosha imyigaragambyo, uba ugamije kumenya uko wakwitwara n'icyo wakora imbere y'agatsiko k'abantu cyangwa itsinda ry'abakora imyigaragambyo, ndetse n'uko amategeko yubahirizwa mu kuyihosha ku buryo bwihuse umuti w'ibyo bibazo, no kugarura ituze ndetse abapolisi bakamenya no gukoresha neza ibikoresho bihosha iyo myigaragambyo.
Mu bitabiriye ibikorwa byo gutangiza iyo myitozo yombi; hari Umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi y'u Rwanda ushinzwe ibikorwa bya Polisi DIGP Dan Munyuza, Umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi y'u Rwanda ushinzwe ubuyobozi n'abakozi DIGP Juvenal Marizamunda, abapolisi bakuru bayobora amashami atandukanye muri Polisi y'u Rwanda, abayobora Polisi y'u Rwanda mu Ntara n'Umujyi wa Kigali n'abandi.

#23233#	10	relationships	http://www.ukwezi.rw/urukundo/article/Dore-ibintu-8-umugore-adashobora-kukubwira-niyo-yaba-agukunda-kajana
Dore ibintu 8 umugore adashobora kukubwira niyo yaba agukunda kajana Ni kenshi bivugwa ko abagabo cyangwa se ab’igitsina gabo aribo bantu badakunze kuvuga ibiberekeyeho, gusa burya n’abagore bagira ibanga rikomeye kuri bimwe mu bibaranga ndetse n’ibyiyumviro byabo cyane cyane bagakunda kubigira ibanga batamenera uwo ari we wese.
1.
Iyo umugore asambanye agatwara inda itari iy’umugabo we abibika muri we akazinda apfa atabivuze.
Gusa ibi kutabivuga n’ ubusanzwe biruta kubivuga.
2.
Abagore bareba filime z’urukozasoni ariko ntabwo bashobora kubyemera ko babikora.
3.
Bakunda ko umusore cyangwa umugabo akokora mu misatsi yabo.
4.
Ntabwo abagore bakunda kumva umusore cyangwa umugabo uvuga ko abagore ari abakuzi b’ibyinyo.
5.
Bashimishwa n’umusore cyangwa umugabo ufata iminota mike ari mu kazi na mbere yo kuryama akabaha ubutumwa bwaba ubw’ ijwi cyangwa ubwanditse.
6.
Umugore akurikiranira hafi, uko umugabo we yitwara ku bandi bagore, ibiganiro agirana nabo akabibika muri we.
7.
Abenshi mu bagore ntabwo bajya bavuga ko batanyuzwe mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.
8.
Bakunda guhoberwa no guhabwa indabo.

#23248#	5	politics	http://www.kigalitoday.com/kwibuka/article/gikomero-abaturage-bafite-icyizere-cy-uko-ahazaza-h-u-rwanda-ari-heza
Gikomero: Abaturage bafite icyizere cy'uko ahazaza h'u Rwanda ari heza Abaturage bo mu murenge wa Gikomero akarere ka Gasabo batangaza ko bafite icyizere cy'uko u Rwanda ruzagira igihe rukabaho nta makimbirane, bitewe n'uko abarokotse n'abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bongeye kujya basabana.
Umurenge wa Bumbogo kime n'utundi duce twose tw'igihugu ni hamwe mu hagaragaye ubwicanyi mu gihe cya Jenoside, aho abaturanyi bishe bagenzi babo babaziza ubwoko.
Gusa hari n'abagize ubutwari bwo guhisha Abatutsi bahigwaga, ubu bafatwa nk'intwari.
Iyamuremye wabuze abo mu muryango we bagera kuri 23, yemeza ko yamaze kubabarira abamwiciye no ubu bakaba babanye neza.
Nyuma y'uko gahunda y'ubumwe n'ubwiyunge ishyiriwemo ingufu ariko bamwe ntibizere ko bishoboka bitewe n'abahano yagwiririye igihugu, abatuye uyu murenge siko bo babibona kuko bemeza ko kuri ubu basigaye banashyingirana.
Elias Iyamuremye, umwe mu barokotse utuye mu kagali ka Munini, atangaza kugeza ubu yababariye abamwiciye kuko ubu banasabana, banakatumirana mu minsi mikuru nk'uko byahozeho mbere ya Jenoside.
Agira ati "Nakwereka abantu banyiciye turamukanya tuganira, tugasangira ku icupa tugasangira ako gatabi rwose nta kibazo mfite.
Ntago nabona umwana wanjye wikundaniye n'umuhungu ngo muzize inzika ya ba se nzi ibyo ba se bakoze.
Ubwo nanjye ntacyo naba nkora naba nshaka Jenoside ntago naba nubaka igihugu.
Abaturage batuye umurenge wa Bumbogo bari bahuye ari benshi baje kwifatanya mu kwibuka abazize Jenoside yakorewe ABatutsi mu 1994.
Iyarumemye watakaje abo mu muryango we bagera kuri 23 akaba ari nawe mugabo wenyine warokotse mu muryango w'iwabo, avuga ko igihe kigeze cy'uko Abanyarwanda basigira abana babo igihugu kitarangwamo urwicyekwe.
N'ubwo ubwiyunge bugenda bufata indi ntera muri uyu murenge wa Bumbogo wahoze ari komini Bumbogo mbere ya Jenoside, nti byari byoroshye kuko byasabye ko abiciwe bafata iya mbere bakegera ababiciye kuko babatinyaga.
Constance Mukankubito ukomoka mu kagaki ka Gicaca wanarokowe n'Umuhutu mu gihe cya Jenoside ubwo umugabo we bari bamaranye amezi arindwi basezeranye yari amaze kwicwa, yemeza ko mu mrenge wabo hari ubwiyunge n'ubwo hari abatarabyemera.
Ati "Twebwe babanjye kujya badutinya kubera y'uko iyo umuntu yakoze icyaha iyo akubonye bimutera isoni kongera kuvugana nawe.
Ariko twebwe twaciye bugufi turabegea ahubwo ari twebwe turabaganiriza, noneho bagenda bashirika ubwoba bakatwegera bakadusaba nk'uko twasabanaga, bakadusaba amazi nk'uko twabikoraga.
Ubu urabona ko abantu bari kugenda biyubaka basubirana, baganira nk'uko baganiraga, basabana imibyizi."
Ibi kandi byemezwa n'uhagarariye umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'uyu murenge, uvuga ko bigaragarira mu buryo batahiriza umugozi umwe mu gufasha abacitse ku icumu batifashije, bikiyongeraho no guhana umuganda bigenda byiyongera.
Uyu murenge kwandi wanaguyemo abandi Batutsi bagera kuri 500 bari bahahungiye baturutse mu muri za Kanombe na za Kicukiro, bahungiye ku rusengero babigiriwemo inama na Burugumesitiri waruriho ariko ari amaco yo kubicira hamwe.
Emmanuel N.

#23251#	9	culture	https://www.igihe.com/umuco/ibitabo/article/mfuranzima-yanditse-igitabo-speech-demanding-future-kigaruka-ku-byifuza
Mfuranzima yanditse igitabo ‘Speech demanding Future’, kigaruka ku byifuzo urubyiruko rwa Afurika rufite Umwanditsi Mfuranzima Fred yanditse igitabo ‘Speech demanding Future’ kijya mu ntekerezo z’urubyiruko rwo muri Afurika n’ibyo rwifuza ngo ejo harwo habe heza.
Iki gitabo kiri mu buryo bw’ibarankuru, kikaba kivanze n’imivugo bikangura ibitekerezo by’urubyiruko, bikanatanga umukoro ku bashinzwe kureberera urubyiruko muri Afurika.
Mfuranzima yabwiye IGIHE ko ajya kwandika iki gitabo, nk’urubyiruko yihereyeho akareba ibyo urubyiruko rwifuza ngo ejo harwo habe heza akabihuza nuko abona urubyiruko rufatwa hirya no hino.
Yavuze ko kubera politiki ziriho muri Afurika, hari aho urubyiruko rugera rukiterera icyizere ari nayo ntandaro y’abafata inzira bakajya gushakishiriza ubuzima mu mahanga, bamwe bakanahura n’ingorane muri iyo nzira.
Ati “Iyo urebye Afurika, nabigereranya nuko abantu ba kera basa nk’abaharaniye kwigenga ariko ubu urubyiruko turi gusa nk’abaharanira kwigendera, tukava aha kubera ibibazo bareba bakabona gukemuka biravunanye.”
“Igitabo kigamije kwerekana ibyo urubyiruko rwifuza kugira ngo igihugu cyangwa umugabane wacu ubimenye kuko nitwe Rwanda cyangwa Afurika y’ejo.”
Mfuranzima yizeye ko igitabo cye kizakebura urubyiruko ndetse n'abarufite mu nshingano ku Mugabane wa Afurika Mfuranzima yavuze ko igikenewe ari uko abayobozi bo muri Afurika bashyira urubyiruko muri gahunda zabo ku buryo narwo rugira uruhare mu birukorerwa.
Yavuze ko ibyo bizarurinda kwiyumvamo ko ibikorwa atari ibyabo ari nacyo gituma akenshi bashaka kwigendera.
Yasabye kandi ko uburezi bwo muri Afurika buvugururwa ku buryo urubyiruko rwigishwa ibigezweho, bizarufasha kwiteza imbere no guhangana n’abandi ku isoko mpuzamahanga.
Mfuranzima yavuze ko igitabo ‘Speech demanding Future’ gishyirwa mu nzu zicuruza ibitabo vuba hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Igitabo ‘Speech demanding Future’ cyanditse mu buryo bw'ibarankuru ariko havanzemo n'imivugo

#23264#	4	health	http://www.igihe.com/ubuzima/article/sobanukirwa-byimbitse-n-indwara-yo-kujojoba-yibasira-abagore
Sobanukirwa byimbitse n’indwara yo kujojoba yibasira abagore Indwata yo Kujojoba (Fistula/Fistule) ni imwe mu zikunze kwibasira abantu b’igitsina gore batari bacye, ikabagiraho ingaruka zitandukanye zirimo kunenwa mu muryango cyangwa nabo ubwabo bakiheza bitewe n’ingaruka zayo.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) rigaragaza ko buri mwaka nibura abantu b’igitsina gore bari hagati y’ibihumbi 50-100 barwara kujojoba, by’umwihariko muri Afurika yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara no muri Aziya, abakobwa bagera kuri miliyoni ebyiri bayirwaye bativuza.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Umuganga w’inzobere mu kuvura indwara z’abakobwa n’abagore n’izituruka ku ngorane bagira babyara wo ku bitaro La Croix du Sud (kwa Nyirinkwaya), Dr Ndacyayisenga Victorien, yavuze ko indwara yo kujojoba ikunda kwibasira abagore n’abakobwa.
Ati “Yitwa Fistule.
Kujojoba iyo imyanya y’ibanga y’umugore ibiri itandukanye ibashije guhura mu buryo budasanzwe.
Umuyoboro uvana inkari mu mpyiko ugahura n’inda ibyara (fistule uretero-vaginale).”
Dr Ndacyayisenga yasobanuye ko hari no kujojoba guterwa n’uko usanga umuyoboro uvana inkari mu mpyiko uhuye n’imyanya myibarukiro [fistule urétral vaginal].
Ngo akenshi bibaho mu gihe cyo kubyara aho umubyeyi ajya ku nda akayitindaho iyo atakurikiranwe neza.
Ati “Umutwe w’umwana ukamanuka wagera mu matako ntubashe gutambuka.
Iyo umaze igihe kirekire, umutwe wafashwe utuma bya bice bihuza imyanya icamo umusarane n’inkari bigera aho amaraso atongera gutemberamo, ka gace kafashwe n’umutwe kagera aho gatakaza ubuzima, kakazamo umwobo uhuza imyanya myibarukiro n’icamo inkari cyangwa icamo umusarane.”
Hari izindi zishobora kubaho mu gihe umuntu yabazwe nabi, bagakomeretsa imyanya ntibabashe kwifunga uko bikwiye.
Ati “Ugasanga umusarane cyangwa inkari biranyura mu gitsina, cyangwa ukabona umugore arajya mu mihango, igaca mu ruhago akayihagarika nk’inkari bitagakwiye kumera gutyo.”
Ibituma abagore n’abakobwa barwara fistula harimo gutinda ku nda ntibabone ubufasha vuba burimo ubwo kubagwa iyo myanya itarangirika, kutabyarira kwa muganga, kutisuzumisha uko bikwiye igihe batwite, kubura umuganga uzobereye mu gufasha uwagize icyo kibazo.
Ikimenyetso gihita cyigaragaza ku mugore cyangwa umukobwa urwaye kujojoba harimo kujojoba inkari cyangwa umusarane biba atabimenye mbere ngo ajye mu bwiherero, bikanamunukaho.
Dr Ndacyayisenga yasobanuye ko imyaka umuntu yaba afite yose ashobora kurwara Fistule ariko ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ikunda kwibasira abari mu kigero cy’imyaka 14-49.
Fustule ni indwara ivurwa igakira nubwo ishobora kugira izindi ngaruka iyo yagaragaye.
Ati “Nk’aha ku bitaro byacu iyo umurwayi yatinze ku bise ariko muganga akabasha kumubyaza, kubera igihe kirekire umutwe wamaze wafashwe, icya mbere dushobora kumushiramo agapira gasohora inkari kugira ngo uruhago rwe rureke kujya rukoresha imbaraga nyinshi.”
Uwo bashyizemo ako gapira, akamarana nibura ibyumweru bine cyangwa bitandatu uruhago rukabanza kumenyera.
Ubundi buryo bwifashishwa mu kuyivura ni ukubagwa, aho umuganga yongera gutandukanye ibice biba byahuye hagati y’inda ibyara, inzira y’inkari cyangwa iy’umusarani.
Mu ngaruka bishobora kugira ku muntu wabazwe harimo kuba atasubirana ubushobozi bwo kubika inkari cyangwa umusarani igihe kirekire nk’uko byari bisanzwe.
Dr Ndacyayisenga avuga ko umuntu uvuwe iyi ndwara ku nshuro ya mbere kandi akavurwa n’umuganga w’inzobere aba afite amahirwe yo kuyikira ku kigero kiri hejuru ya 90%.
Uko umuntu agenda abagwa inshuro nyinshi niko amahirwe agenda agabanuka, iyo bibaye ku nshuro ya kabiri bigera ku kigero cya 60%.
Ati “Umuntu ugize Fistule ashobora kubagwa hagati y’amezi abiri n’atatu akimara kuyigira agakira neza cyane ariko noneho iyo yamaze kumugiraho izindi ngaruka, wa mubiri kubera inkari ziba zagiye ziwutwika ugatakaza umwimerere wawo, ukamera nk’ukomeye, amahirwe yo gukira agenda agabanuka.”
Kuvurwa kw’iyi ndwara igakira na none bijyana n’ingano yayo n’aho yafashe.
Iyo ari nini cyangwa yegereye cyane inkondo y’umura bigorana gukira.
Dr Ndacyayisenga asobanura ko mu Rwanda nta barwayi ba Fistule bakunze kuhagaragara nko mu myaka yashize, aho nko mu 2007 wasangaga abarwayi bayo bashobora kugera ku 2000 ku mwaka.
Mu ngaruka umuntu wayirwaye igihe kirekire agira, harimo kuba amaguru yagira ikibazo cyo kudakora neza kubera imbaraga akoresha ashaka gufunga umwanda igihe uje umutunguye, kunenwa n’abagabo babo n’abandi babana, ubugumba nk’igihe inkari zisohokana mu nda ibyara, kwangirika k’umubiri no mu mitekerereze, kubyara umwana wapfuye n’ibindi.
Abagore n’abakobwa bagirwa inama yo kwisuzumisha inshuro ziteganyijwe igihe batwite, kubyarira kwa muganga kandi ku gihe mu rwego rwo kwirinda.
Umwaka ushize Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko abagore basaga 3600 bavuwe Fistule guhera mu Rwanda mu 2005.

#23268#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/abanyamuryango-ba-vision-sacco-gahanga-biyujurije-inyubako-ya-miliyoni-118-frw
Abanyamuryango ba Vision Sacco Gahanga biyujurije inyubako ya miliyoni 118 Frw (Amafoto) Abanyamuryango ba Vision Sacco Gahanga yo mu Murenge wa Gahanga mu Karere ka Kicukiro, biyujurije inyubako nshya y’igorofa bitezeho ko izabafasha mu gutanga serivisi nziza no ku mutekano w’amafaranga babitsamo.
Iyi nyubako yatashwe ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 2 Kanama 2019, mu muhango witabiriwe n’abayobozi mu Karere ka Kicukiro, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Amakoperative, RCA, abanyamuryango, abakozi n’abayobozi ba Koperative Vision Sacco Gahanga.
Imirimo yo kubaka iyi nyubako yatwaye asaga miliyoni 118 Frw ashobora kuziyongera bitewe n’imirimo mike igikenewe kuyikorwaho.
Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi ya Vision Sacco Gahanga, Bahati Innocent, yavuze ko igitekerezo cyo kubaka iyi nzu cyaje mu 2014, biturutse ku kuba abanyamuryango barabonaga ko aho ikorera hadahesha agaciro amafaranga yabo.
Yakomeje ati “Twari dusanzwe dutanga serivisi nziza ariko twagaburiraga ibiryo ku isahani mbi kandi buriya umuntu ukugaburiye ku isahani itogeje ntabwo bikuryohera ndetse ejo ntiwazagaruka.
Natwe rero tugiye kujya tugaburira abantu ku isahani nziza kandi ni igikorwa kizongera abanyamuryango ba Sacco ya Gahanga n’iterambere ryayo muri rusange.”
Bahati yavuze ko babanje gukorera mu nyubako batijwe n’Umurenge wa Gahanga, nyuma bimukira mu yo batijwe n’Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki mu Rwanda gusa n’igihe bari barahawe cyararenze.
Abanyamuryango b’iyi koperative bavuze ko umuhigo bari barihaye bawugezeho kandi biteze ko serivisi bahabwa zizarushaho kuba nziza.
Nsabimana Justin utuye mu Kagari ka Karembure, amaze imyaka itanu ari umunyamuryango wa Vision Sacco Gahanga.
Yagize ati “Aho bakoreraga hari hato, hafunganye ku buryo wabonaga ko no gushyiramo abakozi byari bigoye.
Aha ngaha rero harisanzuye, n’abahakorera bazajya bakora neza birumvikana.”
Umucungamutungo wa Vision Sacco Gahanga, Umurerwa Triphose, yavuze ko n’ubwo batangaga serivisi, ubu bagiye kurushaho kunoza ibyo bakora kuko aho bazaba bakorera ari heza kandi hisanzuye.
Vision Sacco Gahanga yatangiye mu 2009, ifite abanyamuryango 2000 ariko kuri ubu ifite abasaga 5000.
Abanyamuryango babikijemo asaga miliyoni 500 Frw.
Ubuyobozi bwashishikarije abaturage kugana iyi koperative ngo ibahe inguzanyo kuko amafaranga ahari.
Umukozi wa RCA ushinzwe Iterambere ry’Amakoperative, Kazenga Diogène, yavuze ko iyi Sacco ifite amafaranga menshi, anasaba abanyamuryango kujya bayigana ikabaha inguzanyo cyane ko ari n’imwe mu ntego z’Umurenge Sacco.
Umuyobozi mu Karere ka Kicukiro ushinzwe Iterambere ry’Ubucuruzi n’Umurimo, Murenzi Donatien, yashimye abanyamuryango ba Vision Sacco Gahanga bagize igitekerezo cyo kwiyubakira ahantu heza ho gukorera abasaba gukomeza gusigasira ibyagezweho.
Koperative Umurenge Sacco zashinzwe mu 2009 nyuma y’uko leta ibonye ko serivisi z’imari zitagera ku baturage neza nk’uko bikwiye.
Kuri ubu zikorera mu mirenge yose uko ari 416 yo hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Abayobozi bafungura inyubako nshya ku mugaragaro Abayobozi batemberejwe muri iyi nyubako Abanyamuryango bitabiriye ibirori byo gutaha inyubako nshya yabo Bamwe mu bitabiriye ibirori Perezida w'Inama Njyanama y'Umurenge wa Gahanga, Bikorimana Jean de Dieu yashimye abanyamuryango ba Vision Sacco Gahanga biyubakiye inzu nshya yo gukoreramo Umukozi wa RCA ushinzwe iterambere ry’Amakoperative, Kazenga Diogène ashyikirizwa ishimwe ryagenewe RCA Umukozi w'Akarere ka Kicukiro ushinzwe iterambere ry'Ubucuruzi n'Umurimo, Murenzi Donatien yashimye ubuyobozi bwa Vision Sacco Gahanga Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi ya Vision Sacco Gahanga, Bahati Innocent, yavuze ko bari bamaze igihe kinini bakorera mu nyubako zitari izabo Intebe zizajya zicaramo abagana iyi sacco zegeranye n'icyumba kizajya gikoreramo umucungamutungo Umwe mu banyamuryango barambye muri Sacco Gahanga, Nsabimana Justin, yavuze ko kuba igiye gukorera mu nyubako nshya
biteze umusaruro na serivisi nziza Abakozi ba Vision Sacco Gahanga bagenewe ishimwe kubw'umurava bakomeje kugaragaza Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'Ihuriro ry'Imitwe ya Politiki, Burasanzwe Oswald ashyikirizwa ishimwe ryagenewe abafatanyabikorwa ba Vision Sacco Gahanga Umucungamutungo wa Vision Sacco Gahanga, Umurerwa Triphose aganira n'umwe mu bitabiriye ibirori byo gutaha inyubako nshya Bafashe ifoto y'urwibutso nyuma yo gufungura inyubako nshya ya Vision Sacco Gahanga

#23308#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/Huye-Barishimira-ibyo-bagejejweho-na-Girinka
Huye: Barishimira ibyo bagejejweho na Girinka Abaturage bo mu Karere ka Huye bahawe inka muri gahunda ya Girinka bakabasha kuzifata neza, hanyuma na zo zikabakura mu bukene, bishimira cyane aho bamaze kugera babikesha izo nka.
Marcel Macumi wo mu mudugudu wa Rugarama mu murenge wa Rusatira hashize imyaka igera kuri ine ahawe inka.
Avuga ko hari ibintu bitatu yishimira yagezeho abikesha inka yahawe.
Agira ati "inka nahawe yampaye ifumbire, ubu ndahinga nkeza.
N'ikimenyimienyi urutoki rwanjye rumeze neza".
Akomeza avuga ko amata iyo nka imuha ayaha abana be none ubu bakaba bameze neza.
Ati "Gihamya ni abajyanama b'ubuzima bo muri uyu mudugudu babakurikirana".
Inka nahawe yamfashije no gutunga amafaranga kubera umukamo impa.
Urumva ko nywa nkanasigariza leteri (laiterie).
Ayo mafaranga yagiye akura mu mata na yo ngo yamubashishije kwiyubakira inzu mu mudugudu.
Agira ati "ubundi ntarabona inka sinari kubasha kwiyubakira inzu, ariko narabishoboye".
Mukamudenge hamwe na mugenzi we yari amaze koroza.
Iki cyemezo afite mu ntoki ni icy'uko yituye mugenzi we nyuma yo guhabwa inka muri gahunda ya Girinka.
Janviere Mukamudenge wo Murenge wa Rusatira, na we avuga ko mbere yo guhabwa inka yari umukene cyane, ariko ko nyuma y'imyaka irenga ine ayihawe yabashije gutera imbere.
Agira ati "mbere narahingaga sineze.
Inka nahawe yampaye ifumbire ku buryo nsigaye neza: kuri are eshanu nashoboraga kuheza ibiro bibiri by'ibishyimbo, ariko ubu kubera ifumbire mpeza imifuka irenga ibiri".
Akomeza agira ati " Ubu nanahinze urutoki ku buryo nsigaye ndi umwe mu bahinzi b'intangarugero abandi baza kureberaho.
Ibyo byose mbikesha ifumbire nkomora kuri ya nka nahawe ubu ikaba imaze kumbyarira izindi ebyiri".
Ubwo Mukamudenge yavugaga atya, yari amaze kwitura umuturanyi we inka ihaka (amezi atatu).
Kwikura iyi nka ngo ntibyamugoye kuko yumvaga agomba kwitura abandi "ineza yagiriwe na Perezida wa Repubulika" anashima cyane.
N'ubwo Mukamudenge asigaye ari uwo abandi baza kureberaho, ngo mbere y'uko abona iyi nka yari umukene cyane, ku buryo ngo yanitinyaga akanatinya kugera aho abandi bari.
Agira ati "nari umuntu w'umukene cyane.
No kubona igitenge cyo kwambara byarangoraga.
Nahoraga nigunze, ngatinya kugera aho abandi bari.
Ariko aho mboneye inka nabashije gutinyuka, ngera mu bandi, nkumva ko nanjye mfite ijambo kuko nta bukene buba bungaragaraho".
Marie Claire Joyeuse
