Intwaza zakingiriwe Covid-19 ku macumbi Abakecuru n’abasaza b’Intwaza barengeje imyaka 65 baba mu ngo z’Impinganzima mu turere twa Bugesera, Nyanza na Rusizi bakingiwe Covid-19, nk’uko byari birimo bikorwa mu gihugu hose.
Intwaza zakingiwe Covid-19 Abo bageze mu za bukuru, bakingiriwe mu macumbi yabo kuko bavuga ko badafite imbaraga zo kugera ku bigo nderabuzima aho icyo gikorwa cyari kirimo kubera muri rusange.
Bamwe mu bakuze bahawe urukingo bavuga ko batari bafite ikizere cyo kurubona kubera intege nke, ariko bashima ko inkingo zabasanze mu macumbi.
Abo mu Karere ka Rusizi bavuga ko bashima Perezida Kagame watumye bashobora kubona inkingo mu ba mbere “Turashima Perezida Kagame wadutekerejeho natwe tukaba tubonye urukingo, kubera intege nke ntitwari twizeye kurubona ariko abaganga bazituzaniye aha dutuye”.
Umwe mu bakingiwe avuga ko bishimiye kubona urukingo kuko bibaha ikizere cyo kutazandura icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Kuva tariki ya 5 Werurwe 2021 mu Rwanda batangiye ibikorwa byo gukingira abakora muri serivisi z’ubuzima, abafite indwara zidakira, abakuze n’abagira uruhare mu bikorwa byo gukumira icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Si ibikorwa byagarukiye ku bakora muri serivisi z’ubuzima gusa kuko abakora muri serivisi z’umutekano, abakora muri serivisi zibahuza n’abantu benshi nk’abarimu, abanyamakuru n’abandi bahawe urukingo.
Abo bakecuru n’abasaza b’Intwaza, bavuga ko bazakomeza kwirinda icyo cyorezo nubwo bahawe urukingo, kuko ngo babwiwe ko gukomeza kwirinda ari ngombwa.
Mu minsi ibiri ishize y’igikorwa cyo gukingira abaturage Covid-19 hirya no hino mu gihugu, hamaze gukingirwa abantu 158, 898.
Shakisha izindi nkuru MENYA UMWANDITSI Sylidio Sebuharara Umunyamakuru wa Kigali Today/KT Radio @ sebuharara Reba inkuru zose nanditse ( 760 )

#23955#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/ubucuruzi/article/kudatanga-inyemezabuguzi-bibuza-igihugu-kwihaza-mu-ngengo-y-imari
Kudatanga inyemezabuguzi bibuza igihugu kwihaza mu ngengo y'imari Kuba inyemezabuguzi zidahabwa abaguzi ni kimwe mu bituma imisoro ku nyongeragaciro (TVA) itinjira uko bikwiriye nk'uko byatangajwe n'umuyobozi w'Intara y'Uburengerazuba, Kabahizi Celestin, ubwo yagaragazaga uko imisoro yinjiye mu ntara yose mu mwaka ushize.
Abacuruzi bahura n'imbogamizi zo kudahabwa inyemezabuguzi igihe baranguriye ibicuruzwa byabo mu mujyi wa Kigali; bitangazwa na Kamuzinzi Godfrey ukuriye urugaga rw'abikorera mu Ntara y'Uburengerazuba.
Ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi wahariwe abasora ku rwego rw'intara y'Uburengerazuba, Guverineri Kabahizi yavuze ko inzego zose zigiye guhagurukira guhangana n'ibibangamira iyinjizwa ry'imisoro yose ikwiriye.
Ikigo cy'igihugu cy'imisoro n'amahoro (RRA) kivuga ko kudatanga inyemezabuguzi bigira ingaruka ziremereye kuko bituma igihugu kitagira ubwigenge nyakuri bwo kwihaza mu ngengo y'imari ya Leta.
Komiseri Ruyumbu wari uhagarariye RRA yatangaje ko mu mwaka w'ingengo y'imari ushize binjije mu isanduku ya Leta miliyari 588 na miliyoni 400, zirimo avuye mu musoro ku nyongeragaciro angana na miliyari 220 gusa, bihwanye na 25% by'amafaranga agomba kuva mu musoro ku nyongeragaciro.
Komiseri Ruyumbu arashishikariza abacuruzi gutanga inyemezabuguzi.
Ruyumbu yavuze ko baramutse babashije kwinjiza kugera kuri 75% by'imisoro ku nyongeragaciro babasha gutanga amafaranga agera kuri 90% mu ngengo y'imari, bityo ya mahanga atanga imfashanyo ntazongere kugaraguza u Rwanda agati.
Yavuze ko niyo babasha kwinjiza 50% bya TVA ubwayo byatuma igihugu cyibonera 74% by'ingengo y'imari y'umwaka wose.
Kudatanga inyemezabuguzi ntibigira ingaruka ku bacuruzi gusa ahubwo ingaruka zikomeye ziza ku gihugu kuko bikivutsa ubwigenge nyakuri bwo kwihaza mu ngengo y'imari.
Kurwanya ubu bujura bisaba ingufu za buri wese yaba RRA, inzego z'ibanze, inzego z'umutekano, inzego z'abikorera ku giti cyabo n'abaturage muri rusange.
Umusoro ku nyongeragaciro utangwa n'umuguzi kuko ku giciro cy'igicuruzwa umuguzi asabwa nayo aba arimo, abacuruzi kutayatanga bikaba ari ubujura nk'ubundi.
Emmanuel Nshimiyimana

Kigali: Umugabo n’umugore baguwe gitumo basambana induru ziravuga Kumanywa yo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 20 Ukwakira 2016, umugabo n’umugore bafashwe basambanira mu macumbi (lodge) mu mujyi wa Kigali, kuva ubwo barwana n’abo bashakanye babafashe, induru ziravuga kugeza ubwo Polisi yaje kuhagera igata muri yombi abasambanaga.
Aba basambanaga bombi basanzwe batuye ahitwa mu Nzove, ariko bafatiwe ahitwa muri Jama City Motel i Nyacyonga, kandi ababafashe ni abo bashakanye na buri umwe muri abo bombi.
Umugore wafashwe asambana yari yarabyawe muri batisimu n’umugore w’uwo mugabo basambanaga, kandi banaririmbanaga muri korali.
Ikindi kandi, umugabo wafashwe asambana we yari yarabyaye muri batisimu uwo yasambanyirije umugore.
Ahagana saa munani z’amanywa, umugabo yamenye ko umugore we agiye kumuca inyuma kandi n’uwo bagiye gusambana aramumenya kuko yari amaze igihe abakeka anabacungira hafi, niko kubwira umugore w’uwo mugabo yakekaga barajyana, maze bahita babagwa gitumo.
Ubwo babasangaga mu cyumba basambaniragamo, bahise barwana maze muri Jama City Motel akavuyo kaba kose bituma Polisi ihamagazwa ihita ibata muri yombi, abafashwe basambana ubu bakaba bafungiwe kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Jabana iherereye hafi y’uruganda rw’isukari rwa Kabuye.
Komanda wa Polisi ya Jabana wabataye muri yombi, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.com ko hagiye gukorwa iperereza abafashwe basambana bakanajyanwa kwa muganga kugirango ibimenyetso simusiga bizashyikirizwa ubutabera biboneke.
Aha bose bari bamaze kugezwa kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Jabana Ubwo ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.com cyageraga kuri Jama City Motel aho bafatiwe, umugore w’umugabo wafashwe asambana yari arimo gusuka amarira menshi asobanura uburyo umugabo we yamunaniye, n’uburyo yari yaramuteguje ko Imana izamugaragaza agaseba none bikaba bibaye.
Umugabo w’umugore wafashwe asambana, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.com ko ababajwe n’ukuntu ibi byabaye bamaze iminsi micye basezeranye, kuko tariki 19 Nzeri 2016 ari bwo basezeranye imbere y’Imana, gusa bari basanzwe babana banafitanye abana batanu barimo n’umukuru ufite imyaka 16 y’amavuko.
Amazina, amafoto agaragaza isura n’indi myirondoro y’abafashwe basambana, byabaye ngombwa ko tutabitangaza ku bw’uburenganzira n’impamvu z’ubuzima bwite bw’abo bashakanye.
Abakurikiranyweho iki cyaha baracyemera bagasaba imbabazi.

#23987#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/iyo-nkoze-imibonano-mpuzabitsina-mva-amaraso-byaba-bisanzwe-muganga
Iyo nkoze imibonano mpuzabitsina , mva amaraso…byaba bisanzwe?
Muganga yaramusubije Muri ya gahunda ya baza muganga twashyiriyeho abasomyi bakazajya babaza ibibabazo bashaka ko tubabariza muganga, tugeze ku kibazo cy’umugore wibaza niba kuva amaraso nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina bisanzwe cyangwa bigaragaza uburwayi , n’icyo ufite iki kibazo yakora.
Ikibazo yatwoherereje kiragira kiti " Muraho neza.
Ndagira ngo muzambarize muganga ikibazo mfite cyanteye kwibaza.
Maze imyaka 3 ngeze muri Menopause.
Hashize iminsi, iyo nkoze imibonano mpuzabitsina n’umugabo wanjye, mva amaraso kandi siko byahoze.
Ni uburwayi?
Nakora iki?
Murambarize muganga.
Murakoze."
Mu gushaka igisubizo cy’ikibazo cye, twegereye muganga Dr Iba Mayele uvura indwara z’abagore (gynécologue ) mu ivuriro Polyclnique de l’Etoile riherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali hafi ya Kiliziya ya Sainte Famille.
Mu gusubiza uwabajije ikibazo, Dr Iba yavuze ko kuva amaraso mu gihe cyo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ari ikintu kidasanzwe kabone n’ubwo umugore yaba yaracuze.
Ati " Ntabwo kuva amaraso mu gihe umugore akora imibonano mpuzabitsina ari ikintu gisanzwe nubwo yaba ari muri Menopause.
Icyo gihe gishobora kuba ari nka kanseri y’umura , ubundi burwayi cyangwa ikindi kibazo afite.
Icyo aba agomba gukora ni ukwihutira kujya kwa muganga bakamusuzuma, bakareba inkomoko yabyo."
Dr Iba yakomeje avuga ko ikibazo nk’icyo gishobora guturuka ku mpamvu nyinshi zinyuranye.
Muzo yadutangarije harimo ibibyimba bifata mu mura (fibromes), uburwayi bwa endométrite, kanseri y’inkondo y’umura, iy’umura, iy’igitsina (vagin) nabyo ngo bishobora kuba inkomoko yo kugira ngo umugore ave amaraso mu gihe akora imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Kugira ikibazo cy’inkondo y’umura, byo ngo bishobora gutuma umugore ava amaraso niyo yaba atakoze imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Dr Iba agira inama buri mugore wibonyeho ikibazo nk’iki kwihutira kujya kwivuza ku muganga uvura indwara z’abagore (gynécologue) akamusuzuma kuko ngo hari igihe ikibazo cyaba giterwa n’uburwayi bukomeye buba bugomba gufatiranwa gakiri kare.
Na we niba ufite ikibazo ushaka ko tuzakubariza muganga, wakohereza ikibazo cyawe kuri email: [email protected]

#24009#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Rwamagana-Agoronome-arashinjwa-gufunga-no-guca-amande-abaturage-ubuyobozi-butabizi
Rwamagana: Agoronome arashinjwa gufunga no guca amande abaturage ubuyobozi butabizi Bamwe mu baturage batuye umurenge wa Munyaga, mu karere ka Rwamagana baratakamba bavuga ko abayobozi barimo Agoronome w'umurenge wa Munyaga ndetse n'abayobozi ku rwego rw'akagari n'umudugudu babafata bakabafungira mu murenge babaziza guhinga imyaka yiganjemo amateke mu rutoki, bityo bakabona ari uguhohotera abaturage kuko mbere yo guhanwa batabanza kubigisha ahubwo ngo bazanwa no kubahana bagamije kwibonera amafaranga gusa.
Abaturage baganiriye na Makuruki.rw bavuga ko muri iyi minsi abayobozi batangiye kujya mu ngo z'abaturage bagamije kureba abahinzi niba hari imyaka bafite mu ntoki bityo ngo uwo basanze yarahinzemo bamuca amande y'ibihumbi 10, utayabonye akajyanwa ku murenge agafungirwa muri salle y'umurenge.
Aba baturage kandi bavuga ko batizeye niba ayo mande bacibwa agera kuri konti y'umurenge kuko bayaha uwo muyobozi (Agronome) witwa Nizeyimana Theogene kandi ngo akaba abasaba kuyamuha mu ntoki.
Umwe mu baturage utarashatse ko izina rye ritangazwa yagize ati "Abayobozi barimo agoronome baramfashe ndetse n'abandi batujyana mu murenge batubwira ko tugomba gutanga ibihumbi icumi tutayatanga bakadufungira mu murenge kugeza tuyatanze, urebye baje gusura ingo kubera ko ngo hari abayobozi b'akarere bazaza kudusura nyamara mu kagari kacu abayobozi ntibigeze batubuza guhinga mu rutoki."
Yakomeje avuga ko nta bukangurambaga bwigeze bukorwa nkuko izindi gahunda za Leta bazikangurirwa ngo babe bakanga kubikora kuburyo byitwa kunanirana.
Yagize ati "nta bwo abaturage twananiranye ahubwo twatunguwe no kubona abaturage bose bakwira imishwaro bahunga ubuyobozi abandi barwana no kurandura imyaka bahinze mu rutoki kugira ngo batabaca amande cyangwa bakajyanwa ku murenge , njye abandi barahunze ariko njye baramfashe ndayatanga gusa ntangazwa no kuyatanga mu ntoki z'abayobozi."
Undi muturage yagize ati "abayobozi barantunguye kuburyo badufashemo bakatwiriza ku murenge batuziza ko twahinze amateke n'ibishyimbo mu rutoki kandi batarigeze babitubuza mbere."
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'akagali ka Rweru kamwe mu tugali abaturage bavuga ko baciwe amande kubera guhinga mu rutoki, Uwiringiye Emmanuel yabwiye Makuruki.rw ko koko bari gusura ingo ariko nta mande baca abaturage.
Yagize ati" n'ubu turasura ingo mu midugugu ariko tugamije kwigisha abaturage nta bwo tugamije guca amande.
Twasanze bamwe barahinzemo koko bitewe n'imyumvire yabo mibi, kandi ntabwo tuzi impamvu batumva."
Nizeyimana Theogene, Agoronome atungwa agatoki n'abaturage yabwiye umunyamakuru wa Makuruki.rw ko nta cyo yavuga ku byo ashinjwa n'abaturage.
Nkerarugaba Janvier, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'agateganyo w'umurenge wa Munyaga nawe yabwiye Makuruki.rw ko igikorwa cyo guca amande abaturage nta cyo azi ndetse ko n'uwo abaturage baha ayo mafaranga atamuzi.
Yagize ati" ntabyo tuzi rwose ese ayo mande bayahaye nde?
Kontabure (Comptable) wacu amaze amezi abiri muri konji bityo nta bwo uburyo bayatanzemo buzwi, uretse ko nta muturage duca amande ndetse nta n‘umuturage ugomba guha umuyobozi amafaranga mu ntoki kuko hari konti y'umurenge."
Uyu muyobozi kandi yavuze ko n'ibyo by'abaturage bavuga ko bafungirwa mu biro by'umurenge kubera ko batatanze amande y'uko bahinze indi myaka mu rutoki ngo nabyo atabizi.
Aba baturage bavuga ko iyo bagejejwe mu murenge ngo barekurwa ari uko wabanje gusinyira ko ugomba kwishyura ayo mande, cyangwa waba uyafite aho ukayishyura kugira ngo wemererwe gufungurwa.
Justin NGABONZIZA MAKURUKI.RW

#24045#	6	religion	https://umubavu.com/iyobokamana/article/Abagabo-bafite-abagore-bashobora-gukomorerwa-bakajya-baba-Abapadiri
Abagabo bafite abagore bashobora ’gukomorerwa’ bakajya baba Abapadiri Mu myaka ibiri ishize, muri Kiliziya Gatorika havuzwemo umwuka utari mwiza ushingiye ku mpinduka zo koroshya ibintu Papa Francis yagiye akora zirimo nko kuba Kiliziya yumva abatinganyi ko atari abo guhabwa akato.
Kiliziya Gatorika kandi, yari isanzwe ifite abapadiri bake bafite abagore biganjemo abahoze ari abapasiteri b’Abangilikani bahinduye idini, ingingo ikomeje kuganirwaho ngo harebwe niba hari abandi bagabo bafite abagore bajya bemererwa kuba abapadiri.
Icyifuzo cy’abapadiri bafite abagore n’icyo kwemerera abapadiri basanzweho gushaka abagore cyatanzwe na Cardinal wa Brazil, Claudio Hummes, usanzwe ari inshuti ikomeye ya Papa Francis.
Inama ya Sinodi Gatorika ya 2019 yateraniye i Vatikani kuva tariki 06 kugeza ku ya 27 Ukwakira 2019, yafashe imyanzuro ishobora gutuma abagabo bafite abagore mu gace ka Amazonie ko muri Amerika y’Amajyepfo bagirwa Abapadiri.
Ibibazo by’ubukene bw’Abapadiri n’imiterere mibi yatumwe mu duce twa Amazonie bituma hari abakirisitu gatolika benshi batabona umupadiri wo kubasomera misa buri cyumweru.
Umwe mu myanzuro yafashwe n’iyi nama ya Sinodi gatolika ya 2019 uvuga ko abagabo “Bafite ingo zihamye kandi b’inyangamugayo bubashywe muri sosiyete kandi bitangira Kiliziya bashobora kugirwa Abapadiri nyuma yo guhabwa amasomo atangirwa mu iseminari kugira ngo babashe kuzuza inshingano z’Abapadiri.”
Uyu mwanzuro wa 111 watowe ku bwiganze bw’amajwi 113 ku majwi 43 y’abatarawushyigikiye, bivuze ko Papa Francis nashyira umukono ku nyandiko ikubiyemo imyanzuro yafatiwe muri iyi Sinodi abagabo bafite abagore mu gace ka Amazonie batangira kugirwa abapadiri.
Iyi nyandiko iragaragaza neza ko ibi bireba agace ka Amerika y’Amajyepfo ukuyemo ibihugu bya Argentine na Chile.
Inyandiko ikubiyemo imyanzuro yafatiwe muri iyi Sinodi igaragaza ko bifata amezi n’imyaka kugira ngo Abapadiri bagere mu duce tumwe bagiye gutanga amasakaramentu ya Ukarisitiya, Penetensiya cyangwa Ugusigwa kw’abarwayi.
Icyifuzo cy’uko abagabo bo muri Amazonie bafite abagore bagirwa Abapadiri cyatanzwe n’Abasenyeri bo muri Amerika y’Amajyepfo, kikaba kimaze igihe kinini gitambamirwa n’abatsimbaraye ku mahame ya Kiliziya.
Abakurikiranira hafi ibya Kiriziya Gatorika bavuga ko icyemezo cyo kwemerera abagabo bo muri Amazonie bafite abagore kuba Abapadiri ari intambwe ya Mbere, ishobora kuzana impinduka muri Kiliziya zagera no mu bindi bice by’isi zihereye mu gace ka Amazonie.
Sinodi Gatolika ni inama ikomeye ku rwego rwa Kiliziya Gatolika, ikaba ihuza Abepisikopi bava mu mpande zose z’isi ngo bungurane ibitekerezo ku hazaza ha Kiliziya Gatolika.
Iy’uyu mwaka yitabiriwe n’abarenga 200, baganira ku bibazo bitandukanye birimo iki cy’agace ka Amazonie muri Amerika y’Amajyepfo, ibibazo by’ihindagurika ry’ikirere, ibirebana n’abimukira ndetse n’ibirebana n’iyogezabutumwa.
Abagabo bafite abagore bashobora kuba bagiye kugirwa Abapadiri

Tour du Rwanda: Rwanda Foam yasobanuriye abanyabugesera uko batahura abigana matela zayo Uko umwaka uza undi ugataha Tour du Rwanda ikomeza kuba urugero rwiza rw’ibikorwa bya siporo bitegurwa neza mu gihugu no ku mugabane wa Afurika, ibigo bitandukanye byaba ibya Leta n’ibyikorera nka Rwanda Foam biyitera inkunga, bikanafasha abaturage kumenya ibikorwa byabyo.
Kuri uyu wa Kane iri siganwa rikurikirwa n’abasaga miliyoni eshatu buri mwaka, ryavhagurukiye i Musanze yerekeza i Bugesera banyuze i Kigali mu gace karyo ka kane, kegukanwe n’Umunya-Ertrea, Eyob ariko Umunyarwanda Areruya Joseph yambara umwenda w’umuhondo kuko ari we uyoboye urutonde rusange.
I Bugesera aho abasiganwa basoreje, hari imbaga y’abaturage baje gushyigikira Areruya, dore ko anakomoka muri iyi Ntara y’Uburasirazuba nubwo akinira ikipe y’ababigize umwuga ya Dimension Data muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Rwanda Foam nk’umuterankunga w’iri rushanwa kuva uyu mwaka wa 2017, yishimiye ko Abanyarwanda bitwaye neza kuri uyu munsi ndetse bakomeje kugaragaza icyizere ko bizeye ko bashobora no kuzaryegukana bwa mbere batangiye kuritera inkunga.

By’umwihariko, Karekezi yabwiye abaturage ko Rwanda Foam ihagarariwe ahantu hose mu gihugu, by’umwihariko mu Karere ka Bugesera “dufite umuntu uduhagarariye witwa Nicker ltd.
Aho niho mwasanga ibicuruzwa bya Rwanda Foam.”
Mu kurinda abaturage ko bazagura matela z’abamamyi, babashuka ko ari iza Rwanda Foam zizwiho gukomera, Karekezi yaburiye abaturage uko bamenya inzima.
Yagize ati “Tujya tugira ibibazo by’abamamyi bakunda kwigana matela zacu, mugomba kumenya ko iba yambaye umwenda urimo amabara ya Rwanda Foam urimo n’amazina ya Rwanda Foam, ikagira n’icyapa cy’umuhondo kiriho kashe ya RSB kuko matela za Rwanda Foam zemewe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuziranenge.”
Umuyobozi wa Rwanda Foam, Makuza Patrick, we yavuze ko nta na rimwe uru ruganda ruzigera rutenguha abakiliya barwo kuko rwakomeje guhaza ukwifuza kwabo kuva rwabaho kandi ruzahora rushyira inyungu zabo imbere.
Yagize ati: “Abanyarwanda bakomeze kutugirira icyizere natwe tuzakomeza kubagezaho matela zifite ubuziranenge, ziramba kandi zibungabunga ubuzima bwabo.
Turashimira abakiliya bacu tumaranye imyaka irenga 35 nta na rimwe tuzabatenguha tuzakomeza kubakorera matela nziza kuko turi uruganda rumaze kuba ubukombe.”
Uyu muyobozi yanashimangiye ko bazakomeza gutera inkunga ibikorwa bishimisha Abanyarwanda kandi bibafitiye akamaro nka Tour du Rwanda kuko ari bumwe mu buryo bwiza bwo kubashimira.
Rwanda Foam ni umwe mu baterankunga ba Tour du Rwanda Umuyobozi wa Rwanda Foam, Makuza Patrick, yasobanuriye abanyabugesera uko batahura abigana matela zayo zikomeye Abafana ba Tour du Rwanda baje ari benshi i Bugesera Areruya Joseph na Eyob Metkel basanzwe bakinana bagereye i Nyamata rimwe Areruya Joseph yasubiranye umwenda w'umuhondo yari yambuwe n'Umusuwisi, Pellaud Simon Igikundi cyaje gikurikiye Eyob Metkel na Areruya Joseph Indi nkuru wasoma: Tour du Rwanda: Eyob Metkel yegukanye agace ka Musanze-Nyamata, Areruya yisubiza umwenda w’umuhondo (Amafoto)

#24071#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article18923.html
Yakomeje avuga ko amafaranga azava imbere mu gihugu kongeraho inguzanyo zishyurwa yose hamwe azaba agize 85,8% by’ingengo y’imari y’u Rwanda.
Ikindi ngo ni uko u Rwanda rwavuguruye uburyo bwo gusoresha ibicuruzwa na serivisi hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kugira ngo bongere imisoro iva imbere mu gihugu.
Si mu Rwanda gusa kuko kuri uyu mugoroba ba minisitiri b’imari ba Kenya, Rwanda, Tanzania na Uganda batangaje imari ibihugu byabo bizakoresha mu mwaka w’imari utaha (2019-2020), aho muri ibi bihugu byose Kenya ariyo izakoresha amafaranga menshi mu bihugu byose byo muri EAC.
Ingengo z’imari z’ibi bihugu zizatangira mu kwezi gutaha kwa karindwi nizimara kwemerwa n’Inteko nshingamategeko z’ibi bihugu, ari nazo aba ba Minisitiri bagezagaho iyo mishinga y’imari.
Mu nteko, aba ba Minisitiri babanje kuvuga ko ubukungu bw’ibihugu bigize umuryango wA Afurika y’Iburasirazuba mu mwaka wa 2018 bwazamutse ku kigero cya 4%.
Ikigero bavuze ko ari gito ugereranyijwe n’icyari kitezwe kubera impamvu zinyuranye zirimo ingaruka zo guhangana mu bukungu kw’ibihangange ku isi, Amerika n’Ubushinwa.
Ingengo z’imari z’ibi bihugu zatangajwe mu buryo bukurikira; Kenya: Tiriyari 3.02 z’amashilingi ya Kenya (asanga miliyari 30 z’amadorari y’Amerika) Rwanda: Tiriyari 2,8 z’amanyarwanda (asaga miliyari 3.2 z’amadorari y’Amerika) Tanzania: Tiriyari 33,1 z’amashilingi ya Tanzania (asaga miliyari 14.3 z’Amadorari y’Amerika) Uganda: Tiriyari 40.4 z’amashilingi ya Uganda (asaga miliyari 10.9 z’amadorari y’Amerika) Kuwa gatanu, tariki 30 z’Ukwezi gushize, Minisitiri w’imari w’u Burundi nawe yabwiye Inteko ko ingengo y’imari y’iki gihugu izaba miliyari 1,500 z’amarundi (asaga miliyoni 824 z’amadorari y’Amerika).
Muri rusange, ba minisitiri b’ibi bihugu batangaje ko igice kinini k’ingengo y’imari y’ibihugu byabo kizava mu misoro igihugu gisoresha, inguzanyo z’amahanga zishyurwa, inguzanyo z’imbere mu gihugu n’inkunga z’amahanga zitishyurwa.
Minisitiri Philippo Mpango wa Tanzania yavuze ko hari ibicuruzwa biva hanze bongereye imisoro, ndetse n’igiciro cyo kwandikisha imodoka na moto cyazamuwe mu kongera imari Leta ivana imbere mu gihugu.
Henry Rotich umunyamabanga ushinzwe imari wa Kenya yavuze ko hari ingamba zirimo umusoro mushya wa 10% ku byinjijwe n’abakora n’abakina imikino y’amahirwe, n’umusoro wazamuwe ugera kuri 15% ku nzoga n’itabi.
Imari ibi bihugu bizakoresha umwaka utaha izashyirwa cyane cyane mu bikorwa by’iterambere birimo kuzamura umusaruro w’ubuhinzi, kubaka inzu ziciriritse, uburezi, gushora imari mu mishinga y’iterambere, guhanga imirimo mishya n’igisirikare.

Abakinnyi bazakina 'Tour du Rwanda 2016' barerekeza i Rusizi na Huye Yanditswe kuya 20-10-2016 saa 11:41' na Manzi Rema Jules Mu gihe hasigaye ibyumweru bitatu, Abanyarwanda bakongera kuryoherwa n'ibirori ngarukamwaka by'isiganwa y'amagare rizenguruka igihugu (Tour du Rwanda), abakinnyi bose bagize amakipe atatu azaserukira u Rwanda n'indi imwe y'abatoranyijwe, barerekeza i Rusizi kuri uyu wa Gatandatu mu myiteguro.
Karongi – Rusizi na Rusizi- Huye ni amarushanwa abiri yari ku ngengabihe ya Rwanda Cycling Cup 2016 ariko yamaze gukurwaho, ahubwo akazakinwa nk'imyiteguro ku makipe n'abakinnyi bazaserukira u Rwanda muri "Tour du Rwanda 2016" izakinwa hagati ya tariki 13 na 20 Ugushyingo 2016.
Umunyamabanga w'ishyirahamwe ry'umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare mu Rwanda, FERWACY, Emmanuel Murenzi, yabwiye IGIHE ko izi mpinduka zigamije gutegura amakipe azakina Tour du Rwanda no kureba urwego abakinnyi bagezeho nyuma y'ukwezi n'igice bari mu mwiherero.
Ati "Turashaka gutegura amakipe akomeye azakina Tour du Rwanda, niyo mpamvu aya marushanwa yombi atazabarirwa muri Rwanda Cycling Cup 2016 kuko atazakinwa n'amakipe yose asanzwe agaragaramo.
Tuzategura irindi rushanwa ryo gusoza Rwanda Cycling Cup ariko rizaba nyuma ya Tour du Rwanda."
Murenzi yakomeje avuga ko mu kwezi n'igice abakinnyi bamaranye bakorana imyitozo umunsi ku munsi, abandi bitabira amarushanwa mpuzamahanga atandukanye, ngo bitanga icyizere ko iri rushanwa rimaze imyaka ibiri ryegukanwa n'Abanyarwanda n'ubundi bishoboka ko n'uyu mwaka babisubiramo.
Abakinnyi batoranyijwe kuzakina aya marushanwa abiri mu mpera z'iki Cyumweru, bazahaguruka i Karongi berekeza i Rusizi ku ntera ya kilometero 115,6 ku wa Gatandatu na ho ku Cyumweru bahaguruke i Rusizi berekeza i Huye(140,7 km) banyuze mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe.
Izi nzira zose zizananyurwamo n'abazaba basiganwa muri Tour du Rwanda, ibintu bizaba bizakozwe bwa mbere, kuva yaba mpuzamahanga.
Aya marushanwa azitabirwa n'amakipe ane harimo atatu azakina Tour du Rwanda (Team Rwanda, Benediction Club na Les Amis Sportif) hamwe n'ikipe igizwe n'abakinnyi batandukanye bamaze iminsi bitwara neza mu marushanwa yabereye mu Rwanda.
Amakipe azasiganwa muri aya marushanwa yombi n'abayagize: Team Rwanda Byukusenge Nathan (Benediction) Ruhumuriza Abraham (CCA) Biziyaremye Joseph (Cine Elmay) Gasore Hategeka (Benediction) Nduwayo Eric(Benediction) Benediction Club Byukusenge Patrick (Benediction) Mugisha Samuel (Benediction) Ruberwa Jean (Benediction) Karegeya Jeremy (Cine Elmay) Nizeyiman Alex (Benediction) Les Amis Sportifs Uwizeye Jean Claude (Les Amis Sportifs) Areruya Joseph (Les Amis Sportifs) Twizerane Mathieu (CCA) Tuyishimire Ephrem (Les Amis Sportifs) Hakiruwizeye Samuel (CCA) Ikipe ya kane Nsengimana Bosco Hakizimana Seth Hakizimana Didier Mpitiwenimana Papy Ukiniwabo Rene Jean Paul Ikipe ya Benediction izakina Tour du Rwanda idafite Nathan Byukusenge washyizwe muri Team Rwanda Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#24254#	0	entertainment	http://www.ukwezi.rw/Imyidagaduro/article/Kayirebwa-na-Clarisse-Karasira-bagiye-guhurira-ku-rubyiniro-mu-gitaramo-Ikirenga-mu-Bahanzi-2020
Kayirebwa na Clarisse Karasira bagiye guhurira ku rubyiniro mu gitaramo ‘Ikirenga mu Bahanzi 2020’ Igitaramo ‘Ikirenga mu Bahanzi’ ni igitaramo gishingiye ku guteza imbere umuco biciye ku bahanzi, aho hazashimirwa umuhanzi wamamaje umuco nyarwanda mu Rwanda no mahanga, kizajya kiba buri mwaka kandi gihuze abahanzi b’injyana gakondo barimo abanyabigwi mu bihe byashize n’abo muri ibi bihe.
Igitaramo cy’uyu mwaka kizaba ku nshuro ya mbere muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village (KCEV) hahoze hitwa Camp Kigali tariki ya 8 Werurwe 2020, aho Cécile Kayirebwa ari we muhanzi watoranyijwe kubanziriza abandi bahanzi bakiriho ngo ashimirwe uruhare rwe ndetse ibi birori byashyizwe ku munsi w’abagore kugira ngo uyu munsi koko uzabe uwabo banishimira mugenzi wabo wabaye ‘Indongozi y’Umuco’.
Iki gitaramo cyateguwe na Bwiza Media ifatanyije na Agence Karibu asbl, Umushanana Media n’Abacukumbuzi b’Amateka n’Umuco.
Cécile Kayirebwa azataramana n’abazacyitabira, afatanyije n’abandi bahanzi barimo Muyango Yohani, Mariya Yohani, Mani Martin, Sentore Jules, Karasira Clarisse n’Itorero Ibihame by’Imana.
Mu kiganiro na Mecky Kayiranga, umuhuzabikorwa akaba n’umuvugizi w’iki gikorwa yavuze ko iki gitaramo kigamije guha ikuzo no gushimira abahanzi bagize cyangwa bakomeje kugira uruhare mu kubungabunga umuco nyarwanda no kuwamamaza mu gihugu no mu mahanga.
Ati : “Uyu ni umwanya wo gushimira aba habanzi.
Iyo bataboneka, abenshi ntituba tuzi ibyaranze intwari zacu, ntabwo tuba tuzi ibijyanye n’ubusizi twagiye turagwa n’abasokuruza, aba ni bo babitwigisha mu bihangano.
Mureke tubashimire bakiriho, bakoze umurimo ukomeye.
Ndakubwiza ukuri ko abahanzi batabayeho byagorana kumenya no kumenyekanisha umuco wacu.”
Mecky Kayiranga akomeza avuga ko iki gitaramo kizaba umwanya mwiza w’uko buri munyarwanda wese yaza agashimira aba bahanzi, bo ‘Ndongozi z’Umuco’ kuko ari bo bawubumbatiye , avuga ko ubundi umuntu utarize ubuvanganzo cyangwa avukire mu rugo rukomeye ku muco, byamugora kumenya ibijyanye n’ibisigo , imbyino, ibyivugo, amahamba …, bivuze ko umuhanzi ari ishingiro ry’umuco kuko adufasha kubisakaza.
Umuhanzi ni we ubungabunga, akanahererekanya umuco, wo gicumbi cy’amajyambere arambye mu bya politiki, mu by’ubukungu mu mibereho n’imibanire y’abantu.
Bityo, ni uguhesha agaciro Indongozi muri twe zabigizemo uruhare rugaragara, cyane cyane ko ari bo babashije kwigomeka ku iyaduka ry’indi mico iturutse hirya no hino, maze babasha gusigasira uwacu.
Izo Ndongozi ni zo dukesha zimwe mu ngeri z’umuco wacu, twavuga nk’ibisigo, imigani migufi n’imigani miremire, ibitekerezo, imbyino n’indirimbo rubanda ihuriyeho (chansons populaires).
Mecky Kayiranga avuga ko Kayirebwa yatoranyijwe hashigiye ku bigwi bye birimo kuba yaratangiye ubuhanzi bwe mu 1965, ni umwe mu bakobwa b’Abanyarwanda bagiye ku rubyiniro mpuzamahanga mu bihugu bitandukanye baririmba Ikinyarwanda , mu njyana za kinyarwanda, yaririmbye mu bihugu byinshi cyane birimo : Uganda, Burundi, Ububiligi, France, Suise, America, Ubuhorande , Ubudage, Kenya, Ubwongereza n’ahandi.
Kayirebwa Cécile yakunze kuririmba akiri muto guhera mu mashuri abanza muri Notre Dame de Citeaux i Kigali, aho agiriye kwiga ku Karubanda, atangira gushinga icyo yise « Cercle de Chants et de Danse Rwandaise ».
Atangira yasabaga buri mwana uvuka mu turere dutandukanye kumubwira indirimbo z’iwabo n’uko zibyinwa, noneho akazihimbira injyana.
Mu 1964, yafashwe amajwi na Radio Rwanda maze indirimbo ze zitangira gukoreshwa mu biganiro binyuranye byanyuraga kuri Radio Rwanda ndetse imwe muri zo, agira ati: “Banyarwandakazi, mwegere radiyo, uyu mwanya ni uwanyu”, iza guharirwa kuba ariyo ifungura Radio saa tanu z’amanywa.
Aho agiriye mu mahanga kubera amateka y’igihugu cyacu cyaciyemo, yakomeje kuririmba no kwigisha umuco abinyujije mu buhanzi.
Mu Bubiligi yatangije amatorero atandukanye ndetse anahabwa ibihembo bijyanye n’ubuhanzi bwamamaza Umuco w’Igihugu avukamo.
Imwe mu ndirimbo ye yaje gutoranywa yitwa ‘Umunezero’ yafunguraga Radiyo Muhabura yari iya FPR-Inkotanyi, yakanguriraga abantu urugamba rwo kubohoza igihugu.
Avuga ku bijyanye n’uburyo umuhanzi azashimirwa , Mecky Kayiranga yavuze ko ikintu cya mbere ari ukwereka umuhanzi nk’Abanyarwanda ko turi kumwe na we tumushyigikiye , ibyo yakoze byose yabikoze ku bacu n’igihugu cyacu, ati: “Kuki twazashimira cyangwa tukavuga umuntu atakiriho ?
Tumushimire akiriho, bihe imbaraga n’abandi bari kuzamukira mu njyana ishingiye ku muco.
Uriya ni umwanya umunyarwanda wese akwiye kuzaza azanye inka , azanye ururabo kugirango ashimire umuhanzi.”
Akomeza avuga ko Umuhanzi w’uyu mwaka azashimirwa n’abateguye igitaramo aribo Agence Karibu asbl, Bwiza Media, Umushanana Media n’Abacukumbuzi b’Amateka n’Umuco.
Azahabwa ishimwe ridashingiye ku mibare ahubwo rivuye ku mutima, umuntu wese wumva hari uruhare abahanzi bagize mu muco w’u Rwanda, ni umwanya we wo gushimira Indongozi z’umuco nk’uko Mecky Kayiranga abivuga.
Uyu mushinga wo gutegura ibi bitaramo ugiye gutangira muri uyu mwaka, witezweho kugarura Umuhanzi mu isangano (hagati) ry’ikusanya, ibungabunga n’isakaza ry’umuco nyarwanda.
Bizanafasha mu kugarura no guha ireme indirimbo n’imbyino zigenda zibagirana nyamara zihetse umuco, zibagirana bitewe no kutagira urwego rubyihatira rwihariye.
Ngo kuko gutakaza ikimenyetso kimwe cy’umuco w’abantu bisa nko gusibanganya amateka y’uwo muntu mu isi muri rusange no mu gihugu by’umwihariko.
Uyu mushinga kandi ugamije gutanga umuganda mu kurinda, kubungabunga no guhererekanya amahame shingiro y’Umuco w’u Rwanda, wo soko y’imbaga ifite impagarike.
Iki gitaramo cya mbere cyo gushimira abahanzi ‘Indongozi z’Umuco’ kizaba muri uyu mwaka tariki 8 Werurwe 2020, kuva saa kumi n’ebyiri muri Camp Kigali aho kwinjira bizaba ari 5000 Frw mu myanya isanzwe, 10000 Frw mu myanya y’icyubahiro na 20000 Frw mu myanya y’ikirenga.

#24282#	0	entertainment	https://www.igihe.com/imyidagaduro/article/ikirezi-imfura-ya-masamba-intore-yinjiye-mu-muziki-asohora-indirimbo-ya-mbere
Ikirezi, imfura y’umuhanzi Masamba Intore yinjiye mu muziki asohora indirimbo ya mbere Ikirezi Annaiis Déborah umwana wa Masamba Intore akanaba imfura ye utuye Ottawa muri Canada yateye ikirenge mu cya se yinjira mu muziki anahita ashyira hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise “Smile”.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, uyu mukobwa wavukiye mu Rwanda mu 1995, yavuze ko yahavuye afite imyaka ibiri gusa y’amavuko ajya muri Canada.
Yakuze abana na nyina ariko akurana urukundo rw’umuziki yatangiye kugaragaza akiri muto kuko yaririmbye muri za korali zitandukanye.
Yagize ati “Mama yaranyumvaga kandi akanshyigikira ariko wasangaga ambwira ko ngomba kwiga kugira ngo ngire amahitamo arenze umuziki gusa.”
Ikirezi yavuze ko ababyeyi be bakiriye neza kuba ari umuhanzi nubwo ataririmba gakondo nkuko papa we Masamba aririmba.
Mu 2018 nibwo yinjiye mu muziki ariko atangira asubiramo ibihangano by’abandi ari nako agerageza kwitabira amarushanwa atandukanye y’umuziki.
Muri uwo mwaka yakoze igitaramo yise “Genesis” cyangwa se Itangiriro, cyabereye mu Mujyi wa Ottawa aho atuye muri Canada.
Yari yatumiyemo na se Masamba Intore.
Mu mwaka wa 2019 uyu muhanzikazi yongeye gutegura ikindi gitaramo mu mujyi wa Montréal agamije kugaragaza impano ye yo kuririmba nubwo nta ndirimbo ye n’imwe yagiraga.
Muri Gicurasi 2020 nibwo Ikirezi yasohoye indirimbo ye ya mbere yise Smile.
Yavuze ko atigeze atekereza ko indirimbo ye ya mbere izasohoka mu bihe isi ihanganye n’icyorezo gikomeye nka coronavirus.
Ati “Sinigeze nyitekereza cyane, sinari nzi ko izasohoka gutya, gusa kubera ibihe bya Covid-19 turimo byabaye ngombwa ko nsohora indirimbo ibyinitse nk’iyi.”
Yavuze ko nubwo indirimbo ye ya mbere iri mu njyana ya Reggae, azagerageza gukora n’izindi zitandukanye zirimo na Gakondo Ise yamenyekaniyemo.
Mu mishinga ya vuba afite ngo harimo gusohora album ya mbere nubwo izaba iriho indirimbo nke.
Ikirezi ushimira ababyeyi be uburyo bamushyigikira, yavuze ko yifuza kuzakorera igitaramo mu Rwanda nubwo atazi igihe kizabera.
Uyu mukobwa kuri ubu ari kurangiza icyiciro cya kabiri cya Kaminuza mu bijyanye n’imibereho myiza.
Reba indirimbo nshya ya Ikirezi Intore Masamba yitegereza imfura ye mu 2018 mu gitaramo bakoreye Ottawa muri Canada Intore Masamba yahaye umugisha wa kibyeyi imfura ye anibutsa abantu ko ari we yahimbiye indirimbo yise " Yaraye avutse"

#24316#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/KAYONZA-Abaturage-baratabaza-bamaze-hafi-umwaka-bavoma-amazi-mabi
KAYONZA: Baratabaza nyuma yo gufungurirwa amazi n'abayobozi agasubiranayo na bo Abaturage bo mu karere ka Kayonza, umurenge wa Mwiri by'umwihariko akagari ka Nyawera, bugarijwe n'ikibazo cyo kubura amazi meza aho bamaze hafi umwaka batazi uko amazi meza asa aho bakoresha amazi mabi yo mu gishanga.
Aba baturage bavuga ko aya mazi yatashywe ku mugaragaro n'abayobozi ariko ngo nyuma yo kuyataha akaba atarongeye kugaruka.
Mu baturage baganiriye na Makuruki.rw batashatse ko amazina yabo atangazwa, badutangarije ko bamaze igihe kirekire nta mazi meza bafite kandi ibisabwa ngo ayo mazi abagereho byose babifite (ibigega na robinets).
Aba baturage bavuga ko ikibabaje ari uko umurenge baturanye wa Gahini wo ufite amazi, bakibaza impamvu amazi atabageraho.
Ikindi kandi n'uko aba baturage iyo uganiriye na bo bakubwira ko aka kagari harimo ibigega byinshi ariko n'iyo amazi aje aza mu kigega kimwe cy'ahitwa ku Gitega ibindi byo banacyeka ko imiyoboro yabyo ishobora kuba yarangiritse.
Gusa n'iki kigega ngo kizamo amazi na cyo ngo kimaze amezi arenga 9 nta mazi azamo.
Uyu yagize ati"nta kubeshye sinakubwira ngo tumaze igihe kingana gute tudafite amazi, icyo nzi cyo ni uko ari kinini, twibaza impamvu tutayabona kandi dufite ibigega by'amazi ndetse nabo duturanye muri Gahani bayafite."
Yakomeje avuga ko kubura amazi meza bibagiraho ingaruka mbi kuko bakoresha amazi mabi bityo bakaba bibasirwa n'indwara ziterwa n'umwanda.
Aba baturage bavuga ko ikibababaza ari uko aya mazi yaje gutahwa n'abayobozi ariko ngo nyuma yo kuyataha, aya mazi ngo ntiyogeye kugaruka kuko yagiye ubutagaruka.
Icyo aba baturage bifuza ni uko ubuyobozi bwashaka uburyo bubakemurira ikibazo na bo bakabona amazi meza.
Umunyabanga Nshingwabikorwa w'akagari ka Nyawera, Umurerwa Solange aganira na Makuruki.rw yatubwiye ko koko abaturage bamaze igihe kinini nta mazi babona.
Yagize ati"nibyo koko amazi yarabuze, hashize nk'amezi icyenda nta mazi tubona, abaturage bakoresha amazi mabi kandi murabizi ko atera indwara ikindi banakora urugendo rurerure kuko bavoma ahitwa Ntaruka cyangwa Kibombwe."
Uyu muyobozi nawe arasaba ubuyobozi bumukuriye kuba bwashaka uko bubakemurira iki kibazo maze amazi ntazajye agarukira muri Gahini gusa.
Mu kiganiro Makuruki.rw yagiranye n'umuyobozi wa karere ka Kayonza wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu, Uwibambe Consolee yemeje aya makuru avuga ko bakoranye inama na WASAC kugira ngo ibarebere impamvu nyamukuru amazi atagera kubo agenewe, bityo ngo bakaba bategereje igisubizo cyayo.
Yagize ati"birashoboka ko umurenge umwe wagira amazi undi ntuyabone, biterwa n'isoko bafatiraho.
Icyo kibazo turakizi kandi twatangiye no kugikoraho kuko mu minsi yashize twakoranye inama na WASAC ngo igende iturebere impamvu nyakuri amazi atarimo kugera ku baturage hanyuma nitumara kumenya aho ikibazo kiri ni bwo tuzahita tumenya n'uburyo tugikemuramo."
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko bohereje abakozi babo ngo bajye gufatanya na WASAC mu gushaka iyo mpamvu, bityo bakaba bizeye ko mu cyumweru kimwe bazaba babonye impamvu ituma ayo mazi atagera mu baturage uko bikwiye.
Twagerageje kuvugana na WASAC muri ako karere kuri iki kibazo ariko ntibyadukundiye.

#24321#	4	health	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/badindijwe-mu-iterambere-no-kurwara-malariya
Badindijwe mu iterambere no Kurwara malariya Abaturage bo mu mirenge igize Akarere ka Gatsibo bavuga ko kurwara no kurwaza malariya bituma iterambere ryabo ritihuta nk'uko babyifuza.
Mu gukomeza kurwanya malariya mu karere ka Gatsibo hari igikorwa cyo gutera umuti wica imibu mu nzu z'abaturage.
Bamwe muri aba baturage bo mu Mrenge wa Kizigura baganiriye na Kigali Today, Bagaragaza uburyo basigaye babona indwara ya malariya yariyongereye ugereranyije no mu bihe byashize.
Umwe muri abo baturage witwa Kampayana Ephrosine agira ati "Malariya ni umwanzi w'iterambere kuko iyo yageze mu rugo nta kindi kintu ushobora gukora, kuko umara kuyikiruka abana bagafatwa cyangwa se umugabo, ugasanga ari uguhora kwa muganga."
Hakizimana Emmanuel ushinzwe ibijyanye no kwirinda malariya mu kigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima (RBC), avuga ko ibyo aba baturage bavuga atari amakabyankuru, kuko ngo kugeza ubu akarere kabo ari ko kaza ku isonga mu kugira abarwayi benshi ba malariya.
Ati "Iyo turebye mu mibare dusanga Akarere ka Gatsibo kaza ku mwanya wa mbere mu kugira abaturage bensi barwaye malariya, mu ngamba zafashwe zo kuyirwanya mu gihugu cyose harimo no kongera ubushobozi bw'abajyanama b'ubuzima, bakarenga kubyo kwita ku bana gusa bakajya bafasha n'abantu bakuze."
Ubuyobozi bw'Ibitaro bya Ngarama buvuga ko hakwiye ubufatanye bw'abaturage bose mu gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zo kurwanya ubwiyongere bukabije bwa malariya.
Ubuyobozi bw'Akarere ka Gatsibo buributsa abaturage ko ubuzima buzira umuze ari wo musingi w'ibanze w'iterambere ry'Igihugu n'imibereho myiza y'abaturage, bukabasaba kudakoresha nabi amahirwe yo kubaho neza Leta iba yarabashyiriyeho.
Mu rwego rwo gukomeza guhashya malariya, Leta yashyizeho ingamba zitandukanye zo kuyirwanya zirimo kwivuza hakiri kare, kuryama mu nzitiramibu ikoranye umuti, gukuraho ibihuru n'ibinogo bikikije ingo no kubahiriza gahunda zose zijyanye n'igikorwa cyo kubaterera umuti wica imibu.

#24333#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/ibiterane/article/itorero-angilikani-ryateguye
Itorero Angilikani ryateguye igiterane kizakoreshwamo amarushanwa yo kwiruka Yanditswe kuya 22-07-2014 saa 09:27' na Emma-Marie Umurerwa Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryateguye igiterane mpuzamahanga cy'iminsi itatu kizabimburirwa n'amarushanwa yo kwiruka ku rubyiruko ruri hejuru y'imyaka 15 n'igikorwa cy'imyidagaduro, azatangira tariki ya 1 Kanama 2014 saa mbiri za mu gitondo.
Ku munsi wa nyuma w'igiterane urubyiruko rwitwaye neza mu marushanwa ruzahabwa ibihembo bitandukanye birimo telefoni zigendanwa, n'imyambaro itandukanye mu birori bizaba byitabiriwe na Minisiteri y'Umuco na Siporo.
Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, ubuyobozi (...)
Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryateguye igiterane mpuzamahanga cy'iminsi itatu kizabimburirwa n'amarushanwa yo kwiruka ku rubyiruko ruri hejuru y'imyaka 15 n'igikorwa cy'imyidagaduro, azatangira tariki ya 1 Kanama 2014 saa mbiri za mu gitondo.
Rev.
Samuel Mugisha, Rev Maurice Rukimbira na Manasseh Tuyizerwe mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru Ku munsi wa nyuma w'igiterane urubyiruko rwitwaye neza mu marushanwa ruzahabwa ibihembo bitandukanye birimo telefoni zigendanwa, n'imyambaro itandukanye mu birori bizaba byitabiriwe na Minisiteri y'Umuco na Siporo.
Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, ubuyobozi bw'iri torero bwavuze ko iki giterane ngarukamwaka gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘Ahubwo muhinduke rwose mufite imitima mishya…Rom12:2".
Rev.
Mugisha Samuel umuyobozi ku rusengero St.
Etienne mu Biryogo, yavuze ko batumiye abigisha b'Ijambo ry'Imana batandukanye ndetse n'Abahanzi ku giti cyabo.
Rev.
Mugisha yagize ati « Buri mwaka dutegura igiterane nk'iki mu rwego rwo kurushaho kwigira hamwe ijambo ry'Imana, abakristo bakaboneraho n'umwanya wo kwisuzuma, babifashijwemo n'inyigisho zitandukanye z'ijambo ry'Imana».
Yakomeje avuga ko mu bigisha batumiwe harimo Pasiteri Gerrit Wolfaardt w'umunyafurika y'Epfo wakiriye agakiza ariko akaba ari mu bigeze gutegura itsembabwoko ry'abirabura, hamwe n'abandi bapasiteri batandukanye bo mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, hari kandi amahugurwa y'urubyiruko n'aya babyeyi.
Tuyizere Maurice umwe mu bashinzwe gutegura iki giterane, yavuze ko batumiwe n'abahanzi batandukanye, barimo Dudu uzaturuka i Burundi, Patien Bizimana, Blessed sisters Group, Kamikazi Joy, Edie Mico hamwe na Mass choir yo kuri St Etienne mu Rwanda.
Yasobanuye umusaruro uva mu biterane agira ati « Hari ingo nyinshi zari zifitanye amakimbirane zongeye kubana mu mahoro ».
Uyu musaruro kandi ngo uboneka kubera amahugurwa y'isanamitima mu bijyanye n'ubumwe n'ubwiyunge hakaba n'abandi bagenda bakira agakiza kandi barahoze ari inzererezi. [email protected] Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#24389#	2	security	https://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/umwana-wa-gen-ntawunguka-uyobora-fdlr-yamushishikarije-gutaha
Umwana wa Gen.
Ntawunguka uyobora FDLR yamushishikarije gutaha Mukiza Willy Maurice ni umwana wa kabiri wa General Major Ntawunguka Pacifique ubarizwa mu mashyamba ya Congo mu mitwe y’iterabwoba igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Mukiza Willy Maurice Yagiriye inama Abanyarwanda bakiri hirya no hino hanze y’igihugu kuza mu Rwanda bagafatanya kubaka u Rwanda.
Yagize ati “Abanyarwanda bose bakiri mu mashyamba harimo na Data, bakwiye gushyira intwaro hasi bakaza tugafatanya kubaka igihugu.
Mu Rwanda hari umutekano, amahoro ni yose, turakataje mu iterambere.”
Ati “Ubundi simba numva uburyo bakwingingira amahirwe ukayanga.”
Mukiza Willy Maurice afite mukuru we akagira na mushiki we umukurikira, bose uko ari batatu bakaba ari abana ba Ntawunguka Pacifique.
Mukiza yatse ijambo mu Nama y’Igihugu y’ Umushyikirano irimo kubera i Kigali ku nshuro ya 17, ashima Leta y’u Rwanda, atanga n’ubuhamya, abonerho no kugira inama urubyiruko bagenzi be.
Mukiza avuga ko n’ubwo se ari mu mashyamba ya Congo, Leta y’u Rwanda ngo ntabwo yatereranye abana be.
Ati “Igihugu cyatwitayeho, cyaratwigishije, dukora neza nk’abandi Banyarwanda bose, dufite umutekano, ntawe uturenganya, mbese mwatwitayeho nk’uko mwitaye ku Banyarwanda bose.
Mu mashuri twarize, mukuru wanjye ndetse yize kaminuza arihirwa n’igihugu, arangije akomereza mu Bushinwa, ni ho arimo gukorera Master’s, nta cyangombwa yigeze yimwa, nta n’uwamubajije ngo ugiye he, mbese murumva ko twari tumeze nk’abandi Banyarwanda bose, hatitawe ko turi abana ba Ntawunguka Pacifique.”
Mukiza Willy Maurice yavuze ko mushiki we na we abayeho neza, ubu akaba arimo kwiga muri Ghana ibyerekeranye n’ubuvuzi (Pharmacy).
Mukiza na we arangije muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda (College of Science and Technology Nyarugenge) mu byerekeranye n’ubwubatsi (Civil Engineering).
Arangije kwiga muri uyu mwaka akaba yishimira ko ubu ari umu enjeniyeri (Engineer) abikesha igihugu cyamuhaye umutekano kititaye ku wo ari we.
Ati “Mu rugo hari igihe tuganira tukumva bidashoboka ko dushobora kuba dufatwa kimwe nk’abandi kandi muzehe wacu ari umwe mu batakifuriza gutera imbere.”
Mukiza Willy Maurice agira inama urubyiruko bagenzi be ko bafite igihugu kibakunda kandi kibashyigikiye, abasaba kubyaza umusaruro ayo mahirwe, bihangira imirimo, bakora n’ibindi bitandukanye byabateza imbere, bigateza imbere n’igihugu muri rusange.
Yasabye urubyiruko kandi kwirinda abantu babajya mu matwi bakabashishikariza kwanga igihugu cyabo.
Mukiza Willy Maurice yijeje Perezida Paul Kagame ko bo nk’abana ba Ntawunguka Pacifique biteguye gukorera igihugu mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose bugiteza imbere.
General Major Pacifique Ntawunguka General Major Pacifique Ntawunguka uzwi ku mazina nka Omega, Nzeri na Israel ni we wagizwe umuyobozi w’agateganyo ku buyobozi bw’umutwe w’igisirikare cya FDLR, nyuma y’urupfu rwa Lt Gen Sylvestre Mudacumura warashwe n’ingabo za Congo (FARDC) ku wa 17 Nzeri 2019 zimusanze mu birindiro bye ahitwa Makomalehe muri Rutshuru.
Gen Maj Pacifique Ntawunguka ni we wari umugaba w’ingabo (Etat Major) wa FDLR, akaba yaratoranyijwe n’abandi basirikare bakuru kugira ngo abe ayobora by’agateganyo igisirikare cy’uyu mutwe ubu uri mu bibazo bitoroshye.
Gen Maj Pacifique Ntawunguka wavutse mu 1964, yarushwaga imyaka 10 na Lt Gen Mudacumura.
Avuka i Kageshi muri Gasebeya mu cyahoze ari Komini Gaseke aho azwi ku izina rya Mulefu.
Gen Maj Pacifique Ntawunguka (Omega) yize amashuri abanza ahitwa Mbandari akomereza mu Rwankeri mu cyari Komini Nkuri aho yavuye akomereza muri Christ-Roi mu Karere ka Nyanza, aho yarangije yinjira mu ishuri rya Gisirikare ESM icyiciro cya 25 kuri Leta ya Habyarimana ndetse akaba yarize ibyo gutwara indege.
Avugwa mu bayobozi ba batayo 94 yarwanye n’ingabo za RPA mu Mutara ahazwi nka Komini Muvumba agatsindwa akerekeza i Kigali.
Muri Gicurasi 1994 yakomerekeye mu mirwano, ajyanwa mu kigo cya Gisirikare cya Mukamira, aho yavuye ahungira mu nkambi ya Katale inyuma y’ibirunga.
Mu gihe cy’umutwe wa ALIR yabaye umuyobozi w’ibikorwa bya gisirikare bizwi nka Bethlehem muri Komini Satinsyi, Gakenke na Ramba ariko nyuma yo gutsindwa asubira muri Congo.
Igitabo ‘Leadership of Rwandese armed groups in DRC’ kivuga ko azwi nk’umuntu utava ku izima, ibi bikaba intandaro ituma atarumvikanaga n’umuyobozi we Lt Gen Mudacumura.
Yabaye umuyobozi w’igisirkare cya FDLR mu bice bya Rutshuru na Masisi ndetse akajya asuzugura ibyemezo bya Mudacumura.
Yari umwe mu barwanyi ba FDLR bifuzaga impinduka mu gisirikare binubira ko bayoborwa n’abasaza n’abanyabwoba.
Gen Kabarebe muri 2016 yatangaje ko Ingabo z’u Rwanda na we ubwe bavuganaga n’abarwanyi bari mu mashyamba bafite imigambi mibi ku Rwanda, babumvisha gutaha kandi mu bo yashishikarije gutaha harimo Ntawunguka Pacifique udakozwa ibyo gutaha.
Gen.
Kabarebe ati ‘‘Njye ubwanjye naramwihamagariye nti ‘Pacifique ko wize, uri umupilote wigiye mu Bufaransa, ntabwo uri injiji, ayo mashyamba ya Congo urimo imyaka makumyabiri n’ingahe, ntugeraho ugashishoza ibyo urimo, n’intambara yarananiranye ntabwo uzayitsinda, ntugeraho ukibwira?"
Undi na we ati “Jenerali, reka nkubwire ikintu kimwe.
Njyewe kugaruka mu Rwanda, nzagaruka mu Rwanda nta Mututsi n’uyu n’umwe uri muri icyo gihugu, niba hari ikindi washakaga kongeraho kumbwira, ikiganiro tukirekere ahangaha."
Omega ucumbagira kubera ibikomere yavanye mu Rwanda, yageze muri Congo ayobora Sonoki yashinze itsinda ry’abakirisitu riyoborwa n’uwitwa Muzimangane ariko riza kwamaganwa na Lt Gen Mudacumura.
Yahoze ari nimero enye mu gisirikare cya FDLR-FOCA ariko ubu ni we ugezweho kukiyobora nyuma y’uko abamubanjirije bagiye batakaza ubuzima barimo Lt Gen Sylvestre Mudacumura, Brig Gen Stanislas Nzeyimana wari uzwi nka Bigaruka waburiwe irengero yagiye muri Tanzania hamwe na Brig Gen Léodimir Mugaragu, uzwi nka Léo Manzi warasiwe mu birindiro bye.

#24418#	6	religion	https://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/ubutumwa-bwihariye-musenyeri-antoine-kambanda-azibandaho-namara-kwimikwa-nka
Ubutumwa bwihariye Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda azibandaho namara kwimikwa nka Cardinal Arkiyepiskopi wa Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda uherutse gutorerwa kuba Cardinal n’abandi 12 batorewe rimwe na we bazimikwa ku wa 28 Ugushyingo 2020.
Bazaba binjiye mu mubare w’abajyanama ba hafi b’umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi.
Aba baba bafite amahirwe agirwa na bake yo kugeza ibitekerezo byabo kuri Papa maze bikaba bishobora no gushyirwa mu bikorwa vuba.
Arkiyepiskopi wa Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda, yavuze ko ubutumwa bumuraje ishinga bushingiye ku kwita ku muryango kuko ari wo gicumbi cy’ubukirisitu.
Muri iyi minsi, mu miryango hagaragara ibibazo by’ingutu bibangamiye ubuzima n’imibereho.
Amakimbirane yo mu miryango akomeje gutuma abashakanye bicana, batandukana, bacana inyuma, cyangwa bakabana barebana ay’ingwe maze ingaruka zikagera kuri bo ubwabo no ku bana babo.
Ubu bamwe mu bana baba ku mihanda bagaragaza ko intandaro yo kujya kuba ku muhanda ari amakimbirane yo mu miryango bavukamo.
Mu muryango Nyarwanda kandi ubu haravugwa ikibazo gikomeye cy’abangavu batwita imburagihe, akenshi izi nda baziterwa n’abagabo bakuze bafite imiryango ubundi bakagombye kuba basigasira abo bahohotera.
Rimwe na rimwe abo bangavu iyo bamaze kubyara ababyeyi babo barabatererana cyangwa bakabahoza ku nkeke rimwe na rimwe bagatorongera bakajya kubaho mu buzima busharira.
Abana bavuka kuri abo bangavu na bo bahura n’ubuzima bubi budakwiye ibibondo.
Ibi n’ibindi bibazo bitandukanye bigira ingaruka no ku iyogezabutumwa cyane cyane ko rihera mu muryango.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yatangaje ko mu gihe azaba amaze kwimikwa nka Cardinal, ubutumwa azihatira kugeza ku mushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi buzaba bushingiye ku kwita ku muryango kuko ari wo kiliziya y’ibanze.
Yagize ati “Umuryango ni ubutumwa bw’umwihariko nshinzwe.
Ni wo gicumbi cy’ubukirisitu, ni wo kiliziya y’ibanze.”
Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko yagize amahirwe yo kuba ari we wahagarariye u Rwanda mu Nama y’Abepisikopi (synod) yo mu 2015 bigatuma yumva ibibazo umuryango ufite ku Isi yose muri za Kiliziya.
Avuga ko mu byo yumvise hari abahuje ibibazo n’umuryango Nyarwanda hakaba n’abafite iby’umwihariko ariko kandi ngo iyo nama yatumye agira amahirwe yo kubona ukwemera kuri hirya no hino no kubona ko imbaraga z’ivanjili zigihari.
Ngo kuri we, iki ni igihe cyiza cyo kugeza ibitekerezo bye ku Mushumba wa Kiliziya, akagaragaza uburemere umuryango ufite mu iyogezabutumwa.
Ati “Iyogezabutumwa rihera mu muryango, niho umwana amenyera Imana, niho amenyera isengesho rya mbere kandi niho akura umusingi w’ubukirisitu n’ukwemera bizamwambutsa ubuzima bwe bwose, kwita rero ku muryango mu iyogezabutumwa ni cyo kintu cya mbere numva mu Kiliziya bakwiye guha imbaraga.”
Abalayiki bafite umukoro ukomeye ku busugire bw’umuryango Musenyeri Kambanda avuga ko abalayiki (abakirisitu) bafite inshingano ikomeye yo kwita ku muryango cyane cyane gutoza abana bato kumenya Imana n’ivanjili.
Ati “Abalayiki nibo bagize ingo, kandi ndimo ndavuga ubutumwa buhera mu ngo, abalayiki biri mu nshingano zabo by’umwihariko kwita ku iyogezabutumwa ryo mu muryango.”
Yavuze ko ibihe bya Guma mu rugo byatanze isomo rikomeye ku bakuru b’imiryango kuko byatumye bamenya neza ko ari bo bashumba b’ibanze b’imiryango yabo.
Ati “Guma mu rugo muri COVID-19 yatugaragarije ko mu gihe abantu batashoboraga kujya mu misa basengeraga mu rugo, umukuru w’umuryango akaba yayobora umuhimbazo w’ijambo ry’Imana […] ni we usobanurira abana ivanjiri y’uwo munsi, ni we ubatoza gusenga, buri mwana agashobora kuvuga isengesho […] ubwigishwa ni hariya buhera, niho kiliziya yubatse.
Abalayiki rero bagize umusingi wa Kiliziya, kwita ku muryango ni ubutumwa bafite kandi twubakiyeho twese.”
Yagarutse ku nshingano z’abihaye Imana, avuga ko bakwiye gukoresha neza ingabire bahawe maze bagatanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka umuryango na Kiliziya.
Yakomeje ati “Kwiyegurira Imana ni ingabire mu mateka roho mutagatifu abyutsa mu muntu akifatanya n’abandi mu ngabire yo kwita ku mbabare, kwita ku barwayi, kwigisha abato, kwita ku bantu bafite ubumuga, kwigisha no kujya kwamamaza ivanjiri mu mahanga.
Abiyeguriye Imana icyo tubasaba ni ugushyira mu bikorwa no kubahiriza ingabire bahawe kugira ngo uruhare bategerejweho mu kubaka Kiliziya barugaragaze.”
Kugira ngo umuntu abe Cardinal biri mu bushake bwite bwa Papa kuko nta tora ribaho, bigakorwa mu busesenguzi bwe, akitoranyiriza abajyanama.
Ba Cardinal ni bo batorwamo ba Papa, bivuze ko buri Cardinal aba ari umukandida.
Biteganywa ko Cardinal Kambanda azahita ahabwa imyambaro itukura iranga ba Cardinal namara kwimikwa ku wa 28 Ugushyingo 2020.
Arkiyepiskopi wa Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda, yavuze ko ubutumwa bumuraje ishinga bushingiye ku kwita ku muryango kuko ari wo gicumbi cy’ubukirisitu

#24427#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/impanuka-y-ikamyo-yakomerekeje-batatu
Impanuka y'ikamyo yakomerekeje batatu Ikamyo yikoreye imifuka ya Sima yavaga i Rusizi yerekeza i Kigali, yakoreye impanuka mu Karere ka Nyanza hakomekeramo batatu.
Mu gitondo ku wa 26 Mutarama 2016, ni bwo iyo kamyo yari yikoreye sima z'uruganda rwa CIMERWA, yakoze impanuka ariko abari bayirimo bakomereka bidakanganye nk'uko bamwe mu baturage babatabaye babivuga.
Batatu bakomeretse hanyuma imodoka na yo irangirika bikomeye.
Ngendahimana Gaspard, umwe mu baturage bahageze mbere ikimara kuba, yavuze ko umwe mu bakomeretse ari we wabonaga arembye kurusha abandi.
Yagize ati "Umwe muri abo bantu batatu bari mu modoka yakomeretse cyane undi na we akomereka byoroheje we yigenzaga kuko ni we winjyanye mu modoka twabashakiye bakimara gukora impanuka."
Akomeza avuga ko nyuma gato Polisi ikorera mu Karere ka Nyanza yahageze ariko igasanga abaturage bari bamaze gukorera ubutabazi bw'ibanze abari bakomeretse.
Iri kona rikunze kuberamo impanuka.
Uwo muturage yakomeje agira ati "Kubera ko hano hakunze kubera impanuka kandi akaba ari ku muhanda munini wa kaburimbo dukunze guhita tubatabara, abakoze impanuka tukabashakira uko bagezwa kwa muganga tukabategera izindi modoka ziba zihita."
Abakomeretse bahise bajyanwa mu Bitaro bya Nyanza kugira ngo bahabwe ubutabazi bw'ibanze, mu gihe imodoka igicungiwe aho impanuka yabereye mu Murenge wa Mukingo mu Karere ka Nyanza.
Polisi ishinzwe Umutekano wo mu Muhanda yo yatangaje ko iyo mpanuka yaturutse ku muvuduko ukabije w'iyo modoka.

#24445#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/Rutsiro-Abanyerondo-bahagobotse-umugabo-wari-ufite-umupanga-n-icyuma-atarakora
Rutsiro : Abanyerondo bahagobotse umugabo wari ufite umupanga n'icyuma atarakora ibara Ntamugabumwe uzwi ku izina rya Kiwi wo mu kagari ka Bumba mu murenge wa Mushubati mu karere ka Rutsiro yashatse gutema abaturanyi be ahereye ku mugore we mu ijoro rishyira ku wa gatanu tariki 11/07/2014, ariko abanyerondo babasha kuhagoboka bamwambura umupanga, inkoni n'icyuma yari afite ataragira uwo akomeretsa.
Muri iryo joro, abaturage, ubuyobozi bw'akagari ka Bumba ndetse n'abanyerondo basa n'abaraye bataryamye kubera ko baraye baraririye uwo mugabo w'imyaka 29 y'amavuko wari wateje umutekano mucye.
Abanyerondo bamwambuye umupanga n'icyuma yashakaga gutemesha abaturage ahereye ku mugore we.
Yavuye mu kabari aza iwe mu rugo gushaka umupanga n'itoroshi ngo asubire kurwana mu kabari, ariko akiri aho mu rugo atongana n'umugore aba ari we ashaka guheraho atema.
Icyakora umugore yabashije kumucika, ajya guhuruza abashinzwe umutekano.
Abanyerondo bahageze bahita bamufata baramuzamukana bamushyira mu nyubako y'akagari bajya kureba abayobozi b'akagari, ariko bagarutse basanga urugi rw'ibiro by'akagari yaruciye arasohoka, abantu baramutangatanga barongera bamugarura ku kagari.
Umugore we avuga ko ubusanzwe umugabo we arwana nta mpamvu ifatika ihari, ahubwo ngo abiterwa n'inzoga ndetse n'urumogi aba yanyweye, dore ko no muri ako kanya ubwo yafatwaga yasaga n'uwasinze akaba yari afite n'agacupa kuzuye k'inzoga ya African Gin bamwe bita Suruduwiri.
Umugore avuga ko umugabo we amaze kumanika umupanga inshuro zigera kuri eshatu ashaka kumutema, akaba yifuza ko uwo mugabo nibura yajyanwa ahantu akahamara nk'umwaka atanywa inzoga n'itabi kuko ari byo bimutera kugira imyitwarire mibi.
Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'akagari ka Bumba, Tuyishimire Marcel, na we yemeza ko uwo mugabo adashobotse.
Ati "asanzwe ari umuntu watunaniye, urugomo rwe rurasanzwe, kandi iyo abonye ibintu bikomeye, aryama hasi akihwereza."
Tuyishimire avuga ko bafite amakuru yuko Ntamugabumwe anywa urumogi usibye ko atarafatwa arufite cyangwa ari kurunywa.
Mu rwego rwo kurushaho kwicungira umutekano, muri ako kagari ngo hari ingamba zafashwe zirimo kubahiriza amasaha y'utubari kuko bamwe bateza umutekano mucye biturutse ku businzi.
Indi ngamba ya kabiri ngo ni ukugenzura abantu bavugwaho kunywa ibiyobyabwenge kugira ngo nibabifatanwa bahanwe hakurikijwe amategeko.
Malachie Hakizimana

#24460#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/ba-rwiyemezamirimo-bo-muri-liban-bagiye-kuza-mu-rwanda-kureba-amahirwe-y
Ba rwiyemezamirimo bo muri Liban bagiye kuza mu Rwanda kureba amahirwe y’ishoramari Ba rwiyemezamirimo bakomeye muri Liban barateganya kuza gusura u Rwanda mu mpera z’uyu mwaka, aho bazaba baje kureba aho bashobora gushora imari yabo mu gihugu cya Afurika gifite ubukungu bukomeje kwihuta cyane.
Ku itariki ya 8 Gicurasi 2017, nibwo Umuyobozi w’Urugaga rw’abakora mu bucuruzi, inganda n’ubuhinzi muri Liban (FCCIAL), Mohamed Choucair yatangaje ko bifuza gusura u Rwanda.
Hari mu muhango wo gusoza inama ku bucuruzi n’ishoramari mu Rwanda, yaberaga ku cyicaro cya FCCIAL mu mujyi wa Beirut muri Liban.
Choucar yavuze ko yifuza kubona ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi bwiyongera, kuko umwaka ushize Abanya-Liban bohereje mu Rwanda ibintu bifite agaciro k’ibihumbi 281 by’amadolari, ariko ntibagire ikintu na kimwe bahakura.
Yavuze ko kandi ari we uzarangaza imbere itsinda rizasura u Rwanda hagati ya 8-11 Ukwakira 2017.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Liban, Williams Nkurunziza yagaragaje ko igihugu cyiteguye kwakira ubucuruzi, kandi ko kuba ubukungu bwacyo busa n’aho bukiri bushya, bituma haba amahitamo ya mbere kuri ba rwiyemezamirimo bifuza gushinga imizi muri Afurika.
Yanabasobauriye kandi ku bijyanye no gukora ubucuruzi mu Rwanda, kugura ubutaka, gusubiza umutungo wabo aho bakomoka n’ibindi birimo abakozi n’andi mahirwe atangwa binyuze muri gahunda yo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu gihugu izwi nka ‘ Made in Rwanda’.
Mu bigo byagaragaje inyota yo kuba byashora imari mu Rwanda harimo ibikora ibikoresho byo mu nzu, amarangi, ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, moto, ibicuruza ibikomoka kuri peteroli n’ibigo by’imari iciriritse.
Iyi nama yari yitabiriwe n’uhagarariye inyungu z’u Rwanda mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati, Tarek Ragheb, na ba rwiyemezamirimo bakomeye barimo Umuyobozi w’Ikigo INTech Investments Ltd gikorera mu Rwanda, Hana Hallaj na William Saad, umwe mu bashinze Ikigo ISH akaba anakibereye umuyobozi mukuru.
ISH ni ikigo gifite iminara y’itumanaho ibihumbi 26 irimo n’iyo mu Rwanda.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Liban, Williams Nkurunziza(ibumoso) yagaragaje ko igihugu cyiteguye kwakira ubucuruzi Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Liban, Williams Nkurunziza atanga impano y'ishusho y'ingagi nka kimwe mu bikurura ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda [email protected]

#24474#	6	religion	https://rwandamagazine.com/iyobokamana/article/assumpta-muganwa-agiye-kumurika-album-y-amashusho
Assumpta Muganwa agiye kumurika album y’amashusho Umuhanzikazi Assumpta Muganwa uririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana akomeje imyiteguro ikomeye yo kurumurika Album y’indirimbo z’amashusho.
Ni igitaramo azafashwamo n’abandi bahanzi nka Aline Gahongayire, Tonzi, Arsene Tuyi na Brian Blessed.
Ni igitaramo yiswe ‘Satura Ijuru Live Concert’.
Iki gitaramo kizabera ku rusengero rwa New Life Bible Church ruherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali , ku Kicukiro mu Kagarama tariki 22 Nyakanga 2018 guhera saa cyenda z’ amanywa.
Mu kiganiro na Assumpta Muganwa yagiranye na Rwandamagazine.com yavuze ko ari igitaramo gitegerejwemo guhembukiramo abantu batandukanye ndetse benshi bakazatahana imigisha y’Imana.
Yongeyeho ko iki gitaramo gifite insanganyamatsiko iboneka muri Yesaya 64:1-11 Hagira hati " Icyampa ugasatura ijuru ukamanuka, imisozi igatengukira imbere yawe nk’uko umuriro utwika inyayu ukatuza amazi, kugira ngo izina ryawe rimenyekane mu banzi bawe, amahanga agahindira imishyitsi imbere yawe."
Kwinjira muri iki gitaramo ni ibihumbi bitanu ugahabwa DVD , ibihumbi bitatu ku bantu babiri ndetse n’ibihumbi bibiri ahasigaye hose.
Assumpta azwi cyane mu ndirimbo ye Satura, Tumusiinze n’izindi.Azwi cyane kandi mu biganiro bya Positive Thinking.
Assumpta Muganwa Akomeje imyiteguro yo kumurika Album y’amashusho Assumpta Muganwa yatangiye kuramya no guhimbaza Imana mu bwana.
Avuga ko impano ye akeka ko ayikomora mu muryango kuko na ‘maman’ we umubyara ari umuririmbyi.
Yaririmbye muri Singiza, Deliverance Church, Assemblée de Dieu y’i Butare, kuri ubu akaba ari umwe mu baririmbyi bayobora abandi mu kuramya no guhimbaza Imana muri New Life Bible Church iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, mu Kagarama, mu Karere ka Kicukiro.
Ni umwe mu bagize itsinda ry’abahanzikazi 11 bo muri ‘Gospel’ bishyize hamwe ryitwa ’ All In One Gospel Ladies’.
Ni itsinda na Assumpta abarizwamo.
Rigizwe na : Aline Gahongayire, Diana Kamugisha, Pastor Rose Ngabo, Assoumpta Muganwa , Alice Tonny, Giselle Phanny, Karen, Rachel Rwibasira, Pastor Jackie Mugabo, Gabi Kamanzi ndetse na Tonzi ari na we wagize igitekerezo cyo gutangiza iri tsinda.

#24522#	4	health	http://www.ukwezi.rw/mu-rwanda/Ubuzima/Ubuhamya-bwa-Mukabalisa-n-uburyo-ababyeyi-n-abavandimwe-be-bishwe-urw-agashinyaguro
Ubuhamya bwa Mukabalisa n’uburyo ababyeyi n’abavandimwe be bishwe urw’agashinyaguro Nitwa Immaculee Mukabalisa Shema, navutse mu mwaka w’1987, mvuka mu cyahoze ari komini Kigoma; ubu ni mu murenge wa Mukingo mu karere ka Nyanza, gusa ubu mba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ababyeyi banjye ni KAGERUKA Aphrodice (Mwarimu) na Mukakizima Evaste.
Iwacu twavutse turi abana 7, nkaba ari nanjye wari mutoya.
Ndibuka ko Inkotanyi ziza mu Rwanda njye nari i Kigali kwa mukuru wanjye, tujya ku muhanda aho imodoka (bus) zanyuraga zigiye muri CND (ahakorera Inteko Ishinga Amategeko) ariko iwabo wa mama bose bari barahungiye i Bugande cyera.
Ubwo bidatinze naratashye, ngeze iwacu mucyaro hari murumuna wa mama witwaga Olive, yaje kudusura aturutse i Bugande ariko baramufunga tumubona hashize iminsi gusa sinzi aho yari afungiye ariko muri icyo gihe iwacu bajyaga baza kudusaka imbunda n’ibyitso bavuga ko boherejwe n’uwari burugumestre wa Kigoma.
Jenoside ijya gutangira rero narabyutse mu gitongo nsanga papa na mama n’abo tuvukana (Bane nanjye wa 5 kuko 2 bari barashatse) baricaye ari mugitondo bose barimo kumva radiyo, ariko nk’umwana njye sinari nzi ibyo aribyo.
Ni uko mukuru wanjye witwaga Mignone ni we wambwiye ati “intambara igiye gutera Perezida yapfuye”.
Ubwo uwo munsi twiriwe aho ariko mbona iwacu byahindutse, bigeze ku mugoroba tujya kurara mu masaka twumva imbwa zirara zimoka ariko bwenda gucya turataha.
Musaza wanjye na mukuru wanjye bigaga mu mashuri yisumbuye nibo bakuru twari dusigaranye, sinzi aho babohereje muri icyo gihe.
Papa we yakomezaga yumva amakuru kuri radiyo, byabaye iminsi twirirwa mu rugo tukarara mu masaka.
Bidatinze, ndibuka ko nasanze mama ari mu muryango arimo kurira kuko abavaga i Kigali bahunze bazanye amakuru ko mukuru wanjye bamutaye muri Nyabarongo n’umugabo we n’umwana bahunga baza iwacu, bakavuga ko undi mukuru wanjye wari utwit bishe umugabo we hanyuma uwo mukuru wanjye bakamusatura ngo kuko yari atwite Inyenzi.
Mama yari afite agahinda kenshi gusa mukuru wanjye twakurikiranaga ni we wambwiye ibyo byose, mubaza impamvu babishe ansobanurira ko intambara yateye ko abahutu barimo kwica abatutsi, njye sinari nzi umuhutu cyangwa umututsi kuko njye n’aho nigaga ntawabimbajije kuko papa yari umwarimu buriya bari babizi niyo mpamvu batabimbajije.
Ubwo rero ibintu byabaye bibi batangira gusahura amazu, barasenya, inka batangira kuzirya ariko mama wanjye ku ikubitiro bahise bamwica bamukuye aho yari yihishe, gusa ikintu kinkomeretsa umutima ni uburyo mama bamwishe bamwambuye ubusa bamutera igisongo mu nda ibyara bamurambika mu muhanda kandi ari umubyeyi.
Ubwo twe aho twari twihishe na papa n’abo tuva inda imwe, amakuru twarayamenye ariko papa atubuza kurira gusa icyo yakoze amafaranga yari afite yahise ayaduha arayatugabanya ariko ngirango yadusezeragaho atubwira ko uzajya kutwica tuzayamuha gusa sinakubwira ngo yari angahe sinyibuka.
Ubwo aho twari turi twahise tuhava papa aravuga ngo tujye gupfira aho abandi bari, tujya ku musozi wari hakurya y’iwacu ariko twarebaga ibibera ku musozi w’iwacu.
Twari abantu benshi twicaye inyuma y’urubingo.
Ubwo interahamwe zamenye aho abantu bari, ni uko twagiye kubona tubona zirimo ziramanuka ziza ku musozi twariho, umugabo witwa Munyaburanga niwe wari uziri imbere n’ubu ifoto ye ( yambaye imyenda y’ama training ya orange) mpora nyibona kuko yari umuturanyi wacu.
Ubwo twagerageje kwiruka gusa papa we yarajijishije yinjira mu kabari ariko sinzi uwabatungiye agatoki bamusohoyemo baramutemagura bagenda bazi ko yapfuye, icyo gihe hapfuye abantu benshi cyane.
Twe rero twirukaga tutazi n’iyo tujya, nkanjye nakurikiraga bakuru banjye babiri twari kumwe ariko iby’abana nyine twaragarutse tujya kureba papa dusubira iwacu dusanga papa bamutemaguye avirirana amaraso, ubwo bafashe ikanzu nari nambaye bahita bayimuzirika mu mutwe dusubira mu matongo.
Nihuse rero twasubiye mu matongo, icyo gihe bavugaga ko abagore n’abakobwa batazongera kubica, ubwo hari ba masenge babiri twari kumwe bageragezaga gukanda papa bamuvura bya Kinyarwanda, bidatinze rero amakuru yaramenyekanye ko papa akiriho, maze baragaruka baramutemagura kuko atabyukaga rero batemaga nk’abatema igiti, uko bamutema agataka bigeze aho rero gutaka byarahagaze, twumvaga bavuga ko atakinyagambura bahita bagenda.
Aho twari twicaye rero amarira yari yarakamye ahubwo twaririmbaga indirimbo z’Imana.
Bakigenda mukuru wanjye Mignone (wigaga mu mwaka wa 5 w’amashuri abanza), ni nawe wari mukuru twasaga n’aho dusigaranye, aragenda na masenge witwaga Eveliyana barebye papa batubwira ko akiri muzima, mu byukuri ntiyagaragaraga mu maso ahantu hose yari amaraso kandi ntiyanavugaga yewe n’umusambi yari aryamyeho wari amaraso gusa, n’ibikuta byari byatarukiyeho amaraso kubera uburyo bamutemaga.
Gusa ba masenge bagerageje kumurwanaho yewe bamusabiraga mu baturanyi inyama z’inka zabatutsi babaga batemye bagatogosa inyama bakamusuka isupu mukanwa arongera arahembuka ntiyavugaga ariko yamenyaga umuntu.
Inshuro ya 3 ho baje ari simusiga n’umujinya mwinshi noneho bafata ishoka bahereza umugabo twari duturanye w’umututsi we bari baramuretse bavuga ko azipfusha, maze bati “Nutamwica nawe turakwic”.
Yari umugabo unanutse cyane kandi muremure, yateruye ishoka yikubitana nayo hasi, ni uko bafata ya shoka umutwe barawasa nk’abasa inkwi, bamusize yabaye amagufwa gusa kuko nta n’ubwo noneho wabashaga kubona ko ari umuntu ahubwo ba masenge abo na Mignone wabaye magorwa ari umwana nibo bazinze ikirago bari bamwashirijeho njye na mukuru wanjye wundi bahimbaga Mbegeti twarariraga, data yaratemwe, araswa, arakubitwa gusa Imana ibababarire.
Ubwo twabaye imfubyi gutyo na musaza wacu aho yari yihishe baje kumwica; abagore n’abakobwa twese badushyize hamwe batubwira ko tugomba kujya kwitaba kuri komine Kigoma tugenda tunyura ku mirambo y’abantu, ukumva baravuze bati ni kanaka.
Njye abenshi sinari mbazi gusa amazina narayumvaga.
Twageze kuri komine, abasiririkare n’abapolisi batangira kubohoza (gusambanya) abagore n’abakobwa twabaga turi kumwe bagenda bakuramo umwe agenda akongera akagaruka, twarahiriwe ku mugoroba bati musubire iyo mwaturutse.
Ubwo twaratashye ariko tuhageze badushyira ahantu hamwe, ni uko interahamwe yitwaga Gahindigiri iraza ifite ama grenade itangira kubaza aho mukuru wacu yagiye (umwe iwacu bohereje intambara igitangira akajya ku nshuti y’iwacu) tumubwira ko tutahazi akavuga ko nta kintu bakoze ko agiye kutwicira mu ishyamba ryuwitwa Karambizi.
Baradushoreye ariko dutanga amafaranga baraturekura n’abo ba masenge.
Icyo gihe abakobwa n’abagore barabohozwaga (bakabajyana kubasambanya) bamwe bakabatera amacumu mubirenge, n’izo mbabazi wumva kwari ukubica urw’agashinyaguro gusa.
Ku kandi gasozi duturanye abagore n’abakobwa bari babataye mu misarane bamaramo n’iminsi bamwe batarashiramo umwuka baririmba.
Muri icyo gihe rero njye amatariki sinyibuka ariko hari haciyeho iminsi.
Ubwo umunsi wo kutwica warageze rero, ni uko twese abagore n’abakobwa ari ninjoro ngirango hari nka saa moya cyangwa saa mbiri, baradushorera twese batwicaza hirya y’iwacu gatoya batangira kujya mungo basaba amatoroshi n’imihoro, baba baradushoreye bamwe imbere abandi inyuma natwe turi hagati ariko njye mbwira bakuru banjye babiri twari kumwe nti muze twiruke kuko nabonaga badutwaye mu ishyamba kandi ari ninjoro, nuko bati turatanga amafaranga kuko n’ubundi byajyaga bibaho bakadushorera mugatanga ayo mufite bakabarekura mukagenda ariko byabaga kumanywa.
Ni uko njye nkomeza kubabwira ariko njye numvaga mfite ubwoba bw’iryo shyamba.
Nagiye inyuma y’igishyitsi nk’ugiye kunyara, nari gatoya rero ngirango ntibambonye barakomeje umurongo wose urarangira bageze imbere gatoya bahise babicira aho batangira gutaka mbumva, umukobwa umwe witwaga Venantie niwe waharokotse bamuha imbabazi ariko nawe bari baramugize ikimuga kubera kwirirwa bamusambanya byanamuviriyemo gupfa nyuma ya Jenoside.
Gusa ni Imana iba ifite umugambi wayo ku muntu, nanjye rwose ni yo yabankijije kuko mugitondo nasubiye kureba aho babiciye numva ijwi rya Mignone ataka ngo bamuhe amazi barimo babataba mu byobo ariko we bamutaba itaka ryose rigahita rimuvaho kuko yarahumekega cyane asaba amazi, bamukubise ipiki mu mutwe mvuza induru muri iryo shyamba baba baranyirukankanye, mu kwiruka rero nahuye n’umusore arantangira, ni umusore wari uzi iwacu, icyo gihe igitero cyari kinyirukankanye nagendaga ntazi iyo njya maze uwo mugiraneza ati: “Nturi umwana wo kwa mwarimu?”
Ndamwikiriza maze ati ngwino, anjyana mu nzu maze abanyirukankagaho ntibamenya aho ndengeye.
Kubera kudasinzira, nahise nsinzira n’ibigori byokeje yampaye sinabiriye.
Nakangutse barimo batukana ngo navane inyenzi mu rugo, yatangiye knjya anjyana ku marondo akantwara anzingiye mu musambi akandaza mu bishyimbo cyangwa munzu ya mukuru we yari itaruzura yari aho hafi y’irondo, aho yanyitayeho Imana imuhe iruhuko ridashira yitwaga Feresiyani.
Byaranze abantu baza kubimenya anjyana ku rundi rugo rwa se kuko se yari afite abagore babiri, naho baranyirukana anshyira undi mugenzi we naho nahabaye iminsi naho baza kunyirukana uwo mugenziwe adahari ntangira kuzerera gutyo ntazi iyo mva ariko kuko hagati aho twigeze kujyana iwacu kuzana imyenda mu babisahuye kuko nta myenda nari mfite uretse iyo nari nambaye; inzira twanyuze narayibukaga ndagenda ariko nenda kuhagera mpura n’umugore wa Kaniziyo, yari n’inshuti ya mama ambonye ararira cyane ati “Koko ubu urajya hehe?.
Birirwa bagushakisha barakubuze none urizanye?”.
Ubwo yanjyanye mu nzu, imvura yahise igwa ari nyinshi, bambera abantu beza kuko banjyanye muri iyo mvura bampa ikote ry’umuhungu wabo, umugabo we arantwara n’amaguru anjyana ku wundi musozi duturanye ku muntu wari inshuti na papa.
Niho inkotanyi zansanze gusa Jenoside irangiye nza guhura n’abavandimwe banjye basigaye, kuri ubu dusigaye turi batatu gusa Imana yangiriye neza irandokora ni ubuntu yangiriye.
Ndahumuriza imfubyi zose nzibutsa ko Yesu ari we se w’impfubyi.
Jenoside irangiye ubuzima bwabaye bubi ariko Imana yagiye ibidutambutsamo iradukomeza iratwubakira kandi iranatwubaka yageretseho no kuduha abana.
Imana yambereye umubyeyi iramfasha ndiga, ingirira ubuntu injyana kwiga no muri Amerika Kaminuza ndayirangiza.
Ubu ndubatse mfite umugabo n’abana babiri, n’ubwo abana banjye batagira nyirakuru cyangwa sekuru ariko turabyara inshuti n’abavandimwe bakaduhemba.
Ikindi nshimira Imana ni uko yanshoboje abo twanyuranye mur iyo nzira y’umusaraba nkabashyingura, imva yabo nabashije kuyubakisha no kuyisukura mu bushobozi bwanjye bucye, ndumva hashyinguye 64 ni bo babasha kwibukwa abandi ntawubibuka ariko numva bavuga ko bashobora kuba barenga.
Ibyo mbishimira Imana cyane ko n’aho baruhukiye njye wabavuyemo ngasigara ariko ntabatereranye ababikoze njye narababariye n’ Imana ibabarire ariko kandi rero ntabwo nibagiwe.

#24538#	2	security	http://www.makuruki.rw/UMUTEKANO/article/Umunyamakuru-Ntawuyirushamaboko-afite-impungenge-kubw-amagambo-yabwiwe-na-Gitifu-w-Umurenge
Umunyamakuru Ntawuyirushamaboko arishinganisha nyuma yo gutukirwa mu biro na Gitifu Umunyamakuru wa Radio One na TV1 Ntawuyirushamabako Celestin, yatangaje ko afite impungenge z’umutekano we kubera amagambo yabwiwe n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Runda, mu Karere ka Kamonyi.
Aganira na Makuruki, Ntawuyirushamaboko yavuze ko byatangiye ubwo yari agiye gutara inkuru y’umugambo watemwe na mugenzi we akamuca ukuboko muri uwo murenge.
Ubwo Ntawuyirushamaboko hamwe n’umufasha gufata amashusho (cameraman) bageraga muri Runda, ngo babanje kujya aho umuturage yatemewe ngo babanze bavugane n’abaturage.
Nyuma yo kuvugana n’abaturage, bagiye ku biro by’Umurenge kureba umuyobozi wabaha andi makuru ajyanye n’uwo muntu watemwe, dore ko ari uwatemwe yari yajyanywe kwa muganga , abamutemye bo bakaba bataramenyekana.
Yagiz ati “Twabanje gutuma customer care ngo atubwirire ko dushaka gitifu, atubwira ko hari ibyo arimo bitararangira…nyuma twaje gutuma Etat civil dore ko yatubwiraga ko gitifu ari we wabikurikiranye kandi akaba ari na we muvugizi w’Umurenge…yaje kwemera , tukicara, aradutuka.”
Uyu munyamakuru unasanzwe atuye mu Murenge wa Runda, yakomeje avuga ko bakigera mu biro Gitifu yababwiye amagambo mabi.
Ati “Yatangiye kutubwira nabi, ngo uburyo mukora nibyo nshaka guca, ngo uwo muntu yaba yapfuye mwe mwamuzura.Naraye mbikurikirana ijoro ryose ndananiwe ngo muzaze ikindi gihe ngiye kuruhuka, cyangwa mujye gutangaza bimwe byanyu ko mwabuze amakuru, muvuge ibyo mushaka uzambaza nzisobanura.”
Ubwo ngo aba banyamakuru basohotse mu biro, bageze hanze basanga hari akuma ka camera bibagiriwemo basubira kukaza.
Ntawuyirushamaboko avuga ko ubwo yasubiraga kuzana ako kuma aribwo gitifu yamubwiye amagambo akomeye.
Ati “Nagiye gufata ako kuma kari kasigayemo arambwira ngo uri Umunyerunda nkaba undi, ntabwo uzahambana.Nabihaye uburemere kuko yavuze ko ntazahamubana.”
Nyirandayisabye Christine, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Runda aganira na Makuruki yavuze ko nta magambo mabi yabwiye abo banyamakuru.Yavuze ko yabasobanuriye ko ananiwe kubera kurara ijoro, abasaba kuzagaruka undi munsi akabaha amakuru.
Yagize ati “Ariko se kuki bakabya,ubwo afite ibimenyetso koko!
Nababwiye ko nakoze amanywa n’ijoro kuri kiriya kibazo, mbabwira ko naniwe kandi ko ari inkuru idasaza bashobora kuzagaruka nkabaha amakuru…ahubwo ashobora kuba yifitemo ikibazo, ntabyo navuze.”
Ntawuyirushamaboko avuga ko intandaro yabyo ishobora kuba ari inkuru yigeze gukora ku bayobozi b’Imirenge muri ako karere bangaga kwitaba itangazamakuru bavuga ko bari muri konji, ijwi ry’uwo gitifu rikaba rimwe muyo yakoresheje.
Ngo nyuma y’aho bahuriye ku Ruyenzi, gitifu amubwira ko aho bazahurira hose atazongera kumusuhuza ngo kuko yamusebeje amucisha kuri televiziyo.

#24550#	5	politics	http://igihe.com/politiki/amakuru/article/padiri-nahimana-na-bagenzi-bemeye-gusubira-mu-bihugu-baturutsemo
Padiri Nahimana na bagenzi bemeye gusubira mu bihugu baturutsemo Padiri Nahimana Thomas wari utegerejwe mu Rwanda ku gicamunsi cyo wa 23 Ugushyingo, akangirwa kuhagera ageze i Nairobi kubera ibibazo birimo ibyangombwa by'inzira,ubu yemeye ko we na bagenzi be basubira mu bihugu bari barimo.
Ni nyuma yuko yari ahamaze iminsi yaranze kuva ku izima avuga ko azahava ari uko yemerewe gutaha mu Rwanda, nyamara inzego zishinzwe abinjira n' abasohoka zari zamugaragarije ko adafite ibyangombwa byo gukandagira ku butaka bw'u Rwanda.
Padiri Nahimana yabwiye BBC yanditse iyi nkuru ko mu mishyikirano bagiranye na leta ya Kenya, abategetsi b'icyo gihugu bababwiye ko gukomeza kuba kuri icyo kibuga biri mu nzira zitanoze.
Byari biteganyijwe ko Padiri Thomas Nahimana wari waravuze ko azaza mu Rwanda gutangiza gahunda ye yo kuziyamamariza umwanya w'Umukuru w'Igihugu, agera i Kigali ku wa gatatu w'iki cyumweru.
Itsinda ry'abantu bari bazanye na Padiri Nahimana mu Rwanda ryari rigizwe na Venant Nkurunziza w'imyaka 33, Claire Nadine Kasinge w'imyaka 36 n'umwana we Kejo Skyler w'amezi arindwi.
Iyi nkuru ikomeza ivuga ko Claire Nadine Kasinge w'imyaka 36, ubu we yamaze gusubira muri Canada, naho Padiri Nahimana Thomas we aritegura gusubira mu Bufaransa, mu gihe Venant Nkurunziza bitaramenyekana niba ari busubire muri Malawi aho yabaga.

#24601#	0	entertainment	https://www.kigalitoday.com/imyidagaduro/ibirori/article/teta-mugabo-ange-nicole-nawe-asezerewe-muri-miss-rwanda
Teta Mugabo Ange Nicole nawe asezerewe muri Miss Rwanda Ku munsi wa nyuma wo gukuramo abakobwa ngo hasigare 15 bazagera Finali, Teta Mugabo Ange Nicole wari ufite numero 23 niwe usezerewe yuzuza umubare w’abakobwa batanu bagombaga kuvamo.
Nicole wambaye 23 niwe wasezerewe Mugabo Ange Nicole na Inyumba Charlotte bombi bwari ubwa kabiri bahagarara imbere nk’abatsinzwe bategereje gusa amahirwe yo gutabarwa na bagenzi babo, kuko no ku munsi wa mbere Mugabo yari yatabawe hasohorwa Higiro Joally, mu gihe Inyumba nawe yatabawe na bagenzi be ku munsi wa kane hasohorwa Tuyishime Cyiza Vanessa.
Kuri Inyumba Charlotte, gutabarwa inshuro ebyiri byumvikana nko kumenya kubana neza na bagenzi be kuko bamurokoye inshuro ebyiri zikurikiranya naho Mugabo ahita abura amahirwe yo kuguma muri 15.
Bombi imbere ya bagenzi babo, byagaragara ko bari bafite ubwoba, bibaza uri busigarane n’abandi.
Kimwe na bagenzi be basezerewe, Mugabo Ange Nicole wari wiyamamarije mu ntara y’amajyaruguru, bashobora kugira amahirwe yo kwegukana rimwe mu makamba atangirwa mu mwiherero, nka Miss Congeniality, Miss Heritage, na Miss photogenic, ariko batanu basezerewe ntabwo bazakandagira ku ruhimbi ruzatorerwaho Miss Rwanda 2019 uzasimbura Iradukunda Liliane.
Umunsi nyirizina wo gutanga ikamba no gutoranya ibisonga bya Miss, ni kuwa Gatandatu ku itariki ya 26 Mutarama 2019 I Rusororo ku nyubako ya Intare Conference Arena.
