#24621#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/ibiterane/article/korali-bethlehem-irahumuriza
Korali Bethlehem irahumuriza Abanyarwanda mu gihe bibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Yanditswe kuya 8-04-2014 saa 12:59' na Joel Sengurebe Korali Bethlehem yo muri ADEPR ururembo rwa Gisenyi mu Karere ka Rubavu, yateguye gahunda zo guhumuriza imitima y'Abanyarwanda mu gihe u Rwanda rwibuka ku nshuro ya 20 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Korali Bethlehem ni imwe mu muri korali zikunda kwifashishwa mu gihe cyo kwibuka bitewe n'indirimbo nyinshi zabo zirimo guhumuriza imitima y'Abanyarwanda , iyi korali yagize ubutumwa igenera abanyarwanda aho baboneraho no gutangaza ko biteguye neza kuzahumuriza imitima ya benshi mu bitaramo (...)
Korali Bethlehem yo muri ADEPR ururembo rwa Gisenyi mu Karere ka Rubavu, yateguye gahunda zo guhumuriza imitima y'Abanyarwanda mu gihe u Rwanda rwibuka ku nshuro ya 20 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Korali Bethlehem ni imwe mu muri korali zikunda kwifashishwa mu gihe cyo kwibuka bitewe n'indirimbo nyinshi zabo zirimo guhumuriza imitima y'Abanyarwanda , iyi korali yagize ubutumwa igenera abanyarwanda aho baboneraho no gutangaza ko biteguye neza kuzahumuriza imitima ya benshi mu bitaramo bazitabira mu rwego rwo kwibuka abazize Jenoside mu bice bitandukanye by'igihugu ariko cyane cyane mu karere ka Rubavu.
Nk'uko ubuyobozi bw'iyi korali bwabitangaje, ngo bagomba kuririmbira mu bikorwa bya nimugoroba byo kwibuka ahantu hatandukanye.
Mu hamaze kugenwa, harimo kuzifatikanya n'abakozi b'ibitaro bya Gisenyi mu gihe bazaba barimo kwibuka abakozi babo bazize Jenocide, kwifatanya n'abaturage batuye mu midugudu iri mu mbago z'urusengero rwa ADEPR Gisenyi , hamwe no kuzifatanya na Hoteli Serena ishami rya Gisenyi aho bazibuka abakozi n'abakiriya bayo bahiciwe kuko icyo gihe ahari "Serena hoteli ya Gisenyi" yitwaga "Hotel Merdien Izuba" ikaba yarabuze abakozi benshi n'abakiriya barimo icyo gihe.
Ubuyobozi bw'iyi korali bwakomeje buvuga ko ubutumwa bwa Korali Bethlehem muri iki gihe cy'icyunamo ari ukubwira Abanyarwanda, cyane cyane abasizwe iheruheru na Jenocide ko mu ijuru hari Imana yita ku mfubyi n'abapfakazi kandi ko umugambi w'Imana ari mwiza ku Banyarwanda.
Korali Bethlehem mu butumwa bwayo muri iyi minsi y'icyunamo yagize iti : "Nk'Abanyarwanda, n'ubwo twanyuze mu bikomeye kubw'ubumwe no gutahiriza umugozi umwe bituranga hariho ibyiringiro ijana ku ijana ko ibyabaye bitazongera ukundi, kandi Imana nayo ntizabura kudushyigikira kuko Yesu ntacyo tuzamuburana.
Yatubereye byose kandi ubwo tumwiringiye nta soni zizadukora nta nubwo tuzikorera amaboko kuko hamwe na Yesu ukorera mu buyobozi bwiza dufite, Abanyarwanda tuzakora iby'ubutwari."
Umuyobozi wa Bethlehem yakomeje avuga ko mu mishinga bafite harimo ko nibamara kumurika album yabo y'amashusho ya 6 bise "Ntacyo nzaburana Yesu" bazamurika mu kwezi kwa gatanu , Album yabo izakurikira izaba igizwe n'indirimbo zo kwibuka Jenoside, guhumuriza no gukangurira Abanyarwanda ubumwe n'ubwiyunge batibagiwe na gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda.
Korali Bethlehem irahumuriza Abanyarwanda mu gihe bibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#24637#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/kutagira-impamyabushobozi-za-wda-bituma-batabona-inguzanyo
Kutagira impamyabushobozi za WDA bituma batabona inguzanyo Urubyiruko rwo mu Karere ka Bugesera rwemeza ko kutagira impamyabushobozi itangwa na WDA bibazitira kubona inguzanyo itangwa n’amabanki abafasha gutangira umurimo.
Guhabwa impamyabushobozi zitangwa na WDA bituma babona inguzanyo Rutagengwa Patrick ahagarariye abakorera ububaji mu gakiriro ka Nyamata avuga ko iyi mbogamizi yo kutagira impamyabushobozi itangwa n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere imyuga n’ubumenyingiro (WDA).
Yagize ati “Ku ikubitiro ntitwemerewe guhabwa inguzanyo yo gutangiza umushinga ingana n’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ibihumbi 500, atangwa ari uko ufite impamyabushobozi ya WDA, aho uwayihawe yishyura kimwe cya kabiri andi akaba ari inkunga”.
Nsengiyumva Jean Marie nawe akorera ubukorikori mu gakiriro ka Nyamata avuga ko leta igomba kubagoboka nabo ikabaha amahugurwa kugirango babashe kubona icyangombwa kibemerera guhabwa inguzanyo.
Ati “Nkatwe twize kera tudafite izi mpamyabushobozi za WDA bagomba kudutekerezaho kuko turazikeneye cyane kugirango natwe tubone kuri ayo mafaranga yo kujya kwikorera”.
Taifa Steven, Umukozi w’Akarere ka Bugesera ushinzwe kongera imirimo muri gahunda ya NEP KORA WIGIRE, arasaba abafite iki kibazo ko bakwishyira hamwe maze ubuyobozi bw’akarere bukavugana na WDA ikaza kubaha ikizamini kugira ngo babone izi mpamyabushobozi”.
Imibare itangwa n’abakorera mu gakiriro ka Nyamata igaragaza ko abagera kuri 50 bagakoreramo nta mpamyabushobozi za WDA bagira.
Ni ikibazo bahuriyeho n’abandi bakorera mu dukiriro dutandukanye two muri aka karere.
Ufite iyi mpamyabushobozi ahabwa amafaranga ibihumbi 500 ari mu mirenge SACCO, kugira ngo afashe abize imyuga kubona intangiriro yo kugura ibikoresho mu rwego rwo gukemura ibura ry’akazi mu rubyiruko.

#24646#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/football/article/rayon-sports-nidahabwa-igikombe-ku-mukino-wa-apr-fc-ngo-izacyakirira-mu-iposita
Rayon Sports nidahabwa igikombe ku mukino wa APR FC ngo izacyakirira mu Iposita Mu gihe shampiyona igana ku musozo, ntibirasobanuka hagati ya Ferwafa na Rayon Sports yegukanye igikombe ikifuza ko mu gihe itagishyikirizwa ku mukino wa nyuma izakinira imbere y’abafana bayo tariki 28 Gicurasi na APR FC, ngo izacyakira kinyuze mu Iposita.
Kuwa Mbere y’iki cyumweru Umuvugizi wa Ferwafa, Ruboneza Prosper, yatangarije IGIHE ko ubusanzwe nta tegeko rigena aho ikipe yegukanye igikombe mbere y’uko shampiyona irangira igishyikirizwa, bityo icyemezo kikaba cyagombaga gufatwa mu nama ya Ferwafa na Azam nk’umuterankunga kuri uyu wa Gatatu.
IGIHE yagerageje kuvugana n’Umuvugizi wa Ferwafa ku myanzuro yafashwe ntiyaboneka, ariko hari amakuru yatangiye kuvuga ko igikombe gishobora kuzatangwa ku munsi wa nyuma wa shampiyona; ni ukuvuga Rayon Sports yagiye gusura Kiyovu Sports kuri Stade Mumena.
Ariko kumva kugiherwa ku mukino Rayon Sports izaba yasuye Umunyamabanga wa Rayon Sports, Gakwaya Olivier, yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu munsi bandikiye Ferwafa ibaruwa isaba ko bahabwa igikombe imbere y’abafana babo gusa batarasubizwa ariko igihe bitaba bikunze igikombe bakihorera no ku mukino wa nyuma.
Yagize ati “Twanditse dusaba ko twahabwa igikombe ku mukino wa nyuma tuzakira kugira ngo n’abafana bacu babashe kucyishimira, dukore ibirori byose dushaka twigenga kuko nta muntu uzaba atubaza imitegurire y’uwo munsi.”
Abajwije niba hari icyo bahomba igihe bagihabwa ku munsi wa nyuma basuye Kiyovu Sports, Gakwaya yagize ati “Ntekereza ko ntacyo byaba bitumariye.
Icyo gihe nta cyo dukeneye, ntacyo dukeneye rwose.
Nta nubwo twifuza ko byazakorwa, babyihorera n’ubundi.”
“Icya ngombwa ni ugutwara igikombe kuko nubundi twaragitwaye.
Kukiduha rero ni umuhango ariko kubikorera ahandi nta nyungu tubifitemo uretse wenda izo Ferwafa ifitemo.
Twebwe rero ntabwo tubikeneye.
Ubwo bakireka bakazagiha Iposita ikakituzanira nta kundi.”
Gakwaya yanavuze ko ibirori byo kwakira igikombe byatangiye gutegurwa, hakaba hari umutambagiro w’abafana uteganyijwe mbere yo kwinjira muri stade, hatumiwe abahanzi bazasusurutsa abantu n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Nubwo mu Rwanda nta tegeko rigena uko ikipe yatwaye igikombe igihabwa, muri amwe mu mashampiyona yateye imbere nka La Liga muri Epagne ho igikombe gitangirwa mu rugo rw’ikipe yacyegukanye ndetse byatumye uyu mwaka Real Madrid itagihabwa kuko yagitwaye yakiniye hanze, biba ngombwa ko izagishyikirizwa umwaka utaha yakiniye iwayo.

#24674#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/umuntu-wa-kabiri-yakize-sida
Umuntu wa kabiri yakize SIDA Umurwayi wiswe ‘London Patient’ yabaye uwa kabiri ukize SIDA, nyuma y’uko mu myaka 10 ishize, hatangajwe umuntu wa mbere wakize iyi ndwara ubusanzwe izwiho kudakira.
Umugabo wiswe ‘umurwayi w’i Londre’ cyangwa se ‘London patient’, nawe ubu nta kimenyetso na kimwe agaragaza cy’umuntu ufite virusi ya SIDA uhereye mu mezi 19 ashize nk’uko byatangajwe mu kinyamakuru “Nature”.
Abo barwayi bombi, bavuwe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ryo gusimbuza imisokoro yo mu magufa yabo ‘bone marrow transplants’, ikoranabuhanga risanzwe rikoreshwa kugira ngo havurwe kanseri zo mu maraso, maze bahabwa utunyangingo twavuye ku bantu bafite imibiri itajya yandura virusi itera SIDA.
Dr Ravindra Gupta, Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya Cambridge, wanayoboye ubu bushakashatsi, avuga kuri uwo muntu wakize yagize ati "Kugira ngo umurwayi wa kabiri akire, hifashishijwe uburyo bwakoreshejwe ku murwayi wa mbere wakize SIDA, twerekanye ko umurwayi wiswe uwa Berlin “Berlin patient” , nawe atari umuntu udasanzwe”.
Hirya no hino ku isi, habarurwa za miliyoni z’abantu bafite virusi itera SIDA, bagakomeza guhabwa imiti (antiretroviral therapy), ivugwa ko igabanya ubukana bw’iyo virusi gusa iyo miti ntimara virusi ya Sida mu mubiri w’uyisanganywe.
Gupta yagize ati "kugeza ubu, uburyo bwo kuvura virusi ya SIDA buhari, ni ugutanga imiti irwanya iyo virusi, umuntu agomba gafata ubuzima bwose.
"Iki kiracyari ikibazo gikomeye ku bihugu biri mu nzira y’amajyambere, aho miliyoni z’abantu bafite virusi ya SIDA, batabona imiti iboneye igenewe kugabanya ubukana bw’iyo virusi".
Abantu hafi miliyoni 37 hirya no hino ku isi, bafite virusi itera sida, ariko 59 % gusa, ni bo bonyine babona imiti igabanya ubukana.
Buri mwaka, hafi miliyoni y’abantu ku isi, bapfa bazize indwara zuririye kuri virusi itera SIDA.
Gupta n’ikipe ye, bashimangiye ko kuvura umurwayi wa Sida, hasimburwa imisokoro yo mu magufa ye, ari ibintu bigoye kandi bibabaza.
Bityo ko atari bwo buryo bwonyine bwo kuvura virusi ya SIDA.
Gusa kuba umurwayi wa kabiri yakize nyuma yo gusimburirwa imisokoro, ibyo bishobora kuzafasha abashakashatsi mu kubona aho berekeza ubushakashatsi bakora, bagamije kubona umuti w’iyo virusi nk’uko Gupta yakomeje abisobanura.
Ese uwo muti, ubu urizewe watangira gukoreshwa Sharon R Lewin, Umuyobozi mukuru w’ ikigo gikora ubushakashatsi ku ndwara ziterwa na virusi kitwa “Peter Doherty Institute for Infection and Immunity”, yabwiye ibiro ntaramakuru by’Abafaransa AFP ko bishoboka.
Yagize ati, "Uyu muntu wa kabiri wakize, aratuma dushyigikira igitekerezo cy’uko ubu buryo bwo kuvura bushoboka.
"Dushobora kugerageza, tukareba ikiri muri uko gusimburirwa imisokoro, cyaba cyarafashije uyu mugabo, kigatuma anahagarika imiti igabanya ubukana bwa virusi."
Umuryango mpuzamahanga w’abafite ubwandu bw’agakoko gatera Sida “The International AIDS Society”, kuri uyu wa kabiri, bamaze kumva ko umurwayi wa kabiri yakize, bagize bati, "Ibi bije bishimangira ibyo twajyaga twizera, ko virusi ya Sida ikira".
Abarwayi bombi, uw’I Berlin n’uw’i Londre batewe uturemangingo twavuye ku bantu batajya bandura virusi itera Sida bazwi nka “CCR5”.
Gupta yagize ati, "Kubona uburyo bwo kuvura SIDA igakira burundu, ni ikintu kihutirwa muri rusange, ariko ikibazo gikomeye, ni uko iyo virusi, ijya mu tunyangingingo tw’amaraso “white blood cells” tw’uyifite".
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe kuri uwo mugabo wo mu Bwongereza, bwerekanye ko afite virusi itera SIDA mu 2003, atangira gufata imiti igabanya ubukana kuva mu 2012.
Muri uwo mwaka kandi, yaje gusuzumwa basanga arwaye kanseri y’amaraso ‘Lymphoma’.
Mu 2016, yahawe utunyangingo twatanzwe n’abantu batajya bandura virusi itera SIDA, dore ko ari abantu bake cyane bafite utwo tunyangingo.
Ni ukuvuga ko ari umuntu umwe ku ijana by’abaturage batuye isi bose.
Nyuma yo gusimburirwa imisokoro yo mu magufa, umurwayi w’i Londre yagumye ku miti igabanya ubukana, mu gihe cy’amezi 16, nyuma arayihagarika, kuva ubwo iyo bapimaga basangaga nta virusi igaragara mu maraso ye.
Timothy Brown, wiswe umurwayi wa Berlin "Berlin patient", ari we wabaye uwa mbere wakize SIDA,we yasimburijwe imisokoro inshuro ebyiri, nyuma ahabwa imiti yo kuvura ibibazo by’imisokoro n’ibindi bigize amaraso byagaragaraga ko bifite inenge, ibyo bita “leukaemia”, nyamara umurwayi wo mu Bwongereza we, yasimburijwe imisokoro inshuro imwe gusa, anahabwa imiti ya kanseri yoroheje ”chemotherapy”.
Ubwo yandikaga mu Kinyamakuru cyandika ku buzima mu 2015, asobanura impamvu atangaje amazina ye nyayo, yagize ati,"Numva nifuza ko ntaba ari njye muntu wakize SIDA ku isi njyenyine".
Itsinda ryakoze ubushakashatsi ku murwayi wakize w’i Londre, rizatangaza ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi byose mu nama ngarukamwaka yitwa “Conference on Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections (CROI) in Seattle”,izabera i Washington.

#24719#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/MU-MAFOTO-Uko-Umuganda-wakozwe-mu-bice-bimwe-by-Umujyi-wa-Kigali-henshi-haranzwe-ubwitabire-buke-cyane
MU MAFOTO: Uko Umuganda wakozwe mu bice bimwe by'Umujyi wa Kigali, henshi haranzwe ubwitabire buke cyane Nkuko bisanzwe uwa gatandatu wa nyuma w'ukwezi wahariwe ibikorwa by'Umuganda rusange mu gihugu hose.
Kuri uyu wa gatandatu usoza ukwezi kwa Gashyantare 2015, umuganda twavuga wo ku rwego rw'igihugu ukaba wabereye mu Karere ka Gatsibo, aho witabiriwe n'abayobozi bakuru bose b'igihugu kuva ku rwego rw'abayobozi b'Ubuterere bose kugeza kuri Perezida wa Sena (bitabiriye Umwiherero w'abayobozi bakuru wa 12).
Tukazaba kubagezaho inkuru irambuye mu masaha ari imbere.
By'umwihariko mu mujyi wa Kigali, twanyarukiye mu bice bitandukanye by'Umujyi wa Kigali ahari hateganyijwe ibikorwa bisa nk'ibyihariye, aho wasangaga ubwitabire butari bwinshi cyane kubera imvura yaguye mu masaha umuganda wari utangiye.
Ubwo twageraga mu Karere ka Nyarugenge mu Murenge wa Kanyinya uherereye mu nkengero z'Umujyi, twasanze abaturage n'abayobozi bari gufata gusiza ahazatuzwa impunzi z'abanyarwanda zatahutse ziva muri Tanzaniya.
Imvura ikaba yabarogoye ariko bari batangiye ibikorwa by'Umuganda.
Ubwitabire bwari buringaniye ugereranyije n'ahandi Abaturage bafatanyaga n'abayobozi babo gusiza ibibanza Mu mujyi wa Kigali rwagati, abayobozi b'Umujyi wa Kigali barangajwe imbere na Perezida wa Nyanama y'Umujyi Bwana Sebashongore Dieudonne ari bifatanyije n'abaturage b'Umurenge wa Gitega mu Kagali ka Musezero, aho bafatanyije mu bikorwa byo gusur hafi ya ruhurura nini ituruka munsi ya Gereza nkuru ya Nyarugegenge.
Ubwitabire bw'abantu bukaba butari bwinshi n'ubwo byahise bihumira ku mirari ubwo imvura yagwaga.
Bari bake bihagije Benshi bari abana Sebashongore Dieudonne, Perezida w'Inama njyanama y'Umujyi wa Kigali Mu Murenge wa Gatsata ho mu Karere ka Gasabo, Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Gasabo wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y'abaturage Rangwida Nyirabahire yifatanyije n'abaturage bo muri uyu murenge mu gikorwa cyo guhanga umuhanga w'umugenderano.
Nyuma y'iki gikorwa cy'umuganda abaturage bakoze igikorwa cyo kwegeranya amafaranga y'ubwisungane yo gufasha abatishoboye.
MuMurenge wa Gatsata abaturage bari benshi Uyu muturage ntiyakanzwe n'imvura itari iboroheye Bakusanyije amafranga yo gufasha abatishoboye badafite mitiweri Visi Meya ushinzwe imibereho y'abaturage muri Gasabo yaganiriye n'abaturage nyuma y'umuganda Ahandi twabashije kugera ni mu Murenge wa Bumbogo mu Karere ka Gasabo, mu Kagari ka Gasave aho abaturage bari bakereye gushyiraho akabo mu gusiza ahazubakwa agakiriro.
Ni Umurenge uri mu gice cy'icyaro ahasanzwe hari agasoko karebwa n'abaturage bo muri uwo murenge n'abawegereye.
Umuyobozi w'uyu murenge Alfred Nduwayezu akaba yifatanyije n'aba baturgae ndetse na bamwe mu bajyanama b'Umujyi wa Kigali bari baje kubatera ingabo mu bitugu.
Abaturage baje bashaka gushyiraho akabo mu gusiza ahazubakwa Agakiriro Ubuyobozi bwunganiye imbaraga z'abaturage bubashakira imashini Nubwo imbeho yari nyinshi ntibyabujije abaturage gutegereza inama nyuma y'umuganda Umuyobozi w'Umurenge Nduwayezu Alfred (wambaye ikoti ry'umukara) ubwo yaganiraga n'abaturage nyuma y'umuganda.

#24734#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/covid-19-abarwayi-bashya-59-barimo-49-babonetse-i-kigali
Abo barwayi 59 babonetse mu bipimo 2,871, abamaze kuboneka mu Rwanda banduye icyo cyorezo bose hamwe baba 1,172.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yasobanuye ko abo barwayi bashya 59 barimo 49 babonetse mu kigo kinyurwamo by’igihe gito cya Kigali n’abari mu kato mu Karere ka Kicukiro .
Hari kandi batanu (5) babonetse i Rusizi, batatu (3) babonetse i Nyamasheke, i Kirehe habonetse umuntu umwe (1) n’undi umwe (1) wabonetse i Nyagatare.
Abantu makumyabiri mu bari barwaye bakize, abamaze gukira bose hamwe baba 595, naho abakirwaye ni 574.
Abamaze kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo mu Rwanda ni batatu.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima isaba abaturarwanda bose gukomeza kwitwararika bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.

#24747#	4	health	https://rwandamagazine.com/ubuzima/article/akamaro-k-ubuki-mu-kuvura-ndetse-no-kurinda-indwara-zifata-umutima
Akamaro k’ubuki mu kuvura ndetse no kurinda indwara zifata umutima Muri iki gihe indwara z’umutima ziri guhitana benshi kubera imibereho ya buri munsi iba itameze neza ,hamwe usanga abantu benshi bafite umubyibuho ukabije badakora imyitozo ngororamubiri ndetse n’ibindi.
Ubushakashatsi butandukanye bwagaragaje ko ubuki bwifitemo ubushobozi bwo kurinda izi ndwara zifata umutima ndetse bukaba bwanafasha mu kuvura zimwe muri izo ndwara.
Muri iyi nkuru rero tugiye kubagezaho byinshi utari uzi ku buki mu kurinda ndetse no kuvura indwara z’umutima.
Ibyiza by’ubuki ku mikorere y’umutima wacu 1.
Ubuki butuma umutima utera neza Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko unuki bufasha umutima gutera neza,nka ba bantu rero umutima wabo uba utera nabi ni byiza ko yajya byibura arya ku buki mbere yo kurya.
2.
Ubuki bwongerera imbaraga umutima Burya uko umuntu agenda asaza,umutima ugenda utakaza imbaraga ukagenda unanirwa,ubuki rero burya ngo ni bwiza mu gutuma umutima wawe ugira imbaraga bityo ntucike integer ku buryo bworoshye.
3.
Ubuki butuma amaraso atembera neza mu mutima Iyo amaraso adatembera neza mu mutima,umutima nawo ntubasha gusunika amaraso neza mu mubiri,ibi rero bituma umubiri wose ugira ikibazo.Ngo ni byiza byibuze kurya utuyiko 3 tw’ubuki ku munsi kugira ngo wirinde icyo kibazo.
4.
Ubuki bugabanya urugimbu mu mutima Iya urugimbu (Cholesterol) rubaye rwinshi mu mitsi y’umutima,irifunga bityo bigatera indwara y’umutima bita coronary heart disease,ubuki rero bufasha gusukura iyi mitsi yo mu mutima.Ni byiza gufata byibuze utuyiko 3 tw’ubuki ku munsi.
5.
Ubuki bugabanya ububabare bw’umutima Ku barwaye umutima,usanga akenshi bababara mu gatuza mu gice umutima uherereyemo,iyo urya byibuze hagati y’utuyiko 3 na 5 tw’ubuki ku munsi birinda uko kubabara k’umutima.
Icyitonderwa: Nubwo tumaze kubona ko ubuki ari bwiza ku mikorere y’umutima,birabujijwe guha ubuki abana bari hasi y’umwaka 1 kuko bushobora kubatera ikibazo.
Wari uzi ko habonetse imiti ikozwe mu bimera irinda ndetse ikanavura indwara zifata umutima?
Nkuko tumaze kubibona hejuru,ubuki ni bwiza ku mutima wacu,gusa nanone hari ababa barwaye indwara zitandukanye zifata umutima.Ubu rero habonetse imiti ikoze mu bimera ivura ndetse ikanarinda indwara zifata umutima.Muri iyo miti twavugamo Cardiopower Capsule, Super CoQ10 Capsule, Deep sea fish oil Capsule,… Irizewe kandi nta zindi ngaruka igira ku wayikoresheje.
Uramutse ukeneye iyi miti y’umwimerere wahamagara kuri numero 0789433795/0726355630 cyangwa ukagana aho Horaho Life ikorera mu mugi wa Kigali mu nyubako yo kwa Rubangura Muri etaji ya 3 mu muryango wa 301 na 302.
PT Jean Denys NDORIMANA

#24750#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/bk-igiye-gutanga-inyungu-ku-migabane-ingana-na-miliyari-8-3-frw
BK igiye gutanga inyungu ku migabane ingana na miliyari 8.3 Frw Banki ya Kigali (BK) yatangaje ko igiye gutanga inyungu ku migabane igera kuri miliyari 8,302,347,000 Frw, ni ukuvuga agera kuri 40% by’inyungu yabonetse mu mwaka ushize.
Inyungu ku mugabane umwe mu 2016 ni 12.3 Frw, aho igice kinini gisigaye cy’inyungu kizashyirwa mu ishoramari hagamijwe iterambere rya banki.
Kugeza kuwa 31 Ukuboza 2016, BK yungutse miliyari 20.8 Frw, iyi nyungu ikaba yarazamutse ivuye kuri miliyari 20.5 yinjiye mu 2015.
Kuri uyu wa 5 Gicurasi, ubuyobozi bwa BK bwamenyesheje abanyamigabane mu Nteko Rusange, ko mu mwaka ushize amafaranga banki yakiriye aturutse mu bakiliya bayo yageze kuri miliyari 419.0 Frw avuye kuri miliyari 384.7Frw mu 2015, ndetse umutungo mbumbe wa Banki ya Kigali ugera kuri miliyari 638.3 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 561.2 Frw mu 2015.
Inguzanyo yatanze mu mwaka ushize na zo zarazamutse cyane kuko ziyongereyeho 22% ugereranyije n’umwaka wabanje, kuko zageze kuri miliyari 397.6 Frw, zivuye kuri miliyari 324.8 Frw mu 2015.
Umuyobozi w’Icyubahiro wa BK, Marc Holtzman, yavuze ko kuba banki imaze imyaka 10 iyoboye izindi, mu bihe biri imbere idashobora kwihanganira ubunebwe cyangwa kudasubiza ibyifuzo by’abakiliya.
Yavuze ko ubutumwa aha abanyamigabane ba Banki ya Kigali iri kwizihiza imyaka 50 ari uko iri kugana aheza, yitangaho urugero ko yaguze imigabane muri BK ubwo isoko ryafungurwaga mu Ugushyingo 2016, ubwo yaguraga imigabane 706,000 ayiguriye abana be bane bato, yiyongera kuri 1180 000 yaguze muri Nzeri 2011.
Yagize ati “Naguzemo imigabane kandi sinjye gusa n’ababana narabaguriye.
Ntabwo nigeze ngurisha imigabane yanjye, nta nubwo nteganya kuyigurisha igihe cyose nkiri muzima, mfite icyizere cy’ahazaza h’iyi banki.”
Yabwiye abanyamigabane ko kuba umugabane w’iyi banki ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane utari kuzamura igiciro (ubu umugabane uri kuri 244Frw), ahanini biri guterwa n’uko isoko rihagaze kuko udasanga hari abantu bagura imigabane umunota ku munota, ariko icy’ingenzi ni uko abaguze imigabane bahabwa inyungu yabo kandi hari icyizere ko mu gihe kiri imbere uzazamuka.
Umuyobozi wa Banki ya Kigali, Dr Diane Karusisi, yavuze ko uyu mwaka udasanzwe kuri BK, aho iri kwizihiza imyaka 50 imaze itanga serivisi z’imari, yizeza abanyamigabane ko hari byinshi biteganyijwe mu bihe biri imbere.
Yagize ati “Mu 2017 dufite icyizere cyo gukomeza uburyo bw’imari busanzwe, no guhanga udushya muri serivisi n’ibyo dukorera abakiliya.
Mobile Banking izafasha byinshi muri uyu mwaka.
” BK ikomeje guhindura uburyo yakoragamo ubucuruzi, nk’aho muri Werurwe 2017 yatangije ikigo BK TecHouse kigiye kwita cyane ku iterambere ry’ikoranabuhanga no guhanga ibisubizo birishingiyeho.
Ni ikigo yatangije nyuma y’iminsi mike hatangiye ikindi gitanga ubwishigizi, BK General Insurance, na gahunda yiswe ‘Urumuri Initiative’, aho ibitekerezo bitanu by’indashyikirwa mu ikoranabuhanga bizahabwa miliyoni 60 Frw.
Icyo kigo cy’ubwigishizi cyitezweho umusaruro ufatika, kuko imibare yerekana ko abafite ubwishingizi mu Rwanda bagera kuri 3%, byerekana amahirwe akomeye ari kuri iri soko.
Ubuyobozi bwa BK bwamenyesheje abanyamigabane mu Nteko Rusange ko igiye gutanga nyungu ku migabane Umuyobozi w’Inama y'Ubutegetsi wa BK, Marc Holtzman Umuyobozi wa Banki ya Kigali, Dr Diane Karusisi (Iburyo) Bamwe mu banyamigabane ba BK bitabiriye inama rusange Umuyobozi w'Urugaga rw'Abavoka, Me Kavaruganda Julien, umwe mu bagize Inama y'ubutegetsi ya BK Amafoto: Luqman Mahoro

Ommy Dimpoz yafungiwe muri Amerika agirango ari muri hoteli Umuhanzi wo mu gihugu cya Tanzaniya Ommy Dimpoz yatangaje ko yasoreje umwaka mu gihome ubwo yari muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika azira gukora igitaramo adafite uburenganzira .
Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2015 nibwo umuhanzi Ommy Dimpoz yari muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika aho yari yagiye agiye mu biruhuko by'iminsi mikuru.

Ommy Dimpoz yaje gufungurwa nyuma y'umunsi umwe gusa yanga guhita abitangaza aho yavuze ko atiyumvishaga uburyo yafunzwe .

#24762#	5	politics	https://umubavu.com/politike/article/No-mu-minsi-iza-tuzahatana-mu-matora-Umuvugizi-wa-DALFA-UMURINZI-Video
No mu minsi iza tuzahatana mu matora-Umuvugizi wa DALFA-UMURINZI-Video Umuvugizi w’ishyaka DALFA-UMURINZI ritaremerwa mu Rwanda, Mahoro Jean avuga ko mu ishyaka abereye umuvugizi biteguye gukora hasi no hejuru bakumvisha abanyarwanda ibishyizwe imbere muri iri shyaka birimo Politiki y’amahoro igamije kugirira neza abaturage, yahishuye ko ngo no mu matora ari imbere bazayahatanamo.
Iri shyaka riharanira iterambere n’ubwisanzure kuri bose (Development and Liberty For All), DALFA-Umurinzi, Mahoro avugira, ryashinzwe n’umunyepolitiki utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi buriho mu Rwanda, Madamu Ingabire Victoire mu mwaka ushize wa 2019, akaba ari na we uribereye umuyobozi.
Mahoro Jean uvugira DALFA-Umurinzi, ni umusore wacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside Yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda muri Mata 1994, avuka mu Karere ka Ngororero mu Murenge wa Ngororero nkuko abyivugira.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’umunyamakuru w’UMUBAVU, Mahoro yatangiye avuga ku bantu usanga bumva nabi ’Opozisiyo’ bakayifata nk’abanzi b’igihugu, nk’ibyihebe cyangwa nk’abantu bagambiriye kugirira nabi igihugu cyabo cyangwa ubutegetsi buriho, akavuga ko kuri we Opozisiyo atayifata nk’ababitekereza gutya,.
Kuri we ati "Opozisiyo ni uburyo ushobora gutangamo ibitekerezo byawe uko ubibona kubera ko uri ku butegetsi ubona hari ibyo mutari kwemeranwaho, noneho wa wundi uri ku butegetsi akaba yabikosora, igihe atabikosoye, wowe uri mu ishyaka riri ku ruhande, hakaba hari igihe cyazagera kubera bya bitekerezo byawe byiza ufite, abantu bakagukurikira bakavuga bati ’noneho turabona uri ku butegetsi adashoboye, ngwino utuyobore kuko uriho hari ibyo atabashije kubahiriza, iyo ni yo Opozisiyo ubundi’ ".
Abajijwe uburyo azahangana n’abantu batumva neza Opozisiyo icyo ari cyo, Mahoro ati "Burya, kugira ngo ibintu bihinduke, ni uko ubanza kubivuga noneho ukanabyumvisha abantu, twe twiteguye gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo twumvishe abanyarwanda ko twebwe muri DALFA-Umurinzi icyo dushyize imbere ari Politiki y’amahoro, igamije kugirira neza abaturage, guha ubwisanzure abantu bose, no kubaka amahoro arambye ndetse no kugeza iterambere ku bantu bose muri rusange".
Avuga ko ngo ibi bazakomeza kubivuga no kubisobanura kandi ngo ikizabibafashamo ni uko muri DALFA-Umurinzi ibyo bazashinjwa byose ngo byaba no gutotezwa binyuze mu binyamakuru n’ahandi, bazagerageza kwerekana ko ntaho bahuriye n’ibyo bikorwa, ati "Kandi nta kimenyetso na kimwe kizagaragaza ko twebwe abantu bo muri DALFA-Umurinzi tugamije kugirira nabi igihugu cyacu, ingobyi iduhetse".
Mahoro akomeza avuga ku rubyiruko rwirirwa rwikurikirira iby’abandi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, akavuga ko rukwiriye kugira uruhare muri Politiki y’igihugu ngo kuko ibiri gukorwa ubu ari rwo bizagiraho ingaruka.
Atanga urugero ku kuba muri 1994, urubyiruko rwinshi rw’icyo gihe arirwo rwijanditse muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Akavuga ko uru rubyiruko rw’iki gihe iyo ruza guhaguruka rukanga ibyabaga, bitari gushyirwa mu bikorwa, ati "Urubyiruko ruhagurukiye hamwe rugakora ibyiza, rugatanga umusanzu warwo mu kubaka Politiki nziza y’igihugu, byatanga umusaruro mwiza kuri ejo hazaza ndetse n’ubungubu muri rusange".
Abajijwe ku bitagenda ku rubyiruko rw’ubu, agaruka ku kuba urubyiruko rutinya cyane Politiki ruvuga ko itarureba, ugasanga ngo rwiha umupaka ruvuga ko hari ibitarureba, ngo rukwiye gutinyuka ndetse rukumva ko rushoboye.
Uyu muvugizi wa DALFA-UMURINZI kandi yabajijwe ku isakwa ry’umuyobozi w’irishya, Madamu Ingabire Victoire ryakozwe n’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize uru rwego ngo ruvuga ko ruri mu iperereza ku kuba yaba akorana n’imitwe irwanya ubutegetsi buriho, avuga ko atavugaho byinshi kuko n’ubundi bikiri mu iperereza.
Yabajijwe kandi kuri Venant Abayisenga wavuye mu rugo kwa Ingabire agiye kugura ama-unités ya Telefone kuva ubwo ntagaruke akaburirwa irengero, avuga ko nkuko amategeko abiteganya umunyamategeko wabo yatanze ikirego bityo bakaba bategereje igisubizo cy’inzego z’iperereza.
Ku barwanashyaka ba DALFA-UMURINZI bakunze kumvikana baburiwe irengero cyangwa bikavugwa ko bishwe, yabajijwe niba nta raporo nyirizina yakozwe n’inzego zibishinzwe igaragaza nyirizina uko byagenze, avuga ko ibi na bo ngo bibatera impungenge kandi mu Rwanda hari inzego z’umutekano zizewe cyane.
Yagaragaje ko muri DALFA-UMURINZI ngo bategereza igisubizo kuri Dosiye nk’izi bakakibura, aboneraho gusaba inzego z’umutekano kubagaragariza abibasira abo muri DALFA-UMURINZI gusa.
Ati "Bigaragara ko hari abantu bashinzwe kwibanda kuri abo bantu, rwose izo nzego z’umutekano zidufashe kugira ngo abo bagizi ba nabi bibasiye igice kimwe cy’abantu baboneke".
Muri iki kiganiro cyihariye UMUBAVU wagiranye n’umuvugizi wa DALFA-UMURINZI, Mahoro Jean, cyagarutse kandi ku buzima bw’iri shyaka, uyu muvugizi avuga ko nubwo gukora bigoye ngo ariko bakomeje gukora bashaka abarwanashyaka kandi ngo byose bakabikora bubaha amategeko y’igihugu.
UMUBAVU wamubajije kandi umubare w’abarwanashyaka, avuga ko babafite ngo bahagije kandi ngo baramutse bahawe uburenganzira bwo kwandikisha ishyaka bari tayari.
Abajijwe niba bizeye cyangwa babona bizaborohera kwandikisha ishyaka DALFA-UMURINZI rikemerwa n’amategeko mu Rwanda, Mahoro yavuze ko babyizeye kandi ngo si no kuryandikisha gusa, ati "Tuzi neza ko ibitekerezo byacu muri DALFA-UMURINZI ariyo mpamvu twashinze ishyaka, tuzashinga ishyaka ryemerwe ndetse no mu minsi izaza tuzahatana no mu matora kandi tuzayatsinda".
Avuga ko ngo nta cyabuza abanyarwanda kubatera ingabo mu bitugu kubera ibitekerezo byabo muri DALFA-UMURINZI, ngo nta n’icyababuza kubona intsinzi, ati "Kuko abantu bakurikira igenamigambi ry’ishyaka, ntabwo bakurikira umuntu".
Mahoro avuga ko yaje muri Politiki ayikunze ntawumushutse kandi ngo yayizanywemo no kubaka u Rwanda rwiza rurambye kandi ngo rwubakiye ku murongo n’umusingi ufatika.
Yagarutse ku kuba u Rwanda mu mategeko yarwo rwemera amashyaka menshi, avuga ko ari uko rubona nta kibazo kibirimo.
Avuga ko nubwo igihugu cyaba giteye imbere cyane, ibinengwa bitabura bityo nk’urugero ngo niba u Rwanda ubu rumeze nka Singapour, rwarushaho kuba igihangange nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ati "Iteka umuntu aho ari, ntabwo haba hamunyuze, aba yumva yarengaho akajya n’ahandi".
Mahoro yagarutse ku kibazo cy’ubushomeri mu Rwanda avuga ko muri DALFA-UMURINZI bakunze gutanga umurongo w’uko ibintu byagenda bukagabanuka, aboneraho kubwira urubyiruko ko iyi ari nk’imwe mu mpamvu zatuma rubona ko hari ibitagenda mu gihugu.
Mahoro Jean, Umuvugizi w’ishyaka rya DALFA-UMURINZI Ubwo Madamu Ingabire Victoire yatangazaga ku mugaragaro ko yashinze ishyaka rya DALFA-Umurinzi mu mwaka ushize wa 2019 Ibi n’ibindi byinshi tutavuze muri iyi nkuru, urabyiyumvira muri iyi Video utapfa gusanga ahandi:

#24791#	9	culture	https://igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/ingoma-ya-cyilima-rugwe-intango-y-ibyiciro-by-ubudehe-ubuhutu-ubututsi-n-ubutwa-110916
Ingoma ya Cyilima Rugwe: Intango y’ibyiciro by’ubudehe, ubuhutu, ubututsi n’ubutwa Nk’uko twabibasezeraniye mu nkuru iheruka, tugiye gusubukurira aho twasubikiye tubagezaho ibindi byiciro by’ubudehe, byakuye intango ku ngoma ya Cyilima Rugwe nk’uko bikubiye mu gitabo “Intwari z’Imbanza zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro”.
Dukomereje ku cyiciro cya kabiri cy’ubudehe mu Rwanda rwo ha mbere ni cyo bitaga “Ubuhutu”abakibagamo bakitwa “Abahutu.”
Ubuhutu bwadutse ku ngoma ya Cyilima I Rugwe, ahasaga mu wa 1345 ubwo u Rwanda rwari rumaze kwigarurira Ingoma y’u Buliza.
Icyo gihugu gishya bari bamaze komeka k’u Rwanda, batangiye kugitoza ubworozi bw’inka, ni bwo noneho imiryango yari ifite Inka nyinshi yatangiye gushaka abo bazigabira ngo babafashe kuzigwiza no kuzikwirakwiza mu bihugu bari bigaruriye.
Kuko Inka yari ubukungu fatizo bw’igihugu, zagombaga kuba nyinshi kugira ngo uko abaturage biyongera mu kwigarurira ibihugu ari nako ubukungu bw’igihugu bwiyongera.
Abari bafite inshingano yo kugaba izo nka, ni abari mu cyiciro cya mbere cy’abatunzi bahejeje mu butunzi no mu myumvire aribo bitaga Abatutsi.
Ubuhutu bwari mu cyiciro cy’ubudehe cyari kigizwe ahanini n’abamaze guhembuka gake batangiye gusobanukirwa n’ibyiza by’ubworozi bw’inka bwadukanywe n’Abanyiginya.
Ubuhutu kandi cyari icyiciro cy’abitabiriye kuyoboka Abanyiginya mu gihe cy’itsindwa ry’ibihugu byabo mu gihe cy’iyagurwa ry’igihugu cy’u Rwanda.
Abanyiginya nabo bakabitura kubagabira Inka nk’ikimenyetso cy’ikirenga cyarangaga umukire muri ibyo bihe.
Ubuhutu ryari izina rusange ku bagabye (Abatutsi) n’Abagabiwe (Abahutu), ni ukuvuga ko nta wabashaga kwita undi umuhutu ataramugabiye Inka.
Ubuhutu ni ijambo rishaka kuvuga “ubugaragagu bushingiye ku Nka."
Ubuhutu kandi ryari izina rusange ry’abagaragu kuri ba Sebuja.
Inka zagabirwaga Umuhutu zitandukanye n’izatangwaga mu buhake, kuko inka yo mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’ubudehe yabaga ari iy’ubuntu, naho iy’ubuhake yo ikaba yaratangwaga habanje kuyikorera.
Icyo cyiciro cya kabiri cy’ubudehe cyateje u Rwanda imbere cyane kuko cyamaze imyaka myinshi igera kuri 587 (1345-1932) gituma u Rwanda rugira Inka nyinshi.
Kubera ko ibihugu u Rwanda rwagiye rwigarurira rwari rwarabanje gukoresha politiki yo kubagabira Inka, abenshi muri byo bari bamaze kujijukirwa n’ubukungu bwihishe mu bworozi bw’inka, maze uko Gasabo yoromya ibihugu, ni nako borozaga abaturage Inka.
Icyiciro cy’ubudehe cya kabiri ntabwo cyari icyiciro gisuzumirwamo imiterere y’ubutunzi gusa, cyari n’icyiciro kigaragariza ubuyobozi abaturage bafite imyumvire yo kuyoboka itangiye kuzamuka mu mushinga ubaraje ishinga mu kubaka u Rwanda no kurwagura.
Benshi mu bari biganje muri icyo cyiciro babaga ari abaturage b’ibihugu u Rwanda rwabaga rwigaruriye.
Bityo bakitabwaho nk’abafite aho bageze, atari uguhera ku busa.
Mu gice gikurikira tuzakomereza ku cyiciro cya gatatu cy’Ubutwa cyabagamo abiswe ‘Abatwa.’

#24860#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/amateka/article/mu-rwanda-hagiye-gutangizwa-ingoro-ndangamurage-ya-muzika
Mu Rwanda hagiye gutangizwa Ingoro Ndangamurage ya Muzika Ku nshuro ya mbere mu Rwanda hagiye gutangizwa ingoro ndangamurage y’umuziki Nyarwanda mu rwego rwo kubika amateka.
Mu Rwanda habarizwa ingoro ndangamurage umunani zirimo iy’Ubugeni n’Ubuhanzi; iy’Ibidukijije; iy’Umurage yitiriwe Richard Kandt; iy’Amateka y’Urugamba rwo Guhagarika; iy’Abami n’izindi.
Umuryango witwa U&I Ark ugamije guteza imbere impano z’abahanzi, watangije igitekerezo cyo gushinga ingoro ndangamurage ya muzika nyarwanda, ahazabikwa amateka y’abahanzi n’ibihangano byabo, ibikoresho bya muzika kuva ku bya kera kugeza ku by’ubu, imyambaro y’abanyamuziki, imbyino n’ibindi bifite aho bihuriye na muzika.
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye n’Umuyobozi wa U&I Ark, Patrick Habarugira, yavuze ko iki gitekerezo cyaje mu rwego rwo gusigasira amateka ya muzika Nyarwanda bigaragara ko adafite aho abikwa.
Yagize ati “Iki gitekerezo cyaje nyuma y’aho dusanze hari ibihangano bigenda bizimira ndetse ntibisaba igihe kinini mu myaka itatu hari indirimbo ziba zitacyumvwa.
Twabonye ko twashyiraho ingoro ndangamurage ibika ibihangano bitandukanye kugeza n’aho ubuvivi bwacu buzabasha kumva ibihangano byagiye bibaho.”
Iyi nzu kandi yashyizweho mu rwego rwo gushyigikira ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco Leta y’u Rwanda yashyize imbere nka kimwe mu biyinjiriza amadovize.
Umuryango wa U&I Ark ufite intego yo kuzubaka ingoro ndangamurage ya muzika Nyarwanda ariko mu ntangiriro izajya ikorera ahasanzwe hari Ingoro Ndangamurage y’Ubugeni n’Ubuhanzi iri ahahoze ari kwa Habyarimana i Kanombe.
Mu rwego rwo gutangiza iyi ngoro, hateguwe icyumweru cyahariwe imurikamateka ya muzika Nyarwanda “Kigali Music Exhibition Week” kizatangira tariki ya 22 kugeza ku wa 27 Nyakanga 2019, kizajya kibera muri Car Free Zone.
Nyuma y’iri murika hazahita hatangizwa ibikorwa by’Ingoro Ndangamurage ya Muzika Nyarwanda aho ababyifuza bazajya bayisura.
Ingoro Ndangamurage y'Ubugeni n'Ubuhanzi ni yo izaba icyicaro cy'iya Muzika Nyarwanda

Green Party irifuza ko no mu Rwanda hajya hakoreshwa ikoranabuhanga mu matora Ishyaka rirengera ibidukikije na Demokarasi( Democratic Green Party Rwanda) ririfuza ko mu Rwanda naho hajya hakoreshwa ikoranabuhanga mu matora mu rwego rwo kwirinda iyibwa ry'amajwi no guha ikizere kirambye abatora.
Dr Frank Habineza Ibi iri shyaka ribitangaje nyuma y'urugendo shuri umuyobozi waryo Dr Frank Habineza yagiriye muri Amerika tariki 20 Ukwakira kugeza tariki 7 Ugushyingo, aho we n'abandi bayobozi bakizamuka muri Afurika bari bagiye kureba imiyoborere n'imikorere y'inzego muri Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika.
Iryo shyaka rivuga ko ryashimishijwe n'imikorere ndetse n'imiyoborere ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika, harimo n'imitegurire y'amatora muri icyo gihugu.
Ritangaza ko muri Amerika hari imashini zikoreshwa mu matora, aho bigora umuntu wese ushaka kwiba amajwi kuba yabikora.

Icyakora ngo nubwo Politiki y'ibihugu by'Afurika itandukanye n'iya Amerika, ngo byaba byiza ubwo buryo bwiganywe no mu Rwanda ndetse no mu bindi bihugu by'Afurika.
Green Party ngo yashimishijwe kandi n'ubufatanye buri hagati y'amashyaka abiri ahora asa n'ahanganye muri Amerika, iry'abademokarate n'abarepubulika, bagira n'ibyo batemeranyaho Perezidansi ntibigaragaremo.
Urwo rugendo shuri rwari rwitabiriwe kandi n'ibindi bihugu byo muri Afurika nka Nijeriya, Afurika y'Epfo, Sudan y'Epfo, Swaziland na DRC.
Ferdinand Maniraguha

#24868#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/RUHANGO-Sibomana-Claude-yatawe-muri-yombi-afite-ibiyobyabwenge-birimo-kanyanga-n-urumogi
RUHANGO: Sibomana Claude yatawe muri yombi afite ibiyobyabwenge birimo kanyanga n'urumogi.
Mu mukwabu Polisi yo mu karere ka Ruhango yakoze ku itariki ya 3 Ukwakira, yafashe ibiyobyabwenge bitandukanye birimo, ijerekani 1 ya kanyanga ndetse n'ibiro 10 by'urumogi byose bikaba byarafatanywe umugabo witwa Sibomana Claude wo mu kagari ka Nyamagana, umurenge wa Ruhango.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu ntaray'amajyepfo, Chief Superintendent Hubert Gashagaza, yasabye abaturage gukomeza kwirinda kwishora mu biyobyabwenge kandi bakanatangira amakuru ku gihe kugira ngo ababikora batabwe muri yombi.
Yongeyeho kandi ko gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge ari icyaha nk'ibindi byose ndetse ko kinahanirwa n'amategeko y'u Rwanda.
Chief Superintendent Gashagaza yongeye gusaba inzego z'ibanze kongera ingufu mu gukumira ibiyobyabwenge bashyiraho gahunda zo kwigisha urubyiruko ububi bw'ibiyobyabwenge ndetse bakanabakangurira kutabyishoramo.
Aha yasobanuye ko ibiyobyabwenge ari intandaro y'ibindi byaha birimo, ubujura, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina n'irikorerwa mu ngo ndetse n'urugomo rurimo gukubita no gukomeretsa.
Gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge bihanishwa ingingo ya 594 yo mu gitabo cy'amategeko ahana y'u Rwanda, ivuga ko umuntu wese unywa, ucuruza cyangwa ukwirakwiza ibiyobyabwenge ahanishwa igifungo kuva ku myaka 3 kugeza ku myaka 5 n'ihazabu y'amafaranga y'u Rwanda kuva 500,000 kugeza kuri 5,000,000.
RNP

#24895#	5	politics	http://www.makuruki.rw/Politiki/article/Mfata-kimwe-abahungu-n-umukobwa-banjye-Perezida-Kagame
Mfata kimwe abahungu n'umukobwa banjye-Perezida Kagame Mu kiganiro ku guteza imbere igitsina gore cyaraye kibaye muri gahunda y'inama mpuzamahanga ngarukamwaka yiga ku bibazo Isi ifite izwi nka 'Milken Institute Global Conference', Perezida Paul Kagame yitabiriye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yavuze ko kuringaniza ibitsina byombi aribyo shingiro ry'iterambere ryihuse igihugu kirimo kugeraho.
Muri iki kiganiro cyari kitabiriwe n'abantu banyuranye, basuzumira hamwe uko igitsina gore ku Isi cyahabwa agaciro n'amahirwe angina n'ay'abagabo, Perezida Kagame yari nk'inararibonye kuko ubu u Rwanda aricyo gihugu cya mbere ku Isi gifite abagore benshi mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko (64%), ndetse no mu zindi nzego zifata ibyemezo.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko nta kuntu igihugu nk'u Rwanda gifite abagore 52% by'abaturage bose cyakwirengagiza abo bakobwa n'ababyeyi mu igenamigambi ryacyo.
Uretse ibyo kandi, yanavuze ko amateka n'ibibazo u Rwanda rwanyuzemo byarwigishije amasomo menshi arimo no guha agaciro, kuringaniza no guha amahirwe angana abantu, no gufata Abanyarawanda bose kimwe, abagore n'abagabo.
Kagame yavuze ko Abagore n'abagabo b'u Rwanda, bombi bahuye n'ibibazo kandi bombi bagize ndetse barimo kugira uruhare mu kongera kubaka igihugu.
Ati "Igihugu ni icyacu twese tugomba kusangira amahirwe gifite mu buryo bungana…Umubyeyi nkanjye w'abahungu batatu n'umukobwa umwe, nta kuntu nafata umwanya wo kwiga uko nafata umwana umwe binyuranye n'uko mfata undi kandi bose ari abana banjye.
Niba mbibona gutya kandi ntekereza ko ariko n'Abanyarwanda babona/bafata imiryango yabo, ari nayo mpamvu twashyize ubushobozi mu baturage bacu, abagabo n'abagore mu buryo bungana."
Gusa, Perezida yavuze ko iby'uburinganire bw'ibitsina byombi bitapfuye kwizana gutyo kuko byabaye ngombwa ko habanza guhindurwa imyumvire y'abantu, kuko Abanyarwandakazi bari bagihura n'ibibazo byinshi kimwe n'ahandi hose ku Isi.
Abajije akamaro u Rwanda rwakuye mu kuringaniza ibitsina byombi, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko kuba mu myaka 12 ishize u Rwanda rwaragize umuvuduko w'ubukungu uri hagati ya 7% n'8%, ari ukubera ko impande zombi zitanze kandi zikorera hamwe mu kuzamura igihugu cyabo.
Avuga kandi ko kuba abagore n'abakobwa basigaye bajya mu mashuri, bakaba bari no mu nzego zose zifata ibyemezo bituma abagore badasigara inyuma muri gahunda zose.
Mu Rwanda ubu umugore ntaho agihezwa, kimwe n'uko nta murimo bagikumirirwa gukora gusa urugamba rwo kubazamura ruracyari rurerure kuko Banki y'Isi ivuga ko ubushobozi bwabo mu buryo bw'ubukungu bukiri bucye cyane ugereranyije n'abagabo.
Radio 10

Humble yakiriwe mu muryango w’umukunzi we-AMAFOTO Humble Jizzo yageze muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika ku cyumweru ari kumwe n’umukunzi we, Amy aho baherereye mu gace ka Wenatchee ho muri Washington.

AMAHIRWE ABONEKA RIMWE (Igice cya Cyenda) Mu gice giheruka twasize Brenda atandukanye na Simeon ku buryo budasobanutse nyuma yuko Nkusi yari abatunguye akabasangana!
Kurikira uko iyi nkuru yakomeje kugenda.
Ubwo Brenda yari agiye nasigaye nibaza mumutima wanjye nti:"ese naba nakoze iki gitumye yivumbura akigendera" nararebaga nkabura ikosa naba nakoze ariko Nkusi arambaza ati:"Simeon uriya mukobwa muraziranye?"
ndamusubiza nti:"Nonese urumva twaba tutaziranye akaba yaje kunsura?"
Nuko ameze nk’urakaye arambwira ati:"ariko uziko abakobwa ari ababeshyi?"
ndamubaza nti:"ese kubera iki" nuko aransubiza ati:"Simeon ntunguwe no gusanga uriyamukobwa hano kandi yavuye kukazi ambwirako agiye gusura umukunzi we (cherie/honey) wakoze impanuka ya moto yamugonze none mbabajwe no gusanga yiyiziye hano mugihe twebwe akazi kari katwishe!"

ubwo navugaga ko nsobanukiwe impamvu yarebanaga na Nkusi batavuga ndetse menya ko inzozi zanjye zo kumwegukana zigiye kuba impamo maze nkamutuza mumutima wanjye ubudatuza dore ko nanjye numvaga nifuza ko twahuza akanyibagiza Sabine.

maze Nkusi arivugisha ati:"ndarota cyangwa?"
akomeza agira ati:" muvandi wabaye iki?
None se ko utambwiye?
Ubwo Nkusi yarambwiye ati:"Gusa niba uterekwa urahanura!"
maze numva sinumvise neza icyo ashaka kuvuga maze ndamubaza nti:"kubera ikise?"
maze na we aransubiza ati:"banza umbwire ibyawe n’uriya mukobwa nanjye ndaza kukubwira icyo nashakaga kuvuga!"

yongeraho ati:"ibisigaye wifatire umwanzuro ntabwo uri umwana!’

nuko nanjye ndamusubiza nti:"nanjye umbabarire kuba ntashoboye kubungabunga umutekano w’umwari utuje wuje ineza mumutima kandi umbabarire kuba nananiwe kuguhuza na Nkusi kugirango dusobanukirwe impamvu ya buri wese kumyitwarire yagize!"

maze aho nari nicaye nkoma amashyi ndavuga nti:"byiza cyane ntiwumva inkuru nziza ahubwose uwo ni inde?"
maze Nkusi aransubiza ati:"Simeon ntawundi ni Ephrem mukuru wawe kandi amusura buri munsi!"
maze ndamubaza nti:"Ephrem?".
Nakomeje kuganira na Nkusi mubaza niba ibyo ambwira byaba ari byo gusa ntinda kubyemera kuko numvaga nubwo Ephrem yansabye gusaba imbabazi Sabine atashobora kwihanganira gukundana na we kandi azi neza ibyo musaza we yakoreye papa!
gusa njye kuko nabonaga bumaze kwira ibyo sinakomeje kubyitaho ahubwo naribazaga nti:"ariko buracya ryari ngo njye kwiyumvira icyo Brenda anshakira?

naramusubije nti:"nagerayo ahubwo tugiye kwishimira insinzi ya Sabine kuko birangiye atsindiye kwibanira na mukuru wanjye!"
ubwo twahise tugenda twavuye mukabari bwije kuburyo icyo nari ntegereje cyari uko bucya nkajya kongera kwihera ijisho uburanga burangaza abagenzi bwa Brenda umwari utagira uko asa !

nuko aranseka niko kumbaza ati:"Ese Simeon ntukibuka iminsi?"

Ubwo telephone narayitabye maze atangira kumbaza amakuru yanjye nanjye musubiza ko usibye impanuka nagize ntakibazo ndetse mubwirako ndi kugenda noroherwa maze arambaza ati:"ese ibyo mukuru wawe yakubwiye ubyumvaho iki?"
nuko nanjye ndamusubiza nti:"erega Ephrem tubwirana byinshi ubwo rero sinamenya ibyo umbaza!"
Ubwo muzehe yafashe umwanya wo kunsobanurira ibijyane na Sabine ndetse n’umuryango we ariko nongera kumubwira nti:"erega muzehe icyo ntabura kukubwira nuko Sabine namubabariye ariko kongera gukundana na we ntabwo nabishobora nkibona ucumbagira!"
maze na we arambaza ati:"nonese Imana yo ibasha ite kukwihanganira ibona ucumura kandi udashaka kwihana!"
maze ntangiye kurya iminwa arambwira ati :"ejo urakenewe murugo kandi birihutirwa!"
maze arakupa.
Noneho Brenda yarashyize arampamagara maze ansaba guhurira nawe mubusitani (Garden/Jardin) bwa hotel yoroheje yari iri hafi y’iwanjye,ubwo nahise numva ntazi ibyo anteyemo maze ntega tax-voiture yihuse, ngezeyo nasanze yantanze kugerayo maze ndamwegera mugwamo numva aramfashe aramperanye ariko ntiyavuga nuko ndebye neza mbona amarira aramutemba kumaso nuko muhanaguza ishati yanjye mbona aramwenyuye mumutima ariko nkomeza kwibaza impamvu yabyo.

ariko arambwira ati:"nabikubwiye nzi neza ko kaza kwandura ariko ndagirango nkumenyeshe ko kuva nakumenya nifuje gukora isuku kukintu wakoresheje!"

#24961#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Gasabo-Imyaka-ibaye-ine-begerejwe-ibigega-n-impombo-bitagira-amazi
Gasabo: Imyaka ibaye ine begerejwe ibigega n'impombo bitagira amazi Abaturage batuye mu tugari dutandukanye tw'umurenge wa Nduba, mu karere ka Gasabo, mu mujyi wa Kigali, bamaze imyaka ine bategereje kuvoma amazi aturutse mu bigega n'impombo begerejwe muri 2012 ariko ngo bakaba barategereje amaso ahera mu kirere.
Muri 2012 ni bwo mu tugari dutandukanye tugize Umurenge wa Nduba nka Shango, Gasanze, Muremure na Butare hanyujijwe imiyoboro y'amazi ndetse hashyirwamo amatiyo nyuma n'ibigega birubakwa yewe n'amavomo yegerezwa abaturage ariko ntibabona amazi.
Abatuye muri utu tugari bavuga ko bari bazi ko ikibazo cyo gukoresha no kunywa amazi mabi nayo bavoma kure kigiye gukemuka, nyamara nkuko bamwe mu bo twaganiriye babivuga, ngo bamaze imyaka ine bategereje aya amazi kuri ibyo bikorwa remezo bazaniwe ariko ngo bayobewe amaherezo.
Aba baturage bavuga ko aya mazi akimara kuhagera bayavomye igihe gito cyane agatangira kugaragaza ibibazo birimo guturika kw'amatiyo ayobora amazi ndetse rimwe na rimwe ngo bakanabwirwa ko moteri ikura amazi ku isooko ngo yagize ikibazo gituma batavoma.
Iki kibazo cya moteri ngo cyagiye kivugwa kenshi ariko abaturage babwirwa ko amashanyarazi nagera muri uyu murenge iki kibazo ngo kizakemuka burundu, gusa igikomeje kubatera urujijo ngo ni uko amashanyarazi yahageze ariko ikibazo ntigikemuke nkuko bari barabibwiwe.
Umwe mu baganiriye na Makuruki.rw utuye mu kagari ka Butare yagize ati: "Aya mazi tuyategereje imyaka ine yose, twabanje kuvomaho agahe gato, nyuma amatiyo akajya aturika, ubundi bakatubwira ngo moteri ifite ikibazo gusa ikibazo cy'amazi kiraduhangayikishije muri Nduba."
Undi na we utuye mu kagari ka Shango yagize ati: "Baraje bacukura imiyoboro, bashyiramo amatiyo tubona bubatse ibigega n'amavomo tugira ngo ikibazo cy'amazi kigiye gukemuka, ariko kugeza ubu twavomye iminsi mike none tumaze imyaka ine yose tutabona amazi."
Umuyobozi w'umurenge wa Nduba Barigye Peter yadutangarije ko ikibazo cy'ingutu cyahagaritse ikoreshwa ry'ibi bikorwa remezo ngo ari moteri zakoreshejwe zidafite ubushobozi bwo gutanga amazi, maze atubwira ko akarere karimo kubikemura vuba abaturage bakazabona amazi mu gihe gito.
Barigye yagize ati:"Nibyo ayo mazi yarahageze koko n'ibigega barabyubaka ndetse n'abaturage batangira kuvoma ariko haza kubaho ikibazo cyuko moteri yari ifite ubushobozi buke bwo kuzamura amazi kandi ikanakoresha essence nyinshi, ariko noneho ubu ngubu aho bigeze akarere katanze isoko ndumva muri iki cyumweru rwiyemezamirimo yaragezeyo ubu barimo gushaka uburyo amazi yazamuka aho mvugira aha ubu ngubu barimo kubikora moteri ya essence ntabwo izongera gukoreshwa hazakoreshwa uburyo bw'amashanyarazi."
Gusa uyu muyobozi avuga ko hari impungenge zuko amatiyo ashobora kuba yarangiritse bitewe n'imyaka ishize atabye mu butaka kandi adakoreshwa, gusa ngo nihagira aho biboneka ko yangiritse ngo bazayasana nyuma bitewe n'uko ngo badashobora kubimenya amazi atarazamuka.
Ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Gasabo butangaza ko iki kibazo kirimo gukemurwa kuko nga hoherejweyo imashini (pompe) ifite ubushobozi bwo kuzazamura amazi ndetse yongeraho ko mu gihe gito cyane aba baturage bazaba bavoma.
Stephen Rwamurangwa, umuyobozi w'akarere ka Gasabo yagize ati: "Twabaguriye pompe (imashini ikura amazi ku isooko iyohereza mu matiyo) ifite ubushobozi buhagije, ubundi baguraga utw'amafuti tudafite ubushobozi tugateza ikibazo, iyo pompe yatwaye miliyoni 15 kuko abaturage bagomba kubona amazi, ahubwo ubundi bagombye kuba baratangiye kuvoma kuko hari haratinze isoko ry'iyo pompe kandi bambwiye ko yaguzwe ahubwo reka nkurikirane ndebe kuko nta kindi kibura."
Meya Rwamurangwa yijeje abaturage ko aya mazi agomba kuboneka vuba nubwo na we yagaragaje impungenge zuko amatiyo ashobora kuba yarangiritse ariko akavuga ko no kuyasana bitatwara igihe kinini.
Yanavuze ko hari n'undi mushinga wamaze kwigwa w'amazi azatangwa na WASAC ukazageza amazi mu tugari tutazagerwaho n'aya mazi arimo gukorwa.
Jean Paul NIYITANGA MAKURUKI.RW

OMS yohereje mu Bushinwa impuguke zo gukora ubushakashatsi ku nkomoko ya Coronavirus Nyuma y’amakuru menshi yagiye avugwa ku bijyanye n’inkomoko ya Coronavirus, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe kwita ku Buzima (OMS), ryohereje impuguke mu Bushinwa zigiye gukora ubushakashatsi bugamije kureba niba koko inyamaswa ariyo yabaye intandaro ya Coronavirus n’uburyo yageze mu bantu.

N’ubwo nta bushakashatsi burabyemeza mu buryo budashidikanywaho, abahanga muri siyansi bavuga ko Coronavirus ishobora kuba yaraturutse mu ducurama ikajya mu zindi nyamaswa z’inyamabere zirimo injangwe n’igisamujyonjyo mbere yo kugera mu bantu.

Ubu bushakashatsi buzasiga hamenywe inkomoko nyayo ya Coronavirus

#25061#	9	culture	https://rwandamagazine.com/umuco/article/uti-guterekera-byaturutse-he
Uti “Guterekera byaturutse he?”
Guterekera ni umwe mu mihango yerekeye Abantu bazima n’abandi Bantu bazimu.
Umuntu uterekera aba agamije kugusha neza abazimu( baba abe bapfuye cyangwa se bene wabo w’abandi gusa aha agaciro gakomeye).
Kugusha neza abo bazimu ngo bituma atunga agatunganirwa kandi ibyo akoze byose bikagenda neza.
Twifashishije igitabo cya Musenyeli Aloyizi Bigirumwami cyitwa IMIHANGO N’IMIGENZO N’IMIZIRIRIZO MU RWANDA; turabagezaho aho guterekera byaturutse.
Ngo habayeho abagabo babiri bavaga inda imwe, umwe yitwaga KIBANDA, undi akitwa BASINDI, bagakundana cyane.
Bukeye umuhungu wa BASINDI n’uwa KIBANDA baranywa barasinda bararwana, mwene BASINDI yica mwene KIBANDA.
Nuko BASINDI acikana n’abana be, bajya mu gihugu cya kure cyane bibera iyo ngiyo.
Hashize iminsi myinshi BASINDI ahurira na KIBANDA mu nzira, aramufata maze amujyana iwe, agira ngo amwice, ahorere umwana we.
Bageze imuhira, KIBANDA ntiyaba akimwakuye, ahubwo amufata neza bigeza aho basangira.
Bimaze kabiri, BASINDI abwira KIBANDA ati: ’’Burya twahuye nitwerereza ngo njye gushyingira umukobwa wanjye, none ndekura ngende, njye kumushyingira, nzagaruka untegeke uko ushaka ndangije ibyo’’.
KIBANDA aremera aramurekura ngo ajye gushyingira umukobwa we ati: "Genda ariko uzagaruke vuba.
Turangize ibyacu".
BASINDI agiye kugaruka, agarukana na wa muhungu we wishe, amuzanira se wabo KIBANDA.
Nuko BASINDI abwira KIBANDA ati: "KIBANDA, dore nguyu uwakwiciye umwana, ndamukuzaniye ngo umuhore".
KIBANDA aramwakira, amurekera aho ngaho.
Bukeye yengesha amayoga menshi, atumira bamwana we, se w’umukobwa wapfushije umugabo; bamaze gukorana bose, ab’iwabo w’umukazana we n’inshuti ze zose, KIBANDA abaha inzoga, abatekerereza uko umuhungu we yarwanye n’uwa mwene BASINDI, uwa BASINDI akica uwe, ababwira uko byagenze kose, n’ukuntu bacitse mu gihugu bagahungira mu kindi.
Ati: "None BASINDI yanzaniye umuhungu we wishe uwanjye, ngo muhore."
Undi ati: "Ntabwo muhora, aho kumuhora kandi na we ari umwana wanjye, ndamuha uriya mukazana wanjye, bombi nari mbabyaye".
Nuko ahamagara umukazana we, ati:"Dore umugabo nguhaye".
Abari aho bose, barabimushimira cyane.
KIBANDA ahamagaza ingwa n’umwishywa, ati:"Dore turuzuye njye na BASINDI, tubaye imyishywa y’imirembe, ntituzongera kwangana, nta n’ubwo twabyigeze".
Nuko umwishywa barawambara.
Bazana n’ingwa y’inono, barayireba, bati :"Turanonotse nta nabi, tuzahorana ineza n’inseko nziza".
Mbese nk’uko ingwa y’inono nta kantu kayibamo, haba n’agatirimwa, ngo na bo ni ko bazahora bameze.
Impamvu bakoresha umwishywa mu iterekera, ngo ni uko iyo bawukuyeho intarizi, ari zo nzabirizi zawo zifata ibyatsi, bamara kuwuzikiza, ugasanga ari icyatsi cyorohereye mu ntoki, wagikora ntiwumve gikaramye.
Impamvu yo gukoresha umwishywa n’ingwa y’inono, ngo ni ukwibuka uko KIBANDA na BASINDI bigoroye, kandi umwe yari yiciye undi; umwishywa n’ingwa bikabagusha neza, bakongera kuba abavandimwe uko bari basanzwe.
N’ubu iyo bashaka guterekera umuntu, ngo bamuterekereza ibyo yakundaga, bikaba uburyo bwo kumwibuka no kwigorora na we, bikamugusha neza ntabaterereze ibyago.
Ngayo nguko!
Bigaragara ko impamvu nyamukuru ya byose ari ukubabarirana, tukigorora n’abaduhemukiye maze tukiyemeza kubana neza bizira inzika no guhora.
Ikindi kandi kiza ni uburyo bwo guhora tuzirikana abacu batubanjirije n’ibyiza bakundaga maze tugahora tubyitaho mu rwego rwo kutibagirwa abo dukomokaho n’ibyo bakunda no kubagusha neza.
RUGABA Yvan

Agira ati “Aha bahatwohereje ari mu nkengero z’umujyi ariko ntacyo hadutwaye kuko niho tubona abaguzi bahita ku muhanda.”
Aha bashyizwe naho ntibazahamara kabiri kuko ari mu gishanga giherereye mu Mudugudu w’Urukundo, Akagari ka Kamatamu, mu Murenge wa Kacyiru.
Umukuru w’umudugudu w’Urukundo, Butare Emmanuel, avuga ko yari yabatije ahari hateganyijwe kubakwa ibiro by’umudugudu ngo babe bahakorera kuko kubaka ibiro mu gishanga bari babyangiwe.
Ati “Twari twahahawe na Maman Sportif ngo tuhubake ibiro by’umudugudu ariko kubera ko ari mu gishanga, abashinzwe imyubakire batubwira ko bidashoboka.
Nabaye mpabatije rero ariko muri gahunda yo kubuza abantu gukorera mu bishanga, umurenge uraza urahabakura.
Hamada avuga ko mu Gacuriro aho babumbira hatabagora hatabagora kubona abaguzi kandi ari hafi y’aho bakura ibumba Munyarukundo Shabani, ukuriye imiryango yashigajwe inyuma n’amateka mu Karere ka Gasabo, akanayobora Koperative y’ababumbyi “Modern potery” ihakorera, avuga ko mu bubumbyi harimo inyungu ariko kutagira aho gukorera hatuje bituma hari abadatera imbere.
Ati “Muri koperative umubumbyi ashobora kubona inyungu y’amafaranga asaga ibihumbi 100Frw, ku buryo yamufasha kubona ibyo umuryango we ukeneye.
Ikibazo dufite ni aha dukorera kuko aha ducururiza, ejo ubuyobozi buvuze ngo bugiye kuhashyira ubusitani, bwahatwirukana.”
Remy Norbert Duhuze, Umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe amabwiriza agenga ibidukikije no kurwanya ibihumanya ibidukikije mu Kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe kurengera ibidukikije (REMA), avuga ko kuhakorera ari byo bitemewe ariko kuhacukura ibumba babifitiye uburenganzira byo ntacyo bitwaye Ati “Ikibazo cya bariya rero bafite ibindi bikorwa bahakorera nko kuhabumbira no kuhatwikira.
Ibyo nibyo bitemewe mu gishanga.
Naho ubundi batwaye ibumba bakajya gukorera ahandi nta kibazo bashobora kugira.”
Abirukanywe mu gishanga bagiye kubumbira mu ngo Nyirabahire Languida, Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Gasabo wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage, atangaza ko ibyo bibazo ababumbyi bahuye na byo ubuyobozi bwigeze bumenya ariko akabizeza ko nibabishaka bakaganira bazabashakira ahandi.
Ingingo ya 83 y’Itegeko rigena uburyo bwo kurengera, kubungabunga no guteza imbere ibidukikije mu Rwanda, ivuga ko nta nyubako cyangwa ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi bigomba gushyirwa mu bishanga byaba ibyo mu mijyi cyangwa mu Byaro.
Iyi ngingo ivuga ko igikorwa cyose cyangwa inyubako byemerewe gushyirwa muri metero 20 uvuye ku nkombe z’igishanga.

#25141#	4	health	https://igihe.com/ubuzima/article/hari-abaharikwa-n-abagabo-babo-kuko-babyaye-abana-bafite-ikibazo-cya-autisme
Hari abaharikwa n’abagabo babo kuko babyaye abana bafite ikibazo cya ‘Autisme’ Abagore babyaye abana bafite ibibazo by’imyitwarire bizwi nka ‘Autisme’, bavuga ko bakorerwa ihohoterwa ritandukanye n’abagabo babo kugera n’aho babaharika.
Autisme ni uruhurirane rw’ibibazo by’imyitwarire bijyanye n’ibibazo byo kwisanga mu muryango ndetse no gutinda kuvuga bijyana n’ubufura ku mwana ukiri muto.
Niwemutoni Claudine, wo mu Karere ka Kamonyi, uvuga ko yabyaye umwana ufite ibibazo byo mu mutwe.
Yaje kumenya ko umwana we afite ikibazo cy’imyitwarire ‘Autisme’ abibwiwe n’abaganga b’ i Gatagara mu Karere ka Nyanza.
Ati “Umugabo yamaze kubona ko umwana adafite imiterere nk’iy’abandi bana, agahora antoteza avuga ko iwabo batabyara abana bameze batyo, ubundi akambwira ngo nzamujyane iwacu.
Igihe cyaje kugera yinjira undi mugore nkomeza kuruhana n’umwana, akajya aza mu rugo igihe ashakiye.”
Nyinawabasinga Claudine, wo mu Karere ka Gasabo, avuga ko yajujubijwe n’umugabo kubera ko yabyaye umwana ufite ikibazo cyo mu mutwe.
Ati “Yampozaga ku nkeke, akambwira ngo azashaka undi mugore uzamubyarira umwana muzima.
Ariko ubwo yabivugaga afite inshoreke ku ruhande.”
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo “Autisme Rwanda”, Rosine Duquesne Kamagaju, avuga ko ababyeyi bafite abana bavukanye ikibazo cya Autisme badakwiye kwiheba kuko ari abana nk’abandi.
Ati ‘‘Hari abana baba batazi kwigaburira, kwijyana mu bwiherero n’ibindi.
Ariko iyo bageze hano turabakurikirana, tukabitaho ku buryo mu gihe gito usanga abana bakora nk’ibyo abandi bo mu kigero cyabo bakora nubwo baba bafite ubukererwe mu mitekerereze.’’
Mu rwego rwo gufasha ababyeyi babyaye abana bafite iki kibazo, ‘Ikigo Autisme Rwanda’ kifashisha inzobere zo mu bihugu bitandukanye, bagahugura ababyeyi n’abakozi b’iki kigo.
Umwe mu batanga amahugurwa, Dr Tashi Kyil, wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, avuga ko umwana ufite ikibazo cya Autisme iyo yitaweho akura neza nk’abandi bana kabone nubwo aba afite ubukererwe.
Ati “Umwana wanjye yavutse afite ikibazo cya ‘Autisme’ nyuma yo kwitabwaho mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri yari amaze kugaragaza impinduka.
Ibi byatumye numva ko ngomba gufasha ababyeyi bafite abana bafite iki kibazo nkabasangiza ubunararibonye bwanjye.”
Mu myaka itanu ishize, Ikigo cya Autisme Rwanda, kimaze kwita ku basaga 100, ubu gifasha abana 32.
Ubushakashatsi na OMS bwagaragaje ko umwana umwe ku bana 160 afite ikibazo cya Autisme.

#25145#	7	development	http://www.makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Ukwivuguruza-kwa-MINICOM-ku-Guhagarika-ibiryabarezi
Ese umwanzuro wo guhagarika imikino y'amahirwe si ukwivuguruza kwa MINICOM?
Minisitiri w'ubucuruzi n'inganda mu Rwanda Francois Kanimba Umwanzuro MINICOM yafashe kuri uyu wa 27 Nyakanga 2016 wo guhagarika imikino y'amahirwe uragaragaza kwivuguruza gukomeye kuko yari imaze iminsi micye itangaje ku mugaragaro ko iyo mikino yemewe mu Rwanda ndetse ko nta kibazo na kimwe ishobora guteza kuko ngo bayisuzumanye ubushishozi mbere yo kuyemerera gukinirwa mu Rwanda.
Ni kenshi abaturage bagiye bagaragaza ibibazo n'impungenge bafite ku mikorere n'ingaruka zituruka ku mikorere n'imikoreshereze y'ibyuma bikoreshwa mu mikino y'amahirwe bamwe bakunze kwita Ibiryabarezi ariko Minisiteri y'ubucuruzi n'inganda (MINICOM) ari na yo ifite mu nshingano iyi mikino ikabyamaganira kure.
Itangazamakuru na ryo ryagarutse cyane kuri iyi mikino, aho ryagendaga rifasha aba baturage mu kumvikanisha akababaro kabo, maze ku ikubitiro akarere ka Nyanza gafata iya mbere mu gufata icyemezo cyo guca ibyo biryabarezi ku butaka bwako.
Iki cyemezo cy'akarere ka Nyanza cyamaganywe na Minisiteri y'ubucuruzi n'inganda, ivuga ko ibyakozwe n'ubuyobozi bw'aka karere ndetse n'abandi nkabo, bitemewe n'amategeko.
Icyo gihe umuyobozi w'akarere Ntazinda Erasme mu cyemezo cye yari yagize ati:"....
Hari abana bishoraga muri iyo mikino y'amahirwe bakemererwa kuyikina kandi bizwi neza ko nta mafaranga bakorera maze ugusanga bariba iwabo bikabararura...".
Yakomeje avuga ko Ibiryabarezi "bizongera gukora ari uko ba nyirabyo bagaragaje ibyangombwa by'umwimerere bahawe n'ikigo gishinzwe iterambere mu Rwanda (RDB) kandi hakanubahirizwa amategeko agomba kugenga aho iyo tombora ikorera.
Nubwo ubuyobozi bw'akarere ka Nyanza bwagaragazaga impamvu bufunze iyo mikino, MINICOM yo yavugaga ko ibiryabarezi ntacyo bitwaye, ikanemeza ko ari yo itanga ibyangombwa kandi idashobora kubiha umuntu itabanje kugenzura niba ahantu agiye gukorera ari heza kandi hakaba hatateza umutekano muke.
Ruzibukira Alexis, Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe inganda n'ibigo bito n'ibiciriritse muri MINICOM yavugaga ko iyi Minisiteri itazi iby'urugomo bibera ahakinirwa umukino w'ikiryabarezi.
Yagize ati: "Ibyo by'urugomo n'ibijyanye na byo byumvikane ko mu Rwanda hari umutekano usesuye, hari inzego zibishinzwe, nk'uko tubizi twese, umutekano wacu ni ntamakemwa, ibyo rero nkaba ntabizi ni bwo bwa mbere mbyumvise ko habamo urugomo."
Uyu muyobozi yanahamyaga ko abantu bemerera gukora imikino y'amahirwe abakozi ba MINICOM babanza kugenzura niba ahantu bagiye gukorera ari ahantu hadashobora guteza umutekano muke.
Nta n'icyumweru gishize iyi Minisiteri igaragaje ko ibyo biryabarezi byemewe n'amategeko, kuri uyu wa gatatu yasohoye itangazo rivuga ko ibaye ibihagaritse by'agateganyo mu Rwanda hose, ibyo bigaragaza ko ari ukwivuguruza mu gufata ibyemezo kuri iyi Minisiteri.
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu mujyi wa Kigali baganiriye na MAKURUKI na bo bavuga ko batunguwe no kumva abayobozi ba Minisiteri bivuguruza mu byemezo ibintu ngo bishobora gutuma batakaza ikizere bagiriraga aba bayobozi.
Umwe yagize ati: "Aba sibo ejo bundi bavugaga ko iyi mikino yemewe nta kibazo ifite?
Ubuse ni nde uzongera kujya yizera ibyo bavuga?
Uku ni uguhuzagurika rwose bajye babanza bashishoze mbere yo kuvuga no gufata ibyemezo."
Nanone kandi nubwo iyi Minsiteri ifashye uyu mwanzuro, umuntu ashobora kwibaza ikizakurikiraho hagati y'abacuruzaga ibi biryabarezi na MINICOM dore ko bari bafitanye amasezerano y'imyaka 10 bakorera mu Rwanda nkuko bigaragarira kubyemezo bafite bibemerera gukorera mu Rwanda , ibintu na none bishobora guteza ikibazo bikaba byanagera no mu rwego rw'amategeko.
Muneza Ferdinand MAKURUKI.RW

#25174#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/ibitabo/article/moi-le-dernier-tutsi-igitabo-cy-ubuhamya-bwa-habonimana-wari-kwicwa-akamanikwa
Moi, le Dernier Tutsi, igitabo cy’ubuhamya bwa Habonimana wari kwicwa akamanikwa ku musozi Charles Habonimana yanditse igitabo yise ‘Moi le dernier Tutsi’ gikubiyemo ubuhamya bw’imibereho y’Umututsi mbere ya Jenoside, inzira y’umusaraba yanyuzemo mu gihe cya Jenoside n’uburyo Ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zatumye arokoka.
Habonimana yarokokeye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu yahoze ari Segiteri ya Mayunzwe, Komini Tambwe, Perefegitura ya Gitarama, ubu ni mu Karere ka Ruhango.
Habonimana avuka mu muryango w’abana icyenda , ubwo Jenoside yakorwaga yari afite imyaka 12 y’amavuko.
Abo bavukana 6 n’ababyeyi be barishwe muri Jenoside arokokana na mushiki we umwe mukuru.
Ubuhamya bw’imibereho ye mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi n’inzira ikomeye cyane yanyuzemo yabishyize mu nyandiko agamije ko bitazibagirana ndetse kugira ngo bibe n’uburyo ku bandi barokotse Jenoside bwo kwiyumvamo ko amateka babayemo bayasangiye.
Inkuru ivugwa muri iki gitabo itangira igaragaza ubuzima bw’umwana ukibyiruka ufite imyaka umunani wo ku misozi y’i Kangoma na Mayunzwe bakunze kwita mu Nduga.
Igaragaza imibereho y’Abatutsi, abaturanyi babo, abanyarwanda bose muri rusange.
Habonimana mu kiganiro na IGIHE yavuze kuroka kwe byamubereye nk’igitangaza kuko yari yaragenwe n’abakoraga Jenoside ko ariwe uzicwa nyuma y’abandi Batutsi kandi akicwa akamanikwa ahantu ku buryo abantu bazajya barebera uko umututsi yasaga.
Ati “Ni nayo mpamvu iki gitabo cyitwa ‘Moi le dernier Tutsi’, bishatse kuvuga ko nari naragenwe n’abakora Jenoside iwacu ko njye bazanyica nyuma y’abandi, bakabanza bakica abandi Abatutsi bashira ku misozi noneho bakanyica bakamanika ahantu.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Uwo mugambi rero wagezweho ariko uza gutambamirwa n’uko Inkotanyi zari zigeze mu gihugu, zigeze mu gice cy’iwacu zihafata Abatutsi bose bari batarashira.”
Habonimana yavuze ko kuba iki gitabo cyarahawe iri zina bitavuze ko ariwe Mututsi wa nyuma wasigaye ahubwo ‘ni ijwi rya buri muntu wese wacitse ku icumu, ni ijwi rigaragaza ko buri muntu wese warokotse ariwe wasigaye kugira ngo azabare inkuru zo ku musozi w’iwabo”.
Yakomeje agira ati “Kubera ko habayeho abatubanjirije, habayeho abishwe turi kumwe ndetse muri twe abarokotse harimo abakorewe iyicarubozo, gusogotwa ariko ntibanogoka.
Icyo gice ngifata nk’igice gikomeye kubera ko buri muntu wese warokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mufata nk’umuntu wa nyuma warokotse umugambi wo kubarimbura.”
Muri iki gitabo kandi Habonimana agaragaza uburyo Jenoside yahagaritswe abanyarwanda bakongera kugira icyizere cyo kubaho, umuntu agatangira gutekereza ku mishinga, kongera kugira umuryango n’ibindi byubaka umuntu mu buzima busanzwe.
Iki gitabo kiri mu rurimi rw’Igifaransa, ni umushinga yatekereje kuva mu 2002 akirangiza amashuri yisumbuye.
Nyuma yo kugira ubutwari bwo gutanga ubuhamya mu gihe cyo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, henshi hatandukanye, yagiriwe inama yo kwandika amateka ye mu gitabo.
Mu 2003/04, yabishyize mu nyandiko yandika impapuro zigera kuri 80.
Iki gitabo cyasohotse ku wa Kane tariki 21 Werurwe 2019, i Paris mu Bufaransa ari naho hari bamwe mu bamufashije kucyandika barimo Daniel le Scornet na Christine Illana le Scornet.
Umwanditsi Charles Habonimana yanditse igitabo kivuga ku rugendo rwe mu kurokoka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi

#25228#	7	development	http://makuruki.rw/IMIBEREHO-MYIZA/article/Kigali-Abacururizaga-mu-Mihanda-baravuga-ko-amasoko-bahawe-ari-kubahombya
Kigali: Abacururizaga mu Mihanda baravuga ko amasoko bahawe ari kubahombya.
Mu minsi ishize nibwo ubuyobozi bw'umugi wa Kigali bwafashe icyemezo cyo gutangiza amasoko azajya ahuriramo abacururizaga ku mihanda amasoko azwi nka Free Market.
Gusa abacuruzi bayacururizamo biganjemo abagore bahoze bacururiza mu mihanda baravuga ko aya masoko arimo kubahombya.
Kuri uyu wa 1Nzeri , ubwo urubuga rwacu Makuruki.rw rwasuraga amasoko atandukanye yagiye ahurizwamo abagore bacururizaga mu mihanda aba bazwi nk' abanyadutaro, batugaragarije ko kuva bagera muri ayo masoko bahuye n'igihombo gikomeye kubera ko batabona abakiriya baza kubagurira.
Tuganira na bamwe mu bagore twasanze bacururiza muri ayo masoko batashimye ko amazina n'amafoto yabo byajya ahagaragara, batugaragarije imbogamizi bafite ku masoko bahawe kuva mu kwezi Kamena muri uyu mwaka.
Tukaba twarahereye ku isoko rya Karambo Free Market riherereye mu karere ka Kacukiro, aho aba bagore bavuga ko bamaze amezi 2 bahacururiza, ariko ngo ibicuruzwa byabo byatangiye kubora kubera kubura abakiriya.
Aba bagore baragira bati "Tumaze amezi 2 dukorera muri iri soko, ariko twabuze abakiriya riri kure y'abaturage ikindi kandi ntibaranarimenya, ibicuruzwa byacu turabirangura bikabora kubera ko aba ari imboga n'imbuto. byongeye kandi haracyari n'abagicururiza mu mihanda, ibyo byose rero biratuma tubura abakiriya ibicuruzwa byacu bikangirika, bigatuma tugwa mu gihombo.
Gisozi Free Market(Gasabo) Iki kibazo aba bagore bo mu isoko rya Karambo ( Kicukiro) twasanze bagihuriyeho n'abo mu isoko rya Gisozi.
Aho nabo bavuga ko batabona abakiriya ibicuruzwa byabo nabo biborera mu isoko. baravuga ko bishimira ko bavanywe mu muhanda bakaba bafite umutekano bacuruza ntawe ubirukankana, ariko nanone ngo uretse umutekano bafite wo kuba bacururiza mu isoko, baragira bati" turarangura imineke,inyanya, Amatunda n'ibindi bitandukanye bikamara icyumweru ntawe uraza kubigura bigahita bibora, kubona abakiriya ni ukubanza kurisohokamo tukajya kubinginga ngo baze bagure.
Kabeza Free Market( Kicukiro ) N'ibibazo twasanze kuri aya masoko hafi ya yose aho aherereye mu mugi wa Kigali keretse ayubatse ahagere abaturage , nk'iriherereye hafi y'isoko rya Kimironko.
Mugihe aba bagore bavuga ko barimo gukorera mu gihombo, ngo hari amafaranga leta yabahaye ibabwira ko ari ayo kubafasha kwiteza imbere amafaranga ibihumbi 87,ariko bo babona ko ari inguzanyo kuko ngo baba bagomba kwishyuramo 10% y'inyungu buri kwezi.
Aba bagore baravuga ko yahombye , kuko ngo mugihe cy'amezi 2 gusa bamaze bacuruza nta n'igishoro basigaranye.
Bakaba bavuga ko amezi 6 bahawe nashira batazashobora kwirwaza nk'uko babwiwe n'ubuyobozi bw'umugi.
Aba bacuruzi bakaba basaba ubuyobozi bw'umugi wa Kigali kubakorera ubuvugizi bushingiye kubamenyekanishiriza ayo masoko ndetse no kuvana abandi bagore bose bagicururiza mu mihanda kubera ko ari yo mpavu batabona abakiriya.
Mukiganiro na Makuruki.rw , Muvunyi Kibombo Isaa umuyobozi ushinzwe imibereho myiza y'abaturage no kurenegera abatishoboye bo mu mugi wa kagali, avuga ko iki kibazo bakizi kandi ko umugi wa kigali watanze amasoko yo gukora amatangazo akinitse(Adverts) mu bitangazamakuru , ngo akazaba amenyekanisha aho ayo masoko agiye aherereye.
Kibombo avuga ko bitarenze kuwa mbere taliki 7 Nzeri ayo matangazo azaba yatangiye gutambuka mu bitangazamakuru by'amajwi n'amashusho.
Ku kibazo cyo kuba hakiri bamwe mu bagore bagicururiza mu mihanda bigatuma abari muri ayo masoko Babura abakiriya, Muvunyi Kibombo avuga ko k'ubufatanye n'inzego z'umutekano batangiye igikorwa cyo kuvana mu mihanda abakiyicururizamo, babashishikariza gusanga abandi mu masoko.
Mugihe aba bagore bakomeje kwinubira uburyo bahabwamo ariya mafaranga ibihumbi 87 mu byiciro, kandi ngo hakaba zimwe muri Banki z'imirenge SACCO zibaka inyungu za buri munsi, Kibombo avuga ko hari zimwe muri za SACCO zarenze ku masezerano zagiranye n'ubuyobozi bw'uturere, aho bavuganye ko abo bagore bagomba gutangira kwishyura nyuma y'amezi 2, nabwo bakishyuzwa 5% aho kuba 10% nk'uko aba bagore babivuga.naho ubundi buri mugore afite uburenganzira bwo guhabwa ariya mafaranga yose uko yakabaye kuko ari uburenganzira bwabo.
Gusa ariko nabyo ngo bigakorwa mu bushishozi kuko hari uwayahabwa yose akayakoresha nabi akayahomba yose.
Bityo ngo hakaba hari zimwe muri za SACCO zatangaga make kugira ngo barebe uko akoreshwa kuko ngo n'ubundi aba bagore bari basanzwe bamenyereye kuranguza amafaranga atarenze ibihumbi 20frw.

#25250#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/ubuvuzi/article/muhanga-barifuza-ko-amavuriro-aciriritse-yakora-n-amasaha-ya-nijoro
Muhanga: barifuza ko amavuriro aciriritse yakora n’amasaha ya nijoro Abaturage bo mu Karere ka Muhanga baravuga ko serivisi bahabwa ku mavuriro aciriritse zikwiye no kujya zitangwa na nijoro.
Amavuriro aciriritse yafashije abaturage kutarembera mu ngo Abaturage by’umwihariko batuye mu byaro ahataboneka amavuriro akora nijoro, bavuga ko serivisi z’ubuvuzi bahabwa ku mavuriro aciriritse (Poste de Santé) zibafasha ku manywa gusa kandi na nijoro haboneka abantu barembye.
Umurenge wa Kiyumba ni umwe mu Mirenge ya kure y’Umujyi wa Muhanga ku buryo kubegereza amavuriro aciriritse byatumye abaturage baremberaga mu ngo bagabanuka nk’uko byemezwa na benshi mu bawutuye.
Mahirwe Aimable, Umubaforomo ukorera kuri imwe muri poste de santé zubatswe mu Murenge wa Kiyumba mu karere ka Muhanga na we yemeza ko ibibazo by’ubuvuzi bw’ibanze byagabanyutse kubera amavuriro acirirtse yegerejwe abaturage.
Agira ati, “Serivisi dutanga hano zagiriye abaturage akamaro kuko ntibakirembera mu rugo ugereranyije na mbere, cyane cyane nk’abakoraga urugendo rurerure bava Kabacuzi bajya kwivuriza ku kigo nderabuzima cya Nyabikenke”.
N’ubwo bimeze gutyo ariko, abaturage bagaragaza ko bagihura n’ikibazo cya kwakirwa nijoro bagannye aya mavuriro, kuko aba yafunze bagasaba inzego z’ubuyobozi ko zabafasha kubona ababakira mu masha ya nijoro kuko naho haboneka abakeneye serivisi zo kwa muganga byihutirwa.
Uwamaliya avuga ko kwegurira abikorera amavuriro aciriritse ari bwo buryo bwo gutuma akora nijoro Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Muhanga Uwamaliya Beatrice avuga ko, nyuma yo kubaka aya mavuriro nka kimwe mu byihutirwaga ngo abaturage babone serivisi nziza mu buvuzi, ubu hakurikiyeho kuyegurira abikorera kugira ngo barusheho gutanga bene izo serivisi.
Agira ati, “Icya mbere kwari ukwihutira kubaka aya mavuriro kuigira ngo abaturage bacu babone serivisi z’ibanze kwa muganga”.
“Ubu igikurikiyeho ni ukuyegurira abikorera kugira ngo barusheho gutaga serivisi nziza kumuturage zizaba zirimo no kungera amasaha kugira ngo n’abo bakenera ubuvuzi nijoro babubone”.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Imiyoborere RGB mu mwaka wa 2018, serivisi zirimo kwakira no kwita ku barwayi, gukingira indwara, ibikorwa remezo n’ibikoresho by’amavuriro birimo n’Imbangukiragutabara, abakozi b’amavuriro, n’izindi zitangirwa kwa muganga, bugaragaza ko muri rusange abaturage babajijwe bazishimira ku gipimo cya 70.8%.
Inama zitangwa na Minisiteri y’ubuzima zikaba zisaba abakira abagana serivisi z’ubuzima gushyiramo imbaraga kugira ngo zirusheho kunozwa bityo babashe gufasha ababagana, mu gihe Lata ya yo yihaye Umuhigo wo kuba mbere y’ umwaka wa 2019 nibura buri Kagari kagomba kuba gafite ivuriro ryakira abakeneye serivisi z’ibanze kwa muganga.

USA: Umuhanzi Ndayishimiye Clovis yarushinze na Jackie bamaze imyaka 3 bakundana uruzira imbereka -AMAFOTO Umuhanzi mu ndirimbo zahimbiwe Imana, Clovis Ndayishimiye uba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika afite ishimwe rikomeye ku mutima nyuma y’uko arushinganye na Jackie Mwirinzi bamaze imyaka 3 bari mu munyenga w’urukundo ruzira uburyarya.
Clovis yatangiye muzika aba muri Kenya muri 2011.
Yatangiriye kuyo yise ‘Nataka’ akurikizaho iyo yise ‘Aho wankuye’.
Iyo aheruka yayise’ Nakutegemea’.
Clovis aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kuva muri 2014.

Iyo ubajije Clovis icyo yasanze Jackie arusha abandi, agusubiza ko ari byinshi ariko ngo icy’ingenzi ni uko yubaha Imana cyane, akanubaha cyane abantu bose atarobanuye.

Mu buzima bwanjye bwose nasabaga Imana kuzampa umugore ukijijwe.
Jackie ni umwe mu bakobwa barangwa n’ubwitonzi, wubaha cyane, agakunda no gusenga.”
Bashinze urugo rw’abahanzi Ku itariki 19 Kanama 2017 nibwo Clovis na Jackie bashinze urugo, bahamiriza imbere y’Imana urukundo rwabo basezerana mu rusengero ndetse banabyereka abantu.

Aya makipe asanzwe yambikwa na Sosiyete yo muri Tanzania izwi ku izina rya SG Sports yatangiye ibiganiro n’iyi sosiyeti mu rwego rwo kubakorera imyenda y’abafana aho biteganyijwe ko aya makipe yari asanzwe yambika abakinnyi na bamwe mu bayobozi agiye no kujya yambika abafana bayo akabibyaza amafaranga.

Simon Nsanga ukuriye sosiyete ya SG Sports Sam Karenzi, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Bugesera, imwe mu makipe yambikwa na SG Sports, yavuze ko ubu buryo bushya bugiye kunganira amakipe kubona amafaranga.

Yakomeje avuga ko nubwo bigoye kumenya umubare w’abafana bose ba Bugesera mu gihugu ariko ngo biteze ko byibuze mu baturage batuye aka karere batazaburamo abantu ibihumbi bitanu bashobora kuzagura uyu mwambaro wa Bugesera.

Patrick Namenye uhagarariye SG Sports mu Rwanda, avuga ko intego yabo ari ugufasha amakipe mu rwego rwo kubereka aho bashobora gukura ubushobozi mu gihe ubu hari ibibazo by’amikoro bikomeje kugora amakipe.
Patrick Namenye uhagarariye SG Sports mu Rwanda SG Sports ivuga ko mu bufatanye n’amakipe bagiye gufungura amaduka acuruza imyenda y’aya makipe mu gihugu bityo ushatse umwambaro w’aya makipe akaba yawubona bitamugoye.
Uburyo bwo kwinjiza amafaranga binyuze mu myambaro busanzwe bukoreshwa n’amakipe atandukanye ariko hano mu Rwanda ntabwo bwari bwagatangiye gukoreshwa.
Amakipe yari asanzwe yinjiriza amafaranga ku bibuga ku mikino yakiriye no ku baterankunga.
Ubu buryo niburamuka bukoreshejwe neza buzunganira amakipe yajyaga agorwa n’ibibazo by’amikoro nyuma y’ihagarara ry’inkunga amakipe yahabwaga n’uwari umuterankunga wa Shampiyona ari we AZAM ndetse n’igabanurwa ry’ingengo y’imari amakipe yajyaga ahabwa n’uturere.
SG Sports yatangiye imikoranire n’aya makipe mu rwego rwo kubambika no kubafasha kubyaza umusaruro abafana babo binyuze mu myambaro , ni sosiyeti yo mu gihugu cya Tanzania yafunguye imiryango mu Rwanda muri uyu mwaka.
