Imikwabu yo gufata inzererezi iratanga umusaruro mu mujyi wa Ngoma Imikwabu yo gufata inzererezi mu mujyi wa Ngoma iragenda igabanya ibyaha by'ubujura bw'ibikoresho byo mungo bwari bwibasiye uyu mujyi; nk'uko bitangazwa n'umuyobozi w'akarere ka Ngoma, Nambaje Aphrodise.
Ibi byatangajwe nyuma yuko hafashwe inzererezi n'abatagira ibyangombwa bagera kuri 71 mu mukwabu wakozwe mu ijoro ryo kuwa 26/12/2012 .
Muri uyu mukwabu hafatiwemo n'inzoga zitemewe zirimo na Kanyanga.
Ibibido birimo inzoga z'inkorano zitemewe nka muriture n'izindi.
Umuyobozi w'akarere ka Ngoma yagize ati "Ukurikije imikwabu yagiye ikorwa ukareba n'aba bari ahangaha biragaragara ko bitanga icyizere kuko mu minsi yashize ubujura ndetse n'urugomo byari byafashe indi ntera none aho dufatiye izi nzererezi byaragabanutse kandi bizahoraho."
Abafatanwe inzoga zitemewe ndetse n'urumogi muri uyu mukwabu bahakanaga icyaha nubwo ibibido bafatanwe bemeraga ko ari ibyabo.Umudamu umwe muri bo inzego z'umutekano zavugaga ko zamufatanye kanyanga yabihakanye.
Abafashwe wasangaga biganjemo urubyiruko rwabaga rufite imyenda isa nabi kandi runaba mu nzu ari benshi mu buryo butazwi n'amategeko.
Insoresore nyinshi zinwa urumogi.
Kuba izi nsoresore ziza mu mujyi ntacyo zikora kizwi kandi zitiyandikisha mu makaye y'umudugudu ngo bamenyekane nibyo bituma bafatwa kuko baba barimo n'abajura.
Izi nzoga zitemewe ziri mu bihungabanya umutekano nk'uko inzego z'umutekano zibivuga.
Hashize iminsi mike muri aka karere umusore w'imyaka 20 afashe nyina umubyara ku ngufu abitewe n'inzoga.
Jean Claude Gakwaya

#25357#	10	relationships	https://rwandamagazine.com/urukundo/article/uburyo-10-abashakanye-bacana-inyuma-batabizi
Uburyo 10 abashakanye bacana inyuma batabizi Guca inyuma uwo mwashakanye akenshi bivugwa iyo umwe mu bashakanye akundanye cyangwa akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina n’undi mugabo cyangwa umugore.
Nubwo ibyo ari byo ariko hari n’ibindi bikorwa biba ari uguca inyuma nubwo hatarimo ubusambanyi.
Ibyo bikorwa ni ibi : 1.
Kugira inshuti itari uwo mwashakanye bitari iby’urukundo rweruye ariko na none bitari ubucuti busanzwe.
Ugasanga mukoranaho birenze ibisanzwe, amagambo mubwirana ntago ari ayo wabwira undi uwo ariwe wese.
Abashakanye bakwiye kwirinda izo nshuti.
2.
Kubwira ibibazo by’urugo rwawe, umuntu mudahuje igitsina.
Ibibazo niba utabasha kubiganira n’uwo mwashakanye bibwire inshuti cyangwa undi muntu wo mu muryango muhuje igitsina.
Akenshi ababibwira abo badahuje birangira havuyemo ubusambanyi nubwo biba byaratangiye atari byo bagamije.
3.
Gusohokana n’undi muntu utari uwo mwashakanye.
Kujya gusangira n’undi muntu mudahuje igitsina, gutembera hamwe cyangwa kumusura bigamije kugirana ibihe byiza gusa nabyo ni nko guca inyuma, wagombye kumara uwo mwanya uri kumwe n’uwo mwashakanye.
4.
Kuvuga nabi uwo mwashakanye : kuvuga nabi uwo mwashakanye ubibwira uwo mudahuje igitsina cyangwa utari uwo mu muryango, nabyo wabyirinda cyeretse mu gihe hajemo ihohoterwa nibwo wabibwira ababishinzwe nubwo baba badahuje igitsina nawe.
5.
Kwandikirana n’undi muntu mudahuje igitsina, muvugana ibintu by’amabanga utabwira uwo mwashakanye , hazamo no kwandikirana kuri whatsapp, kohererezanya amashusho udashaka ko uwo mwashakanye abona nabyo wabyirinda.
6.
Kwambara ukarimba ubikorera undi muntu : Niba uri kwambara imyenda myiza, cyangwa yihariye ushaka kugira umuntu wemeza utari uwo mwashakanye tangira witekerezeho umenye impamvu uri kubikora.
7.
Kwandikira umuntu mudahuje igitsina ikarita imwifuriza ibyiza, imwihanganisha cyangwa se kumuha intwererano ukabikora wenyine udashyizeho ko mubikoze hamwe n’uwo mwashakanye nabyo uba uri kumuca inyuma.
8.
Kwanga gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n’uwo mwashakanye nabyo ni bibi.
Bitera ibibazo bikaba ari no kwanga ibyo uba wariyemeje mugiye kubana 9.
Gushyira abana cyangwa ababyeyi bawe mbere y’uwo mwashakanye : nubwo abana n’ababyeyi ari ingenzi mu buzima ntibagomba gufata umwanya wa mbere ngo bajye bamenya gahunda zawe mbere y’uwo mwashakanye cyangwa abe aribo bakugira inama ukurikiza.
10.
Gutwarwa umutima n’ ikindi gikorwa kurenza uko uwuha uwo mwashakanye urugero gukunda umupira cyane, akabari, ama film, akazi ka nyuma y’akazi n’ibindi bitwara umutima.
Buri wese wubatse yakwisuzuma akareba ko adafite aho aca inyuma uwo bashakanye mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ubundi akabireka.
Source:Agasaro.com

#25373#	3	economy	http://www.igihe.com/ubukungu/ishoramari/article/rssb-yasobanuye-iby-amacumbi-y-i-batsinda-yagenewe-ab-amikoro-aciriritse
Kigali:Hatangiye kubakwa amacumbi 561 agenewe ab'amikoro aciriritse Yanditswe kuya 5-08-2016 saa 11:38' na Tombola Felicie Si umuntu wese ubasha kwiyubakira inzu mu mujyi wa Kigali bitewe n'ubushobozi bucye hagendewe ku gishushanyombonera, ikaba ari yo mpamvu RSSB yatangiye kubaka amacumbi 561 aciriritse azunganira gahunda yo gukemura iki kibazo.
Aya macumbi yatangiye kubakwa na RSSB ku bufatanye na Minisiteri y'Ibikorwa remezo, iy'Ingabo n'Umujyi wa Kigali bikaba biteganyijwe ko muri Kamena umwaka utaha azaba yuzuye.
Azaba ari amacumbi bivugwa ko aciriritse ugereranyije n'andi RSSB yubatse hirya no hino mu mujyi wa Kigali yamaze kugurwa.Agenewe abakozi ba leta n'abikorera ariko b'amikoro aciriritse.
RSSB itangaza ko ku bufatanye n'Umujyi wa Kigali n'amabanki y'ubucuruzi hazakorwa igenzura hakarebwa umushahara ndetse n'umutungo w'umuntu uzaba ushaka kugura inzu kuko nta muherwe uyemerewe.
Mu imurikagurisha mpuzamahanga ririmo kubera i Kigali ku nshuro ya 19, Ikigo cy'Igihugu cy'Ubwiteganyirize mu Rwanda RSSB kirimo gusobanurira abakigana aho imirimo yo kubaka ayo macumbi igeze n'igihe abashaka kuzayagura bazatangira kwiyandikisha.
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Viviane Akili, umukozi wo mu biro by'itangazamakuru muri RSSB yavuze ko impamvu yo gusobanurira abagana Expo iby'amacumbi yatangiye kubakwa mu karere ka Gasabo, Umurenge wa Kinyinya, Akagari ka Kagugu ahitwa i Batsinda, ari uko hari abatabizi nyamara aya mazu yaragenewe ab'amikoro yitwa ko ari macye kandi ko mu kwezi k'Ukuboza uyu mwaka abazaba bashaka kuyagura bazaba baratangiye kuyafat.
Ati" Turashaka ko abatugana muri iyi expo bamenya ko ubu imirimo yo kubaka yatangiye muri Kamena 2016 kandi ko ayo macumbi uko ari 561 azaba yamaze kubakwa muri Kamena 2017, bityo mu Kuboza uyu mwaka abazashaka kuyagura bakazaba barimo kwiyandikisha."
RSSB ivuga ko itaheje abafite ubushobozi buhambaye kuko aribo yabanje kubakira amacumbi i Gaculiro (Vision City & 2020 Estate) ndetse n'i Kagugu (Umucyo Estate).
Amacumbi azubakwa i Batsinda yose ni amagorofa hakazaba harimo isoko, aho bategera imodoka, amashuri, amaduka, inzu z'imyidagaduro n'ibindi bikoresho byose abantu bakenera ngo babashe kubaho neza.
Ibiciro by'amacumbi bihera ku mafaranga miliyoni 25 kugeza kuri Miliyoni 32 z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda bitewe n'ibyumba inzu umuntu ashaka ifite.
Kuri ubu imirimo yo kubaka igeze ku kigero cya 10% nyuma y'amezi abiri itangiye bikaba biteganywa ko muri Kamena 2017 izaba irangiye ari na bwo amabwiriza y'ubugure azashyirwa ahagaragara.
Nubwo hazaba ari mu magorofa, uwaguze inzu azaba afite uburenganzira bwo kuzayigurisha no kuba yayitangaho ingwate kuko izaba ari iye bwite.
Si muri Kigali gusa RSSB ikora ibikorwa byo kubaka amacumbi aciriritse kuko hari inzu zuzuye i Nyagatare zigurishwa ndetse n'indi mishinga myinshi igenda ikora.
Hirya no hino mu mu turere tugize Umujyi wa Kigali hari kugenda hubakwa amacumbi aciriritse muri gahunda yo kubaka amacumbi rusange ibihumbi 10 yo muri uru rwego.

#25406#	4	health	https://www.kigalitoday.com/ubuzima/indwara/article/sobanukirwa-indwara-ya-anjine-ishobora-no-gutera-umutima
Sobanukirwa indwara ya Anjine ishobora no gutera umutima Anjine ni uburwayi bufata inyama ebyiri ziba mu muhogo zitwa amigdales (soma amigidale) cyangwa tonsils (soma tonsozi), zikaba zigira umumaro wo kurinda umuntu mikorobe zafata imyanya y’ubuhumekero n’uburiro.
Iyo izo nyama zifashwe na mikorobe nibyo bita anjine.
Mu kiganiro KT Radio yagiranye na Dr Ncogoza Isai uvura indwara zo mu matwi, mu mazuru mu muhogo n’ijosi (ORL) asobanura ko Anjine zirimo ibyiciro 2 bitewe n’ikizitera.
Yagize ati hari anjines ziterwa n’udukoko (bagiteri) zo mu bwoko bwa streptocoques (siterebutokoke), hakaba n’ibindi bintu bituma zaza cyane ku muntu umwe kurusha undi.
Urugero nk’abantu bafite ubwandu (infection) cyangwa se virusi kuburyo nk’umuntu ashobora kurwara grippe ikaziramo na anjine cyangwa se gapfura.
Yakomeje avuga ko angine zikunze kwibasira abana cyane kurusha abantu bakuru, ngo n’ubwo nabo bazirwara, ariko guhera ku bana b’umwaka umwe kugera kumyaka 7 nibo ikunze kugaragaraho cyane.
Dr Ncogoza yakomeje avuga ko hari ibimenyetso biranga anjine, agira ati: “Hari ibimenyetso biranga angines, icya mbere ni ukubabara mu muhogo, umutwe, gucika intege mbese ukamera nk’urwaye Malariya.
Ibyo nibyo by’ingenzi, burya umuriro uza nyuma, kuko ushobora gusanga umuntu afite anjine kandi nta muriro afite.
Ariko ibyo bimenyetso iyo bitavuwe, byateza ibindi bibazo (complications)”.
Dr Ncogoza yakomeje asobanura ibyo bibazo bindi bishamikira kuri anjine zitavuwe ku gihe: “Icya mbere niba wagize umuriro, cyangwa infection ishobora gufata ibindi bice byegereye za nyama za amigdales bikabyara ikibyimba gifite amashyira inyuma y’iyo nyama aribyo bita peritonsilor abscess, cyangwa absce peri-amigdalien mu gifaransa.
Icyo kibyimba iyo kibayeho nacyo gishobora kuzana izindi ngaruka kuko ijosi rikorana n’izo nyama, cyangwa ukagira infection mu buhumekero nko mu bihaha n’ahandi bitewe n’uko za bagiteri zishobora gutwarwa n’umwuka cyangwa ibyo kurya.
Ikindi iyo ari umwana urwaye anjine afite bya bimenyetso, ashobora no gucibwamo (diarrhea).
Ibirenze kuri ibyo iyo anjine zihora zigaruka zishobora gutera umutima, rubagimpande, cyangwa indwara z’impyiko”.
Dr Ncogoza, twamubajije niba iyi ndwara ya anjine yakwirindwa asubiza atya: “ Nta kintu kidasanzwe mbona kirebana no kuyirinda cyokora urwaye anjine yakwirinda gusomana, gukoresha uburoso bw’abandi kuko bagiteri zandura, atabyitayeho yakwanduza mugenzi we.
Ariko ntaburyo budasanzwe bwo kwirinda anjine, ikindi umuntu afashwe na giripe akwiye kuyivuza kugira ngo na anjine zituririraho.
Ikindi ni uko umuntu wafashwe na anjine akwiriye kwivuza hakiri kare bya bibazo bizishamikiyeho bitaraza, icya nyuma ni ukwirinda gufata imiti utandikiwe na muganga.
MENYA UMWANDITSI

#25433#	1	sports	http://www.igihe.com/imikino/amagare/article/ikipe-y-u-rwanda-yegukanye-umwanya-wa-kabiri-mbappe-ahabwa-igihembo-muri-tour
Ikipe y’u Rwanda yabaye iya kabiri, Mbappé arigaragaza ku munsi wa mbere wa Tour du Faso Abakinnyi batandatu bahagarariye u Rwanda mu isiganwa rizenguruka igihugu cya Burkina Faso rizwi nka Tour du Faso, basoreje ku mwanya wa gatatu ku munsi wa mbere wakinwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu, aho basiganwe n’ibihe nk’ikipe (Team Time Trial).
Ikipe y’u Rwanda yitabiriye iri siganwa ku nshuro ya mbere kuva mu 2006, aho kuri ubu riri kuba ku nshuro ya 32.
Mugisha Samuel, Mugisha Moïse, Hakizimana Seth, Munyaneza Didier ‘Mbappé’, Uwizeye Jean Claude na Nzafashwanayo Jean Claude nibo bagize ikipe y’u Rwanda muri iri siganwa ryitabiriwe n’amakipe 15, aho batozwa na Sempoma Félix.
Mu isiganwa rya mbere ryabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu, abakina basiganwa n’ibihe mu makipe yabo, ikipe y’u Rwanda yegukanye umwanya wa kabiri nyuma yo gukoresha iminota umunani n’amasegonda 15 ku ntera y’ibilometero 7.1.
Bai Sicasal Petro de Luanda ni yo yegukanye umwanya wa mbere ikoresha iminota umunani n’amasegonda atanu mu gihe ikipe ya gatatu yabaye u Bubligi.
Munyaneza Didier uzwi nka Mbappé ni we wambitswe umwambaro uhabwa umukinnyi uzi guhatana kurusha abandi (sprinter).
Tour du Faso irakomeza kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ku munsi wayo wa kabiri, aho abasiganwa bazakora intera y’ibilometero 150.5 bavuye mu gace ka Nagreongo bagasoreza muri Tenkodogo.
Munyaneza Didier yahembwe nk'umukinnyi wahatannye kurusha abandi ku munsi wa mbere wa Tour du Faso Ikipe y'u Rwanda yabaye iya kabiri muri TTT ya Tour du Faso Abakinnyi bagize ikipe y'u Rwanda bayobowe n'umutoza Sempoma

Tom Rwagasana arashinja ADEPR kumwandagaza no kumutesha agaciro mu ruhame Nyuma y’icyumweru kimwe abahoze ari abayobozi na ADEPR bambuwe ubupasiteri, Tom Rwagasana wari umuyobozi wungirije na we uri mu babwambuwe yasabye itorero rya ADEPR kwivuguruza kuko ngo icyemezo ryafashe akibona nk’uburyo bwo kumutesha agaciro no kumwandagaza mu ruhame.
Ibi bikubiye mu ibaruwa yandikiye itorero rya ADEPR kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 13 Ukwakira 2017.
Iyi baruwa yasubizaga iyo ADEPR yanditse tariki 5 Ukwakira 2017, ijya hanze tariki 6 Ukwakira.
Ni ibaruwa yamburaga inshingano z’ubupasiteri Sibomana Jean wari umuyobozi wa ADEPR, Rwagasana Tom wari umwungirije , Sebagabo Leonard, Niyitanga Salton, Sindayigaya Theophile na Gasana Valens.
Uko ari 6 bose bahuriye mu kirego cy’icungwa nabi ry’umutungo w’inyubako ya Dove Hotel y’itorero rya ADEPR.
Mu ibaruwa Tom Rwagasana yandikiye umuyobozi wa ADEPR akaba n’umuvugizi wayo , Rev Ephrem Karuranga yamusabye ko bakwiriye kwisubiraho ku cyemezo bafashe cyo kubambura ubupasiteri.
Ingingo ya mbere yashingiyeho ni uko ngo bidakwiye ko bamburwa Ubupasiteri kuko ari umuhamagaro w’Imana.
Tom Rwagasana yakomeje atanga izindi ngingo 3 ashingiraho zirimo ko raporo bashingiyeho bamuhagarika we atayizi atazi ibiyikubiyemo.
Yongeyeho ko ibiyirimo bihabanye n’izindi raporo zakozwe ndetse zikanemezwa n’inzego za ADEPR zibifite mu nshingano.
Mu ibaruwa ye, Tom yagize ati " Mwene data, izindi mpamvu nshingiraho harimo kuba icyemezo cyarashingiye kuri raporo y’ubugenzuzi (External Forensic Audit Report) ntamenyeshejwe, ntakorewe, ntagizemo uruhare urwo arirwo rwose cyangwa ngo mugire icyo muyimbazaho mbahe ibisobanuro.
Kuba nanone nsanga icyo cyemezo ubwacyo kinyuranye n’amategeko y’igihugu muri rusange n’ay’itorero ADEPR by’umwihariko, cyane cyane ku bijyanye n’igihe icyemezo nk’iki cyakabaye gifatwa, ububasha bwo kugifata, inzira binyuzwamo kugira ngo gifatwe ndetse no gusuzuma ibikwiye gushingirwaho mu gihe icyo cyemezo cyaba kiri mu nyungu zanyu ndetse n’izi’itorero muri rusange.”
Tom Rwagasana yasoje ashimira ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR uburyo buri busuzumane ubushishozi ibyo yabandikiye kandi ngo bakaba bagomba kwisubiraho mu gihe gito gishoboka kuko icyemezo nkicyabafatiwe yagifashe nk’uburyo bwo kumutesha agaciro no kumwandagaza mu ruhame.

#25477#	3	economy	http://www.kigalitoday.com/ubukungu/iterambere/article/amatara-yo-ku-muhanda-kigali-rubavu-azateza-imbere-ubucuruzi-n-ubukerarugendo
Amatara yo ku muhanda Kigali-Rubavu azateza imbere ubucuruzi n'ubukerarugendo Minisitiri w'ibikorwaremezo, James Musoni aratangaza ko gucanira umuhanda Kigali-Rubavu bizatanga umusaruro mu guteza imbere ubucuruzi, ubukerarugendo ndetse no kongera ubuhahirane hagati y'u Rwanda na Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo (RDC).
Ibi Minisitiri Musoni yabitangarije mu Karere ka Musanze kuwa 29/01/2015 ubwo yatangizaga ku mugaragaro igikorwa cyo gucanira umuhanda Kigali-Rubavu ureshya n'ibirometero 124.
Uyu muyoboro w'amashanyarazi watashywe watwaye akayabo k'amafaranga y'u Rwanda agera kuri miliyari zirindwi yatanzwe na Leta y'u Rwanda ifatanyije n'uturere.
Gucanira umuhanda KIgali-Rubavu ngo bizateza imbere ubucuruzi n'ubukerarugendo.
Uyu muhanda wa Kigali-Rubavu unyura mu turere dutanu ari two Rulindo, Gakenke na Musanze mu Ntara y'Amajyaruguru, na Nyabihu na Rubavu two mu Ntara y'Iburengerazuba.
Uretse Gakenke na Rulindo, utwo turere dusigaye ni two dukungahaye ku birayi n'ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku gusura ibirunga ndetse n'ingagi.
Abaturage bo mu Karere ka Musanze bemeza ko hari inyungu nyinshi bazakura kuri ayo matara rusange yirukanye umwijima kuko amasaha yo gukora yiyongereye aho ijoro ritazongera kuba imbogamizi yababuza gukomeza akazi kabo nk'abakoresha umuhanda.
Umukozi wa NPD-Cotraco yashyizeho aya matara asobanurira Minisitiri Musoni uko ayo matara akora.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu, Twahirwa Abdulatif ashimangira ko ahageze urumuri ni umutekano nawo utahatangwa.
Ati "Nk'uko byagarutsweho ni umucyo haba havuye umwijima.
Natanga urugero rw'ubujura bukorwa mu mwijima ariko iyo hari umucyo bidufasha gukumira ibyaha cyane cyane by'ubujura".
Amatara yashyizwe kuri uyu muhanda akoresha umuriro muke ungana na ¼ cy'utwarwa n'amatara asanzwe yo ku mihanda, amatara 3500 yakoreshejwe azajya atwara kilowati 250, igishimishije ngo ashobora kumara imyaka 25 atarapfa; nk'uko byemezwa na Uwimbabazi Odette, umuyobozi ushinzwe gukwirakwiza amashanyarazi mu kigo gishinzwe gucunga ingufu (EUCL).
Minisitiri w'ibikorwaremezo avuga ko mu mwaka utaha n'indi mihanda ihuza uturere izacanirwa.
Minisitiri w'ibikorwaremezo, James Musoni yavuze ko iki ari icyiciro cya mbere cyo gucanira imihanda minini, ngo mu mwaka utaha n'indi mihanda ihuza uturere ikazashyirwaho ayo matara.
Agira ati "Dukoresheje uburyo bugenda buvuguruye, gushyira ku bindi bice by'igihugu bizatwara miliyari zigera ku 10 ni ukuvuga ko aha hahenze cyane kuko twari tugitangira kubera ko twavuguruye imikorere n'aho tugenda dukora neza izindi miliyari kugira ngo turangize mu gihugu cyose".
Abaturage bishimiye aya matara yo kumihanda ariko banasabwe kuyabungabunga.
Imihanda izakorwa ifite ibirometero 277 ari yo; Kigali-Kagitumba; Kayonza-Rusumo; Kigali-Gatuna na Kigali-Huye-Akanyaru.
Mu butumwa abayobozi batandukanye bitabiriye uyu muhango bagejeje ku baturage bakanguriwe kubyaza umusaruro ayo matara bavugurura udusantere tw'ubucuruzi bubaka amazu ajyanye n'igihe.
Bibukijwe ko ayo matara abafite inyungu nini akaba ari bo bagomba kuyabungabunga.
Nshimiyimana Leonard

#25495#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/article/mafia-mu-madini-ibikomere-pasiteri-jean-desire-wo-muri-zion-temple-yatewe-na
Mafia mu madini!
Ibikomere Pasiteri Jean-Désiré wo muri Zion Temple yatewe na bagenzi be (Video) Ubishatse wamwita Mvuyekure!
Kuko ashobora kuba nawe yicara agatera ya korasi yo mu Barokore ivuga iti ‘aho wankuye Mana’.
Ni byo koko hari igihe unyura mu bihe bikomeye, ku buryo igihe kigera ukavuga uti rwose si ku bwanjye.
Ni ko na Pasiteri Pasiteri Ntawiniga Jean-Désiré Hullet ameze.
Yakuriye mu muryango wifashije kuko se yari Umukozi wa Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika i Kigali.
Usibye kuba bari abatunzi mu by’Isi, bari n’abatunzi mu by’ijuru kuko basengaga cyane, bakanabitoza abana babo ku buryo buri Munsi wa Karindwi nkuko Abadivantisiti babyemera, bajyaga imbere y’Imana, bakayiragiza.
Afite imyaka 43, ariko yose irimo ubuhamya buhambaye.
Ni umugabo utarahiriwe n’urushako, umugore wa mbere Imana yaramwisubije bamaranye amazi make bashyingiwe nta n’akana amusigiye kuko yari atwite inda y’amezi atandatu.
Yishumbushije undi bari baramenyanye mu buto, gusa nawe ikinyotera cy’urukundo cyashize mu cyumweru cya mbere, birangira batandukanye.
Ubu arasaba Imana ko yasohoza isezerano ryayo ikamushakire undi umukwiye.
Mu minsi irenga ibihumbi 15 amaze ku Isi, yanyuze muri byinshi, ndetse yakoze buri kimwe cyangwa n’Imana n’abantu.
Yanyoye ibiyobyabwenge, yarasambaye, yaciye inyuma uwo bashakanye, yarasinze, yafunzwe kubera uburiganya, yambuye abatabarika n’ibindi.
Nyuma y’aho Imana imubatuye ikamwereka inzira ikwiye, yaje kongera kugira intege nke yisanga mu byaha ku buryo asobanura ko arondoye umubare w’abagore baryamanye, hasenyuka ingo nyinshi zo muri Kigali.
Mu buzima bwe kandi, yabanye n’ibikomere yatewe n’abapasiteri bagenzi bakoranaga umurimo w’Imana, byamubereye intandaro yo kugwa, asubira mu businzi n’ubusambanyi yahozemo atarakizwa.
Muri iki gihe ni Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo “Ladder Leadership Consulting” kigira inama abakora ubucuruzi.
Amaze imyaka 16 yakiriye agakiza, ariko mu 2015 hagati aho yaje kugwa, ubu amaze amezi asaga atanu agarutse mu murimo w’Imana.
Mu kiganiro kirekire yagiranye na IGIHE, yavuze byinshi ku buzima bwe.
Uko yafungiwe muri Gereza Nkuru ya Kigali azira kwigana isinya y’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa BRD, uko ababyeyi n’abavandimwe be bagiye gutura muri Amerika yibereye mu kabari, yavuye gushyingura umugore we n’umwana asanga yirukanwe mu rusengero, yahawe amasaha 24 ngo abe avuye ku butaka bwa Afurika y’Epfo bigizwemo uruhare na Pasiteri n’ibindi.
Ikiganiro kirambuye IGIHE: Mu mabyiruka yawe wari umwana umeze ute?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Ndi umwana w’imfura iwacu, ariko nari umwana wananiye ababyeyi.
Ababyeyi banjye bari bifashije rwose kuko Papa yakoraga muri Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda.
Nakuze ndi wa mwana ugira amanyanga ku buryo najyaga kwikopesha imigati kuri butike kandi mu rugo Mama ayikora, najyaga kwikopesha Sardine kandi mu rugo twatetse inyama.
Iwacu bajyaga bamara kuryama umukozi twari dufite akambyutsa tukajya kurara mu kabari hariya i Nyamirambo tugataha mu gitondo.
Ubu ababyeyi banjye n’abavandimwe baba muri Amerika, ariko umunsi bagendeye njye sinari mpari nari naraye mu kabari, nagiye kubasura bamazeyo imyaka 10.
IGIHE: Bishoboka bite ko umwana wo mu bakirisitu akora ibintu nk’ibyo ?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Ntabwo wakwambara umwambaro w’umuntu ukijijwe ngo agakiza kakujyeho, ntabwo agakiza kandura, ni ikintu umuntu yimenyera ku giti cye.
Ababyeyi banjye basengeraga mu Itorero ry’Abadiventiste b’Umunsi wa Karindwi, banyigishije gusenga nubwo nageze aho nkananirana, byinshi mu byo nakoraga ntibanabimenyaga.
IGIHE: Ababyeyi bawe iyo babonaga iyo myitwarire babyifatagamo gute?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Umwana umeze gutyo ateza ibibazo, nateje ibibazo byinshi narakubiswe bihagije, mu rugo baransengeye bakabwira n’abantu basenga ngo bansengere birananirana.
IGIHE: Wigeze gufungirwa muri Gereza Nkuru ya Kigali, wari wakoze iki?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Nari mfite akazi keza ndi Umucungamutungo muri BRD nahembwaga amafaranga menshi, ariko nari mfite ikibazo cyo kutanyurwa n’ubuzima mbayeho.
Nabagaho ubuzima buhenze cyane butajyanye n’amafaranga nakoreraga binjyana mu madeni, binjyana mu kwambura no mu kubeshya ndafatwa ndafungwa.
Icyo gihe mfatwa nari mfite gahunda yo gutoroka ngo mve mu Rwanda nigire muri Amerika.
Nafunzwe ndegwa kwigana umukono w’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa BRD.
IGIHE: Wari umaze igihe kingana gute ugerageza kwigana umukono we ?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Kuva nkiri umwana nari nzi kwigana isinya, ndibuka ko najyaga nigana isinya ya Papa ku buryo iyo mwarimu yabaga yandikiye ababyeyi banjye kubera amakosa nabaga nakoze, nafataga ikayi nkandikira mwarimu mu mukono wa Papa narangiza ngasinya mu izina rya Papa.
Ntabwo nari nziko bizankurikirana bikageza ubwo bimfungisha.
Ikindi nazize kwari ugutanga amasheki (chèque) zitazigamiye.
Ayo mafaranga yose yagendaga mu nzoga no mu bakobwa, kuko buri munsi nabaga mfite nk’umukobwa umwe iwanjye kandi ntabwo yagenderagaho, yararyaga, yaranywaga.
Pasiteri Jean-Désiré wo muri Zion Temple yavuze ku bikomere yatewe na bagenzi be mu murimo w'Imana IGIHE: Waje kwakira agakiza gute?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Mu 2003 mfunzwe nibwo nakiriye agakiza, ubusanzwe njye ibintu by’abarokore narabyangaga cyane Yesu Kristo ubwe niwe wanyisangiye.
Mfunguwe rero naje ndi umuntu mushya, nshaka kwibera mu rusengero.
Nakoze umurimo w’Imana mbwiriza ubutumwa bwiza.
Najyaga mbwiriza mu muhanda, nkabwiriza mu modoka zitwara abagenzi, nari mfite umuhamagaro ukomeye ndi icyaremwe gishya.
IGIHE: Urugendo rwawe mu barokore rwari rwifashe gute?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Nagiye mu Itorero rya Zion Temple mu 2004 ari Imana inyoherejeyo, abayobozi b’Itorero babona umuhamagaro wanjye baransengera mba Pasiteri mu mwaka wa 2011.
Nabaye Pasiteri mu 2011, ariko bari barabanje kunyohereza kujya kuba Pasiteri wungirije mu Itorero rya Zion Tempe i Butare, icyo gihe itorero ryari rifite ibibazo, pasiteri mukuru ntiyumvikanaga na pasiteri wari umwungirije byari ibibazo bikomeye.
Naje kugira ibyago umugore wanjye Anita Niyuhire twari tumaranye amezi icyenda yicwa n’impanuka yabereye i Burundi, atwite umwana wacu w’imfura.
Pasiteri mukuru twakoranaga ntiyari yarigeze aza kudusura kuva twagera i Butare, umugore wanjye n’umwana bamaze gupfa nabwo ntiyigeze adusura.
IGIHE: Nyuma y’ibyo byago, ubuzima bw’iyogezabutumwa bwakomeje gute?
Ntabwo wigeze ucika intege?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Nyuma yo gushyingura umugore wanjye i Burundi kuko niho impanuka yebereye, nagarutse ku murimo w’Imana ngiye gufungura ibiro nakoreragamo ku itorero, umunyamabanga wacu arambwira ati pasiteri mukuru yahinduye iserire yaravuze ngo umurimo wari ufite aha wararangiye uzasubire ku bakohereje.
Nagize agahinda gakomeye, ndavuga nti mfushije umugore uyu niwe wakampumurije none aranyirukanye?
IGIHE: Nibwo wahise uva mu gakiza?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Nkunda kubibwira abantu ngo iyo uri umukirisitu usanzwe ukajya mu itorero ugasenga ukitahira burya ni byiza ntujye mu bintu by’ubuyobozi.
Kuko ninjiye mu buyobozi mbona ibintu ntigeze mbona, nkavuga nti ese burya ba bantu babwiriza baba mu bintu bimeze gutya?
IGIHE: Zion Temple yagufashije iki muri icyo gihe?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Ubuyobozi bwa Zion Temple bwahise bunyohereza kwiga muri Afurika y’Epfo gukomeza amasomo aho nari narize tewolojiya.
Ngezeyo barankunda, baranyishimira bangirira umuyobozi w’abanyeshuri, bampa n’akazi ndigisha […] Iryo torero ryari riyobowe n’abazungu naryo nasanze ririmo ibibazo, uwariyoboraga yaravugaga bose bagaceceka ntihagire utinyuka kumubaza ati ibi ukora nibiki?
Kubera kwa kutihanganira amafuti kwanjye natangiye kujya mubwiza ukuri ku byo nabonaga bitari byiza akora, maze aranyanga kugeza ubwo yampaye amasaha 24 ngo mbe mvuye muri icyo gihugu, yanyirukanye mu masaha y’ijoro, mu mbeho ikomeye yanga ko mfata n’ikote ryanjye ngo nifubike.
Singiye kukubeshya buriya abakozi b’Imana biriya bibazo byo gucikamo ibice mu matorero harimo ibinyoma byinshi, harimo intambara zirenze n’iza politike harimo mafia.
Njye rero ukuntu navutse mvuga ibintu uko biri.
IGIHE: Wakomoje ku bibazo bibera mu madini, ndakeka icyo cyari icya ikindi uhuye nacyo nyuma yo kwirukanwa.
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Mu bakozi b’Imana habamo intambara zirenze iziba mu banyapolitike […] ubwo naraje ngeze mu Rwanda nsanga mu Itorero rya Zion Temple harimo bya bibazo byose mwagiye mwumva byabaye mu 2015.
Naravuze nti ibi ni ibiki?
Ibintu byatumye nyerera nkagwa ni ibikomere, nari nsigaye njya mu rusengero simfashwe bigeze muri Kamena 2015 mbwira Imana nti mbivuyemo.
Ndavuga nti ndasubira mu byo nahozemo, ndasubira mu nzoga kandi ninzinywa nzazinywera ku mugaragaro.
Ubupasiteri mbutereka hasi kuko nari nzinutswe.
Sinari kuba muri ubwo buzima ngo nkomeze no kujya gusenga, ntabwo nabivanga, ntabwo nabishobora kuko burya iyo ubaye gutyo nibura Imana iba izi aho ubarizwa.
IGIHE: Nyuma yo gupfusha umugore waba wongeye gushaka?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Narongeye ndashaka, umukobwa wabaga muri Canada, ariko twari dusanzwe tuziranye na cya gihe mfunzwe yaransuye.
Mu 2014 nibwo twakoze ubukwe, ariko muhisha ibikomere nari mfite by’itorero.
Twakoze ubukwe ntagisenga, nari nsigaye nsenga ku cyumweru ngezaho nabyo ndabireka.
Urugo rwanjye rwapfuye mu cyumweru cya mbere cy’ubukwe kuko naho nagiriyemo ibikomere mbihisha madamu, ankomeretsa nawe atabizi bituma muzinukwa.
Nashidutse ntakimukunda nkuko namukundaga, yoherezaga impapuro ngo njye muri Canada ngataha nasinze nkazica, naziciye inshuro enye, ubwo ni imyaka ine.
Nagiye mu nzoga nyinshi, njya mu busambanyi bwinshi cyane.
Muri ibyo bibazo byose nta mupasiteri n’umwe wanshatse, washaka intama yazimiye gute se kandi muri mu matiku?
Abanyitayeho ni abo ntacyekaga.
Nyuma yo gukora ubukwe umugore wanjye yasubiye kuba muri Canada, yaje kugaruka nyuma arambwira ati bambwiye ko wanciye inyuma n’abagore benshi?
Ndamubwira nti yaba umwe, baba ijana wowe emera ko naguciye inyuma kandi ndagusaba imbabazi.
Nabimubwiye nshaka kumwikiza kuko numvaga twatandukana.
Gatanya bayiduhaye umwaka ushize mu kwezi kwa munani.
IGIHE: Wanyuzemo mu bihe bitoroshye.
Ukura he imbaraga zo gutanga ubuhamya nk’ubu?
Pasiteri Ntawiniga: Twese turacyubakwa nta muntu wajya hariya ngo avuge ngo we byararangiye Imana yamaze gusiga amarangi, oya twese turi inzu icyubakwa.
Ikibazo rero abantu bagira ni uko abapasiteri bamwe batigaragaza uko bari bigatuma abantu bibwira ko ari abantu batajya bakora ibyaha.
Have have barabikora ahubwo ni uko batajya babyatura.
Kubaho mu kinyoma biravuna, iyo utabaye wowe ntubohoka kandi ntunakira.
Hari abantu bazi ko nugera mu rusengero wibombarika, wagera hanze ukaba undi muntu.
Iyo rero ufite amasura abiri n’imbere y’Imana uba uri “fake” numva njye kubaho mu kuri aribyo byoroshye, kubaho mu kinyoma nibyo bihenze.
Mu mpera za 2018 nibwo Pasiteri Ntawiniga yongeye kwakira agakiza, agaruka mu murimo w’Imana abifashijwemo n’umuntu w’inshuti ye.
Avuga ko Yesu ariwe wongeye kumusanga, amuvura ibikomere byose yari afite, ko atagomba kureba abantu.
Ati "Yambwiye ko ntagomba kureba abana b’abantu kuko ariwe wenyine wanyitoranyirije, kandi ko ubu igihe cyanjye cyo gukora nyagukora aribwo kigeze.
Arusha niho yampereye imbaraga zo kuva mu bibi byose nari ndimo, ngaruka abampemukiye bose narabababariye, abo nahemukiye cyangwa nakomerekeje nanjye mbasabye imbabazi."
Mafia mu madini!

Tour du Rwanda: Uguhangana kudasanzwe hagati ya Mugisha wambaye umuhondo na Ndayisenga Valens Tour du Rwanda 2018 igeze hagati ndetse umwenda w’umuhondo uracyari mu bitugu by’Umunyarwanda Mugisha Samuel, ariko umwuka si mwiza hagati ye na Ndayisenga Valens ashinja gushaka kuwumwambura nyamara we yaramufashije kwegukana iri siganwa mu 2016.
Ubusanzwe mu mukino w’amagare nta wigira kabone n’iyo yaba umuhanga gute, bisaba ko afatanya na bagenzi be bagakora nk’ikipe cyane cyane mu kunaniza abo bahanganye kugira ngo intsinzi iboneke.
Abanyarwanda bakunze gufashanya muri Tour du Rwanda hatitawe ku ikipe buri mukinnyi yitabiriye irushanwa ahagararariye, kuko babikoze mu 2016 Ndayisenga Valens akinira Dimension data yo muri Afurika y’Epfo akaryegukana, n’umwaka ushize barabisubira bafasha Areruya Joseph wakiniraga Dimension Data.
Uyu mwaka Mugisha Samuel, kapiteni wa Team Rwanda, yambaye umwenda w’umuhondo ku munsi wa kabiri nyuma yo kwegukana agace kavaga i Kigali kajya i Huye, gusa yijujutiye ko umwe mu bakinnyi bakomeye muri uyu mukino, Valens Ndayisenga, ari kumusatira cyane aho kumufasha ngo atsinde iri rushanwa.
Mu gace ka Gatatu k’irushanwa kavaga i Huye kajya i Musanze kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Ndayisenga ukinira Equipe De POC Côte De Lumière yo mu Bufaransa, yamusatiriye cyane ashaka kujya gutsinda ndetse no kureba niba yamwambura umwenda w’umuhondo.
No kuri uyu wa Gatatu mu gace kavaga i Musanze kajya i Karongi byongeye kubaho bituma Mugisha agaragaza kutishimira uko mugenzi we ari kwitwara ndetse atangaza ko niba ashaka ko bahangana ariko bigiye kugenda.
Yabwiye itangazamakuru ati “Ntabwo urugendo rw’uyu munsi rwagenze neza kuko hajemo guhangana no kudashaka gufatanya.
Ibyo byabaye umwaka ushize ntabwo byari bikwiye kongera kuba uyu mwaka.
Ntabwo niyumvisha uburyo Valens [Ndayisenga] yashaka ko nsigara, uriya munya-Ethiopia ayitwaye ntabwo baririmba Rwanda Nziza, kuba akinira ikipe yo mu Bufaransa ntibivuze ko atari Umunyarwanda.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Sinzi impamvu yiyumvisha ko adashobora kumfasha kandi nawe izo yatwaye baramufashije, ntabwo watsinda uri wenyine.”
Mugisha yakomeje asobanura uko yahanganye na Ndayisenga ati “Yatakaga ngasigara njyenyine, abakinnyi banjye basigaye inyuma, urumva ko nta kindi nari gukora nahise nishyiramo ko atagomba kunsiga kuko n’abandi bari kugenda kandi ndabasiga amasegonda 21, byabaye akazi katoroshye ariko ndashima Imana yampaye imbaraga sinsigare.”
Mugisha avuga ko nyuma yo kubona uruhande Ndayisenga ariho nawe yiteguye kugira ngo bahangane kandi yizeye ko azafatanya na bagenzi be bakitwara neza.
Ndayisenga Valens we aganira n’abanyamakuru, yavuze ko yaje mu Rwanda aje gutsinda ndetse aramutse abonye uko yambara umwenda w’umuhondo nta kabuza yawambara, yongeraho ko ibyo akora byose ari ibyo aba yasabwe n’umutoza we.
Yagize ati “Ntabwo tubikora ngo duhangane na Mugisha ahubwo turakora dukurikije ibyo abatoza batubwiye.
Mbonye umwenda w’umuhondo nawufata.
Gahunda dufite [nka Equipe De POC Côte De Lumière] ni ukwegukana Tour du Rwanda.
Niba abatoza bo bivugiye bati ntihagire umuntu wongera kureba ku Munyarwanda, icyo gihe wakora iki ?
Biba bicanga umuntu.
” Abajijwe niba abona bishoboka ko Mugisha yazagumana umwenda w’umuhondo kugera ku munsi wa nyuma, yagize ati “Mugisha ameze neza, yaritoje uko bamwataka kose ndabizi neza azitwara neza kandi umwenda w’umuhondo azawegukana ndamwizeye."
Kugeza ubu Mugisha aracyambaye umwenda w’umuhondo, asiga Uwizeye Jean Claude ukinana na Ndayisenga n’Umunya-Ethiopia Hailemichael Mulu amasegonda 0:21" akarusha Lozano RIBA David wa Team Novo Nordisk umunota 01’51’’, agasiga Doring Jonas wa Team Descartes Romandie iminota 02’10’’ naho Ndayisenga Valens wa gatandatu akamusiga iminota 02’13’’.
Tour du Rwanda izakoremereza i Rubavu mu gace kazahagurukira i Karongi kuri uyu wa Kane kareshya na kilometero 95,1 kuwa Gatanu hakazakinwa agace ka Rubavu-Kinigi kareshya 108,5 km, kuwa Gatandatu hakinwe agace ka Musanze- Kigali (imbere ya MIC) kareshya na 107,4 km naho ku Cyumweru risozwe hakinwa agace ka Kigali (Stade Amahoro)- Kigali (Nyamirambo) ka 82,2 km.

Abana bo muri Afurika y’Epfo mu rugendo berekeza mu Misiri mu ndege bikoreye Indege yakozwe n’ingimbi n’abangavu bo muri Afurika y’Epfo iri gukora urugendo rwo kuva mu mujyi wa Cape Town muri iki gihugu yerekeza i Cairo mu murwa mukuru wa Misiri ndetse yamaze guhagarara bwa mbere muri Namibia mu rugendo rwayo nta kibazo igize.
Bavuga ko bizabafata ibyumweru bitandatu mu kurangiza urwo rugendo rwa kilometero 12000 rwerekeza mu Misiri.
Iyo ndege y’ibyicaro bine yo mu bwoko bwa Sling 4 yateranyijwe n’itsinda ry’abanyeshuri 20 bakomoka mu miryango y’amikoro atandukanye.
Megan Werner w’imyaka 17 y’amavuko ari na we mupilote w’iyi ndege, yagize ati: "Intego y’iki gikorwa ni ukwereka Afurika ko buri kintu cyose gishoboka iyo ugishyizeho umutima".
Abo bana bakoze iyo ndege mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bitatu, bagendeye ku bikoresho byakorewe muri Afurika y’Epfo n’uruganda rukora indege zo muri ubwo bwoko.
Ibyo bikoresho byazanwe hamwe n’ibice bito by’indege bibarirwa mu bihumbi byagombaga guteranywa.
Agnes Seemela w’imyaka 15 y’amavuko ati " Iyo ndebye iyi ndege, numva nishimye cyane, sinshobora kwiyumvisha ibyo twakoze.
Mba numva ari nk’umwana wanjye.
Ndayikunda cyane".
Avuga ku rugendo rwabo rwa mbere bava mu mujyi wa Johannesburg berekeza i Cape Town, mbere yo gutangira urugendo nyirizina rwerekeza i Cairo, Agnes yagize ati "Iguruka neza cyane ndetse uba ubona neza ibice bitandukanye by’aho tunyura.
Akomeza agira ati " Bwa mbere, abaturanyi baguye mu kantu , ntabwo babyiyumvishije ubwo nababwiraga ko nafashije mu gukora indege tuzagendamo tuva i Cape Town twerekeza i Cairo.
Ariko ubu baranyishimiye cyane".
Megan ni we watangije umushinga wo gukora iyo ndege, ndetse abandi bo muri iryo tsinda bajonjowe mu bakandida barenga 1000 bari babisabye.
Megan ni umwe muri batandatu muri iryo tsinda babonye uruhushya rwo gutwara indege.
Uko ari batandatu, bazagenda bakuranwa gutwara iyo ndege - iriho amakarita y’Afurika ku mababa yayo yombi ndetse n’ibirango by’abaterankunga.
Megan yagize ati " Kubona uruhushya rwo gutwara indege bingana no kubona impamyabumenyi.
Kubigeraho mu gihe nari mfite n’ibizamini byo hagati mu mwaka nagombaga gukora, ntabwo byari byoroshye".
Mu kwezi kwa cumi umwaka ushize, Megan ni bwo yakoze ibizamini bisoza amasomo, akaba yarabyiteguraga ari nako akora imyiteguro y’uru rugendo rw’indege nkuko BBC dukesha iyi nkuru ibitangaza.
Aba banyeshuri b’ingimbi n’abangavu ubwo bateranyaga iyo ndege yo mu bwoko bwa Sling 4 ,“” igikorwa gifata amasaha 3000 abantu bakuze Umunyeshuri Agnes Keamogetswe Seemela w’imyaka 15 y’amavuko yicaye m ndege we na bagenzi be bo muri Afurika y’Epfo bakoze Abapilote bayo, uhereye i bumoso: Hendrik Coetzer, Megan Werner and Agnes Seemela Ikarita y’urugendo rwabo Barateganya guhagarara mu Rwanda basubira iwabo Papa we, Des Werner, ni umupilote utwara indege zisanzwe z’abagenzi.
Avuga ko ubusanzwe bifata amasaha 3000 abantu bakuze guteranya indege yo mu bwoko bwa Sling 4.
Yagize ati "[Ayo masaha] Uyagabanyije n’abana 20 niyo mpamvu ushobora kubikora mu byumweru bitatu.
Moteri n’ibyuma by’imbere mu ndege byakozwe n’impuguke, ariko ibindi byose bijyanye no gukora indege byakozwe n’abana".
Mu gusubira muri Afurika y’Epfo basoje urugendo rw’i Cairo, aba banyeshuri bavuga ko bazanyura mu yindi nzira, bagahagarara muri Uganda, mu Rwanda, Zambiya na Botswana.
Indi ndege yo muri ubu bwoko bwa Sling 4 itwawe n’abapilote b’impuguke, izaherekeza abo bana mu rugendo rwabo.
Aba bana bavuga ko bateganya kugenda baganiriza urundi rubyiruko rw’aho bazagenda banyura mu kurukangurira gushirika ubute.
Megan yagize ati: "Ni ibintu byiza cyane kubona ukuntu abantu bishimiye igikorwa cyacu.
Byanteye gusesa urumeza".

#25603#	11	people	http://www.igihe.com/abantu/success-stories/article/urugendo-rwa-jesse-umwe-mu-nkingi-zazamuye-abanyamakuru-bakomeye-mu-rwanda
Urugendo rwa Jesse, umwe mu nkingi zazamuye abanyamakuru bakomeye mu Rwanda (Video) Jesse Maxella Kiyingi, wamenyekanye nka ‘Da’ African Son’ ku maradiyo atandukanye mu gihugu uhereye kuri Radio Flash FM, Contact FM, KFM, Royal FM na Kiss FM; ni umwe mu bafatwa nk’inkingi ya mwamba mu itangazamakuru ryo mu Rwanda bitewe n’uruhare rwe mu kugaragaza impano nshya.
Yamenyekanye cyane mu biganiro byo mu rurimi rw’icyongereza, abenshi bamwibukira ku cyitwa ‘Breakfast in the city’ na ‘Easy Sunday’ kuri Radio Flash akaba muri kamere ye umuntu ucisha make udakunda kugaragara mu ruhame ahubwo ‘wihugiraho’.
Yavukiye muri Uganda, akura arota kuba umunyamategeko kurusha uko yakwiga ibijyanye na siyansi.
Gusa, yaje kwisanga muri Makerere University yiga ibijyanye n’ubukungu kuko yatekerezaga ko nabyo byazamuhesha kuba umuntu wiyubashye.
Uko yinjiye mu itangazamakuru… Jesse asobanura ko ubwo yigaga ibijyanye n’ubukungu, mu kiruhuko yaje gusoma mu kinyamakuru ko hari amahirwe ku bashaka kwiga ibijyanye na radiyo na televiziyo; abyinjiramo gutyo.
Ati “Nyuma yaho, umuntu yaje kumbwira ngo ufite ijwi ryiza, wakora kuri radiyo.
Ntangira gukora kuri radiyo mu biruhuko n’ikindi gihe nabaga ndi ku ishuri.
Kuva ubwo sindarivamo.
Nari nkiri muto, umunsi umwe umuntu yakunze ijwi ryanjye, aza kundeba kuri radiyo turaganira gusa yahise ajya mu Bwongereza, turakomeza turavugana.
Ni we wambwiye ngo nzaze gusura umuryango we mu Rwanda.”
Mu 2005 ubwo yazaga gusura umuryango w’umuntu wakunze ijwi rye amwumvise kuri radiyo, yari akiri umunyeshuri, gusa akundwa n’uwo muryango umusaba kuba yaguma mu Rwanda ariko anakomeza amasomo ye muri Uganda.
Ni umwe mu batangiye kuri radiyo bahembwa agatubutse Mu gihe itangazamakuru ryari rigicumbagira bihambaye, Jesse yatangiye akora kuri Radio Flash mu 2005, ahembwa amafaranga ibihumbi 250.
Ni mu gihe ahandi hari higanje abakorerabushake n’abahembwa ay’intica ntikize nk’ibihumbi 30 Frw cyangwa 50.
Ati “Mu 2005, guhembwa ibihumbi 250 Frw kuri radiyo, ndakeka nari umwe muri ba bantu bahembwa neza.
Ndibuka bagenzi banjye bahembwaga 20, 30 abandi bakorera ubuntu.
Icyo gihe naje hano, Radio Flash FM irambwira ngo irampemba ibihumbi 250 Frw, ndavuga nti ni amafaranga meza nanjye yamfasha kwibeshaho nsubiye muri Uganda.”
Aha ni mu mpera za 2017 ubwo yashyikirizwaga igihembo cyagenewe Radio Kiss FM nk'iya kabiri ikunzwe mu gihugu Ikinyarwanda cyabaye imbogamizi Mu myaka ya mbere mu Rwanda, asobanura ko yari acumbitse mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku Gisozi.
Ngo umunsi umwe, yageze ku Kinamba ahasanga icyapa cya MTN cyanditseho ijambo ‘Bite?’
Ibyo byatumye yibaza icyo bisobanuye, abisanisha n’icyongereza ku ijambo ‘bite’ [kuruma ukoresheje amenyo].
Ati “Byansabye nk’imyaka itatu kugira ngo ntangire nibone mu Kinyarwanda, ngikunde.
Numvaga nakomeza kuvuga icyongereza, kuko sinatekereza ko nzamara imyaka myinshi mu Rwanda.”
Nk’umwe mu bantu bamaze igihe kinini mu itangazamakuru ryo mu Rwanda, asobanura ko irijyanye na radiyo ryahindutse cyane uhereye ku buryo amajwi asigaye asohoka, ndetse bigahurirana n’uko hari ihangana ku murimo.
Ibikwiye kuranga umunyamakuru mwiza w’ibiganiro Jesse asobanura ko mu myaka yo hambere, wasangaga abantu bumva ko umunyamakuru mwiza w’ibiganiro kuri radiyo ari ufite ijwi ryiza gusa ngo muri iki gihe byarahindutse.
Ati “Bisaba ko uhuza ubushobozi bwawe karemano ni ukuvuga ijwi ryawe, uburyo witsa mu mivugire; ukanashyiramo imbaraga.
Niba ushaka kuba umunyamakuru mwiza, bigusaba gusoma, ukora ubushakashatsi; ugomba kumenya ibigezweho, ugomba kumva amaradiyo atari ukumva amakuru ahubwo ugamije kumva uko abandi bakora.
Icy’ingenzi kurusha byose ni uko kumenya kubara inkuru bikugira umunyamakuru w’igitangaza.”
Ibi nibyo Jesse aheraho avuga ko umwe mu banyamakuru beza u Rwanda rufite muri iki gihe ari Sandrine Isheja Butera.
Uyu mugore yamamaye kuri Radio Isango Star avuye kuri Salus FM akomereza no ku yandi nka KFM mbere yo kujya gukora kuri Kiss FM.
Ati “Buri gitondo aba ari kubara inkuru yaba inkuru z’urukundo, cyangwa se iz’ihumure kandi aba afite abantu benshi bamukurikiye kuko aba ari kubara inkuru.
Habazaho undi munyamakuru wa radiyo mwiza nka Sandrine, yego.
Ariko umunyamakuru mwiza ubara inkuru ni Sandrine.”
Ni umwe mu bazamuye impano z’abanyamakuru bazwi mu gihugu Benshi mu banyamakuru yaba abamenyekanye mu biganiro bisanzwe cyangwa mu mikino, bazamuwe na Jesse wagiye ubatinyura, akababwira ko bashoboye.
Niwe wahaye Nkusi Arthur igitekerezo cyo kuba yakwiyita ‘Rutura’ ku buryo biba izina abantu bamumenyeraho byoroshye.
Uwera Maurice ukora mu ishami ry’amakuru n’ibiganiro kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda asobanura ko bahuriye muri hoteli yakoragamo mu Kinigi i Musanze hanyuma Jesse yumvise ijwi rye amusaba ko yazajya kumureba kuri Radio Flash.
Aganira na IGIHE, Uwera yagize ati “Njye navuga ko ubumenyi yampaye nta kaminuza n’imwe ibwigisha.
Twahuye mvuye gukora muri hoteli, nari maze imyaka irindwi muri hoteli ariko nakundaga kunenga abanyamakuru batandukanye.
Ubwo twahuraga rero, yarambwiye ngo ngwino uvugane na nyiri radiyo, ntangira ntyo.”
“Ni wa muntu iyo yakubonyemo impano, aragufasha, yakundaga kumbwira ngo ‘ndabizi ibi wabishobora’.
Natangiye ntashobora kuvuga ikintu icyo aricyo cyose cya politiki, mbese niwe wagejeje benshi muri twe aho turi ubu.”
Jesse kandi yagize uruhare mu kuzamura impano z’abandi barimo Theogene Rugimbana ukora mu ishami ry’urubuga rw’imikino kuri Radio One na mugenzi we Rutamu Elie Joe.
Ati “Hari umugore twahuriye muri restaurant i Kampala, ndamubwira nti ufite ijwi nk’irya Juliana Kanyomozi [icyo gihe yari umwe mu bagezweho mu gihugu] nti ariko ubashije kurikoresha; byakugeza aheza.
Uyu munsi ni umwe mu banyamakuru bakomeye muri Uganda.
Naramutwaye mujyana mu kiganiro cyanjye, mumenyereza ibyumweru bike ubundi ndamureka.
Kubona abanyempano rimwe na rimwe ni amahirwe.”
Uyu mugabo kandi niwe wagize uruhare mu iterambere ry’abanyamakuru nka Peter Muyombano wahembwe nk’umunyamakuru w’umwaka mu 2017; Vital Karangwa uyobora Ishami ry’amakuru kuri Radio Flash Fm n’abandi benshi.
Yishimira ko yatanze umusanzu mu kuzamura Radio mu Rwanda Jesse akomeza agira ati “Ndatekereza ko naba naragize uruhare mu iterambere ryo kubyaza amafaranga radiyo mu Rwanda.
Ubwo nari kuri Contact FM, hatangijwe ikiganiro cyitwaga Cross Fire.
Cyakorwaga na Charles Haba na Arthur Asiimwe [uyobora RBA] ninjye watunganyaga ikiganiro cyabo.
Twatangije urugendo rwo kuvuga ngo mu Rwanda, hashobora kubaho ibiganiro mpaka kuri radiyo?
Icyo gihe hari ubwoba bw’ibyo umuntu yavuga cyangwa adakwiye kuvuga.”
Nyuma yaje kugira uruhare mu gutangiza ikiganiro cyitwa Good Morning Rwanda kuri Flass FM, kigira uruhare mu guhindura imyumvire y’Abanyarwanda no gukemura ibibazo bitandukanye byaba byagitambukijwemo.
Ikindi yishimira ni uko hari uburyo ibigo byagiye bihindura imyumvire, bigakangukira kwamamaza ibikorwa byabyo ku buryo byinjiriza amafaranga amaradiyo kandi nabyo bikamenyakana.
Urugendo rw’itangazamakuru mu Rwanda ruracyari rurerure Jesse asobanura ko itangazamakuru mu Rwanda rigifite urugendo rurerure kugira ngo rigere ku rwego rwo mu bindi bihugu uhereye ku kuba abanyamakuru badashyira imbaraga mu gukora inkuru zigaruka cyane ku buzima bw’igihugu n’abaturage.
Yaguze ati “Nk’umunyamakuru, nkwiye kugaragaza ibibura nkasaba ko hari igikorwa.
Rimwe na rimwe ku ruhande rwacu ntidukora ibyo twagakwiriye niyo mpamvu uzasanga ubwiganze bw’inkuru za siporo ubure biriya bindi by’ingenzi.
Umunyamakuru wo mu Rwanda akwiye kurebana ubushishozi inkingi zigize u Rwanda zose ziri muri Vision 2020; buri munsi dukwiye kuba twibaza ngo turi he?”
“Uyu munsi ni 2018, twari dukwiye kuba twibaza ibibazo by’ingenzi tuti ni he twananiwe.
Ese turi kugera ku cyerekezo 2020, iyo wumvise inkuru dufite kuri radiyo ntabwo zigaruka ku cyerekezo 2020 ahubwo ibyo dufite ni shampiyona y’u Bwongereza, indirimbo nshya ya Jay Polly.
Dukeneye inkuru zigaragaza uko iki gihugu kiri gutera imbere, dukeneye kureba ese iri shoramari riri gukorwa, inyungu zizaza ryari ku buryo bitazaba umutwaro ku gihugu.
Abakoze amakosa bakabiryozwa.”
Jesse yemeza ko Sandrine Isheja ari we munyamakuru wa mbere mu Rwanda Jesse amaze kwandika izina rikomeye mu itangazamakuru ryo kuri radiyo mu Rwanda biturutse ku ijwi rye rikundwa na benshi Peter Muyombano uherutse guhembwa nk'umunyamakuru w'umwaka mu Rwanda ni umwe mu bazamuwe na Jesse Isheja Sandrine yamamaye mu biganiro byo kuri Radio Isango Star na KFM yanyuzeho na Kiss FM abarizwaho Rutamu Elie Joe wa Radio 1 (ubanza iburyo) yafashijwe na Jesse kuzamura impano ye mu itangazamakuru ubwo yari akiri umunyeshuri i Nyagatare

Umugabo wa Butera Knowless yashyize hanze ifoto y’umukobwa wabo w’imfura bari kogana muri Pisine[AMAFOTO] Nkuko byagiye bitangazwa na benshi mu babonye iyi foto bakomeje kugaruka cyane ku kwibanda ku kanyamuneza kagaragara ku maso y’aba bombi.
Iyi foto yashyizwe hanze na Producer Clement igaragaza aba bombi bari muri piscine barimo koga.
Ni kenshi abafana ba Butera Knowless na Clement ndetse n’abakurikiranira hafi showbizz nyarwanda bakomeje kugenda bavuga ko ari Clement ndetse na Knowless badakunze gushyira hanze ifoto y’umukobwa wabo gusa kuri iyi nshuro, umukobwa wabo uzwi ku izina rya Ishimwe Butera Or yagaragaye ari kumwe na Se.
Umuhanzikazi Butera Knowless ni umwe mu bahanzikazi nyarwanda batigeze bagaragaza umwana wabo kuva yavuka,gusa we akavuga ko ari ubushake ndetse bizafasha umwana wabo.
Akenshi yakundaga no kubazwa n’itangazamakuru impano amubonamo gusa agahishura ko hari byinshi amubonamo gusa akemeza ko atarasobanukirwa nicyo yiyumvamo cyane.
Mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana n’itangazamakuru yavuze ko umwana we ku myaka 3 yararimo kumwereka ibintu bidasanzwe birimo impano zitandukanye zirimo gukina amanota kuri piano ndetse ngo abona azavamo umuririmbyi mwiza.
Ati: “ Umukobwa wanjye agerageza byinshi.
Iyo ndirimba nawe ararimba, twakina umupira nawe akawutera ndetse ubu azi no gukina amanota amwe ya piano.”
Knowless avuga ko impano iyo ariyo yose azabona mu mwana we azamufasha kuyizamura, ngo ikibi ni uko yaba ihabanye n’amategeko cyangwa imwangiriza isura(yaba iy’umwana cyangwa iy’umuryango we.)
Umwana wa Knowless kandi afite amahirwe yo kumenya gukoresha ibyuma bya muzika bitandukanye kuko Nyina ari umuririmbyi, Se akaba umwe mu bahanga mu gutunganya muzika bakomeye mu Rwanda.
Clement Ishimwe afite icyumba atunganyirizamo umuziki cyizwi mu Rwanda kitwa Kina Music ibi rero bibaha ikizere ko azabimenya vuba kandi bitagoranye.

Airtel Rwanda yagabanyije ibiciro byo guhamagara Yanditswe na Thamimu Hakizimana Kuya 25 Mutarama 2017 saa 10:54 Yasuwe : XX Yavuzweho : 3 0 Sosiyete y'itumanaho, Airtel Rwanda yagabanyije ibiciro byo guhamagara ibinyujije muri serivise yayo nshya yise "Tera Story".

#25619#	6	religion	http://www.igihe.com/iyobokamana/ibiterane/article/ku-nshuro-ya-kane-mu-rwanda-hagiye
Ku nshuro ya kane mu Rwanda hagiye kubera igiterane cy'abagore Yanditswe kuya 16-07-2014 saa 18:08' na Kanyamibwa Patrick Mu Rwanda hagiye kubera igiterane ngarukamwaka ‘Abagore twese hamwe 2014' (All Women Together 2014) kigiye kuba ku nshuro ya 4.
Nk'uko byatangajwe na Apostle Alice Mignonne Kabera, Umuyobozi mukuru wa Women Foundation Ministries, ngo kino giterane uyu mwaka gifite umwihariko.
Yagize ati: "Umwaka wa 2014, ni igihe Imana ishaka ko Umugore w'umushunemu yubakira icyumba umuhanuzi Elisha.
Yatanze icyumba, abona umwana, ibye birarindwa, ndetse n'igihe umwana yapfuye, yarazutse kubw'icyumba yatanze. 
(...)
Mu Rwanda hagiye kubera igiterane ngarukamwaka ‘Abagore twese hamwe 2014' (All Women Together 2014) kigiye kuba ku nshuro ya 4.
Nk'uko byatangajwe na Apostle Alice Mignonne Kabera, Umuyobozi mukuru wa Women Foundation Ministries, ngo kino giterane uyu mwaka gifite umwihariko.
Yagize ati: "Umwaka wa 2014, ni igihe Imana ishaka ko Umugore w'umushunemu yubakira icyumba umuhanuzi Elisha.
Yatanze icyumba, abona umwana, ibye birarindwa, ndetse n'igihe umwana yapfuye, yarazutse kubw'icyumba yatanze.
(2 Abami 4:8).
Uyumunsi Imana ntidusaba ibyumba by'amazu yacu, ahubwo iradusaba ko tuyisubiza mu mitima yacu, ibyacu byari byarapfuye bikongera kubaho.
Reka twumve ubundi bwiza, Umuhanuzi dufite uyu munsi udahemuka, Udahinduka,uruta Elisha n'abandi, ni Yesu Kristu turaritse mur'iki giterane "Abagore twese hamwe" Nk'uko bigaragara ku rubuga rwabo www.wfm.rw, hari gahunda yateguwe y'ivugabutumwa rizatangwa n'abakozi b'Imana batandukanye bo mu bihugu nka Uganda, Canada, u Rwanda n'ahandi.
Iki giterane kikazamara iminsi 4, aho buri munsi kizajya gitangira saa kumi z'umugoroba (16h00/4pm) kikageza saa tatu z'ijoro, kibera kuri Women Foundation Ministries Kimihurura.
Abari gutegura iki giterane bakaba badutangarije ko Pastor Evah Mugerwa wo muri Uganda, uzwi ku buhamya bwubaka abari n'abategaruguri cyane nawe azaba ari muri iki giterane.
Uretse abashyitsi baturuste hanze bazaba bahari bonyine, ahubwo hazaba hari n'abagore ndeste n'abakobwa baturuste mu ntara zose z'u Rwanda bazatanga ubuhamya bwabo bwo kuva mu gutsikamirwa ujya mu bustinzi.
Hari n'abazafasha mu guhimbaza Imana no kuyiramya bazitabira muri iki giterane harimo Worship team ya Women Foundation Ministries izwi ku izina rya precious stones n'abandi beshi.
Nk'uko buri mwaka biba bimeze, intumbero n'intego y'igiterane ikaba ari "Kuva mu gustikamirwa tujya mu bustinzi" naho insanganyamatsiko ikaba "Umwami Mana yatanze itegeko abagore bamamaza inkuru baba benshi" biboneka mu gitabo cya Zaburi 68:12.
Iki giterane "All Women Together 2014" kikazatangira kuva kuwa kabiri tariki 29th Nyakanga 2014 kugeza kuwa Gatanu tariki ya mbere Kanama 2014.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#25620#	9	culture	http://www.igihe.com/umuco/umurage/umuco-wo-kwita-izina-ku-munsi-wa-munani-uragenda-ucika
Umuco wo 'Kwita izina' ku munsi wa munani uragenda ucika Yanditswe kuya 23-01-2013 saa 10:40' na Marie Chantal Nyirabera Umuhango wo kurya ubunnyano wakorwaga umwana amaze iminsi umunani avutse mu rwego rwo kumwita izina, kuri ubu ukorwa hake cyangwa ugahuzwa n'indi mihango nk'iyo kubatizwa k'umwana cyangwa guhemba umubyeyi.
Uyu muhango wakorwaga hambere abana batumiwe bahabwaga amata n'umutsima w'amasaka barangiza kurya bakita izina mugenzi wabo, usanga kuri ubu n'aho ukorwa kubera iterambere usimbuzwa ibindi biribwa nk'umuceri n'ibirayi ndetse n'inyama.
Umubyeyi ubyaye rimwe witwa Ukwigize, yadutangarije ko (...)
Umuhango wo kurya ubunnyano wakorwaga umwana amaze iminsi umunani avutse mu rwego rwo kumwita izina, kuri ubu ukorwa hake cyangwa ugahuzwa n'indi mihango nk'iyo kubatizwa k'umwana cyangwa guhemba umubyeyi.
Uyu muhango wakorwaga hambere abana batumiwe bahabwaga amata n'umutsima w'amasaka barangiza kurya bakita izina mugenzi wabo, usanga kuri ubu n'aho ukorwa kubera iterambere usimbuzwa ibindi biribwa nk'umuceri n'ibirayi ndetse n'inyama.
Umubyeyi ubyaye rimwe witwa Ukwigize, yadutangarije ko umwana we yamwise yanabatijwe hashize amezi abiri, ibi ngo bikaba byaratewe n'uko yabonaga ibikeneye gukorwa ari byinshi.
Abisobanura yagize ati "Muri iki gihe tureba ukuzigama no gukoresha amafaranga neza.
Ntabwo watumira abantu ngo baze kwita izina kandi uteganya kumubatirisha vuba.
Hari n'igihe bihurirana n'uko baje guhemba byose bigakorerwa rimwe.
Imico yakera kuri ubu ntigikurikizwa cyane."
Kimwe na Ukwigize, abenshi mu babyeyi baganiriye na IGIHE bavuga ko kwita izina umwana bigendana n'iterambere ry'aho igihugu kigeze; ubu ngo bikaba bitakiri ngombwa gutegereza iminsi umunani ngo umwana yitwe izina.
Umumararungu, ni umubyeyi w'abana babiri.
Ati "Abanjye bavuka bafite amazina.
Ibyo kubita biba ari umuhango wo guhuza inshuti n'umuryango, ariko ntibibuze ko udashobora kumwita n'iyo minsi irindwi yarenze cyangwa mbere yayo!
Ibihe byarahindutse sin ka kera!"
Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko iterambere ryahinduye inyumvire, n'abantu bakaba bategura ibirori by'umwana babanje kubyitegura neza nta kibihutisha kandi bigakorwa uko ababyeyi babyifuza.
Avuga ko ababishoboye bakubahiriza ya minsi umunani, ariko kuri we ngo inarenze nta kibazo abibonamo.
Hambere ababaga bitabiriye umunsi wo kwita izina babikoraga banifuriza umubyeyi gukomeza kwagura umuryango akabyara ibitsina byombi, ariko ubu umubyeyi agomba kubyara azirikana niba umutungo uzamufasha kurera abo abyaye.
Kuri ubu abenshi bahitamo kugabanya iminsi mikuru yo gusesagura nk'uko bamwe babidutangarije, bagahitamo guhuza iminsi mikuru bakorera umwana wabo nko kumubatirisha n'indi bakabikorera rimwe no 'kwita izina'.
Kwamamaza INKURU ZIHERUKA INKURU ZASOMWE CYANE

#25627#	2	security	http://www.kigalitoday.com/umutekano/imbere-mu-gihugu/article/bahangayikishijwe-n-abitwa-intaragahanga-babategera-mu-nzira-bakabahohotera
Bahangayikishijwe n'abitwa "Intaragahanga" babategera mu nzira bakabahohotera Abatuye i Mwili mu Karere ka Kayonza ngo bahangayikishijwe n'abitwa "Intaragahanga" bategera abaturage mu nzira bakabambura ibyo bafite bakanabahohotera.
Abo bantu bazwi ku izina ry'Intaragahanga ngo bahohotera cyane abaturage bo mu tugari twa Kageyo na Nyamugali kandi bakabahohotera ku manywa y'ihangu.
Bakamurera wigeze guhohoterwa n'intaragahanga ngo yifuza ko igihuru zibamo cyatemwa.
Abaturage b'i Kageyo bavuga ko Intaragahanga ziba mu gace kitwa Ryamutumo kagizwe n'imyobo y'ibirombe byacukurwagamo amabuye y'agaciro bikikijwe n'ibihuru impande n'impande.
Ngo zihisha muri iyo myobo n'ibihuru zitegereje abaturage banyura muri ako gace ngo zibambure ibyo bafite, ariko zikibasira cyane ab'igitsina gore nk'uko abo twavuganye babidutangarije.
Ferediyana Bazimaziki agira ati "Intaragahanga ni abantu tutazi, gusa urahanyura bakakwambura ndetse n'umubyeyi uhanyuze aba akeka ko bari bumugirire nabi."
Abaturage bahangayikishijwe n'intaragahanga zibahohotera.
Mukandamutsa Marigarita na we yungamo agira ati "Iyo tuvuye kuri SACCO udateze moto, bakwambura amafaranga bakakugirira nabi."
Ikibazo cy'izo Ntaragahanga ngo kimaze amezi agera kuri ane nk'uko abaturage twavuganye babiduhamirije.
Bavuga ko zibasubiza mu bukene kuko umuturage unyuze muri ako gace zibamo avuye kubikuza amafaranga kuri Sacco atayageza mu rugo.
Bakamurera Aurelia wigeze guhohoterwa n'Intaragahanga agira ati "Twifuza ko hakorwa umuganda bagatema ibyo bihuru kuko abo bantu bihisha muri ibyo bihuru n'imyobo."
Mukandamutsa kimwe n'abandi baturage bavuganye na Kigali Today, bo basaba ko muri ako gace kabamo Intaragahanga hashyirwa abantu barinda umutekano kugira ngo abaturage bajye bahanyura ntacyo bikanga.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza, John Mugabo, na we yemera ko izo ntaragahanga zihari ariko akavuga ko bazihagurukiye.
Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza, Mugabo John, avuga ko abo bantu bahohotera abaturage ari ababa mu birombe bagamije kwiba amabuye y'agaciro ku buryo iyo bahuye n'umuturage ubazi bamugirira nabi kuko baba banga ko yabavuga.
Gusa ngo ubuyobozi bw'akarere bufatanyije n'ibigo bicukura amabuye y'agaciro bugenda bufata bamwe muri izo Ntaragahanga bakigishwa bakanahabwa akazi, bamara guhabwa akazi "bakavuga bagenzi babo ku buryo bari gufatwa buhorobuhoro" nk'uko umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Kayonza abivuga.

#25652#	0	entertainment	http://www.umuryango.rw/imyidagaduro/umuziki/article/eddy-kenzo-yasuye-inzu-ye-yabanagamo-n-umugore-we-watwawe-n-undi-mugabo-asanga
Eddy Kenzo yasuye inzu ye yabanagamo n’umugore we watwawe n’undi mugabo asanga yatwaye ibintu byo mu nzu birimo na Televiziyo ya rutura[AMAFOTO] Rema yakoze ubukwe n’umugabo witwa Hamza w’umukire nawe wo mugihugu cya Uganda, ubu bari mu kwezi kwa buki.
Eddy Kenzo ntiyari akibana na Rema, imyaka 2 yari igiye gushira, uyu mugore yibana wenyine mu nzu ya Eddy Kenzo.
Uyu mugore yatangaje ko impamvu yanze Eddy Kenzo agashakana nundi mugabo ariko ngo Kenzo yari yaramutaye mu nzu wenyine, akaba ataranakoraga inshingano ze nk’umugabo murugo.
Eddy Kenzo nawe ashinja uyu wahoze ari umugore ko ari umugore wakundaga, ibintu kurusha abazima n’abapfuye kuburyo Kenzo atari akibashije kubana nawe, avugako yamutakazagaho arenga millioni 3 mucyumweru kimwe gusa.
Eddy Kenzo wari warataye Rema mu nzu amusigana n’umwana, yongeye gusubira aho babanaga, ngo icyamutunguye ni uburyo yasanze, inzu yarasahuwe ndetse ngo uyu mugore yahereye kuri televiziyo nini yabaga muri Salo.
